papers.title: Geometric Range Search on Encrypted Data With Forward/Backward Security
papers.authors: Shabnam Kasra Kermanshahi, Shifeng Sun, Joseph K. Liu, Ron Steinfeld, Surya Nepal, Wang Fat Lau, Man Ho Allen Au
papers.abstract: This article presents two dynamic symmetric searchable encryption schemes for geometric range search. Our constructions are the first to provide forward/backward security in the context of SSE-based schemes supporting geometric range search. Besides, we define a security notion called content privacy. This security notion captures the leakages that are critical in the context of geometric range search but not considered by forward/backward security. Content privacy eliminates the leakage on the updated points of the database during both search and update. Due to the inherent leakages associated with range queries, none of the existing related works can support content privacy, whereas the design of our constructions avoids such leakages. When compared to the state-of-the-art schemes, our constructions provide a higher level of security and practical efficiency supported by our experimental results.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了两个用于几何范围搜索的动态对称可搜索加密方案。我们的构造首次在支持几何范围搜索的基于SSE的方案的上下文中提供前向/后向安全性。此外，我们定义了一个叫做内容隐私的安全概念。这个安全概念捕获了在几何范围搜索的上下文中很关键的泄漏，但是前向/后向安全没有考虑这些泄漏。内容隐私消除了在搜索和更新期间数据库更新点的泄漏。由于与范围查询相关的固有泄漏，现有的相关作品都不能支持内容隐私，而我们的结构设计避免了这种泄漏。与最先进的方案相比，我们的构造提供了更高水平的安全性和实际效率，这得到了我们的实验结果的支持。
papers.title_zh: 具有前向/向后安全性的加密数据上的几何范围搜索

papers.title: Robust Detection of Malicious URLs With Self-Paced Wide & Deep Learning
papers.authors: Yunji Liang, Qiushi Wang, Kang Xiong, Xiaolong Zheng, Zhiwen Yu, Daniel Zeng
papers.abstract: As cybercrimes grow in scale with devastating economic costs, it is important to protect potential victims against diverse attacks. In spite of the diversity of cybercrimes, it is the uniform resource locators (URLs) that connect vulnerable users with potential attacks. Although numerous solutions (e.g., rule-based solutions and machine learning-based methods) are proposed for malicious URL detection, they cannot provide robust performance due to the diversity of cybercrimes and cannot cope with the explosive growth of malicious URLs with the evolution of obfuscation strategies. In this paper, we propose a deep learning-based system, dubbed as <italic>CyberLen</italic>, to detect malicious URLs robustly and effectively. Specifically, we use factorization machine (FM) to learn the latent interaction among lexical features. For the deep structural features, position embedding is introduced for token vectorization to reduce the ambiguity of URL tokens. Meanwhile, temporal convolution network (TCN) is utilized to learn the long-distance dependency among URL tokens. To fuse heterogeneous features, self-paced wide <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\&$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mo>&</mml:mo></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liang-ieq2-3121388.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> deep learning strategy is proposed to train a robust model effectively. The proposed solution is evaluated on a large-scale URL dataset. Our experimental results show that position embedding is constructive to reducing the ambiguity of URL tokens, and the self-paced wide <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\&$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mo>&</mml:mo></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liang-ieq3-3121388.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> deep learning strategy shows superior performance in terms of F1 score and convergence speed.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着网络犯罪的规模不断扩大，经济损失惨重，保护潜在受害者免受各种攻击变得非常重要。尽管网络犯罪多种多样，但将易受攻击的用户与潜在攻击联系起来的是统一资源定位符(URL)。尽管针对恶意URL检测提出了许多解决方案(例如，基于规则的解决方案和基于机器学习的方法)，但是由于网络犯罪的多样性，这些解决方案不能提供稳健的性能，并且不能应对恶意URL随着混淆策略的发展而爆炸式增长。在本文中，我们提出了一个基于深度学习的系统，称为< italic>CyberLen</italic >，用于鲁棒和有效地检测恶意URL。具体来说，我们使用因子分解机(FM)来学习词汇特征之间的潜在相互作用。对于深层结构特征，标记向量化引入了位置嵌入，减少了URL标记的二义性。同时，利用时间卷积网络(TCN)学习URL标记间的长距离依赖关系。为了融合异构特征，提出了自定步调的宽< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ & $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mo > & </MML:mo > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Liang-ieq 2-3121388 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >深度学习策略来有效地训练鲁棒模型。在大规模URL数据集上对所提出的解决方案进行了评估。我们的实验结果表明，位置嵌入有助于减少URL标记的歧义，并且自定步调的宽< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ & $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mo > & </MML:mo > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Liang-ieq 3-3121388 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >深度学习策略在以下方面表现出优越的性能
papers.title_zh: 具有自定进度的广泛和深度学习的恶意URL的可靠检测

papers.title: Alert-Driven Attack Graph Generation Using S-PDFA
papers.authors: Azqa Nadeem, Sicco Verwer, Stephen Moskal, Shanchieh Jay Yang
papers.abstract: Ideal cyber threat intelligence (CTI) includes insights into attacker strategies that are specific to a network under observation. Such CTI currently requires extensive expert input for obtaining, assessing, and correlating system vulnerabilities into a graphical representation, often referred to as an attack graph (AG). Instead of deriving AGs based on system vulnerabilities, this work advocates the direct use of intrusion alerts. We propose SAGE, an explainable sequence learning pipeline that automatically constructs AGs from intrusion alerts without a priori expert knowledge. SAGE exploits the temporal and probabilistic dependence between alerts in a suffix-based probabilistic deterministic finite automaton (S-PDFA) — a model that brings infrequent severe alerts into the spotlight and summarizes paths leading to them. Attack graphs are extracted from the model on a per-victim, per-objective basis. SAGE is thoroughly evaluated on three open-source intrusion alert datasets collected through security testing competitions in order to analyze distributed multi-stage attacks. SAGE compresses over 330k alerts into 93 AGs that show how specific attacks transpired. The AGs are succinct, interpretable, and provide directly relevant insights into strategic differences and fingerprintable paths. They even show that attackers tend to follow shorter paths after they have discovered a longer one in 84.5% of the cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 理想的网络威胁情报(CTI)包括对特定于被观察网络的攻击者策略的洞察。这种CTI目前需要大量的专家输入来获取、评估系统漏洞，并将其关联到图形表示中，通常称为攻击图(AG)。这项工作提倡直接使用入侵警报，而不是基于系统漏洞来导出AGs。我们提出SAGE，一个可解释的序列学习管道，它在没有先验专家知识的情况下从入侵警报中自动构造AGs。SAGE在基于后缀的概率确定性有限自动机(S-PDFA)中利用了警报之间的时间和概率相关性，这是一种将不常见的严重警报置于聚光灯下并总结导致它们的路径的模型。攻击图是基于每个受害者、每个目标从模型中提取的。SAGE在通过安全测试竞赛收集的三个开源入侵警报数据集上进行了全面评估，以分析分布式多阶段攻击。SAGE将超过33万个警报压缩成93个ag，显示特定攻击是如何发生的。AGs简洁明了，易于理解，并为战略差异和可指纹化的途径提供了直接相关的见解。他们甚至表明，在84.5%的情况下，攻击者在发现较长的路径后会倾向于选择较短的路径。
papers.title_zh: 使用S-PDFA的警报驱动攻击图生成

papers.title: Phishing Email Detection Using Persuasion Cues
papers.authors: Rohit Valecha, Pranali Mandaokar, H. Raghav Rao
papers.abstract: Phishing is an attempt to acquire sensitive information from an unsuspecting victim by malicious means. Recent studies have shown that phishers often use persuasion techniques to get positive responses from the recipients. Still missing from this literature are studies assessing effectiveness of persuasion cues in phishing email detection. Specifically focusing on gain and loss persuasion cues, we address the following research questions: In detecting phishing emails, (1) how effective are the gain persuasion cues, (2) how effective are the loss persuasion cues, and (3) how effective is an integrated model of gain and loss persuasion? In order to address the research questions, we create three machine learning models, with relevant gain persuasion cues, loss persuasion cues, and combined gain and loss persuasion cues respectively, and compare the estimates with a baseline model that does not account for the persuasion cues. The results show that the three phishing detection models with relevant persuasion cues significantly outperform the baseline model by approximately 5% to 20% percent in terms of F-score, thus representing reliable methods for phishing email detection. The objective of this study is to develop anti-phishing methods that utilize persuasion cues for detecting phishing emails. Such research is useful because a deeper understanding of persuasion cues can inform the design of effective countermeasures for detecting and blocking phishing emails.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络钓鱼是指试图通过恶意手段从不知情的受害者那里获取敏感信息。最近的研究表明，网络钓鱼者经常使用说服技巧来获得收件人的积极回应。该文献中仍然缺少评估在检测网络钓鱼电子邮件中劝说线索有效性的研究。特别关注收益和损失说服线索，我们解决以下研究问题:在检测钓鱼电子邮件时，(1)收益说服线索有多有效，(2)损失说服线索有多有效，以及(3)收益和损失说服的综合模型有多有效？为了解决研究问题，我们创建了三个机器学习模型，分别具有相关的增益说服线索、损失说服线索以及组合的增益和损失说服线索，并将估计值与不考虑说服线索的基线模型进行比较。结果显示，具有相关说服线索的三个网络钓鱼检测模型在F分数方面显著优于基线模型大约5%到20%,因此代表了用于网络钓鱼电子邮件检测的可靠方法。本研究的目的是开发反网络钓鱼方法，利用说服线索来检测网络钓鱼电子邮件。这种研究是有用的，因为对说服线索的更深入理解可以为检测和阻止钓鱼电子邮件的有效对策的设计提供信息。
papers.title_zh: 使用说服提示的网络钓鱼电子邮件检测

papers.title: Explainable Intelligence-Driven Defense Mechanism Against Advanced Persistent Threats: A Joint Edge Game and AI Approach
papers.authors: Huiling Li, Jun Wu, Hansong Xu, Gaolei Li, Mohsen Guizani
papers.abstract: Advanced persistent threats (APT) have novel features such as long-term latency, precision strikes and uncertain strategies. APT poses severe threats to the resource-limited edge devices in advanced networks. Cyber threat intelligence (CTI) conducts data analysis on attack strategies by artificial intelligence (AI) and generates threat intelligence to optimize the detection model and guide defense strategies. However, AI lacks explanations for the decisions and thus reduces the transparency and performance of the detection model. Besides, the tradeoff between the detection accuracy and the computational resource limitation of edge devices needs an optimal and rapid dynamic resource allocation method, which edge game and AI can help. In this article, we propose an explainable intelligence-driven APT edge defense mechanism. The proposed mechanism provides guidelines and explanations for designing the defense strategy and resource allocation scheme of the edge defender to detect APT. The edge defense strategy model is based on edge Bayesian Stackelberg game and CTI. Meanwhile, we implement a DRL-based resource allocation scheme to meet rapid response requirements at the edges. We demonstrate that the proposed mechanism can improve the protection level of edges and defense capability against APT through extensive experiments.
papers.abstract_zh: 高级持久威胁(APT)具有长期潜伏、精确打击和不确定策略等新特征。APT对高级网络中资源有限的边缘设备构成了严重威胁。网络威胁情报(CTI)通过人工智能(AI)对攻击策略进行数据分析，生成威胁情报，优化检测模型，指导防御策略。然而，AI缺乏对决策的解释，因此降低了检测模型的透明度和性能。此外，边缘设备的检测精度和计算资源限制之间的权衡需要一种优化和快速的动态资源分配方法，边缘游戏和人工智能可以帮助实现这一点。在本文中，我们提出了一个可解释的智能驱动的APT边缘防御机制。所提出的机制为设计边缘防御方检测APT的防御策略和资源分配方案提供了指导和解释。边缘防御策略模型基于边缘贝叶斯Stackelberg博弈和CTI。同时，我们实现了基于DRL的资源分配方案，以满足边缘的快速响应要求。通过大量的实验，我们证明了该机制能够提高边缘的保护水平和防御APT的能力。
papers.title_zh: 可解释以情报驱动的防御机制，以防止先进的持久威胁：联合边缘游戏和AI方法

papers.title: Open Source Intelligence for Malicious Behavior Discovery and Interpretation
papers.authors: Yi-Ting Huang, Chi Yu Lin, Ying-Ren Guo, Kai-Chieh Lo, Yeali S. Sun, Meng Chang Chen
papers.abstract: Cyber threats are one of the most pressing issues in the digital age. There has been a consensus on deploying a proactive defense to effectively detect and respond to adversary threats. The key to success is understanding the characteristics of malware, including their activities and manipulated resources on the target machines. The MITRE ATT&CK framework (ATT&CK), a popular source of open source intelligence (OSINT), provides rich information and knowledge about adversary lifecycles and attack behaviors. The main challenges of this study involve knowledge collection from ATT&CK, malicious behavior identification using deep learning, and the identification of associated API calls. A MITRE ATT&CK based Malicious Behavior Analysis system (MAMBA) for Windows malware is proposed, which incorporates ATT&CK knowledge and considers attentions on manipulated resources and malicious activities in the neural network model. To synchronize ATT&CK updates in a timely manner, knowledge collection can be an automatic and incremental process. Given these features, MAMBA achieves the best performance of malicious behavior discovery among all the compared learning-based methods and rule-based approaches on all datasets; it also yields a highly interpretable mapping from the discovered malicious behaviors to relevant ATT&CK techniques, as well as to the related API calls.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络威胁是数字时代最紧迫的问题之一。部署主动防御以有效检测和应对对手威胁已成为共识。成功的关键是了解恶意软件的特征，包括它们在目标机器上的活动和被操纵的资源。米特ATT和CK框架(ATT和CK)，一个流行的开源情报(OSINT)来源，提供了关于对手生命周期和攻击行为的丰富信息和知识。这项研究的主要挑战包括从ATT和CK收集知识，使用深度学习识别恶意行为，以及识别相关的API调用。提出了一种基于米特ATT和CK的恶意行为分析系统(MAMBA ),该系统结合了ATT和CK的知识，并在神经网络模型中考虑了对被操纵资源和恶意活动的关注。为了及时同步ATT和CK的更新，知识收集可以是一个自动的增量过程。鉴于这些特征，在所有数据集上，在所有比较的基于学习的方法和基于规则的方法中，MAMBA实现了恶意行为发现的最佳性能；它还产生了从发现的恶意行为到相关的ATT和CK技术，以及相关的API调用的高度可解释的映射。
papers.title_zh: 恶意行为发现和解释的开源智能

papers.title: An Explainable Multi-Modal Hierarchical Attention Model for Developing Phishing Threat Intelligence
papers.authors: Yidong Chai, Yonghang Zhou, Weifeng Li, Yuanchun Jiang
papers.abstract: Phishing website attack, as one of the most persistent forms of cyber threats, evolves and remains a major cyber threat. Various detection methods (e.g., lookup systems, fraud cue-based methods) have been proposed to identify phishing websites. The limitations of lookup systems (e.g., failing to address newly created attacks) and the fraud cue-based methods (e.g., relying on feature engineering) motivated the development of deep representation-based methods capable of learning deep fraud cues for enhanced anti-phishing capacity. Focusing mostly on URLs, these methods fail to analyze other two important modalities of website content: textual information and visual design. Moreover, the interpretability of these deep learning based methods is limited, reducing model trustworthiness and preventing relevant and actionable intelligence. As such, we propose a multi-modal hierarchical attention model (MMHAM) which jointly learns the deep fraud cues from the three major modalities of website content for phishing website detection. Specifically, MMHAM features an innovative shared dictionary learning approach for aligning representations from different modalities in the attention mechanism. In our evaluation experiments, the proposed MMHAM not only learned improved deep cues for enhanced phishing detection, but provided a hierarchical interpretability system from which we could develop phishing threat intelligence to inform phishing websites detection at different levels.
papers.abstract_zh: 钓鱼网站攻击作为最持久的网络威胁形式之一，不断演变，仍然是一种主要的网络威胁。已经提出了各种检测方法(例如，查找系统、基于欺诈线索的方法)来识别网络钓鱼网站。查找系统的局限性(例如，未能解决新创建的攻击)和基于欺诈线索的方法(例如，依赖于特征工程)推动了能够学习深度欺诈线索以增强反网络钓鱼能力的基于深度表示的方法的发展。这些方法主要集中在URL上，没有分析网站内容的另外两个重要形态:文本信息和视觉设计。此外，这些基于深度学习的方法的可解释性有限，降低了模型的可信度，并阻止了相关和可操作的情报。因此，我们提出了一种多模态分层注意力模型(MMHAM ),它从网站内容的三个主要模态中联合学习深度欺诈线索，用于钓鱼网站检测。具体来说，MMHAM采用了一种创新的共享字典学习方法，用于对齐注意力机制中不同模态的表示。在我们的评估实验中，所提出的MMHAM不仅学习了用于增强的网络钓鱼检测的改进的深度线索，而且提供了分层的可解释性系统，从该系统我们可以开发网络钓鱼威胁情报，以通知不同级别的网络钓鱼网站检测。
papers.title_zh: 一个可解释的多模式分层注意模型，用于开发网络钓鱼威胁智能

papers.title: GCI: A GPU-Based Transfer Learning Approach for Detecting Cheats of Computer Game
papers.authors: Md Shihabul Islam, Bo Dong, Swarup Chandra, Latifur Khan, Bhavani Thuraisingham
papers.abstract: Cheating in massive multiple online games (MMOGs) adversely affect the game’s popularity and reputation among its users. Therefore, game developers invest large amount of efforts to detect and prevent cheats that provide an unfair advantage to cheaters over other naive users during game play. Particularly, MMOG clients share data with the server during game play. Game developers leverage this data to detect cheating. However, detecting cheats is challenging mainly due to the limited client-side information, along with unknown and complex cheating techniques. In this article, we aim to leverage machine learning-based models to predict cheats over encrypted game traffic during game play. Concretely, network game traffic during game play from each player can be used to determine whether a cheat is employed. A major challenge in developing such a prediction model is the availability of sufficient training data, which is sparingly available in practice. Game traffic obtained from a few known players can be easily labeled. However, if such players are not a good representation of the population (i.e., other players), then a supervised model trained on labeled game traffic from these set of players may not generalize well for the population. Here, we propose a Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) based scalable transfer learning approach to overcome the constraints of limited labeled data. Our empirical evaluation on a popular MMOG demonstrates significant improvement in cheat prediction compared to other competing methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 大型多人在线游戏(MMOGs)中的作弊行为会对游戏在用户中的受欢迎程度和声誉产生不利影响。因此，游戏开发者投入大量的努力来检测和防止作弊，这些作弊在游戏过程中为作弊者提供了相对于其他天真用户的不公平优势。特别地，MMOG客户端在玩游戏期间与服务器共享数据。游戏开发者利用这些数据来检测作弊。然而，检测作弊是具有挑战性的，主要是由于有限的客户端信息，以及未知和复杂的作弊技术。在本文中，我们旨在利用基于机器学习的模型来预测游戏过程中加密游戏流量的作弊行为。具体而言，在玩游戏期间来自每个玩家的网络游戏流量可以用于确定是否使用了作弊。开发这种预测模型的一个主要挑战是获得足够的训练数据，而实际上这种数据很少。从几个已知玩家获得的游戏流量可以很容易地被标记。然而，如果这样的玩家不是群体(即，其他玩家)的良好代表，则在来自这些玩家集合的标记游戏流量上训练的监督模型可能不能很好地概括该群体。这里，我们提出了一种基于图形处理器(GPU)的可扩展迁移学习方法来克服有限标记数据的限制。我们在一个流行的MMOG上的实证评估表明，与其他竞争方法相比，欺骗预测有显著的改进。
papers.title_zh: GCI：一种基于GPU的转移学习方法，用于检测计算机游戏的作弊

papers.title: Greyhound: Directed Greybox Wi-Fi Fuzzing
papers.authors: Matheus E. Garbelini, Chundong Wang, Sudipta Chattopadhyay
papers.abstract: The recent rise in complex Wi-Fi vulnerabilities, such as KRACK and Dragonslayer, indicates the critical need for effective Wi-Fi protocol testing tools. In this article, we conceptualize, design and implement a directed fuzzing methodology named Greyhound that automatically tests the Wi-Fi client implementations against vulnerabilities such as crashes or non-compliant behaviors. Leveraging a holistic Wi-Fi protocol model, Greyhound directs the fuzzer in specific states of target Wi-Fi client. By exchanging mutated packets with a Wi-Fi client, Greyhound aims to induce the client to exhibit anomalous behaviors that badly deviate from Wi-Fi protocols. We have implemented Greyhound and evaluated it on a variety of real-world Wi-Fi clients, including smartphone, Raspberry Pi, IoT device microcontrollers and a medical device. Our evaluation indicates that Greyhound not only automatically discovers known vulnerabilities (including KRACK and Dragonslayer) that would require specialized verification otherwise, but, more importantly, it also has uncovered four new vulnerabilities in popular Wi-Fi client devices. All discovered vulnerabilities have been confirmed by manufacturers and they have been assigned three different common vulnerability exposure (CVE) IDs. We also win a bug bounty of 2,200 USD for discovering the security vulnerabilities. Furthermore, our evaluation with three existing Wi-Fi fuzz testing tools reveals that all such tools fail to discover any of the vulnerabilities (including crashes) uncovered by Greyhound. Last but not the least, we have deployed Greyhound to test the Wi-Fi client implementation on automotive head units. Greyhound automatically discovers KRACK, Dragonslayer and other anomalies in these Wi-Fi implementations. Such a real world try-out justifies the necessity and efficacy of Greyhound.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近复杂的Wi-Fi漏洞(如KRACK和Dragonslayer)的增加表明了对有效的Wi-Fi协议测试工具的迫切需要。在本文中，我们概念化、设计并实现了一个名为Greyhound的定向模糊化方法，该方法可以自动测试Wi-Fi客户端实现是否存在漏洞，如崩溃或不兼容行为。利用整体Wi-Fi协议模型，灰狗在目标Wi-Fi客户端的特定状态下指示模糊器。通过与Wi-Fi客户端交换变异的数据包，灰狗旨在诱导客户端表现出严重偏离Wi-Fi协议的异常行为。我们已经实现了Greyhound，并在各种现实世界的Wi-Fi客户端上对其进行了评估，包括智能手机、Raspberry Pi、物联网设备微控制器和一种医疗设备。我们的评估表明，灰狗不仅可以自动发现已知的漏洞(包括KRACK和Dragonslayer ),否则需要专门的验证，但更重要的是，它还在流行的Wi-Fi客户端设备中发现了四个新的漏洞。所有发现的漏洞都已经过制造商确认，并被分配了三个不同的通用漏洞暴露(CVE)id。我们还因为发现安全漏洞赢得了2200美元的bug奖金。此外，我们对三个现有Wi-Fi模糊测试工具的评估表明，所有这些工具都无法发现灰狗发现的任何漏洞(包括崩溃)。最后但同样重要的是，我们已经部署了灰狗来测试汽车主机上的Wi-Fi客户端实现。灰狗会自动发现这些Wi-Fi实现中的KRACK、Dragonslayer和其他异常。这种真实世界的尝试证明了灰狗的必要性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: 灵狮：指导的灰盒Wi-Fi模糊

papers.title: Highly Efficient and Re-Executable Private Function Evaluation With Linear Complexity
papers.authors: Osman Biçer, Muhammed Ali Bingöl, Mehmet Sabir Kiraz, Albert Levi
papers.abstract: Private function evaluation aims to securely compute a function <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$f(x_1, \ldots, x_n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>f</mml:mi><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:msub><mml:mi>x</mml:mi><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:msub><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mo>...</mml:mo><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:msub><mml:mi>x</mml:mi><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:msub><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bingol-ieq1-3009496.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> without leaking any information other than what is revealed by the output, where <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$f$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>f</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bingol-ieq2-3009496.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is a private input of one of the parties (say <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {Party}_1$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Party</mml:mi><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bingol-ieq3-3009496.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$x_i$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi>x</mml:mi><mml:mi>i</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bingol-ieq4-3009496.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is a private input of the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$i$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>i</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bingol-ieq5-3009496.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>th party <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {Party}_i$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Party</mml:mi><mml:mi>i</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bingol-ieq6-3009496.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. In this article, we propose a novel and secure <italic>two-party private function evaluation</italic> (2PFE) scheme based on the DDH assumption. Our scheme introduces a reusability feature that significantly improves the state-of-the-art. Accordingly, our scheme has two variants, one is utilized in the initial execution of the function <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$f$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>f</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bingol-ieq7-3009496.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, and the other is utilized in its subsequent evaluations. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first and most efficient 2PFE scheme that enjoys a reusablity feature. Our protocols achieve linear communication and computation complexities and a constant number of rounds which is at most three.
papers.abstract_zh: 私有函数求值旨在安全地计算函数< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ f(x _ 1，\ldots，x _ n)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > </MML:mi > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:msub > < MML:mi > x </MML:mi > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn >。...</mml:mo><mml:mo >，</MML:mo > < MML:msub > < MML:mi > x </MML:mi > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:msub > < MML:mo >)</MML:mo > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " bingol-ie Q1-3009496 . gif "/> </alternatives在这篇文章中，我们基于DDH假设提出了一个新的安全的两方私有函数评估方案。相应地，我们的方案有两个变体，一个用于函数< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ f $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > f </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " bingol-ieq 7-3009496 . gif "/> </alternatives > </alternatives >据我们所知，这是第一个也是最有效的具有可重用特性的2PFE方案。我们的协议实现了线性的通信和计算复杂性以及最多三个恒定的回合数。

papers.title: E3X: Encrypt-Everything-Everywhere ISA eXtensions for Private Computation
papers.authors: Eduardo Chielle, Nektarios Georgios Tsoutsos, Oleg Mazonka, Michail Maniatakos
papers.abstract: The rapid increase of recent privacy attacks has significantly decreased trust on behalf of the users. A root cause to these problems is that modern computer architectures have always been designed for performance, while security protections are traditionally addressed reactively. Practical security protections, such as Intel SGX, rely on processing unencrypted data in the architectural state, which leaves them exposed to software attacks (e.g., SGXpectre). This work revisits the traditional computation stack and introduces a novel computation paradigm, where data is never decrypted in the architectural state. Through our architecture, data are protected with symmetric or asymmetric encryption and the programmer manipulates them directly in the encrypted domain. To increase performance, we exploit data locality by introducing decryption caches in the microarchitectural state. Our proposal addresses all abstraction levels in the computation stack: from microarchitecture to library support for high-level programming. The proposed architecture is instantiated through new assembly instructions, registers and functional units operating on large integers. In our evaluation, we extend the OpenRISC 1000 architecture and develop open-source libraries for C++. As a case study, we employ data-oblivious benchmarks and observe that for benchmarks with high temporal locality, our architecture can achieve comparable performance to processing unencrypted data.
papers.abstract_zh: 近来隐私攻击的快速增加已经显著降低了用户的信任度。这些问题的根本原因是，现代计算机体系结构一直是为性能而设计的，而安全保护传统上是被动解决的。实际的安全保护，如SGX，依赖于在架构状态下处理未加密的数据，这使它们容易受到软件攻击(如SGXpectre)。这项工作重新审视了传统的计算堆栈，并引入了一种新的计算范式，其中数据在体系结构状态下永远不会被解密。通过我们的架构，数据受到对称或非对称加密的保护，程序员可以在加密域中直接操作它们。为了提高性能，我们通过在微体系结构状态中引入解密缓存来利用数据局部性。我们的提议解决了计算栈中的所有抽象层次:从微体系结构到对高级编程的库支持。所提出的体系结构通过对大整数进行操作的新的汇编指令、寄存器和功能单元来实例化。在我们的评估中，我们扩展了OpenRISC 1000架构，并为C++开发了开源库。作为一个案例研究，我们采用了数据无关的基准，并观察到对于具有高时间局部性的基准，我们的架构可以实现与处理未加密数据相当的性能。
papers.title_zh: e3x：加密全处供私人计算

papers.title: JSCSP: A Novel Policy-Based XSS Defense Mechanism for Browsers
papers.authors: Guangquan Xu, Xiaofei Xie, Shuhan Huang, Jun Zhang, Lei Pan, Wei Lou, Kaitai Liang
papers.abstract: To mitigate cross-site scripting attacks (XSS), the W3C group recommends web service providers to employ a computer security standard called Content Security Policy (CSP). However, less than 3.7 percent of real-world websites are equipped with CSP according to Google’s survey. The low scalability of CSP is incurred by the difficulty of deployment and non-compatibility for state-of-art browsers. To explore the scalability of CSP, in this article, we propose JavaScript based CSP (JSCSP), which is able to support most of real-world browsers but also to generate security policies automatically. Specifically, JSCSP offers a novel self-defined security policy which enforces essential confinements to related items, including JavaScript functions, DOM elements and data access. Meanwhile, JSCSP has an efficient algorithm to automatically generate the policy directives and enforce them in a cascading way, which is more fine-grained and practical than the functionalities provided by CSP. We further implement JSCSP on a Chrome extension, and our evaluation shows that the extension is compatible with popular JavaScript libraries. Our JSCSP extension can detect and block the tested attacking vectors extracted from the prevalent web applications. We state that JSCSP delivers better performance compared to other XSS defense solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了减少跨站点脚本攻击(XSS)，W3C集团建议web服务提供商采用一种称为内容安全策略(CSP)的计算机安全标准。然而，根据谷歌的调查，不到3.7%的真实网站配备了CSP。CSP的低可伸缩性是由部署的困难和与最新浏览器的不兼容引起的。为了探索CSP的可伸缩性，在本文中，我们提出了基于JavaScript的CSP (JSCSP ),它能够支持大多数真实世界的浏览器，而且能够自动生成安全策略。具体来说，JSCSP提供了一种新颖的自定义安全策略，它对相关项目实施必要的限制，包括JavaScript函数、DOM元素和数据访问。同时，JSCSP有一个高效的算法来自动生成策略指令，并以级联的方式执行它们，这比CSP提供的功能更加细粒度和实用。我们还在Chrome扩展上实现了JSCSP，我们的评估表明该扩展与流行的JavaScript库兼容。我们的JSCSP扩展可以检测和阻止从流行的web应用程序中提取的测试攻击向量。我们声明，与其他XSS国防解决方案相比，JSCSP提供了更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: JSCSP：一种基于政策的新型XSS防御机制

papers.title: Probabilistic Inference and Trustworthiness Evaluation of Associative Links Toward Malicious Attack Detection for Online Recommendations
papers.authors: Zhihai Yang, Qindong Sun, Yaling Zhang
papers.abstract: The increasing use of recommender systems as personalization recommendation services such as Amazon, TripAdvisor, and Yelp, has stressed the demand for secure and usable abnormality detection techniques, due to fundamental vulnerabilities of recommender systems and their openness. With the emergence of new attacks, how to defend diverse malicious attacks for online recommendations is a challenging issue. Moreover, characterizing and evaluating sparse rating behaviors are a long-standing problem that still remains open, leading to an upsurge of research, as well as real application. This article investigates probabilistic inference and trustworthiness evaluation of behavioral links according to coupled association networks converted from rating behaviors, and presents a unified detection framework from a novel perspective to spot diverse malicious threats. First, an association graph is constructed from the original rating matrix based on both the inherent rating motivation of users and atomic propagation rules of coupled networks. Then, we evaluate the trustworthiness of link behaviors in the targeted network of coupled association network by exploiting a factor graph model of coupled network, and redetermine concerned links in the targeted network. Finally, suspicious users and items can be empirically inferred by comprehensively evaluating the trustworthiness of both links and nodes in the targeted network. Extensive experiments on synthetic data for profile injection attacks and co-visitation injection attacks, as well as real-world data including Amazon and TripAdvisor, demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed detection approach compared with competing benchmarks.
papers.abstract_zh: 推荐系统作为个性化推荐服务的使用越来越多，如亚马逊、猫途鹰和Yelp，这强调了对安全和可用的异常检测技术的需求，这是由于推荐系统的根本弱点和它们的开放性。随着新攻击的出现，如何防御针对在线推荐的各种恶意攻击是一个具有挑战性的问题。此外，表征和评估稀疏评级行为是一个长期存在的问题，仍然是开放的，导致研究热潮，以及真正的应用。根据由评级行为转换而来的耦合关联网络，研究行为链接的概率推理和可信度评估，并从一个新的角度提出一个统一的检测框架，以识别不同的恶意威胁。首先，基于用户固有的评分动机和耦合网络的原子传播规则，从原始评分矩阵构建关联图。然后，利用耦合网络的因子图模型评估耦合关联网络目标网络中链接行为的可信度，并重新确定目标网络中的相关链接。最后，通过综合评估目标网络中链路和节点的可信度，可以凭经验推断出可疑用户和项目。对profile注入攻击和co-visitory注入攻击的合成数据以及真实世界数据(包括亚马逊和猫途鹰)的大量实验表明，与竞争基准相比，所提出的检测方法是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 概率的推论和可信赖性评估在线建议的恶意攻击检测的关联链接

papers.title: Adaptive Payload Distribution in Multiple Images Steganography Based on Image Texture Features
papers.authors: Xin Liao, Jiaojiao Yin, Mingliang Chen, Zheng Qin
papers.abstract: With the coming era of cloud technology, cloud storage is an emerging technology to store massive digital images, which provides steganography a new fashion to embed secret information into massive images. Specifically, a resourceful steganographer could embed a set of secret information into multiple images adaptively, and share these images in cloud storage with the receiver, instead of traditional single image steganography. Nevertheless, it is still an open issue how to allocate embedding payload among a sequence of images for security performance enhancement. This article formulates adaptive payload distribution in multiple images steganography based on image texture features and provides the theoretical security analysis from the steganalyst's point of view. Two payload distribution strategies based on image texture complexity and distortion distribution are designed and discussed, respectively. The proposed strategies can be employed together with these state-of-the-art single image steganographic algorithms. The comparisons of the security performance against the modern universal pooled steganalysis are given. Furthermore, this article compares the per image detectability of these multiple images steganographic schemes against the modern single image steganalyzer. Extensive experimental results show that the proposed payload distribution strategies could obtain better security performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云技术时代的到来，云存储是一种存储海量数字图像的新兴技术，它为隐写术提供了一种在海量图像中嵌入秘密信息的新方式。具体而言，足智多谋的隐写者可以自适应地将一组秘密信息嵌入到多幅图像中，并在云存储中与接收者共享这些图像，而不是传统的单幅图像隐写。然而，如何在图像序列中分配嵌入有效载荷以提高安全性能仍然是一个公开的问题。本文阐述了基于图像纹理特征的多图像隐写术中自适应的有效载荷分配，并从隐写分析师的角度给出了理论上的安全性分析。分别设计和讨论了基于图像纹理复杂度和失真分布的两种有效载荷分配策略。所提出的策略可以与这些最新的单幅图像隐写算法一起使用。给出了与现代通用混合隐写分析的安全性能比较。此外，本文比较了这些多图像隐写方案与现代单幅图像隐写分析器的每幅图像检测能力。大量实验结果表明，所提出的有效载荷分配策略能够获得更好的安全性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于图像纹理特征的多个图像中的自适应有效载荷分布

papers.title: CSI-Fuzz: Full-Speed Edge Tracing Using Coverage Sensitive Instrumentation
papers.authors: Xiaogang Zhu, Xiaotao Feng, Xiaozhu Meng, Sheng Wen, Seyit Camtepe, Yang Xiang, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Coverage-guided fuzzing is one of the most effective solutions for vulnerability discovery. Among coverage-guided fuzzing, full-speed fuzzing, such as UnTracer, traces test cases only when they discover new coverage. Due to the high expense of tracing test cases, full-speed fuzzers improve the efficiency of fuzzing by tracing only coverage-increasing test cases. However, the existing full-speed fuzzer (i.e., UnTracer) is based on basic block coverage, suffering a severe problem called edge collision. Moreover, such fuzzers neglect the path frequency, which affects fuzzing effectiveness. In this article, we propose CSI-Fuzz, a fuzzer utilizing coverage sensitive instrumentation to address the problems of existing full-speed fuzzing. CSI-Fuzz directly instruments at edges, which solves the problem of edge collision. Meanwhile, CSI-Fuzz sets path identifiers to count the frequency of covered paths. Our CSI-Fuzz can be recognized as an add-on and seamlessly applied to existing coverage-guided fuzzers. We accordingly implement CSI-Fuzz based on two widely-adopted fuzzers, AFL and AFLFast, to evaluate its performance. The experiments demonstrate that CSI-Fuzz discovers more edges than AFL, AFLFast, and UnTracer. Additionally, CSI-Fuzz exposes more bugs than the other fuzzers.
papers.abstract_zh: 覆盖引导模糊化是漏洞发现的最有效的解决方案之一。在覆盖引导的模糊化中，全速模糊化，例如UnTracer，只在发现新的覆盖时跟踪测试用例。由于跟踪测试用例的高开销，全速模糊化器通过只跟踪覆盖增加的测试用例来提高模糊化的效率。然而，现有的全速模糊器(即非跟踪者)是基于基本块覆盖的，遭受称为边缘碰撞的严重问题。此外，这种模糊器忽略了路径频率，这影响了模糊效果。在本文中，我们提出了CSI-Fuzz，一种利用覆盖敏感仪器解决现有全速模糊化问题的模糊化器。CSI-Fuzz在边缘直接插桩，解决了边缘碰撞问题。同时，CSI-Fuzz设置路径标识符来计算覆盖路径的频率。我们的CSI-Fuzz可以被认为是一个附件，可以无缝地应用于现有的覆盖导向模糊器。因此，我们基于两个广泛采用的模糊器AFL和AFLFast实现了CSI-Fuzz，并对其性能进行了评估。实验表明，CSI-Fuzz比AFL、AFLFast和UnTracer发现更多的边缘。此外，CSI-fuzzers暴露了比其他fuzzer更多的错误。
papers.title_zh: CSI-FUZZ：使用覆盖敏感仪器的全速边缘跟踪

papers.title: Malware in the SGX Supply Chain: Be Careful When Signing Enclaves!
papers.authors: Vlad Craciun, Pascal Felber, Andrei Mogage, Emanuel Onica, Rafael Pires
papers.abstract: Malware attacks are a significant part of the new software security threats detected each year. Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) are a set of hardware instructions introduced by Intel in their recent lines of processors that are intended to provide a secure execution environment for user-developed applications. To our knowledge, there was no serious attempt yet to overcome the SGX protection by exploiting the weaknesses in the software supply chain infrastructure, namely at the level of the development, build or signing servers. While SGX protection does not specifically take into consideration such threats, we show in the current article that a simple malware attack exploiting a separation between the build and signing processes can have a serious damaging impact, practically nullifying SGX integrity protection measures. We also explore two possible mitigations against the attack, one centralized leveraging SGX itself, and one distributed that relies on a smart contract deployed on a blockchain infrastructure. Our evaluation shows that both methods are feasible in practice and their added costs are acceptable for the offered protection.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意软件攻击是每年检测到的新软件安全威胁的重要组成部分。英特尔软件保护扩展(SGX)是英特尔在其最新处理器系列中推出的一组硬件指令，旨在为用户开发的应用提供安全的执行环境。据我们所知，还没有人试图通过利用软件供应链基础设施中的弱点，即在开发、构建或签名服务器的级别上，来克服SGX保护。虽然SGX保护没有特别考虑这种威胁，但我们在当前的文章中表明，利用构建和签名过程之间的分离的简单恶意软件攻击可以产生严重的破坏性影响，实际上使SGX完整性保护措施无效。我们还探讨了两种可能的攻击缓解方案，一种是利用SGX本身的集中式方案，另一种是依靠部署在区块链基础设施上的智能合同的分布式方案。我们的评估表明，这两种方法在实践中是可行的，并且它们的额外成本对于所提供的保护是可接受的。
papers.title_zh: SGX供应链中的恶意软件：签署飞地时要小心！

papers.title: IPANM: Incentive Public Auditing Scheme for Non-Manager Groups in Clouds
papers.authors: Longxia Huang, Junlong Zhou, Gongxuan Zhang, Jin Sun, Tongquan Wei, Shui Yu, Shiyan Hu
papers.abstract: Cloud storage services give users a great facility in data management such as data collection, storage and sharing, but also bring some potential security hazards. An utmost importance is how to ensure the integrity of data files stored in the cloud, particular for user groups without trusted managers. Existing literature focuses on integrity checking for groups with managers who have lots of permissions. To overcome the shortage of public auditing for non-manager user groups in clouds, we develop a novel framework IPANM that integrates <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(t,n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhou-ieq1-3004827.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> threshold technology, blinding technology, and incentive mechanism to realize an incentive privacy-preserving public auditing scheme. In IPANM, the data integrity is guaranteed by our <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(t,n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhou-ieq2-3004827.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> threshold signature based public auditing and the data privacy during public auditing is protected by the blinding technology. The generation of signatures can be accelerated by our blockchain-aided incentive mechanism that mobilizes the initiative of signers in the signature generation by rewarding the contributed signers. We formally prove the security of our IPANM and conduct numerical analysis and evaluation study to validate its high efficiency. The experimental results demonstrate that IPANM has lower overheads of storage, communication, and computation as compared to the state-of-the-art technique IAID-PDP and NPP.
papers.abstract_zh: 云存储服务在给用户带来数据收集、存储和共享等数据管理便利的同时，也带来了一些潜在的安全隐患。最重要的是如何确保存储在云中的数据文件的完整性，特别是对于没有可信管理者的用户组。现有的文献集中在管理者拥有大量权限的组的完整性检查上。为了克服云中非管理用户组公共审计的不足，我们开发了一个新的框架IPANM，它集成了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(t，n)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi > t </MML:mi > < MML:mo >，</MML:mo > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > < MML:mi >在IPANM中，数据完整性由我们的< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(t，n)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi > t </MML:mi > < MML:mo >，</MML:mo > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > < MML:mo >)</MML:mo >来保证我们的区块链辅助激励机制可以加速签名的生成，该机制通过奖励有贡献的签名者来调动签名者在签名生成中的积极性。我们形式化地证明了IPANM的安全性，并进行了数值分析和评估研究，以验证其高效性。实验结果表明，与最新技术IAID-PDP和NPP相比，IPANM具有更低的存储、通信和计算开销。
papers.title_zh: IPANM：云中非经理组的激励公共审计计划

papers.title: Defending Against Adversarial Attack Towards Deep Neural Networks Via Collaborative Multi-Task Training
papers.authors: Derui Wang, Chaoran Li, Sheng Wen, Surya Nepal, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Deep neural networks (DNNs) are known to be vulnerable to adversarial examples which contain human-imperceptible perturbations. A series of defending methods, either proactive defence or reactive defence, have been proposed in the recent years. However, most of the methods can only handle specific attacks. For example, proactive defending methods are invalid against grey-box or white-box attacks, while reactive defending methods are challenged by low-distortion adversarial examples or transferring adversarial examples. This becomes a critical problem since a defender usually does not have the type of attack as <italic>a priori</italic> knowledge. Moreover, existing two-pronged defences (e.g., MagNet), which take advantage of both proactive and reactive methods, have been reported as broken under transferring attacks. To address this problem, this article proposed a novel defensive framework based on collaborative multi-task training, aiming at providing defence for different types of attacks. The proposed defence first encodes training labels into label pairs and counters black-box attacks leveraging adversarial training supervised by the encoded label pairs. The defence further constructs a detector to identify and reject high-confidence adversarial examples that bypass the black-box defence. In addition, the proposed collaborative architecture can prevent adversaries from finding valid adversarial examples when the defence strategy is exposed. In the experiments, we evaluated our defence against four state-of-the-art attacks on <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$MNIST$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>M</mml:mi><mml:mi>N</mml:mi><mml:mi>I</mml:mi><mml:mi>S</mml:mi><mml:mi>T</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wen-ieq1-3014390.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$CIFAR10$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>C</mml:mi><mml:mi>I</mml:mi><mml:mi>F</mml:mi><mml:mi>A</mml:mi><mml:mi>R</mml:mi><mml:mn>10</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wen-ieq2-3014390.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> datasets. The results showed that our defending method achieved up to 96.3 percent classification accuracy on black-box adversarial examples, and detected up to 98.7 percent of the high confidence adversarial examples. It only decreased the model accuracy on benign example classification by 2.1 percent for the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$CIFAR10$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>C</mml:mi><mml:mi>I</mml:mi><mml:mi>F</mml:mi><mml:mi>A</mml:mi><mml:mi>R</mml:mi><mml:mn>10</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wen-ieq3-3014390.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，深度神经网络(DNNs)容易受到包含人类察觉不到的扰动的对立例子的攻击。近年来，人们提出了一系列防御方法，要么是主动防御，要么是被动防御。然而，大多数方法只能处理特定的攻击。例如，主动防御方法对灰盒或白盒攻击无效，而被动防御方法受到低失真对抗样本或转移对抗样本的挑战。这就成了一个关键问题，因为防御者通常不知道攻击的类型。此外，现有的双管齐下的防御(例如，MagNet)利用了主动和被动方法，据报告在转移攻击下已被破坏。针对这一问题，提出了一种基于协同多任务训练的新型防御框架，旨在为不同类型的攻击提供防御。提出的防御方法首先将训练标签编码成标签对，并利用由编码标签对监督的对抗训练来对抗黑盒攻击。辩方还构建了一个检测器，以识别和拒绝绕过黑盒辩护的高可信度对抗性例子。此外，当防御策略暴露时，所提出的协作架构可以防止对手找到有效的对抗实例。在实验中，我们评估了我们对以下四种最新攻击的防御能力:对< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ MNIST $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > M </MML:mi > < MML:mi > N </MML:mi > < MML:mi > I </MML:mi > < MML:mi > T </MML实验结果表明，该防御方法对黑盒对抗样本的分类准确率高达96.3%，对高可信度对抗样本的检测准确率高达98.7%。对于< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ cifar 10 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > C </MML:mi > < MML:mi > I </MML:mi > < MML:mi > F </MML:mi > < MML:mi > A </MML:mi > < MML:mi > R </mmm
papers.title_zh: 通过协作多任务培训来防御对抗深神经网络的对抗性攻击

papers.title: Remove Minimum (RM): An Error-Tolerant Scheme for Cardinality Estimate by HyperLogLog
papers.authors: Pedro Reviriego, Jorge Martínez, Ori Rottenstreich, Shanshan Liu, Fabrizio Lombardi
papers.abstract: Estimating the number of distinct elements is required in many computing applications. For example, we may want to estimate the number of unique users accessing a service, or the number of different words in a text. This problem is known as count distinct or cardinality estimate and has been widely studied. An accurate naïve approach is to keep a list of distinct elements and for each upcoming one check such list and add it when it is not found. However, this is not practical for large cardinalities because it would require storing a large number of elements. Over the years, many algorithms have been proposed to provide cardinality estimates without storing elements and using less memory. One of the state-of-the-art algorithms for cardinality estimate is the HyperLogLog (HLL); it provides a good estimate over a large range of cardinality values using a small array of counters. As HLL is implemented in computing systems, it is exposed to soft errors that can corrupt bits stored in memories or registers. To avoid data corruption, memories are commonly protected with Error Correction Codes (ECCs). ECCs however incur in significant overhead because protection needs additional memory cells per word to store the parity check bits as well as additional computation for checking them. For achieving data protection, an alternative approach that can be of low-overhead exploits features of the implemented algorithms to detect and correct errors. In other scenarios, the algorithm must be executed on a system that is not protected with parity or ECCs and thus protection must be implemented at the algorithmic level. In this article, we first study the impact of soft errors on the HLL algorithm by performing simulation by error injection. The results show that the algorithm is quite robust and can filter out most errors. However, for large cardinalities, there are some errors that can cause a large discrepancy in the HLL estimate. This occurs when the uppermost bit with a value of one in a counter is flipped to a zero. Based on the analysis of the experimental results and the HLL algorithm, a protection technique is proposed that effectively mitigates the impact of soft errors at a small overhead. The proposed Remove Minimum (RM) scheme has been validated by error injection experiments to show that it effectively protects against soft errors on the HLL counters.
papers.abstract_zh: 在许多计算应用中，需要估计不同元素的数量。例如，我们可能想要估计访问服务的不同用户的数量，或者文本中不同单词的数量。这个问题被称为计数差异或基数估计，并已得到广泛研究。一个准确的天真的方法是保存一个不同元素的列表，并为每个即将到来的元素检查这样的列表，并在没有找到时添加它。然而，这对于大基数是不实际的，因为它需要存储大量的元素。多年来，已经提出了许多算法来提供基数估计，而无需存储元素和使用更少的内存。基数估计的最新算法之一是超对数(HLL)；它使用少量的计数器在大范围的基数值上提供了很好的估计。当HLL在计算系统中实现时，它暴露于能够破坏存储在存储器或寄存器中的位的软错误。为了避免数据损坏，通常用纠错码(ECC)来保护存储器。然而，ECC会导致显著的开销，因为保护需要每个字额外的存储单元来存储奇偶校验位，以及用于检查它们的额外计算。为了实现数据保护，可以是低开销的替代方法利用所实现的算法的特征来检测和纠正错误。在其他情况下，算法必须在没有奇偶校验或ECC保护的系统上执行，因此必须在算法级别实现保护。在本文中，我们首先通过错误注入进行仿真来研究软错误对HLL算法的影响。结果表明，该算法具有很强的鲁棒性，可以滤除大部分误差。然而，对于大基数，有一些误差会导致HLL估计中的大差异。当计数器中值为1的最高位翻转为零时，就会出现这种情况。基于对实验结果和HLL算法的分析，提出了一种保护技术，以较小的开销有效地减轻了软错误的影响。所提出的移除最小值(RM)方案已经通过错误注入实验进行了验证，表明它有效地防止了HLL计数器上的软错误。
papers.title_zh: 删除最低限度（RM）：超置频率估算基数估算的易于耐受性方案

papers.title: Secret Sharing Based Reversible Data Hiding in Encrypted Images With Multiple Data-Hiders
papers.authors: Bing Chen, Wei Lu, Jiwu Huang, Jian Weng, Yicong Zhou
papers.abstract: The existing models of reversible data hiding in encrypted images (RDH-EI) are based on single data-hider, where the original image cannot be reconstructed when the data-hider is damaged. To address this issue, this article proposes a novel model with multiple data-hiders for RDH-EI based on secret sharing. It divides the original image into multiple different encrypted images with the same size of the original image and distributes them to multiple different data-hiders for data hiding. Each data-hider can independently embed data into the encrypted image to obtain the corresponding marked encrypted image. The original image can be losslessly recovered by collecting sufficient marked encrypted images from undamaged data-hiders when individual data-hiders are subjected to potential damage. This further protects the security of the original image. We provide four cases of the proposed model, namely, two joint cases and two separable cases. From the proposed model, we derive a separable RDH-EI method with high-capacity. Experimental results are presented to illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的加密图像可逆数据隐藏模型(RDH-EI)都是基于单个数据隐藏器的，当数据隐藏器被破坏时，原始图像无法恢复。针对这一问题，本文提出了一种基于秘密共享的多重数据隐藏的RDH-EI模型。它将原始图像分成大小相同的多个不同的加密图像，并分发给多个不同的数据隐藏器进行数据隐藏。每个数据隐藏器可以独立地将数据嵌入到加密图像中，以获得相应的标记加密图像。当单个数据隐藏器遭受潜在破坏时，通过从未受损的数据隐藏器收集足够多的标记加密图像，可以无损恢复原始图像。这进一步保护了原始图像的安全性。我们提供了所提出模型的四种情况，即两种联合情况和两种分离情况。从这个模型出发，我们得到了一个高容量的可分离RDH-EI方法。实验结果表明了该方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于秘密共享的可逆数据隐藏在加密图像中，带有多个数据范围

papers.title: Reversible Data Hiding in Encrypted Images Based on Pixel Prediction and Bit-Plane Compression
papers.authors: Zhaoxia Yin, Yinyin Peng, Youzhi Xiang
papers.abstract: Reversible data hiding in encrypted images (RDHEI) receives growing attention because it protects the content of the original image while the embedded data can be accurately extracted and the original image can be reconstructed losslessly. To make full use of the correlation of the adjacent pixels, this article proposes an RDHEI scheme based on pixel prediction and bit-plane compression. First, the original image are divided into the blocks of equal size and the prediction error of the original image is calculated. Then, the 8 bit-planes of prediction error are executed rearrangement and bit-stream compression, respectively. Finally, the image after vacating room is encrypted by a stream cipher and the additional data is embedded in the vacated room by multi-LSBs (Least Significant Bits) substitution. Experimental results show that the embedding capacity of the proposed method outperforms the state-of-the-art methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密图像中的可逆数据隐藏受到越来越多的关注，因为它可以保护原始图像的内容，同时嵌入的数据可以被准确提取，原始图像可以无损重建。为了充分利用相邻像素的相关性，提出了一种基于像素预测和位平面压缩的RDHEI方案。首先，将原始图像分成大小相等的块，并计算原始图像的预测误差。然后，预测误差的8个位平面分别被执行重排和位流压缩。最后，利用流密码对腾空房间后的图像进行加密，并通过多LSB(最低有效位)替换将附加数据嵌入到腾空的房间中。实验结果表明，该方法的嵌入容量优于现有方法。
papers.title_zh: 可逆数据隐藏在基于像素预测和位平面压缩的加密图像中

papers.title: How to Democratise and Protect AI: Fair and Differentially Private Decentralised Deep Learning
papers.authors: Lingjuan Lyu, Yitong Li, Karthik Nandakumar, Jiangshan Yu, Xingjun Ma
papers.abstract: This article first considers the research problem of fairness in collaborative deep learning, while ensuring privacy. A novel reputation system is proposed through digital tokens and local credibility to ensure fairness, in combination with differential privacy to guarantee privacy. In particular, we build a fair and differentially private decentralised deep learning framework called FDPDDL, which enables parties to derive more accurate local models in a fair and private manner by using our developed two-stage scheme: during the initialisation stage, artificial samples generated by Differentially Private Generative Adversarial Network (DPGAN) are used to mutually benchmark the local credibility of each party and generate initial tokens; during the update stage, Differentially Private SGD (DPSGD) is used to facilitate collaborative privacy-preserving deep learning, and local credibility and tokens of each party are updated according to the quality and quantity of individually released gradients. Experimental results on benchmark datasets under three realistic settings demonstrate that FDPDDL achieves high fairness, yields comparable accuracy to the centralised and distributed frameworks, and delivers better accuracy than the standalone framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文首先考虑协同深度学习中公平性的研究问题，同时保证隐私。提出了一种新的信誉系统，通过数字令牌和本地可信度来保证公平性，结合差分隐私来保证隐私性。特别是，我们建立了一个公平和差分私有的分散深度学习框架FDPDDL，它使各方能够通过使用我们开发的两阶段方案以公平和私有的方式导出更准确的局部模型:在初始化阶段，由差分私有生成对抗网络(DPGAN)生成的人工样本用于相互评估各方的局部可信度并生成初始令牌；在更新阶段，使用差分私有SGD (DPSGD)来促进协同隐私保护深度学习，并根据单独释放的梯度的质量和数量来更新每一方的局部可信度和令牌。在三个真实设置下的基准数据集上的实验结果表明，FDPDDL实现了高公平性，产生了与集中式和分布式框架相当的准确性，并且提供了比独立框架更好的准确性。
papers.title_zh: 如何民主化和保护AI：公平和差异化的分散深度学习

papers.title: Factor of Security (FoS): Quantifying the Security Effectiveness of Redundant Smart Grid Subsystems
papers.authors: Onur Duman, Mengyuan Zhang, Lingyu Wang, Mourad Debbabi, Ribal F. Atallah, Bernard Lebel
papers.abstract: According to International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) 61850-90-4, most smart grid substations are designed with redundancy in order to improve their availability in case of failures. Redundancy usually takes the form of having multiple subsystems with identical functionality based on the assumption that failures in one subsystem are isolated from other subsystems. However, this is not necessarily true in the case of failures caused by malicious attacks, because attackers can easily reuse their skills and tools across different subsystems under similar configurations. Taking this into consideration, this article introduces the factor of security (FoS) metrics to quantify the security effectiveness of redundant subsystems in smart grids. Specifically, we first apply the attack graph model to capture various threats in smart grids and substations; we then formally define the FoS metric and the probabilistic FoS metric, and finally we evaluate those metrics through simulations.
papers.abstract_zh: 根据国际电工委员会(IEC) 61850-90-4，大多数智能电网变电站都设计有冗余，以提高故障情况下的可用性。冗余通常采取拥有多个功能相同的子系统的形式，这是基于一个子系统中的故障与其他子系统隔离的假设。然而，在恶意攻击导致故障的情况下，这不一定是正确的，因为攻击者可以在相似的配置下跨不同的子系统轻松地重用他们的技能和工具。考虑到这一点，本文引入了安全系数(FoS)指标来量化智能电网中冗余子系统的安全有效性。具体来说，我们首先应用攻击图模型来捕获智能电网和变电站中的各种威胁；然后我们正式定义FoS度量和概率FoS度量，最后我们通过仿真评估这些度量。
papers.title_zh: 安全系数（FOS）：量化冗余智能网格子系统的安全有效性

papers.title: Dual Access Control for Cloud-Based Data Storage and Sharing
papers.authors: Jianting Ning, Xinyi Huang, Willy Susilo, Kaitai Liang, Ximeng Liu, Yinghui Zhang
papers.abstract: Cloud-based data storage service has drawn increasing interests from both academic and industry in the recent years due to its efficient and low cost management. Since it provides services in an open network, it is urgent for service providers to make use of secure data storage and sharing mechanism to ensure data confidentiality and service user privacy. To protect sensitive data from being compromised, the most widely used method is encryption. However, simply encrypting data (e.g., via AES) cannot fully address the practical need of data management. Besides, an effective access control over download request also needs to be considered so that Economic Denial of Sustainability (EDoS) attacks cannot be launched to hinder users from enjoying service. In this article, we consider the dual access control, in the context of cloud-based storage, in the sense that we design a control mechanism over both data access and download request without loss of security and efficiency. Two dual access control systems are designed in this article, where each of them is for a distinct designed setting. The security and experimental analysis for the systems are also presented.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，基于云的数据存储服务因其高效、低成本的管理方式，吸引了学术界和工业界越来越多的关注。由于它是在一个开放的网络中提供服务，服务提供商迫切需要利用安全的数据存储和共享机制来保证数据的机密性和服务用户的隐私。为了保护敏感数据不被泄露，最广泛使用的方法是加密。然而，简单地加密数据(例如，通过AES)不能完全满足数据管理的实际需要。此外，还需要考虑对下载请求的有效访问控制，以便不能发起经济可持续性拒绝(EDoS)攻击来阻碍用户享受服务。在本文中，我们在基于云的存储环境中考虑双重访问控制，我们设计了一种在不损失安全性和效率的情况下对数据访问和下载请求进行控制的机制。本文设计了两个双重访问控制系统，其中每一个都用于不同的设计设置。并给出了系统的安全性和实验分析。
papers.title_zh: 基于云的数据存储和共享的双访问控制

papers.title: Phoenix: Towards Ultra-Low Overhead, Recoverable, and Persistently Secure NVM
papers.authors: Mazen Al-Wadi, Kazi Abu Zubair, David Mohaisen, Amro Awad
papers.abstract: Emerging Non-Volatile Memories (NVMs) bring a unique challenge to the security community, namely persistent security. As NVM-based memories are expected to restore their data after recovery, the security metadata must be recovered as well. However, persisting all affected security metadata on each memory write would significantly degrade performance and exacerbate the write endurance problem. On the other hand, relying on an encryption counters recovery scheme would take hours to rebuild the integrity tree, and will not be sufficient to rebuild the Tree-of-Counters (ToC). Due to intermediate nodes dependencies it is not possible to recover this type of trees using the encryption counters. To ensure recoverability, all updates to the security metadata must be persisted, which can be tens of additional writes on each write. In this article, we propose Phoenix, a practical novel scheme which relies on elegantly reproducing the cache content before a crash, however with minimal overheads. Our evaluation results show that Phoenix reduces persisting security metadata overhead writes to 3.8 percent less than a write-back encrypted system without recovery, thus improving the NVM lifetime by 8x. Overall Phoenix performance is better than the baseline.
papers.abstract_zh: 新兴的非易失性存储器(nvm)给安全社区带来了独特的挑战，即持久安全性。由于基于NVM的存储器被期望在恢复后恢复它们的数据，所以安全元数据也必须被恢复。但是，在每次内存写入时保存所有受影响的安全元数据会显著降低性能，并加剧写入耐久性问题。另一方面，依靠加密计数器恢复方案将花费数小时来重建完整性树，并且不足以重建计数器树(ToC)。由于中间节点的依赖性，不可能使用加密计数器来恢复这种类型的树。为了确保可恢复性，对安全元数据的所有更新都必须持久化，这可能需要在每次写入时进行数十次额外的写入。在本文中，我们提出了Phoenix，这是一个实用的新方案，它依赖于在崩溃前优雅地再现缓存内容，但是开销很小。我们的评估结果显示，与没有恢复的回写加密系统相比，Phoenix将持续安全元数据开销写入减少了3.8%，从而将NVM寿命提高了8倍。凤凰号的整体表现比基线要好。
papers.title_zh: 凤凰：朝着超低的头顶，可回收且持续固定的NVM

papers.title: Match in My Way: Fine-Grained Bilateral Access Control for Secure Cloud-Fog Computing
papers.authors: Shengmin Xu, Jianting Ning, Yingjiu Li, Yinghui Zhang, Guowen Xu, Xinyi Huang, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Cloud-fog computing is a novel paradigm to extend the functionality of cloud computing to provide a variety of on-demand data services via the edge network. Many cryptographic tools have been introduced to preserve data confidentiality against the untrustworthy network and cloud servers. However, how to efficiently identify and retrieve useful data from a large number of ciphertexts without a costly decryption mechanism remains a challenging problem. In this article, we introduce a cloud-fog-device data sharing system (CFDS) with data confidentiality and data source identification simultaneously based on a new cryptographic primitive named matchmaking attribute-based encryption (MABE) by extending matchmaking encryption in CRYPTO’19. Our solution offers a secure fine-grained bilateral access control that includes (1) fine-grained sender access control, (2) fine-grained receiver access control, (3) sender privacy, and (4) performance optimization via outsourcing data source identification to fog nodes. We give the formal definition and security models of MABE, and present a concrete construction with formal security proofs. We also offer a detailed security analysis of our proposed CFDS against real-world security threats. The extensive comparison and experimental simulation demonstrate that, by immigrating heavy workload to fog nodes, our scheme has better functionalities and performances than the most related solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 云雾计算是扩展云计算功能的一种新模式，通过边缘网络提供各种按需数据服务。已经引入了许多加密工具来针对不可信的网络和云服务器保护数据机密性。然而，如何在没有昂贵的解密机制的情况下从大量的密文中有效地识别和检索有用的数据仍然是一个具有挑战性的问题。在本文中，我们通过扩展CRYPTO'19中的匹配加密，基于一种新的密码原语(称为匹配属性基加密(MABE ))介绍了一种同时具有数据机密性和数据源识别的云-雾-设备数据共享系统(CFDS)。我们的解决方案提供了一种安全的细粒度双边访问控制，包括(1)细粒度发送方访问控制，(2)细粒度接收方访问控制，(3)发送方隐私，以及(4)通过将数据源识别外包给fog节点进行性能优化。我们给出了MABE的形式化定义和安全模型，并给出了一个具有形式化安全证明的具体结构。我们还针对现实世界中的安全威胁，对我们提出的CFDS进行了详细的安全分析。大量的比较和实验模拟表明，通过将繁重的工作负载迁移到光纤陀螺节点上，我们的方案比大多数相关的解决方案具有更好的功能和性能。
papers.title_zh: 匹配我的方式：安全云雾计算的细粒双边访问控制

papers.title: Towards More Secure Constructions of Adjustable Join Schemes
papers.authors: Shahram Khazaei, Mojtaba Rafiee
papers.abstract: An adjustable join (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\text{Adjoin}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mtext>Adjoin</mml:mtext></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq1-3022320.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) scheme [4] is a symmetric-key primitive that enables a user to securely outsource his database to a server, and later to issue join queries for a pair of columns. When queries are extended to a list of columns, the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathtt{3Partition}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn mathvariant="monospace">3</mml:mn><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">Partition</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq2-3022320.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> security of Adjoin schemes [8] does not capture the expected security. To address this deficiency, we introduce the syntax and security notion of multi-adjustable join (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\text{M-Adjoin}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mtext>M-Adjoin</mml:mtext></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq3-3022320.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) schemes. We propose a new security notion for this purpose, which we refer to as <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathtt{M3Partition}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">M</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="monospace">3</mml:mn><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">Partition</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq4-3022320.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. papers.title_zh: 建立更安全的可调联接方案的结构

papers.title: Achieving Efficient and Privacy-Preserving Exact Set Similarity Search over Encrypted Data
papers.authors: Yandong Zheng, Rongxing Lu, Yunguo Guan, Jun Shao, Hui Zhu
papers.abstract: Set similarity search, aiming to search the similar sets to a query set, has wide application in today's recommendation services. Meanwhile, the rapid advance in cloud technique has promoted the boom of data outsourcing. However, since the cloud is not fully trustable and the data may be sensitive, data should be encrypted before outsourced to the cloud. Undoubtedly, data encryption will hinder some basic functionalities, e.g., set similarity search. For achieving set similarity search over encrypted data, many solutions were proposed, yet they either only satisfy weak security requirements, or only achieve approximate similarity, or have low efficiency or under the model of two cloud servers. Therefore, in this article, we propose a new efficient and privacy-preserving exact set similarity search scheme under a single cloud server. Specifically, we first design a symmetric-key predicate encryption (SPE-Sim) scheme, which can support similarity search over binary vectors. Then, we represent the set records to be binary vectors and employ the B+ tree to build an index for them. After that, based on SPE-Sim and the B+ tree-based index, we propose our scheme and it can achieve efficient set similarity search while preserving the privacy of set records and query contents. Finally, security analysis and performance evaluation indicate that our scheme is privacy-preserving and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 集合相似性搜索旨在搜索与查询集合相似的集合，在当今的推荐服务中有着广泛的应用。同时，云技术的快速发展促进了数据外包的繁荣。然而，由于云不是完全可信的，数据可能是敏感的，因此在外包给云之前应该对数据进行加密。毫无疑问，数据加密会阻碍一些基本功能，例如集合相似性搜索。为了实现加密数据的集合相似性搜索，人们提出了许多解决方案，但这些方案要么只能满足弱安全性要求，要么只能实现近似相似性，要么效率较低，要么是在两个云服务器的模型下。因此，在本文中，我们提出了一种新的高效的、隐私保护的精确集合相似性搜索方案。具体来说，我们首先设计了一个对称密钥谓词加密(SPE-Sim)方案，它可以支持二进制向量上的相似性搜索。然后，我们将集合记录表示为二进制向量，并使用B+树为它们建立索引。然后，基于SPE-Sim和基于B+树的索引，我们提出了我们的方案，它可以实现高效的集合相似性搜索，同时保护集合记录和查询内容的隐私。最后，安全性分析和性能评估表明我们的方案是隐私保护和高效的。
papers.title_zh: 在加密数据上实现高效且具有隐私性的精确设置相似性搜索

papers.title: Detection of Information Hiding at Physical Layer in Wireless Communications
papers.authors: Ning Xie, Zhuoyuan Li, Jie Tan, Alex X. Liu
papers.abstract: This article concerns the problem of detecting the use of information hiding at the physical layer in wireless communications because they are harder to be detected than other layer-based information hiding schemes. Prior schemes for detecting physical layer based information hiding are either heuristic based or machine learning based. The key limitation of prior heuristics based information hiding detection schemes is that they do not answer the fundamental question of why the information hidden at the physical layer can be detected. The key limitation of prior machine learning based information hiding detection schemes is that they lack robustness because wireless signals at the physical layer are very much environmental dependent, and thus an information hiding detection scheme trained in one environment often does not work well in another environment. Our insight is that embedding information on wireless signals at the physical layer will inevitably have a negative impact on the decodability of the cover signals, such as the increase of the error probability at the receiver (as well as the monitor). Based on the above insight, in our approach, after the monitor demodulates and decodes the cover signals, it will re-encode and re-modulate the cover signals, and then compare the resulting recovered signals with the raw signals that it received from the sender. We further propose a new estimation scheme for calculating receiver noise variance and conducted theoretical analysis. Specifically, we propose two hidden information detection schemes, a noise grouped based detection scheme and a constellation distance based detection scheme, both taking estimation errors into consideration. In particular, our constellation distance based detection scheme is the first scheme that can pinpoint the exact location on the received signals that are embedded with hidden information. We implemented our schemes and conducted extensive performance comparison between our schemes and prior schemes. Our experimental results show that when the received SNR is more than 20 dB, our approach with the new estimation scheme has the probability of detection more than 0.95, and our constellation distance based detection scheme can correctly pinpoint all embedded locations.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文关注的问题是检测无线通信中物理层信息隐藏的使用，因为它们比其他基于层的信息隐藏方案更难检测。用于检测基于物理层的信息隐藏的现有方案或者是基于启发式的或者是基于机器学习的。基于先验启发的信息隐藏检测方案的关键限制在于，它们没有回答为什么隐藏在物理层的信息可以被检测到的基本问题。现有的基于机器学习的信息隐藏检测方案的主要限制是它们缺乏鲁棒性，因为物理层的无线信号非常依赖于环境，因此在一种环境中训练的信息隐藏检测方案在另一种环境中通常不能很好地工作。我们的见解是，在物理层将信息嵌入无线信号将不可避免地对覆盖信号的可解码性产生负面影响，例如增加接收器(以及监视器)的错误概率。基于上述认识，在我们的方法中，在监控器解调和解码覆盖信号之后，它将重新编码和重新调制覆盖信号，然后将得到的恢复信号与它从发送器接收的原始信号进行比较。我们进一步提出了一种新的计算接收机噪声方差的估计方案，并进行了理论分析。具体地说，我们提出了两种隐藏信息检测方案，一种基于噪声分组的检测方案和一种基于星座距离的检测方案，这两种方案都考虑了估计误差。特别地，我们的基于星座距离的检测方案是第一个可以在嵌入了隐藏信息的接收信号上精确定位的方案。我们实现了我们的方案，并在我们的方案和以前的方案之间进行了广泛的性能比较。我们的实验结果表明，当接收信噪比大于20 dB时，我们采用新估计方案的方法具有大于0.95的检测概率，并且我们的基于星座距离的检测方案能够正确地定位所有嵌入位置。
papers.title_zh: 在无线通信中的物理层中发现隐藏的信息

papers.title: Efficient Certificateless Multi-Copy Integrity Auditing Scheme Supporting Data Dynamics
papers.authors: Lei Zhou, Anmin Fu, Guomin Yang, Huaqun Wang, Yuqing Zhang
papers.abstract: To improve data availability and durability, cloud users would like to store multiple copies of their original files at servers. The multi-copy auditing technique is proposed to provide users with the assurance that multiple copies are actually stored in the cloud. However, most multi-replica solutions rely on Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), which entails massive overhead of certificate computation and management. In this article, we propose an efficient multi-copy dynamic integrity auditing scheme by employing certificateless signatures (named MDSS), which gets rid of expensive certificate management overhead and avoids the key escrow problem in identity-based signatures. Specifically, we improve the classic Merkle Hash Tree (MHT) to achieve batch updates for multi-copy storage, which allows the communication overhead incurred for dynamics to be independent of the replica number. To meet the flexible storage requirement, we propose a variable replica number storage strategy, allowing users to determine the replica number for each block. Based on the fact that auditors may frame Cloud Storage Servers (CSSs), we use signature verification to prevent malicious auditors from framing honest CSSs. Finally, security analysis proves that our proposal is secure in the random oracle model. Analysis and simulation results show that our proposal is more efficient than current state-of-the-art schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了提高数据可用性和持久性，云用户希望在服务器上存储其原始文件的多个副本。提出多副本审计技术是为了向用户保证多个副本确实存储在云中。然而，大多数多副本解决方案依赖于公钥基础设施(PKI ),这需要大量的证书计算和管理开销。本文利用无证书签名(MDSS)提出了一个高效的多副本动态完整性审计方案，该方案避免了基于身份签名中昂贵的证书管理开销和密钥托管问题。具体来说，我们改进了经典的Merkle哈希树(MHT ),以实现多副本存储的批量更新，这使得动态产生的通信开销与副本数量无关。为了满足灵活的存储需求，我们提出了一种可变副本数量的存储策略，允许用户决定每个块的副本数量。基于审计人员可能陷害云存储服务器(CSSs)的事实，我们使用签名验证来防止恶意审计人员陷害诚实的CSSs。最后，安全性分析证明了我们的方案在随机预言模型下是安全的。分析和仿真结果表明，我们的方案比当前最先进的方案更有效。
papers.title_zh: 有效的无证书多复制完整性审核方案支持数据动态

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Navigation Supporting Similar Queries in Vehicular Networks
papers.authors: Meng Li, Yifei Chen, Shuli Zheng, Donghui Hu, Chhagan Lal, Mauro Conti
papers.abstract: Traffic-sensitive navigation systems in vehicular networks help drivers avoid traffic jams by providing several realtime navigation routes. However, drivers still encounter privacy concerns because their sensitive locations, i.e., their start point and endpoint, are submitted to an honest-but-curious navigation service provider (NSP). Previous privacy-preserving studies exhibit serious deficiencies under similar queries: if a driver makes several similar queries, i.e., periodically makes requests for the same start point and endpoint to the NSP, these requests will eventually reveal the areas of the two points as well as the route. In this article, we present a novel privacy-preserving navigation scheme PiSim, which supports similar queries in navigation services. Intuitively, we transform the typical navigation approach into a traffic congestion querying approach. Instead of sending two locations to the NSP and awaiting a navigation route, drivers query the traffic congestion along the navigation route. Specifically, PiSim is characterized by extending anonymous authentication, facilitating privacy-preserving multi-keyword fuzzy search, and constructing weighted proximity graphs. Our scheme protects location privacy and route privacy, and defends against multiple requesting, spurious reporting, and collusion attacks from malicious drivers. Finally, a detailed analysis confirms the privacy and security properties of PiSim. Extensive experiments are conducted to demonstrate the feasibility, performance, and privacy protection level.
papers.abstract_zh: 车辆网络中的交通敏感导航系统通过提供几条实时导航路线来帮助驾驶员避免交通堵塞。然而，驾驶员仍然遇到隐私问题，因为他们的敏感位置，即他们的起点和终点，被提交给诚实但好奇的导航服务提供商(NSP)。先前的隐私保护研究在类似的查询下表现出严重的缺陷:如果驾驶员进行几个类似的查询，即周期性地请求相同的起点和终点到NSP，这些请求将最终揭示这两个点的区域以及路线。本文提出了一种新的隐私保护导航方案PiSim，它支持导航服务中的相似查询。直观上，我们将典型的导航方法转化为交通拥堵查询方法。驾驶员不是向NSP发送两个位置并等待导航路线，而是查询导航路线沿线的交通拥堵情况。具体来说，PiSim的特点是扩展匿名认证，促进隐私保护的多关键字模糊搜索，并构造加权邻近图。我们的方案保护位置隐私和路由隐私，并防御来自恶意司机的多重请求、虚假报告和共谋攻击。最后，详细的分析证实了PiSim的隐私和安全属性。进行了大量的实验来证明可行性、性能和隐私保护水平。
papers.title_zh: 保存隐私的导航，支持车辆网络中的类似查询

papers.title: SDAC: A Slow-Aging Solution for Android Malware Detection Using Semantic Distance Based API Clustering
papers.authors: Jiayun Xu, Yingjiu Li, Robert H. Deng, Ke Xu
papers.abstract: A novel slow-aging solution named SDAC is proposed to address the model aging problem in Android malware detection, which is due to the lack of adapting to the changes in Android specifications during malware detection. Different from periodic retraining of detection models in existing solutions, SDAC evolves effectively by evaluating new APIs’ contributions to malware detection according to existing API’s contributions. In SDAC, the contributions of APIs are evaluated by their contexts in the API call sequences extracted from Android apps. A neural network is applied on the sequences to assign APIs to vectors, among which the differences of API vectors are regarded as the semantic distances. SDAC then clusters all APIs based on their semantic distances to create a feature set in the training phase, and extends the feature set to include all new APIs in the detecting phase. Without being trained by any new set of real-labelled apps, SDAC can adapt to the changes in Android specifications by simply identifying new APIs appearing in the detection phase. In extensive experiments with datasets dated from 2011 to 2016, SDAC achieves a significantly higher accuracy and a significantly slower aging speed compared with MaMaDroid, a state-of-the-art Android malware detection solution which maintains resilience to API changes.
papers.abstract_zh: 针对Android恶意软件检测中模型老化问题，提出了一种新的慢老化解决方案——SDAC。与现有解决方案中定期重新训练检测模型不同，SDAC通过根据现有API的贡献评估新API对恶意软件检测的贡献来有效地进化。在SDAC，API的贡献是通过从Android应用中提取的API调用序列中的上下文来评估的。对序列应用神经网络以将API分配给向量，其中API向量的差异被视为语义距离。然后，SDAC根据语义距离对所有API进行聚类，以在训练阶段创建一个特征集，并在检测阶段扩展该特征集，以包括所有新的API。无需接受任何新的真实标签应用的训练，SDAC可以通过简单地识别检测阶段出现的新API来适应Android规范的变化。在2011年至2016年的数据集上进行的大量实验中，与MaMaDroid相比，SDAC实现了明显更高的准确性和明显更慢的老化速度，mamad roid是一种最先进的Android恶意软件检测解决方案，可以保持对API变化的弹性。
papers.title_zh: SDAC：使用基于语义距离的API聚类的Android恶意软件检测的慢老化解决方案

papers.title: Update Recovery Attacks on Encrypted Database Within Two Updates Using Range Queries Leakage
papers.authors: Jianting Ning, Geong Sen Poh, Xinyi Huang, Robert H. Deng, Shuwei Cao, Ee-Chien Chang
papers.abstract: Recently, reconstruction attacks on static encrypted database supporting range queries have been proposed. However, attacks on encrypted database within two updates in the similar setting have not been studied extensively. As far as we know, the only work is the update recovery attack presented by Grubbs et al. (CCS 2018). Following their seminal work, we present new update recovery attacks for dense dataset (i.e., at least one record corresponding to each value in the range), which enable a deeper understanding of the impact caused by leakages due to updates on dynamic encrypted database. Our first attack aims at recovering the value of a newly added record in the case of one database update. We further demonstrate that the attack can fully reconstruct the database counts if the updated value is either the minimum or maximum in the range. We then consider a setting where two distinct records are added separately, which leads to our second attack. We next extend our attacks to the setting where the update operation is deletion. To the best of our knowledge, update recovery attack on database supporting deletion has not been considered before. We demonstrate practicality of our attack via extensive simulations using real dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，已经提出了对支持范围查询的静态加密数据库的重构攻击。然而，在相似环境下对两次更新内的加密数据库的攻击还没有被广泛研究。据我们所知，唯一的工作是Grubbs等人提出的更新恢复攻击(CCS 2018)。在他们的开创性工作之后，我们提出了针对密集数据集(即，至少一个记录对应于范围中的每个值)的新的更新恢复攻击，这使得能够更深入地理解由于动态加密数据库上的更新而导致的泄漏所造成的影响。我们的第一个攻击目标是在一次数据库更新的情况下恢复新添加记录的值。我们进一步证明，如果更新的值是该范围内的最小值或最大值，攻击可以完全重建数据库计数。然后，我们考虑分别添加两个不同记录的设置，这导致了我们的第二次攻击。接下来，我们将攻击扩展到更新操作是删除的设置。据我们所知，对支持删除的数据库的更新恢复攻击以前没有被考虑过。我们通过使用真实数据集的大量模拟来证明我们的攻击的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 使用范围查询泄漏在两个更新中更新对加密数据库的恢复攻击

papers.title: Predicting the Discovery Pattern of Publically Known Exploited Vulnerabilities
papers.authors: Yazdan Movahedi, Michel Cukier, Ilir Gashi
papers.abstract: Vulnerabilities with publically known exploits typically form 2–7 percent of all vulnerabilities reported for a given software version. With a smaller number of known exploited vulnerabilities compared with the total number of vulnerabilities, it is more difficult to model and predict when a vulnerability with a known exploit will be reported. In this article, we introduce an approach for predicting the discovery pattern of publically known exploited vulnerabilities using all publically known vulnerabilities reported for a given software. Eight commonly used vulnerability discovery models (VDMs) and one neural network model (NNM) were utilized to evaluate the prediction capability of our approach. We compared their predictions results with the scenario when only exploited vulnerabilities were used for prediction. Our results show that, in terms of prediction accuracy, out of eight software we analyzed, our approach led to more accurate results in seven cases. Only in one case, the accuracy of our approach was worse by 1.6 percent.
papers.abstract_zh: 针对给定软件版本报告的所有漏洞中，利用众所周知的漏洞通常占2–7%。与漏洞总数相比，已知被利用的漏洞数量较少，因此建模和预测已知被利用的漏洞何时被报告更加困难。在本文中，我们介绍了一种方法，该方法使用给定软件报告的所有公开已知的漏洞来预测公开已知的被利用漏洞的发现模式。八个常用的漏洞发现模型(VDM)和一个神经网络模型(NNM)被用来评估我们的方法的预测能力。我们将他们的预测结果与仅利用漏洞进行预测的场景进行了比较。我们的结果表明，就预测准确性而言，在我们分析的八个软件中，我们的方法在七个案例中导致了更准确的结果。只有在一种情况下，我们方法的准确度差了1.6%。
papers.title_zh: 预测公开已知的被剥削漏洞的发现模式

papers.title: Double-Edge Embedding Based Provenance Recovery for Low-Latency Applications in Wireless Networks
papers.authors: Harshan Jagadeesh, Amogh Vithalkar, Naman Jhunjhunwala, Manthan Kabra, Prafull Manav, Yih-Chun Hu
papers.abstract: A number of applications in next-generation multi-hop networks, e.g., vehicular networks, impose low-latency requirements on data transmission thereby necessitating the underlying relays to introduce negligible delay when forwarding the packets. While traditional relaying techniques such as amplify-and-forward protocols may help the packets to satisfy latency-constraints, such strategies do not facilitate the destination in learning the path traveled by the packets, which in turn could be used for either learning the topology of the network or detecting security threats on the network. In addition to low-latency constraints, vehicular networks also result in variable network topology owing to the mobility of the nodes, which in turn imposes additional challenges to the destination in learning the path traveled by the packets. Thus, with potential applications to vehicular networks, we address the problem of designing provenance embedding algorithms that reduce the delays on the packets and yet assist the destination in determining the path traveled by the packets with no knowledge of the network topology. We propose a new class of provenance embedding techniques, referred to as double-edge (DE) embedding techniques, wherein a subset of the relay nodes in the path strategically skip the provenance embedding process to reduce the delays on the packets. Using fixed-size bloom filters as tools to implement the double-edge embedding ideas, first, we derive upper bounds on the error-rates of the DE embedding techniques so that the parameters of the bloom filter can be chosen to facilitate provenance recovery within a given quality of service. Subsequently, we present experimental results on a test bed of XBee devices and Raspberry Pis to demonstrate the efficacy of the proposed techniques, and show that the DE embedding techniques offer latency benefits upto 17 percent along with remarkable reduction in error-rates in comparison with the baselines. We also present a security analysis of the proposed provenance embedding methods to asses their vulnerabilities against various attacks including impersonation threats.
papers.abstract_zh: 下一代多跳网络(例如，车辆网络)中的许多应用对数据传输提出了低延迟的要求，从而需要底层中继在转发分组时引入可忽略的延迟。虽然诸如放大转发协议之类的传统中继技术可以帮助分组满足等待时间约束，但是这种策略并不便于目的地了解分组所经过的路径，而这又可以用于了解网络的拓扑或者检测网络上的安全威胁。除了低延迟限制之外，由于节点的移动性，车辆网络还导致可变的网络拓扑，这反过来在学习分组行进的路径方面给目的地带来了额外的挑战。因此，由于对车辆网络的潜在应用，我们解决了设计起源嵌入算法的问题，该算法减少了分组上的延迟，并且还帮助目的地在不知道网络拓扑的情况下确定分组行进的路径。我们提出了一类新的起源嵌入技术，称为双边(DE)嵌入技术，其中路径中的中继节点的子集策略性地跳过起源嵌入过程，以减少分组上的延迟。使用固定大小的布隆过滤器作为工具来实现双边嵌入思想，首先，我们导出DE嵌入技术的错误率的上界，使得可以选择布隆过滤器的参数来促进给定服务质量内的起源恢复。随后，我们在XBee设备和Raspberry Pis的测试床上展示了实验结果，以证明所提出技术的有效性，并表明DE嵌入技术与基线相比，提供了高达17%的延迟优势以及显著降低的错误率。我们还对所提出的出处嵌入方法进行了安全性分析，以评估它们对包括假冒威胁在内的各种攻击的脆弱性。
papers.title_zh: 无线网络中低延迟应用的基于双向嵌入的出处恢复

papers.title: Differentially Private Multi-Agent Planning for Logistic-Like Problems
papers.authors: Dayong Ye, Tianqing Zhu, Sheng Shen, Wanlei Zhou, Philip S. Yu
papers.abstract: Planning is one of the main approaches used to improve agents’ working efficiency by making plans beforehand. However, during planning, agents face the risk of having their private information leaked. This article proposes a novel strong privacy-preserving planning approach for logistic-like problems. This approach outperforms existing approaches by addressing two challenges: 1) simultaneously achieving strong privacy; completeness and efficiency; and 2) addressing communication constraints. These two challenges are prevalent in many real-world applications including logistics in military environments and packet routing in networks. To tackle these two challenges, our approach adopts the differential privacy technique, which can both guarantee strong privacy and control communication overhead. To the best of our knowledge, this article is the first to apply differential privacy to the field of multi-agent planning as a means of preserving the privacy of agents for logistic-like problems.
