We theoretically prove the strong privacy and completeness of our approach and empirically demonstrate its efficiency. We also theoretically analyze the communication overhead of our approach and illustrate how differential privacy can be used to control it.
papers.abstract_zh: 规划是通过预先制定计划来提高agents工作效率的主要方法之一。然而，在计划期间，代理人面临着他们的私人信息被泄露的风险。本文提出了一种新的强隐私保护规划方法。该方法通过解决两个挑战而优于现有方法:1)同时实现强隐私；完整性和效率；以及2)解决通信限制。这两个挑战普遍存在于许多现实世界的应用中，包括军事环境中的后勤和网络中的分组路由。为了解决这两个问题，我们的方法采用了差分隐私技术，既保证了强隐私性又控制了通信开销。据我们所知，本文首次将差分隐私应用于多智能体规划领域，作为保护智能体隐私以解决类似逻辑问题的一种手段。我们从理论上证明了我们的方法的强隐私性和完整性，并从经验上证明了它的效率。我们还从理论上分析了我们的方法的通信开销，并说明了如何使用差分隐私来控制它。
papers.title_zh: 私人多代理计划类似物流的问题

papers.title: Efficient Provably-Secure Dynamic ID-Based Authenticated Key Agreement Scheme With Enhanced Security Provision
papers.authors: Dariush Abbasinezhad-Mood, Sayyed Majid Mazinani, Morteza Nikooghadam, Arezou Ostad-Sharif
papers.abstract: Providing security and privacy in today's digital era is very crucial. In order to ensure that the sensitive user data can only be accessed by a valid server, the user and server should agree on a common key in advance. To do so, in the last decade, a number of dynamic ID-based authenticated key agreement (DIDAKA) protocols have been proposed, which can guarantee subsequent secure communications of users and servers. Nevertheless, investigating the related works indicates that the existing DIDAKA schemes suffer from one or more security challenges. Quite recently, Xie et al. have presented an interesting anonymous DIDAKA protocol to cover the security weaknesses of previous schemes; nonetheless, we found that their scheme is susceptible to three attacks. Therefore, to remedy the security limitations, in this article, we propose a security-enhanced anonymous DIDAKA protocol, which not only keeps the merits of Xie et al.'s scheme, but also offers better execution time compared to their proposed one. To demonstrate the security of the proposed scheme, we present both formal security proof and automatic formal verification of security and to show its efficiency, we present an extensive comparative performance analysis. In conclusion, the results are indicative of the priority of the proposed scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 在当今的数字时代，提供安全性和隐私性至关重要。为了确保敏感的用户数据只能由有效的服务器访问，用户和服务器应该事先就公共密钥达成一致。为了做到这一点，在过去的十年中，已经提出了许多基于身份的动态认证密钥协商(DIDAKA)协议，这些协议可以保证用户和服务器之间的后续安全通信。然而，对相关工作的调查表明，现有的DIDAKA方案遭受一个或多个安全挑战。最近，谢等人提出了一个有趣的匿名DIDAKA协议来弥补以前方案的安全缺陷；尽管如此，我们发现他们的方案容易受到三种攻击。为此，本文提出了一个安全增强的匿名DIDAKA协议，该协议不仅保持了谢等人方案的优点，而且与他们提出的方案相比具有更好的执行时间。为了证明所提方案的安全性，我们给出了安全性的形式化证明和安全性的自动形式化验证，并给出了一个广泛的性能比较分析。总之，结果表明了所提出的方案的优先性。
papers.title_zh: 具有增强的安全性规定的有效可证明的基于Dynamic ID的验证密钥协议方案

papers.title: Analysis of Encryption Key Generation in Modern Crypto Ransomware
papers.authors: Fabrizio Cicala, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: The scale of ransomware attacks increases every year, and so does its cost, which has reached billions of dollars. A specific class of ransomware, called crypto ransomware, encrypts data of the victims for monetary gain. The encryption models adopted in crypto-ransomware can be very diverse, but, regardless, one of the critical aspects of the encryption process is the method used to generate the encryption key. The analysis of such a method can provide valuable information for understanding ransomware's innermost details and features, critical for building defenses. In this article, we analyze the encryption model and the encryption key generation process of ransomware samples from different families. We discuss the analysis methods and tools we used and the challenges in the analysis of ransomware code. Finally, we present the results of our study and discuss algorithms and functions used in modern crypto-ransomware.
papers.abstract_zh: 勒索软件攻击的规模每年都在增加，其成本也在增加，目前已经达到数十亿美元。一种特殊的勒索软件，称为加密勒索软件，加密受害者的数据以获取金钱利益。加密勒索软件中采用的加密模型可能非常多样，但无论如何，加密过程的一个关键方面是用于生成加密密钥的方法。对这种方法的分析可以为理解勒索软件最深层的细节和特征提供有价值的信息，这对构建防御至关重要。本文分析了来自不同家族的勒索样本的加密模型和加密密钥生成过程。我们讨论了我们使用的分析方法和工具，以及在分析勒索软件代码时面临的挑战。最后，我们介绍了我们的研究结果，并讨论了现代加密勒索软件中使用的算法和函数。
papers.title_zh: 现代加密勒索软件中的加密密钥生成分析

papers.title: A Hardware-Assisted Heartbeat Mechanism for Fault Identification in Large-Scale IoT Systems
papers.authors: Mandrita Banerjee, Carlo Borges, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Junghee Lee, Chrysostomos Nicopoulos
papers.abstract: With increased inter-connectivity among disparate devices, such as Internet-of-Things (IoT) devices, including those deployed in a nation’s critical infrastructure, there is a need to ensure that any failure in the deployed devices can be detected. The capability to automatically detect device failures is particularly crucial in a large-scale, complex IoT system, since it can be very time-consuming and challenging to investigate a large number of geographically-dispersed devices that are also of different makes and types. In this paper, we present a faulty-device identification technique that is designed to achieve lightweight processor-level architectural support. Specifically, a hardware-based monitoring agent is incorporated within a processor and connected to a separate monitoring program when an examination is required. By analyzing information collected by the agent, the monitoring program determines whether the device being monitored is functioning. Findings from our detailed evaluation demonstrate that the proposed approach can detect around 90 percent of the failures with minimal hardware overhead of approximately 5k gates. This area overhead is reasonable and amounts to 7.69 percent of the ARM Cortex-M4 – a lightweight IoT-class processor – that has a total area (excluding optional caches and scratch-pad memory) of 65k gates.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着不同设备(如物联网(IoT)设备，包括部署在国家关键基础设施中的设备)之间互连性的增加，需要确保可以检测到部署设备中的任何故障。在大规模复杂的物联网系统中，自动检测设备故障的能力尤为重要，因为调查大量地理位置分散、品牌和类型各异的设备非常耗时且极具挑战性。在本文中，我们提出了一种故障设备识别技术，旨在实现轻量级处理器级架构支持。具体而言，基于硬件的监控代理被结合在处理器内，并且当需要检查时连接到单独的监控程序。通过分析代理收集的信息，监控程序确定被监控的设备是否正在运行。我们详细评估的结果表明，所提出的方法可以用大约5k门的最小硬件开销检测到大约90%的故障。这一面积开销是合理的，相当于ARM Cortex-M4(一种轻量级物联网级处理器)的7.69%，该处理器的总面积(不包括可选的缓存和暂存存储器)为65k个门。
papers.title_zh: 在大规模物联网系统中用于故障识别的硬件辅助心跳机制

papers.title: DREAM: Online Control Mechanisms for Data Aggregation Error Minimization in Privacy-Preserving Crowdsensing
papers.authors: Yang Liu, Tong Feng, Mugen Peng, Jianfeng Guan, Yu Wang
papers.abstract: Nowadays, by integrating the smart devices carried by users with existing communication infrastructures to provide large-scale, fine-grained and complex sensing services, crowdsensing as a novel sensing paradigm has significantly enriched the applications of smart city and promoted the development of Internet of Things (IoT). However, privacy has become skyrocketing concern for crowdsensing and gravely affected the deployment of crowdsensing. In this article, we present a framework to make the tradeoff between minimizing data aggregation error and guaranteeing system stability by jointly considering the privacy of participants, the randomness of sensing task arrival and the cost of platform. We propose an online control mechanism by exploiting Lyapunov stochastic optimization technique. Additionally, considering that, in reality, it always takes different time for different tasks to make sensing decisions, we extend standard Lyapunov stochastic optimization technique to make separate decisions for different types of sensing tasks in consecutive time. Through rigorous theoretical analysis, we prove that our time-average data aggregation error is approximately optimal while still maintaining system stability. By carrying out extensive simulations, we demonstrate the superiority of our proposed mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，通过将用户携带的智能设备与现有的通信基础设施相结合，提供大规模、细粒度和复杂的感知服务，众包感知作为一种新颖的感知范式，极大地丰富了智慧城市的应用，促进了物联网的发展。然而，隐私已经成为众筹关注的焦点，并严重影响了众筹的部署。在本文中，我们提出了一个框架，通过联合考虑参与者的隐私、感知任务到达的随机性和平台的成本，在最小化数据聚集误差和保证系统稳定性之间进行权衡。我们利用李亚普诺夫随机优化技术提出了一种在线控制机制。此外，考虑到在现实中，不同的任务做出感知决策总是需要不同的时间，我们扩展了标准的李亚普诺夫随机优化技术，以在连续的时间内对不同类型的感知任务做出单独的决策。通过严格的理论分析，我们证明了我们的时间平均数据聚集误差是近似最优的，同时仍然保持系统的稳定性。通过进行大量的模拟，我们证明了我们提出的机制的优越性。
papers.title_zh: 梦想：数据聚合错误最小化隐私人群的在线控制机制

papers.title: An Anonymous Authentication System for Pay-As-You-Go Cloud Computing$^*$*
papers.authors: Jianye Huang, Willy Susilo, Fuchun Guo, Ge Wu, Zhen Zhao, Qiong Huang
papers.abstract: Cloud computing offers on-demand availability of computing resources over the Internet. To attract users, cloud providers offer their resources as services at reasonable prices and provide various price models to reflect higher level of quality of service (QoS), which are referred as pricing schemes. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq2-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-times anonymous authentication (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq3-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA) is an attractive approach to construct pricing schemes, providing access controllability, user anonymity and public traceability. In <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq4-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA schemes, authenticated users are permitted to anonymously access services from a provider at most <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq5-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> times, while the ones whose the number of access times exceeds <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq6-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> can be publicly traced. That is, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq7-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA schemes offer a prepaid plan that charges users based on the amount of access times. Alternatively, pay-as-you-go (PAYG) is a pricing strategy that allows users to be charged based on the amount of usage, reducing the costs on unnecessary resources. Adopting <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq8-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA schemes to PAYG model, the access bound <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq9-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is decided by the prepayment amount and the service usage is tracked by the number of access times. However, this approach is impractical, since existing <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq10-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA schemes only allow an one-time access in an authentication. This article aims to bridge this gap in the literature by designing an efficient and secure authentication system for PAYG cloud computing, supporting flexible access controllability, user anonymity and public traceability. To achieve this, we propose a new <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq11-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA primitive, called <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq12-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-times anonymous pay-as-you-go authentication (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq13-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA-PAYG), that allows users to access services for multiple times in an authentication as long as the number of their access times does not exceed <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq14-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. We first formalize the definition and security model for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq15-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA-PAYG scheme. Subsequently, we present a concrete construction of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq16-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA-PAYG scheme, with the computational complexity as <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$O(1)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>O</mml:mi><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq17-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and the constant communicational cost. Finally, comparing with the most efficient <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq18-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA scheme proposed by Emura <italic>et al.</italic>, the experimental results show that our <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq19-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA-PAYG scheme is 2.5 to 3 times faster and saves up to 66 percent storage in grant processes. The time cost of an authentication of our <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="susilo-ieq20-3007633.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA-PAYG scheme is constant (1.4-2.4 ms), while Emura <italic>et al.</italic>’s scheme needs more than one second when the number of access time is greater than 1, 000.
papers.title_zh: 用于付款的匿名身份验证系统$^*$*

papers.title: Decentralized Blockchain-Based Trust Management Protocol for the Internet of Things
papers.authors: Djamel Eddine Kouicem, Youcef Imine, Abdelmadjid Bouabdallah, Hicham Lakhlef
papers.abstract: The Internet of Things (IoT) is a network that integrates a variety of heterogeneous nodes, such as connected devices (sensors, robots, and smart phones ...), connected cars, smart homes, etc. These smart objects communicate and collaborate in distributed and dynamic environments that are facing several security challenges. Trust management is one of the most important challenges in IoT. Existing trust management solutions do not meet the new requirements of IoT such as heterogeneity, mobility, and scalability. In this article, we propose a hierarchical and scalable blockchain-based trust management protocol with mobility support in massively distributed IoT systems. In our protocol, mobile smart objects disseminate trust information on service providers to the blockchain. Thus, all the objects will have a global view on each service provider in the architecture, which speeds up the trust evaluation process. In addition, our protocol is resilient against the most known malicious attacks such as bad-mouthing, ballot-stuffing, and cooperative attacks. We confirm the efficiency of our proposal through theoretical analysis and extensive simulations. Finally, we show that it outperforms existing solutions, especially in terms of scalability, mobility support, communication, and computation costs.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)是一个集成了各种异构节点的网络，例如连接的设备(传感器、机器人和智能手机...)、联网汽车、智能家居等。这些智能对象在面临多种安全挑战的分布式动态环境中进行通信和协作。信任管理是物联网面临的最重要挑战之一。现有的信任管理解决方案不能满足物联网的新需求，如异构性、移动性和可扩展性。在本文中，我们提出了一种在大规模分布式物联网系统中支持移动性的分层可扩展的基于区块链的信任管理协议。在我们的协议中，移动智能对象向区块链传播服务提供商的信任信息。因此，所有对象都将对体系结构中的每个服务提供者有一个全局视图，这加快了信任评估过程。此外，我们的协议可以抵抗大多数已知的恶意攻击，如唱衰、选票填充和合作攻击。我们通过理论分析和大量的模拟实验证实了我们的建议的有效性。最后，我们表明它优于现有的解决方案，特别是在可伸缩性、移动性支持、通信和计算成本方面。
papers.title_zh: 物联网的基于分散区块链的信任管理协议

papers.title: Boolean Searchable Symmetric Encryption With Filters on Trusted Hardware
papers.authors: Bernardo Ferreira, Bernardo Portela, Tiago Oliveira, Guilherme Borges, Henrique João L. Domingos, João Leitão
papers.abstract: The prevalence and availability of cloud infrastructures has made them the de facto solution for storing and archiving data, both for organizations and individual users. Nonetheless, the cloud’s wide spread adoption is still hindered by dependability and security concerns, particularly in applications with large data collections where efficient search and retrieval services are also major requirements. This leads to an increased tension between security, efficiency, and search expressiveness. In this article we tackle this tension by proposing BISEN, a new provably-secure boolean searchable symmetric encryption scheme that improves these three complementary dimensions by exploring the design space of isolation guarantees offered by novel commodity hardware such as Intel SGX, abstracted as Isolated Execution Environments (IEEs). BISEN is the first scheme to support multiple users and enable highly expressive and arbitrarily complex boolean queries, with minimal information leakage regarding performed queries and accessed data, and verifiability regarding fully malicious adversaries. Furthermore, BISEN extends the traditional SSE model to support filter functions on search results based on generic metadata created by the users. Experimental validation and comparison with the state of art shows that BISEN provides better performance with enriched search semantics and security properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 云基础设施的普及和可用性使其成为组织和个人用户存储和归档数据的事实上的解决方案。尽管如此，云的广泛采用仍然受到可靠性和安全性问题的阻碍，特别是在具有大量数据收集的应用程序中，高效的搜索和检索服务也是主要需求。这导致安全性、效率和搜索表现力之间的矛盾增加。在本文中，我们通过提出一种新的可证明安全的布尔可搜索对称加密方案BISEN来解决这一矛盾，该方案通过探索由新型商用硬件(如SGX)提供的隔离保证的设计空间来改进这三个互补维度，抽象为隔离执行环境(IEEs)。BISEN是第一个支持多用户并支持高度表达和任意复杂的布尔查询的方案，具有关于执行的查询和访问的数据的最小信息泄漏，以及关于完全恶意的对手的可验证性。此外，BISEN扩展了传统的SSE模型，以支持基于用户创建的通用元数据的搜索结果过滤功能。实验验证和与现有技术的比较表明，BISEN提供了更好的性能，丰富了搜索语义和安全属性。
papers.title_zh: 布尔可搜索的对称对称加密，并在受信任的硬件上过滤器

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Outsourced Inner Product Computation on Encrypted Database
papers.authors: Haining Yang, Ye Su, Jing Qin, Huaxiong Wang
papers.abstract: We consider an outsourced computation model in the selective data sharing setting. Specifically, one of the data owners outsources the encrypted data to an untrusted cloud server, and wants to share the specific function of these data with a group of data users. A data user can perform the specific computation on the data that it is authorized to access. We propose a construction under this model for the inner product computation by using the Inner Product Functional Encryption (IPFE) as a building block. A standard IPFE used on this model has two privacy weaknesses regarding the master secret key and the encrypted vector. We propose a strengthened IPFE that revises these weaknesses. We construct a new IPFE scheme and use it to construct an efficient outsourced inner product computation scheme. In our outsourced computation scheme, the storage overhead and the computation cost for a data user are independent of the vector size. The result privacy and the outsourced data privacy are well preserved against the untrusted cloud server. The experimental results show that our schemes are efficient and practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑在选择性数据共享设置外包计算模型。具体来说，其中一个数据所有者将加密数据外包给一个不可信的云服务器，并希望与一组数据用户共享这些数据的特定功能。数据用户可以对其有权访问的数据执行特定的计算。我们在这个模型下提出了一个内积计算的结构，使用内积函数加密(IPFE)作为构造块。在这个模型上使用的标准IPFE在主密钥和加密向量方面有两个隐私弱点。我们建议加强IPFE，修正这些弱点。我们构造了一个新的IPFE方案，并用它构造了一个有效的外包内积计算方案。在我们的外包计算方案中，数据用户的存储开销和计算成本与向量大小无关。相对于不可信的云服务器，结果隐私和外包数据隐私被很好地保护。实验结果表明，我们的方案是有效和实用的。
papers.title_zh: 保存隐私的数据库外包内部产品计算

papers.title: Practical and Provably Secure Three-Factor Authentication Protocol Based on Extended Chaotic-Maps for Mobile Lightweight Devices
papers.authors: Shuming Qiu, Ding Wang, Guoai Xu, Saru Kumari
papers.abstract: Due to the limitations of symmetric-key techniques, authentication and key agreement (AKA) protocols based on public-key techniques have attracted much attention, providing secure access and communication mechanism for various application environments. Among these public-key techniques used for AKA protocols, chaotic-map is more effective than scalar multiplication and modular exponentiation, and it offers a list of desirable cryptographic properties such as un-predictability, un-repeatability, un-certainty, and higher efficiency than scalar multiplication and modular exponentiation. Furthermore, it is usually believed that three-factor AKA protocols can achieve a higher security level than single- and two-factor protocols. However, none of existing three-factor AKA protocols can meet all security requirements. One of the most prevalent problems is how to balance security and usability, and particularly how to achieve truly three-factor security while providing password change friendliness. To deal with this problem, in this article we put forward a provably secure three-factor AKA protocol based on extended chaotic-maps for mobile lightweight devices, by adopting the techniques of “Fuzzy-Verifiers” and “Honeywords”. We prove the security of the proposed protocol in the random oracle model, assuming the intractability of extended chaotic-maps Computational Diffie-Hellman problem. We also simulate the protocol by using the AVISPA tool. The security analysis and simulation results show that our protocol can meet all 13 evaluation criteria regarding security. We also assess the performance of our protocol by comparing with seven other related protocols. The evaluation results demonstrate that our protocol offers better balance between security and usability over state-of-the-art ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于对称密钥技术的局限性，基于公钥技术的认证和密钥协商(AKA)协议引起了广泛关注，为各种应用环境提供了安全的访问和通信机制。在这些用于AKA协议的公钥技术中，混沌映射比标量乘和模幂运算更有效，并且它提供了一系列期望的密码特性，例如不可预测性、不可重复性、不确定性，以及比标量乘和模幂运算更高的效率。此外，通常认为三因素AKA协议可以获得比单因素和双因素协议更高的安全级别。然而，现有的三因素AKA协议没有一个能够满足所有的安全需求。最普遍的问题之一是如何平衡安全性和可用性，特别是如何在提供密码更改友好性的同时实现真正的三因素安全性。针对这一问题，本文采用“模糊验证器”和“蜜语”技术，提出了一种基于扩展混沌映射的可证明安全的移动轻量级设备三因子AKA协议。我们在随机预言模型下证明了该协议的安全性，假设了扩展混沌映射计算Diffie-Hellman问题的难解性。我们还使用AVISPA工具对协议进行了仿真。安全性分析和仿真结果表明，我们的协议能够满足所有13个安全性评估标准。我们还通过与其他七个相关协议的比较来评估我们的协议的性能。评估结果表明，我们的协议在安全性和可用性之间提供了更好的平衡。
papers.title_zh: 实用且可证明安全的三因素身份验证协议，基于移动轻型设备的扩展混沌图

papers.title: Dynamic Implementation of Security Requirements in Business Processes
papers.authors: Benyuan Yang, Hesuan Hu
papers.abstract: Separations of Duties (SoDs) are an important class of security requirements in business process management. Their violation may result in system misuse and fraud, leading to economic losses or legal implications. Hence, it is of paramount importance to ensure that a business process meets all SoDs. Existing works usually adopt model checking to verify SoDs. However, building formal models that simultaneously account for both workflow and SoDs is a time-consuming and error-prone activity. In this article, we propose a new approach to specifying and enforcing SoDs in business processes using Petri nets (PNs). First, we derive a necessary and sufficient condition for the SoD violations from the viewpoint of structure and marking of PNs. We show that the SoD constraints can be enforced by disallowing the process to reach certain markings, with the constraints being written as linear inequalities. Then, we design supervisors to enforce SoDs in an off-line and a real-time manner, respectively, based on the linear inequalities. Meanwhile, inequality analysis is provided for the structural simplicity of supervisors. Finally, the complexity analysis of our approach and the comparison with the work in the literature are given to illustrate the effectiveness and efficiency of ours.
papers.abstract_zh: 职责分离(SOD)是业务流程管理中一类重要的安全需求。违反这些规则可能导致系统误用和欺诈，导致经济损失或法律后果。因此，确保业务流程符合所有SOD是至关重要的。现有的工作通常采用模型检测来验证SoDs。然而，构建同时考虑工作流和SoDs的正式模型是一项耗时且容易出错的活动。在本文中，我们提出了一种使用Petri网(PNs)在业务流程中指定和执行SOD的新方法。首先，我们从PNs的结构和标记的角度推导了SoD违反的充要条件。我们证明了SoD约束可以通过禁止进程到达某些标记来强制执行，约束被写成线性不等式。然后，基于线性不等式，我们设计监督器分别以离线和实时方式执行SoDs。同时，为简化监督者的结构提供了不等式分析。最后，给出了我们方法的复杂性分析以及与文献中工作的比较，以说明我们方法的有效性和效率。
papers.title_zh: 在业务流程中的安全要求动态实施

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Deep Learning With Irregular Users
papers.authors: Guowen Xu, Hongwei Li, Yun Zhang, Shengmin Xu, Jianting Ning, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Federated deep learning has been widely used in various fields. To protect data privacy, many privacy-preservingapproaches have been designed and implemented in various scenarios. However, existing works rarely consider a fundamental issue that the data shared by certain users (called irregular users) may be of low quality. Obviously, in a federated training process, data shared by many irregular users may impair the training accuracy, or worse, lead to the uselessness of the final model. In this article, we propose PPFDL, a Privacy-Preserving Federated Deep Learning framework with irregular users. In specific, we design a novel solution to reduce the negative impact of irregular users on the training accuracy, which guarantees that the training results are mainly calculated from the contribution of high-quality data. Meanwhile, we exploit Yao's garbled circuits and additively homomorphic cryptosystems to ensure the confidentiality of all user-related information. Moreover, PPFDL is also robust to users dropping out during the whole implementation. This means that each user can be offline at any subprocess of training, as long as the remaining online users can still complete the training task. Extensive experiments demonstrate the superior performance of PPFDL in terms of training accuracy, computation, and communication overheads.
papers.abstract_zh: 联邦深度学习已经广泛应用于各个领域。为了保护数据隐私，许多隐私保护方法已经在各种场景中被设计和实现。然而，现有的工作很少考虑一个基本问题，即某些用户(称为非正规用户)共享的数据可能质量较低。显然，在联合训练过程中，许多不规则用户共享的数据可能会削弱训练精度，甚至更糟，导致最终模型无用。在这篇文章中，我们提出了PPFDL，这是一个具有不规则用户的隐私保护联邦深度学习框架。具体而言，我们设计了一种新颖的解决方案来减少不规则用户对训练精度的负面影响，保证训练结果主要来自高质量数据的贡献。同时，我们利用Yao的乱码电路和加法同态密码系统来确保所有用户相关信息的机密性。此外，PPFDL对用户在整个实现过程中的退出也是健壮的。这意味着每个用户都可以在培训的任何子流程中脱机，只要其余的联机用户仍然可以完成培训任务。大量实验证明了PPFDL在训练精度、计算和通信开销方面的优越性能。
papers.title_zh: 隐私权与不规则用户联合深入学习

papers.title: Reversible Data Hiding in Encrypted Images using Chunk Encryption and Redundancy Matrix Representation
papers.authors: Zi-Long Liu, Chi-Man Pun
papers.abstract: For reversible data hiding in encrypted images (RDHEI), the private information in the original image content is protected and the embedded secret data can be used to manage the encrypted image. Up to now, many RDHEI algorithms have been reported, however, these reported RDHEI algorithms cannot achieve a high embedding capacity. Therefore, this article proposes a new RDHEI scheme, which will have improved performance. The main contributions of the proposed scheme include two points: chunk encryption (CE) and redundancy matrix representation (RMR). First, different from the encryption method of pixel-by-pixel encryption used in the previous RDHEI algorithms, CE is the method that uses the traditional exclusive-or (XOR) method to encrypt the original image in chunks. By using the CE method, redundancy will be retained in the encrypted chunks. Second, the RMR method is designed to generate available room for accommodating secret data in redundancy matrices, which are existed in some encrypted chunks. Experimental results show that the proposed scheme achieves a high embedding capacity and the directly decrypted images retain high quality.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于加密图像中的可逆数据隐藏，原始图像内容中的私有信息受到保护，嵌入的秘密数据可以用来管理加密图像。到目前为止，已经报道了许多RDHEI算法，然而，这些报道的RDHEI算法不能实现高嵌入容量。因此，本文提出了一种新的RDHEI方案，它将具有改进的性能。该方案的主要贡献包括两点:块加密(CE)和冗余矩阵表示(RMR)。首先，与以前的RDHEI算法中使用的逐像素加密的加密方法不同，CE是使用传统的异或(XOR)方法对原始图像进行分块加密的方法。通过使用CE方法，冗余将被保留在加密的块中。第二，RMR方法被设计为在冗余矩阵中产生容纳秘密数据的可用空间，该冗余矩阵存在于一些加密块中。实验结果表明，该方案具有较高的嵌入容量，直接解密后的图像保持了较高的质量。
papers.title_zh: 可逆数据隐藏在加密图像中使用块加密和冗余矩阵表示

papers.title: Loco-Store: Locality-Based Oblivious Data Storage
papers.authors: Wenlong Tian, Ruixuan Li, Zhiyong Xu, Weijun Xiao
papers.abstract: With the growing popularity of cloud storage, how to prevent information leakage from cloud access patterns attracts great attention. Oblivious RAM is proposed for this purpose. It is designed for the memory system, and most existing work focused on improving performance in the main memory. Recently, ORAM has been extended to the cloud environment, and it is called Oblivious Data Storage. TaoStore, the state-of-the-art oblivious data storage system, integrates the ORAM technology with synchronous I/O technology to reduce the mean response time. As we observed, there is a strong locality existing in user accesses. However, existing Oblivious Storage research did not consider this. In this article, we propose Loco-Store, an oblivious data storage. In Loco-Store, we design a novel stash controller scheme that can dynamically group relevant blocks during the oblivious I/O processes. We also propose a locality-based eviction algorithm to keep the security guarantee. The theoretical proof proves that our scheme keeps the security definition of ORAM. Finally, we implement a prototype and conduct extensive experiments on real-world datasets. The results show that Loco-Store can save the network bandwidth consumption up to 39.19 percent, and reduce the overall access time by 26.17 percent
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云存储的日益普及，如何防止云访问模式的信息泄露引起了极大的关注。为此，提出了不经意RAM。它是为内存系统设计的，大多数现有的工作都集中在提高主内存的性能上。最近，ORAM被扩展到云环境，它被称为不经意数据存储。TaoStore是最先进的不经意数据存储系统，它将ORAM技术与同步I/O技术相结合，以减少平均响应时间。正如我们所观察到的，用户访问存在很强的局部性。然而，现有的遗忘存储研究没有考虑这一点。在本文中，我们提出了Loco-Store，一种不经意的数据存储。在Loco-Store中，我们设计了一种新颖的stash控制器方案，可以在不经意的I/O过程中动态地对相关的块进行分组。我们还提出了一个基于局部性的驱逐算法来保证安全性。理论证明我们的方案保持了ORAM的安全性定义。最后，我们实现了一个原型，并在真实数据集上进行了大量的实验。结果表明，本地存储可以节省39.19%的网络带宽消耗，减少26.17%的总访问时间
papers.title_zh: Loco商店：基于局部的遗忘数据存储

papers.title: Efficient Secure Pattern Matching With Malicious Adversaries
papers.authors: Maryam Zarezadeh, Hamid Mala, Behrouz Tork Ladani
papers.abstract: In a secure pattern matching scheme, a client learns only the locations where his private pattern matches a server’s private text, while server learns nothing. In this article, we propose a secure pattern matching protocol for the semi-honest setting which is then enhanced to guarantee full simulation-based security in the presence of malicious parties. The proposed protocol supports exact pattern matching, approximate pattern matching and pattern matching with wildcards. It is analytically shown that the proposed protocol is considerably more efficient in the approximate matching with at most <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="mala-ieq1-3009595.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> permitted mismatches while it has the same speed in the exact matching case comparing with the recent work in the literature. The achievements are also experimentally evaluated on a case of secure Desoxyribo-Nucleic Acid (DNA) search over the NCBI dataset of the United States national library of medicine. The results show efficiency of the proposed protocol and particularly confirm low computation overhead for the client.
papers.abstract_zh: 在一个安全的模式匹配方案中，客户只知道他的私有模式与服务器的私有文本匹配的位置，而服务器什么也不知道。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个用于半诚实设置的安全模式匹配协议，然后对其进行了增强，以保证在恶意方存在的情况下完全基于模拟的安全性。该协议支持精确模式匹配、近似模式匹配和带通配符的模式匹配。分析表明，所提出的协议在近似匹配中相当有效，最多具有< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ k $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " mala-ie Q1-3009595 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >允许的不匹配，同时在精确匹配中具有相同的速度在美国国家医学图书馆的NCBI数据集上的安全脱氧核糖核酸(DNA)搜索案例上也实验性地评估了这些成果。结果显示了所提出的协议的效率，并且特别证实了客户端的低计算开销。
papers.title_zh: 有效的安全模式与恶意对手匹配

papers.title: High Capacity Lossless Data Hiding in JPEG Bitstream Based on General VLC Mapping
papers.authors: Yang Du, Zhaoxia Yin, Xinpeng Zhang
papers.abstract: As a branch of reversible data hiding (RDH), lossless data hiding (LDH) technique is important especially. Because LDH can not only reconstruct the cover image losslessly but also keep the visual quality of the marked image no degradation. This article proposes a new LDH scheme for JPEG images by general variable length code (VLC) mapping. In this scheme, the run size values are first reordered. Then a feasible solution space is generated. A simulated embedding model is established to find the optimal solution from the feasible solution space. The optimal mapping relationship is constructed according to the optimal solution. According to the optimal GVM relationship, the Huffman table in the file header is modified and then the additional data can be embedded by replacing the used VLC with the VLCs in the same mapping set. Experimental results demonstrate that most of the JPEG images using the proposed scheme cause less file size increments than previous RDH schemes while keeping the marked JPEG image with no distortion. Furthermore, the proposed scheme can obtain high embedding capacity.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为可逆数据隐藏(RDH)的一个分支，无损数据隐藏技术尤为重要。因为LDH不仅可以无损重建载体图像，而且可以保持标记图像的视觉质量不下降。提出了一种新的基于通用变长码(VLC)映射的JPEG图像LDH方案。在这个方案中，游程值首先被重新排序。然后生成可行解空间。建立模拟嵌入模型，从可行解空间中寻找最优解。根据最优解构造最优映射关系。根据最优GVM关系，修改文件头中的霍夫曼表，然后通过用同一映射集中的VLC替换所使用的VLC来嵌入附加数据。实验结果表明，与以前的RDH方案相比，使用该方案的大多数JPEG图像的文件大小增加较少，同时保持了标记的JPEG图像没有失真。此外，该方案可以获得较高的嵌入容量。
papers.title_zh: 基于一般VLC映射

papers.title: Generating Realistic Fake Equations in Order to Reduce Intellectual Property Theft
papers.authors: Yanhai Xiong, Giridhar Ramachandran, Rajesh Ganesan, Sushil Jajodia, V. S. Subrahmanian
papers.abstract: According to Symantec, the average gap from the time a company is compromised by a zero-day attack to the time the vulnerability is discovered is 312 days. This leaves an adversary with a lot of time to exfiltrate corporate IP. Recent work has suggested automatically generating multiple fake versions of a document to impose costs on the attacker who needs to correctly identify the original document from a set of mostly fake documents. But in the real world, documents contain many diverse components. In this article, we focus on technical documents that often contain equations. We present <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf FEE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FEE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="jajodia-ieq1-3038132.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> (Fake Equation Engine), a framework to generate fake equations in such documents. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf FEE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FEE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="jajodia-ieq2-3038132.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> tries to preserve multiple aspects of a given equation when generating a fake. Moreover, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf FEE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FEE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="jajodia-ieq3-3038132.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is very general and applies to diverse equational forms including polynomial equations, differential equations, transcendental equations, and more. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf FEE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FEE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="jajodia-ieq4-3038132.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> iteratively solves a complex, changing optimization problem inside it. We also present <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf FEE-FAST}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FEE</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FAST</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="jajodia-ieq5-3038132.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, a fast approximate algorithm to solve the optimization problem within <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf FEE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FEE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="jajodia-ieq6-3038132.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Using a panel of human subjects, we show that <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf FEE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">FEE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="jajodia-ieq7-3038132.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> achieves a high rate in deceiving sophisticated subjects.
papers.abstract_zh: 根据赛门铁克的数据，从公司受到零日攻击到发现漏洞的平均间隔时间为312天。这给对手留下了大量时间来窃取公司知识产权。最近的工作建议自动生成文档的多个伪造版本，以向需要从一组大部分是伪造的文档中正确识别原始文档的攻击者强加成本。但是在现实世界中，文档包含许多不同的组件。在本文中，我们主要关注那些经常包含方程的技术文档。我们提出了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF FEE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " sans-serif " > FEE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " jajodia-ie Q1-3038132 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >(假方程引擎)，这是一个在这样的文档中生成假方程的框架。< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF FEE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > FEE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " jajodia-ieq 2-3038132 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >尝试在生成假像时保留给定公式的多个方面。此外，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF FEE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " sans-serif " > FEE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " jajodia-ieq 3-3038132 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >非常通用，适用于各种方程形式，包括多项式方程、微分方程< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF FEE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > FEE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " jajodia-ieq 4-3038132 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >迭代求解其中复杂、不断变化的优化问题。我们还提供< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF FEE-FAST } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > FEE </MML:mi >-</MML:mo > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > FAST </MML:mi > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline使用一组人类受试者，我们显示< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF FEE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > FEE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " jajodia-ieq 7-3038132 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >在欺骗老练的人方面取得了很高的比率
papers.title_zh: 产生逼真的假方程式以减少知识产权盗窃

papers.title: BlockMaze: An Efficient Privacy-Preserving Account-Model Blockchain Based on zk-SNARKs
papers.authors: Zhangshuang Guan, Zhiguo Wan, Yang Yang, Yan Zhou, Butian Huang
papers.abstract: The disruptive blockchain technology is expected to have broad applications in many areas due to its advantages of transparency, fault tolerance, and decentralization, but the open nature of blockchain also introduces severe privacy issues. Since anyone can deduce private information about relevant accounts, different privacy-preserving techniques have been proposed for cryptocurrencies under the UTXO model, e.g., Zerocash and Monero. However, it is more challenging to protect privacy for account-model blockchains (e.g., Ethereum) since it is much easier to link accounts in the account-model blockchain. In this article, we propose BlockMaze, an efficient privacy-preserving account-model blockchain based on zk-SNARKs. Along with dual-balance model, BlockMaze achieves strong privacy guarantees by hiding account balances, transaction amounts, and linkage between senders and recipients. Moreover, we provide formal security definitions and prove the security of BlockMaze. Finally, we implement a prototype of BlockMaze based on Libsnark and Go-Ethereum, and conduct extensive experiments to evaluate its performance. Our 300-node experiment results show that BlockMaze has high efficiency in computation and transaction throughput: one transaction verification takes about 14.2 ms, one transaction generation takes 6.1-18.6 seconds, and its throughput is around 20 TPS.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于其透明、容错和去中心化的优势，颠覆性的区块链技术有望在许多领域得到广泛应用，但区块链的开放性也带来了严重的隐私问题。由于任何人都可以推断出有关相关账户的私人信息，因此在UTXO模型下为加密货币提出了不同的隐私保护技术，例如Zerocash和Monero。然而，保护账户模型区块链(如以太坊)的隐私更具挑战性，因为在账户模型区块链中链接账户要容易得多。本文基于zk-SNARKs提出了一种有效的隐私保护账户模型区块链BlockMaze。除了双平衡模型，BlockMaze还通过隐藏帐户余额、交易金额以及发送方和接收方之间的联系来实现强大的隐私保证。此外，我们给出了形式化的安全定义，并证明了BlockMaze的安全性。最后，我们实现了一个基于Libsnark和Go-Ethereum的BlockMaze原型，并进行了大量的实验来评估其性能。我们的300节点实验结果表明，BlockMaze在计算和事务吞吐量方面具有较高的效率:一个事务验证大约需要14.2 ms，一个事务生成需要6.1-18.6秒，其吞吐量在20 TPS左右。
papers.title_zh: BlockMaze：基于ZK-Snarks的高效保护隐私帐户模型区块链

papers.title: Lightweight and Certificateless Multi-Receiver Secure Data Transmission Protocol for Wireless Body Area Networks
papers.authors: Jian Shen, Ziyuan Gui, Xiaofeng Chen, Jun Zhang, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: The rapid development of low-power integrated circuits, wireless communication, intelligent sensors, and microelectronics has allowed the realization of wireless body area networks (WBANs), which can monitor patients’ vital body parameters remotely in real time to offer timely treatment. These vital body parameters are related to patients’ life and health; and these highly private data are subject to many security threats. To guarantee privacy, many secure communication protocols have been proposed. However, most of these protocols have a one-to-one structure in extra-body communication and cannot support multidisciplinary team (MDT). Hence, we propose a lightweight and certificateless multi-receiver secure data transmission protocol for WBANs to support MDT treatment in this article. In particular, a novel multi-receiver certificateless generalized signcryption (MR-CLGSC) scheme is proposed that can adaptively use only one algorithm to implement one of three cryptographic primitives: signature, encryption or signcryption. Then, a multi-receiver secure data transmission protocol based on the MR-CLGSC scheme with many security properties, such as data integrity and confidentiality, non-repudiation, anonymity, forward and backward secrecy, unlinkability and data freshness, is designed. Both security analysis and performance analysis show that the proposed protocol for WBANs is secure, efficient, and highly practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 低功耗集成电路、无线通信、智能传感器和微电子技术的快速发展使得无线体域网(WBANs)成为可能，它可以远程实时监测患者的重要身体参数，以便提供及时的治疗。这些重要的身体参数关系到患者的生命和健康；并且这些高度隐私的数据受到许多安全威胁。为了保证隐私，已经提出了许多安全通信协议。然而，这些协议中的大多数在体外通信中具有一对一的结构，并且不支持多学科团队(MDT)。因此，本文提出了一种轻量级、无证书的多接收者安全数据传输协议来支持MDT处理。特别地，提出了一种新的多接收者无证书广义签密方案(MR-CLGSC ),该方案可以自适应地仅使用一种算法来实现三种密码原语之一:签名、加密或签密。然后，设计了一个基于MR-CLGSC方案的多接收者安全数据传输协议，该协议具有数据完整性和机密性、不可否认性、匿名性、前向和后向保密性、不可链接性和数据新鲜性等安全特性。安全性分析和性能分析表明，该协议安全、高效、实用性强。
papers.title_zh: 无线身体区域网络的轻量级和证书的多收取安全数据传输协议

papers.title: Fault Injection Analytics: A Novel Approach to Discover Failure Modes in Cloud-Computing Systems
papers.authors: Domenico Cotroneo, Luigi De Simone, Pietro Liguori, Roberto Natella
papers.abstract: Cloud computing systems fail in complex and unexpected ways due to unexpected combinations of events and interactions between hardware and software components. Fault injection is an effective means to bring out these failures in a controlled environment. However, fault injection experiments produce massive amounts of data, and manually analyzing these data is inefficient and error-prone, as the analyst can miss severe failure modes that are yet unknown. This article introduces a new paradigm (fault injection analytics) that applies unsupervised machine learning on execution traces of the injected system, to ease the discovery and interpretation of failure modes. We evaluated the proposed approach in the context of fault injection experiments on the OpenStack cloud computing platform, where we show that the approach can accurately identify failure modes with a low computational cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于硬件和软件组件之间的事件和交互的意外组合，云计算系统以复杂和意外的方式失败。故障注入是在受控环境中产生这些故障的有效手段。然而，故障注入实验会产生大量数据，手动分析这些数据效率低下且容易出错，因为分析师可能会遗漏未知的严重故障模式。本文介绍了一种新的范例(故障注入分析)，它对注入系统的执行跟踪应用无监督的机器学习，以简化故障模式的发现和解释。我们在OpenStack云计算平台上的故障注入实验环境中评估了所提出的方法，其中我们表明该方法可以以较低的计算成本准确地识别故障模式。
papers.title_zh: 故障注射分析：一种新的发现云计算系统中故障模式的方法

papers.title: Achieve Efficient and Privacy-Preserving Disease Risk Assessment Over Multi-Outsourced Vertical Datasets
papers.authors: Fengwei Wang, Hui Zhu, Rongxing Lu, Yandong Zheng, Hui Li
papers.abstract: It is believed that online disease risk assessment system has great potential to alleviate the medical treatment problems for the future smart city and communities, as it can excavate disease risk factors from a large number of patient features, provide diagnostic references for doctors, and save medical treatment time for patients. However, the flourish of online disease risk assessment service still faces severe challenges including information privacy and security. In this article, based on the naïve Bayesian classification, we propose an efficient and privacy-preserving disease risk assessment scheme over multi-outsourced vertical datasets, named CARER. With CARER, the e-healthcare provider can securely train a disease risk predication model over vertically distributed medical data from multiple medical centers (i.e., hospitals), and provide privacy-preserving disease risk predication services for users (i.e., patients and doctors). During the model training and disease risk prediction phases, all sensitive data are operated over ciphertexts without decryption. As a result, the private information of medical centers, e-healthcare provider, and users can be well protected. Detailed security analysis shows that CARER can resist various known security threats. In addition, we evaluate the performance of CARER with real medical datasets, and the results demonstrate that CARER is efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 相信在线疾病风险评估系统能够从大量的患者特征中挖掘疾病风险因素，为医生提供诊断参考，为患者节省就医时间，对于缓解未来智慧城市和社区的就医问题具有巨大的潜力。然而，在线疾病风险评估服务的蓬勃发展仍然面临着包括信息隐私和安全在内的严峻挑战。在这篇文章中，基于朴素贝叶斯分类，我们提出了一个有效的和隐私保护的疾病风险评估方案，称为CARER。通过CARER，电子医疗保健提供商可以在来自多个医疗中心(即医院)的垂直分布的医疗数据上安全地训练疾病风险预测模型，并为用户(即患者和医生)提供保护隐私的疾病风险预测服务。在模型训练和疾病风险预测阶段，所有敏感数据都在没有解密的情况下通过密文进行操作。因此，医疗中心、电子保健提供商和用户的私人信息可以得到很好的保护。详细的安全分析表明，CARER可以抵御各种已知的安全威胁。此外，我们使用真实的医学数据集评估了CARER的性能，结果表明CARER是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 通过多排除的垂直数据集获得有效和保护隐私的疾病风险评估

papers.title: Ants can Carry Cheese: Secure and Private RFID-Enabled Third-Party Distribution
papers.authors: Saiyu Qi, Yuanqing Zheng, Xiaofeng Chen, Wei Wei
papers.abstract: Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) is a key emerging technology to improve data sharing in item distribution systems. By attaching RFID tags to items, item related data can be bound to items and participants involved in an item distribution system can directly store, access and update the data by interrogating the tags. Such a flexible data access manner of RFID technology, however, raises privacy and security concerns. In this article, we focus on a special item distribution system named RFID-enabled Third-party Distribution (RTD) system and identify two inherent security and privacy requirements. We further design a Secure RTD system called Ants, which uses cryptography to protect item messages carried by tags to satisfy both of the requirements while preserving the flexible data access manner of RFID technology. Ants introduces two new techniques named commitment accumulation and selective message proof for memory-constrained tags to carry long crypto-item messages. We conduct theoretical analysis and experiments to demonstrate the security and efficiency of Ants.
papers.abstract_zh: 射频识别(RFID)是一项关键的新兴技术，可以改善物品配送系统中的数据共享。通过将RFID标签附着到物品上，物品相关数据可以被绑定到物品上，并且物品分配系统中涉及的参与者可以通过询问标签来直接存储、访问和更新数据。然而，RFID技术的这种灵活的数据访问方式引起了隐私和安全问题。在本文中，我们关注一个特殊的物品配送系统，名为支持RFID的第三方配送(RTD)系统，并确定了两个固有的安全和隐私要求。我们进一步设计了一个名为Ants的安全RTD系统，该系统使用加密技术来保护标签携带的物品信息，以满足这两个要求，同时保留RFID技术灵活的数据访问方式。Ants引入了两种新技术，称为承诺累积和选择性消息证明，用于存储受限的标签携带长的加密项消息。我们进行了理论分析和实验来证明蚂蚁的安全性和高效性。
papers.title_zh: 蚂蚁可以携带奶酪：安全和私人启用RFID的第三方分销

papers.title: Enabling Efficient, Secure and Privacy-Preserving Mobile Cloud Storage
papers.authors: Jia-Nan Liu, Xizhao Luo, Jian Weng, Anjia Yang, Xu An Wang, Ming Li, Xiaodong Lin
papers.abstract: Mobile cloud storage (MCS) provides clients with convenient cloud storage service. In this article, we propose an efficient, secure and privacy-preserving mobile cloud storage scheme, which protects the data confidentiality and privacy simultaneously, especially the access pattern. Specifically, we propose an oblivious selection and update (OSU) protocol as the underlying primitive of the proposed mobile cloud storage scheme. OSU is based on onion additively homomorphic encryption with constant encryption layers and enables the client to obliviously retrieve an encrypted data item from the cloud and update it with a fresh value by generating a small encrypted vector, which significantly reduces the client’s computation as well as the communication overheads. Compared with previous works, our presented work has valuable properties, such as fine-grained data structure (small item size), lightweight client-side computation (a few of additively homomorphic operations) and constant communication overhead, which make it more suitable for MCS scenario. Moreover, by employing the “verification chunks” method, our scheme can be verifiable to resist malicious cloud. The comparison and evaluation indicate that our scheme is more efficient than existing oblivious storage solutions with the aspects of client and cloud workloads, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动云存储为客户提供便捷的云存储服务。本文提出了一种高效、安全、隐私保护的移动云存储方案，同时保护了数据的机密性和隐私性，尤其是访问模式。具体来说，我们提出了一个不经意选择和更新(OSU)协议作为提出的移动云存储方案的底层原语。OSU基于具有恒定加密层的洋葱附加同态加密，使客户端能够从云中完全检索加密的数据项，并通过生成一个小的加密向量用新值更新它，这大大减少了客户端的计算和通信开销。与以前的工作相比，我们的工作具有有价值的特性，如细粒度的数据结构(小项目大小)、轻量级客户端计算(少量的加法同态运算)和恒定的通信开销，这使它更适合于MCS场景。此外，通过使用“验证块”方法，我们的方案可以抵抗恶意云验证。比较和评估表明，我们的方案在客户端和云负载方面分别比现有的不经意存储解决方案更高效。
papers.title_zh: 实现高效，安全和隐私的移动云存储

papers.title: A Secure Cloud Data Sharing Protocol for Enterprise Supporting Hierarchical Keyword Search
papers.authors: Hongbo Li, Qiong Huang, Willy Susilo
papers.abstract: Cloud storage becomes the priority for storing and sharing data for enterprise users. Encrypting prior to uploading data to the cloud is the best way to protect business secrets, however, it hinders the convenient operations on plaintexts, such as searching over the cloud data. In addition, employees in an enterprise have multiple layer structures and a higher layer employee should have the privilege to monitor the lower layer employees’ data to check if these users violate the regulation without letting the employees be aware of. Public key encryption with keyword search (PEKS) is a well-known cryptographic primitive suitable for secure cloud storage, which supports keyword search without decryption in public key encryption settings. Unfortunately, no existing PEKS scheme supports the monitoring function without authorization from the sender. To address this issue, we propose a variant of PEKS named Hierarchical Public Key Encryption with Keyword Search (HPEKS) and provide a semi-generic construction utilizing a public key tree (PKTree) and a PEKS scheme. To better suit for the enterprise secret data sharing, we build an advanced HPEKS scheme, named designated-tester decryptable hierarchical public key encryption with keyword search (dDHPEKS), which enjoys stronger security and integrates the public key and symmetric key encryptions. We prove our dDHPEKS scheme secure under the security definition in the random oracle model. Particularly, it satisfies the security against outside offline keyword guessing attacks and furthermore, enjoys the transparency property so that the sender does not need to know the internal hierarchy structure of an enterprise in order to share encrypted data to the enterprise. Theoretical evaluation and concrete experiments show that our dDHPEKS scheme has comparable running efficiency with existing PEKS schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 云存储成为企业用户存储和共享数据的首选。在将数据上传到云之前进行加密是保护商业秘密的最佳方式，然而，它阻碍了对明文的方便操作，例如搜索云数据。此外，企业中的员工具有多层结构，高层员工应该有权监控低层员工的数据，以检查这些用户是否违反了规定，而不让员工知道。带有关键字搜索的公钥加密(PEKS)是一种众所周知的适用于安全云存储的加密原语，它支持在公钥加密设置中不解密的关键字搜索。不幸的是，没有现有的PEKS方案在没有来自发送者的授权的情况下支持监控功能。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种称为带关键字搜索的分级公钥加密(HPEKS)的PEKS变体，并提供了一种利用公钥树(PKTree)和PEKS方案的半通用结构。为了更好地适应企业秘密数据共享，我们提出了一种改进的HPEKS方案，命名为指定测试者可解密的带关键字搜索的分级公钥加密(dDHPEKS)，它具有更强的安全性，并且集成了公钥加密和对称密钥加密。我们证明了我们的dDHPEKS方案在随机预言模型的安全定义下是安全的。特别地，它满足了抵抗外部离线关键字猜测攻击的安全性，并且还享有透明性，使得发送者不需要知道企业的内部层级结构就可以将加密的数据共享给企业。理论评估和具体实验表明，dDHPEKS方案具有与现有PEKS方案相当的运行效率。
papers.title_zh: 一个安全的云数据共享协议，用于支持层次关键字搜索的企业

papers.title: Path Sensitive Fuzzing for Native Applications
papers.authors: Shuitao Gan, Chao Zhang, Xiaojun Qin, Xuwen Tu, Kang Li, Zhongyu Pei, Zuoning Chen
papers.abstract: Coverage-guided fuzzing is a widely used and effective solution to find software vulnerabilities. Tracking code coverage and utilizing it to guide fuzzing are crucial to coverage-guided fuzzers. However, tracking full and accurate path coverage is infeasible in practice due to the high instrumentation overhead. Popular fuzzers (e.g., AFL) often use coarse coverage information, e.g., edge hit counts stored in a compact bitmap, to achieve highly efficient greybox testing. Such inaccuracy and incompleteness in coverage introduce serious limitations to fuzzers. First, it causes path collisions, which prevent fuzzers from discovering potential paths that lead to new crashes. More importantly, it prevents fuzzers from making wise decisions on fuzzing strategies. In this article, we propose a coverage sensitive fuzzing solution CollAFL. It mitigates path collisions by providing more accurate coverage information, while still preserving low instrumentation overhead. It also utilizes the coverage information to apply three new fuzzing strategies, promoting the speed of discovering new paths and vulnerabilities. We implemented two variants of this solution, namely CollAFL (based on AFL) and CollAFL-bin (based on AFL-dyninst), to test applications with and without source code respectively, and evaluated them on 24 popular applications. The results showed that path collisions are common, i.e., up to 75 percent of edges could collide with others in some applications. But our solutions CollAFL and CollAFL-bin could reduce the edge collision ratio to nearly zero. Moreover, armed with the three fuzzing strategies, they outperform their counterparts (i.e., AFL and AFL-dyninst) in terms of both code coverage and vulnerability discovery. On average, CollAFL covered 20 percent more program paths, and found 320 percent more unique crashes and 260 percent more bugs than AFL in 200 hours. Moreover, CollAFL-bin covered 15 percent more paths, and found 200 percent more unique crashes and 150 percent more vulnerabilities than AFL-dyninst, showing that the proposed solution also works for binary application fuzzing. In total, CollAFL found 157 new security bugs with 95 new CVEs assigned.
papers.abstract_zh: 覆盖引导模糊化是一种广泛使用且有效的发现软件漏洞的方法。跟踪代码覆盖率并利用它来指导模糊化对于覆盖率导向的模糊化器是至关重要的。然而，由于高仪器开销，跟踪完整和准确的路径覆盖在实践中是不可行的。流行的模糊器(例如AFL)通常使用粗略的覆盖信息，例如存储在紧凑位图中的边缘命中计数，来实现高效的灰箱测试。覆盖面的这种不准确和不完整给模糊者带来了严重的限制。首先，它会导致路径冲突，从而阻止模糊器发现导致新崩溃的潜在路径。更重要的是，它阻止模糊者在模糊策略上做出明智的决定。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个覆盖敏感模糊解决方案CollAFL。它通过提供更准确的覆盖信息来减少路径冲突，同时仍然保持较低的仪器开销。它还利用覆盖信息来应用三种新的模糊策略，提高发现新路径和漏洞的速度。我们实现了这种解决方案的两个变体，分别是CollAFL(基于AFL)和CollAFL-bin(基于AFL-dyninst)，分别测试了有源代码和无源代码的应用，并在24个热门应用上进行评估。结果表明，路径冲突是常见的，即在某些应用程序中，高达75%的边可能会与其他边发生冲突。但是我们的解决方案CollAFL和CollAFL-bin可以将边缘冲突率降低到几乎为零。此外，有了三种模糊化策略，它们在代码覆盖率和漏洞发现方面都优于它们的对手(即AFL和AFL-dyninst)。平均而言，CollAFL在200小时内覆盖了比AFL多20%的程序路径，发现了比AFL多320%的独特崩溃和多260%的错误。此外，与AFL-dyninst相比，CollAFL-bin覆盖了15%以上的路径，发现了200%以上的独特崩溃和150%以上的漏洞，表明所提出的解决方案也适用于二进制应用程序模糊化。CollAFL总共发现了157个新的安全漏洞，分配了95个新的CVE。
papers.title_zh: 对本机应用的路径敏感构糊糊

papers.title: One-to-N & N-to-One: Two Advanced Backdoor Attacks Against Deep Learning Models
papers.authors: Mingfu Xue, Can He, Jian Wang, Weiqiang Liu
papers.abstract: In recent years, deep learning models have been widely deployed in various application scenarios. The training processes of deep neural network (DNN) models are time-consuming, and require massive training data and large hardware overhead. These issues have led to the outsourced training procedure, pre-trained models supplied from third parties, or massive training data from untrusted users. However, a few recent researches indicate that, by injecting some well-designed backdoor instances into the training set, the attackers can create a concealed backdoor in the DNN model. In this way, the attacked model still works normally on the benign inputs, but when a backdoor instance is submitted, some specific abnormal behaviors will be triggered. Existing studies all focus on attacking a single target that triggered by a single backdoor (referred to as One-to-One attack), while the backdoor attacks against multiple target classes, and backdoor attacks triggered by multiple backdoors have not been studied yet. In this article, for the first time, we propose two advanced backdoor attacks, the multi-target backdoor attacks and multi-trigger backdoor attacks: 1) One-to-N attack, where the attacker can trigger multiple backdoor targets by controlling the different intensities of the same backdoor; 2) N-to-One attack, where such attack is triggered only when all the $N$N backdoors are satisfied. Compared with existing One-to-One attacks, the proposed two backdoor attacks are more flexible, more powerful and more difficult to be detected. Besides, the proposed backdoor attacks can be applied under the weak attack model, where the attacker has no knowledge about the parameters and architectures of the DNN models. Experimental results show that these two attacks can achieve better or similar performances when injecting a much smaller proportion or same proportion of backdoor instances than those existing One-to-One backdoor attacks. The two attack methods can achieve high attack success rates (up to 100 percent in MNIST dataset and 92.22 percent in CIFAR-10 dataset), while the test accuracy of the DNN model has hardly dropped (as low as 0 percent in LeNet-5 model and 0.76 percent in VGG-16 model), thus will not raise administrator’s suspicions. Further, the two attacks are also evaluated on a large and realistic dataset (Youtube Aligned Face dataset), where the maximum attack success rate reaches 90 percent (One-to-N) and 94 percent (N-to-One), and the accuracy degradation of target face recognition model (VGGFace model) is only 0.05 percent. The proposed One-to-N and N-to-One attacks are demonstrated to be effective and stealthy against two state-of-the-art defense methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，深度学习模型被广泛部署在各种应用场景中。深度神经网络(DNN)模型的训练过程非常耗时，并且需要大量的训练数据和大量的硬件开销。这些问题导致了外包的训练程序、由第三方提供的预训练模型或者来自不可信用户的大量训练数据。然而，最近的一些研究表明，通过将一些精心设计的后门实例注入训练集，攻击者可以在DNN模型中创建一个隐藏的后门。这样，被攻击的模型在良性的输入上仍然可以正常工作，但是当提交一个后门实例时，就会触发一些特定的异常行为。现有的研究都集中在攻击由单个后门触发的单个目标(称为一对一攻击)，而针对多个目标类别的后门攻击以及由多个后门触发的后门攻击尚未得到研究。在这篇文章中，我们首次提出了两种高级后门攻击，多目标后门攻击和多触发后门攻击:1)一对多攻击，攻击者可以通过控制同一后门的不同强度来触发多个后门目标；2) N对1攻击，只有当所有$N$N个后门都满足时，才会触发这种攻击。与现有的一对一攻击相比，提出的两种后门攻击更灵活、更强大、更难被检测到。此外，所提出的后门攻击可以在弱攻击模型下应用，其中攻击者不知道DNN模型的参数和体系结构。实验结果表明，与现有的一对一后门攻击相比，这两种攻击在注入更少比例或相同比例的后门实例时可以获得更好或相近的性能。这两种攻击方法的攻击成功率都很高(在MNIST数据集上高达100%，在CIFAR-10数据集上高达92.22%)，而DNN模型的测试准确率几乎没有下降(在LeNet-5模型上低至0%，在VGG-16模型上低至0.76%)，不会引起管理员的怀疑。此外，在大规模真实数据集(Youtube对齐人脸数据集)上对这两种攻击进行了评估，最大攻击成功率达到90%(一对一)和94%(一对一)，目标人脸识别模型(VGGFace模型)的准确率下降仅为0.05%。提出的一对多和N对一攻击被证明是有效的和隐蔽的，对抗两种最先进的防御方法。
papers.title_zh: 一对一到一：一：两次针对深度学习模型的高级后门攻击

papers.title: EncodeORE: Reducing Leakage and Preserving Practicality in Order-Revealing Encryption
papers.authors: Zheli Liu, Siyi Lv, Jin Li, Yanyu Huang, Liang Guo, Yali Yuan, Changyu Dong
papers.abstract: Order-preserving encryption (OPE) is a cryptographic primitive that preserves the order of plaintexts. In the past few years, many OPE schemes were proposed to solve the problem of executing range queries in encrypted databases. However, OPE leaks some certain information (for example, the order of ciphertext), so it is vulnerable to many attacks. Subsequently, order-revealing encryption (ORE) was proposed by Boneh et al. (Eurocrypt 2015) as a generalization of order-preserving encryption. It breaks through the limitation of the numeric order of OPE plaintext. It implements ciphertext comparison for any specific form of plaintext through a publicly computable comparison function. In this article, we aim to design a new ORE scheme which reduces the leakages and preserves the practicality in terms of ciphertext length and encryption time. We first propose the hybrid model named HybridORE. Then, we propose an improved scheme named EncodeORE which achieves acceptable security and appropriate ciphertext length. They both explore the encode strategy of encoding plaintext into different parts and apply suitable ORE algorithms to each part according to its security characteristics to reduce leakages. Compared with the typical CLWW scheme (FSE 2016) and Lewi-Wu (CCS 2016) in large domain, they have fewer leakages. The experiment shows that the proposed EncodeORE is very practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 保序加密(OPE)是一种保持明文顺序的加密原语。在过去的几年中，许多OPE方案被提出来解决在加密数据库中执行范围查询的问题。但是，OPE会泄漏某些特定信息(例如密文的顺序)，因此容易受到许多攻击。随后，Boneh等人(Eurocrypt 2015)提出了顺序揭示加密(ORE)作为保序加密的推广。它突破了OPE明文的数值顺序的限制。它通过一个可公开计算的比较函数来实现对任何特定形式明文的密文比较。在这篇文章中，我们的目标是设计一个新的ORE方案，减少泄漏，并保持密文长度和加密时间的实用性。我们首先提出了混合模型HybridORE。然后，我们提出了一个改进的方案EncodeORE，它实现了可接受的安全性和合适的密文长度。它们都探索了将明文编码成不同部分的编码策略，并根据每个部分的安全特性对其应用合适的ore算法以减少泄漏。与典型的CLWW方案(FSE，2016年)和Lewi-Wu (CCS，2016年)相比，它们具有更少的泄漏。实验表明，该编码器具有很强的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 编码：减少泄漏和保存实用性，以进行订购加密

papers.title: Optimizing Privacy-Preserving Outsourced Convolutional Neural Network Predictions
papers.authors: Minghui Li, Sherman S. M. Chow, Shengshan Hu, Yuejing Yan, Chao Shen, Qian Wang
papers.abstract: Convolutional neural networks (CNN) is a popular architecture in machine learning for its predictive power, notably in computer vision and medical image analysis. Its great predictive power requires extensive computation, which encourages model owners to host the prediction service in a cloud platform. This article proposes a CNN prediction scheme that preserves privacy in the outsourced setting, i.e., the model-hosting server cannot learn the query, (intermediate) results, and the model. Similar to SecureML (S&P’17), a representative work that provides model privacy, we employ two non-colluding servers with secret sharing and triplet generation to minimize the usage of heavyweight cryptography. We made the following optimizations for both overall latency and accuracy. 1) We adopt asynchronous computation and SIMD for offline triplet generation and parallelizable online computation. 2) As MiniONN (CCS’17) and its improvement by the generic EzPC compiler (EuroS&P’19), we use a garbled circuit for the non-polynomial ReLU activation to keep the same accuracy as the underlying network (instead of approximating it in SecureML prediction). 3) For the pooling in CNN, we employ (linear) average-pooling, which achieves almost the same accuracy as the (non-linear, and hence less efficient) max-pooling exhibited by MiniONN and EzPC. Considering both offline and online costs, our experiments on the MNIST dataset show a latency reduction of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$122\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>122</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq1-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$14.63\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>14</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>63</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq2-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$36.69\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>36</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>69</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq3-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> compared to SecureML, MiniONN, and EzPC; and a reduction of communication costs by <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$1.09\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>09</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq4-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$36.69\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>36</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>69</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq5-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$31.32\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>31</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>32</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq6-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, respectively. On the CIFAR dataset, our scheme achieves a lower latency by <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$7.14\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>7</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>14</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq7-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$3.48\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>48</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq8-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and lower communication costs by <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$13.88\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>13</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>88</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq9-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$77.46\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>77</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>46</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq10-3029899.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> when compared with MiniONN and EzPC, respectively.

papers.title_zh: 优化保护隐私的外包卷积神经网络预测

papers.title: AWARE: Adaptive Wide-Area Replication for Fast and Resilient Byzantine Consensus
papers.authors: Christian Berger, Hans P. Reiser, João Sousa, Alysson Bessani
papers.abstract: With upcoming blockchain infrastructures, world-spanning Byzantine consensus is getting practical and necessary. In geographically distributed systems, the pace at which consensus is achieved is limited by the heterogeneous latencies of connections between replicas. If deployed on a wide-area network, consensus-based systems benefit from weighted replication, an approach that utilizes extra replicas and assigns higher voting weights to well-connected replicas. This approach enables more choice in quorum formation and replicas can leverage proportionally smaller quorums to advance, thus decreasing consensus latency. However, the system needs a solution to autonomously adjust to its environment if network conditions change or faults occur. We present Adaptive Wide-Area REplication (AWARE), a mechanism that improves the geographical scalability of consensus with nodes being widely spread across the world. Essentially, AWARE is an automated and dynamic voting-weight tuning and leader positioning scheme, which supports the emergence of fast quorums in the system. It employs a reliable self-monitoring process and provides a prediction model seeking to minimize the system’s consensus latency. In experiments using several AWS EC2 regions, AWARE dynamically optimizes consensus latency by self-reliantly finding a fast configuration yielding latency gains observed by clients located across the globe.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着即将到来的区块链基础设施，跨越世界的拜占庭共识变得实际和必要。在地理上分布的系统中，达成共识的速度受到副本之间连接的异构延迟的限制。如果部署在广域网上，基于共识的系统将受益于加权复制，这是一种利用额外副本并为连接良好的副本分配更高投票权重的方法。这种方法允许在法定人数的形成上有更多的选择，副本可以利用成比例的较小法定人数来推进，从而减少共识延迟。但是，如果网络条件发生变化或出现故障，系统需要一种解决方案来自动适应其环境。我们提出了自适应广域复制(AWARE ),这是一种通过节点广泛分布在世界各地来提高共识的地理可扩展性的机制。从本质上讲，AWARE是一个自动化的动态投票权重调整和领导者定位方案，它支持系统中快速法定人数的出现。它采用了可靠的自我监控过程，并提供了一个预测模型，以尽量减少系统的共识延迟。在使用几个AWS EC2区域的实验中，AWARE通过独立地找到一种快速配置来动态优化一致性延迟，这种快速配置产生了全球各地的客户端所观察到的延迟增益。
papers.title_zh: 意识到：快速和弹性拜占庭共识的自适应广阔区域复制

papers.title: RATScope: Recording and Reconstructing Missing RAT Semantic Behaviors for Forensic Analysis on Windows
papers.authors: Runqing Yang, Xutong Chen, Haitao Xu, Yueqiang Cheng, Chunlin Xiong, Linqi Ruan, Mohammad Kavousi, Zhenyuan Li, Liheng Xu, Yan Chen
papers.abstract: Remote Access Trojan (RAT) attacks have become an extensively prevailing and serious threat to enterprise security. A forensic system targeting RAT attacks is needed to record and reconstruct fine-grained semantic behaviors of RATs. However, existing forensic systems suffer from various issues such as intrusive instrumentation, nontrivial recording overhead, and RAT behavior blindness. In this article, we first conduct a large-scale study of a representative set of real-world RAT families active from 1999 to 2016. This is the first study to understand the landscape of RATs in the literature. Based on the study, we then propose RATScope, an instrumentation-free RAT forensic system targeting Windows platform. Specifically, RATScope offers an audit logging module to efficiently record system logs by leveraging Event Tracing for Windows (ETW), and provides a novel program behavior modeling technique to reconstruct semantic behaviors of RATs accurately. We implement a prototype of RATScope and evaluate the recording overhead and the behavior identification accuracy. The results show that the audit logging module only incurs 3.7 percent runtime overhead on average. Our system can achieve around 90 percent true positive rate in the cross-family experiment, around 80 percent true positive rate in the two-year spanning temporal experiment, and near zero false positive rate.
papers.abstract_zh: 远程访问木马(RAT)攻击已经成为企业安全的一个普遍而严重的威胁。需要一个针对老鼠攻击的取证系统来记录和重建老鼠的细粒度语义行为。然而，现有的取证系统受到各种问题的困扰，例如侵入性仪器、不小的记录开销和鼠行为盲。在这篇文章中，我们首先对1999年至2016年活跃的一组具有代表性的真实世界大鼠家族进行了大规模研究。这是文献中第一个了解老鼠景观的研究。在此基础上，我们提出了RATScope，一个面向Windows平台的免工具RAT取证系统。具体来说，RATScope提供了一个审计日志记录模块，通过利用Windows (ETW)的事件跟踪来有效地记录系统日志，并提供了一种新的程序行为建模技术来准确地重建rat的语义行为。我们实现了一个RATScope原型，并对记录开销和行为识别准确性进行了评估。结果表明，审计日志记录模块平均只产生3.7%的运行时开销。我们的系统在跨家系实验中可以达到大约90%的真阳性率，在两年的时间跨度实验中可以达到大约80%的真阳性率，而假阳性率接近于零。
papers.title_zh: RASSCOPE：记录和重建窗口上的法医分析的丢失的大鼠语义行为

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Publicly Verifiable Databases
papers.authors: Qiang Wang, Fucai Zhou, Boyang Zhou, Jian Xu, Chunyu Chen, Qi Wang
papers.abstract: Verifiable databases (VDB) enables the data owner to outsource a huge unencrypted database to the powerful but untrusted cloud such that any client could later retrieve the database and check whether the cloud returns valid records or not. To the best of our knowledge, there is no prior work considering privacy. Besides, they assume that the data owner and the client are fully trusted while they may be semi-honest in the real world. To address these problems, we propose a new primitive called privacy-preserving publicly verifiable database (PPVDB), which not only guarantees the integrity of the queried result but also leaks no information. At the end of this protocol, the client can check whether the cloud returns a valid result and learns the queried result but nothing else about the database. Besides, the cloud learns nothing about the database and the query, and the data owner does not know which item that the client has queried. Motivated by the comparison among some strawman solutions, we incorporate verifiable computation for the polynomial with oblivious pseudorandom function to construct a PPVDB scheme, which is the first VDB scheme providing stronger security against the malicious cloud and the semi-honest client and data owner.
papers.abstract_zh: 可验证数据库(VDB)使数据所有者能够将一个巨大的未加密数据库外包给强大但不可信的云，这样任何客户端都可以在以后检索数据库并检查云是否返回有效记录。据我们所知，没有考虑隐私的事先工作。此外，他们假设数据所有者和客户端是完全可信的，而在现实世界中他们可能是半诚实的。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了一种新的保护隐私的公开可验证数据库(PPVDB ),它不仅能保证查询结果的完整性，而且不会泄露任何信息。在这个协议的最后，客户端可以检查云是否返回有效的结果，并了解查询的结果，但不了解数据库的其他信息。此外，云对数据库和查询一无所知，数据所有者也不知道客户机查询了哪个项目。受多个strawman方案的启发，我们将多项式的可验证计算与不经意伪随机函数相结合，构造了一个PPVDB方案，这是第一个针对恶意云和半诚实客户端和数据所有者提供更强安全性的VDB方案。
papers.title_zh: 公开可验证的数据库

papers.title: Automated Security Risk Identification Using AutomationML-Based Engineering Data
papers.authors: Matthias Eckhart, Andreas Ekelhart, Edgar R. Weippl
papers.abstract: Systems integrators and vendors of industrial components need to establish a security-by-design approach, which includes the assessment and subsequent treatment of security risks. However, conducting security risk assessments along the engineering process is a costly and labor-intensive endeavor due to the complexity of the system(s) under consideration and the lack of automated methods. This, in turn, hampers the ability of security analysts to assess risks pertaining to cyber-physical systems (CPSs) in an efficient manner. In this work, we propose a method that automatically identifies security risks based on the CPS's data representation, which exists within engineering artifacts. To lay the foundation for our method, we present security-focused semantics for the engineering data exchange format AutomationML (AML). These semantics enable the reuse of security-relevant know-how in AML artifacts by means of a formal knowledge representation, modeled with a security-enriched ontology. Our method is capable of automating the identification of security risk sources and potential consequences in order to construct cyber-physical attack graphs that capture the paths adversaries may take. We demonstrate the benefits of the proposed method through a case study and an open-source prototypical implementation. Finally, we prove that our solution is scalable by conducting a rigorous performance evaluation.
papers.abstract_zh: 系统集成商和工业组件供应商需要建立一个安全设计方法，包括安全风险的评估和后续处理。然而，由于所考虑的系统的复杂性和自动化方法的缺乏，在工程过程中进行安全风险评估是一项成本高昂和劳动密集型的工作。这反过来又妨碍了安全分析师高效评估网络物理系统(CPSs)相关风险的能力。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种基于CPS的数据表示自动识别安全风险的方法，它存在于工程工件中。为了给我们的方法奠定基础，我们提出了面向工程数据交换格式AutomationML (AML)的安全语义。这些语义通过一种正式的知识表示，支持在AML工件中重用安全相关的知识，这种知识表示是用一个安全丰富的本体建模的。我们的方法能够自动识别安全风险源和潜在后果，以构建网络物理攻击图，捕捉对手可能采取的路径。我们通过一个案例研究和一个开源原型实现展示了所提出方法的好处。最后，我们通过进行严格的性能评估来证明我们的解决方案是可扩展的。
papers.title_zh: 使用基于AutomationML的工程数据自动化安全风险识别

papers.title: ABATe: Automatic Behavioral Abstraction Technique to Detect Anomalies in Smart Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Sandeep Nair Narayanan, Anupam Joshi, Ranjan Bose
papers.abstract: Detecting anomalies and attacks in smart cyber-physical systems are of paramount importance owing to their growing prominence in controlling critical systems. However, this is a challenging task due to the heterogeneity and variety of components of a CPS, and the complex relationships between sensed values and potential attacks or anomalies. Such complex relationships are results of physical constraints and domain norms which exist in many CPS domains. In this article, we propose ABATe, an Automatic Behavioral Abstraction Technique based on neural networks for detecting anomalies in smart cyber-physical systems. Unlike traditional techniques which abstract the statistical properties of different sensor values, ABATe learns complex relationships between event vectors from normal operational data available in abundance with smart CPS and uses this abstracted model to detect anomalies. ABATe detected more than 88 percent of attacks in the publicly available SWaT dataset featuring data from a scaled down sewage water treatment plant with a very low false positive rate of 1 percent. We also evaluated our technique's ability to capture domain semantics and multi-domain adaptability using a real-world automotive dataset, as well as a synthetic dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 检测智能网络物理系统中的异常和攻击是至关重要的，因为它们在控制关键系统中日益突出。然而，由于CPS组件的异质性和多样性，以及感测值和潜在攻击或异常之间的复杂关系，这是一项具有挑战性的任务。这种复杂的关系是许多CPS领域中存在的物理约束和领域规范的结果。在这篇文章中，我们提出了ABATe，一种基于神经网络的自动行为抽象技术，用于检测智能信息物理系统中的异常。与提取不同传感器值的统计属性的传统技术不同，ABATe从智能CPS提供的大量正常运行数据中学习事件向量之间的复杂关系，并使用此抽象模型来检测异常。ABATe在公开的SWaT数据集中检测到超过88%的攻击，这些数据来自一个缩小规模的污水处理厂，误报率非常低，仅为1%。我们还使用真实世界的汽车数据集和合成数据集评估了我们的技术捕获领域语义和多领域适应性的能力。
papers.title_zh: 减弱：自动行为抽象技术以检测智能网络物理系统中的异常

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Collaborative Analytics on Medical Time Series Data
papers.authors: Xiaoning Liu, Yifeng Zheng, Xun Yi, Surya Nepal
papers.abstract: Medical time series data analytics based on dynamic time warping (DTW) greatly benefits modern medical research. Driven by the distributed nature of medical data, the collaboration of multiple healthcare institutions is usually necessary for a sound medical conclusion. Among others, a typical use case is disease screening for public health, where multiple healthcare institutions wish to collaboratively detect over their joint datasets the patients whose medical records have similar features to the given query samples. However, sharing the medical data faces critical privacy obstacles with the increasingly strict legal regulations on data privacy. In this article, we present the design of a novel system enabling privacy-preserving DTW-based analytics on distributed medical time series datasets. Our system is built from a delicate synergy of techniques from both cryptography and data mining domains, where the key idea is to leverage observations on the advancements in plaintext DTW analytics (e.g., clustering and pruning) to facilitate the scalable computation in the ciphertext domain, through our tailored security design. Extensive experiments over real medical time series datasets demonstrate the promising performance of our system, e.g., our system is able to process a secure DTW query computation over 15K time series sequences in 34 minutes.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于动态时间弯曲(DTW)的医学时间序列数据分析对现代医学研究大有裨益。由于医疗数据的分布式特性，多个医疗保健机构的协作通常对于合理的医疗结论是必要的。其中，一个典型的用例是公共卫生疾病筛查，其中多个医疗保健机构希望在他们的联合数据集上协作检测其病历与给定查询样本具有相似特征的患者。然而，随着对数据隐私日益严格的法律规定，共享医疗数据面临着严重的隐私障碍。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新系统的设计，使隐私保护的基于DTW的分布式医疗时间序列数据集的分析。我们的系统是从密码学和数据挖掘领域的技术的微妙协同作用中构建的，其中的关键思想是利用对明文DTW分析(例如，聚类和剪枝)的进步的观察，通过我们量身定制的安全设计来促进密文领域中的可扩展计算。在真实医学时间序列数据集上的大量实验证明了我们的系统的良好性能，例如，我们的系统能够在34分钟内处理15K时间序列上的安全DTW查询计算。
papers.title_zh: 医疗时间序列数据的隐私权协作分析

papers.title: Toward Verifiable and Privacy Preserving Machine Learning Prediction
papers.authors: Chaoyue Niu, Fan Wu, Shaojie Tang, Shuai Ma, Guihai Chen
papers.abstract: The ubiquitous needs for extracting insights from data are driving the emergence of service providers to offer predictions given the inputs from customers. During this process, it is important and highly nontrivial for the service providers to generate proofs of honest predictions without leaking the key parameters of their trained models. In addition, the customers are usually unwilling to reveal their sensitive inputs. In this article, we proposed MVP, which enables Machine learning prediction in a Verifiable and Privacy preserving fashion. MVP features the properties of polynomial decomposition and prime-order bilinear groups to simultaneously facilitate oblivious evaluation and batch outcome verification while maintaining function privacy and input privacy. We further instantiated MVP with Support Vector Machines (SVMs) and extensively evaluated its performance for the spam detection task on three practical Short Message Service (SMS) datasets.
