Our analysis and evaluation results reveal that MVP achieves the desired properties while incurring low computation and communication overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 从数据中提取洞察力的普遍需求正在推动服务提供商的出现，以根据客户的输入提供预测。在这个过程中，对于服务提供者来说，在不泄露其训练模型的关键参数的情况下，生成诚实预测的证据是重要且非常重要的。此外，客户通常不愿意透露他们的敏感信息。在本文中，我们提出了MVP，它使机器学习预测能够以可验证和隐私保护的方式进行。MVP具有多项式分解和素数阶双线性群的特性，以同时促进遗忘评估和批量结果验证，同时维护函数隐私和输入隐私。我们进一步用支持向量机(SVMs)实例化MVP，并在三个实际的短消息服务(SMS)数据集上广泛评估了它在垃圾邮件检测任务中的性能。我们的分析和评估结果表明，MVP实现了期望的性能，同时产生了低的计算和通信开销。
papers.title_zh: 朝着可验证和隐私保护机器学习预测

papers.title: RESCUE: A Resilient and Secure Device-to-Device Communication Framework for Emergencies
papers.authors: Milan Stute, Florian Kohnhäuser, Lars Baumgärtner, Lars Almon, Matthias Hollick, Stefan Katzenbeisser, Bernd Freisleben
papers.abstract: During disasters, existing telecommunication infrastructures are often congested or even destroyed. In these situations, mobile devices can form a backup communication network for civilians and emergency services using disruption-tolerant networking (DTN) principles. Unfortunately, such distributed and resource-constrained networks are particularly susceptible to a wide range of attacks such as terrorists trying to cause more harm. In this article, we present RESCUE, a resilient and secure device-to-device communication framework for emergency scenarios that provides comprehensive protection against common attacks. RESCUE features a minimalistic DTN protocol that, by design, is secure against notable attacks such as routing manipulations, dropping, message manipulations, blackholing, or impersonation. To further protect against message flooding and Sybil attacks, we present a twofold mitigation technique. First, a mobile and distributed certificate infrastructure particularly tailored to the emergency use case hinders the adversarial use of multiple identities. Second, a message buffer management scheme significantly increases resilience against flooding attacks, even if they originate from multiple identities, without introducing additional overhead. Finally, we demonstrate the effectiveness of RESCUE via large-scale simulations in a synthetic as well as a realistic natural disaster scenario. Our simulation results show that RESCUE achieves very good message delivery rates, even under flooding and Sybil attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在灾害发生时，现有的电信基础设施经常拥挤不堪，甚至遭到破坏。在这些情况下，移动设备可以使用容许中断网络(DTN)原理为民用和应急服务形成备用通信网络。不幸的是，这种分布式和资源受限的网络特别容易受到大范围的攻击，例如恐怖分子试图造成更多的伤害。在本文中，我们介绍了RESCUE，这是一个针对紧急情况的弹性且安全的设备到设备通信框架，它提供了针对常见攻击的全面保护。RESCUE采用了一种极简的DTN协议，通过设计，该协议可以安全地抵御诸如路由操纵、丢弃、消息操纵、黑客攻击或假冒等显著攻击。为了进一步防止消息泛滥和Sybil攻击，我们提出了一种双重缓解技术。首先，特别为紧急情况定制的移动和分布式证书基础设施阻止了多个身份的对抗性使用。第二，消息缓冲区管理方案显著提高了抵御泛洪攻击的能力，即使它们源自多个身份，也不会引入额外的开销。最后，我们通过在一个合成的和真实的自然灾害场景中的大规模模拟来展示救援的有效性。我们的模拟结果显示，即使在洪水和Sybil攻击下，RESCUE也能达到非常好的消息传递率。
papers.title_zh: 救援：紧急情况的弹性且安全的设备到设备通信框架

papers.title: Threat-Event Detection for Distributed Networks Based on Spatiotemporal Markov Random Field
papers.authors: Haishou Ma, Yi Xie, Shensheng Tang, Jiankun Hu, Xingcheng Liu
papers.abstract: Distributed threat-events are one of the main challenges faced in computer networks. Although a lot of research has been conducted for these issues, the situation has not been significantly improved. Different from existing victim-centric approaches, in this article we propose a new network-centric approach for the detection of distributed threat-events. The distributed network is treated as a holistic system that consists of spatially interconnected network elements. Network events are detected by the dynamic behavior analysis of the distributed networks. We develop a model consisting of two-layer random fields to describe the time-varying traffic forwarding behavior of the distributed networks. The bottom layer describes the interaction and influence of the network elements under the action of network events. Markovianity is adopted to characterize the spatiotemporal context of each network element’s behavior patterns. The top layer describes each network element’s traffic features driven by the underlying behavior patterns. A Gaussian mixture model is used to capture the statistical features of the network traffic for each behavior pattern. We derive algorithms for parameter estimation and event detection. Numerical experiments using real datasets and different network scenarios are presented to validate the proposed approach. Performance-related issues and comparison with related works are discussed.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式威胁事件是计算机网络面临的主要挑战之一。虽然针对这些问题进行了大量的研究，但是情况并没有得到明显的改善。与现有的以受害者为中心的方法不同，本文提出了一种新的以网络为中心的分布式威胁事件检测方法。分布式网络被视为由空间上互连的网络元素组成的整体系统。通过对分布式网络的动态行为分析来检测网络事件。我们开发了一个由两层随机场组成的模型来描述分布式网络中时变的流量转发行为。底层描述了网络事件作用下网络元素之间的相互作用和影响。采用马尔可夫性来描述每个网络元素行为模式的时空背景。顶层描述了由底层行为模式驱动的每个网络元素的流量特征。高斯混合模型用于捕获每个行为模式的网络流量的统计特征。我们推导出参数估计和事件检测的算法。使用真实数据集和不同网络场景的数值实验验证了该方法的有效性。讨论了与性能相关的问题以及与相关作品的比较。
papers.title_zh: 基于时空马尔可夫随机场的分布式网络的威胁事件检测

papers.title: Identity-Based Provable Data Possession From RSA Assumption for Secure Cloud Storage
papers.authors: Jianbing Ni, Kuan Zhang, Yong Yu, Tingting Yang
papers.abstract: As cloud storage services have become popular nowadays, the integrity of outsourced data stored at untrusted servers received increased attention. Provable data possession (PDP) provides an effective and efficient solution for cloud data integrity by asking the cloud server to prove that the stored data are not tampered with or maliciously discarded without returning the actual data to users. In this article, we propose an efficient identity-based privacy-preserving provable data possession scheme (ID-P<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ni-ieq1-3036641.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>DP) based on the RSA assumption for secure cloud storage. In ID-P<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ni-ieq2-3036641.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>DP, a cloud user takes the outsourcing file and a global parameter in a time period as inputs to generate identity-based homomorphic authenticators, and any third-party auditor (TPA) can check the integrity of the outsourced file by verifying the validity of homomorphic authenticators. The distinguished feature of ID-P<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ni-ieq3-3036641.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>DP is to support the aggregation of identity-based homomorphic authenticators generated by different users under the RSA assumption, which is an open problem in provable data possession. Specifically, we transfer the identity-based homomorphic authenticators generated in distinct time periods into those with the same period parameter, and the cloud can compress the homomorphic authenticators of different users to generate a data possession proof for integrity verification. Besides, by exploiting zero-knowledge proof, the leakage of outsourced data to TPA can be prevented. The soundness of ID-P<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ni-ieq4-3036641.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>DP is proved based on the RSA assumption, and the privacy against TPA is perfectly preserved. Finally, we demonstrate ID-P<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ni-ieq5-3036641.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>DP is more efficient on integrity verification than the existing BLS-based schemes, and cross-user aggregate verification can significantly reduce computational and communication overhead for TPA.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云存储服务的流行，存储在不可信服务器上的外包数据的完整性受到越来越多的关注。可证明数据拥有(PDP)通过要求云服务器证明存储的数据未被篡改或恶意丢弃，而无需将实际数据返回给用户，从而为云数据完整性提供了有效和高效的解决方案。在本文中，我们基于安全云存储的RSA假设，提出了一种高效的基于身份的隐私保护可证数据拥有方案(id-p < inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " ni-ie Q1-3036641 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > DP)。在id-p < inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " ni-ieq 2-3036641 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > DP中，云用户将外包文件和一个时间段内的全局参数作为输入，生成基于身份的同态认证器，任何第三方审计器(TPA)都可以通过验证同态认证器的有效性来检查外包文件的完整性。id-p < inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " ni-ieq 3-3036641 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > DP的显著特点是支持在RSA假设下聚合不同用户生成的基于身份的同态认证符，这是可证数据占有中的一个公开问题。具体来说，我们将不同时间段生成的基于身份的同态认证器转换为具有相同周期参数的同态认证器，云可以对不同用户的同态认证器进行压缩，生成一个数据持有证明，用于完整性验证。此外，通过利用零知识证明，可以防止外包数据泄露给TPA。基于RSA假设证明了id-p < inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " ni-ieq 4-3036641 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > DP的可靠性，并且完美地保护了针对TPA的隐私。最后，我们证明了id-p < inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$^3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mrow/><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " ni-ieq 5-3036641 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > DP在完整性验证方面比现有的基于BLS的方案更高效，并且跨用户聚合验证可以显著降低TPA的计算和通信开销。
papers.title_zh: 从RSA假设中基于身份的可证明数据拥有，用于安全云存储

papers.title: Hierarchical Temporal Memory-Based One-Pass Learning for Real-Time Anomaly Detection and Simultaneous Data Prediction in Smart Grids
papers.authors: Anomadarshi Barua, Deepan Muthirayan, Pramod P. Khargonekar, Mohammad Abdullah Al Faruque
papers.abstract: A neuro-cognitive inspired architecture based on the Hierarchical Temporal Memory (HTM) is proposed for anomaly detection and simultaneous data prediction in real-time for smart grid <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mu$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>μ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="barua-ieq1-3037054.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>PMU data. The key technical idea is that the HTM learns a <italic>sparse distributed temporal representation</italic> of sequential data that turns out to be very useful for anomaly detection and simultaneous data prediction in real-time. Our results show that the proposed HTM can predict anomalies within 83–90 percent accuracy for three different application profiles, namely <italic>Standard, Reward Few False Positive, Reward Few False Negative</italic> for two different datasets. We show that the HTM is competitive to five state-of-the-art algorithms for anomaly detection. Moreover, for the multi-step prediction in the online setting, the same HTM achieves a low 0.0001 normalized mean square error, a low negative log-likelihood score of 1.5 and is also competitive to six state-of-the-art prediction algorithms. We demonstrate that the same HTM model can be used for <italic>both the tasks</italic> and can learn online in one-pass, in an unsupervised fashion and adapt to changing statistics. <italic>The other state-of-the-art algorithms are either less accurate or are limited to one of the tasks or cannot learn online in one-pass, and adapt to changing statistics.</italic>
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种基于分级时间记忆(HTM)的神经认知启发架构，用于智能电网的实时异常检测和同步数据预测< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mu $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi >μ</MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " barua-ie Q1-3037054 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >关键的技术思想是HTM学习顺序数据的< italic >稀疏分布式时态表示</italic >，这对于异常检测和实时同步数据预测非常有用。我们的结果表明，对于三个不同的应用配置文件，即两个不同数据集的< italic >标准、奖励少量假阳性、奖励少量假阴性</italic >，所提出的HTM可以在83–90%的准确度内预测异常。我们表明，在异常检测方面，HTM可以与五种最先进的算法相媲美。此外，对于在线设置中的多步预测，相同的HTM实现了0.0001的低归一化均方误差、1.5的低负对数似然得分，并且也与六种最先进的预测算法相竞争。我们证明了同一个HTM模型可以用于< italic >两个任务</italic >，并且可以在无人监督的情况下一次性在线学习，并适应不断变化的统计数据。< italic >其他最先进的算法要么精确度较低，要么仅限于一项任务，要么无法一次性在线学习，并且无法适应不断变化的统计数据。</italic >
papers.title_zh: 基于层次内存的层次记忆一通学习，用于实时异常检测和同时数据预测

papers.title: Cross-VM Network Channel Attacks and Countermeasures Within Cloud Computing Environments
papers.authors: Atif Saeed, Peter Garraghan, Syed Asad Hussain
papers.abstract: Cloud providers attempt to maintain the highest levels of isolation between Virtual Machines (VMs) and inter-user processes to keep co-located VMs and processes separate. This logical isolation creates an internal virtual network to separate VMs co-residing within a shared physical network. However, as co-residing VMs share their underlying VMM (Virtual Machine Monitor), virtual network, and hardware are susceptible to cross VM attacks. It is possible for a malicious VM to potentially access or control other VMs through network connections, shared memory, other shared resources, or by gaining the privilege level of its non-root machine. This research presents a two novel zero-day cross-VM network channel attacks. In the first attack, a malicious VM can redirect the network traffic of target VMs to a specific destination by impersonating the Virtual Network Interface Controller (VNIC). The malicious VM can extract the decrypted information from target VMs by using open source decryption tools such as Aircrack. The second contribution of this research is a privilege escalation attack in a cross VM cloud environment with Xen hypervisor. An adversary having limited privileges rights may execute Return-Oriented Programming (ROP), establish a connection with the root domain by exploiting the network channel, and acquiring the tool stack (root domain) which it is not authorized to access directly. Countermeasures against this attacks are also presented
papers.abstract_zh: 云提供商试图在虚拟机(VM)和用户间进程之间保持最高级别的隔离，以保持共处一地的VM和进程分离。这种逻辑隔离创建了一个内部虚拟网络，以分隔共存于共享物理网络中的虚拟机。然而，由于共存的虚拟机共享它们的底层VMM(虚拟机监视器)，虚拟网络和硬件容易受到跨虚拟机攻击。恶意虚拟机有可能通过网络连接、共享内存、其他共享资源或通过获得其非根机器的权限级别来访问或控制其他虚拟机。本研究提出了两种新颖的零日跨虚拟机网络通道攻击。在第一种攻击中，恶意虚拟机可以通过模拟虚拟网络接口控制器(VNIC)将目标虚拟机的网络流量重定向到特定目的地。恶意虚拟机可以通过使用开源解密工具(如Aircrack)从目标虚拟机中提取解密信息。这项研究的第二个贡献是在使用Xen虚拟机管理程序的跨虚拟机云环境中的权限提升攻击。具有有限特权权限的对手可以执行面向返回的编程(ROP ),通过利用网络通道建立与根域的连接，并获取其无权直接访问的工具堆栈(根域)。还提出了应对这种攻击的对策
papers.title_zh: 跨VM网络通道攻击和对策在云计算环境中

papers.title: Oracle-Supported Dynamic Exploit Generation for Smart Contracts
papers.authors: Haijun Wang, Ye Liu, Yi Li, Shangwei Lin, Cyrille Artho, Lei Ma, Yang Liu
papers.abstract: Despite the high stakes involved in smart contracts, they are often developed in an undisciplined manner, leaving the security and reliability of blockchain transactions at risk. In this article, we introduce ContraMaster—an oracle-supported dynamic exploit generation framework for smart contracts. Existing approaches mutate only single transactions; ContraMaster exceeds these by mutating the transaction sequences. ContraMaster uses data-flow, control-flow, and the dynamic contract state to guide its mutations. It then monitors the executions of target contract programs, and validates the results against a general-purpose semantic test oracle to discover vulnerabilities. Being a dynamic technique, it guarantees that each discovered vulnerability is a violation of the test oracle and is able to generate the attack script to exploit this vulnerability. In contrast to rule-based approaches, ContraMaster has not shown any false positives, and it easily generalizes to unknown types of vulnerabilities (e.g., logic errors). We evaluate ContraMaster on 218 vulnerable smart contracts. The experimental results confirm its practical applicability and advantages over the state-of-the-art techniques, and also reveal three new types of attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管智能合约涉及的风险很高，但它们通常是以一种不规范的方式开发的，这使得区块链交易的安全性和可靠性面临风险。在本文中，我们将介绍contra master——Oracle支持的智能合约动态漏洞利用生成框架。现有的方法只改变单个事务；ContraMaster通过改变交易顺序超越了这些限制。ContraMaster使用数据流、控制流和动态契约状态来引导其变化。然后，它监控目标合同程序的执行，并根据通用语义测试oracle来验证结果，以发现漏洞。作为一种动态技术，它保证每个发现的漏洞都违反了测试oracle，并能够生成攻击脚本来利用此漏洞。与基于规则的方法相比，ContraMaster没有显示任何误报，并且它很容易推广到未知类型的漏洞(例如，逻辑错误)。我们评估了218份易受攻击的智能合同。实验结果证实了其实用性和优于最新技术的优势，并且揭示了三种新的攻击类型。
papers.title_zh: 甲骨文支持的智能合约的动态利用生成

papers.title: Generating Adversarial Examples Against Machine Learning-Based Intrusion Detector in Industrial Control Systems
papers.authors: Ji-Ming Chen, Xiangshan Gao, Ruilong Deng, Yang He, Chongrong Fang, Peng Cheng
papers.abstract: Deploying machine learning (ML)-based intrusion detection systems (IDS) is an effective way to improve the security of industrial control systems (ICS). However, ML models themselves are vulnerable to adversarial examples, generated by deliberately adding subtle perturbation to the input sample that some people are not aware of, causing the model to give a false output with high confidence. In this article, our goal is to investigate the possibility of stealthy cyber attacks towards IDS, including injection attack, function code attack and reconnaissance attack, and enhance its robustness to adversarial attack. However, adversarial algorithms are subject to communication protocol and legal range of data in ICS, unlike only limited by the distance between original samples and newly generated samples in image domain. We propose two strategies - optimal solution attack and GAN attack - oriented to flexibility and volume of data, formulating an optimization problem to find stealthy attacks, where the former is appropriate for not too large and more flexible samples while the latter provides a more efficient solution for larger and not too flexible samples. Finally, we conduct experiments on a semi-physical ICS testbed with a high detection performance ensemble ML-based detector to show the effectiveness of our attacks. The results indicate that new samples of reconnaissance and function code attack produced by both optimal solution and GAN algorithm possess 80 percent higher probability to evade the detector, still maintaining the same attack effect. In the meantime, we adopt adversarial training as a method to defend against adversarial attack. After training on the mixture of orginal dataset and newly generated samples, the detector becomes more robust to adversarial examples.
papers.abstract_zh: 部署基于机器学习的入侵检测系统是提高工业控制系统安全性的有效途径。然而，最大似然模型本身容易受到对抗性例子的攻击，这些例子是通过故意向输入样本添加一些人没有意识到的细微扰动而产生的，导致模型给出具有高置信度的错误输出。在本文中，我们的目标是研究对入侵检测系统进行隐蔽攻击的可能性，包括注入攻击、功能代码攻击和侦察攻击，并增强其对对抗性攻击的鲁棒性。然而，对抗算法受通信协议和ICS中合法数据范围的限制，而不像在图像域中只受原始样本和新生成样本之间距离的限制。我们提出了两种面向灵活性和数据量的策略——最优解攻击和GAN攻击，建立了一个寻找隐形攻击的优化问题，其中前者适用于不太大和更灵活的样本，而后者为更大和不太灵活的样本提供了更有效的解决方案。最后，我们在一个半物理ICS测试床上用一个高检测性能的基于集成ML的检测器进行了实验，以展示我们的攻击的有效性。结果表明，最优解和GAN算法产生的新的侦察和功能码攻击样本，在保持相同攻击效果的情况下，逃避检测器的概率提高了80%。同时，我们采用对抗性训练作为防御对抗性攻击的方法。在原始数据集和新产生的样本的混合上训练之后，检测器变得对对立的例子更加鲁棒。
papers.title_zh: 在工业控制系统中为基于机器学习的侵入探测器生成对抗性示例

papers.title: A Large-Scale Empirical Study on the Vulnerability of Deployed IoT Devices
papers.authors: Binbin Zhao, Shouling Ji, Wei-Han Lee, Changting Lin, Haiqin Weng, Jingzheng Wu, Pan Zhou, Liming Fang, Raheem Beyah
papers.abstract: The Internet of Things (IoT) has become ubiquitous and greatly affected peoples’ daily lives. With the increasing development of IoT devices, the corresponding security issues are becoming more and more challenging. Such a severe security situation raises the following questions that need urgent attention: What are the primary security threats that IoT devices face currently? How do vendors and users deal with these threats? In this article, we aim to answer these critical questions through a large-scale systematic study. Specifically, we perform a ten-month-long empirical study on the vulnerability of 1,362,906 IoT devices varying from six types. The results show sufficient evidence that N-days vulnerability is seriously endangering the IoT devices: 385,060 (28.25 percent) devices suffer from at least one N-days vulnerability. Moreover, 2669 of these vulnerable devices may have been compromised by botnets. We further reveal the massive differences among five popular IoT search engines: Shodan [1], Censys [2], [3], Zoomeye [4], Fofa [5], and NTI [6]. To study whether vendors and users adopt defenses against the threats, we measure the security of MQTT [7] servers, and identify that 12740 (88 percent) MQTT servers have no password protection. Our analysis can serve as an important guideline for investigating the security of IoT devices, as well as advancing the development of a more secure environment for IoT systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网已经变得无处不在，并极大地影响了人们的日常生活。随着物联网设备的日益发展，相应的安全问题也越来越具有挑战性。如此严峻的安全形势引发了以下亟待关注的问题:物联网设备目前面临的主要安全威胁是什么？厂商和用户如何应对这些威胁？在本文中，我们旨在通过一项大规模的系统研究来回答这些关键问题。具体来说，我们对6种不同类型的1，362，906台物联网设备的漏洞进行了长达10个月的实证研究。结果显示，充分的证据表明，N天漏洞严重危及物联网设备:385，060(28.25%)台设备至少存在一个N天漏洞。此外，这些易受攻击的设备中有2669个可能已经被僵尸网络侵入。我们进一步揭示了五个流行的物联网搜索引擎之间的巨大差异:Shodan [1]、Censys [2]、[3]、Zoomeye [4]、Fofa [5]和NTI [6]。为了研究供应商和用户是否采取了针对威胁的防御措施，我们测量了MQTT [7]服务器的安全性，发现12740台(88%)MQTT服务器没有密码保护。我们的分析可以作为研究物联网设备安全性的重要指南，并推动为物联网系统开发更安全的环境。
papers.title_zh: 关于部署的物联网设备脆弱性的大规模实证研究

papers.title: Securely and Efficiently Outsourcing Decision Tree Inference
papers.authors: Yifeng Zheng, Huayi Duan, Cong Wang, Ruochen Wang, Surya Nepal
papers.abstract: Outsourcing machine learning inference services to the cloud is getting increasingly popular. However, this also entails privacy risks to the provider's proprietary model and the client's sensitive data. Focusing on inference with decision trees, this article proposes a framework for securely and efficiently outsourcing decision tree inference. Targeting both privacy and efficiency, we propose a customized protocol using only lightweight cryptography in the online execution of secure inference. We resort to additive secret sharing and tackle the problems in various components including secure input feature selection, decision node evaluation, and inference result generation. Our protocol requires no interaction from the provider and client during online secure inference, a distinct advantage over prior works for practical deployment as they all operate under the client-provider setting where synchronous and continuous interaction is required. Performance evaluation demonstrates our security design's efficiency, as well as substantial performance benefits for the client (up to four orders of magnitude in computation and 163 times in communication), as opposed to prior art in the non-outsourcing setting. To facilitate the practical usage for meeting more service demands, we also investigate the extensions for secure outsourced inference of random forests and categorical feature-based decision trees.
papers.abstract_zh: 将机器学习推理服务外包给云变得越来越流行。然而，这也给提供商的专有模型和客户的敏感数据带来了隐私风险。针对决策树推理，本文提出了一个安全有效的外包决策树推理框架。以隐私和效率为目标，我们提出了一个在安全推理的在线执行中仅使用轻量级密码的定制协议。我们求助于附加秘密共享并解决各种组件中的问题，包括安全输入特征选择、决策节点评估和推理结果生成。我们的协议在在线安全推断期间不需要来自提供者和客户端的交互，这对于实际部署来说是优于现有工作的明显优势，因为它们都在需要同步和连续交互的客户端-提供者设置下操作。与非外包设置中的现有技术相比，性能评估证明了我们的安全设计的效率，以及对客户的实质性性能益处(计算中高达4个数量级，通信中高达163倍)。为了促进满足更多服务需求的实际应用，我们还研究了随机森林和基于分类特征的决策树的安全外包推理的扩展。
papers.title_zh: 安全有效地外包决策树推理

papers.title: Harnessing Policy Authenticity for Hidden Ciphertext Policy Attribute-Based Encryption
papers.authors: Intae Kim, Willy Susilo, Joonsang Baek, Jongkil Kim
papers.abstract: The field of cryptography has endeavored to solve numerous security problems. However, a common premise of many of those problems is that the encryptor always generates the ciphertext correctly. Around 10 years ago, this premise was not a problem. However, due to the rapid development and the use of the cloud, which has introduced various access policies and functionalities to provide higher security, it is not correct to assume that this premise is always applied. A “Fake Policy Attack”, which we introduce in this article, is an attack that incorrectly sets the access policy of the ciphertext against the system rules so that users who do not meet the rules can decrypt the ciphertext. In other words, it is an attack that ignores the rules of the system and eventually breaks the security and leaks information. This attack can be more critical for the application environments that require strong security not to leak any related information about ciphertext. In this article, we demonstrate the possible threat of the Fake Policy Attack by providing two relevant examples. Then, we propose a scheme called Policy Authenticable ABE (PA-ABE) to resolve this issue. We provide a formal security analysis of the proposed scheme and performance evaluation results based on our implementation.
papers.abstract_zh: 密码学领域已经努力解决许多安全问题。然而，许多这些问题的一个共同前提是，加密器总是正确地生成密文。大约10年前，这个前提不成问题。然而，由于云的快速发展和使用，引入了各种访问策略和功能来提供更高的安全性，假设这一前提总是适用是不正确的。我们在本文中介绍的“假策略攻击”是一种攻击，它不正确地将密文的访问策略设置为违反系统规则，这样不符合规则的用户就可以解密密文。换句话说，这是一种无视系统规则，最终打破安全，泄露信息的攻击。这种攻击对于要求高度安全的应用程序环境来说可能更为严重，因为这些应用程序环境要求不泄漏任何与密文相关的信息。在本文中，我们通过提供两个相关的例子来展示假策略攻击可能带来的威胁。然后，我们提出了一个称为策略可认证的ABE (PA-ABE)的方案来解决这个问题。我们提供了一个正式的安全分析提出的方案和性能评估结果的基础上，我们的实现。
papers.title_zh: 利用基于隐藏的密文策略属性加密的策略真实性

papers.title: WebCloud: Web-Based Cloud Storage for Secure Data Sharing Across Platforms
papers.authors: Shuzhou Sun, Hui Ma, Zishuai Song, Rui Zhang
papers.abstract: With more and more data moving to the cloud, privacy of user data have raised great concerns. Client-side encryption/decryption seems to be an attractive solution to protect data security, however, the existing solutions encountered three major challenges: low security due to encryption with low-entropy PIN, inconvenient data sharing with traditional encryption algorithms, and poor usability with dedicated software/plugins that require certain types of terminals. This work designs and implements WebCloud, a practical browser-side encryption solution, leveraging modern Web technologies. It solves all the above three problems while achieves several additional remarkable features: robust and immediate user revocation, fast data processing with offline encryption and outsourced decryption. Notably, our solution works on any device equipped with a Web user agent, including Web browsers, mobile and PC applications. We implement WebCloud based on ownCloud for basic file management utility, and utilize WebAssembly and Web Cryptography API for complex cryptographic operations integration. Finally, comprehensive experiments are conducted with many well-known browsers, Android and PC applications, which indicates that WebCloud is cross-platform and efficient. As an interesting by-product, the design of WebCloud naturally embodies a dedicated and practical ciphertext-policy attribute-based key encapsulation mechanism (CP-AB-KEM) scheme, which can be useful in other applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着越来越多的数据转移到云中，用户数据的隐私问题引起了极大的关注。客户端加密/解密似乎是保护数据安全的一种有吸引力的解决方案，然而，现有的解决方案遇到了三个主要挑战:由于使用低熵PIN加密而导致的低安全性，使用传统加密算法不方便的数据共享，以及使用需要特定类型终端的专用软件/插件的可用性差。本文设计并实现了WebCloud，这是一个实用的浏览器端加密解决方案，利用了现代Web技术。它解决了所有上述三个问题，同时实现了几个额外的显著特征:健壮和即时的用户撤销、具有离线加密和外包解密的快速数据处理。值得注意的是，我们的解决方案适用于任何配备了Web用户代理的设备，包括Web浏览器、移动和PC应用程序。我们基于ownCloud实现了WebCloud的基本文件管理工具，并利用WebAssembly和Web Cryptography API集成了复杂的加密操作。最后，使用多个知名浏览器、Android和PC应用进行综合实验，实验结果表明WebCloud具有跨平台性和高效性。作为一个有趣的副产品，WebCloud的设计自然体现了一个专用且实用的基于密文策略属性的密钥封装机制(CP-AB-KEM)方案，该方案可以在其他应用中使用。
papers.title_zh: WebCloud：基于Web的云存储，用于跨平台的安全数据共享

papers.title: Quantum-Safe Round-Optimal Password Authentication for Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Zengpeng Li, Ding Wang, Eduardo Morais
papers.abstract: Password authentication is the dominant form of access control for the Web and mobile devices, and its practicality and ubiquity is unlikely to be replaced by other authentication approaches in the foreseeable future. To guarantee the security of data communication and mitigate the problem of password-cracking, a <italic>Password Authenticated Key Exchange</italic> (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq1-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) system can be deployed between two peer participants. The main drawback of traditional <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq2-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is that passwords are exposed in plaintext when the remote server is compromised. To overcome this limitation, it is recommended by industry standards (such as SRP family RFC 5054, RFC6628, RFC7914, OPAQUE, <italic>etc</italic>) to use <italic>asymmetric</italic>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq3-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocols, which enable the server to store a hash of the user's password with a random salt, providing guarantees that the user's password is never transmitted in plain-text to the server when login. However, most of the existing <italic>asymmetric</italic>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq4-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocols either are based on traditional hash functions under random oracles, or depend on non-quantum-secure hardness assumptions and become insecure in the quantum era. To bridge the gap between <italic>asymmetric</italic>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq5-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and quantum-security, in this article, we resort to <italic>smooth projective hash functions</italic> (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {SPHF}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">SPHF</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq6-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) and <italic>commitment</italic>-based <italic>password-hashing schemes</italic> (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PHS}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PHS</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq7-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) over lattice-based cryptography, and construct an asymmetric <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq8-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocol secure against quantum attacks. Our construction eliminates the costly non-interactive zero-knowledge (NIZK) method, bypasses assumptions of the random oracle model, and achieves quantum resistance. We also show that our asymmetric-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {PAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq9-3040776.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocol can achieve security and efficiency under the Bellare-Pointcheval-Rogaway (BPR) model. Finally, we develop a prototype implementation of our instantiation and use it to evaluate its performance in realistic settings.
papers.abstract_zh: 密码身份验证是Web和移动设备访问控制的主要形式，在可预见的未来，它的实用性和普遍性不太可能被其他身份验证方法取代。为了保证数据通信的安全性并减轻密码破解的问题，一个< italic >密码认证的密钥交换</italic >(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { PAKE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > PAKE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ie Q1-3040776 . gif传统的< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { PAKE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > PAKE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq 2-3040776 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的主要缺点是，当远程服务器为了克服这一限制，行业标准(如SRP系列RFC 5054、RFC6628、RFC7914、OPAQUE、< italic >等)建议使用< italic >不对称</italic >-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { PAKE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > PAKE </MML:mi > </mmm然而，大多数现有的< italic >非对称</italic >-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { PAKE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > PAKE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq 4-3040776 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >协议弥合< italic >不对称</italic >-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { PAKE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > PAKE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq 5-3040776 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >与我们的构造消除了昂贵的非交互式零知识(NIZK)方法，绕过了随机预言模型的假设，并实现了量子抵抗。我们还证明了我们的非对称-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { PAKE } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > PAKE </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq 9-3040776 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >协议在最后，我们开发了实例化的原型实现，并使用它来评估其在现实环境中的性能。
papers.title_zh: 移动设备的量子安全圆形密码身份验证

papers.title: Generating Effective Software Obfuscation Sequences With Reinforcement Learning
papers.authors: Huaijin Wang, Shuai Wang, Dongpeng Xu, Xiangyu Zhang, Xiao Liu
papers.abstract: Obfuscation is a prevalent security technique which transforms syntactic representation of a program to a complicated form, but still keeps program semantics unchanged. So far, developers heavily rely on obfuscation to harden their products and reduce the risk of adversarial reverse engineering. However, despite its spectacular progress, one crucial hurdle is that each of existing obfuscation method is designed specifically for obfuscating one program feature (e.g., identifier name, control flow), so an effective obfuscation scheme usually composes a considerable amount of different obfuscation methods. Therefore, one primary challenge lies in identifying effective combinations of obfuscation methods. In this research, we propose a principled technique for generating an optimal program obfuscation scheme by adopting a reinforcement learning approach. Given a program and a set of obfuscation transformations, a reinforcement learning model is progressively trained to select a sequence of obfuscation transformations, such that applying each transformation in order toward the program yields the optimal obfuscation result, making programs dissimilar while retaining reasonable instrumentation overhead. Our implementation can directly work on raw binary executables without source code, and our evaluation demonstrates that the trained models can effectively obfuscate executable files with low cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 混淆是一种流行的安全技术，它将程序的语法表示转换为复杂的形式，但仍然保持程序语义不变。到目前为止，开发人员严重依赖混淆来强化他们的产品，并降低敌对逆向工程的风险。然而，尽管取得了惊人的进步，但一个关键的障碍是现有的混淆方法都是专门为混淆一个程序特征(例如，标识符名称、控制流)而设计的，因此有效的混淆方案通常由大量不同的混淆方法组成。因此，一个主要的挑战在于识别混淆方法的有效组合。在这项研究中，我们提出了一个原则性的技术，通过采用强化学习的方法来生成一个最佳的程序混淆方案。给定一个程序和一组模糊变换，增强学习模型被逐步训练以选择一系列模糊变换，使得向程序依次应用每个变换产生最佳的模糊结果，使得程序不相似，同时保持合理的工具开销。我们的实现可以直接在原始的二进制可执行文件上工作而无需源代码，我们的评估表明，经过训练的模型可以以较低的成本有效地混淆可执行文件。
papers.title_zh: 通过增强学习生成有效的软件混淆序列

papers.title: Local Information Privacy and Its Application to Privacy-Preserving Data Aggregation
papers.authors: Bo Jiang, Ming Li, Ravi Tandon
papers.abstract: In this article, we propose local information privacy (LIP), and design LIP based mechanisms for statistical aggregation while protecting users’ privacy without relying on a trusted third party. The concept of context-awareness is incorporated in LIP, which can be viewed as exploiting of data prior (both in privatizing and post-processing) to enhance data utility. We present an optimization framework to minimize the mean square error of data aggregation while protecting the privacy of each user’s input data or a correlated latent variable by satisfying LIP constraints. Then, we study optimal mechanisms under different scenarios considering the prior uncertainty and correlation with a latent variable. Three types of mechanisms are studied in this article, including randomized response (RR), unary encoding (UE), and local hashing (LH), and we derive closed-form solutions for the optimal perturbation parameters that are prior-dependent. We compare LIP-based mechanisms with those based on LDP, and theoretically show that the former achieve enhanced utility. We then study two applications: (weighted) summation and histogram estimation, and show how proposed mechanisms can be applied to each application. Finally, we validate our analysis by simulations using both synthetic and real-world data. Results show the impact on data utility by different prior distributions, correlations, and input domain sizes. Results also show that our LIP-based mechanisms provide better utility-privacy tradeoffs than LDP-based ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提出了本地信息隐私(LIP ),并设计了基于LIP的统计聚集机制，在保护用户隐私的同时不依赖可信第三方。上下文感知的概念被结合到LIP中，这可以被看作是利用数据的先验(在私有化和后处理中)来增强数据的效用。我们提出了一个优化框架，以最小化数据聚合的均方误差，同时通过满足LIP约束来保护每个用户的输入数据或相关潜在变量的隐私。然后，我们研究了不同情景下的最优机制，考虑了先验不确定性和与潜在变量的相关性。本文研究了三种类型的机制，包括随机响应(RR)、一元编码(UE)和局部散列(LH)，并推导了先验相关的最优扰动参数的闭合解。我们比较了基于LIP的机制和基于LDP的机制，并从理论上证明了前者具有更高的效用。然后，我们研究两个应用:(加权)求和及直方图估计，并显示如何提出的机制可以应用于每一个应用。最后，我们通过使用合成和真实世界数据的仿真来验证我们的分析。结果显示了不同的先验分布、相关性和输入域大小对数据效用的影响。结果还表明，我们的基于LIP的机制比基于LDP的机制提供了更好的效用-隐私折衷。
papers.title_zh: 本地信息隐私及其应用于隐私数据汇总

papers.title: Extending Attack Graphs to Represent Cyber-Attacks in Communication Protocols and Modern IT Networks
papers.authors: Orly Stan, Ron Bitton, Michal Ezrets, Moran Dadon, Masaki Inokuchi, Yoshinobu Ohta, Tomohiko Yagyu, Yuval Elovici, Asaf Shabtai
papers.abstract: An attack graph is a method used to enumerate the possible paths that an attacker can take in the organizational network. MulVAL is a known open-source framework used to automatically generate attack graphs. MulVAL's default modeling has two main shortcomings. First, it lacks the ability to represent network protocol vulnerabilities, and thus it cannot be used to model common network attacks, such as ARP poisoning. Second, it does not support advanced types of communication, such as wireless and bus communication, and thus it cannot be used to model cyber-attacks on networks that include IoT devices or industrial components. In this article, we present an extended network security model for MulVAL that: (1) considers the physical network topology, (2) supports short-range communication protocols, (3) models vulnerabilities in the design of network protocols, and (4) models specific industrial communication architectures. Using the proposed extensions, we were able to model multiple attack techniques including: spoofing, man-in-the-middle, and denial of service attacks, as well as attacks on advanced types of communication. We demonstrate the proposed model in a testbed which implements a simplified network architecture comprised of both IT and industrial components.
papers.abstract_zh: 攻击图是一种用于列举攻击者在组织网络中可能采取的路径的方法。MulVAL是一个已知的开源框架，用于自动生成攻击图。MulVAL的默认建模有两个主要缺点。首先，它缺乏表示网络协议漏洞的能力，因此不能用于建模常见的网络攻击，如ARP中毒。其次，它不支持高级类型的通信，如无线和总线通信，因此不能用于模拟对包括物联网设备或工业组件的网络的网络攻击。在本文中，我们为MulVAL提供了一个扩展的网络安全模型:(1)考虑物理网络拓扑，(2)支持短程通信协议，(3)对网络协议设计中的漏洞进行建模，以及(4)对特定的工业通信架构进行建模。使用建议的扩展，我们能够模拟多种攻击技术，包括:欺骗、中间人和拒绝服务攻击，以及对高级通信类型的攻击。我们在一个测试床中演示了所提出的模型，该测试床实现了一个由IT和工业组件组成的简化网络架构。
papers.title_zh: 扩展攻击图以表示通信协议和现代IT网络中的网络攻击

papers.title: Probabilistic Path Prioritization for Hybrid Fuzzing
papers.authors: Lei Zhao, Pengcheng Cao, Yue Duan, Heng Yin, Jifeng Xuan
papers.abstract: Hybrid fuzzing that combines fuzzing and concolic execution has become an advanced technique for software vulnerability detection. Based on the observation that fuzzing and concolic execution are complementary in nature, state-of-the-art hybrid fuzzing systems deploy “optimal concolic testing” and “demand launch” strategies. Although these ideas sound intriguing, we point out several fundamental limitations in them, due to unrealistic or oversimplified assumptions. Further, we propose a novel “discriminative dispatch” strategy and design a probabilistic hybrid fuzzing system to better utilize the capability of concolic execution. Specifically, we design a Monte Carlo-based probabilistic path prioritization model to quantify each path’s difficulty, and then prioritize them for concolic execution. Our model assigns the most difficult paths to concolic execution. We implement a prototype named <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf DigFuzz}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">DigFuzz</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhao-ieq1-3042259.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and evaluate our system with two representative datasets and real-world programs. Results show that the concolic execution in <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf DigFuzz}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">DigFuzz</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhao-ieq2-3042259.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> outperforms than those in state-of-the-art hybrid fuzzing systems in every major aspect. In particular, the concolic execution in <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf DigFuzz}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">DigFuzz</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhao-ieq3-3042259.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> contributes to discovering more vulnerabilities (12 versus 5) and producing more code coverage (18.9 versus 3.8 percent) on the CQE dataset than the concolic execution in Driller.
papers.abstract_zh: 结合模糊化和concolic执行的混合模糊化已经成为一种先进的软件漏洞检测技术。根据观察到的模糊化和concolic执行在本质上是互补的，最先进的混合模糊化系统采用“最佳concolic测试”和“按需发射”策略。虽然这些想法听起来很吸引人，但我们指出了其中的几个基本限制，这是由于不现实或过于简单的假设。此外，我们提出了一种新的“区别调度”策略，并设计了一个概率混合模糊系统，以更好地利用concolic执行能力。具体来说，我们设计了一个基于蒙特卡罗的概率路径优先级模型来量化每条路径的难度，然后对它们进行优先级排序以供concolic执行。我们的模型将最困难的路径分配给concolic执行。我们实现了一个名为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF DigFuzz } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > DigFuzz </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Zhao-ie Q1-3042259 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的原型，并使用两个有代表性的数据集和真实程序对我们的系统进行了评估结果显示，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF DigFuzz } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > DigFuzz </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Zhao-ieq 2-3042259 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >中的concolic执行性能优于状态为特别是，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF DigFuzz } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > DigFuzz </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Zhao-ieq 3-3042259 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >中的concolic执行有助于发现更多漏洞(12对5
papers.title_zh: 混合模糊的概率路径优先级

papers.title: CoinLayering: An Efficient Coin Mixing Scheme for Large Scale Bitcoin Transactions
papers.authors: Ning Lu, Yuan Chang, Wenbo Shi, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo
papers.abstract: Coin mixing can be used to preserve identity privacy of Bitcoin owners, by engaging a set of middlepersons (i.e., <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$Mix$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>M</mml:mi><mml:mi>i</mml:mi><mml:mi>x</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="choo-ieq1-3043366.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) to temporarily hold the transacting Bitcoins and remove the linkage between the transacting parties. However, existing schemes are generally not scalable due to limitations associated with the anonymity set and self-credibility. In this article, we propose an efficient coin mixing scheme (hereafter referred to as CoinLayering). To achieve strong anonymity, CoinLayering randomly selects two sets of middlepersons to respectively execute Bitcoin holding and Bitcoin trading. The seller can also select lower-loaded sets of middlepersons in the shortest time possible. We also design two coin mixing protocols, CoinLayering-PA and CoinLayering-PB, to mitigate the risk due to misbehaving middlepersons and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$Supervisor$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>S</mml:mi><mml:mi>u</mml:mi><mml:mi>p</mml:mi><mml:mi>e</mml:mi><mml:mi>r</mml:mi><mml:mi>v</mml:mi><mml:mi>i</mml:mi><mml:mi>s</mml:mi><mml:mi>o</mml:mi><mml:mi>r</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="choo-ieq2-3043366.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. We then mathematically prove that CoinLayering achieves both strong anonymity and self-credibility, and evaluate its performance to demonstrate its scalability.
papers.abstract_zh: 硬币混合可用于保护比特币所有者的身份隐私，方法是让一组中间人(即< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ Mix $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > M </MML:mi > < MML:mi > I </MML:mi > < MML:mi > x </MML:mi > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline然而，由于与匿名集和自可信度相关联的限制，现有方案通常不可扩展。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个有效的硬币混合方案(以下简称为硬币分层)。为了实现强匿名性，CoinLayering随机选择两组中间人分别执行比特币持有和比特币交易。卖方也可以在尽可能短的时间内选择低负荷的中间商。我们还设计了两个硬币混合协议，CoinLayering-PA和CoinLayering-PB，以减轻由于中间人和< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ Supervisor $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > S </MML:mi > < MML:mi > u </MML:mi > < MML:mi > p </MML:mi > < MML:mi > e </MML:mi > < e然后，我们从数学上证明了CoinLayering实现了强匿名性和自可信性，并评估了其性能以展示其可扩展性。
papers.title_zh: 共同延期：大规模比特币交易的有效的硬币混合方案

papers.title: An Empirical Study of the Impact of Single and Multiple Bit-Flip Errors in Programs
papers.authors: Behrooz Sangchoolie, Karthik Pattabiraman, Johan Karlsson
papers.abstract: Recent studies have shown that technology and voltage scaling are expected to increase the likelihood that particle-induced soft errors manifest as multiple-bit errors. This raises concerns about the validity of using single bit-flips in fault injection experiments aiming to assess the program-level impact of soft errors. The goal of this article is to investigate whether multiple-bit errors could cause a higher percentage of silent data corruptions (SDCs) compared to single-bit errors. Based on 2700 fault injection campaigns with 15 benchmark programs, featuring a total of 27 million experiments, our results show that single-bit errors in most cases either yield a higher percentage of SDCs compared to multiple-bit errors or yield SDC results that are very close to the ones obtained for the multiple-bit errors. Further, we find that only around 2 percent of the multiple-bit campaigns resulted in an SDC percentage that was more than 5 percentage points higher than that obtained for the corresponding single-bit campaigns. For most of these campaigns, the highest percentage of SDCs was obtained by flipping at most 3 bits. Based on our results, we also propose four techniques for error space pruning to avoid injection of multiple-bit errors that are either unlikely or infeasible to cause SDCs.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的研究表明，预计技术和电压缩放会增加粒子引起的软错误表现为多位错误的可能性。这引起了对在旨在评估软错误的程序级影响的故障注入实验中使用单比特翻转的有效性的关注。本文的目标是调查与单比特错误相比，多比特错误是否会导致更高百分比的静默数据损坏(SDC)。基于15个基准程序的2700次故障注入活动，共进行了2700万次实验，我们的结果表明，与多位错误相比，大多数情况下单位错误产生的SDC百分比更高，或者产生的SDC结果非常接近多位错误的结果。此外，我们发现只有大约2%的多位广告活动产生的SDC百分比比相应的单位广告活动高出5个百分点以上。对于这些活动中的大多数，SDC的最高百分比是通过翻转至多3位获得的。基于我们的结果，我们还提出了四种错误空间修剪技术，以避免注入不太可能或不可行的多位错误导致SDC。
papers.title_zh: 对程序中单纤维错误错误的影响的实证研究

papers.title: Protecting Decision Boundary of Machine Learning Model With Differentially Private Perturbation
papers.authors: Huadi Zheng, Qingqing Ye, Haibo Hu, Chengfang Fang, Jie Shi
papers.abstract: Machine learning service API allows model owners to monetize proprietary models by offering prediction services to third-party users. However, existing literature shows that model parameters are vulnerable to extraction attacks which accumulate prediction queries and their responses to train a replica model. As countermeasures, researchers have proposed to reduce the rich API output, such as hiding the precise confidence. Nonetheless, even with response being only one bit, an adversary can still exploit fine-tuned queries with differential property to infer the decision boundary of the underlying model. In this article, we propose boundary differential privacy (BDP) against such attacks by obfuscating the prediction responses with noises. BDP guarantees an adversary cannot learn the decision boundary of any two classes by a predefined precision no matter how many queries are issued to the prediction API. We first design a perturbation algorithm called boundary randomized response for a binary model. Then we prove it satisfies <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\epsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zheng-ieq1-3043382.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-BDP, followed by a generalization of this algorithm to a multiclass model. Finally, we generalize a hard boundary to soft boundary and design an adaptive perturbation algorithm that can still work in the latter case. The effectiveness and high utility of our solution are verified by extensive experiments on both linear and non-linear models.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习服务API允许模型所有者通过向第三方用户提供预测服务来将专有模型货币化。然而，现有文献表明，模型参数容易受到提取攻击，这些攻击累积预测查询及其响应来训练副本模型。作为对策，研究人员提出减少丰富的API输出，比如隐藏精确的置信度。尽管如此，即使响应只有一位，对手仍然可以利用具有不同属性的微调查询来推断底层模型的决策边界。在本文中，我们提出了边界差分隐私(BDP)来抵抗这种攻击，通过用噪声混淆预测响应。BDP保证了无论向预测API发出多少查询，对手都无法通过预定义的精度获知任何两个类的决策边界。我们首先为二元模型设计了一个称为边界随机响应的扰动算法。然后我们证明它满足< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ epsilon $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi >ε</MML:math > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Zheng-ie Q1-3043382 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-BDP，接着将这个算法推广到多类模型。最后，我们将硬边界推广到软边界，并设计了一个自适应扰动算法，它仍然可以在后一种情况下工作。在线性和非线性模型上的大量实验验证了我们的解决方案的有效性和高实用性。
papers.title_zh: 通过私人扰动保护机器学习模型的决策边界

papers.title: Eurus: Towards an Efficient Searchable Symmetric Encryption With Size Pattern Protection
papers.authors: Zheli Liu, Yanyu Huang, Xiangfu Song, Bo Li, Jin Li, Yali Yuan, Changyu Dong
papers.abstract: To achieve efficiently search and update on outsourced encrypted data, dynamic searchable symmetric encryption (DSSE) was proposed by just leaking some well-defined leakages. Though small, many recent works show that an attacker can exploit these leakages to undermine the security of existing DSSE schemes. In particular, an attacker can exploit even seemingly harmless size pattern to perform severe attacks. Many exiting schemes resort to oblivious RAM (ORAM) to hide search/access pattern; however, even such powerful cryptographic primitive cannot protect size pattern leakage. In this article, we first show that size pattern can lead to more information leakages, which is not well studied or protected by existing schemes. We then extend the existing privacy notion for DSSE to capture the size pattern leakage, achieving a strong forward and backward privacy definition. Following the definition, we propose a new DSSE scheme Eurus. Eurus can eliminate search/access pattern by relying on a multi-server ORAM scheme, meanwhile reducing size pattern with reasonable efficiency. We show that Eurus can reduce leakage significantly with better efficiency, compared with state-of-the-art leakage reduction schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了实现对外包加密数据的高效搜索和更新，提出了动态可搜索对称加密(DSSE)。尽管规模很小，但最近的许多工作表明，攻击者可以利用这些泄漏来破坏现有DSSE方案的安全性。特别是，攻击者甚至可以利用看似无害的大小模式来执行严重的攻击。许多现有的方案依靠不经意RAM (ORAM)来隐藏搜索/访问模式；然而，即使这样强大密码原语也不能保护大小模式泄漏。在本文中，我们首先表明，大小模式可以导致更多的信息泄漏，这是没有很好地研究或现有的方案保护。然后，我们扩展了现有的DSSE隐私概念，以捕捉大小模式泄漏，实现了一个强大的向前和向后隐私定义。根据这个定义，我们提出了一个新的DSSE方案Eurus。Eurus可以通过依靠多服务器ORAM方案来消除搜索/访问模式，同时以合理的效率减小大小模式。我们表明，与最先进的泄漏减少方案相比，Eurus能够以更高的效率显著减少泄漏。
papers.title_zh: 欧洲：朝着有效搜索的对称加密，并具有尺寸模式保护

papers.title: SAFE: A General Secure and Fair Auction Framework for Wireless Markets With Privacy Preservation
papers.authors: Yanjiao Chen, Xin Tian, Qian Wang, Jianlin Jiang, Minghui Li, Qian Zhang
papers.abstract: With the prosperity of wireless and mobile communications, the allocation of wireless resources, e.g., spectrum channels, femtocell access permissions, and resource blocks of D2D connections, has become a matter of great concern, which leads to the emergence and popularity of electronic auction. However, the lack of privacy protection and fairness guarantee in the existing market has posed great obstacles to user participation in electronic auctions. Without privacy protection, users will be worried about the unauthorized exposure of their commercial secrets, which may hurt their payoffs in the long run. Without fairness guarantee, selfish/malicious users may prematurely abort the auction to avoid unsatisfactory payment, thus causing loss to honest users and wasting system resources. Furthermore, the lack of fairness guarantee will incur an exchange dilemma, where mutually distrusting parties may refuse to initiate the goods/money exchange, hindering the market-clearing of auctions. Although extensive efforts have been made to develop privacy-preserving auction mechanisms for wireless markets, the fairness issue, to the best of our knowledge, has never been taken into account in the context of auctions. Moreover, a truly practical framework that can be applied to most mainstream auction formats is also missing in the literature. In this article, we present the first general framework, named SAFE, for representative auctions in (but not limited to) wireless markets. SAFE achieves a wide range of security goals with much higher efficiency than existing solutions. Furthermore, SAFE ensures auction fairness in a trust-free manner by developing a full set of carefully-designed modular protocols that can be easily adapted to any auction format. We implement the SAFE framework over a simulated Ethereum network. Extensive experimental results confirm that SAFE can indeed achieve high economic efficiency in terms of social welfare and participation satisfaction at very low computation and communication overheads.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着无线和移动通信的繁荣，无线资源的分配，例如频谱信道、毫微微蜂窝接入许可和D2D连接的资源块，已经成为非常关注的问题，这导致了电子拍卖的出现和流行。然而，现有市场缺乏隐私保护和公平保障，给用户参与电子拍卖造成了很大障碍。如果没有隐私保护，用户会担心他们的商业秘密被未经授权地暴露，从长远来看，这可能会损害他们的回报。在没有公平性保证的情况下，自私/恶意用户可能会过早地中止拍卖以避免不满意的支付，从而给诚实用户造成损失并浪费系统资源。此外，缺乏公平保证将导致交换困境，其中相互不信任的各方可能拒绝发起商品/货币交换，从而阻碍拍卖的市场清算。尽管已经进行了广泛的努力来开发用于无线市场的保护隐私的拍卖机制，但是据我们所知，公平问题从未在拍卖的环境中被考虑。此外，一个真正实用的框架，可以适用于大多数主流拍卖格式，也是缺乏文献。在本文中，我们提出了第一个通用框架，名为SAFE，用于(但不限于)无线市场中的代表性拍卖。SAFE以比现有解决方案更高的效率实现了广泛的安全目标。此外，外管局通过开发一整套精心设计的模块化协议，以无信任的方式确保拍卖的公平性，这些协议可以很容易地适应任何拍卖形式。我们在模拟以太网上实现了安全框架。大量的实验结果证实了SAFE确实可以在很低的计算和通信开销下，在社会福利和参与满意度方面实现很高的经济效率。
papers.title_zh: 保险箱：保存隐私的无线市场的一般安全和公平的拍卖框架

papers.title: ShadowPLCs: A Novel Scheme for Remote Detection of Industrial Process Control Attacks
papers.authors: Junjiao Liu, Xiaodong Lin, Xin Chen, Hui Wen, Hong Li, Yan Hu, Jiawei Sun, Zhiqiang Shi, Limin Sun
papers.abstract: Industrial Control System (ICS) security has become increasingly important as attacks targeting ICSs are more prominent. Although many off-the-shelf industrial network intrusion detection mechanisms have been presented in the past, attackers have always found unique disguisable ways to bypass detections and disrupt actual industrial control processes. To mitigate this deficiency, we present a novel scheme for the detection of industrial process control attacks, called ShadowPLCs. Specifically, the scheme first automatically analyzes the PLC control code, then extracts key parameters of the PLCs including valid register addresses, valid range of values, and control logic rules as a basis for evaluating attacks. The attack behavior is detected in real-time from different perspectives through active communication with PLCs and passive monitoring of the network traffic. We implemented a prototype system with Siemens S7-300 series PLCs as a case study. Our scheme was evaluated using two Siemens S7-300 PLCs deployed on a gas pipeline network platform. Experiments demonstrate that the presented scheme can accurately detect process control attacks in real-time without affecting the normal operations of PLCs. Compared with the other four representative detection models, our scheme has better detection performance with detection accuracy of 97.3 percent.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着针对工业控制系统(ICS)的攻击日益突出，ICS的安全性变得越来越重要。尽管过去已经出现了许多现成的工业网络入侵检测机制，但攻击者总是找到独特的伪装方法来绕过检测并破坏实际的工业控制过程。为了减轻这一缺陷，我们提出了一种新的方案来检测工业过程控制攻击，称为阴影PLC。具体来说，该方案首先自动分析PLC控制代码，然后提取PLC的关键参数，包括有效寄存器地址、有效值范围和控制逻辑规则，作为评估攻击的基础。通过主动与PLC通信和被动监控网络流量，从不同角度实时检测攻击行为。我们使用西门子S7-300系列PLC实现了一个原型系统作为案例研究。我们的方案使用部署在天然气管道网络平台上的两台西门子S7-300 PLC进行评估。实验表明，该方案能够在不影响PLC正常运行的情况下，实时准确地检测过程控制攻击。与其他四种有代表性的检测模型相比，该方案具有更好的检测性能，检测准确率达到97.3%。
papers.title_zh: ShadowPlcs：一种用于远程检测工业过程控制攻击的新型方案

papers.title: SSHC: A Secure and Scalable Hybrid Consensus Protocol for Sharding Blockchains With a Formal Security Framework
papers.authors: Yizhong Liu, Jianwei Liu, Qianhong Wu, Hui Yu, Yiming Hei, Ziyu Zhou
papers.abstract: Sharding blockchains are proposed to solve the scalability problem while maintaining security and decentralization. However, there are still many issues to be solved. First, the member selection and assignment process are not strictly analyzed, which might lead to an increase in the adversary proportion. Second, current intra-shard consensus algorithms are inefficient. Besides, cross-shard transaction processing costs expensive system overhead. Moreover, there is a lack of a formal security framework. In this article, we propose a secure and scalable hybrid consensus (SSHC). First, we propose a fair sharding selection scheme to select committee members, including mining processes and member lists confirmation by a reference committee. Second, a pipelined Byzantine fault tolerance for intra-shard consensus is designed, combining the pipelined technology with threshold signatures. Third, we propose a responsive sharding transaction batch processing mechanism to handle cross-shard transactions, which reduces the number of calls to Byzantine fault tolerance algorithms. Fourth, a secure committee reconfiguration method is designed to update shard members efficiently. Furthermore, we employ a formal security framework to design and analyze a sharding blockchain. For an adversary whose computational power fraction is less than <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$1/3$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>/</mml:mo><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq1-3047487.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, by reasonably setting a corruption parameter and other related parameters, SSHC is proved to achieve consistency and liveness.
papers.abstract_zh: 分片区块链的提出是为了解决可伸缩性问题，同时保持安全性和分散性。然而，仍有许多问题有待解决。首先，没有严格分析成员选择和分配过程，这可能导致对手比例的增加。其次，当前的片内共识算法效率低下。此外，跨分片事务处理耗费了昂贵的系统开销。此外，缺乏正式的安全框架。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个安全和可扩展的混合共识(SSHC)。首先，我们提出了一个公平的分片选择方案来选择委员会成员，包括挖掘过程和参考委员会对成员名单的确认。其次，结合流水线技术和门限签名，设计了一种流水线拜占庭容错机制。第三，我们提出了一个响应式分片事务批处理机制来处理跨分片事务，减少了调用拜占庭容错算法的次数。第四，设计了一种安全的委员会重构方法，有效地更新碎片成员。此外，我们采用一个正式的安全框架来设计和分析一个分片区块链。对于计算能力分数小于< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 1/3 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >/</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 3 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Liu-ie Q1-31
papers.title_zh: SSHC：使用正式的安全框架将区块链碎片链碎片链碎片的安全且可扩展的混合共识协议

papers.title: Conditional Privacy-Preserving Authentication Protocol With Dynamic Membership Updating for VANETs
papers.authors: Hu Xiong, Jinhao Chen, Qian Mei, Yanan Zhao
papers.abstract: Existing conditional anonymous authentication protocols to secure the group communication in VANETs (Vehicular Ad hoc Networks) render challenges such as dynamically updating membership in a domain and achieving vehicle user’s privacy preservation. This article elegantly addresses these challenges by proposing a novel conditional privacy-preserving authentication with dynamic membership for VANETs depending on chinese remainder theorem (CRT). Specifically, the CRT is utilized by a trusted authority to securely disseminate a domain key for the authorized vehicles in the same domain, where each vehicle in this domain is able to obtain the domain key by only performing one modulo division operation in case of domain key updating. Distinct from the previous works in this field, our proposed protocol not only achieves message authentication, anonymity and conditional privacy-preserving, but also provides forward security and backward security of vehicles. Theoretical analysis and experiment simulation demonstrate that the proposed protocol is provably secure and highly feasible.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的有条件匿名认证协议在保证车辆自组网群组通信安全的同时，面临着动态更新域成员和实现车辆用户隐私保护等挑战。本文基于中国剩余定理提出了一种新的基于动态成员身份的有条件隐私保护认证方案，很好地解决了这些挑战。具体地，可信机构利用CRT来安全地传播同一域中授权车辆的域密钥，其中在域密钥更新的情况下，该域中的每个车辆能够通过仅执行一次模除操作来获得域密钥。与该领域已有的工作不同，我们提出的协议不仅实现了消息认证、匿名和条件隐私保护，还提供了车辆的前向安全性和后向安全性。理论分析和实验仿真表明，该协议具有可证明的安全性和高度可行性。
papers.title_zh: 带有动态会员更新货物的有条件隐私的身份验证协议

papers.title: Trust But Verify: A Framework for the Trustworthiness of Distributed Systems
papers.authors: Reem M. Albarrak, Daniel A. Menascé
papers.abstract: Many real-time process-control and industrial control systems, such as Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA), use a distributed software architecture and rely on trusted message exchanges among software components. This article presents the Trust but Verify (TBV) middleware that promotes the idea that software components should not blindly trust each other. The TBV intercepts messages between a sender and a receiver to verify the consistency of the messages against rules associated with message types; this verification considers the system state. Based on the verification, a message is either delivered to the recipient or blocked. Even when components are mutually authenticated, it is possible that their counterparts are faulty or acting maliciously, persuading the receiver to take harmful actions. The contributions of this article are: (1) The design of the TBV middleware. (2) A proof-of-concept implementation of the TBV on a cyberphysical system—a water treatment facility. (3) An experimental validation of the TBV through several attack scenarios that allow compromised or faulty components to randomly send erroneous messages. These experiments measure the TBV’s detection rate as well as its overhead. (4) An evaluation of the TBV overhead and performance degradation.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多实时过程控制和工业控制系统，例如监控和数据采集(SCADA ),使用分布式软件架构，并依赖于软件组件之间的可信消息交换。本文介绍了信任但验证(TBV)中间件，该中间件提倡软件组件不应该盲目地相互信任。TBV拦截发送方和接收方之间的消息，以对照与消息类型相关联的规则来验证消息的一致性；该验证考虑系统状态。基于该验证，消息要么被传递给接收者，要么被阻止。即使组件是相互认证的，它们的对应物也有可能是错误的或恶意的，诱使接收者采取有害的行动。本文的贡献在于:(1)TBV中间件的设计。(2)在网络物理系统——水处理设施——上实现TBV的概念验证。(3)通过几个攻击场景对TBV进行实验验证，这些攻击场景允许受损或有故障的组件随机发送错误消息。这些实验测量了TBV的检测率及其开销。(4)TBV开销和性能下降的评估。
papers.title_zh: 信任但验证：分布式系统可信度的框架

papers.title: DE-Sword: Incentivized Verifiable Tag Path Query in RFID-Enabled Supply Chain Systems
papers.authors: Saiyu Qi, Yuanqing Zheng, Yue Li, Xiaofeng Chen, Jianfeng Ma, Dongyi Yang, Yong Qi
papers.abstract: In this article, we propose Double Edged (DE)-Sword, an incentivized verifiable tag path query scheme. DE-Sword queries tag records stored across a path of participants within an RFID-enabled supply chain in a verifiable way. Different with previous works, DE-Sword works in a dishonest-data owner model in which participants are the owners of tag records and may be dishonest. DE-Sword introduces a novel double-edged reputation incentive mechanism to encourage participants to behave honestly; and couples it with cryptographic primitives to ensure query verifiability. We evaluate DE-Sword through game theory, security analysis, and performance evaluation. The game theory and security analysis shows that DE-Sword guarantees query verifiability. The evaluation results show that DE-Sword incurs low overhead in supply chain systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提出了双刃(DE)剑，一个激励的可验证的标签路径查询方案。DE-Sword查询以可验证的方式标记存储在启用RFID的供应链中的参与者路径上的记录。与以前的作品不同，DE-Sword在一个不诚实数据所有者模型中工作，在该模型中，参与者是标签记录的所有者，并且可能是不诚实的。DE-Sword引入新颖的双刃声誉激励机制，鼓励参与者诚实行为；并将其与密码原语相结合以确保查询的可验证性。我们通过博弈论、安全性分析和性能评估来评估DE-Sword。博弈论和安全性分析表明DE-Sword保证了查询的可验证性。评估结果表明，去剑在供应链系统中的开销较低。
papers.title_zh: de-sword：激励启用RFID的供应链系统中的可验证标签路径查询

papers.title: Sanitizable Access Control System for Secure Cloud Storage Against Malicious Data Publishers
papers.authors: Willy Susilo, Peng Jiang, Jianchang Lai, Fuchun Guo, Guomin Yang, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Cloud computing is considered as one of the most prominent paradigms in the information technology industry, since it can significantly reduce the costs of hardware and software resources in computing infrastructure. This convenience has enabled corporations to efficiently use the cloud storage as a mechanism to share data among their employees. At the first sight, by merely storing the shared data as plaintext in the cloud storage and protect them using an appropriate access control would be a nice solution. This is assuming that the cloud is fully trusted for not leaking any information, which is impractical as the cloud is owned by a third party. Therefore, encryption is mandatory, and the shared data will need to be stored as a ciphertext using an appropriate access control. However, in practice, some of these employees may be malicious and may want to deviate from the required sharing policy. The existing protection in the literature has been explored to allow only legitimate recipients to decrypt the contents stored in the cloud storage, but unfortunately, no existing work deals with issues raised due to the presence of malicious data publishers. Malicious data publishers construct data following the given policy, but the ciphertexts can actually be decrypted by unauthorized users without valid keys, or simply, anyone else who is unauthorized. The impact of the involvement of malicious data publishers is detrimental, as it may damage intellectual properties from the corporations. Therefore, it remains an elusive research problem on how to enable a sound approach to resolve the issue when malicious data publishers are involved in the system, which is a very practical question. In this work, we present a new direction of research that can cope with the presence of malicious data publishers. We resolve the aforementioned problem by proposing the notion of Sanitizable Access Control System (SACS), which is designed for a secure cloud storage that can also resist against malicious data publishers. We define the threat model and its formal security model, as well as its design and scheme which is based on $q$q-Parallel Bilinear Diffie-Hellman Exponent Assumption. We provide the security proof of our construction as well as its performance analysis. We believe that this work has opened a new area of research which has never been explored before, even though it is very practical. Therefore, this work will enhance the adoption of secure cloud storage in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算被认为是信息技术产业中最突出的范例之一，因为它可以显著降低计算基础设施中硬件和软件资源的成本。这种便利使企业能够高效地使用云存储作为一种机制，在员工之间共享数据。乍一看，仅仅将共享数据作为明文存储在云存储中并使用适当的访问控制来保护它们是一个不错的解决方案。这是假设云是完全可信的，不会泄露任何信息，这是不切实际的，因为云是由第三方拥有的。因此，加密是强制性的，共享数据需要使用适当的访问控制以密文形式存储。然而，在实践中，这些员工中的一些可能是恶意的，并且可能想要偏离所要求的共享政策。已经探索了文献中的现有保护，以仅允许合法接收者解密存储在云存储中的内容，但是不幸的是，没有现有工作处理由于恶意数据发布者的存在而引起的问题。恶意数据发布者按照给定的策略构造数据，但是密文实际上可以被没有有效密钥的未授权用户解密，或者仅仅是未授权的任何其他人。恶意数据发布者参与的影响是有害的，因为它可能会损害公司的知识产权。因此，当系统中存在恶意数据发布者时，如何找到一种合理的方法来解决这个问题仍然是一个难以解决的研究问题，这是一个非常实际的问题。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个新的研究方向，可以应对恶意数据发布者的存在。我们通过提出可净化访问控制系统(SACS)的概念来解决上述问题，该系统是为安全云存储设计的，也可以抵御恶意数据发布者。我们定义了威胁模型及其形式化安全模型，以及基于$ q $ q-并行双线性Diffie-Hellman指数假设的设计和方案。我们提供了我们的结构的安全性证明以及它的性能分析。我们相信这项工作开辟了一个新的研究领域，这个领域以前从未被探索过，尽管它非常实用。因此，这项工作将促进安全云存储在实践中的应用。
papers.title_zh: 针对恶意数据出版商的安全云存储的可卫生访问控制系统

papers.title: Explainable Artificial Intelligence for Cyber Threat Intelligence (XAI-CTI)
papers.authors: Sagar Samtani, Hsinchun Chen, Murat Kantarcioglu, Bhavani Thuraisingham
papers.title_zh: 用于网络威胁情报的可解释人工智能(XAI-CTI)

papers.title: A Multi-Criteria Analysis of Benchmark Results With Expert Support for Security Tools
papers.authors: Miquel Martínez, Juan Carlos Ruiz, Nuno Antunes, David de Andrés, Marco Vieira
papers.abstract: The benchmarking of security tools is endeavored to determine which tools are more suitable to detect system vulnerabilities or intrusions. The analysis process is usually oversimplified by employing just a single metric out of the large set of those available. Accordingly, the decision may be biased by not considering relevant information provided by neglected metrics. This article proposes a novel approach to take into account several metrics, different scenarios, and the advice of multiple experts. The proposal relies on experts quantifying the relative importance of each pair of metrics towards the requirements of a given scenario. Their judgments are aggregated using group decision making techniques, and pondered according to the familiarity of experts with the metrics and scenario, to compute a set of weights accounting for the relative importance of each metric. Then, weight-based multi-criteria-decision-making techniques can be used to rank the benchmarked tools. The usefulness of this approach is showed by analyzing two different sets of vulnerability and intrusion detection tools from the perspective of multiple/single metrics and different scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全工具的基准测试旨在确定哪些工具更适合检测系统漏洞或入侵。分析过程通常过于简化，只采用一个单一的可用指标。因此，由于没有考虑由被忽略的度量提供的相关信息，决策可能会有偏差。本文提出了一种新颖的方法来考虑几个指标、不同的场景和多个专家的建议。该提议依赖于专家量化每一对度量对给定场景需求的相对重要性。他们的判断使用群体决策技术进行汇总，并根据专家对指标和场景的熟悉程度进行思考，以计算一组权重，说明每个指标的相对重要性。然后，基于权重的多标准决策技术可用于对基准工具进行排序。通过从多个/单个指标和不同场景的角度分析两组不同的漏洞和入侵检测工具，展示了该方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基准结果的多标准分析以及对安全工具的专家支持

papers.title: Orchestration or Automation: Authentication Flaw Detection in Android Apps
papers.authors: Siqi Ma, Juanru Li, Surya Nepal, Diethelm Ostry, David Lo, Sanjay K. Jha, Robert H. Deng, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: Passwords are pervasively used to authenticate users’ identities in mobile apps. To secure passwords against attacks, protection is applied to the password authentication protocol (PAP). The implementation of the protection scheme becomes an important factor in protecting PAP against attacks. We focus on two basic protection in Android, i.e., SSL/TLS-based PAP and timestamp-based PAP. Previously, we proposed an automated tool, <sc>GLACIATE</sc>, to detect authentication flaws. We were curious whether orchestration (i.e., involving manual-effort) works better than automation. To answer this question, we propose an orchestrated approach, <sc>AuthExploit</sc> and compare its effectiveness <sc>GLACIATE</sc>. We study requirements for correct implementation of PAP and then apply <sc>GLACIATE</sc> to identify protection enhancements automatically. Through dependency analysis, <sc>GLACIATE</sc> matches the implementations against the abstracted flaws to recognise defective apps. To evaluate <sc>AuthExploit</sc>, we collected 1,200 Android apps from Google Play. We compared <sc>AuthExploit</sc> with the automation tool, <sc>GLACIATE</sc>, and two other orchestration tools, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf MalloDroid}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">MalloDroid</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ma-ieq1-3050188.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sf SMV-Hunter}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">SMV</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Hunter</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ma-ieq2-3050188.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. The results demonstrated that orchestration tools detect flaws more precisely although the F1 score of <sc>GLACIATE</sc> is higher than <sc>AuthExploit</sc>. Further analysis of the results reveals that highly popular apps and e-commerce apps are not more secure than other apps.
papers.abstract_zh: 在移动应用程序中，密码被广泛用于验证用户的身份。为了保护密码免受攻击，对密码验证协议(PAP)进行了保护。保护方案的实施成为保护PAP免受攻击的重要因素。我们重点研究Android中的两种基本保护，即基于SSL/TLS的PAP和基于时间戳的PAP。之前，我们提出了一个自动化工具“GLACIATE”来检测认证缺陷。我们很好奇编排(例如，涉及人工的工作)是否比自动化工作得更好。为了回答这个问题，我们提出了一种协调的方法，即AuthExploit，并比较了它的有效性。我们研究正确实施PAP的要求，然后应用GLACIATE来自动识别保护增强功能。通过依赖性分析，GLACIATE将实现与抽象的缺陷进行匹配，以识别有缺陷的应用程序。为了评估< sc>AuthExploit</sc >，我们从Google Play收集了1，200个Android应用。我们将< sc>AuthExploit</sc >与自动化工具< sc>GLACIATE</sc >以及另外两个编排工具< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ SF MalloDroid } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > MalloDroid </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " ma-ie Q1-3050180进行了比较结果表明，尽管< sc>GLACIATE</sc >的F1分数高于< sc>AuthExploit</sc >，但编排工具可以更精确地检测缺陷。对结果的进一步分析显示，高度流行的应用程序和电子商务应用程序并不比其他应用程序更安全。
papers.title_zh: 管弦乐或自动化：Android应用中的身份验证缺陷检测

papers.title: Efficient Cyber Attack Detection in Industrial Control Systems Using Lightweight Neural Networks and PCA
papers.authors: Moshe Kravchik, Asaf Shabtai
papers.abstract: Industrial control systems (ICSs) are widely used and vital to industry and society. Their failure can have severe impact on both the economy and human life. Hence, these systems have become an attractive target for physical and cyber attacks alike. In this article, we examine an attack detection method based on simple and lightweight neural networks, namely, 1D convolutional neural networks and autoencoders. We apply these networks to both the time and frequency domains of the data and discuss the pros and cons of each representation approach. The suggested method is evaluated on three popular public datasets, and detection rates matching or exceeding previously published detection results are achieved, while demonstrating a small footprint, short training and detection times, and generality. We also show the effectiveness of PCA, which, given proper data preprocessing and feature selection, can provide high attack detection rates in many settings. Finally, we study the proposed method’s robustness against adversarial attacks that exploit inherent blind spots of neural networks to evade detection while achieving their intended physical effect. Our results show that the proposed method is robust to such evasion attacks: in order to evade detection, the attacker is forced to sacrifice the desired physical impact on the system.
papers.abstract_zh: 工业控制系统(ICSs)应用广泛，对工业和社会至关重要。它们的失败会对经济和人类生活产生严重影响。因此，这些系统已经成为物理和网络攻击的诱人目标。在本文中，我们研究了一种基于简单轻量级神经网络的攻击检测方法，即1D卷积神经网络和自动编码器。我们将这些网络应用于数据的时域和频域，并讨论每种表示方法的优缺点。在三个流行的公共数据集上对所提出的方法进行了评估，实现了匹配或超过先前发表的检测结果的检测率，同时展示了小的足迹、短的训练和检测时间以及通用性。我们还展示了PCA的有效性，在给定适当的数据预处理和特征选择的情况下，PCA可以在许多设置中提供高的攻击检测率。最后，我们研究了所提出的方法对恶意攻击的鲁棒性，这些攻击利用神经网络的固有盲点来逃避检测，同时实现其预期的物理效果。我们的结果表明，所提出的方法对这种逃避攻击是鲁棒的:为了逃避检测，攻击者被迫牺牲对系统的期望物理影响。
papers.title_zh: 使用轻型神经网络和PCA的工业控制系统中有效的网络攻击检测

papers.title: A Privacy-Preserving and Untraceable Group Data Sharing Scheme in Cloud Computing
papers.authors: Jian Shen, Huijie Yang, Pandi Vijayakumar, Neeraj Kumar
papers.abstract: With the development of cloud computing, the great amount of storage data requires safe and efficient data sharing. In multiparty storage data sharing, first, the confidentiality of shared data is ensured to achieve data privacy preservation. Second, the security of stored data is ensured. That is, when stored shared data are subject to frequent access operations, the address sequence or access pattern of data is hidden. Therefore, determining how to ensure the untraceability of stored data or efficient hide the data access pattern in sharing stored data is a challenge. By employing the proxy re-encryption algorithm and oblivious random access memory (ORAM), a privacy-preserving and untraceable scheme is proposed to support multiple users in sharing data in cloud computing. On the one hand, group members and a proxy use the key exchange phase to obtain keys and resist multiparty collusion if necessary. The ciphertext obtained according to the proxy re-encryption phase enables group members to implement access control and store data, thereby completing secure data sharing. On the other hand, this article realizes data untraceability and a hidden data access pattern through a one-way circular linked table in a binary tree (OCLT) and obfuscation operation. Additionally, based on the designed structure and pointer tuple, malicious users are identified and data tampering is prevented. The security analysis shows that the protocol designed in this article can meet the security requirements of proxy re-encryption and ORAM. Both theoretical and experimental analyses demonstrate that the proposed scheme is secure and efficient for group data sharing in cloud computing.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云计算的发展，海量的存储数据要求安全高效的数据共享。在多方存储数据共享中，首先保证共享数据的机密性，实现数据隐私保护。第二，确保存储数据的安全性。也就是说，当存储的共享数据经受频繁的访问操作时，数据的地址序列或访问模式被隐藏。因此，确定如何确保存储数据的不可追踪性或在共享存储数据时有效隐藏数据访问模式是一个挑战。通过使用代理重加密算法和ORAM，提出了一种隐私保护和不可追踪的方案来支持多个用户在云计算中共享数据。一方面，群组成员和代理使用密钥交换阶段来获得密钥，并在必要时抵抗多方共谋。根据代理重加密阶段得到的密文使组成员能够实现访问控制和存储数据，从而完成安全的数据共享。另一方面，本文通过二叉树中的单向循环链表(OCLT)和混淆操作实现了数据的不可追踪性和隐藏的数据访问模式。此外，基于所设计的结构和指针元组，可以识别恶意用户并防止数据篡改。安全性分析表明，本文设计的协议能够满足代理重加密和ORAM的安全性要求。理论和实验分析表明，该方案对于云计算中的群组数据共享是安全有效的。
papers.title_zh: 云计算中的隐私保护和不可追踪的组数据共享方案

papers.title: A New Robust Reference Image Hashing System
papers.authors: Satendra Pal Singh, Gaurav Bhatnagar, Amit Kumar Singh
papers.abstract: The authentication and content protection of multimedia data is a challenging task in the present scenario. One solution is to generate the perceptual hash which essentially authenticates the multimedia data and can also be dealt with image database search problems. In this article, a novel system for generating an image hash is presented. The proposed system utilizes the global and local features in the hash generation process. The local features are obtained from non-linear scale-space based KAZE features. These KAZE features have the ability to capture the most stable point under several content preserving distortions. In contrast, first the input image is converted to a normalized image, it is transformed to the log-polar coordinate system, and then a reference image using the local contrast in the wavelet domain is obtained to extrcat the global features. An intermediate hash sequence is achieved by extracting the significant information from the reference image using the singular value decomposition. The final hash sequence combines both the vectors followed by the randomization process. Extensive experiments are conducted to demonstrate the feasibility and the robustness of the proposed hashing system against a wide range of intentional/unintentional distortions. Further, the comparative analysis with some state-of-the-art techniques validates the better discrimination of the proposed work.
papers.abstract_zh: 在当前情况下，多媒体数据的认证和内容保护是一项具有挑战性的任务。一种解决方案是生成本质上认证多媒体数据的感知散列，并且还可以处理图像数据库搜索问题。在这篇文章中，提出了一种新的生成图像哈希的系统。所提出的系统在散列生成过程中利用了全局和局部特征。从基于非线性尺度空间的KAZE特征中获得局部特征。这些KAZE特征具有在几种内容保留失真下捕捉最稳定点的能力。相比之下，首先将输入图像转换为归一化图像，将其变换到对数极坐标系统，然后使用小波域中的局部对比度获得参考图像，以提取全局特征。通过使用奇异值分解从参考图像中提取重要信息来实现中间散列序列。最终的散列序列结合了两个向量，然后进行随机化处理。进行了大量的实验来证明所提出的散列系统对各种有意/无意失真的可行性和鲁棒性。此外，与一些最新技术的比较分析验证了所提出的工作的更好的区分。
papers.title_zh: 一个新的强大参考图像哈希系统

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving and Collusion-Resistant Charging Coordination Schemes for Smart Grids
papers.authors: Mohamed Baza, Marbin Pazos-Revilla, Ahmed B. T. Sherif, Mahmoud Nabil, Abdulah Jeza Aljohani, Mohamed Mahmoud, Waleed Alasmary
