papers.abstract: Charging coordination is necessary for the successful integration of the Energy Storage Units (ESUs), including electric vehicles and home batteries, into the smart grid. To coordinate charging, the ESUs should send charging requests including time-to-complete-charging (TCC) and battery state-of-charge (SoC) to the charging controller (CC) for scheduling charging, but these data can reveal sensitive information on the ESUs’ owners such as their locations, when they return home and whether they are on travel. In this article, we propose centralized and decentralized privacy-preserving and collusion-resistant charging coordination schemes for ESUs. In the centralized scheme, ESUs authenticate their requests using anonymous tokens. To thwart linkability attacks where the CC uses TCC and SoC to link requests sent from the same ESU at consecutive time slots, an ESU needs to send multiple charging requests with different TCC and SoC values instead of only one request. In the decentralized scheme, charging is coordinated in a distributed way using a privacy-preserving data aggregation technique. The idea is that each ESU selects some ESUs to act as proxies, and shares a secret mask with each proxy. Then, each ESU adds a mask to its charging request and encrypts it so that by aggregating all requests, all masks are nullified and the total charging demand is known, and then it is used to compute the charging schedules. Due to using masking technique, the scheme is secure against collusion attacks. The results of extensive experiments and simulations confirm that our schemes are efficient and secure, and can preserve ESU owners’ privacy and thwart linkability attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 充电协调对于将包括电动汽车和家用电池在内的储能单元成功整合到智能电网中是必要的。为了协调充电，esu应该向充电控制器(CC)发送充电请求，包括充电完成时间(TCC)和电池充电状态(SoC ),以安排充电，但这些数据可能会泄露esu所有者的敏感信息，如他们的位置、他们何时回家以及他们是否在旅行。在这篇文章中，我们提出了集中式和分散式的隐私保护和抗共谋的计费协调方案。在集中式方案中，esu使用匿名令牌认证它们的请求。为了挫败其中CC使用TCC和SoC来链接在连续时隙从相同ESU发送的请求的可链接性攻击，ESU需要发送具有不同TCC和SoC值的多个计费请求，而不是仅仅一个请求。在分散式方案中，使用隐私保护数据聚合技术以分布式方式协调收费。其思想是每个ESU选择一些esu作为代理，并与每个代理共享一个秘密掩码。然后，每个ESU向其计费请求添加一个掩码，并对其进行加密，从而通过聚集所有请求，所有掩码都被无效，并且总计费需求是已知的，然后它被用于计算计费时间表。由于使用了掩蔽技术，该方案可以抵抗共谋攻击。大量的实验和模拟结果证实了我们的方案是高效和安全的，能够保护ESU所有者的隐私和抵御链接攻击。
papers.title_zh: 智能电网的隐私权和抗勾结充电协调方案

papers.title: SySeVR: A Framework for Using Deep Learning to Detect Software Vulnerabilities
papers.authors: Zhen Li, Deqing Zou, Shouhuai Xu, Hai Jin, Yawei Zhu, Zhaoxuan Chen
papers.abstract: The detection of software vulnerabilities (or vulnerabilities for short) is an important problem that has yet to be tackled, as manifested by the many vulnerabilities reported on a daily basis. This calls for machine learning methods for vulnerability detection. Deep learning is attractive for this purpose because it alleviates the requirement to manually define features. Despite the tremendous success of deep learning in other application domains, its applicability to vulnerability detection is not systematically understood. In order to fill this void, we propose the first systematic framework for using deep learning to detect vulnerabilities in C/C++ programs with source code. The framework, dubbed Syntax-based, Semantics-based, and Vector Representations (SySeVR), focuses on obtaining program representations that can accommodate syntax and semantic information pertinent to vulnerabilities. Our experiments with four software products demonstrate the usefulness of the framework: we detect 15 vulnerabilities that are not reported in the National Vulnerability Database. Among these 15 vulnerabilities, seven are unknown and have been reported to the vendors, and the other eight have been “silently” patched by the vendors when releasing newer versions of the pertinent software products.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件漏洞(或简称漏洞)的检测是一个尚未解决的重要问题，每天报告的许多漏洞就证明了这一点。这就需要机器学习方法来进行漏洞检测。深度学习在这方面很有吸引力，因为它减少了手动定义特征的需求。尽管深度学习在其他应用领域取得了巨大成功，但它在漏洞检测方面的适用性尚未得到系统理解。为了填补这一空白，我们提出了第一个使用深度学习来检测C/C++程序中带有源代码的漏洞的系统框架。该框架被称为基于语法、基于语义和向量表示法(SySeVR)，它专注于获取能够适应与漏洞相关的语法和语义信息的程序表示法。我们对四个软件产品的实验证明了该框架的有效性:我们检测到了15个在国家漏洞数据库中没有报告的漏洞。在这15个漏洞中，有7个是未知的，并已报告给供应商，其他8个已由供应商在发布相关软件产品的新版本时“悄悄”修补。
papers.title_zh: SYSEVR：使用深度学习检测软件漏洞的框架

papers.title: Function Representations for Binary Similarity
papers.authors: Luca Massarelli, Giuseppe Antonio Di Luna, Fabio Petroni, Leonardo Querzoni, Roberto Baldoni
papers.abstract: The binary similarity problem consists in determining if two functions are similar considering only their compiled form. Advanced techniques for binary similarity recently gained momentum as they can be applied in several fields, such as copyright disputes, malware analysis, vulnerability detection, etc. In this article we describe SAFE, a novel architecture for function representation based on a self-attentive neural network. SAFE works directly on disassembled binary functions, does not require manual feature extraction, is computationally more efficient than existing solutions, and is more general as it works on stripped binaries and on multiple architectures. Results from our experimental evaluation show how SAFE provides a performance improvement with respect to previous solutions. Furthermore, we show how SAFE can be used in widely different use cases, thus providing a general solution for several application scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 二元相似性问题在于仅考虑两个函数的编译形式来确定它们是否相似。二进制相似性的先进技术最近获得了发展势头，因为它们可以应用于几个领域，如版权纠纷、恶意软件分析、漏洞检测等。在本文中，我们描述了SAFE，这是一种基于自关注神经网络的新型函数表示体系结构。SAFE直接在反汇编的二进制函数上工作，不需要手动特征提取，在计算上比现有解决方案更高效，并且更通用，因为它在剥离的二进制和多个架构上工作。我们的实验评估结果显示了SAFE相对于以前的解决方案如何提供性能改进。此外，我们还展示了SAFE如何应用于各种不同的用例中，从而为几种应用场景提供了一个通用的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 二进制相似性的功能表示

papers.title: A Matrix Factorization Model for Hellinger-Based Trust Management in Social Internet of Things
papers.authors: Soroush Aalibagi, Hamidreza Mahyar, Ali Movaghar, Harry Eugene Stanley
papers.abstract: The Social Internet of Things (SIoT), integration of the Internet of Things, and Social Networks paradigms, has been introduced to build a network of smart nodes that are capable of establishing social links. In order to deal with misbehaving service provider nodes, service requestor nodes must evaluate their trustworthiness levels. In this article, we propose a novel trust management mechanism in the SIoT to predict the most reliable service providers for each service requestor, which leads to reduce the risk of being exposed to malicious nodes. We model the SIoT with a flexible bipartite graph (containing two sets of nodes: service providers and service requestors), then build a social network among the service requestor nodes, using the Hellinger distance. Afterward, we develop a social trust model using nodes’ centrality and similarity measures to extract trust behaviors among the social network nodes. Finally, a matrix factorization technique is designed to extract latent features of SIoT nodes, find trustworthy nodes, and mitigate the data sparsity and cold start problems. We analyze the effect of parameters in the proposed trust prediction mechanism on prediction accuracy. The results indicate that feedbacks from the neighboring nodes of a specific service requestor with high Hellinger similarity in our mechanism outperforms the best existing methods. We also show that utilizing the social trust model, which only considers a similarity measure, significantly improves the accuracy of the prediction mechanism. Furthermore, we evaluate the effectiveness of the proposed trust management system through a real-world SIoT use case. Our results demonstrate that the proposed mechanism is resilient to different types of network attacks, and it can accurately find the most proper and trustworthy service provider.
papers.abstract_zh: 社交物联网(SIoT)是物联网和社交网络范例的集成，已被引入来构建能够建立社交链接的智能节点网络。为了处理行为不当的服务提供者节点，服务请求者节点必须评估它们的可信度。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的信任管理机制，为每个服务请求者预测最可靠的服务提供者，从而降低暴露于恶意节点的风险。我们用一个灵活的二分图(包含两组节点:服务提供者和服务请求者)对SIoT建模，然后使用Hellinger距离在服务请求者节点之间建立一个社交网络。然后，我们开发了一个社会信任模型，使用节点的中心性和相似性度量来提取社会网络节点之间的信任行为。最后，利用矩阵分解技术提取SIoT节点的潜在特征，寻找可信节点，缓解数据稀疏和冷启动问题。我们分析了所提出的信任预测机制中的参数对预测精度的影响。结果表明，在我们的机制中，来自具有高Hellinger相似性的特定服务请求者的邻居节点的反馈优于现有的最好方法。我们还表明，利用仅考虑相似性度量的社会信任模型，显著提高了预测机制的准确性。此外，我们通过一个真实的SIoT用例来评估所提出的信任管理系统的有效性。实验结果表明，该机制能够抵御不同类型的网络攻击，并能准确地找到最合适、最可信的服务提供商。
papers.title_zh: 在社交互联网中，基于Hellinger的信任管理的矩阵分解模型

papers.title: DAENet: Making Strong Anonymity Scale in a Fully Decentralized Network
papers.authors: Tianxiang Shen, Jianyu Jiang, Yunpeng Jiang, Xusheng Chen, Ji Qi, Shixiong Zhao, Fengwei Zhang, Xiapu Luo, Heming Cui
papers.abstract: Traditional anonymous networks (e.g., Tor) are vulnerable to traffic analysis attacks that monitor the whole network traffic to determine which users are communicating. To preserve user anonymity against traffic analysis attacks, the emerging mix networks mess up the order of packets through a set of centralized and explicit shuffling nodes. However, this centralized design of mix networks is insecure against targeted DoS attacks that can completely block these shuffling nodes. In this article, we present DAENet, an efficient mix network that resists both targeted DoS attacks and traffic analysis attacks with a new abstraction called Stealthy Peer-to-Peer (P2P) Network. The stealthy P2P network effectively hides the shuffling nodes used in a routing path into the whole network, such that adversaries cannot distinguish specific shuffling nodes and conduct targeted DoS attacks to block these nodes. In addition, to handle traffic analysis attacks, we leverage the confidentiality and integrity protection of Intel SGX to ensure trustworthy packet shuffles at each distributed host and use multiple routing paths to prevent adversaries from tracking and revealing user identities. We show that our system is scalable with moderate latency (2.2s) when running in a cluster of 10,000 participants and is robust in the case of machine failures, making it an attractive new design for decentralized anonymous communication. DAENet ’s code is released on https://github.com/hku-systems/DAENet.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的匿名网络(例如Tor)容易受到流量分析攻击，流量分析攻击监视整个网络流量以确定哪些用户正在通信。为了保护用户的匿名性免受流量分析攻击，新兴的混合网络通过一组集中且明确的洗牌节点来打乱分组的顺序。然而，这种混合网络的集中式设计对于有针对性的DoS攻击是不安全的，这些攻击可以完全阻止这些混乱的节点。在这篇文章中，我们提出了DAENet，一种有效的混合网络，它可以抵抗有目标的DoS攻击和流量分析攻击，并提供了一种新的抽象，称为隐形对等(P2P)网络。隐形P2P网络有效地将路由路径中使用的洗牌节点隐藏到整个网络中，使得对手无法区分特定的洗牌节点并进行有针对性的DoS攻击来阻止这些节点。此外，为了应对流量分析攻击，我们利用SGX的机密性和完整性保护来确保在每个分布式主机上进行可信的数据包洗牌，并使用多条路由路径来防止对手跟踪和泄露用户身份。我们表明，当在10，000个参与者的集群中运行时，我们的系统具有中等延迟(2.2s)的可伸缩性，并且在机器故障的情况下是健壮的，这使得它成为分散匿名通信的有吸引力的新设计。DAENet的代码在https://github.com/hku-systems/DAENet.发布
papers.title_zh: 丹妮特：在完全分散的网络中制作强大的匿名量表

papers.title: An Automatic Attribute-Based Access Control Policy Extraction From Access Logs
papers.authors: Leila Karimi, Maryam Aldairi, James Joshi, Mai Abdelhakim
papers.abstract: With the rapid advances in computing and information technologies, traditional access control models have become inadequate in terms of capturing fine-grained, and expressive security requirements of newly emerging applications. An attribute-based access control (ABAC) model provides a more flexible approach to addressing the authorization needs of complex and dynamic systems. While organizations are interested in employing newer authorization models, migrating to such models pose as a significant challenge. Many large-scale businesses need to grant authorizations to their user populations that are potentially distributed across disparate and heterogeneous computing environments. Each of these computing environments may have its own access control model. The manual development of a single policy framework for an entire organization is tedious, costly, and error-prone. In this article, we present a methodology for automatically learning ABAC policy rules from access logs of a system to simplify the policy development process. The proposed approach employs an unsupervised learning-based algorithm for detecting patterns in access logs and extracting ABAC authorization rules from these patterns. In addition, we present two policy improvement algorithms, including rule pruning and policy refinement algorithms to generate a higher quality mined policy. Finally, we implement a prototype of the proposed approach to demonstrate its feasibility.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着计算和信息技术的快速发展，传统的访问控制模型已经不能满足新出现的应用程序的细粒度和表达性的安全需求。基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)模型为解决复杂和动态系统的授权需求提供了一种更加灵活的方法。虽然组织对采用更新的授权模型感兴趣，但是迁移到这种模型是一个巨大的挑战。许多大型企业需要向可能分布在不同和异构计算环境中的用户群授予授权。这些计算环境中的每一个都可以有其自己的访问控制模型。为整个组织手动开发一个单一的策略框架是乏味、昂贵且容易出错的。在本文中，我们提出了一种从系统的访问日志中自动学习ABAC策略规则的方法，以简化策略开发过程。该方法采用一种基于无监督学习的算法来检测访问日志中的模式，并从这些模式中提取ABAC授权规则。此外，我们还提出了两种策略改进算法，包括规则剪枝和策略精化算法，以生成更高质量的挖掘策略。最后，我们实现了一个原型来验证该方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 从访问日志中提取的基于自动属性的访问控制策略

papers.title: Enabling (End-to-End) Encrypted Cloud Emails With Practical Forward Secrecy
papers.authors: Jianghong Wei, Xiaofeng Chen, Jianfeng Wang, Xuexian Hu, Jianfeng Ma
papers.abstract: With the widespread use of cloud emails and frequent reports on large-scale email leakage events, a security property so-called forward secrecy becomes desirable and indispensable for both individuals and cloud email service providers to strengthen the security of cloud email systems. Specifically, forward secrecy can guarantee the confidentiality of those previously encrypted emails even if the user’s secret key gets exposed. However, due to the failure to meet the security and practicality requirements of email systems simultaneously, typical methods of achieving forward secrecy, such as Diffie-Hellman key exchange and forward-secure public-key encryption, have not been widely approved and adopted. In this article, to capture forward secrecy of encrypted cloud email systems without sacrificing the practicability, we introduce a new cryptographic primitive named forward-secure puncturable identity-based encryption (fs-PIBE), which enables an email user to perform fine-grained revocation of decryption capacity. In more detail, the user is allowed to preserve the decryption capacity of unreceived encrypted emails, while abolishing that of those received ones. Thus, it provides more practical forward secrecy than typical manners, in which the decryption capacity of received and unreceived encrypted emails is revoked simultaneously. Based on such a primitive, we build a framework of encrypted cloud email systems, and instantiate it with a concrete fs-PIBE construction that has constant size of ciphertext and provable security in the standard model. Furthermore, to improve the security and efficiency of the presented framework, we extend the proposed fs-PIBE scheme to support end-to-end encryption and outsourced decryption, respectively. In addition, as a proof-of-concept of the proposed fs-PIBE scheme, we implement it and produce various experiments to demonstrate its practicability and correctness.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云邮件的广泛使用和大规模邮件泄露事件的频繁报道，对于个人和云邮件服务提供商来说，一种被称为前向保密的安全属性成为加强云邮件系统安全性所需要和不可或缺的。具体来说，前向保密可以保证那些先前加密的电子邮件的机密性，即使用户的密钥被暴露。然而，由于不能同时满足电子邮件系统的安全性和实用性要求，实现前向保密的典型方法，如Diffie-Hellman密钥交换和前向安全公钥加密，还没有被广泛认可和采用。在这篇文章中，为了在不牺牲实用性的前提下获得加密云邮件系统的前向保密性，我们引入了一个新的密码原语，名为前向安全的可穿孔的基于身份的加密(fs-PIBE)，它使得邮件用户能够执行解密能力的细粒度撤销。更详细地说，允许用户保留未收到的加密电子邮件的解密容量，同时废除那些已收到的电子邮件的解密容量。因此，它提供了比典型方式更实用的前向保密性，在典型方式中，接收和未接收的加密电子邮件的解密能力被同时撤销。基于这样一个原语，我们构建了一个加密云邮件系统的框架，并用一个具体的fs-PIBE构造来实例化它，该构造具有恒定的密文长度和在标准模型下可证明的安全性。此外，为了提高该框架的安全性和效率，我们扩展了fs-PIBE方案，分别支持端到端加密和外包解密。此外，作为所提出的fs-PIBE方案的概念验证，我们实现了该方案，并进行了各种实验来验证其实用性和正确性。
papers.title_zh: 启用（端到端）加密的云电子邮件，并带有实用的远期保密

papers.title: A Game-Theoretical Approach for Mitigating Edge DDoS Attack
papers.authors: Qiang He, Cheng Wang, Guangming Cui, Bo Li, Rui Zhou, Qingguo Zhou, Yang Xiang, Hai Jin, Yun Yang
papers.abstract: Edge computing (EC) is an emerging paradigm that extends cloud computing by pushing computing resources onto edge servers that are attached to base stations or access points at the edge of the cloud in close proximity with end-users. Due to edge servers’ geographic distribution, the EC paradigm is challenged by many new security threats, including the notorious distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) attack. In the EC environment, edge servers usually have constrained processing capacities due to their limited sizes. Thus, they are particularly vulnerable to DDoS attacks. DDoS attacks in the EC environment render existing DDoS mitigation approaches obsolete with its new characteristics. In this article, we make the first attempt to tackle the edge DDoS mitigation (EDM) problem. We model it as a constraint optimization problem and prove its <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {NP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">NP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="he-ieq1-3055559.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-hardness. To solve this problem, we propose an optimal approach named EDMOpti and a novel game-theoretical approach named EDMGame for mitigating edge DDoS attacks. EDMGame formulates the EDM problem as a potential EDM Game that admits a Nash equilibrium and employs a decentralized algorithm to find the Nash equilibrium as the solution to the EDM problem. Through theoretical analysis and experimental evaluation, we demonstrate that our approaches can solve the EDM problem effectively and efficiently.
papers.abstract_zh: 边缘计算(EC)是一种新兴的模式，它通过将计算资源推送到边缘服务器来扩展云计算，边缘服务器连接到云边缘的基站或接入点，与最终用户非常接近。由于边缘服务器的地理分布，电子商务模式受到许多新的安全威胁的挑战，包括臭名昭著的分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击。在EC环境中，边缘服务器由于其有限的尺寸通常具有受限的处理能力。因此，它们特别容易受到DDoS攻击。电子商务环境中的DDoS攻击使现有的DDoS缓解方法因其新的特征而变得过时。在本文中，我们首次尝试解决边缘DDoS缓解(EDM)问题。我们将其建模为约束优化问题，并证明其< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathcal { NP } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " script " > NP </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " he-ie Q1-3055559 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-hardness。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种优化方法EDMOpti和一种新的博弈论方法EDMGame来减轻edge DDoS攻击。EDMGame将EDM问题公式化为一个潜在的EDM游戏，它承认一个Nash均衡，并使用一个分散的算法来寻找Nash均衡作为EDM问题的解决方案。通过理论分析和实验评估，我们证明了我们的方法可以有效地解决EDM问题。
papers.title_zh: 一种缓解边缘DDOS攻击的游戏理论方法

papers.title: Design and Evaluation of a Multi-Domain Trojan Detection Method on Deep Neural Networks
papers.authors: Yansong Gao, Yeonjae Kim, Bao Gia Doan, Zhi Zhang, Gongxuan Zhang, Surya Nepal, Damith C. Ranasinghe, Hyoungshick Kim
papers.abstract: Trojan attacks on deep neural networks (DNNs) exploit a backdoor embedded in a DNN model that can hijack any input with an attacker’s chosen signature trigger. Emerging defence mechanisms are mainly designed and validated on vision domain tasks (e.g., image classification) on 2D Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model architectures; a defence mechanism that is general across vision, text, and audio domain tasks is demanded. This work designs and evaluates a run-time Trojan detection method exploiting STRong Intentional Perturbation of inputs that is a multi-domain input-agnostic Trojan detection defence across Vision, Text and Audio domains—thus termed as STRIP-ViTA. Specifically, STRIP-ViTA is demonstratively independent of not only task domain but also model architectures. Most importantly, unlike other detection mechanisms, it requires neither machine learning expertise nor expensive computational resource, which are the reason behind DNN model outsourcing scenario—one main attack surface of Trojan attack. We have extensively evaluated the performance of STRIP-ViTA over: i) CIFAR10 and GTSRB datasets using 2D CNNs for vision tasks; ii) IMDB and consumer complaint datasets using both LSTM and 1D CNNs for text tasks; and iii) speech command dataset using both 1D CNNs and 2D CNNs for audio tasks. Experimental results based on more than 30 tested Trojaned models (including publicly Trojaned model) corroborate that STRIP-ViTA performs well across all nine architectures and five datasets. Overall, STRIP-ViTA can effectively detect trigger inputs with small false acceptance rate (FAR) with an acceptable preset false rejection rate (FRR). In particular, for vision tasks, we can always achieve a 0 percent FRR and FAR given strong attack success rate always preferred by the attacker. By setting FRR to be 3 percent, average FAR of 1.1 and 3.55 percent are achieved for text and audio tasks, respectively. Moreover, we have evaluated STRIP-ViTA against a number of advanced backdoor attacks and compare its effectiveness with other recent state-of-the-arts.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络(DNNs)上的特洛伊木马攻击利用嵌入在DNN模型中的后门，该后门可以劫持攻击者选择的签名触发器的任何输入。新兴的防御机制主要是在2D卷积神经网络(CNN)模型架构上的视觉域任务(例如，图像分类)上设计和验证的；需要一种跨视觉、文本和音频领域任务通用的防御机制。这项工作设计并评估了一种利用输入的强烈故意扰动的运行时木马检测方法，这是一种跨视觉、文本和音频域的多域输入不可知木马检测防御，因此被称为STRIP-ViTA。具体来说，STRIP-ViTA不仅独立于任务域，而且独立于模型架构。最重要的是，与其他检测机制不同，它既不需要机器学习专业知识，也不需要昂贵的计算资源，这就是DNN模型外包场景背后的原因——木马攻击的一个主要攻击面。我们广泛评估了STRIP-ViTA在以下方面的性能:I)使用2D CNN进行视觉任务的CIFAR10和GTSRB数据集；ii)使用LSTM和1D CNN进行文本任务的IMDB和消费者投诉数据集；以及iii)使用1D CNN和2D CNN用于音频任务的语音命令数据集。基于30多个测试的木马模型(包括公开的木马模型)的实验结果证实了STRIP-ViTA在所有九个架构和五个数据集上的良好性能。总的来说，STRIP-ViTA能够以小的错误接受率(FAR)和可接受的预设错误拒绝率(FRR)有效地检测触发输入。特别是，对于视觉任务，我们总是可以实现0%的FRR，并且给定攻击者总是偏好的强攻击成功率。通过将FRR设置为3%，文本和音频任务的平均FAR分别达到1.1%和3.55%。此外，我们还评估了STRIP-ViTA抵御一些高级后门攻击的能力，并将其有效性与其他最新技术进行了比较。
papers.title_zh: 深神经网络上多域特洛伊木马检测方法的设计和评估

papers.title: Optimization-Time Analysis for Cybersecurity
papers.authors: Yunxiao Zhang, Pasquale Malacaria
papers.abstract: A mathematical framework to reason about time resilience in cybersecurity is here introduced. We first consider an attacker who is able to mount several multi-stage attacks on the organization: the defender’s objective is to select an optimal portfolio of security controls, within a given budget, to withstand the highest number of attacks. The mathematical model is a Markov chain with an initial state called the safe state, intermediate states for all possible attacks (each attack state denoting a probabilistic attack graph), and a sink state denoting a successful attack. The overall defence problem is formulated as a bi-level multi-objective optimization, i.e., the defender selects an optimal portfolio of security controls to mitigate an optimal attacker. In order to determine the probability of success of an attack two cases will be considered: (a) the expected probability of success and (b) the highest probability of success. We refer to these two cases as expected-time analysis and worst-case time analysis, respectively. To solve precisely these bi-level optimizations strong duality and Mixed Integer Linear Programming are used. We then extend the framework to investigate resilience in terms of the total duration of the attacks; variations of the previous optimizations are presented to this purpose. Finally numerical evaluations are provided to compare the results obtained from the expected-time analysis and the worst-case time analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 这里介绍了一个推理网络安全中时间弹性的数学框架。我们首先考虑一个能够对组织发动多次多阶段攻击的攻击者:防御者的目标是在给定的预算内选择一个最佳的安全控制组合，以抵御最多的攻击。数学模型是一个马尔可夫链，其初始状态称为安全状态，所有可能攻击的中间状态(每个攻击状态表示一个概率攻击图)，以及表示成功攻击的接收器状态。整个防御问题被公式化为一个双层多目标优化问题，即防御方选择一个最优的安全控制组合来缓解最优的攻击者。为了确定攻击成功的概率，将考虑两种情况:(a)预期的成功概率和(b)最高的成功概率。我们将这两种情况分别称为期望时间分析和最坏情况时间分析。为了精确求解这些双层优化问题，使用了强对偶和混合整数线性规划。然后，我们扩展该框架，根据攻击的总持续时间来研究弹性；为了这个目的，给出了先前优化的变体。最后，通过数值分析比较了期望时间分析和最坏情况时间分析的结果。
papers.title_zh: 网络安全的优化时间分析

papers.title: Lessons to be Learned for a Good Design of Private RFID Schemes
papers.authors: Ferucio Laurentiu Tiplea
papers.abstract: RFID technology is increasingly used in various areas of society, where privacy plays a critical role. Due to this aspect, a sustained effort has been devoted in recent years to develop privacy models for RFID systems. Two widely accepted such models are Vaudenay’s model and the HPVP model. An incursion into the broad diversity of the RFID schemes developed so far shows that many of them do not assure privacy in any of the two models. That is either due to design errors or because their authors did not run any privacy analysis or have used weaker ad hoc privacy models. This article presents five design scenarios underlying constructions of RFID schemes that cannot provide certain levels of privacy in any of the two models. Each scenario is richly exemplified by RFID schemes proposed in the literature, and it is concluded by a lesson to guide us to a better design of such schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: RFID技术越来越多地应用于社会的各个领域，在这些领域中，隐私起着至关重要的作用。由于这一方面，近年来一直致力于开发RFID系统的隐私模型。两个被广泛接受的模型是沃德奈模型和HPVP模型。对迄今为止开发的各种RFID方案的深入研究表明，在这两种模型中，许多方案都不能保证隐私。这要么是由于设计错误，要么是因为作者没有进行任何隐私分析，或者使用了较弱的特别隐私模型。本文介绍了RFID方案的五种设计方案，这些方案在这两种模型中都不能提供一定程度的隐私。文献中提出的RFID方案丰富地举例说明了每种情况，并以一个教训来总结，以指导我们更好地设计这种方案。
papers.title_zh: 要学习的课程，以构成私人RFID计划的良好设计

papers.title: Security and Effectiveness Analysis of the Gateway Integrity Checking Protocol
papers.authors: Mateus Martínez De Lucena, Antônio Augusto Fröhlich
papers.abstract: Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) gateways connected to the Internet are often based on conventional operating systems such as Linux and on conventional communication protocols such as HTTPS and therefore are valuable targets for malicious attackers. When compromised, a malicious IIoT gateway can interfere with data exchanged between IIoT devices and systems running on servers or the Cloud. The Gateway Integrity Checking Protocol (GIP), proposed in previous work, defines a gossip mechanism to collect data from sets of IIoT devices to respond to security challenges issued by an External Security Agent (ESA) to assess a gateways trustworthiness. GIP relies on a secure channel between IIoT devices and the ESA, which is achieved using a Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) for message authentication and encryption. In this paper we perform an analysis of the security measures employed by GIP, using formal descriptions to demonstrate that GIP is no less secure than the hash algorithm and the public key infrastructure used. Additionally, we simulate different configurations of GIP to measure detection rate and time to detect integrity faults.
papers.abstract_zh: 连接到互联网的工业物联网(IIoT)网关通常基于传统的操作系统(如Linux)和传统的通信协议(如HTTPS ),因此是恶意攻击者的重要目标。当受到危害时，恶意IIoT网关可以干扰IIoT设备和运行在服务器或云上的系统之间的数据交换。在以前的工作中提出的网关完整性检查协议(GIP)定义了一种八卦机制，用于从IIoT设备集合中收集数据，以响应外部安全代理(es a)发出的安全挑战，从而评估网关的可信度。GIP依赖于IIoT设备和ESA之间的安全通道，这是通过使用公钥基础设施(PKI)进行消息认证和加密来实现的。在本文中，我们对GIP所采用的安全措施进行了分析，使用形式化的描述来证明GIP的安全性不亚于所使用的散列算法和公钥基础设施。此外，我们模拟GIP的不同配置来测量检测率和检测完整性故障的时间。
papers.title_zh: 网关完整性检查协议的安全性和有效性分析

papers.title: DDCA: A Distortion Drift-Based Cost Assignment Method for Adaptive Video Steganography in the Transform Domain
papers.authors: Yi Chen, Hongxia Wang, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Peisong He, Zoran Salcic, Dali Kaafar, Xuyun Zhang
papers.abstract: Cost assignment plays a key role in coding performance and security of video steganography. Existing cost assignment methods (for adaptive video steganography) are designed for specific transform coefficients rather than all transform coefficients. In addition, existing video steganographic frameworks do not allow Syndrome-Trellis Codes (STCs) to modify all transform coefficients in both intra-coded and inter-coded frames at the same time. To address these limitations, in this article, we first propose a novel video steganographic framework. Then, we give a theoretical analysis of distortion drift in both intra- and inter-coding procedures. Based on the analysis, we design a Distortion Drift-Based Cost Assignment method, hereafter referred to as DDCA. DDCA considers the inner-block, inter-block and inter-frame distortion costs in order to improve the coding performance and the security of stego videos when the embedding payload is fixed. We conducted extensive experiments using two video datasets to evaluate the proposed video steganographic framework and DDCA, in terms of the coding performance and the security. Our experiments show that the proposed framework outperforms three recent state-of-the-art methods, for example the coding performance and the security of stego videos can benefit from DDCA by making full use of all nonzero transform coefficients.
papers.abstract_zh: 成本分配对视频隐写术的编码性能和安全性起着关键作用。现有的成本分配方法(用于自适应视频隐写术)是为特定的变换系数而不是所有的变换系数设计的。此外，现有的视频隐写框架不允许校正子网格码(STC)同时修改帧内编码和帧间编码帧中的所有变换系数。为了解决这些局限性，在本文中，我们首先提出了一种新的视频隐写框架。然后，我们给出了帧内和帧间编码过程中失真漂移的理论分析。基于该分析，我们设计了一种基于失真漂移的成本分配方法，以下简称为DDCA。DDCA综合考虑了块内、块间和帧间失真代价，在嵌入载荷固定的情况下，提高了隐写视频的编码性能和安全性。我们使用两个视频数据集进行了大量的实验，以评估所提出的视频隐写框架和DDCA在编码性能和安全性方面的性能。我们的实验表明，所提出的框架优于三种最新的方法，例如，通过充分利用所有非零变换系数，隐写视频的编码性能和安全性可以受益于DDCA。
papers.title_zh: DDCA：一种基于失真漂移的成本分配方法，用于转换域中的自适应视频隐身

papers.title: Breaking Cuckoo Hash: Black Box Attacks
papers.authors: Pedro Reviriego, Daniel Ting
papers.abstract: Introduced less than twenty years ago, cuckoo hashing has a number of attractive features like a constant worst case number of memory accesses for queries and close to full memory utilization. Cuckoo hashing has been widely adopted to perform exact matching of an incoming key with a set of stored (key, value) pairs in both software and hardware implementations. This widespread adoption makes it important to consider the security of cuckoo hashing. Most hash based data structures can be attacked by generating collisions that reduce their performance. In fact, for cuckoo hashing collisions could lead to insertion failures which in some systems would lead to a system failure. For example, if cuckoo hashing is used to perform Ethernet lookup and a given MAC address cannot be added to the cuckoo hash, the switch would not be able to correctly forward frames to that address. Previous works have shown that this can be done when the attacker knows the hash functions used in the implementation. However, in many cases the attacker would not have that information and would only have access to the cuckoo hash operations to perform insertions, removals or queries. This article considers the security of a cuckoo hash to an attacker that has only a black box access to it. The analysis shows that by carefully performing user operations on the cuckoo hash, the attacker can force insertion failures with a small set of elements. The proposed attack has been implemented and tested for different configurations to demonstrate its feasibility. The fact that cuckoo hash can be broken with only access to its user functions should be taken into account when implementing it in critical systems. The article also discusses potential approaches to mitigate this vulnerability.
papers.abstract_zh: 不到20年前推出的cuckoo散列有许多吸引人的特性，比如查询的内存访问次数不变的最坏情况，以及接近完全的内存利用率。在软件和硬件实现中，广泛采用Cuckoo散列来执行传入键与一组存储的(键，值)对的精确匹配。这种广泛采用使得考虑cuckoo散列的安全性变得很重要。大多数基于散列的数据结构都可以通过产生降低其性能的冲突而受到攻击。事实上，对于cuckoo哈希算法，冲突会导致插入失败，这在某些系统中会导致系统故障。例如，如果使用cuckoo散列来执行以太网查找，而给定的MAC地址不能添加到cuckoo散列中，则交换机将不能正确地将帧转发到该地址。以前的工作表明，当攻击者知道实现中使用的散列函数时，这是可以做到的。然而，在许多情况下，攻击者并没有这些信息，而只能访问cuckoo散列操作来执行插入、删除或查询。本文考虑了对于只有黑盒访问权限的攻击者来说，cuckoo hash的安全性。分析表明，通过仔细地对cuckoo散列执行用户操作，攻击者可以用一小组元素强制插入失败。所提出的攻击已经被实现并针对不同的配置进行了测试，以证明其可行性。在关键系统中实现cuckoo hash时，应该考虑到只有访问它的用户函数才能破解它的事实。本文还讨论了减少这种漏洞的潜在方法。
papers.title_zh: 打破杜鹃哈希：黑匣子攻击

papers.title: Generating Fake Documents Using Probabilistic Logic Graphs
papers.authors: Qian Han, Cristian Molinaro, Antonio Picariello, Giancarlo Sperlì, V. S. Subrahmanian, Yanhai Xiong
papers.abstract: Past research has shown that over 8 months may elapse between the time when a network is compromised and the time the attack is discovered. During this long gap, attackers can steal valuable intellectual property from the victim. The recent FORGE system [8] has suggested that automatically generating fake—but believable—versions of documents can delay the attacker, cost him money, and increase his uncertainty. However, in order to generate fakes, FORGE only modifies the textual component of the document in question. But in the real world, documents consist of many non-textual components such as charts, equations, formulas, diagrams, and tables. We propose the concept of a Probabilistic Logic Graph (PLG) and show that PLGs provide a single, unified framework within which the different parts of a document can be expressed. We then define the problem of generating, for a given PLG representation of a document, a set of fake yet highly believable PLGs (i.e., documents), so that an attacker looking at them (both the original and the fake ones) cannot easily identify the original document. We show that the problem of generating fake PLGs is intractable—but we propose an approximation algorithm that solves it efficiently. We evaluate the use of PLGs over a corpus of patents and show that our fakes can effectively deceive an adversary.
papers.abstract_zh: 过去的研究表明，从网络遭到破坏到攻击被发现，可能需要8个多月的时间。在这段漫长的时间里，攻击者可以从受害者那里窃取有价值的知识产权。最近的伪造系统[8]表明，自动生成伪造的(但可信的)文档版本可以延迟攻击者，让他付出金钱，并增加他的不确定性。然而，为了生成伪造品，FORGE只修改有问题的文档的文本部分。但是在现实世界中，文档由许多非文本组件组成，例如图表、等式、公式、图表和表格。我们提出了概率逻辑图(PLG)的概念，并证明了概率逻辑图提供了一个单一的、统一的框架，在这个框架中可以表达文档的不同部分。然后，我们定义了为文档的给定PLG表示生成一组伪造但高度可信的PLG(即，文档)的问题，使得查看它们(原始和伪造的)的攻击者不能容易地识别原始文档。我们证明了生成伪PLG的问题是棘手的——但是我们提出了一个近似算法来有效地解决它。我们评估了专利语料库中PLG的使用，并表明我们的假货可以有效地欺骗对手。
papers.title_zh: 使用概率逻辑图生成伪造的文档

papers.title: Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Fair Exchange Scheme for V2G Based on Blockchain
papers.authors: Zhiguo Wan, Tong Zhang, Weizhuang Liu, Mingqiang Wang, Liehuang Zhu
papers.abstract: With the fast development of the electric vehicle (EV) technology, EVs are expected to be the mainstream in future. The large number of EVs facilitate development of the emerging vehicle-to-grid (V2G) technology, which realizes two-way electricity flows between EVs and the power grid. How to achieve fairness and privacy for EVs during electricity/service exchanges remains a challenging problem for V2G. In this article, we propose a privacy-preserving fair exchange scheme V2GEx for V2G based on the blockchain. V2GEx is composed of an extended blockchain that supports zero-knowledge funds, a fair exchange smart contract based on the hashchain micropayment mechanism, and a privacy-preserving protocol for V2G. We further propose a simpler and more efficient scheme called Uni-V2GEx, which preserves privacy for only one party. We also provide a rigorous security proof under the universal composability (UC) model to prove V2GEx's security. To evaluate its efficiency, we implement V2GEx and conduct comprehensive experiments to test its performance in terms of computation cost and processing delay. The experiment results show that V2GEx is highly efficient in that verification of V2GEx transactions costs only 20 ms and the average transaction processing latency is around 6 seconds in a 200-node blockchain network.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着电动汽车技术的快速发展，电动汽车有望成为未来的主流。大量的电动汽车促进了新兴的车辆到电网(V2G)技术的发展，该技术实现了电动汽车和电网之间的双向电流流动。如何在电力/服务交换期间实现电动汽车的公平和隐私仍然是V2G面临的一个挑战性问题。在本文中，我们提出了一个基于区块链的保护隐私的V2G公平交换方案V2GEx。V2GEx由支持零知识基金的扩展区块链、基于hashchain微支付机制的公平交换智能合约和V2G的隐私保护协议组成。我们进一步提出了一个更简单、更有效的方案，称为Uni-V2GEx，它只保护一方的隐私。我们还在通用可组合性(UC)模型下提供了一个严格的安全性证明来证明V2GEx的安全性。为了评估它的效率，我们实现了V2GEx并进行综合实验来测试它在计算成本和处理延迟方面的性能。实验结果表明，V2GEx是高效的，在200节点的区块链网络中，验证V2GEx事务的时间仅为20 ms，平均事务处理延迟约为6秒。
papers.title_zh: 基于区块链的V2G分散的隐私公平交换计划

papers.title: PUF-RAKE: A PUF-Based Robust and Lightweight Authentication and Key Establishment Protocol
papers.authors: Mahmood Azhar Qureshi, Arslan Munir
papers.abstract: Physically unclonable functions (PUFs) bind a device's identity to its physical hardware and thus, can be employed for device identification, authentication and cryptographic key generation. However, PUFs are susceptible to modeling attacks if a number of PUFs’ challenge-response pairs (CRPs) are exposed to the adversary. Furthermore, many of the embedded devices requiring authentication and inter-device communication in a real-time environment/system have stringent resource and low latency requirements, and thus require a lightweight authentication and key establishment mechanism to quickly realize an authenticated and secure connection. We propose PUF-RAKE, a PUF-based lightweight, highly reliable authentication and key establishment scheme. The proposed scheme enhances the reliability of PUF as well as alleviates the resource constraints by employing error correction in the server instead of the device as well as removing cryptographic hashing required by earlier PUF-based protocols. The proposed PUF-RAKE is robust against masquerade, brute force, replay, and modeling attacks. In PUF-RAKE, we introduce an inexpensive yet secure stream authentication scheme inside the device which authenticates the server before the underlying PUF can be invoked. This prevents an adversary from brute forcing the device's PUF to acquire CRPs essentially locking out the device from unauthorized model generation. Additionally, we also introduce a lightweight CRP obfuscation mechanism involving XOR and shuffle operations. The security of PUF-RAKE has been formally verified. A prototype of the protocol has been implemented on two Xilinx Zynq 7000 system-on-chips with one present on Xilinx zc706 evaluation board and the other present on the Avnet Zedboard. Observations, security analysis and results verify that the PUF-RAKE is secure against a probabilistic polynomial time adversary under both the unauthenticated link and authenticated link adversarial models while providing ∼99% reliable authentication. In addition, PUF-RAKE provides a reduction of 60 and 72 percent for look-up tables (LUTs) and register count, respectively, in the programmable logic (PL) part of the Zynq 7000 as compared to a recently proposed approach while providing additional advantages.
papers.abstract_zh: 物理不可克隆功能(puf)将设备的身份绑定到其物理硬件，因此可用于设备识别、认证和密钥生成。然而，如果许多puf的挑战-响应对(CRP)暴露给对手，puf容易受到模拟攻击。此外，在实时环境/系统中需要认证和设备间通信的许多嵌入式设备具有严格的资源和低延迟要求，因此需要轻量级认证和密钥建立机制来快速实现认证和安全的连接。我们提出了PUF-雷克，一个基于PUF的轻量级，高度可靠的认证和密钥建立方案。所提出的方案增强了PUF的可靠性，并且通过在服务器中而不是在设备中采用纠错以及去除早期基于PUF的协议所需的加密散列来减轻资源限制。提出的PUF-瑞克算法对伪装、暴力破解、重放和建模攻击具有很强的鲁棒性。在PUF-雷克中，我们在设备内部引入了一种廉价而安全的流认证方案，该方案在底层PUF被调用之前对服务器进行认证。这防止了对手粗暴地强迫设备的PUF获取CRP，实质上阻止了设备的未授权模型生成。此外，我们还介绍了一个轻量级的CRP混淆机制，涉及异或和洗牌操作。PUF-雷克的安全性已被正式验证。该协议的原型已经在两个Xilinx Zynq 7000片上系统上实现，一个在Xilinx zc706评估板上，另一个在Avnet Zedboard上。观察、安全性分析和结果表明，PUF-瑞克方案在未认证链路和认证链路对抗模型下都是安全的，同时提供99%的可靠认证。此外，与最近提出的方法相比，PUF-雷克在Zynq 7000的可编程逻辑(PL)部分分别减少了60%和72%的查找表(lut)和寄存器数量，同时提供了额外的优势。
papers.title_zh: PUF-Rake：基于PUF的强大且轻巧的身份验证和关键建立协议

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Distributed Data Access Control for CloudIoT
papers.authors: Hassan Nasiraee, Maede Ashouri-Talouki
papers.abstract: The Edge-Fog-Cloud interplay in the Internet-of-Things (IoT) leads to many exciting data-sharing applications that use access control systems as primary requirements. To ensure a fine-grained data access control for such data-sharings on untrusted storage (e.g., Cloud), Attribute-Based Encryption (ABE) is a promising tool. To address privacy concerns in such ABE-based access control systems, we propose a new Privacy-preserving Distributed data Access control (PDAC) in CloudIoT. Our PDAC improves the previous privacy-preserving distributed ABE systems in three aspects. The first introduces a new user's anonymity approach against the colluding untrusted (honest-but-curious) authorities. The second presents a novel policy-hiding mechanism that efficiently preserves the privacy of policy-forming attributes (metadata) against colluding parties. The third introduces an independent-authorities system for our privacy-preserving improvements, where an authority can join and leave the system without reinitializing other authorities. Moreover, our PDAC offloads the user's computations over the Cloud servers for efficiency enhancement. We prove the security of our PDAC through formal analysis. Then, we present empirical results on different classes of mobile devices, including a laptop and a smartphone.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网中边缘-雾-云的相互作用导致了许多令人兴奋的数据共享应用，这些应用将访问控制系统作为主要要求。为了确保对不可信存储(例如云)上的这种数据共享进行细粒度的数据访问控制，基于属性的加密(ABE)是一种有前途的工具。为了解决这种基于ABE的访问控制系统中的隐私问题，我们在CloudIoT中提出了一种新的隐私保护分布式数据访问控制(PDAC)。我们的PDAC在三个方面改进了以前的隐私保护分布式ABE系统。第一个引入了一种新的用户匿名方法来对抗串通的不可信(诚实但好奇)机构。第二个提出了一种新颖的策略隐藏机制，该机制有效地保护策略形成属性(元数据)的隐私，防止共谋方。第三个为我们的隐私保护改进引入了一个独立机构系统，其中一个机构可以加入和离开该系统，而无需重新初始化其他机构。此外，我们的PDAC将用户的计算卸载到云服务器上以提高效率。我们通过形式化分析证明了我们的PDAC的安全性。然后，我们展示了不同类别的移动设备的实证结果，包括笔记本电脑和智能手机。
papers.title_zh: 保护Cloudiot的隐私保护分布式数据访问控制

papers.title: Session Invariant EEG Signatures using Elicitation Protocol Fusion and Convolutional Neural Network
papers.authors: Essam Soliman Debie, Nour Moustafa, Athanasios V. Vasilakos
papers.abstract: Brain signals are potential biometric markers in user authentication, complementing existing biometric authentication techniques (such as those based on fingerprint, iris and facial recognition). This article proposes a novel EEG fusion method to examine the reliability and durability of EEG biometric markers across recording sessions. Our hypothesis is that models trained using EEG signals collected during various elicitation protocols can capture generalised brain patterns that pertain personalised information which can improve the durability of biometric systems. Different protocols are likely to produce different responses across brain regions, which can result in more identifiable responses from EEG. In our approach, an end-to-end convolutional neural network (CNN) model is adopted for feature extraction and classification of raw EEG data. The proposed method is evaluated on two EEG datasets which were collected over two separate sessions on different days using multiple different EEG elicitation protocols. Within-session and across-session experiments were conducted. Results for within session experiments showed that CNN models with protocol fusion can achieve similar if not better results than models trained with single protocol. In across-session scenarios, models trained with the proposed protocol fusion approach significantly outperformed single protocol based models. The obtained results illustrate the durability and reliability capabilities of the proposed fusion approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 大脑信号是用户认证中潜在的生物特征标记，补充了现有的生物特征认证技术(如基于指纹、虹膜和面部识别的技术)。本文提出了一种新的脑电融合方法，以检查记录会话中脑电生物标记的可靠性和耐久性。我们的假设是，使用在各种诱导协议期间收集的EEG信号训练的模型可以捕捉与个性化信息相关的一般化大脑模式，这可以提高生物识别系统的耐用性。不同的协议可能会在不同的大脑区域产生不同的反应，这可以从EEG中产生更多可识别的反应。在我们的方法中，端到端卷积神经网络(CNN)模型被用于原始EEG数据的特征提取和分类。所提出的方法在两个EEG数据集上进行评估，这两个EEG数据集是使用多个不同的EEG诱发协议在不同的日子在两个单独的会话中收集的。进行了会话内和跨会话实验。会话内实验的结果表明，与用单一协议训练的模型相比，具有协议融合的CNN模型可以实现类似的(如果不是更好的话)结果。在跨会话场景中，用提出的协议融合方法训练的模型明显优于基于单个协议的模型。所获得的结果说明了所提出的融合方法的耐久性和可靠性。
papers.title_zh: 会话不变的EEG签名使用启发方案融合和卷积神经网络

papers.title: Efficient and Privacy-Preserving Similarity Range Query Over Encrypted Time Series Data
papers.authors: Yandong Zheng, Rongxing Lu, Yunguo Guan, Jun Shao, Hui Zhu
papers.abstract: Similarity query over time series data plays a significant role in various applications, such as signal processing, speech recognition, and disease diagnosis. Meanwhile, driven by the reliable and flexible cloud services, encrypted time series data are often outsourced to the cloud, and as a result, the similarity query over encrypted time series data has recently attracted considerable attention. Nevertheless, existing solutions still have issues in supporting similarity queries over time series data with different lengths, query accuracy and query efficiency. To address these issues, in this article, we propose a new efficient and privacy-preserving similarity range query scheme, where the time warp edit distance (TWED) is used as the similarity metric. Specifically, we first organize time series data into a <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="lu-ieq1-3061611.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>d-tree by leveraging TWED’s triangle inequality, and design an efficient similarity range query algorithm for the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="lu-ieq2-3061611.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>d-tree. Second, based on a symmetric homomorphic encryption technique, we carefully devise a suite of privacy-preserving protocols to provide a security guarantee for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="lu-ieq3-3061611.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>d-tree based similarity range queries. After that, by using the similarity range query algorithm and these protocols, we propose our privacy-preserving similarity range query scheme, in which we elaborate on two strategies to make our scheme resist against the cloud inference attack. Finally, we analyze the security of our scheme and conduct extensive experiments to evaluate its performance, and the results indicate that our proposed scheme is indeed privacy-preserving and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 时间序列数据的相似性查询在信号处理、语音识别和疾病诊断等领域有着重要的应用。同时，在可靠、灵活的云服务的推动下，加密时间序列数据往往被外包到云中，因此，加密时间序列数据的相似性查询近年来引起了广泛关注。然而，现有的解决方案在支持不同长度的时间序列数据的相似性查询、查询精度和查询效率方面仍然存在问题。为了解决这些问题，本文提出了一种新的高效且隐私保护的相似性范围查询方案，其中时间扭曲编辑距离(TWED)被用作相似性度量。具体来说，我们首先通过利用TWED的三角形不等式将时间序列数据组织到一个d树中，并设计了一个高效的相似性范围查询算法其次，基于对称同态加密技术，我们精心设计了一套隐私保护协议，为基于d树的相似性范围提供安全保证然后，利用相似性范围查询算法和这些协议，我们提出了隐私保护的相似性范围查询方案，其中我们详细阐述了两种策略来使我们的方案抵抗云推理攻击。最后，我们分析了我们的方案的安全性，并进行大量的实验来评估它的性能，结果表明我们提出的方案确实是隐私保护和高效的。
papers.title_zh: 加密时间序列数据有效和保留隐私相似性范围查询

papers.title: ProSAS: Proactive Security Auditing System for Clouds
papers.authors: Suryadipta Majumdar, Gagandeep Singh Chawla, Amir Alimohammadifar, Taous Madi, Yosr Jarraya, Makan Pourzandi, Lingyu Wang, Mourad Debbabi
papers.abstract: The multi-tenancy in a cloud along with its dynamic and self-service nature could cause severe security concerns, such as isolation breaches among cloud tenants. To mitigate such concerns and ensure the accountability and transparency of the cloud providers towards their tenants, verifying cloud states against a list of security policies, a.k.a. security auditing, is a promising solution. However, the existing security auditing solutions for clouds suffer from several limitations. First, the traditional auditing approach, which is retroactive in nature, can only detect violations after the fact and hence, often becomes ineffective while dealing with the dynamic nature of a cloud. Second, the existing runtime approaches can cause significant delay in the response time while dealing with the sheer size of a cloud. Finally, the current proactive approaches typically rely on prior knowledge about future changes in a cloud and also require significant manual efforts, and thus become less practical for a dynamic environment like cloud. To address those limitations, we present a novel proactive security auditing system, namely, ProSAS, which can prevent violations to security policies at runtime with a practical response time, and yet does not require prior knowledge about future changes. More specifically, ProSAS first establishes its models (e.g., dependency relationships between cloud events, and critical events) through learning from historical data (e.g., logs); it then predicts future critical events which would likely follow a received event by leveraging the dependency relationships; afterwards, it proactively verifies the impacts of those future events, and prevents those events which can cause violations of security policies. ProSAS is integrated into OpenStack, a popular cloud management platform, and we provide a concrete guideline to port ProSAS to other popular cloud platforms, such as Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon EC2. Our experiment results using both real and synthetic data demonstrate the improvement of efficiency (i.e., reducing response time to 1,450 nanoseconds at best and 8.5 milliseconds on average for a large-scale cloud with 10,000 tenants) and level of automation (i.e., learning more than 20 new critical events spanning 100 days) in proactive security auditing by ProSAS.
papers.abstract_zh: 云中的多租户及其动态和自助服务性质可能会导致严重的安全问题，例如云租户之间的隔离破坏。为了减轻这种担忧并确保云提供商对其租户的责任和透明度，根据一系列安全策略(也称为安全审计)来验证云状态是一个有前途的解决方案。然而，现有的云安全审计解决方案受到一些限制。首先，传统的审计方法本质上是追溯性的，只能在事后检测违规行为，因此在处理云的动态特性时通常会变得无效。其次，在处理庞大的云时，现有的运行时方法会导致响应时间的显著延迟。最后，当前的主动方法通常依赖于关于云中未来变化的先验知识，并且还需要大量的手动工作，因此对于像云这样的动态环境变得不太实用。为了解决这些限制，我们提出了一种新的主动安全审计系统，即ProSAS，它可以在运行时以实际的响应时间防止违反安全策略，而且不需要预先知道未来的变化。更具体地，ProSAS首先通过从历史数据(例如，日志)中学习来建立其模型(例如，云事件和关键事件之间的依赖关系)；然后，它通过利用依赖关系来预测在接收到的事件之后可能发生的未来关键事件；之后，它会主动验证这些未来事件的影响，并阻止那些可能导致违反安全策略的事件。ProSAS被集成到OpenStack中，open stack是一个流行的云管理平台，我们提供了一个具体的指南来将ProSAS移植到其他流行的云平台，如Google云平台和Amazon EC2。我们使用真实数据和合成数据的实验结果表明，ProSAS在主动安全审计方面提高了效率(即，对于拥有10，000个租户的大规模云，响应时间最多可减少到1，450纳秒，平均减少到8.5毫秒)和自动化水平(即，在100天内了解20多个新的关键事件)。
papers.title_zh: PROSA：云的主动安全审核系统

papers.title: Security of Multi-Adjustable Join Schemes: Separations and Implications
papers.authors: Mojtaba Rafiee, Shahram Khazaei
papers.abstract: Database management systems (DBMS) are one of cloud services with major applications in industry and business. In the use of such services, since the cloud service provider cannot be entrusted with the plain data, the databases are typically encrypted prior to outsourcing. One of the most challenging issues in designing these services is supporting SQL join queries on the encrypted database. The multi-adjustable join scheme (M-Adjoin) [Khazaei-Rafiee 2020], an extension of Adjoin [Popa-Zeldovich 2012 and Mironov-Segev-Shahaf 2017], is a symmetric-key primitive that supports the join queries for a list of column labels on an encrypted database. In previous works, the following security notions were introduced for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\text{Adjoin}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mtext>Adjoin</mml:mtext></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq1-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\text{M-Adjoin}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mtext>M-Adjoin</mml:mtext></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq2-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> schemes: <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathtt {3Partition}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn mathvariant="monospace">3</mml:mn><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">Partition</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq3-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathtt {M3Partition}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">M</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="monospace">3</mml:mn><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">Partition</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq4-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathtt {M3P}_{k}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">M</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="monospace">3</mml:mn><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="monospace">P</mml:mi><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq5-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, for every integer <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq6-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. In this article, we first extend the simulation-based and indistinguishability-based security notions for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\text{Adjoin}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mtext>Adjoin</mml:mtext></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq7-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, defined by Mironov <italic>et al.</italic>, to <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\text{M-Adjoin}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mtext>M-Adjoin</mml:mtext></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq8-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Then, we study the relations between all these security notions for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\text{M-Adjoin}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mtext>M-Adjoin</mml:mtext></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="rafiee-ieq9-3062806.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. In particular, some non-trivial relations are proved which resolve some open problems raised by Mironov <italic>et al.</italic>
papers.abstract_zh: 数据库管理系统(DBMS)是在工业和商业中具有主要应用的云服务之一。在使用此类服务时，由于云服务提供商无法获得明文数据，因此在外包之前通常会对数据库进行加密。设计这些服务最具挑战性的问题之一是支持加密数据库上的SQL连接查询。多可调连接方案(M-Adjoin) [Khazaei-Rafiee 2020]，是Adjoin[波帕-泽尔多维奇2012和米罗诺夫-塞格夫-沙哈夫2017]的扩展，是一个对称密钥原语，支持加密数据库上列标签列表的连接查询。在以前的作品中，为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ text { Adjoin } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mtext > Adjoin </MML:mtext > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " rafi ee-ie Q1-3062806 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX引入了以下安全概念在本文中，我们首先扩展由miro定义的< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ text { Adjoin } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mtext > Adjoin </MML:mtext > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " rafi ee-ieq 7-3062806 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的基于模拟和基于不可区分性的安全概念然后，我们研究< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ text { M-Adjoin } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mtext > M-Adjoin </MML:mtext > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " rafi ee-ieq 9-3062806 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的所有这些安全概念之间的关系。特别地，证明了一些非平凡关系，解决了Mironov等人提出的一些公开问题
papers.title_zh: 多调节性加入方案的安全：分离和含义

papers.title: Making Convolutions Resilient Via Algorithm-Based Error Detection Techniques
papers.authors: Siva Kumar Sastry Hari, Michael B. Sullivan, Timothy Tsai, Stephen W. Keckler
papers.abstract: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) are being increasingly used in safety-critical and high-performance computing systems. As such systems require high levels of resilience to errors, CNNs must execute correctly in the presence of hardware faults. Full duplication provides the needed assurance but incurs a prohibitive 100 percent overhead. In this article, we focus on algorithmically verifying convolutions, the most resource-demanding operations in CNNs. We use checksums to verify convolutions. We identify the feasibility and performance related challenges that arise in algorithmically detecting errors in convolutions in optimized CNN inference deployment platforms (e.g., TensorFlow or TensorRT on GPUs) that fuse multiple network layers and use reduced-precision operations, and demonstrate how to overcome them. We propose and evaluate variations of the algorithm-based error detection (ABED) techniques that offer implementation complexity, runtime overhead, and coverage trade-offs. Results show that ABED can detect all transient hardware errors that might otherwise corrupt output with low runtime overheads (6-23 percent). Only about 1.4 percent of the total computations in a CNN are not protected by ABED, which can be duplicated for full CNN protection. ABED for the compute-intensive convolutions and duplicating the rest can offer at least 1.6× throughput compared to full duplication.
papers.abstract_zh: 卷积神经网络(CNN)越来越多地用于安全关键和高性能计算系统。由于这样的系统需要高水平的错误恢复能力，CNN必须在硬件故障的情况下正确执行。完全复制提供了所需的保证，但会产生令人望而却步的100%开销。在本文中，我们将重点放在算法上验证卷积，这是CNN中最需要资源的操作。我们使用校验和来验证卷积。我们确定了在优化的CNN推理部署平台(如GPU上的TensorFlow或TensorRT)中从算法上检测卷积中的错误时出现的可行性和性能相关的挑战，这些平台融合了多个网络层并使用精度降低的操作，并演示了如何克服这些挑战。我们提出并评估了基于算法的错误检测(ABED)技术的变体，这些变体提供了实现复杂性、运行时开销和覆盖折衷。结果表明，ABED可以检测到所有瞬时硬件错误，否则这些错误可能会以较低的运行时开销(6-23%)破坏输出。CNN中只有大约1.4%的总计算不受ABED保护，这可以被复制以获得完整的CNN保护。与完全复制相比，计算密集型卷积的ABED和复制其余部分至少可以提供1.6倍的吞吐量。
papers.title_zh: 通过基于算法的错误检测技术使卷积弹性

papers.title: SaVioR: Thwarting Stack-Based Memory Safety Violations by Randomizing Stack Layout
papers.authors: Seongman Lee, Hyeonwoo Kang, Jinsoo Jang, Brent ByungHoon Kang
papers.abstract: Stack-based memory corruption vulnerabilities have been exploited, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code and read/write arbitrary memory. Although several solutions have been proposed to prevent memory errors on the stack, they are either limited to a specific type of attack (either spatial or temporal attacks) or cause significant performance degradation. In this article, we introduce SaVioR, an efficient and comprehensive stack protection mechanism. The key technique involves randomization of the stack layout to reduce its predictability and exploitability. SaVioR isolates an individual object from spatially and temporally adjacent vulnerable objects and randomizes each object's location, which prevents attackers from predicting the stack layout and thus reduces the likelihood of memory errors being exploited. We implemented SaVioR based on the LLVM compiler framework and applied it to the SPEC CPU2006 benchmarks and real-world applications. Our security evaluation showed that SaVioR provides a high degree of randomness in the stack layout and thus reduces the likelihood of successful exploitation of spatial and temporal memory errors on the stack. Our performance evaluation also demonstrated that it incurs a modest performance overhead (14 percent) with the SPEC CPU2006 benchmark suite, which improves performance compared to the state-of-the-art stack protection while achieving a comparable security level.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于堆栈的内存损坏漏洞已被利用，使得攻击者能够执行任意代码和读/写任意内存。尽管已经提出了几种解决方案来防止栈上的存储器错误，但是它们要么局限于特定类型的攻击(空间攻击或时间攻击)，要么导致显著的性能下降。在本文中，我们介绍了SaVioR，这是一种高效而全面的堆栈保护机制。关键技术包括堆栈布局的随机化，以降低其可预测性和可利用性。SaVioR将单个对象与空间和时间上相邻的易受攻击的对象隔离开来，并随机确定每个对象的位置，这可以防止攻击者预测堆栈布局，从而降低内存错误被利用的可能性。我们基于LLVM编译器框架实现了SaVioR，并将其应用于SPEC CPU2006基准测试和实际应用中。我们的安全评估显示，SaVioR在堆栈布局中提供了高度的随机性，从而降低了成功利用堆栈上的空间和时间内存错误的可能性。我们的性能评估还表明，SPEC CPU2006基准测试套件带来了适度的性能开销(14%)，与最先进的堆栈保护相比，它提高了性能，同时达到了相当的安全级别。
papers.title_zh: 救世主：通过随机化堆栈布局来挫败基于堆栈的内存安全性违规行为

papers.title: Making Information Hiding Effective Again
papers.authors: Zhe Wang, Chenggang Wu, Yinqian Zhang, Bowen Tang, Pen-Chung Yew, Mengyao Xie, Yuanming Lai, Yan Kang, Yueqiang Cheng, Zhiping Shi
papers.abstract: Information hiding (IH) is an important building block for many defenses against code reuse attacks, such as code-pointer integrity (CPI), control-flow integrity (CFI) and fine-grained code (re-)randomization, because of its effectiveness and performance. It employs randomization to probabilistically “hide” sensitive memory areas, called safe areas, from attackers and ensures their addresses are not leaked by any pointers directly. These defenses used safe areas to protect their critical data, such as jump targets and randomization secrets. However, recent works have shown that IH is vulnerable to various attacks. In this article, we propose a new IH technique called SafeHidden. It continuously re-randomizes the locations of safe areas and thus prevents the attackers from probing and inferring the memory layout to find its location. A new thread-private memory mechanism is proposed to isolate the thread-local safe areas and prevent adversaries from reducing the randomization entropy. It also randomizes the safe areas after the TLB misses to prevent attackers from inferring the address of safe areas using cache side-channels. Existing IH-based defenses can utilize SafeHidden directly without any change. Our experiments show that SafeHidden not only prevents existing attacks effectively but also incurs low performance overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于其有效性和性能，信息隐藏(IH)是抵御代码重用攻击的重要组成部分，如代码指针完整性(CPI)、控制流完整性(CFI)和细粒度代码(再)随机化。它采用随机化来从概率上对攻击者“隐藏”敏感的内存区域，称为安全区域，并确保它们的地址不会被任何指针直接泄露。这些防御使用安全区域来保护他们的关键数据，如跳转目标和随机化秘密。然而，最近的研究表明，IH很容易受到各种攻击。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新的IH技术称为安全隐藏。它不断地重新随机化安全区域的位置，从而防止攻击者探查和推断存储器布局来找到其位置。提出了一种新的线程私有内存机制来隔离线程局部安全区域，防止对手降低随机化熵。它还在TLB未命中后随机化安全区域，以防止攻击者使用缓存旁路推断安全区域的地址。现有的基于IH的防御系统可以直接使用SafeHidden，无需任何更改。实验表明，SafeHidden不仅能有效防止现有攻击，而且性能开销也较低。
papers.title_zh: 使信息再次有效

papers.title: SGXTuner: Performance Enhancement of Intel SGX Applications Via Stochastic Optimization
papers.authors: Giovanni Mazzeo, Sergei Arnautov, Christof Fetzer, Luigi Romano
papers.abstract: Intel <italic>SGX</italic> has started to be widely adopted. Cloud providers (Microsoft Azure, IBM Cloud, Alibaba Cloud) are offering new solutions, implementing <italic>data-in-use</italic> protection via SGX. A major challenge faced by both academia and industry is providing transparent SGX support to legacy applications. The approach with the highest consensus is linking the target software with SGX-extended <italic>libc</italic> libraries. Unfortunately, the increased security entails a dramatic performance penalty, which is mainly due to the intrinsic overhead of context switches, and the limited size of protected memory. Performance optimization is non-trivial since it depends on key parameters whose manual tuning is a very long process. We present the architecture of an automated tool, called <italic>SGXTuner</italic>, which is able to find the best setting of SGX-extended <italic>libc</italic> library parameters, by iteratively adjusting such parameters based on continuous monitoring of performance data. The tool is — to a large extent — algorithm agnostic. We decided to base the current implementation on a particular type of stochastic optimization algorithm, specifically <italic>Simulated Annealing</italic>. A massive experimental campaign was conducted on a relevant case study. Three client-server applications — <italic>Memcached</italic>, <italic>Redis</italic>, and <italic>Apache</italic> — were compiled with SCONE's <italic>sgx-musl</italic> and tuned for best performance. Results demonstrate the effectiveness of <italic>SGXTuner</italic>.
papers.abstract_zh: SGX已经开始被广泛采用。云提供商(微软Azure、IBM Cloud、阿里云)正在提供新的解决方案，通过SGX实施< italic >使用中数据</italic >保护。学术界和工业界面临的一个主要挑战是为遗留应用程序提供透明的SGX支持。共识最高的方法是将目标软件与SGX扩展的< italic>libc</italic >库链接起来。不幸的是，增强的安全性带来了显著的性能损失，这主要是由于上下文切换的固有开销和受保护内存的有限大小。性能优化并非无足轻重，因为它依赖于关键参数，而手动调整这些参数是一个非常漫长的过程。我们提出了一个自动化工具的架构，称为< italic>SGXTuner</italic >，它能够通过基于性能数据的连续监控迭代地调整这些参数，找到SGX扩展的< italic>libc</italic >库参数的最佳设置。该工具在很大程度上是算法不可知的。我们决定将当前的实现基于一种特定类型的随机优化算法，特别是< italic >模拟退火</italic >。针对相关案例研究开展了大规模的实验活动。三个客户端-服务器应用程序— <italic>Memcached</italic > 、< italic>Redis</italic >和< italic>Apache</italic> —使用SCONE的< italic>sgx-musl</italic >进行编译，并针对最佳性能进行了调整。结果证明了< italic>SGXTuner</italic >的有效性。
papers.title_zh: SGXTUNER：通过随机优化对英特尔SGX应用的性能提高

papers.title: Practical Encrypted Network Traffic Pattern Matching for Secure Middleboxes
papers.authors: Shangqi Lai, Xingliang Yuan, Shifeng Sun, Joseph K. Liu, Ron Steinfeld, Amin Sakzad, Dongxi Liu
papers.abstract: Network Function Virtualisation (NFV) advances the adoption of composable software middleboxes. Accordingly, cloud data centres become major NFV vendors for enterprise traffic processing. Due to the privacy concern of traffic redirection to the cloud, secure middlebox systems (e.g., BlindBox) draw much attention; they can process encrypted packets against encrypted rules directly. However, most of the existing systems supporting pattern matching based network functions require the enterprise gateway to tokenise packet payloads via sliding windows. Such tokenisation induces a considerable communication overhead, which can be over 100× to the packet size. To overcome this bottleneck, in this article, we propose the first bandwidth-efficient encrypted pattern matching protocol for secure middleboxes. We resort to a primitive called symmetric hidden vector encryption (SHVE), and propose a variant of it, aka SHVE+, to achieve constant and moderate communication cost. To speed up, we devise encrypted filters to reduce the number of accesses to SHVE+ during matching highly. We formalise the security of our proposed protocol and conduct comprehensive evaluations over real-world rulesets and traffic dumps. The results show that our design can inspect a packet over 20 k rules within 100 <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mu$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>μ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="yuan-ieq1-3065652.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>s. Compared to prior work, it brings a saving of 94 percent in bandwidth consumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络功能虚拟化(NFV)促进了可组合软件中间体的采用。因此，云数据中心成为企业流量处理的主要NFV供应商。由于流量重定向到云的隐私问题，安全的中间盒系统(例如盲盒)吸引了很多关注；他们可以直接根据加密的规则处理加密的数据包。然而，大多数支持基于模式匹配的网络功能的现有系统需要企业网关通过滑动窗口来标记分组有效载荷。这种令牌化会导致相当大的通信开销，可能超过数据包大小的100倍。为了克服这个瓶颈，在本文中，我们提出了第一个用于安全中间盒的带宽高效的加密模式匹配协议。我们求助于一种称为对称隐藏向量加密(SHVE)的原语，并提出了它的一种变体，即SHVE+，以实现恒定和适度的通信成本。为了加快速度，我们设计了加密过滤器，以减少在高度匹配期间对SHVE+的访问次数。我们形式化了我们提出的协议的安全性，并对真实世界的规则集和流量转储进行了全面的评估。结果表明，我们的设计可以在100秒内检查超过20 k个规则的数据包。与以前的工作相比，它节省了90%
papers.title_zh: 安全中间箱的实用加密网络流量模式匹配

papers.title: CryptoRec: Novel Collaborative Filtering Recommender Made Privacy-Preserving Easy
papers.authors: Jun Wang, Chao Jin, Qiang Tang, Zhe Liu, Khin Mi Mi Aung
papers.abstract: With the explosive growth of user data, recommenders have become increasingly complicated. State-of-the-art algorithms often have high computational complexity and heavily use non-linear transformations. This fact makes the privacy-preserving problem more challenging, despite the significant advances in cryptography. To alleviate this problem, we propose a privacy-friendly recommender, CryptoRec. It only relies on additions and multiplications, which are efficiently supported by most cryptographic primitives. Different from others, in CryptoRec, the parameter space only contains item features (user features can be directly computed from the item features). This property allows CryptoRec to, (1) naturally achieve transferability if two datasets share the same item entries, which can benefit differential privacy protection; (2) directly estimate the preference of new users whose data is not included in the training set, drastically improving recommendation efficiency. We first evaluate CryptoRec on three real-world datasets. The evaluation results show that the accuracy is competitive with state-of-the-art. Then, we build differential privacy into CryptoRec and leverage its transferability property to reduce the overall privacy loss. Lastly, we demonstrate the simplicity and efficiency of using CryptoRec to construct secure recommendation protocols based on homomorphic encryption schemes. Our results show that CryptoRec outperforms existing solutions in terms of both accuracy and efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着用户数据的爆炸式增长，推荐器变得越来越复杂。最先进的算法通常具有很高的计算复杂度，并且大量使用非线性变换。这个事实使得隐私保护问题变得更具挑战性，尽管密码学有了显著的进步。为了缓解这个问题，我们提出了一个隐私友好的推荐系统CryptoRec。它只依赖加法和乘法，大多数密码原语都有效地支持加法和乘法。与其他不同的是，在CryptoRec中，参数空间只包含项目特征(用户特征可以从项目特征中直接计算出来)。该属性允许CryptoRec)如果两个数据集共享相同的项目条目，则自然地实现可转移性，这有利于差别隐私保护；(2)直接估计数据不包含在训练集中的新用户的偏好，大幅提高推荐效率。我们首先在三个真实数据集上评估CryptoRec。评估结果表明，该方法的准确性与最新水平相当。然后，我们在CryptoRec中构建差分隐私，并利用其可传递性来减少整体隐私损失。最后，我们展示了使用CryptoRec构造基于同态加密方案的安全推荐协议的简单性和有效性。我们的结果表明，CryptoRec在准确性和效率方面都优于现有的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: Cryptorec：新颖的协作过滤推荐人使隐私权变得容易

papers.title: A New Facial Authentication Pitfall and Remedy in Web Services
papers.authors: Dalton Cole, Sara Newman, Dan Lin
papers.abstract: Facial authentication has become more and more popular on personal devices. Due to the ease of use, it has great potential to be widely deployed for web-service authentication in the near future whereby people can easily log on to online accounts from different devices without memorizing lengthy passwords. However, the growing number of attacks on machine learning especially the Deep Neural Networks (DNN) which is commonly used for facial recognition, imposes big challenges on the successful roll-out of such web-service face authentication. Although there have been studies on defending some machine learning attacks, we are not aware of any specific effort devoted to the web-service facial authentication setting. In this article, we first demonstrate a new data poisoning attack that does not require to have any knowledge of the server-side and just needs a handful of malicious photo injections to enable an attacker to easily impersonate the victim in the existing facial authentication systems. We then propose a novel defensive approach called DEFEAT that leverages deep learning techniques to automatically detect such attacks. We have conducted extensive experiments on real datasets and our experimental results show that our defensive approach achieves more than 90 percent detection accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 面部认证在个人设备上越来越受欢迎。由于易于使用，它有很大的潜力在不久的将来广泛用于网络服务认证，人们可以轻松地从不同的设备登录在线帐户，而无需记住冗长的密码。然而，对机器学习(尤其是常用于面部识别的深度神经网络(DNN))的攻击越来越多，给这种网络服务面部认证的成功推广带来了巨大挑战。虽然有一些关于防御一些机器学习攻击的研究，但我们不知道任何致力于网络服务面部认证设置的具体努力。在本文中，我们首先演示了一种新的数据中毒攻击，这种攻击不需要任何服务器端的知识，只需要少量恶意的照片注入，就可以使攻击者轻松地冒充现有面部认证系统中的受害者。然后，我们提出了一种新的防御方法，称为击败，利用深度学习技术来自动检测这种攻击。我们在真实数据集上进行了大量的实验，实验结果表明我们的防御方法达到了90%以上的检测准确率。
papers.title_zh: Web服务中的新面部身份验证陷阱和补救措施

papers.title: Who Moves My App Promotion Investment? A Systematic Study About App Distribution Fraud
papers.authors: Shaoyong Du, Minrui Zhao, Jingyu Hua, Hang Zhang, Xiaoyu Chen, Zhiyun Qian, Sheng Zhong
papers.abstract: As the mobile era matures, it is increasingly competitive to market mobile apps, forcing companies to invest heavily on mobile user acquisition campaigns. This has unfortunately given birth to a new form of Internet fraud, which we refer to as “app distribution fraud”. This new fraud involves collusion between ISPs and fraudulent app distributors where app download is hijacked/redirected. In this article, we have the unique opportunity to cooperate with a major e-commerce company (with about 0.2 billion active users per month) to take a first peek at this problem. Through the nationwide measurement results, we find that app distribution fraud is ubiquitous yet stealthy — about 1.55 percent app downloads are hijacked/redirected, affecting more than 75 percent of the cities we tested and causing an estimated 7.46 billion U.S. dollars financial loss per year. We follow up with additional measurements on the technical mechanism of the fraud and the scope of the fraud (i.e., what other apps are also affected). Surprisingly, we find that sometimes the original app a user intends to download can be replaced with a completely different app, rendering the user's device at risks.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着移动时代的成熟，营销移动应用的竞争越来越激烈，迫使公司在移动用户获取活动上投入大量资金。这不幸催生了一种新的互联网欺诈形式，我们称之为“app分发欺诈”。这种新的欺诈涉及ISP和欺诈性应用程序分销商之间的勾结，其中应用程序下载被劫持/重定向。在本文中，我们有独一无二的机会与一家主要的电子商务公司(每月约有2亿活跃用户)合作，以首次窥视这个问题。通过全国范围内的测量结果，我们发现应用程序分发欺诈无处不在，但却很隐蔽——大约1.55%的应用程序下载被劫持/重定向，影响了我们测试的75%以上的城市，每年造成约74.6亿美元的经济损失。我们对欺诈的技术机制和欺诈的范围进行了额外的测量(例如，还有哪些应用程序也受到了影响)。令人惊讶的是，我们发现有时用户打算下载的原始应用程序可以被完全不同的应用程序替换，从而使用户的设备面临风险。
papers.title_zh: 谁会移动我的应用程序促销投资？ 有关应用程序分销欺诈的系统研究

papers.title: Covert Channel-Based Transmitter Authentication in Controller Area Networks
papers.authors: Xuhang Ying, Giuseppe Bernieri, Mauro Conti, Linda Bushnell, Radha Poovendran
papers.abstract: In recent years, the security of automotive Cyber-Physical Systems (CPSs) is facing urgent threats due to the widespread use of legacy in-vehicle communication systems. As a representative legacy bus system, the Controller Area Network (CAN) hosts Electronic Control Units (ECUs) that are crucial for the vehicles functioning. In this scenario, malicious actors can exploit the CAN vulnerabilities, such as the lack of built-in authentication and encryption schemes, to launch CAN bus attacks (e.g., suspension, injection, and masquerade attacks) with life-threatening consequences (e.g., disabling brakes). In this article, we present TACAN (Transmitter Authentication in CAN), which provides secure authentication of ECUs on the legacy CAN bus by exploiting the covert channels, without introducing CAN protocol modifications or traffic overheads (no extra bits or CAN messages are used). TACAN turns upside-down the originally malicious concept of covert channels and exploits it to build an effective defensive technique that facilitates transmitter authentication via a centralized, trusted Monitor Node. TACAN consists of three different covert channels for ECU authentication: 1) the Inter-Arrival Time (IAT)-based, leveraging the IATs of CAN messages; 2) the Least Significant Bit (LSB)-based, concealing authentication messages into the LSBs of normal CAN data; and 3) a hybrid covert channel, exploiting the combination of the first two. In order to validate TACAN, we implement the covert channels on the University of Washington (UW) EcoCAR (Chevrolet Camaro 2016) testbed. We further evaluate the bit error, throughput, and detection performance of TACAN through extensive experiments using the EcoCAR testbed and a publicly available dataset collected from Toyota Camry 2010. We demonstrate the feasibility of TACAN and the effectiveness of detecting CAN bus attacks, highlighting no traffic overheads and attesting the regular functionality of ECUs.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，由于传统车载通信系统的广泛使用，汽车信息物理系统(CPSs)的安全面临着紧迫的威胁。作为典型的传统总线系统，控制器局域网(CAN)承载着对车辆运行至关重要的电子控制单元(ECU)。在这种情况下，恶意行为者可以利用can漏洞，例如缺乏内置的认证和加密方案，来发起CAN总线攻击(例如，暂停、注入和伪装攻击)，从而导致危及生命的后果(例如，禁用制动器)。在本文中，我们介绍了TACAN(CAN中的发射器认证),它通过利用隐蔽通道来提供传统CAN总线上ECU的安全认证，而不会引入CAN协议修改或流量开销(不使用额外的位或CAN消息)。TACAN颠覆了隐蔽信道最初的恶意概念，并利用它来建立一种有效的防御技术，通过一个集中的、可信的监控节点来促进发射机认证。TACAN包括用于ECU认证的三个不同的隐蔽通道:1)基于到达间隔时间(IAT ),利用CAN消息的IATs2)基于最低有效位(LSB ),将认证消息隐藏到正常CAN数据的LSB中；以及3)混合隐蔽通道，利用前两者的组合。为了验证TACAN，我们在华盛顿大学(UW) EcoCAR(雪佛兰科迈罗2016)试验台上实施了隐蔽通道。我们通过使用EcoCAR测试床和从丰田Camry 2010收集的公开可用数据集的大量实验，进一步评估TACAN的误码、吞吐量和检测性能。我们展示了TACAN的可行性和检测CAN总线攻击的有效性，强调没有流量开销，并证明了ECU的正常功能。
papers.title_zh: 控制器区域网络中的基于秘密通道的发射器身份验证

papers.title: Monitoring-Based Differential Privacy Mechanism Against Query Flooding-Based Model Extraction Attack
papers.authors: Haonan Yan, Xiaoguang Li, Hui Li, Jiamin Li, Wenhai Sun, Fenghua Li
papers.abstract: Public intelligent services enabled by machine learning algorithms are vulnerable to model extraction attacks that can steal confidential information of the learning models through public queries. Though there are some protection options such as differential privacy (DP) and monitoring, which are considered promising techniques to mitigate this attack, we still find that the vulnerability persists. In this article, we propose an adaptive query-flooding parameter duplication (QPD) attack. The adversary can infer the model information with black-box access and no prior knowledge of any model parameters or training data via QPD. We also develop a defense strategy using DP called monitoring-based DP (MDP) against this new attack. In MDP, we first propose a novel real-time model extraction status assessment scheme called Monitor to evaluate the situation of the model. Then, we design a method to guide the differential privacy budget allocation called APBA adaptively. Finally, all DP-based defenses with MDP could dynamically adjust the amount of noise added in the model response according to the result from Monitor and effectively defends the QPD attack. Furthermore, we thoroughly evaluate and compare the QPD attack and MDP defense performance on real-world models with DP and monitoring protection.
papers.abstract_zh: 由机器学习算法实现的公共智能服务容易受到模型提取攻击，这些攻击可以通过公共查询来窃取学习模型的机密信息。虽然有一些保护选项，如差分隐私(DP)和监控，这些被认为是缓解这种攻击的有前途的技术，但我们仍然发现漏洞仍然存在。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个自适应查询泛洪参数复制(QPD)攻击。对手可以通过黑盒访问来推断模型信息，并且不需要任何模型参数或训练数据的先验知识。针对这种新的攻击，我们还开发了一种使用DP的防御策略，称为基于监控的DP (MDP)。在MDP，我们首先提出了一种新的实时模型提取状态评估方案，称为Monitor，用于评估模型的状态。然后，我们设计了一种自适应地指导差分隐私预算分配的方法，称为APBA。最后，所有基于DP和MDP的防御都可以根据监视器的结果动态调整模型响应中添加的噪声量，有效地防御QPD攻击。此外，我们在具有DP和监控保护的真实世界模型上彻底评估和比较了QPD攻击和MDP防御性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于监视的差异隐私机制，以抗查询基于洪水的模型提取攻击

papers.title: Maximizing Error Injection Realism for Chaos Engineering With System Calls
papers.authors: Long Zhang, Brice Morin, Benoit Baudry, Martin Monperrus
papers.abstract: In this article, we present a novel fault injection framework for system call invocation errors, called <sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/>. <sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/> is unique as follows; First, <sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/> enables developers to have full observability of system call invocations. Second, <sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/> generates error models that are realistic in the sense that they mimic errors that naturally happen in production. Third, <sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/> is able to automatically conduct experiments to systematically assess the reliability of applications with respect to system call invocation errors in production. We evaluate the effectiveness and runtime overhead of <sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/> on two real-world applications in a production environment for a single software stack: Java. The results show that <sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/> successfully generates realistic error models and is able to detect important reliability weaknesses with respect to system call invocation errors. To our knowledge, this novel concept of “realistic error injection”, which consists of grounding fault injection on production errors, has never been studied before.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一种新的针对系统调用错误的故障注入框架，称为< sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/>。菲比的独特之处如下:首先，< sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/>使开发人员能够完全观察系统调用。其次，< sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/>会生成逼真的错误模型，模拟生产中自然发生的错误。第三，< sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/>能够自动进行实验，针对生产中的系统调用错误，系统地评估应用程序的可靠性。我们评估了< sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/>在单一软件堆栈:Java的生产环境中的两个真实应用程序上的效率和运行时开销。结果表明，< sc/><bold>Phoebe</bold><sc/>成功地生成了真实的错误模型，并且能够检测出与系统调用错误相关的重要可靠性弱点。据我们所知，这种新颖的“现实错误注入”的概念，包括对生产错误的接地故障注入，以前从未被研究过。
papers.title_zh: 通过系统调用，最大化错误注入现实主义的混乱工程

papers.title: Auth-AIS: Secure, Flexible, and Backward-Compatible Authentication of Vessels AIS Broadcasts
papers.authors: Savio Sciancalepore, Pietro Tedeschi, Ahmed Aziz, Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: Automatic Identification System (AIS) is the de-facto communication standard used by vessels to broadcast identification and position information. However, being AIS communications neither encrypted nor authenticated, they can be eavesdropped and spoofed by adversaries, leading to potentially threatening scenarios. Existing solutions, including the ones conceived in the avionics domain, do not consider integration with the AIS standard, and they do not provide protection against rogue messages flooding. In this article, we propose Auth-AIS, a secure, flexible, standard-compliant, and backward-compatible authentication framework to secure AIS broadcast messages. Auth-AIS leverages existing sound cryptographic tools, including TESLA and Bloom Filters, inheriting their security properties while contextualizing them in the AIS technology. Auth-AIS is a software-only solution, that can be seamlessly integrated into existing AIS deployments, without requiring any hardware replacement. Its innovative design also provides backward-compatibility—i.e., Auth-AIS messages can be received also by AIS users not adopting Auth-AIS, while renouncing at its security guarantees. Auth-AIS can work in either two configuration modes: Deterministic Security Configuration, able to achieve low-delay authentication with a message overhead of 75 percent, or Probabilistic Security Configuration, reducing the message overhead down to 35.71 percent, while experiencing a marginal increase in the authentication delay. All these security configurations guarantee an 80 bits equivalent security level and false-positive rate less than 2--40. Note that these latter security parameters can easily be tuned to fit different security requirements. Finally, the source code of Auth-AIS in the GNURadio ecosystem has been released as open-source, to foster research activities from both Industry and Academia on secure AIS communications.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动识别系统(AIS)是船舶用来广播识别和位置信息的事实上的通信标准。然而，由于AIS通信既没有加密也没有认证，它们可能被对手窃听和欺骗，从而导致潜在的威胁场景。现有的解决方案，包括在航空电子领域中构想的解决方案，没有考虑与AIS标准的集成，并且它们不提供针对恶意消息泛滥的保护。在本文中，我们提出了Auth-AIS，这是一个安全、灵活、符合标准且向后兼容的认证框架，用于保护AIS广播消息。Auth-AIS利用现有的声音加密工具，包括TESLA和Bloom Filters，继承它们的安全属性，同时将它们放在AIS技术的上下文中。Auth-AIS是一个纯软件解决方案，可以无缝集成到现有的AIS部署中，无需更换任何硬件。其创新设计还提供了向后兼容性，即不采用Auth-AIS的AIS用户也可以接收Auth-AIS消息，同时放弃其安全保证。Auth-AIS可以在两种配置模式下工作:确定性安全配置，能够以75%的消息开销实现低延迟身份验证，或者概率性安全配置，将消息开销降低到35.71%，同时身份验证延迟略有增加。所有这些安全配置保证了80位等效安全级别和小于2 - 40的假阳性率。请注意，后面这些安全参数可以很容易地进行调整，以适应不同的安全需求。最后，GNURadio生态系统中Auth-AIS的源代码已经作为开源发布，以促进工业界和学术界对安全AIS通信的研究活动。
papers.title_zh: auth-ais：安全，灵活和向后兼容的船只AIS广播的身份验证

papers.title: FVC-Dedup: A Secure Report Deduplication Scheme in a Fog-Assisted Vehicular Crowdsensing System
papers.authors: Shunrong Jiang, Jianqing Liu, Yong Zhou, Yuguang Fang
