papers.abstract: It is observed that modern vehicles are becoming more and more powerful in computing, communications, and storage capacity. By interacting with other vehicles or with local infrastructures (i.e., fog) such as road-side units, vehicles and fog devices can collaboratively provide services like crowdsensing in an efficient and secure way. Unfortunately, it is hard to develop a secure and privacy-preserving crowdsensing report deduplication mechanism in such a system. In this article, we propose a scheme FVC-Dedup to address this challenge. Specifically, we develop cryptographic primitives to realize secure task allocation and guarantee the confidentiality of crowdsensing reports. During the report submission, we improve the message-lock encryption (MLE) scheme to realize privacy-preserving report deduplication and resist the fake duplicate attacks. Besides, we construct a novel signature scheme to achieve efficient signature aggregation and record the contributions of each participant fairly without knowing the crowdsensing data. The security analysis and performance evaluation demonstrate that FVC-Dedup can achieve secure and privacy-preserving report deduplication with moderate computing and communication overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 据观察，现代车辆在计算、通信和存储能力方面变得越来越强大。通过与其他车辆或诸如路边单元的本地基础设施(即，fog)进行交互，车辆和fog设备可以以高效和安全的方式协作提供诸如众测的服务。不幸的是，在这样的系统中很难开发出安全且保护隐私的众测报告去重机制。在本文中，我们提出了一个FVC重复数据删除方案来应对这一挑战。具体来说，我们开发密码原语来实现安全的任务分配，并保证众测报告的机密性。在报告提交过程中，我们改进了消息锁加密(MLE)方案，实现了保护隐私的报告去重，并抵抗了虚假重复攻击。此外，我们构造了一个新颖的签名方案，在不知道众测数据的情况下，实现了高效的签名聚合，并公平地记录了每个参与者的贡献。安全性分析和性能评估表明，FVC重复数据删除算法能够以适中的计算和通信开销实现安全和隐私保护的报告重复数据删除。
papers.title_zh: FVC-DEDUP：在雾化的车辆人群系统中，安全的报告删除计划

papers.title: SuperSketch: A Multi-Dimensional Reversible Data Structure for Super Host Identification
papers.authors: Xuyang Jing, Hui Han, Zheng Yan, Witold Pedrycz
papers.abstract: Facing big network traffic data, effective data compression becomes crucially important and urgently needed for estimating host cardinalities and identifying super hosts. However, the current literature confronts several challenges: incapability of simultaneously measuring various types of host cardinalities and inability to efficiently reconstruct super host addresses. To address these challenges, in this article, we propose a novel sketch data structure, named SuperSketch, to simultaneously measure multiple types of host cardinalities with the purpose of efficiently identifying super hosts. SuperSketch has two significant characteristics: multi-dimensionality and reversibility. The multi-dimensionality makes SuperSketch capable of simultaneously measuring Source Cardinality, Destination Cardinality, and Destination Port Cardinality. The reversibility allows SuperSketch to accurately and quickly reconstruct the original addresses of super hosts once they are identified. We conduct both theoretical analysis and performance evaluation based on real-world network traffic. Experimental results show that SuperSketch achieves outstanding performance for multi-cardinality measurement, super host identification, and host address reconstruction.
papers.abstract_zh: 面对庞大的网络流量数据，有效的数据压缩对于估计主机基数和识别超级主机变得至关重要和迫切需要。然而，目前的文献面临着几个挑战:无法同时测量各种类型的主机基数和无法有效地重建超级主机地址。为了应对这些挑战，本文提出了一种新的草图数据结构，称为SuperSketch，用于同时测量多种类型的主机基数，以有效地识别超级主机。超缩具有两个显著的特征:多维性和可逆性。多维度使得SuperSketch能够同时测量源基数、目的地基数和目的地端口基数。一旦超级主机被识别，这种可逆性允许超级秘密准确而快速地重建超级主机的原始地址。我们基于真实网络流量进行理论分析和性能评估。实验结果表明，SuperSketch在多基数测量、超级主机识别和主机地址重构等方面具有优异的性能。
papers.title_zh: supersketch：超级主机识别的多维可逆数据结构

papers.title: On Capturing DDoS Traffic Footprints on the Internet
papers.authors: Lumin Shi, Jun Li, Mingwei Zhang, Peter L. Reiher
papers.abstract: While distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks are easy to launch and are becoming more damaging, the defense against DDoS attacks often suffers from the lack of relevant knowledge of the DDoS traffic, including the paths the DDoS traffic has used, the source addresses (spoofed or not) that appear along each path, and the amount of traffic per path or per source. Though IP traceback and path inference approaches could be considered, they are either expensive and hard to deploy or inaccurate. We propose PathFinder, a service that a DDoS defense system can use to obtain the footprints of the DDoS traffic to the victim. PathFinder employs an architecture that is easy to implement and deploy on today's Internet, a PFTrie data structure that introduces multiple design features to log traffic at line rate, and streaming and zooming mechanisms that facilitates the storage and transmission of DDoS footprints more efficiently. Our evaluation shows that PathFinder can significantly improve the efficacy of a DDoS defense system, its PFTrie data structure is fast and has a manageable overhead, and its streaming and zooming mechanisms significantly reduce the delay and overhead in transmitting DDoS footprints.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击很容易发起，并且变得越来越具有破坏性，但是对DDoS攻击的防御常常受到缺乏DDoS流量的相关知识的困扰，包括DDoS流量使用的路径、沿着每条路径出现的源地址(欺骗与否)以及每条路径或每个源的流量。尽管可以考虑IP回溯和路径推断方法，但它们要么昂贵且难以部署，要么不准确。我们提出了PathFinder，一种DDoS防御系统可以用来获取DDoS流量到受害者的足迹的服务。PathFinder采用了一种易于在当今互联网上实施和部署的架构，一种PFTrie数据结构，它引入了多种设计功能来以线速记录流量，以及流和缩放机制，有助于更有效地存储和传输DDoS足迹。我们的评估表明，PathFinder可以显著提高DDoS防御系统的效率，其PFTrie数据结构快速且开销易于管理，其流式传输和缩放机制显著降低了传输DDoS足迹的延迟和开销。
papers.title_zh: 捕获互联网上的DDOS流量足迹

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Search for a Similar Genomic Makeup in the Cloud
papers.authors: Xiaojie Zhu, Erman Ayday, Roman Vitenberg, Narasimha Raghavan Veeraragavan
papers.abstract: Increasing affordability of genome sequencing and, as a consequence, widespread availability of genomic data opens up new opportunities for the field of medicine, as also evident from the emergence of popular cloud-based offerings in this area, such as Google Genomics [1]. To utilize this data more efficiently, it is crucial that different entities share their data with each other. However, such data sharing is risky mainly due to privacy concerns. In this article, we attempt to provide a privacy-preserving and efficient solution for the “similar patient search” problem among several parties (e.g., hospitals) by addressing the shortcomings of previous attempts. We consider a scenario in which each hospital has its own genomic dataset and the goal of a physician (or researcher) is to search for a patient similar to a given one (based on a genomic makeup) among all the hospitals in the system. To enable this search, we propose a hierarchical index structure to index each hospital’s dataset with low memory requirement. Furthermore, we develop a novel privacy-preserving index merging mechanism that generates a common search index from individual indices of each hospital to significantly improve the search efficiency. We also consider the storage of medical information associated with genomic data of a patient (e.g., diagnosis and treatment). We allow access to this information via a fine-grained access control policy that we develop through the combination of standard symmetric encryption and ciphertext policy attribute-based encryption. Using this mechanism, a physician can search for similar patients and obtain medical information about the matching records if the access policy holds. We conduct experiments on large-scale genomic data and show the high efficiency of the proposed scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 基因组测序越来越便宜，因此基因组数据的广泛可用性为医学领域开辟了新的机会，这也从该领域流行的基于云的产品的出现中可以明显看出，如Google Genomics [1]。为了更有效地利用这些数据，不同实体之间共享数据至关重要。然而，这种数据共享是有风险的，主要是因为隐私问题。在本文中，我们试图通过解决先前尝试的缺点，为多方(例如，医院)之间的“相似患者搜索”问题提供隐私保护和有效的解决方案。我们考虑一个场景，其中每个医院都有自己的基因组数据集，医生(或研究人员)的目标是在系统中的所有医院中搜索与给定患者相似的患者(基于基因组构成)。为了实现这种搜索，我们提出了一种层次索引结构，以索引每个医院的低内存需求的数据集。此外，我们开发了一种新的隐私保护索引合并机制，从每个医院的单独索引中生成一个公共搜索索引，以显著提高搜索效率。我们还考虑与患者的基因组数据相关联的医疗信息的存储(例如，诊断和治疗)。我们允许通过一个细粒度的访问控制策略来访问这些信息，该策略是我们通过结合标准对称加密和密文策略基于属性的加密来开发的。使用这种机制，如果访问策略有效，医生可以搜索相似的患者并获得关于匹配记录的医疗信息。我们在大规模基因组数据上进行了实验，并显示了所提方案的高效性。
papers.title_zh: 隐私保护在云中寻找类似的基因组化妆

papers.title: Secure Password-Protected Encryption Key for Deduplicated Cloud Storage Systems
papers.authors: Yuan Zhang, Chunxiang Xu, Nan Cheng, Xuemin Shen
papers.abstract: In this article, we propose SPADE, an encrypted data deduplication scheme that resists compromised key servers and frees users from the key management problem. Specifically, we propose a proactivization mechanism for the servers-aided message-locked encryption (MLE) to periodically substitute key servers with newly employed ones, which renews the security protection and retains encrypted data deduplication. We present a servers-aided password-hardening protocol to resist dictionary guessing attacks. Based on the protocol, we further propose a password-based layered encryption mechanism and a password-based authentication mechanism and integrate them into SPADE to enable users to access their data only using their passwords. Provable security and high efficiency of SPADE are demonstrated by comprehensive analyses and experimental evaluations.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了SPADE，这是一种加密的重复数据删除方案，可以抵抗被破坏的密钥服务器，并使用户摆脱密钥管理问题。具体来说，我们提出了一种服务器辅助消息锁定加密(MLE)的主动化机制，定期用新使用的密钥服务器替换密钥服务器，从而更新安全保护并保留加密的重复数据删除。我们提出了一个服务器辅助的密码强化协议来抵抗字典猜测攻击。在该协议的基础上，我们进一步提出了基于口令的分层加密机制和基于口令的认证机制，并将它们集成到SPADE中，使得用户只需使用口令就可以访问他们的数据。综合分析和实验评估证明了SPADE的安全性和高效性。
papers.title_zh: 安全密码保护的加密密钥，用于删除云存储系统

papers.title: NN-EMD: Efficiently Training Neural Networks Using Encrypted Multi-Sourced Datasets
papers.authors: Runhua Xu, James Joshi, Chao Li
papers.abstract: Training complex neural network models using third-party cloud-based infrastructure among multiple data sources is a promising approach among existing machine learning solutions. However, privacy concerns of large-scale data collections and recent regulations have restricted the availability and use of privacy sensitive data in the third-party infrastructure. To address such privacy issues, a promising emerging approach is to train a neural network model over an encrypted dataset. Specifically, the model training process can be outsourced to a third party such as a cloud service that is backed by significant computing power, while the encrypted training data keeps the data confidential from the third party. Compared to training a traditional machine learning model over encrypted data, however, it is extremely challenging to train a deep neural network (DNN) model over encrypted data for two reasons: first, it requires large-scale computation over huge datasets; second, the existing solutions for computation over encrypted data, such as using homomorphic encryption, is inefficient. Further, for enhanced performance of a DNN model, we also need to use huge training datasets composed of data from multiple data sources that may not have pre-established trust relationships among each other. We propose a novel framework, NN-EMD, to train DNN over encrypted multiple datasets collected from multiple sources. Toward this, we propose a set of secure computation protocols using hybrid functional encryption schemes. We evaluate our framework for performance with regards to the training time and model accuracy on the MNIST datasets. We show that compared to other existing frameworks, our proposed NN-EMD framework can significantly reduce the training time, while providing comparable model accuracy and privacy guarantees as well as supporting multiple data sources. Furthermore, the depth and complexity of neural networks do not affect the training time despite introducing a privacy-preserving NN-EMD setting.
papers.abstract_zh: 在现有的机器学习解决方案中，使用第三方基于云的基础设施在多个数据源中训练复杂的神经网络模型是一种有前途的方法。然而，对大规模数据收集的隐私关注和最近的法规已经限制了隐私敏感数据在第三方基础设施中的可用性和使用。为了解决这种隐私问题，一种有前途的新兴方法是在加密数据集上训练神经网络模型。具体来说，模型训练过程可以外包给第三方，如由强大计算能力支持的云服务，而加密的训练数据则对第三方保密。然而，与在加密数据上训练传统的机器学习模型相比，在加密数据上训练深度神经网络(DNN)模型极具挑战性，原因有二:首先，它需要在巨大的数据集上进行大规模计算；第二，对加密数据进行计算的现有解决方案，例如使用同态加密，是低效的。此外，为了增强DNN模型的性能，我们还需要使用由来自多个数据源的数据组成的巨大训练数据集，这些数据源彼此之间可能没有预先建立的信任关系。我们提出了一个新的框架，NN-EMD，用于在从多个来源收集的加密的多个数据集上训练DNN。为此，我们提出了一套使用混合函数加密方案的安全计算协议。我们评估了我们的框架在MNIST数据集上的训练时间和模型准确性方面的性能。我们表明，与其他现有框架相比，我们提出的NN-EMD框架可以显著减少训练时间，同时提供可比的模型准确性和隐私保证以及支持多数据源。此外，尽管引入了保护隐私的NN-EMD设置，但神经网络的深度和复杂性不影响训练时间。
papers.title_zh: NN-EMD：使用加密的多源数据集有效训练神经网络

papers.title: VulDeeLocator: A Deep Learning-Based Fine-Grained Vulnerability Detector
papers.authors: Zhen Li, Deqing Zou, Shouhuai Xu, Zhaoxuan Chen, Yawei Zhu, Hai Jin
papers.abstract: Automatically detecting software vulnerabilities is an important problem that has attracted much attention from the academic research community. However, existing vulnerability detectors still cannot achieve the vulnerability detection capability and the locating precision that would warrant their adoption for real-world use. In this article, we present a vulnerability detector that can simultaneously achieve a high detection capability and a high locating precision, dubbed Vulnerability Deep learning-based Locator (VulDeeLocator). In the course of designing VulDeeLocator, we encounter difficulties including how to accommodate semantic relations between the definitions of types as well as macros and their uses across files, how to accommodate accurate control flows and variable define-use relations, and how to achieve high locating precision. We solve these difficulties by using two innovative ideas: (i) leveraging intermediate code to accommodate extra semantic information, and (ii) using the notion of granularity refinement to pin down locations of vulnerabilities. When applied to 200 files randomly selected from three real-world software products, VulDeeLocator detects 18 confirmed vulnerabilities (i.e., true-positives). Among them, 16 vulnerabilities correspond to known vulnerabilities; the other two are not reported in the National Vulnerability Database (NVD) but have been “silently” patched by the vendor of Libav when releasing newer versions.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动检测软件漏洞是一个重要的问题，已经引起了学术界的广泛关注。然而，现有的漏洞检测器仍然不能达到漏洞检测能力和定位精度，这将保证它们被现实世界采用。在本文中，我们提出了一个漏洞检测器，可以同时实现高检测能力和高定位精度，称为漏洞深度学习定位器(VulDeeLocator)。在设计VulDeeLocator的过程中，我们遇到了一些困难，包括如何适应类型和宏的定义之间的语义关系以及它们在文件之间的使用，如何适应精确的控制流和变量定义-使用关系，以及如何实现高定位精度。我们通过使用两个创新的想法来解决这些困难:(I)利用中间代码来容纳额外的语义信息，以及(ii)使用粒度细化的概念来确定漏洞的位置。当应用于从三个现实世界软件产品中随机选择的200个文件时，VulDeeLocator检测到18个确认的漏洞(即，真阳性)。其中，16个漏洞对应已知漏洞；另外两个没有在国家漏洞数据库(NVD)中报告，但是已经被Libav的供应商在发布新版本时“悄悄地”修补了。
papers.title_zh: Voldeelocator：基于深度学习的细粒脆弱性检测器

papers.title: Decentralized Self-Auditing Scheme With Errors Localization for Multi-Cloud Storage
papers.authors: Yuan Su, Yanping Li, Bo Yang, Yong Ding
papers.abstract: With the popularity of cloud storage, increasing users begin to outsource data to the cloud. In order to resist possible data analysis for centralized outsourced data and improve the fault tolerance, users prefer to distribute data to cloud servers of different cloud service providers. However, once the data have been outsourced, it will be out of user’s control and many security issues may occur, such as outsourced data being illegally tamper with, or rarely accessed data being secretly deleted. In this article, we propose a decentralized self-auditing scheme for multi-cloud storage, called DSAS. First, based on the symmetric balanced incomplete block design, DSAS achieves integrity verification for outsourced data via the interactions of cloud servers and the auditing costs are shared by the participating CSs. Second, DSAS can locate misbehavior cloud server with low computation costs, and resist denial of service attack initiated by malicious cloud servers which attempts to destroy the audit. Third, DSAS can recover the corrupted data without fetching data, and support the revocation of cloud servers and batch auditing. Finally, security proof and function evaluation show that DSAS has comprehensive security and functionality, and performance simulations and experiment results show that DSAS is efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云存储的普及，越来越多的用户开始将数据外包给云。为了抵御集中式外包数据可能的数据分析，提高容错性，用户更倾向于将数据分布到不同云服务提供商的云服务器上。然而，一旦数据被外包，它将脱离用户的控制，并可能出现许多安全问题，如外包数据被非法篡改，或很少访问的数据被秘密删除。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个分布式自审计方案，称为DSAS。首先，基于对称平衡不完全块设计，DSAS通过云服务器的交互实现外包数据的完整性验证，审计成本由参与的CSs分担。第二，DSAS能够以较低的计算成本定位恶意云服务器，并抵抗恶意云服务器发起的试图破坏审计的拒绝服务攻击。第三，DSAS可以在不抓取数据的情况下恢复损坏的数据，并支持撤销云服务器和批量审计。最后，安全性证明和功能评估表明DSAS具有全面的安全性和功能性，性能模拟和实验结果表明DSAS是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 分散的自我审计方案具有错误本地化用于多云存储的本地化

papers.title: DNS Poisoning of Operating System Caches: Attacks and Mitigations
papers.authors: Fatemah Alharbi, Yuchen Zhou, Feng Qian, Zhiyun Qian, Nael B. Abu-Ghazaleh
papers.abstract: The Domain Name System (DNS) is a protocol supporting name resolution from Fully Qualified Domain Names (FQDNs) to the IP address of the machines corresponding to them. This resolution process is critical to the operation of the Internet, but is susceptible to a range of attacks. One of the most dangerous attack vectors is DNS poisoning where an attacker injects malicious entries into the DNS resolution forcing clients to be redirected from legitimate to malicious servers. Typically, poisoning attacks target a DNS resolver allowing attackers to poison a DNS entry for all machines that use the compromised resolver. However, recent defenses protect resolvers substantially limiting these attacks. In this paper, we present a new class of DNS poisoning attacks targeting the client-side DNS cache, which is used in mainstream operating systems, circumventing defenses protecting resolvers. We implemented the attack on Windows, Mac OS, and Ubuntu Linux machines. We also generalize the attack to work even when the client is behind a Network Address Translation (NAT) router. Our results show that we can reliably inject malicious DNS mappings, with on average, an order of tens of seconds. We also propose client-side mitigations and demonstrate that they can effectively mitigate the vulnerability.
papers.abstract_zh: 域名系统(DNS)是一种协议，支持从完全合格的域名(FQDNs)到相应机器的IP地址的名称解析。这个解析过程对互联网的运行至关重要，但容易受到一系列攻击。最危险的攻击媒介之一是DNS中毒，攻击者在DNS解析中注入恶意条目，迫使客户端从合法服务器重定向到恶意服务器。通常，中毒攻击以DNS解析器为目标，使得攻击者能够毒害使用受损解析器的所有机器的DNS条目。然而，最近的防御措施保护解析器，大大限制了这些攻击。在本文中，我们提出了一种针对客户端DNS缓存的新的DNS中毒攻击，它用于主流操作系统中，绕过保护解析器的防御。我们在Windows、Mac OS和Ubuntu Linux机器上实施了攻击。我们还将攻击一般化，即使客户端位于网络地址转换(NAT)路由器之后。我们的结果表明，我们可以可靠地注入恶意的DNS映射，平均只需几十秒。我们还提出了客户端缓解措施，并证明它们可以有效地缓解漏洞。
papers.title_zh: DNS中毒操作系统缓存：攻击和缓解

papers.title: Revocable Attribute-Based Encryption With Data Integrity in Clouds
papers.authors: Chunpeng Ge, Willy Susilo, Joonsang Baek, Zhe Liu, Jinyue Xia, Liming Fang
papers.abstract: Cloud computing enables enterprises and individuals to outsource and share their data. This way, cloud computing eliminates the heavy workload of local information infrastructure. Attribute-based encryption has become a promising solution for encrypted data access control in clouds due to the ability to achieve one-to-many encrypted data sharing. Revocation is a critical requirement for encrypted data access control systems. After outsourcing the encrypted attribute-based ciphertext to the cloud, the data owner may want to revoke some recipients that were authorized previously, which means that the outsourced attribute-based ciphertext needs to be updated to a new one that is under the revoked policy. The integrity issue arises when the revocation is executed. When a new ciphertext with the revoked access policy is generated by the cloud server, the data recipient cannot be sure that the newly generated ciphertext guarantees to be decrypted to the same plaintext as the originally encrypted data, since the cloud server is provided by a third party, which is not fully trusted. In this article, we consider a new security requirement for the revocable attribute-based encryption schemes: integrity. We introduce a formal definition and security model for the revocable attribute-based encryption with data integrity protection (RABE-DI). Then, we propose a concrete RABE-DI scheme and prove its confidentiality and integrity under the defined security model. Finally, we present an implementation result and provide performance evaluation which shows that our scheme is efficient and practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算使企业和个人能够外包和共享他们的数据。这样，云计算消除了本地信息基础设施的繁重工作。基于属性的加密由于能够实现一对多的加密数据共享，已经成为云环境下加密数据访问控制的一种有前途的解决方案。撤销是加密数据访问控制系统的关键要求。在将加密的基于属性的密文外包给云之后，数据所有者可能想要撤销先前授权的一些接收者，这意味着外包的基于属性的密文需要被更新为在撤销的策略下的新密文。执行撤销时会出现完整性问题。当云服务器生成具有被撤销的访问策略的新密文时，数据接收者不能确定新生成的密文保证被解密为与原始加密数据相同的明文，因为云服务器是由不完全可信的第三方提供的。在这篇文章中，我们考虑了一个新的可撤销的基于属性的加密方案的安全要求:完整性。我们介绍了具有数据完整性保护的基于属性的可撤销加密(RABE-DI)的形式化定义和安全模型。然后，我们提出了一个具体的RABE-数字签名方案，并在定义的安全模型下证明了它的机密性和完整性。最后，我们给出了一个实现结果并给出了性能评估，结果表明我们的方案是有效和实用的。
papers.title_zh: 云中具有数据完整性的基于可撤销属性的加密

papers.title: LibCapsule: Complete Confinement of Third-Party Libraries in Android Applications
papers.authors: Jun Qiu, Xuewu Yang, Huamao Wu, Yajin Zhou, Jinku Li, Jianfeng Ma
papers.abstract: Android application (or app) developers increasingly integrate third-party libraries to enrich the functionality of their apps. However, current permission model on Android cannot constrain the behaviors of in-app third-party libraries for allowing them to operate with the same permissions as their host app. This brings serious security and privacy concerns to users. In this article, we propose LibCapsule, a user-level solution to confine third-party libraries from potential permission abuses. Compared to previous systems, LibCapsule is able to provide complete confinement of third-party libraries in Android apps, including the static Java code, dynamically loaded code and native code of third-party libraries. We have developed a prototype of LibCapsule, and collected 204 popular third-party libraries as well as 2,021 apps to evaluate it. The evaluation results indicate that LibCapsule is capable of enforcing complete and fine-grained regulation on third-party libraries according to customized security policies with a low performance overhead. To engage the whole community, we will release the dataset of third-party libraries and apps in our evaluation.
papers.abstract_zh: Android应用程序(或应用程序)开发者越来越多地集成第三方库，以丰富其应用程序的功能。然而，目前Android上的权限模型不能约束应用内第三方库的行为，以允许它们使用与其宿主应用相同的权限进行操作。这给用户带来了严重的安全和隐私问题。在本文中，我们提出了LibCapsule，这是一个用户级的解决方案，可以防止第三方库被滥用权限。与以前的系统相比，LibCapsule能够在Android应用程序中提供第三方库的完整限制，包括第三方库的静态Java代码、动态加载的代码和本机代码。我们已经开发了LibCapsule的原型，并收集了204个流行的第三方库以及2021个应用程序来评估它。评估结果表明，LibCapsule能够以较低的性能开销根据定制的安全策略对第三方库实施完整和细粒度的监管。为了让整个社区参与进来，我们将在评估中发布第三方库和应用的数据集。
papers.title_zh: libcapsule：在Android应用程序中的第三方库完全限制

papers.title: Object Oriented Policy Conflict Checking Framework in Cloud Networks (OOPC)
papers.authors: Ankur Chowdhary, Abdulhakim Sabur, Dijiang Huang, Myong H. Kang, James Kirby
papers.abstract: Software-Defined Networking (SDN) provides a programmable framework for multi-tenant cloud network management and orchestration. The end-to-end packet processing induced by virtual network functions (VNFs) like stateless firewall, load balancer, intrusion detection, and prevention system (IDPS) in a network involves the processing of network traffic through security policies matching the traffic pattern defined in security rules of individual VNF. The conflicting rules in terms of traffic match and conflicting actions can lead to a) violation of security requirements (authentication and authorization bypass) b) mission requirements - the presence of redundant rules (increased latency, reduced throughput). We present a new object-oriented policy conflict detection and resolution framework (OOPC), which analyzes the rule dependency relationships between the rules of heterogeneous virtual network functions (VNFs) and creates a VNF-Graph. The rules are analyzed using object-oriented dependencies between the address space and actions of VNF rules. OOPC utilizes a compact VNF-Graph, which leads to a reduction in search complexity when analyzing new security policies. Our security policy composition in our framework OOPC achieves 37 percent lower latency in policy graph composition than previous work. The proposed solution performs 20 percent faster security policy conflict detection on a cloud network with 60k OpenFlow rules than prior frameworks that serve a similar purpose.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件定义的网络(SDN)为多租户云网络管理和协调提供了一个可编程的框架。由网络中的无状态防火墙、负载均衡器、入侵检测和防御系统(IDPS)等虚拟网络功能(VNF)引发的端到端数据包处理涉及通过与各个VNF的安全规则中定义的流量模式相匹配的安全策略来处理网络流量。流量匹配和冲突动作方面的冲突规则可能导致a)违反安全要求(绕过认证和授权)b)任务要求-冗余规则的存在(延迟增加、吞吐量降低)。提出了一种新的面向对象的策略冲突检测和解决框架(OOPC ),该框架分析了异构虚拟网络功能(VNFs)规则之间的规则依赖关系，并创建了VNF图。使用地址空间和VNF规则的动作之间的面向对象的依赖性来分析规则。OOPC利用一个紧凑的VNF图，这导致在分析新的安全策略时搜索复杂度的降低。在我们的框架OOPC中，我们的安全策略组合在策略图组合方面实现了比以前工作低37%的延迟。所提出的解决方案在具有60k OpenFlow规则的云网络上执行安全策略冲突检测比服务于类似目的的先前框架快20%。
papers.title_zh: 面向对象的策略冲突检查云网络中的框架（OOPC）

papers.title: A Verifiable and Fair Attribute-Based Proxy Re-Encryption Scheme for Data Sharing in Clouds
papers.authors: Chunpeng Ge, Willy Susilo, Joonsang Baek, Zhe Liu, Jinyue Xia, Liming Fang
papers.abstract: To manage outsourced encrypted data sharing in clouds, attribute-based proxy re-encryption (ABPRE) has become an elegant primitive. In ABPRE, a cloud server can transform an original recipient’s ciphertext to a new one of a shared user’s. As the transformation is computation consuming, a malicious cloud server may return an incorrect re-encrypted ciphertext to save its computation resources. Moreover, a shared user may accuse the cloud server of returning an incorrect re-encrypted ciphertext to refuse to pay the cost of using the cloud service. However, existing ABPRE schemes do not support a mechanism to achieve verifiability and fairness. In this article, a novel verifiable and fair attribute-based proxy re-encryption (VF-ABPRE) scheme is introduced to support verifiability and fairness. The verifiability enables a shared user to verify whether the re-encrypted ciphertext returned by the server is correct and the fairness ensures a cloud server escape from malicious accusation if it has indeed conducted the re-encryption operation honestly. Additionally, we conduct a performance experiment to show the efficiency and practicality of the new VF-ABPRE scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了管理云中外包的加密数据共享，基于属性的代理重加密(ABPRE)已经成为一种优雅的原语。在ABPRE中，云服务器可以将原始收件人的密文转换成共享用户的新密文。由于转换是计算消耗，恶意的云服务器可能返回不正确的重新加密的密文以节省其计算资源。此外，共享用户可能会指责云服务器返回不正确的重新加密的密文，以拒绝支付使用云服务的费用。然而，现有的ABPRE方案不支持实现可验证性和公平性的机制。本文提出了一种新的可验证的公平的基于属性的代理重加密方案(VF-ABPRE ),以支持可验证性和公平性。可验证性使得共享用户能够验证由服务器返回的重新加密的密文是否正确，并且公平性确保云服务器在确实诚实地进行了重新加密操作的情况下免受恶意指控。此外，我们还进行了一个性能实验来验证新的VF-ABPRE方案的有效性和实用性。
papers.title_zh: 一个基于可验证且公平的基于属性的代理重新加密方案，用于云中的数据共享

papers.title: Software-Based Remote Network Attestation
papers.authors: Seema Kumar, Patrick Eugster, Silvia Santini
papers.abstract: Internet of Things (IoT) applications build upon resource-constrained, distributed devices that generate data and enable communication. For such applications to be truly trustworthy, it must be ensured that the devices are not compromised by malicious software. Remote attestation (RA), a prominent technique, exploits challenge-response protocols to detect malware on remote devices. Given the increasing scale and number of IoT deployments, recent work on RA has explored collective attestation of swarms of devices. However state-of-the-art swarm attestation techniques require trusted hardware which makes them inapplicable to both legacy and next generation IoT deployments without trusted hardware. We present SWARNA, a software-based swarm attestation for IoT devices. After highlighting the challenges in designing such a solution, we present two protocol variants for IEEE 802.15.4 TSCH networks. We assess their performance analytically and empirically through testbed experiments. SWARNA maintains a constant payload size whereas, it increases linearly with the network size for existing solutions requiring trusted hardware. The two protocol variants attest 30 nodes networks, in 6s and 1.5s to 8.2s, respectively, depending on the number of malicious nodes. Further, we demonstrate that attestation traffic has a negligible impact on the packet delivery ratio (0.4 percent drop) of a typical data collection application.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)应用建立在资源受限的分布式设备之上，这些设备生成数据并实现通信。为了使这些应用程序真正可信，必须确保设备不会被恶意软件破坏。远程证明(RA)是一种重要的技术，它利用挑战响应协议来检测远程设备上的恶意软件。鉴于物联网部署的规模和数量不断增加，最近在RA方面的工作探索了大量设备的集体认证。然而，最先进的群证明技术需要可信硬件，这使得它们不适用于没有可信硬件的传统和下一代物联网部署。我们介绍了SWARNA，一种基于软件的物联网设备群证明。在强调了设计这种解决方案的挑战之后，我们提出了IEEE 802.15.4 TSCH网络的两种协议变体。我们通过试验台实验分析和经验地评估它们的性能。SWARNA保持恒定的有效负载大小，而对于需要可信硬件的现有解决方案，它随着网络大小线性增加。这两种协议变体证明了30个节点的网络，根据恶意节点的数量，分别为6s和1.5s到8.2s。此外，我们证明了证明流量对典型数据收集应用程序的数据包交付率(0.4%的丢弃率)的影响可以忽略不计。
papers.title_zh: 基于软件的远程网络证明

papers.title: Secure Deterministic Wallet and Stealth Address: Key-Insulated and Privacy-Preserving Signature Scheme With Publicly Derived Public Key
papers.authors: Zhen Liu, Guomin Yang, Duncan S. Wong, Khoa Nguyen, Huaxiong Wang, Xiaorong Ke, Yining Liu
papers.abstract: Deterministic Wallet (DW) and Stealth Address (SA) mechanisms have been widely adopted in the cryptocurrency community, due to their virtues on functionality and privacy protection, which come from a key derivation mechanism that allows an arbitrary number of derived keys to be generated from a master key. However, these algorithms suffer a vulnerability that, when one derived key is compromised somehow, the damage is not limited to the leaked derived key only, but to the master key and in consequence all derived keys are compromised. In this article, we introduce and formalize a new signature variant, called Key-Insulated and Privacy-Preserving Signature Scheme with Publicly Derived Public Key (PDPKS), which fully captures and improves the functionality, security, and privacy requirements of DW and SA. We propose a PDPKS construction and prove its security and privacy in the random oracle model. Furthermore, we implement the construction with parameters for 128-bit security, and the results show that it is practically efficient for the setting of cryptocurrencies. With its solid guarantee on functionality, security and privacy, as well as its practical efficiency, our PDPKS construction provides a practical cryptographic tool that refines DW and SA, without security vulnerability.
papers.abstract_zh: 确定性钱包(DW)和秘密地址(SA)机制已经在加密货币社区中被广泛采用，这是由于它们在功能和隐私保护方面的优点，这些优点来自于密钥派生机制，该机制允许从主密钥生成任意数量的派生密钥。然而，这些算法有一个弱点，即当一个导出密钥以某种方式被泄露时，损害不仅限于泄露的导出密钥，而是主密钥，因此所有导出密钥都被泄露。在本文中，我们介绍并形式化了一种新的签名变体，称为具有公开导出公钥的密钥隔离和隐私保护签名方案(PDPKS)，它完全捕获并改进了DW和SA的功能性、安全性和隐私要求。我们提出了一个PDPKS结构，并在随机预言模型下证明了它的安全性和保密性。此外，我们实现了具有128位安全参数的构造，结果表明它对于加密货币的设置是有效的。由于它在功能性、安全性和隐私性上的可靠保证，以及它的实际效率，我们的PDPKS构造提供了一种改进DW和s a的实用的加密工具，而没有安全漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 安全的确定性钱包和隐身地址：使用公共派生的公共密钥的密钥隔离和隐私签名计划

papers.title: Omega: A Secure Event Ordering Service for the Edge
papers.authors: Cláudio Correia, Miguel Correia, Luís Rodrigues
papers.abstract: The edge computing paradigm extends cloud computing with storage and processing capacity close to the edge of the network, which can be materialized by using many fog nodes placed in multiple geographic locations. Fog nodes are likely to be vulnerable to tampering, so it is important to protect the functions they provide from attacks. A key building block of many distributed applications is an ordering service that keeps track of cause-effect dependencies among events and that allows events to be processed in an order that respects causality. This article presents the design and implementation of a secure event ordering service for fog nodes. Our service, named Omega, leverages the availability of a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE), based on SGX technology, to offer fog clients guarantees regarding the order in which events are applied and served, even when fog nodes are compromised. We have also built OmegaKV, a key-value store that uses Omega to offer causal consistency. Experimental results show that the ordering service can be secured without violating the latency constraints of time-sensitive edge applications, despite the overhead associated with using a TEE. Omega introduces an additional latency of approximately 4ms, that contrary to cloud based solutions, allows latency values in the 5ms-30ms range, as required by time-sensitive edge applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 边缘计算范式通过接近网络边缘的存储和处理能力来扩展云计算，这可以通过使用放置在多个地理位置的许多雾节点来实现。Fog节点很容易被篡改，因此保护它们提供的功能免受攻击非常重要。许多分布式应用程序的一个关键构造块是一个排序服务，它跟踪事件之间的因果依赖关系，并允许按照符合因果关系的顺序处理事件。本文介绍了一个面向fog节点的安全事件订购服务的设计和实现。我们的服务名为Omega，利用基于SGX技术的可信执行环境(TEE)的可用性，为fog客户端提供关于事件应用和服务顺序的保证，即使当fog节点被破坏时也是如此。我们还构建了OmegaKV，一个使用Omega提供因果一致性的键值存储。实验结果表明，尽管存在与使用TEE相关联的开销，但是在不违反时间敏感边缘应用的延迟约束的情况下，订购服务是安全的。Omega引入了大约4毫秒的额外延迟，与基于云的解决方案相反，它允许时间敏感型边缘应用所需的5毫秒至30毫秒范围内的延迟值。
papers.title_zh: 欧米茄：边缘的安全事件订购服务

papers.title: Make Web3.0 Connected
papers.authors: Zhuotao Liu, Yangxi Xiang, Jian Shi, Peng Gao, Haoyu Wang, Xusheng Xiao, Bihan Wen, Qi Li, Yih-Chun Hu
papers.abstract: <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq1-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, often cited to drastically shape our lives, is ubiquitous. However, few literatures have discussed the crucial differentiators that separate <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq2-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> from the era we are currently living in. Via a thorough analysis of the recent blockchain infrastructure evolution, we capture a key invariant featuring the evolution, based on which we provide the first academic definition for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq3-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Our definition is not the only way of understanding <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq4-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, yet, it captures the fundamental and defining trait of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq5-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, and meanwhile it is has two desirable properties. Under this definition, we articulate three key categories of infrastructural enablers for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq6-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>: individual smart-contract capable blockchains, federated or centralized platforms capable of publishing verifiable states, and an interoperability platform to hyperconnect those state publishers to provide a unified and connected computing platform for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq7-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> applications. While innovations in all categories are necessary to fully enable <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf Web3.0}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Web</mml:mi><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">3</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn mathvariant="sans-serif">0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq8-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, in this article, we present a design for the third enabler, i.e., the first interoperability platform, namely <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf HyperService}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">HyperService</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq9-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, that advances the state-of-the-art by simultaneously delivers <italic>interoperability</italic> and <italic>programmability</italic> across <italic>heterogeneous</italic> blockchains and state publishers. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf HyperService}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">HyperService</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq10-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is powered by two innovative designs: <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf (i)}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">i</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq11-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> a developer-facing programming framework that allows developers to build cross-chain applications in a unified programming model; and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf (ii)}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">ii</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq12-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> a secure blockchain-facing cryptography protocol that provably realizes those applications on blockchains. We implement a prototype of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\mathsf HyperService}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">HyperService</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq13-3079315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> in approximately 62,000 lines of code to demonstrate its practicality, usability and scalability.

papers.title: Linguistic Steganography Based on Adaptive Probability Distribution
papers.authors: Xuejing Zhou, Wanli Peng, Boya Yang, Juan Wen, Yiming Xue, Ping Zhong
papers.abstract: Text has become one of the most extensively used digital media in Internet, which provides steganography an effective carrier to realize confidential message hiding. Nowadays, generation-based linguistic steganography has made a significant breakthrough due to the progress of deep learning. However, previous methods based on recurrent neural network have two deviations including exposure bias and embedding deviation, which seriously destroys the security of steganography. In this article, we propose a novel linguistic steganographic model based on adaptive probability distribution and generative adversarial network, which achieves the goal of hiding secret messages in the generated text while guaranteeing high security performance. First, the steganographic generator is trained by using generative adversarial network to effectively tackle the exposure bias, and then the candidate pool is obtained by a probability similarity function at each time step, which alleviates the embedding deviation through dynamically maintaining the diversity of probability distribution. Third, to further improve the security, a novel strategy that conducts information embedding during model training is put forward. We design various experiments from different aspects to verify the performance of the proposed model, including imperceptibility, statistical distribution, anti-steganalysis ability. demonstrate that our proposed model outperforms the current state-of-the-art steganographic schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 文本已经成为互联网上使用最广泛的数字媒体之一，这为隐写术提供了一种实现机密信息隐藏的有效载体。如今，由于深度学习的进展，基于世代的语言隐写术取得了重大突破。然而，以往基于递归神经网络的方法存在暴露偏差和嵌入偏差两种偏差，严重破坏了隐写术的安全性。本文提出了一种基于自适应概率分布和生成对抗网络的语言隐写模型，在保证高安全性能的同时，达到了在生成的文本中隐藏秘密信息的目的。首先，利用生成式对抗网络训练隐写生成器，有效解决暴露偏差问题；然后，在每个时间步利用概率相似度函数获得候选池，通过动态维护概率分布的多样性来缓解嵌入偏差。第三，为了进一步提高安全性，提出了在模型训练过程中进行信息嵌入的新策略。我们从不同的角度设计了不同的实验来验证所提模型的性能，包括不可感知性、统计分布、抗隐写分析能力。证明了我们提出的模型优于当前最先进的隐写方案。
papers.title_zh: 基于自适应概率分布的语言隐志

papers.title: Unleashing Coveraged-Based Fuzzing Through Comprehensive, Efficient, and Faithful Exploitable-Bug Exposing
papers.authors: Bowen Wang, Kangjie Lu, Qiushi Wu, Aditya Pakki
papers.abstract: Fuzzing has become an essential means of finding software bugs. Bug finding through fuzzing requires two parts—exploring code paths to reach bugs and exposing bugs when they are reached. Existing fuzzing research has primarily focused on improving code coverage but not on exposing bugs. Sanitizers such as AddressSanitizer (ASAN) and MemorySanitizer (MSAN) have been the dominating tools for exposing bugs. However, sanitizer-based bug exposing has the following limitations. (1) sanitizers are not compatible with each other. (2) sanitizers incur significant runtime overhead. (3) sanitizers may generate false positives, and (4) exposed bugs may not be exploitable. To address these limitations, we propose Expozzer, a fuzzing system that can expose bugs comprehensively, efficiently, and faithfully. The intuition of Expozzer is to detect bugs through divergences in a properly diversified dual-execution environment, which does not require maintaining or checking execution metadata. We design a practical and deterministic dual-execution engine, a co-design for dual-execution and fuzzers, bug-sensitive diversification, comprehensive, and efficient divergence detection to ensure the effectiveness of Expozzer. The results of evaluations show that Expozzer can detect not only CVE-assigned vulnerabilities reliably, but also new vulnerabilities in well-tested real-world programs. Expozzer is 10 times faster than MemorySanitizer and is similar to AddressSanitizer.
papers.abstract_zh: 模糊化已经成为发现软件漏洞的重要手段。通过fuzzing发现Bug需要两个部分——探索找到bug的代码路径和在找到bug时暴露bug。现有的模糊化研究主要集中于提高代码覆盖率，而不是暴露bug。杀毒软件，如地址杀毒软件(ASAN)和内存初始化软件(MSAN)已经成为暴露漏洞的主要工具。然而，基于消毒剂的漏洞暴露有以下限制。(1)消毒剂彼此不相容。(2)杀毒程序会导致显著的运行时开销。(3)杀毒程序可能产生误报，以及(4)暴露的错误可能不可利用。为了解决这些限制，我们提出了Expozzer，一个可以全面、有效、忠实地暴露bug的模糊化系统。Expozzer的直觉是通过适当多样化的双执行环境中的差异来检测bug，这不需要维护或检查执行元数据。我们设计了一个实用的和确定性的双执行引擎，双执行和fuzzers的协同设计，对bug敏感的多样化，全面和有效的发散检测，以确保Expozzer的有效性。评估结果表明，Expozzer不仅能可靠地检测出CVE指定的漏洞，还能检测出经过充分测试的真实程序中的新漏洞。Expozzer比MemorySanitizer快10倍，类似于AddressSanitizer。
papers.title_zh: 通过全面，高效和忠实的可剥削的爆炸释放基于覆盖的基于覆盖的模糊

papers.title: Building Fault-Tolerant Overlays With Low Node Degrees for Topic-Based Publish/Subscribe
papers.authors: Chen Chen, Roman Vitenberg, Hans-Arno Jacobsen
papers.abstract: We present a new approach for designing reliable and scalable overlay networks to support topic-based pub/sub communication. We propose the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\mathsf {MinAvg}}-{k}{\mathsf {TCO}}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">MinAvg</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">TCO</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq1-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> problem parameterized by <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${k}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq2-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>: use the minimum number of edges to create a <italic><inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${k}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq3-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-topic-connected overlay</italic> (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{k}TCO}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mi>T</mml:mi><mml:mi>C</mml:mi><mml:mi>O</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq4-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) for pub/sub systems, i.e., for each topic, the sub-overlay induced by nodes interested in the topic is <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${k}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq5-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-connected. We prove the NP-completeness of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\mathsf {MinAvg}}-{k}{\mathsf {TCO}}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">MinAvg</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">TCO</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq6-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and show a lower-bound for the hardness of its approximation. For <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\mathsf {MinAvg}}-{2}{\mathsf {TCO}}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">MinAvg</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mn>2</mml:mn><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">TCO</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq7-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, we present GM2, the first polynomial-time algorithm with an approximation ratio. For <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\mathsf {MinAvg}}-{k}{\mathsf {TCO}}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">MinAvg</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">TCO</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq9-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, where <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${k} \geq {2}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mo>≥</mml:mo><mml:mn>2</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq10-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, we propose HararyPT, a simple and efficient heuristic that aligns nodes across different sub-overlays. We experimentally demonstrate the scalability of GM2 and HararyPT with regards to overlay quality under representative pub/sub workloads. GM2 outputs <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{2}TCO}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>2</mml:mn><mml:mi>T</mml:mi><mml:mi>C</mml:mi><mml:mi>O</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq13-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> with an empirically insignificant increase in the average node degree, e.g., an increase by 4 in a 1000-node network, as compared to the baseline <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{1}TCO}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mi>T</mml:mi><mml:mi>C</mml:mi><mml:mi>O</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq14-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> produced by the best-known algorithm. Moreover, GM2 reduces the topic diameters by around 50 percent with respect to those in <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{1}TCO}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mi>T</mml:mi><mml:mi>C</mml:mi><mml:mi>O</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq16-3080281.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种新的方法来设计可靠和可扩展的覆盖网络，以支持基于主题的发布/订阅通信。我们建议使用< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ mathsf { MinAvg } }-{ k } { \ mathsf { TCO } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > MinAvg </MML:mi > < MML:mo >-</MML:mo > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > < MML:mi math variant我们证明了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ mathsf { MinAvg } }-{ k } { \ mathsf { TCO } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > MinAvg </MML:mi >-</MML:mo > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > < MMLfor < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ mathsf { MinAvg } }-{ 2 } { \ mathsf { TCO } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > MinAvg </MML:mi > < MML:mo >-</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 2 </MML:Mn > < MML:mi math variant = " mfor < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ mathsf { MinAvg } }-{ k } { \ mathsf { TCO } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > MinAvg </MML:mi > < MML:mo >-</MML:mo > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > < MML:mi math variant = " m我们实验性地展示了GM2和HararyPT在典型的发布/订阅工作负载下在覆盖质量方面的可扩展性。GM2输出< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { 2 } TCO } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 2 </MML:Mn > < MML:mi > T </MML:mi > < MML:mi > C </MML:mi > < MML:mi > O </MML:mi > </MML:mi > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:T此外，相对于< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { 1 } TCO } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > < MML:mi > T </MML:mi > < MML:mi > C </MML:mi > < MML:mi > O </MML:mi > </MML:mrow
papers.title_zh: 基于主题的出版/订阅的构建具有低节点学位的耐故障覆盖层

papers.title: Policy-Based Broadcast Access Authorization for Flexible Data Sharing in Clouds
papers.authors: Hua Deng, Jixin Zhang, Zheng Qin, Qianhong Wu, Hui Yin, Aniello Castiglione
papers.abstract: Cloud storage services allow data owners to outsource their potentially sensitive data (e.g., private genome data) to remote cloud servers in a ciphertext form. To enable data owners to further share the data encrypted in ciphertexts, many proxy re-encryption (PRE) schemes are proposed. However, most schemes only support single-recipient or coarse-grained re-encryption, which may limit the flexibility for data sharing. To address this issue, we propose a Policy-based Broadcast Access Authorization (PBAA) scheme by introducing the well-established identity-based broadcast encryption (IBBE) and key-policy attribute-based encryption into PRE. In our PBAA scheme, a data owner can apply IBBE to encrypt his data to a group of recipients. More importantly, the data owner can generate a delegation key with an access policy, and send this key to the cloud such that it can convert any initial ciphertext satisfying the access policy into a new ciphertext for a new group of recipients. With these features, cloud users can share their remote data in a secure and flexible way. Security analysis and performance evaluation show that the PBAA scheme is secure and efficient, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 云存储服务允许数据所有者将其潜在的敏感数据(例如，私人基因组数据)以密文形式外包给远程云服务器。为了使数据所有者能够进一步共享加密在密文中的数据，许多代理重加密(PRE)方案被提出。然而，大多数方案只支持单接收者或粗粒度的重加密，这可能会限制数据共享的灵活性。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了一种基于策略的广播接入授权(PBAA)方案，该方案将成熟的基于身份的广播加密(IBBE)和基于密钥策略属性的加密引入到PRE。在我们的PBAA方案中，数据所有者可以应用IBBE加密他的数据给一组接收者。更重要的是，数据所有者可以生成一个带有访问策略的委托密钥，并将这个密钥发送到云，这样云就可以将任何满足访问策略的初始密文转换为新的一组接收者的新密文。有了这些特性，云用户可以安全、灵活地共享他们的远程数据。安全性分析和性能评估表明，PBAA方案是安全有效的。
papers.title_zh: 基于策略的广播访问授权，用于云中的灵活数据共享

papers.title: Enabling Secure and Efficient Decentralized Storage Auditing With Blockchain
papers.authors: Yuefeng Du, Huayi Duan, Anxin Zhou, Cong Wang, Man Ho Au, Qian Wang
papers.abstract: As a promising alternative solution to cloud storage, decentralized storage networks (DSN) are widely anticipated to develop continuously and reshape the storage market share in the foreseeable future. In particular, one of the most important research problems is how to enforce the quality of service (QoS) in the context of storage solutions. Despite plenty of auditing-related works in the context of cloud storage, none of them can be directly applied to the decentralized storage paradigm. The challenges of designing a feasible storage auditing framework emanate from two aspects: 1) security problems unique to the decentralized settings and 2) performance overhead due to on-chain operations. In this article, we first put forward a basic storage auditing framework that satisfies the security and efficiency requirements, and outperforms the existing approaches. We also identify a critical and overlooked security problem that would compromise the integrity of storage auditing solutions in the blockchain paradigm. With our refined storage auditing design based on customized zero knowledge protocols, we propose a convenient mitigation solution in our revised security model. The evaluation results confirm that our solution would only incur a 10–15 percent increase in the overall auditing costs for common usage scenarios, compared to the basic design.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为云存储的一种有前途的替代解决方案，分布式存储网络(DSN)被广泛认为将在可预见的未来继续发展并重塑存储市场份额。特别是，最重要的研究问题之一是如何在存储解决方案的上下文中实施服务质量(QoS)。尽管在云存储的上下文中有大量与审计相关的工作，但是没有一个可以直接应用于分散存储范例。设计一个可行的存储审计框架的挑战来自两个方面:1)分散设置特有的安全问题，以及2)链上操作导致的性能开销。在本文中，我们首先提出了一个基本的存储审计框架，该框架满足安全性和效率要求，并优于现有的方法。我们还发现了一个被忽视的关键安全问题，该问题会损害区块链模式中存储审核解决方案的完整性。借助基于定制零知识协议的优化存储审核设计，我们在修订后的安全模型中提出了一个方便的缓解解决方案。评估结果证实，与基本设计相比，我们的解决方案在常见使用场景下只会增加10-15%的总体审计成本。
papers.title_zh: 通过区块链实现安全有效的分散存储审核

papers.title: WebEnclave: Protect Web Secrets From Browser Extensions With Software Enclave
papers.authors: Xinyu Wang, Yuefeng Du, Cong Wang, Qian Wang, Liming Fang
papers.abstract: Browser extensions are widely used nowadays to customize users’ browsers with more functionalities, meanwhile introduce potential risks due to escalated privileges. Existing security mechanisms, such as Same Origin Policy and Content Security Policy, do not apply to browser extensions that can read and write on web applications at any time. In spite of the state-of-the-art industrial efforts that rely on centralized management to inspect and detect malicious behaviors massively, the detection-based method cannot analyze fast-evolving behaviors of malicious browser extensions. To this end, we adopt a novel approach to protect users from malicious browser extensions, where we consider the problem of malicious extensions on the side of web applications. From a high level point of view, web developers are allowed to specify sensitive parts in a web application by using our provided software enclave. With our proposed WebEnclave extension installed, when users visit a web application, sensitive information required for the web application to work normally is sealed into an isolated world locally that malicious extensions cannot access. Extensive evaluation of our built prototype shows it can effectively protect user secrets from malicious extensions with negligible performance overhead and usability inconvenience. We also publish source codes for public use.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，浏览器扩展被广泛用于定制具有更多功能的用户浏览器，同时由于权限升级而引入了潜在的风险。现有的安全机制，如同源策略和内容安全策略，不适用于可以随时在web应用程序上读写的浏览器扩展。尽管依靠集中管理来大规模检查和检测恶意行为的最先进的工业努力，基于检测的方法不能分析恶意浏览器扩展的快速发展的行为。为此，我们采用了一种新颖的方法来保护用户免受恶意浏览器扩展的侵害，其中我们考虑了web应用程序端的恶意扩展问题。从高层次的角度来看，web开发人员可以使用我们提供的软件enclave来指定web应用程序中的敏感部分。安装了我们建议的WebEnclave扩展后，当用户访问web应用程序时，web应用程序正常工作所需的敏感信息被密封在本地的隔离世界中，恶意扩展无法访问。对我们构建的原型的广泛评估表明，它可以有效地保护用户秘密免受恶意扩展，而性能开销和可用性不便可以忽略不计。我们还发布源代码供公众使用。
papers.title_zh: Webenclave：使用软件Enclave保护网络秘密免受浏览器扩展

papers.title: Performability of Network Service Chains: Stochastic Modeling and Assessment of Softwarized IP Multimedia Subsystem
papers.authors: Mario Di Mauro, Giovanni Galatro, Fabio Postiglione, Marco Tambasco
papers.abstract: Service provisioning mechanisms implemented across 5G infrastructures take broadly into use the network service chain concept. Typically, it is coupled with Network Function Virtualization (NFV) paradigm, and consists in defining a pre-determined path traversed by a set of softwarized network nodes to provide specific services. A well known chain-like framework is the IP Multimedia Subsystem (IMS), a key infrastructure of 5G networks, that we characterize both by a performance and an availability perspective. Precisely, supported by a designed from scratch testbed realized through <italic>Clearwater</italic> platform, we perform a stochastic assessment of a softwarized IMS (softIMS) architecture where two main stages stand out: i) a performance analysis, where, exploiting the queueing network decomposition method, we formalize an optimization problem of resource allocation by modeling each softIMS node as an <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$M/G/c$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>M</mml:mi><mml:mo>/</mml:mo><mml:mi>G</mml:mi><mml:mo>/</mml:mo><mml:mi>c</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="dimauro-ieq1-3082626.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> system; ii) an availability assessment, where, adopting the Stochastic Reward Net methodology, we are able to characterize the behavior of softIMS in terms of failure/repair events, and to derive a set of optimal configurations satisfying a given availability requirement (e.g., five nines) while minimizing deployment costs. Two routines dubbed <italic>OptCNT</italic> and <italic>OptSearchChain</italic> have been devised to govern the performance and availability analyses, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 跨5G基础设施实施的服务供应机制广泛采用了网络服务链概念。典型地，它与网络功能虚拟化(NFV)范例相结合，并且包括定义由一组软件化的网络节点穿过的预定路径，以提供特定的服务。一个众所周知的链状框架是IP多媒体子系统(IMS)，这是5G网络的一个关键基础设施，我们从性能和可用性角度对其进行了描述。确切地说，在通过< italic>Clearwater</italic >平台实现的从零开始设计的测试床的支持下，我们对软件化IMS (softIMS)架构执行随机评估，其中两个主要阶段非常突出:I)性能分析，其中，利用排队网络分解方法，我们通过将每个softIMS节点建模为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " >＄M/G/c ＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:MML:mathii)可用性评估，其中，采用随机回报网方法，我们能够根据故障/修复事件来表征软件的行为，并且导出满足给定可用性要求(例如，五个九)同时最小化部署成本的一组最优配置。名为< italic>OptCNT</italic >和< italic>OptSearchChain</italic >的两个例程分别用于管理性能和可用性分析。
papers.title_zh: 网络服务链的性能：软件IP多媒体子系统的随机建模和评估

papers.title: ServiceRank: Root Cause Identification of Anomaly in Large-Scale Microservice Architectures
papers.authors: Meng Ma, Weilan Lin, Disheng Pan, Ping Wang
papers.abstract: Nowadays, increasing business applications running in the cloud are embracing the microservice architecture. This article presents the challenges and implications of diagnosing root causes of anomalies in large-scale microservice architecture using real incidents in IBM Bluemix. We propose ServiceRank, a novel framework for anomaly detection and root cause identification in the microservice architecture to tackle these challenges. ServiceRank introduces an anomaly detector followed by a root cause analysis module, which detects the suspected abnormal service without pre-defined thresholds. To generalize our approach, we design a causal relationship extraction approach to construct impact graphs for root cause investigation according to specific anomalies. To eliminate cloud design-patterns' impact on anomaly diagnosis, we propose a correlation calibration mechanism in ServiceRank and present a calibration algorithm for the circuit breaker - A typical protection pattern in the microservice architecture. Finally, we design a heuristic investigation algorithm based on the second-order random walk to identify the anomaly's root cause. Experimental results in a simulated environment and the IBM Bluemix platform show that ServiceRank outperforms selected approaches in accuracy and offers fast identification of root cause service when an anomaly occurs. Moreover, we can deploy ServiceRank rapidly and easily in various systems without any pre-defined knowledge.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，越来越多运行在云中的业务应用都在拥抱微服务架构。本文介绍了使用IBM Bluemix中的真实事件来诊断大规模微服务架构中异常的根本原因的挑战和意义。我们提出了ServiceRank，这是一个用于微服务架构中异常检测和根本原因识别的新框架，以应对这些挑战。ServiceRank引入了异常检测器，之后是根本原因分析模块，该模块在没有预定义阈值的情况下检测可疑的异常服务。为了推广我们的方法，我们设计了一种因果关系提取方法，以根据特定的异常来构建用于根本原因调查的影响图。为了消除云设计模式对异常诊断的影响，我们在ServiceRank中提出了一种关联校准机制，并针对微服务架构中的典型保护模式&断路器提出了一种校准算法。最后，我们设计了一个基于二阶随机游走的启发式调查算法来识别异常的根本原因。在模拟环境和IBM Bluemix平台上的实验结果表明，ServiceRank在准确性上优于所选方法，并在异常发生时提供了对根本原因服务的快速识别。此外，我们可以在各种系统中快速轻松地部署ServiceRank，而无需任何预定义的知识。
papers.title_zh: Servicerank：根本原因鉴定大规模微服务体系结构中的异常

papers.title: PrivFace: Fast Privacy-Preserving Face Authentication With Revocable and Reusable Biometric Credentials
papers.authors: Jing Lei, Qingqi Pei, Yao Wang, Wenhai Sun, Xuefeng Liu
papers.abstract: Privacy concerns of using sensitive biometric data as credentials arise with the wide adoption of user-friendly face authentication. To protect the facial features of users, two important functions, i.e., <italic>revocability</italic> and <italic>reusability</italic>, are anticipated to be realized in a privacy-preserving face authentication design. Revocability requires an effective approach to deregister or replace user credentials when the authentication server is compromised; For reusability, the same credentials should appear independently to non-cooperating applications. Accomplishing these two properties is challenging as the uniqueness of facial features. In this article, we present <sc>PrivFace</sc>, a fast privacy-preserving face authentication, supporting revocable, and reusable biometric credentials. The core innovation is a novel secure inner product protocol that employs a lightweight random masking technique instead of time-consuming public-key cryptographic operations to efficiently measure facial data similarity. We rigorously analyze the security to show that the server cannot acquire the user's sensitive biological features during the authentication. Our experiment with real-world datasets shows that <sc>PrivFace</sc> is friendly to edge smart devices, which takes less than <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$100 ms$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>100</mml:mn><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mi>s</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq1-3083970.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> per successful authentication on a common smartphone and outperforms the prior art J. Lei, Q. Pei <italic>et al.</italic> [1]. by <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$20 \times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>20</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq2-3083970.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. We have made the relevant codes open-source to the community for further research.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着用户友好的面部认证的广泛采用，使用敏感的生物特征数据作为凭证的隐私问题出现了。为了保护用户的面部特征，在保护隐私的面部认证设计中期望实现两个重要的功能，即< italic >可撤销性</italic >和< italic >可重用性</italic >。可撤销性需要一种有效的方法，以便在认证服务器受损时撤销或替换用户凭证；为了可重用性，相同的凭证应该独立地出现在不合作的应用程序中。由于面部特征的独特性，实现这两个特性是具有挑战性的。在本文中，我们介绍了< sc>PrivFace</sc >，这是一种快速的隐私保护面部认证，支持可撤销和可重用的生物特征凭证。核心创新是一种新颖的安全内积协议，该协议采用轻量级随机屏蔽技术而不是耗时的公钥加密操作来有效地测量面部数据相似性。我们严格分析了安全性，证明服务器在认证过程中无法获取用户的敏感生物特征。我们对真实数据集的实验表明，< sc>PrivFace</sc >对边缘智能设备是友好的，它花费的时间少于< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " >＄100 ms ＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 100 </MML:Mn > < MML:mi > m </MML:mi > < MML:mi > s </MML:mi > </MML:mrow >by < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 20 \ times $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 20 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >×</MML:mo > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Liu-ieq 2-3083970 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula我们已经向社区开放了相关代码，以供进一步研究。
papers.title_zh: 私密：具有可撤销和可重复使用的生物识别凭证的快速保护面部身份验证

papers.title: ABAC-Based Security Model for DDS
papers.authors: Hwimin Kim, Dae-Kyoo Kim, Alaa S. Alaerjan
papers.abstract: Security is increasingly critical in data communication of distributed environments. DDS is a middleware standard for data-centric publish/subscribe communication in a large scale real-time environment. DDS provides a security model for secure data communication. A major service of the security model is authorization. The authorization is based on the contents of messages rather than the information about the participant which should be the subject for access control. In this article, we present a novel approach for improved authorization of the DDS security model using ABAC. We first analyze the DDS security model and identify integration points for ABAC. Based on the analysis, we incorporate ABAC entities into the security model with ABAC behaviors defined across RTPS and DCPS. We implemented the model in XACML and evaluated by applying it to a patient monitoring system in the healthcare domain for its effectiveness, scalability, and efficiency in a controlled environment. The evaluation on effectiveness demonstrates that the model successfully enforces access control during the discovery process in a dynamic changing setting. The evaluation on scalability and efficiency demonstrates that the model is capable of handling 1,050 access requests simultaneously under the average of 40.60 milliseconds which satisfies the TT3 requirements in IEC 61850-5 with the average ABAC overheads of 10.62 milliseconds accounting for 26.67 percent of the communication time.
papers.abstract_zh: 在分布式环境的数据通信中，安全性变得越来越重要。DDS是一个中间件标准，用于大规模实时环境中以数据为中心的发布/订阅通信。DDS为安全数据通信提供了一种安全模型。安全模型的一个主要服务是授权。授权是基于消息的内容，而不是关于应该作为访问控制对象的参与者的信息。在本文中，我们提出了一种使用ABAC来改进DDS安全模型授权的新方法。我们首先分析DDS安全模型，并确定ABAC的集成点。根据分析，我们将ABAC实体纳入安全模型，在RTPS和DCPS定义ABAC行为。我们在XACML中实现了该模型，并通过将其应用于医疗保健领域的患者监控系统来评估其在受控环境中的有效性、可伸缩性和效率。有效性评估表明，该模型在动态变化的环境中成功地实施了发现过程中的访问控制。对可扩展性和效率的评估表明，该模型能够在平均40.60毫秒的时间内同时处理1050个访问请求，满足IEC 61850-5 TT3的要求，平均ABAC开销为10.62毫秒，占通信时间的26.67%。
papers.title_zh: 基于ABAC的DDS的安全模型

papers.title: Remote Attacks on Drones Vision Sensors: An Empirical Study
papers.authors: Zhangjie Fu, Yueyan Zhi, Shouling Ji, Xingming Sun
papers.abstract: Vision systems applied to drones, automatic vehicles, and robots have become an increasingly popular sensing method. However, vision sensors that make up these systems are vulnerable to malicious input attacks, which can lead to serious consequences. Privious work on attacking cameras of automatic vehicles shows that lasers can cause failure of camera-based functionalities, but it lacks analysis of the results and does not conduct experiments in the actual scenarios. In this article, a laser-based attack on cameras and binocular vision sensors of drones is presented. First, we propose a threat model that describes how an adversary attacks the drone then perform feasibility analysis of the attack from theory and practice. Next, we design multi-variable experiments in the lab to systematically study the effectiveness of the attack, and further analyze how each variable affects the results. To get intuitive and fine-grained results, multidimensional image similarity is used to measure the effects. In particular, experiments in the actual scenarios are carried out, and results show that the attack can make obstacle avoidance, target recognition and tracking completely failed. Finally, lightweight countermeasures based on hardware and software are proposed to improve sensor resilience against the attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 应用于无人机、自动车辆和机器人的视觉系统已经成为越来越受欢迎的传感方法。然而，组成这些系统的视觉传感器容易受到恶意输入攻击，这可能导致严重的后果。关于攻击自动车辆摄像头的秘密工作表明，激光会导致基于摄像头的功能失效，但它缺乏对结果的分析，并且没有在实际场景中进行实验。在这篇文章中，对无人机的摄像头和双目视觉传感器进行了激光攻击。首先，我们提出一个威胁模型，描述对手如何攻击无人机，然后从理论和实践上对攻击进行可行性分析。接下来，我们在实验室中设计多变量实验，系统地研究攻击的有效性，并进一步分析每个变量如何影响结果。为了得到直观和细粒度的结果，使用多维图像相似性来衡量效果。特别是在实际场景下进行了实验，结果表明该攻击可以使避障、目标识别和跟踪完全失败。最后，提出了基于硬件和软件的轻量级对策，以提高传感器对攻击的抵御能力。
papers.title_zh: 对无人机视觉传感器的远程攻击：一项实证研究

papers.title: Fog-to-MultiCloud Cooperative Ehealth Data Management With Application-Aware Secure Deduplication
papers.authors: Yinjin Fu, Nong Xiao, Tao Chen, Jian Wang
papers.abstract: The healthcare industry faces challenges regarding the security and efficiency of data management for patient health records (PHRs). We propose SafePHR: a secure and efficient medical data service with application aware deduplication in fog-to-multicloud encrypted storage. It introduces a fog-to-multicloud cooperative storage model, which combines low-latency and high-safety local fog with unlimited capacity and built-in disaster recovery in remote multi-cloud to enhance eHealth data management. It also provides an application aware secure deduplication scheme to improve the data traffic and space efficiency of cloud storage for encrypted PHRs using variants of convergent encryption. Then, it further enhances the resiliency and security of cloud storage by striping encrypted data across multiple cloud vendors with a fault-tolerant coding scheme. Compared with the state-of-the-art of cloud-assisted eHealth systems, our experiments demonstrate that SafePHR can ensure data confidentiality of deduplication, achieve a competitive low cloud storage space overhead, and improve system performance with high fault-tolerance capability.
papers.abstract_zh: 医疗保健行业面临着患者健康记录(phr)数据管理的安全性和效率方面的挑战。我们提出SafePHR:一种安全高效的医疗数据服务，在雾到多云加密存储中提供应用感知型重复数据删除。它引入了雾到多云的合作存储模型，将低延迟、高安全性的本地雾与远程多云中的无限容量和内置灾难恢复相结合，以增强电子健康数据管理。它还提供了一个应用感知的安全重复数据删除方案，以提高使用聚合加密变体的加密phr的数据流量和云存储空间效率。然后，它通过采用容错编码方案在多个云供应商之间条带化加密数据，进一步增强云存储的弹性和安全性。与云辅助的电子健康系统相比，我们的实验表明SafePHR能够确保重复数据删除的数据机密性，实现具有竞争力的低云存储空间开销，并提高系统性能和高容错能力。
papers.title_zh: FOG到Multicloud合作EHealth数据管理，并具有应用程序意识安全重复数据删除

papers.title: Golden Grain: Building a Secure and Decentralized Model Marketplace for MLaaS
papers.authors: Jia-Si Weng, Jian Weng, Chengjun Cai, Hongwei Huang, Cong Wang
papers.abstract: ML-as-a-service (MLaaS) becomes increasingly popular and revolutionizes the lives of people. A natural requirement for MLaaS is, however, to provide highly accurate prediction services. To achieve this, current MLaaS systems integrate and combine multiple well-trained models in their services. Yet, in reality, there is no easy way for MLaaS providers, especially for startups, to collect sufficiently well-trained models from individual developers, due to the lack of incentives. In this article, we aim to fill this gap by building up a model marketplace, called as Golden Grain, to facilitate model sharing, which enforces the fair model-money swapping process between individual developers and MLaaS providers. Specifically, we deploy the swapping process on the blockchain, and further introduce a blockchain-empowered model benchmarking process for transparently determining the model prices according to their authentic performances, so as to motivate the faithful contributions of well-trained models. Especially, to ease the blockchain overhead for model benchmarking, our marketplace carefully offloads the heavy computation and designs a secure off-chain on-chain interaction protocol based on a trusted execution environment (TEE), for ensuring both the integrity and authenticity of benchmarking. We implement a prototype of our Golden Grain on the Ethereum blockchain, and conduct extensive experiments using standard benchmark datasets to demonstrate the practically affordable performance of our design.
papers.abstract_zh: ML即服务(MLaaS)变得越来越流行，并彻底改变了人们的生活。然而，MLaaS的一个自然要求是提供高度精确的预测服务。为了实现这一点，当前的MLaaS系统在其服务中集成和组合了多个训练有素的模型。然而，在现实中，由于缺乏激励，MLaaS提供商，尤其是初创公司，没有简单的方法从个体开发者那里收集足够训练有素的模型。在本文中，我们旨在通过建立一个模型市场来填补这一空白，该市场被称为Golden Grain，以促进模型共享，从而在个人开发者和MLaaS提供商之间强制执行公平的模型货币交换过程。具体来说，我们在区块链部署了交换过程，并进一步引入了区块链授权的模型基准过程，根据模型的真实表现透明地确定模型价格，以激励训练有素的模型的忠实贡献。特别是，为了减轻模型基准测试的区块链开销，我们的市场小心地卸载了繁重的计算，并设计了一个基于可信执行环境(TEE)的安全链上链下交互协议，以确保基准测试的完整性和真实性。我们在以太坊区块链上实现了我们的黄金纹理原型，并使用标准基准数据集进行了广泛的实验，以展示我们设计的实际可负担的性能。
papers.title_zh: 黄金谷物：为MLAA建立安全而分散的模型市场

papers.title: SecRec: A Privacy-Preserving Method for the Context-Aware Recommendation System
papers.authors: Jinrong Chen, Lin Liu, Rongmao Chen, Wei Peng, Xinyi Huang
papers.abstract: Context-aware recommendation systems are of increasing popularity in the digital era to recommend personalized items to users. However, how to ensure user data privacy while remaining high recommendation accuracy is widely considered a challenge. In this work, we propose a privacy-preserving method for the context-aware recommendation system in the two-cloud model. In particular, we first adjust the standard additive secret sharing scheme to support secure negative integers computation, based on which we manage to design secure comparison protocol and division protocols that enjoy desirable security and efficiency. By using these new protocols, we propose a secure and efficient context-aware recommendation system that also supports offline users. Compared with the state-of-the-art, our scheme achieves stronger data privacy preservation by further protecting the intermediate data calculated during the system training. Experimental results on real-world datasets indicate that our scheme is efficient. Notable, our system could achieve more significant performance improvement by running the underlying schemes in parallel.
papers.abstract_zh: 情境感知推荐系统在数字时代越来越受欢迎，可以向用户推荐个性化的项目。然而，如何在保持高推荐准确度的同时确保用户数据隐私被广泛认为是一个挑战。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一种在两云模型下的上下文感知推荐系统的隐私保护方法。特别地，我们首先调整了标准的加性秘密共享方案以支持安全的负整数计算，并在此基础上设计了安全的比较协议和除法协议。通过使用这些新的协议，我们提出了一个安全有效的上下文感知推荐系统，它也支持离线用户。与现有技术相比，我们的方案通过进一步保护在系统训练期间计算的中间数据来实现更强的数据隐私保护。真实数据集上的实验结果表明我们的方案是有效的。值得注意的是，通过并行运行底层方案，我们的系统可以实现更显著的性能提升。
papers.title_zh: SECREC：上下文感知推荐系统的隐私权方法

papers.title: DAMIA: Leveraging Domain Adaptation as a Defense Against Membership Inference Attacks
papers.authors: Hongwei Huang, Weiqi Luo, Guoqiang Zeng, Jian Weng, Yue Zhang, Anjia Yang
papers.abstract: Deep Learning (DL) techniques allow ones to train models from a dataset to solve tasks. DL has attracted much interest given its fancy performance and potential market value, while security issues are amongst the most colossal concerns. However, the DL models may be prone to the membership inference attack, where an attacker determines whether a given sample is from the training dataset. Efforts have been made to hinder the attack but unfortunately, they may lead to a major overhead or impaired usability. In this article, we propose and implement DAMIA, leveraging Domain Adaptation (DA) as a defense aginist membership inference attacks. Our observation is that during the training process, DA obfuscates the dataset to be protected using another relate and similar dataset, and derives a model that underlyingly extracts the features from both datasets. Seeing that the model is obfuscated, membership inference fails, while the extracted features provide supports for usability. Extensive experiments have been conducted to validates our intuition. The model trained by DAMIA has a negligible footprint to the usability and introduces slight overhead compared with other defenses. Our experiment also excludes factors that may hinder the performance of DAMIA, and comparisons with other defenses, providing a potential guideline to vendors and researchers to benefit from our solution in a timely manner.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习(DL)技术允许人们从数据集训练模型来解决任务。鉴于其出色的性能和潜在的市场价值，DL吸引了很多兴趣，而安全问题是最大的担忧之一。然而，DL模型可能容易受到成员推理攻击，攻击者确定给定的样本是否来自训练数据集。人们已经努力阻止这种攻击，但不幸的是，它们可能会导致较大的开销或可用性受损。在这篇文章中，我们提出并实现了DAMIA，利用领域适应(DA)作为一种防御成员推理攻击。我们的观察是，在训练过程中，DA使用另一个相关和相似的数据集来混淆要保护的数据集，并导出从两个数据集提取特征的模型。鉴于模型是模糊的，成员推理失败，而提取的特征提供了可用性的支持。已经进行了大量的实验来验证我们的直觉。由DAMIA训练的模型对可用性的影响可以忽略不计，并且与其他防御相比引入了轻微的开销。我们的实验还排除了可能阻碍DAMIA性能的因素，并与其他防御进行了比较，为供应商和研究人员及时受益于我们的解决方案提供了潜在的指导。
papers.title_zh: 达米亚：利用域的适应作为对会员推理攻击的防御

papers.title: Taking Care of the Discretization Problem: A Comprehensive Study of the Discretization Problem and a Black-Box Adversarial Attack in Discrete Integer Domain
papers.authors: Lei Bu, Zhe Zhao, Yuchao Duan, Fu Song
papers.abstract: Neural network based (NN-based) classifiers are known vulnerable against adversarial examples, namely, adding slight perturbations to a benign image cause a classifier to make a false prediction. To evaluate the robustness of NN-based classifiers against adversarial examples, numerous adversarial attacks with high success rates have been proposed recently. NN-based image classifiers usually normalize valid images (e.g., RGB image where the value at each coordinate is an integer between 0 and 255) into a real continuous domain (e.g., 3-dimensional matrix where the value at each coordinate is a real number between 0 and 1) and make classification decisions on the normalized images. However, adversarial examples crafted in a real continuous domain may become benign once they are denormalized back into the corresponding discrete integer domain, known as the discretization problem. This problem has been mentioned in some prior works but received relatively limited attention. In this work, we report the first comprehensive study of existing works to understand the impacts of the discretization problem. By analyzing 35 representative methods and empirically studying 20 representative open source tools, we found 29/35 (theoretically) and 14/20 (empirically) are affected by the discretization problem, e.g., the success rate could dramatically drop from 100 to 10 percent after the domain transformation. As the first step towards addressing this problem in a black-box scenario, we propose a novel derivative-free optimization method, which can directly craft adversarial examples in the discrete integer domain. Experimental results show that the method achieves nearly 100 percent attack success rates for both targeted and untargeted attacks, comparable to the most popular white-box methods (FGSM, BIM and C&W), and significantly outperforms representative black-box methods (ZOO, AutoZOOM, NES-PGD, Bandits, FD, FD-PSO and GenAttack). Our results suggest that the discretization problem should be treated more seriously, and the discrete optimization algorithms show a promising future in crafting effective black-box attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 已知基于神经网络(NN-based)的分类器易受敌对实例的攻击，即，向良性图像添加轻微扰动会导致分类器做出错误预测。为了评估基于神经网络的分类器对对抗性例子的鲁棒性，最近提出了许多具有高成功率的对抗性攻击。基于NN的图像分类器通常将有效图像(例如，RGB图像，其中每个坐标处的值是0到255之间的整数)归一化到实连续域(例如，三维矩阵，其中每个坐标处的值是0到1之间的实数)中，并对归一化的图像做出分类决定。然而，在真实连续域中制作的对立示例一旦被反规格化回到相应的离散整数域中就可能变成良性的，这被称为离散化问题。这个问题已经在一些先前的作品中被提及，但是受到的关注相对有限。在这项工作中，我们报告了现有工作的第一次全面研究，以了解离散化问题的影响。通过分析35种有代表性的方法和对20种有代表性的开源工具进行实证研究，我们发现29/35(理论上)和14/20(实证上)受到离散化问题的影响，例如，在域转换后，成功率可能会从100%急剧下降到10%。作为在黑盒场景中解决这个问题的第一步，我们提出了一种新的无导数优化方法，该方法可以直接在离散整数域中构造对立的例子。实验结果表明，该方法对目标攻击和非目标攻击的成功率接近100%，与最流行的白盒方法(FGSM、BIM和C&W)相当，并明显优于代表性的黑盒方法(ZOO、AutoZOOM、NES-PGD、bottons、FD、FD-PSO和GenAttack)。我们的结果表明，离散化问题应该得到更认真的对待，离散优化算法在制造有效的黑盒攻击方面显示出有前途的前景。
papers.title_zh: 照顾离散问题：对离散化问题的全面研究和离散整数域中的黑盒对抗攻击

papers.title: This Hacker Knows Physics: Device Physics Aware Mimicry Attacks in Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Qinchen Gu, David Formby, Shouling Ji, Brendan Saltaformaggio, Anu G. Bourgeois, Raheem Beyah
papers.abstract: Recent work proposed to improve the security of CPSs by authenticating the CPS devices through the device operation times in the response packets from the devices, due to the strong correlation between the timing fingerprints and the physics of the devices. Although such a technique may be effective in defending against naive attackers, an advanced attacker may monitor the operation of the CPS before launching a device physics aware mimicry attack. In this paper, we show how the spoofed response packets can be crafted by an attacker to deceive the CPS device authentication method based on the device operation times. Specifically, we use the timing and physical measurements embedded in the packets to reconstruct the devices in the physical system, which can be used to spoof response packets corresponding to the actual model and configuration of the devices in the CPS. We demonstrate the performance of our technique in realistic testbeds with real devices. Finally, we propose an upgraded defense mechanism that may be used against such mimicry attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于定时指纹和设备的物理特性之间的强相关性，最近的工作提出通过来自设备的响应分组中的设备操作时间来认证CPS设备，从而提高CPS的安全性。尽管这种技术可以有效地防御天真的攻击者，但是高级攻击者可以在发起设备物理感知模仿攻击之前监控CPS的操作。在本文中，我们展示了攻击者是如何伪造响应数据包来欺骗基于设备操作时间的CPS设备身份验证方法的。具体来说，我们使用嵌入在数据包中的定时和物理测量来重建物理系统中的设备，这可用于欺骗对应于CPS中设备的实际型号和配置的响应数据包。我们在具有真实设备的真实测试床上展示了我们的技术的性能。最后，我们提出了一个升级的防御机制，可以用来对付这种模仿攻击。
papers.title_zh: 这个黑客知道物理：设备物理意识到网络物理系统中的模仿攻击

papers.title: CBA-Detector: A Self-Feedback Detector Against Cache-Based Attacks
papers.authors: Beilei Zheng, Jianan Gu, Jialun Wang, Chuliang Weng
