papers.abstract: Cloud computing is convenient to provide adequate resources for tenants. However, since multiple tenants share the underlying hardware resources, malicious tenants can use the shared processor to launch cache-based attacks. Such attacks can help malicious tenants steal private data of other tenants bypassing isolation mechanisms provided by the system, resulting in information leakage. Moreover, Spectre and Meltdown vulnerabilities can even extract memory contents arbitrarily with the help of cache attacks. Therefore, cache-based attacks pose a serious threat to the security of cloud platforms. To defeat such attacks, many detection methods have been proposed. However, most methods induce high false positives because they completely rely on the hardware performance counters (HPCs) and detect attacks with static criteria. To solve this problem, this article proposes a self-feedback detector named CBA-Detector to detect cache-based attacks in real time. Specifically, CBA-Detector first uses machine learning technologies to create models for identifying suspicious programs with abnormal hardware behaviors, then analyzes suspicious programs from the instruction level to identify real attacks and provide feedback. Based on the feedback, the models can be updated to further improve their detection accuracy. As our experiments show, CBA-Detector can accurately identify cache-based attacks in real time and introduces a little overhead. Besides, the misjudgment rate decreases with the running time.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算方便为租户提供充足的资源。但是，由于多个租户共享底层硬件资源，恶意租户可以使用共享的处理器来发起基于缓存的攻击。这种攻击可以帮助恶意租户绕过系统提供的隔离机制，窃取其他租户的隐私数据，从而导致信息泄漏。此外，Spectre和Meltdown漏洞甚至可以在缓存攻击的帮助下任意提取内存内容。因此，基于缓存的攻击对云平台的安全构成了严重威胁。为了挫败这种攻击，已经提出了许多检测方法。然而，大多数方法会导致很高的误报率，因为它们完全依赖于硬件性能计数器(HPC)并使用静态标准来检测攻击。为了解决这个问题，本文提出了一种自反馈检测器CBA-Detector来实时检测基于缓存的攻击。具体来说，CBA-Detector首先使用机器学习技术创建模型，用于识别具有异常硬件行为的可疑程序，然后从指令层面分析可疑程序，识别真实的攻击并提供反馈。基于反馈，可以更新模型以进一步提高它们的检测精度。如我们的实验所示，CBA-Detector可以实时准确地识别基于缓存的攻击，并且引入少量开销。此外，误判率随着运行时间的增加而降低。
papers.title_zh: CBA检测器：针对基于缓存攻击的自反馈检测器

papers.title: Towards Lightweight Authentication and Batch Verification Scheme in IoV
papers.authors: Himani Sikarwar, Debasis Das
papers.abstract: Revolution in the transportation industry was envisioned by self-driving vehicles, with the potential of communication with other vehicles and interaction with other units of the smart environment. With the advent of the Internet of Vehicles(IoV), which is a system that allows communication between vehicles and other static components of the environment and is a convergence of the Internet of Things (IoT), vehicles are considered as an essential part of the network having secure data sensing and processing platforms. Many vehicular ad-hoc networks (VANETs) research focused on the limited set of applications for intelligent transportation systems (ITS) and typically implied safe driving, infotainment, and traffic management. However, it still exhibits an enormous scope of enhancement in various areas of ITS. In this article, we present a new architecture for IoV, keeping in view the different aspects of ITS and discussing how it can mitigate the challenges of secure communication in IoV along with the new visionary solution for authentication. An IoV is highly dynamic, having different topological structures, uneven distribution of nodes, and, therefore, vulnerable to various security and privacy attacks. This article also presents an efficient batch verification scheme having lightweight authentication that uses bilinear map and one-way hash functions to ensure a high level of security within the limited time constraint as compared to single message verification. The proposed scheme has better performance than the existing techniques in terms of computational delay, time complexity, transmission overhead, and energy consumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动驾驶汽车预见了交通运输行业的革命，它具有与其他车辆通信以及与智能环境中其他单元交互的潜力。随着车联网(IoV)的出现，车辆被认为是具有安全数据感测和处理平台的网络的重要部分，车联网是允许车辆和环境的其他静态组件之间通信的系统，并且是物联网(IoT)的汇聚。许多车载自组织网络(VANETs)的研究集中在智能交通系统(ITS)的有限应用上，通常涉及安全驾驶、信息娱乐和交通管理。然而，它在智能交通系统的各个领域仍有很大的改进空间。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的IoV架构，着眼于ITS的不同方面，并讨论了它如何减轻IoV中安全通信的挑战，以及新的有远见的认证解决方案。IoV是高度动态的，具有不同的拓扑结构、不均匀的节点分布，因此容易受到各种安全和隐私攻击。本文还提出了一种具有轻量级认证的高效批量验证方案，该方案使用双线性映射和单向散列函数来确保与单个消息验证相比在有限的时间约束内的高级安全性。在计算延迟、时间复杂度、传输开销和能量消耗方面，所提出的方案比现有技术具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 在IOV中迈向轻质身份验证和批处理验证方案

papers.title: On the Effectiveness of Using Graphics Interrupt as a Side Channel for User Behavior Snooping
papers.authors: Haoyu Ma, Jianwen Tian, Debin Gao, Chunfu Jia
papers.abstract: Graphics Processing Units (GPUs) are now a key component of many devices and systems, including those in the cloud and data centers, thus are also subject to side-channel attacks. Existing side-channel attacks on GPUs typically leak information from graphics libraries like OpenGL and CUDA, which require creating contentions within the GPU resource space and are being mitigated with software patches. This article evaluates potential side channels exposed at a lower-level interface between GPUs and CPUs, namely the graphics interrupts. These signals could indicate unique signatures of GPU workload, allowing a spy process to infer the behavior of other processes. We demonstrate the practicality and generality of such side-channel exploitation with a variety of assumed attack scenarios. Simulations on both Nvidia and Intel graphics adapters showed that our attack could achieve high accuracy, while in-depth studies were also presented to explore the low-level rationale behind such effectiveness. On top of that, we further propose a practical mitigation scheme which protects GPU workloads against the graphics-interrupt-based side-channel attack by piggybacking mask payloads on them to generate interfering graphics interrupt “noises”. Experiments show that our mitigation technique effectively prohibited spy processes from inferring user behaviors via analyzing runtime patterns of graphics interrupt with only trivial overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 图形处理单元(GPU)现在是许多设备和系统的关键组件，包括云和数据中心中的设备和系统，因此也容易受到侧信道攻击。对GPU的现有旁道攻击通常会泄漏OpenGL和CUDA等图形库的信息，这需要在GPU资源空间内创建争用，并通过软件补丁来缓解。本文评估了在GPU和CPU之间的低级接口上暴露的潜在侧通道，即图形中断。这些信号可以指示GPU工作负载的独特签名，允许间谍进程推断其他进程的行为。我们通过各种假设的攻击场景展示了这种旁道利用的实用性和普遍性。在Nvidia和Intel图形适配器上的模拟表明，我们的攻击可以达到很高的准确性，同时还进行了深入的研究，以探索这种有效性背后的底层原理。在此基础上，我们进一步提出了一种实用的缓解方案，通过在GPU工作负载上搭载掩码负载来产生干扰图形中断“噪声”，从而保护GPU工作负载免受基于图形中断的侧通道攻击。实验表明，我们的缓解技术有效地阻止了间谍进程通过分析图形中断的运行时模式来推断用户行为，并且开销很小。
papers.title_zh: 关于使用图形中断作为用户行为窥探的侧通道的有效性

papers.title: Secure Repackage-Proofing Framework for Android Apps Using Collatz Conjecture
papers.authors: Haoyu Ma, Shijia Li, Debin Gao, Chunfu Jia
papers.abstract: App repackaging has been raising serious concerns about the health of the Android ecosystem, and repackage-proofing is an important mitigation against threat of such attacks. However, existing app repackage-proofing schemes were only evaluated against trivial adversaries simulated using analyzers for other purposes (e.g., disclosing privacy leakage vulnerabilities), hence were shown “effective” mainly because their key programming features were not even supported by those toolkits. Furthermore, existing works have also neglected dynamic adversaries capable of manipulating victim apps at runtime, making them vulnerable against such stronger opponents. In this article, we propose a novel repackage-proofing framework, which deploys distributed detection and response sites into the subject app's native partition to cross-verify all its code files. The detection sites transmit obtained integrity metrics to response sites via secure communication channels built on the subject app's own control flows using a specialized obfuscation technique based on Collatz conjecture, turning the repackage-proofing process into complicated implicit flows that are intrinsically difficult to be resolved due to the conjecture's nonlinear dynamical behaviors. We evaluated our framework using sophisticated Android data-flow analyzers. Results showed that our prototype effectively impeded analyses aiming to trace the information flows of its cross-verification.
papers.abstract_zh: 应用程序重新打包已经引起了人们对Android生态系统健康状况的严重担忧，而重新打包防护是抵御此类攻击威胁的重要手段。然而，现有的应用程序防重新打包方案仅针对使用分析器模拟的用于其他目的(例如，披露隐私泄露漏洞)的微不足道的对手进行评估，因此被显示为“有效”，主要是因为它们的关键编程功能甚至不被那些工具包支持。此外，现有的工作还忽略了能够在运行时操纵受害者应用程序的动态对手，使他们在面对更强大的对手时变得脆弱。在本文中，我们提出了一种新颖的防重新打包框架，它将分布式检测和响应站点部署到主题应用程序的本机分区中，以交叉验证其所有代码文件。检测站点使用基于Collatz推测的专门混淆技术，通过建立在主题应用程序自己的控制流上的安全通信通道，将获得的完整性度量传输到响应站点，将重新打包验证过程转变为复杂的隐式流，由于推测的非线性动态行为，这些隐式流本质上难以解决。我们使用复杂的Android数据流分析器评估了我们的框架。结果表明，我们的原型有效地阻碍了旨在跟踪其交叉验证信息流的分析。
papers.title_zh: 使用Collatz猜想，为Android应用程序安全重新包装框架框架

papers.title: DELIA: Distributed Efficient Log Integrity Audit Based on Hierarchal Multi-Party State Channel
papers.authors: Jing Chen, Xin Chen, Kun He, Ruiying Du, Weihang Chen, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Audit log contains the trace of different activities in computing systems, which makes it critical for security management, censorship, and forensics. However, experienced attackers may delete or modify the audit log after their attacks, which makes the audit log unavailable in attack investigation. In this article, we focus on the log integrity audit in the same domain, in which a number of servers update audit logs for a single or several organizations as an alliance. We propose a distributed efficient log integrity audit framework, called DELIA, which employs the distributed ledger technique to protect audit information, and utilizes the idea of state channel to improve the throughput of distributed ledger. To generate stable state from the rapidly-updated logs in the domain, we propose a log state generation scheme, which not only generates state suitable for audit logs, but also enables mutual supervision within the domain. To overcome the high latency in existing state channel schemes, we propose a hierarchal multi-party state channel scheme, which makes the latency in our framework independent of the number of servers in the domain. We implement DELIA on Ethereum and evaluate its performance. The results show that our framework is efficient and secure in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 审计日志包含计算系统中不同活动的痕迹，这使得它对于安全管理、审查和取证至关重要。但是，有经验的攻击者可能在攻击后删除或修改审计日志，这使得审计日志在攻击调查中不可用。在本文中，我们将重点放在同一个域中的日志完整性审计，在这个域中，多个服务器作为一个联盟为单个或多个组织更新审计日志。我们提出了一个高效的分布式日志完整性审计框架DELIA，它采用分布式账本技术来保护审计信息，并利用状态通道的思想来提高分布式账本的吞吐量。为了从域中快速更新的日志中生成稳定的状态，我们提出了一种日志状态生成方案，该方案不仅能生成适合审计日志的状态，还能实现域内的相互监督。为了克服现有状态信道方案中的高延迟，我们提出了一种分层多方状态信道方案，该方案使得我们的框架中的延迟与域中服务器的数量无关。我们在以太坊上实现了DELIA，并对其性能进行了评估。结果表明，我们的框架在实践中是高效和安全的。
papers.title_zh: Delia：基于层次多党派渠道的分布式有效的日志完整性审核

papers.title: XAuth: Efficient Privacy-Preserving Cross-Domain Authentication
papers.authors: Jing Chen, Zeyi Zhan, Kun He, Ruiying Du, Donghui Wang, Fei Liu
papers.abstract: It is well known that each Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) system forms a closed security domain and only recognizes certificates in its own domain (such as medical systems, financial systems, and 5G networks). When users need to access services in other domains, their identities often cannot be recognized or PKI systems require extremely complex operations to authenticate the users’ identities. This is the cross-domain authentication problem. The distributed consensus feature of blockchain provides a technical approach to solve this problem. However, there are some unresolved problems in existing blockchain-based schemes. On one hand, due to the low throughput of blockchain systems, the response speed may be insufferable when the number of cross-domain authentication requirements becomes enormous. On the other hand, these schemes insufficiently consider the privacy risk in the cross-domain scenario. In this article, we propose an efficient privacy-preserving cross-domain authentication scheme called XAuth that is integrated naturally with the existing PKI and Certificate Transparency (CT) systems. Specifically, we design a lightweight correctness verification protocol based on Multiple Merkle Hash Tree for rapid response. To protect users’ privacy, we present an anonymous authentication protocol for cross-domain authentication. The security analysis and experimental results demonstrate that XAuth is secure and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，每个公钥基础设施(PKI)系统都形成一个封闭的安全域，并且只认可自己域内的证书(如医疗系统、金融系统、5G网络)。当用户需要访问其他域中的服务时，他们的身份通常无法被识别，或者PKI系统需要极其复杂的操作来认证用户的身份。这就是跨域认证问题。区块链的分布式一致性特征为解决这一问题提供了技术途径。然而，在现有的基于区块链的方案中存在一些未解决的问题。一方面，由于区块链系统的低吞吐量，当跨域认证需求的数量变得巨大时，响应速度可能令人难以忍受。另一方面，这些方案没有充分考虑跨域场景中的隐私风险。在本文中，我们提出了一个有效的隐私保护跨域认证方案XAuth，它与现有的PKI和证书透明(CT)系统自然地集成在一起。具体来说，我们设计了一个基于多Merkle哈希树的轻量级正确性验证协议，以实现快速响应。为了保护用户的隐私，我们提出了一个用于跨域认证的匿名认证协议。安全性分析和实验结果表明，XAuth是安全有效的。
papers.title_zh: Xauth：有效保存隐私的跨域身份验证

papers.title: Cybersafety: A System-Theoretic Approach to Identify Cyber-Vulnerabilities & Mitigation Requirements in Industrial Control Systems
papers.authors: Shaharyar Khan, Stuart E. Madnick
papers.abstract: Recent cyber-physical attacks, such as Stuxnet, Triton etc., have invoked an ominous realization about the vulnerability of critical infrastructure, including water, power and gas distribution systems. Traditional IT security-biased protection methods that focus on improving cyber hygiene are largely impotent in the face of targeted attacks by advanced cyber-adversaries. Thus, there is an urgent need to analyze the safety and security of critical infrastructure in a holistic fashion, leveraging the physics of the cyber-physical system. System-Theoretic Accident Model & Processes (STAMP) offers a powerful framework to analyze complex systems; hitherto, STAMP has been used extensively to perform safety analyses but an integrated safety and cybersecurity analysis of industrial control systems (ICS) has not been published. This paper uses the electrical generation and distribution system of an archetypal industrial facility to demonstrate the application of a STAMP-based method – called Cybersafety – to identify and mitigate cyber-vulnerabilities in ICS. The key contribution of this work is to differentiate the additional steps required to perform a holistic cybersecurity analysis for an ICS of significant size and complexity and to present the analysis in a structured format that can be emulated for larger systems with many interdependent subsystems.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的网络物理攻击，如Stuxnet、Triton等。引发了对关键基础设施脆弱性的不祥认识，包括水、电和天然气分配系统。面对高级网络对手的有针对性的攻击，侧重于改善网络卫生的传统IT安全保护方法在很大程度上无能为力。因此，迫切需要利用信息物理系统的物理学，以整体方式分析关键基础设施的安全和安保。系统理论事故模型和过程(STAMP)为分析复杂系统提供了一个强有力的框架；迄今为止，STAMP已被广泛用于执行安全分析，但尚未发布工业控制系统(ICS)的综合安全和网络安全分析。本文使用一个原型工业设施的发电和配电系统来演示如何应用一种基于标记的方法(称为网络安全)来识别和缓解集成电路中的网络漏洞。这项工作的主要贡献是区分了对规模和复杂性相当大的集成电路进行整体网络安全分析所需的额外步骤，并以一种结构化的格式呈现分析，这种格式可以模拟具有许多相互依赖的子系统的大型系统。
papers.title_zh: 网络安全：一种系统理论方法，用于识别工业控制系统中的网络范围和缓解要求

papers.title: SEAR: Secure and Efficient Aggregation for Byzantine-Robust Federated Learning
papers.authors: Lingchen Zhao, Jianlin Jiang, Bo Feng, Qian Wang, Chao Shen, Qi Li
papers.abstract: Federated learning facilitates the collaborative training of a global model among distributed clients without sharing their training data. Secure aggregation, a new security primitive for federated learning, aims to preserve the confidentiality of both local models and training data. Unfortunately, existing secure aggregation solutions fail to defend against Byzantine failures that are common in distributed computing systems. In this work, we propose a new secure and efficient aggregation framework, SEAR, for Byzantine-robust federated learning. Relying on the trusted execution environment, i.e., Intel SGX, SEAR protects clients’ private models while enabling Byzantine resilience. Considering the limitation of the current Intel SGX's architecture (i.e., the limited trusted memory), we propose two data storage modes to efficiently implement aggregation algorithms efficiently in SGX. Moreover, to balance the efficiency and performance of aggregation, we propose a sampling-based method to efficiently detect Byzantine failures without degrading the global model's performance. We implement and evaluate SEAR in a LAN environment, and the experiment results show that SEAR is computationally efficient and robust to Byzantine adversaries. Compared to the previous practical secure aggregation framework, SEAR improves aggregation efficiency by 4-6 times while supporting Byzantine resilience at the same time.
papers.abstract_zh: 联合学习促进了分布式客户端之间的全局模型的协作训练，而无需共享它们的训练数据。安全聚合是一种新的联邦学习安全原语，旨在保护本地模型和训练数据的机密性。不幸的是，现有的安全聚合解决方案无法抵御分布式计算系统中常见的拜占庭故障。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个新的安全有效的聚集框架，SEAR，用于拜占庭健壮的联邦学习。依靠可信执行环境，即英特尔SGX，西尔斯保护客户的私人模型，同时实现拜占庭式的弹性。考虑到当前SGX架构的局限性(即有限的可信内存)，我们提出了两种数据存储模式来有效地在SGX中实现聚合算法。此外，为了平衡聚集的效率和性能，我们提出了一种基于采样的方法来有效地检测拜占庭故障，而不会降低全局模型的性能。我们在局域网环境中实现并评估了SEAR，实验结果表明SEAR计算效率高，对拜占庭攻击具有鲁棒性。与之前实用的安全聚合框架相比，SEAR在支持拜占庭弹性的同时，聚合效率提高了4-6倍。
papers.title_zh: SEAR：拜占庭式联合学习的安全有效聚合

papers.title: Distribution-Preserving Steganography Based on Text-to-Speech Generative Models
papers.authors: Kejiang Chen, Hang Zhou, Hanqing Zhao, Dongdong Chen, Weiming Zhang, Nenghai Yu
papers.abstract: Steganography is the art and science of hiding secret messages in public communication so that the presence of secret messages cannot be detected. There are two distribution-preserving steganographic frameworks, one is sampler-based and the other is compression-based. The former requires a perfect sampler which yields data following the same distribution, and the latter needs the explicit distribution of generative objects. However, these two conditions are too strict even unrealistic in the traditional data environment, e.g., the distribution of natural images is hard to seize. Fortunately, generative models bring new vitality to distribution-preserving steganography, which can serve as the perfect sampler or provide the explicit distribution of generative media. Taking text-to-speech generation task as an example, we propose distribution-preserving steganography based on WaveGlow and WaveRNN, which corresponds to the former two categories. Steganalysis experiments and theoretical analysis are conducted to demonstrate that the proposed methods can preserve the distribution.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐写术是在公共通信中隐藏秘密消息的艺术和科学，这样秘密消息的存在就不会被检测到。有两种保持分布的隐写框架，一种是基于采样的，另一种是基于压缩的。前者需要一个完美的采样器，它产生的数据遵循相同的分布，而后者需要生成对象的显式分布。然而，这两个条件在传统的数据环境中过于严格，甚至是不现实的，例如，自然图像的分布很难把握。幸运的是，生成模型为保持分布的隐写术带来了新的活力，它可以作为完美的采样器或提供生成媒体的显式分布。以文本到语音生成任务为例，我们提出了基于WaveGlow和WaveRNN的分布保持隐写算法，它对应于前两类。隐写分析实验和理论分析表明，提出的方法可以保持分布。
papers.title_zh: 基于文本到语音生成模型的发行术隐身

papers.title: Backdoor Attack on Machine Learning Based Android Malware Detectors
papers.authors: Chaoran Li, Xiao Chen, Derui Wang, Sheng Wen, Muhammad Ejaz Ahmed, Seyit Camtepe, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Machine learning (ML) has been widely used for malware detection on different operating systems, including Android. To keep up with malware's evolution, the detection models usually need to be retrained periodically (e.g., every month) based on the data collected in the wild. However, this leads to poisoning attacks, specifically backdoor attacks, which subvert the learning process and create evasion ‘tunnels’ for manipulated malware samples. To date, we have not found any prior research that explored this critical problem in Android malware detectors. Although there are already some similar works in the image classification field, most of those similar ideas cannot be borrowed to solve this problem, because the assumption that the attacker has full control of the training data collection or labelling process is not realistic in real-world malware detection scenarios. In this article, we are motivated to study the backdoor attack against Android malware detectors. The backdoor is created and injected into the model stealthily without access to the training data and activated when an app with the trigger is presented. We demonstrate the proposed attack on four typical malware detectors that have been widely discussed in academia. Our evaluation shows that the proposed backdoor attack achieves up to 99 percent evasion rate over 750 malware samples. Moreover, the above successful attack is realised by a small size of triggers (only four features) and a very low data poisoning rate (0.3 percent).
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习(ML)已被广泛用于不同操作系统上的恶意软件检测，包括Android。为了跟上恶意软件的发展，通常需要基于在野外收集的数据定期(例如，每月)重新训练检测模型。然而，这会导致中毒攻击，特别是后门攻击，它会破坏学习过程，并为被操纵的恶意软件样本创建规避“隧道”。到目前为止，我们还没有发现任何探索Android恶意软件检测器中这一关键问题的先前研究。尽管在图像分类领域已经有一些类似的工作，但那些类似的想法大多不能被借用来解决这个问题，因为攻击者完全控制训练数据收集或标记过程的假设在现实世界的恶意软件检测场景中是不现实的。在这篇文章中，我们研究了针对Android恶意软件检测器的后门攻击。后门是在不访问训练数据的情况下悄悄创建并注入到模型中的，并在出现带有触发器的应用程序时被激活。我们在学术界广泛讨论的四个典型的恶意软件检测器上演示了所提出的攻击。我们的评估表明，所提出的后门攻击在750个恶意软件样本上实现了高达99%的规避率。此外，上述成功的攻击是通过小规模的触发器(只有四个特征)和非常低的数据中毒率(0.3%)实现的。
papers.title_zh: 基于机器学习的Android恶意软件探测器的后门攻击

papers.title: RAT: Reinforcement-Learning-Driven and Adaptive Testing for Vulnerability Discovery in Web Application Firewalls
papers.authors: Mohammadhossein Amouei, Mohsen Rezvani, Mansoor Fateh
papers.abstract: Due to the increasing sophistication of web attacks, Web Application Firewalls (WAFs) have to be tested and updated regularly to resist the relentless flow of web attacks. In practice, using a brute-force attack to discover vulnerabilities is infeasible due to the wide variety of attack patterns. Thus, various black-box testing techniques have been proposed in the literature. However, these techniques suffer from low efficiency. This article presents Reinforcement-Learning-Driven and Adaptive Testing (RAT), an automated black-box testing strategy to discover injection vulnerabilities in WAFs. In particular, we focus on SQL injection and Cross-site Scripting, which have been among the top ten vulnerabilities over the past decade. More specifically, RAT clusters similar attack samples together. It then utilizes a reinforcement learning technique combined with a novel adaptive search algorithm to discover almost all bypassing attack patterns efficiently. We compare RAT with three state-of-the-art me&thods considering their objectives. The experiments show that RAT performs 33.53 and 63.16 percent on average better than its counterparts in discovering the most possible bypassing payloads and reducing the number of attempts before finding the first bypassing payload when testing well-configured WAFs, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于web攻击越来越复杂，web应用程序防火墙(WAFs)必须定期测试和更新，以抵御持续不断的Web攻击。实际上，由于攻击模式的多样性，使用暴力攻击来发现漏洞是不可行的。因此，在文献中已经提出了各种黑盒测试技术。然而，这些技术的效率很低。本文介绍了强化学习驱动的自适应测试(RAT)，这是一种发现WAFs中注入漏洞的自动化黑盒测试策略。我们特别关注SQL注入和跨站点脚本，这两个漏洞在过去十年中一直位列前十。更具体地说，RAT将相似的攻击样本聚集在一起。然后，它利用强化学习技术结合一种新颖的自适应搜索算法来有效地发现几乎所有的旁路攻击模式。考虑到它们的目标，我们将RAT与三种最先进的方法进行了比较。实验表明，在测试配置良好的WAFs时，RAT在发现最可能的旁路有效载荷和减少在找到第一个旁路有效载荷之前的尝试次数方面分别比其对手平均好33.53%和63.16%。
papers.title_zh: 大鼠：对Web应用程序中的漏洞发现的增强学习驱动和自适应测试

papers.title: DBFT: A Byzantine Fault Tolerance Protocol With Graceful Performance Degradation
papers.authors: Jingjing Zhang, Yingyao Rong, Jiannong Cao, Chunming Rong, Jing Bian, Weigang Wu
papers.abstract: Byzantine Fault Tolerant (BFT) state machine replication protocols are used to achieve agreement among replicated servers with arbitrary faults. Most existing BFT protocols perform well in fault-free cases, but usually suffer from serious performance degradation when faults occur. In this paper, we present DBFT, a BFT protocol that realizes graceful performance degradation in faulty cases. The major novelty of DBFT lies in the double-response mechanism, which lets replica nodes deterministically respond to clients twice: one is after the speculative execution phase and the other is after the commitment phase. The double-response mechanism ensures good performance in spite of inconsistency in speculative execution. Also, to further alleviates undetectable performance attacks by a smartly malicious primary, we change primary upon every outstanding request. Moreover, DBFT does not involve clients in critical consensus operations so as to reduce the load of clients. We prove the correctness properties, i.e., safety and liveness, of DBFT. We conduct extensive experiments and the results show that, DBFT outperforms similar BFT protocols obviously in normal cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 拜占庭容错(BFT)状态机复制协议用于在具有任意故障的复制服务器之间达成一致。现有的大多数BFT协议在无故障情况下性能良好，但在故障发生时性能会严重下降。在本文中，我们提出了DBFT，一个BFT协议，实现了优雅的错误情况下的性能下降。DBFT的主要新颖之处在于双重响应机制，它让副本节点确定性地响应客户机两次:一次是在推测执行阶段之后，另一次是在提交阶段之后。双重响应机制确保了良好的性能，尽管在推测执行中存在不一致。此外，为了进一步减轻狡猾的恶意主节点造成的不可检测的性能攻击，我们会在每个未完成的请求时更改主节点。此外，DBFT不会让客户参与关键的共识操作，以减轻客户的负担。我们证明了DBFT的正确性性质，即安全性和活性。我们进行了大量的实验，结果表明，在正常情况下，DBFT明显优于类似的BFT协议。
papers.title_zh: DBFT：具有优美性能退化的拜占庭式容忍协议

papers.title: Enabling Privacy-Preserving Geographic Range Query in Fog-Enhanced IoT Services
papers.authors: Yu Guo, Hongcheng Xie, Cong Wang, Xiaohua Jia
papers.abstract: The explosive growth of the Internet of Things (IoT) is pushing forward the paradigm of fog computing services today. An important service for most fog-enhanced applications is geographic range-match, which means the fog-nodes can accurately collect sensed data from IoT devices based on their location distances. However, due to the increasing attacking surfaces, outsourcing range query operations to untrusted fog-nodes inevitably raises new privacy concerns about query content and device location exposure. In this article, we devise a new geographic range-match scheme for fog-enhanced services, which allows fog-nodes to securely collect range-based sensed data while protecting the location privacy of IoT devices. Our main idea is to formulate the problem of encrypted geographic queries as range-based pattern matching and carefully craft security schemes to enable efficient range queries in the ciphertext domain. The proposed range-match scheme is provably secure and can reduce accessible information during distance comparisons. We formally analyze the security strengths and complete the prototype implementation. The comprehensive experimental results demonstrate the practicality of our designs.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)的爆炸式增长正在推动当今雾计算服务的范式。大多数fog增强应用程序的一项重要服务是地理范围匹配，这意味着fog节点可以根据其位置距离准确收集来自物联网设备的传感数据。然而，由于攻击面的增加，将范围查询操作外包给不可信的雾节点不可避免地引起了关于查询内容和设备位置暴露的新的隐私问题。在本文中，我们为雾增强服务设计了一种新的地理范围匹配方案，该方案允许雾节点安全地收集基于范围的传感数据，同时保护物联网设备的位置隐私。我们的主要思想是将加密地理查询的问题公式化为基于范围的模式匹配，并精心设计安全方案，以在密文域中实现有效的范围查询。所提出的距离匹配方案是可证明安全的，并且可以在距离比较期间减少可访问的信息。我们正式分析安全优势并完成原型实现。综合实验结果证明了我们设计的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 在雾气增强物联网服务中启用保护隐私的地理范围查询

papers.title: Detecting False Data Injection Attacks in Peer to Peer Energy Trading Using Machine Learning
papers.authors: Sara Mohammadi, Frank Eliassen, Yan Zhang, Hans-Arno Jacobsen
papers.abstract: In peer-to-peer (P2P) energy trading, the incorporation of distributed energy resources with unprotected data, originating from sources such as home energy management systems that are connected through the Internet, provokes vulnerabilities that can manifest security breaches. In this article, two threat scenarios based on a novel false data injection attack (FDIA) model in a local P2P energy trading system are explored. In these scenarios, an attacker gains free energy by manipulating prosumers’ consumption and demand. Precise and fast attack detection is needed to guarantee suitable countermeasures to prevent potential risks. We propose a novel instance-based machine learning (ML) classifier for detecting FDIAs. In contrast to black-box ML models, our algorithm provides a transparent decision-making procedure with significant predictive performance. We apply our detection model to a real-world dataset from Austin, Texas. Our experimental results show superior performance as compared to several popular interpretable and non-interpretable ML methods. On average, we achieve a 96.10 percent detection rate, a 96.18 percent accuracy rate, and a false negative rate of 1.97 percent with our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 在对等(P2P)能源交易中，将分布式能源资源与来自通过互联网连接的家庭能源管理系统等来源的未受保护的数据相结合，会引发可表明违反安全的漏洞。本文探讨了本地P2P能源交易系统中基于一种新的虚假数据注入攻击(FDIA)模型的两种威胁场景。在这些场景中，攻击者通过操纵消费者的消费和需求获得免费能源。需要精确和快速的攻击检测来保证适当的对策以防止潜在的风险。我们提出了一种新的基于实例的机器学习(ML)分类器来检测FDIAs。与黑盒ML模型相比，我们的算法提供了具有显著预测性能的透明决策过程。我们将我们的检测模型应用于来自德克萨斯州奥斯汀的真实世界数据集。我们的实验结果显示了优于几个流行的可解释和不可解释的最大似然方法的性能。平均来说，我们的方法实现了96.10%的检测率、96.18%的准确率和1.97%的假阴性率。
papers.title_zh: 使用机器学习检测到同行的虚假数据注射攻击以相处的能源交易

papers.title: DL-FHMC: Deep Learning-Based Fine-Grained Hierarchical Learning Approach for Robust Malware Classification
papers.authors: Ahmed Abusnaina, Mohammed Abuhamad, Hisham Alasmary, Afsah Anwar, Rhongho Jang, Saeed Salem, DaeHun Nyang, David Mohaisen
papers.abstract: The acceptance of the Internet of Things (IoT) for both household and industrial applications is accompanied by the rapid growth of IoT malware. With the increase of their attack surface, analyzing, understanding, and detecting IoT malicious behavior are crucial. Traditionally, machine and deep learning-based approaches are used for malware detection and behavioral understanding. However, recent research has shown the susceptibility of those approaches to adversarial attacks by introducing noise to the feature space. In this work, we introduce DL-FHMC, a fine-grained hierarchical learning approach for robust IoT malware detection. DL-FHMC utilizes Control Flow Graph (CFG)-based behavioral patterns for adversarial IoT malicious software detection. In particular, we extract a comprehensive list of behavioral patterns from a large dataset of malicious IoT binaries, represented by the shared execution flows, and use them as a modality for malicious behavior detection. Leveraging machine learning and subgraph isomorphism matching algorithms, DL-FHMC provides state-of-the-art performance in detecting malware samples and adversarial examples (AEs). We first highlight the caveats of CFG-based IoT malware detection systems, showing the adversarial capabilities in generating practical functionality-preserving AEs with reduced overhead using Graph Embedding and Augmentation (GEA) techniques. We then introduce Suspicious Behavior Detector, a component that extracts comprehensive behavioral patterns from three popular IoT malicious families, Gafgyt, Mirai, and Tsunami, for AEs detection with high accuracy. The proposed detector operates as a model-independent standalone module, with no prior assumptions of the adversarial attacks nor their configurations.
papers.abstract_zh: 家庭和工业应用对物联网(IoT)的接受，伴随着物联网恶意软件的快速增长。随着攻击面的增加，分析、理解和检测物联网恶意行为变得至关重要。传统上，基于机器和深度学习的方法用于恶意软件检测和行为理解。然而，最近的研究表明，这些方法通过向特征空间引入噪声而容易受到敌对攻击。在这项工作中，我们介绍了DL-FHMC，一种用于鲁棒物联网恶意软件检测的细粒度分层学习方法。DL-FHMC利用基于控制流图(CFG)的行为模式来检测敌对物联网恶意软件。特别是，我们从大型恶意物联网二进制数据集中提取了一个完整的行为模式列表，由共享执行流表示，并将其用作恶意行为检测的一种方式。利用机器学习和子图同构匹配算法，DL-FHMC在检测恶意软件样本和敌对示例(AEs)方面提供了一流的性能。我们首先强调了基于CFG的物联网恶意软件检测系统的注意事项，展示了使用图形嵌入和增强(GEA)技术以降低的开销生成实用功能保留AEs的对抗能力。然后，我们介绍了可疑行为检测器，它是一个组件，可从Gafgyt、Mirai未来组合和Tsunami这三个流行的物联网恶意软件家族中提取全面的行为模式，以实现高准确度的AEs检测。所提出的检测器作为独立于模型的独立模块运行，不需要对敌对攻击及其配置的预先假设。
papers.title_zh: DL-FHMC：强大的恶意软件分类的基于深度学习的细粒度层次学习方法

papers.title: Fine-Grained and Controllably Editable Data Sharing With Accountability in Cloud Storage
papers.authors: Huiying Hou, Jianting Ning, Yunlei Zhao, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: With the increasing cloud storage service, users can enjoy non-interactive data sharing. Nonetheless, the data owner cannot timely update the shared data all the while. To ensure the timeliness and the authoritative source of the data, some users should be allowed to update the data on behalf of an authoritative data owner without changing data source. However, this allows harmful information to be injected into the data unnoticeably. How to efficiently realize editable cloud-based data sharing supporting malicious user tracing has not been fully explored. To address the problem, we propose a fine-grained and controllably editable cloud-based data sharing scheme with malicious user accountability. The data owner only needs to sign the shared data before uploading it and can specify a fine-grained access control policy about who can update the data and which portions of the data can be updated. The authorized users non-interactively convert signatures of original data into new ones for the updated data, which are indistinguishable from the original signatures. The proposed scheme also supports malicious user accountability in the sense that malicious users who post harmful information can be traced. We demonstrate the security and practicality of our scheme via formal security analysis and extensive experiments.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云存储服务的增加，用户可以享受非交互式的数据共享。然而，数据所有者不能一直及时更新共享数据。为了确保数据的及时性和权威性，应该允许一些用户在不改变数据源的情况下代表权威数据所有者更新数据。然而，这使得有害信息在不为人知的情况下被注入到数据中。如何高效实现支持恶意用户追踪的可编辑云数据共享尚未得到充分探索。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一个细粒度的可控可编辑的基于云的数据共享方案，并对恶意用户进行问责。数据所有者只需要在上传共享数据之前对其进行签名，并且可以指定关于谁可以更新数据以及可以更新数据的哪些部分的细粒度访问控制策略。授权用户非交互地将原始数据的签名转换成用于更新数据的新签名，新签名与原始签名是不可区分的。所提出的方案还支持恶意用户责任，即可以追踪发布有害信息的恶意用户。通过形式化的安全性分析和大量的实验，我们证明了该方案的安全性和实用性。
papers.title_zh: 云存储中的细粒度和可控制的数据共享和问责制

papers.title: Optimal Online Liveness Fault Detection for Multilayer Cloud Computing Systems
papers.authors: Yen-Lin Lee, Deron Liang, Wei-Jen Wang
papers.abstract: Efficient online liveness fault detection is crucial to cloud systems. Most current online liveness fault detection techniques, such as system layer heartbeating, use a single unreliable detector to detect cloud system liveness. A single unreliable detector requires a certain amount of time to detect faults to avoid misjudgment, regardless of the type of fault detected. However, many faults can be detected by other detectors more quickly. Therefore, this article proposes an efficient online liveness fault detection mechanism for cloud systems that integrates existing detectors to quickly detect faults. We compared the fault detection efficiency of the proposed mechanism with those of counterpart mechanisms. According to the results, relative to system layer heartbeating without any auxiliary detection mechanism, our proposed mechanism had a 70.3 percent shorter fault detection time.
papers.abstract_zh: 高效的在线活性故障检测对云系统至关重要。当前大多数在线活性故障检测技术，例如系统层心跳，使用单个不可靠检测器来检测云系统活性。单个不可靠的检测器需要一定的时间来检测故障，以避免误判，而不管检测到的故障类型如何。但是，其他检测器可以更快地检测到许多故障。因此，本文提出了一种有效的云系统在线活性故障检测机制，该机制集成了现有的检测器来快速检测故障。我们比较了所提出的机制和对应机制的故障检测效率。根据结果，相对于没有任何辅助检测机制的系统层心跳，我们提出的机制的故障检测时间缩短了70.3%。
papers.title_zh: 多层云计算系统的最佳在线LIVISE检测

papers.title: Towards Practical and Privacy-Preserving Multi-Dimensional Range Query Over Cloud
papers.authors: Yandong Zheng, Rongxing Lu, Yunguo Guan, Jun Shao, Hui Zhu
papers.abstract: It is undeniable that Internet of Things (IoT) in big data era can provide us with huge volumes of multi-dimensional data, transforming our society into a much more intelligent one. In order to fit for the multi-dimensional data processing in big data era, multi-dimensional range queries, especially over cloud platform, have received considerable attention in recent years. However, as the cloud server is not fully trustable, designing multi-dimensional range queries over encrypted data becomes a research trend, and many solutions have been proposed in the literature. Nevertheless, most existing solutions suffer from the leakage of the single-dimensional privacy, and such leakage would severely put the data at risk. Although a few existing works have addressed the problem of single-dimensional privacy, they are impractical in some real scenarios due to the issues of inefficiency, inaccuracy, and two-cloud-server requirement. Aiming at solving these issues, in this article, we propose a practical and privacy-preserving multi-dimensional range query (PRQ) scheme. Specifically, in our proposed PRQ scheme, we first index the multi-dimensional dataset with an R-tree and reduce R-tree based range queries to the problem of point intersection and range intersection. Then, by employing the lightweight matrix encryption technique, we design two novel algorithms for PRQ, i.e., multi-dimensional point intersection predicate encryption (PIPE) and multi-dimensional range intersection predicate encryption (RIPE), which can preserve the privacy of the proposed point intersection algorithm and range intersection algorithm, and further preserve the single-dimensional privacy of the proposed PRQ scheme. Detailed security analysis shows that our proposed PRQ scheme is indeed privacy-preserving. In addition, extensive simulations are conducted, and the results also demonstrate its efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 不可否认，大数据时代的物联网可以为我们提供海量的多维数据，将我们的社会转变为一个更加智能的社会。为了适应大数据时代的多维数据处理，多维范围查询，尤其是云平台上的多维范围查询，近年来受到了广泛关注。然而，由于云服务器不完全可信，设计加密数据的多维范围查询成为一种研究趋势，文献中提出了许多解决方案。然而，大多数现有的解决方案都存在一维隐私泄露的问题，并且这种泄露会严重地将数据置于危险之中。虽然一些现有的工作已经解决了单维隐私的问题，但是由于低效率、不准确和两个云服务器需求的问题，它们在一些真实场景中是不切实际的。针对这些问题，本文提出了一种实用的保护隐私的多维范围查询(PRQ)方案。具体地说，在我们提出的PRQ方案中，我们首先用R树索引多维数据集，并将基于R树的范围查询简化为点相交和范围相交的问题。然后，通过使用轻量级矩阵加密技术，我们设计了两个新的PRQ算法，即多维点相交谓词加密(PIPE)和多维范围相交谓词加密(RIPE ),这两个算法能够保持所提出的点相交算法和范围相交算法的保密性，并且进一步保持所提出的PRQ方案的一维保密性。详细的安全性分析表明，我们提出的PRQ方案确实是隐私保护的。此外，还进行了大量的仿真，结果也证明了其有效性。
papers.title_zh: 朝着云上的实用和隐私保护多维范围查询

papers.title: MDEFTL: Incorporating Multi-Snapshot Plausible Deniability into Flash Translation Layer
papers.authors: Shijie Jia, Qionglu Zhang, Luning Xia, Jiwu Jing, Peng Liu
papers.abstract: Conventional encryption solutions cannot defend against a coercive attacker who can capture the device owner, and force the owner to disclose keys used for decrypting sensitive data. To defend against such a coercive adversary, Plausibly Deniable Encryption (PDE) was introduced to allow the device owner to deny the very existence of sensitive data. The existing PDE systems built for computing devices equipped with flash storage media, are problematic, since they cannot defend against multi-snapshot adversaries, who may have access to the storage medium of a user's device at different points of time. In this article, we propose MDEFTL, a secure multi-snapshot PDE system for mobile devices which incorporates plausible deniability into Flash Translation Layer (FTL). MDEFTL is the first practical design which integrates multi-snapshot PDE into FTL, a pervasively deployed layer in literally all the current mobile devices. A salient advantage of MDEFTL lies in its capability of achieving multi-snapshot plausible deniability while being able to accommodate the special nature of NAND flash as well as eliminate deniability compromises from it. We implemented MDEFTL using an open-source NAND flash controller. The experimental results show that, compared to conventional encryption which does not provide deniability, our MDEFTL only incurs a small overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的加密解决方案无法抵御强制攻击者，强制攻击者可以捕获设备所有者，并迫使所有者公开用于解密敏感数据的密钥。为了抵御这种胁迫对手，似是而非的可否认加密(PDE)被引入，以允许设备所有者否认敏感数据的存在。为配备有闪存存储介质的计算设备构建的现有PDE系统是有问题的，因为它们不能防御多快照对手，这些对手可能在不同的时间点访问用户设备的存储介质。在本文中，我们提出了MDEFTL，这是一个用于移动设备的安全多快照PDE系统，它将似是而非的可否认性集成到了闪存转换层(FTL)中。MDEFTL是第一个将多快照PDE集成到FTL中的实用设计，这是一个几乎在所有当前移动设备中普遍部署的层。MDEFTL的一个显著优势在于它能够实现多快照似是而非的可否认性，同时能够适应NAND闪存的特殊性质，并消除其可否认性危害。我们使用开源NAND闪存控制器实现了MDEFTL。实验结果表明，与不提供可否认性的传统加密方法相比，我们的MDEFTL只产生了很小的开销。
papers.title_zh: mdeftl：将多刺激性合理可否认性纳入闪存翻译层

papers.title: Active Warden Attack: On the (In)Effectiveness of Android App Repackage-Proofing
papers.authors: Haoyu Ma, Shijia Li, Debin Gao, Daoyuan Wu, Qiaowen Jia, Chunfu Jia
papers.abstract: App repackaging has raised serious concerns to the Android ecosystem with the repackage-proofing technology attracting attention in the Android research community. In this article, we first show that existing repackage-proofing schemes rely on a flawed security assumption, and then propose a new class of active warden attack that intercepts and falsifies the metrics used by repackage-proofing for detecting the integrity violations during repackaging. We develop a proof-of-concept toolkit to demonstrate that all the existing repackage-proofing schemes can be bypassed by our attack toolkit. On the positive side, our analysis further identifies a new integrity metric in the Android ART runtime that can robustly and efficiently indicate bytecode tampering caused by either repackaging or active warden attacks. By associating this new metric with two supplemental verification mechanisms, we construct a multi-party verification framework that significantly raises the bar of repackage-proofing and identify conditions under which the proposed framework could detect app repackaging without getting compromised by active warden attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 应用程序重新打包已经引起了Android生态系统的严重关注，防重新打包技术引起了Android研究社区的关注。在本文中，我们首先指出现有的防重新打包方案依赖于一个有缺陷的安全假设，然后提出一种新的主动监管攻击，它拦截并伪造防重新打包所使用的度量，以检测重新打包期间的完整性破坏。我们开发了一个概念验证工具包来证明所有现有的防重新打包方案都可以被我们的攻击工具包绕过。从积极的一面来看，我们的分析进一步确定了Android ART运行时中的一个新的完整性度量，该度量可以稳健而有效地指示由重新打包或主动监管攻击引起的字节码篡改。通过将这一新指标与两个补充验证机制相关联，我们构建了一个多方验证框架，该框架显著提高了防重新打包的标准，并确定了所提出的框架可以检测应用程序重新打包而不会受到主动监管攻击的条件。
papers.title_zh: 主动看守攻击：对Android应用程序的（在）有效性

papers.title: EBSNN: Extended Byte Segment Neural Network for Network Traffic Classification
papers.authors: Xi Xiao, Wentao Xiao, Rui Li, Xiapu Luo, Haitao Zheng, Shutao Xia
papers.abstract: Network traffic classification is important to intrusion detection and network management. Most of existing methods are based on machine learning techniques and rely on the features extracted manually from flows or packets. However, with the rapid growth of network applications, it is difficult for these approaches to handle new complex applications. In this article, we design a novel neural network, the Extended Byte Segment Neural Network (EBSNN), to classify netwrk traffic. EBSNN first divides a packet into header segments and payload segments, which are then fed into encoders composed of the recurrent neural networks with the attention mechanism. Based on the outputs, another encoder learns the high-level representation of the whole packet. In particular, side-channel features are learned from header segments to improve the performance. Finally, the label of the packet is obtained by the softmax function. Furthermore, EBSNN can classify network flows by examining the first few packets. Thorough experiments on the real-world datasets show that EBSNN achieves better performance than the state-of-the-art methods in both the application identification task and the website identification task.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络流量分类对于入侵检测和网络管理非常重要。大多数现有的方法是基于机器学习技术，并依赖于从流或包中手动提取的特征。然而，随着网络应用的快速增长，这些方法很难处理新的复杂应用。在这篇文章中，我们设计了一种新的神经网络，扩展字节段神经网络(EBSNN)，用于对网络流量进行分类。EBSNN首先将数据包分为报头段和有效载荷段，然后将它们送入由具有注意机制的递归神经网络组成的编码器。基于输出，另一个编码器学习整个分组的高级表示。特别地，从报头段中学习边信道特征以提高性能。最后，通过softmax函数获得数据包的标签。此外，EBSNN可以通过检查前几个数据包来对网络流进行分类。在真实数据集上的实验表明，无论是在应用识别任务还是网站识别任务中，EBSNN都取得了比现有方法更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: EBSNN：用于网络流量分类的扩展字节段神经网络

papers.title: On the Security of the K Minimum Values (KMV) Sketch
papers.authors: Pedro Reviriego, Alfonso Sánchez-Macián, Shanshan Liu, Fabrizio Lombardi
papers.abstract: Data sketches are widely used to accelerate operations in big data analytics. For example, algorithms use sketches to compute the cardinality of a set, or the similarity between two sets. Sketches achieve significant reductions in computing time and storage requirements by providing probabilistic estimates rather than exact values. In many applications, an estimate is sufficient and thus, it is possible to trade accuracy for computational complexity; this enables the use of probabilistic sketches. However, the use of probabilistic data structures may create security issues because an attacker may manipulate the data in such a way that the sketches produce an incorrect estimate. For example, an attacker could potentially inflate the estimate of the number of distinct users to increase its revenues or popularity. Recent works have shown that an attacker can manipulate Hyperloglog, a sketch widely used for cardinality estimate, with no knowledge of its implementation details. This paper considers the security of K Minimum Values (KMV), a sketch that is also widely used to implement both cardinality and similarity estimates. Next sections characterize vulnerabilities at an implementation-independent level, with attacks formulated as part of a novel adversary model that manipulates the similarity estimate. Therefore, the paper pursues an analysis and simulation; the results suggest that as vulnerable to attacks, an increase or reduction of the estimate may occur. The execution of the attacks against the KMV implementation in the Apache DataSketches library validates these scenarios. Experiments show an excellent agreement between theory and experimental results.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据草图被广泛用于加速大数据分析中的操作。例如，算法使用草图来计算一个集合的基数，或者两个集合之间的相似性。草图通过提供概率估计而不是精确值，显著减少了计算时间和存储需求。在许多应用中，一个估计值就足够了，因此，可以用精度换取计算复杂度；这使得概率草图的使用成为可能。然而，概率数据结构的使用可能会产生安全问题，因为攻击者可能会以草图产生错误估计的方式操纵数据。例如，攻击者可能会夸大不同用户的估计数量，以增加收入或受欢迎程度。最近的工作表明，攻击者可以操纵Hyperloglog，一种广泛用于基数估计的草图，而不知道它的实现细节。本文考虑了K最小值(KMV)的安全性，这是一种也被广泛用于实现基数和相似性估计的草图。接下来的章节在独立于实现的层面上描述了漏洞的特征，将攻击描述为操纵相似性估计的新型对手模型的一部分。因此，本文进行了分析和仿真；结果表明，由于易受攻击，估计值可能会增加或减少。对Apache DataSketches库中KMV实现的攻击验证了这些场景。实验表明理论和实验结果之间有很好的一致性。
papers.title_zh: 关于K最低值的安全性（KMV）草图

papers.title: Poirot: Causal Correlation Aided Semantic Analysis for Advanced Persistent Threat Detection
papers.authors: Jian Yang, Qi Zhang, Xiaofeng Jiang, Shuangwu Chen, Feng Yang
papers.abstract: The volatile, covert and slow multistage attack patterns of Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) present a tricky challenge of APT detection, which are vital for organisations to protect their critical assets. In this article, we aim to develop system that aggregates and uses existing systems’ alerts to detect APTs. In order to achieve this, we propose a causal correlation aided semantic analysis system, called Poirot, for detecting the multi-stage threats over a long-time span from existing systems’ alerts. Poirot is capable of autonomously mining causality between anomalous events, which instructs us in reorganizing the original alerts and in constructing alert-chains. The system further exploits the Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) to model the semantic context of the alert-chains. This LDA model facilitates us to carry out the semantic analysis for capturing the latent attack intent as well as for reconstructing the APT scenario. We use an alert dataset provided by a cyber security company to verify the proposed Poirot in terms of the detection accuracy and the capability of attack scenario reconstruction. The experiment results are presented to show the achievable performance of the proposed semantic analysis based APT detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 高级持续威胁(APT)的易变、隐蔽和缓慢的多阶段攻击模式给APT检测带来了棘手的挑战，这对于组织保护其关键资产至关重要。在本文中，我们的目标是开发一个系统，该系统聚集并使用现有系统的警报来检测apt。为了实现这一点，我们提出了一个因果关联辅助语义分析系统，称为波洛，用于从现有系统的警报中检测长时间跨度内的多阶段威胁。波洛能够自主挖掘异常事件之间的因果关系，这指导我们重组原始警报并构建警报链。该系统进一步利用潜在的狄利克雷分配(LDA)来建模警报链的语义上下文。这个LDA模型有助于我们进行语义分析，以捕获潜在的攻击意图以及重建APT场景。我们使用一家网络安全公司提供的警报数据集，从检测准确性和攻击场景重建能力方面验证了提出的波洛模型。实验结果显示了基于语义分析的APT检测的可实现性能。
papers.title_zh: POIROT：因果关系帮助先进持续威胁检测的语义分析

papers.title: A Secure and Authenticated Mobile Payment Protocol Against Off-Site Attack Strategy
papers.authors: Liming Fang, Minghui Li, Zhe Liu, Changting Lin, Shouling Ji, Anni Zhou, Willy Susilo, Chunpeng Ge
papers.abstract: Mobile payment system has been expected to provide more efficient and convenient payment methods. However, compared to traditional payments, mobile payment issues related to the security of electronic accounts and payment apps present serious challenges. In this paper, we find the potential security risks by analyzing the commonly used tokenized mobile payment method and put forward the corresponding off-site attack strategy. In this scenario, the attackers are not only limited to malicious third parties but also can be illegal merchants. To address the off-site attack, especially the potential attackers who may be malicious merchants, we also propose SALP, a secure and authenticated payment protocol, using time and position as necessary conditions for the payment confirmation. Furthermore, we leverage identity-based signature (IBS) to prevent altering the information and reduce the overhead of the third-party authentication. We conduct case studies to demonstrate that the SALP can effectively prevent the off-site payment attack without a trusted hardware environment. In particular, we finally argue that SALP does not bring additional system overhead without degrading the convenience of mobile payment.
papers.abstract_zh: 人们一直期望移动支付系统能够提供更加高效便捷的支付方式。然而，与传统支付相比，与电子账户和支付应用安全相关的移动支付问题带来了严峻的挑战。本文通过分析常用的令牌化移动支付方式，发现其潜在的安全风险，并提出相应的非现场攻击策略。在这种情况下，攻击者不仅仅限于恶意第三方，还可能是非法商家。为了解决非现场攻击，特别是可能是恶意商家的潜在攻击者，我们还提出了SALP，一个安全的认证支付协议，使用时间和位置作为支付确认的必要条件。此外，我们利用基于身份的签名(IBS)来防止更改信息，并减少第三方认证的开销。我们进行了案例研究来证明SALP可以有效地防止没有可信硬件环境的非现场支付攻击。特别地，我们最后认为SALP不会在不降低移动支付便利性的情况下带来额外的系统开销。
papers.title_zh: 针对异地攻击策略的安全和身份验证的移动支付协议

papers.title: A Systemic Approach for Natural Language Scenario Elicitation of Security Requirements
papers.authors: Hanan Hibshi, Stephanie T. Jones, Travis D. Breaux
papers.abstract: Security analysts rely on scenarios to assess vulnerabilities, project attacks, and decide on security requirements that mitigate the threat. However, eliciting natural language scenarios from stakeholders can be an ad-hoc process and subject to ambiguity and incompleteness. In this article, we examine systematic scenario elicitation by introducing a method based on user stories that uses a simplified process model of iterative scenario refinement. The process consists of three steps: 1) eliciting an interaction statement that describes a critical action performed by a user or system process; 2) eliciting one or more descriptive statements about a technology that enables the interaction; and 3) refinement of the technology into technical variants that correspond to design alternatives. We empirically evaluated our method by implementing our prototype in a user study that collects 30 security scenarios from participants. Based on our analysis, our proposed method is shown effective. Participants had a 100 percent task completion rate with 57 percent of participants achieving complete task-success, and the remaining 43 percent of participants achieving partial task-success. We also show the effect of security domain knowledge, and the benefit of using structure when collecting security requirements in natural language text. Finally, we present lessons learned and future research directions.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全分析师依靠场景来评估漏洞、预测攻击，并决定减轻威胁的安全要求。然而，从涉众那里引出自然语言场景可能是一个特别的过程，容易产生歧义和不完整。在本文中，我们通过介绍一种基于用户故事的方法来检验系统化的场景提取，该方法使用迭代场景精化的简化过程模型。该过程包括三个步骤:1)引出描述由用户或系统进程执行的关键动作的交互语句；2)引出关于实现交互的技术的一个或多个描述性陈述；以及3)将技术细化为与设计方案相对应的技术变体。我们通过在一项用户研究中实现我们的原型，从参与者那里收集了30个安全场景，对我们的方法进行了经验评估。基于我们的分析，我们提出的方法是有效的。参与者的任务完成率为100 %,其中57%的参与者完成了全部任务，其余43%的参与者完成了部分任务。我们还展示了安全领域知识的作用，以及在自然语言文本中收集安全需求时使用结构的好处。最后，我们提出了经验教训和未来的研究方向。
papers.title_zh: 一种自然语言场景的系统方法启发安全要求

papers.title: SeUpdate: Secure Encrypted Data Update for Multi-User Environments
papers.authors: Jiabei Wang, Rui Zhang, Jianhao Li, Yuting Xiao, Hui Ma
papers.abstract: Searchable Symmetric Encryption (SSE) is a key tool for secure data processing. To date, most of the SSEs were studied alone, while an SSE supporting update operations over encrypted data remained a challenging problem due to various statistical attacks and multi-user environments. In this article, we propose SeUpdate, the first SSE scheme that simultaneously achieves keyword search and controlled update over encrypted data, with flexible read (search) and write (update) access control policies among multiple users. In SeUpdate, users do not need to share secret keys and a single query enables one to efficiently search all his authorized data. We formally define a security model, and prove our scheme have both forward and backward security. We note that the write permission of an SSE is realized for the first time. We further extend the basic scheme with dynamic access policy update and support of a large number of files. We also implement SeUpdate and some related work. The theoretical and experimental analyses demonstrate our scheme and its extension are practical and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 可搜索对称加密(SSE)是安全数据处理的关键工具。迄今为止，大多数SSE都是单独研究的，而由于各种统计攻击和多用户环境，支持加密数据更新操作的SSE仍然是一个具有挑战性的问题。在本文中，我们提出了SeUpdate，这是第一个同时实现关键字搜索和加密数据的受控更新的SSE方案，在多个用户之间具有灵活的读取(搜索)和写入(更新)访问控制策略。在SeUpdate中，用户不需要共享密钥，一个简单的查询就能有效地搜索到所有授权数据。我们形式化地定义了一个安全模型，并证明了我们的方案具有前向安全性和后向安全性。我们注意到第一次实现了SSE的写权限。我们通过动态访问策略更新和对大量文件的支持进一步扩展了基本方案。我们还实现了SeUpdate和一些相关的工作。理论和实验分析表明，该方案及其扩展是实用有效的。
papers.title_zh: seupdate：多用户环境的安全加密数据更新

papers.title: An Efficient E2E Crowd Verifiable E-Voting System
papers.authors: Xinyu Zhang, Bingsheng Zhang, Aggelos Kiayias, Thomas Zacharias, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Electronic voting (e-voting), compared with article voting, has advantages in several aspects. Among those benefits, the ability to audit the electoral process at every stage is one of the most desired features of an e-voting system. In Eurocrypt 2015, Kiayias, Zacharias, and Zhang proposed a new E2E verifiable e-voting system that for the first time provides E2E verifiability without relying on external sources of randomness or the random oracle model; the main advantage of such system is in the fact that election auditors need only the election transcript and the feedback from the voters to pronounce the election process unequivocally valid. Unfortunately, their system comes with a huge performance and storage penalty for the election authority (EA) compared to other e-voting systems such as Helios. The main reason is that due to the way the EA forms the proof of the tally result, it is required to precompute a number of ciphertexts for each voter and each possible choice of the voter. The performance penalty on the EA appears to be intrinsic to the approach: voters cannot compute an enciphered ballot themselves because there seems to be no way for them to prove that it is a valid ciphertext. In this work, we construct a new e-voting system that retains similar strong E2E characteristics (but against computational adversaries) while completely eliminating the performance and storage penalty of the EA. Our construction has similar performance to Helios and is practical. The privacy of our construction relies on the SXDH assumption over bilinear groups via complexity leveraging.
papers.abstract_zh: 与文章投票相比，电子投票在几个方面具有优势。在这些好处中，能够在每个阶段审计选举过程是电子投票系统最需要的功能之一。在Eurocrypt 2015中，Kiayias、Zacharias和Zhang提出了一种新的可验证电子投票系统，该系统首次提供了可验证性，而不依赖于外部随机源或随机预言模型；这种系统的主要优点在于，选举审计员只需要选举记录和来自选民的反馈就可以宣布选举过程明确有效。不幸的是，与Helios等其他电子投票系统相比，他们的系统给选举机构(EA)带来了巨大的性能和存储损失。主要原因是由于EA形成计票结果证明的方式，需要为每个投票人和投票人的每个可能选择预先计算多个密文。EA的性能损失似乎是这种方法固有的:选民不能自己计算加密选票，因为他们似乎没有办法证明这是一个有效的密文。在这项工作中，我们构造了一个新的电子投票系统，它保留了相似的强E2E特性(但针对计算对手)，同时完全消除了EA的性能和存储损失。我们的结构与Helios具有相似的性能，并且是实用的。我们的构造的保密性依赖于通过复杂性杠杆作用在双线性群上的SXDH假设。
papers.title_zh: 有效的E2E人群可验证的电子投票系统

papers.title: Social Characteristic-Based Propagation-Efficient PBFT Protocol to Broadcast in Unstructured Overlay Networks
papers.authors: Xiaoqin Feng, Jianfeng Ma, Yinbin Miao, Ximeng Liu, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo
papers.abstract: Blockchain allows for secure management of a shared ledger by agreement protocols, where transactions are validated over network without central authorities. Although the agreement protocol has been thoroughly conducted of propagation and consensus researches, mobility of nodes in unstructured overlay networks has not received much attention. Besides, current dynamic propagation schemes waste travel hops and are low of delivery ratio. In this article, we propose a social characteristic-based propagation-efficient protocol NefSBFT to agree on system state plus consensus mechanisms in public blockchains. We devise a propagation technique (travel hops of at least <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\frac{1}{3}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mfrac><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mn>3</mml:mn></mml:mfrac></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="feng-ieq1-3104465.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> savings, delivery ratio above 0.93, etc.) for message multicasting when exploiting real nodes’ social characteristics of intermittent connectivity and frequent partitions. This propagation technique is executed in the improved FastBFT to achieve transaction ordering and block verification, thus, no controllable mobility is required during the whole system’s execution. NefSBFT achieves fast propagation, small message complexity and few resource consumption of travel hops and running nodes for complete protocol execution. We analyze NefSBFT’s security against DDOS attack of non-primary failure. The experiments show the performance tradeoff under different parameters, compare the propagation efficiency with Erlay and Flooding, and clarify NefSBFT’s impact on the whole system performance through comparison.
papers.abstract_zh: 区块链允许通过协议协议对共享账本进行安全管理，其中交易通过网络进行验证，无需中央机构。尽管对协议的传播和一致性研究已经进行得很深入，但是非结构化覆盖网络中节点的移动性还没有得到足够的重视。此外，现有的动态传播方案浪费了旅行跳数，并且投递率低。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个基于社会特征的高效传播协议NefSBFT，用于在公共区块链中协商系统状态加共识机制。我们设计了一种传播技术(至少< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ frac { 1 } { 3 } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:MFR AC > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > < MML:Mn > 3 </MML:Mn > </MML:MFR AC > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " feng-ie Q1-3104465。)用于当利用真实节点的间歇性连接和频繁划分的社会特征时的消息多播。这种传播技术在改进的FastBFT中执行，以实现事务排序和块验证，因此，在整个系统的执行过程中不需要可控的移动性。NefSBFT实现了快速的传播、较小的消息复杂度和很少的用于完整协议执行的旅行跳和运行节点的资源消耗。我们分析了NefSBFT对非主要失效的DDOS攻击的安全性。实验展示了不同参数下的性能权衡，比较了Erlay和Flooding的传播效率，通过比较阐明了NefSBFT对整个系统性能的影响。
papers.title_zh: 基于社会特征的传播效率PBFT协议，以在非结构化覆盖网络中广播

papers.title: Toward a Secure, Rich, and Fair Query Service for Light Clients on Public Blockchains
papers.authors: Chengjun Cai, Lei Xu, Anxin Zhou, Cong Wang
papers.abstract: The rapid growth of storage overhead on public blockchains has urged the use of light clients that only store a small fraction of blockchain data and rely on other bootstrapped full nodes for data retrievals. Unfortunately, current blockchain light client designs are far from satisfactory. First, outsourcing retrieval requests could raise severe concerns about result correctness and privacy threats. Second, current light clients do not support rich query and enforce fee payments to full nodes. Given that blockchain storage increases day by day, enabling effective rich blockchain queries and fairly compensating full nodes’ ever growing costs has become extremely necessary. In this article, we propose a general and secure paid query framework to simultaneously meet those demands above. Specifically, we leverage the integration of trusted hardware (e.g., Intel SGX) and smart contract as a starting point for building efficient yet secure query processing with fair payments. Then, we further craft several crucial performance and security refinement designs to boost query efficiency and enforce result correctness, and also explore an enclave-facilitated fair settlement mechanism for on-chain cost optimizations. We implement a prototype of our paid query framework and the experimental result has demonstrated its practically affordable cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 公共区块链上存储开销的快速增长促使人们使用仅存储一小部分区块链数据并依赖其他引导完整节点进行数据检索的轻型客户端。不幸的是，目前的区块链轻型客户端设计远不能令人满意。首先，外包检索请求可能会引起对结果正确性和隐私威胁的严重关注。第二，当前的轻型客户端不支持富查询，并强制向完整节点付费。鉴于区块链存储与日俱增，启用有效的富区块链查询并公平补偿完整节点不断增长的成本变得极为必要。在本文中，我们提出了一个通用的、安全的付费查询框架来同时满足上述需求。具体来说，我们利用可信硬件(例如，SGX)和智能合约的集成，作为构建高效而安全的查询处理和公平支付的起点。然后，我们进一步精心设计了几个关键的性能和安全优化设计，以提高查询效率和加强结果的正确性，并探索了一个飞地促进的公平结算机制，以优化链上成本。我们实现了一个付费查询框架的原型，实验结果证明了它的实际可负担成本。
papers.title_zh: 为公共区块链的轻型客户提供安全，丰富和公平的查询服务

papers.title: An Automated Multi-Tab Website Fingerprinting Attack
papers.authors: Qilei Yin, Zhuotao Liu, Qi Li, Tao Wang, Qian Wang, Chao Shen, Yixiao Xu
papers.abstract: In Website Fingerprinting (WF) attack, a local passive eavesdropper utilizes network flow information to identify which web pages a user is browsing. Previous researchers have demonstrated the feasibility and effectiveness of WF attacks under a strong Single Page Assumption: the network flow extracted by the adversary belongs to a single web page. In reality, the assumption may not hold because users tend to open multiple tabs simultaneously (or within a short period of time) so that their network traffic is mixed. In this article, we propose an automated multi-tab Website Fingerprinting attack that is able to accurately classify websites regardless of the number of simultaneously opened pages. Our design is powered by two innovative designs. First, we develop a split point classification method to dynamically identify the split point between the first page and its subsequent pages. As a result, the network traffic before the split point is solely generated for the first page. Then, we propose a new chunk-based WF classifier to infer the websites based on the initial chunk of clean traffic. For both classifiers, we apply automated feature selection to select a concise yet representative feature set. We implement a prototype of our design and perform extensive evaluations using SSH and Tor-based datasets to demonstrate the effectiveness of both our system components individually and the integrated system as a whole.
papers.abstract_zh: 在网站指纹(WF)攻击中，本地被动窃听者利用网络流量信息来识别用户正在浏览的网页。先前的研究人员已经在一个强单页假设下证明了WF攻击的可行性和有效性:对手提取的网络流属于单个网页。实际上，该假设可能不成立，因为用户倾向于同时(或在短时间内)打开多个标签，因此他们的网络流量是混合的。在本文中，我们提出了一种自动的多标签网站指纹攻击，它能够准确地对网站进行分类，而不管同时打开的页面有多少。我们的设计由两个创新设计驱动。首先，我们开发了一个分裂点分类方法来动态地识别第一页和它的后续页面之间的分裂点。因此，拆分点之前的网络流量仅针对第一页生成。然后，我们提出了一种新的基于块的WF分类器，根据初始干净流量块来推断网站。对于这两个分类器，我们应用自动特征选择来选择一个简洁而有代表性的特征集。我们实现了一个设计原型，并使用SSH和基于Tor的数据集进行了广泛的评估，以展示我们的系统组件作为一个整体的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 自动多录像带网站指纹攻击

papers.title: RevFRF: Enabling Cross-Domain Random Forest Training With Revocable Federated Learning
papers.authors: Yang Liu, Zhuo Ma, Yilong Yang, Ximeng Liu, Jianfeng Ma, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Random forest is one of the most heated machine learning tools in a wide range of industrial scenarios. Recently, federated learning enables efficient distributed machine learning without direct revealing of private participant data. In this article, we present a novel framework of federated random forest (RevFRF), and further emphatically discuss the participant revocation problem of federated learning based on RevFRF. Specifically, RevFRF first introduces a suite of homomorphic encryption based secure protocols to implement federated random forest (RF). The protocols cover the whole lifecycle of an RF model, including construction, prediction and participant revocation. Then, referring to the practical application scenarios of RevFRF, the existing federated learning frameworks ignore a fact that even every participant in federated learning cannot maintain the cooperation with others forever. In company-level cooperation, allowing the remaining companies to use a trained model that contains the memories from an off-lying company potentially leads to a significant conflict of interest. Therefore, we propose the revocable federated learning concept and illustrate how RevFRF implements participant revocation in applications. Through theoretical analysis and experiments, we show that the protocols can efficiently implement federated RF and ensure the memories of a revoked participant in the trained RF to be securely removed.
papers.abstract_zh: 随机森林是广泛的工业场景中最热门的机器学习工具之一。最近，联合学习实现了高效的分布式机器学习，而不直接暴露私有参与者数据。本文提出了一种新的联邦随机森林框架(RevFRF ),并着重讨论了基于RevFRF的联邦学习的参与者撤销问题。具体来说，RevFRF首先引入了一套基于同态加密的安全协议来实现联邦随机森林(RF)。这些协议覆盖了RF模型的整个生命周期，包括构造、预测和参与者撤销。然后，参考RevFRF的实际应用场景，现有的联邦学习框架忽略了一个事实，即使是联邦学习中的每个参与者也不能永远保持与他人的合作。在公司层面的合作中，允许剩余的公司使用包含来自一个不在的公司的记忆的经过训练的模型可能会导致重大的利益冲突。因此，我们提出了可撤销的联邦学习概念，并说明了RevFRF如何在应用程序中实现参与者撤销。通过理论分析和实验，我们证明了该协议能够有效地实现联合射频，并确保被撤销参与者的记忆被安全地移除。
papers.title_zh: REVFRF：通过可撤销的联邦学习实现跨域随机培训

papers.title: Outlier: Enabling Effective Measurement of Hypervisor Code Integrity With Group Detection
papers.authors: Jianan Gu, Yukun Ma, Beilei Zheng, Chuliang Weng
papers.abstract: Virtualization brings the benefits of utilization and scalability to the multi-tenant cloud platforms. However, the hypervisor, as one of the foundations in virtualization, is challenging to survive under various malicious attacks due to its large attack surface. This article presents a novel group detection framework for the hypervisor code integrity, called Outlier. In an Outlier group, each host contains two parts. One is a distributed detection protocol, called Co-protocol, and the other is a detection interface, called Checker. The Co-protocol constructs trust for the integrity detection within an Outlier group. With the Co-protocol, each Checker conducts reliable integrity detection on the hypervisor code, and then the potential “outlier” host is perceived. We implement our Outlier prototype on the Xen hypervisor and evaluate its overhead. Experiments show that the introduction of the Outlier has few impacts on the performance of the virtualized systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 虚拟化为多租户云平台带来了利用率和可扩展性的优势。然而，作为虚拟化基础之一的虚拟机管理程序，由于其巨大的攻击面，很难在各种恶意攻击下生存。本文提出了一种新的用于管理程序代码完整性的组检测框架，称为离群值。在离群组中，每个主机包含两个部分。一个是分布式检测协议，称为Co-protocol，另一个是检测接口，称为Checker。协同协议为离群组内的完整性检测构建信任。通过协同协议，每个检查器对虚拟机管理程序代码进行可靠的完整性检测，然后发现潜在的“异常”主机。我们在Xen hypervisor上实现了异常原型，并评估了它的开销。实验表明，离群点的引入对虚拟化系统的性能几乎没有影响。
papers.title_zh: 离群值：通过小组检测实现有效测量管理程序代码完整性

papers.title: Efficient Analysis of Resource Availability for Cloud Computing Systems to Reduce SLA Violations
papers.authors: Yuchang Mo, Liudong Xing
papers.abstract: Resource availability of cloud computing systems is vital for today's information infrastructures. However, the constituent computing nodes are not fault free. The availability requirements on the delivered computing resources should be defined clearly by using a formal, contractual agreement, known as the Service Level Agreement (SLA), between providers and customers. To reduce the risk of various SLA violations, an efficient analysis of resource availability is important. This paper proposes a new analytical approach based on multi-valued decision diagrams (MDD) for the efficient resource availability analysis of cloud computing systems with heterogeneous, multi-state computing nodes. Particularly, a novel and efficient MDD construction method is presented to generate compact MDD models encoding different amounts of cumulative computing resources. Two detailed case studies are performed to illustrate basics and application of the proposed approach to reduce SLA violations and guarantee the availability requirements on the delivered computing resources. Benchmark studies are further conducted to show efficiency of the proposed MDD-based approach as compared with the continuous-time Markov chains-based method and the universal generation function-based method.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算系统的资源可用性对于当今的信息基础设施至关重要。然而，组成计算节点并不是无故障的。应使用提供商和客户之间的正式合同协议(称为服务水平协议(SLA ))来明确定义对交付的计算资源的可用性要求。为了降低各种违反SLA的风险，对资源可用性的有效分析非常重要。提出一种新的基于多值决策图(MDD)的分析方法，用于对具有异构、多态计算节点的云计算系统进行有效的资源可用性分析。特别地，提出了一种新颖且高效的MDD构造方法，以生成对不同数量的累积计算资源进行编码的紧凑MDD模型。我们进行了两个详细的案例研究，以说明所提出方法的基础和应用，从而减少SLA违规并保证所交付计算资源的可用性要求。基准研究进一步表明，与基于连续时间马尔可夫链的方法和基于通用生成函数的方法相比，基于MDD的方法是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 有效分析云计算系统的资源可用性以减少SLA违规行为

papers.title: Minimax Approximation of Sign Function by Composite Polynomial for Homomorphic Comparison
papers.authors: Eunsang Lee, Joon-Woo Lee, Jong-Seon No, Young-Sik Kim
papers.abstract: The comparison operation for two numbers is one of the most frequently used operations in several applications, including deep learning. As such, lots of research has been conducted with the goal of efficiently evaluating the comparison operation in homomorphic encryption schemes. Recently, Cheon et al. (Asiacrypt 2020) proposed new comparison methods that approximated the sign function on homomorphically encrypted data using composite polynomials and proved that these methods had optimal asymptotic complexity. In this article, we propose a practically optimal method that approximates the sign function using compositions of minimax approximation polynomials. We prove that this approximation method is optimal with respect to depth consumption and the number of non-scalar multiplications. In addition, we propose a polynomial-time algorithm that determines the optimal composition of minimax approximation polynomials for the proposed homomorphic comparison operation using dynamic programming. The numerical analysis demonstrates that when minimizing runtime, the proposed comparison operation reduces the runtime by approximately 45 percent on average when compared to the previous algorithm. Likewise, when minimizing depth consumption, the proposed algorithm reduces the runtime by approximately 41 percent on average. In addition, when high precision in the comparison operation is required, the previous algorithm does not achieve 128-bit security, while the proposed algorithm does due to its small depth consumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 两个数字的比较操作是几种应用中最常用的操作之一，包括深度学习。因此，为了有效地评估同态加密方案中的比较操作，已经进行了大量的研究。最近，Cheon等人(Asiacrypt 2020)提出了新的比较方法，这些方法使用复合多项式来近似同态加密数据上的符号函数，并证明了这些方法具有最优的渐近复杂性。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个实用的最佳方法，近似符号函数使用的组成极大极小近似多项式。我们证明了这种近似方法在深度消耗和非标量乘法次数方面是最优的。此外，我们提出了一个多项式时间算法，该算法使用动态规划为所提出的同态比较操作确定最小最大近似多项式的最佳组合。数值分析表明，当最小化运行时间时，与先前的算法相比，所提出的比较操作平均减少了大约45%的运行时间。同样，当最小化深度消耗时，所提出的算法平均减少了大约41%的运行时间。此外，当要求比较操作中的高精度时，先前的算法不能实现128位安全性，而所提出的算法由于其较小的深度消耗而实现了128位安全性。
papers.title_zh: 通过复合多项式进行符号功能的最小值近似

papers.title: Agora: A Privacy-Aware Data Marketplace
papers.authors: Vlasis Koutsos, Dimitrios Papadopoulos, Dimitris Chatzopoulos, Sasu Tarkoma, Pan Hui
papers.abstract: We propose Agora, the first privacy-aware data marketplace that enables parties to get compensated for contributing data, without relying on a trusted third party. We leverage cryptographic techniques to achieve three security properties: (i) data privacy—raw data remain private except for a function output, (ii) output verifiability—the output is proven to be correct, and (iii) atomicity of payments—parties cannot avoid paying for provided services. Agora is designed as a decentralized blockchain application via smart contracts. We implement a prototype on Ethereum and evaluate its performance in terms of computation overhead and monetary cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出Agora，这是第一个隐私感知数据市场，它使各方能够因贡献数据而获得报酬，而无需依赖可信的第三方。我们利用加密技术来实现三个安全属性:(I)数据隐私——除了函数输出，原始数据仍然是隐私的，(ii)输出可验证性——输出被证明是正确的，以及(iii)支付的原子性——各方不能避免为所提供的服务付费。Agora被设计成一个通过智能合约的分散式区块链应用程序。我们在以太坊上实现了一个原型，并评估了它在计算开销和货币成本方面的性能。
papers.title_zh: Agora：隐私感知数据市场

papers.title: Differentially Oblivious Data Analysis With Intel SGX: Design, Optimization, and Evaluation
papers.authors: Pengfei Wu, Qi Li, Jianting Ning, Xinyi Huang, Wei Wu
papers.abstract: A privacy-preserving data analytics system enables a cloud user to perform the distributed job in a secure manner such that the data privacy can be guaranteed during the cloud-outsourced computation. However, many SGX-based solutions are vulnerable to some side-channel attacks, including the access pattern leakage from both network and memory. Several data-oblivious algorithms with full obliviousness have been proposed in the literature, but they are impractical to be used in the cloud due to the expensive computational overhead. In this article, we propose a DPSpark system with the security defined in a notion of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(\epsilon,\delta)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>δ</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ning-ieq1-3106317.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-differentially private obliviousness (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(\epsilon,\delta)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>δ</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ning-ieq2-3106317.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-DPO), which relaxes full obliviousness to enable an efficiency improvement. Based on this definition, we present a perturbation-shuffle-analysis (PSA) computing architecture and design several typical differentially oblivious operators. In further, we optimize the system efficiency by reducing the number of oblivious shuffles and choosing an appropriate privacy budget. Finally, we benchmark the system in different parameters. The experimental results show that DPSpark significantly outperforms two state-of-the-art solutions, only with 10.1-85.4 percent additional overhead performing an SGX-based data analysis application.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私保护数据分析系统使云用户能够以安全的方式执行分布式作业，使得在云外包计算期间可以保证数据隐私。然而，许多基于SGX的解决方案容易受到一些旁路攻击，包括来自网络和内存的访问模式泄漏。文献中已经提出了几种完全遗忘的数据不经意算法，但是由于昂贵的计算开销，它们在云中使用是不切实际的。在本文中，我们提出了一个DPSpark系统，其安全性定义在< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(\ epsilon，\ delta)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi >ε</MML:mi > < MML:mo >，</MML:mo > < MML:mi > delta </MML:mi > < MML:mi基于这一定义，我们提出了一种扰动洗牌分析(PSA)计算结构，并设计了几种典型的差分不经意算子。此外，我们通过减少不经意的洗牌次数和选择合适的隐私预算来优化系统效率。最后，我们用不同的参数对系统进行了基准测试。实验结果表明，DPSpark明显优于两种最先进的解决方案，在执行基于SGX的数据分析应用程序时，只增加了10.1-85.4%的开销。
papers.title_zh: 使用英特尔SGX差异化的数据分析：设计，优化和评估

papers.title: Untouchable Once Revoking: A Practical and Secure Dynamic EHR Sharing System via Cloud
papers.authors: Shengmin Xu, Jianting Ning, Xinyi Huang, Yingjiu Li, Guowen Xu
papers.abstract: Healthcare Internet-of-Things (IoT) enables lightweight devices to observe patients’ vital signals and outsource them to a remote cloud to enjoy flexible data sharing. However, it faces many security threats as the outsourced data is no longer physically controlled by data owners, and the cloud that hosts the outsourced data is not fully trusted. Many privacy protection technologies have been adopted to solve this problem, among which cryptographic mechanisms have become one of the most promising tools. Unfortunately, current cryptographic mechanisms in healthcare IoT mainly suffer from the following challenges: 1) dynamic user groups for managing users’ accessibility; 2) efficient revocation mechanism to mitigate the burden during user revocation; 3) forward and backward secrecy to ensure session independence in the presence of session key leakage; 4) revocable storage to prevent data users from learning any unauthorized data even the data is authorized before; and 5) information manipulation during data transmission. In this article, we introduce a practical and secure system to address the above problems. Our system provides fine-grained access control with dynamic user groups for optimizing scalability and functionality. We prove that our system is secure against numerous real-world threats. Extensive comparison and experimental analysis demonstrate that our system enjoys superior performance than the state-of-the-art solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 医疗保健物联网(IoT)使轻量级设备能够观察患者的生命信号，并将它们外包给远程云，以享受灵活的数据共享。然而，它面临着许多安全威胁，因为外包数据不再由数据所有者进行物理控制，而且托管外包数据的云也不完全可信。许多隐私保护技术被用来解决这个问题，其中密码机制成为最有前途的工具之一。不幸的是，当前医疗物联网中的加密机制主要面临以下挑战:1)用于管理用户可访问性的动态用户组；2)有效的撤销机制以减轻用户撤销期间的负担；3)前向和后向保密，以确保在存在会话密钥泄漏的情况下的会话独立性；4)可撤销存储，以防止数据用户学习任何未授权的数据，即使该数据之前被授权；以及5)数据传输期间的信息操纵。在这篇文章中，我们介绍了一个实用和安全的系统来解决上述问题。我们的系统通过动态用户组提供细粒度的访问控制，以优化可扩展性和功能。我们证明了我们的系统是安全的，可以抵御许多现实世界的威胁。大量的比较和实验分析表明，我们的系统比最先进的解决方案具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 一旦撤销的不可动摇：通过云实用且安全的动态EHR共享系统

papers.title: Checking Only When It Is Necessary: Enabling Integrity Auditing Based on the Keyword With Sensitive Information Privacy for Encrypted Cloud Data
papers.authors: Xiang Gao, Jia Yu, Yan Chang, Huaqun Wang, Jianxi Fan
papers.abstract: The public cloud data integrity auditing technique is used to check the integrity of cloud data through the Third Party Auditor (TPA). In order to make it more practical, we propose a new paradigm called integrity auditing based on the keyword with sensitive information privacy for encrypted cloud data. This paradigm is designed for one of the most common scenario, that is, the user concerns the integrity of a portion of encrypted cloud files that contain his/her interested keywords. In our proposed scheme, the TPA who is only provided with the encrypted keyword, can audit the integrity of all encrypted cloud files that contain the user’s interested keyword. Meanwhile, the TPA cannot deduce the sensitive information about which files contain the keyword and how many files contain this keyword. These salient features are realized by leveraging a newly proposed Relation Authentication Label (RAL). The RAL can not only authenticate the relation that files contain the queried keyword, but also be used to generate the auditing proof without sensitive information exposure. We give concrete security analysis showing that the proposed scheme satisfies correctness, auditing soundness and sensitive information privacy. We also conduct the detailed experiments to show the efficiency of our scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 公共云数据完整性审计技术用于通过第三方审计器(TPA)检查云数据的完整性。为了使其更加实用，我们提出了一种新的基于敏感信息隐私关键字的加密云数据完整性审计模式。这种模式是为一种最常见的场景设计的，即用户关注包含他/她感兴趣的关键字的加密云文件的完整性。在我们提出的方案中，只提供加密关键字的TPA可以审计所有包含用户感兴趣的关键字的加密云文件的完整性。同时，TPA不能推断出关于哪些文件包含该关键字以及有多少文件包含该关键字的敏感信息。这些显著特征是通过利用新提出的关系认证标签(RAL)来实现的。RAL不仅可以认证文件包含查询关键字的关系，还可以用来生成审计凭证，不会暴露敏感信息。我们给出了具体的安全性分析，表明该方案满足正确性、审计可靠性和敏感信息隐私。我们也进行了详细的实验来证明我们的方案的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 仅在必要时检查：启用基于关键字的完整性审核，并具有敏感信息隐私的加密云数据

papers.title: From Theory to Code: Identifying Logical Flaws in Cryptographic Implementations in C/C++
papers.authors: Sazzadur Rahaman, Haipeng Cai, Omar Chowdhury, Danfeng Yao
papers.abstract: Cryptographic protocols are often expected to be provably secure. However, this security guarantee often falls short in practice due to various implementation flaws. We propose a new paradigm called cryptographic program analysis (CPA) which prescribes the use of program analysis to detect these implementation flaws at compile time. The principal insight of the CPA is that many of these flaws in cryptographic implementations can be mapped to the violation of meta-level properties of implementations. A program property that is necessary to realize a cryptographic property is referred to as meta-level property. We show that violations of these meta-level properties can be identified at compile-time that can serve as sufficient evidence of the encompassing flaws. We investigated existing literature on cryptographic implementation flaws and derived 25 corresponding meta-level properties. To instantiate the abstract paradigm of CPA, we develop a specification language based on deterministic finite automaton (DFA) and show that most of the meta-level properties can be expressed in terms of our language. We then develop a tool called TaintCrypt which uses static taint analysis to identify meta-level property violations of C/C++ cryptographic implementations at compile-time. We demonstrate the efficacy of TaintCrypt by analyzing open-source C/C++ cryptographic libraries (e.g., OpenSSL) and observe that TaintCrypt could have helped to avoid several high-profile flaws. We also evaluated TaintCrypt on 5 popular applications and libraries, which generated new security insights. The experimental evaluation on large-scale projects indicates the scalability of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 密码协议通常被认为是可证明安全的。然而，由于各种实施缺陷，这种安全保证在实践中常常不尽人意。我们提出了一个新的范例，称为密码程序分析(CPA ),它规定了使用程序分析在编译时检测这些实现缺陷。CPA的主要观点是，加密实现中的许多缺陷都可以映射到对实现的元级属性的违反。实现密码特性所必需的程序特性被称为元级特性。我们证明了对这些元级属性的违反可以在编译时被识别，这可以作为包含缺陷的充分证据。我们调查了关于密码实现缺陷的现有文献，并推导出25个相应的元级属性。为了实例化CPA的抽象范式，我们开发了一种基于确定性有限自动机(DFA)的规范语言，并表明大多数元级属性可以用我们的语言来表达。然后，我们开发了一个名为TaintCrypt的工具，它使用静态污点分析来识别编译时C/C++加密实现的元级属性违例。我们通过分析开源C/C++加密库(例如OpenSSL)来展示tain crypt的功效，并观察到tain crypt可能有助于避免几个引人注目的缺陷。我们还在5个流行的应用程序和库上评估了TaintCrypt，这产生了新的安全见解。对大规模项目的实验评估表明了该方法的可扩展性。
papers.title_zh: 从理论到代码：确定C/C ++加密实现中的逻辑缺陷

papers.title: Quantifying Cybersecurity Effectiveness of Dynamic Network Diversity
papers.authors: Huashan Chen, Hasan Cam, Shouhuai Xu
papers.abstract: The deployment of monoculture software stacks can have devastating consequences because a single attack can compromise all of the vulnerable computers in cyberspace. This one-vulnerability-affects-all phenomenon will continue until after software stacks are diversified, which is well recognized by the research community.
