However, existing studies mainly focused on investigating the effectiveness of software diversity at the building-block level (e.g., whether two independent implementations indeed exhibit independent vulnerabilities); the effectiveness of enforcing network-wide software diversity is little understood, despite its importance in possibly helping justify investment in software diversification. As a first step towards ultimately tackling this problem, we propose a systematic framework for modeling and quantifying the cybersecurity effectiveness of network diversity, including a suite of cybersecurity metrics. We also present an agent-based simulation to empirically demonstrate the usefulness of the framework. We draw a number of insights, including the surprising result that proactive diversity is effective under very special circumstances, but reactive-adaptive diversity is much more effective in most cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 单一文化软件栈的部署可能会带来灾难性的后果，因为一次攻击就可能危及网络空间中所有易受攻击的计算机。这种一个漏洞影响所有漏洞的现象将持续到软件堆栈多样化之后，这是研究界公认的。然而，现有的研究主要集中在调查构建块级别的软件多样性的有效性(例如，两个独立的实现是否确实表现出独立的漏洞)；加强网络范围内软件多样性的有效性很少被了解，尽管它可能有助于证明软件多样化投资的重要性。作为最终解决这一问题的第一步，我们提出了一个系统框架，用于建模和量化网络多样性的网络安全有效性，包括一套网络安全指标。我们还提出了一个基于代理的模拟实验来证明该框架的有效性。我们得出了许多见解，包括令人惊讶的结果，即主动多样性在非常特殊的情况下是有效的，但反应-适应多样性在大多数情况下更有效。
papers.title_zh: 量化动态网络多样性的网络安全有效性

papers.title: On The (In)Effectiveness of Static Logic Bomb Detection for Android Apps
papers.authors: Jordan Samhi, Alexandre Bartel
papers.abstract: Android is present in more than 85% of mobile devices, making it a prime target for malware. Malicious code is becoming increasingly sophisticated and relies on logic bombs to hide itself from dynamic analysis. In this article, we perform a large scale study of TSOpen, our open-source implementation of the state-of-the-art static logic bomb scanner TriggerScope, on more than 500k Android applications. Results indicate that the approach scales. Moreover, we investigate the discrepancies and show that the approach can reach a very low false-positive rate, 0.3%, but at a particular cost, e.g., removing 90% of sensitive methods. Therefore, it might not be realistic to rely on such an approach to automatically detect all logic bombs in large datasets. However, it could be used to speed up the location of malicious code, for instance, while reverse engineering applications. We also present TrigDB a database of 68 Android applications containing trigger-based behavior as a ground-truth to the research community.
papers.abstract_zh: 超过85%的移动设备安装了Android，这使其成为恶意软件的主要目标。恶意代码变得越来越复杂，并依靠逻辑炸弹来隐藏自己，使其免受动态分析。在本文中，我们在超过500，000个Android应用程序上对我们最先进的静态逻辑炸弹扫描器TriggerScope的开源实现TSOpen进行了大规模研究。结果表明这种方法是可行的。此外，我们调查了差异，并表明该方法可以达到非常低的假阳性率，0.3%，但有一个特定的成本，例如，删除90%的敏感方法。因此，依靠这种方法来自动检测大型数据集中的所有逻辑炸弹可能是不现实的。然而，它可以用来加速定位恶意代码，例如，当逆向工程应用程序。我们还将TrigDB(一个包含68个Android应用程序的数据库，包含基于触发器的行为)作为研究社区的基础事实。
papers.title_zh: 关于Android应用的静态逻辑炸弹检测的（IN）有效性

papers.title: Secure Anonymous Communication on Corrupted Machines With Reverse Firewalls
papers.authors: Yi Wang, Rongmao Chen, Xinyi Huang, Baosheng Wang
papers.abstract: The Snowden revelations in 2013 showed that user machines running cryptographic protocols might be stealthily corrupted by attackers (e.g., manufacturers and supply-chain intermediaries) who could tamper cryptographic implementations to insert backdoors to undermine cryptographic tools. To formalize such attacks, in CRYPTO 2014, Bellare <italic>et al.</italic> proposed the notion of Algorithm-Substitution Attack (ASA) which has been extensively studied since then. In this work, we turn to investigate the security of anonymous communication (AC) protocol—a well-known tool to protect user privacy on the Internet—in the case when user machines are corrupted. Specifically, we give a formal treatment of ASAs on the universal mixnet-based AC (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf{U\text{-}Mix\text{-}AC}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">U</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Mix</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">AC</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq1-3107463.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) protocols. We show that ASAs on <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf{U\text{-}Mix\text{-}AC}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">U</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Mix</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">AC</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq2-3107463.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocols could be more dangerous than previously thought by presenting attacks that are extremely powerful. As countermeasure, we adopt cryptographic reverse firewall (CRF), originally proposed by Mironov and Stephens-Davidowitz in EUROCRYPT 2015, to restore the security of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf{U\text{-}Mix\text{-}AC}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">U</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Mix</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">AC</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq3-3107463.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocols in the presence of ASAs. We also implement proposed AC protocol, ASAs and CRFs for experimental evaluations, and the results show that the execution time of subverted algorithms is almost the same as that of faithful ones and our designed CRFs are effective to guard the security of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf{U\text{-}Mix\text{-}AC}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">U</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">Mix</mml:mi><mml:mtext mathvariant="sans-serif">-</mml:mtext><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">AC</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chen-ieq4-3107463.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 2013年斯诺登的爆料表明，运行加密协议的用户机器可能会被攻击者(如制造商和供应链中介)暗中破坏，攻击者可以篡改加密实现，插入后门来破坏加密工具。为了形式化这种攻击，在CRYPTO 2014中，Bellare <italic >等人</italic >提出了算法替换攻击(ASA)的概念，此后该概念得到了广泛的研究。在这项工作中，我们转而研究匿名通信(AC)协议的安全性——这是一种众所周知的在互联网上保护用户隐私的工具——在用户机器被破坏的情况下。具体来说，我们对基于通用mixnet的AC(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { U \ text {-} Mix \ text {-} AC } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > U </MML:mi > < MML:mtext math variant = " sans-serif " >-</MML:mtext我们证明了as on < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { U \ text {-} Mix \ text {-} AC } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > U </MML:mi > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " >-</MML:mtext > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif作为对策，我们采用加密反向防火墙(CRF)，最初由Mironov和Stephens-Davidowitz在EUROCRYPT 2015中提出，以恢复< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { U \ text {-} Mix \ text {-} AC } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > U </MML:mi > < MML:mtext的安全性我们还实现了所提出的AC协议、asa和CRF进行实验评估，结果表明颠覆算法的执行时间与忠实算法几乎相同，并且我们设计的CRF能够有效地保护< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { U \ text {-} Mix \ text {-} AC } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > U的安全性
papers.title_zh: 用反向防火墙在损坏的机器上确保匿名通信

papers.title: Detecting and Mitigating DDoS Attacks in SDN Using Spatial-Temporal Graph Convolutional Network
papers.authors: Yongyi Cao, Hao Jiang, Yuchuan Deng, Jing Wu, Pan Zhou, Wei Luo
papers.abstract: With the development of data plane programmable Software-Defined Networking (SDN), Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks on the data plane increasingly become fatal. Currently, traditional attack detection methods are mainly used to detect whether a DDoS attack occurs and it is difficult to find the path that the attack flow traverses the network, which makes it difficult to accurately mitigate DDoS attacks. In this article, we propose a detection method based on Spatial-Temporal Graph Convolutional Network (ST-GCN) over the data plane programmable SDN, which maps the network into a graph. It senses the state of switches through In-band Network Telemetry (INT) with sampling, inputs the network state into the spatial-temporal graph convolutional network detection model, and finally finds out the switches through which DDoS attack flows pass. Based on this, we propose a defense method combined with an enhanced whitelist and a precise dropping strategy, which can effectively mitigate DDoS attacks and minimize the impact on legitimate network traffic. The evaluation results show that our detection method can accurately detect the path that the DDoS attack flows pass through, and can effectively mitigate the DDoS attack. Compared to classic methods, our method improves the detection accuracy by nearly 10%. At the same time, the southbound interface load and CPU overhead brought by our detection and defense process are much lower than the classic methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着数据平面可编程软件定义网络(SDN)的发展，数据平面上的分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击变得越来越致命。目前，传统的攻击检测方法主要用于检测是否发生DDoS攻击，很难发现攻击流穿越网络的路径，从而很难准确缓解DDoS攻击。本文提出了一种基于时空图卷积网络(ST-GCN)的数据平面可编程SDN检测方法，将网络映射成图。它通过带内网络遥测(INT)带内采样感知交换机状态，将网络状态输入时空图卷积网络检测模型，最终找出DDoS攻击流经过的交换机。基于此，我们提出了一种结合增强白名单和精确丢弃策略的防御方法，可以有效缓解DDoS攻击，将对合法网络流量的影响降到最低。评估结果表明，我们的检测方法能够准确地检测出DDoS攻击流经过的路径，并能有效地缓解DDoS攻击。与经典方法相比，我们的方法提高了近10%的检测精度。同时，我们的检测和防御过程所带来的南向接口负载和CPU开销也远低于经典方法。
papers.title_zh: 使用时空图卷积网络检测和缓解SDN中的DDOS攻击

papers.title: Exploiting Non-Cooperative Game Against Cache Pollution Attack in Vehicular Content Centric Network
papers.authors: Lin Yao, Zhenyu Chen, Haipeng Dai, Guowei Wu
papers.abstract: Vehicular Content Centric Network (VCCN) has been proposed to address the issues of user mobility and sporadic connectivity in Vehicular Ad hoc Network (VANET). The in-network caching of VCCN can indeed improve the performance of content distribution in terms of cache hit and delivery latency by making each node store frequently accessed data. However, data caching unfortunately suffers from Cache Pollution Attack (CPA) that sends out fabricated requests to pollute the data cache. To prevent the degradation of network performance caused by such an attack, we propose a detection and defense scheme for CPA by adopting game theory. We model the attack scenario into a non-cooperative game model. First, we prove the non-existence of pure strategy Nash Equilibrium (NE) in the attacker and defender game, and propose a normal form game model with complete information and an extensive Bayesian form game model with incomplete information. Under the guidance of NE, we propose a punishment strategy to prevent the conspiracy attack and make the attackers behave normally. Moreover, we propose a cooperative detection scheme to give the Road Side Unit (RSU) the final decision on CPA based on the direct and indirect suspicious lists which are generated by each node according to the observed traffic pattern. Simulation evaluations demonstrate that our scheme outperforms state-of-the-art schemes in terms of cache hit, detecting ratio, and cache accuracy for detecting and defending CPA.
papers.abstract_zh: 车载内容中心网络(VCCN)被提出来解决车载自组织网络(VANET)中用户移动性和零星连通性的问题。VCCN的网内缓存通过使每个节点存储频繁访问的数据，确实可以在缓存命中率和传递延迟方面提高内容分发的性能。然而，数据缓存不幸地遭受缓存污染攻击(CPA ),该攻击发出捏造的请求来污染数据缓存。为了防止这种攻击导致的网络性能下降，我们采用博弈论的方法提出了一种针对CPA的检测和防御方案。我们将攻击场景建模为非合作博弈模型。首先，我们证明了攻防博弈中纯策略纳什均衡的不存在性，并提出了一个完全信息范式博弈模型和一个不完全信息扩展贝叶斯范式博弈模型。在NE的指导下，我们提出了一种惩罚策略来防止共谋攻击，使攻击者行为正常。此外，我们提出了一个合作检测方案，根据每个节点根据观察到的交通模式生成的直接和间接可疑列表，给出路侧单元(RSU)对CPA的最终决策。仿真评估表明，在检测和防御CPA的缓存命中率、检测率和缓存准确性方面，我们的方案优于现有的方案。
papers.title_zh: 利用以车辆内容为中心网络中的无合作游戏针对缓存污染攻击

papers.title: Blockchain-Based Privacy Enforcement in the IoT Domain
papers.authors: Federico Daidone, Barbara Carminati, Elena Ferrari
papers.abstract: The Internet of Things (IoT) pervades our lives every day and has given end users the opportunity of accessing personalized and advanced services based on the analysis of the sensed data. However, IoT services are also characterized by new challenges related to security and privacy because end users often share sensitive data with different consumers without precise knowledge of how they will be managed and used. To cope with these issues, we propose a blockchain-based privacy enforcement framework where users can define how their data can be used and check if their will is respected without relying on a centralized manager. The preliminary tests we performed, simulating different scenarios, show the feasibility of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)渗透到我们的日常生活中，并为最终用户提供了基于对感知数据的分析来访问个性化和高级服务的机会。然而，物联网服务也面临着与安全和隐私相关的新挑战，因为最终用户经常与不同的消费者共享敏感数据，而不知道如何管理和使用这些数据。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了一个基于区块链的隐私执行框架，用户可以定义如何使用他们的数据，并检查他们的意愿是否得到尊重，而不依赖于集中管理器。我们执行的初步测试模拟了不同的场景，显示了我们方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 物联网域中的基于区块链的隐私执行

papers.title: IS-WARS: Intelligent and Stealthy Adversarial Attack to Wi-Fi-Based Human Activity Recognition Systems
papers.authors: Pei Huang, Xiaonan Zhang, Sihan Yu, Linke Guo
papers.abstract: The non-intrusive human activity recognition has been envisioned as a key enabler for many emerging applications requiring interactions between humans and computing systems. To accurately recognize different human behaviors, ubiquitous wireless signals are widely adopted, e.g., Wi-Fi signals, whose Channel State Information (CSI) can precisely reflect human movements. Unfortunately, nearly all Wi-Fi-based recognition systems assume a clean wireless environment, i.e., no interference will compromise the developed algorithms, which, apparently, is not feasible in practice. Even worse, for systems using Wi-Fi 2.4GHz signals, the widely existing interference from coexisting protocols, such as ZigBee, Bluetooth, and LTE-Unlicensed, can easily compromise the recognition process, posing a hard limit on further enhancing the accuracy. Therefore, this work uncovers a new signal adversarial attack against Wi-Fi-based human activity recognition systems, by intentionally injecting interference using coexisting protocol signals. The contaminated Wi-Fi signal will distort CSI estimation and finally output a false recognition result. Different from traditional jamming attacks, this new adversarial attack is intelligent and stealthy in terms of avoiding being detected from traffic analysis. Along with both theoretical analysis and extensive real-world experiments, we have shown this newly-identified attack can easily compromise many existing Wi-Fi-based human recognition systems while still bypassing existing schemes for malicious signal detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 非侵入式人类活动识别已被视为许多新兴应用的关键使能器，这些应用需要人类和计算系统之间的交互。为了准确地识别不同的人类行为，普遍采用无处不在的无线信号，例如Wi-Fi信号，其信道状态信息(CSI)可以精确地反映人类运动。不幸的是，几乎所有基于Wi-Fi的识别系统都假设无线环境干净，即没有干扰会损害所开发的算法，这显然在实践中是不可行的。更糟糕的是，对于使用Wi-Fi 2.4GHz信号的系统，来自ZigBee、蓝牙和LTE-Unlicensed等共存协议的广泛存在的干扰很容易损害识别过程，对进一步提高精度构成了硬性限制。因此，这项工作揭示了一种针对基于Wi-Fi的人类活动识别系统的新的信号敌对攻击，通过使用共存的协议信号故意注入干扰。被污染的Wi-Fi信号将使CSI估计失真，并最终输出错误的识别结果。与传统的干扰攻击不同，这种新的对抗性攻击在避免被流量分析检测方面具有智能性和隐蔽性。通过理论分析和广泛的真实世界实验，我们已经表明这种新发现的攻击可以轻松地破坏许多现有的基于Wi-Fi的人类识别系统，同时仍然绕过现有的恶意信号检测方案。
papers.title_zh: IS WARS：对基于Wi-Fi的人类活动识别系统的聪明而隐秘的对抗性攻击

papers.title: ExtendedSketch: Fusing Network Traffic for Super Host Identification With a Memory Efficient Sketch
papers.authors: Xuyang Jing, Zheng Yan, Hui Han, Witold Pedrycz
papers.abstract: Super host refers to the host that has a high cardinality or exhibits a big change in a network. Facing big-volume network traffic, sketches have been widely applied to identify super hosts in an efficient and accurate way. However, most sketches cannot flexibly balance memory usage and accuracy in host cardinality estimation. Setting an inappropriate counter size for a sketch could either lead to inaccurate host cardinality estimation or cause memory waste. In order to solve this issue, we propose a novel extensible and reversible sketch, named ExtendedSketch, to achieve accurate super host identification with high memory efficiency. The core idea of ExtendedSketch is to monitor low-cardinality hosts with small-sized counters while dynamically extending the size of counters when monitoring high-cardinality hosts by applying an adaptive extension strategy. Such the strategy can adaptively increase counter size according to network traffic status at runtime, which not only ensures the accuracy of high-cardinality host estimation but also avoids unnecessary memory consumption. We perform theoretical analysis and conduct a series of experimental evaluations on ExtendedSketch based on real world network traffic. Experimental results show that under same memory usage, compared to the state-of-the-art, ExtendedSketch achieves <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$1.4{ \sim }7.5$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>4</mml:mn><mml:mo>∼</mml:mo><mml:mn>7</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>5</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="yan-ieq1-3111328.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> times smaller error rate in estimating host cardinality with <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$1.9{ \sim }26.7$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>9</mml:mn><mml:mo>∼</mml:mo><mml:mn>26</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>7</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="yan-ieq2-3111328.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> times better accuracy on super host identification and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$95 {\sim }2^{15}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>95</mml:mn><mml:mo>∼</mml:mo><mml:msup><mml:mn>2</mml:mn><mml:mn>15</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="yan-ieq3-3111328.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> times faster speed on abnormal address reconstruction. Its advance in accuracy and efficiency demonstrates the practical significance of ExtendedSketch for super host identification.
papers.abstract_zh: 超级主机是指在网络中基数较高或表现出较大变化的主机。面对大流量的网络流量，草图被广泛应用于高效、准确地识别超级主机。然而，大多数草图不能灵活地平衡内存使用和主机基数估计的准确性。为草图设置不适当的计数器大小可能会导致不准确的主机基数估计，或者导致内存浪费。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了一种新的可扩展可逆草图ExtendedSketch，以实现高存储效率的超级主机识别。ExtendedSketch的核心思想是使用小型计数器来监控低基数主机，同时在监控高基数主机时通过应用自适应扩展策略来动态扩展计数器的大小。该策略能够在运行时根据网络流量状况自适应地增加计数器的大小，既保证了高基数主机估计的准确性，又避免了不必要的内存消耗。我们基于真实世界的网络流量对ExtendedSketch进行了理论分析和一系列实验评估。实验结果表明，在相同的内存使用情况下，与现有技术相比，ExtendedSketch实现了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 1.4 { \ sim } 7.5 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >。</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 4 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >∞</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 7 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >。</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 5 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Yan-ie Q1-3111328 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >使用< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 1.9 { \ sim } 26.7 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math >，估算主机基数时的错误率小一倍</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 9 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >∞</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 26 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >。</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 7 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Yan-ieq 2-3111328 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >超级主机识别的准确性提高了一倍，并且< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " >＄95 { \ sim }2^{15}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>95</mml:mn><mml:mo>∼</mml:mo><mml:msup><mml:mn>2</mml:mn><mml:mn>15</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " Yan-ieq 3-3111328 . gif它在准确性和效率上的进步表明了扩展搜索在超级宿主识别中的实际意义。
papers.title_zh: ExtendedSketch：将网络流量与超级主机识别的网络流量与内存有效的草图

papers.title: Sidechains With Fast Cross-Chain Transfers
papers.authors: Lingyuan Yin, Jing Xu, Qiang Tang
papers.abstract: With the rapid evolution of the blockchain technologies, the interoperability of different blockchain systems is emerging as one of the essential features of blockchains. Sidechains, a mechanism providing communications between different blockchains, have been heralded as the crucial factor of blockchain interoperability. However, there are still issues that need to be addressed in terms of security and feasibility. In this article, for proof-of-stake (PoS) and proof-of-work (PoW) blockchains, we propose efficient sidechain constructions with fast cross-chain transfers and small proof size by novel cross-chain certificate generation process and committee selection methods. Moreover, we also provide an extra functionality of supporting instant cross-chain transfers, such that emergent cross-chain transactions can be processed immediately. Compared to prior sidechains, our PoS sidechain construction can achieve faster cross-chain transfers, which improves the promptness of cross-chain transfers. While our PoW sidechain construction is more efficient with smaller proof size, reducing the storage and bandwidth overhead. Furthermore, we formally prove our sidechain constructions satisfying the properties of atomicity and timeliness. Finally, we develop a proof-of-concept implementation of our sidechains, and the experimental results show our constructions is not only faster, but also efficient with low storage and bandwidth overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着区块链技术的迅速发展，不同区块链系统的互操作性正成为区块链的基本特征之一。侧链是一种在不同区块链之间提供通信的机制，被认为是区块链互操作性的关键因素。然而，在安全性和可行性方面仍然存在需要解决的问题。在本文中，对于利益证明(PoS)和工作证明(PoW)区块链，我们通过新颖的跨链证书生成过程和委员会选择方法，提出了具有快速跨链传输和小证明大小的高效侧链构造。此外，我们还提供了支持即时跨链转账的额外功能，以便紧急跨链交易可以立即得到处理。与以前的侧链相比，我们的PoS侧链结构可以实现更快的跨链转移，这提高了跨链转移的及时性。而我们的PoW侧链结构在较小的校样尺寸下效率更高，减少了存储和带宽开销。此外，我们正式证明了我们的侧链结构满足原子性和时效性。最后，我们开发了侧链的概念验证实现，实验结果表明我们的构造不仅速度更快，而且效率更高，存储和带宽开销更低。
papers.title_zh: 带有快速跨链转移的侧链

papers.title: Blockchain-Based Secure Deduplication and Shared Auditing in Decentralized Storage
papers.authors: Guohua Tian, Yunhan Hu, Jianghong Wei, Zheli Liu, Xinyi Huang, Xiaofeng Chen, Willy Susilo
papers.abstract: Data deduplication and public auditing are significant for providing secure and efficient network storage services. However, the existing data deduplication schemes supporting auditing not only cannot effectively alleviate the threats of the single point of failure and duplicate-faking attack, but also have to bear the massive waste of computation and storage resources caused by metadata redundancy and repetitive audit tasks. In this article, we propose a blockchain-based secure deduplication and shared auditing scheme in decentralized storage. Specifically, our scheme utilizes a novel deduplication protocol based on the double-server storage model to achieve efficient space-saving while protecting data users from losing data under a single point of failure and duplicate-faking attack. Besides, it sharply reduces the computation and storage costs of metadata by introducing a lightweight authenticator generation algorithm and update protocol. On this basis, our scheme further adopts a blockchain-based two-way shared auditing mechanism to achieve decentralized public auditing without the third-party auditor, in which the audit authenticators and results of outsourced data are shared among its users to avoid repetitive audit tasks. Security and performance analysis indicates the practicability of our scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 重复数据删除和公共审计对于提供安全高效的网络存储服务具有重要意义。然而，现有的支持审计的重复数据删除方案不仅不能有效缓解单点故障和伪造副本攻击的威胁，还必须承受元数据冗余和重复审计任务带来的计算和存储资源的大量浪费。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于区块链的分布式存储安全重复数据删除和共享审计方案。具体而言，我们的方案利用基于双服务器存储模型的新型重复数据删除协议来实现高效的空间节省，同时保护数据用户在单点故障和复制伪造攻击下不会丢失数据。此外，通过引入轻量级认证器生成算法和更新协议，大大降低了元数据的计算和存储成本。在此基础上，该方案进一步采用基于区块链的双向共享审计机制，实现了无第三方审计机构的分散式公共审计，审计授权码和外包数据结果在用户间共享，避免了重复的审计任务。安全性和性能分析表明了该方案的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 基于区块链的安全重复数据删除和分散存储中的共享审核

papers.title: Grounds for Suspicion: Physics-Based Early Warnings for Stealthy Attacks on Industrial Control Systems
papers.authors: Mazen Azzam, Liliana Pasquale, Gregory M. Provan, Bashar Nuseibeh
papers.abstract: Stealthy attacks on Industrial Control Systems can cause significant damage while evading detection. In this article, instead of focusing on the detection of stealthy attacks, we aim to provide early warnings to operators, in order to avoid physical damage and preserve in advance data that may serve as an evidence during an investigation. We propose a framework to provide grounds for suspicion, i.e., preliminary indicators reflecting the likelihood of success of a stealthy attack. We propose two grounds for suspicion based on the behaviour of the physical process: (i) feasibility of a stealthy attack, and (ii) proximity to unsafe operating regions. We propose a metric to measure grounds for suspicion in real-time and provide soundness principles to ensure that such a metric is consistent with the grounds for suspicion. We apply our framework to Linear Time-Invariant (LTI) systems and formulate the suspicion metric computation as a real-time reachability problem. We validate our framework on a case study involving the benchmark Tennessee-Eastman process. We show through numerical simulation that we can provide early warnings well before a potential stealthy attack can cause damage, while incurring minimal load on the network. Finally, we apply our framework on a use case to illustrate its usefulness in supporting early evidence collection.
papers.abstract_zh: 对工业控制系统的秘密攻击可以在逃避检测的同时造成重大损害。在本文中，我们的重点不是检测隐形攻击，而是向操作人员提供早期警告，以避免物理损坏并提前保存数据，这些数据可能会在调查过程中用作证据。我们提出了一个框架来提供怀疑的理由，即反映秘密攻击成功可能性的初步指标。我们基于物理过程的行为提出了两个怀疑的理由:(I)秘密攻击的可行性，和(ii)接近不安全的操作区域。我们提出了一种度量标准来实时测量怀疑的理由，并提供了可靠性原则来确保这种度量标准与怀疑的理由一致。我们将我们的框架应用于线性时不变(LTI)系统，并将怀疑度量计算公式化为实时可达性问题。我们在一个涉及基准田纳西-伊斯曼过程的案例研究中验证了我们的框架。我们通过数值模拟表明，我们可以在潜在的隐蔽攻击造成损害之前提供早期预警，同时对网络造成最小的负载。最后，我们在一个用例上应用我们的框架来说明它在支持早期证据收集中的有用性。
papers.title_zh: 怀疑的理由：基于物理学的早期警告，涉及对工业控制系统的隐秘攻击

papers.title: The Hermes BFT for Blockchains
papers.authors: Mohammad M. Jalalzai, Chen Feng, Costas Busch, Golden G. Richard III, Jianyu Niu
papers.abstract: The performance of partially synchronous BFT-based consensus protocols is highly dependent on the primary node. All participant nodes in the network are blocked until they receive a proposal from the primary node to begin the consensus process. Therefore, an honest but slack node (with limited bandwidth) can adversely affect the performance when selected as primary. <italic>Hermes</italic>decreases protocol dependency on the primary node and minimizes transmission delay induced by the slack primary while keeping low message complexity and latency with high scalability. Hermes achieves these performance improvements by relaxing strong BFT agreement (safety) guarantees only for a specific type of Byzantine faults (also called equivocated faults). Interestingly, we show that in Hermes equivocating by a Byzantine primary is <italic>expensive</italic> and <italic>ineffective</italic>. Therefore, the safety of Hermes is comparable to the general BFT consensus. We deployed and tested Hermes on 190 Amazon <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$EC2$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>E</mml:mi><mml:mi>C</mml:mi><mml:mn>2</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="feng-ieq1-3114310.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> instances. In these tests, Hermes’s performance was comparable to the state-of-the-art BFT protocol for blockchains (when the network size is large) in the absence of slack nodes. Whereas, in the presence of slack nodes Hermes outperforms the state-of-the-art BFT protocol significantly in terms of throughput and latency.
papers.abstract_zh: 部分同步的基于BFT的共识协议的性能高度依赖于主节点。网络中的所有参与节点都被阻塞，直到它们从主节点接收到开始共识过程的提议。因此，一个诚实但松散的节点(带宽有限)在被选为主节点时会对性能产生不利影响。< italic>Hermes</italic >降低了对主节点的协议依赖性，最大限度地减少了由备用主节点引起的传输延迟，同时保持了较低的消息复杂性和延迟，并具有高可扩展性。Hermes通过仅针对特定类型的拜占庭故障(也称为可疑故障)放松强BFT协议(安全)保证来实现这些性能改进。有趣的是，我们发现在赫尔墨斯，用拜占庭式的原色模棱两可是< italic >昂贵的</italic >和< italic >无效的</italic >。因此，赫尔墨斯的安全性堪比一般的BFT共识。我们在190 Amazon上部署并测试了Hermes < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ EC2 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > E </MML:mi > < MML:mi > C </MML:mi > < MML:Mn > 2 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " feng-ie Q1-310在这些测试中，在没有松弛节点的情况下，Hermes的性能可与区块链的最新BFT协议(当网络规模较大时)相媲美。然而，在存在松弛节点的情况下，Hermes在吞吐量和延迟方面明显优于最新的BFT协议。
papers.title_zh: 爱马仕BFT用于区块链

papers.title: Towards Certifying the Asymmetric Robustness for Neural Networks: Quantification and Applications
papers.authors: Changjiang Li, Shouling Ji, Haiqin Weng, Bo Li, Jie Shi, Raheem Beyah, Shanqing Guo, Zonghui Wang, Ting Wang
papers.abstract: One intriguing property of deep neural networks (DNNs) is their vulnerability to adversarial examples – those maliciously crafted inputs that deceive target DNNs. While a plethora of defenses have been proposed to mitigate the threats of adversarial examples, they are often penetrated or circumvented by even stronger attacks. To end the constant arms race between attackers and defenders, significant efforts have been devoted to providing certifiable robustness bounds for DNNs, which ensures that for a given input its vicinity does not admit any adversarial instances. Yet, most prior works focus on the case of symmetric vicinities (e.g., a hyperrectangle centered at a given input), while ignoring the inherent heterogeneity of perturbation direction (e.g., the input is more vulnerable along a particular perturbation direction). To bridge the gap, in this article, we propose the concept of asymmetric robustness to account for the inherent heterogeneity of perturbation directions, and present Amoeba1, an efficient certification framework for asymmetric robustness. Through extensive empirical evaluation on state-of-the-art DNNs and benchmark datasets, we show that compared with its symmetric counterpart, the asymmetric robustness bound of a given input describes its local geometric properties in a more precise manner, which enables use cases including (i) modeling stronger adversarial threats, (ii) interpreting DNN predictions, and makes it a more practical definition of certifiable robustness for security-sensitive domains.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络(dnn)的一个有趣特性是它们容易受到敌对例子的影响——这些恶意制作的输入会欺骗目标dnn。虽然已经提出了过多的防御措施来减轻对抗性示例的威胁，但是它们经常被更强的攻击穿透或绕过。为了结束攻击者和防御者之间的持续军备竞赛，已经投入了大量的努力来为DNNs提供可证明的鲁棒性界限，这确保了对于给定的输入，其附近不允许任何敌对的实例。然而，大多数现有工作集中于对称邻域的情况(例如，以给定输入为中心的超矩形)，而忽略了扰动方向的固有不均匀性(例如，输入沿着特定扰动方向更易受攻击)。为了弥补这一缺陷，本文提出了非对称鲁棒性的概念来解释扰动方向的内在异质性，并提出了一个有效的非对称鲁棒性认证框架Amoeba1。通过对最新DNNs和基准数据集的大量经验评估，我们表明，与对称输入相比，给定输入的非对称鲁棒性界限以更精确的方式描述了其局部几何属性，这使得用例包括(I)建模更强的敌对威胁，(ii)解释DNN预测，并使其成为安全敏感域的可证明鲁棒性的更实用定义。
papers.title_zh: 旨在证明神经网络的不对称鲁棒性：量化和应用

papers.title: Toward Robust Detection of Puppet Attacks via Characterizing Fingertip-Touch Behaviors
papers.authors: Cong Wu, Kun He, Jing Chen, Ziming Zhao, Ruiying Du
papers.abstract: Fingerprint authentication has gained increasing popularity on mobile devices in recent years. However, it is vulnerable to presentation attacks, which include that an attacker spoofs with an artificial replica. Many liveness detection solutions have been proposed to defeat such presentation attacks; however, they all fail to defend against a particular type of presentation attack, namely puppet attack, in which an attacker places an unwilling victim's finger on the fingerprint sensor. In this article, we propose FinAuth, an effective and efficient software-only solution, to complement fingerprint authentication by defeating both synthetic spoofs and puppet attacks using fingertip-touch characteristics. FinAuth characterizes intrinsic fingertip-touch behaviors including the acceleration and the rotation angle of mobile devices when a legitimate user authenticates. FinAuth only utilizes common sensors equipped on mobile devices and does not introduce extra usability burdens on users. To evaluate the effectiveness of FinAuth, we carried out experiments on datasets collected from 90 subjects after the IRB approval. The results show that FinAuth can achieve the average balanced accuracy of 96.04% with 5 training data points and 99.28% with 100 training data points. Security experiments also demonstrate that FinAuth is resilient against possible attacks. In addition, we report the usability analysis results of FinAuth, including user authentication delay and overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，指纹认证在移动设备上越来越受欢迎。然而，它容易受到表示攻击，包括攻击者用人工复制品进行欺骗。已经提出了许多活性检测解决方案来挫败这种呈现攻击；然而，它们都无法防御特定类型的呈现攻击，即傀儡攻击，攻击者将不情愿的受害者的手指放在指纹传感器上。在本文中，我们提出了FinAuth，一种有效且高效的纯软件解决方案，通过利用指尖触摸特征击败合成欺骗和傀儡攻击来补充指纹认证。FinAuth描述了固有的指尖触摸行为，包括合法用户验证时移动设备的加速度和旋转角度。FinAuth只利用移动设备上配备的普通传感器，不会给用户带来额外的可用性负担。为了评估FinAuth的有效性，我们在IRB批准后从90名受试者收集的数据集上进行了实验。实验结果表明，FinAuth在5个训练数据点和100个训练数据点的情况下，平均平衡准确率分别达到96.04%和99.28%。安全实验也证明了FinAuth对可能的攻击具有弹性。此外，我们报告了FinAuth的可用性分析结果，包括用户认证延迟和开销。
papers.title_zh: 通过表征指尖触摸行为来稳健地检测木偶攻击

papers.title: Tracking Normalized Network Traffic Entropy to Detect DDoS Attacks in P4
papers.authors: Damu Ding, Marco Savi, Domenico Siracusa
papers.abstract: Distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) attacks represent a persistent threat to modern telecommunications networks: detecting and counteracting them is still a crucial unresolved challenge for network operators. DDoS attack detection is usually carried out in one or more central nodes that collect significant amounts of monitoring data from networking devices, potentially creating issues related to network overload or delay in detection. The dawn of programmable data planes in Software-Defined Networks can help mitigate this issue, opening the door to the detection of DDoS attacks directly in the data plane of the switches. However, the most widely-adopted data plane programming language, namely P4, lacks supporting many arithmetic operations, therefore, some of the advanced network monitoring functionalities needed for DDoS detection cannot be straightforwardly implemented in P4. This work overcomes such a limitation and presents two novel strategies for flow cardinality and for normalized network traffic entropy estimation that only use P4-supported operations and guarantee a low relative error. Additionally, based on these contributions, we propose a DDoS detection strategy relying on variations of the normalized network traffic entropy. Results show that it has comparable or higher detection accuracy than state-of-the-art solutions, yet being simpler and entirely executed in the data plane.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击是对现代电信网络的持续威胁:检测和应对它们仍然是网络运营商尚未解决的关键挑战。DDoS攻击检测通常在一个或多个从网络设备收集大量监控数据的中央节点中进行，这可能会产生与网络过载或检测延迟相关的问题。软件定义网络中可编程数据平面的出现有助于缓解这一问题，为直接在交换机的数据平面中检测DDoS攻击打开了大门。然而，最广泛采用的数据平面编程语言，即P4，缺乏对许多算术运算的支持，因此，DDoS检测所需的一些高级网络监控功能不能直接在P4实现。这项工作克服了这样的限制，并提出了两个新的策略流基数和归一化网络流量熵估计，只使用P4支持的操作，并保证较低的相对误差。此外，基于这些贡献，我们提出了一种基于归一化网络流量熵变化的DDoS检测策略。结果表明，它具有与最先进的解决方案相当或更高的检测精度，但更简单，并且完全在数据平面中执行。
papers.title_zh: 跟踪标准化的网络流量熵以检测P4中的DDOS攻击

papers.title: Byzantine-Resilient Multi-Agent System
papers.authors: Rachid Guerraoui, Alexandre Maurer
papers.abstract: We consider the problem of making a multi-agent system (MAS) resilient to Byzantine failures through replication. We consider a very general model of MAS, where randomness can be involved in the behavior of each agent. We propose the first universal scheme to make such a MAS Byzantine-resilient.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑通过复制使多智能体系统(MAS)对拜占庭故障具有弹性的问题。我们考虑一个非常一般的MAS模型，其中每个主体的行为都包含随机性。我们提出了第一个使这种MAS具有拜占庭弹性的通用方案。
papers.title_zh: 拜占庭式多代理系统

papers.title: XAI-Based Microarchitectural Side-Channel Analysis for Website Fingerprinting Attacks and Defenses
papers.authors: Berk Gülmezoglu
papers.abstract: Website Fingerprinting attacks aim to track the visited websites in browsers and infer confidential information about users. Several studies showed that recent advancements in Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL) algorithms made it possible to implement website fingerprinting attacks even though various defense techniques are present in the network. Nevertheless, trained models for website detection are not analyzed deeply to identify the leakage sources which are not always visible to both attackers and Cyber Threat Intelligence engineers. This study focuses on explaining ML and DL models in the context of microarchitecture-based website fingerprinting attacks. In the attack model, performance counters and cache occupancy side-channels are implemented on Google Chrome and Tor browsers. After ML and DL models are trained, LIME and saliency map XAI methods are applied to examine the leakage points in the side-channel data. In order to match the leakage samples in the measurements to the network traces, a novel dataset is collected by utilizing Google Chrome and Firefox browser developer tools. Next, the efficiency of explainable methods are analyzed with XAI metrics. Finally, an XAI-based obfuscation defense technique is proposed as a countermeasure against microarchitecture-based website fingerprinting attacks
papers.abstract_zh: 网站指纹攻击旨在跟踪浏览器中访问过的网站，并推断出用户的机密信息。几项研究表明，机器学习(ML)和深度学习(DL)算法的最新进展使实施网站指纹攻击成为可能，即使网络中存在各种防御技术。然而，用于网站检测的训练模型没有被深入分析，以识别攻击者和网络威胁情报工程师并不总是可见的泄漏源。本研究的重点是在基于微体系结构的网站指纹攻击的背景下解释ML和DL模型。在攻击模型中，性能计数器和缓存占用侧通道是在Google Chrome和Tor浏览器上实现的。在训练ML和DL模型之后，应用LIME和显著图XAI方法来检查侧通道数据中的泄漏点。为了将测量中的泄漏样本与网络轨迹进行匹配，利用Google Chrome和Firefox浏览器开发工具收集了一个新的数据集。接下来，用XAI度量分析可解释方法的效率。最后，提出了一种基于XAI的混淆防御技术来对抗基于微体系结构的网站指纹攻击
papers.title_zh: 网站指纹攻击和防御的基于XAI的微构造侧通道分析

papers.title: RL-Shield: Mitigating Target Link-Flooding Attacks Using SDN and Deep Reinforcement Learning Routing Algorithm
papers.authors: Amir Rezapour, Wen-Guey Tzeng
papers.abstract: Link-flooding attacks (LFAs) are a new type of distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks that can substantially damage network connectivity. LFAs flows are seemingly legitimate at the origin. But their cumulative volume at critical links causes congestion. We propose RL-Shield, a reinforcement learning based defense system against LFAs. It mitigates LFAs and, at the same time, effectively forwards data traffic in the network. RL-Shield introduces a new detection algorithm for monitoring IP behaviors using the Dirichlet distribution and Bayesian statistics. It monitors the interplay of LFAs and traffic engineering and identifies source IPs that persistently react to re-routing events. The detection algorithm controls two reinforcement learning based routing algorithms that use a hop-by-hop technique to connect related node pairs.We evaluate RL-Shield on various network topologies by simulating several attack strategies. The simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness and high-accuracy of RL-Shield.
papers.abstract_zh: 链路泛洪攻击(LFAs)是一种新型的分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击，可以严重破坏网络连接。从源头上看，LFA流似乎是合法的。但是它们在关键路段的累积量会导致拥堵。我们提出了RL-Shield，一个基于强化学习的防御系统。它减少了LFA，同时有效地在网络中转发数据流量。RL-Shield引入了一种新的检测算法，使用狄利克雷分布和贝叶斯统计来监控IP行为。它监控LFA和流量工程的相互作用，并识别持续对重新路由事件做出反应的源IP。检测算法控制两种基于强化学习的路由算法，这两种算法使用逐跳技术来连接相关的节点对。我们通过模拟几种攻击策略来评估各种网络拓扑上的RL-Shield。仿真结果验证了RL-Shield的有效性和高精度。
papers.title_zh: RL-shield：使用SDN和深度强化学习路由算法来减轻目标链接淋巴结攻击

papers.title: Generative-Adversarial Class-Imbalance Learning for Classifying Cyber-Attacks and Faults - A Cyber-Physical Power System
papers.authors: Maryam Farajzadeh-Zanjani, Ehsan Hallaji, Roozbeh Razavi-Far, Mehrdad Saif
papers.abstract: There has been an increasing interest in the use of data-driven techniques for classifying cyber-attacks and physical faults in cyber-physical systems. In real-world applications, the number of cyber-attack and faulty samples is usually far less than normal samples. This causes the skewed class distribution in data collected from cyber-physical systems. Training an accurate predictive model under skewed class conditions is not an easy task. In this work, we introduce a new generative adversarial framework for learning from skewed class distributions. This novel Adversarial Class-Imbalance Learning (ACIL) scheme has a novel loss function that is used during the adversarial training session. ACIL tries to iteratively adjust weights of an auxiliary multilayer perceptron to learn the minority class (i.e., cyber-attacks and physical faults) distributions along with the majority class (i.e., normal) distribution. Moreover, we devise an inclusive data-driven scheme for classifying cyber-attacks and faults, which includes four experiments of a baseline, nine state-of-the-art class-imbalance learning methods, two different generative-adversarial network-based approaches, and ACIL. These techniques are verified and compared through several experimental cyber-physical power scenarios. The obtained results show the effectiveness of ACIL for classifying samples of cyber-attacks and faults with skewed class distributions.
papers.abstract_zh: 人们对使用数据驱动技术对网络物理系统中的网络攻击和物理故障进行分类越来越感兴趣。在现实世界的应用中，网络攻击和故障样本的数量通常远远少于正常样本。这导致了从信息物理系统收集的数据中的偏斜类别分布。在偏斜的类条件下训练准确的预测模型不是一件容易的事情。在这项工作中，我们介绍了一种新的生成对抗框架，用于从偏斜的类分布中学习。这种新颖的对抗性类别不平衡学习(ACIL)方案具有新颖的损失函数，该损失函数在对抗性训练会话期间使用。ACIL试图迭代地调整辅助多层感知器的权重，以学习少数类(即网络攻击和物理故障)分布以及多数类(即正态)分布。此外，我们设计了一个包容性的数据驱动的网络攻击和故障分类方案，其中包括四个基线实验，九个最先进的类别不平衡学习方法，两个不同的基于生成-对抗网络的方法，以及ACIL。这些技术通过几个实验性的网络物理电源场景进行了验证和比较。所获得的结果显示了ACIL对具有偏斜类别分布的网络攻击和故障样本进行分类的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 用于分类的网络攻击和故障的生成对抗性级别的不平衡学习 - 网络物理功率系统

papers.title: A Formal Verification of ArpON - A Tool for Avoiding Man-in-the-Middle Attacks in Ethernet Networks
papers.authors: Danilo Bruschi, Andrea Di Pasquale, Silvio Ghilardi, Andrea Lanzi, Elena Pagani
papers.abstract: Since the nineties, the Man-in-The-Middle (MITM) attack has been one of the most effective strategies adopted for compromising information security in network environments. In this article, we focus our attention on ARP cache poisoning, which is one of the most well-known and more adopted techniques for performing MITM attacks in Ethernet local area networks. More precisely, we will prove that, in network environments with at least one malicious host in the absence of cryptography, an ARP cache poisoning attack cannot be avoided. Subsequently, we advance ArpON, an efficient and effective solution to counteract ARP cache poisoning, and we use a model-checker for verifying its safety property. Our main finding, in accordance with the above impossibility result, is that the only event that compromises the safety of ArpON is a cache poisoning that nevertheless is removed by ArpON itself after a very short period, thus making it practically infeasible to perpetrate an ARP cache poisoning attack on network hosts where ArpON is installed.
papers.abstract_zh: 自90年代以来，中间人(MITM)攻击一直是网络环境中危害信息安全的最有效策略之一。在本文中，我们将注意力集中在ARP缓存中毒上，这是在以太局域网中执行MITM攻击的最著名和最常用的技术之一。更准确地说，我们将证明，在没有加密的情况下，在至少有一个恶意主机的网络环境中，ARP缓存中毒攻击是无法避免的。随后，我们提出了一种有效的解决ARP缓存中毒的方法ArpON，并使用模型检测器来验证其安全性。根据上述不可能的结果，我们的主要发现是，危害ArpON安全性的唯一事件是缓存中毒，但它在很短的时间后被ArpON自身消除，因此在安装了ArpON的网络主机上实施ARP缓存中毒攻击实际上是不可行的。
papers.title_zh: ARPON的正式验证 - 一种避免在以太网网络中进行中间攻击的工具

papers.title: Understanding Security Risks of Embedded Devices Through Fine-Grained Firmware Fingerprinting
papers.authors: Qiang Li, Dawei Tan, Xin Ge, Haining Wang, Zhi Li, Jiqiang Liu
papers.abstract: An increasing number of embedded devices are connecting to the Internet, ranging from cameras, routers to printers, while an adversary can exploit security flaws already known to compromise those devices. Security patches are usually associated with the device firmware, which relies on the device vendors and products. Due to compatibility and release-time issues, many embedded devices are still using outdated firmware with known vulnerabilities or flaws. In this article, we conduct a systematic study on device vulnerabilities by leveraging firmware fingerprints. Specifically, we use a web crawler to gather 9,716 firmware images from official websites of device vendors, and 347,685 security reports scattered across data archives, blogs, and forums. We propose to generate fine-grained fingerprints based on the subtle differences between the filesystems of various firmware images. Furthermore, machine learning algorithms and regex are used to identify device vulnerabilities and corresponding device firmware fingerprints. We perform real-world experiments to validate the performance of the firmware fingerprint, which yields high accuracy of 91% precision and 90% recall. We reveal that 6,898 reports have the firmware and related vulnerability information, and there are more than 10% of firmware vulnerabilities without any patches or solutions for mitigating underlying security risks.
papers.abstract_zh: 越来越多的嵌入式设备连接到互联网，从相机、路由器到打印机，而对手可以利用已知的安全缺陷来危害这些设备。安全补丁通常与依赖于设备供应商和产品的设备固件相关联。由于兼容性和发布时间问题，许多嵌入式设备仍在使用具有已知漏洞或缺陷的过时固件。在本文中，我们通过利用固件指纹对设备漏洞进行了系统研究。具体来说，我们使用网络爬虫从设备供应商的官方网站收集9，716个固件映像，以及分散在数据档案、博客和论坛中的347，685个安全报告。我们建议基于各种固件映像的文件系统之间的细微差异来生成细粒度的指纹。此外，机器学习算法和正则表达式用于识别设备漏洞和相应的设备固件指纹。我们进行了真实世界的实验来验证固件指纹的性能，它产生了91%的精确度和90%的召回率。我们发现，6，898份报告包含固件和相关漏洞信息，并且有超过10%的固件漏洞没有任何补丁或解决方案来减轻潜在的安全风险。
papers.title_zh: 通过细粒固件指纹识别嵌入式设备的安全风险

papers.title: Achieving Privacy-Preserving Online Diagnosis With Outsourced SVM in Internet of Medical Things Environment
papers.authors: Bin Xie, Tao Xiang, Xiaofeng Liao, Jiahui Wu
papers.abstract: Online diagnosis is one of the data services, which can use the machine learning model placed on the cloud and collected physical data from internet of medical things (IoMT) for better medical services. However, the collected user data, diagnosis results and the deployed machine learning model contain sensitive information of users and the healthcare provider, which may lead to serious privacy leakage. To achieve a secure outsourced diagnosis, both high security and low burden for users should be considered. However, the existing works can not solve these problems simultaneously. In this article, based on two non-colluding servers, a privacy-preserving cloud-aided diagnosis scheme for IoMT is proposed. Concretely, a hybrid data encryption method based on homomorphic encryption and AES is used to generate user requests in an efficient way. Besides, we propose a class of secure two-party protocols using homomorphic encryption, such as secure kernel function computation, secure multiplication, and secure comparison, and a privacy-preserving diagnosis scheme based on multi-class SVM with these building blocks is constructed, which can keep users offline in the diagnosis process. Finally, the security analysis and evaluation further illustrate that our scheme is superior to the prior works in terms of security and user-friendliness.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线诊断是数据服务之一，它可以使用放置在云上的机器学习模型，并从医疗物联网(IoMT)收集物理数据，以提供更好的医疗服务。然而，收集的用户数据、诊断结果和部署的机器学习模型包含用户和医疗保健提供商的敏感信息，这可能导致严重的隐私泄露。为了实现安全的外包诊断，应该考虑高安全性和对用户的低负担。然而，现有的工作不能同时解决这些问题。基于两台非共谋服务器，提出了一种保护隐私的云辅助IoMT诊断方案。具体地，基于同态加密和AES的混合数据加密方法被用于以有效的方式生成用户请求。此外，我们提出了一类使用同态加密的安全两方协议，如安全核函数计算、安全乘法和安全比较，并利用这些构造块构造了一个基于多类SVM的隐私保护诊断方案，在诊断过程中保持用户离线。最后，安全性分析和评估进一步表明，我们的方案在安全性和用户友好性方面优于现有的工作。
papers.title_zh: 在医学事物环境中，通过外包SVM外包SVM实现隐私的在线诊断

papers.title: Modeling and Defense of Social Virtual Reality Attacks Inducing Cybersickness
papers.authors: Samaikya Valluripally, Aniket Gulhane, Khaza Anuarul Hoque, Prasad Calyam
papers.abstract: Social Virtual Reality Learning Environments (VRLE) offer a new medium for flexible and immersive learning environments with geo-distributed users. Ensuring user safety in VRLE application domains such as education, flight simulations, military training is of utmost importance. Specifically, there is a need to study the impact of “immersion attacks” (e.g., chaperone attack, occlusion) and other types of attacks/faults (e.g., unauthorized access, network congestion) that may cause user safety issues (i.e., inducing of cybersickness). In this article, we present a novel framework to quantify the security, privacy issues triggered via immersion attacks and other types of attacks/faults. By using a real-world social VRLE viz., vSocial and creating a novel attack-fault tree model, we show that such attacks can induce undesirable levels of cybersickness. Next, we convert these attack-fault trees into stochastic timed automata (STA) representations to perform statistical model checking for a given attacker profile. Using this model checking approach, we determine the most vulnerable threat scenarios that can trigger high occurrence cases of cybersickness for VRLE users. Lastly, we show the effectiveness of our attack-fault tree modeling by incorporating suitable design principles such as hardening, diversity, redundancy and principle of least privilege to ensure user safety in a VRLE session.
papers.abstract_zh: 社交虚拟现实学习环境(VRLE)为地理上分散的用户提供了一种灵活的沉浸式学习环境。在教育、飞行模拟、军事训练等VRLE应用领域，确保用户安全至关重要。具体而言，需要研究“沉浸式攻击”(例如，伴侣攻击、遮挡)和其他类型的攻击/故障(例如，未经授权的访问、网络拥塞)的影响，这些攻击/故障可能会导致用户安全问题(例如，诱发网络疾病)。在本文中，我们提出了一个新的框架来量化通过沉浸式攻击和其他类型的攻击/故障触发的安全和隐私问题。通过使用真实世界的社会虚拟现实。，vSocial，并创建了一个新的攻击故障树模型，我们表明，这种攻击可以导致不良水平的网络病。接下来，我们将这些攻击故障树转换为随机时间自动机(STA)表示，以对给定的攻击者配置文件执行统计模型检查。使用这种模型检查方法，我们可以确定最易受攻击的威胁场景，这些场景可能会引发VRLE用户的网络疾病的高发生率。最后，我们通过引入适当的设计原则，如硬化、多样性、冗余和最小特权原则来确保用户在VRLE会话中的安全，展示了我们的攻击-故障树建模的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 对社会虚拟现实攻击的建模和防御引起网络攻击

papers.title: Generating Adversarial Examples With Distance Constrained Adversarial Imitation Networks
papers.authors: Pengfei Tang, Wenjie Wang, Jian Lou, Li Xiong
papers.abstract: Recent studies have shown that neural networks are vulnerable to adversarial examples that are designed by adding small perturbations to clean examples in order to trick the classifier to misclassify. Various approaches based on optimization have been proposed for generating adversarial examples with minimal perturbation. Model training based methods such as Adversarial Transformation Network (ATN) provide a fundamentally new way to directly transform an input into an adversarial example, which promises fast generation of adversarial examples. However, the adversarial examples may have suboptimal quality with significantly large perturbations or low attack success rate at small perturbations. In this article, we propose a distance constrained Adversarial Imitation Network (AIN), which enhances ATN and is capable of generating both targeted and untargeted examples with an explicit distance constraint. AIN can not only generate large scale adversarial examples efficiently as achieved in ATN, but also imitate the behavior of state-of-the-art optimization-based methods, hence achieving improved quality. Extensive experiments show that AIN significantly outperforms ATN and other Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) based methods in the quality of generated adversarial examples, and is much more efficient than optimization based methods while achieving comparable quality.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的研究表明，神经网络容易受到敌对例子的攻击，这些例子是通过向干净的例子添加小的扰动来设计的，以便欺骗分类器进行错误分类。已经提出了各种基于优化的方法来生成具有最小扰动的对立示例。基于模型训练的方法，例如对立转换网络(ATN)提供了一种全新的方式来将输入直接转换成对立的例子，这种方式保证了对立例子的快速生成。然而，敌对的例子可能具有次优的质量，具有非常大的扰动或在小扰动下的低攻击成功率。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个距离约束的对抗性模仿网络(AIN ),它增强了ATN，并且能够在明确的距离约束下生成有目标和无目标的例子。AIN不仅可以像ATN一样高效地生成大规模的对抗样本，而且可以模仿基于优化的方法的行为，从而提高质量。大量实验表明，AIN在生成对抗样本的质量上明显优于ATN和其他基于生成对抗网络(GAN)的方法，并且在达到可比质量的同时比基于优化的方法更高效。
papers.title_zh: 通过距离受限的对抗性模仿网络生成对抗示例

papers.title: Model of Execution Trace Obfuscation Between Threads
papers.authors: Zihan Sha, Hui Shu, Xiaobing Xiong, Fei Kang
papers.abstract: Advanced reverse analysis tools have significantly improved the ability of attackers to crack software via dynamic analysis techniques, such as symbol execution and taint analysis. These techniques are widely used in malicious fields such as vulnerability exploitation or theft of intellectual property. In this paper, we present an obfuscation strategy called “execution trace obfuscation,” wherein the program execution trace repeatedly switches between multiple threads. Our technique realizes equivalent code transformation by abstracting the obfuscation problems into pruning, cloning, and coloring problems in graph theory. Based on this, we further propose the cascade encryption of a function that depends on execution trace information with a key derived from the function address calculation process, followed by removing this key from the program. We have implemented a compiler-level system that inputs a source program and automatically generates an obfuscated file. Finally, random test proves the universality of obfuscation algorithm and verify the system’s performance. Results shows that our system can effectively interfere advanced reverse analysis tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 高级逆向分析工具极大地提高了攻击者通过动态分析技术(如符号执行和污点分析)破解软件的能力。这些技术广泛用于恶意领域，如漏洞利用或窃取知识产权。在本文中，我们提出了一种称为“执行跟踪混淆”的混淆策略，其中程序执行跟踪在多个线程之间重复切换。我们的技术通过将混淆问题抽象为图论中的剪枝、克隆和着色问题来实现等价的代码转换。基于此，我们进一步提出用从函数地址计算过程中导出的密钥对依赖于执行跟踪信息的函数进行级联加密，然后从程序中移除该密钥。我们实现了一个编译器级别的系统，它输入一个源程序并自动生成一个混淆文件。最后，随机测试证明了混淆算法的通用性，验证了系统的性能。结果表明，我们的系统可以有效地干扰先进的逆向分析工具。
papers.title_zh: 线程之间的执行模型

papers.title: Guard: Attack-Resilient Adaptive Load Balancing in Distributed Streaming Systems
papers.authors: Anas Daghistani, Mosab Khayat, Muhamad Felemban, Walid G. Aref, Arif Ghafoor
papers.abstract: The performance of distributed streaming systems relies on how even the workload is distributed among their machines. However, data and query workloads are skewed and change rapidly. Therefore, multiple adaptive load-balancing mechanisms have been proposed in the literature to rebalance distributed streaming systems according to the changes in their workloads. This paper introduces a novel attack model that targets adaptive load-balancing mechanisms of distributed streaming systems. The attack reduces the throughput and the availability of the system by making it stay in a continuous state of rebalancing. This paper proposes Guard, a component that detects and blocks attacks that target the adaptive load balancing of distributed streaming systems. Guard uses an unsupervised machine-learning technique to detect malicious users that are involved in the attack. Guard does not block any user unless it detects that the user is malicious. Guard does not depend on a specific application. Experimental evaluation for a high-intensity attack illustrates that Guard improves the throughput and the availability of the system by 85% and 86%, respectively. Moreover, Guard improves the minimum availability that the attacker achieves by 325%.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式流系统的性能甚至依赖于工作负载如何在它们的机器之间分配。但是，数据和查询工作负载是不对称的，并且变化很快。因此，在文献中已经提出了多种自适应负载平衡机制，以根据其工作负载的变化来重新平衡分布式流系统。介绍了一种针对分布式流媒体系统自适应负载平衡机制的新型攻击模型。这种攻击通过使系统处于持续的重新平衡状态来降低系统的吞吐量和可用性。本文提出了Guard，它是一个检测和阻止针对分布式流系统的自适应负载平衡的攻击的组件。Guard使用无监督的机器学习技术来检测参与攻击的恶意用户。除非检测到用户是恶意的，否则Guard不会阻止任何用户。保护不依赖于特定的应用。对高强度攻击的实验评估表明，Guard使系统的吞吐量和可用性分别提高了85%和86%。而且，Guard将攻击者达到的最低可用性提高了325%。
papers.title_zh: 后卫：分布式流媒体系统中的攻击弹性自适应负载平衡

papers.title: Securing Big Data Scientific Workflows via Trusted Heterogeneous Environments
papers.authors: Saeid Mofrad, Ishtiaq Ahmed, Fengwei Zhang, Shiyong Lu, Ping Yang, Heming Cui
papers.abstract: Big data workflow management systems (BDWMS)s have recently emerged as popular data analytics platforms to conduct large-scale data analytics in the cloud. However, the protection of data confidentiality and secure execution of workflow applications remains an important and challenging problem. Although a few data analytics systems, such as VC3 and Opaque, were developed to address security problems, they are limited to specific domains such as Map-Reduce-style and SQL query workflows. A generic secure framework for BDWMSs is still missing. In this article, we propose SecDATAVIEW, a distributed BDWMS that employs heterogeneous workers, such as Intel SGX and AMD SEV, to protect both workflow and workflow data execution, addressing three major security challenges: (1) Reducing the TCB size of the big data workflow management system in the untrusted cloud by leveraging the hardware-assisted TEE and software attestation; (2) Supporting Java-written workflow tasks to overcome the limitation of SGX’s lack of support for Java programs; and (3) Reducing the adverse impact of SGX enclave memory paging overhead through a “Hybrid” workflow task scheduling system that selectively deploys sensitive tasks to a mix of SGX and SEV worker nodes. Our experimental results show that SecDATAVIEW imposes moderate overhead on the workflow execution time.
papers.abstract_zh: 大数据工作流管理系统(BDWMS)最近成为流行的数据分析平台，用于在云中进行大规模数据分析。然而，保护数据机密性和工作流应用的安全执行仍然是一个重要的和具有挑战性的问题。虽然开发了一些数据分析系统(如VC3和Opaque)来解决安全问题，但它们仅限于特定领域，如Map-Reduce风格和SQL查询工作流。BDWMSs的通用安全框架仍然缺失。在本文中，我们提出了SecDATAVIEW，这是一个分布式BDWMS，它使用异构工作人员，如英特尔SGX和AMD SEV，来保护工作流和工作流数据执行，解决三个主要的安全挑战:(1)通过利用硬件辅助的TEE和软件证明，减少不可信云中大数据工作流管理系统的TCB大小；(2)支持Java编写的工作流任务，克服SGX不支持Java程序的局限；以及(3)通过“混合”工作流任务调度系统减少SGX飞地内存分页开销的不利影响，该系统选择性地将敏感任务部署到SGX和SEV工作者节点的混合。我们的实验结果表明，SecDATAVIEW在工作流执行时间上施加了适度的开销。
papers.title_zh: 通过可信赖的异质环境来确保大数据科学工作流程

papers.title: GRIP-GAN: An Attack-Free Defense Through General Robust Inverse Perturbation
papers.authors: Haibin Zheng, Jinyin Chen, Hang Du, Weipeng Zhu, Shouling Ji, Xuhong Zhang
papers.abstract: Despite of its tremendous popularity and success in computer vision (CV) and natural language processing, deep learning is inherently vulnerable to adversarial attacks in which adversarial examples (AEs) are carefully crafted by imposing imperceptible perturbations on the clean examples to deceive the target deep neural networks (DNNs). Many defense solutions in CV have been proposed. However, most of them, e.g., adversarial training, suffer from a low generality due to the reliance on limited AEs. Moreover, some solutions even have a non-negligible negative impact on the classification accuracy of clean examples. Last but not least, they are impotent against the unconstrained attacks in which the attackers optimize the perturbation direction and size by additionally taking the defense methods into accounts. In this article, we propose GRIP-GAN to learn a general robust inverse perturbation (GRIP), which is not only able to offset any potential adversarial perturbations but also strengthen the target class-related features, purely from the clean images via a generative adversarial network (GAN). By feeding a random noise, GRIP-GAN is able to generate a dynamic GRIP for each input image to defend against unconstrained attacks. To further improve the defense performance, we also enable GRIP-GAN to generate a GRIP tailored to each input image via feeding input image specific noise to GRIP-GAN. Extensive experiments are carried out on MNIST, CIFAR10, and ImageNet datasets against 17 adversarial attacks. The results show that GRIP-GAN outperforms all the baselines. We further share insights on the success of GRIP-GAN and provide visualized proofs.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管深度学习在计算机视觉(CV)和自然语言处理方面获得了巨大的普及和成功，但它天生容易受到对抗性攻击，其中对抗性示例(AEs)是通过对干净示例施加难以察觉的扰动来欺骗目标深度神经网络(DNNs)而精心制作的。已经提出了许多CV中的防御解决方案。然而，它们中的大多数，例如对抗性训练，由于依赖于有限的不良事件而具有较低的通用性。此外，一些解决方案甚至对干净样本的分类精度有不可忽略的负面影响。最后但并非最不重要的是，它们对无约束攻击无能为力，在无约束攻击中，攻击者通过额外考虑防御方法来优化扰动方向和大小。在本文中，我们提出GRIP-GAN来学习一般的鲁棒逆扰动(GRIP ),该逆扰动不仅能够抵消任何潜在的敌对扰动，而且能够增强目标类相关的特征，这些特征完全来自于通过生成敌对网络(GAN)的干净图像。通过输入随机噪声，GRIP-GAN能够为每个输入图像生成动态GRIP，以抵御不受约束的攻击。为了进一步提高防御性能，我们还使GRIP-GAN能够通过向GRIP-GAN提供输入图像特定噪声来生成适合每个输入图像的GRIP。针对17种对抗性攻击，在MNIST、CIFAR10和ImageNet数据集上进行了大量实验。结果表明，GRIP-GAN优于所有基准。我们进一步分享了GRIP-GAN的成功经验，并提供了直观的证据。
papers.title_zh: Grip-gan：通过一般强大的逆扰动通过一般强大的反向防御

papers.title: Enabling Verifiable Privacy-Preserving Multi-Type Data Aggregation in Smart Grids
papers.authors: Xiaojun Zhang, Chao Huang, Yuan Zhang, Sheng Cao
papers.abstract: In this article, we analyze the inherent characteristic of smart grid systems, where we observe that a smart meter always generates different types of electricity consumption data for one user, and a control center (CC) always conducts an in-depth statistic analysis on these data for subsequent services. Among these data, some of them are very sensitive and should be prevented for any leakage and modification. Furthermore, due to the large number of users in a smart grid system, it is advantageous for CC to receive and process the data from different users simultaneously. To this end, we propose a verifiable privacy-preserving multi-type data aggregation scheme (VPMDA) for smart grids. VPMDA enables an aggregator gateway (AG) to aggregate encrypted multi-type data and forward the aggregated data to CC, such that CC checks the integrity of aggregated data and obtains the statistic analysis results (e.g., average, variance) on the aggregated data without learning each individual data content. We further extend VPMDA to improve the performance of verifying data integrity on CC significantly. We formally prove the security of VPMDA against various attacks. We also implement a prototype of VPMDA and conduct a comprehensive performance evaluation to demonstrate its feasibility and efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们分析了智能电网系统的固有特性，其中我们观察到，智能电表总是为一个用户生成不同类型的用电数据，控制中心(CC)总是对这些数据进行深入的统计分析，以用于后续服务。在这些数据中，有些非常敏感，应防止任何泄露和修改。此外，由于智能电网系统中的大量用户，CC同时接收和处理来自不同用户的数据是有利的。为此，我们提出了一种面向智能电网的可验证的隐私保护多类型数据融合方案(VPMDA)。VPMDA使聚合器网关(AG)能够聚合加密的多类型数据，并将聚合的数据转发给CC，使得CC检查聚合数据的完整性，并获得关于聚合数据的统计分析结果(例如，平均值、方差),而无需了解每个单独的数据内容。我们进一步扩展了VPMDA，显著提高了在CC上验证数据完整性的性能。我们形式化地证明了VPMDA对各种攻击的安全性。我们还实现了一个VPMDA原型，并进行了全面的性能评估，以证明其可行性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: 在智能网格中启用可验证的隐私性多型数据聚合

papers.title: Peripheral-Free Device Pairing by Randomly Switching Power
papers.authors: Zhijian Shao, Jian Weng, Yue Zhang, Yongdong Wu, Ming Li, Jia-Si Weng, Weiqi Luo, Shui Yu
papers.abstract: With the growing popularity of the Internet-of-Things (IoT), a massive amount of purpose-specific, heterogeneous, inexpensive devices have been deployed. To allow these devices to perform their duties and collaborate efficiently, designing a secure and dependable communication channel is necessary. Pairing, as the fundamental procedure for establishing a trustworthy communication channel, has received extensive attention from security researchers. Previous secure pairing protocols depend on auxiliary peripherals (e.g., displays, speakers) to share the secret message, while for those products featuring with low-price, manufacturers would probably adopt insecure pairing methods to reduce the cost, so the devices may be subject to various attacks. To mitigate such a situation, we design a peripheral-free secure pairing protocol, termed SwitchPairing. Our protocol only requires users to connect the pre-pairing devices to the same power source, then randomly presses and releases the switch to generate a shared secret. It does not require additional peripherals and can defense eavesdropping and replay attacks innately. We implement a prototype via two CC2640R2F development boards and invite volunteers to participate in the experiments about bench-marking security and usability. The result of our experiments show that our protocol can fulfill the security and efficient requirement of various IoT applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着物联网(IoT)的日益普及，大量专用、异构、廉价的设备被部署。为了让这些设备能够履行职责并高效协作，设计一个安全可靠的通信通道是非常必要的。配对作为建立可信通信信道的基本步骤，受到了安全研究者的广泛关注。以前的安全配对协议依赖于辅助外设(如显示器、扬声器)来共享秘密信息，而对于那些价格低廉的产品，制造商可能会采用不安全的配对方法来降低成本，因此设备可能会受到各种攻击。为了缓解这种情况，我们设计了一个无外设的安全配对协议，称为开关配对。我们的协议只需要用户将预配对设备连接到同一个电源，然后随机按下并释放开关来生成共享秘密。它不需要额外的外围设备，可以天生防御窃听和重放攻击。我们通过两块CC2640R2F开发板实现了一个原型，并邀请志愿者参与关于安全性和可用性的基准测试实验。实验结果表明，该协议能够满足各种物联网应用的安全性和高效性要求。
papers.title_zh: 通过随机切换功率配对的无外围设备配对

papers.title: Cleaning the NVD: Comprehensive Quality Assessment, Improvements, and Analyses
papers.authors: Afsah Anwar, Ahmed Abusnaina, Songqing Chen, Frank Li, David Mohaisen
papers.abstract: Vulnerability databases are vital sources of information on emergent software security concerns. How reliable and accurate are these databases though? This paper explores this question through the National Vulnerability Database (NVD), the U.S. government’s vulnerability repository that arguably serves as the industry standard. Our investigations uncover data inconsistency or incompleteness in the NVD that can impact its practical usage, by affecting information such as the vulnerability publication dates, the affected vendor and product names, severity scores, and vulnerability type fields. Preliminary results suggest shifting trends, unveiling common mistakes, suggestions, and strategies for their avoidance.
papers.abstract_zh: 漏洞数据库是紧急软件安全问题的重要信息来源。这些数据库有多可靠和准确呢？本文通过国家漏洞数据库(NVD)来探讨这个问题，该数据库是美国政府的漏洞库，可以说是行业标准。我们的调查揭示了NVD中的数据不一致或不完整，这些数据会影响漏洞发布日期、受影响的供应商和产品名称、严重性分数和漏洞类型字段等信息，从而影响其实际用途。初步结果表明趋势正在转变，揭示了常见错误、建议以及避免这些错误的策略。
papers.title_zh: 清洁NVD：全面的质量评估，改进和分析

papers.title: Model Protection: Real-Time Privacy-Preserving Inference Service for Model Privacy at the Edge
papers.authors: Jiahui Hou, Huiqi Liu, Yunxin Liu, Yu Wang, Peng-Jun Wan, Xiang-Yang Li
papers.abstract: Major cloud service providers with well-equipped infrastructure, experienced machine learning (ML) expertise, and enriched training datasets are building ML-as-a-Service (MLaaS) systems, in which clients can query ML-based prediction services with their data. Instead of moving private data to the cloud, in this work, we design, implement, and evaluate a novel secure ML system to enable MLaaS on edge devices. To protect the proprietary ML models on edge devices from revealing to the clients while maintaining a real-time inference is challenging. Existing privacy-preserving ML techniques can hardly satisfy real-time requirements. In our solution, we employ a secure enclave (e.g., SGX) to offer security and provide better efficiency than cryptographic techniques. However, the enclave alone cannot achieve real-time capability due to its limited capacity. We observe that the ML model imposes a severe accuracy degradation when adding noise to a few model weights. Based on this, we design a suite of novel solutions to optimize the performance of secure enclave-based inference service at the edge by enclosing only <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$1\%$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>%</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="li-ieq1-3126315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> computation within secure enclaves. Our work can achieve up to a <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$7.8\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>7</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>8</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="li-ieq2-3126315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> increase in efficiency and a <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$27\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>27</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="li-ieq3-3126315.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> reduction in memory usage compared to the state-of-the-art.
papers.abstract_zh: 拥有装备精良的基础设施、经验丰富的机器学习(ML)专业知识和丰富的训练数据集的主要云服务提供商正在构建ML即服务(MLaaS)系统，在该系统中，客户可以使用他们的数据查询基于ML的预测服务。在这项工作中，我们设计、实现并评估了一个新的安全ML系统，以支持边缘设备上的MLaaS，而不是将私有数据移动到云中。保护边缘设备上的专有ML模型不暴露给客户端，同时保持实时推断是具有挑战性的。现有的隐私保护ML技术很难满足实时性要求。在我们的解决方案中，我们采用了安全飞地(例如SGX)来提供安全性，并提供比加密技术更好的效率。然而，由于容量有限，enclave本身无法实现实时功能。我们观察到，当将噪声添加到一些模型权重时，ML模型强加了严重的精度下降。基于此，我们设计了一套新颖的解决方案，通过仅封装< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 1 \ % $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo > % </MML:mo > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Li我们的工作可以实现高达< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 7.8 \乘以$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 7 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >。</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 8 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >×</MML:mo > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Li-ieq 2-3126315 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >提高效率和< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 27 \ times $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < mmm
papers.title_zh: 模型保护：边缘模型隐私的实时隐私推理推理服务

papers.title: A Novel Verification Scheme to Resist Online Password Guessing Attacks
papers.authors: Albert Guan, Chia-Mei Chen
papers.abstract: User name and password are the most commonly used user authentication scheme in information systems. Strong passwords are secure but difficult to remember, so many users prefer easy-to-remember passwords. These weak passwords are also easily guessed by attackers, leading to online password guessing attacks, posing a serious security threat to information systems. Providing a reliable user authentication scheme to allow legitimate users to login while preventing online password guessing attacks is a challenge. We define a formal statistical model for the behavior of users and attackers, and differentiate users and attackers according to this model. The proposed solution computes the entropy of the passwords entered by the user and considers the user legitimate only if the entropy does not exceed a threshold. We show that entropy is an effective feature to distinguish legitimate users from attackers. We also show that the proposed user authentication scheme is effective in identifying password guessing attacks, even if the user chooses a common password. The new scheme adds an extra layer of protection to passwords, which is especially important for weak passwords. The scheme is a slight modification of the existing scheme, so it can be easily integrated into existing systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 用户名和密码是信息系统中最常用的用户认证方案。强密码很安全，但是很难记住，所以许多用户更喜欢容易记住的密码。这些弱密码也很容易被攻击者猜到，导致在线密码猜测攻击，对信息系统构成严重的安全威胁。提供一个可靠的用户认证方案以允许合法用户登录，同时防止在线密码猜测攻击是一个挑战。我们为用户和攻击者的行为定义了一个形式化的统计模型，并根据这个模型来区分用户和攻击者。所提出的解决方案计算用户输入的密码的熵，并且仅当熵不超过阈值时才认为用户是合法的。我们证明了熵是区分合法用户和攻击者的有效特征。我们还证明了所提出的用户认证方案在识别密码猜测攻击方面是有效的，即使用户选择了一个普通的密码。新方案为密码增加了一层额外的保护，这对于弱密码尤其重要。该方案是对现有方案的轻微修改，因此可以很容易地集成到现有系统中。
papers.title_zh: 一种抗拒在线密码猜测攻击的新型验证方案

2023.journals_title: IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing, Volume 20

papers.title: Seamlessly Safeguarding Data Against Ransomware Attacks
papers.authors: Abdulrahman Abu Elkhail, Nada Lachtar, Duha Ibdah, Rustam Aslam, Hamza Khan, Anys Bacha, Hafiz Malik
papers.abstract: Encryption has become an indispensable technology for preserving confidentiality. Unfortunately, cybercriminals have re-purposed this technology to deny users access to their data. This trend has sparked an onslaught of ransomware attacks, that resulted in several victims being extorted to pay ransoms in return for restoring their maliciously encrypted data. In response to these challenges, we propose a novel runtime solution that seamlessly defends against cryptographic ransomware. A key observation made by this work is that maliciously encrypted data is initially buffered in the OS's page cache before it is flushed to the underlying storage device. Based on this observation, we develop a solution that efficiently manages data synchronization between the memory and storage subsystems to prevent maliciously encrypted data from being permanently committed to the underlying storage. We extensively validate the robustness of this approach against more than one thousand ransomware samples and show that our design reliably restores all encrypted files. Furthermore, our solution is resilient to ransomware that employ techniques including master boot record infection and multi-threaded attacks. Finally, an evaluation of our proof-of-concept implementation shows minimal performance impact while running a mix of compute and I/O bound applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密已经成为保密不可或缺的技术。不幸的是，网络犯罪分子改变了这项技术的用途，拒绝用户访问他们的数据。这一趋势引发了勒索软件攻击的冲击，导致数名受害者被勒索支付赎金，以换取恢复他们恶意加密的数据。为了应对这些挑战，我们提出了一种新的运行时解决方案，无缝抵御加密勒索软件。这项工作得出的一个重要观察结果是，恶意加密的数据在被刷新到底层存储设备之前，最初会缓冲在操作系统的页面缓存中。基于这种观察，我们开发了一种解决方案，可以有效地管理内存和存储子系统之间的数据同步，以防止恶意加密的数据被永久提交到底层存储。我们针对一千多个勒索软件样本广泛验证了这种方法的鲁棒性，并表明我们的设计能够可靠地恢复所有加密文件。此外，我们的解决方案能够抵御采用包括主引导记录感染和多线程攻击在内的技术的勒索软件。最后，对我们的概念验证实施的评估显示，在运行混合计算和I/O绑定应用时，性能影响极小。
papers.title_zh: 无缝保护数据，以防止勒索软件攻击

papers.title: PrivKVM*: Revisiting Key-Value Statistics Estimation With Local Differential Privacy
papers.authors: Qingqing Ye, Haibo Hu, Xiaofeng Meng, Huadi Zheng, Kai Huang, Chengfang Fang, Jie Shi
papers.abstract: A key factor in big data analytics and artificial intelligence is the collection of user data from a large population. However, the collection of user data comes at the price of privacy risks, not only for users but also for businesses who are vulnerable to internal and external data breaches. To address privacy issues, local differential privacy (LDP) has been proposed to enable an untrusted collector to obtain accurate statistical estimation on sensitive user data (e.g., location, health, and financial data) without actually accessing the true records. As key-value data is an extremely popular NoSQL data model, there are a few works in the literature that study LDP-based statistical estimation on key-value data. However, these works have some major limitations, including supporting small key space only, fixed key collection range, difficulty in choosing an appropriate padding length, and high communication cost. In this article, we propose a two-phase mechanism <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$PrivKVM^*$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>P</mml:mi><mml:mi>r</mml:mi><mml:mi>i</mml:mi><mml:mi>v</mml:mi><mml:mi>K</mml:mi><mml:mi>V</mml:mi><mml:msup><mml:mi>M</mml:mi><mml:mo>*</mml:mo></mml:msup></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ye-ieq1-3107512.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> as an optimized and highly-complete solution to LDP-based key-value data collection and statistics estimation. We verify its correctness and effectiveness through rigorous theoretical analysis and extensive experimental results.
papers.abstract_zh: 大数据分析和人工智能的一个关键因素是从大量人群中收集用户数据。然而，收集用户数据是以隐私风险为代价的，不仅对用户如此，对易受内部和外部数据泄露影响的企业也是如此。为了解决隐私问题，已经提出了本地差分隐私(LDP ),以使得不可信的收集器能够在不实际访问真实记录的情况下获得关于敏感用户数据(例如，位置、健康和财务数据)的准确统计估计。由于关键值数据是一种非常流行的NoSQL数据模型，在文献中有一些工作研究基于LDP的关键值数据的统计估计。然而，这些工作有一些主要的限制，包括仅支持小的密钥空间、固定的密钥收集范围、难以选择合适的填充长度以及高的通信成本。在本文中，我们提出了一种两阶段机制< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$privkvm^*$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>p</mml:mi><mml:mi>r</mml:mi><mml:mi>i</mml:mi><mml:mi>v</mml:mi><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mi>v</mml:mi><mml:msup><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>*</mml:mo></mml:msup></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " ye-ie Q1-3107512 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >，作为基于LDP的键值数据收集和统计估计的优化和高度完整的解决方案。我们通过严格的理论分析和大量的实验结果验证了其正确性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: PRIVKVM*：使用当地差别隐私对密钥值统计估算进行重新访问

papers.title: VerSA: Verifiable Secure Aggregation for Cross-Device Federated Learning
papers.authors: Changhee Hahn, Hodong Kim, Minjae Kim, Junbeom Hur
papers.abstract: In privacy-preserving cross-device federated learning, users train a global model on their local data and submit encrypted local models, while an untrusted central server aggregates the encrypted models to obtain an updated global model. Prior work has demonstrated how to verify the correctness of aggregation in such a setting. However, such verification relies on strong assumptions, such as a trusted setup among all users under unreliable network conditions, or it suffers from expensive cryptographic operations, such as bilinear pairing. In this paper, we scrutinize the verification mechanism of prior work and propose a model recovery attack, demonstrating that most local models can be leaked within a reasonable time (e.g., <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$98\%$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>98</mml:mn><mml:mo>%</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hur-ieq1-3126323.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> of encrypted local models are recovered within 21 h). Then, we propose <sc>VerSA</sc>, a verifiable secure aggregation protocol for cross-device federated learning. <sc>VerSA</sc> does not require any trusted setup for verification between users while minimizing the verification cost by enabling both the central server and users to utilize only a lightweight pseudorandom generator to prove and verify the correctness of model aggregation. We experimentally confirm the efficiency of <sc>VerSA</sc> under diverse datasets, demonstrating that <sc>VerSA</sc> is orders of magnitude faster than verification in prior work.
papers.abstract_zh: 在保护隐私的跨设备联合学习中，用户在其本地数据上训练全局模型并提交加密的本地模型，而不可信的中央服务器聚集加密的模型以获得更新的全局模型。先前的工作已经演示了如何在这样的设置中验证聚合的正确性。然而，这种验证依赖于强有力的假设，例如在不可靠的网络条件下所有用户之间的可信设置，或者它遭受昂贵的加密操作，例如双线性配对。在本文中，我们仔细检查了先前工作的验证机制，并提出了模型恢复攻击，证明了大多数本地模型可以在合理的时间内泄漏(例如，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " >＄98 \ % ＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 98 </MML:Mn > % </MML:mo > % </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < MML:math >)然后，我们提出了跨设备联合学习的可验证安全聚合协议VerSA。VerSA不需要任何可信设置来在用户之间进行验证，同时通过使中央服务器和用户都能够仅利用轻量级伪随机生成器来证明和验证模型聚合的正确性，来最小化验证成本。我们通过实验证实了VerSA在不同数据集下的效率，证明了VerSA比先前工作中的验证快几个数量级。
papers.title_zh: VERSA：可验证的安全汇总，用于联合学习的跨设备

papers.title: A Secure EMR Sharing System With Tamper Resistance and Expressive Access Control
papers.authors: Shengmin Xu, Jianting Ning, Yingjiu Li, Yinghui Zhang, Guowen Xu, Xinyi Huang, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: To reduce the cost of human and material resources and improve the collaborations among medical systems, research laboratories and insurance companies for healthcare researches and commercial activities, electronic medical records (EMRs) have been proposed to shift from paperwork to friendly shareable electronic records. To take advantage of EMRs efficiently and reduce the cost of local storage, EMRs are usually outsourced to the remote cloud for sharing medical data with authorized users. However, cloud service providers are untrustworthy. In this paper, we propose an efficient, secure, and flexible EMR sharing system by introducing a novel cryptosystem called dual-policy revocable attribute-based encryption and tamper resistance blockchain technology. Our proposed system enables EMRs to be shared at a fine-grained level and allows data users to detect any unauthorized manipulation. Moreover, the key generation center can revoke malicious users without affecting the honest users. We provide the formal security model as well as the concrete scheme with security analysis. The experimental simulation and experimental analysis of our proposed scheme demonstrate that our proposed system has superior performances to the most relevant solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了降低人力和物力资源的成本，并改善医疗系统、研究实验室和保险公司之间在医疗保健研究和商业活动方面的协作，电子医疗记录(EMR)已经被提议从书面文件转变为友好的可共享电子记录。为了有效利用电子病历并降低本地存储成本，电子病历通常被外包给远程云，以便与授权用户共享医疗数据。但是，云服务提供商是不可信的。在本文中，我们提出了一种高效、安全、灵活的电子病历共享系统，该系统采用了一种新的密码系统——基于双策略可撤销属性加密和防篡改区块链技术。我们提出的系统使电子病历能够在一个细粒度的水平上共享，并允许数据用户检测任何未经授权的操纵。而且，密钥生成中心可以在不影响诚实用户的情况下撤销恶意用户。我们给出了形式化的安全模型以及具体的方案，并进行了安全性分析。实验模拟和实验分析表明，我们提出的系统比最相关的解决方案具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 具有防篡改和表达访问控制的安全EMR共享系统

papers.title: Fault-Tolerant Routing With Load Balancing in LeTQ Networks
papers.authors: Weibei Fan, Fu Xiao, Jianxi Fan, Zhijie Han, Lijuan Sun, Ruchuan Wang
papers.abstract: With the increasing scale of parallel computer interconnection network, the possibility of processor failure or link failure between processors in the network is also increasing. In the design of supercomputers, not only link overhead and communication delay should be taken into account, but also fault-tolerant performance of networks should be emphasized. Locally exchanged twisted cube (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$LeTQ$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>L</mml:mi><mml:mi>e</mml:mi><mml:mi>T</mml:mi><mml:mi>Q</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="fan-ieq1-3126627.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) is a newly proposed interconnection network with lower link overhead and shorter diameter. With the increasing scale of supercomputers, fault-tolerant routing is indispensable. In this article, we propose a new load balancing fault-tolerant routing algorithm based on node contraction for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$LeTQ$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>L</mml:mi><mml:mi>e</mml:mi><mml:mi>T</mml:mi><mml:mi>Q</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="fan-ieq2-3126627.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> networks.
