Many proposed solutions rely on implementing optimized cryptographic primitives and assume that the cryptographic keys were previously shared among the different nodes during the production phase, omitting the issue related to keys distribution and update. We propose SENECAN, a solution that combines watermarking and wired jamming to secure the CAN bus's long-term key distribution. Our solution leverages intentional interference and spread spectrum watermarking to achieve security properties such as confidentiality, integrity, authentication, and anti-replay. Compared to other works, SENECAN does not require any CAN protocol and system architecture modification. Instead, it requires an additional CAN transceiver and an initial transmission overhead. Finally, we tested the effectiveness and functioning of the SENECAN distribution schema in a real CAN environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 控制区域网络(CAN)代表用于车内网络通信的标准总线。不幸的是，CAN并不是一个安全的协议。CAN上的通信不利用任何安全特征(例如，加密和认证)，从而在关键应用中产生不同的漏洞。这种安全性的缺乏在集成了远程连接能力(例如，蓝牙和WiFi)的最新CAN网络中更加突出。这种设计上的不安全性导致了修补CAN漏洞的特定机制的开发。许多提出的解决方案依赖于实现优化的密码原语，并假设密码密钥先前在生产阶段在不同节点之间共享，忽略了与密钥分发和更新相关的问题。我们提出了SENECAN，这是一种结合了水印和有线干扰的解决方案，用于保护CAN总线的长期密钥分发。我们的解决方案利用有意干扰和扩频水印来实现诸如机密性、完整性、认证和防重放等安全属性。与其他作品相比，SENECAN不需要修改任何CAN协议和系统架构。相反，它需要额外的CAN收发器和初始传输开销。最后，我们在真实的CAN环境中测试了SENECAN分布模式的有效性和功能。
papers.title_zh: Senecan：通过水印和干扰可以安全分配可以通过

papers.title: SymmeProof: Compact Zero-Knowledge Argument for Blockchain Confidential Transactions
papers.authors: Shang Gao, Zhe Peng, Feng Tan, Yuanqing Zheng, Bin Xiao
papers.abstract: To reduce the transmission cost of blockchain confidential transactions, we propose SymmeProof, a novel communication efficient non-interactive zero-knowledge range proof protocol without a trusted setup. We design and integrate two new techniques in SymmeProof, namely vector compression and inner-product range proof. The proposed vector compression is able to reduce the communication cost to <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\log (n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo form="prefix">log</mml:mo><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiao-ieq1-3179913.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiao-ieq2-3179913.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-size vectors. The proposed inner-product range proof converts a range proof relation into an inner-product form, which can further reduce the range proof size with the vector compression technique. Based on these two techniques, SymmeProof can eventually achieve a <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\log (n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo form="prefix">log</mml:mo><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiao-ieq3-3179913.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-size range proof. The proposed SymmeProof can be used in many important applications such as blockchain confidential transactions as well as arguments for arithmetic circuit satisfiability. We evaluate the performance of SymmeProof. The results show that SymmeProof substantially outperforms representative methods such as Bulletproofs in the proof size without a trusted setup.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了降低区块链机密事务的传输成本，我们提出了一种新的通信高效的无可信机构的非交互式零知识范围证明协议SymmeProof。我们设计并集成了两种新的对称防护技术，即向量压缩和内积范围证明。所提出的矢量压缩能够将通信成本降低到< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ log(n)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo form = " prefix " > log </MML:mo > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > < MML:mo >)</MML:mo > </MML:mrow > .所提出的内积范围证明将范围证明关系转换成内积形式，这可以通过向量压缩技术进一步减小范围证明的大小。基于这两种技术，SymmeProof最终可以实现< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ log(n)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo form = " prefix " > log </MML:mo > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > < MML:mo >)</MML:mo > </MML:mrow >所提出的对称性可用于许多重要的应用，如区块链机密事务以及算术电路可满足性的论证。我们评估了symmeprevent的性能。结果表明，在没有可信设置的情况下，SymmeProof在证明大小方面明显优于Bulletproofs等代表性方法。
papers.title_zh: 符号防止：区块链机密交易的紧凑零知识论点

papers.title: Blockchain-Based Transparency Framework for Privacy Preserving Third-Party Services
papers.authors: Runhua Xu, Chao Li, James Joshi
papers.abstract: Increasingly, information systems rely on computational, storage, and network resources deployed in third-party facilities such as cloud centers and edge nodes. Such an approach further exacerbates cybersecurity concerns constantly raised by numerous incidents of security and privacy attacks resulting in data leakage and identity theft, among others. These have, in turn, forced the creation of stricter security and privacy-related regulations and have eroded the trust in cyberspace. In particular, security-related services and infrastructures, such as Certificate Authorities (CAs) that provide digital certificate services and Third-Party Authorities (TPAs) that provide cryptographic key services, are critical components for establishing trust in crypto-based privacy-preserving applications and services. To address such trust issues, various transparency frameworks and approaches have been recently proposed in the literature. This article proposes TAB framework that provides transparency and trustworthiness of third-party authority and third-party facilities using blockchain techniques for emerging crypto-based privacy-preserving applications. TAB employs the Ethereum blockchain as the underlying public ledger and also includes a novel smart contract to automate accountability with an incentive mechanism that motivates users to participate in auditing, and punishes unintentional or malicious behaviors. We implement TAB and show through experimental evaluation in the Ethereum official test network, Rinkeby, that the framework is efficient. We also formally show the security guarantee provided by TAB, and analyze the privacy guarantee and trustworthiness it provides.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息系统越来越依赖部署在云中心和边缘节点等第三方设施中的计算、存储和网络资源。这种方法进一步加剧了网络安全问题，这种问题是由大量安全和隐私攻击事件不断引发的，这些事件导致数据泄露和身份盗窃等。这反过来又迫使人们制定更严格的安全和隐私相关法规，并侵蚀了网络空间的信任度。特别是，与安全相关的服务和基础设施，如提供数字证书服务的认证机构(ca)和提供加密密钥服务的第三方机构(TPA ),是在基于加密的隐私保护应用和服务中建立信任的关键组件。为了解决这种信任问题，最近在文献中提出了各种透明框架和方法。本文提出了一个TAB框架，它使用区块链技术为新兴的基于加密的隐私保护应用程序提供第三方机构和第三方设施的透明性和可信性。TAB采用以太坊区块链作为底层公共账本，还包括一个新颖的智能合约，通过激励机制来自动承担责任，激励用户参与审计，并惩罚无意或恶意的行为。我们实现了TAB，并通过在以太坊官方测试网络Rinkeby上的实验评估表明该框架是有效的。我们还形式化地展示了TAB提供的安全保证，并分析了它提供的隐私保证和可信性。
papers.title_zh: 基于区块链的透明度框架保存第三方服务

papers.title: CrossBehaAuth: Cross-Scenario Behavioral Biometrics Authentication Using Keystroke Dynamics
papers.authors: Chenhao Lin, Jingyi He, Chao Shen, Qi Li, Qian Wang
papers.abstract: Behavioral biometrics has been widely investigated and deployed in real world scenarios for human authentication. However, there has been almost nil attempt to identify behavior patterns in a cross-scenario setting, which is common in practice and needs urgent attention. This paper defines and investigates cross-scenario behavioral biometrics authentication using keystroke dynamics. A novel system called CrossBehaAuth is presented for extending keystroke dynamics-based behavior authentication to new scenarios and extensive problems. We design a temporal-aware learning mechanism based deep neural network for cross-scenario keystroke dynamics authentication. This mechanism selectively learns and encodes temporal information for efficient behavioral pattern transfer in cross-scenario settings. A local Gaussian data augmentation approach is proposed to increase the diversity of behavioral data and therefore, further improve the performance. We evaluate the proposed approach on two publicly available datasets. The extensive experimental results confirm the efficacy of our CrossBehaAuth for cross-scenario keystroke dynamics authentication. Our approach significantly improves the authentication accuracy in cross-scenario settings and even achieves comparable performance on single-scenario authentication tasks. In addition, our approach shows its generalizability and advantages in both single and cross scenario keystroke dynamics authentication.
papers.abstract_zh: 行为生物测定学已经被广泛研究并部署在真实世界场景中用于人类认证。然而，几乎没有人尝试在跨场景环境中识别行为模式，这在实践中很常见，需要迫切关注。本文定义并研究了使用击键动力学的跨场景行为生物特征认证。提出了一种新的系统CrossBehaAuth，用于将基于击键动力学的行为认证扩展到新的场景和广泛的问题。我们设计了一个基于时间感知学习机制的深度神经网络用于跨场景击键动力学认证。这种机制选择性地学习和编码时间信息，以便在跨场景设置中进行有效的行为模式转移。提出了一种局部高斯数据扩充方法来增加行为数据的多样性，从而进一步提高性能。我们在两个公开可用的数据集上评估了所提出的方法。大量的实验结果证实了我们的CrossBehaAuth用于跨场景击键动力学认证的有效性。我们的方法显著提高了跨场景设置中的身份验证准确性，甚至在单场景身份验证任务中获得了相当的性能。此外，我们的方法显示了其在单一和跨场景击键动力学认证的普遍性和优势。
papers.title_zh: Crossbehaauth：使用击键动力学的跨幕期行为生物识别验证

papers.title: Cover Selection for Steganography Using Image Similarity
papers.authors: Zichi Wang, Guorui Feng, Liquan Shen, Xinpeng Zhang
papers.abstract: Existing cover selection methods for steganography mainly focus on embedding distortion of each image, but ignore the similarity between images. When the cover images are similar, a number of relevant samples are provided to steganalysis, which is disadvantageous to steganography. This paper proposes a new cover selection method to joint image similarity and embedding distortion. Due to the difference between steganography and other image processing tasks, e.g., image reconstruction, image recognition, we propose a customized method to calculate image similarity for steganography based on SVD (singular value decomposition). Importantly, the small singular values (instead of the large ones) are employed, since it is suitable for the properties of steganography. In addition, embedding distortion is calculated by the current distortion minimization framework. The obtained image similarity and embedding distortion are combined to form a new cover selection strategy. As a result, the properties of batch images can be fully used. Experimental results show that our scheme outperforms the state-of-the-art cover selection methods when they are checked by modern steganalytic tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的隐写术覆盖选择方法主要关注每幅图像的嵌入失真，而忽略了图像间的相似性。当载体图像相似时，需要提供大量相关样本进行隐写分析，这对隐写术不利。提出了一种新的结合图像相似性和嵌入失真的封面选择方法。由于隐写术与图像重建、图像识别等其他图像处理任务的不同，我们提出了一种基于奇异值分解的图像相似度计算方法。重要的是，采用小奇异值(而不是大奇异值)，因为它适合于隐写术的特性。此外，嵌入失真由当前失真最小化框架计算。将得到的图像相似度和嵌入失真结合起来，形成一种新的覆盖选择策略。因此，可以充分利用批量图像的特性。实验结果表明，当使用现代隐写分析工具进行检测时，我们的方案优于当前最先进的覆盖选择方法。
papers.title_zh: 使用图像相似性掩盖隐肌的选择

papers.title: Membership Inference Attacks Against Machine Learning Models via Prediction Sensitivity
papers.authors: Lan Liu, Yi Wang, Gaoyang Liu, Kai Peng, Chen Wang
papers.abstract: Machine learning (ML) has achieved huge success in recent years, but is also vulnerable to various attacks. In this article, we concentrate on membership inference attacks and propose Aster, which merely requires the target model's black-box API and a data sample to determine whether this sample was used to train the given ML model or not. The key idea of Aster is that the training data of a fully trained ML model usually has lower prediction sensitivities compared with that of the non-training data (i.e., testing data). Less sensitivity means that when perturbing a training sample's feature value in the corresponding feature space, the prediction of the perturbed sample obtained from the target model tends to be consistent with the original prediction. In this article, we quantify the prediction sensitivity with the Jacobian matrix which could reflect the relationship between each feature's perturbation and the corresponding prediction's change. Then we regard the samples with a lower as training data. Aster can breach the membership privacy of the target model's training data with no prior knowledge about the target model or its training data. The experiment results on four datasets show that our method outperforms three state-of-the-art inference attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，机器学习取得了巨大的成功，但也容易受到各种攻击。在本文中，我们集中研究成员推理攻击，并提出Aster，它只需要目标模型的黑盒API和一个数据样本来确定这个样本是否用于训练给定的ML模型。Aster的关键思想是，与非训练数据(即测试数据)相比，完全训练的ML模型的训练数据通常具有较低的预测灵敏度。较低的灵敏度意味着当在相应的特征空间中扰动训练样本的特征值时，从目标模型获得的被扰动样本的预测倾向于与原始预测一致。在本文中，我们用雅可比矩阵来量化预测灵敏度，雅可比矩阵反映了每个特征的扰动与相应预测变化之间的关系。然后我们把a较低的样本作为训练数据。Aster可以在事先不了解目标模型或其训练数据的情况下，破坏目标模型的训练数据的成员隐私。在四个数据集上的实验结果表明，我们的方法优于三种最先进的推理攻击。
papers.title_zh: 通过预测灵敏度对机器学习模型的会员推断攻击

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving and Outsourced Multi-Party K-Means Clustering Based on Multi-Key Fully Homomorphic Encryption
papers.authors: Peng Zhang, Teng Huang, Xiaoqiang Sun, Wei Zhao, Hongwei Liu, Shangqi Lai, Joseph K. Liu
papers.abstract: The clustering algorithm is a useful tool for analyzing medical data. For instance, the k-means clustering can be used to study precipitating factors of a disease. In order to implement the clustering algorithm efficiently, data computation is outsourced to cloud servers, which may leak the private data. Encryption is a common method for solving this problem. But cloud servers are difficult to calculate ciphertexts from multiple parties. Hence, we choose multi-key fully homomorphic encryption (FHE), which supports computations on the ciphertexts that have different secret keys, to protect the private data. In this paper, based on Chen's multi-key FHE scheme, we first propose secure squared euclidean, comparison, minimum, and average protocols. Then, we design the basic and advanced schemes for implementing the secure multi-party k-means clustering algorithm. In the basic scheme, the implementation of homomorphic multiplication includes the process of transforming ciphertexts under different keys. In order to implement homomorphic multiplication efficiently, the advanced scheme uses an improved method to transform ciphertexts. Meanwhile, almost all computations are completely outsourced to cloud servers. We prove that the proposed protocols and schemes are secure and feasible. Simulation results also show that our improved method is helpful for improving the homomorphic multiplication of Chen's multi-key FHE scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 聚类算法是分析医疗数据的有用工具。例如，k-均值聚类可用于研究疾病的诱发因素。为了高效地实现聚类算法，数据计算被外包给云服务器，这可能会泄露隐私数据。加密是解决这一问题的常用方法。但是云服务器很难计算多方的密文。因此，我们选择多密钥全同态加密(FHE ),它支持对具有不同密钥的密文进行计算，以保护私有数据。本文基于陈的多密钥方案，首先提出了安全的平方欧氏协议、比较协议、最小协议和平均协议。然后，我们设计了实现安全多方k-means聚类算法的基本方案和高级方案。在基本方案中，同态乘法的实现包括不同密钥下的密文变换过程。为了有效地实现同态乘法，改进方案使用了一种改进的方法来变换密文。同时，几乎所有的计算都完全外包给了云服务器。我们证明了所提出的协议和方案是安全可行的。仿真结果也表明，改进的方法有助于提高陈多密钥方案的同态乘法性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于多键完全同型加密的隐私保护和外包多方K-Means聚类

papers.title: NACA: A Joint Distortion-Based Non-Additive Cost Assignment Method for Video Steganography
papers.authors: Yi Chen, Zoran Salcic, Hongxia Wang, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Xuyun Zhang
papers.abstract: Lots of non-additive cost assignment methods designed for image steganography have improved the security of stego images, but surprisingly there are only a few such non-additive cost assignment methods for video steganography. In this article, we first analyze the distortion propagation by decomposing it into inner-block, inter-block, and inter-frame distortion drifts. Then, we determine the inner-block distortion drift (caused by the embedding modifications) that induces the inter-block and the inter-frame distortion drifts, using prediction. Based on the findings, we compose a joint distortion for all transform coefficients in each transform block. Finally, we propose a joint distortion-based non-additive cost assignment (NACA) method to reduce the inner-block distortion drift by distortion compensation. This allows us to further reduce both intra-frame (inter-block) and inter-frame distortion drifts, and achieve enhanced security. We conduct extensive experiments to evaluate the performance of NACA, in terms of security and coding performance. The evaluation results demonstrate that NACA achieves improved security and visual stego video quality, and maintains a very marginal increase in bit-rate, in comparison to four other competing additive cost assignment approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多为图像隐写设计的非附加成本分配方法提高了隐写图像的安全性，但令人惊讶的是，这种用于视频隐写的非附加成本分配方法很少。在本文中，我们首先通过将其分解为块内、块间和帧间失真漂移来分析失真传播。然后，我们使用预测来确定引起块间和帧间失真漂移的块内失真漂移(由嵌入修改引起)。基于这些发现，我们为每个变换块中的所有变换系数合成一个联合失真。最后，我们提出了一种基于联合失真的非附加成本分配(NACA)方法，通过失真补偿来降低块内失真漂移。这允许我们进一步降低帧内(块间)和帧间失真漂移，并实现增强的安全性。我们进行了大量的实验来评估NACA在安全性和编码性能方面的性能。评估结果表明，与其他四种竞争的附加成本分配方法相比，NACA实现了改进的安全性和视觉隐写视频质量，并保持了非常微小的比特率增加。
papers.title_zh: NACA：一种基于联合失真的非加性成本分配方法

papers.title: Adversarial Steganography Embedding via Stego Generation and Selection
papers.authors: Minglin Liu, Tingting Song, Weiqi Luo, Peijia Zheng, Jiwu Huang
papers.abstract: The recent literature has shown that adversarial embedding has promise for enhancing the security of steganography. However, existing methods achieve the final stego mainly based on a pre-trained Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)-based steganalyzer without considering any other steganalytic features. When the steganalyzer is re-trained, its performance usually drops significantly. We propose a novel adversarial embedding method via stego generation and selection. To improve the diversity of the stego images, this method first randomly generates many candidate stegos according to the amplitudes of the gradients and embedding costs of a given cover. Since the image residuals are the commonly used low-level features in many steganalyzers, the proposed method carefully designs different adaptive high-pass filters to calculate the image residuals, and then selects a final stego from among those candidate stegos which can successfully fool the pre-trained steganalyzer, according to the residual distance between stego and the cover. Extensive experimental evaluations on re-trained CNN-based and traditional steganalyzers demonstrate that the proposed method can significantly enhance the security of the modern steganographic methods in both spatial and JPEG domains, and achieve much better performance than related adversarial embedding methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的文献表明，对抗性嵌入有望提高隐写术的安全性。然而，现有方法主要基于预训练的基于卷积神经网络(CNN)的隐写分析器来实现最终隐写，而没有考虑任何其他隐写分析特征。当隐写分析器被重新训练时，它的性能通常会显著下降。我们提出了一种新的基于隐写生成和选择的对抗性嵌入方法。为了提高隐写图像的多样性，该方法首先根据给定载体的梯度幅值和嵌入代价随机产生多个候选隐写图像。由于图像残差是许多隐写分析器中常用的底层特征，该方法精心设计不同的自适应高通滤波器来计算图像残差，然后根据隐写与载体之间的残差距离，从那些能够成功欺骗预训练隐写分析器的候选隐写中选择最终隐写。对基于CNN的隐写分析器和传统隐写分析器的大量实验评估表明，该方法能显著增强现代隐写方法在空间域和JPEG域的安全性，且性能远优于相关的对抗性嵌入方法。
papers.title_zh: 对抗性隐志通过Stego Generation and Selection嵌入

papers.title: A Privacy-Preserving Framework for Conducting Genome-Wide Association Studies Over Outsourced Patient Data
papers.authors: Xiaojie Zhu, Erman Ayday, Roman Vitenberg
papers.abstract: Due to the sheer volume of data, data owners (e.g., hospitals or other data collectors) tend to outsource their data to cloud service providers (CSPs) for the purpose of storage and analytics. However, privacy concerns about genomic and phenotype data significantly limit the data owners’ choice. In this work, we propose the first solution, to the best of our knowledge, that allows a CSP to perform efficient and privacy-preserving search and analysis over encrypted genomic and phenotype data that is multi-tenant, i.e., owned by multiple hospitals. We first propose an encryption mechanism for phenotype data, where each data owner is allowed to encrypt its data with a unique secret key. Moreover, the ciphertext supports privacy-preserving search and, consequently, enables the identification of the case and control groups for a genome-wide association study (GWAS) without any privacy violations. Furthermore, we provide a per-query based authorization mechanism for a client to access and operate on the data stored at the CSP. Additionally, we apply multi-key fully homomorphic encryption to encrypt genomic data and show how to compute GWAS statistics (e.g., chi-square distribution test) over the ciphertext of individuals in the identified case and control groups. Thus, for the first time, the proposed scheme provides privacy-preserving computation for the entire GWAS pipeline. Finally, we implement the proposed scheme and run experiments over a real-life genomic dataset to show its effectiveness. The result shows that the proposed solution is capable to efficiently identify the case/control groups and subsequently conduct GWAS on the identified case/control groups.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于数据量巨大，数据所有者(如医院或其他数据收集者)倾向于将其数据外包给云服务提供商(CSP)进行存储和分析。然而，关于基因组和表型数据的隐私问题极大地限制了数据所有者的选择。在这项工作中，我们提出了第一个解决方案，据我们所知，它允许CSP对多租户(即由多家医院拥有)的加密基因组和表型数据进行高效和隐私保护的搜索和分析。我们首先提出了一个表型数据的加密机制，其中每个数据所有者都被允许用一个唯一的密钥加密其数据。此外，密文支持隐私保护搜索，因此能够在没有任何隐私侵犯的情况下识别全基因组关联研究(GWAS)的病例组和对照组。此外，我们为客户端访问和操作存储在CSP上的数据提供了基于每个查询的授权机制。此外，我们应用多密钥全同态加密来加密基因组数据，并展示如何计算已识别病例和对照组中个体的密文的GWAS统计量(例如，卡方分布检验)。因此，所提出的方案第一次为整个GWAS流水线提供了隐私保护计算。最后，我们实现了所提出的方案，并在真实的基因组数据集上进行实验，以证明其有效性。结果表明，所提出的解决方案能够有效地识别病例/对照组，并随后对所识别的病例/对照组进行GWAS。
papers.title_zh: 用于进行全基因组的关联研究的隐私保护框架，以对外包患者数据进行研究

papers.title: Detecting CAN Attacks on J1939 and NMEA 2000 Networks
papers.authors: Matthew Rogers, Phillip Weigand, Jassim Happa, Kasper Rasmussen
papers.abstract: J1939 is a networking layer built on top of the widespread CAN bus used for communication between different subsystems within a vehicle. The J1939 and NMEA 2000 protocols standardize data enrichment for these subsystems, and are used for trucks, weapon systems, naval vessels, and other industrial systems. Practical security solutions for existing CAN based communication systems are notoriously difficult because of the lack of cryptographic capabilities of the devices involved. In this paper we propose a novel intrusion detection system (IDS) for J1939 and NMEA 2000 networks. Our IDS (CANDID) combines timing analysis with a packet manipulation detection system and data analysis. This data analysis enables us to capture the state of the vehicle, detect messages with irregular timing intervals, and take advantage of the dependencies between different Electronic Control Units (ECUs) to restrict even the most advanced attacker. Our IDS is deployed and tested on multiple vehicles, and has demonstrated greater accuracy and detection capabilities than previous work.
papers.abstract_zh: J1939是建立在广泛使用的CAN总线之上的网络层，用于车辆内不同子系统之间的通信。J1939和NMEA 2000协议使这些子系统的数据浓缩标准化，并用于卡车、武器系统、军舰和其他工业系统。众所周知，现有基于CAN的通信系统的实际安全解决方案非常困难，因为所涉及的设备缺乏加密能力。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新的入侵检测系统(IDS)的J1939和NMEA 2000网络。我们的IDS (CANDID)将时间分析与数据包操纵检测系统和数据分析相结合。这种数据分析使我们能够捕捉车辆的状态，检测不规则时间间隔的消息，并利用不同电子控制单元(ECU)之间的依赖关系来限制即使是最先进的攻击者。我们的IDS在多辆车上进行了部署和测试，并证明了比以前的工作更高的准确性和检测能力。
papers.title_zh: 检测可以攻击J1939和NMEA 2000网络

papers.title: Towards Class-Balanced Privacy Preserving Heterogeneous Model Aggregation
papers.authors: Xiaoyi Pang, Zhibo Wang, Zeqing He, Peng Sun, Meng Luo, Ju Ren, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Heterogeneous model aggregation (HMA) is an effective paradigm that integrates on-device trained models heterogeneous in architecture and target task into a comprehensive model. Recent works adopt knowledge distillation to amalgamate the knowledge of learned features and predictions from heterogeneous on-device models to realize HMA. However, most of them ignore that the disclosure of learned features exposes on-device models to privacy attacks. Moreover, the aggregated model may suffer from the imbalanced supervision caused by the uneven distribution of amalgamated knowledge about each class and show class bias. In this article, to address these issues, we propose a response-based class-balanced heterogeneous model aggregation mechanism, called CBHMA. It can effectively achieve HMA in a privacy-preserving manner and alleviate class bias in the aggregated model. Specifically, CBHMA aggregates on-device models by using only their response information to reduce their privacy leakage risk. To mitigate the impact of imbalanced supervision, CBHMA quantitatively measures the imbalanced supervision level for each class. Based on that, CBHMA customizes fine-grained misclassification costs for each class and utilizes such costs to adjust the importance of each class (more importance to classes with weaker supervision) in the response-based HMA algorithm. Extensive experiments on two real-world datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of CBHMA.
papers.abstract_zh: 异构模型聚合(Heterogeneous model aggregation，HMA)是一种有效的范式，可以将结构和目标任务异构的在设备上训练的模型集成为一个综合的模型。最近的工作采用知识提炼来合并来自异构设备上模型的学习特征和预测的知识，以实现HMA。然而，他们中的大多数忽略了学习特征的公开将设备上的模型暴露给隐私攻击。此外，聚合模型可能遭受由关于每个类的融合知识的不均匀分布引起的不平衡监督，并表现出类偏差。在本文中，为了解决这些问题，我们提出了一种基于响应的类平衡异构模型聚合机制，称为CBHMA。它能以保护隐私的方式有效地实现HMA，并减轻聚集模型中的类偏见。具体来说，CBHMA通过仅使用设备上模型的响应信息来聚合设备上模型，以降低其隐私泄露风险。为了减轻不平衡监管的影响，CBHMA对每个类别的不平衡监管水平进行定量测量。基于此，CBHMA为每个类定制细粒度的错误分类成本，并利用这些成本来调整基于响应的HMA算法中每个类的重要性(对于监督较弱的类更重要)。在两个真实数据集上的大量实验证明了CBHMA的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 迈向平衡的隐私保护异质模型聚合

papers.title: Understanding Location Privacy of the Point-of-Interest Aggregate Data via Practical Attacks and Defenses
papers.authors: Wei Tong, Yinggang Tong, Chang Xia, Jingyu Hua, Qun Li, Sheng Zhong
papers.abstract: Location-based services have significantly affected mobile users’ everyday life, and location privacy has become essential. Some applications (e.g., location-based recommendation, mobility analytics) do not need the raw location data, and the service providers adopt aggregation to protect users’ location traces. However, some works show that even these aggregation data may disclose users’ location privacy when additional prior knowledge is available to an adversary. We consider the location privacy problem in the presence of Location Uniqueness, a property by which some geographical locations can be re-identified based on the aggregated point-of-interest information. We first study whether existing protection mechanisms are adequate for defending against this type of attack. Then we present two practical attacks for inferring users’ actual locations based on the POI aggregates. A secure POI aggregate release mechanism is proposed for defending against this type of re-identification attack and achieving differential privacy at the same time. We conduct extensive experiments on real-world datasets. The results show that the existing protection mechanisms cannot provide sufficient protection against location re-identification attacks. The proposed attacks can significantly improve the inference performance, and the proposed protection mechanism achieves satisfactory performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于位置的服务已经极大地影响了移动用户的日常生活，位置隐私变得至关重要。一些应用(例如，基于位置的推荐、移动性分析)不需要原始位置数据，服务提供商采用聚合来保护用户的位置踪迹。然而，一些工作表明，当对手可以获得额外的先验知识时，即使这些聚集数据也可能泄露用户的位置隐私。我们考虑了位置唯一性下的位置隐私问题，通过位置唯一性，一些地理位置可以基于聚集的兴趣点信息被重新识别。我们首先研究现有的保护机制是否足以抵御这种类型的攻击。然后我们提出了两种基于兴趣点集合推断用户实际位置的实际攻击。提出了一种安全的POI聚合发布机制来抵御这种重认证攻击，同时实现差分隐私。我们在真实世界数据集上进行了大量实验。结果表明，现有的保护机制不能提供足够的保护来抵御位置重识别攻击。所提出的攻击可以显著提高推理性能，所提出的保护机制也取得了令人满意的性能。
papers.title_zh: 通过实用攻击和防御措施了解利点汇总数据的位置隐私

papers.title: CommandFence: A Novel Digital-Twin-Based Preventive Framework for Securing Smart Home Systems
papers.authors: Yinhao Xiao, Yizhen Jia, Qin Hu, Xiuzhen Cheng, Bei Gong, Jiguo Yu
papers.abstract: Smart home systems are both technologically and economically advancing rapidly. As people become gradually inalienable to smart home infrastructures, their security conditions are getting more and more closely tied to everyone's privacy and safety. In this paper, we consider smart apps, either malicious ones with evil intentions or benign ones with logic errors, that can cause property loss or even physical sufferings to the user when being executed in a smart home environment and interacting with human activities and environmental changes. Unfortunately, current preventive measures rely on permission-based access control, failing to provide ideal protections against such threats due to the nature of their rigid designs. In this paper, we propose CommandFence, a novel digital-twin-based security framework that adopts a fundamentally new concept of protecting the smart home system by letting any sequence of app commands to be executed in a virtual smart home system, in which a deep-q network (DQN) is used to predict if the sequence could lead to a risky consequence. CommandFence is composed of an Interposition Layer to interpose app commands and an Emulation Layer to figure out whether they can cause any risky smart home state if correlating with possible human activities and environmental changes. We fully implemented our CommandFence implementation and tested against 553 official SmartApps on the Samsung SmartThings platform and successfully identified 34 potentially dangerous ones, with 31 of them reported to be problematic Author: Please provide index terms/keywords for your article. To download the IEEE Taxonomy go to http://www.ieee.org/documents/taxonomy_v101.pdf ?> the first time to our best knowledge. Moreover, We tested our CommandFence on the 10 malicious SmartApps created by Jia et al. 2017, and successfully identified 7 of them as risky, with the missed ones actually only causing smartphone information leak (not harmful to the smart home system). We also tested CommandFence against the 17 benign SmartApps with logic errors developed by Celik et al. 2017, and achieved a 100% accuracy. Our experimental studies indicate that adopting CommandFence incurs a neglectable overhead of 0.1675 seconds.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能家居系统在技术和经济上都在快速发展。随着人们逐渐与智能家居基础设施密不可分，他们的安全状况与每个人的隐私和安全越来越紧密地联系在一起。在本文中，我们考虑智能应用程序，无论是恶意的还是良性的逻辑错误，当在智能家居环境中执行并与人类活动和环境变化交互时，都会给用户造成财产损失甚至身体痛苦。不幸的是，当前的预防措施依赖于基于许可的访问控制，由于其严格设计的性质，无法提供针对这种威胁的理想保护。在本文中，我们提出了CommandFence，这是一种基于数字孪生的新型安全框架，采用了一种全新的概念来保护智能家居系统，方法是让任何序列的应用程序命令在虚拟智能家居系统中执行，其中deep-q网络(DQN)用于预测该序列是否会导致危险的后果。CommandFence由一个插入层和一个仿真层组成，前者用于插入应用程序命令，后者用于计算它们是否会导致任何危险的智能家居状态，如果与可能的人类活动和环境变化相关的话。我们全面实施了CommandFence实施，并针对三星SmartThings平台上的553个官方智能应用进行了测试，成功识别了34个潜在危险应用，其中31个据报告有问题作者:请为您的文章提供索引术语/关键词。去http://www.ieee.org/documents/taxonomy_v101.pdf下载IEEE分类法？>第一次到我们最好的知识。此外，我们在贾等人2017年创建的10个恶意智能应用上测试了我们的命令，并成功识别出其中7个具有风险，错过的那些实际上只导致智能手机信息泄露(对智能家居系统无害)。我们还针对切利克等人2017年开发的17个存在逻辑错误的良性SmartApps测试了CommandFence，取得了100%的准确率。我们的实验研究表明，采用命令会导致0.1675秒的可忽略开销。
papers.title_zh: CommandFence：一个新型的基于数字双线的预防框架，用于保护智能家居系统

papers.title: FuzzyDedup: Secure Fuzzy Deduplication for Cloud Storage
papers.authors: Tao Jiang, Xu Yuan, Yuan Chen, Ke Cheng, Liangmin Wang, Xiaofeng Chen, Jianfeng Ma
papers.abstract: Data deduplication is of critical importance to reduce the storage cost for clients and to relieve the unnecessary storage pressure for cloud servers. While various techniques have been proposed for secure deduplication of identical files/blocks, the effective and secure deduplication solutions on fuzzy similar data (image, video, and others) which occupy a large portion in the real world across wide applications, remain open. In this article, we propose a novel deduplication system, named Fuzzy Deduplication (FuzzyDedup), to implement the secure deduplication of similar data (i.e., similar files, chunks, or blocks). In particular, we leverage the similarity-preserving hash, a fuzzy extractor based on error-correcting codes, and the encryption with customized design to construct a fuzzy-style deduplication encryption scheme (FuzzyMLE), achieving the ciphertext-based deduplication for similar data. Besides, to defend against data ownership cheating attack and duplicate-faking attack, a fuzzy-style proof of ownership scheme (FuzzyPoW) is designed for the cloud server to securely verify a client in possession of the similar data. To further enhance security and efficiency, we also propose both server-aided and random-tag FuzzyMLE to make FuzzyDedup robust against off-line brute-force attack and to support tag randomization, respectively. Then, we design Hamming distance reduction and tag cutting optimization algorithms to improve the tag query efficiency of FuzzyDedup. In the end, we formally prove the security of our solution and conduct experiments on real-world datasets for performance evaluation. Experimental results exhibit the efficiency of FuzzyDedup in terms of computation cost and communication overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 重复数据删除对于降低客户端的存储成本和减轻云服务器不必要的存储压力至关重要。虽然已经提出了用于相同文件/块的安全去重复的各种技术，但是对模糊相似数据(图像、视频等)的有效且安全的去重复解决方案仍然是开放的，这些数据在现实世界中的广泛应用中占据了很大一部分。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的重复数据删除系统，称为模糊重复数据删除(FuzzyDedup)，以实现相似数据(即，相似的文件、块或块)的安全重复数据删除。特别地，我们利用相似性保持哈希、基于纠错码的模糊提取器和定制设计的加密来构建模糊式重复数据删除加密方案(FuzzyMLE ),实现基于密文的相似数据重复数据删除。此外，为了抵御数据所有权欺骗攻击和复制伪造攻击，云服务器设计了一种模糊式所有权证明方案(FuzzyPoW ),用于安全验证拥有相似数据的客户端。为了进一步提高安全性和效率，我们还提出了服务器辅助和随机标签FuzzyMLE，分别使FuzzyDedup对离线暴力攻击和支持标签随机化具有鲁棒性。然后，设计了汉明距离缩减和标签切割优化算法来提高模糊重复标签查询效率。最后，我们正式证明了该方案的安全性，并在真实数据集上进行了性能评估实验。实验结果显示了FuzzyDedup在计算成本和通信开销方面的有效性。
papers.title_zh: fuzzydedup：安全的模糊重复数据删除用于云存储

papers.title: Misconfiguration-Free Compositional SDN for Cloud Networks
papers.authors: Heng Pan, Zhenyu Li, Penghao Zhang, Penglai Cui, Kavé Salamatian, Gaogang Xie
papers.abstract: Cloud computing provides a new paradigm to offer flexible IT infrastructures. In IaaS clouds, tenants deploy software-defined networking (SDN) policies to simplify network management and customize network behaviors. However, programming SDN networks is error-prone no matter using low-level APIs or high-level programming languages. Specifically, SDN policies may contain misconfigurations that do not break the pre-defined network invariants (e.g., black holes), but either degrade the deployment efficiency or mistakenly translate tenants intents. Prior studies for checking either traditional access control policies or network-wide invariants, are thus fail to detect these misconfigurations. To address this gap, this paper presents PMM, a misconfiguration checking tool for compositional SDN that works at the data plane of cloud networks. We first propose a new data structure, minimal interval set, to represent the match patterns of rulesets. This representation serves the basis for composition algebra construction and misconfiguration checking. We then propose the principles, algorithms and also optimisations for fast and accurate checking. We finally implement PMM in Covisor. Experiments with both real-world rulesets and synthetic rulesets show that PMM can detect misconfigurations of SDN policies in cloud networks within hundreds of milliseconds.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算为提供灵活的IT基础设施提供了一个新的范例。在IaaS云中，租户部署软件定义的网络(SDN)策略来简化网络管理和自定义网络行为。然而，无论使用低级API还是高级编程语言，编写SDN网络都容易出错。具体而言，SDN策略可能包含未破坏预定义网络不变量的错误配置(例如黑洞)，但会降低部署效率或错误地解释租户意图。先前用于检查传统访问控制策略或网络范围不变量的研究因此不能检测这些错误配置。为了弥补这一差距，本文介绍了PMM，这是一种用于组合SDN的错误配置检查工具，可在云网络的数据平面上工作。我们首先提出一种新的数据结构，最小区间集，来表示规则集的匹配模式。这种表示为组合代数构造和错误配置检查提供了基础。然后，我们提出的原则，算法，以及快速和准确的检查优化。我们最终在Covisor中实现了PMM。真实世界规则集和合成规则集的实验表明，PMM可以在数百毫秒内检测到云网络中SDN策略的错误配置。
papers.title_zh: 云网络的无配置的无构图SDN

papers.title: SpreadMeNot: A Provably Secure and Privacy-Preserving Contact Tracing Protocol
papers.authors: Pietro Tedeschi, Spiridon Bakiras, Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: A plethora of contact tracing apps have been developed and deployed in several countries around the world in the battle against Covid-19. However, people are rightfully concerned about the security and privacy risks of such applications. To address these issues, in this paper we provide two main contributions. First, we present an in-depth analysis of the security and privacy characteristics of the most prominent contact tracing protocols, under both passive and active adversaries. The results of our study indicate that all protocols are vulnerable to a variety of attacks, mainly due to the deterministic nature of the underlying cryptographic protocols. Our second contribution is the design and implementation of SpreadMeNot, a novel contact tracing protocol that can defend against most passive and active attacks, thus providing strong (provable) security and privacy guarantees that are necessary for such a sensitive application. Our detailed analysis, both formal and experimental, shows that SpreadMeNot satisfies security, privacy, and performance requirements, hence being an ideal candidate for building a contact tracing solution that can be adopted by the majority of the general public, as well as to serve as an open-source reference for further developments in the field.
papers.abstract_zh: 在抗击新冠肺炎病毒的战斗中，大量的联系追踪应用程序已经在全球多个国家开发和部署。然而，人们有理由担心这类应用程序的安全和隐私风险。为了解决这些问题，本文提供了两个主要贡献。首先，我们提出了一个在被动和主动对手下最突出的联系追踪协议的安全和隐私特征的深入分析。我们的研究结果表明，所有协议都容易受到各种攻击，这主要是由于底层密码协议的确定性。我们的第二个贡献是SpreadMeNot的设计和实现，这是一个新颖的联系跟踪协议，可以抵御大多数被动和主动攻击，从而提供强大的(可证明的)安全性和隐私保证，这对于这样一个敏感的应用程序是必要的。我们的详细分析(包括正式分析和实验分析)表明，SpreadMeNot满足安全性、隐私性和性能要求，因此是构建可被大多数公众采用的联系追踪解决方案的理想候选，也是该领域进一步发展的开源参考。
papers.title_zh: SpreadMenot：可证明安全且保护隐私的联系人跟踪协议

papers.title: On Detecting Route Hijacking Attack in Opportunistic Mobile Networks
papers.authors: Ala Altaweel, Radu Stoleru, Guofei Gu, Arnab Kumar Maity, Suman Bhunia
papers.abstract: In this paper, we show that Hybrid Routing and Prophet protocols in Opportunistic Mobile Networks (OMNs) are vulnerable to the <italic>CollusiveHijack</italic> attack, in which a malicious attacker, Eve, compromises a set of nodes and lies about their Inter-Contact-Times (ICTs). Eve claims that her nodes meet more frequently than in reality to hijack the routes of legitimate nodes in OMNs. The CollusiveHijack attack enables Eve to launch more severe attacks like packet modification, traffic analysis, and incentive seeking attacks. To identify the CollusiveHijack attack, we propose the Kolmogorov-Smirnov two-sample test to determine whether the statistical distribution of the packets’ delays follows the derived distribution from the ICTs among the nodes. We propose three techniques to detect the CollusiveHijack attack, the Path Detection Technique (PDT), the Hop Detection Technique (HDT), and the Early Hop Detection Technique (EHDT), which trade off compatibility with the Bundle Security Protocol, the detection rate, and the detection latency. We evaluated our techniques through extensive trace-driven simulations and a proof-of-concept system implementation and show that they can detect CollusiveHijack attacks with 80.0% to 99.4% detection rates (when Eve hijacks more than 60 packets) while maintaining a low false positive rate (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sim$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mo>∼</mml:mo></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="altaweel-ieq1-3186029.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>3.6%) and a short detection latency (7-14 hours) for EHDT (75%-85% enhancement compared to PDT and HDT).
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们证明了机会移动网络中的混合路由和Prophet协议容易受到< italic>CollusiveHijack</italic >攻击，在这种攻击中，恶意攻击者Eve破坏了一组节点并谎报了它们的相互联系时间(ICTs)。Eve声称她的节点比现实中更频繁地相遇，以劫持omn中合法节点的路由。共谋劫持攻击使Eve能够发起更严重的攻击，如数据包修改、流量分析和动机寻求攻击。为了识别共谋劫持攻击，我们提出了Kolmogorov-Smirnov双样本测试，以确定分组延迟的统计分布是否遵循从节点间的信道传输中导出的分布。我们提出了三种检测共谋劫持攻击的技术，路径检测技术(PDT)、跳检测技术(HDT)和早期跳检测技术(EHDT)，这些技术在与包安全协议的兼容性、检测率和检测延迟之间进行权衡。我们通过广泛的跟踪驱动模拟和概念验证系统实施来评估我们的技术，并表明它们可以以80.0%至99.4%的检测率检测共谋劫持攻击(当Eve劫持超过60个数据包时)，同时保持较低的误报率(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ sim $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mo >∩</MML:mo > </MML:math > < inline-graphic)
papers.title_zh: 检测机会移动网络中的路线劫持攻击

papers.title: Bilateral Privacy-Preserving Worker Selection in Spatial Crowdsourcing
papers.authors: Hengzhi Wang, Yongjian Yang, En Wang, Xiulong Liu, Jingxiao Wei, Jie Wu
papers.abstract: Spatial Crowdsourcing (SC) has been adopted in various applications such as Gigwalk and Uber, where a platform takes location-based tasks (e.g., picking up passengers) from a requester and selects suitable workers to perform them. In most existing works, the platform selects workers based on the requester and worker information, which suffers from serious privacy issues. Some works have considered privacy issues, but they still suffer from either of two limitations: (i) Privacy of the requester and worker cannot be protected simultaneously; (ii) Third-party trusted entities are usually required. Motivated by this, we focus on protecting the privacy of both the requester and the worker without third-party entities while selecting workers. We use randomized response, a widely recognized and prevalent privacy model achieving Local Differential Privacy (LDP), to jointly protect the privacy of workers’ locations and charges based on the location-charge correlation. For the requester, we present a novel mechanism called randomized matrix multiplication to hide the real task locations. More importantly, we prove that the worker selection based on the protected information is non-submodular and NP-hard, which cannot be addressed in polynomial time. To this end, we present an approximate algorithm to solve the problem efficiently, of which the effectiveness is measured by the approximation ratio, i.e., the ratio of the optimal solution to the approximate solution. Finally, simulations based on real-world datasets illustrate that our worker selection outperforms the state-of-the-art method on both privacy protection and worker selection.
papers.abstract_zh: 空间众包(SC)已在各种应用中采用，如Gigwalk和优步，其中平台从请求者那里接受基于位置的任务(例如，搭载乘客)，并选择合适的工人来执行这些任务。在大多数现有的工作中，平台基于请求者和工作者信息选择工作者，这遭受严重的隐私问题。一些工作已经考虑了隐私问题，但是它们仍然遭受两个限制中的任一个:(I)请求者和工作者的隐私不能被同时保护；(ii)通常需要第三方可信实体。在此推动下，我们在选择员工时注重保护请求者和员工的隐私，不借助第三方实体。我们使用随机化回答(一种广泛认可和流行的隐私模型，实现局部差异隐私(LDP))来共同保护基于位置-费用相关性的工人位置和费用的隐私。对于请求者，我们提出了一种称为随机矩阵乘法的新机制来隐藏真实的任务位置。更重要的是，我们证明了基于受保护信息的工人选择是非次模的和NP难的，不能在多项式时间内解决。为此，我们提出了一种有效求解该问题的近似算法，其有效性用近似比来衡量，即最优解与近似解的比值。最后，基于真实数据集的仿真表明，我们的工人选择在隐私保护和工人选择两方面都优于最先进的方法。
papers.title_zh: 双边隐私保护工人在空间众包中选择

papers.title: AIR-FI: Leaking Data From Air-Gapped Computers Using Wi-Fi Frequencies
papers.authors: Mordechai Guri
papers.abstract: This article presents a new attack allowing attackers to exfiltrate data from isolated, air-gapped computers via Wi-Fi frequencies. We show that malware in a compromised air-gapped computer can generate signals in the Wi-Fi frequency bands. The signals are generated through the memory buses - no special hardware is required. Sensitive data can be modulated and secretly exfiltrated on top of the signals. We show that nearby Wi-Fi-capable devices (e.g., smartphones, laptops, and IoT devices) can intercept these signals, decode them, and send them to the attacker over the Internet. We utilized the physical layer information exposed by the Wi-Fi chips to extract the signals. We further implemented the transmitter and receiver and discussed design considerations and implementation details. We evaluated this covert channel in terms of bandwidth and distance and presented a set of countermeasures. Our evaluation shows that data can be exfiltrated from air-gapped computers to nearby Wi-Fi receivers located meters away at bit rates of 16 bit/sec.
papers.abstract_zh: 这篇文章介绍了一种新的攻击，它允许攻击者通过Wi-Fi频率从隔离的空气间隙计算机中窃取数据。我们发现，恶意软件在被入侵的空气间隙计算机中可以产生Wi-Fi频段的信号。信号是通过内存总线产生的，不需要特殊的硬件。敏感数据可以被调制并秘密渗透到信号之上。我们发现附近支持Wi-Fi的设备(如智能手机、笔记本电脑和物联网设备)可以拦截这些信号，对其进行解码，并通过互联网将其发送给攻击者。我们利用Wi-Fi芯片暴露的物理层信息来提取信号。我们进一步实现了发射机和接收机，并讨论了设计考虑和实现细节。我们从带宽和距离方面评估了这个隐蔽信道，并提出了一套对策。我们的评估表明，数据可以以16位/秒的比特率从有空隙的计算机渗漏到附近几米外的Wi-Fi接收器。
papers.title_zh: 空气网络：使用Wi-Fi频率从空调计算机中泄漏数据

papers.title: CAeSaR: An Online Payment Anti-Fraud Integration System With Decision Explainability
papers.authors: Cheng Wang, Songyao Chai, Hangyu Zhu, Changjun Jiang
papers.abstract: In data-driven anti-fraud engineering for online payment services, the integration of proper function modules is an effective way to further improve detection performance by overcoming the inability of single-function methods to cope with complex and varied frauds. However, a qualified integration is really inaccessible under multiple demanding requirements, i.e., improving detection performance, ensuring decision explainability, and limiting processing latency and computing consumption. In this work, we propose a qualified integration system, named CAeSaR, that can simultaneously meet all of the above requirements. This satisfactory result is achieved by the cooperation of two innovative techniques. The first is a novel three-way taxonomy of function division, called TRTPT, according to the temporal positions of transactions relative to a reference fraudulent transaction. Based on TRTPT, CAeSaR can introduce three kinds of anti-fraud function modules which collaboratively cover all types of frauds theoretically. The second is an effective integration scheme, called TELSI. It generates the candidate decision strategies by combining the judgments of three function modules by only two simple logical connectives, which essentially ensures the decision explainability. Particularly, TELSI can assign the most effective decision strategy to the corresponding transaction adaptively by a devised stacking-based multi-classification. The advantages of CAeSaR are validated in practice over real-life data from a prestigious bank.
papers.abstract_zh: 在数据驱动的在线支付服务反欺诈工程中，集成适当的功能模块是进一步提高检测性能的有效方法，可以克服单一功能方法无法应对复杂多变的欺诈的问题。然而，在多种苛刻要求下，即提高检测性能、确保决策可解释性以及限制处理延迟和计算消耗，合格的集成实际上是不可实现的。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个合格的集成系统，命名为凯撒，可以同时满足上述所有要求。这一令人满意的结果是通过两种创新技术的配合实现的。第一种是一种新的功能划分的三向分类法，称为TRTPT，根据交易相对于参考欺诈交易的时间位置。基于TRTPT，CAeSaR可以引入三种反欺诈功能模块，从理论上协同覆盖所有类型的欺诈。第二个是有效的集成方案，称为TELSI。它仅用两个简单的逻辑连接词将三个功能模块的判断组合起来生成候选决策策略，从本质上保证了决策的可解释性。特别地，TELSI可以通过设计的基于堆叠的多分类自适应地为相应的事务分配最有效的决策策略。CAeSaR的优势在一家著名银行的真实数据中得到实践验证。
papers.title_zh: 凯撒：在线支付反欺诈集成系统，具有决策性

papers.title: Joint Biological ID : A Secure and Efficient Lightweight Biometric Authentication Scheme
papers.authors: Haoyang Wang, Kai Fan, Hongyan Chen, Qi Chen, Kuan Zhang, Fenghua Li, Hui Li, Yintang Yang
papers.abstract: Biometric applications makes biometric authentication replace the traditional password in many cases. Biometric recognition technology has the advantages of convenience and high stability, facilitating identity recognition. However, the shortcoming of biometric authentication is easy to be stolen and leaked, which raises security concerns. In this paper, we design a lightweight joint biometric authentication scheme (SELBA) based on face and fingerprint. We improve searchable encryption (SE) to protect the privacy security of extracted biometric features in the storage and authentication stage. Because of the problem that biometric features cannot be changed or retrieved once leaked in existing schemes, we propose a cancelable mechanism to reconstruct stolen or damaged biometric templates. Moreover, we make a complete security analysis of the SELBA to meet the confidentiality, renewability, revocability, irreversibility and unlinkability of template in biometric recognition. Meanwhile, we conduct experiments on real data sets to show that SELBA is secure, efficient and easy to use in practical application scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 生物识别应用使得生物认证在很多情况下取代了传统的密码。生物识别技术具有便捷性和高稳定性的优点，便于身份识别。然而，生物认证的缺点是容易被窃取和泄露，这引发了安全问题。本文设计了一种基于人脸和指纹的轻量级联合生物认证方案。我们改进了可搜索加密(SE ),以在存储和认证阶段保护提取的生物特征的隐私安全。针对现有方案中生物特征一旦泄露就无法更改或恢复的问题，我们提出了一种可撤销机制来重建被盗或受损的生物模板。此外，我们对SELBA进行了完整的安全性分析，以满足生物识别中模板的机密性、可更新性、可撤销性、不可逆性和不可链接性。同时，我们在真实数据集上进行了实验，结果表明SELBA在实际应用场景中是安全、高效和易用的。
papers.title_zh: 联合生物ID：安全有效的轻质生物特征验证方案

papers.title: Type-I Generative Adversarial Attack
papers.authors: Shenghong He, Ruxin Wang, Tongliang Liu, Chao Yi, Xin Jin, Renyang Liu, Wei Zhou
papers.abstract: Deep neural networks are vulnerable to adversarial attacks either by examples with indistinguishable perturbations which produce incorrect predictions, or by examples with noticeable transformations that are still predicted as the original label. The latter case is known as the Type I attack which, however, has achieved limited attention in literature. We advocate that the vulnerability comes from the ambiguous distributions among different classes in the resultant feature space of the model, which is saying that the examples with different appearances may present similar features. Inspired by this, we propose a novel Type I attack method called generative adversarial attack (GAA). Specifically, GAA aims at exploiting the distribution mapping from the source domain of multiple classes to the target domain of a single class by using generative adversarial networks. A novel loss and a U-net architecture with latent modification are elaborated to ensure the stable transformation between the two domains. In this way, the generated adversarial examples have similar appearances with examples of the target domain, yet obtaining the original prediction by the model being attacked. Extensive experiments on multiple benchmarks demonstrate that the proposed method generates adversarial images that are more visually similar to the target images than the competitors, and the state-of-the-art performance is achieved.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络容易受到对抗性攻击，要么是由产生不正确预测的不可区分的扰动的例子，要么是由仍然被预测为原始标签的具有明显变换的例子。后一种情况被称为I型攻击，但在文献中受到的关注有限。我们认为脆弱性来源于模型合成特征空间中不同类之间的不明确分布，即不同外观的实例可能呈现相似的特征。受此启发，我们提出了一种新的第一类攻击方法，称为生成对抗性攻击(GAA)。具体而言，GAA旨在通过使用生成对抗网络来利用从多个类别的源域到单个类别的目标域的分布映射。提出了一种新的loss和一种具有潜在修改的U-net结构，以保证两个域之间的稳定转换。以这种方式，生成的对抗实例具有与目标领域的实例相似的外观，但是通过被攻击的模型获得原始预测。在多个基准上的大量实验表明，与竞争对手相比，该方法生成的敌对图像在视觉上与目标图像更相似，达到了最先进的性能。
papers.title_zh: I型生成对抗攻击

papers.title: Network Traffic Content Identification Based on Time-Scale Signal Modeling
papers.authors: Yu Liang, Yi Xie, Shensheng Tang, Shunzheng Yu, Xingcheng Liu, Jiankun Hu
papers.abstract: Identifying the nature of data flows can help improve network service and security. Most existing solutions usually simplify the traffic classification to protocol and application identification based on some uniqueness assumptions. However, in the real world these assumptions aren't always reasonable due to the abuse of multiplexing techniques. In this work, a new scheme is proposed from a different perspective that aims to directly identify the content inside a data flow without considering the external protocols and applications. We use wavelet to obtain the time-scale signals of each data flow and develop a new hidden Markov tree (HMT) with an embedding deep neural network (DNN) to model these signals. Each hidden state of the HMT represents a specific signal generation pattern. Transition of hidden states describes the time-scale context of the signal patterns. DNN is used to describe the probabilistic relationship between the implicit patterns and the observed time-scale signals. We derive new algorithms for the model and create an instance for each type of traffic, which projects the data flows into a multi-dimensional decision space and achieves their content identification through a classifier. Numerical experiments using real datasets are presented to validate the proposed scheme. Performance-related issues and comparisons with related works are discussed.
papers.abstract_zh: 识别数据流的性质有助于改善网络服务和安全性。大多数现有的解决方案通常基于一些唯一性假设将流量分类简化为协议和应用识别。然而，在现实世界中，由于复用技术的滥用，这些假设并不总是合理的。在这项工作中，从不同的角度提出了一种新的方案，旨在直接识别数据流内部的内容，而不考虑外部协议和应用程序。我们使用小波来获得每个数据流的时间尺度信号，并开发新的隐马尔可夫树(HMT)和嵌入的深度神经网络(DNN)来建模这些信号。HMT的每个隐藏状态代表一个特定的信号生成模式。隐藏状态的转换描述了信号模式的时标上下文。DNN用于描述隐含模式和观察到的时间尺度信号之间的概率关系。我们为该模型推导了新的算法，并为每种类型的流量创建了一个实例，该实例将数据流投影到多维决策空间中，并通过分类器实现其内容识别。使用真实数据集的数值实验验证了该方案的有效性。讨论了与性能相关的问题以及与相关作品的比较。
papers.title_zh: 基于时间尺度信号建模的网络流量内容识别

papers.title: Expressive Data Sharing and Self-Controlled Fine-Grained Data Deletion in Cloud-Assisted IoT
papers.authors: Qian Mei, Minghao Yang, Jinhao Chen, Lili Wang, Hu Xiong
papers.abstract: Expressive data sharing and efficient data deletion are essential to drive the development of cloud-assisted IoT. But insecure transmission and the vulnerability of the cloud server may cause potential threats to IoT data, attribute-based encryption (ABE) is widely applied to ensure data confidentially. Nonetheless, the potential data exposure caused by the compromised long-term key and the contradiction between conventional access structures in ABE and the various demands of data owners are still two huge challenges. To overcome these challenges, this article designs an unbounded and puncturable ciphertext-policy ABE with arithmetic span program (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {UP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">UP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq1-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {CP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">CP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq2-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {ABE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">ABE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq3-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {ASP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">ASP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq4-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) scheme and presents an expressive data sharing and self-controlled fine-grained data deletion solution in cloud-assisted IoT, which allows data owners to efficiently encrypt and share data with various computable access policies, but also enables data owners and data users to independently delete specific data stored in the cloud. The designed <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {UP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">UP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq5-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {CP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">CP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq6-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {ABE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">ABE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq7-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {ASP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">ASP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq8-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> leverages unbounded ABE and puncturable encryption to support the flexible update of system parameters and the deletion of specific data. Also, the arithmetic span program access structure is combined to realize expressive data sharing. Moreover, the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {UP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">UP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq9-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {CP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">CP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq10-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {ABE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">ABE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq11-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {ASP}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">ASP</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiong-ieq12-3188740.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is adaptively secure in the standard model, and comprehensive performance evaluations demonstrate its practicability and scalability in cloud-assisted IoT.
papers.abstract_zh: 富有表现力的数据共享和高效的数据删除对于推动云辅助物联网的发展至关重要。但是不安全的传输和云服务器的漏洞可能对物联网数据造成潜在威胁，基于属性的加密(ABE)被广泛应用于保证数据的机密性。尽管如此，长期密钥泄露导致的潜在数据暴露和ABE中传统访问结构与数据所有者各种需求之间的矛盾仍然是两个巨大的挑战。为了克服这些挑战，本文设计了一个具有算术跨度的无界可穿孔密文策略ABE程序(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathcal { UP } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " script " > UP </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Xiong-ie Q1-3188740 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >)designed < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathcal { UP } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " script " > UP </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Xiong-ieq 5-3188740 . gif "/> </alternatives >-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ math此外，结合算术跨度程序访问结构，实现有表达的数据共享。此外，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathcal { UP } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " script " > UP </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Xiong-ieq 9-3188740 . gif "/> </alternatives >-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \的
papers.title_zh: 云辅助物联网中的表达性数据共享和自我控制的细粒数据删除

papers.title: Learning in Your "Pocket": Secure Collaborative Deep Learning With Membership Privacy
papers.authors: Xindi Ma, Qi Jiang, Ximeng Liu, Qingqi Pei, Jianfeng Ma, Wenjing Lou
papers.abstract: Organizations tend to collaboratively train the deep learning model over their combined datasets for a common benefit (e.g., better-trained model or learning a complicated model). However, due to the consideration about privacy leakage, organizations cannot share their data directly, especially related to sensitive domains. In this article, a privacy-preserving collaborative deep learning mechanism, namely Sigma, is designed to allow participating organizations to train a collective model without exposing their local training data to the others. Specifically, a single-server-aided private collaborative architecture is introduced to achieve the private collaborative learning, which protects organizations’ data even if <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n-1$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ma-ieq1-3192326.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> out of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ma-ieq2-3192326.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> participants colluded. We also design a practical protocol to perform the secure model training, which can resist the typical inference attack through the sharing information. After that, we propose a fair model releasing mechanism for participants and introduce differential privacy to prevent model stealing and membership inference attack. Furthermore, we prove that Sigma can ensure participants’ privacy preservation and analyze the communication overhead in theory. To evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of Sigma, we conduct an experiment over two real-world datasets and the simulation results demonstrate that Sigma can efficiently achieve the collaborative model training and effectively resist the membership inference attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了共同的利益(例如，训练更好的模型或学习复杂的模型)，组织倾向于在他们的组合数据集上协作训练深度学习模型。然而，出于对隐私泄露的考虑，组织不能直接共享他们的数据，尤其是涉及敏感领域的数据。在本文中，一种保护隐私的协作深度学习机制，即适马，旨在允许参与组织训练一个集体模型，而不会将他们的本地训练数据暴露给其他人。具体而言，引入了单服务器辅助的私有协作架构来实现私有协作学习，即使< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ n-1 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi >-</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math >，也能保护组织的数据我们还设计了一个实用的安全模型训练协议，通过共享信息来抵抗典型的推理攻击。在此基础上，我们提出了一个公平的模型发布机制，并引入差分隐私来防止模型窃取和成员推理攻击。此外，我们证明了适马可以保证参与者的隐私安全，并从理论上分析了通信开销。为了评估适马的有效性和效率，我们在两个真实数据集上进行了实验，仿真结果表明，适马能够有效地实现协同模型训练，并能有效地抵抗成员推理攻击。
papers.title_zh: 在您的“口袋”中学习：与会员隐私的协作深度学习

papers.title: STD-NET: Search of Image Steganalytic Deep-Learning Architecture via Hierarchical Tensor Decomposition
papers.authors: Shunquan Tan, Qiushi Li, Laiyuan Li, Bin Li, Jiwu Huang
papers.abstract: Steganalysis aims to reveal covert communication established via steganography. In the arm race with steganography, steganalysis has evolved from the old-style hand-crafted features set to deep-learning architectures. However, recent studies show that the majority of existing deep steganalysis models have a large amount of redundancy, which leads to a huge waste of storage and computing resources. The existing model compression method cannot flexibly compress the convolutional layer in residual shortcut block so that a satisfactory shrinking rate cannot be obtained. In this article, we propose STD-NET, an unsupervised deep-learning architecture search approach via hierarchical tensor decomposition for image steganalysis. Our proposed strategy will not be restricted by various residual connections, since this strategy does not change the number of input and output channels of the convolution block. We propose a normalized distortion threshold to evaluate the sensitivity of each involved convolutional layer of the base model to guide STD-NET to compress target network in an efficient and unsupervised approach, and obtain two network structures of different shapes with low computation cost and similar performance compared with the original one. Extensive experiments have confirmed that, on one hand, our model can achieve comparable or even better detection performance in various steganalytic scenarios due to the great adaptivity of the obtained network architecture. On the other hand, the experimental results also demonstrate that our proposed strategy is more efficient and can remove more redundancy compared with previous steganalytic network compression methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐写分析旨在揭示通过隐写术建立的隐蔽通信。在与隐写术的军备竞赛中，隐写分析已经从旧式的手工制作的特征集发展到深度学习架构。然而，最近的研究表明，现有的深度隐写分析模型存在大量冗余，导致存储和计算资源的巨大浪费。现有的模型压缩方法不能灵活地压缩剩余捷径块中的卷积层，从而不能获得令人满意的收缩率。在本文中，我们提出了STD-NET，一种用于图像隐写分析的无监督深度学习架构搜索方法。我们提出的策略将不受各种剩余连接的限制，因为该策略不改变卷积块的输入和输出通道的数量。我们提出了一个归一化的失真阈值来评估基本模型中每个卷积层的敏感度，以指导STD-NET以一种高效且无监督的方式压缩目标网络，并以较低的计算成本获得了两种不同形状的网络结构，而性能与原始网络结构相当。大量的实验表明，一方面，由于所获得的网络架构具有很强的自适应性，我们的模型可以在各种隐写分析场景中获得相当甚至更好的检测性能。另一方面，实验结果也表明，与以前的隐写分析网络压缩方法相比，我们提出的策略更有效，可以去除更多的冗余。
papers.title_zh: STD-NET：通过层次张量分解搜索图像切解深度学习架构

papers.title: Editorial: Software Reliability and Dependability Engineering
papers.authors: Zheng Zheng, Lorenzo Strigini, Nuno Antunes, Kishor S. Trivedi
papers.title_zh: 社论:软件可靠性和可信性工程

papers.title: Fault Injection for TensorFlow Applications
papers.authors: Niranjhana Narayanan, Zitao Chen, Bo Fang, Guanpeng Li, Karthik Pattabiraman, Nathan DeBardeleben
papers.abstract: As machine learning (ML) has seen increasing adoption in safety-critical domains (e.g., autonomous vehicles), the reliability of ML systems has also grown in importance. While prior studies have proposed techniques to enable efficient error-resilience (e.g., selective instruction duplication), a fundamental requirement for realizing these techniques is a detailed understanding of the application's resilience. In this work, we present TensorFI 1 and TensorFI 2, high-level fault injection (FI) frameworks for TensorFlow-based applications. TensorFI 1 and 2 are able to inject both hardware and software faults in any general TensorFlow 1 and 2 program respectively. Both are configurable FI tools that are flexible, easy to use, and portable. They can be integrated into existing TensorFlow programs to assess their resilience for different fault types (e.g., bit-flips in particular operations or layers). We use TensorFI 1 and TensorFI 2 to evaluate the resilience of 11 and 10 ML programs respectively, all written in TensorFlow, including DNNs used in the autonomous vehicle domain. The results give us insights into why some of the models are more resilient. We also measure the performance overheads of the two injectors, and present 4 case studies, two for each tool, to demonstrate their utility.
papers.title_zh: 张量流应用的故障注入
papers.abstract_zh: 随着机器学习(ML)在安全关键领域(例如，自动驾驶汽车)的应用越来越多，ML系统的可靠性也变得越来越重要。虽然先前的研究已经提出了实现有效的错误恢复能力的技术(例如，选择性指令复制)，但是实现这些技术的基本要求是对应用程序的恢复能力的详细理解。在这项工作中，我们提出了TensorFI 1和TensorFI 2，用于基于TensorFlow的应用程序的高级故障注入(FI)框架。TensorFI 1和2能够分别在任何通用TensorFlow 1和2程序中注入硬件和软件故障。两者都是灵活、易用和可移植的可配置FI工具。它们可以集成到现有的TensorFlow程序中，以评估它们对不同故障类型(例如，特定操作或层中的位翻转)的弹性。我们分别使用TensorFI 1和TensorFI 2来评估11和10 ML程序的弹性，这些程序都是用TensorFlow编写的，包括自动驾驶汽车领域使用的DNNs。这些结果让我们了解了为什么一些模型更有弹性。我们还测量了两个注入器的性能开销，并给出了4个案例研究，每个工具两个，以展示它们的效用。

papers.title: An Empirical Study of Fault Triggers in Deep Learning Frameworks
papers.authors: Xiaoting Du, Yulei Sui, Zhihao Liu, Jun Ai
papers.abstract: Deep learning frameworks play a key rule to bridge the gap between deep learning theory and practice. With the growing of safety- and security-critical applications built upon deep learning frameworks, their reliability is becoming increasingly important. To ensure the reliability of these frameworks, several efforts have been taken to study the causes and symptoms of bugs in deep learning frameworks, however, relatively little progress has been made in investigating the fault triggering conditions of those bugs. This paper presents the first comprehensive empirical study on fault triggering conditions in three widely-used deep learning frameworks (i.e., TensorFlow, MXNET and PaddlePaddle). We have collected 3,555 bug reports from GitHub repositories of these frameworks. A bug classification is performed based on fault triggering conditions, followed by the analysis of frequency distribution of different bug types and the evolution features. The correlations between bug types and fixing time are investigated. Moreover, we have also studied the root causes of Bohrbugs and Mandelbugs and investigated the important consequences of each bug type. Finally, the analysis of regression bugs in deep learning frameworks is conducted. We have revealed 12 important findings based on our empirical results and have provided 10 implications for developers and users.
papers.title_zh: 深度学习框架中错误触发因素的实证研究
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习框架在弥合深度学习理论和实践之间的差距方面发挥了关键作用。随着基于深度学习框架的安全和安全性关键应用的增长，它们的可靠性变得越来越重要。为了确保这些框架的可靠性，已经进行了一些努力来研究深度学习框架中错误的原因和症状，然而，在调查这些错误的故障触发条件方面取得了相对较少的进展。本文首次对三个广泛使用的深度学习框架(即TensorFlow、MXNET和PaddlePaddle)中的故障触发条件进行了全面的实证研究。我们已经从这些框架的GitHub库收集了3555个bug报告。基于故障触发条件进行缺陷分类，然后分析不同缺陷类型的频率分布和演化特征。研究了错误类型和修复时间之间的关系。此外，我们还研究了Bohrbugs和Mandelbugs的根本原因，并调查了每种bug类型的重要后果。最后，对深度学习框架中的回归错误进行了分析。基于我们的实证结果，我们揭示了12个重要的发现，并为开发者和用户提供了10个启示。

papers.title: An Incremental Approach for Understanding Collision Avoidance of an Industrial Path Planner
papers.authors: Xiao-Yi Zhang, Paolo Arcaini, Fuyuki Ishikawa
papers.abstract: Autonomous Driving Systems (ADSs) are complex systems that must consider different aspects such as safety, compliance to traffic regulations, comfort, etc. The relative importance of these aspects is usually balanced in a weighted cost function. However, there is generally no optimal set of weights, and different driving situations may require different weights values to guarantee a safe drive. Recent testing approaches can generate diverse driving scenarios in which different ADS configurations lead to various degrees of hazard. These tests need to be properly analyzed to improve the ADS's safety. In this paper, we propose an analysis approach that is able to assess the relation between the ADS configurations and the level of hazard that is obtained in some particular traffic situations. The approach uses fuzzification to partition ADS weights in different categories, and a spectrum-based analysis to identify which weights categories are related to hazard and safety. The occurrence of a hazard could be due to a single weight or to combinations of two or more weights. For scalability, the approach performs an incremental analysis, in which first single weights are considered, and then weight combinations of higher order. The approach has been applied to an industrial path planner.
papers.title_zh: 理解工业路径规划器避碰的增量方法
papers.abstract_zh: 自动驾驶系统(ADS)是复杂的系统，必须考虑不同的方面，如安全性、遵守交通法规、舒适性等。这些方面的相对重要性通常在加权成本函数中得到平衡。但是，通常不存在最佳的权重集，不同的驾驶情况可能需要不同的权重值来保证安全驾驶。最近的测试方法可以产生不同的驾驶场景，其中不同的ADS配置导致不同程度的危险。需要对这些测试进行适当的分析，以提高广告的安全性。在本文中，我们提出了一种分析方法，该方法能够评估在某些特定交通情况下获得的ADS配置和危险等级之间的关系。该方法使用模糊化将ADS权重划分为不同的类别，并使用基于频谱的分析来确定哪些权重类别与危险和安全相关。危险的发生可能是由于单一重量或两种或多种重量的组合。对于可伸缩性，该方法执行增量分析，其中首先考虑单个权重，然后考虑更高阶的权重组合。该方法已应用于工业路径规划。

papers.title: RGB Cameras Failures and Their Effects in Autonomous Driving Applications
papers.authors: Andrea Ceccarelli, Francesco Secci
papers.abstract: RGB cameras are one of the most relevant sensors for autonomous driving applications. It is undeniable that failures of vehicle cameras may compromise the autonomous driving task, possibly leading to unsafe behaviors when images that are subsequently processed by the driving system are altered. To support the definition of safe and robust vehicle architectures and intelligent systems, in this paper we define the failure modes of a vehicle camera, together with an analysis of effects and known mitigations. Further, we build a software library for the generation of the corresponding failed images and we feed them to six object detectors for mono and stereo cameras and to the self-driving agent of an autonomous driving simulator. The resulting misbehaviors with respect to operating with clean images allow a better understanding of failures effects and the related safety risks in image-based applications.
papers.title_zh: RGB摄像头故障及其在自动驾驶应用中的影响
papers.abstract_zh: RGB摄像头是自动驾驶应用中最相关的传感器之一。不可否认的是，车辆摄像头的故障可能会影响自动驾驶任务，当随后由驾驶系统处理的图像被更改时，可能会导致不安全的行为。为了支持安全可靠的车辆架构和智能系统的定义，本文定义了车辆摄像头的故障模式，并分析了影响和已知的缓解措施。此外，我们建立了一个软件库，用于生成相应的失败图像，并将它们提供给单声道和立体摄像机的六个对象检测器以及自动驾驶模拟器的自动驾驶代理。与干净图像相关的操作所导致的不当行为允许更好地理解基于图像的应用中的故障效应和相关的安全风险。

papers.title: Locating Anomaly Clues for Atypical Anomalous Services: An Industrial Exploration
papers.authors: Guoping Rong, Hao Wang, Shenghui Gu, Yangchen Xu, Jialin Sun, Dong Shao, He Zhang
papers.abstract: Continuity and steadiness are vital for services with massive users, which requires the anomalies of services should be detected and resolved in a timely manner. Our previous work proposed a tool, namely <italic>ImpAPTr (Impact Analysis based on Pruning Tree)</italic>, to identify the combination of multiple dimensional attributes as the clues leading to the root cause of service anomalies. However, <italic>ImpAPTr</italic> applies a threshold driven strategy, i.e., it needs to be triggered by a <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\geq 0.05\%$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>≥</mml:mo><mml:mn>0</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>05</mml:mn><mml:mo>%</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq1-3181143.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> drop of the success rate of the service calls (abbr. <italic>SRSC</italic>), which may face problems in an atypical yet pervasive situation in field application. For example, the combination of trivial anomalies (i.e., each causes a drop less than 0.05% to <italic>SRSC</italic>) can lead to a far more than 0.05% drop on <italic>SRSC</italic>. Besides, a suitable threshold is usually hard to be determined, etc. To address these problems, we propose a new method, namely <italic>ImpAPTr+</italic> in this paper to free the constraint of the 0.05% threshold. The basic idea is to involve time dimension and identify clues across multiple time intervals of data. We performed evaluation on three typical methods (i.e., <italic>ImpAPTr+</italic>, <italic>R-Adtributor</italic> and <italic>Squeeze</italic>) with both production environment dataset and simulation dataset. The former dataset is directly retrieved from the service monitoring data in <italic>Meituan</italic>, one of the largest on-line service providers worldwide. The latter dataset is fabricated also using the monitoring data from the same company. The results indicate: (1) <italic>ImpAPTr+</italic> outperforms previous approaches to a large degree in terms of accuracy. (2) Both <italic>ImpAPTr+</italic> and <italic>R-Adtributor</italic> are able to find proper clues within seconds. (3) <italic>ImpAPTr+</italic> tends to find proper clues with shorter time intervals (i.e., less data), which implies that the method is more suitable for near real-time monitoring scenarios.
papers.title_zh: 定位非典型异常服务的异常线索:工业探索
papers.abstract_zh: 对于拥有大量用户的服务来说，连续性和稳定性至关重要，这就要求及时发现和解决服务异常。我们之前的工作提出了一种工具，即< italic>ImpAPTr(基于剪枝树的影响分析)</italic >，用于将多维属性的组合识别为导致服务异常的根本原因的线索。但是，< italic>ImpAPTr</italic >采用阈值驱动策略，即它需要由< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ geq 0.05 \ % $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >≥</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 0 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >触发。</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 05 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo > % </MML:mo > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Zhang-ie Q1-3181143 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >服务调用成功率下降(缩写< italic >，</italic >)，在现场应用中可能面临非典型但普遍存在的问题。例如，微小异常的组合(即每个异常导致< italic>SRSC</italic >下跌不到0.05%)可能导致< italic>SRSC</italic >下跌超过0.05%。此外，合适的阈值通常难以确定，等等。为了解决这些问题，本文提出了一种新的方法，即< italic>ImpAPTr+</italic >来解除0.05%阈值的限制。其基本思想是涉及时间维度，并在多个时间间隔的数据中识别线索。我们使用生产环境数据集和模拟数据集对三种典型方法(即< italic>ImpAPTr+</italic > 、< italic > R-ad attributer </italic >和< italic>Squeeze</italic >)进行了评估。前一个数据集直接从< italic >美团</italic >(全球最大的在线服务提供商之一)的服务监控数据中检索。后一个数据集也是使用来自同一公司的监测数据制作的。结果表明:(1) <italic>ImpAPTr+</italic >在准确性方面在很大程度上优于以前的方法。(2)< italic > ImpAPTr+</italic >和< italic > R-ad attributer </italic >都能在几秒钟内找到合适的线索。(3) <italic>ImpAPTr+</italic >倾向于以更短的时间间隔(即，更少的数据)找到适当的线索，这意味着该方法更适合于接近实时的监控场景。

papers.title: SwissLog: Robust Anomaly Detection and Localization for Interleaved Unstructured Logs
papers.authors: Xiaoyun Li, Pengfei Chen, Linxiao Jing, Zilong He, Guangba Yu
papers.abstract: Modern distributed systems generate interleaved logs when running in parallel. Identifiers (ID) are always attached to them to trace running instances or entities in logs. Therefore, log messages can be grouped by the same IDs to help anomaly detection and localization. The existing approaches to achieve this still fall short meeting these challenges: 1) Log is solely processed in single components without mining log dependencies. 2) Log formats are continually changing in modern software systems. 3) It is challenging to detect latent performance issues non-intrusively by trivial monitoring tools. To remedy the above shortcomings, we propose SwissLog, a robust anomaly detection and localization tool for interleaved unstructured logs. SwissLog focuses on log sequential anomalies and tries to dig out possible performance issues. SwissLog constructs ID relation graphs across distributed components and groups log messages by IDs. Moreover, we propose an online data-driven log parser without parameter tuning. The grouped log messages are parsed via the novel log parser and transformed with semantic and temporal embedding. Finally, SwissLog utilizes an attention-based Bi-LSTM model and a heuristic searching algorithm to detect and localize anomalies in instance-granularity, respectively. The experiments on real-world and synthetic datasets confirm the effectiveness, efficiency, and robustness of SwissLog.
papers.title_zh: SwissLog:针对交错非结构化日志的健壮异常检测和定位
papers.abstract_zh: 现代分布式系统在并行运行时会生成交叉日志。标识符(ID)总是附加到它们上，以跟踪日志中正在运行的实例或实体。因此，日志消息可以按相同的id分组，以帮助异常检测和定位。实现这一点的现有方法仍然不能满足这些挑战:1)日志仅在单个组件中处理，而没有挖掘日志依赖性。2)日志格式在现代软件系统中不断变化。3)通过琐碎的监控工具非侵入性地检测潜在的性能问题是具有挑战性的。为了弥补上述缺点，我们提出了SwissLog，一个健壮的异常检测和定位工具，用于交错的非结构化日志。SwissLog关注日志序列异常，并试图挖掘出可能的性能问题。SwissLog跨分布式组件构建ID关系图，并按ID对日志消息进行分组。此外，我们还提出了一个无需参数调整的在线数据驱动的日志解析器。分组的日志消息通过新颖的日志解析器进行解析，并通过语义和时间嵌入进行转换。最后，SwissLog利用基于注意力的双LSTM模型和启发式搜索算法分别在实例粒度上检测和定位异常。真实数据集和合成数据集上的实验验证了SwissLog的有效性、高效性和鲁棒性。

papers.title: Does OpenBSD and Firefox's Security Improve With Time?
papers.authors: Jian Shi, Deqing Zou, Shouhuai Xu, Xianjun Deng, Hai Jin
papers.abstract: Ozment and Schechter (USENIX Security’2006) analyzed the evolution of OpenBSD vulnerabilities over the span of 7 years (1998-2005) and concluded that its security increases with age. In this paper, we extend their study by analyzing the evolution of OpenBSD vulnerabilities over the span of 22 years (1998-2020) and Firefox vulnerabilities over the span of 9 years (2011-2020). Our empirical study leads to a number of insights, including the following: both OpenBSD and Firefox get more secure (i.e., less vulnerable) with time, but today’s developers do not necessarily produce more secure code; OpenBSD and Firefox developers tend to make similar security mistakes, but Firefox vulnerabilities are easier to exploit; finally, Firefox’s vulnerability density is almost one order of magnitude higher than OpenBSD’s, meaning Firefox is more vulnerable.
papers.title_zh: OpenBSD和Firefox的安全性是否随着时间的推移而提高？
papers.abstract_zh: Ozment和Schechter (USENIX安全2006)分析了OpenBSD漏洞在7年(1998-2005)中的演变，并得出结论，它的安全性随着年龄的增长而增加。在本文中，我们通过分析OpenBSD漏洞在22年间(1998-2020年)和Firefox漏洞在9年间(2011-2020年)的演变来扩展他们的研究。我们的实证研究得出了许多见解，包括以下几点:随着时间的推移，OpenBSD和Firefox都变得更安全(即更不容易受到攻击)，但今天的开发人员不一定能生产出更安全的代码；OpenBSD和Firefox开发者往往会犯类似的安全错误，但是Firefox的漏洞更容易被利用；最后，Firefox的漏洞密度几乎比OpenBSD高一个数量级，意味着Firefox更容易受到攻击。

papers.title: Sorald: Automatic Patch Suggestions for SonarQube Static Analysis Violations
papers.authors: Khashayar Etemadi, Nicolas Harrand, Simon Larsén, Haris Adzemovic, Henry Luong Phu, Ashutosh Verma, Fernanda Madeiral, Douglas Wikström, Martin Monperrus
papers.abstract: Previous work has shown that early resolution of issues detected by static code analyzers can prevent major costs later on. However, developers often ignore such issues for two main reasons. First, many issues should be interpreted to determine if they correspond to actual flaws in the program. Second, static analyzers often do not present the issues in a way that is actionable. To address these problems, we present SORALD: a novel system that devise metaprogramming templates to transform the abstract syntax trees of programs and suggest fixes for static analysis warnings. Thus, the burden on the developer is reduced from interpreting and fixing static issues, to inspecting and approving full fledged solutions. SORALD fixes violations of 10 rules from SONARQUBE, one of the most widely used static analyzers for Java. We evaluate SORALD on a dataset of 161 popular repositories on GITHUB. Our analysis shows the effectiveness of SORALD as it fixes 65% (852/1,307) of the violations that meets the repair preconditions. Overall, our experiments show it is possible to automatically fix notable violations of the static analysis rules produced by the state-of-the-art static
papers.title_zh: sorald:sonar cube静态分析违规的自动补丁建议
papers.abstract_zh: 先前的工作表明，静态代码分析器检测到的问题的早期解决可以防止以后的主要成本。然而，开发人员经常忽略这些问题，主要有两个原因。首先，许多问题应该被解释，以确定它们是否对应于程序中的实际缺陷。其次，静态分析器通常不会以可操作的方式呈现问题。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了SORALD:一个新颖的系统，它设计元编程模板来转换程序的抽象语法树，并对静态分析警告提出修复建议。因此，开发人员的负担从解释和修复静态问题减少到检查和批准成熟的解决方案。SORALD修复了SONARQUBE的10个违反规则的问题，SONARQUBE是最广泛使用的Java静态分析器之一。我们在GITHUB上的161个流行库的数据集上评估了SORALD。我们的分析显示了SORALD的有效性，因为它修复了65% (852/1，307)满足修复前提条件的违规。总的来说，我们的实验表明，可以自动修复由最先进的静态分析产生的明显违反静态分析规则的情况

papers.title: Impact of Service Function Aging on the Dependability for MEC Service Function Chain
papers.authors: Jing Bai, Xiaolin Chang, Fumio Machida, Lili Jiang, Zhen Han, Kishor S. Trivedi
papers.abstract: The Multi-access Edge Computing (MEC) and Network Function Virtualization (NFV) integrated architecture is a key enabling platform for 5G to run multiple customized services in the form of service function chain (SFC) configured as an ordered set of service functions (SFs). However, memory-related software aging in the SF that can be exploited by attackers becomes a new threat to the dependability of MEC-SFC services. To provide dependable MEC-SFC services, proactive rejuvenation techniques to counteract the SF aging problem are essential. In this paper, we develop a semi-Markov model to quantitatively investigate the transient availability and steady-state dependability (availability and reliability) of MEC-SFC services. Our model enables the analysis of a MEC-SFC with any number of SFs, and can capture complex time-dependent behaviors of aging, failure, and recovery. The approximate accuracies of the presented model on dependability measures are comprehensively evaluated through comparative studies with simulation experiments. We then detect potential bottlenecks for a MEC-SFC system through sensitivity analysis and further analyze the impact of event-time interval distributions on steady-state dependability. Finally, we investigate the transient behaviors of a MEC-SFC service when varying system parameters during MEC-SFC operation.
papers.title_zh: 服务功能老化对MEC服务功能链可靠性的影响
