papers.abstract_zh: 多接入边缘计算(MEC)和网络功能虚拟化(NFV)集成架构是5G以服务功能链(SFC)的形式运行多种定制服务的关键支持平台，服务功能链配置为一组有序的服务功能(SFs)。然而，SF中与内存相关的软件老化会被攻击者利用，成为MEC-SFC服务可靠性的新威胁。为了提供可靠的MEC-SFC服务，抵消SF老化问题的主动更新技术是必不可少的。在本文中，我们开发了一个半马尔可夫模型来定量研究MEC-SFC服务的瞬时可用性和稳态可信性(可用性和可靠性)。我们的模型能够分析具有任意数量SF的MEC-SFC，并且能够捕捉老化、失效和恢复的复杂的时间相关行为。通过与仿真实验的对比研究，综合评价了所提出模型在可信性测度方面的近似精度。然后，我们通过灵敏度分析检测MEC-SFC系统的潜在瓶颈，并进一步分析事件-时间间隔分布对稳态可靠性的影响。最后，我们研究了MEC-SFC服务在MEC-SFC运行期间改变系统参数时的瞬态行为。

papers.title: Vulnerability Analysis of Chinese Digital Passwords Related to ATM PIN Using Deep Learning
papers.authors: Hongfang Shi, Wenying Zhang, Zimin Zhang, Dewen Ding
papers.abstract: Human-made digital passwords are a dominant form of ATM card authentication. However, it is vulnerable to guessing attacks. Unfortunately, previous studies have focused on letters-only passwords or passwords that include both letters and digits, and few empirical studies have been conducted on the security of digital passwords, let alone the regional differences in digital passwords. In this paper, we studied the vulnerability of pure six-digit passwords extracted from the leaked dataset of the Chinese website. We used the Pearson chi-square test to check whether each digit in the password obeyed a uniform distribution. We showed regional conventions for Chinese digital passwords. We proposed using a recurrent neural network (RNN) to model password resistance to guessing attacks and explore how different architectures and training methods impact the effectiveness of neural networks. The experimental results on five website datasets demonstrate the superior performance of the proposed approach over state-of-the-art deep learning techniques in terms of both learning efficiency and matching accuracy.
papers.title_zh: 基于深度学习的ATM PIN相关中文数字密码脆弱性分析
papers.abstract_zh: 人工数字密码是ATM卡认证的主要形式。但是，它容易受到猜测攻击。遗憾的是，以往的研究主要集中在纯字母密码或同时包含字母和数字的密码上，对数字密码安全性的实证研究很少，更不用说数字密码的地域差异了。本文研究了从中国网站泄露的数据集中提取的纯六位数密码的脆弱性。我们使用Pearson卡方检验来检查密码中的每个数字是否服从均匀分布。我们展示了中文数字密码的区域约定。我们建议使用递归神经网络(RNN)来模拟密码抵抗猜测攻击，并探索不同的架构和训练方法如何影响神经网络的有效性。在五个网站数据集上的实验结果表明，该方法在学习效率和匹配精度方面都优于当前最先进的深度学习技术。

papers.title: UC Secure Private Branching Program and Decision Tree Evaluation
papers.authors: Keyu Ji, Bingsheng Zhang, Tianpei Lu, Lichun Li, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Branching program (BP) is a DAG-based non-uniform computational model for L/poly class. It has been widely used in formal veriﬁcation, logic synthesis, and data analysis. As a special BP, a decision tree is a popular machine learning classiﬁer for its eﬀectiveness and simplicity. In this work, we propose a UC-secure eﬃcient 3-party computation platform for outsourced branching program and/or decision tree evaluation. We construct a constant-round protocol and a linear-round protocol. In particular, the overall (online + oﬄine) communication cost of our linear-round protocol is O ( d ( (cid:96) + log m + log n )) and its round complexity is 2 d − 1, where m is the DAG size, n is the number of features, (cid:96) is the feature length, and d is the longest path length. To enable eﬃcient oblivious hopping among the DAG nodes, we propose a lightweight 1-out-of- N shared OT protocol with logarithmic communication in both online and oﬄine phase. This partial result may be of independent interest to some other cryptographic protocols. Our benchmark shows, compared with the state-of-the-arts, the proposed constant-round protocol is up to 10X faster in the WAN setting, while the proposed linear-round protocol is up to 15X faster in the LAN setting.
papers.title_zh: UC安全私有分支程序和决策树评估
papers.abstract_zh: 分支程序(BP)是基于DAG的L/poly类的非均匀计算模型。它已广泛用于形式验证、逻辑综合和数据分析。作为一种特殊的BP，决策树因其eﬀectiveness和简单性而成为一种流行的机器学习分类器。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个UC-secure eﬃcient三方计算平台，用于外包分支程序和/或决策树评估。我们构造了一个恒定轮协议和一个线性轮协议。特别地，我们的线性循环协议的总(在线+ oﬄine)通信成本是O ( d ( (cid:96) + log m + log n))，并且它的循环复杂度是2d 1，其中m是DAG大小，n是特征的数量，(cid:96)是特征长度，d是最长路径长度。为了实现DAG节点间的eﬃcient不经意跳跃，我们提出了一个轻量级的n选1共享OT协议，该协议在在线和oﬄine阶段都具有对数通信。这个部分结果可能与其他一些密码协议无关。我们的基准测试表明，与现有技术相比，所提出的恒定轮次协议在WAN环境中的速度提高了10倍，而所提出的线性轮次协议在LAN环境中的速度提高了15倍。

papers.title: Nereus: Anonymous and Secure Ride-Hailing Service Based on Private Smart Contracts
papers.authors: Meng Li, Yifei Chen, Chhagan Lal, Mauro Conti, Fabio Martinelli, Mamoun Alazab
papers.abstract: Security and privacy issues have become a major hindrance to the broad adoption of Ride-Hailing Services (RHSs). In this article, we introduce a new collusion attack initiated by the Ride-Hailing Service Provider (RHSP) and a driver that could easily link the real riders and their anonymous requests (credentials). Besides this attack, existing work requires heavy computations to execute user matching, and it is challenging for riders to verify matching results. Meanwhile, a malicious driver may cancel an assigned ride order due to its short distance. To address these issues, we present a RHS system named Nereus to support collusion resistance, efficiency, verifiability, and accountability. First, we integrate a smart contract into a Software Guard Extensions (SGX) enclave to establish a private smart contract for collusion resistance. We use a Bloom filter to achieve efficient matching. Second, we leverage privacy-preserving range query and Merkle proofs to make matching results verifiable. Meanwhile, we adopt short group signatures to provide anonymous authentication and deposit commitments to hold the runaway driver accountable. We formally state and prove the security and privacy of Nereus. We build a prototype based on Ethereum and SGX to conduct extensive performance analysis in regard to gas costs, computational costs, and communication overhead. Experimental results show that Nereus significantly improves over existing schemes in terms of computational costs.
papers.title_zh: Nereus:基于私有智能合同的匿名安全叫车服务
papers.abstract_zh: 安全和隐私问题已经成为广泛采用打车服务(RHSs)的主要障碍。在本文中，我们介绍了一种由打车服务提供商(RHSP)和一名司机发起的新的共谋攻击，该攻击可以轻松地将真正的乘客和他们的匿名请求(凭据)联系起来。除了这种攻击，现有的工作需要大量的计算来执行用户匹配，并且对骑手来说验证匹配结果是具有挑战性的。同时，恶意的驾驶员可能由于其较短的距离而取消分配的乘车订单。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了一个名为Nereus的RHS系统来支持抗共谋、效率、可验证性和可问责性。首先，我们将智能合约集成到软件保护扩展(SGX)飞地中，以建立私有智能合约来抵抗共谋。我们使用布隆过滤器来实现有效的匹配。第二，我们利用隐私保护范围查询和Merkle证明来验证匹配结果。同时，我们采用短群签名来提供匿名认证和押金承诺，以追究逃跑司机的责任。我们正式声明并证明涅柔斯的安全性和隐私性。我们构建了一个基于以太坊和SGX的原型，对气体成本、计算成本和通信开销进行了广泛的性能分析。实验结果表明，Nereus在计算成本方面明显优于现有方案。

papers.title: Can We Mitigate Backdoor Attack Using Adversarial Detection Methods?
papers.authors: Kaidi Jin, Tianwei Zhang, Chao Shen, Yufei Chen, Ming Fan, Chenhao Lin, Ting Liu
papers.abstract: —Deep Neural Networks are well known to be vulnerable to adversarial attacks and backdoor attacks, where minor modifications on the input are able to mislead the models to give wrong results. Although defenses against adversarial attacks have been widely studied, investigation on mitigating backdoor attacks is still at an early stage. It is unknown whether there are any connections and common characteristics between the defenses against these two attacks. We conduct comprehensive studies on the connections between adversarial examples and backdoor examples of Deep Neural Networks to seek to answer the question: can we detect backdoor using adversarial detection methods. Our insights are based on the observation that both adversarial examples and backdoor examples have anomalies during the inference process, highly distinguishable from benign samples. As a result, we revise four existing adversarial defense methods for detecting backdoor examples. Extensive evaluations indicate that these approaches provide reliable protection against backdoor attacks, with a higher accuracy than detecting adversarial examples. These solutions also reveal the relations of adversarial examples, backdoor examples and normal samples in model sensitivity, activation space and feature space. This is able to enhance our understanding about the inherent features of these two attacks and the defense opportunities.
papers.title_zh: 我们可以使用对抗性检测方法来减少后门攻击吗？
papers.abstract_zh: —众所周知，深度神经网络容易受到敌对攻击和后门攻击，对输入的微小修改就能够误导模型给出错误的结果。尽管对抗攻击的防御已经被广泛研究，但是减轻后门攻击的研究仍处于早期阶段。对于这两种攻击的防御之间是否有任何联系和共同特征是未知的。我们对深度神经网络的对抗样本和后门样本之间的联系进行了全面的研究，以寻求回答以下问题:我们能否使用对抗检测方法来检测后门。我们的见解是基于这样的观察:在推理过程中，对立的例子和秘密的例子都有异常，与良性的例子有很大的区别。因此，我们修改了四个现有的对抗防御方法来检测后门的例子。广泛的评估表明，这些方法提供了对后门攻击的可靠保护，具有比检测敌对实例更高的准确性。这些解决方案还揭示了对抗样本、后门样本和正常样本在模型敏感度、激活空间和特征空间中的关系。这能够增强我们对这两种攻击的内在特征和防御机会的理解。

papers.title: Verifiable Homomorphic Secret Sharing for Low Degree Polynomials

HSS schemes cannot guarantee correct reconstruction, if some servers are malicious and provide wrong partial results. Recently, verifiable HSS (VHSS) has been introduced to achieve an additional property: (iii) any <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$t$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>t</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq9-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> colluding servers cannot persuade the client(s) to accept their partial results and reconstruct a wrong value. The property (iii) is usually achieved by the client verifying the servers’ partial results. A VHSS scheme is compact if the verification is substantially faster than locally computing <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$f(x_{1},\ldots,x_{n})$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>f</mml:mi><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:msub><mml:mi>x</mml:mi><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:msub><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mo>...</mml:mo><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:msub><mml:mi>x</mml:mi><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:msub><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq10-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Of the existing VHSS schemes for polynomials, some are not compact; the others are compact but impose very heavy workload on the servers, even for low degree polynomials (e.g., they are at least 4000× slower than the existing HSS schemes in order to evaluate polynomials of degree <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\leq 5$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>≤</mml:mo><mml:mn>5</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq11-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, which have many applications such as privacy-preserving machine learning). In this paper, we propose both a single-client VHSS (SVHSS) model and a multi-client VHSS (MVHSS) model. Our SVHSS allows a client to use a secret key to share its data among servers; our MVHSS allows multiple clients to share their data with a public key. For any integers <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$m,t>0$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>></mml:mo><mml:mn>0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq12-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, we constructed both an <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(m,t)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq13-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-SVHSS scheme and an <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(m,t)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq14-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-MVHSS scheme that satisfy the properties of (i)-(iii). Our constructions are based on level-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq15-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> homomorphic encryptions. The <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(m,t)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq16-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-SVHSS and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(m,t)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq17-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-MVHSS are compact and allow the computations of degree-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$d$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>d</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq18-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> polynomials for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$d\leq ((k+1)m-1)/t$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>d</mml:mi><mml:mo>≤</mml:mo><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mo>+</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>)</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>)</mml:mo><mml:mo>/</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq19-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$d\leq ((k+1)(m-t)-1)/t$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>d</mml:mi><mml:mo>≤</mml:mo><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mo>+</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>)</mml:mo><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>)</mml:mo><mml:mo>/</mml:mo><mml:mi>t</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq20-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, respectively. Experiments show that our schemes are much more efficient than the existing compact VHSS for low degree polynomials. For example, to compute polynomials of degree <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\leq 5$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>≤</mml:mo><mml:mn>5</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq21-3194321.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, our MVHSS scheme is at least 420× faster. By applying SVHSS and MVHSS, we may add verifiability to privacy-preserving machine learning (PPML) algorithms. Experiments show that the resulting schemes are at least 52× and 20× faster than the existing verifiable PPML schemes.

papers.title: An Adaptive IPM-Based HEVC Video Steganography via Minimizing Non-Additive Distortion
papers.authors: Jie Wang, Xuemei Yin, Yifang Chen, Jiwu Huang, Xiangui Kang
papers.abstract: Recently, almost all the proposed adaptive video steganographic schemes are based on minimizing an additive embedding distortion. However, they ignore the hard fact that the additive embedding distortion is not quite suitable for video steganography because of the interplay of cover elements in video steganography. In this article, an adaptive intra prediction mode based (IPM-based) video steganography is proposed by minimizing the non-additive distortion in HEVC. To reduce the complexity of minimizing the non-additive distortion, a multi-layered embedding structure combined with a proposed embedding distortion updating strategy is adopted to approximate the non-additive distortion in an additive form. First, all IPMs are decomposed into multiple layers based on the distortion drift graph to offer multi-layered embedding. Each IPM in the same layer is considered to be independent, and syndrome-trellis code (STC) can be applied to embed the message segment into each layer with an additive distortion function sequentially. Then, a distortion function composed of self-distortion and drift-distortion is proposed to initialize the distortion of modifying each IPM. Finally, after embedding the first message segment into the IPMs in the first layer with the initialized distortions, an embedding distortion updating strategy is applied to update the distortions of the IPMs in the remaining layers dynamically. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed adaptive IPM-based video steganography can achieve much better perceptual quality and security performance than the state-of-the-art.
papers.title_zh: 最小化非加性失真的自适应IPM HEVC视频隐写
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，几乎所有提出的自适应视频隐写方案都是基于最小化附加嵌入失真。然而，他们忽略了一个铁的事实，即由于视频隐写术中覆盖元素的相互作用，加性嵌入失真不太适合视频隐写术。通过最小化HEVC中的非加性失真，提出了一种基于自适应帧内预测模式的视频隐写算法。为了降低最小化非加性失真的复杂度，采用多层嵌入结构并结合嵌入失真更新策略，以加性形式逼近非加性失真。首先，基于失真漂移图将所有IPM分解为多层，以提供多层嵌入。同一层中的每个IPM被认为是独立的，并且可以应用校正子网格码(STC)以附加失真函数顺序地将消息段嵌入到每层中。然后，提出了一个由自失真和漂移失真组成的失真函数来初始化修改每个IPM的失真。最后，在利用初始化的失真将第一消息段嵌入到第一层的IPMs中之后，应用嵌入失真更新策略来动态地更新剩余层中的IPMs的失真。实验结果表明，所提出的基于自适应IPM的视频隐写技术能够获得比现有技术更好的感知质量和安全性能

papers.title: Collusion Detection and Trust Management for Indoor Navigation System With Crowdsourcing
papers.authors: Weiwei Li, Mi Wen, Zhou Su, Kuan Zhang
papers.abstract: The indoor navigation system supported by spatial crowdsourcing emerges as a promising application to provide customized location service for requesters. An important stage of crowdsourcing is to select trustworthy workers. Workers’ reputation, as an essential criterion of this selection, is usually evaluated by feedback ratings from requesters. However, the reputation in the crowdsourcing-based indoor navigation system is vulnerable to the collusion attack, that is malicious workers (i.e., attackers) collude with requesters to illegally increase reputation. In this paper, we propose a collusion detection scheme to distinguish attackers and provide a secure reputation mechanism. Specifically, we first identify collusive requesters categorized into three different levels according to their feedback rating behaviors. Then, the weighted logistic regression (WLR) is developed to distinguish the collusive requesters who provide exorbitant feedback ratings. Furthermore, we employ an outlying sequence detection based on the maximum mean discrepancy (MMD), to resist the multiple location queries initiated by the same collusive requester through analyzing the distribution distance. In addition, we propose a community detection algorithm, named Fastgreedy, to identify the collusion from many requesters. Finally, the extensive simulation results demonstrate that the proposed scheme can effectively detect collusive requesters and significantly outperform other methods.
papers.title_zh: 众包室内导航系统的共谋检测和信任管理
papers.abstract_zh: 空间众包支持的室内导航系统为用户提供个性化的定位服务。众包的一个重要阶段是选择值得信赖的工人。工人的声誉，作为这种选择的一个基本标准，通常由请求者的反馈评级来评估。然而，基于众包的室内导航系统中的信誉容易受到合谋攻击，即恶意工作者(即攻击者)与请求者合谋非法增加信誉。在本文中，我们提出了一个共谋检测方案来区分攻击者并提供一个安全的信誉机制。具体来说，我们首先确定合谋请求者，根据他们的反馈评级行为将其分为三个不同的级别。然后，加权逻辑回归(WLR)被开发来区分提供过高反馈评级的共谋请求者。此外，我们采用基于最大平均差异(MMD)的离群序列检测，通过分析分布距离来抵抗由同一个共谋请求者发起的多个位置查询。此外，我们提出了一个社区检测算法，命名为Fastgreedy，以识别来自许多请求者的共谋。最后，大量的仿真结果表明，该方案能有效地检测出合谋请求者，性能明显优于其他方法。

papers.title: HyperPS: A Virtual-Machine Memory Protection Approach Through Hypervisor's Privilege Separation
papers.authors: Kunli Lin, Wenqing Liu, Kun Zhang, Bibo Tu
papers.abstract: The HostOS or Hypervisor constitutes the most important cornerstone of today's commercial cloud environment security. Unfortunately, the HostOS/Hypervisor, especially the QEMU-KVM architecture, is not immune to all vulnerabilities and exploitations. Recently, researchers have put forward lots of schemes to protect Virtual Machines under the compromised HostOS/Hypervisor. However, some of these schemes rely on special hardware facilities, while other (e.g., Nested Virtualization schemes) require large modification to current commercial cloud architecture. In this paper, we present a novel scheme, named HyperPS, to implement virtual machine protection under the compromised HostOS/Hypervisor. The key idea of HyperPS is to deprive the HostOS/Hypervisor of the privileges of managing the physical memory into an isolated and trusted execution environment. HyperPS does not rely customized hardware or extra processor privilege. HyperPS shares the same privilege with the HostOS. We have implemented a fully functional prototype based on the KVM in Intel x86_64 architecture. Experiment results show that HyperPS has achieved an acceptable trade-off between security and performance.
papers.title_zh: HyperPS:一种通过虚拟机管理程序权限分离的虚拟机内存保护方法
papers.abstract_zh: 主机操作系统或虚拟机管理程序构成了当今商业云环境安全性的最重要基石。不幸的是，主机操作系统/管理程序，尤其是QEMU-KVM架构，并不能避免所有的漏洞和利用。最近，研究人员提出了许多方案来保护受到危害的主机/管理程序下的虚拟机。然而，这些方案中的一些依赖于特殊的硬件设施，而其他方案(例如，嵌套虚拟化方案)需要对当前的商业云架构进行大的修改。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新的方案，命名为HyperPS，来实现在受到损害的主机操作系统/管理程序下的虚拟机保护。HyperPS的关键思想是剥夺主机操作系统/虚拟机管理程序在一个隔离和可信的执行环境中管理物理内存的特权。HyperPS不依赖定制的硬件或额外的处理器特权。HyperPS与主机共享相同的特权。我们在Intel x86_64架构中实现了一个基于KVM的全功能原型。实验结果表明，HyperPS在安全性和性能之间取得了可接受的平衡。

papers.title: Towards Robust Fingerprinting of Relational Databases by Mitigating Correlation Attacks
papers.authors: Tianxi Ji, Erman Ayday, Emre Yilmaz, Pan Li
papers.abstract: Database fingerprinting is widely adopted to prevent unauthorized data sharing and identify the source of data leakages. Although existing schemes are robust against common attacks, their robustness degrades significantly if attackers utilize inherent correlations among database entries. In this paper, we demonstrate the vulnerability of existing schemes by identifying different correlation attacks: column-wise correlation attack, row-wise correlation attack, and their integration. We provide robust fingerprinting against these attacks by developing mitigation techniques, which can work as post-processing steps for any off-the-shelf database fingerprinting schemes and preserve the utility of databases. We investigate the impact of correlation attacks and the performance of mitigation techniques using a real-world database. Our results show (i) high success rates of correlation attacks against existing fingerprinting schemes (e.g., integrated correlation attack can distort 64.8% fingerprint bits by just modifying 14.2% entries in a fingerprinted database), and (ii) high robustness of mitigation techniques (e.g., after mitigation, integrated correlation attack can only distort 3% fingerprint bits). Additionally, the mitigation techniques effectively alleviate correlation attacks even if (i) attackers have access to correlation models directly computed from the original database, while the database owner uses inaccurate correlation models, (ii) or attackers utilize higher order of correlations than the database owner.
papers.title_zh: 通过减轻相关性攻击实现关系数据库的鲁棒指纹识别
papers.abstract_zh: 数据库指纹被广泛用于防止未经授权的数据共享和识别数据泄漏的来源。尽管现有方案对常见攻击具有鲁棒性，但是如果攻击者利用数据库条目之间的内在相关性，则它们的鲁棒性会显著降低。在本文中，我们通过识别不同的相关攻击来证明现有方案的脆弱性:列相关攻击、行相关攻击以及它们的结合。我们通过开发缓解技术来提供针对这些攻击的健壮的指纹识别，这些技术可以作为任何现成的数据库指纹识别方案的后处理步骤，并保留数据库的效用。我们使用真实世界的数据库调查了相关性攻击的影响和缓解技术的性能。我们的结果显示(I)针对现有指纹方案的相关攻击的高成功率(例如，集成相关攻击仅通过修改指纹数据库中14.2%的条目就可以扭曲64.8%的指纹比特)，以及(ii)缓解技术的高鲁棒性(例如，在缓解之后，集成相关攻击只能扭曲3%的指纹比特)。此外，即使(I)攻击者有权访问直接从原始数据库计算的相关性模型，而数据库所有者使用不准确的相关性模型，(ii)或攻击者利用比数据库所有者更高阶的相关性，减轻技术也能有效地减轻相关性攻击。

papers.title: FeSA: Automatic Federated Swarm Attestation on Dynamic Large-Scale IoT Devices
papers.authors: Boyu Kuang, Anmin Fu, Yansong Gao, Yuqing Zhang, Jianying Zhou, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Swarm attestation, as an important branch of Remote Attestation (RA), enables a trusted party (verifier) to verify the security states of multiple devices (provers) in a large network (swarm) simultaneously via a challenge-response mechanism. However, swarm attestation suffers from significant redundancy overhead since all devices in the swarm need to be attested in each attestation round. Besides, it faces challenges such as verifier-impersonation Denial of Service (DoS) attacks, highly dynamic networks, transient & self-relocating malware, and Time-Of-Check-Time-Of-Use (TOCTOU) attacks. In this paper, considering not only the detection accuracy but also the privacy of swarm owners in real Internet of Things (IoT) scenarios, we propose an Automatic Federated Swarm Attestation scheme (FeSA). Under this scheme, we design a federated-learning-based automatic swarm attestation protocol that enables the verifiers to identify the suspicious devices by a neural network model and then attest them. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first scheme to apply a federated learning method to RA, ruling out the redundancy attestation rounds while preserving data privacy. The FeSA redesigns the interaction model of RA by a challenge-query mechanism to reduce the overhead of an individual device to a constant. In order to evaluate our scheme, we first set up a smart office environment with 12 types of smart IoT devices for real-world data collection up to 21 days. Based on the real dataset, we demonstrate that FeSA can indeed identify the compromised IoT devices while reducing redundancy. We further simulate large-scale swarms of up to 1,000,000 devices to validate the efficiency of FeSA in large-scale swarms. Last, the security analysis proves the ability of FeSA to resist various attacks.
papers.title_zh: FeSA:动态大规模物联网设备上的自动联邦群体证明
papers.abstract_zh: 群证明是远程证明的一个重要分支，它允许可信方(验证者)通过挑战-应答机制同时验证大型网络(群)中多个设备(证明者)的安全状态。然而，群证明遭受显著的冗余开销，因为群中的所有设备需要在每个证明回合中被证明。此外，它还面临着验证者假冒拒绝服务(DoS)攻击、高度动态的网络、瞬时和自我转移恶意软件以及检查时间使用时间(TOCTOU)攻击等挑战。在本文中，我们不仅考虑了检测的准确性，还考虑了真实物联网场景中群所有者的隐私性，提出了一种自动联合群证明方案(FeSA)。在此方案下，我们设计了一个基于联邦学习的自动群体证明协议，使得验证者能够通过神经网络模型识别可疑设备，并对其进行证明。据我们所知，这是第一个将联合学习方法应用于RA的方案，排除了冗余证明循环，同时保护了数据隐私。FeSA通过挑战查询机制重新设计了RA的交互模型，将单个设备的开销降低到一个常数。为了评估我们的方案，我们首先用12种智能物联网设备建立了一个智能办公环境，用于长达21天的真实世界数据收集。基于真实数据集，我们证明了FeSA确实可以识别受损的物联网设备，同时减少冗余。我们进一步模拟了多达1，000，000台设备的大规模集群，以验证FeSA在大规模集群中的效率。最后，安全性分析证明了FeSA抵抗各种攻击的能力。

papers.title: A Novel Authentication Scheme Supporting Multiple User Access for 5G and Beyond
papers.authors: Chengzhe Lai, Yixiao Ma, Rongxing Lu, Yinghui Zhang, Dong Zheng
papers.abstract: The deployment of ultra-dense networks in the fifth-generation (5 G) network architecture can significantly improve the quality of wireless links, but this will cause frequent handovers of mobile users and increase authentication delays. Furthermore, the simultaneous influx of a large number of mobile users may cause serious network congestion. Aiming at these problems, this article proposes a novel authentication scheme supporting multi-user access, which fully considers the scenarios of intra-domain handover and inter-domain handover across AMF. Using the characteristics of the network architecture integrated with mobile edge computing (MEC) and software-defined networks (SDN), the user's moving path can be predicted in advance to speed up the handover process. Most importantly, the proposed scheme can perform secure, efficient and flexible mutual authentication and key agreement between the group and the core network by using aggregated message authentication codes with detecting functionality (AMAD) and contributory broadcast encryption technique. Through the use of BAN Logic and Scyther tool verification, the proposed scheme can not only realize multiple user authentication and key agreement, but also fulfill various security goals. Performance evaluations demonstrate that the proposed scheme has moderate computational and communication overhead, and lower transmission overhead compared with existing schemes, which can effectively reduce authentication delay.
papers.title_zh: 一种支持5G及以后多用户接入的新型认证方案
papers.abstract_zh: 在第五代(5 G)网络架构中部署超密集网络可以显著提高无线链路的质量，但这会造成移动用户的频繁切换，增加认证延迟。此外，大量移动用户的同时涌入可能会导致严重的网络拥塞。针对这些问题，本文提出了一种新的支持多用户接入的认证方案，该方案充分考虑了AMF域内切换和域间切换的场景。利用集成了移动边缘计算(MEC)和软件定义网络(SDN)的网络架构的特性，可以提前预测用户的移动路径，从而加快切换过程。最重要的是，该方案通过使用具有检测功能的聚合消息认证码(AMAD)和贡献式广播加密技术，可以在群组和核心网络之间进行安全、高效和灵活的相互认证和密钥协商。通过使用BAN逻辑和Scyther工具验证，该方案不仅可以实现多用户认证和密钥协商，还可以满足各种安全目标。性能评估表明，与现有方案相比，该方案具有适中的计算和通信开销，以及较低的传输开销，能够有效降低认证延迟。

papers.title: Achieving Revocable Attribute Group-Based Encryption for Mobile Cloud Data: A Multi-Proxy Assisted Approach
papers.authors: Jie Cui, Bei Li, Hong Zhong, Yan Xu, Lu Liu
papers.abstract: Although proxy-assisted revocable attribute-based encryption provides fine-grained privacy protection and reduces the decryption cost of data users, it inherits several disadvantages in outsourcing decryption. The decryption capability in outsourcing decryption is divided into two parts: the outsourcing transformation key and the user decryption key. The proxy server utilizes transformation keys to transform the ciphertext which can only be decrypted by the users who generated the transformation key. When multiple users with the same attributes request outsourcing transformation, the proxy server must do numerous transformation operations, increasing the computing overhead of the proxy server and the user request response time. To address the aforementioned issues, we propose a multi-proxy assisted revocable attribute group-based encryption (MP-RAGBE) scheme. We form a user group out of users who have the same attributes and send the transformation keys directly to the proxy server. Users in the same group can decrypt the transformed ciphertext, and only a small number of transformation keys need to be updated when revocation occurs. The security and experimental analyses show that the proposed scheme meets the defined security requirements while significantly reducing user request response time, the overhead of transformation key generation, transmission, and ciphertext transformation.
papers.title_zh: 实现移动云数据的可撤销属性组加密:一种多代理辅助的方法
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然代理辅助的可撤销属性加密提供了细粒度的隐私保护并降低了数据用户的解密成本，但它继承了外包解密的几个缺点。外包解密中的解密能力分为两部分:外包转换密钥和用户解密密钥。代理服务器利用转换密钥来转换只能由生成转换密钥的用户解密的密文。当多个属性相同的用户请求外包转换时，代理服务器必须做大量的转换操作，增加了代理服务器的计算开销和用户请求响应时间。为了解决上述问题，我们提出了一个多代理辅助的基于可撤销属性组的加密(MP-RAGBE)方案。我们将具有相同属性的用户组成一个用户组，并将转换密钥直接发送给代理服务器。同一组内的用户可以解密变换后的密文，发生撤销时只需要更新少量的变换密钥。安全性和实验分析表明，该方案在满足安全要求的同时，显著降低了用户请求响应时间、转换密钥生成、传输和密文转换的开销。

papers.title: Astraea: Anonymous and Secure Auditing Based on Private Smart Contracts for Donation Systems
papers.authors: Meng Li, Yifei Chen, Liehaung Zhu, Zijian Zhang, Jianbing Ni, Chhagan Lal, Mauro Conti
papers.abstract: Many regions are in urgent need of facial masks for slowing down the spread of COVID-19. To fight the pandemic, people are contributing masks through donation systems. Most existing systems are built on a centralized architecture which is prone to the single point of failure and lack of transparency. Blockchain-based solutions neglect fundamental privacy concerns (donation privacy) and security attacks (collusion attack, stealing attack). Moreover, current auditing solutions are not designed to achieve donation privacy, thus not appropriate in our context. In this work, we design a decentralized, anonymous, and secure auditing framework Astraea based on private smart contracts for donation systems. Specifically, we integrate a Distribute Smart Contract (DiSC) with an SGX Enclave to distribute donations, prove the integrity of donation number (intention) and donation sum while preserving donation privacy. With DiSC, we design a Donation Smart Contract to refund deposits and defend against the stealing attack the collusion attack from malicious collector and transponder. We formally define and prove the privacy and security of Astraea by using security reduction. We build a prototype of Astraea to conduct extensive performance analysis. Experimental results demonstrate that Astraea is practically efficient in terms of both computation and communication.
papers.title_zh: 义神星:基于私人智能合同的匿名安全审计捐赠系统
papers.abstract_zh: 许多地区急需口罩来减缓新冠肺炎的传播。为了抗击疫情，人们通过捐赠系统捐赠口罩。大多数现有系统都是建立在集中式架构上，这种架构容易出现单点故障并且缺乏透明度。基于区块链的解决方案忽略了基本的隐私问题(捐赠隐私)和安全攻击(共谋攻击、窃取攻击)。此外，当前的审计解决方案不是为实现捐赠隐私而设计的，因此不适合我们的环境。在这项工作中，我们设计了一个分散的，匿名的，安全的审计框架义神星基于私人智能合同捐赠系统。具体来说，我们将分发智能合同(DiSC)与SGX飞地相集成，以分发捐赠，证明捐赠数量(意向)和捐赠金额的完整性，同时保护捐赠隐私。利用DiSC协议，我们设计了一个捐赠智能契约来退还押金，并抵御窃取攻击和恶意收集者与应答者的合谋攻击。通过使用安全归约，我们正式定义并证明了义神星的隐私性和安全性。我们构建了一个义神星原型来进行广泛的性能分析。实验结果表明，义神星在计算和通信两方面都是有效的。

papers.title: PointerScope: Understanding Pointer Patching for Code Randomization
papers.authors: Mengfei Xie, Yan Lin, Chenke Luo, Guojun Peng, Jianming Fu
papers.abstract: Various fine-grained randomization schemes have been designed to increase the entropy of process space, while none of them can rise from an academic exercise to industrial deployment like Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR). One of the critical reasons is the incorrectness of randomization caused by the mismatch between their pointer collection capabilities and the high accuracy requirements of the pointer patching task. In this article, we present PointerScope, an accurate compile-time pointer collection scheme deriving from a group of novel observations. The success of PointerScope relies on the complete tracing of the pointer generation process, including the compilation chain from compiler to static linker and the interface specification between them. From this view, PointerScope identifies four types of pointer-related static linker behaviors and clarifies five types of inherent addressing modes in the x86-64 architecture. The vague understanding of them causes the Compiler-assisted Code Randomization (CCR) to incorrectly collect pointers and patch them to the wrong values after randomization. Further, we measure the pointer collection capability of augmented binary analysis, the experimental results show that they can mitigate challenges from the traditional binary analysis by the given premises, but additional heuristics still need to be designed to support the fine-grained randomization.
papers.title_zh: 指针范围:了解代码随机化的指针修补
papers.abstract_zh: 已经设计了各种细粒度随机化方案来增加进程空间的熵，但是它们中没有一个能够像地址空间布局随机化(ASLR)那样从学术实践上升到工业部署。其中一个关键原因是，由于指针收集能力和指针修补任务的高精度要求之间的不匹配，导致随机化不正确。在本文中，我们介绍了PointerScope，这是一个精确的编译时指针收集方案，它来自一组新颖的观察结果。PointerScope的成功依赖于指针生成过程的完整跟踪，包括从编译器到静态链接器的编译链以及它们之间的接口规范。从这个角度来看，PointerScope确定了四种类型的与指针相关的静态链接器行为，并阐明了x86-64体系结构中五种类型的固有寻址模式。对它们的模糊理解导致编译器辅助代码随机化(CCR)错误地收集指针，并在随机化后将它们修补到错误的值。此外，我们测量了扩展二进制分析的指针收集能力，实验结果表明，在给定的前提下，它们可以缓解来自传统二进制分析的挑战，但是仍然需要设计额外的启发式算法来支持细粒度的随机化。

papers.title: An Escalated Eavesdropping Attack on Mobile Devices via Low-Resolution Vibration Signals
papers.authors: Yunji Liang, Yuchen Qin, Qi Li, Xiaokai Yan, Luwen Huangfu, Sagar Samtani, Bin Guo, Zhiwen Yu
papers.abstract: With the global prevalence of mobile devices, concerns about mobile devices regarding privacy breaches and data leakage are rising. Although sensor permissions are required for mobile applications to access outputs of built-in sensors, motion sensors (e.g., accelerometer and gyroscope) can be visited directly without permission requirement. Extant studies have shown that motion sensors may cause breaches of confidential information, such as passwords, digits, and voice-based commands, but whether it is possible to synthesize intelligible speech waveforms from low-resolution motion sensors has been understudied. In this article, we present an escalated side-channel attack of built-in speakers by synthesizing intelligible speech waveforms from low-resolution vibration signals. Opposite to traditional classification problems, we formulate this task as a generative problem and introduce an end-to-end synthesis framework dubbed as AccMyrinx to eavesdrop on the speaker via the low-resolution vibration signals. In AccMyrinx, we introduce the data alignment solution to provide the pair-wise voice-vibration sequences and present wavelet-based MelGAN (WMelGAN) with multi-scale time-frequency domain discriminators to generate intelligible acoustic waveforms. We conducted intensive experiments and demonstrated the feasibility of synthesizing the intelligible acoustic signals from low-resolution solid-borne vibration signals. Compared with existing synthesis solutions, our proposed solution outperforms the baselines in both subject and object metrics with the smoothed word error rate of 42.67% and the Mel-Cepstral distortion of 0.298. In addition, the quality of synthetic speeches could be impacted by several factors, including gender, speech rate, volume, and sampling frequency.
papers.title_zh: 通过低分辨率振动信号对移动设备的逐步升级的窃听攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 随着移动设备在全球的普及，人们对移动设备隐私泄露和数据泄露的担忧日益加剧。虽然移动应用程序需要传感器许可才能访问内置传感器的输出，但运动传感器(例如，加速度计和陀螺仪)可以在没有许可要求的情况下直接访问。现有的研究表明，运动传感器可能会导致密码、数字和基于语音的命令等机密信息泄露，但是否有可能从低分辨率运动传感器合成可理解的语音波形尚未得到充分研究。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一种升级的内置扬声器的侧声道攻击，通过从低分辨率振动信号合成可理解的语音波形。与传统的分类问题相反，我们将这个任务表述为一个生成问题，并引入一个端到端的合成框架AccMyrinx，通过低分辨率的振动信号窃听说话人。在AccMyrinx中，我们引入了数据对齐解决方案来提供成对的语音-振动序列，并提出了基于小波的MelGAN (WMelGAN)和多尺度时频域鉴别器来生成可理解的声波波形。我们进行了大量的实验，并证明了从低分辨率固体振动信号合成可理解的声学信号的可行性。与现有的合成解决方案相比，我们提出的解决方案在主客观指标上都优于基线，平滑字错误率为42.67%，Mel倒谱失真为0.298。此外，合成语音的质量会受到几个因素的影响，包括性别、语速、音量和采样频率。

papers.title: On the Detection of Smart, Self-Propagating Internet Worms
papers.authors: Jun Li, Devkishen Sisodia, Shad Stafford
papers.abstract: —Self-propagating worms can infect millions of computers on the Internet in just several minutes. As witnessed by the recent Mirai and WannaCry worms, worm attacks are real, destructive, and continue to persist. Although many worm detectors exist, most that we studied suffer from three drawbacks: none systematically consider countermeasures from worm authors, potentially causing low effectiveness against evasive worms; all focus on outbound worms leaving a network, leaving their efﬁcacy against inbound worms entering a network unanswered; and many require bi-directional trafﬁc to detect worms, making their placement on the Internet inﬂexible. We therefore revisit worm detection in this paper, while avoiding the aforementioned drawbacks of existing work. We describe our design of SWORD, a new worm detector that focuses on the fundamental behavior of worms. It includes two complementary modules to monitor connections from and to a protected network, with one module monitoring burst durations and the other ensuring quiescent periods. Via extensive experiments using both simulated worm trafﬁc and a real-world Mirai worm trace, we demonstrate that SWORD is superior to existing detectors at not only detecting both classic and evasive outbound worms, but also inbound worms, especially those that are superspreading or surreptitious.
papers.title_zh: 智能自传播网络蠕虫的检测
papers.abstract_zh: —自我传播的蠕虫可以在几分钟内感染互联网上数百万台计算机。正如最近的Mirai未来组合和WannaCry蠕虫所见证的那样，蠕虫攻击是真实的、破坏性的，并且会继续存在。尽管存在许多蠕虫检测器，但我们研究的大多数都有三个缺点:没有一个系统地考虑蠕虫作者的对策，这可能导致对逃避性蠕虫的低效率；所有这些都集中在离开网络的出站蠕虫上，而对进入网络的入站蠕虫的有效性却没有答案；许多应用需要双向流量来检测蠕虫，这使得它们在互联网上的放置变得不灵活。因此，我们在本文中重新讨论蠕虫检测，同时避免现有工作的上述缺点。我们描述了SWORD的设计，它是一个新的蠕虫检测器，主要研究蠕虫的基本行为。它包括两个互补模块，用于监控进出受保护网络的连接，一个模块监控突发持续时间，另一个模块确保静止周期。通过使用模拟蠕虫流量和真实世界Mirai未来组合蠕虫跟踪的大量实验，我们证明了SWORD不仅在检测传统和规避出站蠕虫方面优于现有检测器，而且在检测入站蠕虫方面也优于现有检测器，尤其是那些超级传播或秘密传播的蠕虫。

papers.title: Timing Analysis of CAN FD for Security-Aware Automotive Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Yong Xie, Gang Zeng, Ryo Kurachi, Fu Xiao, Hiroaki Takada, Shiyan Hu
papers.abstract: The CAN FD emerges as a promising CAN technology inside the ACPS due to its advantages of high data-phase bit-rate and message payload. HSM based security solution is recommended by auto industry to protect CAN FD from potential security attacks, but it induces new challenges on timing analysis of CAN FD messages, which is left open in the literature. This article develops the first security-aware system model to describe the processing of CAN FD messages, and presents a new WCRT analysis to bound the interference induced by security-critical messages. We give the theoretical proof that our WCRT analysis can upper bound the response time of CAN FD messages. Using a small message set, we show that the WCRT computed by our new analysis is only 14% percent higher than the true WCRT obtained from an exhaustive search based simulator. By comparing with existing method, the number of impacted messages increases along with the increasing number of security critical messages, and for the two typical CAN FD systems, the percentage of WCRT increase varies from 12.43% to 14.57% and 7.0% to 10.89%, respectively; the percentage of WCRT decrease varies from 3.29% to 6.04% and 4.13% to 7.93%, respectively.
papers.title_zh: 安全感知汽车信息物理系统CAN FD的时序分析
papers.abstract_zh: CAN FD由于其高数据相位比特率和消息有效载荷的优点而成为ACPS内有前途的CAN技术。汽车行业推荐基于HSM的安全解决方案来保护CAN FD免受潜在的安全攻击，但是它对CAN FD消息的时序分析提出了新的挑战，这在文献中是公开的。本文开发了第一个安全感知系统模型来描述CAN FD消息的处理，并提出了一种新的WCRT分析来限制由安全关键消息引起的干扰。我们给出了理论证明，我们的WCRT分析可以上限的反应时间可以FD消息。使用一个小的消息集，我们表明，由我们的新分析计算的WCRT只比从基于穷举搜索的模拟器获得的真实WCRT高14%。与现有方法相比，受影响的消息数量随着安全关键消息数量的增加而增加，对于两个典型的CAN故障诊断系统，WCRT增加的百分比分别为12.43%至14.57%和7.0%至10.89%；WCRT下降的百分比分别从3.29%到6.04%和4.13%到7.93%不等。

papers.title: Optimizing Secure Decision Tree Inference Outsourcing
papers.authors: Yifeng Zheng, Cong Wang, Ruochen Wang, Huayi Duan, Surya Nepal
papers.abstract: Outsourcing decision tree inference services to the cloud is highly beneficial, yet raises critical privacy concerns on the proprietary decision tree of the model provider and the private input data of the client. In this paper, we design, implement, and evaluate a new system that allows highly efficient outsourcing of decision tree inference. Our system significantly improves upon the state-of-the-art in the overall online end-to-end secure inference service latency at the cloud as well as the local-side performance of the model provider. We first presents a new scheme which securely shifts most of the processing of the model provider to the cloud, resulting in a substantial reduction on the model provider’s performance complexities. We further devise a scheme which substantially optimizes the performance for encrypted decision tree inference at the cloud, particularly the communication round complexities. The synergy of these techniques allows our new system to achieve up to 8× better overall online end-to-end secure inference latency at the cloud side over realistic WAN environment, as well as bring the model provider up to 19× savings in communication and 18× savings
papers.title_zh: 优化安全决策树推理外包
papers.abstract_zh: 将决策树推理服务外包给云是非常有益的，但是会对模型提供者的专有决策树和客户的私有输入数据带来严重的隐私问题。在本文中，我们设计、实现并评估了一个新的系统，该系统允许高效地外包决策树推理。我们的系统显著改善了云上的整体在线端到端安全推理服务延迟以及模型提供者的本地端性能。我们首先提出了一个新的方案，它安全地将模型提供者的大部分处理转移到云中，从而大大降低了模型提供者的性能复杂性。我们还设计了一个方案，该方案极大地优化了云加密决策树推理的性能，特别是通信轮复杂度。这些技术的协同作用使我们的新系统在真实WAN环境的云端实现了高达8倍的整体在线端到端安全推理延迟，并为模型提供商节省了高达19倍的通信成本和18倍的成本

papers.title: FASHION: Functional and Attack Graph Secured HybrId Optimization of Virtualized Networks
papers.authors: Devon Callahan, Timothy Curry, Hazel Davidson, Heytem Zitoun, Benjamin Fuller, Laurent Michel
papers.abstract:
Maintaining a resilient computer network is a delicate task with conflicting priorities. Flows should be served while controlling risk due to attackers. Upon publication of a vulnerability, administrators scramble to manually mitigate risk before a patch is available. Tools exist to check network reachability (Khurshid et al., NSDI 2013) and risk using (probabilistic) attack graphs (Sheyner et al., IEEE S\&P 2002). These tools are not designed to fashion configurations that simultaneously satisfy multiple properties. 
We introduce FASHION: a linear optimizer that \emph{fashions} network configurations to balance functionality and security requirements. FASHION formalizes functionality as a multi-commodity flow problem with side-constraints. FASHION formulates security as the average of 1) the risk of the connected component in the attack graph and 2) the highest probability path in the attack graph. These measures approximate the risk in a probabilistic attack graph (Wang et al., Network Security Metrics 2017). FASHION outputs a set of software-defined networking rules consumable by a Frenetic controller (Foster et al., ICFP 2011). The approximation linearly combines two measures. One measure is the impact of the set of nodes the attacker can reach in the attack graph (ignoring probability). The second is the maximum probability path in the attack graph. 
FASHION is evaluated on data center networks with up to 649 devices, usually outputting a solution in under 30 minutes. FASHION allows an enterprise to automatically reconfigure their network upon a change in functionality (shift in user demand) or security (publication or patching of a vulnerability).
papers.title_zh: 时尚:虚拟化网络的功能和攻击图安全混合优化
papers.abstract_zh:
维护一个有弹性的计算机网络是一项微妙的任务，各种优先级相互冲突。应该在控制攻击者带来的风险的同时为流提供服务。漏洞发布后，管理员争相在补丁可用之前手动降低风险。有工具可以检查网络的可达性(Khurshid等人，NSDI 2013年)和使用(概率)攻击图的风险(Sheyner等人，IEEE S\&P 2002年)。这些工具并不是为了设计同时满足多种属性的配置。
我们引入了FASHION:一种线性优化器，它强调网络配置来平衡功能和安全需求。时尚将功能形式化为一个带有侧面约束的多商品流动问题。时尚将安全性定义为1)攻击图中连接组件的风险和2)攻击图中最高概率路径的平均值。这些措施近似于概率攻击图中的风险(王等，网络安全指标2017)。FASHION输出一组软件定义的网络规则，可供狂热的控制器使用(Foster等人，ICFP 2011)。近似线性地结合了两个度量。一个衡量标准是攻击者在攻击图中可以到达的节点集的影响(忽略概率)。二是攻击图中的最大概率路径。
FASHION在拥有多达649台设备的数据中心网络上进行评估，通常在30分钟内输出一个解决方案。时尚允许企业在功能(用户需求的变化)或安全(漏洞的公布或修补)发生变化时自动重新配置他们的网络。

papers.title: Correct-by-Design Interacting Smart Contracts and a Systematic Approach for Verifying ERC20 and ERC721 Contracts With VeriSolid
papers.authors: Keerthi Nelaturu, Anastasia Mavridou, Emmanouela Stachtiari, Andreas G. Veneris, Aron Laszka
papers.abstract: —Blockchain-based smart contracts enable the creation of decentralized applications, which often handle assets of considerable value. While the underlying platforms guarantee the correctness of smart-contract execution, they cannot ensure that the code of a contract is correct. Today, as evidenced by a number of recent security breaches, developers still have a hard time making contracts that work properly.Even though these incidents often exploit contract interaction, prior work on smart-contract verification, vulnerability discovery, and secure development typically considers only individual contracts in isolation. To address this gap, we introduce the V ERI S OLID framework for the formal verification of contracts that are specified using a abstract state machine based model with rigorous operational semantics. Our model-based approach allows developers to reason about and verify the behavior of a set of interacting contracts at a high level of abstraction. V ERI S OLID allows the generation of Solidity code that is functionally and behaviorally equivalent to verified models, which enables the creation of correct-by-design smart contracts. We additionally introduce a graphical notation (called deployment diagrams ) for specifying possible interactions between contract types. Based on this notation, we present a framework for the automated verification, generation, and deployment of contracts that conform to a deployment diagram. To demonstrate the applicability of V ERI S OLID , we translate existing Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) specifications to temporal properties for two of the most popular contract interfaces: ERC20 and ERC721. We also show you how to write code for the ERC20 and ERC721 interfaces in a way that is safe, and we do this by using V ERI S OLID . We evaluate our framework on 726 contracts that are currently deployed on the Ethereum blockchain, which include 267 ERC20 and 459 ERC721 contracts. Our experiments indicate that 18% of ERC20 contracts and 4% of ERC721 contracts fail to satisfy the EIP specifications. contracts, Verification, Solidity, EIP, ERC20, ERC721, Ethereum
papers.title_zh: 通过VeriSolid验证ERC20和ERC721合同的设计正确的交互式智能合同和系统方法
papers.abstract_zh: —基于区块链的智能合同支持创建分散式应用程序，这些应用程序通常处理价值可观的资产。虽然底层平台保证智能合约执行的正确性，但它们不能确保合约的代码是正确的。今天，正如最近的一些安全漏洞所证明的那样，开发人员仍然很难制定出正常工作的合同。尽管这些事件经常利用契约交互，但智能契约验证、漏洞发现和安全开发的前期工作通常只孤立地考虑单个契约。为了解决这个问题，我们引入了V . ERI的OLID框架来对契约进行形式化验证，该框架使用基于抽象状态机的模型和严格的操作语义来指定。我们基于模型的方法允许开发人员在高抽象层次上推理和验证一组交互契约的行为。ERI的OLID允许生成在功能和行为上等同于验证模型的可靠性代码，这使得设计正确的智能合同的创建成为可能。我们另外引入了一个图形化的符号(称为部署图),用于指定契约类型之间可能的交互。基于这种符号，我们提出了一个框架，用于自动验证、生成和部署符合部署图的契约。为了证明V . ERI的OLID的适用性，我们将现有的以太坊改进建议(EIP)规范转化为两个最流行的契约接口的时态属性:ERC20和ERC721。我们还将向您展示如何以安全的方式为ERC20和ERC721接口编写代码，我们是通过使用V . ERI的OLID来完成的。我们在区块链以太坊上部署的726份合同上评估了我们的框架，其中包括267份ERC20和459份ERC721合同。我们的实验表明，18%的ERC20合约和4%的ERC721合约不符合EIP规范。合同，验证，可靠性，EIP，ERC20，ERC721，以太坊

papers.title: SpADe: Multi-Stage Spam Account Detection for Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Federico Concone, Giuseppe Lo Re, Marco Morana, Sajal K. Das
papers.abstract: In recent years, Online Social Networks (OSNs) have radically changed the way people communicate. The most widely used platforms, such as Facebook, Youtube, and Instagram, claim more than one billion monthly active users each. Beyond these, news-oriented micro-blogging services, e.g., Twitter, are daily accessed by more than 120 million users sharing contents from all over the world. Unfortunately, legitimate users of the OSNs are mixed with malicious ones, which are interested in spreading unwanted, misleading, harmful, or discriminatory content. Spam detection in OSNs is generally approached by considering the characteristics of the account under analysis, its connection with the rest of the network, as well as data and metadata representing the content shared. However, obtaining all this information can be computationally expensive, or even unfeasible, on massive networks. Driven by these motivations, in this article we propose SpADe, a multi-stage Spam Account Detection algorithm with reject option, whose purpose is to exploit less costly features at the early stages, while progressively extracting more complex information only for those accounts that are difficult to classify. Experimental evaluation shows the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm compared to single-stage approaches, which are much more complex in terms of features processing and classification time.
papers.title_zh: SpADe:在线社交网络的多阶段垃圾邮件账户检测
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，在线社交网络从根本上改变了人们的交流方式。使用最广泛的平台，如脸书、Youtube和Instagram，每个都声称有超过10亿的月活跃用户。除此之外，每天有超过1.2亿用户访问以新闻为导向的微博服务，如Twitter，分享来自世界各地的内容。不幸的是，osn的合法用户与恶意用户混杂在一起，恶意用户对传播不想要的、误导的、有害的或歧视性的内容感兴趣。OSNs中的垃圾邮件检测通常通过考虑被分析账户的特征、其与网络其余部分的连接以及表示共享内容的数据和元数据来进行。然而，在大规模网络上，获取所有这些信息在计算上可能是昂贵的，甚至是不可行的。在这些动机的驱动下，我们在本文中提出了SpADe，一种带拒绝选项的多阶段垃圾邮件帐户检测算法，其目的是在早期阶段利用成本较低的功能，同时仅针对那些难以分类的帐户逐步提取更复杂的信息。实验评估表明，与在特征处理和分类时间方面复杂得多的单阶段方法相比，所提出的算法是有效的。

papers.title: Device-Independent Smartphone Eavesdropping Jointly Using Accelerometer and Gyroscope
papers.authors: Ming Gao, Yajie Liu, Yike Chen, Yimin Li, Zhongjie Ba, Xian Xu, Jinsong Han, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Eavesdropping via inertial measurement units (IMUs) has brought growing concerns over smartphone users’ privacy. In such attacks, adversaries utilize IMUs, including accelerometers and gyroscopes, which require zero permissions for access to acquire speeches. A common countermeasure is to limit sampling rates (within 200 Hz) to reduce overlap of vocal fundamental bands (85<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sim$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mo>∼</mml:mo></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="han-ieq1-3193130.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>255 Hz) and inertial measurements (0<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sim$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mo>∼</mml:mo></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="han-ieq2-3193130.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>100 Hz). Nevertheless, we observe that IMUs sampling below 200 Hz still record adequate speech-related information because of aliasing distortions. Accordingly, we propose a practical side-channel attack, namely <italic>InertiEAR</italic>, to break the defense of sampling rate restriction on the zero-permission eavesdropping. It leverages accelerometers and gyroscopes jointly to eavesdrop on both top and bottom speakers in smartphones. We exploit coherence between responses of the built-in accelerometer and gyroscope using a mathematical model. The coherence allows precise segmentation without manual assistance. We also mitigate the impact of hardware diversity and achieve better device-independent performance than existing approaches that have to massively increase training data from different smartphones for a scalable network model. These two advantages re-enable zero-permission attacks but also extend the attacking surface and endangering degree to off-the-shelf smartphones. <italic>InertiEAR</italic> achieves the recognition accuracy of 78.8% with the cross-device accuracy of up to 60.9% among 12 smartphones.
papers.title_zh: 使用加速度计和陀螺仪联合窃听与设备无关的智能手机
papers.abstract_zh: 通过惯性测量单元(IMU)进行窃听已经引起了人们对智能手机用户隐私的日益担忧。在这种攻击中，对手利用IMU，包括加速度计和陀螺仪，无需任何权限即可获取语音。一种常见的对策是限制采样速率(200 Hz以内)以减少人声基频波段的重叠(85 < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ sim $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mo >∩</MML:mo > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Han-ie Q1-3193130 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > 255Hz然而，我们观察到，由于混叠失真，低于200 Hz的IMUs采样仍然可以记录足够的语音相关信息。据此，我们提出了一种实用的边信道攻击，即< italic > inertia ear </italic >，来突破零许可窃听的采样率限制的防御。它利用加速度计和陀螺仪来窃听智能手机顶部和底部的扬声器。我们利用数学模型，利用内置加速度计和陀螺仪响应之间的一致性。相干性允许在没有人工辅助的情况下进行精确分割。我们还减轻了硬件多样性的影响，并实现了比现有方法更好的设备无关性能，现有方法必须为可扩展的网络模型大量增加来自不同智能手机的训练数据。这两个优点重新启用了零权限攻击，但也将攻击面和危害程度扩展到了现成的智能手机。< italic>InertiEAR</italic >在12款智能手机中实现了78.8%的识别准确率，跨设备准确率高达60.9%。

papers.title: Behavior-Based Anomaly Detection in Log Data of Physical Access Control Systems
papers.authors: Florian Skopik, Markus Wurzenberger, Georg Höld, Max Landauer, Walter Kuhn
papers.abstract: Behavior-based anomaly detection (AD) approaches for enterprise-IT security are not easily applicable to other domains, such as embedded devices and IoT nodes in cyber-physical systems. AD approaches are usually highly optimized for specific purposes, tightly bound to domain-specific technologies and rely on a specific syntax of investigated data. Data from cyber-physical systems is however highly diverse, often poorly documented and not easily ingested for automated analysis. AECID provides an anomaly detection approach, that monitors unstructured textual event data (i.e., log data), and implements self-learning for autonomous operation. A parser generator establishes a model of normal system behavior on top of observed events, which then can be leveraged to detect anomalies as deviations from that baseline. The unsupervised anomaly detection approaches of AECID apply machine learning techniques to perform sequence analysis, correlation analysis and statistical tests of events represented in log data. This paper discusses AECID's applicability in a building security system use case. A proof of concept demonstrates the effective detection of anomalies in log data of a building access control system stemming from card misuse, including stolen access cards and cloned cards.
papers.title_zh: 基于行为的物理访问控制系统日志数据异常检测
papers.abstract_zh: 用于企业IT安全的基于行为的异常检测(AD)方法不容易应用于其他领域，如信息物理系统中的嵌入式设备和物联网节点。AD方法通常针对特定目的进行了高度优化，与特定领域的技术紧密结合，并依赖于特定的调查数据语法。然而，来自网络物理系统的数据是高度多样化的，通常缺乏记录，并且不容易进行自动分析。AECID提供了一种异常检测方法，该方法监控非结构化文本事件数据(即日志数据)，并实现自主操作的自学习。解析器生成器在观察到的事件之上建立正常系统行为的模型，然后可以利用该模型来检测偏离基线的异常。AECID的无监督异常检测方法应用机器学习技术来执行日志数据中表示的事件的序列分析、相关性分析和统计测试。本文讨论了AECID在建筑安全系统用例中的适用性。一个概念验证演示了如何有效地检测建筑物出入控制系统的日志数据中因卡滥用(包括被盗出入卡和克隆卡)而产生的异常。

papers.title: Leveraging Smart Contracts for Secure and Asynchronous Group Key Exchange Without Trusted Third Party
papers.authors: Victor Youdom Kemmoe, Yongseok Kwon, Rasheed Hussain, Sunghyun Cho, Junggab Son
papers.abstract: Group Key Exchange (GKE) is an important tool to develop secure multi-user applications such as group text messages, ad-hoc networks, and so on. Most of the currently deployed GKE schemes are synchronous, i.e., they require all the participants to be online during their execution. However, with more battery-powered devices being used in such applications, the synchronicity requirement is challenging to fulfill. To fill the gaps, asynchronous GKE schemes have been introduced in the literature. Nevertheless, the currently available asynchronous and synchronous GKE schemes rely on Trusted Third Parties (TTPs) for key establishment and management. To this end, reliance on TTPs is a serious shortcoming since TTPs are well known to be the single point of failure. Furthermore, the existing GKE schemes require participants to perform all computations, which can degrade the performance of resource-constrained devices such as Internet of Things (IoT) devices. To solve these problems, in this paper, we propose an asynchronous GKE scheme that uses blockchain and smart contracts to store the security keys-related material and reduce the computational load of the participants. Furthermore, our proposed scheme provides Perfect Forward Secrecy (PFS) and Post-Compromised Security (PCS). Our implementation on Ethereum shows that the proposed scheme can scale to more than 100 participants when combined with a distributed storage system.
papers.title_zh: 在没有可信第三方的情况下利用智能合约进行安全和异步的组密钥交换
papers.abstract_zh: 群组密钥交换(GKE)是开发安全多用户应用的重要工具，如群组短信、ad-hoc网络等。大多数当前部署的GKE方案是同步的，即，它们要求所有参与者在它们执行期间在线。然而，随着此类应用中使用越来越多的电池供电器件，同步性要求很难满足。为了填补空白，文献中已经引入了异步GKE方案。然而，当前可用的异步和同步GKE方案依赖可信第三方(TTP)来建立和管理密钥。为此，依赖TTP是一个严重的缺点，因为众所周知TTP是单点故障。此外，现有的GKE方案要求参与者执行所有计算，这会降低资源受限设备(如物联网设备)的性能。为了解决这些问题，本文提出了一个异步GKE方案，该方案使用区块链和智能合同来存储安全密钥相关的材料，并减少参与者的计算量。此外，我们提出的方案提供了完美的前向保密性(PFS)和后折衷安全性(PCS)。我们在以太坊上的实现表明，当与分布式存储系统结合时，所提出的方案可以扩展到超过100个参与者。

papers.title: Learn to Forget: Machine Unlearning via Neuron Masking
papers.authors: Zhuo Ma, Yang Liu, Ximeng Liu, Jian Liu, Jianfeng Ma, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Nowadays, machine learning models, especially neural networks, have became prevalent in many real-world applications. These models are trained based on a one-way trip from user data: as long as users contribute their data, there is no way to withdraw. To this end, machine unlearning becomes a popular research topic, which allows the model trainer to unlearn unexpected data from a trained machine learning model. In this article, we propose the first uniform metric called forgetting rate to measure the effectiveness of a machine unlearning method. It is based on the concept of membership inference and describes the transformation rate of the eliminated data from “memorized” to “unknown” after conducting unlearning. We also propose a novel unlearning method called Forsaken. It is superior to previous work in either utility or efficiency (when achieving the same forgetting rate). We benchmark Forsaken with eight standard datasets to evaluate its performance. The experimental results show that it can achieve more than 90% forgetting rate on average and only causeless than 5% accuracy loss.
papers.title_zh: 学会遗忘:通过神经元掩蔽的机器遗忘
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，机器学习模型，尤其是神经网络，已经在许多现实世界的应用中变得普遍。这些模型是基于来自用户数据的单向行程进行训练的:只要用户贡献了自己的数据，就没有办法退出。为此，机器遗忘成为一个热门的研究课题，它允许模型训练器从已训练的机器学习模型中遗忘意外数据。在本文中，我们提出了第一个称为遗忘率的统一度量来衡量机器去学习方法的有效性。它基于隶属度推理的概念，描述了剔除数据在进行遗忘后从“记忆”到“未知”的转化率。我们还提出了一种新的遗忘方法，称为遗忘法。无论是效用还是效率(达到相同遗忘率时)都优于前人的工作。我们用八个标准数据集对遗忘者进行了基准测试，以评估其性能。实验结果表明，该方法平均遗忘率达到90%以上，准确率损失不到5%。

papers.title: Hawkeye: Eliminating Kernel Address Leakage in Normal Data Flows
papers.authors: Zeyu Mi, Zhi Guo, Fuqian Huang, Haibo Chen
papers.abstract: The confidentiality of the operating system kernel addresses is crucial to keeping the kernel secure from malicious users. To avoid leaking this position, researchers have proposed various techniques to defeat the exploits of abnormal data flows embedded in the kernel's memory safety loopholes, such as uninitialized memory read and buffer over-reads. However, this is far from complete. The kernel address can be leaked even in normal data flows without exploiting memory safety loopholes. We have designed a static analysis tool named Hawkeye to fill the gap. It searches for kernel address leakages in normal data flows that reveal the kernel address clues. Hawkeye precisely identifies the kernel addresses with minimum manual annotation and scales to analyze the whole kernel source code. It requires nearly ten times fewer memory resources and 40 times less inspection time than the state-of-the-art tool that analyzes kernel address leakage. Hawkeye unveils hundreds of leakages in various versioned kernels. It has even discovered 20 bugs in the mainline Linux kernel with the kernel pointer hashing mechanism already deployed and three bugs in FreeBSD. All the corresponding patches have been accepted by the developers.
papers.title_zh: 鹰眼:消除正常数据流中的内核地址泄漏
papers.abstract_zh: 操作系统内核地址的机密性对于防止恶意用户攻击内核至关重要。为了避免泄露这一位置，研究人员提出了各种技术来击败嵌入在内核内存安全漏洞中的异常数据流的利用，如未初始化的内存读取和缓冲区过度读取。然而，这还远远没有完成。即使在没有利用内存安全漏洞的正常数据流中，内核地址也可能被泄漏。我们设计了一个名为鹰眼的静态分析工具来填补这一空白。它在正常数据流中搜索内核地址泄漏，从而揭示内核地址线索。Hawkeye通过最少的人工注释精确地识别内核地址，并扩展到分析整个内核源代码。与分析内核地址泄漏的最先进工具相比，它需要的内存资源少了近十分之一，检查时间少了40倍。鹰眼揭露了各种版本内核中的数百个漏洞。它甚至在已经部署了内核指针散列机制的主线Linux内核中发现了20个错误，在FreeBSD中发现了3个错误。所有相应的补丁都已被开发者接受。

papers.title: Securing TEEs With Verifiable Execution Contracts
papers.authors: Guoxing Chen, Yinqian Zhang
papers.abstract: Recent works have demonstrated that trusted execution environments, such as Intel Software Guard Extensions, are vulnerable to various attacks from the privileged software, including side-channel attacks. Existing solutions, such as T-SGX, Déjà Vu, Cloak and Varys, detect side-channel attacks at runtime. But they are limited by design, because false detection is unavoidable in these detection methods and therefore any security policy developed atop these mechanisms has to tolerate some malicious operations to achieve practical false positive detection rates. In this article, we propose the concept of verifiable execution contracts, which request the privileged software to provide a benign execution environment for enclaves within which launching attacks becomes very difficult, if not impossible. Since the privileged software is untrusted, we design methods for verifying that the execution contracts are observed. With the proposed verifiable execution contracts, we analyzed how existing attacks could be mitigated.
papers.title_zh: 使用可验证的执行合同保护发球台
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的工作表明，可信执行环境，如英特尔软件保护扩展，容易受到特权软件的各种攻击，包括侧信道攻击。现有的解决方案，如T-SGX，似曾相识，斗篷和瓦里斯，在运行时检测侧信道攻击。但是它们受到设计的限制，因为在这些检测方法中错误检测是不可避免的，因此在这些机制上开发的任何安全策略都必须容忍一些恶意操作，以实现实际的错误肯定检测率。在本文中，我们提出了可验证执行契约的概念，它要求特权软件为飞地提供一个良性的执行环境，在飞地内发起攻击变得非常困难，甚至不可能。由于特权软件是不可信的，我们设计了验证执行契约被遵守的方法。利用提出的可验证执行契约，我们分析了如何减轻现有的攻击。

papers.title: Towards Neural Network-Based Communication System: Attack and Defense
papers.authors: Zuobin Xiong, Zhipeng Cai, Chunqiang Hu, Daniel Takabi, Wei Li
papers.abstract: Recent progress has witnessed the excellent success of neural networks in many emerging applications, such as image recognition, text classification, and speech analysis. In order to achieve secure communication, the utilization of neural networks has been realized yet has not raised sufficient research attention. In addition, the existing neural network-based communication system falls short due to its critical security flaws. In this article, we investigate the security vulnerabilities of the existing neural communication system. Based on our analysis, we design two kinds of attack models, including target man-in-the-middle attack and target fraud attack. After that, to improve the security performance of neural communication systems, we develop a new defense mechanism to facilitate two-way secure communication by separating secret key from plaintext and incorporating defensive loss into the training process. Moreover, we show the effectiveness of our proposed neural communication system via theoretical proof. Finally, we implement comprehensive real data experiments to evaluate the performance of our attack and defense methods from the aspects of classification accuracy, communication efficiency and communication qualify, which confirms the advantages of our proposed neural communication system compared with the state-of-the-art.
papers.title_zh: 走向基于神经网络的通信系统:攻击与防御
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的进展见证了神经网络在许多新兴应用中的巨大成功，例如图像识别、文本分类和语音分析。为了实现安全通信，已经实现了利用神经网络，但是还没有引起足够的研究关注。此外，现有的基于神经网络的通信系统由于其严重的安全缺陷而存在不足。在这篇文章中，我们调查了现有的神经通信系统的安全漏洞。基于我们的分析，我们设计了两种攻击模型，包括目标中间人攻击和目标欺诈攻击。之后，为了提高神经通信系统的安全性能，我们开发了一种新的防御机制，通过将密钥与明文分离并将防御损失纳入训练过程来促进双向安全通信。此外，我们通过理论证明展示了我们提出的神经通信系统的有效性。最后，我们进行了全面的真实数据实验，从分类精度、通信效率和通信质量三个方面评估了我们的攻击和防御方法的性能，证实了我们提出的神经通信系统相对于现有技术的优势

papers.title: Harnessing the x86 Intermediate Rings for Intra-Process Isolation
papers.authors: Hojoon Lee, Chihyun Song, Brent ByungHoon Kang
papers.abstract: Modern applications often involve the processing of sensitive information. However, the lack of privilege separation within the user space leaves sensitive application secrets such as cryptographic keys just as unprotected as a ”hello world” string. Cutting-edge hardware-supported security features are being introduced. However, the features are often vendor-specific or lack compatibility with older generations of the processors. The situation leaves developers with no portable solution to incorporate protection for the sensitive application component. We propose LOTRx86, a fundamental and portable approach for user-space privilege separation. Our approach creates a more privileged user execution layer called PrivUser by harnessing the underused intermediate privilege levels on the x86 architecture. The PrivUser memory space, a set of pages within process address space that are inaccessible to user mode, is a safe place for application secrets and routines that access them. We implement the LOTRx86 ABI that exports the privcall interface to users to invoke secret handling routines in PrivUser. This way, sensitive application operations that involve the secrets are performed in a strictly controlled manner. The memory access control in our architecture is privilege-based, accessing the protected application secret only requires a change in the privilege, eliminating the need for costly remote procedure calls or change in address space. We evaluated our platform by developing a proof-of-concept LOTRx86-enabled web server that employs our architecture to securely access its private key during an SSL connection. We conducted a set of experiments, including a performance measurement on the PoC on both Intel and AMD PCs, and confirmed that LOTRx86 incurs only a limited performance overhead.
papers.title_zh: 利用x86中间环实现进程内隔离
papers.abstract_zh: 现代应用通常涉及敏感信息的处理。然而，用户空间中缺乏特权分离，使得诸如加密密钥之类的敏感应用程序机密像“hello world”字符串一样得不到保护。先进的硬件支持的安全功能正在被引入。然而，这些功能通常是特定于供应商的，或者缺乏与老一代处理器的兼容性。这种情况使得开发人员没有可移植的解决方案来保护敏感的应用程序组件。我们提出了LOTRx86，这是一种基本的、可移植的用户空间特权分离方法。我们的方法通过利用x86架构上未充分利用的中间特权级别，创建了一个更有特权的用户执行层，称为PrivUser。PrivUser内存空间是用户模式不可访问的进程地址空间中的一组页面，是应用程序机密和访问它们的例程的安全位置。我们实现了LOTRx86 ABI，它将privcall接口导出给用户，以调用PrivUser中的秘密处理例程。这样，涉及机密的敏感应用程序操作以严格控制的方式执行。在我们的体系结构中，存储器访问控制是基于特权的，访问受保护的应用秘密只需要改变特权，消除了对昂贵的远程过程调用或地址空间改变的需要。我们通过开发一个支持LOTRx86的概念验证web服务器来评估我们的平台，该服务器使用我们的架构在SSL连接期间安全地访问其私钥。我们进行了一系列实验，包括在英特尔和AMD电脑上对PoC进行性能测量，并确认LOTRx86仅产生有限的性能开销。

papers.title: AGAPECert: An Auditable, Generalized, Automated, Privacy-Enabling Certification Framework With Oblivious Smart Contracts
papers.authors: Servio Palacios, Aaron Ault, James V. Krogmeier, Bharat K. Bhargava, Christopher G. Brinton
papers.abstract: —This paper introduces AGAPECert, an Auditable, Generalized, Automated, Privacy-Enabling, Certiﬁcation framework capable of performing auditable computation on private data and reporting real-time aggregate certiﬁcation status without disclosing underlying private data. AGAPECert utilizes a novel mix of trusted execution environments, blockchain technologies, and a real-time graph-based API standard to provide automated, oblivious, and auditable certiﬁcation. Our technique allows a privacy-conscious data owner to run pre-approved Oblivious Smart Contract code in their own environment on their own private data to produce Private Automated Certiﬁcations. These certiﬁcations are veriﬁable, purely functional transformations of the available data, enabling a third party to trust that the private data must have the necessary properties to produce the resulting certiﬁcation. Recently, a multitude of solutions for certiﬁcation and traceability in supply chains have been proposed. These often suffer from signiﬁcant privacy issues because they tend to take a "shared, replicated database" approach: every node in the network has access to a copy of all relevant data and contract code to guarantee the integrity and reach consensus, even in the presence of malicious nodes. In these contexts of certiﬁcations that require global coordination, AGAPECert can include a blockchain to guarantee ordering of events, while keeping a core privacy model where private data is not shared outside of the data owner’s own platform. AGAPECert contributes an open-source certiﬁcation framework that can be adopted in any regulated environment to keep sensitive data private while enabling a trusted automated workﬂow. Smart Contract, Private Automated Certiﬁcation, Certiﬁcation, Supply Chain, Blockchain.
papers.title_zh: AGAPECert:一个可审计的、通用的、自动化的、支持隐私的认证框架，带有不经意的智能契约
papers.abstract_zh: —本文介绍了AGAPECert，这是一个可审计的、通用的、自动化的、支持隐私的认证框架，能够对私有数据执行可审计的计算，并报告实时聚合认证状态，而不会泄露底层私有数据。AGAPECert利用可信执行环境、区块链技术和基于图形的实时API标准的新颖组合，提供自动化、易察觉和可审计的认证。我们的技术允许注重隐私的数据所有者在自己的环境中对自己的私有数据运行预先批准的不经意智能合同代码，以生成私有自动证书。这些证书是可用数据的可验证的纯函数转换，使第三方能够相信私有数据必须具有生成证书所需的属性。最近，针对供应链中的认证和可追溯性提出了多种解决方案。这些通常会遇到严重的隐私问题，因为它们往往采用“共享、复制数据库”的方法:网络中的每个节点都可以访问所有相关数据和合同代码的副本，以保证完整性并达成共识，即使存在恶意节点。在这些需要全球协调的认证环境中，AGAPECert可以包括一个区块链来保证事件的排序，同时保持一个核心隐私模型，在该模型中，私人数据不会在数据所有者自己的平台之外共享。AGAPECert贡献了一个开源认证框架，可在任何监管环境中采用，以保持敏感数据的私密性，同时实现可信的自动化工作流。智能合同、私有自动认证、认证、供应链、区块链。

papers.title: Detection of Cache Pollution Attack Based on Ensemble Learning in ICN-Based VANET
papers.authors: Lin Yao, Zhaolong Zheng, Xin Wang, Yujie Zeng, Guowei Wu
papers.abstract: Content Centric Network (CCN) can be extended to efficiently and reliably support content delivery and solve the network performance degradation caused by dynamic topology and intermittent connectivity of Vehicle Ad hoc NETwork (VANET). However, the in-network caching mechanism of Vehicular Content Centric Network (VCCN) is vulnerable against Cache Pollution Attack (CPA), where attackers aim to fill the buffer space with non-popular contents by releasing fake requests. Unavoidably, the cache hit ratio of content requests from legal users is degraded and the content retrieval latency is increased under CPA. Hence, it is critical to detect and mitigate CPA. The current solutions for static CCN cannot be directly applied into dynamic VCCN. In this article, we propose a detection scheme based on hybrid heterogeneous multi-classifier ensemble learning, where CPA is determined by the cooperation of multiple vehicles. In our scheme, each vehicle can build or join a cluster whose head possesses more common moving attributes of position, speed and direction with other members. Besides, the cluster head as a base learner is responsible for training its own classifier by making some relevant statistics on requests and hit ratio. Specifically, the problem of ensemble classifier making from the individual classifiers is formulated as a linear optimization problem, with the goal of minimizing the false ratio of detecting CPA. The generalization ability of ensemble learning can make very accurate predictions on CPA. By comparison, our detection scheme outperforms the existing schemes in terms of detection ratio, hit ratio, retrieval delay. Besides, simulations have proved that the overfitting problem of adopting a singe base learning algorithm can be alleviated in our scheme.
papers.title_zh: ICN VANET基于集成学习的缓存污染攻击检测
papers.abstract_zh: 内容中心网络(CCN)可以扩展为高效可靠地支持内容分发，解决车载自组织网络(VANET)的动态拓扑和间歇性连接导致的网络性能下降。然而，车载内容中心网络(VCCN)的网内缓存机制容易受到缓存污染攻击(CPA ),攻击者通过发布虚假请求来填充非热门内容。不可避免地，CPA降低了合法用户内容请求的缓存命中率，增加了内容检索延迟。因此，检测和减轻CPA是至关重要的。静态CCN的当前解决方案不能直接应用于动态VCCN。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于混合异构多分类器集成学习的检测方案，其中CPA由多个车辆的协作来确定。在我们的方案中，每辆车可以建立或加入一个簇，簇头和其他成员拥有更多共同的位置、速度和方向移动属性。此外，作为基础学习器的簇头负责通过对请求和命中率进行相关统计来训练自己的分类器。具体来说，从单个分类器生成集成分类器的问题被公式化为线性优化问题，目标是最小化检测CPA的错误率。集成学习的泛化能力可以对CPA做出非常准确的预测。通过比较，我们的检测方案在检测率、命中率和检索延迟方面都优于现有的检测方案。此外，模拟实验证明，采用单基学习算法的过拟合问题可以在我们的方案中得到缓解。

papers.title: PUF-Based Mutual Authentication and Key Exchange Protocol for Peer-to-Peer IoT Applications
papers.authors: Yue Zheng, Wenye Liu, Chongyan Gu, Chip-Hong Chang
papers.abstract: Peer to Peer (P2P) or direct connection IoT has become increasingly popular owing to its lower latency and higher privacy compared to database-driven or server-based IoT. However, wireless vulnerabilities raise severe concerns on IoT device-to-device communication. This is further aggravated by the challenge to achieve lightweight direct mutual authentication and secure key exchange between IoT peer nodes in P2P IoT applications. Physical unclonable function (PUF) is a key enabler to lightweight, low-power and secure authentication of resource-constrained devices in IoT. Nevertheless, current PUF-enabled authentication protocols, with or without the challenge-response pairs (CRPs) of each of its interlocutors stored in the verifier’s side, are incompatible for P2P IoT scenarios due to the security, storage and computing power limitations of IoT devices. To solve this problem, a new lightweight PUF-based mutual authentication and key-exchange protocol is proposed. It allows two resource-constrained PUF embedded endpoint devices to authenticate each other directly without the need for local storage of CRP or any private secrets, and simultaneously establish the session key for secure data exchange without resorting to public-key algorithm. The proposed protocol is evaluated using the Mao and Boyd logic as well as the automatic security analysis tool ProVerif to corroborate its mutual authenticity, secrecy, and resistance against replay and man-in-the-middle attacks. Using two Avnet Ultra96-V2 boards to emulate the two IoT endpoint devices of a network, a physical prototype system is also constructed to demonstrate and validate the feasibility of the proposed secure P2P connection scheme.
papers.title_zh: 面向对等物联网应用的基于PUF的双向认证和密钥交换协议
papers.abstract_zh: 与数据库驱动或基于服务器的物联网相比，点对点(P2P)或直连物联网因其更低的延迟和更高的隐私性而变得越来越受欢迎。然而，无线漏洞引起了对物联网设备到设备通信的严重关注。在P2P物联网应用中，实现物联网对等节点之间的轻量级直接相互认证和安全密钥交换的挑战进一步加剧了这一点。物理不可克隆功能(PUF)是物联网中资源受限设备的轻量级、低功耗和安全认证的关键使能因素。然而，由于物联网设备的安全性、存储和计算能力的限制，当前支持PUF的认证协议，无论是否在验证方存储每个对话者的挑战-响应对(CRP ),对于P2P物联网场景都是不兼容的。为了解决这个问题，提出了一个新的轻量级的基于PUF的双向认证和密钥交换协议。它允许两个资源受限的PUF嵌入式端点设备在不需要本地存储CRP或任何私有秘密的情况下直接相互认证，并且同时建立用于安全数据交换的会话密钥，而不求助于公钥算法。使用Mao和Boyd逻辑以及自动安全分析工具ProVerif对所提出的协议进行评估，以证实其相互真实性、保密性以及对重放和中间人攻击的抵抗能力。使用两块Avnet Ultra96-V2板来模拟网络中的两个物联网端点设备，构建了一个物理原型系统来演示和验证所提出的安全P2P连接方案的可行性。

papers.title: Automatic Inference of Fault Tree Models Via Multi-Objective Evolutionary Algorithms
papers.authors: Lisandro Arturo Jimenez-Roa, Tom Heskes, Tiedo Tinga, Mariëlle Stoelinga
papers.abstract: —Fault tree analysis is a well-known technique in reliability engineering and risk assessment, which supports decision-making processes and the management of complex systems. Traditionally, fault tree (FT) models are built manually together with domain experts, considered a time-consuming process prone to human errors. With Industry 4.0, there is an increasing availability of inspection and monitoring data, making techniques that enable knowledge extraction from large data sets relevant. Thus, our goal with this work is to propose a data-driven approach to infer efﬁcient FT structures that achieve a complete representation of the failure mechanisms contained in the failure data set without human intervention. Our algorithm, the FT-MOEA, based on multi-objective evolutionary algorithms, enables the simultaneous optimization of different relevant metrics such as the FT size, the error computed based on the failure data set and the Minimal Cut Sets. Our results show that, for six case studies from the literature, our approach successfully achieved automatic, efﬁcient, and consistent inference of the associated FT models. We also present the results of a parametric analysis that tests our algorithm for different relevant conditions that inﬂuence its performance, as well as an overview of the data-driven methods used to automatically infer FT models.
papers.title_zh: 基于多目标进化算法的故障树模型自动推理
papers.abstract_zh: —故障树分析是可靠性工程和风险评估中的一项众所周知的技术，它支持决策过程和复杂系统的管理。传统上，故障树(FT)模型是与领域专家一起手动构建的，这被认为是一个耗时的过程，容易出现人为错误。随着工业4.0的发展，检测和监控数据的可用性越来越高，使得从大型数据集中提取知识的技术变得越来越重要。因此，我们这项工作的目标是提出一种数据驱动的方法来推断有效的FT结构，在没有人为干预的情况下实现故障数据集中包含的故障机制的完整表示。我们的算法FT-MOEA基于多目标进化算法，能够同时优化不同的相关度量，例如FT大小、基于故障数据集计算的误差和最小割集。我们的结果表明，对于文献中的六个案例研究，我们的方法成功地实现了相关FT模型的自动、有效和一致的推断。我们还展示了参数分析的结果，该结果针对影响算法性能的不同相关条件测试了我们的算法，并概述了用于自动推断FT模型的数据驱动方法。

papers.title: Poisoning-Assisted Property Inference Attack Against Federated Learning
papers.authors: Zhibo Wang, Yuting Huang, Mengkai Song, Libing Wu, Feng Xue, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Federated learning (FL) has emerged as an ideal privacy-preserving learning technique which can train a global model in a collaborative way while preserving the private data in the local. However, recent advances have demonstrated that FL is still vulnerable to inference attacks, such as reconstruction attack and membership inference. Among these attacks, the property inference attack, aiming to infer properties of the training data that are irrelevant with the learning objective, has not received too much attention while resulting in severe privacy leakage. Existing property inference attack approaches either cannot achieve satisfactory performance when the global model has converged or under dynamic FL where participants can drop in and drop out freely. In this paper, we propose a novel poisoning-assisted property inference attack (PAPI-attack) against FL. The key insight is that there exists underlying discriminative ability in the periodic model updates, which reflects the change of the data distribution, especially the occurrence of the sensitive property. Thus, a binary attack model can be constructed by a malicious participant for inferring the unintended information. More importantly, we present a property-specific poisoning mechanism by modifying the label of training data from the adversary to distort the decision boundary of shared (global) model in FL. Consequently, benign participants are induced to disclose more information about the sensitive property. Extensive experiments on real-world datasets demonstrate that PAPI-attack outperforms the state-of-the-art property inference attacks against FL.
papers.title_zh: 针对联邦学习的中毒辅助属性推理攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 联邦学习(FL)是一种理想的隐私保护学习技术，它能够以协作的方式训练一个全局模型，同时在局部保存隐私数据。然而，最近的研究表明，模糊逻辑仍然容易受到推理攻击，如重构攻击和成员推理。在这些攻击中，旨在推断与学习目标无关的训练数据的属性的属性推断攻击没有受到太多关注，但却导致了严重的隐私泄露。现有的属性推断攻击方法要么在全局模型已经收敛时不能获得令人满意的性能，要么在参与者可以自由加入和退出的动态FL下不能获得令人满意的性能。本文提出了一种新的针对FL的中毒辅助属性推断攻击(PAPI攻击)。关键在于周期性模型更新中存在潜在的判别能力，它反映了数据分布的变化，尤其是敏感特性的出现。因此，恶意参与者可以构建二元攻击模型来推断非预期信息。更重要的是，我们提出了一种属性特定的中毒机制，通过修改来自对手的训练数据的标签来扭曲FL中共享(全局)模型的决策边界。因此，良性参与者被诱导披露更多关于敏感财产的信息。真实数据集上的大量实验表明，PAPI攻击优于针对FL的最先进的属性推断攻击。

papers.title: Preserving Privacy for Distributed Genome-Wide Analysis Against Identity Tracing Attacks
papers.authors: Yanjun Zhang, Guangdong Bai, Xue Li, Surya Nepal, Marthie Grobler, Chen Chen, Ryan K. L. Ko
papers.abstract: Genome-wide analysis has demonstrated both health and social benefits. However, large scale sharing of such data may reveal sensitive information about individuals. One of the emerging challenges is identity tracing attack that exploits correlations among genomic data to reveal the identity of DNA samples. In this paper, we first demonstrate that the adversary can narrow down the sample's identity by detecting his/her genetic relatives and quantify such privacy threat by employing a Shannon entropy-based measurement. For example, we exemplify that when the dataset size reaches 30% of the population, for any target from that population, the uncertainty of the target's identity is reduced to merely 2.3 bits of entropy (i.e., the identity is pinned down within 5 people). Direct application of existing approaches such as differential privacy (DP), secure multiparty computation (MPC) and homomorphic encryption (HE) may not be applicable to this challenge in genome-wide analysis because of the compromise on utility (i.e., accuracy or efficiency).
