Towards addressing this challenge, this paper proposes a framework named <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\upsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>υ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bai-ieq1-3186672.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula><sc>Frag</sc> to facilitate privacy-preserving data sharing and computation in genome-wide analysis. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\upsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>υ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bai-ieq2-3186672.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula><sc>Frag</sc> mitigates privacy risks by using a vertical fragmentation to disrupt the genetic architecture on which the adversary relies for identity tracing without sacrificing the capability of genome-wide analysis. We theoretically prove that it preserves the correctness of the primitive functionalities and algorithms ranging from basic summary statistics to advanced neural networks. Our experiments demonstrate that <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\upsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>υ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bai-ieq3-3186672.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula><sc>Frag</sc> outperforms secure multiparty computation (MPC) and homomorphic encryption (HE) protocols, with a speedup of more than 221x for training neural networks, and also traditional non-private algorithms and a state-of-the-art noise-based differential privacy (DP) solution in most settings.
papers.title_zh: 针对身份追踪攻击的分布式全基因组分析的隐私保护
papers.abstract_zh: 全基因组分析显示了健康和社会效益。然而，大规模共享此类数据可能会泄露个人的敏感信息。一个新出现的挑战是身份追踪攻击，它利用基因组数据之间的相关性来揭示DNA样本的身份。在本文中，我们首先证明对手可以通过检测他/她的遗传亲属来缩小样本的身份，并通过采用基于香农熵的测量来量化这种隐私威胁。例如，我们举例说明，当数据集大小达到群体的30%时，对于该群体中的任何目标，目标身份的不确定性降低到仅2.3比特的熵(即，身份被限制在5个人以内)。现有方法的直接应用，如差分隐私(DP)、安全多方计算(MPC)和同态加密(HE)可能不适用于全基因组分析中的这一挑战，因为对效用(即准确性或效率)有所妥协。为了应对这一挑战，本文提出了一个名为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ upsilon $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi >υ</MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Bai-ie Q1-3186672 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > < sc > Frag </sc >的框架，以促进基因组中的隐私保护数据共享和计算< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ upsilon $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi >υ</MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Bai-ieq 2-3186672 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > < sc > Frag </sc >通过使用垂直分割来破坏基因结构，从而减轻隐私风险，而对手依赖基因结构进行身份追踪我们从理论上证明了它保持了从基本汇总统计到高级神经网络的原始功能和算法的正确性。我们的实验证明，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ upsilon $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi >υ</MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Bai-ieq 3-3186672 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula > < sc > Frag </sc >优于安全多方计算(MPC)和同态加密(HE)协议

papers.title: Forward/Backward and Content Private DSSE for Spatial Keyword Queries
papers.authors: Xiangyu Wang, Jianfeng Ma, Ximeng Liu, Yinbin Miao, Yang Liu, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Spatial keyword queries are attractive techniques that have been widely deployed in real-life applications in recent years, such as social networks and location-based services. However, existing solutions neither support dynamic update nor satisfy the privacy requirements in real applications. In this article, we investigate the problem of Dynamic Searchable Symmetric Encryption (DSSE) for spatial keyword queries. First, we formulate the definition of DSSE for spatial keyword queries (namely, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {DSSE}_{\mathsf {SKQ}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">DSSE</mml:mi><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">SKQ</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq1-3205670.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) and extend the DSSE leakage functions to capture the leakages in <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {DSSE}_{\mathsf {SKQ}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">DSSE</mml:mi><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">SKQ</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq2-3205670.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Then, we present a practical <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {DSSE}_{\mathsf {SKQ}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">DSSE</mml:mi><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">SKQ</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq3-3205670.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> construction based on geometric prefix encoding inverted-index and encrypted bitmap. Rigorous security analysis proves that our construction can achieve not only forward/backward privacy but content privacy as well, which can resist the most existing leakage-abuse attacks. Evaluation results using real-world datasets demonstrate the efficiency and feasibility of our construction. Comparative analysis reveals that our construction outperforms state-of-the-art schemes in terms of privacy and performance, e.g., our construction is <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$175\times$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>175</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liu-ieq4-3205670.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> faster than existing schemes with only 51% server storage cost.
papers.title_zh: 用于空间关键字查询的前向/后向和内容私有DSSE
papers.abstract_zh: 空间关键字查询是近年来广泛部署在现实生活应用中的有吸引力的技术，例如社交网络和基于位置的服务。然而，现有的解决方案既不支持动态更新，也不能满足实际应用中的隐私要求。在本文中，我们研究了空间关键字查询的动态可搜索对称加密(DSSE)问题。首先，我们为空间关键字查询制定了DSSE的定义(即，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { DSSE } _ { \ mathsf { SKQ } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:msub > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > DSSE </MML:mi > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > SKQ </MML:mi > </MML:msub >)然后，我们给出一个实用的< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { DSSE } _ { \ mathsf { SKQ } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:msub > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > DSSE </MML:mi > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > SKQ </MML:mi > </MML:msub > </MML:math > < inline-graphic严格的安全性分析证明，我们的构造不仅可以实现前向/后向隐私，还可以实现内容隐私，可以抵抗大多数现有的泄漏滥用攻击。使用真实数据集的评估结果证明了我们的构建的有效性和可行性。比较分析表明，我们的构造在保密性和性能方面优于最先进的方案，例如，我们的构造是< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " >＄175 \乘以＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:Mn > 175 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >×</MML:mo > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:math

papers.title: A Comparison of Four Notions of Isomorphism-Based Security for Graphs
papers.authors: Zhiyuan Lin, Mahesh Tripunitara
papers.abstract: A graph is a powerful abstraction for representing information. We address the problem of publishing a secure version of a graph that does not leak information to an adversary who may possess prior information about portions of the graph, and may have unbounded computational power. In this context, we revisit four notions of security, all of which are based on variants of graph isomorphism, that have been proposed in two different application contexts in the literature. We compare the four notions to one another, first from the standpoint of strength, i.e., whether meeting one notion implies meeting another, and then from the standpoint of computational hardness, i.e., what the exact computational complexity is for the problem of checking whether a graph meets a notion. For the latter, we identify that for two of the notions we consider, the problem is <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathbf{NP}\text{-complete}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi mathvariant="bold">NP</mml:mi><mml:mtext>-complete</mml:mtext></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="tripunitara-ieq1-3199326.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, and for the two others, it is <bold>ISO</bold>-complete, where <bold>ISO</bold> is the class of problems induced by graph isomorphism. We observe that strength is not necessarily correlated to computational hardness. In summary, our work makes contributions at the foundations of an important notion of security for graphs.
papers.title_zh: 图的四种同构安全概念的比较
papers.abstract_zh: 图是表示信息的强大抽象。我们解决了发布图的安全版本的问题，该版本不会将信息泄露给可能拥有关于图的部分的先验信息并且可能具有无限计算能力的对手。在这种情况下，我们重新审视四个安全概念，所有这些概念都基于图同构的变体，它们是在文献中的两个不同应用环境中提出的。我们将这四个概念相互比较，首先从强度的角度，即满足一个概念是否意味着满足另一个概念，然后从计算难度的角度，即对于检查一个图是否满足一个概念的问题，确切的计算复杂度是多少。对于后者，我们确定对于我们考虑的两个概念，问题是< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathbf { NP } \ text {-complete } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi math variant = " bold " > NP </MML:mi > < MML:mtext >-complete </MML:mtext > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline我们观察到强度不一定与计算难度相关。总之，我们的工作在图的安全的一个重要概念的基础上做出了贡献。

papers.title: Mitigating Adversarial Attacks on Data-Driven Invariant Checkers for Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Rajib Ranjan Maiti, Cheah Huei Yoong, Venkata Reddy Palleti, Arlindo Silva, Christopher M. Poskitt
papers.abstract: —The use of invariants in developing security mechanisms has become an attractive research area because of their potential to both prevent attacks and detect attacks in Cyber-Physical Systems (CPS). In general, an invariant is a property that is expressed using design parameters along with Boolean operators and which always holds in normal operation of a system, in particular, a CPS. Invariants can be derived by analysing operational data of various design parameters in a running CPS, or by analysing the system’s requirements/design documents, with both of the approaches demonstrating significant potential to detect and prevent cyber-attacks on a CPS. While data-driven invariant generation can be fully automated, design-driven invariant generation has a substantial manual intervention. In this paper, we aim to highlight the shortcomings in data-driven invariants by demonstrating a set of adversarial attacks on such invariants. We propose a solution strategy to detect such attacks by complementing them with design-driven invariants. We perform all our experiments on a real water treatment testbed. We shall demonstrate that our approach can significantly reduce false positives and achieve high accuracy in attack detection on CPSs.
papers.title_zh: 减轻对信息物理系统的数据驱动不变检验器的敌对攻击
papers.abstract_zh: —在开发安全机制中使用不变量已经成为一个有吸引力的研究领域，因为它们在防止攻击和检测网络物理系统(CPS)中的攻击方面都有潜力。一般来说，不变量是一种使用设计参数和布尔运算符来表达的属性，并且在系统(特别是CPS)的正常操作中总是成立。不变量可以通过分析运行中的CPS的各种设计参数的操作数据，或者通过分析系统的要求/设计文档来导出，这两种方法都显示出检测和防止CPS上的网络攻击的巨大潜力。虽然数据驱动的不变量生成可以完全自动化，但设计驱动的不变量生成需要大量的人工干预。在本文中，我们的目的是通过展示一组对数据驱动不变量的攻击来突出数据驱动不变量的缺点。我们提出了一种解决策略，通过用设计驱动的不变量补充它们来检测这种攻击。我们在真实的水处理试验台上进行所有的实验。我们将证明，我们的方法可以大大减少误报，并在CPSs上实现高精度的攻击检测。

papers.title: Interpreting Universal Adversarial Example Attacks on Image Classification Models
papers.authors: Yi Ding, Fuyuan Tan, Ji Geng, Zhen Qin, Mingsheng Cao, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Zhiguang Qin
papers.abstract: Mitigating adversarial deep learning attacks remains challenging, partly because of the ease and low cost in carrying out such attacks. Therefore, in this article, we focus on the understanding of universal adversarial example attack on image classification models. Specifically, we seek to understand the difference(s) between adversarial examples in two adversarial datasets (DAmageNet and PGD dataset) and clean examples in ImageNet learned by the classification model, and whether we can use such findings to resist adversarial example attacks. We also seek to determine if we can retrain a discriminator to discriminate whether the input image is an adversarial example, using adversarial training. We then design a number of experiments (e.g., class activation map (CAM) analysis, feature map analysis, feature maps/filters changing, adversarial training, and binary classification model) to help us determine whether the universal adversarial dataset can be successfully used to attack the classification model. This, in turn, contributes to a better understanding of adversarial defenses over pretrained classification model from an interpretation perspective. To the best of our knowledge, this work is one of the earliest works to systematically investigate the interpretation of universal adversarial example attack on image classification models, both visually and quantitatively.
papers.title_zh: 解读对图像分类模型的通用对抗示例攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 减轻对抗性深度学习攻击仍然具有挑战性，部分原因是实施这种攻击容易且成本低。因此，在本文中，我们重点研究对图像分类模型的通用对抗性例子攻击的理解。具体来说，我们试图了解两个对立数据集(达马金特和PGD数据集)中的对立示例与通过分类模型学习的ImageNet中的干净示例之间的差异，以及我们是否可以使用这样的发现来抵抗对立示例攻击。我们还试图确定我们是否可以重新训练一个鉴别器来鉴别输入图像是否是一个对抗性的例子，使用对抗性训练。然后，我们设计了许多实验(例如，类激活图(CAM)分析、特征图分析、特征图/过滤器改变、对抗训练和二元分类模型)来帮助我们确定通用对抗数据集是否可以成功地用于攻击分类模型。这反过来又有助于从解释的角度更好地理解对抗式防御对预训练分类模型的影响。据我们所知，这项工作是最早的工作之一，系统地调查了图像分类模型上的通用对抗性示例攻击的解释，无论是视觉上还是定量上。

papers.title: A Variational AutoEncoder-Based Relational Model for Cost-Effective Automatic Medical Fraud Detection
papers.authors: Jie Chen, Xiaonan Hu, Dongyi Yi, Mamoun Alazab, Jianqiang Li
papers.abstract: This work aims to develop a framework of automatic medical fraud detection (AMFD) which can be deployed in healthcare industry. To address the issue that the medical fraud labels are insufficient in both size and classes for training a good AMFD model, this work proposes a novel Variational AutoEncoder-based Relational Model (VAERM) which can simultaneously exploit Patient-Doctor relational network and one-class fraud labels to improve the fraud detection. Then, the proposed VAERM coupled with active learning strategy can assist healthcare industry experts to conduct cost-effective fraud investigation. Finally, we propose an online model updating method to reduce the computation and memory requirement while preserving the predictive performance. The proposed framework is tested in a real world dataset and it empirically outperforms the state-of-the-art methods in both automatic fraud detection and fraud investigation tasks.
papers.title_zh: 一种基于变分自动编码器的关系模型，用于经济有效的自动医疗欺诈检测
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作旨在开发一个医疗欺诈自动检测(AMFD)框架，可以部署在医疗保健行业。为了解决医疗欺诈标签在规模和类别上都不足以训练良好的AMFD模型的问题，该工作提出了一种新的基于变分自动编码器的关系模型(VAERM ),该模型可以同时利用患者-医生关系网络和单类别欺诈标签来提高欺诈检测。然后，所提出的VAERM结合主动学习策略可以帮助医疗保健行业专家进行具有成本效益的欺诈调查。最后，我们提出了一种在线模型更新方法，在保持预测性能的同时减少了计算量和内存需求。所提出的框架在真实世界数据集上进行了测试，它在自动欺诈检测和欺诈调查任务方面都优于最先进的方法。

papers.title: On Account Association With Assistance From Mobile Networks
papers.authors: Sean W. Caldwell, Ye Zhu, Yong Guan, Riccardo Bettati
papers.abstract: In this paper, we draw attention to the problem of account association attacks designed to determine whether a target mobile phone number is associated with a particular online account. In the case of 4G/LTE, the adversary launches an account association attack by sending SMS messages to the target phone number and analyzing patterns in traffic related to the online account. We evaluate the proposed attacks in both a local 4G/LTE testbed and a major commercial 4G/LTE network. Our extensive experiments show that the proposed attacks can successfully identify account association with near-perfect accuracy. Our experiments also illustrate that the proposed attacks can be launched in a way that the victim receives no indication of being under attack.
papers.title_zh: 在移动网络帮助下的账户关联
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提请注意帐户关联攻击的问题，这些攻击旨在确定目标手机号码是否与特定的在线帐户相关联。在4G/LTE的情况下，对手通过向目标电话号码发送SMS消息并分析与在线账户相关的流量模式来发起账户关联攻击。我们在本地4G/LTE试验床和主要商用4G/LTE网络中评估了提出的攻击。我们的大量实验表明，所提出的攻击能够以近乎完美的准确度成功地识别账户关联。我们的实验还表明，所提出的攻击可以在受害者没有收到受到攻击的指示的情况下发起。

papers.title: Evaluating the Robustness of Trigger Set-Based Watermarks Embedded in Deep Neural Networks
papers.authors: Suyoung Lee, Wonho Song, Suman Jana, Meeyoung Cha, Sooel Son
papers.abstract: —Trigger set-based watermarking schemes have gained emerging attention as they provide a means to prove ownership for deep neural network model owners. In this paper, we argue that state-of-the-art trigger set-based watermarking algorithms do not achieve their designed goal of proving ownership. We posit that this impaired capability stems from two common experimental ﬂaws that the existing research practice has committed when evaluating the robustness of watermarking algorithms: (1) incomplete adversarial evaluation and (2) overlooked adaptive attacks. We conduct a comprehensive adversarial evaluation of 11 representative watermarking schemes against six of the existing attacks and demonstrate that each of these watermarking schemes lacks robustness against at least two non-adaptive attacks. We also propose novel adaptive attacks that harness the adversary’s knowledge of the underlying watermarking algorithm of a target model. We demonstrate that the proposed attacks effectively break all of the 11 watermarking schemes, consequently allowing adversaries to obscure the ownership of any watermarked model. We encourage follow-up studies to consider our guidelines when evaluating the robustness of their watermarking schemes via conducting comprehensive adversarial evaluation that includes our adaptive attacks to demonstrate a meaningful upper bound of watermark robustness.
papers.title_zh: 深度神经网络中基于触发集的水印鲁棒性评估
papers.abstract_zh: —基于触发集的水印方案获得了新的关注，因为它们提供了一种为深度神经网络模型所有者证明所有权的方法。在本文中，我们认为，目前最先进的基于触发集的水印算法并没有达到其设计目标，证明所有权。我们假设，这种受损的能力源于现有研究实践在评估水印算法的鲁棒性时遇到的两个常见实验难题:(1)不完整的对抗性评估和(2)被忽略的适应性攻击。我们对11个有代表性的水印方案进行了全面的对抗评估，以抵抗现有的6种攻击，并证明这些水印方案中的每一个都缺乏抵抗至少两种非自适应攻击的鲁棒性。我们还提出了新的自适应攻击，利用对手对目标模型的潜在水印算法的知识。我们证明了所提出的攻击有效地打破了所有11个水印方案，从而允许对手掩盖任何水印模型的所有权。我们鼓励后续研究在评估他们的水印方案的鲁棒性时考虑我们的准则，通过进行全面的对抗性评估，包括我们的自适应攻击，以证明水印鲁棒性的有意义的上限。

papers.title: Towards Persistent Detection of DDoS Attacks in NDN: A Sketch-Based Approach
papers.authors: Zhiwei Xu, Xin Wang, Yujun Zhang
papers.abstract: As a promising architectural design for future Internet, Named Data Networking (NDN) relies on data names, instead of destination IP addresses, to deliver data. NDN supports data authenticity and integrity by making public key signatures mandatory on data content and data names. This handles the primary security concern in NDN, but is still vulnerable to new DDoS attacks, including Cache Pollution attacks and Interest Flooding attacks, which degrade NDN transmission significantly, by violating the crucial components of NDN routers. To defend against DDoS attacks in NDN, the most effective way is to persistently detect the malicious traffic and then throttle them. Except for the usual concern of the accuracy and efficiency in attack detection, since these attacks themselves have already imposed a huge burden on victims, to avoid exhausting the remaining resources on the victims for detection purpose, a lightweight detection solution is highly desired. We study DDoS attacks and propose a persistent detection solution based on an observed malicious traffic pattern, which leverages a novel sketch to monitor the malicious traffic in a timely and lightweight way. Additionally, our analysis and experiments demonstrate that, with fixed low resource consumption, the proposed solution can persistently detect DDoS attacks in NDN.
papers.title_zh: NDN DDoS攻击的持续检测:基于草图的方法
papers.abstract_zh: 作为未来互联网的一种有前途的架构设计，命名数据网络(NDN)依靠数据名称而不是目的IP地址来传送数据。NDN通过对数据内容和数据名称强制使用公钥签名来支持数据的真实性和完整性。这解决了NDN的主要安全问题，但仍然容易受到新的DDoS攻击，包括缓存污染攻击和兴趣泛滥攻击，这些攻击通过破坏NDN路由器的关键组件，显著降低了NDN传输。为了防御NDN的DDoS攻击，最有效的方法是持续检测恶意流量，然后对其进行扼制。除了通常对攻击检测的准确性和效率的关注之外，由于这些攻击本身已经给受害者带来了巨大的负担，为了避免耗尽受害者用于检测目的的剩余资源，非常需要一种轻量级的检测解决方案。我们研究了DDoS攻击，并提出了一种基于观察到的恶意流量模式的持续检测解决方案，该方案利用一种新颖的草图来及时、轻量级地监控恶意流量。此外，我们的分析和实验表明，在固定的低资源消耗下，所提出的解决方案可以持续检测NDN的DDoS攻击。

papers.title: Maintainable Log Datasets for Evaluation of Intrusion Detection Systems
papers.authors: Max Landauer, Florian Skopik, Maximilian Frank, Wolfgang Hotwagner, Markus Wurzenberger, Andreas Rauber
papers.abstract: Intrusion detection systems (IDS) monitor system logs and network traffic to recognize malicious activities in computer networks. Evaluating and comparing IDSs with respect to their detection accuracies is thereby essential for their selection in specific use-cases. Despite a great need, hardly any labeled intrusion detection datasets are publicly available. As a consequence, evaluations are often carried out on datasets from real infrastructures, where analysts cannot control system parameters or generate a reliable ground truth, or private datasets that prevent reproducibility of results. As a solution, we present a collection of maintainable log datasets collected in a testbed representing a small enterprise. Thereby, we employ extensive state machines to simulate normal user behavior and inject a multi-step attack. For scalable testbed deployment, we use concepts from model-driven engineering that enable automatic generation and labeling of an arbitrary number of datasets that comprise repetitions of attack executions with variations of parameters. In total, we provide 8 datasets containing 20 distinct types of log files, of which we label 8 files for 10 unique attack steps. We publish the labeled log datasets and code for testbed setup and simulation online as open-source to enable others to reproduce and extend our results.
papers.title_zh: 用于入侵检测系统评估的可维护日志数据集
papers.abstract_zh: 入侵检测系统(IDS)监控系统日志和网络流量，以识别计算机网络中的恶意活动。因此，评估和比较IDSs的检测精度对于在特定使用情况下选择IDSs至关重要。尽管有很大的需求，但几乎没有任何标记的入侵检测数据集是公开可用的。因此，评估通常是在来自真实基础设施的数据集上进行的，在真实基础设施中，分析师无法控制系统参数或生成可靠的地面实况，或者是妨碍结果再现性的私有数据集。作为一个解决方案，我们提出了一个可维护的日志数据集的集合，它是在一个代表小型企业的测试床中收集的。因此，我们使用大量的状态机来模拟正常的用户行为，并注入多步攻击。对于可扩展的测试平台部署，我们使用来自模型驱动工程的概念，这些概念能够自动生成和标记任意数量的数据集，这些数据集包含重复的攻击执行和各种参数。我们总共提供了8个数据集，包含20种不同类型的日志文件，其中8个文件被标记为10个独特的攻击步骤。我们将标记的日志数据集和用于测试床设置和模拟的代码作为开源在线发布，以使其他人能够复制和扩展我们的结果。

papers.title: Easy Peasy: A New Handy Method for Pairing Multiple COTS IoT Devices
papers.authors: Heng Ye, Qiang Zeng, Jiqiang Liu, Xiaojiang Du, Wei Wang
papers.abstract: Context-based paring is a promising direction for pairing IoT devices constrained in user interfaces (UIs). However, it takes a proximate distance or a long time for IoT devices to sense highly correlated context with enough entropy. In this work, we present a fast and secure approach, named MPairing, to pairing multiple commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) IoT devices. This approach is based on the key idea that devices co-located within a physically-secure boundary can perceive qualified context under the help of human-in-the-loop (HITL). Specifically, we leverage received-signal-strength (RSS) trajectory data with manually-generated interference in a short period as the shared secret to achieve fast and secure pairing. Subsequently, the real-time RSS trajectory data is utilized to generate random numbers in lieu of pre-shared key (PSK), which makes our scheme more resistant to background attacks. We theoretically prove the security of our pairing scheme and implement it in real-world environments. Our experimental results demonstrate that our scheme can effectively defend against malicious devices by imposing a threshold on the similarity of RSS trajectory data. The experimental results also show that, compared with the traditional context-based pairing that takes up to 24 hours, in our scheme it takes only 10 seconds on average for a legitimate device to pass the similarity checking, which is efficient and robust.
papers.title_zh: Easy Peasy:一种新的便捷方法，用于配对多个COTS物联网设备
papers.abstract_zh: 基于上下文的配对是用户界面(ui)受限的物联网设备配对的一个有前途的方向。然而，物联网设备需要很近的距离或很长的时间来感知具有足够熵的高度相关的上下文。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种快速安全的方法，名为MPairing，用于配对多个商用现成(COTS)物联网设备。这种方法基于一个关键思想，即在人在回路(HITL)的帮助下，位于物理安全边界内的设备可以感知合格的上下文。具体来说，我们利用接收信号强度(RSS)轨迹数据和短时间内人工生成的干扰作为共享秘密，以实现快速安全的配对。随后，利用实时RSS轨迹数据代替预共享密钥(PSK)生成随机数，使我们的方案更能抵抗后台攻击。我们从理论上证明了我们的配对方案的安全性，并在现实环境中实现了它。实验结果表明，通过对RSS轨迹数据的相似度设置阈值，我们的方案可以有效地防御恶意设备。实验结果还表明，与传统的需要24小时的基于上下文的配对相比，在我们的方案中，合法设备通过相似性检查平均只需要10秒，这是高效和鲁棒的。

papers.title: A Privacy-Preserving Architecture and Data-Sharing Model for Cloud-IoT Applications
papers.authors: Maribel Fernández, Jenjira Jaimunk, Bhavani Thuraisingham
papers.abstract: Many service providers offer their services in exchange for users’ private data. Despite new regulations created to protect users privacy, users are often given little choice over the way their data is collected and used. To address privacy concerns in cloud-IoT applications, we propose to use an architecture, called Data Bank, which gives users fine-grained control over their data. Data Bank uses a category-based data access (CBDA) model which covers the whole data life-cycle, from data collection from IoT devices to data sharing with services. We show how dynamic policies can be specified using a new attribute-based instance of CBDA, and describe the use of policy graphs to visualise and analyse policies.
papers.title_zh: 面向云-物联网应用的隐私保护架构和数据共享模型
papers.abstract_zh: 许多服务提供商提供他们的服务来交换用户的私人数据。尽管制定了保护用户隐私的新法规，但用户在收集和使用数据的方式上往往没有多少选择。为了解决云-物联网应用中的隐私问题，我们建议使用一种称为数据库的架构，让用户能够精细控制他们的数据。Data Bank使用基于类别的数据访问(CBDA)模型，该模型覆盖整个数据生命周期，从物联网设备的数据收集到与服务的数据共享。我们展示了如何使用新的基于属性的CBDA实例来指定动态策略，并描述了如何使用策略图来可视化和分析策略。

papers.title: Integrating Coordinate Transformation and Random Sampling Into High-Capacity Reversible Data Hiding in Encrypted Polygonal Models
papers.authors: Yuan-Yu Tsai, Hong-Lin Liu
papers.abstract: Reversible data hiding in encrypted media involves using algorithms to perform data encryption to improve the privacy of the original media and hide data for covert communication or access control. This study explores the feasibility of applying coordinate transformation and random sampling to enhance the embedding rate and total embedding capacity of separable reversible data hiding in encrypted polygonal models based on multiple most significant bit (multi-MSB) prediction and Huffman coding. We first transform each vertex coordinate value of the input model into a decimal value between 0 and 1 and then convert the value into numerous binary digits with a user-defined compression threshold. Thereafter, the random sampling concept is used to generate embeddable vertices with only partial neighboring vertices as a reference. Thus, the embedding rate and total embedding capacity can both be increased considerably. The multi-MSB prediction technique is adopted to obtain the embedding capacity of each embeddable vertex, each vertex coordinate value in the proposed study can have a respective embedding length. Finally, the auxiliary information compressed through Huffman coding and an encrypted secret message are embedded in the multi-MSB of each embeddable vertex coordinate value through bit substitution. The experimental results of this study indicate the feasibility of the proposed algorithm.
papers.title_zh: 加密多边形模型中集成坐标变换和随机采样的大容量可逆数据隐藏
papers.abstract_zh: 加密介质中的可逆数据隐藏涉及使用算法来执行数据加密，以提高原始介质的私密性，并隐藏数据用于隐蔽通信或访问控制。基于多重最高有效位(multi-MSB)预测和Huffman编码，研究了在加密多边形模型中应用坐标变换和随机采样来提高可分可逆数据隐藏的嵌入率和总嵌入容量的可行性。我们首先将输入模型的每个顶点坐标值转换为0到1之间的十进制值，然后使用用户定义的压缩阈值将该值转换为许多二进制数字。此后，使用随机采样概念，仅使用部分相邻顶点作为参考来生成可嵌入顶点。因此，嵌入率和总嵌入容量都可以显著增加。采用多MSB预测技术来获得每个可嵌入顶点的嵌入容量，在所提出的研究中，每个顶点坐标值可以具有各自的嵌入长度。最后，通过比特替换将霍夫曼编码压缩的辅助信息和加密的秘密信息嵌入到每个可嵌入顶点坐标值的多MSB中。实验结果表明了该算法的可行性。

papers.title: Online Failure Prediction for Complex Systems: Methodology and Case Studies
papers.authors: João R. Campos, Ernesto Costa, Marco Vieira
papers.abstract: Online Failure Prediction (OFP) allows proactively taking countermeasures before a failure occurs, such as saving data or restarting a system. However, despite its potential contribution to improving dependability, OFP still presents key limitations. Besides the problem of choosing the optimal set of features, assessing predictive models is complex and common procedures for supporting comparison are not available. There is, in fact, little work on developing and assessing failure predictors for complex systems. In this aricle, we present two extensive case studies on distinct Operating Systems (OSs), Linux and Windows, showing that it is possible to create models that can predict different types of incoming failures, highlighting various important considerations such as the operational requirements of the target system. To drive the case studies, we define a well-structured framework for a fair and sound assessment and comparison of alternative predictive solutions. It includes scenarios for choosing the most adequate metrics for the assessment, comparing alternative models, and selecting the best predictor, while considering the need to tolerate perturbations in the data. In practice, we show that, by following a well-defined process, it is possible to develop accurate failure predictors and establish a ranking of the models under evaluation in different scenarios and OSs.
papers.title_zh: 复杂系统的在线故障预测:方法和案例研究
papers.abstract_zh: 在线故障预测(OFP)允许在故障发生之前主动采取对策，例如保存数据或重启系统。然而，尽管它对提高可靠性有潜在的贡献，OFP仍然存在关键的局限性。除了选择最佳特征集的问题之外，评估预测模型是复杂的，并且没有用于支持比较的通用程序。事实上，很少有人研究和评估复杂系统的故障预测器。在本文中，我们介绍了两个关于不同操作系统(OS)的广泛案例研究，Linux和Windows，表明可以创建模型来预测不同类型的输入故障，突出了各种重要的考虑因素，如目标系统的操作要求。为了推动案例研究，我们定义了一个结构良好的框架，用于公平合理地评估和比较备选预测解决方案。它包括为评估选择最合适的度量标准、比较替代模型和选择最佳预测器的场景，同时考虑容忍数据中扰动的需要。在实践中，我们表明，通过遵循明确定义的流程，有可能开发出准确的故障预测器，并在不同的场景和操作系统中建立评估模型的排序。

papers.title: A Practical Lightweight Anonymous Authentication and Key Establishment Scheme for Resource-Asymmetric Smart Environments
papers.authors: Linyan Bai, Ching-Fang Hsu, Lein Harn, Jianqun Cui, Zhuo Zhao
papers.abstract: With the rapid developments of Internet of Things (IoT) technologies, the security of sensitive data has attracted more and more attention for many resource-asymmetric smart environments, such as smart home, smart agriculture and so on. The resource-asymmetry environment refers to the uneven distribution of resources on different devices side, which is specifically manifested as gateway side is resource-rich, user side and device side are resource-restricted. Hence, a secure and practical authentication key establishment scheme for such smart environments is urgently needed. Recently many researchers have designed authentication and key establishment schemes for security purpose, however most of them cannot consider the excess of gateway resources and guarantee the anonymity of user, and further, they are not suitable for resource-asymmetric smart environments because they are not lightweight enough in user side and smart device side. Due to the fact that Rabin cryptosystem has the large difference in time-consuming between encryption and decryption, it is extremely suitable for constructing authentication and key establishment scheme for resource-asymmetric smart environments. So, a new practical authentication and key establishment scheme based on the Rabin cryptosystem for resource-asymmetric smart environments is proposed, which can make better use of the advantages of abundant gateway resources and realize the lightweight operations on device side and user side, and at the same time can provide user anonymity. With Proverif and BAN logic, we can prove that our solution not only provides anonymity, but also satisfies all defined security features. Simultaneously, compared with latest similar protocols in computation cost and communication overhead, the results show that our scheme is more effective. Hence, our design has more attraction for authentication and key establishment scheme in resource-asymmetric smart environments.
papers.title_zh: 一种适用于资源不对称智能环境的轻量级匿名认证和密钥建立方案
papers.abstract_zh: 随着物联网技术的快速发展，在智能家居、智能农业等许多资源不对称的智能环境中，敏感数据的安全性越来越受到关注。资源不对称环境是指不同设备侧的资源分布不均匀，具体表现为网关侧资源丰富，用户侧和设备侧资源受限。因此，迫切需要一种适用于这种智能环境的安全实用的认证密钥建立方案。近年来，许多研究人员设计了基于安全目的的认证和密钥建立方案，但是大多数方案不能考虑网关资源的过剩和保证用户的匿名性，并且由于它们在用户端和智能设备端不够轻量，不适合资源不对称的智能环境。由于Rabin密码体制在加密和解密时间上的巨大差异，它非常适合构建资源不对称的智能环境下的认证和密钥建立方案。为此，提出了一种新的基于Rabin密码体制的实用认证和密钥建立方案，能够更好地利用丰富的网关资源，实现设备端和用户端的轻量级操作，同时提供用户匿名性。使用Proverif和BAN逻辑，我们可以证明我们的解决方案不仅提供匿名性，而且满足所有定义的安全特性。同时，与最新的同类协议在计算开销和通信开销方面进行比较，结果表明我们的方案更加有效。因此，我们的设计对资源不对称的智能环境中的认证和密钥建立方案更有吸引力。

papers.title: On Nxt Proof of Stake Algorithm: A Simulation Study
papers.authors: Wenbing Zhao
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present a simulation study of a Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus algorithm used in a public blockchain called Nxt. We first provide an overview of Nxt and its PoS consensus algorithm design, and introduce a concise mathematical analysis of the Nxt PoS algorithm. We then present an experimental study on the Nxt PoS behavior in a simulated environment and in a small network running Nxt private nodes. We show that the fractions of the blocks generated by forgers in the system are generally proportional to their weight in stakes provided that the weight is relatively small, which is consistent with the mathematical analysis. We consider two scenarios of double-spending attacks: (1) a single dominating forger with large stakes; and (2) a group of colluding forgers that collectively control large stakes. The simulation results show that the single-forger attack is more advantageous over using a pool of forgers in launching successful double-spending attacks. Finally, we propose a quota-based mechanism to limit the fraction of blocks that any forger could generate. We show that the mechanism is highly effective in mitigating the single-forger attack, but has limited success in preventing the double-spending attacks based on forging pools.
papers.title_zh: 关于Nxt Stake算法证明的仿真研究
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个模拟研究的证明利害关系(PoS)的共识算法中使用的公共区块链称为Nxt。我们首先提供了Nxt及其PoS一致性算法设计的概述，并介绍了Nxt PoS算法的简明数学分析。然后，我们在模拟环境和运行Nxt私有节点的小型网络中对Nxt PoS行为进行了实验研究。我们证明了系统中由伪造者生成的块的分数通常与它们在赌注中的重量成比例，只要重量相对较小，这与数学分析是一致的。我们考虑了两种双重花费攻击的情况:(1)一个具有大赌注的单个支配性伪造者；以及(2)一群共谋的伪造者，他们共同控制大量股份。仿真结果表明，单个伪造者攻击比使用一群伪造者发起成功的双花费攻击更有优势。最后，我们提出了一个基于配额的机制来限制任何伪造者可以生成的分块。我们证明了该机制在减轻单个伪造攻击方面是非常有效的，但是在防止基于伪造池的双重花费攻击方面效果有限。

papers.title: Improved Protocols for Distributed Secret Sharing
papers.authors: Roberto De Prisco, Alfredo De Santis, Francesco Palmieri
papers.abstract: In Distributed Secret Sharing schemes, secrets are encoded with shares distributed over multiple nodes of a network. Each involved party has access to a subset of the nodes and thus to a subset of the shares and is able to reconstruct a specific secret. Usually, these schemes are evaluated by measuring the required storage overhead, as well as the encoding and decoding complexities. In this paper, we provide new Distributed (multi) Secret Sharing Protocols for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(k,n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="palmieri-ieq1-3213790.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-threshold access structures that improve on previous results, characterized by nearly-optimal storage overhead, achieving both storage optimality and a better encoding/decoding complexity. The protocols are also simpler than previous ones and allow for easier encoding.
papers.title_zh: 分布式秘密共享的改进协议
papers.abstract_zh: 在分布式秘密共享方案中，秘密用分布在网络的多个节点上的份额来编码。每个参与方都可以访问节点的子集，从而访问份额的子集，并且能够重构特定的秘密。通常，通过测量所需的存储开销以及编码和解码的复杂性来评估这些方案。在本文中，我们为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(k，n)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > < MML:mo >，</MML:mo > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi >)</MML提供了新的分布式(多)秘密共享协议这些协议也比以前的更简单，允许更容易的编码。

papers.title: Go-Sharing: A Blockchain-Based Privacy-Preserving Framework for Cross-Social Network Photo Sharing
papers.authors: Ming Zhang, Zhe Sun, Hui Li, Ben Niu, Fenghua Li, Zixu Zhang, Yuhang Xie, Chunhao Zheng
papers.abstract: The evolution of social media has led to a trend of posting daily photos on online Social Network Platforms (SNPs). The privacy of online photos is often protected carefully by security mechanisms. However, these mechanisms will lose effectiveness when someone spreads the photos to other platforms. In this article, we propose Go-sharing, a blockchain-based privacy-preserving framework that provides powerful dissemination control for cross-SNP photo sharing. In contrast to security mechanisms running separately in centralized servers that do not trust each other, our framework achieves consistent consensus on photo dissemination control through carefully designed smart contract-based protocols. We use these protocols to create platform-free dissemination trees for every image, providing users with complete sharing control and privacy protection. Considering the possible privacy conflicts between owners and subsequent re-posters in cross-SNP sharing, we design a dynamic privacy policy generation algorithm that maximizes the flexibility of re-posters without violating formers’ privacy. Moreover, Go-sharing also provides robust photo ownership identification mechanisms to avoid illegal reprinting. It introduces a random noise black box in a two-stage separable deep learning process to improve robustness against unpredictable manipulations. Through extensive real-world simulations, the results demonstrate the capability and effectiveness of the framework across a number of performance metrics.
papers.title_zh: Go-Sharing:基于区块链的跨社交网络照片共享隐私保护框架
papers.abstract_zh: 社交媒体的发展导致了在在线社交网络平台(SNPs)上发布日常照片的趋势。网络照片的隐私通常受到安全机制的严密保护。然而，当有人将照片传播到其他平台时，这些机制将失去效力。在这篇文章中，我们提出了Go-sharing，这是一个基于区块链的隐私保护框架，为跨SNP照片共享提供了强大的传播控制。与在彼此不信任的集中式服务器中单独运行的安全机制相比，我们的框架通过精心设计的基于智能合同的协议，在照片传播控制上达成一致的共识。我们使用这些协议为每个图像创建平台无关的传播树，为用户提供完整的共享控制和隐私保护。考虑到跨SNP共享中所有者和后续转发者之间可能存在的隐私冲突，我们设计了一种动态隐私策略生成算法，在不侵犯前者隐私的前提下最大化转发者的灵活性。此外，Go-sharing还提供了强大的照片所有权识别机制，以避免非法转载。它在两阶段可分离深度学习过程中引入随机噪声黑盒，以提高对不可预测操纵的鲁棒性。通过大量真实世界的模拟，结果表明了该框架在许多性能指标上的能力和有效性。

papers.title: Mangling Rules Generation With Density-Based Clustering for Password Guessing
papers.authors: Shunbin Li, Zhiyu Wang, Ruyun Zhang, Chunming Wu, Hanguang Luo
papers.abstract: Rule-based password generation is one of the most effective and often employed techniques in the highly compute-intensive password recovery process. However, it is challenging to design and maintain a practical password mangling ruleset, which is a time-consuming task requiring specialized expertise. This paper therefore introduced MDBSCAN (Modified Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise), a novel density-based cluster approach in machine learning, to build an automatic password mangling rule generator. To evaluate the proposed method, cross-checks across 4 different real-world password datasets leaked from popular Internet services and applications are adopted. The results indicate that the proposed generator could produce high-quality mangling rules with a better hit rate and enhance current mangling rules by identifying hidden or omitted rules. The proposed approach also shows strong interpretability and computational efficiency. When examining the RockYou password dataset with the top 77 rules, the hit rate may rise by 11% to 104% proportionally to other well-known solutions. Furthermore, by combining the top 77 rules generated by MDBSCAN with those from other rulesets, 3–12.67% more real-world passwords can be retrieved.
papers.title_zh: 基于密度聚类的密码猜测规则生成
papers.abstract_zh: 基于规则的密码生成是高度计算密集型密码恢复过程中最有效和最常用的技术之一。然而，设计和维护一个实用的密码篡改规则集是具有挑战性的，这是一项耗时的任务，需要专业知识。为此，引入机器学习中一种新的基于密度的聚类方法MDB scan(Modified Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise)来构建密码篡改规则自动生成器。为了评估所提出的方法，采用了从流行的互联网服务和应用泄漏的4个不同的真实世界密码数据集的交叉检查。结果表明，该生成器能够产生高质量的混杂规则，具有更好的命中率，并通过识别隐藏或省略的规则来增强当前的混杂规则。该方法还显示了很强的可解释性和计算效率。当使用前77条规则检查RockYou密码数据集时，命中率可能会比其他众所周知的解决方案成比例地上升11%到104%。此外，通过将MDBSCAN生成的前77条规则与其他规则集生成的规则相结合，可以多检索3–12.67%的真实密码。

papers.title: VOSA: Verifiable and Oblivious Secure Aggregation for Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning
papers.authors: Yong Wang, Aiqing Zhang, Shu Wu, Shui Yu
papers.abstract: Federated learning has emerged as a promising paradigm by collaboratively training a global model through sharing local gradients without exposing raw data. However, the shared gradients pose a threat to privacy leakage of local data. The central server may forge the aggregated results. Besides, it is common that resource-constrained devices drop out in federated learning. To solve these problems, the existing solutions consider either only efficiency, or privacy preservation. It is still a challenge to design a verifiable and lightweight secure aggregation with drop-out resilience for large-scale federated learning. In this article, we propose VOSA, an efficient verifiable and oblivious secure aggregation protocol for privacy-preserving federated learning. We exploit aggregator oblivious encryption to efficiently mask users’ local gradients. The central server performs aggregation on the obscured gradients without revealing the privacy of local data. Meanwhile, each user can efficiently verify the correctness of the aggregated results. Moreover, VOSA adopts a dynamic group management mechanism to tolerate users’ dropping out with no impact on their participation in future learning process. Security analysis shows that the VOSA can guarantee the security requirements of privacy-preserving federated learning. The extensive experimental evaluations conducted on real-world datasets demonstrate the practical performance of the proposed VOSA with high efficiency.
papers.title_zh: VOSA:保护隐私的联邦学习的可验证和不经意安全聚合
papers.abstract_zh: 通过共享局部梯度而不暴露原始数据来协作训练全局模型，联合学习已经成为一种有前途的范式。然而，共享梯度对本地数据的隐私泄露构成了威胁。中央服务器可以伪造聚集的结果。此外，资源受限的设备退出联合学习是很常见的。为了解决这些问题，现有的解决方案要么只考虑效率，要么考虑隐私保护。为大规模联合学习设计一个可验证的、轻量级的、具有丢包恢复能力的安全聚合仍然是一个挑战。在这篇文章中，我们提出了VOSA，一个有效的可验证的和不经意的安全聚集协议，用于保护隐私的联邦学习。我们利用聚合器不经意加密来有效地屏蔽用户的局部梯度。中央服务器在不泄露本地数据隐私的情况下对模糊的梯度执行聚合。同时，每个用户可以有效地验证汇总结果的正确性。此外，VOSA采用动态的群组管理机制来容忍用户的退出，而不影响他们参与未来的学习过程。安全性分析表明，VOSA能够保证隐私保护联邦学习的安全性要求。在真实数据集上进行的大量实验评估表明，所提出的VOSA具有高效的实际性能。

papers.title: Smaug: A TEE-Assisted Secured SQLite for Embedded Systems
papers.authors: Di Lu, Minqiang Shi, Xindi Ma, Ximeng Liu, Rui Guo, Tianfang Zheng, Yulong Shen, Xuewen Dong, Jianfeng Ma
papers.abstract: As one of the most popular relational databases for embedded devices, SQLite is lightweight to be embedded into applications without installing a specific database management system. However, simplicity and easy-to-use are double-edged swords; while bringing convenience, they also make data processing and storage risky. For example, an attacker can obtain data from a database file or memory and tamper with it once he has gained higher privileges, threatening the database's confidentiality and integrity. To address such security issues, based on a trusted execution environment (TEE) and a trusted platform module (TPM), we have proposed Smaug, a general secure scheme to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of SQLite and similar databases. With Smaug, all the critical data is stored in ciphertext, and data integrity protection is also provided. Besides, with TEE, all the sensitive operations are isolated from the untrusted environment, which can effectively resist attacks against memory. In addition, we use TPM to provide a solid root-of-trust (RoT) for the system. Finally, we have implemented a prototype system, and the performance evaluations have clarified the dominant factors that affect the system availability, providing a reference to the design and implementation of similar systems.
papers.title_zh: Smaug:一个面向嵌入式系统的TEE辅助安全SQLite
papers.abstract_zh: 作为嵌入式设备中最流行的关系数据库之一，SQLite是轻量级的，可以嵌入到应用程序中，而无需安装特定的数据库管理系统。但是，简单和易用是双刃剑；在带来便利的同时，它们也给数据处理和存储带来了风险。例如，攻击者可以从数据库文件或内存中获取数据，并在获得更高权限后篡改数据，从而威胁数据库的机密性和完整性。为了解决这样的安全问题，基于可信执行环境(TEE)和可信平台模块(TPM)，我们提出了Smaug，一个通用的安全方案，以确保SQLite和类似数据库的机密性和完整性。使用Smaug，所有关键数据都以密文形式存储，并且还提供了数据完整性保护。此外，通过TEE，所有敏感操作与不可信环境隔离，可以有效抵御针对内存的攻击。此外，我们使用TPM来为系统提供可靠的信任根(RoT)。最后，我们实现了一个原型系统，性能评估明确了影响系统可用性的主要因素，为类似系统的设计和实现提供了参考。

papers.title: ZeroProKeS: A Secure Zeroconf Key Establishment Protocol for Large-Scale Low-Cost Applications
papers.authors: Shahnewaz Karim Sakib, George T. Amariucai, Yong Guan
papers.abstract: Traditional approaches to authenticated key establishment include the use of PKI or trusted third parties. While certificate deployment is sub-optimal for large-scale, low-cost applications, the use of trusted third parties is subject to human error and leaked credentials. For this context, co-location can be a valuable resource, and it is often exploited through common randomness harvesting techniques, but these, in turn, suffer from low achievable rates and usually from restrictive assumptions about the environment. Recent techniques for exploiting co-location are based on the notion of quality time and rely on sophisticated throttled clue-issuing mechanisms that allow a device with enough time to spend in the vicinity of the transmitter to find a secret key by collecting enough consecutive clues. By contrast, attackers are afforded only limited time to listen to, or interact with, the clue transmitter. Previous work in this direction deals solely with passive attackers and uses high-overhead information throttling mechanisms. This paper introduces the active attacker model for the quality-time paradigm and proposes a simple solution, a Zeroconf Key Establishment Protocol (ZeroProKeS). Additionally, the paper shows how to efficiently expand the proposed protocol to adhere to any customized information transfer function between legitimate users.
papers.title_zh: ZeroProKeS:一种适用于大规模低成本应用的安全Zeroconf密钥建立协议
papers.abstract_zh: 认证密钥建立的传统方法包括使用PKI或可信第三方。虽然证书部署对于大规模、低成本的应用程序来说是次优的，但是使用受信任的第三方容易出现人为错误和泄露凭证。在这种情况下，协同定位可能是一种有价值的资源，并且通常通过常见的随机性采集技术来利用，但是这些技术又受到可实现的速率低以及通常对环境的限制性假设的影响。利用协同定位的最新技术基于质量时间的概念，并且依赖于复杂的节流线索发布机制，该机制允许具有足够时间在发射机附近花费的设备通过收集足够的连续线索来找到秘密密钥。相比之下，攻击者只能在有限的时间内收听或与线索发送者互动。这个方向上以前的工作只处理被动攻击者，并使用高开销的信息节流机制。本文介绍了质量-时间范式的主动攻击者模型，并提出了一个简单的解决方案& Zeroconf密钥建立协议(ZeroProKeS)。此外，本文还展示了如何有效地扩展所提出的协议，以遵守合法用户之间的任何定制信息传输功能。

papers.title: Your Labels are Selling You Out: Relation Leaks in Vertical Federated Learning
papers.authors: Pengyu Qiu, Xuhong Zhang, Shouling Ji, Tianyu Du, Yuwen Pu, Jun Zhou, Ting Wang
papers.abstract: Vertical federated learning (VFL) is an emerging privacy-preserving paradigm that enables collaboration between companies. These companies have the same set of users but different features. One of them is interested in expanding new business or improving its current service with others’ features. For instance, an e-commerce company, who wants to improve its recommendation performance, can incorporate users’ preferences from another corporation such as a social media company through VFL. On the other hand, graph data is a powerful and sensitive type of data widely used in industry. Their leakage, e.g., the node leakage and/or the relation leakage, can cause severe privacy issues and financial loss. Therefore, protecting the security of graph data is important in practice. Though a line of work has studied how to learn with graph data in VFL, the privacy risks remain underexplored. In this paper, we perform the first systematic study on relation inference attacks to reveal VFL's risk of leaking samples’ relations. Specifically, we assume the adversary to be a semi-honest participant. Then, according to the adversary's knowledge level, we formulate three kinds of attacks based on different intermediate representations. Particularly, we design a novel numerical approximation method to handle VFL's encryption mechanism on the participant's representations. Extensive evaluations with four real-world datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of our attacks. For instance, the area under curve of relation inference can reach more than 90%, implying an impressive relation inference capability. Furthermore, we evaluate possible defenses to examine our attacks’ robustness. The results show that their impacts are limited. Our work highlights the need for advanced defenses to protect private relations and calls for more exploration of VFL's privacy and security issues.
papers.title_zh: 你的标签出卖了你:垂直联合学习中的关系泄漏
papers.abstract_zh: 垂直联合学习(VFL)是一种新兴的隐私保护范式，支持公司之间的协作。这些公司拥有相同的用户群，但功能不同。他们中的一个对拓展新业务或用其他人的功能改进其现有服务感兴趣。例如，一家电子商务公司希望提高其推荐性能，可以通过VFL整合来自另一家公司(如社交媒体公司)的用户偏好。另一方面，图形数据是一种在工业中广泛使用的强大而敏感的数据类型。它们的泄漏，例如节点泄漏和/或关系泄漏，会导致严重的隐私问题和经济损失。因此，保护图形数据的安全具有重要的现实意义。尽管在VFL有一行人已经研究了如何利用图表数据进行学习，但隐私风险仍未得到充分探索。本文首次对关系推理攻击进行了系统研究，揭示了VFL泄露样本关系的风险。具体来说，我们假设对手是一个半诚实的参与者。然后，根据对手的知识水平，我们制定了三种基于不同的中间表示的攻击。特别地，我们设计了一种新的数值逼近方法来处理参与者陈述的VFL加密机制。用四个真实世界数据集进行的广泛评估证明了我们的攻击的有效性。例如，关系推理的曲线下面积可以达到90%以上，这意味着令人印象深刻的关系推理能力。此外，我们评估可能的防御措施，以检查我们的攻击的鲁棒性。结果表明，它们的影响是有限的。我们的工作强调了保护私人关系的先进防御的必要性，并呼吁对VFL的隐私和安全问题进行更多的探索。

papers.title: Matrix-Based Secret Sharing for Reversible Data Hiding in Encrypted Images
papers.authors: Zhongyun Hua, Yanxiang Wang, Shuang Yi, Yifeng Zheng, Xingyu Liu, Yongyong Chen, Xinpeng Zhang
papers.abstract: Traditional schemes for reversible data hiding in encrypted images (RDH-EI) focus on one data hider and cannot resist the single point of failure. Besides, the image security is determined by one party, rather than multiple parties. Thus, it is valuable to design RDH-EI schemes with multiple data hiders for stronger security. In this article, we propose a multiple data hiders-based RDH-EI scheme using a new secret sharing technique. First, we devise an <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(r,n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>r</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hua-ieq1-3218570.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-threshold <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(r\leq n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>r</mml:mi><mml:mo>≤</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hua-ieq2-3218570.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> matrix-based secret sharing (MSS) using matrix theory, and theoretically verify its efficacy and security properties. Then, using the MSS, we propose an <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(r,n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>r</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hua-ieq3-3218570.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-threshold RDH-EI scheme called MSS-RDHEI. The content owner encrypts an image to be <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hua-ieq4-3218570.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> encrypted images using the MSS with an encryption key, and outsources these encrypted images to <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hua-ieq5-3218570.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> data hiders. Each data hider can embed some data, e.g., copyright and identification information, into the encrypted image for the purposes of storage, management, or other processing, and these data can also be losslessly extracted. An authorized receiver can recover the confidential image from <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$r$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>r</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hua-ieq6-3218570.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> encrypted images. By designing, our MSS-RDHEI scheme can withstand <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n-r$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mi>r</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="hua-ieq7-3218570.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> points of failure. Experimental results show that it ensures the image content confidentiality and achieves a much larger embedding capacity than state-of-the-art schemes.
papers.title_zh: 基于矩阵的秘密共享用于加密图像中的可逆数据隐藏

papers.title: Exploring Handwritten Signature Image Features for Hardware Security
papers.authors: Mahendra Rathor, Anirban Sengupta, Rahul Chaurasia, Aditya Anshul
papers.abstract: This paper presents a novel hardware security technique that leverages handwritten signature image features for securing intellectual property (IP) cores, such as digital signal processing (DSP) cores, against IP piracy and false claim of IP ownership threats. In our approach, an IP vendor's handwritten signature image features are first converted into a corresponding digital template, followed by mapping into hardware security constraints and implanting them into the design during high level synthesis (HLS) process. This paper presents methodologies of extracting feature set of a handwritten signature through sampling and of encoding of the samples into binary values using a tree based encoding, for generating the digital template. The results of the proposed approach are assessed in terms of strength of IP ownership proof, security against a forged signature and impact of embedding signature constraints on design cost. The results revealed that the proposed approach provides robust security at negligible design cost overhead and also outperforms state of the art hardware security approaches for DSP cores.
papers.title_zh: 探索用于硬件安全的手写签名图像特征
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一种新颖的硬件安全技术，该技术利用手写签名图像特征来保护诸如数字信号处理(DSP)核之类的知识产权(IP)核免受IP盗版和IP所有权虚假声明的威胁。在我们的方法中，首先将IP供应商的手写签名图像特征转换为相应的数字模板，然后映射到硬件安全约束，并在高级综合(HLS)过程中将它们植入设计中。本文提出了通过采样提取手写签名的特征集的方法和使用基于树的编码将样本编码成二进制值的方法，用于生成数字模板。根据IP所有权证明的强度、防止伪造签名的安全性以及嵌入签名约束对设计成本的影响来评估所提出方法的结果。结果表明，所提出的方法以可忽略的设计成本开销提供了鲁棒的安全性，并且也优于针对DSP内核的最新硬件安全方法。

papers.title: Escaping From Consensus: Instantly Redactable Blockchain Protocols in Permissionless Setting
papers.authors: Xinyu Li, Jing Xu, Lingyuan Yin, Yuan Lu, Qiang Tang, Zhenfeng Zhang
papers.abstract: Blockchain technologies have drawn a lot of attentions, and its immutability is paramount to applications requiring persistent records. However, tremendous real-world incidents have exposed the harm of strict immutability, such as the illicit data stored on Bitcoin and the loss of millions of dollars in vulnerable smart contracts. Moreover, “Right to be Forgotten” has been imposed in new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of European Union, which is incompatible with blockchain's immutability. Therefore, it is imperative to design efficient redactable blockchain in a controlled way. In this paper, we present a generic design of redactable blockchain protocols in the permissionless setting, applied to both proof-of-stake and proof-of-work blockchains. Our protocol can (1) maintain the same adversary bound requirement as the underlying blockchain, (2) support various network environments, (3) offer public verifiability for any redaction, and (4) achieve instant redaction, even only within one slot in the best case, which is desirable for redacting harmful data. Furthermore, we define the first ideal protocol of redactable blockchain and conduct security analysis following the language of universal composition. Finally, we develop a proof-of-concept implementation showing that the overhead remains minimal for both online and re-spawning nodes, which demonstrates the high efficiency of our design.
papers.title_zh: 逃离共识:在无许可环境下即时编辑区块链协议
papers.abstract_zh: 区块链技术已经引起了很多关注，它的不变性对于需要持久记录的应用来说至关重要。然而，大量现实世界的事件暴露了严格不变性的危害，如比特币上存储的非法数据和易受攻击的智能合约中数百万美元的损失。此外，欧盟新的《一般数据保护条例》( GDPR)中规定了“被遗忘权”,这与区块链的永久性不相容。因此，以可控的方式设计高效的可编辑区块链势在必行。在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个可编辑的区块链协议的一般设计，在无许可的设置，适用于证明的利益和证明的工作区块链。我们的协议可以(1)保持与底层区块链相同的对手边界要求，(2)支持各种网络环境，(3)为任何编辑提供公共可验证性，以及(4)实现即时编辑，即使在最好的情况下也只在一个时隙内，这对于编辑有害数据是理想的。此外，我们定义了第一个理想的可编辑区块链协议，并遵循通用组合语言进行安全性分析。最后，我们开发了一个概念验证实现，表明在线和重新生成节点的开销保持最小，这表明了我们设计的高效率。

papers.title: Implicit Hammer: Cross-Privilege-Boundary Rowhammer Through Implicit Accesses
papers.authors: Zhi Zhang, Wei He, Yueqiang Cheng, Wenhao Wang, Yansong Gao, Dongxi Liu, Kang Li, Surya Nepal, Anmin Fu, Yi Zou
papers.abstract: Rowhammer is a hardware vulnerability in DRAM memory, where repeated access to hammer rows can induce bit flips in neighboring victim rows. Rowhammer attacks have enabled privilege escalation, sandbox escape, cryptographic key disclosures, etc. A key requirement of all existing rowhammer attacks is that an attacker must have access to at least part of an exploitable hammer row. We term such rowhammer attacks as Explicit Hammer. Recently, several proposals leverage the spatial proximity between the accessed hammer rows and the location of the victim rows for a defense against rowhammer. These all aim to deny the attacker's permission to access hammer rows near sensitive data, thus defeating explicit hammer-based attacks. In this paper, we question the core assumption underlying these defenses. We present Implicit Hammer, a confused-deputy attack that causes accesses to hammer rows that the attacker is not allowed to access. It is a paradigm shift in rowhammer attacks since it crosses privilege boundary to stealthily rowhammer an inaccessible row by implicit DRAM accesses. Such accesses are achieved by abusing inherent features of modern hardware and/or software. We propose a generic model to rigorously formalize the necessary conditions to initiate implicit hammer and explicit hammer, respectively. Compared to explicit hammer, implicit hammer can defeat the advanced software-only defenses, stealthy in hiding itself and hard to be mitigated. To demonstrate the practicality of implicit hammer, we have created two implicit hammer's instances, called PThammer and SyscallHammer.
papers.title_zh: 隐式锤:通过隐式访问的跨权限边界的行锤
papers.abstract_zh: Rowhammer是DRAM内存中的一个硬件漏洞，重复访问hammer行会导致相邻受害行中的位翻转。Rowhammer攻击支持权限提升、沙箱转义、密钥泄露等。所有现有的行锤攻击的一个关键要求是，攻击者必须至少能够访问可利用的锤行的一部分。我们将这种行锤攻击称为显式锤。最近，几个提议利用被访问的锤行和受害者行的位置之间的空间接近来防御行锤。这些都旨在拒绝攻击者访问敏感数据附近的hammer行的权限，从而挫败显式的基于hammer的攻击。在本文中，我们质疑这些防御背后的核心假设。我们提出隐式hammer，这是一种混淆代理攻击，它导致攻击者访问不允许访问的Hammer行。这是行锤攻击的一个范式转变，因为它跨越了特权边界，通过隐式DRAM访问来秘密地行锤一个不可访问的行。这种访问是通过滥用现代硬件和/或软件的固有特征来实现的。我们提出了一个通用模型，严格地形式化了分别启动隐式hammer和显式hammer的必要条件。与显式hammer相比，隐式hammer可以击败高级的纯软件防御，具有隐蔽性，难以被削弱。为了展示隐式hammer的实用性，我们创建了两个隐式hammer的实例，名为PThammer和SyscallHammer。

papers.title: Snoopy: A Webpage Fingerprinting Framework With Finite Query Model for Mass-Surveillance
papers.authors: Gargi Mitra, Prasanna Karthik Vairam, Sandip Saha, Nitin Chandrachoodan, V. Kamakoti
papers.abstract: Internet users are vulnerable to privacy attacks despite the use of encryption. Webpage fingerprinting, an attack that analyzes encrypted traffic, can identify the webpages visited by a user. The key challenges in performing mass-scale webpage fingerprinting arise from (i) the sheer number of combinations of user behavior and preferences to account for, and; (ii) the bound on the number of website queries imposed by the defense mechanisms (e.g., DDoS defense) deployed at the website. These constraints preclude the use of conventional data-intensive ML-based techniques. In this work, we propose Snoopy, a first-of-its-kind framework, that performs webpage fingerprinting for a large number of users visiting a website. Snoopy caters to the generalization requirements of mass-surveillance while complying with a bound on the number of website accesses (finite query model) for traffic sample collection. We show that Snoopy achieves <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\approx 90\%$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>≈</mml:mo><mml:mn>90</mml:mn><mml:mo>%</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="mitra-ieq1-3222462.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> accuracy when evaluated on most websites, across various browsing contexts. A simple ensemble of Snoopy and an ML-based technique achieves <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\approx 97\%$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>≈</mml:mo><mml:mn>97</mml:mn><mml:mo>%</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="mitra-ieq2-3222462.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> accuracy while adhering to the finite query model, in cases when Snoopy alone does not perform well.
papers.title_zh: Snoopy:基于有限查询模型的网页指纹框架
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管使用了加密技术，互联网用户还是容易受到隐私攻击。网页指纹是一种分析加密流量的攻击，可以识别用户访问的网页。执行大规模网页指纹识别的关键挑战来自于(I)要考虑的用户行为和偏好的组合的绝对数量，以及；(ii)由部署在网站上的防御机制(例如，DDoS防御)强加的网站查询数量的界限。这些限制排除了传统的数据密集型基于ML的技术的使用。在这项工作中，我们提出了Snoopy，这是一个首创的框架，可以为大量访问网站的用户执行网页指纹识别。Snoopy迎合了大规模监控的一般化要求，同时遵守了流量样本收集的网站访问数量限制(有限查询模型)。我们证明Snoopy实现了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ approach 90 \ % $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >∞</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 90 </MML:mo > % </MML:mo > % </MML:mo > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Mitra-MitraSnoopy和基于ML的技术的简单组合实现了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ approximate 97 \ % $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >∞</MML:Mn > < MML:mo > % </MML:Mn > </MML:mo > % </MML:mo > </MML:mrow > < inline-graphic xlink:math

papers.title: Mitigating Adversarial Gray-Box Attacks Against Phishing Detectors
papers.authors: Giovanni Apruzzese, V. S. Subrahmanian
papers.abstract: Although machine learning based algorithms have been extensively used for detecting phishing websites, there has been relatively little work on how adversaries may attack such “phishing detectors” (PDs for short). In this paper, we propose a set of Gray-Box attacks on PDs that an adversary may use which vary depending on the knowledge that he has about the PD. We show that these attacks severely degrade the effectiveness of several existing PDs. We then propose the concept of <italic>operation chains</italic> that iteratively map an original set of features to a new set of features and develop the “Protective Operation Chain” (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\sf POC}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">POC</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="apruzzese-ieq1-3210029.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> for short) algorithm. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\sf POC}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">POC</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="apruzzese-ieq2-3210029.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> leverages the combination of random feature selection and feature mappings in order to increase the attacker's uncertainty about the target PD. Using 3 existing publicly available datasets plus a fourth that we have created and will release upon the publication of this article<sup>1</sup>, we show that <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\sf POC}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">POC</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="apruzzese-ieq3-3210029.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is more robust to these attacks than past competing work, while preserving predictive performance when no adversarial attacks are present. Moreover, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${{\sf POC}}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">POC</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="apruzzese-ieq4-3210029.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is robust to attacks on 13 different classifiers, not just one. These results are shown to be statistically significant at the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$p < 0.001$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>p</mml:mi><mml:mo><</mml:mo><mml:mn>0</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>001</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="apruzzese-ieq5-3210029.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> level.
papers.title_zh: 减轻针对网络钓鱼检测器的对抗性灰盒攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管基于机器学习的算法已经被广泛用于检测网络钓鱼网站，但是关于对手如何攻击这种“网络钓鱼检测器”(简称PDs)的工作相对较少。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一组对PD的灰箱攻击，对手可以根据他对PD的了解来使用这些攻击。我们发现这些攻击严重降低了现有PDs的效率。然后，我们提出了< italic >操作链</italic >的概念，它迭代地将一组原始功能映射到一组新功能，并开发了“保护性操作链”(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ SF POC } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > POC </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " apruzzese-ie Q1< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ SF POC } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " sans-serif " > POC </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " apruzzese-ieq 2-3210029 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >利用随机特征选择和特征映射的组合，以便使用3个现有的公开可用数据集，加上我们已经创建并将在本文< sup>1</sup >发布时发布的第四个数据集，我们显示< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ SF POC } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > POC </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " apruzzese-ieq 3-321此外，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { { \ SF POC } } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > POC </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " apruzzese-ieq 4-3210029 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >对13种不同分类器的攻击具有很强的鲁棒性，而不是这些结果显示在< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ p < 0.001 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > p </MML:mi > < MML:mo > < </MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 0 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >时具有统计显著性。</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 001 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " apruzzese-ieq 5-3210029 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >级别。

papers.title: Efficient and Privacy-Preserving Spatial Keyword Similarity Query Over Encrypted Data
papers.authors: Songnian Zhang, Suprio Ray, Rongxing Lu, Yunguo Guan, Yandong Zheng, Jun Shao
papers.abstract: As a popular and practical query type in location-based services, the spatial keyword query has been extensively studied in both academia and industry. Meanwhile, with the growing demand for data privacy, many privacy-preserving spatial keyword query schemes have been proposed to deal with queries over encrypted data. However, none of the existing schemes preserve access pattern privacy, and the recent research illustrates that leaking such privacy may incur inference attacks and thus disclose sensitive information. In addition, most existing schemes only consider the boolean keyword search, which is not quite practical and flexible in real-world applications. To address the above issues, in this paper, we propose two privacy-preserving spatial keyword similarity query schemes that can preserve full and partial access pattern privacy, respectively. First, we present a basic privacy-preserving spatial keyword similarity query scheme (PPSKS) by integrating a secure set membership test (SSMT) technique with secure circuits. After that, to improve performance, we propose a tree-based scheme (PPSKS+) by employing a new index called FR-tree together with a predicate encryption technique that can encrypt FR-tree. Formal security analysis shows that: i) our proposed schemes can protect outsourced data, query requests, and query results; ii) our PPSKS scheme can hide full access patterns, while the PPSKS+ scheme preserves <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$m$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>m</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="lu-ieq1-3227141.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-access pattern privacy. Extensive experiments are also conducted, and the results indicate that our tree-based PPSKS+ scheme is much more efficient, almost two orders of magnitude better than our linear search PPSKS scheme in performing queries.
papers.title_zh: 加密数据上高效且隐私保护的空间关键词相似性查询
papers.abstract_zh: 作为位置服务中一种流行且实用的查询类型，空间关键词查询在学术界和工业界都得到了广泛的研究。与此同时，随着人们对数据隐私需求的不断增长，许多保护隐私的空间关键字查询方案被提出来处理加密数据的查询。然而，现有的方案都没有保护访问模式隐私，最近的研究表明，泄露这种隐私可能会招致推理攻击，从而泄露敏感信息。此外，现有的大多数方案只考虑了布尔关键字搜索，这在实际应用中不太实用和灵活。针对上述问题，本文提出了两种隐私保护的空间关键词相似性查询方案，分别能够保护全部和部分访问模式隐私。首先，我们提出了一个基本的隐私保护空间关键词相似性查询方案(PPSKS ),该方案将安全集合成员测试(SSMT)技术与安全电路相结合。之后，为了提高性能，我们提出了一个基于树的方案(PPSKS+)，它采用了一个称为FR-tree的新索引和一个可以加密FR-tree的谓词加密技术。形式化的安全性分析表明:I)我们提出的方案可以保护外包数据、查询请求和查询结果；ii)我们的PPSKS方案可以隐藏完整的访问模式，而PPSKS+方案保留< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ m $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > m </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Lu-ie Q1-3227141 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-访问模式隐私。实验结果表明，基于树的PPSKS+方案比基于线性搜索的PPSKS方案的查询效率提高了近两个数量级。

papers.title: Cover Reproducible Steganography via Deep Generative Models
papers.authors: Kejiang Chen, Hang Zhou, Yaofei Wang, Menghan Li, Weiming Zhang, Nenghai Yu
papers.abstract: Whereas cryptography easily arouses attacks by means of encrypting a secret message into a suspicious form, steganography is advantageous for its resilience to attacks by concealing the message in an innocent-looking cover signal. Minimal distortion steganography, one of the mainstream steganography frameworks, embeds messages while minimizing the distortion caused by the modification on the cover elements. Due to the unavailability of the original cover signal for the receiver, message embedding is realized by finding the coset leader of the syndrome function of steganographic codes migrated from channel coding, which is complex and has limited performance. Fortunately, deep generative models and the robust semantic of generated data make it possible for the receiver to perfectly reproduce the cover signal from the stego signal. With this advantage, we propose cover-reproducible steganography where the source coding, e.g., arithmetic coding, serves as the steganographic code. Specifically, the decoding process of arithmetic coding is used for message embedding and its encoding process is regarded as message extraction. Taking text-to-speech and text-to-image synthesis tasks as two examples, we illustrate the feasibility of cover-reproducible steganography. Steganalysis experiments and theoretical analysis are conducted to demonstrate that the proposed methods outperform the existing methods in most cases.
papers.title_zh: 基于深度生成模型的覆盖可复制隐写术
papers.abstract_zh: 密码术通过将秘密消息加密成可疑形式容易引起攻击，而隐写术通过将消息隐藏在看似无害的隐藏信号中而具有抵抗攻击的弹性。最小失真隐写术是主流隐写术框架之一，它在嵌入信息的同时最小化由修改载体元素引起的失真。由于接收端无法获得原始的覆盖信号，信息嵌入是通过寻找信道编码迁移来的隐写码的伴随式函数的陪集首来实现的，这一过程复杂且性能有限。幸运的是，深度生成模型和生成数据的鲁棒语义使得接收器可以从隐写信号中完美地再现隐藏信号。利用这一优势，我们提出了覆盖可再现隐写术，其中源编码，例如算术编码，用作隐写码。具体而言，算术编码的解码过程用于消息嵌入，其编码过程被视为消息提取。以文本到语音和文本到图像的合成任务为例，我们说明了覆盖可复制隐写术的可行性。隐写分析实验和理论分析表明，所提方法在大多数情况下都优于现有方法。

papers.title: Membership Inference Attacks Against Deep Learning Models via Logits Distribution
papers.authors: Hongyang Yan, Shuhao Li, Yajie Wang, Yaoyuan Zhang, Kashif Sharif, Haibo Hu, Yuanzhang Li
papers.abstract: Deep Learning(DL) techniques have gained significant importance in the recent past due to their vast applications. However, DL is still prone to several attacks, such as the Membership Inference Attack (MIA), based on the memorability of training data. MIA aims at determining the presence of specific data in the training dataset of the model with substitute model of similar structure to the objective model. As MIA relies on the substitute model, they can be mitigated if the substitute model is not clear about the network structure of the objective model. To solve the challenge of shadow-model construction, this work presents L-Leaks, a member inference attack based on Logits. L-Leaks allow an adversary to use the substitute model's information to predict the presence of membership if the shadow and objective model are similar enough. Here, the substitute model is built by learning the logits of the objective model, hence making it similar enough. This results in the substitute model having sufficient confidence in the member samples of the objective model. The evaluation of the attack's success shows that the proposed technique can execute the attack more accurately than existing techniques. It also shows that the proposed MIA is significantly robust under different network models and datasets.
papers.title_zh: 基于Logits分布的深度学习模型成员推理攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习(DL)技术由于其广泛的应用而在最近获得了显著的重要性。然而，基于训练数据的记忆性，DL仍然容易受到几种攻击，例如成员推理攻击(MIA)。MIA旨在用与目标模型结构相似的替代模型来确定模型的训练数据集中特定数据的存在。由于MIA依赖于替代模型，如果替代模型不清楚目标模型的网络结构，它们可以被减轻。为了解决影子模型构建的挑战，本文提出了L-Leaks，一种基于Logits的成员推理攻击。如果影子模型和目标模型足够相似，L-Leaks允许对手使用替代模型的信息来预测成员的存在。这里，替代模型是通过学习目标模型的逻辑来构建的，因此使其足够相似。这导致替代模型在目标模型的成员样本中具有足够的置信度。对攻击成功的评估表明，所提出的技术可以比现有技术更准确地执行攻击。它还表明，所提出的MIA在不同的网络模型和数据集下具有显著的鲁棒性。

papers.title: MRSA: Mask Random Array Protocol for Efficient Secure Handover Authentication in 5G HetNets
papers.authors: Yibing Liu, Lijun Huo, Jun Wu, Mohsen Guizani
papers.abstract: The emergence of new communication applications adds high heterogeneity to 5G-networks. With the increase of heterogeneity, handover of user equipment between different service HetNets is frequent. It must smoothly realize user-free switching to provide services continuously. Although the 3 rd Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) has proposed a standard protocol for this scenario, it is found that these protocols cannot satisfy key forward/backward secrecy, lacks mutual authentication, etc. Further, it can be subjected to replay, DoS and other attacks. To alleviate these problems, we propose a mask random array protocol, MRSA. For efficient, secure handover authentication in 5G HetNets, we first design a verification mechanism called mask array, which depends on a random number self-circulating encryption structure. The mechanism can not only check the identity of the communication entity but also evaluate the freshness of the message. Second, we devise the mask array-based key derivation method to ensure the whole mechanism's key security. Third, formal proof and automated analysis are established to verify the efficiency and safety of the proposed MRSA protocol. Finally, function and robustness analysis illustrate the ability to resist attacks, while the simulation base station communication analysis shows the efficiency of the protocol from three aspects of data, time and energy. MRSA has significant performance advantages compared to existing schemes in 5G HetNets.
papers.title_zh: MRSA:5G网络中高效安全切换认证的掩码随机阵列协议
papers.abstract_zh: 新通信应用的出现增加了5G网络的高度异构性。随着异构性的增加，用户设备在不同服务网络之间的切换是频繁的。它必须平稳地实现无用户切换以持续提供服务。尽管第三代合作伙伴计划(3GPP)已经为这种情况提出了标准协议，但是发现这些协议不能满足密钥前向/后向保密，缺乏相互认证等。此外，它还可能受到重播、拒绝服务和其他攻击。为了缓解这些问题，我们提出了一种掩模随机阵列协议MRSA。为了在5G网络中实现高效、安全的切换认证，我们首先设计了一种称为掩码阵列的验证机制，它依赖于一种随机数自循环加密结构。该机制不仅可以检查通信实体的身份，还可以评估消息的新鲜度。其次，我们设计了基于掩码数组的密钥推导方法来保证整个机制的密钥安全性。第三，建立了形式化证明和自动化分析来验证所提出的MRSA协议的效率和安全性。最后，功能和鲁棒性分析说明了抵抗攻击的能力，而仿真基站通信分析从数据、时间和能量三个方面展示了协议的效率。与5G HetNets中的现有方案相比，MRSA具有显著的性能优势。

papers.title: Cancelable Fingerprint Template Construction Using Vector Permutation and Shift-Ordering
papers.authors: Sani M. Abdullahi, Ke Lv, Shuifa Sun, Hongxia Wang
papers.abstract: The need for cancelable biometric techniques has seen a progressive rise due to the rapid deployment of biometric authentication systems. These techniques prevent compromising biometric data by generating and using their corresponding cancelable templates for user authentication. However, the non-invertible distance preserving transformation methods employed in various schemes are often vulnerable to information leakage since matching is performed in the transform domain. This paper proposed a non-invertible distance preserving scheme based on vector permutation and shift-order process. First, the dimension of feature vectors is reduced using kernelized principal component analysis before randomly permuting the extracted vector features. A shift-order process is then applied to the generated features to achieve non-invertibility and combat similarity correlation-based attacks. The generated hash codes are resilient to various security and privacy attacks such as ARM, masquerade, and brute-force preimage. Experimental evaluations conducted on eight fingerprint datasets from FVC2002, FVC2004, and FVC2006 reveal a high matching performance of the proposed method with better recognition accuracy than other existing state-of-the-art. The scheme also fulfills the revocability and unlinkability requirements of cancelable biometrics.
papers.title_zh: 使用向量置换和移位排序的可取消指纹模板构造
papers.abstract_zh: 由于生物识别认证系统的快速部署，对可取消的生物识别技术的需求逐渐增加。这些技术通过生成并使用相应的可取消模板来进行用户认证，从而防止泄露生物特征数据。然而，由于匹配是在变换域中执行的，所以在各种方案中采用的不可逆距离保持变换方法经常容易受到信息泄漏的影响。提出了一种基于向量置换和移位序过程的不可逆距离保持方案。首先，在随机置换提取的向量特征之前，使用核化主成分分析来降低特征向量的维度。然后，对生成的特征应用移位顺序过程，以实现不可逆性并对抗基于相似性相关性的攻击。生成的散列码对各种安全和隐私攻击具有弹性，例如ARM、伪装和强力原像。在来自FVC2002、FVC2004和FVC2006的八个指纹数据集上进行的实验评估表明，所提出的方法具有较高的匹配性能，比其他现有技术具有更好的识别精度。

papers.title: Leaking Wireless ICs via Hardware Trojan-Infected Synchronization
papers.authors: Alán Rodrigo Díaz Rizo, Hassan Aboushady, Haralampos-G. Stratigopoulos
papers.abstract: We propose a Hardware Trojan (HT) attack in wireless Integrated Circuits (ICs) that aims at leaking sensitive information within a legitimate transmission. The HT is hidden inside the transmitter modulating the sensitive information into the preamble of each transmitted frame which is used for the synchronization of the transmitter with the receiver. The data leakage does not affect synchronization and is imperceptible by the inconspicuous nominal receiver as it does not incur any performance penalty in the communication. A knowledgeable rogue receiver, however, can recover the data using signal processing that is too expensive and impractical to be used during run-time in nominal receivers. The HT mechanism is designed at circuit-level and is embedded entirely into the digital section of the RF transceiver having a tiny footprint. The proposed HT attack is demonstrated with measurements on a hardware platform. We demonstrate the stealthiness of the attack, i.e., its ability to evade defenses based on testing and run-time monitoring, and the robustness of the attack, i.e., the ability of the rogue receiver to recover the leaked information even under unfavorable channel conditions.
papers.title_zh: 通过感染硬件木马的同步泄漏无线IC
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种无线集成电路(ICs)中的硬件木马(HT)攻击，旨在泄漏合法传输中的敏感信息。HT隐藏在发射机内部，将敏感信息调制到每个发送帧的前同步码中，用于发射机与接收机的同步。数据泄漏不会影响同步，并且不会被不显眼的标称接收器察觉，因为它不会导致通信中的任何性能损失。然而，有知识的欺诈接收机可以使用信号处理来恢复数据，该信号处理太昂贵且不切实际，不能在正常接收机的运行时间内使用。超线程(HT)机制是在电路级设计的，完全嵌入到射频收发器的数字部分，具有微小的尺寸。提出的HT攻击通过在硬件平台上的测量来演示。我们证明了攻击的隐蔽性，即它逃避基于测试和运行时监控的防御的能力，以及攻击的鲁棒性，即欺诈接收机即使在不利的信道条件下也能恢复泄漏的信息。

papers.title: Certificate Transparency With Enhanced Privacy
papers.authors: Hyunsoo Kwon, Sangtae Lee, Minjae Kim, Changhee Hahn, Junbeom Hur
papers.abstract: Digital certificates play an important role in the authentication of communicating parties for transport layer security. Recently, however, frequent incidents such as the illegal issuance of fake certificates by a compromised certificate authority have raised concerns about the legacy certificate system. Certificate Transparency (CT) mitigates such issues by employing a log server to audit issued certificates publicly, making the certificate issuance and verification processes transparent. Unfortunately, the legacy CT ecosystem suffers from log server compromises and user browsing information leakage. Furthermore, the data structure for the certificate management in the legacy CT system incurs computation overhead linear to the number of registered certificates in the log. In this paper, we propose a secure CT scheme by leveraging a shared value tree (SVT), a novel log structure specifically designed to address the log server compromise and browsing information leakage problems. The verification time of SVT remains constant regardless of the number of registered certificates in the log. We analyze our scheme on the legacy CT system to demonstrate its incremental deployability, guaranteeing a smooth transition toward a more secure web ecosystem.
papers.title_zh: 增强隐私的证书透明度
papers.abstract_zh: 数字证书在传输层安全性的通信方身份验证中起着重要的作用。然而，最近频繁发生的事件，例如被损害的证书授权机构非法发行假证书，引起了对遗留证书系统的关注。证书透明性(CT)通过使用日志服务器来公开审核颁发的证书，使证书颁发和验证过程透明，从而缓解了此类问题。不幸的是，传统的CT生态系统受到日志服务器损害和用户浏览信息泄漏的影响。此外，传统CT系统中用于证书管理的数据结构导致与日志中注册的证书数量成线性的计算开销。在本文中，我们提出了一个利用共享值树(SVT)的安全CT方案，这是一种新的日志结构，专门用于解决日志服务器泄露和浏览信息泄漏问题。无论日志中注册了多少个证书，SVT的验证时间都保持不变。我们在遗留的CT系统上分析我们的方案，以展示它的增量可部署性，保证向更安全的web生态系统的平稳过渡。

papers.title: Efficient Verifiable Unbounded-Size Database From Authenticated Matrix Commitment
papers.authors: Haining Yang, Dengguo Feng, Jing Qin
papers.abstract: Verifiable database with update (VDB) enables the client to store a large dataset in the outsourced database, and then efficiently query and update the data with a new value. It is attractive for the merits of checking the validity of the queried data and detecting the malicious actions of tampering with the outsourced database concurrently.
