papers.abstract_zh: 内容分发网络(CDN)是由大量节点组成的分布式系统，允许用户从附近的节点请求对象。CDN不仅减少了用户端的端到端延迟，还卸载了内容提供商(CP)，提供了抵御分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击的弹性。然而，通过缓存对象和处理用户请求，CDN提供商可以推断用户偏好和对象的受欢迎程度，从而导致信息泄漏。不幸的是，这种信息泄漏可能导致用户隐私的损失，并向不可信的或受损的CDN提供商泄露商业特定信息。最先进的解决方案可以保护敏感对象的内容，但不能防止CDN提供商推断用户偏好和对象的受欢迎程度。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个隐私保护的加密CDN系统，不仅隐藏了对象和用户请求的内容，还保护了用户的偏好和对象的流行性，防止好奇的CDN提供商发现。我们采用加密来保护对象和用户请求，使得cdn和CP都可以执行搜索操作，而无需以明文形式访问对象和请求。我们提出的系统是基于一个可扩展的多用户访问的密钥管理方法，其中用户撤销不需要密钥再生和数据重新加密。我们已经实现了该系统的原型，并展示了它的实用效率。
papers.title_zh: Multi-CDN：在内容交付网络中迈向隐私

papers.title: Retrofitting the Partially Privileged Mode for TEE Communication Channel Protection
papers.authors: Jinsoo Jang, Brent ByungHoon Kang
papers.abstract: ARM TrustZone provides a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) to isolate security-critical services, which are generally invoked from the Rich Execution Environment (REE) through a communication channel established by executing the Secure Monitor Call (SMC) with the general registers configured as input parameters. Unfortunately, the communication channel has been abused by adversaries to incur misbehavior of the TEE, to analyze the internal working of the TEE, and to exploit its vulnerabilities. We therefore propose the TEE defense (TFence) framework that enables the creation of a partially privileged (par-priv) process, which benefits from the coordination of the system mode and virtualization extension. More specifically, on ARM architecture, direct invocation of hypercall and SMC is not allowed in the user process; however, we limitedly escalate the privilege of the process to enable it to directly communicate with trust anchors such as hypervisor and TrustZone. This approach enabled us to remove the kernel dependency when the process communicates with the TEE, which also reduces the attack surface to the critical part of the application involved in the communication. Besides, direct communication with the hypervisor facilitates the adoption of application-shielding approaches to protect the critical part and to restrict arbitrary access to the TEE.
papers.abstract_zh: ARM TrustZone提供了一个可信执行环境(TEE)来隔离安全关键服务，这些服务通常通过执行安全监控调用(SMC)建立的通信通道从丰富执行环境(REE)中调用，并将通用寄存器配置为输入参数。不幸的是，通信信道已经被对手滥用来招致TEE的不当行为、分析TEE的内部工作以及利用其弱点。因此，我们提出了TEE defense (TFence)框架，该框架支持创建部分特权(par-priv)进程，该进程受益于系统模式和虚拟化扩展的协调。更具体的说，在ARM架构上，用户进程中不允许直接调用hypercall和SMC但是，我们有限地提升了进程的特权，使其能够直接与信任锚(如hypervisor和TrustZone)通信。这种方法使我们能够在进程与TEE通信时消除内核依赖性，这也减少了对通信中涉及的应用程序关键部分的攻击面。此外，与管理程序的直接通信有助于采用应用程序屏蔽方法来保护关键部分并限制对TEE的任意访问。
papers.title_zh: 重新修改部分特权模式以进行T恤通信渠道保护

papers.title: Energy-Efficient Superconductor Bloom Filters for Streaming Data Inspection
papers.authors: Mikhail Dorojevets
papers.abstract: Bloom filters can be used in network intrusion detection systems to detect known attack signatures in packet payloads. In this paper we propose and analyze the potential application of superconductor flux quantum technology for streaming data inspection with Bloom filters designed with Reciprocal Quantum Logic (RQL). This paper describes the gate-level design, performance, and energy-efficiency analysis of three superconductor 2 Kbit Bloom filters with 1) the run-time selection of the number of hashes per stream, and 2) different numbers of input streams per Bloom filter. The Bloom filter circuits were designed using a bottom-up approach with manual placing and routing of basic RQL gates. The design complexity is below 97K Josephson junctions. The highest clock frequency reached in the simulation of the circuits is 14.7 GHz. The false positive ra tes of the RQL Bloom filters are in very close agreement with the theoretical expectations of the false positive probability for the filters. For the cryocooling efficiency of 0.1 percent, the RQL Bloom filters demonstrate high energy efficiency in the range of ∼1.5-43.6 pJ/stream/operation at room temperature for stream lengths from 16 to 256 bits. All circuits are designed and simulated for the 248 nm MIT Lincoln Laboratory SFQ5ee fabrication process.
papers.abstract_zh: 布隆过滤器可用于网络入侵检测系统，以检测数据包有效载荷中的已知攻击特征。在这篇论文中，我们提出并分析了超导量子通量技术在流数据检测中的潜在应用，该应用采用了倒易量子逻辑(RQL)设计的布隆过滤器。本文描述了三个超导体2 Kbit Bloom滤波器的门级设计、性能和能效分析，其中1)每个流的哈希数的运行时选择，以及2)每个Bloom滤波器的不同输入流数。布隆过滤器电路使用自下而上的方法设计，手动放置和布线基本的RQL门。设计复杂度低于97K约瑟夫逊结。电路仿真中达到的最高时钟频率为14.7 GHz。RQL布鲁姆过滤器的假阳性率与过滤器的假阳性概率的理论预期非常接近。对于0.1%的低温冷却效率，对于16至256比特的流长度，RQL布鲁姆过滤器在室温下表现出在1.5-43.6 pJ/流/操作范围内的高能量效率。所有电路均针对248纳米MIT Lincoln Laboratory SFQ5ee制造工艺进行设计和仿真。
papers.title_zh: 用于流数据检查的节能超导体闭合过滤器

papers.title: Efficient Fine-Grained Data Sharing Mechanism for Electronic Medical Record Systems with Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Hui Ma, Rui Zhang, Guomin Yang, Zishuai Song, Kai He, Yuting Xiao
papers.abstract: Sharing digital medical records on public cloud storage via mobile devices facilitates patients (doctors) to get (offer) medical treatment of high quality and efficiency. However, challenges such as data privacy protection, flexible data sharing, efficient authority delegation, computation efficiency optimization, are remaining toward achieving practical fine-grained access control in the Electronic Medical Record (EMR) system. In this work, we propose an innovative access control model and a fine-grained data sharing mechanism for EMR, which simultaneously achieves the above-mentioned features and is suitable for resource-constrained mobile devices. In the model, complex computation is outsourced to public cloud servers, leaving almost no complex computation for the private key generator (PKG), sender and receiver. Additionally, the communication cost of the PKG and users is optimized. Moreover, we develop an extensible library called <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf {libabe}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">libabe</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ma-ieq1-2844814.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> that is compatible with Android devices, and the access control mechanism is actually deployed on realistic environment, including public cloud servers, a laptop and an inexpensive mobile phone with constrained resources. The experimental results indicate that the mechanism is efficient, practical and economical.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过移动设备共享公共云存储上的数字病历有助于患者(医生)获得(提供)高质量和高效率的医疗服务。然而，在电子病历(EMR)系统中实现实用的细粒度访问控制仍面临诸多挑战，如数据隐私保护、灵活的数据共享、高效的授权、计算效率优化等。在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个创新的电子病历访问控制模型和细粒度的数据共享机制，同时实现了上述功能，并适用于资源受限的移动设备。在该模型中，复杂的计算被外包给公共云服务器，几乎没有复杂的计算留给私钥生成器(PKG)、发送方和接收方。此外，优化了PKG和用户的通信成本。此外，我们开发了一个名为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { libabe } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " sans-serif " > libabe </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " ma-ie Q1-2844814 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的可扩展库，它与Android设备兼容，并且实验结果表明，该机制高效、实用、经济。
papers.title_zh: 具有移动设备的电子病历系统的有效细粒度数据共享机制

papers.title: The Cost of Scaling a Reliable Interconnection Topology
papers.authors: Rachid Guerraoui, Alexandre Maurer
papers.abstract: In distributed computing, many papers try to evaluate the message complexity of a distributed system as a function of the number of nodes <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq1-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. But what about the cost of <italic>building</italic> the distributed system itself? Assuming that we want to reliably connect <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq2-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> nodes, how does the total number of nodes of the network evolve with <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq3-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>? Addressing such a question lies at the heart of achieving scalability in cloud computing. In this paper, we give the explicit description of a distributed system of which any two of the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq4-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> nodes, for any <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq5-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, <italic>remain connected</italic> (by a path of alive nodes and channels) with probability at least <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mu$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>μ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq6-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, despite the very fact that (a) every other node or channel has an independent probability <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\lambda$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>λ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq7-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> of failing, and (b) the number of channels connected to every node is physically bounded by a constant. We show however that if we also require any two of the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq8-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> nodes to maintain a <italic>balanced message throughput</italic> with a constant probability, then <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$O(n \log ^{1+\epsilon } n)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>O</mml:mi><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:msup><mml:mo form="prefix">log</mml:mo><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>+</mml:mo><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:msup><mml:mi>n</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq9-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> additional intermediary nodes are sufficient, where <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\epsilon > 0$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi><mml:mo>></mml:mo><mml:mn>0</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="maurer-ieq10-2845402.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is an arbitrarily small constant.
papers.abstract_zh: 在分布式计算中，许多论文试图将分布式系统的消息复杂度评估为节点数的函数< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ n $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Maurer-ie Q1-2845402 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >。但是< italic >构建</italic >分布式系统本身的成本呢？假设我们想要可靠地连接< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ n $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Maurer-ieq 2-2845402 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >节点，网络的节点总数如何随着< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = "？解决这样一个问题是实现云计算可扩展性的核心。在本文中，我们给出了分布式系统的显式描述，对于任何< inline-formula><tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ n $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Maurer-ieq 4-2845402 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >节点，对于任何< inline-formula > < tex-math然而，我们发现，如果我们还需要任意两个< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " > $ n $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Maurer-ieq 8-2845402 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >节点以恒定的概率保持< italic >平衡的消息吞吐量</italic >
papers.title_zh: 缩放可靠的互连拓扑的成本

papers.title: Service Outsourcing in F2C Architecture with Attribute-based Anonymous Access Control and Bounded Service Number
papers.authors: Jianan Hong, Kaiping Xue, Na Gai, David S. L. Wei, Peilin Hong
papers.abstract: F2C (fog-to-cloud) enables service providers to rent the low-cost cloud/fog resources to publish their services, and the fog nodes, which are deployed at the edge, can provide short-latency service to users. However, new security threats come along with this new computing paradigm, where the access control and trusted payment are concerned in this work. We propose a privacy-preserving authentication scheme. By integrating <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xue-ieq1-2845381.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-times anonymous authentication (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xue-ieq2-2845381.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-TAA) and attribute-based access control, in our proposed scheme, service providers can autonomously determine a fine-grained access policy and the maximal access times for authorized users. Thus, users who satisfy the access policy can receive benefits of this service for certain number of times without leaking any private information. Our authentication phase has a low latency because it is offloaded to the fog as what the service does. This paper presents a lightweight and trusted billing mechanism using Merkle Hash Tree (MHT), which can detect the cloud's service forgery with high probability, without costing too much of service provider's bandwidth and computation. Rigorous security analysis proves that the proposed scheme is secure against malicious users, fogs, and cloud, and the experimental results show the significant performance advantage on both the delay reduction and service providers’ cost saving.
papers.abstract_zh: F2C (fog-to-cloud)允许服务提供商租用低成本的云/雾资源发布服务，部署在边缘的雾节点可以为用户提供短延迟服务。然而，新的安全威胁伴随着这种新的计算模式而来，其中访问控制和可信支付是这项工作所涉及的。我们提出了一个保护隐私的认证方案。通过集成< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ k $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Xue-ie Q1-2845381 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-times匿名认证(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ k $ </tex-math > < alternatives因此，满足访问策略的用户可以在不泄露任何私人信息的情况下，在一定次数内获得该服务的好处。我们的身份验证阶段具有较低的延迟，因为它像服务一样被卸载到雾中。提出了一种轻量级可信计费机制，该机制使用Merkle哈希树(MHT ),能够以很高的概率检测云服务伪造，而不会消耗服务提供商太多的带宽和计算量。严格的安全性分析证明了该方案对恶意用户、雾和云是安全的，实验结果表明该方案在降低延迟和节省服务提供商成本方面具有显著的性能优势。
papers.title_zh: 通过基于属性的匿名访问控制和有限的服务编号，F2C体系结构中的服务外包

papers.title: Understanding JavaScript Vulnerabilities in Large Real-World Android Applications
papers.authors: Wei Song, Qingqing Huang, Jeff Huang
papers.abstract: JavaScript-related vulnerabilities are becoming a major security threat to hybrid mobile applications. In this article, we present a systematic study to understand how JavaScript is used in real-world Android apps and how it may lead to security vulnerabilities. We begin by conducting an empirical study on the top-100 most popular Android apps to investigate JavaScript usage and its related security vulnerabilities. Our study identifies four categories of JavaScript usage and finds that three of these categories, if inappropriately used, can respectively lead to three types of vulnerabilities. We also design and implement an automatic tool named <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ JSDroid}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">JSDroid</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="song-ieq1-2845851.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> to detect JavaScript-related vulnerabilities. We have applied <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ JSDroid}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">JSDroid</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="song-ieq2-2845851.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> to 1,000 large real-world Android apps and found that over 70 percent of these apps have potential JavaScript-related vulnerabilities and 20 percent of them can be successfully exploited. Moreover, based on the vulnerabilities identified by <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ JSDroid}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">JSDroid</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="song-ieq3-2845851.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, we have successfully launched real attacks on 30 real-world apps.
papers.abstract_zh: JavaScript相关的漏洞正成为混合移动应用的主要安全威胁。在本文中，我们展示了一项系统研究，以了解JavaScript如何在现实世界的Android应用程序中使用，以及它如何可能导致安全漏洞。我们首先对前100个最流行的Android应用进行实证研究，调查JavaScript的使用及其相关的安全漏洞。我们的研究确定了JavaScript使用的四个类别，并发现其中三个类别如果使用不当，会分别导致三种类型的漏洞。我们还设计并实现了一个名为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ SF { JSDroid } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > JSDroid </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " song-ie Q1-2845851 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的自动工具来检测与JavaScript相关的内容我们已经将< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ SF { JSDroid } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > JSDroid </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " song-ieq 2-2845851 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >应用于1000个大型现实世界的Android应用程序，并发现此外，根据< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ SF { JSDroid } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > JSDroid </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " song-ieq 3-2845851 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >识别出的漏洞，我们已经成功地对30个
papers.title_zh: 了解大型现实世界Android应用中的JavaScript漏洞

papers.title: Physical Layer based Message Authentication with Secure Channel Codes
papers.authors: Dajiang Chen, Ning Zhang, Nan Cheng, Kuan Zhang, Zhiguang Qin, Xuemin Shen
papers.abstract: In this paper, we investigate physical (PHY) layer message authentication to combat adversaries with infinite computational capacity. Specifically, a PHY-layer authentication framework over a wiretap channel (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$W_1,W_2$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:msub><mml:mi>W</mml:mi><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:msub><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:msub><mml:mi>W</mml:mi><mml:mn>2</mml:mn></mml:msub></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq1-2846258.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) is proposed to achieve information-theoretic security with the same key. We develop a theorem to reveal the requirements/conditions for the authentication framework to be information-theoretic secure for authenticating a polynomial number of messages in terms of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq2-2846258.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Based on this theorem, we design an authentication protocol that can guarantee the security requirements, and prove its authentication rate can approach infinity when <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhang-ieq3-2846258.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> goes to infinity. Furthermore, we design and implement a feasible and efficient message authentication protocol over binary symmetric wiretap channel (BSWC) by using <italic>Linear Feedback Shifting Register</italic>based (LFSR-based) hash functions and strong secure polar code. Through extensive simulations, it is demonstrated that the proposed protocol can achieve high authentication rate, with low time cost and authentication error rate.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究了物理(PHY)层消息认证，以对抗具有无限计算能力的对手。具体来说，在窃听信道上的PHY层认证框架(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ W _ 1，W _ 2 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:msub > < MML:mi > W </MML:mi > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:msub > < MML:mo >，</mml:mo><mml:msub><mml我们开发了一个定理来揭示认证框架对于认证多项式数量的消息是信息理论安全的要求/条件，按照< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ n $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Zhang-ieq 2-2846258 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >。基于这个定理，我们设计了一个能够保证安全性要求的认证协议，并证明了当< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " >＄n ＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Zhang-ieq 3-2846258 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >趋于无穷大时，其认证率可以趋近于无穷大。此外，通过使用基于线性反馈移位寄存器的哈希函数和强安全极性码，我们设计并实现了一个可行且高效的二进制对称窃听信道(BSWC)上的消息认证协议。通过大量的仿真实验，证明了该协议具有较高的认证率，较低的时间开销和认证错误率。
papers.title_zh: 基于物理层的消息身份验证带有安全的频道代码

papers.title: CPU Elasticity to Mitigate Cross-VM Runtime Monitoring
papers.authors: Zeyu Mi, Haibo Chen, Yinqian Zhang, ShuangHe Peng, Xiaofeng Wang, Michael K. Reiter
papers.abstract: In this paper, We present a new technique that offers lightweight, general, and elastic protection against Crum (Cross-VM runtime monitoring) attacks. Our protection, called Crease (CPU Resource Elasticity as a Service), enables a VM (called principal) to purchase a higher clock rate from the cloud, through lowering the frequency of a malicious VM (called peer), to support its security-critical operations within a short period. During that period, the weakened peer becomes unable to catch up with the pace of the strengthened principal, therefore losing the capability to effectively collect its sensitive information. In the meantime, our approach can also make up for the performance impact on the peer through refunding schedule credits or service credits, in line with the service level agreement of today's cloud. At the center of our design is the novel application of on-demand frequency scaling and schedule quantum randomization, together with a situation-awareness mechanism that dynamically assesses the security risk posed by the peer. We analyzed the security guarantee of our design, implemented a prototype and evaluated it on a well-known Crum attack (an LLC side-channel attack) and various workloads. Our study shows that Crease is effective at protecting the principal, with only a small impact on the peer's operations.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一种新的技术，它提供了一种轻量级的、通用的和弹性的针对Crum(跨虚拟机运行时监控)攻击的保护。我们的保护称为Crease (CPU资源弹性即服务)，通过降低恶意虚拟机(称为对等机)的频率，使虚拟机(称为主体)能够从云中购买更高的时钟频率，以在短时间内支持其安全关键操作。在此期间，被削弱的对等体变得无法跟上被加强的主体的步伐，因此失去了有效收集其敏感信息的能力。与此同时，我们的方法还可以通过退款计划信用或服务信用来弥补对对等端的性能影响，符合当今云的服务级别协议。我们设计的核心是按需频率缩放和调度量子随机化的新颖应用，以及动态评估对等体带来的安全风险的情况感知机制。我们分析了我们设计的安全保证，实现了一个原型，并在一个众所周知的Crum攻击(LLC侧信道攻击)和各种工作负载上对其进行了评估。我们的研究表明，Crease在保护主体方面是有效的，对对等体的操作只有很小的影响。
papers.title_zh: CPU弹性减轻跨VM运行时监视

papers.title: Releasing Correlated Trajectories: Towards High Utility and Optimal Differential Privacy
papers.authors: Lu Ou, Zheng Qin, Shaolin Liao, Yuan Hong, Xiaohua Jia
papers.abstract: A mutual correlation between trajectories of two users is very helpful to real-life applications such as product recommendation and social media. While providing tremendous benefits, the releasing of correlated trajectories may leak sensitive social relations, due to potential links between mutual correlations and social relations. To the best of our knowledge, we take the first step to propose a mathematically rigorous <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="qin-ieq1-2853105.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-body Laplace framework, satisfying <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\varepsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ɛ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="qin-ieq2-2853105.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-differential privacy, which efficiently prevents a social relation inference through the mutual correlation between <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="qin-ieq3-2853105.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-node trajectories of two users. The problem is mathematically formulated by defining a trajectory correlation score to measure the social relation between two users. Then, under the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="qin-ieq4-2853105.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-body Laplace framework, we propose two Lagrange Multiplier-based Differentially Private (LMDP) approaches to optimize the privacy budgets, for the data utility measured by location distances and the data utility measured by location correlations, i.e., UD-LMDP and UC-LMDP. Also, we present detailed analyses of privacy, data utility, adversary knowledge and the constrained optimizations. Finally, we perform experimental studies with real-life data. Our experimental results show that our proposed approaches achieve better privacy and data utility than the existing approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 两个用户的轨迹之间的相互关联对于产品推荐和社交媒体等现实生活中的应用非常有帮助。尽管提供了巨大的好处，但是由于相互关联和社会关系之间的潜在联系，相关轨迹的发布可能会泄露敏感的社会关系。据我们所知，我们首先提出了一个数学上严格的< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " > $ n $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Qin-ie Q1-2853105 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-body拉普拉斯框架，满足< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$\varepsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ɛ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic通过定义轨迹相关性分数来测量两个用户之间的社会关系，该问题被数学地公式化。然后，在< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ n $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > n </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Qin-ieq 4-2853105 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-body拉普拉斯框架下，我们提出了两种基于拉格朗日乘数的差分隐私(LMDP)方法来优化数据的隐私预算此外，我们还详细分析了隐私、数据效用、对手知识和约束优化。最后，我们使用真实数据进行实验研究。实验结果表明，与现有方法相比，我们提出的方法实现了更好的隐私和数据效用。
papers.title_zh: 释放相关轨迹：迈向高实用性和最佳差异隐私

papers.title: Secure and Efficient Two-Party Signing Protocol for the Identity-Based Signature Scheme in the IEEE P1363 Standard for Public Key Cryptography
papers.authors: Debiao He, Yudi Zhang, Ding Wang, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo
papers.abstract: Mobile device and application (app) security are increasingly important, partly due to the constant and fast-paced cyberthreat evolution. To ensure the security of communication (e.g., data-in-transit), a number of identity-based signature schemes have been designed to facilitate authorization identification and validation of messages. However, in many of these schemes, a user's private key may leak when a new signature is generated since the private keys are stored on the device. Seeking to improve the security of the private key, we propose the first two-party distributed signing protocol for the identity-based signature scheme in the IEEE P1363 standard. This protocol requires that two devices separately store one part of the user's private key, and allows these two devices to generate a valid signature without revealing the entire private key of the user. We formally prove that the security of the protocol in the random oracle model. Then, we implement the protocol using the MIRACL library and evaluate the protocol on two mobile devices. Compared with the protocol of Lindell (CRYPTO'17) that uses the zero-knowledge proof for its security, our protocol is more suitable for deployment in the mobile environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动设备和应用程序(app)的安全性变得越来越重要，部分原因是网络威胁不断快速发展。为了确保通信的安全性(例如，数据传输)，已经设计了许多基于身份的签名方案来促进消息的授权识别和验证。然而，在许多这些方案中，当生成新的签名时，用户的私钥可能会泄露，因为私钥存储在设备上。为了提高私钥的安全性，我们在IEEE P1363标准中提出了第一个基于身份的两方分布式签名协议。该协议要求两个设备分别存储用户私钥的一部分，并允许这两个设备在不泄露用户整个私钥的情况下生成有效的签名。我们在随机预言模型下形式化地证明了该协议的安全性。然后，我们使用MIRACL库实现了该协议，并在两台移动设备上对该协议进行了评估。与Lindell (CRYPTO'17)使用零知识证明的协议相比，我们的协议更适合部署在移动环境中。
papers.title_zh: IEEE P1363公共密钥加密标准中基于身份的签名方案的安全有效的两党签名协议

papers.title: Anonymous Lightweight Chaotic Map-Based Authenticated Key Agreement Protocol for Industrial Internet of Things
papers.authors: Jangirala Srinivas, Ashok Kumar Das, Mohammad Wazid, Neeraj Kumar
papers.abstract: With an exponential increase in the popularity of Internet, the real-time data collected by various smart sensing devices can be analyzed remotely by a remote user (e.g., a manager) in the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT). However, in the IIoT environment, the gathered real-time data is transmitted over the public channel, which raises the issues of security and privacy in this environment. Therefore, to protect illegal access by an adversary, user authentication mechanism is one of the promising security solutions in the IIoT environment. To achieve this goal, we propose a new user authenticated key agreement scheme in which only authorized users can access the services from the designated IoT sensing devices installed in the IIoT environment. In the proposed scheme, fuzzy extractor technique is used for biometric verification. Moreover, three factors, namely smart card, password and personal biometrics of a legal registered user are applied in the proposed scheme to increase the level of security in the system. The proposed scheme supports new devices addition after initial deployment of the devices, password/biometric change phase and also smart card revocation phase in case the smart card is lost or stolen by an adversary. In addition, the proposed scheme is lightweight in nature. We carry out the formal security analysis using the broadly accepted Real-Or-Random (ROR) model and also the non-mathematical (informal) security analysis on the proposed scheme. Furthermore, the formal security verification using the popularly-used AVISPA (Automated Validation of Internet Security Protocols and Applications) tool is carried out on the proposed scheme. The detailed security analysis assures that the proposed scheme can withstand several well-known attacks in the IIoT environment. A practical demonstration using the NS2 simulation study is also performed for the proposed scheme and other related existing schemes. Also, a detailed comparative study shows that the proposed scheme is efficient, and provides superior security in comparison to the other schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着互联网普及程度的指数级增长，工业物联网(IIoT)中的远程用户(如管理者)可以远程分析各种智能传感设备采集的实时数据。然而，在IIoT环境中，收集的实时数据通过公共信道传输，这在这种环境中产生了安全和隐私问题。因此，为了防止对手的非法访问，用户认证机制是IIoT环境中最有前途的安全解决方案之一。为了实现这一目标，我们提出了一种新的用户认证密钥协商方案，其中只有授权用户才能从安装在IIoT环境中的指定物联网传感设备访问服务。在所提出的方案中，模糊提取器技术被用于生物特征验证。此外，三个因素，即智能卡，密码和合法注册用户的个人生物特征被应用在提出的方案中，以提高系统的安全水平。所提出的方案支持在设备的初始部署之后的新设备添加、密码/生物特征改变阶段以及在智能卡丢失或被对手窃取的情况下的智能卡撤销阶段。此外，所提出的方案本质上是轻量级的。我们使用广泛接受的真实或随机(ROR)模型进行了正式的安全性分析，并对提出的方案进行了非数学(非正式)的安全性分析。此外，使用广泛使用的AVISPA(Internet Security Protocols and Applications Automated Validation of Internet Security Protocols and Applications)工具对提出的方案进行了形式化的安全性验证。详细的安全性分析确保了所提出的方案能够抵抗IIoT环境中的几种众所周知的攻击。利用NS2模拟研究对所提出的方案和其他相关的现有方案进行了实际演示。此外，详细的比较研究表明，所提出的方案是有效的，并提供了优于其他方案的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 基于工业互联网的匿名轻巧的混乱地图经过身份验证的关键协议协议

papers.title: Explicit Modelling and Treatment of Repair in Prediction of Dependability
papers.authors: Jose Ignacio Aizpurua, Yiannis Papadopoulos, Guillaume Merle
papers.abstract: In engineering practice, multiple repair actions are considered carefully by designers, and their success or failure defines further control actions and the evolution of the system state. Such treatment is not fully supported by the current state-of-the-art in dependability analysis. We propose a novel approach for explicit modelling and analysis of repairable systems, and describe an implementation, which builds on HiP-HOPS, a method and tool for model-based synthesis of dependability evaluation models. HiP-HOPS is augmented with Pandora, a temporal logic for the qualitative analysis of Temporal Fault Trees (TFTs), and capabilities for quantitative dependability analysis via Stochastic Activity Networks (SAN). Dependability prediction is achieved via explicit modelling of local failure and repair events in a system model and then by: (i) propagation of local effects through the model and synthesis of repair-aware TFTs for the system, (ii) qualitative analysis of TFTs that respects both failure and repair logic and (iii) quantification of dependability via translation of repair-aware TFTs into SAN. The approach provides insight into the effects of multiple and alternative failure and repair scenarios, and can thus be useful in reconfigurable systems that typically employ software to utilise functional redundancies in a variety of ways.
papers.abstract_zh: 在工程实践中，设计者仔细考虑多个修复动作，它们的成功或失败定义了进一步的控制动作和系统状态的演变。这种处理并不完全被可靠性分析的当前技术水平所支持。我们提出了一种新的方法，用于可修复系统的显式建模和分析，并描述了一个实现，该实现基于HiP-HOPS，一种基于模型的可信性评估模型综合的方法和工具。HiP-HOPS增加了Pandora，一种用于时间故障树(TFTs)定性分析的时间逻辑，以及通过随机活动网络(SAN)进行定量可靠性分析的能力。通过对系统模型中的局部故障和修复事件进行显式建模，然后通过以下方式来实现可靠性预测:(I)通过模型传播局部效应并合成系统的修复感知tft，(ii)对考虑故障和修复逻辑的tft进行定性分析，以及(iii)通过将修复感知tft转换为SAN来量化可靠性。该方法提供了对多个和替代故障和修复场景的影响的洞察，并且因此可用于通常采用软件以各种方式利用功能冗余的可重构系统。
papers.title_zh: 明确的建模和维修预测可靠性

papers.title: A Risk Management Approach to Defending Against the Advanced Persistent Threat
papers.authors: Lu-Xing Yang, Pengdeng Li, Xiaofan Yang, Yuan Yan Tang
papers.abstract: The advanced persistent threat (APT) as a new kind of cyber attack has posed a severe threat to modern organizations. When the APT has been detected, the organization has to deal with the APT response problem, i.e., to allocate the available response resources to fix her insecure hosts so as to mitigate her potential loss. This paper addresses the APT response problem by using the risk management approach. First, we introduce a model characterizing the evolution of the organization's expected state. By analyzing this model, we find the organization's expected state approaches a common limit expected state. Then, we use the organization's expected loss per unit time to measure her potential loss, and we find this measure is determined by the organization's limit expected state. On this basis, we model the APT response problem as a game-theoretic problem (the APT response game) in which the organization seeks a Nash equilibrium. We present a greedy algorithm for solving the game. Comparative experiments show that the algorithm is effective. Therefore, we recommend the response strategy generated by performing the algorithm. These findings contribute to defending against the APT. To our knowledge, this is the first time the APT response problem is addressed.
papers.abstract_zh: 高级持续威胁(APT)作为一种新型网络攻击，对现代组织构成了严重威胁。当检测到APT时，组织必须处理APT响应问题，即分配可用的响应资源来修复其不安全的主机，以减轻其潜在的损失。本文通过使用风险管理方法来解决APT响应问题。首先，我们引入一个模型来描述组织期望状态的演变。通过分析这个模型，我们发现组织的期望状态接近于一个共同的极限期望状态。然后，我们用单位时间内组织的期望损失来度量她的潜在损失，我们发现这个度量是由组织的极限期望状态决定的。在此基础上，我们将APT响应问题建模为组织寻求纳什均衡的博弈论问题(APT响应博弈)。我们提出了一种求解该博弈的贪婪算法。对比实验表明该算法是有效的。因此，我们推荐通过执行算法生成的响应策略。这些发现有助于防御APT。据我们所知，这是第一次处理APT响应问题。
papers.title_zh: 防御先进持续威胁的风险管理方法

papers.title: Disclose More and Risk Less: Privacy Preserving Online Social Network Data Sharing
papers.authors: Jiayi Chen, Jianping He, Lin Cai, Jianping Pan
papers.abstract: Many third-party services and applications have integrated the login services of popular Online Social Networks, such as Facebook and Google+, and acquired user information to enrich their services by requesting user's permission. Although users can control the information disclosed to the third parties in a certain granularity, there are still serious privacy risks due to the inference attack. Even if users conceal their sensitive information, attackers can infer their secrets by exploiting the correlations among private and public information with background knowledge. To defend against such attacks, we formulate the social network data sharing problem through an optimization-based approach, which maximizes the users’ self-disclosure utility while preserving their privacy. We propose two privacy-preserving social network data sharing methods to counter the inference attack. One is the efficiency-based privacy-preserving disclosure algorithm (EPPD) targeting the high utility, and the other is to convert the original problem into a multi-dimensional knapsack problem (d-KP) using greedy heuristics with a low computational complexity. We use real-world social network datasets to evaluate the performance. From the results, the proposed methods achieve a better performance when compared with the existing ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多第三方服务和应用程序集成了流行的在线社交网络的登录服务，如脸书和Google+，并通过请求用户的许可来获取用户信息以丰富其服务。虽然用户可以在一定的粒度上控制向第三方公开的信息，但由于推理攻击，仍然存在严重的隐私风险。即使用户隐藏了他们的敏感信息，攻击者也可以利用背景知识，利用私有信息和公共信息之间的相关性推断出他们的秘密。为了抵御这种攻击，我们通过一种基于优化的方法来描述社交网络数据共享问题，这种方法在保护用户隐私的同时最大化了用户的自我披露效用。我们提出了两种隐私保护的社交网络数据共享方法来对抗推理攻击。一种是以高效用为目标的基于效率的隐私保护披露算法(EPPD ),另一种是利用低计算复杂度的贪婪启发式算法将原问题转化为多维背包问题(d-KP)。我们使用真实世界的社交网络数据集来评估性能。实验结果表明，与现有方法相比，本文提出的方法具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 披露更多和风险更少：保存在线社交网络数据共享的隐私

papers.title: Sparse Matrix Masking-Based Non-Interactive Verifiable (Outsourced) Computation, Revisited
papers.authors: Liang Zhao, Liqun Chen
papers.abstract: A Privacy-preserving Verifiable (outsourced) Computation (PVC) protocol enables a resource-constrained client to outsource expensive and sensitive workloads to computationally powerful but possibly untrusted service providers (called workers) and to verify the correctness of the results. In a PVC protocol, the inputs and outputs of the computation are hidden, so that the worker is unable to determine them. This is referred to as the privacy property. A Non-interactive PVC (NPVC) protocol is a PVC protocol without communications between a client and worker, apart from distributing the workloads and results. In the literature, Sparse Matrices (SMs) have been used in NPVC protocols to efficiently hide the inputs and outputs from the worker. However, to the best of our knowledge, how the low density of an SM affects privacy in such NPVC protocols has not been formally analyzed. In this work, we first propose a formal definition of the privacy property of an NPVC protocol with respect to matrix density. We use this definition to demonstrate that all of the SM masking-based NPVC protocols that we know of do not hold this privacy property under the ciphertext-only attack model. We then propose an SM masking construction to modify two of those protocols, chosen because they are state-of-the-art, and prove that the modified protocols hold the privacy property under the chosen-plaintext attack model. Our modifications do not require the client operating matrix inversion, and they are able to keep the same level of high performance and all other properties as the originals.
papers.abstract_zh: 保护隐私的可验证(外包)计算(PVC)协议使资源受限的客户端能够将昂贵且敏感的工作负载外包给计算能力强大但可能不可信的服务提供商(称为工作者),并验证结果的正确性。在PVC协议中，计算的输入和输出是隐藏的，因此工作人员无法确定它们。这被称为隐私属性。非交互式PVC (NPVC)协议是一种除了分配工作负载和结果之外，客户端和工作者之间没有通信的PVC协议。在文献中，稀疏矩阵(SMs)已经被用于NPVC协议中，以有效地对工作者隐藏输入和输出。然而，据我们所知，在这种NPVC协议中，SM的低密度如何影响隐私还没有被正式分析。在这项工作中，我们首先提出了一个关于矩阵密度的NPVC协议隐私属性的形式化定义。我们使用这个定义来证明我们所知道的所有基于SM掩码的NPVC协议在纯密文攻击模型下不具有这种隐私属性。然后，我们提出了一个SM屏蔽结构来修改其中的两个协议，选择它们是因为它们是最先进的，并证明了修改后的协议在选择明文攻击模型下保持隐私属性。我们的修改不需要客户端操作矩阵求逆，并且它们能够保持与原始版本相同水平的高性能和所有其他属性。
papers.title_zh: 基于稀疏矩阵掩蔽的非相互作用可验证（外包）计算，重新审视

papers.title: Attribute-Based Hybrid Boolean Keyword Search over Outsourced Encrypted Data
papers.authors: Kai He, Jun Guo, Jian Weng, Jia-Si Weng, Joseph K. Liu, Xun Yi
papers.abstract: With cloud computing becoming increasingly popular, there has been a rapid increase in the number of data owners who outsource their data to the cloud while allowing users to retrieve the data. To preserve the privacy of data, data owners usually encrypt their data before outsourcing them to the cloud, and cloud servers can search across the ciphertext domain on behalf of users without learning any information about the data. However, existing work in the literature mostly supports only a single-user or single-keyword search which is not able to satisfy more desired expressive search. Thus, we propose a searchable encryption primitive with attribute-based access control for hybrid boolean keyword search over outsourced encrypted data. There exist several desirable features: (1) Data owners can set search permissions for outsourced encrypted data according to an access control policy. (2) Multiple users, whose attributes satisfy the access control policy, are allowed to perform a retrieval operation upon the encrypted data. (3) Authorized users are able to perform more expressive search, such as any required boolean keyword expression search. Additionally, this primitive is provably secure under our security model and we have also implemented the prototype to show the practicality of the primitive.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云计算变得越来越流行，将数据外包给云同时允许用户检索数据的数据所有者的数量迅速增加。为了保护数据的隐私，数据所有者通常会在将数据外包给云之前对其进行加密，云服务器可以代表用户在密文域中进行搜索，而无需了解数据的任何信息。然而，现有文献中的工作大多只支持单用户或单关键词搜索，不能满足更多期望的表达性搜索。因此，我们提出了一个基于属性访问控制的可搜索加密原语，用于外包加密数据的混合布尔关键字搜索。存在几个期望的特征:(1)数据所有者可以根据访问控制策略设置外包加密数据的搜索许可。(2)允许属性满足访问控制策略的多个用户对加密数据进行检索操作。(3)授权用户能够执行更具表达性的搜索，例如任何所需的布尔关键字表达式搜索。此外，这个原语在我们的安全模型下是可证明安全的，我们也实现了原型来展示这个原语的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 基于属性的混合布尔值关键字搜索外包加密数据

papers.title: You Can Access but You Cannot Leak: Defending Against Illegal Content Redistribution in Encrypted Cloud Media Center
papers.authors: Leo Yu Zhang, Yifeng Zheng, Jian Weng, Cong Wang, Zihao Shan, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: The wide adoption of cloud greatly facilitates the sharing of explosively generated media content today, yet deprives content providers’ direct control over the outsourced media content. Thus, it is pivotal to build an encrypted cloud media center where only authorized access is allowed. Enforcing access control alone, however, cannot fully protect content providers’ interests, as authorized users may later become traitors that illegally redistribute media content to the public. Such realistic threat should have been seriously treated yet is largely overlooked in the literature. In this paper, we initiate the first study on secure media sharing with fair traitor tracing in the encrypted cloud media center, through a new marriage of proxy re-encryption (for secure media sharing) and fair watermarking (for fair traitor tracing). Our key insight is to fully leverage the homomorphic properties residing in proxy re-encryption to embrace operations in fair watermarking. Two protocols are proposed for different application scenarios. We also provide complexity analysis for performance, showing that our work can also be treated as secure outsourcing of fair watermarking, and thus kills two birds with one stone. We thoroughly analyze the security strengths and conduct extensive experiments to validate the effectiveness of our design.
papers.abstract_zh: 云的广泛采用极大地促进了当今爆炸性生成的媒体内容的共享，但剥夺了内容提供商对外包媒体内容的直接控制。因此，建立一个只允许授权访问的加密云媒体中心至关重要。然而，仅仅实施访问控制并不能完全保护内容提供商的利益，因为授权用户以后可能成为向公众非法再分发媒体内容的叛徒。这种现实的威胁本应得到认真对待，但在文献中却被大大忽略了。在本文中，我们通过代理再加密(用于安全媒体共享)和公平水印(用于公平叛逆者追踪)的新结合，在加密云媒体中心发起了第一个具有公平叛逆者追踪的安全媒体共享研究。我们的关键见解是充分利用代理重新加密中的同态属性来包含公平水印中的操作。针对不同的应用场景提出了两种协议。我们还提供了性能的复杂性分析，表明我们的工作也可以被视为公平水印的安全外包，从而一举两得。我们彻底分析了安全优势，并进行了大量的实验来验证我们设计的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 您可以访问但无法泄漏：防御加密云媒体中心中的非法内容重新分布

papers.title: Design, Analysis and Application of Embedded Resistive RAM Based Strong Arbiter PUF
papers.authors: Rekha Govindaraj, Swaroop Ghosh, Srinivas Katkoori
papers.abstract: Resistive Random Access Memory (RRAM) based Physical Unclonable Function (PUF) designs exploit either the probabilistic switching or the resistance variability during forming, SET and RESET processes of RRAM. Memory PUFs using RRAM are typically weak PUFs due to fewer number of challenge response pairs. We propose a strong arbiter PUF based on 1T-1R bit cell which is designed from conventional RRAM memory array with minimally invasive changes. Conventional voltage sense amplifier is repurposed to act like an arbiter and generate the response. Similarly, address and data lines are repurposed to act as challenge and response bits respectively. The PUF is simulated using 65 nm predictive technology models for CMOS and Verilog-A model for a hafnium oxide based RRAM. The proposed PUF architecture is evaluated for uniqueness, uniformity and reliability for various number of stages. It demonstrates mean intra-die Hamming Distance (HD) of 0.135 percent and inter-die HD of 51.4 percent, and passes the NIST tests. We study the vulnerability of proposed PUF to machine learning attacks. We also present an application of proposed PUF for data attestation in the internet of things. Proposed PUF-based data attestation consumes 9.88pJ of total energy per data block of 64-bits and offers a speed of 120.7 kbps.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于电阻随机存取存储器(RRAM)的物理不可克隆功能(PUF)设计利用了RRAM的形成、设置和复位过程中的概率切换或电阻可变性。由于较少数量的挑战响应对，使用RRAM的存储器puf通常是弱puf。我们提出了一种基于1T-1R位单元的强仲裁器PUF，该位单元是从传统的RRAM存储器阵列经过最小侵入性改变而设计的。传统的电压检测放大器被重新设计为仲裁器并产生响应。类似地，地址线和数据线被重新调整用途，分别用作挑战位和响应位。使用用于CMOS的65 nm预测技术模型和用于基于氧化铪的RRAM的Verilog模型来模拟PUF。对所提出的PUF体系结构的独特性、一致性和可靠性进行了评估。它表现出平均芯片内汉明距离(HD)为0.135%，芯片间HD为51.4%，并通过了NIST测试。我们研究了提出的PUF对机器学习攻击的脆弱性。我们还提出了一个PUF在物联网数据认证中的应用。提出的基于PUF的数据证明消耗每个64位数据块9.88pJ的总能量，并提供120.7 kbps的速度。
papers.title_zh: 设计，分析和应用嵌入式电阻RAM的强司机PUF

papers.title: Benchmarking the Capability of Symbolic Execution Tools with Logic Bombs
papers.authors: Hui Xu, Zirui Zhao, Yangfan Zhou, Michael R. Lyu
papers.abstract: Symbolic execution has become an indispensable technique for software testing and program analysis. However, since several symbolic execution tools are presently available off-the-shelf, there is a need for a practical benchmarking approach. This paper introduces a fresh approach that can help benchmark symbolic execution tools in a fine-grained and efficient manner. The approach evaluates the performance of such tools against known challenges faced by general symbolic execution techniques, e.g., floating-point numbers and symbolic memories. We first survey related papers and systematize the challenges of symbolic execution. We extract 12 distinct challenges from the literature and categorize them into two categories: symbolic-reasoning challenges and path-explosion challenges. Next, we develop a dataset of logic bombs and a framework for benchmarking symbolic execution tools automatically. For each challenge, our dataset contains several logic bombs, each addressing a specific challenging problem. Triggering one or more logic bombs confirms that the symbolic execution tool in question is able to handle the corresponding problem. Real-world experiments with three popular symbolic execution tools, namely, KLEE, angr, and Triton have shown that our approach can reveal the capabilities and limitations of the tools in handling specific issues accurately and efficiently. The benchmarking process generally takes only a few dozens of minutes to evaluate a tool. We have released our dataset on GitHub as open source, with an aim to better facilitate the community to conduct future work on benchmarking symbolic execution tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 符号执行已经成为软件测试和程序分析不可或缺的技术。然而，由于目前有几种现成的符号执行工具，因此需要一种实用的基准测试方法。本文介绍了一种全新的方法，可以帮助以细粒度和高效的方式对符号执行工具进行基准测试。该方法针对通用符号执行技术(例如浮点数和符号存储器)所面临的已知挑战来评估这些工具的性能。我们首先调查相关论文，并系统化符号执行的挑战。我们从文献中提取了12个不同的挑战，并将它们分为两类:符号推理挑战和路径爆炸挑战。接下来，我们开发了一个逻辑炸弹数据集和一个自动基准符号执行工具的框架。对于每个挑战，我们的数据集包含几个逻辑炸弹，每个解决一个特定的挑战性问题。触发一个或多个逻辑炸弹确认了所讨论的符号执行工具能够处理相应的问题。使用三个流行的符号执行工具(即KLEE、angr和Triton)进行的真实世界实验表明，我们的方法可以准确有效地揭示这些工具在处理特定问题时的能力和局限性。基准测试过程通常只需要几十分钟来评估一个工具。我们已经在GitHub上开源发布了我们的数据集，目的是更好地促进社区在基准符号执行工具上开展未来的工作。
papers.title_zh: 用逻辑炸弹对符号执行工具的功能进行基准测试

papers.title: A Bayesian Game Theoretic Approach for Inspecting Web-Based Malvertising
papers.authors: Chin-Tser Huang, Muhammad N. Sakib, Charles A. Kamhoua, Kevin A. Kwiat, Laurent Njilla
papers.abstract: Web-based advertising systems have been exploited by cybercriminals to disseminate malware to an enormous number of end-users and their vulnerable machines. To protect their malicious ads and malware from detection by the ad network, malvertisers apply various redirection and evasion techniques. Meanwhile, the ad network can also apply inspection techniques to spoil the malvertiser's tricks and expose the malware. However, both the malvertiser and the ad network are under resource and time constraints. Moreover, the ad network is disadvantaged because it has incomplete information about whether it is facing a benign or malicious advertiser. In this paper, we aim to apply the Bayesian game model by designing two games to formulate the problem of inspecting the Web-based maladvertising. The first game has two types of Advertisers, namely Malicious and Benign, and one type of Defender; the second game has two types of Attackers, Advanced and Simple, in terms of their capability of redirection and evasion, and one type of Defender. We define their strategies and payoff functions, and compute their Bayesian Nash equilibria. We use numeric simulation to evaluate our game theoretic models, and we derive several insights from the results that can serve as guidelines for the ad network to decide its best inspection strategy.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络犯罪分子利用基于Web的广告系统向大量最终用户及其易受攻击的机器传播恶意软件。为了保护他们的恶意广告和恶意软件不被广告网络检测到，恶意广告者应用各种重定向和规避技术。同时，广告网络还可以应用检测技术来破坏恶意广告者的伎俩并揭露恶意软件。然而，恶意广告客户和广告网络都受到资源和时间的限制。此外，广告网络处于不利地位，因为它没有关于它面对的是良性还是恶意广告客户的完整信息。在本文中，我们的目的是应用贝叶斯博弈模型，通过设计两个游戏来制定的问题，检查基于网络的不当广告。第一个游戏有两种类型的广告商，即恶意和良性，以及一种类型的防御者；第二个游戏有两种类型的攻击者，高级和简单，根据他们的重定向和规避能力，以及一种类型的防御者。我们定义他们的策略和支付函数，并计算他们的贝叶斯纳什均衡。我们使用数值模拟来评估我们的博弈模型，并从结果中得出一些见解，这些见解可以作为广告网络决定其最佳检查策略的指南。
papers.title_zh: 一种用于检查基于Web的恶化的贝叶斯游戏理论方法

papers.title: Lattice-Based Public Key Searchable Encryption from Experimental Perspectives
papers.authors: Rouzbeh Behnia, Muslum Ozgur Ozmen, Attila Altay Yavuz
papers.abstract: Public key Encryption with Keyword Search (PEKS) aims in mitigating the impacts of data privacy versus utilization dilemma by allowing any user in the system to send encrypted files to the server to be searched by a receiver. The receiver can retrieve the encrypted files containing specific keywords by providing the corresponding trapdoors of these keywords to the server. Despite their merits, the existing PEKS schemes introduce a high end-to-end delay that may hinder their adoption in practice. Moreover, they do not scale well for large security parameters and provide no post-quantum security promises. In this paper, we propose two novel lattice-based PEKS schemes that offer a high computational efficiency along with better security assurances than that of the existing alternatives. Specifically, our NTRU-PEKS scheme achieves 18 times lower end-to-end delay than the most efficient pairing-based alternatives. Our LWE-PEKS offers provable security in the standard model with a reduction to the worst-case lattice problems. We fully implemented our NTRU-PEKS scheme and benchmarked its performance as deployed on Amazon Web Services cloud infrastructures.
papers.abstract_zh: 带有关键字搜索的公钥加密(PEKS)旨在通过允许系统中的任何用户向服务器发送加密文件以供接收者搜索，来减轻数据隐私与利用两难的影响。接收者可以通过向服务器提供这些关键字的相应陷门来检索包含特定关键字的加密文件。尽管有其优点，但是现有的PEKS方案引入了高的端到端延迟，这可能阻碍它们在实践中的采用。此外，它们不能很好地适应大的安全参数，也不能提供后量子安全承诺。在本文中，我们提出了两个新的基于格的PEKS方案，它们提供了比现有方案更高的计算效率和更好的安全保证。具体来说，我们的NTRU-PEKS方案实现了比最有效的基于配对的替代方案低18倍的端到端延迟。我们的LWE-PEKS在标准模型下提供了可证明的安全性，并减少了最坏情况下的格问题。我们完全实施了我们的NTRU-佩克斯方案，并对其部署在亚马逊网络服务云基础设施上的性能进行了基准测试。
papers.title_zh: 从实验角度来看，基于晶格的公钥可搜索加密

papers.title: Pagoda: A Hybrid Approach to Enable Efficient Real-Time Provenance Based Intrusion Detection in Big Data Environments
papers.authors: Yulai Xie, Dan Feng, Yuchong Hu, Yan Li, Staunton Sample, Darrell D. E. Long
papers.abstract: Efficient intrusion detection and analysis of the security landscape in big data environments present challenge for today's users. Intrusion behavior can be described by provenance graphs that record the dependency relationships between intrusion processes and the infected files. Existing intrusion detection methods typically analyze and identify the anomaly either in a single provenance path or the whole provenance graph, neither of which can achieve the benefit on both detection accuracy and detection time. We propose Pagoda, a hybrid approach that takes into account the anomaly degree of both a single provenance path and the whole provenance graph. It can identify intrusion quickly if a serious compromise has been found on one path, and can further improve the detection rate by considering the behavior representation in the whole provenance graph. Pagoda uses a persistent memory database to store provenance and aggregates multiple similar items into one provenance record to maximumly reduce unnecessary I/O during the detection analysis. In addition, it encodes duplicate items in the rule database and filters noise that does not contain intrusion information. The experimental results on a wide variety of real-world applications demonstrate its performance and efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 高效的入侵检测和分析大数据环境中的安全形势是当今用户面临的挑战。入侵行为可以用起源图来描述，起源图记录了入侵过程和被感染文件之间的依赖关系。现有的入侵检测方法通常是在单个来源路径或整个来源图中分析和识别异常，这两种方法都不能同时兼顾检测精度和检测时间。我们提出了Pagoda，一种混合的方法，同时考虑了单个起源路径和整个起源图的异常程度。如果在一条路径上发现了严重的危害，它可以快速地识别入侵，并通过考虑整个起源图中的行为表示来进一步提高检测率。Pagoda使用持久性内存数据库来存储出处，并将多个相似的项目聚合到一个出处记录中，以最大限度地减少检测分析期间不必要的I/O。此外，它对规则数据库中的重复项进行编码，并过滤不包含入侵信息的噪音。在各种实际应用中的实验结果证明了该算法的性能和效率。
papers.title_zh: 宝塔：一种混合方法，用于在大数据环境中启用有效的基于实时出处的侵入式检测

papers.title: Precision-Enhanced Differentially-Private Mining of High-Confidence Association Rules
papers.authors: Mihai Maruseac, Gabriel Ghinita
papers.abstract: Association rule mining discovers patterns in large data repositories, and benefits diverse application domains such as healthcare, marketing, etc. However, mining datasets that contain data about individuals may cause significant privacy breaches. Recent research addresses the privacy threats that arise when mining sensitive data, and several techniques allow data mining with differential privacy guarantees. However, existing methods only discover rules that have very large support, i.e., occur in a large fraction of the dataset transactions (typically, more than 50 percent). This is a serious limitation, as numerous high-quality rules do not reach such high frequencies (e.g., rules about rare diseases, or luxury merchandise). We propose a method that focuses on mining high-quality association rules with moderate and low frequencies. We employ a novel technique for rule extraction that combines the exponential mechanism of differential privacy with reservoir sampling. The proposed algorithm allows us to directly mine association rules, without the need to compute noisy supports for large numbers of itemsets. Our experimental evaluation shows that our technique is able to sample low- and moderate-support rules with good precision, clearly outperforming existing solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 关联规则挖掘发现大型数据仓库中的模式，并有益于不同的应用领域，如医疗保健，营销等。然而，挖掘包含个人数据的数据集可能会导致严重的隐私泄露。最近的研究解决了挖掘敏感数据时出现的隐私威胁，一些技术允许数据挖掘具有不同的隐私保证。然而，现有方法仅发现具有非常大的支持度的规则，即，出现在数据集事务的大部分中(通常，超过50%)。这是一个严重的限制，因为许多高质量的规则不会达到如此高的频率(例如，关于罕见疾病或奢侈品的规则)。我们提出了一种方法，集中于挖掘高质量的中低频关联规则。我们采用一种新颖的规则提取技术，将差分隐私的指数机制与储层采样相结合。该算法允许我们直接挖掘关联规则，而不需要计算大量项目集的噪声支持。我们的实验评估表明，我们的技术能够以良好的精度对低支持度和中等支持度的规则进行采样，明显优于现有的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 高信心协会规则的精确增强差异性采矿

papers.title: Detection and Defense of Cache Pollution Attacks Using Clustering in Named Data Networks
papers.authors: Lin Yao, Zhenzhen Fan, Jing Deng, Xin Fan, Guowei Wu
papers.abstract: Named Data Network (NDN), as a promising information-centric networking architecture, is expected to support next-generation of large-scale content distribution with open in-network cachings. However, such open in-network caches are vulnerable against Cache Pollution Attacks (CPAs) with the goal of filling cache storage with non-popular contents. The detection and defense against such attacks are especially difficult because of CPA's similarities with normal fluctuations of content requests. In this work, we use a clustering technique to detect and defend against CPAs. By clustering the content interests, our scheme is able to distinguish whether they have followed the Zipf-like distribution or not for accurate detections. Once any attack is detected, an attack table will be updated to record the abnormal requests. While such requests are still forwarded, the corresponding content chunks are not cached. Extensive simulations in ndnSIM demonstrate that our scheme can resist CPA effectively with higher cache hit, higher detecting ratio, lower hop count, and lower algorithm complexity compared to other state-of-the-art schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 命名数据网络(NDN)作为一种有前途的以信息为中心的网络架构，有望支持下一代具有开放网内缓存的大规模内容分发。然而，这种开放的网络内高速缓存容易受到高速缓存污染攻击(CPAs ),其目标是用不流行的内容填充高速缓存存储。由于CPA与内容请求的正常波动的相似性，检测和防御这种攻击尤其困难。在这项工作中，我们使用聚类技术来检测和防范CPAs。通过对内容兴趣进行聚类，我们的方案能够区分它们是否遵循Zipf-like分布，从而进行准确的检测。一旦检测到任何攻击，就会更新攻击表来记录异常请求。虽然此类请求仍会被转发，但相应的内容块不会被缓存。在ndnSIM中的大量仿真实验表明，与其他方案相比，该方案能有效抵抗CPA攻击，具有更高的缓存命中率、更高的检测率、更低的跳数和更低的算法复杂度。
papers.title_zh: 使用命名数据网络中的聚类检测和防御缓存污染攻击

papers.title: Multi-User Verifiable Searchable Symmetric Encryption for Cloud Storage
papers.authors: Xueqiao Liu, Guomin Yang, Yi Mu, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: In a cloud data storage system, symmetric key encryption is usually used to encrypt files due to its high efficiency. In order allow the untrusted/semi-trusted cloud storage server to perform searching over encrypted data while maintaining data confidentiality, searchable symmetric encryption (SSE) has been proposed. In a typical SSE scheme, a users stores encrypted files on a cloud storage server and later can retrieve the encrypted files containing specific keywords. The basic security requirement of SSE is that the cloud server learns no information about the files or the keywords during the searching process. Some SSE schemes also offer additional functionalities such as detecting cheating behavior of a malicious server (i.e., verifiability) and allowing update (e.g., modifying, deleting and adding) of documents on the server. However, the previous (verifiable) SSE schemes were designed for single users, which means the searching can only be done by the data owner, whereas in reality people often use cloud storage to share files with other users. In this paper we present a multi-user verifiable searchable symmetric encryption (MVSSE) scheme that achieves all the desirable features of a verifiable SSE and allows multiple users to perform searching. We then define an ideal functionality for MVSSE under the Universally Composable (UC-) security framework and prove that our ideal functionality implies the security requirements of a secure MVSSE, and our multi-user verifiable SSE scheme is UC-secure. We also implement our scheme to verify its high performance based on some real dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 在云数据存储系统中，对称密钥加密因其高效性通常被用于加密文件。为了允许不可信/半可信云存储服务器在保持数据机密性的同时对加密数据执行搜索，已经提出了可搜索对称加密(SSE)。在典型的SSE方案中，用户将加密文件存储在云存储服务器上，稍后可以检索包含特定关键字的加密文件。SSE的基本安全要求是云服务器在搜索过程中不了解文件或关键字的任何信息。一些SSE方案还提供附加功能，例如检测恶意服务器的欺骗行为(即，可验证性)以及允许更新(例如，修改、删除和添加)服务器上的文档。然而，以前的(可验证的)SSE方案是为单个用户设计的，这意味着搜索只能由数据所有者完成，而在现实中，人们经常使用云存储与其他用户共享文件。在本文中，我们提出了一个多用户可验证可搜索对称加密(MVSSE)方案，它实现了可验证对称加密的所有理想特性，并允许多个用户执行搜索。然后，我们在通用可组合(UC-)安全框架下定义了MVSSE的理想功能，并证明了我们的理想功能隐含了安全MVSSE的安全需求，并且我们的多用户可验证SSE方案是UC-安全的。我们还实现了我们的方案，并在一些真实数据集上验证了它的高性能。
papers.title_zh: 多用户可验证的可搜索的对称加密，用于云存储

papers.title: The Authorization Policy Existence Problem
papers.authors: Pierre Bergé, Jason Crampton, Gregory Z. Gutin, Rémi Watrigant
papers.abstract: Constraints such as separation-of-duty are widely used to specify requirements that supplement basic authorization policies. However, the existence of constraints (and authorization policies) may mean that a user is unable to fulfill her/his organizational duties because access to resources has been denied. In short, there is a tension between the need to protect resources (using policies and constraints) and the availability of resources. Recent work on workflow satisfiability and resiliency in access control asks whether this tension compromises the ability of an organization to achieve its objectives. In this paper, we develop a new method of specifying constraints which subsumes much related work and allows a wider range of constraints to be specified. The use of such constraints leads naturally to a range of questions related to “policy existence”, where a positive answer means that an organization's objectives can be realized. We analyze the complexity of these policy existence questions and, for particular sub-classes of constraints defined by our language, develop fixed-parameter tractable algorithms to solve them.11.An extended abstract of this paper appeared in the Proceedings of the Seventh ACM Conference on Data and Application Security and Privacy [1]. Research was partially supported by Leverhulme Trust grant RPG-2018-161 and Royal Society Wolfson Research Merit Award.
papers.abstract_zh: 职责分离等约束被广泛用于指定补充基本授权策略的需求。然而，约束(和授权策略)的存在可能意味着用户无法履行她/他的组织职责，因为对资源的访问被拒绝。简而言之，保护资源的需要(使用策略和约束)和资源的可用性之间存在矛盾。最近关于访问控制中工作流可满足性和弹性的工作提出了这样一个问题:这种紧张关系是否会损害组织实现其目标的能力。在本文中，我们开发了一种新的方法来指定约束，它包含了许多相关的工作，并允许指定更大范围的约束。使用这种约束自然会导致一系列与“政策存在”有关的问题，其中肯定的答案意味着一个组织的目标可以实现。我们分析这些策略存在问题的复杂性，并针对我们的语言所定义的约束的特定子类，开发固定参数的易处理算法来解决它们。11 .本文的扩展摘要出现在第七届ACM数据和应用安全与隐私会议的会议录中[1]。研究得到了lever Hulme Trust grant RPG-2018-161和皇家学会Wolfson研究优秀奖的部分支持。
papers.title_zh: 授权政策存在问题

2021.journals_title: IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing, Volume 18

papers.title: Efficient Analysis of Repairable Computing Systems Subject to Scheduled Checkpointing
papers.authors: Yuchang Mo, Liudong Xing, Yi-Kuei Lin, Wenzhong Guo
papers.abstract: To improve the success probability of a mission execution, scheduled checkpointing is often implemented to save completed portions of the mission task so that a system can resume the mission execution effectively after its restoration whenever the system failure occurs. This paper considers a repairable computing system subject to the scheduled checkpointing. The checkpointing intervals are deterministic, but can be even or uneven. The system repair time is fixed while the system time-to-failure can follow any arbitrary type of distributions. The maximum number of repairs is specified by a certain threshold value. A multi-valued decision diagram (MDD)-based analytical approach is proposed to evaluate the exact success probability of a mission execution for the considered repairable system. The proposed approach enables generating a compact mission MDD model where identical subMDD models can be merged to improve computational efficiency and reduce storage requirement. The MDD model, once being constructed, can be reused for system reliability evaluations using different input parameter values. A benchmark study is presented to show the efficiency of proposed MDD approach. A case study is performed to illustrate the application of the proposed MDD approach to facilitate decision making about proper system design and parameter selection.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了提高任务执行的成功概率，通常采用调度检查点来保存任务任务的已完成部分，以便在系统发生故障时，系统可以在恢复后有效地恢复任务执行。本文考虑了一个受定期检查点约束的可修复计算系统。检查点间隔是确定的，但可以是均匀的，也可以是不均匀的。系统修复时间是固定的，而系统无故障时间可以服从任意类型的分布。修复的最大次数由某个阈值指定。针对所考虑的可修复系统，提出了一种基于多值决策图(MDD)的分析方法来评估任务执行的精确成功概率。所提出的方法能够生成紧凑的任务MDD模型，其中相同的子模型可以被合并以提高计算效率并减少存储需求。MDD模型一旦建立，就可以使用不同的输入参数值重复用于系统可靠性评估。一个基准研究表明了所提出的MDD方法的有效性。一个案例研究被执行来说明所提出的MDD方法的应用，以促进关于正确的系统设计和参数选择的决策。
papers.title_zh: 有效分析可维修计算系统的预定检查点

papers.title: Semantics-Aware Privacy Risk Assessment Using Self-Learning Weight Assignment for Mobile Apps
papers.authors: Jing Chen, Chiheng Wang, Kun He, Ziming Zhao, Min Chen, Ruiying Du, Gail-Joon Ahn
papers.abstract: Most of the existing mobile application (app) vetting mechanisms only estimate risks at a coarse-grained level by analyzing app syntax but not semantics. We propose a semantics-aware privacy risk assessment framework (SPRisk), which considers the sensitivity discrepancy of privacy-related factors at semantic level. Our framework can provide qualitative (i.e., risk level) and quantitative (i.e., risk score) assessment results, both of which help users make decisions to install an app or not. Furthermore, to find the reasonable weight distribution of each factor automatically, we exploit a self-learning weight assignment method, which is based on fuzzy clustering and knowledge dependency theory. We implement a prototype system and evaluate the effectiveness of SPRisk with 192,445 normal apps and 7,111 malicious apps. A measurement study further reveals some interesting findings, such as the privacy risk distribution of Google Play Store, the diversity of official and unofficial marketplaces, which provide insights into understanding the seriousness of privacy threat in the Android ecosystem.
papers.abstract_zh: 大多数现有的移动应用程序(app)审查机制仅通过分析app语法而不是语义来在粗粒度级别上估计风险。我们提出了一个语义感知的隐私风险评估框架(SPRisk ),该框架在语义层面上考虑了隐私相关因素的敏感性差异。我们的框架可以提供定性(即风险级别)和定量(即风险分数)的评估结果，这两种结果都有助于用户做出安装或不安装应用程序的决定。此外，为了自动找到各因素的合理权重分配，我们开发了一种基于模糊聚类和知识依赖理论的自学习权重分配方法。我们实现了一个原型系统，并用192，445个正常应用和7，111个恶意应用评估了SPRisk的有效性。一项测量研究进一步揭示了一些有趣的发现，如谷歌Play商店的隐私风险分布，官方和非官方市场的多样性，这为理解Android生态系统中隐私威胁的严重性提供了见解。
papers.title_zh: 语义意识的隐私风险评估使用移动应用程序的自学习权重分配

papers.title: DNIC Architectural Developments for 0-Knowledge Detection of OPC Malware
papers.authors: Julian L. Rrushi
papers.abstract: We present an anti-malware solution that is able to reliably detect Object Linking and Embedding for Process Control (OPC) malware on machines in production. Detection is attained on the very first encounter with OPC malware, and hence without any prior knowledge of their code and data. We architected the integration of a decoy network interface controller (DNIC) with a layer of kernel code that emulates a target OPC machine. A DNIC displays a (nonexistent) network, which the compromised machine appears to be connected to. OPC emulation displays a valid (but nonexistent) target OPC machine, which appears to be reachable from the compromised machine over the (nonexistent) network. Our code intercepts OPC malware during their search for target machines over the network. Its overall architecture is crafted to validate the infection by leveraging OPC protocol mechanics. The same principles of operation are used to recognize goodware that access a DNIC by accident. Safe co-existence with production functions and real I/O devices is ensured by a monitor filter driver, which removes all decoy data bound for the monitor. We tested our DNIC architectural developments against numerous OPC malware samples involved in the Dragonfly cyber espionage campaign, and discuss the findings in the paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种反恶意软件解决方案，能够可靠地检测生产机器上的过程控制(OPC)恶意软件的对象链接和嵌入。检测是在第一次遇到OPC恶意软件时实现的，因此不需要事先知道它们的代码和数据。我们设计了一个诱饵网络接口控制器(DNIC)与模拟目标OPC机器的内核代码层的集成。DNIC显示一个(不存在的)网络，被入侵的机器似乎连接到该网络。OPC仿真显示一个有效的(但不存在的)目标OPC机器，该机器看起来可以通过(不存在的)网络从受损的机器到达。我们的代码在他们通过网络搜索目标机器的过程中拦截OPC恶意软件。其整体架构通过利用OPC协议机制来验证感染。相同的操作原理用于识别偶然访问DNIC的商品。监视器过滤器驱动程序确保了与生产功能和真实I/O设备的安全共存，该驱动程序删除了所有发往监视器的虚假数据。我们针对蜻蜓网络间谍活动中涉及的大量OPC恶意软件样本测试了我们的DNIC架构开发，并在本文中讨论了这些发现。
papers.title_zh: DNIC建筑发展，用于0-知识检测OPC恶意软件

papers.title: Preventing Overshadowing Attacks in Self-Jamming Audio Channels
papers.authors: Qiao Hu, Yuanzhen Liu, Anjia Yang, Gerhard P. Hancke
papers.abstract: Recently there has been a growing interest in short-range communication using audio channels for device pairing and as a self-jamming communication medium. Given that such channels are audible to participants they are considered more resistant to active attacks, i.e., the attack signal would be heard by the participants. In this paper, we investigate the validity of this assumption using two prominent acoustic self-jamming systems implementations. We show that basic overshadowing attacks are possible in these systems and that these attacks cannot be effectively detected by the participants if the attacker is close to the receiving device. Finally, we propose a novel physical-layer solution for effectively detecting overshadowing attacks, which can improve state-of-the-art acoustic self-jamming systems by ensuring channel integrity while not requiring fundamental modifications to these schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，人们对使用音频信道进行设备配对和作为自干扰通信媒介的短距离通信越来越感兴趣。假设这样的信道对参与者来说是可听见的，那么它们被认为对主动攻击更有抵抗力，即攻击信号会被参与者听到。在本文中，我们研究了这一假设的有效性使用两个突出的声学自干扰系统的实现。我们证明了在这些系统中基本的遮蔽攻击是可能的，并且如果攻击者靠近接收设备，这些攻击不能被参与者有效地检测到。最后，我们提出了一种新的物理层解决方案，用于有效地检测遮蔽攻击，它可以通过确保信道完整性来改进最先进的声学自干扰系统，同时不需要对这些方案进行根本修改。
papers.title_zh: 防止在自我判断的音频频道中遮盖攻击

papers.title: Secure Secret Sharing Enabled b-band Mini Vaults Bio-Cryptosystem for Vectorial Biometrics
papers.authors: Yen-Lung Lai, Jung Yeon Hwang, Zhe Jin, Soohyong Kim, Sangrae Cho, Andrew Beng Jin Teoh
papers.abstract: Biometric Cryptosystems for secret binding such as fuzzy vault and fuzzy commitment are provable secure and offers a convenient way for secret management and protection. Despite numerous practical schemes have been reported, they are deficient in resisting several security and privacy attacks. In this paper, we propose a novel bio-cryptosystem that based on the three key ingredients namely Index of Maximum (IoM) hashing, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(m, k)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bengjin-ieq1-2874245.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> threshold secret sharing and <italic>b</italic>-band mini vaults notion. The IoM hashing is motivated from the ranking based Locality Sensitive Hashing theory meant for non-invertible transformation. On the other hand, the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(m, k)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>m</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="bengjin-ieq2-2874245.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> threshold secret sharing scheme and the <italic>b</italic>-band mini vaults manage overcome inherent limitations of biometric cryptosystems when integrated with IoM hashing. The proposed scheme strikes the balance between performance and the privacy/security protection. Unlike fuzzy vault and fuzzy commitment, which primarily devised for unordered and binary biometrics, respectively, our scheme is tailored for feature vector-based biometrics (vectorial biometrics). Comprehensive experiments on fingerprint vectors that derived from several FVC fingerprint benchmarks and rigorous analysis demonstrate decent secret retrieval performance yet offer strong resilience against six major security and privacy attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 模糊金库和模糊承诺等用于秘密绑定的生物密码系统是可证明安全的，为秘密管理和保护提供了一种方便的方法。尽管已经报道了许多实用的方案，但是它们在抵抗一些安全和隐私攻击方面是有缺陷的。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的生物密码系统，它基于三个关键要素，即最大值指数(IoM)哈希、< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(m，k)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi > m </MML:mi > < MML:mo >、</MML:mo > < MML:mi > k </MML:moIoM散列的动机来自于基于排名的位置敏感散列理论，该理论用于不可逆变换。另一方面，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(m，k)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >(</MML:mi > < MML:mi > m </MML:mi >，</MML:mo > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > < MML:mo >)</MML:mo > </MML:mo所提出的方案在性能和隐私/安全保护之间取得了平衡。与分别主要为无序和二进制生物特征设计的模糊金库和模糊承诺不同，我们的方案是为基于特征向量的生物特征(向量生物特征)定制的。对来自几个FVC指纹基准和严格分析的指纹向量的全面实验表明，秘密检索性能不错，但对六种主要的安全和隐私攻击具有很强的弹性。
papers.title_zh: 安全的秘密共享启用了B波段迷你保险库的生物元素系统的矢量生物识别技术

papers.title: Detecting Adversarial Image Examples in Deep Neural Networks with Adaptive Noise Reduction
papers.authors: Bin Liang, Hongcheng Li, Miaoqiang Su, Xirong Li, Wenchang Shi, Xiaofeng Wang
papers.abstract: Recently, many studies have demonstrated deep neural network (DNN) classifiers can be fooled by the adversarial example, which is crafted via introducing some perturbations into an original sample. Accordingly, some powerful defense techniques were proposed. However, existing defense techniques often require modifying the target model or depend on the prior knowledge of attacks. In this paper, we propose a straightforward method for detecting adversarial image examples, which can be directly deployed into unmodified off-the-shelf DNN models. We consider the perturbation to images as a kind of noise and introduce two classic image processing techniques, scalar quantization and smoothing spatial filter, to reduce its effect. The image entropy is employed as a metric to implement an adaptive noise reduction for different kinds of images. Consequently, the adversarial example can be effectively detected by comparing the classification results of a given sample and its denoised version, without referring to any prior knowledge of attacks. More than 20,000 adversarial examples against some state-of-the-art DNN models are used to evaluate the proposed method, which are crafted with different attack techniques. The experiments show that our detection method can achieve a high overall F1 score of 96.39 percent and certainly raises the bar for defense-aware attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，许多研究表明，深度神经网络(DNN)分类器可以被对立样本欺骗，对立样本是通过在原始样本中引入一些扰动而制作的。相应地，一些强有力的防御技术被提出。然而，现有的防御技术通常需要修改目标模型或者依赖于攻击的先验知识。在本文中，我们提出了一种直接的方法来检测对立的图像实例，可以直接部署到未经修改的现成的DNN模型。我们将对图像的扰动视为一种噪声，并引入两种经典的图像处理技术——标量量化和平滑空间滤波来降低其影响。采用图像熵作为度量来实现不同种类图像的自适应降噪。因此，通过比较给定样本及其去噪版本的分类结果，可以有效地检测出对抗样本，而无需参考任何攻击的先验知识。超过20，000个针对一些最先进的DNN模型的对抗例子被用来评估所提出的方法，这些例子是用不同的攻击技术制作的。实验表明，我们的检测方法可以达到96.39%的总体F1值，无疑提高了防御意识攻击的标准。
papers.title_zh: 检测具有自适应噪音的深神经网络中的对抗图像示例

papers.title: Distributed Attack Detection in a Water Treatment Plant: Method and Case Study
papers.authors: Sridhar Adepu, Aditya Mathur
papers.abstract: The rise in attempted and successful attacks on critical infrastructure, such as power grid and water treatment plants, has led to an urgent need for the creation and adoption of methods for detecting such attacks often launched either by insiders or state actors. This paper focuses on one such method that aims at the detection of attacks that compromise one or more actuators and sensors in a plant either through successful intrusion in the plant's communication network or directly through the plant computers. The method, labelled as Distributed Attack Detection (DAD), detects attacks in real-time by identifying anomalies in the behavior of the physical process in the plant. Anomalies are identified by using monitors that are implementations of invariants derived from the plant design. Each invariant must hold either throughout the plant operation, or when the plant is in a given state. The effectiveness of DAD was assessed experimentally on an operational water treatment plant named SWaT that is a near-replica of commercially available large treatment plants. The method used in DAD was found to be effective in detecting stealthy and coordinated attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 对电网和水处理厂等关键基础设施的未遂攻击和成功攻击的增加，导致迫切需要建立和采用检测这种通常由内部人员或国家行为者发起的攻击的方法。本文关注于一种这样的方法，其目的在于检测通过成功入侵工厂的通信网络或直接通过工厂的计算机来危害工厂中的一个或多个执行器和传感器的攻击。该方法被称为分布式攻击检测(DAD)，通过识别工厂中物理过程的行为异常来实时检测攻击。通过使用监视器来识别异常，监视器是从工厂设计中导出的不变量的实现。每个不变量必须在整个工厂运行期间或当工厂处于给定状态时保持不变。DAD的有效性是在一个名为SWaT的可运行的水处理厂进行实验评估的，该水处理厂是商业上可获得的大型水处理厂的近似复制品。在DAD中使用的方法被发现在检测秘密的和协同的攻击中是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 水处理厂中的分布式攻击检测：方法和案例研究

papers.title: oGBAC - A Group Based Access Control Framework for Information Sharing in Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Donghui Hu, Chunya Hu, Yuqi Fan, Xintao Wu
papers.abstract: Internet users receive various online social networks (OSNs) services, however, providers of OSNs do not always provide users fine-grained privacy protection mechanisms with sufficient privacy protection for shared resources. In this paper, we propose a formal Group-Based Access Control (oGBAC) framework for preventing privacy disclosure when sharing information within or among groups in OSNs. Our framework extends the group-centric Secure Information Sharing (g-SIS) models by adapting the concept of the group to OSNs. We impose some restrictions to the group and information flow among groups to ensure that operations cannot incur privacy disclosure when sharing information among friends in OSNs. In view of characteristics of OSNs and the requirements of secure information flow, the oGBAC model also incorporates some ideas from the Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC) to develop information flow based rules using relationship among attributes (such as tags, time and security levels) of objects and subjects in OSNs. Administration related rules and access related rules are designed for each access operation of group based OSNs’ information sharing. The security of oGBAC model is analyzed using formal methods. To demonstrate the usability of the oGBAC model, we implement the model with the Comparative Attribute-Based Encryption (CCP-CABE), and analyze the security and efficiency of the implemented system to prove the effectiveness of the implemented system.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网用户接收各种在线社交网络(OSNs)服务，然而，OSNs的提供商并不总是为用户提供细粒度的隐私保护机制，对共享资源提供足够的隐私保护。在本文中，我们提出了一个正式的基于组的访问控制(oGBAC)框架，用于防止OSNs中组内或组间共享信息时的隐私泄露。我们的框架扩展了以组为中心的安全信息共享(g-SIS)模型，将组的概念应用于OSNs。我们对群组和群组之间的信息流动施加一些限制，以确保在OSNs中的朋友之间共享信息时操作不会导致隐私泄露。考虑到OSNs的特点和安全信息流的需求，oGBAC模型还结合了基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)的一些思想，利用OSNs中对象和主体的属性(如标签、时间和安全级别)之间的关系来开发基于信息流的规则。管理相关规则和访问相关规则是为基于组的osn信息共享的每个访问操作而设计的。使用形式化方法分析oGBAC模型的安全性。为了验证oGBAC模型的可用性，我们使用基于属性的比较加密(CCP-CABE)实现了oGBAC模型，并对实现的系统进行了安全性和效率分析，证明了实现系统的有效性。
papers.title_zh: OGBAC-基于小组的访问控制框架，用于在线社交网络中的信息共享

papers.title: Proxy-Free Privacy-Preserving Task Matching with Efficient Revocation in Crowdsourcing
papers.authors: Jiangang Shu, Kan Yang, Xiaohua Jia, Ximeng Liu, Cong Wang, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Task matching in crowdsourcing has been extensively explored with the increasing popularity of crowdsourcing. However, privacy of tasks and workers is usually ignored in most of exiting solutions. In this paper, we study the problem of privacy-preserving task matching for crowdsourcing with multiple requesters and multiple workers. Instead of utilizing proxy re-encryption, we propose a proxy-free task matching scheme for multi-requester/multi-worker crowdsourcing, which achieves task-worker matching over encrypted data with scalability and non-interaction. We further design two different mechanisms for worker revocation including Server-Local Revocation (SLR) and Global Revocation (GR), which realize efficient worker revocation with minimal overhead on the whole system. The proposed scheme is provably secure in the random oracle model under the Decisional <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>q</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="shu-ieq1-2875682.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-Combined Bilinear Diffie-Hellman (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>q</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="shu-ieq2-2875682.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-DCDBH) assumption. Comprehensive theoretical analysis and detailed simulation results show that the proposed scheme outperforms the state-of-the-art work.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着众包的日益流行，众包中的任务匹配得到了广泛的研究。然而，在大多数现有的解决方案中，任务和工作者的隐私通常被忽略。本文研究多请求者多工作者众包中隐私保护任务匹配问题。我们提出了一种面向多请求者/多工作者众包的无代理任务匹配方案，取代了使用代理重加密的方案，实现了基于加密数据的任务-工作者匹配，具有可扩展性和非交互性。我们进一步设计了两种不同的工作撤销机制，包括服务器本地撤销和全局撤销，以最小的系统开销实现了高效的工作撤销。所提出的方案在随机预言模型中在判定< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ q $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > q </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Shu-ie Q1-2875682 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-组合双线性Diffie-Hellman(< inline-formula > < tex-Hellman)下是可证明安全的全面的理论分析和详细的仿真结果表明，所提出的方案优于现有的工作。
papers.title_zh: 众包中有效撤销的无代理隐私任务匹配

papers.title: Enabling Reliable Keyword Search in Encrypted Decentralized Storage with Fairness
papers.authors: Chengjun Cai, Jian Weng, Xingliang Yuan, Cong Wang
papers.abstract: Blockchain has led the trend of decentralized applications and shown great use beyond cryptocurrencies. Decentralized storage such as Storj and Sia leverages blockchain to establish an open platform for sharing economy, which provides private and reliable file-outsourcing services. However, the ubiquitous keyword search function over encrypted files is yet to be supported. To enable this function, we first apply searchable encryption techniques to the decentralized setting.
