papers.title_zh: 虚假的在线存储库生成引擎，用于网络欺骗

papers.title: Comparative Analysis and Framework Evaluating Mimicry-Resistant and Invisible Web Authentication Schemes
papers.authors: Furkan Alaca, AbdelRahman Abdou, Paul C. van Oorschot
papers.abstract: Many password alternatives for web authentication proposed over the years, despite having different designs and objectives, all predominantly rely on the knowledge of some secret. This motivates us, herein, to provide the first detailed exploration of the integration of a fundamentally different element of defense into the design of web authentication schemes: a mimicry-resistance dimension. We analyze web authentication mechanisms with respect to new usability and security properties related to mimicry-resistance (augmenting the UDS framework), and in particular evaluate invisible techniques (those requiring neither user actions, nor awareness) that provide some mimicry-resistance (unlike those relying solely on static secrets), including device fingerprinting schemes, PUFs (physically unclonable functions), and a subset of Internet geolocation mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管有不同的设计和目的，多年来提出的用于web认证的许多密码替代方案都主要依赖于某种秘密的知识。这促使我们在这里提供了第一个详细的探索，将一个根本不同的防御元素集成到web身份验证方案的设计中:一个抗模仿的维度。我们针对与抗模仿性相关的新的可用性和安全性属性分析了web身份验证机制(增强了UDS框架)，并特别评估了提供一些抗模仿性(不同于仅依赖静态秘密的技术)的不可见技术(那些既不需要用户操作也不需要意识的技术)，包括设备指纹方案、puf(物理上不可克隆的功能)和互联网地理定位机制的子集。
papers.title_zh: 比较分析和框架评估抗模仿和无形的Web身份验证方案

papers.title: Immersive Virtual Reality Attacks and the Human Joystick
papers.authors: Peter Casey, Ibrahim M. Baggili, Ananya Yarramreddy
papers.abstract: This is one of the first accounts for the security analysis of consumer immersive Virtual Reality (VR) systems. This work breaks new ground, coins new terms, and constructs proof of concept implementations of attacks related to immersive VR. Our work used the two most widely adopted immersive VR systems, the HTC Vive, and the Oculus Rift. More specifically, we were able to create attacks that can potentially disorient users, turn their Head Mounted Display (HMD) camera on without their knowledge, overlay images in their field of vision, and modify VR environmental factors that force them into hitting physical objects and walls. Finally, we illustrate through a human participant deception study the success of being able to exploit VR systems to control immersed users and move them to a location in physical space without their knowledge. We term this the Human Joystick Attack. We conclude our work with future research directions and ways to enhance the security of these systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 这是消费者沉浸式虚拟现实(VR)系统安全性分析的首批帐户之一。这项工作开辟了新的领域，创造了新的术语，并构建了与沉浸式虚拟现实相关的攻击的概念实现证明。我们的工作使用了两个最广泛采用的沉浸式虚拟现实系统，HTC Vive和Oculus Rift。更具体地说，我们能够创建可能使用户迷失方向的攻击，在他们不知情的情况下打开他们的头戴式显示(HMD)相机，在他们的视野中覆盖图像，并修改迫使他们撞击物理对象和墙壁的VR环境因素。最后，我们通过一项人类参与者欺骗研究说明了能够利用虚拟现实系统来控制沉浸用户并在他们不知情的情况下将他们移动到物理空间中的某个位置的成功。我们称之为人类操纵杆攻击。我们总结了我们的工作与未来的研究方向和方法，以提高这些系统的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 沉浸式虚拟现实攻击和人类的操纵杆

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Proof of Storage for the Pay-As-You-Go Business Model
papers.authors: Tong Wu, Guomin Yang, Yi Mu, Fuchun Guo, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Proof of Storage (PoS) enables a cloud storage provider to prove that a client’s data is intact. However, existing PoS protocols are not designed for the pay-as-you-go business model in which payment is made based on both storage volume and duration. In this paper, we propose two PoS protocols suitable for the pay-as-you-go storage business model. The first is a time encapsulated Proof of Retrievability (PoR) protocol that ensures retrievability of the original file upon successful auditing by a client. Considering the large size of outsourced data, we then extend the protocol to a privacy-preserving public auditing protocol which allows a third party auditor to audit outsourced data on behalf of its clients without sacrificing the privacy of the data or the timestamp (i.e., time of storage). We formalize the definition, system model and security model of the proposed PoS system and prove the security of the proposed protocols by a sequence of games in the algebraic group model with a random oracle. We analyze the performance of the protocols both theoretically and experimentally and show that the protocols are practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 存储证明(PoS)使云存储提供商能够证明客户的数据是完整的。然而，现有的PoS协议不是为现收现付的商业模式设计的，在该商业模式中，根据存储量和持续时间进行支付。在本文中，我们提出了两个适用于现收现付存储商业模式的PoS协议。第一个是时间封装的可检索性证明(PoR)协议，它确保在客户端成功审核后原始文件的可检索性。考虑到外包数据的巨大规模，我们将该协议扩展为隐私保护的公共审计协议，允许第三方审计员代表其客户审计外包数据，而不牺牲数据的隐私或时间戳(即存储时间)。我们形式化了所提出的PoS系统的定义、系统模型和安全模型，并用随机预言机在代数群模型中通过一系列博弈证明了所提出协议的安全性。我们从理论和实验两方面分析了协议的性能，证明了协议的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 付费商业模式的隐私权存储证明

papers.title: Real-Time Error Detection in Nonlinear Control Systems Using Machine Learning Assisted State-Space Encoding
papers.authors: Suvadeep Banerjee, Balavinayagam Samynathan, Jacob A. Abraham, Abhijit Chatterjee
papers.abstract: Successful deployment of autonomous systems in a wide range of societal applications depends on error-free operation of the underlying signal processing and control functions. Real-time error detection in nonlinear systems has mostly relied on redundancy at the component or algorithmic level causing expensive area and power overheads. This paper describes a real-time error detection methodology for nonlinear control systems for detecting sensor and actuator degradations as well as malfunctions due to soft errors in the execution of the control algorithm on a digital processor. Our approach is based on creation of a redundant check state in such a way that its value can be computed from the current states of the system as well as from a history of prior observable state values and inputs (via machine learning algorithms). By checking for consistency between the two, errors are detected with low latency. The method is demonstrated on two test case simulations - an inverted pendulum balancing problem and a sliding mode controller driven brake-by-wire (BBW) system. In addition, hardware results from error injection experiments in an ARM core representation on an FPGA and artificial sensor degradations on a self-balancing robot prove the practical feasibility of implementation.
papers.abstract_zh: 自治系统在各种社会应用中的成功部署取决于底层信号处理和控制功能的无误操作。非线性系统中的实时错误检测主要依赖于组件或算法级的冗余，导致昂贵的面积和功率开销。本文描述了一种用于非线性控制系统的实时误差检测方法，用于检测由于在数字处理器上执行控制算法中的软误差而引起的传感器和致动器退化以及故障。我们的方法是基于冗余校验状态的创建，以这种方式，它的值可以从系统的当前状态以及从先前可观察的状态值和输入的历史来计算(通过机器学习算法)。通过检查两者之间的一致性，可以低延迟地检测到错误。该方法在两个测试案例仿真中得到验证——倒立摆平衡问题和滑模控制器驱动的线控制动(BBW)系统。此外，在FPGA上的ARM核表示中的错误注入实验和在自平衡机器人上的人工传感器退化的硬件结果证明了实现的实际可行性。
papers.title_zh: 使用机器学习辅助状态空间编码的非线性控制系统中的实时错误检测

papers.title: Secure Computing Enclaves Using FPGAs
papers.authors: Muhammad E. S. Elrabaa, Mohammed Alasli, Marwan H. Abu-Amara
papers.abstract: A new scheme for securing users’ data and applications in public clouds and data centers using Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) has been developed. This scheme incorporates all necessary protocols, hardware, and software components to provide protection against many known potential attacks including internal attacks. It achieves perfect forward secrecy, provides FPGA authentication and integrity checks, and securely establishes a symmetric session key between the user and the FPGA. A complete prototype has been implemented to show the feasibility of the proposed scheme with current FPGAs. Experimental results showed that an FPGA-based compute node can be set up in a cloud in 3.36s; 12.6 times faster than booting a medium-size conventional Virtual Machine (VM) on the same cloud. Based on the average global Internet speed, the time it takes to set up the FPGA-based machine from anywhere in the world was estimated to be 15s. Also, running an experimental secure image processing application on the FPGA took 50 percent less time than running the same application on a conventional state-of-the art processor (without a secure container).
papers.abstract_zh: 使用现场可编程门阵列(FPGAs)在公共云和数据中心保护用户数据和应用的新方案已经开发出来。该方案整合了所有必要的协议、硬件和软件组件，以提供针对包括内部攻击在内的许多已知潜在攻击的保护。它实现了完美的前向保密，提供FPGA认证和完整性检查，并在用户和FPGA之间安全地建立对称会话密钥。一个完整的原型已经实现，以显示在当前FPGAs上提出的方案的可行性。实验结果表明，基于FPGA的计算节点可以在3.36秒内建立在云端；比在同一云上启动中型传统虚拟机(VM)快12.6倍。根据全球平均互联网速度，从世界任何地方设置基于FPGA的机器所需的时间估计为15秒。此外，在FPGA上运行一个实验性的安全图像处理应用所需的时间比在传统的先进处理器(没有安全容器)上运行相同的应用少50%。
papers.title_zh: 使用FPGA安全地计算飞地

papers.title: Resource-Aware Detection and Defense System against Multi-Type Attacks in the Cloud: Repeated Bayesian Stackelberg Game
papers.authors: Omar Abdel Wahab, Jamal Bentahar, Hadi Otrok, Azzam Mourad
papers.abstract: Cloud-based systems are subject to various attack types launched by Virtual Machines (VMs) manipulated by attackers having different goals and skills. The existing detection and defense mechanisms might be suitable for simple attack environments but become ineffective when the system faces advanced attack scenarios wherein simultaneous attacks of different types are involved. This is because these mechanisms overlook the attackers’ strategies in the detection system’s design, ignore the system’s resource constraints, and lack sufficient knowledge about the attackers’ types and abilities. To address these shortcomings, we propose a repeated Bayesian Stackelberg game consisting of the following phases: risk assessment framework that identifies the VMs’ risk levels, live-migration-based defense mechanism that protects services from being successful targets for attackers, machine-learning-based technique that collects malicious data from VMs using honeypots and employs one-class Support Vector Machine to learn the attackers’ types distributions, and resource-aware Bayesian Stackelberg game that provides the hypervisor with the detection load’s optimal distribution over VMs that maximizes the detection of multi-type attacks. Experiments conducted using Amazon’s datacenter and Amazon Web Services honeypot data reveal that our solution maximizes the detection, minimizes the number of attacked services, and runs efficiently compared to the state-of-the-art detection and defense strategies, namely Collabra, probabilistic migration, Stackelberg, maxmin, and fair allocation.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于云的系统会受到由具有不同目标和技能的攻击者操纵的虚拟机发起的各种攻击。现有的检测和防御机制可能适用于简单的攻击环境，但是当系统面临涉及不同类型的同时攻击的高级攻击场景时就变得无效了。这是因为这些机制在检测系统的设计中忽略了攻击者的策略，忽略了系统的资源约束，并且对攻击者的类型和能力缺乏足够的了解。为了解决这些缺点，我们提出了一个重复贝叶斯Stackelberg博弈，包括以下阶段:风险评估框架，确定虚拟机的风险级别；基于实时迁移的防御机制，防止服务成为攻击者的成功目标；基于机器学习的技术，使用蜜罐从虚拟机收集恶意数据，并采用单类支持向量机来学习攻击者的类型分布；资源感知贝叶斯Stackelberg博弈，为虚拟机管理程序提供检测负载在虚拟机上的最佳分布，最大限度地检测多种类型的攻击。使用亚马逊数据中心和亚马逊Web服务蜜罐数据进行的实验表明，与最先进的检测和防御策略(即Collabra、概率迁移、Stackelberg、maxmin和公平分配)相比，我们的解决方案最大限度地提高了检测能力，最大限度地减少了受攻击服务的数量，并且运行高效。
papers.title_zh: 资源感知的检测和防御系统，以抵抗云中的多类攻击：重复的贝叶斯Stackelberg游戏

papers.title: Recovery Algorithms for Paxos-Based State Machine Replication
papers.authors: Jan Z. Konczak, Pawel T. Wojciechowski, Nuno Santos, Tomasz Zurkowski, André Schiper
papers.abstract: In this article, we propose and evaluate three different state recovery algorithms aimed for Paxos—one of the most popular distributed agreement protocols. Paxos is commonly used to maintain consistency among state machine replicas despite of failures of processes. The first algorithm, that we call FullSS, originates from the original Paxos and requires that the system frequently uses stable storage during regular (non-faulty) execution. The other two state recovery algorithms, ViewSS and EpochSS, scarcely require access to stable storage, and the recovering process must do much less work to restore its lost state, and to catch up on the current state of the system. We thoroughly analyze and compare the behavior of the three algorithms during state recovery and also during regular, non-faulty system execution, under various workloads (e.g., causing the network or CPU saturation). The experimental results show that by using ViewSS and EpochSS, we can significantly improve process recovery with respect to the original Paxos, if only it can be assumed that at any time a majority of replicas are up running (excluding those replicas that are just recovering). Moreover, these algorithms do not impact the performance of Paxos during regular (non-faulty) operation. However, FullSS is the only choice out of the three, if the system must tolerate catastrophic failures.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们针对Pax OS——最流行的分布式协议之一，提出并评估了三种不同的状态恢复算法。Paxos通常用于维护状态机副本之间的一致性，尽管存在进程故障。第一种算法，我们称之为FullSS，源自最初的Paxos，要求系统在常规(无故障)执行期间频繁使用稳定存储。其他两种状态恢复算法，ViewSS和EpochSS，几乎不需要访问稳定的存储，并且恢复过程必须做更少的工作来恢复其丢失的状态，并赶上系统的当前状态。我们彻底分析和比较了三种算法在状态恢复期间以及在各种工作负载(例如，导致网络或CPU饱和)下正常、无故障的系统执行期间的行为。实验结果表明，通过使用ViewSS和EpochSS，我们可以显著提高相对于原始Paxos的进程恢复，只要可以假设在任何时候大多数副本都在运行(不包括那些刚刚恢复的副本)。此外，这些算法在常规(无故障)操作期间不会影响Paxos的性能。然而，如果系统必须容忍灾难性的故障，FullSS是三者中唯一的选择。
papers.title_zh: 基于PAXOS的状态机复制的恢复算法

papers.title: An Efficient NIZK Scheme for Privacy-Preserving Transactions Over Account-Model Blockchain
papers.authors: Shunli Ma, Yi Deng, Debiao He, Jiang Zhang, Xiang Xie
papers.abstract: We introduce the abstract framework of decentralized smart contracts system with balance and transaction amount hiding property over account-model blockchain. To build a concrete system with such properties, we utilize a homomorphic public-key encryption scheme and construct a highly efficient non-interactive zero knowledge (NIZK) argument based upon the encryption scheme to ensure the validity of the transactions. Our NIZK scheme is perfect zero knowledge in the common reference string model, while its soundness holds in the random oracle model. Compared to previous similar constructions, our proposed NIZK argument dramatically improves the time efficiency in generating a proof, at the cost of relatively longer proof size.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了分散智能合同系统的抽象框架，该系统在账户模型区块链上隐藏余额和交易量属性。为了建立一个具有这些性质的具体系统，我们利用同态公钥加密方案，并基于该加密方案构造了一个高效的非交互式零知识(NIZK)论证，以确保交易的有效性。我们的NIZK方案在公共参考字符串模型中是完美的零知识，而它的可靠性在随机预言模型中成立。与以前的类似构造相比，我们提出的NIZK论证极大地提高了生成证明的时间效率，代价是相对较长的证明长度。
papers.title_zh: 关于帐户模型区块链的隐私权交易的高效NIZK计划

papers.title: Looking Back! Using Early Versions of Android Apps as Attack Vectors
papers.authors: Yue Zhang, Jian Weng, Jia-Si Weng, Lin Hou, Anjia Yang, Ming Li, Yang Xiang, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Android platform is gaining explosive popularity. This leads developers to invest resources to maintain the upward trajectory of the demand. Unfortunately, as the profit potential grows higher, the chances of these Apps getting attacked also get higher. Therefore, developers improved the security of their Apps, which limits attackers ability to compromise upgraded versions of the Apps. However, developers cannot enhance the security of earlier versions that have been released on the Play Store. The earlier versions of the App can be subject to reverse engineering and other attacks. In this paper, we find that attackers can use these earlier versions as attack vectors, which threatens well protected upgraded versions. We show how to attack the upgraded versions of some popular Apps, including Facebook, Sina Weibo and Qihoo360-Cloud-Driven by analyzing the vulnerabilities existing in their earlier versions. We design and implement a tool named DroidSkynet to analyze and find out vulnerable apps from the Play Store. Among 1,500 mainstream Apps collected from the real world, our DroidSkynet indicates the success rate of attacking an App using an earlier version is 34 percent. We also explore possible mitigation solutions to achieve a balance between utility and security of the App update process.
papers.abstract_zh: Android平台正在获得爆炸性的流行。这导致开发者投入资源来维持需求的上升轨迹。不幸的是，随着潜在利润越来越高，这些应用受到攻击的几率也越来越高。因此，开发人员提高了他们应用程序的安全性，这限制了攻击者破坏应用程序升级版本的能力。然而，开发者无法增强Play Store上已发布的早期版本的安全性。该应用程序的早期版本可能会受到逆向工程和其他攻击。在本文中，我们发现攻击者可以使用这些早期版本作为攻击载体，这威胁到保护良好的升级版本。我们展示了如何通过分析早期版本中存在的漏洞来攻击一些流行应用程序的升级版本，包括脸书、新浪微博和奇虎360云驱动。我们设计并实现了一个名为DroidSkynet的工具来分析并找出Play Store中易受攻击的应用。在从现实世界收集的1500个主流应用中，我们的DroidSkynet表明，使用早期版本攻击应用的成功率为34%。我们还探索了可能的缓解解决方案，以实现应用程序更新过程的实用性和安全性之间的平衡。
papers.title_zh: 回头看！ 使用Android应用的早期版本作为攻击向量

papers.title: Tool of Spies: Leaking your IP by Altering the 3D Printer Compiler
papers.authors: Sujit Rokka Chhetri, Anomadarshi Barua, Sina Faezi, Francesco Regazzoni, Arquimedes Canedo, Mohammad Abdullah Al Faruque
papers.abstract: In cyber-physical additive manufacturing systems, side-channel attacks have been used to reconstruct the G/M-code (which are instructions given to a manufacturing system) of 3D objects being produced. This method is effective for stealing intellectual property from an organization, through least expected means, during prototyping stage before the product goes through a large-scale fabrication and comes out in the market. However, an attacker can be far from being able to completely reconstruct the G/M-code due to lack of enough information leakage through the side-channels. In this paper, we propose a novel way to amplify the information leakage and thus boost the chances of recovery of G/M-code by surreptitiously altering the compiler. By using this compiler, an adversary may easily control various parameters to magnify the leakage of information from a 3D printer while still producing the desired object, thus remaining hidden from the authentic users. This type of attack may be implemented by strong attackers having access to the tool chain and seeking high level of stealth. We have implemented such a compiler and have demonstrated that it increases the success rate of recovering G/M-codes from the four side-channels (acoustic, power, vibration, and electromagnetic) by up to 39 percent compared to previously proposed attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在信息物理添加制造系统中，侧信道攻击已被用于重建正在生产的3D对象的G/M代码(这是给制造系统的指令)。这种方法对于在产品进行大规模制造并投放市场之前的原型阶段，通过最意想不到的手段从组织窃取知识产权是有效的。然而，由于缺乏通过旁路泄漏的足够信息，攻击者远不能完全重构G/M码。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一种新的方法来放大信息泄漏，从而通过暗中改变编译器来增加G/M码的恢复机会。通过使用该编译器，对手可以容易地控制各种参数来放大来自3D打印机的信息泄漏，同时仍然产生期望的对象，从而对真实用户保持隐藏。这种类型的攻击可能由能够访问工具链并寻求高度隐蔽的强大攻击者实施。我们已经实现了这样一个编译器，并且已经证明，与以前提出的攻击相比，它将从四个边信道(声学、功率、振动和电磁)恢复G/M码的成功率提高了39%。
papers.title_zh: 间谍工具：通过更改3D打印机编译器来泄漏IP

papers.title: Traceable Monero: Anonymous Cryptocurrency with Enhanced Accountability
papers.authors: Yannan Li, Guomin Yang, Willy Susilo, Yong Yu, Man Ho Au, Dongxi Liu
papers.abstract: Monero provides a high level of anonymity for both users and their transactions. However, many criminal activities might be committed with the protection of anonymity in cryptocurrency transactions. Thus, user accountability (or traceability) is also important in Monero transactions, which is unfortunately lacking in the current literature. In this paper, we fill this gap by introducing a new cryptocurrency named Traceable Monero to balance the user anonymity and accountability. Our framework relies on a tracing authority, but is optimistic, in that it is only involved when investigations in certain transactions are required. We formalize the system model and security model of Traceable Monero. We present a detailed construction of Traceable Monero by overlaying Monero with two types of tracing mechanisms, tracing the one-time addresses with money flows and tracing the long-term addresses. We prove the security of Traceable Monero and implement a prototype of the system, which demonstrates that Traceable Monero incurs merely a very small overhead in generating and verifying a transaction compared to Monero transactions.
papers.abstract_zh: Monero为用户及其交易提供了高度的匿名性。然而，许多犯罪活动可能在加密货币交易的匿名保护下进行。因此，用户责任(或可追溯性)在Monero交易中也很重要，但不幸的是，目前的文献中缺乏这一点。在本文中，我们通过引入一种新的加密货币Traceable Monero来平衡用户匿名性和可问责性，从而填补了这一空白。我们的框架依赖于一个追踪机构，但这是乐观的，因为它只在需要对某些交易进行调查时才会涉及到。我们形式化了可追踪Monero的系统模型和安全模型。我们提出了一个可追踪Monero的详细结构，通过在Monero上覆盖两种类型的追踪机制，追踪带有资金流的一次性地址和追踪长期地址。我们证明了可追踪Monero的安全性，并实现了一个原型系统，该系统表明，与Monero事务相比，可追踪Monero在生成和验证事务时只产生了非常小的开销。
papers.title_zh: 可追溯的Monero：匿名加密货币具有增强的问责制

papers.title: Lossless Data Hiding Based on Homomorphic Cryptosystem
papers.authors: Shuli Zheng, Yuzhao Wang, Donghui Hu
papers.abstract: With the development of cloud server, reversible data hiding in encrypted domain has received widespread attention for management of encrypted media. Most of existing reversible data hiding methods are based on stream ciphers, which are mainly concerned with data storage security. While homomorphic ciphers focus on data processing security, which is popular in cloud and other third-party platforms. Reversible data hiding with homomorphic cryptography has been an active topic in the research filed. In this paper, we propose a new lossless data hiding method based on homomorphic cryptosystem. After a content owner generates encrypted media with homomorphic ciphers, a data hider embeds secret data by establishing a mapping between secret bits and losslessly modifying encrypted media. At the receiver side, the embedded data is extracted from encrypted domain with a little auxiliary message. And original media is recovered by directly decrypting marked encrypted media. During the embedding process, the modification of encrypted media does not change the corresponding original media owing to homomorphic and probabilistic properties. Thus, no distortion is introduced in the whole procedures of data embedding. And directly decrypted media containing embedded data is the same as the original media. Meanwhile, the proposed method achieves a high embedding rate through efficient mapping and skillful use of expanded pixel values. The experimental results show that compared with state-of-the-art methods, the proposed method has higher embedding rate without distortion.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云服务器的发展，加密域中的可逆数据隐藏在加密媒体管理方面受到了广泛关注。现有的可逆数据隐藏方法大多基于流密码，主要关注数据存储的安全性。而同态密码则侧重于数据处理安全，在云和其他第三方平台比较流行。基于同态密码的可逆数据隐藏一直是研究领域的热点。本文提出了一种新的基于同态密码体制的无损数据隐藏方法。在内容所有者用同态密码生成加密媒体之后，数据隐藏器通过建立秘密比特之间的映射和无损修改加密媒体来嵌入秘密数据。在接收端，嵌入的数据通过少量的辅助信息从加密域中提取出来。并且通过直接解密标记的加密媒体来恢复原始媒体。在嵌入过程中，由于同态性和概率性，加密媒体的修改不会改变相应的原始媒体。因此，在数据嵌入的整个过程中不会引入失真。并且直接解密的包含嵌入数据的媒体与原始媒体相同。同时，该方法通过高效映射和巧妙利用扩展像素值，实现了较高的嵌入率。实验结果表明，与现有方法相比，该方法具有较高的嵌入率且不失真。
papers.title_zh: 基于同构密码系统的无损数据隐藏

papers.title: An Integrated Privacy Preserving Attribute-Based Access Control Framework Supporting Secure Deduplication
papers.authors: Runhua Xu, James Joshi, Prashant Krishnamurthy
papers.abstract: Recent advances in information technologies have facilitated applications to generate, collect or process large amounts of sensitive personal data. Emerging cloud storage services provide a better paradigm to support the needs of such applications. Such cloud based solutions introduce additional security and privacy challenges when dealing with outsourced data including that of supporting fine-grained access control over such data stored in the cloud. In this paper, we propose an integrated, privacy-preserving user-centric attribute based access control framework to ensure the security and privacy of users’ data outsourced and stored by a cloud service provider (CSP). The core component of the proposed framework is a novel privacy-preserving, revocable ciphertext policy attribute-based encryption (PR-CP-ABE) scheme. To support advanced access control features like write access on encrypted data and privacy-preserving access policy updates, we propose extended Path-ORAM access protocol that can also prevent privacy disclosure of access patterns. We also propose an integrated secure deduplication approach to improve the storage efficiency of CSPs while protecting data privacy. Finally, we evaluate the proposed framework and compare it with other existing solutions with regards to the security and performance issues.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息技术的最新发展促进了应用程序生成、收集或处理大量敏感的个人数据。新兴的云存储服务提供了一个更好的范例来支持此类应用程序的需求。当处理外包数据时，这种基于云的解决方案引入了额外的安全和隐私挑战，包括支持对存储在云中的这种数据的细粒度访问控制。在本文中，我们提出了一个集成的、保护隐私的、以用户为中心的基于属性的访问控制框架，以确保云服务提供商(CSP)外包和存储的用户数据的安全性和隐私性。该框架的核心组件是一个新颖的隐私保护、可撤销密文策略的基于属性的加密(PR-CP-ABE)方案。为了支持高级访问控制功能，如对加密数据的写访问和保护隐私的访问策略更新，我们提出了扩展的路径ORAM访问协议，该协议还可以防止访问模式的隐私泄露。我们还提出了一种集成的安全重复数据删除方法，以提高CSP的存储效率，同时保护数据隐私。最后，我们对提出的框架进行了评估，并在安全性和性能方面与其他现有的解决方案进行了比较。
papers.title_zh: 一个集成的隐私保护基于属性的访问控制框架，支持安全重复数据删除

papers.title: PA-CRT: Chinese Remainder Theorem Based Conditional Privacy-Preserving Authentication Scheme in Vehicular Ad-Hoc Networks
papers.authors: Jing Zhang, Jie Cui, Hong Zhong, Zhili Chen, Lu Liu
papers.abstract: Existing security and identity-based vehicular communication protocols used in Vehicular Ad-hoc Networks (VANETs) to achieve conditional privacy-preserving mostly rely on an ideal hardware device called tamper-proof device (TPD) equipped in vehicles. Achieving fast authentication during the message verification process is usually challenging in such strategies and further they suffer performance constraints from resulting overheads. To address such challenges, this paper proposes a novel Chinese remainder theorem (CRT)-based conditional privacy-preserving authentication scheme for securing vehicular authentication. The proposed protocol only requires realistic TPDs, and eliminates the need for pre-loading the master key onto the vehicle's TPDs. Chinese remainder theorem can dynamically assist the trusted authorities (TAs) whilst generating and broadcasting new group keys to the vehicles in the network. The proposed scheme solves the leakage problem during side channel attacks, and ensures higher level of security for the entire system. In addition, the proposed scheme avoids using the bilinear pairing operation and map-to-point hash operation during the authentication process, which helps achieving faster verification even under increasing number of signature. Moreover, the security analysis shows that our proposed scheme is secure under the random oracle model and the performance analysis shows that our proposed scheme is efficient in reducing computation and communication overheads.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的基于安全和身份的车载通信协议在车载自组织网络中实现有条件的隐私保护，主要依赖于安装在车辆上的防篡改设备(TPD)。在这种策略中，在消息验证过程中实现快速认证通常是具有挑战性的，并且它们还受到由此产生的开销的性能限制。为了解决这一问题，提出了一种基于中国剩余定理的有条件隐私保护认证方案。所提出的协议只需要真实的TPDs，并且消除了将主密钥预加载到车辆的TPDs上的需要。中国剩余定理可以动态地帮助可信机构(TAs)生成新的组密钥并向网络中的车辆广播。该方案解决了边信道攻击时的泄漏问题，保证了整个系统更高的安全性。此外，该方案避免了在认证过程中使用双线性对运算和点到点哈希运算，这有助于在签名数量增加的情况下实现更快的验证。此外，安全性分析表明我们提出的方案在随机预言模型下是安全的，性能分析表明我们提出的方案在减少计算和通信开销方面是有效的。
papers.title_zh: PA-CRT：中文剩余定理的有条件隐私保护身份验证方案

papers.title: CuRTAIL: ChaRacterizing and Thwarting AdversarIal Deep Learning
papers.authors: Mojan Javaheripi, Mohammad Samragh, Bita Darvish Rouhani, Tara Javidi, Farinaz Koushanfar
papers.abstract: Recent advances in adversarial Deep Learning (DL) have opened up a new and largely unexplored surface for malicious attacks jeopardizing the integrity of autonomous DL systems. This article introduces CuRTAIL, a novel end-to-end computing framework to characterize and thwart potential adversarial attacks and significantly improve the reliability (safety) of a victim DL model. We formalize the goal of preventing adversarial attacks as an optimization problem to minimize the rarely observed regions in the latent feature space spanned by a DL network. To solve the aforementioned minimization problem, a set of complementary but disjoint modular redundancies are trained to validate the legitimacy of the input samples. The proposed countermeasure is unsupervised, meaning that no adversarial sample is leveraged to train modular redundancies. This, in turn, ensures the effectiveness of the defense in the face of generic attacks. We evaluate the robustness of our proposed methodology against the state-of-the-art adaptive attacks in a white-box setting considering that the adversary knows everything about the victim model and its defenders. Extensive evaluations for analyzing MNIST, CIFAR10, and ImageNet data corroborate the effectiveness of CuRTAIL framework against adversarial samples. The computations in each modular redundancy can be performed independently of the other redundancy modules. As such, CuRTAIL detection algorithm can be completely parallelized among multiple hardware settings to achieve maximum throughput. We further provide an open-source Application Programming Interface (API) to facilitate the adoption of the proposed framework for various applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 对抗性深度学习(DL)的最新进展为危及自主DL系统完整性的恶意攻击开辟了一个新的和基本上未探索的表面。本文介绍了一种新的端到端计算框架——curve，它可以描述和阻止潜在的恶意攻击，并显著提高受害者DL模型的可靠性(安全性)。我们将防止敌对攻击的目标形式化为一个优化问题，以最小化DL网络所跨越的潜在特征空间中很少观察到的区域。为了解决上述最小化问题，训练一组互补但不相交的模块冗余来验证输入样本的合法性。提出的对策是无监督的，这意味着没有敌对的样本被用来训练模块冗余。这反过来确保了面对一般攻击时防御的有效性。我们在白盒环境中评估了我们提出的方法对最先进的自适应攻击的鲁棒性，考虑到对手知道关于受害者模型及其防御者的一切。对分析MNIST、CIFAR10和ImageNet数据的广泛评估证实了针对敌对样本的缩减框架的有效性。每个模块化冗余中的计算可以独立于其他冗余模块来执行。这样，缩减检测算法可以在多个硬件设置中完全并行化，以实现最大吞吐量。我们还提供了一个开源的应用程序编程接口(API ),以方便各种应用程序采用所提出的框架。
papers.title_zh: 缩减：表征和挫败对抗性深度学习

papers.title: Secure Opportunistic Contextual Logging for Wearable Healthcare Sensing Devices
papers.authors: Muhammad Siddiqi, Syed Taha Ali, Vijay Sivaraman
papers.abstract: Wearable technology is increasingly being used for medical applications such as continuous monitoring of chronically ill patients in homes and hospitals. The various stakeholders (patients, doctors, insurers) have an interest in ensuring not only that the data is untampered, but also that the context is verifiable (e.g., correct time and location can be associated with the data collected). Prior works have studied these aspects in isolation, typically using cryptographic techniques. In this paper, we develop a new solution that leverages the density of wireless devices in the vicinity of the transaction to create witness records ensuring data is tamper-protected and bound to its time and location context. Our first contribution is to develop a secure logging architecture that compacts witness records using Bloom filters and hash-chains them to bind them to the data, allowing fast and reliable forensic verification. Our second contribution is to identify the various configuration parameters influencing the performance of our scheme in terms of storage, processing, and transmission efficiency, and to quantify their effect on verification accuracy. Our third contribution implements and demonstrates the feasibility of our scheme, and quantifies its efficacy via simulation using real trace data from a multi-storey building representing a hospital environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 可穿戴技术正越来越多地用于医疗应用，例如对家庭和医院中的慢性病患者进行连续监测。各种利益相关者(患者、医生、保险公司)不仅对确保数据未被篡改感兴趣，而且对确保上下文可验证感兴趣(例如，正确的时间和位置可以与收集的数据相关联)。先前的工作已经孤立地研究了这些方面，通常使用密码技术。在本文中，我们开发了一种新的解决方案，利用交易附近的无线设备密度来创建见证记录，确保数据受到篡改保护，并绑定到其时间和位置上下文。我们的第一个贡献是开发了一个安全的日志记录架构，该架构使用Bloom filters压缩证人记录，并使用哈希链将它们绑定到数据，从而实现快速可靠的取证验证。我们的第二个贡献是确定在存储、处理和传输效率方面影响我们方案性能的各种配置参数，并量化它们对验证准确性的影响。我们的第三个贡献实现并证明了我们的方案的可行性，并通过使用来自代表医院环境的多层建筑的真实跟踪数据的模拟来量化其功效。
papers.title_zh: 确保可穿戴医疗保健设备的机会性上下文记录

papers.title: Crypt-DAC: Cryptographically Enforced Dynamic Access Control in the Cloud
papers.authors: Saiyu Qi, Yuanqing Zheng
papers.abstract: Enabling cryptographically enforced access controls for data hosted in untrusted cloud is attractive for many users and organizations. However, designing efficient cryptographically enforced dynamic access control system in the cloud is still challenging. In this paper, we propose Crypt-DAC, a system that provides practical cryptographic enforcement of dynamic access control. Crypt-DAC revokes access permissions by delegating the cloud to update encrypted data. In Crypt-DAC, a file is encrypted by a symmetric key list which records a file key and a sequence of revocation keys. In each revocation, a dedicated administrator uploads a new revocation key to the cloud and requests it to encrypt the file with a new layer of encryption and update the encrypted key list accordingly. Crypt-DAC proposes three key techniques to constrain the size of key list and encryption layers. As a result, Crypt-DAC enforces dynamic access control that provides efficiency, as it does not require expensive decryption/re-encryption and uploading/re-uploading of large data at the administrator side, and security, as it immediately revokes access permissions. We use formalization framework and system implementation to demonstrate the security and efficiency of our construction.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于许多用户和组织来说，对托管在不受信任的云中的数据启用加密的强制访问控制是有吸引力的。然而，在云中设计高效的加密强制动态访问控制系统仍然具有挑战性。在本文中，我们提出Crypt-DAC，一个提供动态访问控制的实际加密实施的系统。Crypt-DAC通过委托云更新加密数据来撤销访问权限。在Crypt-DAC中，文件由记录文件密钥和撤销密钥序列的对称密钥列表加密。在每次撤销中，专门的管理员向云上传新的撤销密钥，并请求云使用新的加密层对文件进行加密，并相应地更新加密密钥列表。Crypt-DAC提出了三种关键技术来限制密钥列表和加密层的大小。因此，Crypt-DAC实施了动态访问控制，提供了效率，因为它不需要在管理员端进行昂贵的解密/重新加密和上传/重新上传大数据，并且安全性，因为它立即撤销访问许可。我们使用形式化框架和系统实现来展示我们的构建的安全性和效率。
papers.title_zh: crypt-dac：云中的密码执行动态访问控制

papers.title: Differentially Private Publication of Vertically Partitioned Data
papers.authors: Peng Tang, Xiang Cheng, Sen Su, Rui Chen, Huaxi Shao
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study the problem of publishing vertically partitioned data under differential privacy, where different attributes of the same set of individuals are held by multiple parties. In this setting, with the assistance of a semi-trusted curator, the involved parties aim to collectively generate an integrated dataset while satisfying differential privacy for each local dataset. Based on the latent tree model (LTM), we present a differentially private latent tree (DPLT) approach, which is, to the best of our knowledge, the first approach to solving this challenging problem. In DPLT, the parties and the curator collaboratively identify the latent tree that best approximates the joint distribution of the integrated dataset, from which a synthetic dataset can be generated. The fundamental advantage of adopting LTM is that we can use the connections between a small number of latent attributes derived from each local dataset to capture the cross-dataset dependencies of the observed attributes in all local datasets such that the joint distribution of the integrated dataset can be learned with little injected noise and low computation and communication costs. DPLT is backed up by a series of novel techniques, including two-phase latent attribute generation (TLAG), tree index based correlation quantification (TICQ) and distributed Laplace perturbation protocol (DLPP). Extensive experiments on real datasets demonstrate that DPLT offers desirable data utility with low computation and communication costs.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究差分隐私下垂直划分数据的发布问题，其中同一组个体的不同属性由多方持有。在这种情况下，在半可信管理人的帮助下，相关方旨在共同生成一个集成数据集，同时满足每个本地数据集的不同隐私。在潜在树模型(LTM)的基础上，我们提出了差分私有潜在树(DPLT)方法，据我们所知，这是解决这个挑战性问题的第一个方法。在DPLT，各方和策展人合作确定最接近综合数据集联合分布的潜在树，从中可以生成合成数据集。采用LTM的基本优点是，我们可以使用从每个局部数据集中导出的少量潜在属性之间的连接来捕获所有局部数据集中观察到的属性的跨数据集相关性，从而可以用很少的注入噪声和较低的计算和通信成本来学习集成数据集的联合分布。DPLT由一系列新技术支持，包括两阶段潜在属性生成(TLAG)、基于树索引的相关性量化(TICQ)和分布式拉普拉斯扰动协议(DLPP)。真实数据集上的大量实验表明，DPLT以较低的计算和通信代价提供了理想的数据效用。
papers.title_zh: 在垂直分区的数据上差异私人出版

papers.title: MADneSs: A Multi-Layer Anomaly Detection Framework for Complex Dynamic Systems
papers.authors: Tommaso Zoppi, Andrea Ceccarelli, Andrea Bondavalli
papers.abstract: Anomaly detection can infer the presence of errors without observing the target services, but detecting variations in the observable parts of the system on which the services reside. This is a promising technique in complex software-intensive systems, because either instrumenting the services’ internals is exceedingly time-consuming, or encapsulation makes them not accessible. Unfortunately, in such systems anomaly detection is often ineffective due to their dynamicity, which implies changes in the services or their expected workload. Here we present our approach to enhance the efficacy of anomaly detection in complex, dynamic software-intensive systems. After discussing the related challenges, we present MADneSs, an anomaly detection framework tailored for the above systems that includes an adaptive multi-layer monitoring module. Monitored data are then processed by the anomaly detector, which adapts its parameters depending on the current system behavior. An anomaly alert is provided if the analysis conducted by the anomaly detector identify unexpected trends in the data. MADneSs is evaluated through an experimental campaign on two service-oriented architectures; software faults are injected in the application layer, and detected through monitoring of underlying system layers. Lastly, we quantitatively and qualitatively discuss our results with respect to state-of-the-art solutions, highlighting the key contributions of MADneSs.
papers.abstract_zh: 异常检测可以在不观察目标服务的情况下推断错误的存在，但是检测服务所驻留的系统的可观察部分的变化。在复杂的软件密集型系统中，这是一种很有前途的技术，因为要么检测服务的内部结构非常耗时，要么封装使得它们不可访问。不幸的是，在这样的系统中，异常检测通常是无效的，因为它们是动态的，这意味着服务或其预期工作负载的变化。在这里，我们提出了我们的方法，以提高在复杂的，动态的软件密集型系统中的异常检测的效率。在讨论了相关的挑战后，我们提出了MADneSs，这是一个为上述系统定制的异常检测框架，它包括一个自适应的多层监控模块。然后由异常检测器处理监控的数据，异常检测器根据当前系统行为调整其参数。如果异常检测器进行的分析识别出数据中的意外趋势，则提供异常警报。MADneSs通过在两个面向服务的架构上的实验活动进行评估；软件故障被注入到应用层，并通过对底层系统层的监控来检测。最后，我们定量和定性地讨论了我们关于最先进的解决方案的结果，强调了MADneSs的关键贡献。
papers.title_zh: 疯狂：复杂动态系统的多层异常检测框架

papers.title: PSpec-SQL: Enabling Fine-Grained Control for Distributed Data Analytics
papers.authors: Chen Luo, Fei He, Fei Peng, Dong Yan, Dan Zhang, Xin Zhou
papers.abstract: Business organizations regularly collect customer data to improve their services. Organizations may want to share data within themselves or even with third-parties to maximize data utility. Since business data contain lots of customer data, organizations must respect customers’ privacy expounded by privacy laws. In this paper, we present PSpec-SQL, a distributed data analytics system that automatically enforces privacy compliance for SQL queries. Our system provides a high-level language PSpec for the data owner to specify her data usage policy. As usual, the data analyst queries data to perform data analysis, but our system checks each query to ensure only policy-compliant queries are executed. We have implemented a prototype of PSpec-SQL on top of Spark-SQL, and carried out a case study on the TPC benchmarks. The results show the practicability of our system with negligible overhead over query processing.
papers.abstract_zh: 商业组织定期收集客户数据以改进他们的服务。组织可能希望在内部共享数据，甚至与第三方共享数据，以最大限度地利用数据。由于业务数据包含大量客户数据，组织必须尊重隐私法规定的客户隐私。在本文中，我们介绍了PSpec-SQL，这是一个分布式数据分析系统，可以自动执行SQL查询的隐私合规性。我们的系统为数据所有者提供了一种高级语言PSpec来指定她的数据使用策略。像往常一样，数据分析师查询数据以执行数据分析，但是我们的系统检查每个查询以确保只执行符合策略的查询。我们在Spark-SQL上实现了PSpec-SQL原型，并对TPC基准进行了案例研究。实验结果表明，该系统在查询处理上的开销可以忽略不计，具有一定的实用性。
papers.title_zh: PSPEC-SQL：启用分布式数据分析的细粒度控制

papers.title: Checking is Believing: Event-Aware Program Anomaly Detection in Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Long Cheng, Ke Tian, Danfeng Daphne Yao, Lui Sha, Raheem A. Beyah
papers.abstract: Securing cyber-physical systems (CPS) against malicious attacks is of paramount importance because these attacks may cause irreparable damages to physical systems. Recent studies have revealed that control programs running on CPS devices suffer from both control-oriented attacks (e.g., code-injection or code-reuse attacks) and data-oriented attacks (e.g., non-control data attacks). Unfortunately, existing detection mechanisms are insufficient to detect runtime data-oriented exploits, due to the lack of runtime execution semantics checking. In this work, we propose <italic>Orpheus</italic>, a new security methodology for defending against data-oriented attacks by enforcing cyber-physical execution semantics. We first present a general method for reasoning cyber-physical execution semantics of a control program (i.e., causal dependencies between the physical context/event and program control flows), including the event identification and dependence analysis. As an instantiation of <italic>Orpheus</italic>, we then present a new program behavior model, i.e., the event-aware finite-state automaton (<italic>e</italic>FSA). <italic>e</italic>FSA takes advantage of the event-driven nature of CPS control programs and incorporates event checking in anomaly detection. It detects data-oriented exploits if a specific physical event is missing along with the corresponding event dependent state transition. We evaluate our prototype’s performance by conducting case studies under data-oriented attacks. Results show that <italic>e</italic>FSA can successfully detect different runtime attacks. Our prototype on Raspberry Pi incurs a low overhead, taking 0.0001s for each state transition integrity checking, and 0.063s<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sim$</tex-math><alternatives> <mml:math> <mml:mo>∼</mml:mo> </mml:math> <inline-graphic xlink:href="cheng-ieq1-2906161.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>0.211s for the cyber-physical contextual consistency checking.
papers.abstract_zh: 保护网络物理系统(CPS)免受恶意攻击至关重要，因为这些攻击可能会对物理系统造成不可挽回的损失。最近的研究表明，在CPS设备上运行的控制程序遭受面向控制的攻击(例如，代码注入或代码重用攻击)和面向数据的攻击(例如，非控制数据攻击)。不幸的是，由于缺乏运行时执行语义检查，现有的检测机制不足以检测运行时面向数据的利用。在这项工作中，我们提出了< italic>Orpheus</italic >，这是一种新的安全方法，通过实施网络物理执行语义来防御面向数据的攻击。我们首先提出了一种用于推理控制程序的信息物理执行语义(即物理上下文/事件和程序控制流之间的因果依赖)的通用方法，包括事件识别和依赖分析。作为< italic>Orpheus</italic >的一个实例，我们提出了一个新的程序行为模型，即事件感知有限状态自动机(< italic>e</italic>FSA)。FSA利用CPS控制程序的事件驱动特性，并在异常检测中加入事件检查。如果特定的物理事件以及相应的事件相关状态转换丢失，它会检测面向数据的漏洞。我们通过在面向数据的攻击下进行案例研究来评估我们的原型的性能。结果表明，< italic>e</italic>FSA可以成功检测不同的运行时攻击。我们在Raspberry Pi上的原型开销较低，每次状态转换完整性检查花费0.0001秒，0.063秒< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ sim $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mo > ∨</MML:mo > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " cheng-ie Q1-2906161 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula
papers.title_zh: 检查的信念：网络物理系统中的事件感知程序异常检测

papers.title: STYX: A Hierarchical Key Management System for Elastic Content Delivery Networks on Public Clouds
papers.authors: Xiaokang Hu, Jian Li, Changzheng Wei, Weigang Li, Xin Zeng, Ping Yu, Haibing Guan
papers.abstract: Hosting content delivery networks (CDNs) on clouds has the potential to improve the performance as resources and caches can be placed closer to subscribers. However, avoiding data leakage over an untrusted public cloud is critical, especially for sensitive data such as the SSL private key. The popular Keyless SSL solution allows content owners to retain on-premise custody of SSL private keys on their own key servers, but this solution likely causes performance bottlenecks and impedes the elasticity of CDNs. This paper describes a novel key management system, named STYX, for transmitting trusted data over untrusted channels and storing them on untrusted platforms. STYX accomplishes secure key provisioning for CDN scale-out and the key is securely protected with full revocation rights for CDN scale-in. STYX is implemented as a three-phase hierarchical key management scheme by leveraging Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) and QuickAssist Technology (QAT). Furthermore, STYX supports CDN services by integrating Nginx as the SSL termination proxy and the popular Redis/Memcached/Apache as backend caching engines. The performance evaluation shows that STYX significantly outperforms the native HTTPS servers on the CDN node due to QAT acceleration, providing up to a 5x enhancement in throughput and a 50 percent reduction in latency.
papers.abstract_zh: 在云上托管内容交付网络(cdn)有可能提高性能，因为资源和缓存可以放在离用户更近的地方。然而，避免数据在不受信任的公共云上泄漏是至关重要的，尤其是对于敏感数据，如SSL私钥。流行的无密钥SSL解决方案允许内容所有者在他们自己的密钥服务器上保留SSL私钥的内部托管，但这种解决方案可能会导致性能瓶颈，并妨碍cdn的灵活性。本文描述了一种新颖的密钥管理系统，命名为STYX，用于在不可信通道上传输可信数据并将其存储在不可信平台上。STYX实现了CDN横向扩展的安全密钥供应，并且密钥受到CDN纵向扩展的完全撤销权限的安全保护。STYX是通过利用英特尔软件保护扩展(SGX)和快速辅助技术(QAT)实现的三阶段分层密钥管理方案。此外，STYX通过集成Nginx作为SSL终端代理和流行的Redis/Memcached/Apache作为后端缓存引擎来支持CDN服务。性能评估显示，由于QAT加速，STYX在CDN节点上的性能明显优于本地HTTPS服务器，吞吐量提高了5倍，延迟降低了50%。
papers.title_zh: Styx：公共云上弹性内容交付网络的层次密钥管理系统

papers.title: Robust and Universal Seamless Handover Authentication in 5G HetNets
papers.authors: Yinghui Zhang, Robert H. Deng, Elisa Bertino, Dong Zheng
papers.abstract: The evolving fifth generation (5G) cellular networks will be a collection of heterogeneous and backward-compatible networks. With the increased heterogeneity and densification of 5G heterogeneous networks (HetNets), it is important to ensure security and efficiency of frequent handovers in 5G wireless roaming environments. However, existing handover authentication mechanisms still have challenging issues, such as anonymity, robust traceability and universality. In this paper, we address these issues by introducing RUSH, a Robust and Universal Seamless Handover authentication protocol for 5G HetNets. In RUSH, anonymous mutual authentication with key agreement is enabled for handovers by exploiting the trapdoor collision property of chameleon hash functions and the tamper-resistance of blockchains. RUSH achieves universal handover authentication for all the diverse mobility scenarios, as exemplified by the handover between 5G new radio and non-3GPP access regardless of the trustworthiness of non-3GPP access and the consistency of the core network. RUSH also achieves perfect forward secrecy, master key forward secrecy, known randomness secrecy, key escrow freeness and robust traceability. Our formal security proofs based on the BAN-logic and formal verification based on AVISPA indicate that RUSH resists various attacks. Comprehensive performance evaluation and comparisons show that RUSH outperforms other schemes in both computation and communication efficiencies.
papers.abstract_zh: 演进中的第五代(5G)蜂窝网络将是异构和向后兼容网络的集合。随着5G异构网络(HetNets)的异构性和密度的增加，确保5G无线漫游环境中频繁切换的安全性和效率变得非常重要。然而，现有的切换认证机制仍然具有挑战性的问题，例如匿名性、鲁棒的可追踪性和普遍性。在本文中，我们通过引入RUSH来解决这些问题，RUSH是一种适用于5G HetNets的健壮且通用的无缝切换认证协议。在RUSH中，通过利用变色龙哈希函数的陷门碰撞特性和区块链的防篡改性，实现了带密钥协商的匿名双向认证。RUSH实现了所有不同移动场景的通用切换认证，如5G新无线电和非3GPP接入之间的切换所例示的，而不管非3GPP接入的可信度和核心网络的一致性。RUSH还实现了完美的前向保密、主密钥前向保密、已知随机性保密、密钥托管自由和健壮的可追踪性。基于BAN逻辑的形式化安全证明和基于AVISPA的形式化验证表明，RUSH能够抵抗各种攻击。综合性能评估和比较表明，RUSH在计算和通信效率上都优于其他方案。
papers.title_zh: 5G Hetnets中强大而通用的无缝切换身份验证

papers.title: Extracting Randomness from the Trend of IPI for Cryptographic Operations in Implantable Medical Devices
papers.authors: Hassan Chizari, Emil Lupu
papers.abstract: Achieving secure communication between an Implantable Medical Device (IMD) and a gateway or programming device outside the body has showed its criticality in recent reports of vulnerabilities in cardiac devices, insulin pumps and neural implants, amongst others. The use of asymmetric cryptography is typically not a practical solution for IMDs due to the scarce computational and power resources. Symmetric key cryptography is preferred but its security relies on agreeing and using strong keys, which are difficult to generate. A solution to generate strong shared keys without using extensive resources, is to extract them from physiological signals already present inside the body such as the Inter-Pulse interval (IPI). The physiological signals must therefore be strong sources of randomness that meet five conditions: <italic>Universality</italic> (available on all people), <italic>Liveness</italic> (available at any-time), <italic>Robustness</italic> (strong random number), <italic>Permanence</italic> (independent from its history) and <italic>Uniqueness</italic> (independent from other sources). However, these conditions (mainly the last three) have not been systematically examined in current methods for randomness extraction from IPI. In this study, we first propose a methodology to measure the last three conditions: Information secrecy measures for <italic>Robustness</italic>, Santha-Vazirani Source <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$delta$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>d</mml:mi><mml:mi>e</mml:mi><mml:mi>l</mml:mi><mml:mi>t</mml:mi><mml:mi>a</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="chizari-ieq1-2921773.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> value for <italic>Permanence</italic> and random sources dependency analysis for <italic>Uniqueness</italic>. Then, using a large dataset of IPI values (almost 900,000,000 IPIs), we show that IPI does not have <italic>Robustness</italic> and <italic>Permanence</italic> as a randomness source. Thus, extraction of a strong uniform random number from IPI values is impossible. Third, we propose to use the trend of IPI, instead of its value, as a source for a new randomness extraction method named Martingale Randomness Extraction from IPI (MRE-IPI). We evaluate MRE-IPI and show that it satisfies the <italic>Robustness</italic> condition completely and <italic>Permanence</italic> to some level. Finally, we use the NIST STS and Dieharder test suites and show that MRE-IPI is able to outperform all recent randomness extraction methods from IPIs and achieves a quality roughly half that of the AES random number generator. MRE-IPI is still not a strong random number and cannot be used as key to secure communications in general. However, it can be used as a one-time pad to securely exchange keys between the communication parties. The usage of MRE-IPI will thus be kept at a minimum and reduces the probability of breaking it. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first work in this area which uses such a comprehensive method and large dataset to examine the randomness of physiological signals.
papers.abstract_zh: 在植入式医疗设备(IMD)和体外网关或编程设备之间实现安全通信，在最近关于心脏设备、胰岛素泵和神经植入物等设备漏洞的报告中显示了其重要性。由于缺乏计算和功率资源，使用非对称加密通常不是IMD的实际解决方案。对称密钥加密是首选，但其安全性依赖于同意和使用难以生成的强密钥。在不使用大量资源的情况下生成强共享密钥的解决方案是从身体内部已经存在的生理信号中提取它们，例如脉搏间隔(IPI)。因此，生理信号必须是满足五个条件的强随机性来源:< italic >普遍性</italic >(适用于所有人)、< italic >活性</italic >(随时可用)、< italic >稳健性</italic >(强随机数)、< italic >持久性</italic >(独立于其历史)和< italic >独特性</italic >(独立于其他来源)。然而，这些条件(主要是最后三个)在当前从IPI随机抽取的方法中没有被系统地检查。在本研究中，我们首先提出了一种测量最后三个条件的方法:针对< italic >健壮性</italic >、Santha-Vazirani Source < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " >＄delta ＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi > d </MML:mi > < MML:mi > e </MML:mi > < MML:mi > l </MML:mi >然后，使用IPI值的大数据集(几乎900，000，IPIs)，我们表明IPI不具有作为随机性来源的< italic >鲁棒性</italic >和< italic >持久性</italic >。因此，从IPI值中提取强均匀随机数是不可能的。第三，我们建议使用IPI的趋势，而不是它的值，作为一种新的随机性提取方法的来源，该方法被命名为来自IPI的鞅随机性提取(MRE-IPI)。我们评估了MRE-IPI，证明它完全满足< italic >鲁棒性</italic >条件，并且在一定程度上满足< italic >持久性</italic >。最后，我们使用NIST STS和Dieharder测试套件，并表明MRE-IPI能够超越IPIs的所有最近的随机数提取方法，并实现大约一半的AES随机数生成器的质量。MRE-IPI仍然不是一个强随机数，不能用作一般安全通信的密钥。但是，它可以用作一次性密码本，以便在通信双方之间安全地交换密钥。因此，MRE-IPI的使用将保持在最低水平，并降低破坏它的可能性。据我们所知，这是该领域首次使用如此全面的方法和大数据集来检查生理信号的随机性。
papers.title_zh: 从IPI的趋势中提取随机性，用于植入医疗设备中的加密操作

papers.title: Privacy-Aware Personal Data Storage (P-PDS): Learning how to Protect User Privacy from External Applications
papers.authors: Bikash Chandra Singh, Barbara Carminati, Elena Ferrari
papers.abstract: Recently, Personal Data Storage (PDS) has inaugurated a substantial change to the way people can store and control their personal data, by moving from a service-centric to a user-centric model. PDS offers individuals the capability to keep their data in a unique logical repository, that can be connected and exploited by proper analytical tools, or shared with third parties under the control of end users. Up to now, most of the research on PDS has focused on how to enforce user privacy preferences and how to secure data when stored into the PDS. In contrast, in this paper we aim at designing a Privacy-aware Personal Data Storage (P-PDS), that is, a PDS able to automatically take privacy-aware decisions on third parties access requests in accordance with user preferences. The proposed P-PDS is based on preliminary results presented in [1] , where it has been demonstrated that semi-supervised learning can be successfully exploited to make a PDS able to automatically decide whether an access request has to be authorized or not. In this paper, we have deeply revised the learning process in order to have a more usable P-PDS, in terms of reduced effort for the training phase, as well as a more conservative approach w.r.t. users privacy, when handling conflicting access requests. We run several experiments on a realistic dataset exploiting a group of 360 evaluators. The obtained results show the effectiveness of the proposed approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，个人数据存储(PDS)通过从以服务为中心转向以用户为中心的模式，为人们存储和控制个人数据的方式带来了巨大的变化。PDS使个人能够将其数据保存在一个独特的逻辑存储库中，该存储库可以由适当的分析工具连接和利用，或者在最终用户的控制下与第三方共享。到目前为止，对PDS的大多数研究都集中在如何实施用户隐私偏好以及如何保护存储到PDS中的数据。相比之下，在本文中，我们旨在设计一种隐私感知的个人数据存储(P-PDS)，即能够根据用户偏好对第三方访问请求自动做出隐私感知决策的PDS。提出的P-PDS基于[1]中给出的初步结果，其中已经证明半监督学习可以被成功地利用，以使PDS能够自动决定访问请求是否必须被授权。在本文中，我们对学习过程进行了深度修改，以便在处理冲突的访问请求时，减少训练阶段的工作量，并采用更保守的方法保护用户隐私，从而获得更有用的P-PDS。我们利用一组360名评估者在真实数据集上运行了几个实验。所得结果表明了该方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 隐私感知的个人数据存储（P-PD）：学习如何保护用户隐私免受外部应用程序

papers.title: Sensitive Label Privacy Preservation with Anatomization for Data Publishing
papers.authors: Lin Yao, Zhenyu Chen, Xin Wang, Dong Liu, Guowei Wu
papers.abstract: Data in its original form, however, typically contain sensitive information about individuals. Directly publishing raw data will violate the privacy of people involed. Consequently, it becomes increasingly important to preserve the privacy of published data. An attacker is apt to identify an individual from the published tables, with attacks through the record linkage, attribute linkage, table linkage or probabilistic attack. Although algorithms based on generalization and suppression have been proposed to protect the sensitive attributes and resist these multiple types of attacks, they often suffer from large information loss by replacing specific values with more general ones. Alternatively, anatomization and permutation operations can de-link the relation between attributes without modifying them. In this paper, we propose a scheme Sensitive Label Privacy Preservation with Anatomization (SLPPA) to protect the privacy of published data. SLPPA includes two procedures, table division and group division. During the table division, we adopt entropy and mean-square contingency coefficient to partition attributes into separate tables to inject uncertainty for reconstructing the original table. During the group division, all the individuals in the original table are partitioned into non-overlapping groups so that the published data satisfies the pre-defined privacy requirements of our (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\alpha,\beta,\gamma,\delta$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>α</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>β</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>γ</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>δ</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="yao-ieq1-2919833.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) model. Two comprehensive sets of real-world relationship data are applied to evaluate the performance of our anonymization approach. Simulations and privacy analysis show our scheme possesses better privacy while ensuring higher utility.
papers.abstract_zh: 然而，原始形式的数据通常包含关于个人的敏感信息。直接发布原始数据会侵犯相关人员的隐私。因此，保护已发布数据的隐私变得越来越重要。攻击者易于从公布的表中识别出个人，通过记录链接、属性链接、表链接或概率攻击进行攻击。虽然已经提出了基于概括和抑制的算法来保护敏感属性并抵抗这些多种类型的攻击，但是它们经常由于用更一般的值替换特定值而遭受大量信息损失。或者，剖析和置换操作可以在不修改属性的情况下断开属性之间的关系。本文提出一种基于解剖的敏感标签隐私保护方案(SLPPA)来保护公开数据的隐私。SLPPA包括两个过程，表划分和组划分。在表划分过程中，采用熵和均方关联系数将属性划分到不同的表中，为重构原始表注入不确定性。在组划分期间，原始表中的所有个体都被划分到不重叠的组中，以便发布的数据满足我们的(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ alpha，\beta，\gamma，\ delta $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi >α</MML:mi > < MML:mo >，</mml:mo><mml:mi>β</mml:mi >)的预定义的隐私要求两组全面的真实世界关系数据被用于评估我们的匿名化方法的性能。仿真和隐私分析表明，该方案在保证较高效用的同时，具有更好的隐私性。
papers.title_zh: 敏感的标签隐私保存和解剖学用于数据发布

papers.title: Automatic Integer Error Repair by Proper-Type Inference
papers.authors: Xi Cheng, Min Zhou, Xiaoyu Song, Ming Gu, Jiaguang Sun
papers.abstract: C language plays a key role in system programming and applications. Integer error is a common yet important C program defect because arithmetic operations may produce unrepresentable values in certain integer types. Integer error is one of the major sources of software failures and vulnerabilities. Due to the complex semantics of C integers, manually repairing integer errors is prone to introducing additional errors even for experienced programmers. This paper presents an approach to automatically generate fixes for integer errors. Our approach infers, for each expression, a type that is capable of representing its possible values, and utilizes inferred types as program fixes based on common fix patterns codified from real world. We have developed our system IntPTI which is evaluated on the largest public benchmark of integer errors and 7 widely-used open-source projects. The evaluation results demonstrate the superior performance of IntPTI in terms of accuracy, scalability, runtime overhead and robustness of fixes. In addition, IntPTI is applied on the embedded software of a realistic train control system. It succeeds in both detecting 67 new integer errors and generating 101 fixes confirmed by developers. The study substantiates the feasibility and effectiveness of the proposed methodology.
papers.abstract_zh: c语言在系统编程和应用中起着关键作用。整数错误是一个常见但重要的C程序缺陷，因为算术运算可能会在某些整数类型中产生不可表示的值。整数错误是软件故障和漏洞的主要来源之一。由于C整数的复杂语义，即使对于有经验的程序员，手动修复整数错误也容易引入额外的错误。本文提出了一种自动生成整数错误修复的方法。我们的方法为每个表达式推断出一个能够表示其可能值的类型，并基于从现实世界中编纂的常见修复模式将推断出的类型用作程序修复。我们已经开发了我们的系统IntPTI，在最大的整数误差公共基准和7个广泛使用的开源项目上进行了评估。评估结果证明了IntPTI在准确性、可伸缩性、运行时开销和修复健壮性方面的卓越性能。此外，将IntPTI应用于实际列车控制系统的嵌入式软件中。它成功地检测了67个新的整数错误，并生成了101个由开发人员确认的修复。该研究证实了所提出方法的可行性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: 通过适当的推理自动整数错误修复

papers.title: Protecting Multi-Level Memories From Jamming Using Q-ary Expurgated Robust Codes
papers.authors: Yaara Neumeier, Osnat Keren
papers.abstract: Robust codes can effectively detect jamming in <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>q</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="neumeier-ieq1-3050088.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-ary memories for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q=2^t$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>q</mml:mi><mml:mo>=</mml:mo><mml:msup><mml:mn>2</mml:mn><mml:mi>t</mml:mi></mml:msup></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="neumeier-ieq2-3050088.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. When <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>q</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="neumeier-ieq3-3050088.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is not a power of two, a binary information word has to be converted into a <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>q</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="neumeier-ieq4-3050088.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-ary word prior to the encoding. This conversion expurgates the code since some of the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>q</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="neumeier-ieq5-3050088.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-ary codewords are never used. Unless properly designed, expurgation can significantly degrade the effectiveness of the code in terms of its error detection capability. This article analyzes the error masking probability of an expurgated robust code when applied to <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>q</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="neumeier-ieq6-3050088.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-ary memories. It is shown that by wisely designing the converter, this degradation can be minimized, and in some cases, the code's efficiency can be superior to the original code.
