papers.title: How Much I Can Rely on You: Measuring Trustworthiness of a Twitter User
papers.authors: Rajkumar Das, Gour C. Karmakar, Joarder Kamruzzaman
papers.abstract: Trustworthiness in an online environment is essential because individuals and organizations can easily be misled by false and malicious information receiving from untrustworthy users. Though existing methods assess users’ trustworthiness by exploiting Twitter account properties, their efficacy is inadequate because of Twitter's restriction on profile and tweet size, the existence of missing or insufficient profiles, and ease to create fake accounts or relationships to pretend as trustworthy. In this paper, we present a holistic approach by exploiting ideas perceived from real-world organizations for trust estimation along with available Twitter information. Users’ trustworthiness is determined by considering their credentials, recommendation from referees and the quality of the information in their Twitter accounts and tweets. We establish the feasibility of our approach analytically and further devise a multi-objective cost function for the A* search to find a quasi-optimal path between the trust evaluator and the user whose trustworthiness is being evaluated. We also propose an incentive mechanism to increase user participation in the trust evaluation process, and a threat model and trustworthiness measure of referees to thwart the possibility of providing an untruthful recommendation to inflate one's trustworthiness. The efficacy of our proposed approach is validated through experiments using Twitter data and extensive simulation in various scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线环境中的可信性是至关重要的，因为个人和组织很容易被从不可信的用户接收的虚假和恶意信息误导。尽管现有方法通过利用Twitter账户属性来评估用户的可信度，但由于Twitter对简档和推文大小的限制、简档缺失或不足的存在以及创建虚假账户或关系以假装可信的容易性，这些方法的效力是不够的。在本文中，我们提出了一种整体方法，利用从真实世界组织中感知的想法以及可用的Twitter信息进行信任评估。用户的可信度是通过考虑他们的证书、推荐人的推荐以及他们的Twitter账户和推文中的信息质量来确定的。我们分析地建立了我们的方法的可行性，并且进一步设计了用于A*搜索的多目标成本函数，以在信任评估者和其可信度正被评估的用户之间找到准最优路径。我们还提出了一个激励机制来增加用户在信任评估过程中的参与，以及一个威胁模型和推荐人的可信度度量来阻止提供虚假推荐来夸大可信度的可能性。通过使用Twitter数据的实验和各种场景中的大量模拟，验证了我们提出的方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 我可以依靠您多少：测量Twitter用户的可信度

papers.title: Mobile Crowdsourcing Task Allocation with Differential-and-Distortion Geo-Obfuscation
papers.authors: Leye Wang, Dingqi Yang, Xiao Han, Daqing Zhang, Xiaojuan Ma
papers.abstract: In mobile crowdsourcing, organizers usually need participants’ precise locations for optimal task allocation, e.g., minimizing selected workers’ travel distance to task locations. However, the exposure of users’ locations raises privacy concerns. In this paper, we propose a location privacy-preserving task allocation framework with geo-obfuscation to protect users’ locations during task assignments. More specifically, we make participants obfuscate their reported locations under the guarantee of two rigorous privacy-preserving schemes, differential and distortion privacy, without the need to involve any third-party trusted entity. In order to achieve optimal task allocation with the differential-and-distortion geo-obfuscation, we formulate a mixed-integer non-linear programming problem to minimize the expected travel distance of the selected workers under the constraints of differential and distortion privacy. Moreover, a worker may be willing to accept multiple tasks, and a task organizer may be concerned with multiple utility objectives such as task acceptance ratio in addition to travel distance. Against this background, we also extend our solution to the multi-task allocation and multi-objective optimization cases. Evaluation results on both simulation and real-world user mobility traces verify the effectiveness of our framework. Particularly, our framework outperforms Laplace obfuscation, a state-of-the-art geo-obfuscation mechanism, by achieving up to 47 percent shorter average travel distance on real-world data under the same level of privacy protection.
papers.abstract_zh: 在移动众包中，组织者通常需要参与者的精确位置来优化任务分配，例如，最小化选定工人到任务位置的旅行距离。然而，用户位置的暴露引发了隐私问题。在本文中，我们提出了一个位置隐私保护的任务分配框架，通过地理混淆来保护用户在任务分配过程中的位置。更具体地说，我们使参与者在差分和失真隐私两种严格的隐私保护方案的保证下模糊他们报告的位置，而不需要涉及任何第三方可信实体。为了利用差分和失真地理混淆实现最优任务分配，我们建立了一个混合整数非线性规划问题，在差分和失真隐私约束下最小化所选工作者的期望旅行距离。此外，工作者可能愿意接受多个任务，并且任务组织者可能关心多个效用目标，例如除了行进距离之外的任务接受率。在此背景下，我们还将我们的解决方案扩展到多任务分配和多目标优化的情况。模拟和真实用户移动轨迹的评估结果验证了该框架的有效性。特别是，我们的框架优于拉普拉斯模糊处理，拉普拉斯模糊处理是一种最先进的地理模糊处理机制，在相同的隐私保护级别下，真实世界数据的平均传输距离缩短了47%。
papers.title_zh: 移动众包任务分配，差异和延伸

papers.title: Locally Differentially Private Heavy Hitter Identification
papers.authors: Tianhao Wang, Ninghui Li, Somesh Jha
papers.abstract: The notion of Local Differential Privacy (LDP) enables users to answer sensitive questions while preserving their privacy. The basic LDP frequency oracle protocol enables the aggregator to estimate the frequency of any value. But when the domain of input values is large, finding the most frequent values, also known as the heavy hitters, by estimating the frequencies of all possible values, is computationally infeasible. In this paper, we propose an LDP protocol for identifying heavy hitters. In our proposed protocol, which we call Prefix Extending Method (PEM), users are divided into groups, with each group reporting a prefix of her value. We analyze how to choose optimal parameters for the protocol and identify two design principles for designing LDP protocols with high utility. Experiments show that under the same privacy guarantee and computational cost, PEM has better utility on both synthetic and real-world datasets than existing solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 本地差分隐私(LDP)的概念使用户能够回答敏感问题，同时保护他们的隐私。基本的LDP频率oracle协议使聚合器能够估计任何值的频率。但是，当输入值的范围很大时，通过估计所有可能值的频率来查找最频繁的值(也称为重要值)在计算上是不可行的。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个LDP协议来识别重量级人物。在我们提出的协议中，我们称之为前缀扩展方法(PEM ),用户被分成组，每个组报告一个她的值的前缀。我们分析了如何为协议选择最佳参数，并确定了设计具有高实用性的LDP协议的两个设计原则。实验表明，在相同的隐私保证和计算成本下，PEM在合成数据集和真实数据集上都比现有解决方案具有更好的效用。
papers.title_zh: 本地私人重型击球手识别

papers.title: Trust Assessment in Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Guangchi Liu, Qing Yang, Honggang Wang, Alex X. Liu
papers.abstract: Assessing trust in online social networks (OSNs) is critical for many applications such as online marketing and network security. It is a challenging problem, however, due to the difficulties of handling complex social network topologies and conducting accurate assessment in these topologies. To address these challenges, we model trust by proposing the three-valued subjective logic (3VSL) model. 3VSL properly models the uncertainties that exist in trust, thus is able to compute trust in arbitrary graphs. We theoretically prove the capability of 3VSL based on the Dirichlet-Categorical (DC) distribution and its correctness in arbitrary OSN topologies. Based on the 3VSL model, we further design the AssessTrust (AT) algorithm to accurately compute the trust between any two users connected in an OSN. We validate 3VSL against two real-world OSN datasets: Advogato and Pretty Good Privacy (PGP). Experimental results indicate that 3VSL can accurately model the trust between any pair of indirectly connected users in the Advogato and PGP.
papers.abstract_zh: 评估在线社交网络中的信任对于在线营销和网络安全等许多应用至关重要。然而，这是一个具有挑战性的问题，因为处理复杂的社会网络拓扑和在这些拓扑中进行准确的评估是困难的。为了应对这些挑战，我们通过提出三值主观逻辑(3VSL)模型来对信任进行建模。3VSL恰当地建模了信任中存在的不确定性，因此能够计算任意图中的信任。我们从理论上证明了基于DC分布的3VSL的能力及其在任意OSN拓扑中的正确性。在3VSL模型的基础上，我们进一步设计了AssessTrust (AT)算法来精确计算OSN中任意两个用户之间的信任。我们在两个真实世界的OSN数据集上验证了3 vsl:Advogato和Pretty Good Privacy (PGP)。实验结果表明，3VSL能够准确地对Advogato和PGP中任意一对间接连接的用户之间的信任进行建模。
papers.title_zh: 在线社交网络中的信任评估

papers.title: Towards Thwarting Template Side-Channel Attacks in Secure Cloud Deduplications
papers.authors: Yuan Zhang, Yunlong Mao, Minze Xu, Fengyuan Xu, Sheng Zhong
papers.abstract: As one of a few critical technologies to cloud storage service, deduplication allows cloud servers to save storage space by deleting redundant file copies. However, it often leaks side channel information regarding whether an uploading file gets deduplicated or not. Exploiting this information, adversaries can easily launch a template side-channel attack and severely harm cloud users’ privacy. To thwart this kind of attack, we resort to the k-anonymity privacy concept to design secure threshold deduplication protocols. Specifically, we have devised a novel cryptographic primitive called “dispersed convergent encryption” (DCE) scheme, and proposed two different constructions of it. With these DCE schemes, we successfully construct secure threshold deduplication protocols that do not rely on any trusted third party. Our protocols not only support confidentiality protections and ownership verifications, but also enjoy formal security guarantee against template side-channel attacks even when the cloud server could be a “covert adversary” who may violate the predefined threshold and perform deduplication covertly. Experimental evaluations show our protocols enjoy very good performance in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为云存储服务的少数关键技术之一，重复数据删除允许云服务器通过删除冗余文件副本来节省存储空间。但是，它通常会泄露有关上传文件是否进行了重复数据消除的辅助信息。利用这些信息，对手可以轻松地发起模板侧信道攻击，并严重损害云用户的隐私。为了阻止这种攻击，我们求助于k-匿名隐私概念来设计安全的门限重复数据删除协议。具体来说，我们设计了一个新的密码原语，称为“分散收敛加密”(DCE)方案，并提出了两种不同的构造。利用这些DCE方案，我们成功地构造了不依赖任何可信第三方的安全门限去重协议。我们的协议不仅支持机密性保护和所有权验证，而且还享有针对模板侧信道攻击的正式安全保证，即使云服务器可能是违反预定义阈值并秘密执行重复数据删除的“秘密对手”。实验评估表明，我们的协议在实践中享有很好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 旨在阻止模板侧通道攻击在安全的云进行攻击中

papers.title: FS-PEKS: Lattice-Based Forward Secure Public-Key Encryption with Keyword Search for Cloud-Assisted Industrial Internet of Things
papers.authors: Xiaojun Zhang, Chunxiang Xu, Huaxiong Wang, Yuan Zhang, Shixiong Wang
papers.abstract: Cloud-assisted Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) relies on cloud computing to provide massive data storage services. To ensure the confidentiality, sensitive industrial data need to be encrypted before being outsourced to cloud storage server. Public-key encryption with keyword search (PEKS) enables users to search target encrypted data by keywords. However, most existing PEKS schemes are based on conventional hardness assumptions, which are vulnerable to adversaries equipped with quantum computers in the near future. Moreover, they suffer from key exposure, and thus the security would be broken once the keys are compromised. In this paper, we propose a forward secure PEKS scheme (FS-PEKS) based on lattice assumptions for cloud-assisted IIoT, which is post-quantum secure. We integrate a lattice-based delegation mechanism into FS-PEKS to achieve forward security, such that the security of the system is still guaranteed even the keys are compromised by the adversaries. We define the first formal security model on forward security of PEKS, and prove the security of FS-PEKS under the model. As the keywords of industrial data are with inherently low entropy, we further extend FS-PEKS to resist insider keyword guessing attacks (IKGA). The comprehensive performance evaluation demonstrates that FS-PEKS is practical for cloud-assisted IIoT.
papers.abstract_zh: 云辅助工业物联网(IIoT)依靠云计算提供海量数据存储服务。为了保证机密性，敏感的工业数据在外包给云存储服务器之前需要进行加密。带有关键字搜索的公钥加密(PEKS)使用户能够通过关键字搜索目标加密数据。然而，大多数现有的PEKS方案都是基于传统的硬度假设，在不久的将来很容易受到配备量子计算机的对手的攻击。此外，它们遭受密钥泄露，因此一旦密钥被泄露，安全性将被破坏。本文提出了一种基于格假设的前向安全PEKS方案(FS-PEKS ),该方案是后量子安全的。我们在FS-PEKS中集成了一个基于格的委托机制来实现前向安全性，这样即使密钥被攻击者破解，系统的安全性也能得到保证。我们定义了第一个关于PEKS前向安全性的形式化安全模型，并在该模型下证明了FS-PEKS的安全性。由于工业数据的关键词具有固有的低熵，我们进一步扩展FS-PEKS来抵抗内部关键词猜测攻击(IKGA)。综合性能评估表明，FS-PEKS对于云辅助的IIoT是可行的。
papers.title_zh: FS-PEKS：基于晶格的前向安全公开加密，并使用关键字搜索云辅助工业互联网

papers.title: Dating with Scambots: Understanding the Ecosystem of Fraudulent Dating Applications
papers.authors: Yangyu Hu, Haoyu Wang, Yajin Zhou, Yao Guo, Li Li, Bingxuan Luo, Fangren Xu
papers.abstract: In this work, we are focusing on a new and yet uncovered way for malicious apps to gain profit. They claim to be dating apps. However, their sole purpose is to lure users into purchasing premium/VIP services to start conversations with other (likely fake female) accounts in the app. We call these apps as fraudulent dating apps. This paper performs a systematic study to understand the whole ecosystem of fraudulent dating apps. Specifically, we have proposed a three-phase method to detect them and subsequently comprehend their characteristics via analyzing the existing account profiles. Our observation reveals that most of the accounts are not managed by real persons, but by chatbots based on predefined conversation templates. We also analyze the business model of these apps and reveal that multiple parties are actually involved in the ecosystem, including producers who develop apps, publishers who publish apps to gain profit, and the distribution network that is responsible for distributing apps to end users. Finally, we analyze the impact of them to users (i.e., victims) and estimate the overall revenue. Our work is the first systematic study on fraudulent dating apps, and the results demonstrate the urge for a solution to protect users.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们专注于一种新的尚未发现的恶意应用程序获取利润的方式。他们自称是约会app。然而，他们的唯一目的是引诱用户购买高级/VIP服务，以开始与应用程序中的其他(可能是假冒女性)帐户进行对话。我们称这些应用为欺诈性约会应用。本文进行了一项系统研究，以了解欺诈性约会应用的整个生态系统。具体来说，我们提出了一个三阶段的方法来检测它们，并随后通过分析现有的帐户配置文件来理解它们的特征。我们的观察显示，大多数账户不是由真人管理的，而是由基于预定义对话模板的聊天机器人管理的。我们还分析了这些应用的商业模式，并揭示了生态系统中实际涉及的多方，包括开发应用的生产商，发布应用以获取利润的出版商，以及负责向最终用户分发应用的分发网络。最后，我们分析它们对用户(即受害者)的影响，并估计整体收入。我们的工作是对欺诈性约会应用的第一次系统研究，结果表明迫切需要一种保护用户的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 与sc骨约会：了解欺诈性约会应用的生态系统

papers.title: Collusion Defender: Preserving Subscribers' Privacy in Publish and Subscribe Systems
papers.authors: Shujie Cui, Sana Belguith, Pramodya De Alwis, Muhammad Rizwan Asghar, Giovanni Russello
papers.abstract: The Publish and Subscribe (pub/sub) system is an established paradigm to disseminate the data from publishers to subscribers in a loosely coupled manner using a network of dedicated brokers. However, sensitive data could be exposed to malicious entities if brokers get compromised or hacked; or even worse, if brokers themselves are curious to learn about the data. A viable mechanism to protect sensitive publications and subscriptions is to encrypt the data before it is disseminated through the brokers. State-of-the-art approaches allow brokers to perform encrypted matching without revealing publications and subscriptions. However, if malicious brokers collude with malicious subscribers or publishers, they can learn the interests of innocent subscribers, even when the interests are encrypted. In this article, we present a pub/sub system that ensures confidentiality of publications and subscriptions in the presence of untrusted brokers. Furthermore, our solution resists collusion attacks between untrusted brokers and malicious subscribers (or publishers). Finally, we have implemented a prototype of our solution to show its feasibility and efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 发布和订阅(pub/sub)系统是一个已建立的范例，使用专用代理网络以松散耦合的方式将数据从发布者传播到订阅者。然而，如果经纪人受到危害或黑客攻击，敏感数据可能会暴露给恶意实体；或者更糟糕的是，如果经纪人自己对这些数据感到好奇。保护敏感出版物和订阅的可行机制是在通过代理传播数据之前对数据进行加密。最先进的方法允许经纪人在不泄露出版物和订阅的情况下执行加密匹配。但是，如果恶意经纪人与恶意订阅者或发布者勾结，他们可以了解无辜订阅者的利益，即使利益是加密的。在本文中，我们介绍了一个发布/订阅系统，它可以在存在不可信代理的情况下确保发布和订阅的机密性。此外，我们的解决方案可以抵御不受信任的代理和恶意订阅者(或发布者)之间的共谋攻击。最后，我们实现了我们的解决方案的原型，以显示其可行性和效率。
papers.title_zh: 串通辩护人：保留订户在发布和订阅系统中的隐私

papers.title: On Evaluating Fault Resilient Encoding Schemes in Software
papers.authors: Jakub Breier, Xiaolu Hou, Yang Liu
papers.abstract: Cryptographic implementations are often vulnerable against physical attacks, fault injection analysis being among the most popular techniques. On par with development of attacks, the area of countermeasures is advancing rapidly, utilizing both hardware- and software-based approaches. When it comes to software encoding countermeasures for fault protection and their evaluation, there are very few proposals so far, mostly focusing on single operations rather than cipher as a whole. In this paper we propose an evaluation framework that can be used for analyzing the effectivity of software encoding countermeasures against fault attacks. We first formalize the encoding schemes in software, helping us to define what properties are required when designing a fault protection. Based on these findings, we develop an evaluation metric that can be used universally to determine the robustness of a software encoding scheme against bit flip faults and instruction skips. We provide a way to select a code according to user criteria and also a dynamic code analysis method to estimate the level of protection of assembly implementations using encoding schemes. Finally, we verify our findings by implementing a block cipher PRESENT, protected by encoding scheme based on anticodes, and provide a detailed evaluation of this implementation using different codes.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密实现通常容易受到物理攻击，故障注入分析是最流行的技术之一。随着攻击的发展，利用基于硬件和基于软件的方法，对抗领域正在快速发展。当涉及到用于故障保护的软件编码对策及其评估时，迄今为止很少有提议，大多集中在单个操作而不是密码整体上。本文提出了一个评估框架，用于分析软件编码对抗错误攻击的有效性。我们首先在软件中形式化编码方案，帮助我们定义在设计故障保护时需要什么属性。基于这些发现，我们开发了一种评估度量，可以普遍用于确定软件编码方案对抗位翻转错误和指令跳过的鲁棒性。我们提供了一种根据用户标准选择代码的方法，还提供了一种动态代码分析方法来评估使用编码方案的程序集实现的保护级别。最后，我们通过实现由基于反码的编码方案保护的分组密码来验证我们的发现，并使用不同的代码提供了该实现的详细评估。
papers.title_zh: 评估软件中的故障弹性编码方案

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Attribute-Based Keyword Search in Shared Multi-owner Setting
papers.authors: Yinbin Miao, Ximeng Liu, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Robert H. Deng, Jiguo Li, Hongwei Li, Jian-Feng Ma
papers.abstract: Ciphertext-Policy Attribute-Based Keyword Search (CP-ABKS) facilitates search queries and supports fine-grained access control over encrypted data in the cloud. However, prior CP-ABKS schemes were designed to support unshared multi-owner setting, and cannot be directly applied in the shared multi-owner setting (where each record is accredited by a fixed number of data owners), without incurring high computational and storage costs. In addition, due to privacy concerns on access policies, most existing schemes are vulnerable to off-line keyword-guessing attacks if the keyword space is of polynomial size. Furthermore, it is difficult to identify malicious users who leak the secret keys when more than one data user has the same subset of attributes. In this paper, we present a privacy-preserving CP-ABKS system with hidden access policy in Shared Multi-owner setting (basic ABKS-SM system), and demonstrate how it is improved to support malicious user tracing (modified ABKS-SM system). We then prove that the proposed ABKS-SM systems achieve selective security and resist off-line keyword-guessing attack in the generic bilinear group model. We also evaluate their performance using real-world datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于密文策略属性的关键字搜索(CP-ABKS)方便了搜索查询，并支持对云中加密数据的细粒度访问控制。然而，先前的CP-ABKS方案被设计为支持非共享的多所有者设置，并且不能直接应用于共享的多所有者设置(其中每个记录由固定数量的数据所有者认可)，而不会导致高的计算和存储成本。此外，由于对访问策略的隐私关注，如果关键字空间是多项式大小，大多数现有方案容易受到离线关键字猜测攻击。此外，当不止一个数据用户具有相同的属性子集时，很难识别泄漏秘密密钥的恶意用户。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个在共享多所有者环境下具有隐藏访问策略的隐私保护CP-ABKS系统(基本ABKS-SM系统)，并演示了如何对其进行改进以支持恶意用户追踪(改进的ABKS-SM系统)。然后，我们证明了所提出的ABKS-SM系统在一般双线性群模型下实现了选择性安全并抵抗离线关键字猜测攻击。我们还使用真实数据集评估了它们的性能。
papers.title_zh: 在共享的多主设置中基于隐私保护属性的关键字搜索

papers.title: PrivHome: Privacy-Preserving Authenticated Communication in Smart Home Environment
papers.authors: Geong Sen Poh, Prosanta Gope, Jianting Ning
papers.abstract: A smart home enables users to access devices such as lighting, HVAC, temperature sensors, and surveillance camera. It provides a more convenient and safe living environment for users. Security and privacy, however, is a key concern since information collected from these devices are normally communicated to the user through an open network (i.e. Internet) or system provided by the service provider. The service provider may store and have access to these information. Emerging smart home hubs such as Samsung SmartThings and Google Home are also capable of collecting and storing these information. Leakage and unauthorized access to the information can have serious consequences. For example, the mere timing of switching on/off of an HVAC unit may reveal the presence or absence of the home owner. Similarly, leakage or tampering of critical medical information collected from wearable body sensors can have serious consequences. Encrypting these information will address the issues, but it also reduces utility since queries is no longer straightforward. Therefore, we propose a privacy-preserving scheme, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf {PrivHome}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PrivHome</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="gope-ieq1-2914911.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. It supports authentication, secure data storage and query for smart home systems. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf {PrivHome}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">PrivHome</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="gope-ieq2-2914911.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> provides data confidentiality as well as entity and data authentication to prevent an outsider from learning or modifying the data communicated between the devices, service provider, gateway, and the user. It further provides privacy-preserving queries in such a way that the service provider, and the gateway does not learn content of the data. To the best of our knowledge, privacy-preserving queries for smart home systems has not been considered before. Under our scheme is a new, lightweight entity and key-exchange protocol, and an efficient searchable encryption protocol. Our scheme is practical as both protocols are based solely on symmetric cryptographic techniques. We demonstrate efficiency and effectiveness of our scheme based on experimental and simulation results, as well as comparisons to existing smart home security protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能家居使用户能够访问照明、HVAC、温度传感器和监控摄像头等设备。为用户提供了更加便捷、安全的生活环境。然而，安全性和隐私是一个关键问题，因为从这些设备收集的信息通常通过服务提供商提供的开放网络(即互联网)或系统传递给用户。服务提供商可以存储并访问这些信息。新兴的智能家居中心，如三星SmartThings和谷歌home，也能够收集和存储这些信息。信息的泄露和未经授权的访问会产生严重的后果。例如，仅仅是打开/关闭HVAC单元的时间就可以揭示屋主的存在或不存在。类似地，从可穿戴身体传感器收集的关键医疗信息的泄露或篡改会产生严重的后果。加密这些信息将解决这些问题，但它也降低了效用，因为查询不再是直接的。因此，我们提出了一个隐私保护方案，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ SF { priv home } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " sans-serif " > priv home </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " gope-ie Q1-2914911 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >。它支持智能家居系统的身份验证、安全数据存储和查询。< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ SF { priv home } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math variant = " sans-serif " > priv home </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " gope-ieq 2-2914911 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >提供数据机密性以及实体和数据认证，以防止外人获知它还以服务提供商和网关不了解数据内容的方式提供隐私保护查询。据我们所知，智能家居系统的隐私保护查询以前从未被考虑过。在我们的方案下是一个新的，轻量级的实体和密钥交换协议，以及一个有效的可搜索加密协议。我们的方案是实用的，因为这两个协议都只基于对称密码技术。基于实验和仿真结果，以及与现有智能家居安全协议的比较，我们证明了我们的方案的效率和有效性。
papers.title_zh: Privhome：智能家庭环境中保存隐私的经过身份验证的通信

papers.title: The Feasibility of Injecting Inaudible Voice Commands to Voice Assistants
papers.authors: Chen Yan, Guoming Zhang, Xiaoyu Ji, Tianchen Zhang, Taimin Zhang, Wenyuan Xu
papers.abstract: Voice assistants (VAs) such as Siri and Google Now have become an increasingly popular human-machine interaction method and have made various systems voice controllable. Prior work on attacking voice assistants shows that the hidden voice commands that are incomprehensible to people can control the VAs. Hidden voice commands, though ‘hidden’, are nonetheless audible. In this work, we design a completely inaudible attack, DolphinAttack, that modulates voice commands on ultrasonic carriers to achieve inaudibility. By leveraging the nonlinearity of the microphone circuits, the modulated low-frequency audio commands can be successfully demodulated, recovered, and more importantly interpreted by the voice assistants. We validate DolphinAttack on popular voice assistants, including Siri, Google Now, S Voice, HiVoice, Cortana, Alexa, etc. By injecting a sequence of inaudible voice commands, we show a few proof-of-concept attacks, which include activating Siri to initiate a FaceTime call on iPhone, activating Google Now to turn on the airplane mode, and even manipulating the navigation system in an Audi automobile. We propose hardware and software defense solutions. We validate that it is feasible to detect DolphinAttack by classifying the audios using supported vector machine (SVM), and suggest to re-design voice assistants to be resilient to inaudible voice command attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: Siri和Google Now等语音助手(VAs)已经成为越来越受欢迎的人机交互方式，并使各种系统变得可以语音控制。先前关于攻击语音助手的工作表明，人们无法理解的隐藏语音命令可以控制VAs。隐藏的语音命令虽然是“隐藏的”，但仍然是听得见的。在这项工作中，我们设计了一种完全听不见的攻击，DolphinAttack，它在超声波载波上调制语音命令以实现听不见。通过利用麦克风电路的非线性，调制的低频音频命令可以被语音助理成功解调、恢复，更重要的是可以被语音助理解释。我们在流行的语音助手上验证DolphinAttack，包括Siri、Google Now、S Voice、HiVoice、Cortana、Alexa等。通过注入一系列听不见的语音命令，我们展示了一些概念验证攻击，包括激活Siri在iPhone上发起FaceTime呼叫，激活Google Now打开飞行模式，甚至操纵奥迪汽车的导航系统。我们提出硬件和软件防御解决方案。我们验证了通过使用支持向量机(SVM)对音频进行分类来检测海豚攻击是可行的，并建议重新设计语音助手以抵抗听不见的语音命令攻击。
papers.title_zh: 向语音助手注入听不清的语音命令的可行性

papers.title: DSEOM: A Framework for Dynamic Security Evaluation and Optimization of MTD in Container-Based Cloud
papers.authors: Hai Jin, Zhi Li, Deqing Zou, Bin Yuan
papers.abstract: Due to the lightweight features, the combination of container technology and microservice architecture makes container-based cloud environment more efficient and agile than VM-based cloud environment. However, it also greatly amplifies the dynamism and complexity of the cloud environment and increases the uncertainty of security issues in the system concurrently. In this case, the effectiveness of defense mechanisms with fixed strategies would fluctuate as the updates occur in cloud environment. We refer this problem as effectiveness drift problem of defense mechanisms, which is particularly acute in the proactive defense mechanisms, such as moving target defense (MTD). To tackle this problem, we present DSEOM, a framework that can automatically perceive updates of container-based cloud environment, rapidly evaluate the effectiveness change of MTD and dynamically optimize MTD strategies. Specifically, we establish a multi-dimensional attack graphs model to formalize various complex attack scenarios. Combining with this model, we introduce the concept of betweenness centrality to effectively evaluate and optimize the implementation strategies of MTD. In addition, we present a series of security and performance metrics to quantify the effectiveness of MTD strategies in DSEOM. And we conduct extensive experiments to illustrate the existence of the effectiveness drift problem and demonstrate the usability and scalability of DSEOM.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于轻量级的特性，容器技术和微服务架构的结合使得基于容器的云环境比基于VM的云环境更加高效和敏捷。然而，它也极大地放大了云环境的动态性和复杂性，同时增加了系统中安全问题的不确定性。在这种情况下，具有固定策略的防御机制的有效性会随着云环境中的更新而波动。我们把这个问题称为防御机制的有效性漂移问题，这在主动防御机制中尤为突出，如移动目标防御(MTD)。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了DSEOM框架，该框架能够自动感知基于容器的云环境的更新，快速评估MTD的有效性变化，并动态优化MTD策略。具体来说，我们建立了一个多维攻击图模型来形式化各种复杂的攻击场景。结合该模型，我们引入中间中心性的概念来有效地评估和优化MTD的实现策略。此外，我们提出了一系列安全性和性能指标来量化DSEOM中MTD策略的有效性。我们进行了大量的实验来说明有效性漂移问题的存在，并展示了DSEOM的可用性和可扩展性。
papers.title_zh: DSEOM：基于容器的云中MTD的动态安全评估和优化的框架

papers.title: Secure Halftone Image Steganography Based on Pixel Density Transition
papers.authors: Wei Lu, Yingjie Xue, Yuileong Yeung, Hongmei Liu, Jiwu Huang, Yun Q. Shi
papers.abstract: Most state-of-the-art halftone image steganographic techniques only consider the flipping distortion according to the human visual system, which are not always secure when they are attacked by steganalyzers. In this paper, we propose a halftone image steganographic scheme that aims to generate stego images with good visual quality and strong statistical security of anti-steganalysis. First, the concept of pixel density is proposed and a novel construction called pixel density histogram (PDH) is proposed to design a “<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\pm 1$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>±</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="lu-ieq1-2933621.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> embedding” scheme for halftone images. Then, we optimize density pair selection to select density blocks that can improve visual quality. Finally, the messages are embedded through pixel density transition, where a novel pixel flipping strategy is proposed, which can maintain the structural dependence by optimizing the pixel mesh Markov transition matrix (PMMTM). The experimental results demonstrate that the proposed steganography scheme can achieve strong statistical security of anti-steganalysis with good visual quality without degrading the embedding capacity.
papers.abstract_zh: 大多数半色调图像隐写技术仅根据人类视觉系统考虑翻转失真，在受到隐写分析器攻击时并不总是安全的。本文提出了一种半色调图像隐写方案，旨在生成具有良好视觉质量和强抗隐写分析统计安全性的隐写图像。首先，提出了像素密度的概念，并提出了一种称为像素密度直方图(PDH)的新颖结构来设计一个“< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ pm 1 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo > </MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Lu-ie Q1-1然后，我们优化密度对选择，以选择能够提高视觉质量的密度块。最后，通过像素密度转移嵌入信息，提出了一种新的像素翻转策略，通过优化像素网格马尔可夫转移矩阵来保持结构相关性。实验结果表明，该隐写方案在不降低嵌入容量的前提下，具有很强的抗隐写分析统计安全性和良好的视觉质量。
papers.title_zh: 基于像素密度过渡的安全半径图像密封摄影

papers.title: IDEA: Intrusion Detection through Electromagnetic-Signal Analysis for Critical Embedded and Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Haider Adnan Khan, Nader Sehatbakhsh, Luong N. Nguyen, Robert Locke Callan, Arie Yeredor, Milos Prvulovic, Alenka G. Zajic
papers.abstract: We propose a novel framework called IDEA that exploits electromagnetic (EM) side-channel signals to detect malicious activity on embedded and cyber-physical systems (CPS). IDEA first records EM emanations from an uncompromised reference device to establish a baseline of reference EM patterns. IDEA then monitors the target device's EM emanations. When the observed EM emanations deviate from the reference patterns, IDEA reports this as an anomalous or malicious activity. IDEA does not require any resource or infrastructure on, or any modification to, the monitored system itself. In fact, IDEA is isolated from the target device, and monitors the device without any physical contact. We evaluate IDEA by monitoring the target device while it is executing embedded applications with malicious code injections such as Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS), Ransomware and code modification. We further implement a control-flow hijack attack, an advanced persistent threat, and a firmware modification on three CPSs: an embedded medical device called SyringePump, an industrial Proportional-Integral-Derivative (PID) Controller, and a Robotic Arm, using a popular embedded system, Arduino UNO. The results demonstrate that IDEA can detect different attacks with excellent accuracy (AUC > 99.5%, and 100 percent detection with less than 1 percent false positives) from distances up to 3 m.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个新的框架，称为IDEA，它利用电磁(EM)边信道信号来检测嵌入式和网络物理系统(CPS)上的恶意活动。IDEA首先记录来自未受损参考装置的电磁辐射，以建立参考电磁模式的基线。IDEA然后监控目标设备的电磁辐射。当观察到的电磁辐射偏离参考模式时，IDEA会将其报告为异常或恶意活动。IDEA不需要任何资源或基础设施，也不需要对受监控系统本身进行任何修改。事实上，IDEA与目标设备是隔离的，它在没有任何物理接触的情况下监控设备。我们评估IDEA的方法是，在目标设备执行嵌入式应用时，通过恶意代码注入(如分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)、勒索软件和代码修改)对其进行监控。我们还在三个CPS上实施了控制流劫持攻击、高级持续威胁和固件修改:一个名为SyringePump的嵌入式医疗设备、一个工业比例积分微分(PID)控制器和一个使用流行嵌入式系统Arduino UNO的机械臂。结果表明，IDEA可以在最远3米的距离内以极高的准确性检测不同的攻击(AUC > 99.5%，100%检测，误报率低于1%)
papers.title_zh: 想法：通过电磁信号分析的入侵检测，用于关键嵌入式和网络物理系统

papers.title: A Machine Learning-Based Intrusion Detection System for Securing Remote Desktop Connections to Electronic Flight Bag Servers
papers.authors: Ron Bitton, Asaf Shabtai
papers.abstract: Remote desktop protocols (RDP) are commonly used for connecting and interacting with computers remotely. In this case, a server component runs on the remote computer and shares its desktop (i.e., screen) with the client component which runs on an end user device. In recent years, a number of vulnerabilities have been identified in two widely used remote desktop implementations, Microsoft Remote Desktop and RealVNC. These vulnerabilities may expose the remote server to a new attack vector. This concern is increased when it comes to a cyber-physical system (CPS) in which a client device with a low trust level connects to the critical system via the remote desktop server. In order to mitigate this risk, in this paper we propose a network based intrusion detection system (NIDS) specifically designed for securing the remote desktop connections. The propose method utilizes an innovative anomaly detection technique based on machine learning for detecting malicious TCP packets, which can carry exploits aimed at the RDP server. An empirical evaluation conducted on an avionic system setup consisting of a commercial tablet (Samsung Galaxy Tab) connected through a Virtual Network Computing (VNC) remote desktop implementation to a real electronic flight bag (EFB) server shows that the proposed method can detect malicious packets carrying real exploits (reported in recent years) with a true positive rate of 0.863 and a false positive rate of 0.0001.
papers.abstract_zh: 远程桌面协议(RDP)通常用于远程连接计算机并与之交互。在这种情况下，服务器组件运行在远程计算机上，并与运行在终端用户设备上的客户端组件共享其桌面(即屏幕)。近年来，在微软远程桌面和RealVNC这两个广泛使用的远程桌面实现中发现了许多漏洞。这些漏洞可能会将远程服务器暴露给新的攻击媒介。在网络物理系统(CPS)中，信任级别较低的客户端设备通过远程桌面服务器连接到关键系统，这种担忧就更加突出了。为了降低这种风险，本文提出了一种基于网络的入侵检测系统(NIDS ),专门用于保护远程桌面连接。所提出的方法利用一种基于机器学习的创新异常检测技术来检测恶意TCP包，该包可以携带针对RDP服务器的攻击。在由通过虚拟网络计算(VNC)远程桌面实现连接到真实电子飞行包(EFB)服务器的商用平板电脑(三星Galaxy Tab)组成的航空电子系统设置上进行的经验评估表明，所提出的方法可以以0.863的真阳性率和0.0001的假阳性率检测携带真实利用(近年来报道)的恶意分组。
papers.title_zh: 基于机器学习的入侵检测系统，用于确保远程桌面连接到电子飞行袋服务器

papers.title: CPPHA: Capability-Based Privacy-Protection Handover Authentication Mechanism for SDN-Based 5G HetNets
papers.authors: Jin Cao, Maode Ma, Yulong Fu, Hui Li, Yinghui Zhang
papers.abstract: Ultra-dense Heterogeneous network (HetNet) technique can significantly improve wireless link quality, spectrum efficiency and system capacity, and satisfy different requirements for coverage in hotspots, which has been viewed as one of the key technologies in fifth Generation (5G) network. Due to the existence of many different types of base stations (BSs) and the complexity of the network topology in the 5G HetNets, there are a lot of new challenges in security and mobility management aspects for this multi-tier 5G architecture including insecure access points and potential frequent handovers among several different types of base stations. In this paper, we integrate user capability and Software Defined Network (SDN) technique, and propose a capability-based privacy protection handover authentication mechanism in SDN-based 5G HetNets. Our proposed scheme can achieve the mutual authentication and key agreement between User Equipments (UEs) and BSs in 5G HetNets at the same time largely reduce the authentication handover cost. We demonstrate that our proposed scheme indeed can provide robust security protection by employing several security analysis methods including the BAN logic and the formal verification tool Scyther. In addition, the performance evaluation results show that our scheme outperforms other existing schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 超密集异构网络(HetNet)技术能够显著提高无线链路质量、频谱效率和系统容量，满足不同热点区域的覆盖需求，被视为第五代(5G)网络的关键技术之一。由于5G HetNets中存在许多不同类型的基站(BSs)和网络拓扑的复杂性，这种多层5G架构在安全性和移动性管理方面存在许多新的挑战，包括不安全的接入点和几个不同类型基站之间的潜在频繁切换。本文结合用户能力和软件定义网络(SDN)技术，提出了一种基于SDN的5G异构网络中基于能力的隐私保护切换认证机制。我们提出的方案可以在5G异构网中实现用户设备和基站之间的相互认证和密钥协商，同时大大降低了认证切换成本。我们通过使用BAN逻辑和形式化验证工具Scyther等多种安全分析方法，证明了我们提出的方案确实能够提供健壮的安全保护。此外，性能评估结果表明，我们的方案优于现有的其他方案。
papers.title_zh: CPPHA：基于SDN的5G HETNET的基于功能的隐私保护切换身份验证机制

papers.title: Mimosa: Protecting Private Keys Against Memory Disclosure Attacks Using Hardware Transactional Memory
papers.authors: Congwu Li, Le Guan, Jingqiang Lin, Bo Luo, Quanwei Cai, Jiwu Jing, Jing Wang
papers.abstract: Cryptography is essential for computer and network security. When cryptosystems are deployed in computing or communication systems, it is extremely critical to protect the cryptographic keys. In practice, keys are loaded into the memory as plaintext during cryptographic computations. Therefore, the keys are subject to memory disclosure attacks that read unauthorized data from RAM. Such attacks could be performed through software exploitations, such as OpenSSL Heartbleed, even when the integrity of the victim system’s binaries is maintained. They could also be done through physical methods, such as cold-boot attacks, even if the system is free of software vulnerabilities. This paper presents Mimosa, to protect RSA private keys against both software-based and physical memory disclosure attacks. Mimosa uses hardware transactional memory (HTM) to ensure that (a) whenever a malicious thread other than Mimosa attempts to read the plaintext private key, the transaction aborts and all sensitive data are automatically cleared with hardware, due to the strong atomicity guarantee of HTM; and (b) all sensitive data, including private keys and intermediate states, appear as plaintext only within CPU-bound caches, and are never loaded to RAM chips. To the best of our knowledge, Mimosa is the first solution to use transactional memory to protect sensitive data against memory attacks. However, the fragility of TSX transactions introduces extra cache-clogging denial-of-service (DoS) threats, and attackers could sharply degrade the performance by concurrent memory-intensive tasks. To mitigate the DoS threats, we further partition an RSA private-key computation into multiple transactional parts by analyzing the distribution of aborts, while (sensitive) intermediate results are still protected across transactional parts. Through extensive experiments, we show that Mimosa effectively protects cryptographic keys against attacks that attempt to read sensitive data in memory, and introduces only a small performance overhead, even with concurrent cache-clogging workloads.
papers.abstract_zh: 密码学对于计算机和网络安全至关重要。当密码系统被部署在计算或通信系统中时，保护密钥是极其重要的。实际上，在加密计算过程中，密钥是作为明文加载到内存中的。因此，密钥容易受到从RAM中读取未授权数据的内存泄漏攻击。这种攻击可以通过OpenSSL Heartbleed等软件漏洞来执行，即使受害系统的二进制文件保持完整。即使系统没有软件漏洞，它们也可以通过物理方法实现，如冷启动攻击。本文提出Mimosa来保护RSA私钥免受基于软件和物理内存泄漏的攻击。Mimosa使用硬件事务内存(HTM)来确保(a)每当除Mimosa之外的恶意线程试图读取明文私钥时，事务中止，并且所有敏感数据被硬件自动清除，这是由于HTM的强原子性保证；以及(b)所有敏感数据，包括私钥和中间状态，只在受CPU限制的缓存中以明文形式出现，从不加载到RAM芯片中。据我们所知，Mimosa是第一个使用事务内存来保护敏感数据免受内存攻击的解决方案。然而，TSX事务的脆弱性引入了额外的缓存阻塞拒绝服务(DoS)威胁，攻击者可以通过并发内存密集型任务来大幅降低性能。为了减轻DoS威胁，我们通过分析中止的分布将RSA私钥计算进一步划分为多个事务部分，而(敏感的)中间结果仍然在事务部分之间受到保护。通过大量的实验，我们表明Mimosa可以有效地保护密钥免受试图读取内存中敏感数据的攻击，并且即使在并发缓存阻塞工作负载的情况下，也只会引入少量的性能开销。
papers.title_zh: MIMOSA：使用硬件交易记忆保护私钥免受内存披露攻击

papers.title: Revocable Identity-Based Broadcast Proxy Re-Encryption for Data Sharing in Clouds
papers.authors: Chunpeng Ge, Zhe Liu, Jinyue Xia, Liming Fang
papers.abstract: Cloud computing has become prevalent due to its nature of massive storage and vast computing capabilities. Ensuring a secure data sharing is critical to cloud applications. Recently, a number of identity-based broadcast proxy re-encryption (IB-BPRE) schemes have been proposed to resolve the problem. However, the IB-BPRE requires a cloud user (Alice) who wants to share data with a bunch of other users (e.g., colleagues) to participate the group shared key renewal process because Alice's private key is a prerequisite for shared key generation. This, however, does not leverage the benefit of cloud computing and causes the inconvenience for cloud users. Therefore, a novel security notion named revocable identity-based broadcast proxy re-encryption (RIB-BPRE) is presented to address the issue of key revocation in this work. In a RIB-BPRE scheme, a proxy can revoke a set of delegates, designated by the delegator, from the re-encryption key. The performance evaluation reveals that the proposed scheme is efficient and practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算因其海量存储和巨大的计算能力而变得流行。确保安全的数据共享对于云应用至关重要。最近，许多基于身份的广播代理重加密(IB-BPRE)方案被提出来解决这个问题。然而，IB-BPRE要求想要与一群其他用户(例如，同事)共享数据的云用户(爱丽丝)参与群组共享密钥更新过程，因为爱丽丝的私钥是共享密钥生成的先决条件。然而，这并没有利用云计算的优势，并且给云用户带来了不便。因此，本文提出了一种新的安全概念——可撤销的基于身份的广播代理重加密(RIB-BPRE)来解决密钥撤销问题。在里布-BPRE方案中，代理可以从重加密密钥中撤销由委托者指定的一组委托。性能评估表明，该方案是有效和实用的。
papers.title_zh: 基于可撤销的身份基于身份的广播代理重新加密云中的数据共享

papers.title: Sonification to Support the Monitoring Tasks of Security Operations Centres
papers.authors: Louise Axon, Jassim Happa, Alastair Janse van Rensburg, Michael Goldsmith, Sadie Creese
papers.abstract: Sonification (the representation of data as sound) may offer a solution to some of the network-security monitoring challenges faced in security operations centres (SOCs). Prior work has shown that sonification can present network-security information to humans effectively, and indicated that security practitioners foresee potential for sonification to aid in scenarios related to their work. The use of sonification by security practitioners in tasks relevant to SOCs has not been examined, however. To address this gap, we assessed the use of sonification by security practitioners in network-security monitoring tasks in an experimental setting. We report on the results of a study in which we compared the performance of security practitioners using a Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) tool with their performance using a SIEM tool that incorporated sonification, in a primary and a non-primary monitoring task. In both tasks, a number of aspects of the monitoring performance of participants were significantly improved when sonification was used. Our results support the potential for sonification to aid in SOC tasks, and indicate a need to validate the utility of sonification systems by running them in operational SOCs.
papers.abstract_zh: 声音化(将数据表示为声音)可能为安全运营中心(SOC)面临的一些网络安全监控挑战提供解决方案。先前的工作表明，发音可以有效地向人类呈现网络安全信息，并表明安全从业者预见到发音在与其工作相关的场景中的潜在帮助。然而，安全从业者在与SOC相关的任务中使用发音还没有被检查。为了填补这个空白，我们在实验环境中评估了安全从业者在网络安全监控任务中使用发音的情况。我们报告了一项研究的结果，在这项研究中，我们比较了使用安全信息和事件管理(SIEM)工具的安全从业者的表现，以及他们在主要和非主要监控任务中使用结合了发音的SIEM工具的表现。在这两项任务中，当使用发音时，参与者的监测表现的许多方面都得到了显著改善。我们的结果支持了发音在SOC任务中的潜力，并表明有必要通过在可操作SOC中运行来验证发音系统的效用。
papers.title_zh: 索要支持安全操作中心的监视任务

papers.title: Reliable and Privacy-Preserving Truth Discovery for Mobile Crowdsensing Systems
papers.authors: Chuan Zhang, Liehuang Zhu, Chang Xu, Ximeng Liu, Kashif Sharif
papers.abstract: Truth discovery has received considerable attention in mobile crowdsensing systems. In real practice, it is vital to resolve conflicts among a large amount of sensory data and estimate the truthful information. Although truth discovery has been widely explored to improve aggregation accuracy, numerous security and privacy issues still need to be addressed. Existing schemes either do not guarantee the privacy of each participating user, or fail to consider practical needs in crowdsensing systems. In this paper, we present two reliable and privacy-preserving truth discovery schemes for different scenarios. Our first design is fit for applications where users are relatively stable. By employing the homomorphic Paillier encryption, one-way hash chain, and super-increasing sequence techniques, this approach not only guarantees strong privacy, but also is highly efficient and practical. Our second design suits applications where users are frequently moving. In such an application, we explore data perturbation and homomorphic Paillier encryption to shift all user workloads to the server side, without compromising users’ privacy. Through detailed security analysis, we demonstrate that both schemes are secure, practical, and privacy-preserving. Moreover, extensive experiments based on real world and simulated mobile crowdsensing systems, we demonstrate the efficiency of our proposed schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 真相发现在移动众测系统中受到了广泛关注。在实际应用中，解决大量感觉数据之间的冲突并估计真实信息是至关重要的。尽管真实发现已经被广泛探索以提高聚集准确性，但是许多安全和隐私问题仍然需要解决。现有的方案要么不能保证每个参与用户的隐私，要么不能考虑众测系统的实际需求。在这篇文章中，我们提出了两个可靠的和隐私保护的真相发现方案，适用于不同的场景。我们的第一个设计适合用户相对稳定的应用。通过使用同态Paillier加密、单向散列链和超递增序列技术，该方法不仅保证了强保密性，而且高效实用。我们的第二个设计适合用户频繁移动的应用。在这样的应用中，我们探索数据扰动和同态Paillier加密，将所有用户工作负载转移到服务器端，而不损害用户的隐私。通过详细的安全性分析，我们证明了两个方案都是安全、实用和隐私保护的。此外，基于真实世界和模拟移动众测系统的大量实验证明了我们提出的方案的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 移动人群系统的可靠且保存隐私的真相发现

papers.title: Denoising in the Dark: Privacy-Preserving Deep Neural Network-Based Image Denoising
papers.authors: Yifeng Zheng, Huayi Duan, Xiaoting Tang, Cong Wang, Jiantao Zhou
papers.abstract: Large volumes of images are being exponentially generated today, which poses high demands on the services of storage, processing, and management. To handle the explosive image growth, a natural choice nowadays is cloud computing. However, coming with the cloud-based image services is acute data privacy concerns, which has to be well addressed. In this paper, we present a secure cloud-based image service framework, which allows privacy-preserving and effective image denoising on the cloud side to produce high-quality image content, a key for assuring the quality of various image-centric applications. We resort to state-of-the-art image denoising techniques based on deep neural networks (DNNs), and show how to uniquely bridge cryptographic techniques (like lightweight secret sharing and garbled circuits) and image denoising in depth to support privacy-preserving DNN based image denoising services on the cloud. By design, the image content and the DNN model are all kept private along the whole cloud-based service flow. Our extensive empirical evaluation shows that our security design is able to achieve denoising quality comparable to that in plaintext, with high cost efficiency on the local side and practically affordable cost on the cloud side.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，大量图像呈指数级增长，这对存储、处理和管理服务提出了很高的要求。为了应对爆炸式的图像增长，当今的自然选择是云计算。然而，基于云的图像服务带来了严重的数据隐私问题，这必须得到很好的解决。在本文中，我们提出了一个安全的基于云的图像服务框架，它允许在云端保护隐私和有效的图像去噪，以产生高质量的图像内容，这是确保各种以图像为中心的应用程序的质量的关键。我们求助于基于深度神经网络(DNNs)的最先进的图像去噪技术，并展示了如何独特地将加密技术(如轻量级秘密共享和乱码电路)与图像去噪深度结合，以支持基于云的图像去噪服务的隐私保护DNN。按照设计，图像内容和DNN模型在整个基于云的服务流程中都是私有的。我们广泛的经验评估表明，我们的安全设计能够实现与明文相当的去噪质量，在本地端具有较高的成本效率，在云端具有实际可承受的成本。
papers.title_zh: 在黑暗中降级：隐私保护基于神经网络的深度图像

papers.title: Design of Secure Authenticated Key Management Protocol for Cloud Computing Environments
papers.authors: Wei Li, Xuelian Li, Juntao Gao, Haiyu Wang
papers.abstract: With the maturity of cloud computing technology in terms of reliability and efficiency, a large number of services have migrated to the cloud platform. To convenient access to the services and protect the privacy of communication in the public network, three-factor Mutual Authentication and Key Agreement (MAKA) protocols for multi-server architectures gain wide attention. However, most of the existing three-factor MAKA protocols don’t provide a formal security proof resulting in various attacks on the related protocols, or they have high computation and communication costs. And most of the three-factor MAKA protocols haven’t a dynamic revocation mechanism, which leads to malicious users can not be promptly revoked. To address these drawbacks, we propose a provable dynamic revocable three-factor MAKA protocol that achieves the user dynamic management using Schnorr signatures and provides a formal security proof in the random oracle. Security analysis shows that our protocol can meet various demands in the multi-server environments. Performance analysis demonstrates that the proposed scheme is well suited for computing resource constrained smart devices. The full version of the simulation implementation proves the feasibility of the protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云计算技术在可靠性和效率方面的成熟，大量的服务迁移到了云平台上。为了在公共网络中方便地访问服务和保护通信隐私，面向多服务器架构的三因素相互认证和密钥协商(MAKA)协议得到了广泛关注。然而，现有的大部分三因子MAKA协议没有提供正式的安全证明，导致相关协议受到各种攻击，或者计算和通信代价很高。并且大多数三因子MAKA协议没有动态撤销机制，导致恶意用户不能被及时撤销。针对这些缺点，我们提出了一个可证明的动态可撤销的三因子MAKA协议，该协议使用Schnorr签名实现了用户的动态管理，并在随机预言机中提供了一个形式化的安全证明。安全性分析表明，该协议能够满足多服务器环境下的各种需求。性能分析表明，该方案非常适合计算资源受限的智能设备。完整版本的仿真实现证明了该协议的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 针对云计算环境的安全身份验证的密钥管理协议的设计

papers.title: Efficient and Privacy-Preserving Ridesharing Organization for Transferable and Non-Transferable Services
papers.authors: Mahmoud Nabil, Ahmed B. T. Sherif, Mohamed Mahmoud, Ahmad Alsharif, Mohamed M. Abdallah
papers.abstract: Ridesharing allows multiple persons to share one vehicle for their trips instead of using multiple vehicles. Ridesharing can reduce the number of vehicles in the street, which consequently can reduce air pollution, traffic congestion, and transportation cost. However, ridesharing organization requires passengers to report sensitive location information about their trips to a trip organizing server (TOS) which creates a serious privacy issue. The existing ridesharing organization schemes are neither flexible nor scalable in the sense that they require a driver and a rider to have exactly the same trip to share a ride, and they are inefficient if applied to large geographic areas. In this paper, we propose two efficient privacy-preserving ridesharing organization schemes for Non-transferable Ridesharing Service (NRS) and Transferable Ridesharing Service (TRS). In NRS, a rider shares a ride from his/her trip’s start to the destination with only one driver, whereas, in TRS, a rider can transfer between multiple drivers while en route until he reaches his destination. In the proposed schemes, the ridesharing area is divided into a number of small geographic areas, called cells, and each cell has a unique identifier. Each driver/rider should encrypt his/her trip’s data with modified kNN encryption scheme, and send an encrypted ridesharing offer/request to the TOS. In NRS scheme, Bloom filters are used to represent the trip information compactly before encryption. Then, the TOS can measure the similarity of the encrypted trips to organize shared rides without revealing either the users’ identities or the locations. In TRS scheme, drivers report their encrypted routes, and then the TOS builds a directed graph that is passed to a modified version of Dijkstra’s shortest path algorithm to search for an optimal path for rides that can achieve a set of preferences prescribed by the riders. Although TRS can be used to organize non-transferable trips, performance evaluation shows that NRS requires less communication overhead than TRS. Our formal privacy proof and analysis demonstrate that the proposed schemes can preserve users privacy and our experimental results using routes extracted from real maps show that the proposed schemes can be used efficiently for large cities.
papers.abstract_zh: 拼车允许多人共用一辆车出行，而不是使用多辆车。拼车可以减少街道上的车辆数量，从而减少空气污染、交通拥堵和运输成本。然而，拼车组织要求乘客向行程组织服务器(TOS)报告关于他们行程的敏感位置信息，这产生了严重的隐私问题。现有的拼车组织方案既不灵活也不可扩展，因为它们要求司机和骑手进行完全相同的旅行来共享一次乘车，并且如果应用于大的地理区域，它们是低效的。本文针对不可转移拼车服务(NRS)和可转移拼车服务(TRS)提出了两种高效的隐私保护拼车组织方案。在NRS，一个乘客从他/她的行程开始到目的地只与一个司机共乘一次车，而在TRS，一个乘客可以在途中换乘多个司机，直到他到达目的地。在所提出的方案中，拼车区域被分成许多小的地理区域，称为小区，每个小区都有一个唯一的标识符。每个司机/乘客应使用改进的kNN加密方案加密他/她的行程数据，并向TOS发送加密的拼车要约/请求。在NRS方案中，在加密之前使用布隆过滤器来简洁地表示出行信息。然后，TOS可以测量加密行程的相似性，在不暴露用户身份或位置的情况下组织共享乘车。在TRS计划中，司机报告他们的加密路线，然后TOS构建一个有向图，该图被传递给Dijkstra最短路径算法的修改版本，以搜索能够实现乘客指定的一组偏好的最佳乘车路径。虽然TRS可用于组织不可转移的旅行，但性能评估显示，NRS比TRS需要更少的通信开销。我们的形式化隐私证明和分析表明，所提出的方案可以保护用户的隐私，我们使用从真实地图中提取的路线的实验结果表明，所提出的方案可以有效地用于大城市。
papers.title_zh: 可转让和不可转让服务的高效和隐私式乘车组织

papers.title: Secure Fine-Grained Encrypted Keyword Search for E-Healthcare Cloud
papers.authors: Haijiang Wang, Jianting Ning, Xinyi Huang, Guiyi Wei, Geong Sen Poh, Ximeng Liu
papers.abstract: E-Healthcare systems are increasingly popular due to the introduction of wearable healthcare devices and sensors. Personal health records (PHRs) are collected by these devices and stored in a remote cloud. Due to privacy concern, these records should not be accessible by any unauthorized party, and the cloud providers should not be able to learn any information from the stored records. To address the above issues, one promising solution is to employ attribute based encryption (ABE) for fine-grained access control and searchable encryption for keyword search on encrypted data. However, most of existing ABE schemes leak the privacy of access policy which may also contain sensitive information. On the other hand, for users’ devices with limited computing power and bandwidth, the mechanism should enable them to be able to search the PHRs efficiently. Unfortunately, most existing works on ABE do not support efficient keyword search on encrypted data. In this work, we propose an efficient hidden policy ABE scheme with keyword search. Our scheme enables efficient keyword search with constant computational overhead and constant storage overhead. Moreover, we enhance the recipient’s privacy which hides the access policy. As of independent interest, we present a trapdoor malleability attack and demonstrate that some of previous schemes may suffer from such attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于可穿戴保健设备和传感器的引入，电子保健系统越来越受欢迎。个人健康记录(phr)由这些设备收集并存储在远程云中。出于隐私考虑，这些记录不应该被任何未授权方访问，云提供商也不应该能够从存储的记录中了解任何信息。为了解决上述问题，一个有希望的解决方案是采用基于属性的加密(ABE)进行细粒度访问控制，并采用可搜索加密对加密数据进行关键字搜索。然而，现有的大多数ABE方案泄露了访问策略的隐私，其中可能包含敏感信息。另一方面，对于计算能力和带宽有限的用户设备，该机制应该使他们能够有效地搜索phr。不幸的是，大多数现有的关于ABE的工作都不支持对加密数据进行有效的关键字搜索。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个有效的带有关键字搜索的隐藏策略ABE方案。我们的方案实现了具有恒定计算开销和恒定存储开销的高效关键字搜索。此外，我们增强了接收者的隐私，隐藏了访问策略。作为独立的兴趣，我们提出了陷门延展性攻击，并证明了以前的一些方案可能遭受这种攻击。
papers.title_zh: 安全粒度加密的关键字搜索电子保健云

papers.title: Adaptive Video Data Hiding through Cost Assignment and STCs
papers.authors: Yanli Chen, Hongxia Wang, Hanzhou Wu, Zhiqiang Wu, Tao Li, Asad Malik
papers.abstract: With the increasing popularity of digital video communication, video data hiding has become an active research topic in covert communication and privacy protection. Traditional video data hiding methods often use quantized discrete cosine transform (QDCT) coefficients to carry a sufficient payload. However, since QDCT coefficients expose texture features and motion characteristics of the present video frame heavily, data embedding with QDCT coefficients may lead to significant intra-frame distortion and inter-frame distortion drift. To avoid obvious visual artifacts and keep bit-rate within a satisfactory level of the marked video, data embedding in QDCT coefficients should take into account both the intra-frame and inter-frame distortion impacts. It motivates the authors to propose an efficient cost assignment-based video data hiding method in this paper. The proposed cost assignment method aims to accurately evaluate the data embedding distortion. Specifically, the proposed scheme considers intra-frame changes and intra-frame distortion drift, for which the texture and motion changes of frames can be measured. The frame position is also used to reflect a cumulative distortion difference of multiple frames. For data embedding, syndrome-trellis code (STC) is adopted to minimize the overall distortion. Experimental results show that the proposed method significantly outperforms existing works in terms of payload-distortion performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着数字视频通信的日益普及，视频数据隐藏已经成为隐蔽通信和隐私保护领域的一个研究热点。传统的视频数据隐藏方法通常使用量化的离散余弦变换(QDCT)系数来携带足够的有效载荷。然而，由于QDCT系数严重暴露了当前视频帧的纹理特征和运动特征，因此用QDCT系数嵌入数据可能导致显著的帧内失真和帧间失真漂移。为了避免明显的视觉伪像并将比特率保持在令人满意的标记视频水平内，在QDCT系数中嵌入的数据应该考虑帧内和帧间失真的影响。这促使作者提出了一种有效的基于成本分配的视频数据隐藏方法。提出的成本分配方法旨在准确评估数据嵌入失真。具体地，所提出的方案考虑了帧内变化和帧内失真漂移，为此可以测量帧的纹理和运动变化。帧位置也用于反映多个帧的累积失真差异。对于数据嵌入，采用伴随式网格码(STC)来最小化整体失真。实验结果表明，该方法在有效载荷失真性能方面明显优于现有方法。
papers.title_zh: 通过成本分配和STC隐藏的自适应视频数据

papers.title: A Key for John Doe: Modeling and Designing Anonymous Password-Authenticated Key Exchange Protocols
papers.authors: María Isabel González Vasco, Angel L. Pérez del Pozo, Claudio Soriente
papers.abstract: Anonymous Password-Authenticated Key Exchange (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ APAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">APAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="gonzalezvasco-ieq1-2919013.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) can be seen as the hybrid offspring of standard key exchange and anonymous password authentication protocols. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ APAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">APAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="gonzalezvasco-ieq2-2919013.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> allows a client holding a low-entropy password to establish a session key with a server, provided that the client’s password is in the server’s set. Moreover, no information about the password input by the client or the set of valid passwords held by the server should leak to the other party–beyond whether the client’s password lies or not in the server’s password database. To the best of our knowledge, all <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ APAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">APAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="gonzalezvasco-ieq3-2919013.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> proposals to date either assume client storage or force the client to remember the index assigned to its password in the server’s database. Furthermore, earlier works either provide only informal definitions or fail in some sense to properly model the primitive. In this paper, we provide a formal security model for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ APAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">APAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="gonzalezvasco-ieq4-2919013.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, capturing security and anonymity provisions for both clients and servers. In addition, we present two <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sf{ APAKE}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">APAKE</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="gonzalezvasco-ieq5-2919013.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> protocols that only require clients to remember a password and that attain our sought key secrecy and anonymity guarantees. Our first protocol leverages oblivious pseudo-random functions, while the second one builds upon a special type of identity-based encryption scheme.

papers.title_zh: 约翰·杜伊（John Doe）的关键：建模和设计匿名密码认证的密钥交换协议

papers.title: Towards Private and Scalable Cross-Media Retrieval
papers.authors: Shengshan Hu, Leo Yu Zhang, Qian Wang, Zhan Qin, Cong Wang
papers.abstract: Cross-media retrieval (CMR) is an attractive networked application where a server responds to queries with retrieval results of different modalities. Different from traditional information retrieval, CMR relies on a more enriched set of machine learning techniques to produce semantic models projecting multimodal data into a common space. A larger training dataset usually gives more accurate models, leading to a better retrieval result. Despite very promising with potential underpinnings in network analytics and multimedia applications, applying CMR in such contexts also faces severe privacy challenges, due to the fact that various data scattering among multiple parties may be sensitive and not allowed to be shared publicly. Studies jointly considering cross-media analytics, privacy protection, collaborative learning, and distributed networking contexts, are relatively sparse. In this work, we propose the first practical system for privacy-preserving cross-media retrieval by utilizing trusted processors. Our scheme enables secure aggregation of the data from distinct parties, and secure canonical correlation analysis (CCA) over collaborated data to obtain semantic models. Verification mechanisms are designed to defend against active attacks from a malicious adversary. Furthermore, to deal with large data sets, we provide a set of optimization methods to accomodate to limited trusted memory and improve the efficiency of training process in CMR. We consider issues such as data block splitting to manage memory overhead, ordering of operations as well as parameters reuse and release to simplify I/O, and parallel computation to speed up dual operations. Our experiments over both synthetic and real datasets show that our solution is very efficient in practice, outperforms the existing solutions, and performs comparably with the original CMR system.
papers.abstract_zh: 跨媒体检索(CMR)是一种有吸引力的网络应用，其中服务器用不同模态的检索结果来响应查询。与传统的信息检索不同，CMR依赖于一组更丰富的机器学习技术来产生语义模型，将多模态数据投影到公共空间。较大的训练数据集通常给出更准确的模型，从而导致更好的检索结果。尽管在网络分析和多媒体应用中具有潜在的基础，但是在这样的环境中应用CMR也面临着严重的隐私挑战，这是因为分散在多方之间的各种数据可能是敏感的，并且不允许公开共享。联合考虑跨媒体分析、隐私保护、协作学习和分布式网络环境的研究相对较少。在这项工作中，我们提出了第一个利用可信处理器实现隐私保护跨媒体检索的实用系统。我们的方案能够安全地聚合来自不同方的数据，并对协作数据进行安全的典型相关分析(CCA)以获得语义模型。验证机制旨在抵御恶意对手的主动攻击。此外，为了处理大数据集，我们提供了一套优化方法来适应有限的可信内存，提高CMR训练过程的效率。我们考虑的问题包括数据块分割以管理内存开销、操作排序以及参数重用和释放以简化I/O，以及并行计算以加速双重操作。我们在合成数据集和真实数据集上的实验表明，我们的解决方案在实践中非常有效，优于现有的解决方案，并且与原始CMR系统的性能相当。
papers.title_zh: 迈向私人和可扩展的跨媒体检索

papers.title: KALD: Detecting Direct Pointer Disclosure Vulnerabilities
papers.authors: Brian Belleville, Wenbo Shen, Stijn Volckaert, Ahmed M. Azab, Michael Franz
papers.abstract: Modern operating system kernels deploy Kernel Address Space Layout Randomization (KASLR) to mitigate control-flow hijacking attacks. KASLR randomizes the base addresses of the kernel's code and data segments. However, it randomizes both with a single offset and does not randomize the internal layout of either of these segments, so relative addresses remain known to adversaries. If the kernel discloses a single code or global data pointer, an adversary can therefore infer the entire layout of the kernel's code segment and bypass KASLR. In this paper, we present Kernel Address Leak Detector (KALD), a tool that finds direct disclosure vulnerabilities by statically analyzing the kernel source code. KALD can analyze the source code of modern operating system kernels and find previously unreported leaks. KALD compiles a list of functions that can leak information to user-space accessible locations, and it uses the results of a points-to analysis to determine whether individual invocations of such functions can disclose kernel pointers. We show that KALD successfully detects several direct disclosure vulnerabilities in the Linux kernel and that it is flexible enough to be useful in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代操作系统内核部署内核地址空间布局随机化(KASLR)来减轻控制流劫持攻击。KASLR将内核代码和数据段的基址随机化。但是，它用单个偏移量随机化两者，并且不随机化这些段中任何一个的内部布局，因此相对地址仍然为对手所知。如果内核公开了单个代码或全局数据指针，对手就可以推断出内核代码段的整个布局并绕过KASLR。在本文中，我们介绍了内核地址泄漏检测器(KALD)，这是一种通过静态分析内核源代码来发现直接泄漏漏洞的工具。KALD可以分析现代操作系统内核的源代码，并发现以前未报告的漏洞。KALD编译了一个函数列表，这些函数会将信息泄漏到用户空间可访问的位置，它使用指向分析的结果来确定对这些函数的单独调用是否会泄漏内核指针。我们证明了KALD成功地检测到了Linux内核中的几个直接泄漏漏洞，并且它足够灵活，在实践中非常有用。
papers.title_zh: 卡尔德：检测直接指针披露漏洞

papers.title: $\sf {DBank}$DBank: Predictive Behavioral Analysis of Recent Android Banking Trojans
papers.authors: Chongyang Bai, Qian Han, Ghita Mezzour, Fabio Pierazzi, V. S. Subrahmanian
papers.abstract: Using a novel dataset of Android banking trojans (ABTs), other Android malware, and goodware, we develop the DBank system to predict whether a given Android APK is a banking trojan or not. We introduce the novel concept of a Triadic Suspicion Graph (TSG for short) which contains three kinds of nodes: goodware, banking trojans, and API packages. We develop a novel feature space based on two classes of scores derived from TSGs: suspicion scores (SUS) and suspicion ranks (SR)-the latter yields a family of features that generalize PageRank. While TSG features (based on SUS/SR scores) provide very high predictive accuracy on their own in predicting recent (2016-2017) ABTs, we show that the combination of TSG features with previously studied lightweight static and dynamic features in the literature yields the highest accuracy in distinguishing ABTs from goodware, while preserving the same accuracy of prior feature combinations in distinguishing ABTs from other Android malware. In particular, DBank's overall accuracy in predicting whether an APK is a banking trojan or not is up to 99.9% AUC with 0.3% false positive rate. Moreover, we have already reported two unlabeled APKs from VirusTotal (which DBank has detected as ABTs) to the Google Android Security Team-in one case, we discovered it before any of the 63 anti-virus products on VirusTotal did, and in the other case, we beat 62 of 63 anti-viruses on VirusTotal. This suggests that DBank is capable of making new discoveries in the wild before other established vendors. We also show that our novel TSG features have some interesting defensive properties as they are robust to knowledge of the training set by an adversary: even if the adversary uses 90% of our training set and uses the exact TSG features that we use, it is difficult for him to infer DBank's predictions on APKs. We additionally identify the features that best separate and characterize ABTs from goodware as well as from other Android malware. Finally, we develop a detailed data-driven analysis of five major recent ABT families: FakeToken, Svpeng, Asacub, BankBot, and Marcher, and identify the features that best separate them from goodware and other malware.
papers.abstract_zh: 使用一个新的Android银行特洛伊木马(ABTs)、其他Android恶意软件和goodware数据集，我们开发了DBank系统来预测给定的Android APK是否是银行特洛伊木马。我们引入了三元怀疑图(简称TSG)的新概念，它包含三种类型的节点:goodware、banking trojans和API包。我们开发了一个新的特征空间，它基于从TSGs得到的两类分数:怀疑分数(SUS)和怀疑等级(SR)，后者产生了一个概括PageRank的特征族。虽然TSG特征(基于SUS/SR分数)本身在预测最近(2016-2017年)的abt时提供了非常高的预测准确性，但我们表明，TSG特征与文献中先前研究的轻量级静态和动态特征的组合在区分abt与goodware时产生了最高的准确性，同时在区分abt与其他Android恶意软件时保持了先前特征组合的相同准确性。特别地，DBank在预测APK是否为银行特洛伊木马时的总体准确率高达99.9% AUC，误报率为0.3%。此外，我们已经向谷歌Android安全团队报告了来自VirusTotal的两个未标记的DBank已将其检测为abt)——在一个案例中，我们在VirusTotal上的63个反病毒产品之前发现了它，在另一个案例中，我们击败了VirusTotal上63个反病毒产品中的62个。这表明DBank有能力在其他成熟的供应商之前在野外做出新的发现。我们还表明，我们的新TSG特征具有一些有趣的防御特性，因为它们对对手的训练集的知识是鲁棒的:即使对手使用我们训练集的90%并使用我们使用的确切TSG特征，他也很难推断出DBank对APKs的预测。此外，我们还确定了最能区分和表征abt与goodware以及其他Android恶意软件的特征。最后，我们对最近的五个主要ABT家族进行了详细的数据驱动分析:FakeToken、Svpeng、Asacub、BankBot和Marcher，并确定了最能将它们与goodware和其他恶意软件区分开来的特征。
papers.title_zh: $ \ sf {dbank} $ dbank：最近的Android银行木马的预测行为分析

papers.title: Dynamic Group-Oriented Provable Data Possession in the Cloud
papers.authors: Kun He, Jing Chen, Quan Yuan, Shouling Ji, Debiao He, Ruiying Du
papers.abstract: As an important security property of cloud storage, data integrity has not been sufficiently studied under the multi-writer model, where a group of users work on shared files collaboratively and any group member can update the data by modification, insertion, and deletion operations. Existing works under such multi-writer model would bring large storage cost to the third-party verifiers. Furthermore, to the best of our knowledge, none of the existing works for shared files supports fully dynamic operations, which implies that users cannot freely perform the update operations. In this paper, we propose the first public auditing scheme for shared data that supports fully dynamic operations and achieves constant storage cost for the verifiers. Our scheme, named PRAYS, is boosted by a new paradigm for remote data integrity checking. To implement the new paradigm, we proposed a specially designed authenticated structure, called blockless Merkle tree, and a novel cryptographic primitive, called permission-based signature. Extensive evaluation demonstrates that PRAYS is as efficient as the existing less-functional solutions. We believe that PRAYS is an important step towards designing practical multi-writer cloud storage systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为云存储的一个重要安全属性，数据完整性在多写入者模型下尚未得到充分研究，在该模型中，一组用户协作处理共享文件，任何组成员都可以通过修改、插入和删除操作来更新数据。这种多作者模式下的现有作品会给第三方验证者带来巨大的存储成本。此外，据我们所知，现有的对共享文件的工作都不支持完全动态的操作，这意味着用户不能自由地执行更新操作。在本文中，我们提出了第一个共享数据的公共审计方案，该方案支持完全动态的操作，并且实现了验证者的恒定存储开销。我们的方案名为PRAYS，由远程数据完整性检查的新范式推动。为了实现这种新的模式，我们提出了一种专门设计的认证结构，称为无块Merkle树，以及一种新的密码原语，称为基于权限的签名。广泛的评估表明，PRAYS与现有的功能较少的解决方案一样有效。我们相信PRAYS是设计实用的多写入者云存储系统的重要一步。
papers.title_zh: 云中动态的面向群体的可证明数据拥有

papers.title: S2Net: Preserving Privacy in Smart Home Routers
papers.authors: SeungSeob Lee, Hang Shi, Kun Tan, Yunxin Liu, SuKyoung Lee, Yong Cui
papers.abstract: At present, wireless home routers are becoming increasingly smart. While these smart routers provide rich functionalities to users, they also raise security concerns. Although the existing end-to-end encryption techniques can be applied to protect personal data, such rich functionalities become unavailable due to the encrypted payloads. On the other hand, if the smart home routers are allowed to process and store the personal data of users, once compromised, the users’ sensitive data will be exposed. As a consequence, users face a difficult trade-off between the benefits of the rich functionalities and potential privacy risks. To deal with this dilemma, we propose a novel system named Secure and Smart Network (S2Net) for home routers. For S2Net, we propose a secure OS that can distinguish and manage multiple sessions belonging to different users. The secure OS and all the router applications are placed in the secure world using the ARM TrustZone technology. In S2Net, we also confine the router applications in sandboxes provided by the proposed secure OS to prevent data leakage. As a result, S2Net can provide rich functionalities for users while preserving strong privacy for home routers. In addition, we develop a crypto-worker model that provides an abstraction layer of cryptographic tasks performed by a heterogeneous multi-core system. The other important role of crypto-worker is to parallelize the computations in order to resolve the high computation cost of cryptographic functions. We report the system design of S2Net and the details of our implementation. Experimental results with benchmarks and real applications demonstrate that our implementation is capable of achieving high performance in terms of throughput while mitigating the overhead of S2Net design.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前无线家用路由器越来越智能。虽然这些智能路由器为用户提供了丰富的功能，但它们也带来了安全问题。尽管现有的端到端加密技术可以用于保护个人数据，但是由于加密的有效载荷，这样丰富的功能变得不可用。另一方面，如果智能家庭路由器被允许处理和存储用户的个人数据，一旦遭到破坏，用户的敏感数据将被暴露。因此，用户在丰富功能的好处和潜在的隐私风险之间面临着艰难的权衡。为了解决这一难题，我们提出了一种新的家庭路由器安全智能网络系统(S2Net)。对于S2Net，我们提出了一个安全的操作系统，可以区分和管理属于不同用户的多个会话。使用ARM TrustZone技术，将安全操作系统和所有路由器应用置于安全环境中。在S2Net中，我们还将路由器应用程序限制在安全操作系统提供的沙箱中，以防止数据泄漏。因此，S2Net可以为用户提供丰富的功能，同时为家庭路由器保留强大的隐私。此外，我们开发了一个加密工作者模型，该模型提供了一个由异构多核系统执行的加密任务的抽象层。加密工作者的另一个重要作用是并行化计算，以解决加密函数的高计算成本。我们报告了S2Net的系统设计和实现细节。基准和实际应用的实验结果表明，我们的实现能够在吞吐量方面实现高性能，同时减少S2Net设计的开销。
papers.title_zh: S2NET：在智能家居路由器中保留隐私

papers.title: PSRide: Privacy-Preserving Shared Ride Matching for Online Ride Hailing Systems
papers.authors: Haining Yu, Xiaohua Jia, Hongli Zhang, Xiangzhan Yu, Jiangang Shu
papers.abstract: Online Ride Hailing (ORH) has extensively made our trip more convenient. With mobile devices, riders can request taxis through ORH systems in a short time. However, to enjoy ORH services, users need to submit their location information to ORH systems, which raises serious privacy concerns. In this paper, we study the privacy leakage of online ridesharing matching, a more complex and economy ORH service that allows riders to share rides with others, and propose a privacy-preserving shared ride matching scheme, called PSRide. PSRide can find the taxi with the minimum additional travel time to serve a new rider based on its existing schedule, while protecting the location privacy of both riders and taxis. In PSRide, we propose a zone-based minimum road travel time estimation approach and a secure comparison protocol to efficiently optimize the schedules of taxis for a new rider over encrypted data. We implement PSRide and analyze it thoroughly. Theoretical analysis and experimental evaluations show that PSRide is secure and efficient for ORH systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线打车(ORH)极大地方便了我们的出行。通过移动设备，乘客可以在短时间内通过ORH系统请求出租车。然而，为了享受ORH服务，用户需要向ORH系统提交他们的位置信息，这引起了严重的隐私问题。本文研究在线拼车匹配的隐私泄露问题，提出一种保护隐私的拼车匹配方案PSRide。PSRide可以根据现有时间表找到额外行程时间最少的出租车，为新乘客提供服务，同时保护乘客和出租车的位置隐私。在PSRide中，我们提出了一种基于区域的最短道路旅行时间估计方法和一种安全的比较协议，以通过加密数据有效地优化新乘客的出租车调度。我们实现了PSRide并对其进行了深入的分析。理论分析和实验评估表明，PSRide对于ORH系统是安全有效的。
papers.title_zh: PSRIDE：保护隐私的共享乘车匹配在线乘车系统

papers.title: A Lightweight Privacy-Preserving CNN Feature Extraction Framework for Mobile Sensing
papers.authors: Kai Huang, Ximeng Liu, Shaojing Fu, Deke Guo, Ming Xu
papers.abstract: The proliferation of various mobile devices equipped with cameras results in an exponential growth of the amount of images. Recent advances in the deep learning with convolutional neural networks (CNN) have made CNN feature extraction become an effective way to process these images. However, it is still a challenging task to deploy the CNN model on the mobile sensors, which are typically resource-constrained in terms of the storage space, the computing capacity, and the battery life. Although cloud computing has become a popular solution, data security and response latency are always the key issues. Therefore, in this paper, we propose a novel lightweight framework for privacy-preserving CNN feature extraction for mobile sensing based on edge computing. To get the most out of the benefits of CNN with limited physical resources on the mobile sensors, we design a series of secure interaction protocols and utilize two edge servers to collaboratively perform the CNN feature extraction. The proposed scheme allows us to significantly reduce the latency and the overhead of the end devices while preserving privacy. Through theoretical analysis and empirical experiments, we demonstrate the security, effectiveness, and efficiency of our scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 配备有相机的各种移动设备的激增导致图像量呈指数级增长。卷积神经网络(CNN)在深度学习方面的最新进展使得CNN特征提取成为处理这些图像的有效方法。然而，在移动传感器上部署CNN模型仍然是一项具有挑战性的任务，移动传感器通常在存储空间、计算能力和电池寿命方面受到资源限制。虽然云计算已经成为一种流行的解决方案，但数据安全性和响应延迟始终是关键问题。因此，本文提出了一种基于边缘计算的轻量级隐私保护CNN特征提取框架。为了在移动传感器上有限的物理资源下最大限度地利用CNN的优势，我们设计了一系列安全交互协议，并利用两个边缘服务器协作执行CNN特征提取。所提出的方案允许我们在保护隐私的同时显著减少终端设备的延迟和开销。通过理论分析和实验，我们证明了该方案的安全性、有效性和高效性。
papers.title_zh: 轻巧的保密性CNN功能提取框架用于移动传感

papers.title: Person Re-Identification over Encrypted Outsourced Surveillance Videos
papers.authors: Hang Cheng, Huaxiong Wang, Ximeng Liu, Yan Fang, Meiqing Wang, Xiaojun Zhang
papers.abstract: Person re-identification (Re-ID) has attracted extensive attention due to its potential to identify a person of interest from different surveillance videos. With the increasing amount of the surveillance videos, high computation and storage costs have posed a great challenge for the resource-constrained users. In recent years, the cloud storage services have made a large volume of video data outsourcing become possible. However, person Re-ID over outsourced surveillance videos could lead to a security threat, i.e., the privacy leakage of the innocent person in these videos. Therefore, we propose an efFicient privAcy-preseRving peRson Re-ID Scheme (FARRIS) over outsourced surveillance videos, which can ensure the privacy of the detected person while providing the person Re-ID service. Specifically, FARRIS exploits the convolutional neural network (CNN) and kernels based supervised hashing (KSH) to extract the efficient person Re-ID feature. Then, we design a secret sharing based Hamming distance computation protocol to allow cloud servers to calculate similarities among obfuscated feature indexes. Furthermore, a dual Merkle hash trees based verification is proposed, which permits users to validate the correctness of the matching results. The extensive experimental results and security analysis demonstrate that FARRIS can work efficiently, without compromising the privacy of the involved person.
papers.abstract_zh: 人物再识别(Re-ID)因其能够从不同的监控视频中识别出感兴趣的人而受到广泛关注。随着监控视频数量的不断增加，高昂的计算和存储成本给资源受限的用户带来了巨大的挑战。近年来，云存储服务使得大量的视频数据外包成为可能。然而，人们对外包监控视频的重新识别可能会导致安全威胁，即这些视频中无辜者的隐私泄露。因此，我们提出了一种有效的隐私保护的外包监控视频人员重识别方案(FARRIS ),该方案在提供人员重识别服务的同时，能够保证被检测人员的隐私。具体来说，FARRIS利用卷积神经网络(CNN)和基于核的监督哈希(KSH)来提取有效的个人身份识别特征。然后，我们设计了一个基于秘密共享的汉明距离计算协议，允许云服务器计算混淆特征索引之间的相似度。此外，提出了一种基于双重Merkle哈希树的验证方法，允许用户验证匹配结果的正确性。大量的实验结果和安全性分析表明，FARRIS可以有效地工作，而不会损害相关人员的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 对加密外包监视视频的人重新识别

papers.title: Invisible Adversarial Attack against Deep Neural Networks: An Adaptive Penalization Approach
papers.authors: Zhibo Wang, Mengkai Song, Siyan Zheng, Zhifei Zhang, Yang Song, Qian Wang
papers.abstract: Recent studies demonstrated that deep neural networks (DNNs) are vulnerable to adversarial examples, which would seriously threaten security-sensitive applications. Existing works synthesized the adversarial examples by perturbing the original/benign images by leveraging the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {L}_p$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="script">L</mml:mi><mml:mi>p</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq1-2929047.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-norm to penalize the perturbations, which restricts the pixel-wise distance between the adversarial images and correspondingly benign images. However, they added perturbations globally to the benign images without explicitly considering their content/spacial structure, resulting in noticeable artifacts especially in those originally clean regions, e.g., sky and smooth surface. In this paper, we propose an invisible adversarial attack, which synthesizes adversarial examples that are visually indistinguishable from benign ones. We adaptively distribute the perturbation according to human sensitivity to a local stimulus in the benign image, i.e., the higher insensitivity, the more perturbation. Two types of adaptive adversarial attacks are proposed: 1) coarse-grained and 2) fine-grained. The former conducts <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {L}_p$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="script">L</mml:mi><mml:mi>p</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq2-2929047.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-norm regularized by the novel spatial constraints, which utilizes the rich information of the cluttered regions to mask perturbation. The latter, called Just Noticeable Distortion (JND)-based adversarial attack, utilizes the proposed JND<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$_p$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mrow/><mml:mi>p</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq3-2929047.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> metric for better measuring the perceptual similarity, and adaptively sets penalty by weighting the pixel-wise perceptual redundancy of an image. We conduct extensive experiments on the MNIST, CIFAR-10 and ImageNet datasets and a comprehensive user study with 50 participants. The experimental results demonstrate that JND<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$_p$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mrow/><mml:mi>p</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq4-2929047.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is a better metric for measuring the perceptual similarity than <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {L}_p$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi mathvariant="script">L</mml:mi><mml:mi>p</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq5-2929047.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-norm, and the proposed adaptive adversarial attacks can synthesize indistinguishable adversarial examples from benign ones and outperform the state-of-the-art methods.
