papers.abstract_zh: 最近的研究表明，深度神经网络(DNNs)容易受到敌对例子的攻击，这将严重威胁安全敏感的应用。现有的作品通过利用< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > ＄\ mathcal { L } _ p ＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:msub > < MML:mi math variant = " script " > L </MML:mi > < MML:mi > p </MML:mi > </MML:msub > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = "通过干扰原始/良性图像来合成对抗性的例子然而，他们在没有明确考虑良性图像的内容/空间结构的情况下，在良性图像中添加了全局扰动，导致明显的伪影，尤其是在那些原本干净的区域，例如天空和光滑的表面。在本文中，我们提出了一种无形的对抗性攻击，它综合了对抗性的例子，这些例子在视觉上无法与良性的例子区分开来。我们根据人类对良性图像中的局部刺激的敏感度来自适应地分布扰动，即，不敏感度越高，扰动越多。提出了两种类型的自适应对抗性攻击:1)粗粒度攻击和2)细粒度攻击。前者进行< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathcal { L } _ p $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:msub > < MML:mi math variant = " script " > L </MML:mi > < MML:mi > p </MML:mi > </MML:msub > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq 2-2929047 . gif " "后者被称为基于明显失真(JND)的对抗性攻击，它利用了所提出的JND < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ _ p $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:msub > < MML:mrow/> < MML:mi > p </MML:mi > </MML:msub > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq-2929047 . gif "/。我们在MNIST、CIFAR-10和ImageNet数据集上进行了广泛的实验，并对50名参与者进行了全面的用户研究。实验结果表明，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ _ p $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:msub > < MML:mrow/> < MML:mi > p </MML:mi > </MML:msub > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq 4-2929047 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >是一个较好的算法
papers.title_zh: 对深神经网络的无形对抗性攻击：一种适应性惩罚方法

papers.title: Trace-Length Independent Runtime Monitoring of Quantitative Policies
papers.authors: Xiaoning Du, Alwen Tiu, Kun Cheng, Yang Liu
papers.abstract: Metric linear-time logic (MTL) has been widely used to specify runtime policies. Traditionally this use of MTL is to capture the qualitative aspects of the monitored systems, but recent developments in its extensions with aggregate operators allow some quantitative policies to be specified. Our interest in MTL-based policy languages is driven by applications in runtime malware or intrusion detection in platforms like Android and autonomous vehicles, which requires the monitoring algorithm to be independent of the length of the system event traces so that its performance does not degrade as the traces grow. We propose a policy language based on a past-time variant of MTL, extended with an aggregate operator called the metric temporal counting quantifier to specify a policy based on the number of times some sub-policies are satisfied in the specified past time interval. We show that a broad class of policies, but not all policies, specified with our language can be monitored in a trace-length independent way, and provide a concrete algorithm to do so. We implement and test our algorithm in both an existing Android monitoring framework and an autonomous vehicle simulation platform, and show that our approach can effectively specify and monitor quantitative policies drawn from real-world studies.
papers.abstract_zh: 度量线性时间逻辑(MTL)已被广泛用于指定运行时策略。传统上，MTL的这种使用是为了捕获被监控系统的定性方面，但是最近在它的扩展中使用聚集运算符的发展允许指定一些定量策略。我们对基于MTL的策略语言的兴趣是由Android和自动驾驶汽车等平台中的运行时恶意软件或入侵检测应用程序驱动的，这要求监控算法独立于系统事件跟踪的长度，以便其性能不会随着跟踪的增长而下降。我们提出了一种基于MTL的过去时间变量的策略语言，用一个称为度量时态计数量词的聚合运算符进行了扩展，以基于在指定的过去时间间隔内某些子策略被满足的次数来指定策略。我们证明了用我们的语言指定的一大类策略，但不是所有的策略，可以以一种跟踪长度独立的方式被监控，并提供了一个具体的算法来做到这一点。我们在现有的Android监控框架和自动驾驶汽车仿真平台上实现和测试了我们的算法，并表明我们的方法可以有效地指定和监控来自真实世界研究的量化政策。
papers.title_zh: 定量策略的痕量长度独立运行时监视

papers.title: Guest Editors' Introduction to the Joint Special Section on Secure and Emerging Collaborative Computing and Intelligent Systems
papers.authors: Yuan Hong, Valérie Issarny, Surya Nepal, Mudhakar Srivatsa
papers.title_zh: 访客编辑介绍安全和新兴协作计算和智能系统的联合特别部分

papers.title: Robust Deep Learning Ensemble Against Deception
papers.authors: Wenqi Wei, Ling Liu
papers.abstract: Deep neural network (DNN) models are known to be vulnerable to maliciously crafted adversarial examples and to out-of-distribution inputs drawn sufficiently far away from the training data. How to protect a machine learning model against deception of both types of destructive inputs remains an open challenge. This article presents XEnsemble, a diversity ensemble verification methodology for enhancing the adversarial robustness of DNN models against deception caused by either adversarial examples or out-of-distribution inputs. XEnsemble by design has three unique capabilities. First, XEnsemble builds diverse input denoising verifiers by leveraging different data cleaning techniques. Second, XEnsemble develops a disagreement-diversity ensemble learning methodology for guarding the output of the prediction model against deception. Third, XEnsemble provides a suite of algorithms to combine input verification and output verification to protect the DNN prediction models from both adversarial examples and out of distribution inputs. Evaluated using 11 popular adversarial attacks and two representative out-of-distribution datasets, we show that XEnsemble achieves a high defense success rate against adversarial examples and a high detection success rate against out-of-distribution data inputs, and outperforms existing representative defense methods with respect to robustness and defensibility.
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，深度神经网络(DNN)模型容易受到恶意制作的敌对示例的攻击，并且容易受到从训练数据中提取的分布外输入的攻击。如何保护机器学习模型免受两种类型的破坏性输入的欺骗仍然是一个公开的挑战。本文介绍了XEnsemble，一种多样性集成验证方法，用于增强DNN模型对抗由对抗样本或非分布输入引起的欺骗的对抗鲁棒性。XEnsemble的设计有三个独特的功能。首先，XEnsemble通过利用不同的数据清理技术构建不同的输入去噪验证器。其次，XEnsemble开发了一种不一致多样性集成学习方法，用于保护预测模型的输出免受欺骗。第三，XEnsemble提供了一套算法来组合输入验证和输出验证，以保护DNN预测模型免受对立示例和非分布输入的影响。使用11个流行的对抗性攻击和两个代表性的非分布数据集进行评估，我们表明XEnsemble对对抗性示例实现了高防御成功率，对非分布数据输入实现了高检测成功率，并且在鲁棒性和可防御性方面优于现有的代表性防御方法。
papers.title_zh: 强大的深度学习合奏反对欺骗

papers.title: An Optimal Noise Mechanism for Cross-Correlated IoT Data Releasing
papers.authors: Lu Ou, Zheng Qin, Shaolin Liao, Jian Weng, Xiaohua Jia
papers.abstract: Cross correlations are ubiquitous in time-series IoT data sets such as trajectories from smartphones and smart meters data in smart grids. Conventional privacy methods have difficulty to protect cross correlation privacy within such correlated data set. Here we propose a novel <bold>C</bold>orrelated noise mechanism for <bold>C</bold>ross-correlated <bold>D</bold>ata <bold>P</bold>rivacy (CCDP). Because the Fourier coefficients of the cross correlation of two data records are the linear product of those of the two data records, the sanitizing Fourier coefficients noise is used for efficient optimization. Also, the noise is added via the Geometric sum method, which is proved to provide the required Laplace distribution. We perform rigorous mathematical analysis of the CCDP and prove that it satisfies <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\varepsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ɛ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liao-ieq1-3031223.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-Pufferfish privacy. We also prove that the CCDP can achieve the optimal data utility for a given privacy budget <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\varepsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ɛ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liao-ieq2-3031223.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. What's more important, we further derive the mathematical procedure to obtain the optimal Laplace noise scale parameter to achieve better data utility. Simulations show that the proposed CCDP outperforms the independent Fourier coefficients noise mechanism, as well as two other state-of-the-art time-domain privacy mechanisms in the literature, for three types of data sets: computer-generated data, real-world trajectory data, and smart meter data.
papers.abstract_zh: 互相关普遍存在于时间序列物联网数据集中，例如智能手机的轨迹和智能电网中的智能电表数据。传统的隐私方法难以保护这种相关数据集中的互相关隐私。在这里，我们提出了一种新的交叉相关数据(CCDP)的相关噪声机制。因为两个数据记录的互相关的傅立叶系数是两个数据记录的傅立叶系数的线性乘积，所以净化傅立叶系数噪声被用于有效的优化。此外，通过几何和方法添加噪声，这被证明提供了所需的拉普拉斯分布。我们对CCDP进行了严格的数学分析，并证明它满足< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$\varepsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ɛ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " Liao-ie Q1-3031223 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-河豚隐私。我们还证明了对于给定的隐私预算，CCDP可以实现最优的数据效用。更重要的是，我们进一步推导出获得最佳拉普拉斯噪声尺度参数的数学过程，以获得更好的数据效用。仿真表明，对于三种类型的数据集:计算机生成的数据、真实世界的轨迹数据和智能仪表数据，所提出的CCDP优于独立傅立叶系数噪声机制，以及文献中的其他两种最先进的时域隐私机制。
papers.title_zh: 交叉相关的物联网数据释放的最佳噪声机制

papers.title: Differentially Private $k$k-Means Clustering With Convergence Guarantee
papers.authors: Zhigang Lu, Hong Shen
papers.abstract: To address the non-convengence problem of the existing solutions for differentially private k-means clustering, we propose a novel framework for injecting differential privacy into the real centroids in the interactive setting. Specifically, to ensure the convergence, we maintain the perturbed centroids of the previous iteration t-1 to compute a convergence zone for each cluster in the current iteration t, where we inject differential privacy noise. To achieve a satisfactory convergence rate, we further control the orientation of centroid movement in each cluster by two strategies: one takes the orientation of centroid movement from iteration t-1 to iteration t (past knowledge); the other uses the additional information of the orientation from iteration t to iteration t+1 (future knowledge). We prove that, in the expected case, our algorithm (in both strategies) converges to a solution of Lloyd's algorithm in at most twice as many iterations as Lloyd's algorithm. Furthermore, when using both past and future knowledge, we prove that our algorithm converges to the same solution as Lloyd's algorithm (for the same initial centroids) with high probability. We validate the superiority of our algorithms in clustering quality to the state-of-the-art results through extensive experimental evaluations on six widely used real-world datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了解决现有差分隐私k-means聚类解决方案的不收敛问题，我们提出了一个新的框架，将差分隐私注入到交互环境中的真实质心。具体地，为了确保收敛，我们保持前一次迭代t-1的扰动质心，以计算当前迭代t中每个聚类的收敛区域，其中我们注入差分隐私噪声。为了达到令人满意的收敛速度，我们通过两种策略进一步控制每个聚类中质心移动的方向:一种是从迭代t-1到迭代t(过去知识)取质心移动的方向；另一种使用从迭代t到迭代t+1的方向的附加信息(未来知识)。我们证明，在预期的情况下，我们的算法(在两种策略中)收敛到劳埃德算法的一个解，迭代次数最多是劳埃德算法的两倍。此外，当使用过去和未来的知识时，我们证明了我们的算法以高概率收敛到与Lloyd算法相同的解(对于相同的初始质心)。通过在六个广泛使用的真实数据集上的大量实验评估，我们验证了我们的算法在聚类质量上优于最先进的结果。
papers.title_zh: 差异私人$ k $ k-means聚类和融合保证

papers.title: VMGuard: State-Based Proactive Verification of Virtual Network Isolation With Application to NFV
papers.authors: Gagandeep Singh Chawla, Mengyuan Zhang, Suryadipta Majumdar, Yosr Jarraya, Makan Pourzandi, Lingyu Wang, Mourad Debbabi
papers.abstract: Network Functions Virtualization (NFV) leverages from clouds to simplify and automate the creation and deployment of network services on the fly in a multi-tenant environment. However, clouds may also bring issues leading to tenants’ concerns over possible breaches violating the isolation of their deployments. Verifying such network isolation breaches in cloud-enabled NFV environments faces unique challenges. The fine-grained and distributed network access control (e.g., per-function security group rules), which is typical to virtual cloud infrastructures, requires examining not only the events but also the states of all virtual resources using a state-based verification approach. However, verifying the state of a virtual infrastructure may become highly complex and non-scalable due to its sheer size paired with the self-serviced dynamic nature of clouds. In this article, we propose VMGuard, a state-based proactive approach for efficiently verifying large-scale virtual infrastructures in cloud and NFV against network isolation policies. Informally, our key idea is to proactively trigger the verification based on predicted events and their simulated impact upon the current state, such that we can have the best of both worlds, i.e., the efficiency of a proactive approach and the effectiveness of state-based verification. We implement and evaluate VMGuard based on OpenStack, and our experiments with both real and synthetic data demonstrate the performance and efficiency, e.g., less than five milliseconds to perform incremental verification on a dataset with more than 25, 000 VMs and less than two milliseconds with the proactive module enabled.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络功能虚拟化(NFV)利用云来简化和自动化多租户环境中网络服务的动态创建和部署。然而，云也可能带来问题，导致租户担心可能会违反其部署的隔离。在支持云的NFV环境中验证此类网络隔离漏洞面临独特的挑战。细粒度的分布式网络访问控制(例如，基于功能的安全组规则)是虚拟云基础架构的典型特征，它不仅需要检查事件，还需要使用基于状态的验证方法检查所有虚拟资源的状态。但是，验证虚拟基础架构的状态可能会变得非常复杂且不可扩展，因为其庞大的规模与云的自助式动态特性相结合。在本文中，我们提出了VMGuard，这是一种基于状态的主动方法，用于根据网络隔离策略高效验证云和NFV中的大规模虚拟基础架构。非正式地说，我们的主要想法是基于预测的事件及其对当前状态的模拟影响主动触发验证，这样我们可以拥有两个世界的最佳之处，即主动方法的效率和基于状态的验证的有效性。我们基于OpenStack实现并评估了VMGuard，我们使用真实数据和合成数据进行的实验展示了其性能和效率，例如，在超过25，000个虚拟机的数据集上执行增量验证不到5毫秒，启用主动模块不到2毫秒。
papers.title_zh: VMGuard：基于州基于国家的主动验证虚拟网络隔离，并应用于NFV

papers.title: Quantify Co-Residency Risks in the Cloud Through Deep Learning
papers.authors: Jin Han, Wanyu Zang, Meng Yu, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Cloud computing, while becoming more and more popular as a dominant computing platform, introduces new security challenges. When virtual machines are deployed in a cloud environment, virtual machine placement strategies can significantly affect the overall security risks of the entire cloud. In recent years, the attacks are specifically designed to co-locate with target virtual machines in the cloud. The virtual machine placement without considering the security risks may put the users, or even the entire cloud, in danger. In this article, we present a fine-grained model to quantify the risk level caused by co-residency. Using a large scale dataset collected from Microsoft Azure Platform, we profile the behavior patterns of normal service subscribers (tenants) using our proposed feature metrics. Tenants are clustered into multiple categories. After the baseline is established based on the normal behavior pattern, the derivation can be evaluated for each category and the high-risk group can be labeled accordingly. With the labeled datasets, a classification component and a quantification component are constructed to dynamically quantify the co-residency risks for a specific virtual machine. Our experimental results demonstrate the robustness of our model to the new data and the accuracy is verified by examination of F-score Matrix.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算作为一种主流计算平台变得越来越流行，同时也带来了新的安全挑战。在云环境中部署虚拟机时，虚拟机放置策略会显著影响整个云的整体安全风险。近年来，这些攻击专门设计为与云中的目标虚拟机共处一地。不考虑安全风险的虚拟机放置可能会将用户甚至整个云置于危险之中。在本文中，我们提出了一个细粒度的模型来量化共同居住导致的风险水平。使用从Microsoft Azure平台收集的大规模数据集，我们使用我们提出的特征度量来描述普通服务订户(租户)的行为模式。租户被分为多个类别。在基于正常行为模式建立了基线之后，可以对每个类别的派生进行评估，并且可以相应地标记高风险组。利用标记的数据集，构建分类组件和量化组件，以动态量化特定虚拟机的共存风险。我们的实验结果证明了我们的模型对新数据的鲁棒性，并且通过检验F-score矩阵验证了其准确性。
papers.title_zh: 通过深度学习来量化云中的共同居留风险

papers.title: Fee-Free Pooled Mining for Countering Pool-Hopping Attack in Blockchain
papers.authors: Hongwei Shi, Shengling Wang, Qin Hu, Xiuzhen Cheng, Junshan Zhang, Jiguo Yu
papers.abstract: The pool-hopping attack casts down the expected profits of both the mining pool and honest miners in Blockchain. The mainstream countermeasures, namely PPS (pay-per-share) and PPLNS (pay-per-last-N-share), can hedge pool hopping but need to charge miners some fees when they join in a pool. Obviously, the higher fee charged, the higher cost of joining the pool, the less motivation of a miner to mine in the pool. In this article, we apply the zero-determinant (ZD) theory to design a novel pooled mining which offers an incentive mechanism for motivating miners not to switch in pools strategically by economic means without fee charged. In short, the proposed pooled mining has three unique features: 1) fee-free. No fee is charged if the miner does not hop, 2) wide applicability. It can be employed in both prepaid and postpaid mechanisms, and 3) fairness. Even can dominate the game with any miner, a pool has to cooperate when a miner does not hop among pools, implying that the pool cannot squeeze the honest miners financially. The fairness of our scheme makes it have long-term sustainability. Both theoretical analyses and numerical simulations demonstrate the effectiveness of our scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 跳池攻击降低了区块链中矿池和诚实矿工的预期利润。主流对策，即PPS(按股付费)和PPLNS(按最后N股付费)，可以对冲跳池行为，但需要在矿工加入池中时向他们收取一些费用。显然，收取的费用越高，加入池的成本越高，矿工在池中采矿的动力就越小。在本文中，我们应用零行列式(ZD)理论设计了一种新的联营开采，它提供了一种激励机制，激励矿工不要通过经济手段战略性地转换联营，而不收取任何费用。简而言之，提议的联营开采有三个独特的特点:1)免费。如果矿工不跳，不收取任何费用，2)广泛的适用性。它可以在预付费和后付费机制中使用，以及3)公平性。即使可以与任何矿工控制游戏，当矿工不在池中跳跃时，池必须合作，这意味着池不能在财务上压榨诚实的矿工。我们的方案的公平性使得它具有长期的可持续性。理论分析和数值模拟都证明了该方案的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 在区块链中反击泳池跳攻击的无收费合并开采

papers.title: Sustainable Ensemble Learning Driving Intrusion Detection Model
papers.authors: Xinghua Li, Mengyao Zhu, Laurence T. Yang, Mengfan Xu, Zhuo Ma, Cheng Zhong, Hui Li, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Nowadays, in machine learning based intrusion detection systems, ensemble learning is a commonly adopted method to improve the detection accuracy. Unfortunately, the existing works have not considered the accumulation and reuse of historical knowledge, as well as the sensitivity of the detection model to different types of attacks, which leads to a low detection accuracy. To address the issue, this article proposes a model based on sustainable ensemble learning. In the model training stage, by taking the individual classifiers probability output and classification confidence as the training data, we build multi-class regression models such that ensemble learning adapts to different attacks. Besides, in the updating stage, an iterative updating method is presented, where the parameters and decision results of the historical model are added to the training process of the new ensemble model to realize the incremental learning. Experiment results show that the proposed model significantly outperforms the existing solutions in terms of detection accuracy, false alarm, stability and robustness.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前，在基于机器学习的入侵检测系统中，集成学习是一种常用的提高检测精度的方法。遗憾的是，现有的工作没有考虑历史知识的积累和重用，以及检测模型对不同类型攻击的敏感性，导致检测准确率较低。针对这一问题，提出一种基于可持续集成学习的模型。在模型训练阶段，通过将单个分类器的概率输出和分类置信度作为训练数据，建立多类回归模型，使集成学习适应不同的攻击。此外，在更新阶段，提出了一种迭代更新方法，将历史模型的参数和决策结果加入到新集成模型的训练过程中，实现增量学习。实验结果表明，该模型在检测精度、虚警率、稳定性和鲁棒性方面明显优于现有解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 可持续合奏学习驱动入侵检测模型

papers.title: Stochastic Workflow Authorizations With Queueing Constraints
papers.authors: Haibing Lu, Xi Chen, Qi Liu, Michele Samorani, Guojie Song, Yanjiang Yang
papers.abstract: Cloud-based workflow architecture has been widely used in e-science, e-business, smart city, and others, to automate business processes and improve their flexibility and maintainability. Online workflow executes in a collaborative and distributed environment and is prone to fraud and information leakage. Workflow authorization models are implemented to ensure that tasks are performed by authorized subjects with compliance of security/privacy polices. However, existing workflow authorization models have some limitations. First, most of the existing research focuses on static workflows, where an order arriving at a workflow traverses tasks in a fixed sequence. In many real applications, however, task routing is not deterministic, having a probability distribution or pattern that may be estimated from historical data. Second, existing research ignores practical resource constraints, like user utilization, order waiting time, etc. To address the limitations, this article studies the workflow authorization model under the more realistic dynamic settings. We formulate a workflow as a queueing system, so business constraints can be analytically represented, under reasonable assumptions. We model the studied problems as pseudo-Boolean satisfiaiblity problems and investigate their theoretical properties. We also develop algorithms and carry out computational studies. The experimental results show the effectiveness and efficiency of our developed solutions. Our research results are useful for production and process design in many real-life settings such as health care, online banking and electronic payment systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于云的工作流架构已经广泛应用于电子科学、电子商务、智能城市等领域，以实现业务流程的自动化并提高其灵活性和可维护性。在线工作流在协作和分布式环境中执行，容易出现欺诈和信息泄露。实施工作流授权模型以确保任务由授权主体执行，并符合安全/隐私策略。然而，现有的工作流授权模型存在一些局限性。首先，大多数现有的研究集中于静态工作流，其中到达工作流的订单以固定的顺序遍历任务。然而，在许多实际应用中，任务路由是不确定的，具有可以从历史数据中估计的概率分布或模式。第二，现有的研究忽略了实际的资源约束，如用户利用率、订单等待时间等。为了解决这些局限性，本文研究了更现实的动态环境下的工作流授权模型。我们将工作流公式化为排队系统，因此在合理的假设下，业务约束可以被解析地表示。我们将所研究的问题建模为伪布尔可满足性问题，并研究了它们的理论性质。我们还开发算法并进行计算研究。实验结果表明了我们提出的解决方案的有效性和高效性。我们的研究成果对许多现实生活中的生产和流程设计非常有用，如医疗保健、网上银行和电子支付系统。
papers.title_zh: 带有排队约束的随机工作流授权

papers.title: Updatable Block-Level Message-Locked Encryption
papers.authors: Yongjun Zhao, Sherman S. M. Chow
papers.abstract: Deduplication is widely used for reducing the storage requirement for storage service providers. Nevertheless, it is unclear how to support deduplication of encrypted data securely until the study of Bellare et al. on message-locked encryption (MLE, Eurocrypt 2013). While updating (shared) files is natural, existing MLE solutions do not allow efficient update of encrypted files stored remotely. Even modifying a single bit requires the expensive way of downloading and decrypting a large ciphertext (then re-uploading). This paper initiates the study of updatable block-level MLE, a new primitive in incremental cryptography and cloud cryptography. Our proposed provably-secure construction is updatable with computation cost logarithmic in the file size. It naturally supports block-level deduplication. It also supports proof-of-ownership which protects storage providers from being abused as a free content distribution network. Our experiments show its practical performance relative to the original MLE and existing non-updatable block-level MLE.
papers.abstract_zh: 重复数据删除广泛用于降低存储服务提供商的存储需求。然而，在Bellare等人对消息锁定加密(MLE，Eurocrypt 2013)进行研究之前，尚不清楚如何安全地支持加密数据的重复数据删除。虽然更新(共享)文件是自然的，但是现有的MLE解决方案不允许远程存储的加密文件的有效更新。即使修改一个比特也需要下载和解密大量密文(然后重新上传)的昂贵方式。本文开始研究可更新的块级最大似然估计，它是增量密码和云密码中的一种新的原语。我们提出的可证明安全的构造是可更新的，计算开销与文件大小成对数关系。它自然支持块级重复数据消除。它还支持所有权证明，保护存储提供商不被滥用为免费内容分发网络。我们的实验显示了它相对于原始最大似然估计和现有的不可更新块级最大似然估计的实际性能。
papers.title_zh: 可更新的块级消息锁定加密

papers.title: Efficient and Secure Decision Tree Classification for Cloud-Assisted Online Diagnosis Services
papers.authors: Jinwen Liang, Zheng Qin, Sheng Xiao, Lu Ou, Xiaodong Lin
papers.abstract: Decision tree classification has become a prevailing technique for online diagnosis services. By outsourcing computation intensive tasks to a cloud server, cloud-assisted online diagnosis services are better ways for cases that the storage and computation requirements exceed the capability of medical institutions. With privacy concerns as well as intellectual property protection issues, the valuable diagnosis classifier and the sensitive user data should be protected against the cloud server. In this paper, we identify a work-flow for cloud-assisted online diagnosis services. We propose an efficient and secure decision tree classification scheme in the proposed work-flow. Specifically, the medical institution transforms a locally pre-trained decision tree classifier to a decision table, and later uses searchable symmetric encryption to encrypt the decision table. Then, the encrypted table is outsourced to the cloud server, and a user can submit encrypted physiological features to the cloud server and obtain an encrypted diagnosis prediction back. We provide formal security proofs to demonstrate that our scheme protects the confidentiality of the decision tree classifier and the user’s data. The performance analysis shows that our scheme achieves faster-than-linear classification speed. Experimental evaluations show that our scheme requires several micro-seconds to process a diagnosis request in the tested datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 决策树分类已经成为在线诊断服务的流行技术。通过将计算密集型任务外包给云服务器，云辅助在线诊断服务是存储和计算需求超出医疗机构能力的情况下的更好方式。考虑到隐私问题和知识产权保护问题，有价值的诊断分类器和敏感的用户数据应该免受云服务器的影响。在本文中，我们确定了云辅助在线诊断服务的工作流程。在提出的工作流中，我们提出了一个高效安全的决策树分类方案。具体来说，医疗机构将本地预训练的决策树分类器转换为决策表，然后使用可搜索的对称加密来加密决策表。然后，将加密表外包给云服务器，用户可以向云服务器提交加密的生理特征，并获得加密的诊断预测。我们提供了正式的安全证明来证明我们的方案保护了决策树分类器和用户数据的机密性。性能分析表明，我们的方案实现了比线性分类更快的速度。实验评估表明，我们的方案在测试数据集中处理一个诊断请求需要几微秒的时间。
papers.title_zh: 有效且安全的决策树分类用于云辅助在线诊断服务

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Secret Shared Computations Using MapReduce
papers.authors: Shlomi Dolev, Peeyush Gupta, Yin Li, Sharad Mehrotra, Shantanu Sharma
papers.abstract: Data outsourcing allows data owners to keep their data at untrusted clouds that do not ensure the privacy of data and/or computations. One useful framework for fault-tolerant data processing in a distributed fashion is MapReduce, which was developed for trusted private clouds. This paper presents algorithms for data outsourcing based on Shamir’s secret-sharing scheme and for executing privacy-preserving SQL queries such as count, selection including range selection, projection, and join while using MapReduce as an underlying programming model. Our proposed algorithms prevent an adversary from knowing the database or the query while also preventing output-size and access-pattern attacks. Interestingly, our algorithms do not involve the database owner, which only creates and distributes secret-shares once, in answering any query, and hence, the database owner also cannot learn the query. Logically and experimentally, we evaluate the efficiency of the algorithms on the following parameters: (i) the number of communication rounds (between a user and a server), (ii) the total amount of bit flow (between a user and a server), and (iii) the computational load at the user and the server.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据外包允许数据所有者将他们的数据保存在不可信的云中，这不能确保数据和/或计算的隐私。MapReduce是一个用于分布式容错数据处理的有用框架，它是为可信私有云开发的。本文介绍了基于Shamir的秘密共享方案的数据外包算法，以及在使用MapReduce作为底层编程模型时执行隐私保护SQL查询(如计数、选择(包括范围选择)、投影和连接)的算法。我们提出的算法防止对手知道数据库或查询，同时还防止输出大小和访问模式攻击。有趣的是，我们的算法不涉及数据库所有者，在回答任何查询时，数据库所有者只创建和分发一次秘密份额，因此，数据库所有者也不能学习查询。从逻辑上和实验上，我们根据以下参数评估算法的效率:(I)通信回合数(在用户和服务器之间)，(ii)比特流总量(在用户和服务器之间)，以及(iii)用户和服务器的计算负载。
papers.title_zh: 使用MapReduce隐私的秘密共享计算

papers.title: Multi-Authority Attribute-Based Keyword Search over Encrypted Cloud Data
papers.authors: Yinbin Miao, Robert H. Deng, Ximeng Liu, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Hongjun Wu, Hongwei Li
papers.abstract: Searchable Encryption (SE) is an important technique to guarantee data security and usability in the cloud at the same time. Leveraging Ciphertext-Policy Attribute-Based Encryption (CP-ABE), the Ciphertext-Policy Attribute-Based Keyword Search (CP-ABKS) scheme can achieve keyword-based retrieval and fine-grained access control simultaneously. However, the single attribute authority in existing CP-ABKS schemes is tasked with costly user certificate verification and secret key distribution. In addition, this results in a single-point performance bottleneck in distributed cloud systems. Thus, in this paper, we present a secure Multi-authority CP-ABKS (MABKS) system to address such limitations and minimize the computation and storage burden on resource-limited devices in cloud systems. In addition, the MABKS system is extended to support malicious attribute authority tracing and attribute update. Our rigorous security analysis shows that the MABKS system is selectively secure in both selective-matrix and selective-attribute models. Our experimental results using real-world datasets demonstrate the efficiency and utility of the MABKS system in practical applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 可搜索加密(SE)是同时保证云中数据安全性和可用性的重要技术。利用密文策略基于属性的加密(CP-ABE)，密文策略基于属性的关键字搜索(CP-ABKS)方案可以同时实现基于关键字的检索和细粒度的访问控制。然而，现有的CP-ABKS方案中的单属性权威机构承担着昂贵的用户证书验证和密钥分发的任务。此外，这导致了分布式云系统中的单点性能瓶颈。因此，在本文中，我们提出了一个安全的多权限CP-ABKS (MABKS)系统来解决这些限制，并最小化云系统中资源有限的设备的计算和存储负担。此外，MABKS系统被扩展以支持恶意属性权限追踪和属性更新。严格的安全性分析表明，MABKS系统在选择矩阵和选择属性模型下都是选择安全的。我们使用真实世界数据集的实验结果证明了MABKS系统在实际应用中的有效性和实用性。
papers.title_zh: 多授权属性基于加密云数据的关键字搜索

papers.title: SOS: Standard-Compliant and Packet Loss Tolerant Security Framework for ADS-B Communications
papers.authors: Savio Sciancalepore, Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: The Automatic Dependent Surveillance - Broadcast (ADS-B) technology, already deployed by the major avionics companies (e.g., QatarAirways and AmericanAirlines), will become mandatory on board of civil and military aircraft flying in Class A, B, and C airspaces by 2020, enabling direct airplanes communications and enhanced flights monitoring. However, ADS-B has been designed without security considerations, thus being vulnerable to a variety of attacks, including message injection and messages order manipulation attacks, that can be easily performed via widely available commercial Software Defined Radios. To address these threats, we present Securing Open Skies (SOS), a standard-compliant, backward-compatible, loss-tolerant, and bandwidth efficient security framework to secure ADS-B communications. SOS leverages the real deployment of densely distributed, participatory ADS-B sensor networks such as OpenSky Network and Flight Radar, and provides message authentication and integrity security services on a time-slot basis, without resorting to any public key cryptography mechanism. Experimental performances obtained through a realistic proof-of-concept, deployed using commercial Ettus Research X310 Software Defined Radios, demonstrate the viability and effectiveness of our solution, even in presence of uniformly at random or burst packet loss events characterizing the ADS-B frequency band. For instance, SOS allows the verification of the authenticity of ADS-B messages requiring less than 50 percent of bandwidth overhead, with a percentage of verifiable slots above 80 percent, even in an highly lossy environment, characterized by a single packet loss probability of 60 percent—the process requiring less than one second: almost one tenth of similar approaches published in the literature. Finally, a thorough comparison against state of the art solutions in the literature highlights the unique security and reliability features enjoyed by SOS, as well as its practical viability.
papers.abstract_zh: 主要航空电子公司(如QatarAirways和AmericanAirlines)已经部署的自动相关监视-广播(ADS-B)技术，到2020年将成为在A、B和C类空域飞行的民用和军用飞机上的强制要求，实现直接的飞机通信和增强的飞行监控。然而，ADS-B的设计没有考虑安全因素，因此容易受到各种攻击，包括消息注入和消息顺序操纵攻击，这些攻击可以通过广泛可用的商业软件定义无线电轻松执行。为了应对这些威胁，我们提出了安全开放天空(SOS)，这是一个符合标准、向后兼容、容错和带宽高效的安全框架，用于保护ADS-B通信。SOS利用OpenSky Network和Flight Radar等密集分布、参与式ADS-B传感器网络的真实部署，以时隙为基础提供消息认证和完整性安全服务，而不求助于任何公钥密码机制。通过使用商用Ettus Research X310软件定义无线电部署的实际概念验证获得的实验性能，证明了我们的解决方案的可行性和有效性，即使在ADS-B频段出现均匀随机或突发丢包事件时也是如此。例如，SOS允许验证ADS-B消息的真实性，只需要不到50%的带宽开销，可验证时隙的百分比超过80 %,即使在高损耗环境中，其特征是单个数据包丢失概率为60 %,该过程需要不到一秒钟:几乎是文献中公布的类似方法的十分之一。最后，与文献中最先进的解决方案进行彻底的比较，突出了SOS所享有的独特的安全性和可靠性，以及它的实际可行性。
papers.title_zh: SOS：符合标准和数据包丢失耐受性安全框架的ADS-B通信

papers.title: SecuCode: Intrinsic PUF Entangled Secure Wireless Code Dissemination for Computational RFID Devices
papers.authors: Yang Su, Yansong Gao, Michael Chesser, Omid Kavehei, Alanson P. Sample, Damith C. Ranasinghe
papers.abstract: The simplicity of deployment and perpetual operation of energy harvesting devices provides a compelling proposition for a new class of edge devices for the Internet of Things. In particular, Computational Radio Frequency Identification (CRFID) devices are an emerging class of battery free, computational, sensing enhanced devices that harvest all of their energy for operation. Despite wireless connectivity and powering, secure wireless firmware updates remains an open challenge for CRFID devices due to: intermittent powering, limited computational capabilities, and the absence of a supervisory operating system. We present, for the first time, a secure wireless code dissemination (SecuCode) mechanism for CRFIDs by entangling a device intrinsic hardware security primitive—Static Random Access Memory Physical Unclonable Function (SRAM PUF)—to a firmware update protocol. The design of SecuCode: i) overcomes the resource-constrained and intermittently powered nature of the CRFID devices; ii) is fully compatible with existing communication protocols employed by CRFID devices—in particular, ISO-18000-6C protocol; and ii) is built upon a standard and industry compliant firmware compilation and update method realized by extending a recent framework for firmware updates provided by Texas Instruments. We build an end-to-end SecuCode implementation and conduct extensive experiments to demonstrate standards compliance, evaluate performance and security.
papers.abstract_zh: 能量收集设备的部署简单和永久运行为物联网的新型边缘设备提供了一个令人信服的主张。具体而言，计算射频识别(CRFID)设备是一类新兴的无电池、计算、传感增强型设备，其收集所有能量用于操作。尽管有无线连接和供电，安全的无线固件更新对于CRFID设备来说仍然是一个公开的挑战，这是由于:间歇供电、有限的计算能力以及缺乏监控操作系统。通过将设备固有的硬件安全原语——静态随机存取存储器物理不可克隆功能(SRAM PUF)——与固件更新协议相结合，我们首次提出了一种用于CRFIDs的安全无线代码传播(SecuCode)机制。SecuCode的设计:I)克服了CRFID设备的资源受限和间歇供电的特性；ii)与CRFID设备所采用的现有通信协议完全兼容，特别是ISO-18000-6C协议；以及ii)建立在符合标准和工业的固件编译和更新方法上，该方法通过扩展由德州仪器提供的固件更新的最新框架来实现。我们构建了一个端到端的SecuCode实施方案，并进行了大量实验来验证标准合规性，评估性能和安全性。
papers.title_zh: scecucode：固有的PUF纠结安全无线代码传播计算RFID设备

papers.title: Fault-Tolerant Real-Time Fair Scheduling on Multiprocessor Systems with Cold-Standby
papers.authors: Piyoosh Purushothaman Nair, Arnab Sarkar, Santosh Biswas
papers.abstract: The ability to maintain functional and temporal correctness in the presence of faults is a key requirement in many safety-critical embedded systems. This work proposes an efficient fault recovery mechanism for real-time multiprocessor systems scheduled using a low overhead, semi-partitioned optimal proportional fair scheduling technique. We assume a system that can handle a single permanent processor fault at any time, using cold back-ups (with pre-specified activation / recovery time subsequent to the detection of a fault). As a result of the fault, the system may suffer transient overloads during such recovery periods, potentially leading to unacceptable fairness deviations and consequent rejections / early terminations of critical jobs. The proposed fault-tolerant scheduler, called Fault Tolerant Fair Scheduler (FT-FS), attempts to minimize such job terminations / rejections during recovery, by judiciously redistributing slacks accumulated by a subset of jobs, delivering more sustainable performance in the process. Experimental results reveal that the proposed FT-FS algorithm performs appreciably even under high system loads. Practical applicability of our proposed scheme has been illustrated using a case study on aircraft flight control system.
papers.abstract_zh: 在出现故障时保持功能和时间正确性的能力是许多安全关键嵌入式系统的关键要求。本文提出了一种有效的故障恢复机制，用于使用低开销、半分区最优比例公平调度技术调度的实时多处理器系统。我们假设系统可以使用冷备份(在检测到故障后有预先指定的激活/恢复时间)在任何时候处理单个永久性处理器故障。作为故障的结果，系统可能在这样的恢复期间遭受瞬时过载，潜在地导致不可接受的公平性偏差和随后的关键作业的拒绝/提前终止。提出的容错调度器，称为容错公平调度器(FT-FS ),通过明智地重新分配作业子集累积的松弛时间，试图在恢复期间最小化这种作业终止/拒绝，从而在该过程中提供更可持续的性能。实验结果表明，所提出的FT-FS算法即使在高系统负载下也表现良好。以飞机飞行控制系统为例，说明了该方法的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 多处理器系统的易于故障的实时公平安排

papers.title: Vulnerable Service Invocation and Countermeasures
papers.authors: Huan Chang, Lingguang Lei, Kun Sun, Yuewu Wang, Jiwu Jing, Yi He, Pingjian Wang
papers.abstract: Before Android 5.0, the services in Android applications can be invoked either explicitly or implicitly. However, since the implicit service invocations may suffer service hijacking attacks and thus lead to sensitive data leakage, they have been forbidden since Android 5.0. Thereafter the Android system will simply throw an exception and crash the applications that still invokes services implicitly, so that it was expected that application developers will be forced to convert the implicit service invocations to explicit ones. In this paper, we develop a static analysis framework called ISA to analyze the effectiveness of forbidden policy on removing the vulnerable service invocations. We collect two datasets containing common 1390 apps downloaded 1 to 3 months before the forbidden policy is enforced and 30 months after the forbidden policy is enforced, respectively. Our preliminary analysis indicates a 82.58% reduction in the number of vulnerable service invocations due to the enforcement of forbidden policy. However, upon further investigation, we discover that the forbidden policy fails to resolve service hijacking attacks. We find that 36 popular applications are still vulnerable to service hijacking attacks, which can lead to the leakage of sensitive information such as user login credential. Finally, we analyze the reasons of the residue vulnerable invocations and then propose two countermeasures.
papers.abstract_zh: 在Android 5.0之前，Android应用中的服务可以被显式或隐式调用。然而，由于隐式服务调用可能遭受服务劫持攻击，从而导致敏感数据泄漏，因此自Android 5.0以来，它们已被禁止。此后，Android系统将简单地抛出一个异常，并使仍然隐式调用服务的应用程序崩溃，因此可以预料，应用程序开发人员将被迫将隐式服务调用转换为显式服务调用。在本文中，我们开发了一个静态分析框架ISA来分析禁止策略在移除易受攻击的服务调用方面的有效性。我们收集了两个数据集，分别包含禁止政策实施前1至3个月和禁止政策实施后30个月下载的常见1390应用。我们的初步分析表明，由于禁止策略的实施，易受攻击的服务调用数量减少了82.58%。然而，经过进一步的研究，我们发现禁止策略不能解决服务劫持攻击。我们发现，36个流行的应用程序仍然容易受到服务劫持攻击，这可能导致用户登录凭证等敏感信息的泄漏。最后，我们分析了剩余易受攻击调用的原因，并提出了两种对策。
papers.title_zh: 脆弱的服务调用和对策

papers.title: DPC: A Dynamic Permission Control Mechanism for Android Third-Party Libraries
papers.authors: Fu-Hau Hsu, Nien-Chi Liu, Yanling Hwang, Che-Hao Liu, Chuan-Sheng Wang, Chang-Yi Chen
papers.abstract: Today's smartphone app stores are full of apps with diverse features. Many developers use third-party libraries to reduce the development time and cost, but developers often ignore the security problems of third-party libraries. A major security problem introduced by third-party libraries is that a third-party library has the same permissions as the apps, called host-apps hereafter, that use it. According to previous research, having the same permissions as its host apps, a third-party library could have unauthorized access to user data, which poses a serious threat to app users. Therefore, how to prevent third-party libraries from abusing permissions has become an important issue. To solve this problem, this paper proposes a Dynamic Permission Control mechanism, called Dynamic Permission Controller or DPC hereafter, for app developers to prohibit third-party libraries from abusing host apps’ dangerous permissions. DPC modifies the permission control mechanism of Android framework to make apps have a more flexible permission management mechanism when they are running. DPC provides new APIs which allows an app to dynamically disable a granted dangerous permission before invoking an API of a third-party library and restore the dangerous permission after completing the API. Hence, DPC protects user's privacy by blocking unauthorized access from third-party libraries. Meanwhile, without the requirement that an app developer needs to know the detail of third-party libraries, the app still can use APIs of third-party libraries safely. Experimental results show that DPC works with many popular apps downloaded from Google Play well and DPC prohibits a third-party library from having the same dangerous permissions that its host apps have. Hence, unlike previous solutions, DPC does not have compatibility problems. The overhead introduced by DPC on an emulator and Nexus 7 are 1.8 and 0.3 percent respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 今天的智能手机应用商店充满了功能多样的应用。很多开发者使用第三方库来减少开发时间和成本，但是开发者往往忽略了第三方库的安全问题。第三方库引入的一个主要安全问题是，第三方库与使用它的应用程序(以下称为主机应用程序)具有相同的权限。根据之前的研究，拥有与其主机应用程序相同的权限，第三方库可以未经授权访问用户数据，这对应用程序用户构成了严重威胁。因此，如何防止第三方库滥用权限成为一个重要的问题。为了解决这个问题，本文提出了一种动态权限控制机制，称为动态权限控制器(Dynamic Permission Controller，DPC ),用于应用开发者禁止第三方库滥用主机应用的危险权限。DPC修改了Android框架的权限控制机制，使app在运行时有更灵活的权限管理机制。DPC提供了新的API，允许应用程序在调用第三方库的API之前动态禁用授予的危险权限，并在完成API后恢复危险权限。因此，DPC通过阻止来自第三方库的未授权访问来保护用户的隐私。同时，不需要应用开发者了解第三方库的细节，应用仍然可以安全地使用第三方库的API。实验结果表明，DPC与许多从Google Play下载的流行应用程序配合良好，并且DPC禁止第三方库拥有与其主机应用程序相同的危险权限。因此，与以前的解决方案不同，DPC没有兼容性问题。DPC在模拟器和Nexus 7上引入的开销分别为1.8%和0.3%。
papers.title_zh: DPC：Android第三方库的动态权限控制机制

papers.title: PPSB: An Open and Flexible Platform for Privacy-Preserving Safe Browsing
papers.authors: Helei Cui, Yajin Zhou, Cong Wang, Xinyu Wang, Yuefeng Du, Qian Wang
papers.abstract: Safe Browsing (SB) is an important security feature in modern web browsers to help detect new unsafe websites. Although useful, recent studies have pointed out that the widely adopted SB services, such as Google Safe Browsing and Microsoft SmartScreen, can raise privacy concerns since users’ browsing history might be subject to unauthorized leakage to service providers. In this paper, we present a Privacy-Preserving Safe Browsing (PPSB) platform. It bridges the browser that uses the service and the third-party blacklist providers who provide unsafe URLs, with the guaranteed privacy of users and blacklist providers. Particularly, in PPSB, the actual URL to be checked, as well as its associated hashes or hash prefixes, never leave the browser in cleartext. This protects the user’s browsing history from being directly leaked or indirectly inferred. Moreover, these lists of unsafe URLs, the most valuable asset for the blacklist providers, are always encrypted and kept private within our platform. Extensive evaluations using real datasets (with over 1 million unsafe URLs) demonstrate that our prototype can function as intended without sacrificing normal user experience, and block unsafe URLs at the millisecond level. All resources, including Chrome extension, Docker image, and source code, are available for public use.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全浏览(SB)是现代web浏览器中的一项重要安全功能，有助于检测新的不安全网站。虽然有用，但最近的研究指出，广泛采用的SB服务，如谷歌安全浏览和微软智能屏幕，可能会引起隐私问题，因为用户的浏览历史可能会未经授权泄露给服务提供商。本文提出了一个保护隐私的安全浏览(PPSB)平台。它在使用该服务的浏览器和提供不安全网址的第三方黑名单提供商之间架起了桥梁，保证了用户和黑名单提供商的隐私。特别是，在PPSB，要检查的实际URL，以及相关的散列或散列前缀，绝不会以明文形式离开浏览器。这就保护了用户的浏览历史不被直接泄露或间接推断。此外，这些不安全网址的列表，对黑名单提供商来说是最有价值的资产，在我们的平台中总是被加密和保密的。使用真实数据集(超过100万个不安全URL)的广泛评估表明，我们的原型可以在不牺牲正常用户体验的情况下正常工作，并在毫秒级阻止不安全URL。所有资源，包括Chrome扩展、Docker图像和源代码，都可以公开使用。
papers.title_zh: PPSB：一个开放且灵活的平台，用于保存隐私安全浏览

papers.title: Sais: Self-Adaptive Identification of Security Bug Reports
papers.authors: Shaikh Mostafa, Bridgette Findley, Na Meng, Xiaoyin Wang
papers.abstract: Among various bug reports (BRs), security bug reports (SBRs) are unique because they require immediate concealment and fixes. When SBRs are not identified in time, attackers can exploit the vulnerabilities. Prior work identifies SBRs via text mining, which requires a predefined keyword list and trains a classifier with known SBRs and non-security bug reports (NSBRs). The former approach is not reliable, because (1) as the contexts of security vulnerabilities and terminology of SBRs change over time, the predefined list will become out-dated; and (2) users may have insufficient SBRs for training. We introduce a semi-supervised learning-based approach, Sais, to adaptively and reliably identify SBRs. Given a project's BRs containing some labeled SBRs, many more NSBRs, and unlabeled BRs, Sais iteratively mines keywords, trains a classifier based on the keywords from the labeled data, classifies unlabeled BRs, and augments its training data with the newly labeled BRs. Our evaluation shows that Sais is useful for identifying SBRs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在各种错误报告(BRs)中，安全错误报告(SBR)是独特的，因为它们需要立即隐藏和修复。当SBR没有被及时识别时，攻击者可以利用这些漏洞。先前的工作通过文本挖掘来识别SBR，这需要预定义的关键字列表，并用已知的SBR和非安全错误报告(NSBRs)来训练分类器。前一种方法是不可靠的，因为(1)随着安全漏洞的上下文和SBR的术语随着时间而改变，预定义的列表将变得过时；以及(2)用户可能没有足够的SBR用于训练。我们介绍了一种基于半监督学习的方法，Sais，以自适应和可靠地识别SBR。给定包含一些标记的br、更多的NSBRs和未标记的br的项目的br，sai迭代地挖掘关键字，基于来自标记数据的关键字训练分类器，对未标记的br进行分类，并用新标记的br增加其训练数据。我们的评估表明Sais对于识别SBR是有用的。
papers.title_zh: SAI：安全错误报告的自适应识别

papers.title: A Mixing Scheme Using a Decentralized Signature Protocol for Privacy Protection in Bitcoin Blockchain
papers.authors: Ruiyang Xiao, Wei Ren, Tianqing Zhu, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo
papers.abstract: Bitcoin transactions are not truly anonymous as an attacker can attempt to reveal a user’s private information by tracing related transactions. Existing approaches to protect privacy (e.g., mixcoin, shuffle, and blinded token) suffer from a number of limitations. For example, some approaches assume the existence of a trusted third party, rely on exchanges among various currencies, or broadcast sensitive details before mixing. Therefore, there is a real risk of privacy breach or losing tokens. Thus in this paper, we design a mixing scheme with one decentralized signature protocol, which does not rely on a third party or require a transaction fee. Specifically, our scheme uses a negotiation process to guarantee transaction details, which is monitored by the participants. Furthermore, the scheme includes a signature protocol based on the ElGamal signature protocol and secret sharing. The proposed scheme is then proven secure.
papers.abstract_zh: 比特币交易并不是真正匿名的，因为攻击者可以试图通过跟踪相关交易来泄露用户的私人信息。现有的保护隐私的方法(例如，mixcoin、shuffle和blinded token)受到许多限制。例如，一些方法假设存在可信的第三方，依赖于各种货币之间的交换，或者在混合之前广播敏感的细节。因此，确实存在侵犯隐私或丢失令牌的风险。因此，在本文中，我们设计了一个混合方案和一个分散签名协议，它不依赖于第三方，也不需要交易费用。具体来说，我们的方案使用一个协商过程来保证交易细节，这是由参与者监控的。此外，该方案还包括一个基于ElGamal签名协议和秘密共享的签名协议。所提出的方案被证明是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 使用分散的签名协议的混合方案在比特币区块链中进行隐私保护

papers.title: Optimized Verifiable Fine-Grained Keyword Search in Dynamic Multi-Owner Settings
papers.authors: Yinbin Miao, Robert H. Deng, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Ximeng Liu, Jianting Ning, Hongwei Li
papers.abstract: Ciphertext-Policy Attribute-Based Keyword Search (CP-ABKS) schemes support both fine-grained access control and keyword-based ciphertext retrieval, which make these schemes attractive for resource-constrained users (i.e., mobile or wearable devices, sensor nodes, etc.) to store, share and search encrypted data in the public cloud. However, ciphertext length and decryption overhead in the existing CP-ABKS schemes grow with the complexity of access policies or the number of data users’ attributes. Moreover, such schemes generally do not consider the practical multi-owner setting (e.g., each file needs to be signed by multiple data owners before being uploaded to the cloud server) or prevent malicious cloud servers from returning incorrect search results. To overcome these limitations, in this paper we first design an optimized Verifiable Fine-grained Keyword Search scheme in the static Multi-owner setting (termed as basic VFKSM), which achieves short ciphertext length, fast ciphertext transformation, accelerated search process, and authentic search result verification. Then, we extend the basic VFKSM to support multi-keyword search and multi-owner update (also called as extended VFKSM). Finally, we prove that the basic (or extended) VFKSM resists the Chosen-Keyword Attack (CKA) and external Keyword-Guessing Attack (KGA). We also evaluate the performance of these schemes using various public datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 密文策略基于属性的关键字搜索(CP-ABKS)方案支持细粒度的访问控制和基于关键字的密文检索，这使得这些方案对资源受限的用户(即移动或可穿戴设备、传感器节点等)具有吸引力。)在公有云中存储、共享和搜索加密数据。然而，现有CP-ABKS方案的密文长度和解密开销随着访问策略的复杂性或数据用户属性的数量而增加。此外，这种方案通常不考虑实际的多所有者设置(例如，每个文件在被上传到云服务器之前需要由多个数据所有者签名)或者防止恶意的云服务器返回不正确的搜索结果。为了克服这些限制，本文首先在静态多所有者环境下设计了一个优化的可验证的细粒度关键字搜索方案(称为基本VFKSM)，该方案实现了短密文长度、快速密文转换、加速搜索过程和可信搜索结果验证。然后，我们扩展基本VFKSM以支持多关键字搜索和多所有者更新(也称为扩展VFKSM)。最后，我们证明了基本的(或扩展的)VFKSM抵抗选择关键字攻击(CKA)和外部猜测关键字攻击(KGA)。我们还使用各种公共数据集评估了这些方案的性能。
papers.title_zh: 在动态多主设置中优化可验证的细粒关键字搜索

papers.title: Blindfolded Evaluation of Random Forests with Multi-Key Homomorphic Encryption
papers.authors: Asma Aloufi, Peizhao Hu, Harry W. H. Wong, Sherman S. M. Chow
papers.abstract: Decision tree and its generalization of random forests are a simple yet powerful machine learning model for many classification and regression problems. Recent works propose how to privately evaluate a decision tree in a two-party setting where the feature vector of the client or the decision tree model (such as the threshold values of its nodes) is kept secret from another party. However, these works cannot be extended trivially to support the outsourcing setting where a third-party who should not have access to the model or the query. Furthermore, their use of an interactive comparison protocol does not support branching program, hence requires interactions with the client to determine the comparison result before resuming the evaluation task. In this paper, we propose the first secure protocol for collaborative evaluation of random forests contributed by multiple owners. They outsource evaluation tasks to a third-party evaluator. Upon receiving the client's encrypted inputs, the cloud evaluates obliviously on individually encrypted random forest models and calculates the aggregated result. The system is based on our new secure comparison protocol, secure counting protocol, and a multi-key somewhat homomorphic encryption on top of symmetric-key encryption. This allows us to reduce communication overheads while achieving round complexity lower than existing work.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于许多分类和回归问题，决策树及其对随机森林的推广是一种简单而强大的机器学习模型。最近的工作提出了如何在两方设置中私下评估决策树，其中客户端的特征向量或决策树模型(如其节点的阈值)对另一方保密。然而，这些工作不能简单地扩展以支持外包设置，其中第三方不应该访问模型或查询。此外，他们使用的交互式比较协议不支持分支程序，因此需要与客户进行交互，以在恢复评估任务之前确定比较结果。在本文中，我们提出了第一个安全的协议，用于多个所有者贡献的随机森林的协作评估。他们将评估任务外包给第三方评估人员。在收到客户端的加密输入后，云会对单独加密的随机森林模型进行评估，并计算聚合结果。该系统基于我们新的安全比较协议、安全计数协议和对称密钥加密之上的多密钥同态加密。这允许我们减少通信开销，同时实现比现有工作更低的循环复杂度。
papers.title_zh: 具有多键同态加密的随机森林的蒙上蒙蔽评估

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Electronic Ticket Scheme with Attribute-Based Credentials
papers.authors: Jinguang Han, Liqun Chen, Steve Schneider, Helen Treharne, Stephan Wesemeyer
papers.abstract: Users accessing services are often required to provide personal information, for example, age, profession and location, in order to satisfy access polices. This personal information is evident in the application of e-ticketing where discounted access is granted to visitor attractions or transport services if users satisfy policies related to their age or disability or other defined over attributes. We propose a privacy-preserving electronic ticket scheme using attribute-based credentials to protect users’ privacy. The benefit of our scheme is that the attributes of a user are certified by a trusted third party so that the scheme can provide assurances to a seller that a user’s attributes are valid. The scheme makes the following contributions: (1) users can buy different tickets from ticket sellers without releasing their exact attributes; (2) two tickets of the same user cannot be linked; (3) a ticket cannot be transferred to another user; (4) a ticket cannot be double spent. The novelty of our scheme is to enable users to convince ticket sellers that their attributes satisfy the ticket policies and buy discounted tickets anonymously. This is a step towards identifying an e-ticketing scheme that captures user privacy requirements in transport services. The security of our scheme is proved and reduced to a well-known complexity assumption. The scheme is also implemented and its performance is empirically evaluated.
papers.abstract_zh: 访问服务的用户通常需要提供个人信息，例如年龄、职业和位置，以满足访问策略。这种个人信息在电子票务的应用中是显而易见的，在电子票务中，如果用户满足与他们的年龄或残疾或其他定义的属性相关的政策，则授予对游客景点或交通服务的折扣访问。我们提出了一个隐私保护的电子票方案，使用基于属性的凭证来保护用户的隐私。我们的方案的好处是用户的属性由可信的第三方认证，因此该方案可以向卖方提供用户属性有效的保证。该方案的贡献在于:用户可以从票贩子那里购买不同的票，而不需要发布它们的确切属性；(2)同一用户的两张票不能联动；(3)票证不能转让给另一个用户；(4)车票不能重复使用。我们方案的新颖之处在于使用户能够说服售票员他们的属性满足门票政策，并匿名购买打折门票。这是朝着确定一个电子票务方案迈出的一步，该方案能够满足交通服务中的用户隐私要求。我们的方案的安全性被证明，并简化到一个众所周知的复杂性假设。该方案也已实现，并对其性能进行了实证评估。
papers.title_zh: 具有基于属性的凭据

papers.title: Towards Low-Cost Mechanisms to Enable Restoration of Encrypted Non-Volatile Memories
papers.authors: Mao Ye, Kazi Abu Zubair, Aziz Mohaisen, Amro Awad
papers.abstract: Since Non-Volatile Memories (NVMs) started entering the mainstream memory/storage market, we must consider how to secure NVM-equipped computing systems. Recent Meltdown and Spectre attacks are a strong evidence that security must be intrinsic to computing systems instead of being added as an afterthought. Processor vendors are taking the first steps and are beginning to build security primitives into commodity processors. One security primitive that is associated with the use of emerging NVMs is memory encryption. Memory encryption, while necessary, is very challenging when used with NVMs because it exacerbates the write endurance problem. Secure architectures use cryptographic metadata that must be persisted and restored to allow secure recovery of data in the event of power-loss. Specifically, encryption counters must be persistent to enable secure and functional recovery of an interrupted system. However, the cost of ensuring and maintaining persistence for these counters can be significant. In this paper, we propose a novel scheme to maintain encryption counters without the need for frequent updates. Our new memory controller design, Osiris, repurposes memory Error-Correction Codes (ECCs) to enable fast restoration and recovery of encryption counters. Since different counter-mode encryption schemes are used in industry and research, we provide a versatile Osiris implementation that improves the performance and write-endurance in different memory encryption schemes. To evaluate our design, we use Gem5 to run eight memory-intensive workloads selected from SPEC2006 and U.S. Department of Energy (DoE) proxy applications, and three computation-intensive graph algorithms from CRONO. Compared to a write-through counter-cache scheme, on average, Osiris can reduce 45.8 percent of the memory writes (increase lifetime by 1.86x), and reduce the performance overhead from 44.7 percent(for write-through) to only 4.49 percent. Furthermore, without the need for backup battery or extra power-supply hold-up time, Osiris performs better than a battery-backed write-back (4.4 versus 5.7 percent overhead) and has less write-traffic (1.8 versus 5.4 percent overhead).
papers.abstract_zh: 由于非易失性存储器(NVM)开始进入主流存储器/存储市场，我们必须考虑如何保护配备NVM的计算系统。最近的Meltdown和Spectre攻击是一个强有力的证据，表明安全必须是计算系统固有的，而不是事后添加的。处理器厂商正在迈出第一步，并开始在商用处理器中构建安全原语。与新兴nvm的使用相关联的一个安全原语是存储器加密。存储器加密虽然是必要的，但在与nvm一起使用时非常具有挑战性，因为它加剧了写入耐久性问题。安全架构使用必须保存和恢复的加密元数据，以便在断电时安全恢复数据。具体来说，加密计数器必须是持久的，以实现被中断系统的安全和功能恢复。但是，确保和维护这些计数器的持久性的成本可能会很高。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的方案来维护加密计数器，而不需要频繁更新。我们的新内存控制器设计Osiris重新利用了内存纠错码(ECC)来实现加密计数器的快速恢复和复原。由于在工业和研究中使用不同的反模式加密方案，我们提供了一种通用的Osiris实现，可以提高不同存储器加密方案的性能和写耐久性。为了评估我们的设计，我们使用Gem5运行从SPEC2006和美国能源部(DoE)代理应用中选择的八个内存密集型工作负载，以及来自CRONO的三个计算密集型图形算法。与直写式计数器缓存方案相比，平均而言，Osiris可以减少45.8%的内存写入(将生命周期提高1.86倍)，并将性能开销从44.7%(直写式)降至仅4.49%。此外，不需要备用电池或额外的电源保持时间，Osiris的性能优于电池供电的回写(4.4%对5.7%的开销)，并且写入流量更少(1.8%对5.4%的开销)。
papers.title_zh: 迈向低成本机制，以恢复加密的非易失性记忆

papers.title: Survivability Analysis of K-Variant Architecture for Different Memory Attacks and Defense Strategies
papers.authors: Berk Bekiroglu, Bogdan Korel
papers.abstract: Many systems require high security during a limited operational timeframe. These systems can be exposed to many attacks that prevent tasks from being completed. To reduce the chances of a successful attack and increase the security of these systems, many fault tolerance architectures and defense strategies have been developed. N-version architecture is one technique to improve reliability and security. In this architecture, functionally equivalent variants of a program are developed and executed concurrently. However, due to the high cost of developing and maintaining N versions, it is used for large budget projects. In this paper, an alternative approach to improve security is K-variant architecture. By applying safe and automated program transformations, functionally equivalent variants of the original program are generated. The goal is to shift vulnerabilities in variants into different locations. These variants are executed simultaneously to complete a task so that the chance of a successful exploitation attack is decreased. In this paper, several types of memory exploitation attacks are analyzed along with the proposed four defense strategies. The experimental study investigates the effectiveness of defense strategies against these attacks. The results suggest that K-variant architecture with the proposed defense strategies may significantly improve the security of systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多系统在有限的操作时间内需要高安全性。这些系统可能会受到许多攻击，导致任务无法完成。为了减少成功攻击的机会并增加这些系统的安全性，已经开发了许多容错体系结构和防御策略。n版本体系结构是一种提高可靠性和安全性的技术。在这种体系结构中，程序的功能等效变体被同时开发和执行。但是，由于开发和维护N个版本的成本很高，所以用于大预算项目。在本文中，另一种提高安全性的方法是K-variant体系结构。通过应用安全和自动化的程序转换，生成了原始程序的功能等同的变体。目标是将变体中的漏洞转移到不同的位置。同时执行这些变体来完成任务，从而降低成功利用攻击的机会。本文分析了几种内存利用攻击，并提出了四种防御策略。实验研究调查防御策略对这些攻击的有效性。结果表明，K-variant体系结构和提出的防御策略可以显著提高系统的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 针对不同记忆攻击和防御策略的K变量架构的生存能力分析

papers.title: An Accurate Negative Survey Using Answer Confidence Level
papers.authors: Borui Cai, Guangyan Huang, Chi-Hung Chi, Ran Liu, Yanfeng Shu
papers.abstract: Negative survey is an effective method to protect the privacy of survey participants and has many applications. Different from normal survey, it hides personal privacy by requiring an individual participant to provide a negative option as the answer to the survey question. Answers of participants can further be reconstructed into the distribution of positive options. However, the current negative survey that assumes all participants are 100 percent confident in their answers introduces some precision loss to the reconstruction process. In this paper, we provide an accurate negative survey by allowing participants to annotate their confidence levels to the answers. In particular, we develop a novel Negative Survey to Positive Survey with Answer Confidence Level (NStoPS-CL) algorithm to reconstruct the negative survey with answer confidence level and further increase the accuracy of reconstruction. Experiments demonstrate that NStoPS-CL reliably improves the reconstruction accuracy by testing answer confidence level under different conditions (i.e., dataset size, number of question options and dataset distributions), while balancing reconstruction accuracy and privacy well.
papers.abstract_zh: 消极调查是保护调查参与者隐私的有效方法，有许多应用。与普通调查不同，它通过要求个体参与者提供否定选项作为调查问题的答案来隐藏个人隐私。参与者的答案可以进一步重构为正选项的分布。然而，目前的负面调查假设所有参与者对他们的答案100%有信心，这给重建过程带来了一些精度损失。在本文中，我们提供了一个准确的负面调查，允许参与者注释他们对答案的信心水平。特别地，我们开发了一种新的带答案置信度的负调查到正调查(NStoPS-CL)算法来重建带答案置信度的负调查，进一步提高重建的准确性。实验表明，NStoPS-CL通过测试不同条件下(即数据集大小、问题选项数量和数据集分布)的答案置信度，可靠地提高了重建精度，同时很好地平衡了重建精度和隐私。
papers.title_zh: 使用答案置信度水平进行准确的负面调查

papers.title: Towards Private, Robust, and Verifiable Crowdsensing Systems via Public Blockchains
papers.authors: Chengjun Cai, Yifeng Zheng, Yuefeng Du, Zhan Qin, Cong Wang
papers.abstract: Public blockchains have emerged as a promising direction in revolutionizing existing data-driven systems relying on centralized service providers. Among others, one kind of such systems is the popular crowdsensing systems which promise convenient data collection and aggregation. Although promising, leveraging public blockchains to build crowdsensing systems is non-trivial and has to overcome several barriers. First, public blockchains are transparent and lack support for data privacy. Second, participants from the open blockchain environment may misbehave in serving crowdsensing applications, like providing invalid data or doing aggregation incorrectly. Further, on-chain processing incurs monetary cost, so simply putting all workload on-chain is highly uneconomical and a delicate joint on-chain and off-chain design is required. In this paper, we take the first research attempt and explore a new design point to bridge public blockchains with crowdsensing systems. We propose a framework for building private, robust, and verifiable blockchain-empowered crowdsensing systems. It features an open service paradigm where blockchain nodes can rent out their computing resources to serve crowdsensing applications, with custom and full-fledged mechanisms to foster a healthy and economical ecosystem and to simultaneously tackle the challenges of data privacy, robustness against misbehaving participants, and service correctness assurance. Extensive experiments demonstrate our designs practicality.
papers.abstract_zh: 公共区块链已经成为依靠集中式服务提供商革新现有数据驱动系统的一个有前途的方向。其中，一种这样的系统是流行的众测系统，其承诺方便的数据收集和聚集。尽管前景看好，但利用公共区块链构建众测系统并非易事，必须克服几个障碍。首先，公共区块链是透明的，缺乏对数据隐私的支持。其次，来自开放区块链环境的参与者可能会在服务众测应用程序时行为不端，比如提供无效数据或错误地进行聚合。此外，链上处理会导致货币成本，因此简单地将所有工作负载放在链上是非常不经济的，并且需要微妙的链上和链下联合设计。在本文中，我们进行了第一次研究尝试，并探索了一个新的设计点，以连接公共区块链和众测系统。我们提出了一个构建私有的、健壮的、可验证的区块链授权的众测系统的框架。它采用了一种开放的服务模式，其中区块链节点可以出租其计算资源来服务于众测应用程序，并采用定制和成熟的机制来培育健康和经济的生态系统，同时应对数据隐私、防止不当行为参与者的鲁棒性以及服务正确性保证等挑战。大量的实验证明了我们设计的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 通过公共区块链迈向私人，健壮和可验证的人群系统

papers.title: Cryptographic Design of PriCloud, a Privacy-Preserving Decentralized Storage with Remuneration
papers.authors: Henning Kopp, David Mödinger, Franz J. Hauck, Frank Kargl
papers.abstract: Over the last years, demand for file hosting has sky-rocketed due to cost reductions and availability of services. However, centralized providers have a negative impact on the privacy of their users, since they are able to read and collect various data about their users and even link it to their identity via their payments. On the other hand, decentralized storage solutions like GNUnet suffer from a lack of participation by providers, since there is no feasible business model. We propose PriCloud, a decentralized storage system which allows users to pay their storage providers without sacrificing their privacy by employing anonymous storage smart contracts and private payments on a blockchain. We are able to provide privacy to the users and storage providers, and unlinkability between users and files. Our system offers decentralized file storage including strong privacy guarantees and built-in remuneration for storage providers.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几年里，由于成本的降低和服务的可用性，对文件托管的需求直线上升。然而，集中式提供商对其用户的隐私有负面影响，因为他们能够读取和收集关于其用户的各种数据，甚至通过他们的支付将这些数据与他们的身份联系起来。另一方面，像GNUnet这样的分散存储解决方案缺乏提供商的参与，因为没有可行的商业模式。我们提出了PriCloud，这是一个分散的存储系统，允许用户在不牺牲隐私的情况下，通过采用匿名存储智能合同和区块链上的私人支付向存储提供商付费。我们能够为用户和存储提供商提供隐私，以及用户和文件之间的不可链接性。我们的系统提供分散的文件存储，包括强大的隐私保证和存储提供商的内置报酬。
papers.title_zh: Pricloud的加密设计，这是一种具有报酬的分散存储的隐私化存储

papers.title: A Coprocessor-Based Introspection Framework Via Intel Management Engine
papers.authors: Lei Zhou, Fengwei Zhang, Jidong Xiao, Kevin Leach, Westley Weimer, Xuhua Ding, Guojun Wang
papers.abstract: During the past decade, virtualization-based (e.g., virtual machine introspection) and hardware-assisted approaches (e.g., x86 SMM and ARM TrustZone) have been used to defend against low-level malware such as rootkits. However, these approaches either require a large Trusted Computing Base (TCB) or they must share CPU time with the operating system, disrupting normal execution. In this article, we propose an introspection framework called Nighthawk that transparently checks system integrity and monitor the runtime state of target system. Nighthawk leverages the Intel Management Engine (IME), a co-processor that runs in isolation from the main CPU. By using the IME, our approach has a minimal TCB and incurs negligible overhead on the host system on a suite of indicative benchmarks. We use Nighthawk to introspect the system software and firmware of a host system at runtime. The experimental results show that Nighthawk can detect real-world attacks against the OS, hypervisors, and System Management Mode while mitigating several classes of evasive attacks. Additionally, Nighthawk can monitor the runtime state of host system against the suspicious applications running in target machine.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年中，基于虚拟化(例如，虚拟机自检)和硬件辅助的方法(例如，x86 SMM和ARM TrustZone)已被用于防御诸如rootkits之类的低级恶意软件。然而，这些方法要么需要大型可信计算基础(TCB ),要么必须与操作系统共享CPU时间，从而中断正常执行。在本文中，我们提出了一个称为Nighthawk的自省框架，它透明地检查系统完整性并监控目标系统的运行时状态。Nighthawk利用了英特尔管理引擎(IME)，这是一个独立于主CPU运行的协处理器。通过使用IME，我们的方法具有最小的TCB，并且在一组指示性基准上对主机系统产生的开销可以忽略不计。我们使用Nighthawk在运行时检查主机系统的系统软件和固件。实验结果表明，Nighthawk可以检测针对操作系统、虚拟机管理程序和系统管理模式的真实攻击，同时减轻几类规避攻击。此外，Nighthawk可以针对目标机器上运行的可疑应用程序监控主机系统的运行时状态。
papers.title_zh: 基于英特尔管理引擎的基于协处理器的内省框架

papers.title: Adversarial Examples versus Cloud-Based Detectors: A Black-Box Empirical Study
papers.authors: Xurong Li, Shouling Ji, Meng Han, Juntao Ji, Zhenyu Ren, Yushan Liu, Chunming Wu
papers.abstract: Deep learning has been broadly leveraged by major cloud providers, such as Google, AWS and Baidu, to offer various computer vision related services including image classification, object identification, illegal image detection, etc. While recent works extensively demonstrated that deep learning classification models are vulnerable to adversarial examples, cloud-based image detection models, which are more complicated than classifiers, may also have similar security concern but not get enough attention yet. In this paper, we mainly focus on the security issues of real-world cloud-based image detectors. Specifically, (1) based on effective semantic segmentation, we propose four attacks to generate semantics-aware adversarial examples via only interacting with black-box APIs; and (2) we make the first attempt to conduct an extensive empirical study of black-box attacks against real-world cloud-based image detectors. Through the comprehensive evaluations on five major cloud platforms: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Baidu Cloud, and Alibaba Cloud, we demonstrate that our image processing based attacks can reach a success rate of approximately 100 percent, and the semantic segmentation based attacks have a success rate over 90 percent among different detection services, such as violence, politician, and pornography detection. We also proposed several possible defense strategies for these security challenges in the real-life situation.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习已被主要的云提供商广泛利用，如谷歌、AWS和百度，以提供各种计算机视觉相关的服务，包括图像分类、对象识别、非法图像检测等。虽然最近的工作广泛证明了深度学习分类模型容易受到对立示例的攻击，但比分类器更复杂的基于云的图像检测模型也可能有类似的安全问题，但尚未得到足够的重视。本文主要研究现实世界中基于云的图像检测器的安全问题。具体来说，(1)基于有效的语义分割，我们提出了四种攻击方法，通过只与黑盒API交互来生成语义感知的对抗实例；以及(2)我们首次尝试对针对真实世界的基于云的图像检测器的黑盒攻击进行广泛的实证研究。通过在AWS、Azure、Google Cloud、Baidu Cloud和Alibaba Cloud五个主要云平台上的综合评估，我们证明了基于图像处理的攻击可以达到大约100%的成功率，而基于语义分割的攻击在不同的检测服务(如暴力、政治和色情检测)中的成功率超过90%。我们还针对现实生活中的这些安全挑战提出了几种可能的防御策略。
papers.title_zh: 对抗性示例与基于云的检测器：黑盒经验研究

papers.title: Side Channel Attacks on GPUs
papers.authors: Hoda Naghibijouybari, Ajaya Neupane, Zhiyun Qian, Nael B. Abu-Ghazaleh
papers.abstract: Graphics Processing Units (GPUs) are commonly integrated with computing devices to enhance the performance and capabilities of graphical workloads. In addition, they are increasingly being integrated in data centers and clouds such that they can be used to accelerate data intensive workloads. Under a number of scenarios the GPU can be shared between multiple applications at a fine granularity allowing a spy application to monitor side channels and attempt to infer the behavior of the victim. For example, OpenGL and WebGL send workloads to the GPU at the granularity of a frame, allowing an attacker to interleave the use of the GPU to measure the side-effects of the victim computation through performance counters or other resource tracking APIs. We demonstrate the vulnerability by implementing three end-to-end attacks. We show that an OpenGL or CUDA based spy can fingerprint websites accurately (attack I), track user activities within the website, and even infer the keystroke timings for a password text box (attack II) with high accuracy. The third attack demonstrates how a CUDA spy application can derive the internal parameters of a neural network model being used by another CUDA application on the cloud. To counter these attacks, the paper suggests mitigations based on limiting the rate of the calls, or limiting the granularity of the returned information.
papers.abstract_zh: 图形处理单元(GPU)通常与计算设备集成在一起，以增强图形工作负载的性能和能力。此外，它们越来越多地被集成到数据中心和云中，以便可以用来加速数据密集型工作负载。在许多情况下，GPU可以在多个应用程序之间以精细的粒度共享，从而允许间谍应用程序监控侧信道并尝试推断受害者的行为。例如，OpenGL和WebGL以帧的粒度向GPU发送工作负载，允许攻击者交错使用GPU，通过性能计数器或其他资源跟踪API来测量受害者计算的副作用。我们通过实施三种端到端攻击来演示该漏洞。我们证明了基于OpenGL或CUDA的间谍可以准确地对网站进行指纹识别(攻击I)，跟踪网站内的用户活动，甚至可以高精度地推断密码文本框的击键时间(攻击II)。第三个攻击演示了CUDA spy应用程序如何获取云上另一个CUDA应用程序正在使用的神经网络模型的内部参数。为了应对这些攻击，该论文提出了基于限制调用速率或限制返回信息粒度的缓解措施。
papers.title_zh: 侧渠道攻击GPU

papers.title: Security of Streaming Media Communications with Logistic Map and Self-Adaptive Detection-Based Steganography
papers.authors: Jinghui Peng, Yijing Jiang, Shanyu Tang, Farid Meziane
papers.abstract: Voice over IP (VoIP) is finding its way into several applications, but its security concerns still remain. This paper shows how a new self-adaptive steganographic method can ensure the security of covert VoIP communications over the Internet. In this study an Active Voice Period Detection algorithm is devised for PCM codec to detect whether a VoIP packet carries active or inactive voice data, and the data embedding location in a VoIP stream is chosen randomly according to random sequences generated from a logistic chaotic map. The initial parameters of the chaotic map and the selection of where to embed the message are negotiated between the communicating parties. Steganography experiments on active and inactive voice periods were carried out using a VoIP communications system. Performance evaluation and security analysis indicates that the proposed VoIP steganographic scheme can withstand statistical detection, and achieve secure real-time covert communications with high speech quality and negligible signal distortion.
papers.abstract_zh: IP语音(VoIP)正在进入几个应用领域，但是它的安全问题仍然存在。本文展示了一种新的自适应隐写方法如何确保互联网上隐蔽VoIP通信的安全性。在本研究中，为PCM编解码器设计了活动语音周期检测算法，以检测VoIP分组是否携带活动或不活动语音数据，并且根据从logistic混沌映射产生的随机序列随机选择VoIP流中的数据嵌入位置。通信方之间协商混沌映射的初始参数和嵌入消息的位置的选择。使用VoIP通信系统对活跃和不活跃语音周期进行隐写实验。性能评估和安全性分析表明，所提出的VoIP隐写方案能够抵抗统计检测，实现安全实时的隐蔽通信，具有较高的语音质量和可忽略的信号失真。
papers.title_zh: 使用Logistic Map和基于自适应检测的隐肌的流媒体通信的安全性

papers.title: ZeroKernel: Secure Context-Isolated Execution on Commodity GPUs
papers.authors: Ohmin Kwon, Yonggon Kim, Jaehyuk Huh, Hyunsoo Yoon
papers.abstract: In the last decade, the dedicated graphics processing unit (GPU) has emerged as an architecture for high-performance computing workloads. Recently, researchers have also focused on the isolation property of a dedicated GPU and suggested GPU-based secure computing environments with several promising applications. However, despite the security analysis conducted by the prior studies, it has been unclear whether a dedicated GPU can be leveraged as a secure processor in the presence of a kernel-privileged attacker. In this paper, we first demonstrate the security of dedicated GPUs through comprehensive studies on context information for GPU execution. The paper shows that a kernel-privileged attacker can manipulate the GPU contexts to redirect memory accesses or execute arbitrary GPU codes on the running GPU kernel. Based on the security analysis, this paper proposes a new on-chip execution model for the dedicated GPU and a novel defense mechanism supporting the security of the on-chip execution. With comprehensive evaluation, the paper assures that the proposed solutions effectively isolate sensitive data in on-chip storages and defend against known attack vectors from a privileged attacker, supporting that the commodity GPUs can be leveraged as a secure processor.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去十年中，专用图形处理单元(GPU)已成为高性能计算工作负载的架构。最近，研究人员还关注了专用GPU的隔离特性，并提出了基于GPU的安全计算环境，具有几个有前途的应用。然而，尽管之前的研究进行了安全分析，但尚不清楚在存在内核特权攻击者的情况下，专用GPU是否可以被用作安全处理器。在本文中，我们首先通过对GPU执行上下文信息的综合研究，论证了专用GPU的安全性。该论文表明，具有内核特权的攻击者可以操纵GPU上下文来重定向内存访问或在运行的GPU内核上执行任意GPU代码。在安全性分析的基础上，提出了一种新的专用GPU片上执行模型和一种支持片上执行安全性的防御机制。通过全面的评估，该论文确保了所提出的解决方案能够有效地隔离片上存储中的敏感数据，并防御来自特权攻击者的已知攻击媒介，支持商用GPU可以被用作安全处理器。
papers.title_zh: Zerokernel：商品GPU上的安全上下文分配执行

papers.title: CATTmew: Defeating Software-Only Physical Kernel Isolation
papers.authors: Yueqiang Cheng, Zhi Zhang, Surya Nepal, Zhi Wang
papers.abstract: All the state-of-the-art rowhammer attacks can break the MMU-enforced inter-domain isolation because the physical memory owned by each domain is adjacent to each other. To mitigate these attacks, physical domain isolation, introduced by CATT [7] , physically separates each domain by dividing the physical memory into multiple partitions and keeping each partition occupied by only one domain. CATT implemented physical kernel isolation as the first generic and practical software-only defense to protect kernel from being rowhammered as kernel is one of the most appealing targets. In this paper, we develop a novel exploit that could effectively defeat the CATT implementation and gain both root and kernel privileges, indicating that the physical kernel isolation is not secure in practice. Our exploit can work without exhausting the page cache or the system memory, or relying on the information of the virtual-to-physical address mapping. The exploit is motivated by our key observation that the modern OSes have double-owned kernel buffers (e.g., video buffers and SCSI Generic buffers) owned concurrently by the kernel and user domains. The existence of such buffers invalidates the physical separation enforced by CATT and makes the rowhammer-based attack possible again. Existing conspicuous rowhammer attacks achieving the root/kernel privilege escalation exhaust the page cache or even the whole system memory. Instead, we propose a new technique, named Memory Ambush. It is able to place the hammerable double-owned kernel buffers physically adjacent to the target objects (e.g., page tables) with only a small amount of memory. As a result, our exploit is stealthier and has fewer memory footprints. We also replace the inefficient rowhammer algorithm that blindly picks up addresses to hammer with an efficient one. Our algorithm selects suitable addresses based on an existing timing channel [31] . We implement our exploit on the Linux kernel version 4.10.0. Our experiment results indicate that a successful attack could be done within 1 minute. The occupied memory is as low as 88 MB.
papers.abstract_zh: 所有最新的rowhammer攻击都可以打破MMU强制的域间隔离，因为每个域拥有的物理内存彼此相邻。为了减少这些攻击，由CATT [7]引入的物理域隔离通过将物理内存划分为多个分区并保持每个分区仅被一个域占用来物理地分隔每个域。CATT实现了物理内核隔离，作为第一个通用和实用的纯软件防御，以保护内核免受行攻击，因为内核是最有吸引力的目标之一。在本文中，我们开发了一个新的漏洞，可以有效地击败CATT实现，并获得root和内核权限，这表明物理内核隔离在实践中是不安全的。我们的利用可以在不耗尽页面缓存或系统内存的情况下工作，或者依赖于虚拟到物理地址映射的信息。这种利用的动机是我们的关键观察，即现代操作系统具有由内核和用户域同时拥有的双重内核缓冲区(例如，视频缓冲区和SCSI通用缓冲区)。这种缓冲区的存在使CATT实施的物理隔离失效，并使基于rowhammer的攻击再次成为可能。实现根/内核权限提升的现有明显的行锤攻击耗尽了页面缓存甚至整个系统内存。取而代之的是，我们提出了一种新的技术，叫做内存埋伏。它能够将可锤化的双重拥有的内核缓冲区放置在仅具有少量存储器的目标对象(例如，页表)附近。因此，我们的漏洞利用更加隐蔽，占用的内存也更少。我们还用高效的rowhammer算法替换了低效的row hammer算法，该算法盲目地选取地址进行锤击。我们的算法基于现有的定时通道选择合适的地址[31]。我们在Linux内核版本4.10.0上实现了我们的利用。我们的实验结果表明，一次成功的攻击可以在1分钟内完成。占用内存低至88 MB。
papers.title_zh: CATTMEW：击败仅软件的物理内核隔离

papers.title: Fully Accountable Data Sharing for Pay-as-You-Go Cloud Scenes
papers.authors: Ti Wang, Hui Ma, Yongbin Zhou, Rui Zhang, Zishuai Song
papers.abstract: Many enterprises and individuals prefer to outsource data to public cloud via various pricing approaches. One of the most widely-used approaches is the pay-as-you-go model, where the data owner hires public cloud to share data with data consumers, and only pays for the actually consumed services. To realize controllable and secure data sharing, ciphertext-policy attribute-based encryption (CP-ABE) is a suitable solution, which can provide fine-grained access control and encryption functionalities simultaneously. But there are some serious challenges when applying CP-ABE in pay-as-you-go. First, the decryption cost in ABE is too heavy for data consumers. Second, ABE ciphertexts probably suffer distributed denial of services (DDoS) attacks, but there is no solution that can eliminate the security risk. At last, the data owner should audit resource consumption to guarantee the transparency of charge, while the existing method is inefficient. In this work, we propose a general construction named fully accountable ABE (FA-ABE), which simultaneously solves all the challenges by supporting all-sided accountability in the pay-as-you-go model. We formally define the security model and prove the security in the standard model. Also, we implement an instantiate construction with the self-developed library <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathsf{ libabe}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="sans-serif">libabe</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="ma-ieq1-2947579.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. The experiment results indicate the efficiency and practicality of our construction.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多企业和个人更喜欢通过各种定价方法将数据外包给公共云。最广泛使用的方法之一是现收现付模式，在这种模式下，数据所有者租用公共云与数据消费者共享数据，并且只为实际消费的服务付费。为了实现可控和安全的数据共享，密文策略基于属性的加密(CP-ABE)是一种合适的解决方案，它可以同时提供细粒度的访问控制和加密功能。但是在现收现付中应用CP-ABE存在一些严峻的挑战。第一，ABE中的解密成本对于数据消费者来说过于沉重。第二，ABE密文可能遭受分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击，但没有解决方案可以消除安全风险。最后，数据所有者应该对资源消耗进行审计，以保证收费的透明性，而现有方法效率低下。在本文中，我们提出了一个名为完全可问责的ABE (FA-ABE)的通用结构，它通过支持现收现付模型中的全面问责制同时解决了所有的挑战。我们形式化地定义了安全模型，并证明了标准模型的安全性。此外，我们使用自行开发的库< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathsf { libabe } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " sans-serif " > libabe </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " ma-ie Q1-2947579 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >实现了一个实例化构造。实验结果表明了该结构的有效性和实用性。
papers.title_zh: 全面负责的数据共享，用于付费云场景

papers.title: Scaling Camouflage: Content Disguising Attack Against Computer Vision Applications
papers.authors: Yufei Chen, Chao Shen, Cong Wang, Qixue Xiao, Kang Li, Yu Chen
papers.abstract: Recently, deep neural networks have achieved state-of-the-art performance in multiple computer vision tasks, and become core parts of computer vision applications. In most of their implementations, a standard input preprocessing component called image scaling is embedded, in order to resize the original data to match the input size of pre-trained neural networks. This article demonstrates content disguising attacks by exploiting the image scaling procedure, which cause machine’s extracted content to be dramatically dissimilar with that before scaled. Different from previous adversarial attacks, our attacks happen in the data preprocessing stage, and hence they are not subject to specific machine learning models. To achieve a better deceiving and disguising effect, we propose and implement three feasible attack approaches with <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$L_0$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi>L</mml:mi><mml:mn>0</mml:mn></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="shen-ieq1-2971601.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$L_2$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi>L</mml:mi><mml:mn>2</mml:mn></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="shen-ieq2-2971601.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>- and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$L_{\infty }$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msub><mml:mi>L</mml:mi><mml:mi>∞</mml:mi></mml:msub></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="shen-ieq3-2971601.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-norm distance metrics. We have conducted a comprehensive evaluation on various image classification applications, including three local demos and two remote proprietary services. We also investigate the attack effects on a YOLO-v3 object detection demo. Our experimental results demonstrate successful content disguising against all of them, which validate our approaches are practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，深度神经网络在多个计算机视觉任务中取得了最先进的性能，并成为计算机视觉应用的核心部分。在大多数实现中，嵌入了称为图像缩放的标准输入预处理组件，以便调整原始数据的大小，以匹配预训练神经网络的输入大小。本文演示了利用图像缩放过程进行内容伪装攻击，使机器提取的内容与缩放前的内容明显不同。与以前的对抗性攻击不同，我们的攻击发生在数据预处理阶段，因此它们不受特定机器学习模型的影响。为了达到更好的欺骗和伪装效果，我们提出并实现了三种可行的攻击方法，使用< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " >＄L _ 0 ＄</tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:msub > < MML:mi > L </MML:mi > < MML:Mn > 0 </MML:Mn > </MML:msub > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Shen-ie Q1-2971600我们对各种图像分类应用进行了全面的评估，包括三个本地演示和两个远程专有服务。我们还研究了攻击对YOLO-v3目标检测演示的影响。我们的实验结果显示了成功的内容伪装，验证了我们的方法是可行的。
papers.title_zh: 缩放伪装：内容掩盖了针对计算机视觉应用的攻击

papers.title: Shielding Collaborative Learning: Mitigating Poisoning Attacks Through Client-Side Detection
papers.authors: Lingchen Zhao, Shengshan Hu, Qian Wang, Jianlin Jiang, Chao Shen, Xiangyang Luo, Pengfei Hu
papers.abstract: Collaborative learning allows multiple clients to train a joint model without sharing their data with each other. Each client performs training locally and then submits the model updates to a central server for aggregation. Since the server has no visibility into the process of generating the updates, collaborative learning is vulnerable to poisoning attacks where a malicious client can generate a poisoned update to introduce backdoor functionality to the joint model.
