The existing solutions for detecting poisoned updates, however, fail to defend against the recently proposed attacks, especially in the non-IID (independent and identically distributed) setting. In this article, we present a novel defense scheme to detect anomalous updates in both IID and non-IID settings. Our key idea is to realize client-side cross-validation, where each update is evaluated over other clients’ local data. The server will adjust the weights of the updates based on the evaluation results when performing aggregation. To adapt to the unbalanced distribution of data in the non-IID setting, a dynamic client allocation mechanism is designed to assign detection tasks to the most suitable clients. During the detection process, we also protect the client-level privacy to prevent malicious clients from knowing the participations of other clients, by integrating differential privacy with our design without degrading the detection performance. Our experimental evaluations on three real-world datasets show that our scheme is significantly robust to two representative poisoning attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 协作学习允许多个客户端训练一个联合模型，而无需彼此共享数据。每个客户端在本地执行训练，然后将模型更新提交给中央服务器进行汇总。由于服务器对生成更新的过程没有可见性，协作学习容易受到中毒攻击，其中恶意客户端可以生成中毒更新以将后门功能引入联合模型。然而，用于检测中毒更新的现有解决方案无法抵御最近提出的攻击，尤其是在非IID(独立且同分布)设置中。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一种新的防御方案来检测IID和非IID环境中的异常更新。我们的主要想法是实现客户端交叉验证，其中每个更新都是根据其他客户端的本地数据进行评估的。当执行聚合时，服务器将基于评估结果调整更新的权重。为了适应非IID环境下数据分布的不均衡，设计了一种动态客户端分配机制，将检测任务分配给最合适的客户端。在检测过程中，我们还通过在不降低检测性能的情况下将差分隐私与我们的设计相结合来保护客户端级别的隐私，以防止恶意客户端知道其他客户端的参与。我们在三个真实数据集上的实验评估表明，我们的方案对两种典型的中毒攻击具有显著的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 屏蔽协作学习：通过客户端检测来减轻中毒攻击

papers.title: Website Fingerprinting Through the Cache Occupancy Channel and its Real World Practicality
papers.authors: Anatoly Shusterman, Zohar Avraham, Eliezer Croitoru, Yarden Haskal, Lachlan Kang, Dvir Levi, Yosef Meltser, Prateek Mittal, Yossi Oren, Yuval Yarom
papers.abstract: Website fingerprinting attacks use statistical analysis on network traffic to compromise user privacy. The classical attack model used to evaluate website fingerprinting attacks assumes an on-path adversary, who observes traffic traveling between the user's computer and the network. In this article we investigate a different attack model, in which the adversary sends JavaScript code to the target user's computer. This code mounts a cache side-channel attack to identify other websites being browsed. Using machine learning techniques to classify traces of cache activity, we achieve high classification accuracy in both the open-world and the closed-world models. Our attack is more resistant than network-based fingerprinting to the effects of response caching, and resilient both to network-based defenses and to side-channel countermeasures. We carry out a real-world evaluation of several aspects of our attack, exploring the impact of the changes in websites and browsers over time, as well as of the attacker's ability to guess the software and hardware configuration of the target user's computer. To protect against cache-based website fingerprinting, new defense mechanisms must be introduced to privacy-sensitive browsers and websites. We investigate one such mechanism, and show that it reduces the effectiveness of the attack and completely eliminates it when used in the Tor Browser.
papers.abstract_zh: 网站指纹攻击使用对网络流量的统计分析来危害用户隐私。用于评估网站指纹攻击的经典攻击模型假设路径上的对手观察用户计算机和网络之间的流量。在本文中，我们研究了一种不同的攻击模型，在这种模型中，对手向目标用户的计算机发送JavaScript代码。该代码发起缓存旁路攻击，以识别正在浏览的其他网站。使用机器学习技术来分类缓存活动的痕迹，我们在开放世界和封闭世界模型中都实现了高分类准确度。我们的攻击比基于网络的指纹更能抵抗响应缓存的影响，并且对基于网络的防御和旁路对策都具有弹性。我们对攻击的几个方面进行了真实世界的评估，探索网站和浏览器随时间变化的影响，以及攻击者猜测目标用户计算机的软件和硬件配置的能力。为了防止基于缓存的网站指纹，必须为隐私敏感的浏览器和网站引入新的防御机制。我们研究了一种这样的机制，并表明它降低了攻击的有效性，并在Tor浏览器中使用时完全消除了攻击。
papers.title_zh: 网站指纹通过缓存占用频道及其现实世界实用性

papers.title: Robust Transparency Against Model Inversion Attacks
papers.authors: Yasmeen Alufaisan, Murat Kantarcioglu, Yan Zhou
papers.abstract: Transparency has become a critical need in machine learning (ML) applications. Designing transparent ML models helps increase trust, ensure accountability, and scrutinize fairness. Some organizations may opt-out of transparency to protect individuals’ privacy. Therefore, there is a great demand for transparency models that consider both privacy and security risks. Such transparency models can motivate organizations to improve their credibility by making the ML-based decision-making process comprehensible to end-users. Differential privacy (DP) provides an important technique to disclose information while protecting individual privacy. However, it has been shown that DP alone cannot prevent certain types of privacy attacks against disclosed ML models. DP with low <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\epsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="alufaisan-ieq1-3019508.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> values can provide high privacy guarantees, but may result in significantly weaker ML models in terms of accuracy. On the other hand, setting <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\epsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="alufaisan-ieq2-3019508.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> value too high may lead to successful privacy attacks. This raises the question whether we can disclose accurate transparent ML models while preserving privacy. In this article we introduce a novel technique that complements DP to ensure model transparency and accuracy while being robust against model inversion attacks. We show that combining the proposed technique with DP provide highly transparent and accurate ML models while preserving privacy against model inversion attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 透明性已经成为机器学习(ML)应用中的一个关键需求。设计透明的ML模型有助于增加信任，确保责任，并审查公平性。一些组织可能会选择不透明以保护个人隐私。因此，非常需要考虑隐私和安全风险的透明模型。这种透明模型可以通过使基于ML的决策过程对最终用户来说是可理解的来激励组织提高他们的可信度。差分隐私提供了一种在保护个人隐私的同时公开信息的重要技术。然而，已经表明单独的DP不能防止针对公开的ML模型的某些类型的隐私攻击。具有低< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ epsilon $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < Mml:math > < MML:mi >ε</MML:math > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " alufaisan-ie Q1-3019508 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >值的DP可以提供高隐私保证，但可能导致ML模型在准确性方面明显较弱。另一方面，将< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ epsilon $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi >ε</MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " alufaisan-ieq 2-3019508 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >值设置得太高可能会导致成功的隐私攻击。这就提出了一个问题，我们是否可以在保护隐私的同时公开准确透明的ML模型。在本文中，我们介绍了一种补充DP的新技术，以确保模型的透明性和准确性，同时对模型反演攻击具有鲁棒性。我们证明了将所提出的技术与DP相结合提供了高度透明和精确的ML模型，同时保护了隐私免受模型反转攻击。
papers.title_zh: 对模型反转攻击的强大透明度

papers.title: Invisible Backdoor Attacks on Deep Neural Networks Via Steganography and Regularization
papers.authors: Shaofeng Li, Minhui Xue, Benjamin Zi Hao Zhao, Haojin Zhu, Xinpeng Zhang
papers.abstract: Deep neural networks (DNNs) have been proven vulnerable to backdoor attacks, where hidden features (patterns) trained to a normal model, which is only activated by some specific input (called triggers), trick the model into producing unexpected behavior. In this article, we create covert and scattered triggers for backdoor attacks, invisible backdoors, where triggers can fool both DNN models and human inspection. We apply our invisible backdoors through two state-of-the-art methods of embedding triggers for backdoor attacks. The first approach on Badnets embeds the trigger into DNNs through steganography. The second approach of a trojan attack uses two types of additional regularization terms to generate the triggers with irregular shape and size. We use the Attack Success Rate and Functionality to measure the performance of our attacks. We introduce two novel definitions of invisibility for human perception; one is conceptualized by the Perceptual Adversarial Similarity Score (PASS) and the other is Learned Perceptual Image Patch Similarity (LPIPS). We show that the proposed invisible backdoors can be fairly effective across various DNN models as well as four datasets MNIST, CIFAR-10, CIFAR-100, and GTSRB, by measuring their attack success rates for the adversary, functionality for the normal users, and invisibility scores for the administrators. We finally argue that the proposed invisible backdoor attacks can effectively thwart the state-of-the-art trojan backdoor detection approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络(DNNs)已经被证明容易受到后门攻击，其中隐藏的特征(模式)被训练成一个正常的模型，该模型只被一些特定的输入(称为触发器)激活，欺骗模型产生意想不到的行为。在本文中，我们为后门攻击创建了隐蔽和分散的触发器，隐形后门，其中触发器可以欺骗DNN模型和人工检查。我们通过两种最先进的嵌入后门攻击触发器的方法来应用我们的隐形后门。Badnets上的第一种方法通过隐写术将触发器嵌入到DNNs中。特洛伊木马攻击的第二种方法使用两种类型的附加正则化项来生成形状和大小不规则的触发器。我们使用攻击成功率和功能来衡量攻击的性能。我们介绍了人类感知不可见性的两个新定义；一个是通过感知敌对相似性分数(PASS)概念化的，另一个是学习的感知图像块相似性(LPIPS)。我们通过测量对手的攻击成功率、普通用户的功能和管理员的不可见性得分，表明所提出的不可见后门在各种DNN模型以及四个数据集MNIST、CIFAR-10、CIFAR-100和GTSRB上可以相当有效。我们最后认为，提出的隐形后门攻击可以有效地挫败最先进的木马后门检测方法。
papers.title_zh: 通过隐身和正则化对深度神经网络的无形后门攻击

papers.title: Image Transformation-Based Defense Against Adversarial Perturbation on Deep Learning Models
papers.authors: Akshay Agarwal, Richa Singh, Mayank Vatsa, Nalini K. Ratha
papers.abstract: Deep learning algorithms provide state-of-the-art results on a multitude of applications. However, it is also well established that they are highly vulnerable to adversarial perturbations. It is often believed that the solution to this vulnerability of deep learning systems must come from deep networks only. Contrary to this common understanding, in this article, we propose a non-deep learning approach that searches over a set of well-known image transforms such as Discrete Wavelet Transform and Discrete Sine Transform, and classifying the features with a support vector machine-based classifier. Existing deep networks-based defense have been proven ineffective against sophisticated adversaries, whereas image transformation-based solution makes a strong defense because of the non-differential nature, multiscale, and orientation filtering. The proposed approach, which combines the outputs of two transforms, efficiently generalizes across databases as well as different unseen attacks and combinations of both (i.e., cross-database and unseen noise generation CNN model). The proposed algorithm is evaluated on large scale databases, including object database (validation set of ImageNet) and face recognition (MBGC) database. The proposed detection algorithm yields at-least 84.2% and 80.1% detection accuracy under seen and unseen database test settings, respectively. Besides, we also show how the impact of the adversarial perturbation can be neutralized using a wavelet decomposition-based filtering method of denoising. The mitigation results with different perturbation methods on several image databases demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习算法在众多应用程序上提供了最先进的结果。然而，众所周知，他们极易受到敌对势力的干扰。人们通常认为，深度学习系统的这种脆弱性的解决方案必须仅来自深度网络。与这种普遍理解相反，在本文中，我们提出了一种非深度学习方法，该方法搜索一组众所周知的图像变换，如离散小波变换和离散正弦变换，并用基于支持向量机的分类器对特征进行分类。现有的基于深度网络的防御已被证明对复杂的对手无效，而基于图像变换的解决方案由于其非差分性质、多尺度和方向过滤而成为强大的防御。所提出的方法结合了两种变换的输出，有效地概括了跨数据库以及不同的未知攻击和两者的组合(即，跨数据库和未知噪声生成CNN模型)。所提出的算法在大规模数据库上进行评估，包括对象数据库(ImageNet的验证集)和人脸识别(MBGC)数据库。所提出的检测算法在可见和不可见的数据库测试设置下分别产生至少84.2%和80.1%的检测准确度。此外，我们还展示了如何使用基于小波分解的滤波去噪方法来抵消不利扰动的影响。多个图像数据库上不同扰动方法的缓解结果验证了该方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于图像转化的防御对抗性扰动在深度学习模型上

papers.title: LAW: Learning Automatic Windows for Online Payment Fraud Detection
papers.authors: Cheng Wang, Changqi Wang, Hangyu Zhu, Jipeng Cui
papers.abstract: The rapid development of internet finance has caused increasing concern in online payment fraud due to its great threat. It is typical to employ rule systems or machine learning-based techniques to detect frauds. For the most significant features of such fraudulent transactions are exhibited in a sequential form, the sliding time window is a widely-recognized effective tool for this problem. With a sliding time window, features about the transaction characteristics can be extracted, and the latent patterns hidden in transaction records can be captured. However, the adaptive setting of sliding time window is really a big challenge, since the transaction patterns in real-life application scenarios are often too elusive to be captured. As a matter of fact, the practical setting usually needs to be updated and refined with manual intervention regularly. This is time-consuming indeed. In this article, we pursue an adaptive learning approach to detect fraudulent online payment transactions with automatic sliding time windows. Accordingly, we make efforts on optimizing the setting of windows and improving the adaptability. We design an intelligent window, called learning automatic window (LAW). It utilizes the learning automata to learn the proper parameters of time windows and adjust them dynamically and regularly according to the variation and oscillation of fraudulent transaction patterns. By the experiments over a real-world dataset of the online payment service from a commercial bank, we validate the gain of LAW in terms of detection effectiveness and robustness. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first work to make a sliding time window for fraud detection capable of learning its proper size in changing situations.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网金融的快速发展使得网上支付欺诈受到越来越多的关注。通常采用规则系统或基于机器学习的技术来检测欺诈。因为这种欺诈交易的最显著特征是以连续的形式展示的，所以滑动时间窗口是解决这个问题的被广泛认可的有效工具。通过滑动时间窗，可以提取交易特征，捕捉隐藏在交易记录中的潜在模式。然而，滑动时间窗口的自适应设置确实是一个很大的挑战，因为实际应用场景中的事务模式往往难以捕捉。事实上，实际设置通常需要定期通过人工干预进行更新和改进。这确实很费时间。在本文中，我们寻求一种自适应学习方法来检测具有自动滑动时间窗口的欺诈性在线支付交易。因此，我们努力优化窗口设置，提高适应性。我们设计了一个智能窗口，叫做学习自动窗口(LAW)。它利用学习自动机来学习合适的时间窗参数，并根据欺诈交易模式的变化和振荡来动态地、有规律地调整它们。通过在商业银行在线支付服务的真实数据集上的实验，我们验证了该方法在检测有效性和鲁棒性方面的增益。据我们所知，这是第一个为欺诈检测制作滑动时间窗口的工作，能够在变化的情况下学习其适当的大小。
papers.title_zh: 法律：学习在线付款欺诈检测的自动窗口

papers.title: Anomaly Detection in Operating System Logs with Deep Learning-Based Sentiment Analysis
papers.authors: Hudan Studiawan, Ferdous Sohel, Christian Payne
papers.abstract: The purpose of sentiment analysis is to detect an opinion or polarity in text data. We can apply such an analysis to detect negative sentiment, which represents the anomalous activities in operating system (OS) logs. Existing methods involve manual searching, predefined rules, or traditional machine learning techniques to detect such suspicious events. In this article, we propose a novel deep learning-based sentiment analysis technique to check whether there are anomalous activities in OS logs. Log messages are modeled as sentences and we identify the sentiments using the gated recurrent unit (GRU) networks. OS log datasets inherently have a class imbalance in the sense that the number of negative sentiment is much lower than that of the number of positive ones. In order to address the class imbalance, we build a GRU layer on top of a class imbalance solver using the Tomek link method. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed method can detect anomalous events in OS logs with an overall F1 and accuracy of 99.84 and 99.93 percent, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 情感分析的目的是检测文本数据中的观点或极性。我们可以应用这样的分析来检测负面情绪，负面情绪表示操作系统(OS)日志中的异常活动。现有的方法包括手动搜索、预定义规则或传统的机器学习技术来检测这种可疑事件。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的基于深度学习的情感分析技术来检查操作系统日志中是否存在异常活动。日志消息被建模为句子，我们使用门控递归单元(GRU)网络来识别情感。操作系统日志数据集本质上具有类别不平衡，因为负面情绪的数量远远低于正面情绪的数量。为了解决类别不平衡问题，我们使用Tomek链接方法在类别不平衡解算器的基础上构建了一个GRU图层。实验结果表明，该方法能够检测出操作系统日志中的异常事件，总体F1和准确率分别为99.84%和99.93%。
papers.title_zh: 具有深度学习情感分析的操作系统日志中的异常检测

papers.title: Towards Learning-Based, Content-Agnostic Detection of Social Bot Traffic
papers.authors: Yebo Feng, Jun Li, Lei Jiao, Xintao Wu
papers.abstract: With the fast-growing popularity of online social networks (OSNs), the security and privacy of OSN ecosystems becomes essential for the public. Among threats OSNs face, malicious social bots have become the most common and detrimental. They are often employed to violate users’ privacy, distribute spam, and disturb the financial market, posing a compelling need for effective social bot detection solutions. Unlike traditional social bot detection approaches that have strict requirements on data sources (e.g., private payload information, social relationships, or activity histories), this article proposes a method called BotFlowMon that relies only on content-agnostic flow-level data as input to identify OSN bot traffic. BotFlowMon introduces several new algorithms and techniques to classify social bot traffic from real OSN user traffic, including aggregating network flow records to obtain OSN transaction data, fusing transaction data to extract features and visualize flows, and an innovative density-valley-based clustering algorithm to subdivide each transaction into individual actions. The evaluation shows BotFlowMon can identify the traffic from social bots with a 96.1 percent accuracy, which, based on the worst case study on a testing machine, only takes no more than 0.71 seconds on average after it sees the traffic.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着在线社交网络(OSN)的快速普及，OSN生态系统的安全性和隐私性对公众来说变得至关重要。在osn面临的威胁中，恶意社交机器人已经成为最常见和最有害的威胁。它们经常被用来侵犯用户的隐私，分发垃圾邮件，扰乱金融市场，迫切需要有效的社交机器人检测解决方案。与对数据源有严格要求的传统社交bot检测方法不同(例如，私有有效载荷信息、社交关系或活动历史)，本文提出了一种称为BotFlowMon的方法，该方法仅依赖于内容不可知的流级别数据作为输入来识别OSN bot流量。BotFlowMon引入了几种新的算法和技术，从真实的OSN用户流量中对社交bot流量进行分类，包括聚合网络流量记录以获得OSN交易数据，融合交易数据以提取特征和可视化流量，以及创新的基于密度谷的聚类算法，以将每个交易细分为单独的操作。评估显示，BotFlowMon可以以96.1%的准确率识别社交机器人的流量，根据测试机器上的最坏情况研究，在看到流量后，平均只需不超过0.71秒。
papers.title_zh: 朝基于学习的，内容不足的社会机器人流量检测

papers.title: Timely Detection and Mitigation of Stealthy DDoS Attacks Via IoT Networks
papers.authors: Keval Doshi, Yasin Yilmaz, Suleyman Uludag
papers.abstract: Internet of Things (IoT) networks consist of sensors, actuators, mobile and wearable devices that can connect to the Internet. With billions of such devices already in the market which have significant vulnerabilities, there is a dangerous threat to the Internet services and also some cyber-physical systems that are also connected to the Internet. Specifically, due to their existing vulnerabilities IoT devices are susceptible to being compromised and being part of a new type of stealthy Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attack, called Mongolian DDoS, which is characterized by its widely distributed nature and small attack size from each source. This article proposes a novel anomaly-based Intrusion Detection System (IDS) that is capable of timely detecting and mitigating this emerging type of DDoS attacks. The proposed IDS’s capability of detecting and mitigating stealthy DDoS attacks with even very low attack size per source is demonstrated through numerical and testbed experiments.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)网络由可以连接到互联网的传感器、执行器、移动和可穿戴设备组成。由于市场上已经有数十亿这样的设备存在重大漏洞，因此对互联网服务以及一些也连接到互联网的网络物理系统存在危险的威胁。具体来说，由于其现有的漏洞，物联网设备很容易受到危害，并成为一种新型秘密分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击的一部分，这种攻击称为蒙古DDoS，其特征是其广泛分布的性质和来自每个来源的小攻击规模。本文提出了一种新的基于异常的入侵检测系统(IDS ),能够及时检测和缓解这种新兴的DDoS攻击。数值实验和测试实验表明，该入侵检测系统能够以非常低的攻击规模检测和缓解隐蔽的DDoS攻击。
papers.title_zh: 通过IoT网络及时检测和缓解隐形DDOS攻击

papers.title: Enhancing Robustness of On-Line Learning Models on Highly Noisy Data
papers.authors: Zilong Zhao, Robert Birke, Rui Han, Bogdan Robu, Sara Bouchenak, Sonia Ben Mokhtar, Lydia Y. Chen
papers.abstract: Classification algorithms have been widely adopted to detect anomalies for various systems, e.g., IoT, cloud and face recognition, under the common assumption that the data source is clean, i.e., features and labels are correctly set. However, data collected from the wild can be unreliable due to careless annotations or malicious data transformation for incorrect anomaly detection. In this article, we extend a two-layer on-line data selection framework: Robust Anomaly Detector (RAD) with a newly designed ensemble prediction where both layers contribute to the final anomaly detection decision. To adapt to the on-line nature of anomaly detection, we consider additional features of conflicting opinions of classifiers, repetitive cleaning, and oracle knowledge. We on-line learn from incoming data streams and continuously cleanse the data, so as to adapt to the increasing learning capacity from the larger accumulated data set. Moreover, we explore the concept of oracle learning that provides additional information of true labels for difficult data points. We specifically focus on three use cases, (i) detecting 10 classes of IoT attacks, (ii) predicting 4 classes of task failures of big data jobs, and (iii) recognising 100 celebrities faces. Our evaluation results show that RAD can robustly improve the accuracy of anomaly detection, to reach up to 98.95 percent for IoT device attacks (i.e., +7%), up to 85.03 percent for cloud task failures (i.e., +14%) under 40 percent label noise, and for its extension, it can reach up to 77.51 percent for face recognition (i.e., +39%) under 30 percent label noise. The proposed RAD and its extensions are general and can be applied to different anomaly detection algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 分类算法已被广泛用于检测各种系统的异常，例如物联网、云和人脸识别，前提是数据源是干净的，即特征和标签设置正确。然而，从野外收集的数据可能是不可靠的，因为粗心的注释或恶意的数据转换会导致不正确的异常检测。在本文中，我们扩展了一个两层在线数据选择框架:鲁棒异常检测器(RAD ),它具有新设计的集合预测，其中两层都有助于最终的异常检测决策。为了适应异常检测的在线性质，我们考虑了分类器意见冲突、重复清洗和oracle知识的附加特征。我们从输入的数据流中在线学习，并不断清洗数据，以适应从更大的累积数据集增加的学习能力。此外，我们探讨了oracle learning的概念，它为困难的数据点提供了真实标签的附加信息。我们特别关注三种用例，(I)检测10类物联网攻击，(ii)预测大数据工作的4类任务失败，以及(iii)识别100张名人的脸。我们的评估结果表明，RAD可以稳健地提高异常检测的准确性，在40%的标签噪声下，物联网设备攻击的准确率高达98.95%(即+7%)，云任务失败的准确率高达85.03%(即+14%)，对于其扩展，在30%的标签噪声下，人脸识别的准确率高达77.51%(即+39%)。所提出的RAD及其扩展是通用的，可以应用于不同的异常检测算法。
papers.title_zh: 在高度嘈杂的数据上增强在线学习模型的鲁棒性

papers.title: DatingSec: Detecting Malicious Accounts in Dating Apps Using a Content-Based Attention Network
papers.authors: Xinlei He, Qingyuan Gong, Yang Chen, Yang Zhang, Xin Wang, Xiaoming Fu
papers.abstract: Dating apps have gained tremendous popularity during the past decade. Compared with traditional offline dating means, dating apps ease the process of partner finding significantly. While bringing convenience to hundreds of millions of users, dating apps are vulnerable to become targets of adversaries. In this article, we focus on malicious user detection in dating apps. Existing methods overlooked the signals hidden in the textual information of user interactions, particularly the interplay of temporal-spatial behaviors and textual information, leading to limited detection performance. To tackle this, we propose DatingSec, a novel malicious user detection system for dating apps. Concretely, DatingSec leverages long short-term memory neural networks (LSTM) and an attentive module to capture the interplay of users’ temporal-spatial behaviors and user-generated textual content. We evaluate DatingSec on a real-world dataset collected from Momo, a widely used dating app with more than 180 million users. Experimental results show that DatingSec outperforms state-of-the-art methods and achieves an F1-score of 0.857 and AUC of 0.940.
papers.abstract_zh: 约会应用程序在过去十年中获得了巨大的人气。与传统的线下约会方式相比，约会应用大大简化了寻找伴侣的过程。虽然给数亿用户带来了便利，但约会应用很容易成为对手的目标。在这篇文章中，我们主要关注约会应用中的恶意用户检测。现有方法忽略了隐藏在用户交互文本信息中的信号，特别是时空行为和文本信息的相互作用，导致检测性能有限。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了DatingSec，一种针对约会应用的新型恶意用户检测系统。具体来说，DatingSec利用长短期记忆神经网络(LSTM)和注意力模块来捕捉用户的时空行为和用户生成的文本内容的相互作用。我们在从Momo收集的真实世界数据集上评估DatingSec，Momo是一个广泛使用的约会应用程序，拥有超过1.8亿用户。实验结果表明，DatingSec的性能优于目前最先进的方法，F1值为0.857，AUC值为0.940。
papers.title_zh: Datingsec：使用基于内容的注意网络在约会应用中检测恶意帐户

papers.title: "Seeing is Not Always Believing": Detecting Perception Error Attacks Against Autonomous Vehicles
papers.authors: Jinshan Liu, Jung-Min Park
papers.abstract: Due to the great achievements in artificial intelligence, it is predicted that autonomous vehicles with little or even no human involvement will come to market in the near future. Autonomous vehicles are equipped with multiple types of sensors. An autonomous vehicle relies on its sensors to perceive its environment, and this sensory information plays a key role in the vehicle's driving decisions. Hence, ensuring the trustworthiness of the sensor data is crucial for drivers’ safety. In this article, we discuss the impact of perception error attacks (PEAs) on autonomous vehicles, and propose a countermeasure called LIFE (LIDAR and Image data Fusion for detecting perception Errors). LIFE detects PEAs by analyzing the consistency between camera image data and LIDAR data using novel machine learning and computer vision algorithms. The performance of LIFE has been evaluated extensively using the KITTI dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于人工智能的巨大成就，预计不久的将来，很少甚至没有人类参与的自动驾驶汽车将会上市。自动驾驶汽车配备了多种类型的传感器。自动驾驶汽车依靠传感器来感知环境，这种传感信息在汽车的驾驶决策中起着关键作用。因此，确保传感器数据的可信度对于驾驶员的安全至关重要。在本文中，我们讨论了感知错误攻击(PEAs)对自动驾驶汽车的影响，并提出了一种称为LIFE的对策(激光雷达和图像数据融合以检测感知错误)。LIFE通过使用新颖的机器学习和计算机视觉算法分析相机图像数据和激光雷达数据之间的一致性来检测豌豆。使用KITTI数据集对生命的表现进行了广泛的评估。
papers.title_zh: “看到并不总是相信”：检测对自动驾驶汽车的感知错误攻击

papers.title: $\mu$μVulDeePecker: A Deep Learning-Based System for Multiclass Vulnerability Detection
papers.authors: Deqing Zou, Sujuan Wang, Shouhuai Xu, Zhen Li, Hai Jin
papers.abstract: Fine-grained software vulnerability detection is an important and challenging problem. Ideally, a detection system (or detector) not only should be able to detect whether or not a program contains vulnerabilities, but also should be able to pinpoint the type of a vulnerability in question. Existing vulnerability detection methods based on deep learning can detect the presence of vulnerabilities (i.e., addressing the binary classification or detection problem), but cannot pinpoint types of vulnerabilities (i.e., incapable of addressing multiclass classification). In this paper, we propose the first deep learning-based system for multiclass vulnerability detection, dubbed μVulDeePecker. The key insight underlying μVulDeePecker is the concept of code attention, which can capture information that can help pinpoint types of vulnerabilities, even when the samples are small. For this purpose, we create a dataset from scratch and use it to evaluate the effectiveness of μVulDeePecker. Experimental results show that μVulDeePecker is effective for multiclass vulnerability detection and that accommodating control-dependence (other than data-dependence) can lead to higher detection capabilities.
papers.abstract_zh: 细粒度的软件漏洞检测是一个重要且具有挑战性的问题。理想情况下，检测系统(或检测器)不仅应该能够检测一个程序是否包含漏洞，还应该能够查明所讨论的漏洞的类型。基于深度学习的现有弱点检测方法可以检测弱点的存在(即，解决二进制分类或检测问题)，但是不能查明弱点的类型(即，不能解决多类分类)。本文提出了第一个基于深度学习的多类漏洞检测系统μVulDeePecker。μVulDeePecker的关键洞察是代码关注的概念，它可以捕获有助于查明漏洞类型的信息，即使样本很小。为此，我们从头开始创建一个数据集，并使用它来评估μVulDeePecker的有效性。实验结果表明，μVulDeePecker对于多类漏洞检测是有效的，并且适应控制依赖(而不是数据依赖)可以导致更高的检测能力。
papers.title_zh: 美元

papers.title: On the Analysis of Byte-Granularity Heap Randomization
papers.authors: DaeHee Jang, Jonghwan Kim, Hojoon Lee, Minjoon Park, Yunjong Jung, Minsu Kim, Brent ByungHoon Kang
papers.abstract: Heap randomization, in general, has been a well-trodden area; however, the efficacy of byte-granularity randomization has never been fully explored as misalignment raises various concerns. Modern heap exploits often abuse the determinism in word alignment, and modern CPU architecture better supports unaligned access (since Nehalem). Based on such new developments, we conduct an in-depth analysis of evaluating the efficacy of byte-granularity heap randomization in three folds: (i) security effectiveness, (ii) performance impact, and (iii) compatibility analysis to measure deployment cost. Security discussion is based on 20 CVE case studies. To measure performance details, we conduct cycle-level microbenchmarks and report that the performance cost is highly concentrated to edge cases depending on the L1-cache line. Based on such analysis, we design and implement an allocator suited for byte-granularity heap randomization. On the negative side, our analysis suggests that byte-granularity heap randomization has high deployment cost due to various implementation conflicts. We enumerate the problematic compatibility issues using Coreutils, Nginx, and ChakraCore benchmarks.
papers.abstract_zh: 一般来说，堆随机化是一个经常使用的领域；然而，字节粒度随机化的功效从未被充分探索，因为不对齐会引起各种问题。现代堆利用经常滥用字对齐的确定性，现代CPU架构更好地支持非对齐访问(自Nehalem以来)。基于这样的新发展，我们从三个方面对评估字节粒度堆随机化的功效进行了深入分析:(I)安全有效性，(ii)性能影响，以及(iii)兼容性分析以衡量部署成本。安全性讨论基于20个CVE案例研究。为了测量性能细节，我们进行了周期级微基准测试，并报告说性能成本高度集中于边缘情况，具体取决于L1缓存线。基于这样的分析，我们设计并实现了一个适用于字节粒度堆随机化的分配器。从负面来看，我们的分析表明，由于各种实现冲突，字节粒度堆随机化具有很高的部署成本。我们列举了使用Coreutils、Nginx和ChakraCore基准的兼容性问题。
papers.title_zh: 关于字节粒度堆随机化的分析

papers.title: PVOPM: Verifiable Privacy-Preserving Pattern Matching with Efficient Outsourcing in the Malicious Setting
papers.authors: Jun Zhou, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Zhenfu Cao, Xiaolei Dong
papers.abstract: Outsourced pattern matching delegates the task of finding all positions pattern <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$P$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>P</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhou-ieq1-2947436.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> appears in text <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$T$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>T</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhou-ieq2-2947436.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> to the cloud from resource-constrained devices. Unfortunately, it has brought a series of security and privacy issues. Most of the state-of-the-art either disclosed text/pattern privacy or exploited the computationally-intensive techniques of public key fully homomorphic encryption (FHE), commitment schemes and zero knowledge proof to achieve both text/pattern privacy and verifiability. To address these issues, as a building block, an efficient privacy preserving verifiable outsourced discrete fourier transform protocol OVFT is first devised based on any one-way trapdoor permutation (OWTP). Based on OVFT, we propose an efficient secure verifiable outsourced polynomial multiplication protocol OPVML which is further exploited in designing our final protocol PVOPM for verifiable privacy-preserving outsourced pattern matching. Without exploiting public key FHE, the proposed PVOPM achieves both verifiability and text/pattern privacy against the collusion between the cloud and malicious receiver/sender, by generating authentication proofs of constant size and executing constant times of any one-way trapdoor permutation, independent to both the text size <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>n</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhou-ieq3-2947436.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> and the pattern size <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$m$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>m</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="zhou-ieq4-2947436.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Finally, formal security proof under universal composable (UC) model and extensive evaluations demonstrate the efficiency and practicability of our proposed PVOPM.

papers.title: A Distributed Flow Correlation Attack to Anonymizing Overlay Networks Based on Wavelet Multi-Resolution Analysis
papers.authors: Francesco Palmieri
papers.abstract: Government agencies rely more and more heavily on the availability of flexible and intelligent solutions for the interception and analysis of Internet-based telecommunications. Unfortunately, the global lawful interception market has been recently put into a corner by the emerging sophisticated encryption, obfuscation and anonymization technologies provided by modern overlay communication infrastructures. To face this challenge, this work proposes a novel strategy for defeating the anonymity of traffic flows, collected within and at the exit of these anonymizing networks, relying on distributed flow-capture, characterization and correlation attacks driven by wavelet-based multi-resolution analysis. Such a strategy, starting from a properly formalized attack model, results in an effective and promising framework that can be easily deployed on real-life network equipment and can potentially scale by working according to different distribution/parallelization scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 政府机构越来越依赖灵活、智能的解决方案来拦截和分析基于互联网的通信。不幸的是，全球合法监听市场最近被现代覆盖通信基础设施提供的新兴复杂加密、混淆和匿名技术逼入了困境。为了应对这一挑战，这项工作提出了一种新的策略，依靠基于小波的多分辨率分析驱动的分布式流捕获、表征和相关性攻击，来击败在这些匿名化网络内部和出口处收集的匿名流量。这种策略从适当形式化的攻击模型开始，产生有效且有前途的框架，该框架可以容易地部署在现实生活的网络设备上，并且可以通过根据不同的分布/并行化场景工作而潜在地扩展。
papers.title_zh: 基于小波多分辨率分析的分布式流相关攻击对匿名覆盖网络的攻击

papers.title: Low-High Burst: A Double Potency Varying-RTT Based Full-Buffer Shrew Attack Model
papers.authors: Meng Yue, Minxiao Wang, Zhijun Wu
papers.abstract: The full-buffer Shrew (FB-Shrew) denial of service (DoS) attack is a variant of the classic Shrew attack that exploits the congestion control mechanism of transmission control protocol (TCP). Here, an attacker sends a high-rate burst of attack packets only after the router buffer is filled with TCP packets, causing the router to drop legitimate packets, and forcing the retransmission of TCP packets. As such, an FB-Shrew attack can cause maximum damage with minimum resources. In this paper, we challenge an assumption of constant round trip time adopted in the original FB-Shrew model. As a result, this model fails to achieve its expected attack effect. In response, we analyze the TCP congestion window and queue behaviors to develop two low-high burst models for maximizing the potency of the FB-Shrew attack. Model 1 is designed to achieve the attack effect expected of the original model. Then, the attack potency of Model 1 is enhanced by simply adjusting the starting time of the attack burst to form Model 2. Mode 1 only exploits the retransmission timeout (RTO) mechanism. Model 2 takes advantage of both the RTO mechanism and the fast retransmission mechanism. In this way, Model 2 further slows down the growth of the congestion window and extends the attack period. A combination of theoretical analyses and simulations are adopted to first validate the proper functioning and effectiveness of the two models for a standard network configuration, and then we assess their attack performances with variations in different network parameters. Our performance assessment demonstrates that one attack unit of Model 2 damages almost twice the number of TCP units as one attack unit of Model 1, which represents an increase in attack potency of nearly 200 percent. The present study provides an expanded basis to explore FB-Shrew attack patterns that may be utilized by attackers. Moreover, the damage that could be inflicted by such attack and the extent to which defense strategies are capable of mitigating the attack's impact could be assessed more precisely by defenders.
papers.abstract_zh: 全缓冲Shrew (FB-Shrew)拒绝服务(DoS)攻击是利用传输控制协议(TCP)拥塞控制机制的经典Shrew攻击的变体。在这种情况下，攻击者只有在路由器缓冲区充满TCP数据包后才会发送高速率的攻击数据包，导致路由器丢弃合法数据包，并强制重新传输TCP数据包。因此，FB-Shrew攻击可以用最少的资源造成最大的伤害。在本文中，我们对最初的FB-Shrew模型中采用的往返时间不变的假设提出了质疑。导致这种模式达不到预期的攻击效果。作为响应，我们分析了TCP拥塞窗口和队列行为，以开发两个低-高突发模型来最大化FB-Shrew攻击的潜力。模型1旨在实现原始模型预期的攻击效果。然后，通过简单地调整攻击突发的开始时间来形成模型2，增强了模型1的攻击效能。模式1仅利用重传超时(RTO)机制。模型2利用了RTO机制和快速重传机制。这样，模型2进一步减缓了拥塞窗口的增长，延长了发作期。采用理论分析和仿真相结合的方法，首先验证了两种模型在标准网络配置下的正常功能和有效性，然后评估了它们在不同网络参数下的攻击性能。我们的性能评估表明，模型2的一个攻击单元对TCP单元的破坏几乎是模型1的一个攻击单元的两倍，这意味着攻击能力增加了近200%。本研究为探究攻击者可能利用的FB-Shrew攻击模式提供了扩展的基础。此外，防御者可以更准确地评估这种攻击可能造成的损害以及防御策略能够在多大程度上减轻攻击的影响。
papers.title_zh: 低高爆发：基于RTT的双重效力，基于RTT

papers.title: RS-HABE: Revocable-Storage and Hierarchical Attribute-Based Access Scheme for Secure Sharing of e-Health Records in Public Cloud
papers.authors: Jianghong Wei, Xiaofeng Chen, Xinyi Huang, Xuexian Hu, Willy Susilo
papers.abstract: Personal e-health records (EHR) enable medical workers (e.g., doctors and nurses) to conveniently and quickly access each patient’s medical history through the public cloud, which greatly facilitates patients’ visits and makes telemedicine possible. Additionally, since EHR involve patients’ personal privacy information, EHR holders would hesitate to directly outsource their data to cloud servers. A natural and favorite manner of conquering this issue is to encrypt these outsourced EHR such that only authorized medical workers can access them. Specifically, the ciphertext-policy attribute-based encryption (CP-ABE) supports fine-grained access over encrypted data and is considered to be a perfect solution of securely sharing EHR in the public cloud. In this paper, to strengthen the system security and meet the requirement of specific applications, we add functionalities of user revocation, secret key delegation and ciphertext update to the original ABE, and propose a revocable-storage hierarchical attribute-based encryption (RS-HABE) scheme, as the core building of establishing a framework for secure sharing of EHR in public cloud. The proposed RS-HABE scheme features of forward security (a revoked user can no longer access previously encrypted data) and backward security (a revoked user also cannot access subsequently encrypted data) simultaneously, and is proved to be selectively secure under a complexity assumption in bilinear groups, without random oracles. The theoretical analysis indicates that the proposed scheme surpasses existing similar works in terms of functionality and security, at the acceptable cost of computation overhead. Moreover, we implement the proposed scheme and present experiments to demonstrate its practicability.
papers.abstract_zh: 个人电子健康记录(EHR)使医疗工作者(如医生和护士)能够通过公共云方便快捷地访问每个患者的病历，极大地方便了患者的就诊，使远程医疗成为可能。此外，由于EHR涉及患者的个人隐私信息，EHR持有者会犹豫是否直接将他们的数据外包给云服务器。解决这个问题的一个自然且受欢迎的方法是加密这些外包的EHR，这样只有授权的医务人员才能访问它们。具体来说，密文策略基于属性的加密(CP-ABE)支持对加密数据的细粒度访问，被认为是公共云中安全共享EHR的完美解决方案。为了加强系统安全性和满足特定应用的需求，在原有的ABE基础上增加了用户撤销、密钥委托和密文更新功能，并提出了一种可撤销存储的分层基于属性加密(RS-HABE)方案，作为建立公有云中EHR安全共享框架的核心构建。所提出的RS-HABE方案同时具有前向安全性(被撤销的用户不能再访问先前加密的数据)和后向安全性(被撤销的用户也不能访问随后加密的数据)，并且在双线性群中的复杂性假设下被证明是选择性安全的，不需要随机预言。理论分析表明，该方案在功能性和安全性方面优于现有的同类方案，而计算开销却是可接受的。此外，我们实现了所提出的方案，并通过实验验证了其实用性。
papers.title_zh: RS-HABE：可撤销的存储和基于层次属性的访问方案，用于在公共云中安全共享电子保险记录

papers.title: Architectures for Detecting Interleaved Multi-Stage Network Attacks Using Hidden Markov Models
papers.authors: Tawfeeq A. Shawly, Ali A. Elghariani, Jason Kobes, Arif Ghafoor
papers.abstract: With the growing amount of cyber threats, the need for development of high-assurance cyber systems is becoming increasingly important. The objective of this article is to address the challenges of modeling and detecting sophisticated network attacks, such as multiple interleaved attacks. We present the interleaving concept and investigate how interleaving multiple attacks can deceive intrusion detection systems. Using one of the important statistical machine learning (ML) techniques, Hidden Markov Models (HMM), we develop two architectures that take into account the stealth nature of the interleaving attacks, and that can detect and track the progress of these attacks. These architectures deploy a database of HMM templates of known attacks and exhibit varying performance and complexity. For performance evaluation, in the presence of multiple multi-stage attack scenarios, various metrics are proposed which include (1) attack risk probability, (2) detection error rate, and (3) the number of correctly detected stages. Extensive simulation experiments are used to demonstrate the efficacy of the proposed architectures.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着网络威胁的不断增加，开发高可靠性网络系统的需求变得越来越重要。本文的目标是解决建模和检测复杂网络攻击的挑战，例如多重交错攻击。我们提出交错的概念，并研究如何交错多个攻击可以欺骗入侵检测系统。使用一种重要的统计机器学习(ML)技术，即隐马尔可夫模型(HMM)，我们开发了两种体系结构，这两种体系结构考虑了交错攻击的隐蔽性，并且可以检测和跟踪这些攻击的进展。这些体系结构部署了已知攻击的HMM模板数据库，并表现出不同的性能和复杂性。对于性能评估，在存在多个多阶段攻击场景的情况下，提出了各种度量，包括(1)攻击风险概率，(2)检测错误率，以及(3)正确检测到的阶段的数量。大量的模拟实验被用来证明所提出的架构的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 用于使用隐藏Markov模型检测交错的多阶段网络攻击的体系结构

papers.title: ObliComm: Towards Building an Efficient Oblivious Communication System
papers.authors: Pengfei Wu, Robert H. Deng, Qingni Shen, Ximeng Liu, Qi Li, Zhonghai Wu
papers.abstract: Anonymous Communication (AC) hides traffic patterns and protects message metadata from being leaked during message transmission. Many practical AC systems have been proposed aiming to reduce communication latency and support a large number of users. However, how to design AC systems which possess strong security property and at the same time achieve optimal performance (i.e., the lowest latency or highest horizontal scalability) has been a challenging problem. In this paper, we propose an ObliComm framework, which consists of six modular AC subroutines. We also present a strong security definition for AC, named oblivious communication, encompassing confidentiality, unobservability, and a new requirement sending-and-receiving operation hiding. The AC subroutines in ObliComm allow for modular construction of oblivious communication systems in different network topologies. All constructed systems satisfy oblivious communication definition and can be provably secure in the universal composability (UC) framework. Additionally, we model the relationship between the network topology and communication measurements by queuing theory, which enables the system’s efficiency can be optimized and estimated by quantitative analysis and calculation. Through theoretical analyses and empirical experiments, we demonstrate the efficiency of our scheme and soundness of the queuing model.
papers.abstract_zh: 匿名通信(AC)隐藏流量模式，保护消息元数据在消息传输过程中不被泄露。已经提出了许多实用的AC系统，旨在减少通信延迟并支持大量用户。然而，如何设计具有强安全性的AC系统并同时实现最佳性能(即最低的延迟或最高的水平可扩展性)一直是一个具有挑战性的问题。本文提出了一个ObliComm框架，它由六个模块化的AC子程序组成。我们也为AC提出了一个强安全定义，命名为不经意通信，包括机密性、不可观察性和一个新的要求发送和接收操作隐藏。ObliComm中的AC子例程允许在不同的网络拓扑结构中模块化构建不经意通信系统。所有构造的系统都满足不经意通信定义，并且在通用可组合性框架下是可证明安全的。此外，通过排队论对网络拓扑和通信测量之间的关系进行建模，使得系统的效率可以通过定量分析和计算来优化和估计。通过理论分析和实验，我们证明了该方案的有效性和排队模型的合理性。
papers.title_zh: Oblicomm：建立有效的遗忘沟通系统

papers.title: Cree: A Performant Tool for Safety Analysis of Administrative Temporal Role-Based Access Control (ATRBAC) Policies
papers.authors: Jonathan Shahen, Jianwei Niu, Mahesh Tripunitara
papers.abstract: Access control deals with the roles and privileges to which a user is authorized, and is an important aspect of the security of a system. As enterprise access control systems need to scale to several users, roles and privileges, it is common for access control models to support delegation: a trusted security administrator is able to give semi-trusted users the ability to change portions of the authorization state. With delegation comes the danger that semi-trusted users, perhaps in collusion, may effect a state that violates enterprise policy, which in turn results in the problem called safety analysis, which is regarded as a fundamental and technically challenging problem in access control. Safety analysis is used by a trusted security administrator to answer “what if” questions before she grants privileges to a semi-trusted user. Safety analysis has been studied for various access control schemes in the literature; we address safety analysis in the context of Administrative Temporal Role-Based Access Control (ATRBAC), an administrative model for TRBAC, which is an extension to the traditional RBAC. ATRBAC has new features, which introduce new technical challenges for safety analysis: (i) a time-dimension: two new components in each administrative rule that specify in which time periods an administrative action may be effected, and a user is authorized to a role, and, (ii) two new kinds of rules for whether a role is enabled for administrative action. We propose a software tool, which we call Cree, for safety analysis of ATRBAC policies. In Cree we reduce ATRBAC-Safety to model checking and use an off-the-shelf model checker, NuSMV. The foundation for Cree is the observation from our prior work that ATRBAC safety is PSPACE. Along with an efficient reduction to model checking, we include in Cree four techniques to further improve performance: Polynomial Time Solving when possible, Forward and Backwards Pruning, Abstraction Refinement, and Bound Estimation. These are inspired by prior work, but our algorithms are different in that they address the new challenges that ATRBAC introduces. We discuss our design of Cree, and the results of a thorough empirical assessment across our approach, and five other prior tools for ATRBAC safety. Our results suggest that there are input classes for which Cree outperforms existing tools, and for the remainder, Cree’s performance is no worse. We have made Cree available as open-source for public download.
papers.abstract_zh: 访问控制处理用户被授权的角色和特权，并且是系统安全性的一个重要方面。由于企业访问控制系统需要扩展到多个用户、角色和权限，因此访问控制模型通常支持委托:受信任的安全管理员能够给予不太受信任的用户更改部分授权状态的能力。随着委托而来的危险是，半信任用户，也许是串通的，可能实现违反企业策略的状态，这反过来导致称为安全分析的问题，这被认为是访问控制中的基本和技术上具有挑战性的问题。受信任的安全管理员使用安全分析来回答“假设”问题，然后将权限授予不完全受信任的用户。文献中已经研究了各种访问控制方案的安全性分析；我们在基于角色的管理时间访问控制(ATRBAC)的上下文中处理安全性分析，ATR BAC是TRBAC的管理模型，是传统RBAC的扩展。ATRBAC具有新的特性，这些特性为安全分析带来了新的技术挑战:(I)时间维度:每个管理规则中有两个新的组成部分，它们指定了在哪个时间段内可以实施管理行为，并且用户被授权担任某个角色，以及(ii)两种新的规则，用于确定是否为管理行为启用某个角色。我们提出了一个软件工具，我们称之为Cree，用于ATRBAC策略的安全性分析。在Cree中，我们将ATRBAC-Safety简化为模型检查，并使用现成的模型检查器NuSMV。Cree的基础是从我们以前的工作中观察到ATRBAC安全性是PSPACE。随着对模型检查的有效简化，我们在Cree中包含了四种技术来进一步提高性能:尽可能的多项式时间求解、向前和向后剪枝、抽象精化和边界估计。这些都是受先前工作的启发，但我们的算法是不同的，因为它们解决了ATRBAC引入的新挑战。我们讨论了我们的Cree设计，对我们的方法进行全面的实证评估的结果，以及ATRBAC安全性的其他五种现有工具。我们的结果表明，对于某些输入类，Cree的性能优于现有的工具，而对于其他输入类，Cree的性能并不差。我们已经将Cree作为开源软件提供给公众下载。
papers.title_zh: CREE：用于安全分析基于行政角色的访问控制（ATRBAC）政策的性能工具

papers.title: Secure and Utility-Aware Data Collection with Condensed Local Differential Privacy
papers.authors: Mehmet Emre Gursoy, Acar Tamersoy, Stacey Truex, Wenqi Wei, Ling Liu
papers.abstract: Local Differential Privacy (LDP) is popularly used in practice for privacy-preserving data collection. Although existing LDP protocols offer high utility for large user populations (100,000 or more users), they perform poorly in scenarios with small user populations (such as those in the cybersecurity domain) and lack perturbation mechanisms that are effective for both ordinal and non-ordinal item sequences while protecting sequence length and content simultaneously. In this paper, we address the small user population problem by introducing the concept of Condensed Local Differential Privacy (CLDP) as a specialization of LDP, and develop a suite of CLDP protocols that offer desirable statistical utility while preserving privacy. Our protocols support different types of client data, ranging from ordinal data types in finite metric spaces (numeric malware infection statistics), to non-ordinal items (OS versions, transaction categories), and to sequences of ordinal and non-ordinal items. Extensive experiments are conducted on multiple datasets, including datasets that are an order of magnitude smaller than those used in existing approaches, which show that proposed CLDP protocols yield high utility. Furthermore, case studies with Symantec datasets demonstrate that our protocols accurately support key cybersecurity-focused tasks of detecting ransomware outbreaks, identifying targeted and vulnerable OSs, and inspecting suspicious activities on infected machines.
papers.abstract_zh: 局部差分隐私(LDP)在实践中广泛用于隐私保护数据收集。尽管现有的LDP协议为大用户群(100，000或更多用户)提供了很高的实用性，但是它们在小用户群(例如网络安全领域中的用户群)的情况下表现不佳，并且缺乏对有序和非有序项目序列都有效同时保护序列长度和内容的扰动机制。在本文中，我们通过引入压缩本地差分隐私(CLDP)的概念来解决小用户群问题，并开发了一套CLDP协议，在保护隐私的同时提供了理想的统计效用。我们的协议支持不同类型的客户端数据，从有限度量空间中的有序数据类型(数字恶意软件感染统计)，到非有序项目(操作系统版本、事务类别)，以及有序和非有序项目序列。在多个数据集上进行了大量实验，包括比现有方法中使用的数据集小一个数量级的数据集，这表明所提出的CLDP协议产生了高效用。此外，对赛门铁克数据集的案例研究表明，我们的协议能够准确地支持以网络安全为中心的关键任务，如检测勒索病毒爆发、识别目标和易受攻击的操作系统，以及检查受感染机器上的可疑活动。
papers.title_zh: 使用凝结的当地差异隐私的安全和公用事业感知的数据收集

papers.title: Blockchain-Based Private Provable Data Possession
papers.authors: Huaqun Wang, Qihua Wang, Debiao He
papers.abstract: Remote data secure storage is of crucial importance in cloud computing. In order to check remote data integrity, an important paradigm PDP (i.e., provable data possession) is proposed. All the existing PDP schemes make use of RSA or bilinear pairings. One large file has to be divided into a great many of blocks. For example, 1T (Terabit) file has to be divided into <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$1.0737 \times 10^9$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>0737</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo><mml:msup><mml:mn>10</mml:mn><mml:mn>9</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq1-2949809.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> blocks (RSA where the length of the index is 1024 bits) or <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$6.8719 \times 10^9$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>6</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</mml:mo><mml:mn>8719</mml:mn><mml:mo>×</mml:mo><mml:msup><mml:mn>10</mml:mn><mml:mn>9</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq2-2949809.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> blocks (bilinear pairings where the order of the elliptic curve is 160 bits). The huge computation cost and communication cost incurs the inefficient PDP implementation. In other words, they are not practical. In order to solve the problem, we propose a new PDP model: blockchain-based private PDP. The new concept makes use of blockchain which is the core of cryptocurrency. For the new concept, the paper formalizes its system model and security model. Then, a concrete blockchain-based private PDP scheme is designed by making use of blockchain and RSA. The proposed blockchain-based private PDP scheme is provably secure. At the same time, we also analyze its performance from two parts: theory analysis and implementation prototype. Our analysis shows that the proposed PDP scheme is secure, efficient and practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 远程数据安全存储在云计算中至关重要。为了检查远程数据的完整性，提出了一种重要的范例PDP(即可证明的数据占有)。所有现有的PDP方案都使用RSA或双线性对。一个大文件必须分成许多块。例如，1T(太比特)文件必须分成< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " > $ 1.0737 \乘以10^9$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>.</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 0737 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >×</MML:mo > < MML:msup > < MML:Mn > 10 </MML:Mn > < MML:Mn > 9 </MML:Mn > </MML:Mn > </MML:msup > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ie Q1-2949809 . gif "/></MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 8719 </MML:Mn > < MML:mo >×</MML:mo > < MML:msup > < MML:Mn > 10 </MML:Mn > < MML:Mn > 9 </MML:Mn > </MML:msup > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Wang-ieq 2-2949809 . gif "/>巨大的计算成本和通信成本导致PDP实现效率低下。换句话说，它们不实用。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种新的PDP模型:基于区块链的私有PDP。这个新概念利用了区块链，它是加密货币的核心。对于这一新概念，本文给出了它的系统模型和安全模型。然后，利用区块链和RSA设计了一个具体的基于区块链的私有PDP方案。提出的基于区块链的私有PDP方案是可证明安全的。同时，我们还从理论分析和实现原型两个方面对其性能进行了分析。我们的分析表明，所提出的PDP方案是安全、高效和实用的。
papers.title_zh: 基于区块链的私人可证明数据拥有

papers.title: Understanding Illicit UI in iOS Apps Through Hidden UI Analysis
papers.authors: Yeonjoon Lee, Xueqiang Wang, Xiaojing Liao, XiaoFeng Wang
papers.abstract: In <italic>Chameleon</italic> apps, benign UIs are displayed during Apple App vetting while their hidden potentially-harmful illicit UIs (<italic>PHI-UI</italic>) are revealed once they reached App Store. In this article, we report the <italic>first</italic> systematic study on iOS <italic>Chameleon</italic> apps, which sheds light on a largely overlooked threat that the illicit activities are launched solely based on UI. Our research employed <sc>Chameleon</sc>-<sc>Hunter</sc>, a new static analysis approach that determines the suspiciousness of a <italic>PHI-UI</italic> leveraging the <italic>semantic features</italic> generated from iOS app UI and metadata. The approach is based on the observation that <italic>PHI-UI</italic> not only is structurally hidden but also has notable semantic inconsistency with the benign UI. Our evaluation shows that <sc>Chameleon</sc>-<sc>Hunter</sc> is highly effective, achieving 92.6 percent precision and 94.7 percent recall. From 28K Apple App Store apps, we found 142 new <italic>Chameleon</italic> apps, which were confirmed and promptly removed by Apple. Our work reveals that Chameleon apps can easily bypass the App store vetting and conduct a set of suspicious activities including collecting users’ private information, swindling money with fake monetary services, and leading the user to a pirated app store.
papers.abstract_zh: 在< italic >变色龙</italic >应用程序中，良性用户界面在苹果应用程序审查期间显示，而隐藏的潜在有害非法用户界面(< italic>PHI-UI</italic >)一旦到达App Store就会显示出来。在本文中，我们报告了对iOS <italic >变色龙</italic >应用的< italic >首次</italic >系统研究，该研究揭示了一个在很大程度上被忽视的威胁，即非法活动完全是基于用户界面发起的。我们的研究采用了< sc > Chameleon </sc >-< sc > Hunter </sc >，这是一种新的静态分析方法，利用从iOS应用程序UI和元数据生成的< italic >语义特征</italic >来确定< italic>PHI-UI</italic >的可疑性。这种方法基于这样的观察，即< italic>PHI-UI</italic >不仅在结构上是隐藏的，而且在语义上与良性UI明显不一致。我们的评估表明,< sc > Chameleon </sc >-< sc > Hunter </sc >非常有效，达到了92.6%的准确率和94.7%的召回率。从28K个苹果应用商店应用程序中，我们发现了142个新的< italic >变色龙</italic >应用程序，这些应用程序得到了苹果公司的确认并迅速下架。我们的工作揭示了变色龙应用程序可以轻松地绕过应用程序商店的审查，并进行一系列可疑的活动，包括收集用户的私人信息，用虚假的货币服务诈骗金钱，并将用户引向盗版应用程序商店。
papers.title_zh: 通过隐藏的UI分析了解iOS应用中的非法UI

papers.title: Far Proximity Identification in Wireless Systems
papers.authors: Tao Wang, Jian Weng, Jay Ligatti, Yao Liu
papers.abstract: As wireless mobile devices are more and more pervasive and adopted in critical applications, it is becoming increasingly important to measure the physical proximity of these devices in a secure way. Although various techniques have been developed to identify whether a device is close, the problem of identifying the far proximity (i.e., a target is at least a certain distance away) has been neglected by the research community. Meanwhile, verifying the far proximity is desirable and critical to enhance the security of emerging wireless applications. In this article, we propose a secure far proximity identification approach that determines whether or not a remote device is far away. The key idea of the proposed approach is to estimate the far proximity from the unforgeable “fingerprint” of the proximity. We have validated and evaluated the effectiveness of the proposed far proximity identification method through experiments on real measured channel data. The experiment results show that the proposed approach can detect the far proximity with a successful rate of 0.85 for the non-Line-of-sight (NLoS) scenario, and the successful rate can be further increased to 0.99 for the Line-of-sight (LoS) scenario.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着无线移动设备越来越普及并在关键应用中采用，以安全的方式测量这些设备的物理接近度变得越来越重要。尽管已经开发了各种技术来识别设备是否在近处，但是识别远处接近度(即，目标至少在一定距离之外)的问题已经被研究团体所忽视。同时，验证远接近度对于增强新兴无线应用的安全性是期望的和关键的。在本文中，我们提出了一种安全的近距离识别方法，可以确定远程设备是否在远处。所提出的方法的关键思想是从接近度的不可伪造的“指纹”来估计远接近度。通过在真实测量信道数据上的实验，我们验证并评估了所提出的远接近识别方法的有效性。实验结果表明，该方法在非视距(NLoS)场景下可以以0.85的成功率检测到远接近，在视距(LoS)场景下成功率可以进一步提高到0.99。
papers.title_zh: 无线系统中的近距离识别

papers.title: Multi-Client Cloud-Based Symmetric Searchable Encryption
papers.authors: Shabnam Kasra Kermanshahi, Joseph K. Liu, Ron Steinfeld, Surya Nepal, Shangqi Lai, Randolph Loh, Cong Zuo
papers.abstract: We propose a <italic>multi-client</italic> Symmetric Searchable Encryption (SSE) scheme based on the single-user protocol <xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref3">[3]</xref> . The scheme allows any user to generate a search query by interacting with any <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\theta -1$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>θ</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="kasrakermanshahi-ieq1-2950934.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\theta$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>θ</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="kasrakermanshahi-ieq2-2950934.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is a threshold parameter) ‘helping’ users. It preserves the privacy of a database content against the server assuming a leakage of up to <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\theta -1$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>θ</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="kasrakermanshahi-ieq3-2950934.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> users’ keys to the server while hiding the query from the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\theta -1$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mi>θ</mml:mi><mml:mo>-</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="kasrakermanshahi-ieq4-2950934.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> ‘helping users’. To achieve the query privacy, we design a new distributed key-homomorphic pseudorandom function (PRF) that hides the PRF input (search keyword) from the ‘helping’ users. We present a concrete construction of our randomizable distributed PRF. By distributing the utilized keys among the users, the need for a constant online presence of the data owner to provide services to the users is eliminated, while providing resilience against a user key exposure. We extended our scheme to support user revocation in two different scenarios. In addition, we give a solution for fast update of the encryption key with the overhead significantly smaller than the re-encryption and re-uploading the database. Moreover, our scheme is secure against passive and active collusion between the server and a subset of users.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个基于单用户协议的< italic >多客户端</italic >对称可搜索加密(SSE)方案。该方案允许任何用户通过与任何< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ theta-1 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi >θ</MML:mi >-</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " kas它针对服务器保护数据库内容的隐私，假设泄漏量高达< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ theta-1 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mi >θ</MML:mi >-</MML:mo > < MML:Mn > 1 </MML:Mn > </MML:mrow > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href为了实现查询隐私，我们设计了一种新的分布式密钥-同态伪随机函数(PRF ),它对“帮助”用户隐藏PRF输入(搜索关键字)。我们给出了我们的随机化分布PRF的具体构造。通过在用户之间分发所使用的密钥，消除了数据所有者持续在线向用户提供服务的需要，同时提供了针对用户密钥泄露的弹性。我们扩展了我们的方案，在两种不同的场景中支持用户撤销。此外，我们给出了一个快速更新加密密钥的解决方案，其开销明显小于重新加密和重新上传数据库。此外，我们的方案是安全的，可以防止服务器和用户子集之间的被动和主动共谋。
papers.title_zh: 基于多客户云的对称可搜索加密

papers.title: DeepChain: Auditable and Privacy-Preserving Deep Learning with Blockchain-Based Incentive
papers.authors: Jia-Si Weng, Jian Weng, Jilian Zhang, Ming Li, Yue Zhang, Weiqi Luo
papers.abstract: Deep learning can achieve higher accuracy than traditional machine learning algorithms in a variety of machine learning tasks. Recently, privacy-preserving deep learning has drawn tremendous attention from information security community, in which neither training data nor the training model is expected to be exposed. Federated learning is a popular learning mechanism, where multiple parties upload local gradients to a server and the server updates model parameters with the collected gradients. However, there are many security problems neglected in federated learning, for example, the participants may behave incorrectly in gradient collecting or parameter updating, and the server may be malicious as well. In this article, we present a distributed, secure, and fair deep learning framework named DeepChain to solve these problems. DeepChain provides a value-driven incentive mechanism based on Blockchain to force the participants to behave correctly. Meanwhile, DeepChain guarantees data privacy for each participant and provides auditability for the whole training process. We implement a prototype of DeepChain and conduct experiments on a real dataset for different settings, and the results show that our DeepChain is promising.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习可以在多种机器学习任务中实现比传统机器学习算法更高的准确率。近年来，保护隐私的深度学习引起了信息安全界的极大关注。联合学习是一种流行的学习机制，其中多方将本地梯度上传到服务器，服务器用收集的梯度更新模型参数。然而，在联邦学习中有许多被忽视的安全问题，例如，参与者可能在梯度收集或参数更新中表现不正确，服务器也可能是恶意的。本文提出了一个分布式、安全、公平的深度学习框架DeepChain来解决这些问题。DeepChain提供了一种基于区块链的价值驱动的激励机制，以迫使参与者行为正确。同时，DeepChain保证每个参与者的数据隐私，并为整个培训过程提供可审计性。我们实现了DeepChain的原型，并在真实数据集上针对不同的设置进行了实验，实验结果表明我们的DeepChain是有前途的。
papers.title_zh: 深链：基于区块链的激励措施可审核和保护隐私的深度学习

papers.title: Security-Aware Data Allocation in Multicloud Scenarios
papers.authors: Sabrina De Capitani di Vimercati, Sara Foresti, Giovanni Livraga, Vincenzo Piuri, Pierangela Samarati
papers.abstract: When moving large and heterogeneous data collections to the cloud, a key requirement concerns the selection of the most suitable (set of) cloud service(s) for outsourcing. Not only can different resources have different characteristics and requirements, but different cloud providers can also offer different services and security guarantees, and can have different costs. Selecting a single service for outsourcing an entire data collection can result in a non-optimal solution, as a single service satisfying, at reasonable costs, all the requirements specified by the data owner might not exist. Selecting a set of services could instead ensure the satisfaction of the requirements, possibly with economic advantages. In this article, we address this problem and present a flexible and expressive, yet simple model for supporting data owners in identifying a proper allocation of their resources to a set of cloud services. Our model allows data owners to specify in an easy and intuitive way protection requirements operating at the granularity level of single resource (or class thereof), and representing the minimum security guarantees that a cloud service must offer to store resources. Resources can be outsourced in plaintext or encrypted form, depending on their requirements and on what is the most convenient allocation. Data owners can then also specify global allocation requirements that apply to the overall allocation, to reduce the burden on their side and to avoid excessive fragmentation of the resource collection. We solve the problem of finding an allocation that satisfies both the protection and the global allocation requirements, while minimizing economic costs, by formulating it as a binary programming problem, thus allowing the use of existing techniques for its efficient solution.
papers.abstract_zh: 当将大型异构数据集迁移到云中时，一个关键需求是选择最适合外包的云服务。不仅不同的资源可能具有不同的特征和要求，而且不同的云提供商也可能提供不同的服务和安全保证，并且可能具有不同的成本。选择单一服务外包整个数据收集可能导致非最佳解决方案，因为单一服务以合理的成本满足数据所有者指定的所有要求可能并不存在。相反，选择一组服务可以确保满足需求，这可能具有经济优势。在本文中，我们解决了这个问题，并提出了一个灵活的、富有表现力的、简单的模型，用于支持数据所有者确定他们的资源到一组云服务的适当分配。我们的模型允许数据所有者以简单直观的方式指定保护要求，这些要求在单个资源(或其类别)的粒度级别上运行，并代表云服务必须为存储资源提供的最低安全保证。资源可以以明文或加密的形式外包，这取决于它们的需求和最方便的分配方式。然后，数据所有者还可以指定适用于整体分配的全局分配要求，以减轻他们的负担，并避免资源集合的过度分散。我们通过将其公式化为二进制规划问题来解决找到满足保护和全局分配要求同时最小化经济成本的分配的问题，从而允许使用现有技术来有效地解决该问题。
papers.title_zh: 在多云方案中的安全性数据分配

papers.title: Software Vulnerability Discovery via Learning Multi-Domain Knowledge Bases
papers.authors: Guanjun Lin, Jun Zhang, Wei Luo, Lei Pan, Olivier Y. de Vel, Paul Montague, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Machine learning (ML) has great potential in automated code vulnerability discovery. However, automated discovery application driven by off-the-shelf machine learning tools often performs poorly due to the shortage of high-quality training data. The scarceness of vulnerability data is almost always a problem for any developing software project during its early stages, which is referred to as the cold-start problem. This article proposes a framework that utilizes transferable knowledge from pre-existing data sources. In order to improve the detection performance, multiple vulnerability-relevant data sources were selected to form a broader base for learning transferable knowledge. The selected vulnerability-relevant data sources are cross-domain, including historical vulnerability data from different software projects and data from the Software Assurance Reference Database (SARD) consisting of synthetic vulnerability examples and proof-of-concept test cases. To extract the information applicable in vulnerability detection from the cross-domain data sets, we designed a deep-learning-based framework with Long-short Term Memory (LSTM) cells. Our framework combines the heterogeneous data sources to learn unified representations of the patterns of the vulnerable source codes. Empirical studies showed that the unified representations generated by the proposed deep learning networks are feasible and effective, and are transferable for real-world vulnerability detection. Our experiments demonstrated that by leveraging two heterogeneous data sources, the performance of our vulnerability detection outperformed the static vulnerability discovery tool Flawfinder. The findings of this article may stimulate further research in ML-based vulnerability detection using heterogeneous data sources.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习在自动化代码漏洞发现方面具有巨大的潜力。然而，由现成的机器学习工具驱动的自动发现应用往往由于缺乏高质量的训练数据而表现不佳。漏洞数据的缺乏几乎总是任何开发软件项目在其早期阶段的一个问题，这被称为冷启动问题。本文提出了一个框架，利用来自现有数据源的可转移知识。为了提高检测性能，选择了多个与漏洞相关的数据源，以形成一个更广泛的学习可转移知识的基础。所选的与漏洞相关的数据源是跨域的，包括来自不同软件项目的历史漏洞数据和来自软件保障参考数据库(SARD)的数据，后者由合成漏洞示例和概念验证测试案例组成。为了从跨域数据集中提取适用于漏洞检测的信息，我们设计了一个基于深度学习的长短期记忆(LSTM)单元框架。我们的框架结合了异构数据源来学习易受攻击源代码模式的统一表示。实证研究表明，由所提出的深度学习网络生成的统一表示是可行和有效的，并且可转移到现实世界的漏洞检测中。我们的实验表明，通过利用两个异构数据源，我们的漏洞检测性能优于静态漏洞发现工具Flawfinder。本文的发现可能会刺激使用异构数据源的基于ML的漏洞检测的进一步研究。
papers.title_zh: 通过学习多域知识库来发现软件脆弱性

papers.title: SegGuard: Segmentation-Based Anonymization of Network Data in Clouds for Privacy-Preserving Security Auditing
papers.authors: Momen Oqaily, Yosr Jarraya, Meisam Mohammady, Suryadipta Majumdar, Makan Pourzandi, Lingyu Wang, Mourad Debbabi
papers.abstract: Security auditing allows cloud tenants to verify the compliance of cloud infrastructure with respect to desirable security properties, e.g., whether a tenant’s virtual network is properly isolated from other tenants’ networks. However, the input to the auditing task, such as the detailed topology of the underlying cloud infrastructure, typically contains sensitive information which a cloud provider may be reluctant to hand over to a third party auditor. Additionally, auditing results intended for one tenant may inadvertently reveal private information about other tenants, e.g., another tenant’s VM is reachable due to a misconfiguration. How to anonymize both the input data and the auditing results in order to prevent such information leakage is a novel challenge that has received little attention. Directly applying most of the existing anonymization techniques to such a context would either lead to insufficient protection or render the data unsuitable for auditing. In this article, we propose SegGuard, a novel anonymization approach that prevents cross-tenant information leakage through per-tenant encryption, and prevents information leakage to auditors through hiding real input segments among fake ones; in addition, applying property-preserving encryption in an innovative way enables SegGuard to preserve the data utility for auditing while mitigating semantic attacks. We implement SegGuard based on OpenStack, and evaluate its effectiveness and overhead using both synthetic and real data. Our experimental results demonstrate that SegGuard can reduce the information leakage to a negligible level (e.g., less than 1 percent for an adversary with 50 percent pre-knowledge) with a practical response time (e.g., 62 seconds to anonymize a cloud infrastructure with 25,000 virtual machines).
papers.abstract_zh: 安全审计允许云租户验证云基础设施在期望的安全属性方面的合规性，例如，租户的虚拟网络是否与其他租户的网络适当隔离。然而，审计任务的输入，如底层云基础设施的详细拓扑，通常包含敏感信息，云提供商可能不愿意将这些信息交给第三方审计员。此外，针对一个租户的审计结果可能会无意中泄露其他租户的隐私信息，例如，由于配置错误，另一个租户的虚拟机是可访问的。如何匿名化输入数据和审计结果以防止这种信息泄漏是一个很少受到关注的新挑战。将大多数现有的匿名化技术直接应用于这种环境，要么会导致保护不足，要么会使数据不适合审计。在本文中，我们提出了SegGuard，这是一种新的匿名化方法，通过对每个租户加密来防止跨租户信息泄漏，并通过将真实输入段隐藏在虚假输入段中来防止信息泄漏给审计员；此外，以创新的方式应用属性保留加密使SegGuard能够保留用于审计的数据效用，同时减轻语义攻击。我们基于OpenStack实现了SegGuard，并使用模拟数据和真实数据评估了它的有效性和开销。我们的实验结果表明，SegGuard可以在实际响应时间(例如，匿名化具有25，000台虚拟机的云基础架构需要62秒)内，将信息泄漏降低到可以忽略的水平(例如，对于具有50%预先知识的对手来说，低于1%)。
papers.title_zh: Segguard：基于细分的云中基于细分的匿名云数据，以进行隐私安全审核

papers.title: General Confidentiality and Utility Metrics for Privacy-Preserving Data Publishing Based on the Permutation Model
papers.authors: Josep Domingo-Ferrer, Krishnamurty Muralidhar, Maria Bras-Amorós
papers.abstract: Anonymization for privacy-preserving data publishing, also known as statistical disclosure control (SDC), can be viewed under the lens of the permutation model. According to this model, any SDC method for individual data records is functionally equivalent to a permutation step plus a noise addition step, where the noise added is marginal, in the sense that it does not alter ranks. Here, we propose metrics to quantify the data confidentiality and utility achieved by SDC methods based on the permutation model. We distinguish two privacy notions: in our work, anonymity refers to subjects and hence mainly to protection against record re-identification, whereas confidentiality refers to the protection afforded to attribute values against attribute disclosure. Thus, our confidentiality metrics are useful even if using a privacy model ensuring an anonymity level <italic>ex ante</italic>. The utility metric is a general-purpose metric that can be conveniently traded off against the confidentiality metrics, because all of them are bounded between 0 and 1. As an application, we compare the utility-confidentiality trade-offs achieved by several anonymization approaches, including privacy models (<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="domingoferrer-ieq1-2968027.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-anonymity and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\epsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>ε</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="domingoferrer-ieq2-2968027.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-differential privacy) as well as SDC methods (additive noise, multiplicative noise and synthetic data) used without privacy models.
papers.abstract_zh: 保护隐私数据发布的匿名化，也称为统计披露控制(SDC)，可以从排列模型的角度来看。根据这一模型，任何用于单个数据记录的SDC方法在功能上相当于一个置换步骤加上一个噪声添加步骤，其中添加的噪声是边际的，在这种意义上，它不改变等级。在这里，我们提出了量化的数据保密性和效用的SDC方法的基础上置换模型。我们区分了两个隐私概念:在我们的工作中，匿名是指主题，因此主要是指防止记录被重新识别，而机密性是指防止属性值被披露。因此，即使使用隐私模型来确保匿名级别< italic >事前</italic >，我们的机密性指标也是有用的。效用度量是一个通用的度量，可以方便地与机密性度量进行权衡，因为它们都介于0和1之间。作为一个应用程序，我们比较了几种匿名化方法实现的效用-保密性权衡，包括隐私模型(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ k $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " domingoferrer-ie Q1-2968027 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-匿名和< inline
papers.title_zh: 基于排列模型的一般机密性和公用事业指标用于隐私数据发布

papers.title: On the Security of Privacy-Preserving Attribute-Based Keyword Search in Shared Multi-Owner Setting
papers.authors: Jianfei Sun, Hu Xiong, Xuyun Nie, Yinghui Zhang, Pengfei Wu
papers.abstract: Recently in the IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing (doi: 10.1109/TDSC.2019.28976752019), Miao et al. proposed a novel construction of Privacy-Preserving Attribute-Based Keyword Search in Shared Multi-owner Setting (ABKS-SM), which can delegate keyword search tasks to cloud server provider (CSP) without revealing any useful information. Although the authors claimed that the offline keyword guessing attacks can be resisted in ABKS-SM scheme, we show that this scheme indeed suffers from four types of offline keyword guessing attacks and hence fails to gain the claimed security property, which is an important goal to be achieved in searchable encryption schemes. Specifically, given the concrete attacks, we demonstrate that the underlying keyword information can be extracted from both encrypted keyword indexes and trapdoors by any malicious user and any adversarial CSP. We hope that the similar security vulnerabilities could be avoided in the future design of related searchable encryption schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，在IEEE Transactions on reliable and Secure Computing(doi:10.1109/tdsc . 2019.28976752019)中，苗等人提出了一种新的共享多所有者环境下基于属性的隐私保护关键词搜索结构(ABKS-SM)，该结构可以在不泄露任何有用信息的情况下将关键词搜索任务委托给云服务器提供商(CSP)。尽管作者声称ABKS-SM方案可以抵抗离线关键字猜测攻击，但我们证明该方案确实遭受了四种离线关键字猜测攻击，因此不能获得所声称的安全特性，而这是可搜索加密方案要达到的一个重要目标。具体来说，考虑到具体的攻击，我们证明了任何恶意用户和任何敌对的CSP都可以从加密的关键字索引和陷门中提取底层关键字信息。我们希望在未来相关可搜索加密方案的设计中能够避免类似的安全漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 关于在共享多主设置中基于隐私保护属性的关键字搜索的安全性

papers.title: Man-in-the-Middle Attacks Against Machine Learning Classifiers Via Malicious Generative Models
papers.authors: Derui Wang, Chaoran Li, Sheng Wen, Surya Nepal, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) are vulnerable to deliberately crafted adversarial examples. In the past few years, many efforts have been spent on exploring query-optimisation attacks to find adversarial examples of either black-box or white-box DNN models, as well as the defending countermeasures against those attacks. In this article, we explore vulnerabilities of DNN models under the umbrella of Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attacks, which have not been investigated before. From the perspective of an MitM adversary, the aforementioned adversarial example attacks are not viable anymore. First, such attacks must acquire the outputs from the models multiple times before actually launching attacks, which is difficult for the MitM adversary in practice. Second, such attacks are one-off and cannot be directly generalised onto new data examples, which decreases the rate of return for the attacker. In contrast, using generative models to craft adversarial examples on the fly can mitigate the drawbacks. However, the adversarial capability of the generative models, such as Variational Auto-Encoder (VAE), has not been extensively studied. Therefore, given a classifier, we investigate using a VAE decoder to either transform benign inputs to their adversarial counterparts or decode outputs from benign VAE encoders to be adversarial examples. The proposed method can endue more capability to MitM attackers. Based on our evaluation, the proposed attack can achieve above 95 percent success rates on both MNIST and CIFAR10 datasets, which is better or comparable with state-of-the-art query-optimisation attacks. In the meantime, the attack is <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$10^4$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:msup><mml:mn>10</mml:mn><mml:mn>4</mml:mn></mml:msup></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="wang-ieq1-3021008.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> times faster than the query-optimisation attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络(DNNs)容易受到故意制造的对立例子的攻击。在过去的几年中，许多努力已经花费在探索查询优化攻击上，以找到黑盒或白盒DNN模型的对抗例子，以及针对这些攻击的防御对策。在本文中，我们探讨了中间人(MitM)攻击下DNN模型的漏洞，这是以前没有研究过的。从MitM对手的角度来看，上述对抗性示例攻击不再可行。首先，在实际发起攻击之前，这种攻击必须多次从模型中获取输出，这在实践中对于MitM对手来说是困难的。其次，这种攻击是一次性的，不能直接推广到新的数据示例上，这降低了攻击者的回报率。相比之下，使用生成模型来动态构建对立的例子可以减轻这些缺点。然而，生成模型的对抗能力，如变分自动编码器(VAE)，还没有得到广泛的研究。因此，给定一个分类器，我们研究使用VAE解码器来将良性输入转换成它们的敌对对应物，或者将良性VAE编码器的输出解码成敌对的例子。该方法可以赋予MitM攻击者更多的能力。根据我们的评估，所提出的攻击在MNIST和CIFAR10数据集上都可以达到95%以上的成功率，这比最先进的查询优化攻击要好或相当。同时，这种攻击比查询优化攻击快< inline-formula > < tex-math xlink:href = " Wang-ie Q1-3021008 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >倍。
papers.title_zh: 通过恶意生成模型对机器学习分类器的中间人攻击

papers.title: DiLSe: Lattice-Based Secure and Dependable Data Dissemination Scheme for Social Internet of Vehicles
papers.authors: Amuleen Gulati, Gagangeet Singh Aujla, Rajat Chaudhary, Neeraj Kumar, Mohammad S. Obaidat, Abderrahim Benslimane
papers.abstract: With the evolution of the Internet of Vehicles (IoV), there has been an overwhelming increase in the number of connected vehicles in recent times. Due to this reason, massive amounts of data generated by connected vehicles makes traditional host-centric approach inevitable in IoV ecosystem. Moreover, the existing TCP/IP based congestion control mechanisms cannot be directly applied in IoV environment as there is a requirement of content sharing among vehicles with reduced delay and high throughput. So, in this article,11.This article is an extended version of paper entitled “Deep Learning-based Content Centric Data Dissemination Scheme for Internet of Vehicles“ published in IEEE ICC, 20-24 May 2018, Kansas City, USA DiLSe: A Lattice-based Secure and Dependable Data Dissemination Scheme for Social Internet of Vehicles is designed, which works in three modules. The first module, i.e., deep learning based content centric data dissemination scheme, works in three phases. 1) In the first phase, the connection probability of vehicles is computed to identify stable and reliable connections using Weiner process model. 2) In the second phase, a convolutional neural network based scheme is presented for estimating the social relationship score among vehicle-to-vehicle pair. 3) In the third phase, a content centric data dissemination scheme is presented. However, the mobility of vehicles in IoV ecosystem gives them the liberty to move in/out of the network without IP assignment. This makes it necessary to replicate the content at each node for providing fault tolerance. So, in the second module, a data replication scheme for fault tolerance in IoV network is designed, which is followed by an access control mechanism for read/right access for network content in third module. Finally, in the last module, a crucial lattice-based exchange and authentication scheme using blockchain is also designed for handling secure communication in IoV ecosystem. The proposed scheme is evaluated on a highway topology using extensive simulations. The results obtained prove the efficacy of the proposed scheme concerning various performance metrics.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着车联网(IoV)的发展，近年来联网车辆的数量大幅增加。由于这个原因，互联车辆产生的大量数据使得传统的以主机为中心的方法在IoV生态系统中不可避免。此外，现有的基于TCP/IP的拥塞控制机制不能直接应用于IoV环境，因为需要在车辆之间以减少的延迟和高吞吐量共享内容。所以，在这篇文章中，11。本文是2018年5月20-24日在美国堪萨斯城IEEE ICC上发表的题为《基于深度学习的车联网以内容为中心的数据传播方案》的论文的扩展版本DiLSe:设计了一种基于格的安全可靠的车联网社交数据传播方案，该方案工作在三个模块中。第一个模块，即基于深度学习的以内容为中心的数据传播方案，分三个阶段工作。1)在第一阶段，使用韦纳过程模型计算车辆的连接概率以识别稳定和可靠的连接。2)在第二阶段，提出了一种基于卷积神经网络的方案，用于估计车对车之间的社会关系得分。3)在第三阶段，提出了以内容为中心的数据传播方案。然而，IoV生态系统中车辆的移动性使它们可以自由进出网络，而无需分配IP。这使得有必要在每个节点复制内容以提供容错。因此，在第二模块中，设计了用于IoV网络中容错的数据复制方案，随后在第三模块中设计了用于网络内容的读/权限访问的访问控制机制。最后，在最后一个模块中，我们还设计了一个重要的基于格的交换和认证方案，使用区块链来处理IoV生态系统中的安全通信。使用大量仿真在高速公路拓扑上评估了所提出的方案。所获得的结果证明了所提出的方案在各种性能度量方面的有效性。
papers.title_zh: DILSE：基于晶格的安全和可靠的数据传播方案

papers.title: A Fine-Grained Approach for Anomaly Detection in File System Accesses With Enhanced Temporal User Profiles
papers.authors: Shagufta Mehnaz, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: Protecting sensitive data from theft, exfiltration, and other kinds of abuses by malicious insiders is a challenging problem. While access control mechanisms cannot always prevent the insiders from misusing sensitive data (since, in most of the cases, authorized users within organizations are granted access permissions), malicious outsiders also pose severe threats due to different security vulnerabilities in the systems, e.g., phishing attacks, memory corruptions, etc., which enable them to steal the credentials of the authorized users who have access to the data. To protect sensitive data from such attackers, anomaly detection techniques are often combined with other existing security measures, e.g., access control and encryption. An anomaly detection technique for identifying anomalies in file system accesses is based on the key idea that there should be significant differences between the file access behaviors of a benign user and an attacker. In this article, we propose an approach to create fine-grained profiles of the users’ regular file access activities while extensively analyzing the timestamp information of the file accesses. According to our observation, even if a user’s access to a file seems benign, only a fine-grained analysis of the access (such as the size of access, the timestamp of access) can determine the original intention of the user. We exploit the users’ file access information at the block level to model their regular file access behaviors (user profiles) which are then securely stored and used for identifying anomalous file system accesses in the detection phase. We are also able to automatically profile new files and new users added to the system dynamically. Finally, our performance evaluations demonstrate that our proposed approach has an accuracy of 98.7 percent in detecting anomalies while incurring an overhead of only 2 percent.
