papers.abstract_zh: 复杂通信网络(ccn)的激增及其对维护当今社会一致性的重要性迫切提高了保护网络基础设施免受恶意软件攻击的需求。在本文中，我们提出了一个基于马尔可夫随机场(MRF)的时空随机框架，用于模拟随机攻击下CCN的宏观行为，其中恶意威胁通过直接交互传播，并遵循易感-被感染-易感感染范式。我们利用MRF框架，以整体的方式分析研究了各种类型的ccn中的传播动力学，即格子图、随机图、无标度图、小世界图和多跳图。通过将Gibbs抽样与模拟退火相结合，我们针对所考虑的一般随机攻击，针对各种拓扑和恶意软件相关参数，研究了上述系统的行为。我们证明了MRF框架在捕捉SIS恶意软件传播的演变方面的有效性，并使用它来评估合成和真实ccn关于所涉及参数的鲁棒性。研究发现，随机网络更健壮，其次是无标度网络、规则网络和小世界网络，而多跳网络最脆弱。
papers.title_zh: Markov随机现场框架，用于建模复杂通信网络中的恶意软件传播

papers.title: A Scalable Approach to Joint Cyber Insurance and Security-as-a-Service Provisioning in Cloud Computing
papers.authors: Jonathan Chase, Dusit Niyato, Ping Wang, Sivadon Chaisiri, Ryan K. L. Ko
papers.abstract: As computing services are increasingly cloud-based, corporations are investing in cloud-based security measures. The Security-as-a-Service (SECaaS) paradigm allows customers to outsource security to the cloud, through the payment of a subscription fee. However, no security system is bulletproof, and even one successful attack can result in the loss of data and revenue worth millions of dollars. To guard against this eventuality, customers may also purchase cyber insurance to receive recompense in the case of loss. To achieve cost effectiveness, it is necessary to balance provisioning of security and insurance, even when future costs and risks are uncertain. To this end, we introduce a stochastic optimization model to optimally provision security and insurance services in the cloud. Since the model we design is a mixed integer problem, we also introduce a partial Lagrange multiplier algorithm that takes advantage of the total unimodularity property to find the solution in polynomial time. We also apply sensitivity analysis to find the exact tolerance of decision variables to parameter changes. We show the effectiveness of these techniques using numerical results based on real attack data to demonstrate a realistic testing environment, and find that security and insurance are interdependent.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着计算服务越来越基于云，企业正在投资基于云的安全措施。安全性即服务(SECaaS)模式允许客户通过支付订阅费将安全性外包给云。然而，没有安全系统是防弹的，即使一次成功的攻击也可能导致价值数百万美元的数据和收入损失。为了防止这种可能性，客户也可以购买网络保险，以便在损失的情况下获得赔偿。为了实现成本效益，即使未来的成本和风险不确定，也有必要平衡安全和保险的供应。为此，我们引入了一个随机优化模型来优化云中的安全和保险服务。由于我们设计的模型是一个混合整数问题，我们还引入了一个部分拉格朗日乘子算法，利用总幺模性质在多项式时间内找到解决方案。我们还应用灵敏度分析来找出决策变量对参数变化的精确容差。我们使用基于真实攻击数据的数值结果来展示这些技术的有效性，以展示真实的测试环境，并发现安全性和保险是相互依赖的。
papers.title_zh: 云计算中的联合网络保险和安全性提供的可扩展方法

papers.title: Anonymization of Sensitive Quasi-Identifiers for l-Diversity and t-Closeness
papers.authors: Yuichi Sei, Hiroshi Okumura, Takao Takenouchi, Akihiko Ohsuga
papers.abstract: A number of studies on privacy-preserving data mining have been proposed. Most of them assume that they can separate quasi-identifiers (QIDs) from sensitive attributes. For instance, they assume that address, job, and age are QIDs but are not sensitive attributes and that a disease name is a sensitive attribute but is not a QID. However, all of these attributes can have features that are both sensitive attributes and QIDs in practice. In this paper, we refer to these attributes as sensitive QIDs and we propose novel privacy models, namely, (l1, …, lq)-diversity and (t1, …, tq)-closeness, and a method that can treat sensitive QIDs. Our method is composed of two algorithms: An anonymization algorithm and a reconstruction algorithm. The anonymization algorithm, which is conducted by data holders, is simple but effective, whereas the reconstruction algorithm, which is conducted by data analyzers, can be conducted according to each data analyzer's objective. Our proposed method was experimentally evaluated using real data sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经提出了许多关于隐私保护数据挖掘的研究。他们中的大多数认为他们可以将准标识符(qid)从敏感属性中分离出来。例如，他们假设地址、工作和年龄是QID，但不是敏感属性，疾病名称是敏感属性，但不是QID。然而，在实践中，所有这些属性都可以具有既是敏感属性又是qid的特征。在本文中，我们将这些属性称为敏感qid，并提出了新的隐私模型，即(l1，…，LQ)-多样性和(t1，…，TQ)-紧密性，以及一种可以处理敏感qid的方法。我们的方法由两个算法组成:匿名化算法和重构算法。由数据持有者执行的匿名化算法简单而有效，而由数据分析器执行的重建算法可以根据每个数据分析器的目标来执行。我们提出的方法是实验评估使用真实数据集。
papers.title_zh: L-多样性和T-Closentes的敏感准标识符的匿名化

papers.title: De-SAG: On the De-Anonymization of Structure-Attribute Graph Data
papers.authors: Shouling Ji, Ting Wang, Jianhai Chen, Weiqing Li, Prateek Mittal, Raheem Beyah
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study the impacts of non-Personal Identifiable Information (non-PII) on the privacy of graph data with attribute information (e.g., social networks data with users’ profiles (attributes)), namely Structure-Attribute Graph (SAG) data, both theoretically and empirically. Our main contributions are two-fold: (i) we conduct the first attribute-based anonymity analysis for SAG data under both preliminary and general models. By careful quantification, we obtain the explicit correlation between the graph anonymity and the attribute information. We also validate our analysis through numerical and real world data-based evaluations and the results indicate that the non-PII can also lead to significant anonymity loss; and (ii) according to our theoretical analysis, we propose a new de-anonymization framework for SAG data, namely De-SAG, which takes into account both the graph structure and the attribute information to the best of our knowledge. By extensive experiments, we demonstrate that De-SAG can significantly improve the performance of state-of-the-art graph de-anonymization attacks. Our attribute-based anonymity analysis and de-anonymization framework are expected to provide data owners and researchers a more complete understanding on the privacy vulnerability of graph data, and thus shed light on future graph anonymization and de-anonymization research.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们从理论和实证两方面研究了非个人身份信息(非PII)对带有属性信息的图数据(例如，带有用户简档(属性)的社交网络数据)，即结构-属性图(SAG)数据的隐私的影响。我们的主要贡献有两个方面:(1)我们首次在初步和一般模型下对SAG数据进行了基于属性的匿名分析。通过细致的量化，我们得到了图的匿名性和属性信息之间的显式关联。我们还通过数值和真实世界的数据评估验证了我们的分析，结果表明，非PII也会导致显著的匿名损失；以及(ii)根据我们的理论分析，我们提出了一种新的SAG数据去匿名化框架，即De-SAG，它尽我们所知考虑了图结构和属性信息。通过大量的实验，我们证明了De-SAG可以显著提高当前图形去匿名化攻击的性能。我们的基于属性的匿名分析和去匿名化框架有望为数据所有者和研究人员提供对图数据隐私脆弱性的更完整理解，从而为未来的图匿名化和去匿名化研究提供启示。
papers.title_zh: DE-SAG：关于结构 - 属性图数据的匿名化数据

papers.title: Efficient Delegated Private Set Intersection on Outsourced Private Datasets
papers.authors: Aydin Abadi, Sotirios Terzis, Roberto Metere, Changyu Dong
papers.abstract: Private set intersection (PSI) is an essential cryptographic protocol that has many real world applications. As cloud computing power and popularity have been swiftly growing, it is now desirable to leverage the cloud to store private datasets and delegate PSI computation to it. Although a set of efficient PSI protocols have been designed, none support outsourcing of the datasets and the computation. In this paper, we propose two protocols for delegated PSI computation on outsourced private datasets. Our protocols have a unique combination of properties that make them particularly appealing for a cloud computing setting. Our first protocol, O-PSI, satisfies these properties by using additive homomorphic encryption and point-value polynomial representation of a set. Our second protocol, EO-PSI, is mainly based on a hash table and point-value polynomial representation and it does not require public key encryption; meanwhile, it retains all the desirable properties and is much more efficient than the first one. We also provide a formal security analysis of the two protocols in the semi-honest model and we analyze their performance utilizing prototype implementations we have developed. Our performance analysis shows that EO-PSI scales well and is also more efficient than similar state-of-the-art protocols for large set sizes.
papers.abstract_zh: 私有集合交集(PSI)是一种重要的加密协议，在现实世界中有许多应用。随着云计算能力和受欢迎程度的快速增长，现在需要利用云来存储私有数据集并将PSI计算委托给它。虽然已经设计了一组有效的PSI协议，但是没有一个支持数据集和计算的外包。在本文中，我们提出了两个在外包私有数据集上进行委托PSI计算的协议。我们的协议具有独特的属性组合，这使得它们对于云计算环境特别有吸引力。我们的第一个协议O-PSI通过使用加法同态加密和集合的点值多项式表示来满足这些性质。我们的第二个协议EO-PSI主要基于哈希表和点值多项式表示，它不需要公钥加密；同时，它保留了所有期望的特性，并且比第一种更有效。我们还在半诚实模型中对这两个协议进行了形式化的安全性分析，并利用我们开发的原型实现分析了它们的性能。我们的性能分析表明，EO-PSI具有良好的可扩展性，并且在大规模集合中比同类协议更加高效。
papers.title_zh: 在外包私人数据集上有效委派私人设置交集

papers.title: Efficient Multi-Factor Authenticated Key Exchange Scheme for Mobile Communications
papers.authors: Rui Zhang, Yuting Xiao, Shuzhou Sun, Hui Ma
papers.abstract: Authenticated key exchange (AKE) is one of the most important applications in applied cryptography, where a user interacts with a server to set up a session key where pre-registered information (aka. authentication factor), such as a password or biometrics, of the user is stored. While single-factor AKE is widely used in practice, higher security concerns call for multi-factor AKE (MFAKE) schemes, e.g., combining both passwords and biometrics simultaneously. However, in some casually designed schemes, security is even weakened in the sense that leakage of one authentication factor will defeat the whole MFAKE protocol. Furthermore, an inevitable by-product arise that the usability of the protocol often drop greatly. To summarize, the existing multi-factor protocols did not provide enough security and efficiency simultaneously. In this paper, we make one step ahead by proposing a very efficient MFAKE protocol. We define the security model and give the according security analysis. We also implement our protocol on a smartphone and a cloud server. The theoretic comparisons and the experimental results show that our scheme achieves both security and usability.
papers.abstract_zh: 认证密钥交换(AKE)是应用密码术中最重要的应用之一，其中用户与服务器交互以建立会话密钥，其中预先注册的信息(又名认证因素)，例如密码或生物特征。虽然单因子AKE在实践中被广泛使用，但是更高的安全性考虑要求多因子AKE (MFAKE)方案，例如同时结合密码和生物特征。然而，在一些随意设计的方案中，一个认证因子的泄漏将使整个MFAKE协议失效，在这个意义上，安全性甚至被削弱了。此外，一个不可避免的副产品出现了，即协议的可用性经常大大下降。总之，现有的多因素协议不能同时提供足够的安全性和效率。在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个非常有效的MFAKE协议。我们定义了安全模型并给出了相应的安全性分析。我们还在智能手机和云服务器上实现了我们的协议。理论比较和实验结果表明，该方案兼顾了安全性和可用性。
papers.title_zh: 移动通信的有效多因素身份验证的密钥交换计划

papers.title: RACOON++: A Semi-Automatic Framework for the Selfishness-Aware Design of Cooperative Systems
papers.authors: Guido Lena Cota, Sonia Ben Mokhtar, Gabriele Gianini, Ernesto Damiani, Julia Lawall, Gilles Muller, Lionel Brunie
papers.abstract: A challenge in designing cooperative distributed systems is to develop feasible and cost-effective mechanisms to foster cooperation among selfish nodes, i.e., nodes that strategically deviate from the intended specification to increase their individual utility. Finding a satisfactory solution to this challenge may be complicated by the intrinsic characteristics of each system, as well as by the particular objectives set by the system designer. Our previous work addressed this challenge by proposing RACOON, a general and semi-automatic framework for designing selfishness-resilient cooperative systems. RACOON relies on classical game theory and a custom built simulator to predict the impact of a fixed set of selfish behaviours on the designer's objectives. In this paper, we present RACOON++, which extends the previous framework with a declarative model for defining the utility function and the static behaviour of selfish nodes, along with a new model for reasoning on the dynamic interactions of nodes, based on evolutionary game theory. We illustrate the benefits of using RACOON++ by designing three cooperative systems: a peer-to-peer live streaming system, a load balancing protocol, and an anonymous communication system. Extensive experimental results using the state-of-the-art PeerSim simulator verify that the systems designed using RACOON++ achieve both selfishness-resilience and high performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 设计合作分布式系统的一个挑战是开发可行的和成本有效的机制来促进自私节点之间的合作，自私节点即策略上偏离预期规范以增加其个体效用的节点。由于每个系统的固有特性以及系统设计者设定的特定目标，找到解决这一挑战的满意方案可能会变得复杂。我们之前的工作通过提出RACOON解决了这一挑战，RACOON是一个通用的半自动框架，用于设计自私弹性合作系统。RACOON依靠经典博弈论和定制的模拟器来预测一组固定的自私行为对设计师目标的影响。在本文中，我们介绍了RACOON++，它扩展了以前的框架，使用声明性模型来定义效用函数和自私节点的静态行为，以及基于进化博弈论的新模型来推理节点的动态交互。我们通过设计三个协作系统来说明使用RACOON++的好处:一个对等直播系统、一个负载平衡协议和一个匿名通信系统。使用最先进的PeerSim模拟器的大量实验结果验证了使用RACOON++设计的系统实现了自私-弹性和高性能。
papers.title_zh: 浣熊++：合作系统的自私感知设计的半自动框架

papers.title: RAW-Tag: Replicating in Altered Cache Ways for Correcting Multiple-Bit Errors in Tag Array
papers.authors: Hamed Farbeh, Fereshte Mozafari, Masoume Zabihi, Seyed Ghassem Miremadi
papers.abstract: Tag array in on-chip caches is one of the most vulnerable components to radiation-induced soft errors. Protecting the tag array in some processors is limited to error detection using the parity check, since the overheads of error correcting codes are not affordable in this component. State-of-the-art tag protection schemes combine the parity check with replication to provide error correction capability. Classifying these replication-based schemes into partial-replication and full-replication, the former offers a low overhead protection in which a large fraction of detectable errors remain uncorrectable, whereas the latter imposes a significant overhead to correct all of the errors. This paper proposes a low overhead full-replication scheme, so called Replicating in Altered Ways of Tag (RAW-Tag), to correct all detectable errors. RAW-Tag manipulates the cache replacement algorithm and keeps track of the incoming/evicting cache lines to not only provide a replica for all tags, but also eliminate the simultaneous susceptibility of both a tag and its replica to a single Multiple-Bit Upset (MBU). The simulation results show that RAW-Tag imposes no performance overhead and increases the energy consumption of L1 and L2 caches by only 6.6 and 0.3 percent, respectively, as compared with the baseline.
papers.abstract_zh: 片上缓存中的标签阵列是最容易受到辐射引起的软错误影响的组件之一。在一些处理器中保护标签阵列限于使用奇偶校验的错误检测，因为纠错码的开销在这个组件中是负担不起的。最新的标签保护方案将奇偶校验与复制相结合，以提供纠错能力。将这些基于复制的方案分为部分复制和完全复制，前者提供了低开销保护，其中大部分可检测的错误保持不可纠正，而后者施加了大量开销来纠正所有错误。本文提出了一种低开销的全复制方案，即所谓的以改变的标记方式(RAW-Tag)进行复制，以纠正所有可检测的错误。RAW-Tag操纵高速缓存替换算法，并跟踪进入/退出的高速缓存行，不仅为所有标签提供副本，而且消除标签及其副本对单个多位翻转(MBU)的同时易感性。仿真结果表明，与基线相比，RAW-Tag没有增加性能开销，仅增加了L1和L2缓存的能耗，分别为6.6%和0.3%。
papers.title_zh: 原始标签：以更改的缓存方式复制以纠正标签数组中的多位错误

papers.title: Reducing Timing Side-Channel Information Leakage Using 3D Integration
papers.authors: Chongxi Bao, Ankur Srivastava
papers.abstract: Recently, following the work pioneered by Kocher [1] , using cache behavior as a timing side-channel to leak critical system information has received lots of attentions because of its easy-to-implement nature and amazingly good results. Recent attacks have been demonstrated to successfully leak the full key from many commonly used encryption algorithms including RSA, AES, etc. These attacks pose great threats to applications that depend on these encryption methods such as banking systems, military systems, etc. To mitigate the increasing threat, numerous countermeasures, mostly software patches, have been proposed. Hardware mitigations, however, have been less pursued. 3D integration, which stacks multiple dies vertically, offers shorter wire-length and improves system performance. It may be used to offset the performance overhead these countermeasures incur. In this paper, we investigate several possible ways in which the availability of 3D integration can be exploited to mitigate timing side-channel attacks while still obtaining superior performance over a baseline 2D system. Simulation results using Gem5 simulator show that our techniques can significantly reduce timing information leakage while still achieving 20.43 percent performance gain over a 2D baseline system.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，继Kocher [1]的工作之后，使用缓存行为作为泄漏关键系统信息的定时旁路，由于其易于实现的性质和令人惊讶的良好效果，受到了很多关注。最近的攻击已经被证明可以成功地从许多常用的加密算法(包括RSA、AES等)中泄漏完整的密钥。这些攻击对依赖这些加密方法的应用程序(如银行系统、军事系统等)构成了巨大威胁。为了减轻日益增长的威胁，已经提出了许多对策，主要是软件补丁。然而，硬件缓解措施很少被采用。垂直堆叠多个芯片的3D集成提供了更短的布线长度并提高了系统性能。它可以用来抵消这些对策带来的性能开销。在本文中，我们研究了几种可能的方法，其中可以利用3D集成的可用性来减轻定时边信道攻击，同时仍然获得优于基线2D系统的性能。使用Gem5模拟器的模拟结果表明，我们的技术可以显著减少定时信息泄漏，同时仍然可以实现比2D基线系统高20.43%的性能增益。
papers.title_zh: 使用3D集成减少定时侧通道信息泄漏

papers.title: Social Network De-Anonymization and Privacy Inference with Knowledge Graph Model
papers.authors: Jianwei Qian, Xiang-Yang Li, Chunhong Zhang, Linlin Chen, Taeho Jung, Junze Han
papers.abstract: Social network data is widely shared, transferred and published for research purposes and business interests, but it has raised much concern on users’ privacy. Even though users’ identity information is always removed, attackers can still de-anonymize users with the help of auxiliary information. To protect against de-anonymization attack, various privacy protection techniques for social networks have been proposed. However, most existing approaches assume specific and restrict network structure as background knowledge and ignore semantic level prior belief of attackers, which are not always realistic in practice and do not apply to arbitrary privacy scenarios. Moreover, the privacy inference attack in the presence of semantic background knowledge is barely investigated. To address these shortcomings, in this work, we introduce knowledge graphs to explicitly express arbitrary prior belief of the attacker for any individual user. The processes of de-anonymization and privacy inference are accordingly formulated based on knowledge graphs. Our experiment on data of real social networks shows that knowledge graphs can power de-anonymization and inference attacks, and thus increase the risk of privacy disclosure. This suggests the validity of knowledge graphs as a general effective model of attackers’ background knowledge for social network attack and privacy preservation.
papers.abstract_zh: 出于研究目的和商业利益，社交网络数据被广泛共享、传输和发布，但这引起了人们对用户隐私的关注。即使用户的身份信息总是被删除，攻击者仍然可以在辅助信息的帮助下对用户进行去匿名。为了防止去匿名攻击，已经提出了各种用于社交网络的隐私保护技术。然而，现有的大多数方法假设特定和受限的网络结构作为背景知识，忽略了攻击者的语义层先验信念，这在实践中并不总是现实的，并且不适用于任意的隐私场景。此外，语义背景知识下的隐私推理攻击很少被研究。为了解决这些缺点，在这项工作中，我们引入知识图来明确表达攻击者对任何个人用户的任意先验信念。去匿名化和隐私推理的过程基于知识图被相应地公式化。我们对真实社交网络数据的实验表明，知识图可以增强去匿名化和推理攻击，从而增加隐私泄露的风险。这表明知识图作为攻击者背景知识的通用有效模型对于社交网络攻击和隐私保护是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 社交网络去匿名化和与知识图模型的隐私推论

papers.title: Wormhole: The Hidden Virus Propagation Power of the Search Engine in Social Networks
papers.authors: Cai Fu, Xiao-Yang Liu, Jia Yang, Laurence T. Yang, Shui Yu, Tianqing Zhu
papers.abstract: Today search engines are tightly coupled with social networks, and present users with a double-edged sword: they are able to acquire information interesting to users but are also capable of spreading viruses introduced by hackers. It is challenging to characterize how a search engine spreads viruses, since the search engine serves as a virtual virus pool and creates propagation paths over the underlying network structure. In this paper, we quantitatively analyze virus propagation effects and the stability of the virus propagation process in the presence of a search engine. First, although social networks have a community structure that impedes virus propagation, we find that a search engine generates a propagation wormhole. Second, we propose an epidemic feedback model and quantitatively analyze propagation effects based on a model employing four metrics: infection density, the propagation wormhole effect, the epidemic threshold, and the basic reproduction number. Third, we verify our analyses on four real-world data sets and two simulated data sets. Moreover, we prove that the proposed model has the property of partial stability. Evaluation results show that, compared the cases without a search engine, virus propagation with the search engine has a higher infection density, shorter network diameter, greater propagation velocity, lower epidemic threshold, and larger basic reproduction number.
papers.abstract_zh: 今天，搜索引擎与社交网络紧密结合，给用户带来了一把双刃剑:它们能够获取用户感兴趣的信息，但也能够传播黑客引入的病毒。描述搜索引擎如何传播病毒是一项挑战，因为搜索引擎充当虚拟病毒库，并在底层网络结构上创建传播路径。本文定量分析了在搜索引擎存在的情况下，病毒的传播效果以及病毒传播过程的稳定性。首先，尽管社交网络具有阻止病毒传播的社区结构，但我们发现搜索引擎会产生传播虫洞。其次，我们提出了一个流行病反馈模型，并基于一个采用四个度量标准的模型定量分析了传播效应:感染密度、传播虫洞效应、流行病阈值和基本再生数。第三，我们在四个真实数据集和两个模拟数据集上验证了我们的分析。此外，我们证明了该模型具有部分稳定性。评估结果表明，与没有搜索引擎的情况相比，使用搜索引擎的病毒传播具有更高的感染密度、更短的网络直径、更大的传播速度、更低的传播阈值和更大的基本繁殖数。
papers.title_zh: 虫洞：社交网络中搜索引擎的隐藏病毒传播能力

papers.title: Yes, Machine Learning Can Be More Secure! A Case Study on Android Malware Detection
papers.authors: Ambra Demontis, Marco Melis, Battista Biggio, Davide Maiorca, Daniel Arp, Konrad Rieck, Igino Corona, Giorgio Giacinto, Fabio Roli
papers.abstract: To cope with the increasing variability and sophistication of modern attacks, machine learning has been widely adopted as a statistically-sound tool for malware detection. However, its security against well-crafted attacks has not only been recently questioned, but it has been shown that machine learning exhibits inherent vulnerabilities that can be exploited to evade detection at test time. In other words, machine learning itself can be the weakest link in a security system. In this paper, we rely upon a previously-proposed attack framework to categorize potential attack scenarios against learning-based malware detection tools, by modeling attackers with different skills and capabilities. We then define and implement a set of corresponding evasion attacks to thoroughly assess the security of Drebin, an Android malware detector. The main contribution of this work is the proposal of a simple and scalable secure-learning paradigm that mitigates the impact of evasion attacks, while only slightly worsening the detection rate in the absence of attack. We finally argue that our secure-learning approach can also be readily applied to other malware detection tasks.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了应对现代攻击日益增加的可变性和复杂性，机器学习已被广泛用作恶意软件检测的统计可靠工具。然而，它对精心制作的攻击的安全性不仅最近受到质疑，而且已经表明，机器学习表现出内在的漏洞，可以被利用来逃避测试时的检测。换句话说，机器学习本身可能是安全系统中最薄弱的环节。在本文中，我们依靠之前提出的攻击框架，通过对具有不同技能和能力的攻击者进行建模，对基于学习的恶意软件检测工具的潜在攻击场景进行分类。然后，我们定义并实现了一组相应的规避攻击，以彻底评估Android恶意软件检测器Drebin的安全性。这项工作的主要贡献是提出了一个简单和可扩展的安全学习范式，它减轻了逃避攻击的影响，同时在没有攻击的情况下仅略微恶化了检测率。我们最后认为，我们的安全学习方法也可以很容易地应用于其他恶意软件检测任务。
papers.title_zh: 是的，机器学习可以更安全！ 关于Android恶意软件检测的案例研究

papers.title: On the Security of a Variant of ElGamal Encryption Scheme
papers.authors: Fang-Yu Rao
papers.abstract: Recently, based on the Paillier cryptosystem [1] , Yi et al. outline a distributed ElGamal cryptosystem which allows for both a much simpler distributed key generation procedure and a more efficient distributed decryption of messages from a large plaintext domain [2] . In this paper, we analyze the security of their proposed variant of ElGamal encryption scheme and demonstrate that their proposed variant is not secure as claimed. Thus, whether an additively homomorphic cryptosytem satisfying the desired properties exists remains an open question.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，基于Paillier密码系统[1]，Yi等人概述了一种分布式ElGamal密码系统，该系统允许更简单的分布式密钥生成过程和更有效的来自大明文域的消息的分布式解密[2]。在本文中，我们分析了他们提出的ElGamal加密方案变体的安全性，并证明了他们提出的变体并不像声称的那样是安全的。因此，是否存在满足期望性质的加同态密码系统仍然是一个公开的问题。
papers.title_zh: 关于Elgamal加密方案变体的安全性

papers.title: Paradigm Shifts in Cryptographic Engineering
papers.authors: Raphael C.-W. Phan, Moti Yung
papers.abstract: The papers in this special section identify paradigm shifts in cryptographic engineering. Modern cryptography is almost five decades old, and we have seen some interesting breakthroughs throughout its relatively young history. These include the engineering foundations of symmetric key cryptography and block ciphers in particular (like the DES and the AES), the discovery of public-key cryptography, protocols for secure computations for general and specific tasks using interactions among parties and tools like homomorphic encryption (this line of work has been enhancing the use of cryptography beyond secure messaging into secure computing).
papers.abstract_zh: 这一特殊部分中的论文确定了密码工程中的范式转变。现代密码学已经有将近50年的历史了，在它相对年轻的历史中，我们已经看到了一些有趣的突破。其中包括对称密钥密码术的工程基础，特别是分组密码(如DES和AES)，公开密钥密码术的发现，使用各方之间的交互和同态加密等工具进行一般和特定任务的安全计算的协议(这一系列工作已经将密码术的使用从安全消息传递扩展到安全计算)。
papers.title_zh: 加密工程的范式变化

papers.title: Another Look at Anonymous Communication
papers.authors: Russell W. F. Lai, Kam-Fung Cheung, Sherman S. M. Chow, Anthony Man-Cho So
papers.abstract: Anonymous communication is desirable for personal, financial, and political reasons. Despite the abundance of frameworks and constructions, anonymity definitions are usually either not well defined or too complicated to use. In between are ad-hoc definitions for specific protocols which sometimes only provide weakened anonymity guarantees. This paper addresses this situation from the perspectives of syntax, security definition, and construction. We propose simple yet expressive syntax and security definition for anonymous communication. Our syntax covers protocols with different operational characteristics. We give a hierarchy of anonymity definitions, starting from the strongest possible to several relaxations. We also propose a modular construction from any key-private public-key encryption scheme, and a new primitive—oblivious forwarding protocols, of which we give two constructions. The first is a generic construction from any random walk over graphs, while the second is optimized for the probability of successful delivery, with experimental validation for our optimization. Anonymity is guaranteed even when the adversary can observe and control all traffic in the network and corrupt most nodes, in contrast to some efficient yet not-so-anonymous protocols. We hope this work suggests an easier way to design and analyze efficient anonymous communication protocols in the future.
papers.abstract_zh: 出于个人、经济和政治原因，匿名通信是可取的。尽管有大量的框架和结构，匿名的定义通常要么没有很好的定义，要么太复杂而无法使用。介于两者之间的是特定协议的特定定义，这些定义有时只能提供弱化的匿名保证。本文从语法、安全性定义和构造的角度来解决这种情况。我们为匿名通信提出了简单而富有表现力的语法和安全定义。我们的语法涵盖了具有不同操作特性的协议。我们给出了一个匿名定义的层次结构，从最强的开始到几个最弱的。我们还提出了一个基于任意密钥-私有公钥加密方案的模块化构造，以及一个新的原语——不经意转发协议，我们给出了其中的两个构造。第一个是从任何随机遍历图的一般构造，而第二个是针对成功交付的概率优化的，并对我们的优化进行了实验验证。与一些有效但不那么匿名的协议相比，即使对手可以观察和控制网络中的所有流量并破坏大多数节点，匿名性也是有保证的。我们希望这项工作为将来设计和分析有效的匿名通信协议提供了一种更简单的方法。
papers.title_zh: 另一个看匿名交流

papers.title: Private Compound Wildcard Queries Using Fully Homomorphic Encryption
papers.authors: Myungsun Kim, Hyung Tae Lee, San Ling, Benjamin Hong Meng Tan, Huaxiong Wang
papers.abstract: Fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) brings a paradigm shift in cryptographic engineering by enabling us to resolve various unsolved problems. Among them, this work solves the problem to design a private database query (PDQ) protocol that supports compound queries with wildcard conditions on encrypted databases using FHE. More precisely, we consider a setting where clients outsource an encrypted database using FHE to a remote server, and later request results of compound queries including a wildcard search condition–given a set of attribute values $\lbrace A_1, A_2, \ldots, A_{n}\rbrace${A1,A2,...,An} and a search pattern $W$W, retrieve a set of all attribute values $A_i$Ai's in which the pattern $W$W occurs. To this end, we first develop an algorithm for testing whether an encrypted string contains an encrypted pattern without revealing any information of the pattern, taking auxiliary encryptions as additional inputs. Then, using this algorithm, we design PDQ protocols on encrypted databases, which support compound queries using wildcard search conditions. Finally, we demonstrate proof-of-concept implementation results of our protocols by exploiting single-instruction-multiple-data operations and multi-threading techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 全同态加密(FHE)通过使我们能够解决各种未解决的问题，带来了密码工程的范式转变。其中，该工作解决了设计私有数据库查询(PDQ)协议的问题，该协议使用FHE支持加密数据库上带通配符条件的复合查询。更准确地说，我们考虑一种设置，其中客户端将使用FHE的加密数据库外包给远程服务器，然后请求包含通配符搜索条件的复合查询的结果-给定一组属性值＄\ lbrace A _ 1，A_2，\ldots，A _ { n } \ rbrace ＄{ A1，A2，...，An}和搜索模式$W$W，检索出现模式$W$W的所有属性值$A_i$Ai的集合。为此，我们首先开发了一种算法，用于测试加密字符串是否包含加密模式，而不暴露模式的任何信息，将辅助加密作为附加输入。然后，使用该算法，我们在加密数据库上设计了PDQ协议，该协议支持使用通配符搜索条件的复合查询。最后，我们通过利用单指令多数据操作和多线程技术展示了我们的协议的概念验证实现结果。
papers.title_zh: 使用完全同态加密的私人复合通配符查询

papers.title: Generation of Secure and Reliable Honeywords, Preventing False Detection
papers.authors: Akshima, Donghoon Chang, Aarushi Goel, Sweta Mishra, Somitra Kumar Sanadhya
papers.abstract: Breach in password databases has been a frequent phenomena in the software industry. Often these breaches go undetected for years. Sometimes, even the companies involved are not aware of the breach. Even after they are detected, publicizing such attacks might not always be in the best interest of the companies. This calls for a strong breach detection mechanism. Juels et al. (in ACM-CCS 2013) suggest a method called ‘Honeywords’, for detecting password database breaches. Their idea is to generate multiple fake passwords, called honeywords and store them along with the real password. Any login attempt with honeywords is identified as a compromise of the password database, since legitimate users are not expected to know the honeywords corresponding to their passwords. The key components of their idea are (i) generation of honeywords, (ii) typo-safety measures for preventing false alarms, (iii) alarm policy upon detection, and (iv) testing robustness of the system against various attacks. In this work, we analyze the limitations of existing honeyword generation techniques. We propose a new attack model called ‘Multiple System Intersection attack considering Input’. We show that the ‘Paired Distance Protocol’ proposed by Chakraborty et al., is not secure in this attack model. We also propose new and more practical honeyword generation techniques and call them the ‘evolving-password model’, the ‘user-profile model’, and the ‘append-secret model’. These techniques achieve ‘approximate flatness’, implying that the honeywords generated using these techniques are indistinguishable from passwords with high probability. Our proposed techniques overcome most of the risks and limitations associated with existing techniques. We prove flatness of our ‘evolving-password model’ technique through experimental analysis. We provide a comparison of our proposed models with the existing ones under various attack models to justify our claims.
papers.abstract_zh: 在软件行业中，密码数据库被攻破是一种常见的现象。这些违规行为通常会持续数年未被发现。有时，甚至涉及的公司都没有意识到违规。即使在检测到这些攻击后，公开这些攻击也不一定符合公司的最大利益。这需要强大的违规检测机制。Juels等人(在ACM-CCS，2013年)提出了一种称为“蜜语”的方法，用于检测密码数据库泄露。他们的想法是生成多个假密码，称为蜜语，并将它们与真实密码一起存储。任何使用蜜语的登录尝试都被认为是对密码数据库的破坏，因为合法用户不会知道与其密码相对应的蜜语。他们的想法的关键组成部分是(I)生成甜言蜜语，(ii)防止错误警报的打字安全措施，(iii)检测时的警报策略，以及(iv)测试系统对各种攻击的鲁棒性。在这项工作中，我们分析了现有的蜜语生成技术的局限性。我们提出了一种新的攻击模型，称为“考虑输入的多系统交叉攻击”。我们证明了Chakraborty等人提出的“配对距离协议”在这种攻击模型中是不安全的。我们还提出了新的和更实用的蜜语生成技术，并把它们称为“进化密码模型”、“用户简档模型”和“附加秘密模型”。这些技术实现了“近似平坦度”，这意味着使用这些技术生成的蜜语很有可能与密码无法区分。我们提出的技术克服了与现有技术相关的大多数风险和限制。我们通过实验分析证明了我们的“进化密码模型”技术的平坦性。我们提供了我们提出的模型与现有模型在各种攻击模型下的比较，以证明我们的主张。
papers.title_zh: 生成安全可靠的蜂蜜字，防止虚假检测

papers.title: Building and Studying a Password Store that Perfectly Hides Passwords from Itself
papers.authors: Maliheh Shirvanian, Nitesh Saxena, Stanislaw Jarecki, Hugo Krawczyk
papers.abstract: We introduce a novel approach to password management, called SPHINX, which remains secure even when the password manager itself has been compromised. In SPHINX, the information stored on the device is theoretically independent of the user's master password. Moreover, an attacker with full control of the device, even at the time the user interacts with it, learns nothing about the master password – the password is not entered into the device in plaintext form or in any other way that may leak information on it. Unlike existing managers, SPHINX produces strictly high-entropy passwords and makes it compulsory for the users to register these passwords with the web services, which defeats online guessing attacks and offline dictionary attack upon service compromise. We present the design, implementation and performance evaluation of SPHINX, offering prototype browser plugins, smartphone apps and transparent device-client communication. We further provide a comparative analytical evaluation of SPHINX with other password managers based on a formal framework consisting of security, usability, and deployability metrics.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们引入了一种新的密码管理方法，称为SPHINX，即使密码管理器本身被破坏，它仍然是安全的。在SPHINX中，存储在设备上的信息理论上独立于用户的主密码。此外，即使在用户与设备交互时，完全控制设备的攻击者也不会了解主密码——密码不会以明文形式或任何其他可能泄露设备信息的方式输入设备。与现有的管理器不同，SPHINX产生严格的高熵密码，并强制用户向web服务注册这些密码，这可以击败在线猜测攻击和离线字典攻击。我们展示了SPHINX的设计、实现和性能评估，提供了原型浏览器插件、智能手机应用和透明的设备-客户端通信。我们进一步提供了SPHINX与其他密码管理器的比较分析评估，该评估基于一个由安全性、可用性和可部署性指标组成的正式框架。
papers.title_zh: 构建和研究密码商店，该密码商店完全隐藏了密码

papers.title: Robust Fuzzy Extractors and Helper Data Manipulation Attacks Revisited: Theory versus Practice
papers.authors: Georg T. Becker
papers.abstract: Fuzzy extractors have been proposed in 2004 by Dodis et al. as a secure way to generate cryptographic keys from noisy sources. In recent years, fuzzy extractors have become an important building block in hardware security due to their use in secure key generation based on Physical Unclonable Functions (PUFs). Fuzzy extractors are provably secure against passive attackers. A year later Boyen et al. introduced robust fuzzy extractors which are also provably secure against active attackers, i.e., attackers that can manipulate the helper data. In this paper we show that the original provable secure robust fuzzy extractor construction by Boyen et al. actually does not fulfill the error-correction requirements for practical PUF applications. The fuzzy extractors proposed for PUF-based key generation on the other hand that fulfill the error-correction requirements cannot be extended to such robust fuzzy extractors, due to a strict bound $t$t on the number of correctable errors. While it is therefore tempting to simply ignore this strict bound, we present novel helper data manipulation attacks on fuzzy extractors that also work if a “robust fuzzy extractor-like” construction without this strict bound is used. Hence, this paper can be seen as a call for action to revisit this seemingly solved problem of building robust fuzzy extractors. The new focus should be on building more efficient solutions in terms of error-correction capability, even if this might come at the costs of a proof in a weaker security model.
papers.abstract_zh: 模糊提取器由Dodis等人在2004年提出，作为从噪声源生成密钥的安全方式。近年来，由于模糊提取器在基于物理不可克隆函数(puf)的安全密钥生成中的应用，模糊提取器已经成为硬件安全中的重要构件。模糊提取器可证明是安全的，可以抵抗被动攻击者。一年后，Boyen等人推出了健壮的模糊提取器，该提取器也可被证明是安全的，可以抵御主动攻击者，即可以操纵辅助数据的攻击者。在本文中，我们表明，Boyen等人最初的可证明安全的鲁棒模糊提取器构造实际上不满足实际PUF应用的纠错要求。另一方面，为基于PUF的密钥生成提出的满足纠错要求的模糊提取器不能扩展到这种鲁棒的模糊提取器，因为对可纠正错误的数量有严格的限制。虽然简单地忽略这个严格的界限是诱人的，但我们提出了对模糊提取器的新的辅助数据操作攻击，如果使用没有这个严格界限的“健壮的模糊提取器类”结构，这些攻击也是有效的。因此，这篇论文可以被看作是一个呼吁行动，以重新审视这个似乎已经解决的问题，建立稳健的模糊提取器。新的重点应该是在纠错能力方面构建更有效的解决方案，即使这可能以在更弱的安全模型中证明为代价。
papers.title_zh: 重新审视了强大的模糊提取器和辅助数据操纵攻击：理论与实践

papers.title: It is All in the System's Parameters: Privacy and Security Issues in Transforming Biometric Raw Data into Binary Strings
papers.authors: Margarita Osadchy, Orr Dunkelman
papers.abstract: Biometrics traits such as faces, fingerprints, and irises, are becoming prevalent in computer security applications: from authentication systems to identification systems. Given the sensitive nature of biometrics, a great deal of effort is put into protecting the biometric data after it is acquired — from secure sketch and fuzzy extractors to the use of secure multiparty computations (in protocols such as SCiFI or GSHADE). While these solutions make sure that the extracted values (e.g., binary strings or vectors) that correspond to the biometrics are kept privately and securely, their practical implementations are not optimal with respect to privacy guarantees in the process of extracting the information from the raw biometric data. This paper analyses current solutions for protected systems and discusses the existing and potential problems in the security and privacy of their feature extraction and the binarization processes. As an illustrative example, we show a PoC of an attack on a feature extraction solution from facial images, used in several protected systems, and show that it reveals information which is very close to the training image of the user. As we argue in this paper, other solutions provide privacy for the system's users but make use of external set of biometric data which is often quite large, thus facing privacy and ownership issues associated with the external set of people. The take home message of this paper is: Many of the existing “privacy preserving” solutions neglect the privacy and security aspects of the feature extraction and binarization processes. Hence, we urge future research to close this gap in the security and privacy of biometric systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 人脸、指纹和虹膜等生物特征在计算机安全应用中变得越来越普遍:从认证系统到身份识别系统。鉴于生物识别的敏感性，在获取生物识别数据后，人们投入了大量精力来保护这些数据——从安全草图和模糊提取器到安全多方计算的使用(在SCiFI或GSHADE等协议中)。虽然这些解决方案确保了对应于生物测定的提取值(例如，二进制串或向量)被保密和安全地保存，但是它们的实际实现在从原始生物测定数据中提取信息的过程中就隐私保证而言并不是最佳的。本文分析了当前受保护系统的解决方案，并讨论了在特征提取和二值化过程中存在的和潜在的安全和隐私问题。作为一个说明性的例子，我们展示了在几个受保护的系统中使用的对来自面部图像的特征提取解决方案的攻击的PoC，并且展示了它揭示了非常接近用户的训练图像的信息。正如我们在本文中所讨论的，其他解决方案为系统用户提供了隐私保护，但使用了通常相当大的外部生物特征数据集，因此面临与外部人员集相关的隐私和所有权问题。这篇论文的主旨是:许多现有的“隐私保护”解决方案忽略了特征提取和二值化过程的隐私和安全方面。因此，我们敦促未来的研究，以填补这一差距的安全和隐私的生物识别系统。
papers.title_zh: 这全都在系统的参数中：将生物识别原始数据转换为二进制字符串的隐私和安全问题

papers.title: Strong Stationary Times and its use in Cryptography
papers.authors: Pawel Lorek, Filip Zagórski, Michal Kulis
papers.abstract: This paper presents applicability of Strong Stationary Times (SST) techniques in the area of cryptography. The applicability is in three areas: (1) Propositions of a new class of cryptographic algorithms (pseudo-random permutation generators) which do not run for the predefined number of steps. Instead, these algorithms stop according to a stopping rule defined as SST, for which one can obtain provable properties: a) results are perfect samples from uniform distribution, b) immunity to timing attacks (no information about the resulting permutation leaks through the information about the number of steps SST algorithm performed). (2) We show how one can leverage properties of SST-based algorithms to construct an implementation (of a symmetric encryption scheme) which is immune to the timing-attack by reusing implementations which are not secure against timing-attacks. In symmetric key cryptography researchers mainly focus on constant time (re)implementations. Our approach goes in a different direction and explores ideas of input masking. (3) Analysis of idealized (mathematical) models of existing cryptographic schemes—i.e., we improve a result by Mironov [21] .
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了强平稳时间(SST)技术在密码学领域的应用。适用性在三个方面:(1)一类新的密码算法(伪随机置换发生器)的主张，该算法不运行预定数量的步骤。相反，这些算法根据被定义为SST的停止规则来停止，对于SST，可以获得可证明的性质:a)结果是来自均匀分布的完美样本，b)对定时攻击的免疫性(没有关于所得排列的信息通过关于SST算法执行的步骤数的信息泄漏)。(2)我们展示了如何利用基于SST的算法的属性来构造(对称加密方案的)实现，通过重用对定时攻击不安全的实现，该实现不受定时攻击的影响。在对称密钥加密中，研究人员主要关注常数时间(re)实现。我们的方法走在一个不同的方向，探索输入屏蔽的想法。(3)对现有密码方案的理想化(数学)模型的分析——即我们改进了Mironov [21]的一个结果。
papers.title_zh: 强大的固定时间及其在密码学中的使用

papers.title: A Privacy Mechanism for Access Controlled Graph Data
papers.authors: Muhammad Umer Arshad, Muhamad Felemban, Zahid Pervaiz, Arif Ghafoor, Walid G. Aref
papers.abstract: There has been significant interest in the development of anonymization schemes for publishing graph data. However, privacy is a major concern in dealing with graph data. In this paper, an integrated framework for ensuring privacy in the presence of an authorization mechanism is proposed. Access control mechanisms provide additional safeguard against data breaches and ensure that only authorized information is available to end-users based on their assigned roles. The integrated framework highlights a tradeoff between privacy and authorized privileges. To attain a pre-specified privacy level, access privileges might need to be relaxed. For the proposed framework, we formulate the $k$k-anonymous Bi-objective Graph Partitioning ($k$k-BGP) problem and provide its hardness results. Heuristics solutions are developed to solve the constraint problem. The framework provides an anonymous view based on the target class of role-based workloads for graph data. The proposed heuristics are empirically evaluated and a detailed security analysis of the framework in terms of risk associated with re-identification attack is conducted.
papers.abstract_zh: 人们对开发用于发布图形数据的匿名化方案非常感兴趣。然而，隐私是处理图形数据的一个主要问题。本文提出了一个在授权机制下保证隐私的集成框架。访问控制机制为防止数据泄露提供了额外的保护，并确保最终用户只能根据其分配的角色访问授权信息。集成框架强调了隐私和授权特权之间的权衡。为了达到预先指定的隐私级别，可能需要放宽访问权限。对于提出的框架，我们提出了$ k $ k-匿名双目标图划分($k$k-BGP)问题，并给出了它的困难结果。开发启发式解决方案来解决约束问题。该框架为图形数据提供了基于基于角色的工作负载目标类的匿名视图。对所提出的启发式算法进行了经验评估，并根据与重新识别攻击相关联的风险对该框架进行了详细的安全性分析。
papers.title_zh: 访问控制图数据的隐私机制

papers.title: AP-PRE: Autonomous Path Proxy Re-Encryption and Its Applications
papers.authors: Zhenfu Cao, Hongbing Wang, Yunlei Zhao
papers.abstract: In this paper, we introduce a new cryptographic primitive, called autonomous path proxy re-encryption (AP-PRE), which is motivated by several application scenarios where the delegator would like to control the whole delegation path in a multi-hop delegation process. Compared with the traditional proxy re-encryption, AP-PRE provides much better fine-grained access control to delegation path. Briefly speaking, in an AP-PRE scheme, the delegator designates a path of his preferred delegatees. The path consists of several delegatees with the privilege from high to low. If the delegatee in the path cannot complete the decryption, the decryption right is automatically delegated to the next one in the path. In this way, the delegator can ensure that the delegation has always been done among those delegatees the delegator trusts. Moreover, an AP-PRE scheme has to obey the following path rules. The delegation, for ciphertexts of a delegator $i$i, can only be carried out on the autonomous path $\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai designated by the delegator $i$i, in the sense that (1) re-encrypted ciphertexts along the autonomous path $\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai cannot branch off $\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai with meaningful decryption, and (2) original ciphertexts generated under $pk_j$pkj for $j \ne i$j≠i (i.e., for a path $\mathsf {Pa}_j$Paj different from $\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai) cannot be inserted into (i.e., cannot be transformed along) the autonomous path $\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai with meaningful decryption. We give the formal definition, as well as the formal security model, for this cryptographic primitive. Under this concept, we construct an IND-CPA secure AP-PRE scheme under the decisional bilinear Diffie-Hellman (DBDH) assumption in the random oracle model. Our scheme is with the useful properties of proxy re-encryption, i.e., unidirectionality and multi-hop.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们介绍了一种新的密码原语，称为自治路径代理重加密(AP-PRE ),它是由多跳委托过程中委托者希望控制整个委托路径的几种应用场景所激发的。与传统的代理重加密相比，AP-PRE对委托路径提供了更好的细粒度访问控制。简而言之，在AP-PRE方案中，委托者指定他的优选被委托者的路径。该路径由几个权限从高到低的代理人组成。如果路径中的被委派者无法完成解密，解密权限将自动委派给路径中的下一个被委派者。这样，委托人可以确保委托总是在委托人信任的被委托人之间完成。此外，AP-PRE方案必须遵守以下路径规则。对于委托者$i$i的密文，委托只能在由委托者$i$i指定的自治路径$\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai上执行，意思是(1)沿着自治路径$\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai的重新加密的密文不能用有意义的解密来分支$\mathsf {Pa}_i$Pai，以及(2)在$pk_j$pkj下为$j \ne i$j≠i生成的原始密文(即我们给出了这个密码原语的形式定义和安全模型。在这个概念下，我们在随机预言机模型中的判定双线性Diffie-Hellman (DBDH)假设下构造了一个IND-CPA安全的AP-PRE方案。我们的方案具有代理重加密的有用性质，即单向性和多跳性。
papers.title_zh: AP-PRE：自主路径代理重新加密及其应用

papers.title: Efficient Nonprofiling 2nd-Order Power Analysis on Masked Devices Utilizing Multiple Leakage Points
papers.authors: Liwei Zhang, A. Adam Ding, Yunsi Fei, Pei Luo
papers.abstract: 2nd-order attacks utilize power values at two leakage points to break cryptographic systems protected by 1st-order random masking. Without profiling, the attacker do not know the exact location of the two leakage points. Standard 2nd-order attacks with an exhaustive search over two windows of size $n_w$nw has computational complexity $\mathcal {O}(n_w^2)$O(nw2) and does not scale well with the window size $n_w$nw. We propose to apply a decision-combination attack, the majority vote (MV) attack, to combine 2nd order attacks at multiple candidate pairs of leakage points selected through two filters. The first filter pre-process the power traces with Fast Fourier Transformation (FFT) techniques and reduce the complexity to $\mathcal {O}(n_w\log _2(n_w))$O(nwlog2(nw)). The second filter use an advanced statistical feature selection procedure, Higher Criticism (HC), to select leakage candidates that improve the effectiveness of decision-combination MV attack and other leakage-combination attacks. We derive theoretical success conditions of MV attacks as well as the typical maximum attack and a leakage-combination sum attack. The theoretical conditions are confirmed through performance comparisons of the attacks on synthetic data sets and on two real data sets, an FPGA implementation and a software implementation of masked AES. The proposed FF-HC-MV attack is data-adaptive, working well in all data sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 二阶攻击利用两个泄漏点的功率值来破解受一阶随机屏蔽保护的密码系统。如果不进行分析，攻击者就不知道两个泄漏点的确切位置。在大小为$n_w$nw的两个窗口上进行穷举搜索的标准二阶攻击具有计算复杂度$ \ {o}(n_w^2)$o(nw2)并且不能很好地与窗口大小$n_w$nw成比例。我们建议应用决策组合攻击，即多数投票(MV)攻击，在通过两个过滤器选择的多个候选泄漏点对处组合二阶攻击。第一滤波器利用快速傅立叶变换(FFT)技术对功率轨迹进行预处理，并将复杂度降低到$ \ mathcal { O }(n _ w \ log _ 2(n _ w))$ O(NW log 2(NW))。第二个过滤器使用高级统计特征选择过程，更高的批评(HC ),来选择泄漏候选，以提高决策组合MV攻击和其他泄漏组合攻击的有效性。我们推导了MV攻击以及典型的最大值攻击和泄漏组合和攻击的理论成功条件。通过对合成数据集和两个真实数据集(一个FPGA实现和一个软件实现的屏蔽AES)的攻击性能比较，证实了理论条件。提出的FF-HC-MV攻击是数据自适应的，在所有数据集上都工作良好。
papers.title_zh: 利用多个泄漏点的蒙版设备上有效的非副业2阶功率分析

papers.title: Empirical Analysis and Validation of Security Alerts Filtering Techniques
papers.authors: Domenico Cotroneo, Andrea Paudice, Antonio Pecchia
papers.abstract: System administrators cope with security incidents through a variety of monitors, such as intrusion detection systems, event logs, security information and event management systems. Monitors generate large volumes of alerts that overwhelm the operations team and make forensics time-consuming. Filtering is a consolidated technique to reduce the amount of alerts. In spite of the number of filtering proposals, few studies have addressed the validation of filtering results in real production datasets. This paper analyzes a number of state-of-the-art filtering techniques that are used to address security datasets. We use 14 months of alerts generated in a SaaS Cloud. Our analysis aims to measure and compare the reduction of the alerts volume obtained by the filters. The analysis highlights pros and cons of each filter and provides insights into the practical implications of filtering as affected by the characteristics of a dataset. We complement the analysis with a method to validate the output of a filter in absence of ground truth, i.e., the knowledge of the incidents occurred in the system at the time the alerts were generated. The analysis addresses blacklist, conceptual clustering and bytes techniques, and our filtering proposal based on term weighting.
papers.abstract_zh: 系统管理员通过各种监视器来处理安全事件，例如入侵检测系统、事件日志、安全信息和事件管理系统。监视器生成大量警报，令运营团队不堪重负，使得取证非常耗时。过滤是减少警报数量的一种整合技术。尽管有大量的过滤建议，但很少有研究致力于在实际生产数据集中验证过滤结果。本文分析了许多用于处理安全数据集的最新过滤技术。我们使用SaaS云中生成的14个月的警报。我们的分析旨在测量和比较过滤器获得的警报量的减少。该分析强调了每种过滤器的优点和缺点，并提供了受数据集特征影响的过滤的实际含义。我们用一种方法来补充分析，以在缺乏基本事实的情况下验证过滤器的输出，即在生成警报时系统中发生的事件的知识。该分析涉及黑名单、概念聚类和字节技术，以及我们基于术语加权的过滤建议。
papers.title_zh: 安全性警报过滤技术的经验分析和验证

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Fine-Grained Data Retrieval Schemes for Mobile Social Networks
papers.authors: Mohamed Mahmoud, Khaled Rabieh, Ahmed B. T. Sherif, Enahoro Oriero, Muhammad Ismail, Erchin Serpedin, Khalid A. Qaraqe
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose privacy-preserving fine-grained data retrieval schemes for mobile social networks (MSNs). The schemes enable users to retrieve data from other users who are interested in some topics related to a subject of interest. We define a subject to be a broad term that can cover many fine-grained topics, e.g., History can be a subject and World War I can be a topic. We consider centralized and decentralized network models. Our centralized scheme allows users to securely outsource data to a server such that the server matches the users who are interested in same topic(s) and have defined social attributes with privacy preservation. Searchable encryption scheme and a proposed cryptography construct are used to enable the server to match the topics and attributes without knowing any private information. By using the social attributes, users can prescribe the other users who can be connected to. We also propose a decentralized scheme that can be used when there is no connection to the server, i.e, shortage of Internet connectivity. The scheme leverages friends-of-friends relationship and transferable trust concept, where each user trusts his friends and the friends of friends. If a friend is not interested in the requested subject, he/she can link him/her to his/her friends without knowing the requested subject to preserve privacy. Our schemes use Bloom filters to store the topics of interest to reduce the storage and communication overhead. This is important because the number of fine-grained topics can be large. Different techniques to store the topics in the filter are proposed and investigated. Performance metrics are proposed and evaluated using real implementations. Our analysis and implementation results demonstrate that our schemes can preserve the privacy of the MSN users with high performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了保护隐私的移动社交网络细粒度数据检索方案。这些方案使用户能够从对与感兴趣的主题相关的某些主题感兴趣的其他用户那里检索数据。我们将主题定义为一个宽泛的术语，可以涵盖许多细粒度的主题，例如，历史可以是一个主题，第一次世界大战可以是一个话题。我们考虑集中和分散的网络模型。我们的集中式方案允许用户安全地将数据外包给服务器，使得服务器匹配对相同主题感兴趣并且已经定义了隐私保护的社交属性的用户。使用可搜索的加密方案和建议的加密构造来使服务器能够在不知道任何私人信息的情况下匹配主题和属性。通过使用社交属性，用户可以指定可以连接的其他用户。我们还提出了一个分散的方案，可以在没有连接到服务器时使用，即缺乏互联网连接。该方案利用朋友的朋友关系和可转移信任概念，每个用户信任他的朋友和朋友的朋友。如果朋友对所请求的主题不感兴趣，他/她可以在不知道所请求的主题的情况下将他/她链接到他/她的朋友，以保护隐私。我们的方案使用布隆过滤器来存储感兴趣的主题，以减少存储和通信开销。这很重要，因为细粒度主题的数量可能很大。提出并研究了在过滤器中存储主题的不同技术。使用真实的实现来提议和评估性能度量。我们的分析和实现结果表明，我们的方案能够高效地保护MSN用户的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 提供移动社交网络隐私的罚款数据检索方案

papers.title: SμV - The Security MicroVisor: A Formally-Verified Software-Based Security Architecture for the Internet of Things
papers.authors: Mahmoud Ammar, Bruno Crispo, Bart Jacobs, Danny Hughes, Wilfried Daniels
papers.abstract: The Internet of Things (IoT) is shaped by the increasing number of low-cost Internet-connected embedded devices that are becoming ubiquitous in every aspect of modern life. With their cost-sensitive design, integrating hardware-based security mechanisms into such devices is undesirable. Therefore, securing these devices is a particularly difficult challenge, especially, due to their growing popularity as attack targets, via remote malware infestations. The vast majority of such devices are bare-metal, where they execute programs in fully-accessible and unprotected memories without any operating system and even without including any form of security. This is beside the fact that IoT operating systems offer little or no protection. This paper addresses this problem through the concept of a Security MicroVisor (S$\mu$μV), which provides embedded devices that lack hardware-based memory protection units with memory isolation using software virtualisation and assembly-level code verification. More specifically, our contribution is two-fold. First, we propose S$\mu$μV as a software-based memory isolation technique. We then formally verify the software architecture, written in C, to prove that it is memory-safe and crash-free. Second, we propose a software-based remote attestation, as an example of a fundamental security service that can be implemented on top of S$\mu$μV, to detect malware-infected devices. We first describe the design and implementation of S$\mu$μV. Then, we highlight the formal verification of software architecture, and characterize the remote attestation protocol. We evaluate the S$\mu$μV implementation using an 8-bit AVR microcontroller that is widely used in IoT devices. Evaluation results show that S$\mu$μV provides strong security guarantees while maintaining extremely low overhead in terms of memory footprint, performance, and power consumption. Furthermore, we extend the performance evaluation also to the remote attestation scheme, illustrating its limited overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)是由越来越多的低成本互联网连接嵌入式设备形成的，这些设备在现代生活的各个方面变得无处不在。由于其成本敏感的设计，将基于硬件的安全机制集成到这种设备中是不理想的。因此，保护这些设备是一项特别困难的挑战，特别是由于它们作为攻击目标越来越受欢迎，通过远程恶意软件感染。绝大多数这样的设备都是裸机，它们在没有任何操作系统，甚至没有任何形式的安全措施的情况下，在完全可访问且不受保护的存储器中执行程序。除此之外，物联网操作系统几乎或根本不提供保护。本文通过安全微管理器(S$\mu$μV)的概念来解决这一问题，它使用软件虚拟化和汇编级代码验证为缺乏基于硬件的内存保护单元的嵌入式设备提供内存隔离。更具体地说，我们的贡献是双重的。首先，我们提出S$\mu$μV作为基于软件的存储器隔离技术。然后，我们正式验证用C编写的软件架构，证明它是内存安全和无崩溃的。其次，我们提出了基于软件的远程证明，作为可以在S$\mu$μV之上实现的基本安全服务的示例，以检测受恶意软件感染的设备。首先描述了S$\mu$μV的设计和实现，然后重点介绍了软件体系结构的形式化验证，并对远程证明协议进行了描述。我们使用物联网设备中广泛使用的8位AVR微控制器评估S$\mu$μV实现。评估结果表明，S$\mu$μV提供了强大的安全保证，同时在内存占用、性能和功耗方面保持了极低的开销。此外，我们还将性能评估扩展到远程证明方案，说明其有限的开销。
papers.title_zh: SμV-Security Microvisor：物联网的正式验证的基于软件的安全体系结构

papers.title: Supersingular Isogeny Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange on 64-Bit ARM
papers.authors: Amir Jalali, Reza Azarderakhsh, Mehran Mozaffari Kermani, David Jao
papers.abstract: We present an efficient implementation of the supersingular isogeny Diffie-Hellman (SIDH) key exchange protocol on 64-bit ARMv8 processors for 125- and 160-bit post-quantum security levels. We analyze the use of both affine and projective SIDH formulas and provide a comprehensive analysis of both approaches based on the inversion-to-multiplication ratio. Implementation results show that regardless of security concerns, affine SIDH is competitive with the projective coordinates implementation, and even outperforms projective implementation in the final round of SIDH; however, projective SIDH shows better overall performance for the whole key exchange protocol. Notably, over larger finite fields, using optimized field multiplication leads to the much better performance of projective compared to affine formulas. We integrate our optimized software into the open quantum-safe OpenSSL library and compare our software with other available post-quantum primitives. The benchmark results on ARMv8 demonstrate speedup of up to 5X over the generic version of SIDH implementation which is available inside the OQS library for the same quantum security level. We observe that our highly-optimized implementation still suffers from a large number of operations for computing isogenies of elliptic curves. However, in terms of communication overhead, supersingular isogeny-based cryptosystem provides significantly smaller key size compared to its counterparts.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了在64位ARMv8处理器上针对125位和160位后量子安全级别的超奇异同源Diffie-Hellman (SIDH)密钥交换协议的有效实现。我们分析了仿射和投影SIDH公式的使用，并提供了基于反转倍增比的两种方法的综合分析。实现结果表明，在不考虑安全性的情况下，仿射SIDH与射影坐标实现相比具有竞争力，在最后一轮SIDH中甚至优于射影实现；然而，对于整个密钥交换协议，投影SIDH表现出更好的整体性能。值得注意的是，在较大的有限域上，与仿射公式相比，使用优化的域乘法会产生更好的投影性能。我们将我们优化的软件集成到开放的量子安全OpenSSL库中，并将我们的软件与其他可用的后量子原语进行比较。ARMv8上的基准测试结果表明，在相同的量子安全级别下，SIDH实现的通用版本比OQS图书馆内提供的SIDH实现提高了高达5X。我们观察到，我们高度优化的实现仍然受到计算椭圆曲线同源的大量操作的影响。然而，就通信开销而言，基于超奇异同源的密码系统提供的密钥比同类系统小得多。
papers.title_zh: 在64位臂上的占用等值差异差异键交换

papers.title: Guest Editors' Introduction: Special Section on Security in Emerging Networking Technologies
papers.authors: Gail-Joon Ahn, Guofei Gu, Hongxin Hu, Seungwon Shin
papers.abstract: NETWORK infrastructure is undergoing a major shift away from ossified hardware-based networks to programmable software-based networks. One compelling example of this paradigm shift is the advent of SoftwareDefined Networking (SDN). A traditional network mixes control and traffic processing logic in single hardware devices, making the network more complex and harder to manage. SDN has addressed this issue by decoupling the control plane in network devices from the data plane to simplify production networks. On the other hand, enterprise networks are populated with a large number of proprietary and expensive hardware-based middleboxes, such as firewall, IDS/IPS, and load balancing. Hardware-based middleboxes present significant drawbacks such as high costs, management complexity, slow time to market, and unscalability. Network Function Virtualization (NFV) was proposed as another new network paradigm to address those drawbacks by replacing hardware-based network functions with virtualized software systems running on generic and inexpensive commodity hardware. Given their benefits, SDN and NFV have recently attracted significant attention from both academia and industry. SDN andNFV introduce significant granularity, visibility, flexibility, and elasticity to networking, but at the same time bring forth new security challenges. For example, decoupling the data plane and the control plane in SDN essentially opens a door to attackers for exploiting the vulnerabilities of SDN controllers, APIs, applications, and protocols, and further break their trust relations. Meanwhile, both SDN and NFV could be leveraged to strengthen network defense. The aim of this special issue is to encompass research advances in all areas of security in emerging networking technologies. The special issue intends to provide a venue for interested researchers and practitioners to share their novel research ideas and results. In response to the call for papers, this special section has collected 14 submissions and the following 4 papers were included in this special section after rigorous peer review and careful revision. The first paper “Dynamic Packet Forwarding Verification in SDN” by Qi Li, Xiaoyue Zou, Qun Huang, Jing Zheng, and Patrick P.C. Lee proposes a robust and lightweight packet forwarding verification mechanism that is able to detect various sophisticated attacks against packet forwarding in SDN. The proposed mechanism leverages dynamic packet sampling to verify integrity of packets on networks to detect various attacks violating packet integrity in SDN. Extensive experiments have been done with real trace to demonstrate that the proposed system can achieve more than 97 percent verification accuracy, while only incurring around 0.2 percent packet collection rate and less than 5 percent throughput degradation. The second paper “SDN-based Privacy Preserving Cross Domain Routing” by Qingjun Chen, Shouqian Shi, Xin Li, Chen Qian, and Sheng Zhong presents a privacy-preserving cross-domain routing optimization protocol in multi-domain SDN environments. The proposed solution provides two fundamental routing functions, policy-compliant shortest path computing and bandwidth allocation, to ensure strong protection for the private information of domains. Experimental evaluation shows that the proposed system is efficient in computation and communication costs based on real ISP network topologies. The third paper “Detecting and Mitigating Target LinkFlooding Attacks Using SDN” by Juan Wang, Ru Wen, and Jiangqi Li introduces a novel defense system for the linkflooding attack (LFA), leveraging some key features, such as programmability, network-wide view, and flow traceability, of SDN. The proposed solution includes a target link selection approach and a congestion monitoring mechanism to effectively detect LFA, and a multiple traffic rerouting method and a malicious traffic blocking approach to mitigate LFA. Experimental results show that the proposed system can accurately detect and rapidly mitigate LFA, but only imposes minimal communication overhead. The fourth paper “Dependability Integration in Cloud-hosted Telecommunication Services” by Wiem Abderrahim and Zied Choukair proposes a Dependability Broker Architecture in Telco Clouds (DBA-Telco), which is a broker architecture G.-J. papers.abstract_zh: 网络基础设施正在经历从僵化的基于硬件的网络到可编程的基于软件的网络的重大转变。这种范式转变的一个引人注目的例子是软件定义的网络(SDN)的出现。传统网络在单个硬件设备中混合了控制和流量处理逻辑，使得网络更加复杂和难以管理。SDN通过将网络设备中的控制平面与数据平面分离来简化生产网络，从而解决了这一问题。另一方面，企业网络中充斥着大量专有且昂贵的基于硬件的中间设备，如防火墙、IDS/IPS和负载平衡。基于硬件的中间体存在明显的缺点，例如高成本、管理复杂性、上市时间慢以及不可扩展性。网络功能虚拟化(NFV)是作为另一种新的网络模式提出来的，它通过用运行在通用廉价商品硬件上的虚拟化软件系统取代基于硬件的网络功能来解决这些缺点。鉴于其优势，SDN和NFV最近吸引了学术界和工业界的极大关注。SDN和NFV为网络带来了显著的粒度、可见性、灵活性和弹性，但同时也带来了新的安全挑战。例如，在SDN中分离数据平面和控制平面实质上为攻击者利用SDN控制器、API、应用和协议的漏洞打开了大门，并进一步破坏了它们的信任关系。同时，SDN和NFV都可以用来加强网络防御。本特刊的目的是涵盖新兴网络技术中所有安全领域的研究进展。特刊旨在为感兴趣的研究人员和从业人员提供一个分享其新颖研究思想和成果的场所。为了响应征文的号召，本专栏共收集了14篇投稿，以下4篇论文经过严格的同行评审和认真的修改后被收入本专栏。第一篇论文“SDN中的动态分组转发验证”由、、邹、、和Patrick P.C. Lee提出了一种健壮且轻量级的分组转发验证机制，该机制能够检测针对SDN中的分组转发的各种复杂攻击。该机制利用动态数据包采样来验证网络上数据包的完整性，以检测SDN中违反数据包完整性的各种攻击。使用真实跟踪进行的大量实验表明，所提出的系统可以实现超过97%的验证准确率，同时仅导致大约0.2%的分组收集率和不到5%的吞吐量下降。第二篇论文“基于SDN的隐私保护跨域路由”由陈青军、史守谦、、陈谦和仲胜提出了多域SDN环境中的隐私保护跨域路由优化协议。所提出的解决方案提供了两个基本的路由功能，符合策略的最短路径计算和带宽分配，以确保对域的私有信息的强保护。基于真实ISP网络拓扑的实验评估表明，所提出的系统在计算和通信成本方面是有效的。第三篇论文“使用SDN检测和缓解目标链路泛洪攻击”由、茹雯和李撰写，介绍了一种针对链路泛洪攻击的新型防御系统(LFA)，利用了SDN的一些关键特性，如可编程性、全网络视图和流可追溯性。所提出的解决方案包括有效检测LFA的目标链路选择方法和拥塞监控机制，以及减轻LFA的多重流量重新路由方法和恶意流量阻塞方法。实验结果表明，所提出的系统能够准确地检测和快速地减轻LFA，但只施加最小的通信开销。Wiem Abderrahim和Zied Choukair的第四篇论文“云托管电信服务中的可靠性集成”提出了电信云中的可靠性代理架构(DBA-Telco)，这是一个代理架构G.-J.
