papers.title: Dynamic Packet Forwarding Verification in SDN
papers.authors: Qi Li, Xiaoyue Zou, Qun Huang, Jing Zheng, Patrick P. C. Lee
papers.abstract: Like traditional IP networking, the emerging Software-Defined Networking (SDN) technology is vulnerable to sophisticated attacks against packets and their forwarding behaviors. However, existing proposals of packet forwarding verification for IP networking cannot be directly applied to the current SDN deployment due to the limited functionalities and resources in commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) SDN switches. We propose DynaPFV, a dynamic packet forwarding verification mechanism that is capable of detecting various sophisticated attacks against packet forwarding. DynaPFV leverages the controllability of SDN to examine both packets and flow statistics across a network of switches to detect violation of packet integrity and forwarding behaviors. To mitigate the verification overhead, DynaPFV dynamically adjusts the rates of packet sampling and flow statistics collection based on the prior detection results in order to preserve the verification accuracy. Furthermore, DynaPFV makes changes to the SDN controller only, and is directly deployable atop COTS SDN switches without modifications. We conduct theoretical analysis on the trade-off between performance and accuracy in our dynamic verification approach. We further prototype DynaPFV using the open-source Floodlight controller, and evaluate our DynaPFV prototype using Mininet simulations and hardware testbed experiments. DynaPFV achieves over 97 percent of verification accuracy only with less than 5 percent of throughput degradation and less than 10 percent of additional forwarding delays.
papers.abstract_zh: 像传统的IP网络一样，新兴的软件定义网络(SDN)技术容易受到针对数据包及其转发行为的复杂攻击。然而，由于商用现成(COTS) SDN交换机的功能和资源有限，现有的IP网络分组转发验证建议不能直接应用于当前的SDN部署。我们提出了DynaPFV，这是一种动态的数据包转发验证机制，能够检测针对数据包转发的各种复杂攻击。DynaPFV利用SDN的可控性来检查交换机网络中的数据包和流量统计数据，以检测违反数据包完整性和转发行为的情况。为了减少验证开销，DynaPFV根据之前的检测结果动态调整数据包采样和流统计数据收集的速率，以保持验证的准确性。此外，DynaPFV只对SDN控制器进行更改，无需修改即可直接部署在COTS SDN交换机上。在我们的动态验证方法中，我们对性能和准确性之间的权衡进行了理论分析。我们使用开源泛光灯控制器进一步开发DynaPFV原型，并使用Mininet仿真和硬件测试床实验评估我们的DynaPFV原型。DynaPFV实现了97%以上的验证准确率，而吞吐量下降不到5%，额外转发延迟不到10%。
papers.title_zh: SDN中的动态数据包转发验证

papers.title: SDN-Based Privacy Preserving Cross Domain Routing
papers.authors: Qingjun Chen, Shouqian Shi, Xin Li, Chen Qian, Sheng Zhong
papers.abstract: Today's large-scale enterprise networks, data center networks, and wide area networks can be decomposed into multiple administrative or geographical domains. Domains may be owned by different administrative units or organizations. Hence protecting domain information is an important concern. Existing general-purpose Secure Multi-Party Computation (SMPC) methods that preserves privacy for domains are extremely slow for cross-domain routing problems. In this paper we present PYCRO, a cryptographic protocol specifically designed for privacy-preserving cross-domain routing optimization in Software Defined Networking (SDN) environments. PYCRO provides two fundamental routing functions, policy-compliant shortest path computing and bandwidth allocation, while ensuring strong protection for the private information of domains. We rigorously prove the privacy guarantee of our protocol. To improve time efficiency we design the QuIck Pathing (QIP) technique. QIP only requires one-time offline preprocessing and very fast online computation. We have implemented a prototype system that runs PYCRO and QIP on servers in a campus network. Experimental results using real ISP network topologies show that PYCRO and QIP are very efficient in computation and communication costs.
papers.abstract_zh: 当今的大规模企业网络、数据中心网络和广域网可以分解成多个管理或地理域。域可能属于不同的管理单位或组织。因此，保护域信息是一个重要的问题。现有的保护域隐私的通用安全多方计算(SMPC)方法对于跨域路由问题非常慢。在本文中，我们介绍了PYCRO，一种专门为软件定义网络(SDN)环境中保护隐私的跨域路由优化而设计的加密协议。PYCRO提供了两个基本的路由功能，符合策略的最短路径计算和带宽分配，同时确保对域的私有信息的强保护。我们严格证明了我们协议的隐私保证。为了提高时间效率，我们设计了快速QIP技术。QIP只需要一次离线预处理和非常快速的在线计算。我们已经实现了一个原型系统，在校园网的服务器上运行PYCRO和QIP。使用真实ISP网络拓扑的实验结果表明，PYCRO和QIP在计算和通信开销方面非常有效。
papers.title_zh: 基于SDN的隐私保护跨域路由

papers.title: Detecting and Mitigating Target Link-Flooding Attacks Using SDN
papers.authors: Juan Wang, Ru Wen, Jiangqi Li, Fei Yan, Bo Zhao, Fajiang Yu
papers.abstract: DDoS attacks have caused very serious damage to enterprise networks. Recently, a new kind of DDoS attack called link-flooding attack (LFA), has surfaced and is already being used by attackers to flood and congest network critical links. LFA is very difficult to detect since adversaries often utilize large-scale legitimate low-speed flows and rolls target links to isolate target areas for launching attacks. To address such a critical security problem, we design and implement a novel LFA defense system called LFADefender that leverages some key features, such as programmability, network-wide view, and flow traceability, of an emerging network technology, Software-Defined Networking (SDN), to effectively detect and migrate LFA. In LFADefender, we propose a LFA target link selection approach and design a LFA congestion monitoring mechanism to effectively detect LFA. In addition, we present a multiple optional paths rerouting method to temporarily mitigate links congestion caused by LFA. We further propose a malicious traffic blocking approach to radically mitigate LFA. Our evaluation results show that LFADefender can accurately detect and rapidly mitigate LFA, but only imposes minimal overhead in the communication channels between network controllers and data planes.
papers.abstract_zh: DDoS攻击对企业网络造成了非常严重的破坏。最近，一种新的DDoS攻击称为链路泛洪攻击(LFA)，已经出现并被攻击者用来泛洪和拥塞网络关键链路。LFA非常难以检测，因为对手通常利用大规模合法低速流和滚动目标链接来隔离目标区域以发起攻击。为了解决这样一个关键的安全问题，我们设计并实现了一个名为LFADefender的新型LFA防御系统，该系统利用新兴网络技术软件定义网络(SDN)的一些关键功能，如可编程性、网络范围视图和流量可追溯性，来有效地检测和迁移LFA。在LFADefender中，我们提出了一种LFA目标链路选择方法，并设计了一种LFA拥塞监控机制来有效地检测LFA。此外，我们提出了一种多可选路径重路由方法来暂时缓解由LFA引起的链路拥塞。我们进一步提出了一种恶意流量阻塞方法来从根本上减轻LFA。我们的评估结果表明，LFADefender可以准确检测并快速缓解LFA，但只会对网络控制器和数据平面之间的通信通道造成最小的开销。
papers.title_zh: 使用SDN检测和缓解目标链接淋巴结攻击

papers.title: Dependability Integration in Cloud-hosted Telecommunication Services
papers.authors: Wiem Abderrahim, Zièd Choukair
papers.abstract: Future networks should be based on Telco clouds to handle the growing traffic. Thanks to Telco Clouds, network functions can be deployed, accessed and run like any information technology application hosted in cloud computing. However, network functions need to fulfill carrier grade characteristics consisting of strict requirements in dependability (e.g., five nines availability, some milliseconds of outage). In traditional telecommunication networks, these features are guaranteed by proprietary hardware that hosts network functions. In Telco cloud context, there is an emergency need to adapt cloud environments in order to guarantee carrier-class behaviour. The aim of this paper is to guarantee dependability in the telecommunication services hosted in cloud environments according to the rates fixed by ETSI for three service availability levels. In this regard, we propose the Dependability Broker Architecture in Telco Clouds; which is a broker architecture based on a Software Defined Network controller that operates on Network Function Virtualization environments. DBA-Telco takes into consideration the different availability levels defined for telecommunication services. It also dimensions the bottlenecks of the virtualized mobile core EPC-IMS based on the expectations of 5G networks. This architecture achieves the carrier grade requirements in the virtualized mobile core network EPC-IMS.
papers.abstract_zh: 未来的网络应该基于电信云来处理不断增长的流量。多亏了电信云，网络功能可以像云计算中托管的任何信息技术应用程序一样部署、访问和运行。然而，网络功能需要满足电信级特征，包括可靠性的严格要求(例如，五个9的可用性，几毫秒的中断)。在传统的电信网络中，这些功能由承载网络功能的专有硬件来保证。在电信云环境中，迫切需要适应云环境，以保证电信级行为。本文的目的是根据ETSI为三个服务可用性级别确定的比率，保证云环境中托管的电信服务的可靠性。在这方面，我们提出了电信云中的可靠性代理架构；它是一种基于软件定义的网络控制器的代理体系结构，该网络控制器在网络功能虚拟化环境中运行。DBA-Telco考虑了为电信服务定义的不同可用性级别。它还根据5G网络的预期，确定了虚拟化移动核心EPC-IMS的瓶颈。该架构实现了虚拟化移动核心网EPC-IMS中的电信级要求。
papers.title_zh: 云托管电信服务中的可靠性集成

papers.title: A Novel Security Protocol Attack Detection Logic with Unique Fault Discovery Capability for Freshness Attacks and Interleaving Session Attacks
papers.authors: Anca Jurcut, Tom Coffey, Reiner Dojen
papers.abstract: This paper introduces a new logic-based technique for detecting security protocol weaknesses that are exploitable by freshness and interleaving session attacks. This technique is realised as a special purpose logic to be used throughout the protocol design stage, where a draft of the protocol is subjected to formal analysis prior to its publication or deployment. For any detected failures the analysis also reveals their cause, facilitating design corrections. The proposed Attack Detection Logic is introduced and its details, including the language, predicates, axioms, rules, semantics as well as soundness and completeness are presented. The effectiveness of the logic is evaluated in a case study, where it is demonstrated how to use the Attack Detection Logic as part of the design process of security protocols. Further, the logic is applied to a range of security protocols, including protocols with known weaknesses and protocols that are known to be secure. The logic's ability to detect various attacks is established by demonstrating that for protocols with known weaknesses, at least one detection rule is activated and no detection rule is activated for protocols without weaknesses. This case study confirms the logic's ability to detect design weaknesses exploitable by freshness and interleaving session attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了一种新的基于逻辑的技术，用于检测可被新鲜性和交错会话攻击利用的安全协议弱点。该技术被实现为在整个协议设计阶段使用的专用逻辑，其中协议草案在其发布或部署之前要经过形式分析。对于任何检测到的故障，该分析还揭示了它们的原因，有助于设计修正。介绍了所提出的攻击检测逻辑，并给出了它的细节，包括语言、谓词、公理、规则、语义以及可靠性和完整性。在一个案例研究中评估了该逻辑的有效性，在该案例研究中展示了如何使用攻击检测逻辑作为安全协议设计过程的一部分。此外，该逻辑被应用于一系列安全协议，包括具有已知弱点的协议和已知安全的协议。通过证明对于具有已知弱点的协议，至少激活一个检测规则，而对于没有弱点的协议，不激活检测规则，来建立逻辑检测各种攻击的能力。这个案例研究证实了逻辑检测可被新鲜度和交错会话攻击利用的设计弱点的能力。
papers.title_zh: 新型安全协议攻击检测逻辑，具有独特的故障发现能力，可用于新鲜攻击和交织会话攻击

papers.title: An Immunization Framework for Social Networks Through Big Data Based Influence Modeling
papers.authors: Sancheng Peng, Guojun Wang, Yongmei Zhou, Cong Wan, Cong Wang, Shui Yu, Jianwei Niu
papers.abstract: Social networks are critical in terms of information or malware propagation. However, how to contain the spreading of malware in social networks is still an open and challenging issue. In this paper, we propose a novel defending method through big data based influence modeling. We first establish a social interaction graph based on big data sets of the studied object. Based on the graph, we are able to measure direct influence of individuals by computing each node's strength, which includes the degree of the node and the total number of messages sent by each user to her friends. Then, we design an algorithm to construct influence spreading tree using the breadth first search strategy, and measure indirect influence of individuals by traversing the tree. We identify the top <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi>k</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="peng-ieq1-2731844.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> influential nodes among all the nodes via the social influence strength, and propose an immunization algorithm to defend social networks against various attacks. The extensive experiments show that influence can spread easily in social networks, and the greater the influence of initial spread node is, the more impact it is on the malware propagation in social networks. The proposed method provides an effective solution to the prevention of malware or malicious messages propagation in social networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 社交网络在信息或恶意软件传播方面至关重要。然而，如何遏制恶意软件在社交网络中的传播仍然是一个开放和具有挑战性的问题。本文通过基于大数据的影响建模，提出了一种新的防御方法。我们首先基于所研究对象的大数据集建立社交互动图。基于该图，我们能够通过计算每个节点的强度来测量个人的直接影响，这包括节点的度和每个用户向她的朋友发送的消息的总数。然后，我们设计了一个算法，利用广度优先搜索策略构建影响传播树，并通过遍历树来度量个体的间接影响。我们通过社交影响强度在所有节点中识别出最有影响力的节点，并提出一种免疫算法来保护社交网络免受各种攻击。大量实验表明，影响力在社交网络中容易传播，初始传播节点的影响力越大，对恶意软件在社交网络中的传播影响越大。所提出的方法为防止恶意软件或恶意消息在社交网络中传播提供了有效的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 通过基于大数据的影响建模为社交网络的免疫框架

papers.title: Block Design-Based Key Agreement for Group Data Sharing in Cloud Computing
papers.authors: Jian Shen, Tianqi Zhou, Debiao He, Yuexin Zhang, Xingming Sun, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Data sharing in cloud computing enables multiple participants to freely share the group data, which improves the efficiency of work in cooperative environments and has widespread potential applications. However, how to ensure the security of data sharing within a group and how to efficiently share the outsourced data in a group manner are formidable challenges. Note that key agreement protocols have played a very important role in secure and efficient group data sharing in cloud computing. In this paper, by taking advantage of the symmetric balanced incomplete block design (SBIBD), we present a novel block design-based key agreement protocol that supports multiple participants, which can flexibly extend the number of participants in a cloud environment according to the structure of the block design. Based on the proposed group data sharing model, we present general formulas for generating the common conference key <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathcal {K}$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mi mathvariant="script">K</mml:mi></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiang-ieq1-2725953.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> for multiple participants. Note that by benefiting from the <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(v,k + 1,1)$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mo>(</mml:mo><mml:mi>v</mml:mi><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mi>k</mml:mi><mml:mo>+</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>,</mml:mo><mml:mn>1</mml:mn><mml:mo>)</mml:mo></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="xiang-ieq2-2725953.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-block design, the computational complexity of the proposed protocol linearly increases with the number of participants and the communication complexity is greatly reduced. In addition, the fault tolerance property of our protocol enables the group data sharing in cloud computing to withstand different key attacks, which is similar to Yi's protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算中的数据共享使得多个参与者可以自由共享群组数据，提高了协同环境中的工作效率，具有广泛的潜在应用。然而，如何保证集团内部数据共享的安全性，以及如何以集团的方式高效地共享外包数据是一个巨大的挑战。注意，在云计算中，密钥协商协议在安全高效的群组数据共享中发挥了非常重要的作用。利用对称平衡不完全区组设计，提出了一种新的基于区组设计的支持多个参与者的密钥协商协议，该协议可以根据区组设计的结构灵活地扩展云环境中的参与者数量。基于所提出的群组数据共享模型，我们给出了为多个参与者生成公共会议密钥的一般公式< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ mathcal { K } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mi math variant = " script " > K </MML:mi > </MML:math > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Xiang-ie Q1-2725953 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >请注意，受益于< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(v，k + 1，1)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < MML:math > < MML:mrow > < MML:mo >(</MML:mo > < MML:mi > v </MML:mi > < MML:mo >，</MML:mo > < MML:mi > k </MML:mi > < MML:mo >+</MML:mo > < MML此外，我们的协议的容错特性使得云计算中的组数据共享能够抵抗不同的密钥攻击，这与易的协议类似。
papers.title_zh: 基于块设计的基于云计算中小组数据共享的关键协议

papers.title: Brew: A Security Policy Analysis Framework for Distributed SDN-Based Cloud Environments
papers.authors: Sandeep Pisharody, Janakarajan Natarajan, Ankur Chowdhary, Abdullah Alshalan, Dijiang Huang
papers.abstract: The ease of programmability in Software-Defined Networking (SDN) makes it a great platform implementation of various initiatives that involve application deployment, dynamic topology changes, and decentralized network management in a multi-tenant data center environment. However, implementing security solutions in such an environment is fraught with policy conflicts and consistency issues with the hardness of this problem being affected by the distribution scheme for the SDN controllers. In this paper we present Brew, a security policy analysis framework implemented on an OpenDaylight SDN controller, that has comprehensive conflict detection and resolution modules to ensure that no two flow rules in a distributed SDN-based cloud environment have conflicts at any layer; thereby assuring consistent conflict-free security policy implementation and preventing information leakage. We present techniques for global prioritization of flow rules in a decentralized environment, extend firewall rule conflict classification from a traditional environment to SDN flow rule conflicts by recognizing and classifying conflicts stemming from cross-layer conflicts and provide strategies for unassisted resolution of these conflicts. Alternately, if administrator input is desired to resolve conflicts, a novel visualization scheme is implemented to help the administrators view the conflicts graphically. We demonstrate the correctness, feasibility and scalability of our framework through a proof-of-concept prototype.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件定义网络(SDN)的可编程性使其成为在多租户数据中心环境中实施各种计划的绝佳平台，这些计划涉及应用部署、动态拓扑变化和分散式网络管理。然而，在这样的环境中实现安全解决方案充满了策略冲突和一致性问题，该问题的难度受到SDN控制器的分布方案的影响。在本文中，我们介绍了Brew，这是一个在OpenDaylight SDN控制器上实现的安全策略分析框架，它具有全面的冲突检测和解决模块，以确保在基于SDN的分布式云环境中，任何层都不会有两个流规则发生冲突；从而确保一致的无冲突安全策略实施并防止信息泄漏。我们提出了在分散环境中对流规则进行全局优先级排序的技术，通过识别和分类源自跨层冲突的冲突，将防火墙规则冲突分类从传统环境扩展到SDN流规则冲突，并提供了这些冲突的无辅助解决策略。或者，如果需要管理员输入来解决冲突，则实现新颖的可视化方案来帮助管理员图形化地查看冲突。我们通过一个概念验证原型证明了我们的框架的正确性、可行性和可扩展性。
papers.title_zh: Brew：基于分布式SDN的云环境的安全策略分析框架

papers.title: Di-PriDA: Differentially Private Distributed Load Balancing Control for the Smart Grid
papers.authors: Xiaojing Liao, Preethi Srinivasan, David Formby, Raheem A. Beyah
papers.abstract: The future electrical grid, i.e., smart grid, is envisioned to use appliance-level control to provide sustainable power usage and flexible energy utilization. However, load trace monitoring for appliance-level control poses privacy concerns given that private behaviors can be inferred by electricity utilization levels. In this paper, we introduce a privacy-preserving and fine-grained power load data analysis mechanism Di-PriDA for appliance-level peak-time load balancing control in the smart grid. Di-PriDA achieved <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$3\varepsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>3</mml:mn><mml:mi>ɛ</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href="liao-ieq1-2717826.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-differential privacy, which provided indistinguishable application power consumption data to protect against eavesdroppers. The proposed technique explores a new differential privacy problem: the distributed top-k problem without a trusted third party, and provides both rigorous provable privacy and an accuracy guarantee based on distributed differential privacy. We implement a prototype of Di-PriDA on an external microcontroller device used for smart meters, and evaluate its performance under two real-world power usage datasets, as well as a synthetic dataset through a combination of experiments and simulations. We find that Di-PriDA effectively achieves confidentiality for the appliance-level peak-time load balancing control while guaranteeing a good quality-of-service to the various stakeholders of the power grid.
papers.abstract_zh: 未来的电网，即智能电网，设想使用电器级控制来提供可持续的电力使用和灵活的能源利用。然而，对于电器级控制的负载跟踪监控提出了隐私问题，因为隐私行为可以通过用电级别来推断。在本文中，我们介绍了一种隐私保护的细粒度电力负荷数据分析机制Di-PriDA，用于智能电网中设备级的高峰时间负荷平衡控制。Di-PriDA实现了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$3\varepsilon$</tex-math><alternatives><mml:math><mml:mrow><mml:mn>3</mml:mn><mml:mi>ɛ</mml:mi></mml:mrow></mml:math><inline-graphic xlink:href = " Liao-ie Q1-2717826 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-差分隐私，提供不可区分的应用功耗数据，以防止窃听。该技术探索了一个新的差分隐私问题:无可信第三方的分布式top-k问题，并提供了基于分布式差分隐私的严格可证明隐私和准确性保证。我们在用于智能电表的外部微控制器设备上实现了Di-PriDA原型，并通过结合实验和仿真，在两个真实世界用电数据集和一个合成数据集下评估了其性能。我们发现Di-PriDA有效地实现了设备级高峰时间负载平衡控制的机密性，同时保证了对电网的各种利益相关者的良好服务质量。
papers.title_zh: di-prida：私有分布式负载平衡控制的智能电网

papers.title: Emerging-Image Motion CAPTCHAs: Vulnerabilities of Existing Designs, and Countermeasures
papers.authors: Song Gao, Manar Mohamed, Nitesh Saxena, Chengcui Zhang
papers.abstract: Based on the notion of “emergence”, Xu et al. (Usenix Security 2012; TDSC 2013) developed the first concrete instantiation of emerging-image moving-object (EIMO) CAPTCHAs using 2D hollow objects (codewords), shown to be usable and believed to be secure. In this paper, we highlight the hidden security weaknesses of such a 2D EIMO CAPTCHA design. A key vulnerability is that the camera projection on 2D objects is constant (unlike 3D objects), making it possible to reconstruct the underlying codewords by superimposing and aggregating the temporally scattered parts of the object extracted from consecutive frames. We design and implement an automated attack framework to defeat this design using image processing techniques, and show that its accuracy in recognizing moving codewords is up to 89.2 percent, under different parameterizations. Our framework can be broadly used to undermine the security of different instances of 2D EIMO CAPTCHAs (not just the current state-of-the-art by Xu et al.), given the generalized and robust back-end theories in our attack, namely the methods to locate a codeword, reduce noises and accumulate objects’ contour information from consecutive frames corresponding to multiple time periods. As a countermeasure, we propose a fundamentally different design of EIMO CAPTCHAs based on pseudo 3D objects, and examine its security as well as usability. We argue that this design can resist our attack against 2D EIMO CAPTCHAs, although at the cost of reduced usability compared to the - now insecure - 2D EIMO CAPTCHAs.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于“涌现”的概念，徐等(Usenix Security 2012TDSC 2013)使用2D空心对象(代码字)开发了新兴图像运动对象(EIMO)验证码的第一个具体实例，该实例被证明是可用的并且被认为是安全的。在本文中，我们强调了这种2D EIMO验证码设计隐藏的安全弱点。一个关键的弱点是相机在2D物体上的投影是恒定的(不同于3D物体)，使得有可能通过叠加和聚集从连续帧中提取的物体的时间上分散的部分来重构潜在的码字。我们设计并实现了一个自动攻击框架，使用图像处理技术来击败这种设计，并显示在不同的参数化下，其识别移动码字的准确率高达89.2%。我们的框架可以广泛地用于破坏EIMO验证码的不同实例的安全性(不仅仅是徐等人的当前最新技术水平)，给出了我们的攻击中的通用和鲁棒的后端理论，即从对应于多个时间段的连续帧定位码字、减少噪声和累积对象轮廓信息的方法。作为对策，我们提出了一个完全不同的基于伪3D对象的EIMO验证码设计，并检查其安全性和可用性。我们认为，这种设计可以抵御我们对2D·艾莫验证码的攻击，尽管与现在不安全的2D·艾莫验证码相比，其代价是可用性降低。
papers.title_zh: 新兴图像运动验证验验：现有设计的漏洞和对策

papers.title: F-PAD: Private Attribute Disclosure Risk Estimation in Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Xiao Han, Hailiang Huang, Leye Wang
papers.abstract: In online social networks, users always expect to share some information for benefits (e.g., personalized services) while hiding the others for privacy. Unfortunately, the hidden information is likely to be predicted by various powerful inference attacks with the rapid advances in machine learning. Then, what is the risk that a user's private information could be disclosed? What countermeasures can be taken to fight against the privacy violation for the user? To tackle these issues, this article proposes a general Framework for Private Attribute Disclosure estimation (F-PAD) including three steps: 1) private attribute prediction; 2) disclosure model training; 3) disclosure risk estimation. Not like most prior risk estimation studies focusing on one specific attack model and private attribute, F-PAD can estimate disclosure risk for individual users in terms of disclosure probability and risk level within a high confidence given a basket of potential inference attack models; furthermore, F-PAD can adapt to various attributes (e.g., gender, age) and offer countermeasures to help users lower the risk. Extensive experiment studies on two real social network datasets, Facebook and Book-Crossing, have verified the effectiveness of F-PAD in ‘current city’, ‘gender’ and ‘age’ disclosure risk estimation.
papers.abstract_zh: 在在线社交网络中，用户总是希望为了利益(例如，个性化服务)而共享一些信息，同时为了隐私而隐藏其他信息。不幸的是，随着机器学习的快速发展，隐藏的信息很可能被各种强大的推理攻击所预测。那么，用户隐私信息被泄露的风险有多大呢？对于用户来说，可以采取什么对策来对抗隐私侵犯？为了解决这些问题，本文提出了一个私有属性泄露估计的一般框架，包括三个步骤:1)私有属性预测；2)披露模型培训；3)披露风险估计。不像大多数以前的风险估计研究集中在一个特定的攻击模型和私有属性，F-PAD可以在给定一篮子潜在的推理攻击模型的情况下，在高置信度范围内根据披露概率和风险水平来估计个人用户的披露风险；此外，F-PAD可以适应各种属性(例如，性别、年龄)，并提供对策来帮助用户降低风险。在两个真实的社交网络数据集(脸书和图书交叉)上的大量实验研究验证了F-PAD在“当前城市”、“性别”和“年龄”泄露风险估计中的有效性。
papers.title_zh: F-PAD：在线社交网络中的私人属性披露风险估计

papers.title: Multitenant Access Control for Cloud-Aware Distributed Filesystems
papers.authors: Giorgos Kappes, Andromachi Hatzieleftheriou, Stergios V. Anastasiadis
papers.abstract: In a virtualization environment that serves multiple tenants (independent organizations), storage consolidation at the filesystem level is desirable because it enables data sharing, administration efficiency, and performance optimizations. The scalable deployment of filesystems in such environments is challenging due to intermediate translation layers required for networked file access or identity management. First we define the entities involved in a multitenant filesystem and present relevant security requirements. Then we introduce the design of the Dike authorization architecture. It combines native access control with tenant namespace isolation and compatibility to object-based filesystems. We introduce secure protocols to authenticate the participating entities and authorize the data access over the network. We alternatively use a local cluster and a public cloud to experimentally evaluate a Dike prototype implementation that we developed. At several thousand tenants, our prototype incurs limited performance overhead below 21 percent, unlike a solution from industry whose multitenancy overhead approaches 84 percent in some cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 在服务于多个租户(独立组织)的虚拟化环境中，文件系统级别的存储整合是可取的，因为它支持数据共享、管理效率和性能优化。由于网络文件访问或身份管理需要中间转换层，因此在这种环境中文件系统的可扩展部署具有挑战性。首先，我们定义多租户文件系统中涉及的实体，并提出相关的安全需求。然后介绍了Dike授权体系结构的设计。它将本机访问控制与租户命名空间隔离以及与基于对象的文件系统的兼容性结合起来。我们引入了安全协议来认证参与实体并授权网络上的数据访问。我们或者使用本地集群和公共云来实验性地评估我们开发的Dike原型实现。在数千租户的情况下，我们的原型产生的性能开销有限，低于21%，不像行业解决方案的多租户开销在某些情况下接近84%。
papers.title_zh: 云吸引分布式文件系统的多端访问控制

papers.title: Guest Editors' Introduction: Special Issue on Reliable and Secure VANETs
papers.authors: Alexey V. Vinel, Xiaomin Ma, Dijiang Huang
papers.abstract: VEHICULAR ad-hoc networks (VANETs) has gained a significant attention during the last decades both from industrial and academia communities. Novel VANETenabled active safety automotive applications are heavily dependent on reliability and security of underlying intervehicle communication protocols. The error-prone nature of the wireless channel and its openness to external invasions as well as dynamic VANET environment, impose the need for intensive studies before applications like platooning or collision avoidance can become a part of our daily life. The aim of this Special Issue is to encompass research advances in all areas of reliability and security in VANETs. The 11 papers comprising this Special Issue provide contributions related to the novel protocols for reliable and secure vehicle-to-vehicle and vehicle-to-infrastructure communication as well as methods for their performance evaluation. Cooperative driving applications are based on an underlying vehicular-WiFi extension (i.e., ITS-G5/DSRC) known for its unreliability and unbounded delay. Few contributions discuss the protocol design in VANETs to meet the Quality-of-Service (QoS) requirements:
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几十年里，车载自组织网络(VANETs)受到了工业界和学术界的广泛关注。支持主动安全的新型汽车应用非常依赖于底层车辆间通信协议的可靠性和安全性。无线信道易出错的特性及其对外部入侵和动态VANET环境的开放性，要求在队列或防撞等应用成为我们日常生活的一部分之前，必须进行深入研究。本特刊的目的是涵盖VANETs可靠性和安全性所有领域的研究进展。构成本特刊的11篇论文提供了有关可靠和安全的车对车和车对基础设施通信的新协议及其性能评估方法的贡献。合作驾驶应用程序基于一个底层的车载WiFi扩展(即ITS-G5/DSRC)，以其不可靠性和无限延迟而闻名。很少有文章讨论VANETs中满足服务质量(QoS)要求的协议设计:

papers.title: V2V QoS Guaranteed Channel Access in IEEE 802.11p VANETs
papers.authors: Che-Yu Chang, Hsu-Chun Yen, Der-Jiunn Deng
papers.abstract: IEEE 802.11p Wireless Access in the Vehicular Environment (WAVE) has been serving as the de facto wireless protocol for a Vehicular Ad hoc Network (VANET) with the explosive growth of vehicular applications. These applications require guaranteed Quality-of-Service (QoS). However, the fundamental channel access mechanism of WAVE, Enhanced Distributed Channel Access (EDCA), is not able to provide guaranteed QoS due to the unpredictable random access. To remedy this problem, we propose a novel channel access scheme, called Earliest Deadline First based Carrier Sense Multiple Access (EDF-CSMA). EDF-CSMA based on EDCA dynamically adjusts the priority of real-time streaming to avoid collision and introduces an admission control policy according to time constraints to provide guaranteed QoS in multi-channel environments. An analytical model is carried out to study and compare the channel utilization of EDF-CSMA and QoS-aware Hybrid Coordination Function (HCF) controlled channel access (HCCA) method. The result shows that 60 percent of channel utilization is improved by EDF-CSMA. Additionally, real video-based simulations are conducted to evaluate the performance of EDF-CSMA and the existing EDCA method. The results show that EDF-CSMA reaches better QoS support than EDCA while maintaining efficient channel utilization.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着车载应用的爆炸性增长，车载环境中的IEEE 802.11p无线接入(WAVE)已经成为车载自组织网络(VANET)的事实上的无线协议。这些应用需要有保证的服务质量(QoS)。然而，由于不可预测的随机接入，WAVE的基本信道接入机制，增强型分布式信道接入(EDCA)不能提供有保证的QoS。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种新的信道接入方案，称为基于最早截止时间优先的载波侦听多路访问(EDF-CSMA)。基于EDCA的EDF-CSMA动态调整实时流的优先级以避免冲突，并根据时间约束引入接纳控制策略以在多信道环境中提供有保证的QoS。建立了一个分析模型来研究和比较EDF-CSMA和QoS感知的混合协调功能(HCF)控制的信道接入(HCCA)方法的信道利用率。结果表明，EDF-CSMA提高了60%的信道利用率。此外，进行了基于真实视频的仿真，以评估EDF-CSMA和现有EDCA方法的性能。结果表明，与EDCA相比，EDF-CSMA在保持高效信道利用率的同时，获得了更好的QoS支持。
papers.title_zh: V2V QoS保证频道访问IEEE 802.11p VANETS

papers.title: Random Transmit Power Control for DSRC and its Application to Cooperative Safety
papers.authors: Bernhard Kloiber, Jérôme Härri, Thomas Strang, Stephan Sand, Cristina Rico Garcia
papers.abstract: Cooperative safety applications require dedicated short-range communications (DSRC) to provide position-awareness of neighboring vehicles at a specific level of reliability, i.e., awareness-quality, up to a given distance, i.e., awareness-range. However, heavy communication loads negatively impact such awareness requirements due to communication impairments, ranging from strict capacity limitations of DSRC channels to correlated packet collisions due to periodic communication patterns. Transmission control strategies may adapt power or rate to control such impairments but risk missing the requirements of cooperative safety applications. In this paper, we design a new awareness control strategy by implementing a spatial awareness framework. Specifically, we adapt the distribution of the awareness-quality as a function of the awareness-range. Therefore, we first propose random transmit power control (RTPC), which manages to provide different levels of awareness-quality at different ranges, while mitigating correlated packet collisions by randomizing them in space. As RTPC is able to reduce the channel load, we secondly propose to combine RTPC with transmit rate control (TRC) and to benefit from the gained channel resources by subsequently increasing the update-rate and by implication, the quality of position-awareness. The spatial awareness control capability of RTPC+TRC has been evaluated through simulations. We discuss the influence of RTPC+TRC on cooperative safety applications exemplarily for the forward collision warning (FCW) application.
papers.abstract_zh: 合作安全应用需要专用的短距离通信(DSRC)以特定的可靠性水平(即感知质量)提供邻近车辆的位置感知，直到给定的距离(即感知范围)。然而，由于通信损伤，从DSRC信道的严格容量限制到由于周期性通信模式引起的相关分组冲突，繁重的通信负载负面地影响了这种认知需求。传输控制策略可以调整功率或速率来控制这种损伤，但是存在无法满足协作安全应用要求的风险。在本文中，我们通过实现一个空间感知框架来设计一个新的感知控制策略。具体来说，我们将感知质量的分布调整为感知范围的函数。因此，我们首先提出了随机发射功率控制(RTPC ),它能够在不同的范围内提供不同级别的感知质量，同时通过在空间上随机化相关的分组冲突来减轻它们。由于RTPC能够减少信道负载，我们其次提出将RTPC与传输速率控制(TRC)相结合，并且通过随后增加更新速率以及暗示的位置感知的质量来受益于所获得的信道资源。通过仿真评估了RTPC+TRC的空间感知控制能力。我们以前向碰撞警告(FCW)应用为例，讨论了RTPC+TRC对合作安全应用的影响。
papers.title_zh: DSRC的随机传输功率控制及其应用于合作安全

papers.title: Secure and Robust Multi-Constrained QoS Aware Routing Algorithm for VANETs
papers.authors: Mahmoud Hashem Eiza, Thomas J. Owens, Qiang Ni
papers.abstract: Secure QoS routing algorithms are a fundamental part of wireless networks that aim to provide services with QoS and security guarantees. In vehicular ad hoc networks (VANETs), vehicles perform routing functions, and at the same time act as end-systems thus routing control messages are transmitted unprotected over wireless channels. The QoS of the entire network could be degraded by an attack on the routing process, and manipulation of the routing control messages. In this paper, we propose a novel secure and reliable multi-constrained QoS aware routing algorithm for VANETs. We employ the ant colony optimisation (ACO) technique to compute feasible routes in VANETs subject to multiple QoS constraints determined by the data traffic type. Moreover, we extend the VANET-oriented evolving graph (VoEG) model to perform plausibility checks on the routing control messages exchanged among vehicles. Simulation results show that the QoS can be guaranteed while applying security mechanisms to ensure a reliable and robust routing service.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全QoS路由算法是无线网络的基本组成部分，旨在为服务提供QoS和安全保证。在车载自组织网络(VANETs)中，车辆执行路由功能，同时充当终端系统，因此路由控制消息在无线信道上无保护地传输。对路由过程的攻击和对路由控制消息的操纵可能会降低整个网络的QoS。本文提出了一种新的安全可靠的多约束QoS感知路由算法。我们使用蚁群优化(ACO)技术来计算VANETs中可行的路由，这些路由服从由数据业务类型确定的多个QoS约束。此外，我们扩展了面向VANET的演化图(VoEG)模型，对车辆间交换的路由控制消息进行合理性检查。仿真结果表明，在应用安全机制保证可靠和健壮的路由服务的同时，QoS也能得到保证。
papers.title_zh: 安全且坚固的多约束QoS意识到VANETS的路由算法

papers.title: Securing Vehicular IPv6 Communications
papers.authors: Pedro J. Fernández, José Santa, Fernando Bernal-Hidalgo, Antonio F. Skarmeta
papers.abstract: A common practice is applying security after a network has been designed or developed. We have the opportunity of not committing this error in vehicular networks. Apart from particular works in the literature, ETSI TC ITS has defined general security services for (vehicular) cooperative systems. However, existent efforts do not pay the needed attention to the integration of IPv6 yet. The potential of IPv6 in the field is being described within ISO TC 204, above all, but further work is needed for a proper integration of security. This work follows this direction, and a reference vehicular communication architecture considering ETSI/ISO regulations, uses Internet Protocol security (IPsec) and Internet Key Exchange version 2 (IKEv2) to secure IPv6 Network Mobility (NEMO). A key advance is also the implementation and experimental evaluation of the proposal in a challenging vertical handover scenario between 3G and 802.11p. The performance of the secured NEMO channel is widely analyzed in terms of the movement speed, bandwidth, traffic type or signal quality, and it is concluded that the addition of IPv6 security only implies a slight reduction in the overall performance, with the great advantage of providing confidentiality, integrity and authenticity to the communication path.
papers.abstract_zh: 一种常见的做法是在设计或开发网络后应用安全性。我们有机会在车载网络中不犯这种错误。除了文献中的特定工作之外，ETSI TC ITS还定义了(车辆)协作系统的一般安全服务。然而，现有的努力还没有对IPv6的集成给予足够的重视。最重要的是，ISO TC 204中描述了IPv6在该领域的潜力，但是需要进一步的工作来正确集成安全性。该工作遵循这一方向，并且参考考虑了ETSI/ISO规定的车辆通信架构，使用互联网协议安全性(IPsec)和互联网密钥交换版本2 (IKEv2)来保护IPv6网络移动性(NEMO)。一个关键的进步是在3G和802.11p之间具有挑战性的垂直切换场景中实施和实验评估该提案。从移动速度、带宽、流量类型或信号质量方面广泛分析了受保护的NEMO信道的性能，并得出结论:增加IPv6安全性仅意味着整体性能略有下降，但具有为通信路径提供保密性、完整性和真实性的巨大优势。
papers.title_zh: 确保车辆IPv6通信

papers.title: Historical Spectrum Sensing Data Mining for Cognitive Radio Enabled Vehicular Ad-Hoc Networks
papers.authors: Xin-Lin Huang, Jun Wu, Wenfeng Li, Zhifeng Zhang, Fusheng Zhu, Minghao Wu
papers.abstract: In vehicular ad-hoc network (VANET), the reliability of communication is associated with driving safety. However, research shows that the safety-message transmission in VANET may be congested under some urgent communication cases. More spectrum resource is an effective way to solve transmission congestion. Hence, we introduce cognitive radio (CR) enabled VANET (CR-VANET), where CR device can detect possible idle spectrum for VANET communications and assist to timely broadcast safety-message. Given high-speed mobility of vehicles and dynamically-changing availability of channels, a novel prediction algorithm is proposed to pick out the channel with the greatest probability of availability, which can meet the quality of service (QoS) requirement of urgent communications and effectively avoid conflict with licensed users. Specifically, the spatiotemporal correlations among historical spectrum sensing data are exploited to form prior knowledge of channel availability probability, and Bayesian inference is used to derive posterior probability of channel availability. Comparing with other spectrum detection methods, the proposed algorithm has more than 8 percent detection performance improvement at false alarm probability 0.2, and thus can avoid access conflict with licensed users dramatically. Furthermore, the proposed algorithm always has larger packet reception probability (PRP) and lower transmission delay compared with conventional VANET broadcasting. Hence, the proposed algorithm can improve reliability of safety-message transmission and enhance driving safety significantly.
papers.abstract_zh: 在车载自组织网络(VANET)中，通信的可靠性关系到行车安全。然而，研究表明，在某些紧急通信情况下，VANET的安全消息传输可能会发生拥塞。更多的频谱资源是解决传输拥塞的有效途径。因此，我们引入了认知无线电(CR)支持的VANET (CR-VANET)，其中CR设备可以检测VANET通信可能的空闲频谱，并协助及时广播安全消息。考虑到车辆的高速移动和信道可用性的动态变化，提出了一种新的预测算法来选择可用性概率最大的信道，以满足紧急通信的服务质量(QoS)要求，并有效避免与授权用户的冲突。具体而言，利用历史频谱感知数据之间的时空相关性来形成信道可用性概率的先验知识，并使用贝叶斯推理来导出信道可用性的后验概率。与其他频谱检测方法相比，该算法在虚警概率为0.2的情况下检测性能提高了8%以上，并能有效避免授权用户的接入冲突。此外，与传统的VANET广播相比，该算法总是具有更大的分组接收概率(PRP)和更低的传输延迟。因此，该算法可以提高安全信息传输的可靠性，显著提高驾驶安全性。
papers.title_zh: 具有认知无线电的车辆临时网络的历史光谱传感数据挖掘

papers.title: PBA: Prediction-Based Authentication for Vehicle-to-Vehicle Communications
papers.authors: Chen Lyu, Dawu Gu, Yunze Zeng, Prasant Mohapatra
papers.abstract: In vehicular networks, broadcast communications are critically important, as many safety-related applications rely on single-hop beacon messages broadcast to neighbor vehicles. However, it becomes a challenging problem to design a broadcast authentication scheme for secure vehicle-to-vehicle communications. Especially when a large number of beacons arrive in a short time, vehicles are vulnerable to computation-based Denial of Service (DoS) attacks that excessive signature verification exhausts their computational resources. In this paper, we propose an efficient broadcast authentication scheme called Prediction-Based Authentication (PBA) to not only defend against computation-based DoS attacks, but also resist packet losses caused by high mobility of vehicles. In contrast to most existing authentication schemes, our PBA is an efficient and lightweight scheme since it is primarily built on symmetric cryptography. To further reduce the verification delay for some emergency applications, PBA is designed to exploit the sender vehicle's ability to predict future beacons in advance. In addition, to prevent memory-based DoS attacks, PBA only stores shortened re-keyed Message Authentication Codes (MACs) of signatures without decreasing security. We analyze the security of our scheme and simulate PBA under varying vehicular network scenarios. The results demonstrate that PBA fast verifies almost 99 percent messages with low storage cost not only in high-density traffic environments but also in lossy wireless environments.
papers.abstract_zh: 在车载网络中，广播通信至关重要，因为许多安全相关应用依赖于向邻近车辆广播的单跳信标消息。然而，为安全的车对车通信设计广播认证方案成为一个具有挑战性的问题。特别是当大量信标在短时间内到达时，车辆容易受到基于计算的拒绝服务(DoS)攻击，过多的签名验证耗尽了它们的计算资源。本文提出了一种有效的广播认证方案，称为基于预测的认证(PBA ),不仅可以防御基于计算的拒绝服务攻击，还可以抵抗由于车辆的高移动性而导致的数据包丢失。与大多数现有的认证方案相比，我们的PBA是一个高效和轻量级的方案，因为它主要建立在对称加密的基础上。为了进一步减少某些紧急应用的验证延迟，PBA被设计成利用发送方车辆提前预测未来信标的能力。此外，为了防止基于内存的DoS攻击，PBA仅存储签名的缩短的重新密钥消息认证码(MAC ),而不会降低安全性。我们分析了方案的安全性，并在不同的车载网络场景下模拟了PBA。结果表明，不仅在高密度业务环境中，而且在有损耗的无线环境中，PBA都以低存储成本快速验证了几乎99%的消息。
papers.title_zh: PBA：基于预测的车辆到车辆通信的身份验证

papers.title: Impossible Differential Fault Analysis on the LED Lightweight Cryptosystem in the Vehicular Ad-Hoc Networks
papers.authors: Wei Li, Wenwen Zhang, Dawu Gu, Yanqin Cao, Zhi Tao, Zhihong Zhou, Ya Liu, Zhiqiang Liu
papers.abstract: With the advancement and deployment of leading-edge telecommunication technologies for sensing and collecting traffic related information, the vehicular ad-hoc networks (VANETs) have emerged as a new application scenario that is envisioned to revolutionize the human driving experiences and traffic flow control systems. To avoid any possible malicious attack and resource abuse, employing lightweight cryptosystems is widely recognized as one of the most effective approaches for the VANETs to achieve confidentiality, integrity and authentication. As a typical substitution-permutation network lightweight cryptosystem, LED supports 64-bit and 128-bit secret keys, which are flexible to provide security for the RFID and other highly-constrained devices in the VANETs. Since its introduction, some research of fault analysis has been devoted to attacking the last three rounds of LED. It is an open problem to know whether provoking faults at a former round of LED allows recovering the secret key. In this paper, we give an answer to this problem by showing a novel impossible differential fault analysis on one round earlier of all LED keysize variants. Mathematical analysis and simulating experiments show that the attack could recover the 64-bit and 128-bit secret keys of LED by introducing 48 faults and 96 faults in average, respectively. The result in this study describes that LED is vulnerable to a half byte impossible differential fault analysis. It will be beneficial to the analysis of the same type of other iterated lightweight cryptosystems in the VANETs.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着用于感测和收集交通相关信息的前沿电信技术的发展和部署，车载自组织网络(VANETs)已经作为一种新的应用场景出现，其被设想为彻底改变人类驾驶体验和交通流控制系统。为了避免任何可能的恶意攻击和资源滥用，采用轻量级密码系统被广泛认为是VANETs实现机密性、完整性和认证的最有效方法之一。作为一种典型的替代-置换网络轻量级密码系统，LED支持64位和128位密钥，可以灵活地为VANETs中的RFID和其他高度受限的设备提供安全性。自从它被引入以来，一些故障分析的研究一直致力于攻击LED的最后三轮。知道在前一轮LED上引起故障是否允许恢复密钥是一个公开的问题。在本文中，我们给出了这个问题的答案，通过显示一个新的不可能差分故障分析的一轮早期的所有LED按键尺寸的变化。数学分析和模拟实验表明，该攻击平均引入48个错误和96个错误，分别可以恢复64位和128位LED密钥。本研究的结果描述了LED易受半字节不可能差分故障分析的影响。这将有利于对VANETs中其他同类型的迭代轻量级密码系统的分析。
papers.title_zh: 在车辆临时网络中的LED轻型密码系统上的不可能的差分故障分析

papers.title: MixGroup: Accumulative Pseudonym Exchanging for Location Privacy Enhancement in Vehicular Social Networks
papers.authors: Rong Yu, Jiawen Kang, Xumin Huang, Shengli Xie, Yan Zhang, Stein Gjessing
papers.abstract: Vehicular social network (VSN) is envisioned to serve as an essential data sensing, exchanging and processing platform for the future Intelligent Transportation Systems. In this paper, we aim to address the location privacy issue in VSNs. In traditional pseudonym-based solutions, the privacy-preserving strength is mainly dependent on the number of vehicles meeting at the same occasion. We notice that an individual vehicle actually has many chances to meet several other vehicles. In most meeting occasions, there are only few vehicles appearing concurrently. Motivated by these observations, we propose a new privacy-preserving scheme, called MixGroup, which is capable of efficiently exploiting the sparse meeting opportunities for pseudonym changing. By integrating the group signature mechanism, MixGroup constructs extended pseudonym-changing regions, in which vehicles are allowed to successively exchange their pseudonyms. As a consequence, for the tracking adversary, the uncertainty of pseudonym mixture is accumulatively enlarged, and therefore location privacy preservation is considerably improved. We carry out simulations to verify the performance of MixGroup. Results indicate that MixGroup significantly outperforms the existing schemes. In addition, MixGroup is able to achieve favorable performance even in low traffic conditions.
papers.abstract_zh: 车载社交网络(VSN)是未来智能交通系统的重要数据感知、交换和处理平台。在本文中，我们的目标是解决位置隐私问题。在传统的基于假名的解决方案中，隐私保护的强度主要取决于在同一场合相遇的车辆的数量。我们注意到一辆车实际上有很多机会遇到其他几辆车。在大多数会议场合，只有很少的车辆同时出现。在这些观察的激励下，我们提出了一个新的隐私保护方案，称为MixGroup，它能够有效地利用假名改变的稀疏会议机会。通过集成群签名机制，MixGroup构建了扩展的假名交换区域，在该区域中，车辆被允许连续交换它们的假名。因此，对于跟踪对手来说，假名混合的不确定性被累积地放大，并且因此位置隐私保护被显著地改善。我们通过仿真来验证MixGroup的性能。结果表明，MixGroup明显优于现有方案。此外，MixGroup即使在低流量条件下也能实现良好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 混音组：累积化名交换以增强车辆社交网络的位置隐私增强

papers.title: A Pseudonym Management System to Achieve Anonymity in Vehicular Ad Hoc Networks
papers.authors: Hassan Artail, Noor Abbani
papers.abstract: In this paper we propose a framework for providing anonymity to communicating cars in VANETs. The anonymity is accomplished based on a system of pseudonym generation, distribution, and replenishing. The road side units (RSUs) play a key role in the framework by receiving the originally generated pseudonyms from the trusted authority, and then distributing pseudonym sets to cars while shuffling the sets amongst themselves to maximize anonymity. The pseudonym distribution process among the RSUs and to the vehicles is highly adaptive to accommodate the needs of the vehicles. We develop a distributed optimization algorithm for the shuffling process and a novel mechanism for cars to change their pseudonyms. Experimental evaluations based on ns3 simulations demonstrate the effectiveness of the framework through showing relatively high values of the used metric, namely the anonymity set.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个在VANETs中为通信车辆提供匿名的框架。匿名是基于假名生成、分配和补充的系统来实现的。路边单元(rsu)通过从可信机构接收最初生成的假名，然后将假名集合分配给汽车，同时在它们之间洗牌以最大化匿名性，从而在框架中扮演关键角色。rsu之间以及对车辆的假名分配过程是高度自适应的，以适应车辆的需求。我们开发了一个分布式优化算法的洗牌过程和一个新的机制，汽车改变他们的假名。基于ns3仿真的实验评估通过显示所使用的度量(即匿名集)的相对高的值来证明该框架的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 一个化名管理系统，可在车辆临时网络中实现匿名

papers.title: Trustworthy Parking Communities: Helping Your Neighbor to Find a Space
papers.authors: Julian Timpner, Dominik Schürmann, Lars C. Wolf
papers.abstract: Cooperation between vehicles facilitates traffic management, road safety and infotainment applications. Cooperation, however, requires trust in the validity of the received information. In this paper, we tackle the challenge of securely exchanging parking spot availability information. Trust is crucial in order to support the decision of whether the querying vehicle should rely on the received information about free parking spots close to its destination and thus ignore other potentially free spots on the way. Therefore, we propose Parking Communities, which provide a distributed and dynamic means to establish trusted groups of vehicles helping each other to securely find parking in their respective community area. Our approach is based on high-performance state-of-the-art encryption and signature algorithms as well as a well-understood mathematical trust rating model. This approach allows end-to-end encrypted request-response communications in combination with geocast and can be used as an overlay to existing vehicular networking technologies. We provide a comprehensive comparison with other security architectures and simulation results showing the feasibility of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 车辆之间的合作促进了交通管理、道路安全和信息娱乐应用。然而，合作需要信任所接收信息的有效性。在本文中，我们解决了安全交换停车位可用性信息的挑战。信任是至关重要的，以便支持查询车辆是否应该依赖于所接收的关于其目的地附近的空闲停车位的信息，从而忽略途中的其他潜在空闲停车位的决定。因此，我们提出停车社区，它提供了一种分布式和动态的方法来建立信任的车辆组，互相帮助，在各自的社区区域安全地找到停车位。我们的方法基于高性能的最先进的加密和签名算法，以及众所周知的数学信任评级模型。这种方法允许与geocast相结合的端到端加密请求-响应通信，并且可以用作现有车辆联网技术的覆盖层。我们提供了与其他安全体系结构的综合比较和仿真结果，表明了我们方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 值得信赖的停车社区：帮助您的邻居找到一个空间

papers.title: Bayesian Coalition Negotiation Game as a Utility for Secure Energy Management in a Vehicles-to-Grid Environment
papers.authors: Neeraj Kumar, Sudip Misra, Naveen K. Chilamkurti, Jong-Hyouk Lee, Joel J. P. C. Rodrigues
papers.abstract: In recent times, Plug-in Electric Vehicles (PEVs) have emerged as a new alternative to increase the efficiency of smart grids (SGs) in a vehicles-to-grid (V2G) environment. The V2G environment provides a bidirectional power and information flow, so that users can have an optimized usage as per their requirements. However, uncontrolled and unmanaged power distribution may lead to an overall performance degradation in V2G environment. One reason for this uncontrolled and unmanaged flow may be due to the usage of power by unauthorized users. To address this issue, we propose a Bayesian Coalition Negotiation Game (BCNG) as a utility for secure energy management for PEVs in the V2G environment. We have used a BCNG along with Learning Automata (LA), wherein LA are stationed on PEVs and are assumed as the players in the game. To provide an approach based on resilience for any misuse of electricity consumption, a new Secure Payoff Function (SPF) is proposed. The players take actions and update their action probability vector using the SPF. A Nash Equilibrium (NE) is also achieved in the game using convergence theory. Our proposal is evaluated with various metrics. The proposed scheme also provides mutual authentication and resilience against various attacks during power distribution.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，在车辆到电网(V2G)环境中，插电式电动汽车(pev)已经成为提高智能电网(SGs)效率的新选择。V2G环境提供双向电力和信息流，因此用户可以根据自己的需求优化使用。然而，不受控制和管理的配电可能会导致V2G环境中的整体性能下降。这种不受控制和管理的流动的一个原因可能是由于未经授权的用户使用电力。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一个贝叶斯联盟协商游戏(BCNG ),作为V2G环境下pev安全能源管理的工具。我们使用了BCNG和学习自动机(LA)，其中LA位于pev上，并被假设为游戏中的玩家。为了提供一种基于弹性的方法来防止任何电力消耗的滥用，提出了一种新的安全支付函数(SPF)。玩家采取行动，并使用SPF更新他们的行动概率向量。纳什均衡(NE)也是利用收敛理论在博弈中实现的。我们的提案是用各种指标评估的。所提出的方案还提供了相互认证和抵御配电期间各种攻击的弹性。
papers.title_zh: 贝叶斯联盟谈判游戏是在车辆到网格环境中安全能源管理的实用程序

papers.title: Guest Editors' Introduction: Special Issue on Cyber Crime
papers.authors: Wojciech Mazurczyk, Thomas Holt, Krzysztof Szczypiorski
papers.abstract: The twelve papers in this special section focus on the topic of cybercrimes. These computer crimes reflect the evolution of criminal practices that have adapted to the world of information and communication technologies. Cybercriminality has become a curse of the modern world with the potential to affect every one nationally and/or internationally. Individuals, companies, governments and institutions may become victims as well as (involuntary) helpers of cyber criminals. The inability to provide effective cyber-security can potentially have a tremendous socio-economic impact on global enterprises as well as individuals.
papers.abstract_zh: 这一专题部分的12篇论文重点讨论了网络犯罪这一主题。这些计算机犯罪反映了适应信息和通信技术世界的犯罪行为的演变。网络犯罪已经成为现代世界的一个祸害，有可能影响到国内和/或国际上的每一个人。个人、公司、政府和机构可能成为网络犯罪的受害者以及(非自愿的)帮助者。无法提供有效的网络安全可能会对全球企业和个人产生巨大的社会经济影响。
papers.title_zh: 客座编辑简介：有关网络犯罪的特刊

papers.title: Towards Building Forensics Enabled Cloud Through Secure Logging-as-a-Service
papers.authors: Shams Zawoad, Amit Kumar Dutta, Ragib Hasan
papers.abstract: Collection and analysis of various logs (e.g., process logs, network logs) are fundamental activities in computer forensics. Ensuring the security of the activity logs is therefore crucial to ensure reliable forensics investigations. However, because of the black-box nature of clouds and the volatility and co-mingling of cloud data, providing the cloud logs to investigators while preserving users' privacy and the integrity of logs is challenging. The current secure logging schemes, which consider the logger as trusted cannot be applied in clouds since there is a chance that cloud providers (logger) collude with malicious users or investigators to alter the logs. In this paper, we analyze the threats on cloud users' activity logs considering the collusion between cloud users, providers, and investigators. Based on the threat model, we propose Secure-Logging-as-a-Service ( SecLaaS), which preserves various logs generated for the activity of virtual machines running in clouds and ensures the confidentiality and integrity of such logs. Investigators or the court authority can only access these logs by the RESTful APIs provided by SecLaaS, which ensures confidentiality of logs. The integrity of the logs is ensured by hash-chain scheme and proofs of past logs published periodically by the cloud providers. In prior research, we used two accumulator schemes Bloom filter and RSA accumulator to build the proofs of past logs. In this paper, we propose a new accumulator scheme - Bloom-Tree, which performs better than the other two accumulators in terms of time and space requirement.
papers.abstract_zh: 各种日志(例如，进程日志、网络日志)的收集和分析是计算机取证中的基本活动。因此，确保活动日志的安全性对于确保可靠的取证调查至关重要。然而，由于云的黑盒性质以及云数据的易变和混合，在向调查人员提供云日志的同时保护用户的隐私和日志的完整性具有挑战性。当前的安全日志记录方案认为日志记录者是可信的，不能应用于云中，因为云提供商(日志记录者)有可能与恶意用户或调查者勾结来更改日志。本文考虑云用户、提供商和调查者之间的合谋，分析了云用户活动日志面临的威胁。在威胁模型的基础上，我们提出了安全日志即服务(SecLaaS ),它保存为运行在云中的虚拟机的活动而生成的各种日志，并确保这些日志的机密性和完整性。调查人员或法院当局只能通过SecLaaS提供的RESTful APIs访问这些日志，这确保了日志的机密性。日志的完整性由哈希链方案和云提供商定期发布的过去日志的证明来确保。在先前的研究中，我们使用两种累加器方案Bloom filter和RSA累加器来建立过去日志的证明。本文提出了一种新的累加器方案——Bloom-Tree，它在时间和空间需求方面都优于其他两种累加器。
papers.title_zh: 通过安全的伐木构建取证启用云，即服务

papers.title: Assessing the Effectiveness of Moving Target Defenses Using Security Models
papers.authors: Jin B. Hong, Dong Seong Kim
papers.abstract: Cyber crime is a developing concern, where criminals are targeting valuable assets and critical infrastructures within networked systems, causing a severe socio-economic impact on enterprises and individuals. Adopting moving target defense (MTD) helps thwart cyber attacks by continuously changing the attack surface. There are numerous MTD techniques proposed in various domains (e.g., virtualized network, wireless sensor network), but there is still a lack of methods to assess and compare the effectiveness of them. Security models, such as an attack graph (AG), provide a formal method of analyzing the security, but incorporating MTD techniques in those security models has not been studied. In this paper, we incorporate MTD techniques into a security model, namely a hierarchical attack representation model (HARM), to assess the effectiveness of them. In addition, we use importance measures (IMs) for deploying MTD techniques to enhance the scalability. Finally, we compare the scalability of AG and HARM when deploying MTD techniques, as well as changes in performance and security in our experiments.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络犯罪是一个不断发展的问题，犯罪分子将目标锁定在网络系统中的宝贵资产和关键基础设施，对企业和个人造成了严重的社会经济影响。采用移动目标防御(MTD)有助于通过不断改变攻击面来挫败网络攻击。在不同的领域(例如虚拟化网络、无线传感器网络)提出了许多MTD技术，但是仍然缺乏评估和比较它们的有效性的方法。诸如攻击图(AG)之类的安全模型提供了分析安全性的正式方法，但是还没有研究将MTD技术结合到这些安全模型中。在本文中，我们将MTD技术结合到一个安全模型中，即层次攻击表示模型(HARM ),以评估它们的有效性。此外，我们使用重要性度量(IMs)来部署MTD技术以增强可伸缩性。最后，我们比较了部署MTD技术时AG和HARM的可伸缩性，以及在实验中性能和安全性的变化。
papers.title_zh: 使用安全模型评估行动目标防御的有效性

papers.title: Data Lineage in Malicious Environments
papers.authors: Michael Backes, Niklas Grimm, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: Intentional or unintentional leakage of confidential data is undoubtedly one of the most severe security threats that organizations face in the digital era. The threat now extends to our personal lives: a plethora of personal information is available to social networks and smartphone providers and is indirectly transferred to untrustworthy third party and fourth party applications. In this work, we present a generic data lineage framework Lime for data flow across multiple entities that take two characteristic, principal roles (i.e., owner and consumer). We define the exact security guarantees required by such a data lineage mechanism toward identification of a guilty entity, and identify the simplifying non-repudiation and honesty assumptions. We then develop and analyze a novel accountable data transfer protocol between two entities within a malicious environment by building upon oblivious transfer, robust watermarking, and signature primitives. Finally, we perform an experimental evaluation to demonstrate the practicality of our protocol and apply our framework to the important data leakage scenarios of data outsourcing and social networks. In general, we consider Lime, our lineage framework for data transfer, to be an key step towards achieving accountability by design.
papers.abstract_zh: 机密数据的有意或无意泄漏无疑是组织在数字时代面临的最严重的安全威胁之一。这种威胁现在延伸到我们的个人生活:社交网络和智能手机提供商可以获得大量个人信息，并间接转移到不可信的第三方和第四方应用程序。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个通用的数据沿袭框架Lime，用于跨多个实体的数据流，这些实体具有两个特征，即主要角色(即所有者和消费者)。我们定义了这种数据沿袭机制对犯罪实体识别所需的确切安全保证，并确定了简化的不可否认性和诚实性假设。然后，我们通过建立在不经意传输、鲁棒水印和签名原语的基础上，开发并分析了恶意环境中两个实体之间的新型可问责数据传输协议。最后，我们进行了一个实验评估来证明我们的协议的实用性，并将我们的框架应用到数据外包和社交网络的重要数据泄漏场景中。总的来说，我们认为Lime，我们用于数据传输的沿袭框架，是实现设计问责制的关键一步。
papers.title_zh: 恶意环境中的数据血统

papers.title: Malware Detection in Cloud Computing Infrastructures
papers.authors: Michael R. Watson, Noor-ul-Hassan Shirazi, Angelos K. Marnerides, Andreas Mauthe, David Hutchison
papers.abstract: Cloud services are prominent within the private, public and commercial domains. Many of these services are expected to be always on and have a critical nature; therefore, security and resilience are increasingly important aspects. In order to remain resilient, a cloud needs to possess the ability to react not only to known threats, but also to new challenges that target cloud infrastructures. In this paper we introduce and discuss an online cloud anomaly detection approach, comprising dedicated detection components of our cloud resilience architecture. More specifically, we exhibit the applicability of novelty detection under the one-class support Vector Machine (SVM) formulation at the hypervisor level, through the utilisation of features gathered at the system and network levels of a cloud node. We demonstrate that our scheme can reach a high detection accuracy of over <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX"> $90$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="watson-ieq1-2457918.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> percent whilst detecting various types of malware and DoS attacks. Furthermore, we evaluate the merits of considering not only system-level data, but also network-level data depending on the attack type. Finally, the paper shows that our approach to detection using dedicated monitoring components per VM is particularly applicable to cloud scenarios and leads to a flexible detection system capable of detecting new malware strains with no prior knowledge of their functionality or their underlying instructions.
papers.abstract_zh: 云服务在私有、公共和商业领域都很突出。这些服务中的许多被期望总是开启的，并且具有关键的性质；因此，安全性和弹性是越来越重要的方面。为了保持弹性，云不仅需要能够应对已知威胁，还需要能够应对针对云基础架构的新挑战。在本文中，我们介绍并讨论了一种在线云异常检测方法，包括我们的云弹性架构的专用检测组件。更具体地，我们通过利用在云节点的系统和网络级别收集的特征，展示了在虚拟机管理程序级别的单类支持向量机(SVM)公式下的新颖性检测的适用性。我们证明，我们的方案可以达到超过< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 90 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:type = " simple " xlink:href = " Watson-ie Q1-2457918 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的高检测准确率，同时检测各种类型的恶意软件和DoS攻击。此外，我们评估了不仅考虑系统级数据，而且根据攻击类型考虑网络级数据的优点。最后，该论文表明，我们使用每个虚拟机的专用监控组件进行检测的方法特别适用于云场景，并导致灵活的检测系统能够检测新的恶意软件菌株，而无需事先了解它们的功能或它们的底层指令。
papers.title_zh: 云计算基础架构中的恶意软件检测

papers.title: Hacking Is Not Random: A Case-Control Study of Webserver-Compromise Risk
papers.authors: Marie Vasek, John Wadleigh, Tyler Moore
papers.abstract: We describe a case-control study to identify risk factors that are associated with higher rates of webserver compromise. We inspect a random sample of around 200,000 webservers and automatically identify attributes hypothesized to affect the susceptibility to compromise, notably content management system (CMS) and webserver type. We then cross-list this information with data on webservers hacked to serve phishing pages or redirect to unlicensed online pharmacies. We find that webservers running WordPress and Joomla are more likely to be hacked than those not running any CMS, and that servers running Apache and Nginx are more likely to be hacked than those running Microsoft IIS. We also identify several WordPress plugins and Joomla extensions that associated with compromise. Furthermore, using a series of logistic regressions, we find that a CMS's market share is positively correlated with website compromise. Surprisingly, we find that webservers running outdated software are less likely to be compromised than those running up-to date software. We present evidence that this is true for core WordPress software (the most popular CMS platform) and many associated plugins. Finally, we examine what happens to webservers following compromise. We find that under 5 percent of hacked WordPress websites are subsequently updated, but those that do are recompromised about half as often as those that do not update.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们描述了一项病例对照研究，以确定与较高的web服务器危害率相关的风险因素。我们检查了大约200，000个web服务器的随机样本，并自动识别假设影响易受攻击性的属性，特别是内容管理系统(CMS)和web服务器类型。然后，我们将这些信息与被黑客攻击的网络服务器上的数据进行交叉列表，以提供钓鱼网页或重定向到未经许可的在线药店。我们发现，运行WordPress和Joomla的web服务器比不运行任何CMS的服务器更容易被黑客攻击，运行Apache和Nginx的服务器比运行微软IIS的服务器更容易被黑客攻击。我们还发现了几个与危害相关的WordPress插件和Joomla扩展。此外，使用一系列的逻辑回归，我们发现一个CMS的市场份额正相关的网站妥协。令人惊讶的是，我们发现运行过时软件的web服务器比运行最新软件的web服务器更不容易受到攻击。我们提出证据证明核心WordPress软件(最流行的CMS平台)和许多相关插件都是如此。最后，我们检查在妥协之后web服务器会发生什么。我们发现，不到5%被黑的WordPress网站随后会更新，但那些更新的网站被重新攻击的频率大约是那些不更新的网站的一半。
papers.title_zh: 黑客不是随机的：Web-Compromise风险的病例对照研究

papers.title: Leveraging Strategic Detection Techniques for Smart Home Pricing Cyberattacks
papers.authors: Yang Liu, Shiyan Hu, Tsung-Yi Ho
papers.abstract: In this work, the vulnerability of the electricity pricing model in the smart home system is assessed. Two closely related pricing cyberattacks which manipulate the guideline electricity prices received at smart meters are considered and they aim at reducing the expense of the cyberattacker and increasing the peak energy usage in the local community. A single event detection technique which uses support vector regression and impact difference for detecting anomaly pricing is proposed. The detection capability of such a technique is still limited since it does not model the long term impact of pricing cyberattacks. This motivates us to develop a partially observable Markov decision process based detection algorithm, which has the ingredients such as reward expectation and policy transfer graph to account for the cumulative impact and the potential future impact due to pricing cyberattacks. Our simulation results demonstrate that the pricing cyberattack can reduce the cyberattacker's bill by 34.3 percent at cost of the increase of others' bill by 7.9 percent, and increase the peak to average ratio (PAR) by 35.7 percent. Furthermore, the proposed long term detection technique has the detection accuracy of more than 97 percent with significant reduction in PAR and bill compared to repeatedly using the single event detection technique.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，评估了智能家居系统中电价模型的脆弱性。考虑操纵智能电表接收的指导电价的两种密切相关的定价网络攻击，它们旨在降低网络攻击者的费用并增加当地社区的峰值用电量。提出了一种利用支持向量回归和影响差检测异常定价的单事件检测技术。这种技术的检测能力仍然有限，因为它没有对定价网络攻击的长期影响进行建模。这促使我们开发一种基于部分可观察马尔可夫决策过程的检测算法，该算法具有诸如回报期望和策略转移图的成分，以说明由于定价网络攻击而产生的累积影响和潜在的未来影响。我们的模拟结果表明，定价网络攻击可以减少网络攻击者的账单34.3%，而其他人的账单增加7.9%，峰均比(PAR)增加35.7%。此外，与重复使用单事件检测技术相比，所提出的长期检测技术具有超过97%的检测准确度，并且PAR和bill显著降低。
papers.title_zh: 利用智能家居定价网络攻击的战略检测技术

papers.title: An Empirical Study of HTTP-based Financial Botnets
papers.authors: Aditya K. Sood, Sherali Zeadally, Richard J. Enbody
papers.abstract: Cyber criminals are covertly attacking critical infrastructures, and botnets are a common component of those attacks. In recent years, botnets have been shifting their focus from broad-based attacks to more targeted ones such as attacking financial institutions, especially banks. The primary reason for this shift towards financial institutions is that, where the money is. We present an empirical study of the components, features and operations of some of the most widely deployed HTTP-based financial botnets (such as Zeus, SpyEye, ICE 1X, Citadel, Carberp, Tinba, Bugat and Shylock). Our study provides critical insights into the design of these botnets and should help the security community to generate intelligence and develop more robust security solutions to defend against cyber attacks by these botnets. In addition, our comparative analysis of insidious techniques pertaining to Command and Control (C&C) communication, system exploitation and data exfiltration also provides an effective and a holistic view of the capabilities of HTTP-based financial botnets. This study also highlights the evolution of various HTTP-based financial botnets over a period of time. Finally, we discuss security solutions that can help mitigate some of the techniques used by HTTP-based financial botnets.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络罪犯正在秘密攻击关键基础设施，僵尸网络是这些攻击的常见组成部分。近年来，僵尸网络已经将他们的重点从广泛的攻击转移到更有针对性的攻击，例如攻击金融机构，特别是银行。向金融机构转移的主要原因是，哪里有钱。我们对一些部署最广泛的基于HTTP的金融僵尸网络(如Zeus、SpyEye、ICE 1X、Citadel、Carberp、Tinba、Bugat和Shylock)的组件、功能和操作进行了实证研究。我们的研究为这些僵尸网络的设计提供了重要的见解，应该有助于安全社区生成情报并开发更强大的安全解决方案来抵御这些僵尸网络的网络攻击。此外，我们对与命令和控制(C&C)通信、系统利用和数据渗透相关的隐蔽技术的比较分析也提供了基于HTTP的金融僵尸网络能力的有效和全面的视图。这项研究还强调了各种基于HTTP的金融僵尸网络在一段时间内的演变。最后，我们讨论可以帮助减轻基于HTTP的金融僵尸网络所使用的一些技术的安全解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 基于HTTP的金融僵尸网络的实证研究

papers.title: Industrial Control System Network Intrusion Detection by Telemetry Analysis
papers.authors: Stanislav Ponomarev, Travis Atkison
papers.abstract: Until recently, industrial control systems (ICSs) used “air-gap” security measures, where every node of the ICS network was isolated from other networks, including the Internet, by a physical disconnect. Attaching ICS networks to the Internet benefits companies and engineers who use them. However, as these systems were designed for use in the air-gapped security environment, protocols used by ICSs contain little to no security features and are vulnerable to various attacks. This paper proposes an approach to detect the intrusions into network attached ICSs by measuring and verifying data that is transmitted through the network but is not inherently the data used by the transmission protocol-network telemetry. Using simulated PLC units, the developed IDS was able to achieve 94.3 percent accuracy when differentiating between machines of an attacker and engineer on the same network, and 99.5 percent accuracy when differentiating between attacker and engineer on the Internet.
papers.abstract_zh: 直到最近，工业控制系统(ICSs)还使用“空气间隙”安全措施，即通过物理断开将ICS网络的每个节点与其他网络(包括互联网)隔离开来。将ICS网络接入互联网有利于使用它们的公司和工程师。然而，由于这些系统是为在有空气间隙的安全环境中使用而设计的，ICSs使用的协议包含很少甚至没有安全特征，并且容易受到各种攻击。本文提出了一种方法，通过测量和验证通过网络传输的数据来检测对网络附加ICSs的入侵，但这些数据本身并不是传输协议-网络遥测所使用的数据。使用模拟PLC单元，开发的IDS在区分同一网络上的攻击者和工程师的机器时能够达到94.3%的准确性，在区分互联网上的攻击者和工程师时能够达到99.5%的准确性。
papers.title_zh: 工业控制系统网络入侵通过遥测分析检测

papers.title: Measuring the Influence of Perceived Cybercrime Risk on Online Service Avoidance
papers.authors: Markus Riek, Rainer Böhme, Tyler Moore
papers.abstract: Cybercrime is a pervasive threat for today's Internet-dependent society. While the real extent and economic impact is hard to quantify, scientists and officials agree that cybercrime is a huge and still growing problem. A substantial fraction of cybercrime's overall costs to society can be traced to indirect opportunity costs, resulting from unused online services. This paper presents a parsimonious model that builds on technology acceptance research and insights from criminology to identify factors that reduce Internet users' intention to use online services. We hypothesize that avoidance of online banking, online shopping and online social networking is increased by cybercrime victimization and media reports. The effects are mediated by the perceived risk of cybercrime and moderated by the user's confidence online. We test our hypotheses using a structural equation modeling analysis of a representative pan-European sample. Our empirical results confirm the negative impact of perceived risk of cybercrime on the use of all three online service categories and support the role of cybercrime experience as an antecedent of perceived risk of cybercrime. We further show that more confident Internet users perceive less cybercriminal risk and are more likely to use online banking and online shopping, which highlights the importance of consumer education.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络犯罪是当今依赖互联网的社会的普遍威胁。虽然真实的程度和经济影响很难量化，但科学家和官员们一致认为网络犯罪是一个巨大且仍在增长的问题。网络犯罪给社会造成的总体成本中有很大一部分可以追溯到间接机会成本，这是由未使用的在线服务造成的。本文提出了一个简约模型，该模型基于技术接受研究和犯罪学的见解，以确定降低互联网用户使用在线服务意向的因素。我们假设网络犯罪受害者和媒体报道增加了对网上银行、网上购物和网上社交网络的回避。这种影响由感知的网络犯罪风险来调节，并由用户的网上信心来调节。我们使用一个代表性的泛欧样本的结构方程模型分析来检验我们的假设。我们的实证结果证实了感知的网络犯罪风险对所有三种在线服务类别的使用的负面影响，并支持网络犯罪体验作为感知的网络犯罪风险的前因的作用。我们进一步表明，更自信的互联网用户认为网络犯罪风险更小，更有可能使用网上银行和网上购物，这突出了消费者教育的重要性。
papers.title_zh: 衡量感知到的网络犯罪风险对在线服务回避的影响

papers.title: A Support Vector Machine-Based Framework for Detection of Covert Timing Channels
papers.authors: Pradhumna Lal Shrestha, Michael Hempel, Fahimeh Rezaei, Hamid Sharif
papers.abstract: Covert channels exploit side channels within existing network resources to transmit secret messages. They are integrated into the elements of network resources that were not even designed for the purpose of communication. This means that traditional security features like firewalls cannot detect them. Their ability to evade detection makes covert channels a grave security concern. Hence, it is imperative to detect and disrupt them. However, a generic mechanism that can be used to detect a large variety of covert channels is missing. In this paper, we propose a support vector machine (SVM)-based framework for reliable detection of covert communications. The machine learning framework utilizes the fingerprints derived from the traffic under investigation to classify the traffic as covert or overt. We trained our classifier using the fingerprints from four popular and diverse covert timing channel algorithms and tested each of them independently. We have shown that the machine learning framework has great potential to blindly detect covert channels, even when the covert message size is reduced.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐蔽信道利用现有网络资源中的副信道来传输秘密消息。它们被集成到网络资源的元素中，这些元素甚至不是为通信目的而设计的。这意味着防火墙等传统安全功能无法检测到它们。他们逃避检测的能力使得秘密通道成为一个严重的安全隐患。因此，检测和破坏它们是当务之急。然而，一个通用的机制，可以用来检测各种各样的隐蔽通道是失踪。在本文中，我们提出了一个基于支持向量机(SVM)的框架，用于可靠地检测隐蔽通信。机器学习框架利用从被调查的流量中获得的指纹来将流量分类为隐蔽的或公开的。我们使用来自四种流行且不同的隐蔽时间通道算法的指纹来训练我们的分类器，并且独立地测试它们中的每一个。我们已经表明，机器学习框架具有盲检测隐蔽信道的巨大潜力，即使当隐蔽消息大小减小时。
papers.title_zh: 一个基于支持向量机器的框架，用于检测秘密定时通道

papers.title: Achieving Flatness: Selecting the Honeywords from Existing User Passwords
papers.authors: Imran Erguler
papers.abstract: Recently, Juels and Rivest proposed honeywords (decoy passwords) to detect attacks against hashed password databases. For each user account, the legitimate password is stored with several honeywords in order to sense impersonation. If honeywords are selected properly, a cyber-attacker who steals a file of hashed passwords cannot be sure if it is the real password or a honeyword for any account. Moreover, entering with a honeyword to login will trigger an alarm notifying the administrator about a password file breach. At the expense of increasing the storage requirement by 20 times, the authors introduce a simple and effective solution to the detection of password file disclosure events. In this study, we scrutinize the honeyword system and present some remarks to highlight possible weak points. Also, we suggest an alternative approach that selects the honeywords from existing user passwords in the system in order to provide realistic honeywords-a perfectly flat honeyword generation method-and also to reduce storage cost of the honeyword scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，Juels和Rivest提出了honeywords(诱饵密码)来检测针对哈希密码数据库的攻击。对于每个用户帐户，合法密码与几个甜言蜜语存储在一起，以检测假冒。如果甜言蜜语选择得当，窃取散列密码文件的网络攻击者无法确定这是真实密码还是任何帐户的甜言蜜语。此外，输入蜜语登录将触发警报，通知管理员密码文件被破坏。以存储需求增加20倍为代价，作者介绍了一种简单有效的检测密码文件泄露事件的解决方案。在这项研究中，我们仔细检查了蜜语系统，并提出了一些意见，以突出可能的弱点。此外，我们建议一种替代方法，从系统中现有的用户密码中选择蜜语，以便提供真实的蜜语——一种完美的平面蜜语生成方法——并且还减少蜜语方案的存储成本。
papers.title_zh: 实现平坦度：从现有用户密码中选择Honeywords

papers.title: FRoDO: Fraud Resilient Device for Off-Line Micro-Payments
papers.authors: Vanesa Daza, Roberto Di Pietro, Flavio Lombardi, Matteo Signorini
papers.abstract: Credit and debit card data theft is one of the earliest forms of cybercrime. Still, it is one of the most common nowadays. Attackers often aim at stealing such customer data by targeting the Point of Sale (for short, PoS) system, i.e. the point at which a retailer first acquires customer data. Modern PoS systems are powerful computers equipped with a card reader and running specialized software. Increasingly often, user devices are leveraged as input to the PoS. In these scenarios, malware that can steal card data as soon as they are read by the device has flourished. As such, in cases where customer and vendor are persistently or intermittently disconnected from the network, no secure on-line payment is possible. This paper describes FRoDO, a secure off-line micro-payment solution that is resilient to PoS data breaches. Our solution improves over up to date approaches in terms of flexibility and security. To the best of our knowledge, FRoDO is the first solution that can provide secure fully off-line payments while being resilient to all currently known PoS breaches. In particular, we detail FRoDO architecture, components, and protocols. Further, a thorough analysis of FRoDO functional and security properties is provided, showing its effectiveness and viability.
papers.abstract_zh: 信用卡和借记卡数据盗窃是最早的网络犯罪形式之一。尽管如此，它仍然是当今最常见的一种。攻击者通常以销售点(简称PoS)系统为目标，即零售商首次获取客户数据的点，从而窃取此类客户数据。现代PoS系统是功能强大的计算机，配有读卡器并运行专门的软件。越来越多的时候，用户设备被用作PoS的输入。在这些情况下，一旦被设备读取，就可以窃取卡数据的恶意软件大量出现。因此，在顾客和卖主持续或间歇地与网络断开连接的情况下，不可能进行安全的在线支付。本文介绍了FRoDO，这是一种安全的离线小额支付解决方案，可抵御PoS数据泄露。我们的解决方案在灵活性和安全性方面比最新的方法有所改进。据我们所知，FRoDO是第一个能够提供安全的完全离线支付的解决方案，同时能够抵御所有当前已知的PoS违规行为。特别是，我们详细介绍了FRoDO的体系结构、组件和协议。此外，还提供了对FRoDO功能和安全属性的全面分析，显示了其有效性和可行性。
papers.title_zh: Frodo：离线微付款的欺诈弹性设备

papers.title: Enabling Fine-Grained Multi-Keyword Search Supporting Classified Sub-Dictionaries over Encrypted Cloud Data
papers.authors: Hongwei Li, Yi Yang, Tom H. Luan, Xiaohui Liang, Liang Zhou, Xuemin Sherman Shen
papers.abstract: Using cloud computing, individuals can store their data on remote servers and allow data access to public users through the cloud servers. As the outsourced data are likely to contain sensitive privacy information, they are typically encrypted before uploaded to the cloud. This, however, significantly limits the usability of outsourced data due to the difficulty of searching over the encrypted data. In this paper, we address this issue by developing the fine-grained multi-keyword search schemes over encrypted cloud data. Our original contributions are three-fold. First, we introduce the relevance scores and preference factors upon keywords which enable the precise keyword search and personalized user experience. Second, we develop a practical and very efficient multi-keyword search scheme. The proposed scheme can support complicated logic search the mixed “AND”, “OR” and “NO” operations of keywords. Third, we further employ the classified sub-dictionaries technique to achieve better efficiency on index building, trapdoor generating and query. Lastly, we analyze the security of the proposed schemes in terms of confidentiality of documents, privacy protection of index and trapdoor, and unlinkability of trapdoor. Through extensive experiments using the real-world dataset, we validate the performance of the proposed schemes. Both the security analysis and experimental results demonstrate that the proposed schemes can achieve the same security level comparing to the existing ones and better performance in terms of functionality, query complexity and efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 使用云计算，个人可以将他们的数据存储在远程服务器上，并允许公共用户通过云服务器访问数据。由于外包的数据可能包含敏感的隐私信息，它们通常在上传到云之前被加密。然而，由于难以搜索加密数据，这极大地限制了外包数据的可用性。在本文中，我们通过开发加密云数据上的细粒度多关键字搜索方案来解决这个问题。我们最初的贡献有三个方面。首先，我们引入关键字的相关性分数和偏好因子，这使得精确的关键字搜索和个性化的用户体验成为可能。其次，我们开发了一个实用且非常有效的多关键字搜索方案。该方案可以支持复杂的逻辑搜索，即关键字的“与”、“或”和“否”混合运算。第三，我们进一步使用分类子字典技术来提高索引建立、陷门生成和查询的效率。最后，我们从文档的机密性、索引和陷门的隐私保护以及陷门的不可链接性等方面分析了所提方案的安全性。通过使用真实数据集的大量实验，我们验证了所提出方案的性能。安全性分析和实验结果表明，与现有方案相比，所提出的方案可以达到相同的安全级别，并且在功能性、查询复杂度和效率方面具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 在加密的云数据上启用精细粒度多键搜索，支持分类的符号

papers.title: Group Key Agreement with Local Connectivity
papers.authors: Shaoquan Jiang
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study a group key agreement problem where a user is only aware of his neighbors while the connectivity graph is arbitrary. In our problem, there is no centralized initialization for users. A group key agreement with these features is very suitable for social networks. Under our setting, we construct two efficient protocols with passive security. We obtain lower bounds on the round complexity for this type of protocol, which demonstrates that our constructions are round efficient. Finally, we construct an actively secure protocol from a passively secure one.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究了一个组密钥协商问题，其中用户只知道他的邻居，而连接图是任意的。在我们的问题中，没有对用户进行集中初始化。具有这些特征的组密钥协商非常适合于社交网络。在我们的背景下，我们构造了两个有效的被动安全协议。我们得到了这类协议的轮复杂度的下界，这表明我们的构造是轮有效的。最后，我们从一个被动安全协议构造了一个主动安全协议。
papers.title_zh: 与本地连接的小组密钥协议

papers.title: Inference Attack on Browsing History of Twitter Users Using Public Click Analytics and Twitter Metadata
papers.authors: Jonghyuk Song, Sangho Lee, Jong Kim
papers.abstract: Twitter is a popular online social network service for sharing short messages (tweets) among friends. Its users frequently use URL shortening services that provide (i) a short alias of a long URL for sharing it via tweets and (ii) public click analytics of shortened URLs. The public click analytics is provided in an aggregated form to preserve the privacy of individual users. In this paper, we propose practical attack techniques inferring who clicks which shortened URLs on Twitter using the combination of public information: Twitter metadata and public click analytics. Unlike the conventional browser history stealing attacks, our attacks only demand publicly available information provided by Twitter and URL shortening services. Evaluation results show that our attack can compromise Twitter users' privacy with high accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: Twitter是一种流行的在线社交网络服务，用于在朋友之间分享短信息(tweets)。它的用户经常使用URL缩短服务，这些服务提供(I)一个长URL的短别名，用于通过tweets分享它，以及(ii)对缩短的URL的公共点击分析。公众点击分析以汇总的形式提供，以保护个人用户的隐私。在本文中，我们提出了实用的攻击技术，通过结合使用公共信息:Twitter元数据和公共点击分析来推断谁点击了Twitter上的哪个缩短的URL。与传统的浏览器历史窃取攻击不同，我们的攻击只需要Twitter和URL缩短服务提供的公开可用信息。评估结果表明，我们的攻击能够以较高的准确率泄露Twitter用户的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 使用公共点击分析和Twitter元数据对Twitter用户浏览历史记录的推断攻击

papers.title: netCSI: A Generic Fault Diagnosis Algorithm for Large-Scale Failures in Computer Networks
papers.authors: Srikar Tati, Scott Rager, Bong Jun Ko, Guohong Cao, Ananthram Swami, Thomas La Porta
papers.abstract: We present a framework and a set of algorithms for determining faults in networks when large scale outages occur. The design principles of our algorithm, netCSI, are motivated by the fact that failures are geographically clustered in such cases. We address the challenge of determining faults with incomplete symptom information due to a limited number of reporting nodes. netCSI consists of two parts: a hypotheses generation algorithm, and a ranking algorithm. When constructing the hypothesis list of potential causes, we make novel use of positive and negative symptoms to improve the precision of the results. In addition, we propose pruning and thresholding along with a dynamic threshold value selector, to reduce the complexity of our algorithm. The ranking algorithm is based on conditional failure probability models that account for the geographic correlation of the network objects in clustered failures. We evaluate the performance of netCSI for networks with both random and realistic topologies. We compare the performance of netCSI with an existing fault diagnosis algorithm, MAX-COVERAGE, and demonstrate an average gain of 128 percent in accuracy for realistic topologies.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个框架和一套算法来确定网络故障时，大规模停电发生。我们的算法netCSI的设计原则是基于这样一个事实:在这种情况下，故障在地理上是聚集的。我们解决了由于报告节点数量有限而导致故障征兆信息不完整的问题。netCSI由两部分组成:假设生成算法和排序算法。当构建潜在原因的假设列表时，我们新颖地使用阳性和阴性症状来提高结果的精确度。此外，我们提出剪枝和阈值以及动态阈值选择器，以降低我们的算法的复杂性。排序算法基于条件故障概率模型，该模型考虑了集群故障中网络对象的地理相关性。我们评估了netCSI在随机和真实拓扑网络中的性能。我们将netCSI的性能与现有的故障诊断算法MAX-COVERAGE进行了比较，并展示了在实际拓扑结构中128%的平均准确性增益。
papers.title_zh: NETCSI：计算机网络中大规模故障的通用故障诊断算法

papers.title: Privacy Protection for Wireless Medical Sensor Data
papers.authors: Xun Yi, Athman Bouguettaya, Dimitrios Georgakopoulos, Andy Song, Jan Willemson
papers.abstract: In recent years, wireless sensor networks have been widely used in healthcare applications, such as hospital and home patient monitoring.
