Wireless medical sensor networks are more vulnerable to eavesdropping, modification, impersonation and replaying attacks than the wired networks. A lot of work has been done to secure wireless medical sensor networks. The existing solutions can protect the patient data during transmission, but cannot stop the inside attack where the administrator of the patient database reveals the sensitive patient data. In this paper, we propose a practical approach to prevent the inside attack by using multiple data servers to store patient data. The main contribution of this paper is securely distributing the patient data in multiple data servers and employing the Paillier and ElGamal cryptosystems to perform statistic analysis on the patient data without compromising the patients' privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，无线传感器网络已广泛应用于医疗保健领域，如医院和家庭病人监护。无线医疗传感器网络比有线网络更容易受到窃听、篡改、假冒和重放攻击。为了保证无线医疗传感器网络的安全，已经做了大量的工作。现有的解决方案可以在传输过程中保护患者数据，但是不能阻止患者数据库的管理员泄露敏感患者数据的内部攻击。在本文中，我们提出了一种实用的方法来防止内部攻击，使用多个数据服务器来存储病人数据。本文的主要贡献是将病人数据安全地分布在多个数据服务器中，并采用Paillier和ElGamal密码系统对病人数据进行统计分析，而不损害病人的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 无线医疗传感器数据的隐私保护

papers.title: Sequence Diagram Aided Privacy Policy Specification
papers.authors: Hui Shen, Ram Krishnan, Rocky Slavin, Jianwei Niu
papers.abstract: A fundamental problem in the specification of regulatory privacy policies such as the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) in a computer system is to state the policies precisely, consistent with their high-level intuition. In this paper, we propose UML sequence diagrams as a practical means to graphically express privacy policies. A graphical representation allows decision-makers such as application domain experts and security architects to easily verify and confirm the expected behavior. Once intuitively confirmed, our work in this article introduces an algorithmic approach to formalizing the semantics of sequence diagrams in terms of linear temporal logic (LTL) templates. In all the templates, different semantic aspects are expressed as separate, yet simple LTL formulas that can be composed to define the complex semantics of sequence diagrams. The formalization enables us to leverage the analytical powers of automated decision procedures for LTL formulas to determine if a collection of sequence diagrams is consistent, independent, etc. and also to verify if a system design conforms to the privacy policies. We evaluate our approach by modeling and analyzing a substantial subset of HIPAA rules using sequence diagrams.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算机系统中诸如健康保险便携性和责任法案(HIPAA)之类的监管隐私政策的规范中的一个基本问题是精确地陈述政策，与它们的高级直觉一致。在本文中，我们提出了UML序列图作为一种图形化表达隐私策略的实用方法。图形表示允许决策者(如应用程序领域专家和安全架构师)轻松验证和确认预期行为。一旦直观地得到证实，我们在本文中的工作介绍了一种算法方法，根据线性时序逻辑(LTL)模板来形式化序列图的语义。在所有的模板中，不同的语义方面被表示为独立的，但是简单的LTL公式，这些公式可以被组合来定义序列图的复杂语义。形式化使我们能够利用LTL公式的自动决策过程的分析能力来确定序列图的集合是否一致、独立等。以及验证系统设计是否符合隐私策略。我们通过使用序列图建模和分析HIPAA规则的主要子集来评估我们的方法。
papers.title_zh: 序列图帮助隐私政策规范

papers.title: Wireless Communications under Broadband Reactive Jamming Attacks
papers.authors: Song Fang, Yao Liu, Peng Ning
papers.abstract: A reactive jammer jams wireless channels only when target devices are transmitting; Compared to constant jamming, reactive jamming is harder to track and compensate against [2], [38]. Frequency hopping spread spectrum (FHSS) and direct sequence spread spectrum (DSSS) have been widely used as countermeasures against jamming attacks. However, both will fail if the jammer jams all frequency channels or has high transmit power. In this paper, we propose an anti-jamming communication system that allows communication in the presence of a broadband and high power reactive jammer. The proposed system transmits messages by harnessing the reaction time of a reactive jammer. It does not assume a reactive jammer with limited spectrum coverage and transmit power, and thus can be used in scenarios where traditional approaches fail. We develop a prototype of the proposed system using GNURadio. Our experimental evaluation shows that when a powerful reactive jammer is present, the prototype still keeps communication, whereas other schemes such as 802.11 DSSS fail completely.
papers.abstract_zh: 反应式干扰器只有在目标设备发射时才会干扰无线信道；与持续干扰相比，反应式干扰更难跟踪和补偿[2]、[38]。跳频扩频(FHSS)和直接序列扩频(DSSS)已被广泛用作对抗干扰攻击的手段。然而，如果干扰器干扰所有频道或具有高发射功率，两者都将失败。在本文中，我们提出了一种抗干扰通信系统，它允许在存在宽带和高功率反应式干扰机的情况下进行通信。所提出的系统通过利用反应式干扰器的反应时间来传输消息。它不假设反应式干扰器具有有限的频谱覆盖和发射功率，因此可以在传统方法失败的情况下使用。我们使用GNURadio开发了一个原型系统。我们的实验评估表明，当存在强大的反应式干扰机时，原型仍然保持通信，而其他方案如802.11 DSSS则完全失败。
papers.title_zh: 宽带反应性干扰攻击下的无线通信

papers.title: Editor's Note
papers.authors: Elisa Bertino, Dario Catalano, Qi Li, Alex X. Liu, Anna Cinzia Squicciarini, Alexey V. Vinel
papers.title_zh: 编者注

papers.title: A Provenance-Aware Access Control Framework with Typed Provenance
papers.authors: Lianshan Sun, Jaehong Park, Dang Nguyen, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Provenance is a directed graph that captures historical information about data items in Provenance-Aware Systems (PAS). A variety of access control models and policy languages specific to PAS have been recently discussed in literature. However, it is still not clear how to efficiently specify provenance-aware access control policies and how to effectively enforce these policies with respect to complex provenance graph that can only be captured at run-time. To this end, we design and implement a provenance-aware access control framework with a layered architecture that features an abstract layer, including a Typed Provenance Model (TPM) and a set of TPM interpreters. TPM includes a set of abstract provenance types enabling efficient specification of provenance-aware policies. New provenance types can be composed of extant ones for specifying new policies. TPM interpreters can be integrated to enable the policy enforcement with respect to provenance graphs in different physical representations. By treating provenance types as special attributes, the proposed framework enables an adoption of provenance-aware access control in existing attribute-based access control frameworks, such as XACML-compliant ones. We implement the proposed framework by extending SUN's XACML implementation and show that it facilitates the specification of provenance-aware policies in XACML with minor extensions. We also analyze the performance of the proposed framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 出处是一个有向图，它捕获了有关出处感知系统(PAS)中数据项的历史信息。最近在文献中讨论了各种特定于PAS的访问控制模型和策略语言。然而，仍然不清楚如何有效地指定知晓出处的访问控制策略，以及如何针对只能在运行时捕获的复杂出处图有效地实施这些策略。为此，我们设计并实现了一个具有分层架构的起源感知访问控制框架，该框架具有一个抽象层，包括一个类型化的起源模型(TPM)和一组TPM解释器。TPM包括一组抽象起源类型，支持起源感知策略的有效规范。新的起源类型可以由现存的起源类型组成，用于指定新的策略。TPM解释器可以被集成，以允许关于不同物理表示中的出处图表的策略实施。通过将起源类型视为特殊属性，所提出的框架使得能够在现有的基于属性的访问控制框架(例如符合XACML的框架)中采用起源感知的访问控制。我们通过扩展SUN的XACML实现来实现所提出的框架，并表明它通过较小的扩展促进了XACML中起源感知策略的规范。我们也分析了提出的框架的性能。
papers.title_zh: 带有类型出处的出处感知的访问控制框架

papers.title: An Access Control Model for Online Social Networks Using User-to-User Relationships
papers.authors: Yuan Cheng, Jaehong Park, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Users and resources in online social networks (OSNs) are interconnected via various types of relationships. In particular, user-to-user relationships form the basis of the OSN structure, and play a significant role in specifying and enforcing access control. Individual users and the OSN provider should be enabled to specify which access can be granted in terms of existing relationships. In this paper, we propose a novel user-to-user relationship-based access control (UURAC) model for OSN systems that utilizes regular expression notation for such policy specification. Access control policies on users and resources are composed in terms of requested action, multiple relationship types, the starting point of the evaluation, and the number of hops on the path. We present two path checking algorithms to determine whether the required relationship path between users for a given access request exists. We validate the feasibility of our approach by implementing a prototype system and evaluating the performance of these two algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线社交网络(osn)中的用户和资源通过各种类型的关系相互连接。特别是，用户到用户的关系构成了OSN结构的基础，在指定和实施访问控制方面起着重要的作用。应该允许个人用户和OSN提供者指定根据现有关系可以授予哪些访问权限。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的基于用户对用户关系的OSN系统访问控制(UURAC)模型，该模型利用正则表达式符号来描述这种策略规范。用户和资源的访问控制策略由请求的动作、多种关系类型、评估的起点和路径上的跳数组成。我们提出了两种路径检查算法来确定给定访问请求的用户之间所需的关系路径是否存在。通过实现一个原型系统和评估这两种算法的性能，我们验证了我们方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 使用用户对用户关系的在线社交网络的访问控制模型

papers.title: Cloning Your Gadgets: Complete ROP Attack Immunity with Multi-Variant Execution
papers.authors: Stijn Volckaert, Bart Coppens, Bjorn De Sutter
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present disjoint code layouts (DCL), a technique that complements multi-variant execution <xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref1">[1]</xref> and W<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\oplus$ </tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="volckaert-ieq1-2411254.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>X protection to effectively immunize programs against control flow hijacking exploits such as return oriented programming (ROP) <xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref2">[2]</xref> and return-to-libc attacks <xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref3">[3]</xref>. DCL improves upon address space partitioning (ASP), an earlier technique presented to defeat memory exploits. Unlike ASP, our solution keeps the full virtual address space available to the protected program. Additionally, our combination of DCL with Multi-Variant Execution is transparent to both the user and the programmer and incurs much less overhead than other ROP defense tools, both in terms of run time and memory footprint.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们介绍了分离代码布局(DCL)，这是一种补充多变量执行的技术< xref ref ref-type = " bibr " rid = " re f1 " >[1]</xref >和W < inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ oplus $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:type = " simple " xlink:href = " volck aert-ie Q1-2411254 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formulation > XDCL对地址空间分区(ASP)进行了改进，这是一种早期的技术，用于防止内存漏洞。与ASP不同，我们的解决方案保留了受保护程序可用的全部虚拟地址空间。此外，我们的DCL与多变量执行的组合对用户和程序员都是透明的，并且在运行时间和内存占用方面比其他ROP防御工具产生的开销少得多。
papers.title_zh: 克隆小工具：通过多变量执行的完整ROP攻击豁免

papers.title: Key Indistinguishability versus Strong Key Indistinguishability for Hierarchical Key Assignment Schemes
papers.authors: Arcangelo Castiglione, Alfredo De Santis, Barbara Masucci
papers.abstract: A hierarchical key assignment scheme is a method to assign some private information and encryption keys to a set of classes in a partially ordered hierarchy, in such a way that the private information of a higher class can be used to derive the keys of all classes lower down in the hierarchy. In this paper we analyze the security of hierarchical key assignment schemes according to different notions: security with respect to key indistinguishability and against key recovery, as well as the two recently proposed notions of security with respect to strong key indistinguishability and against strong key recovery . We first explore the relations between all security notions and, in particular, we prove that security with respect to strong key indistinguishability is not stronger than the one with respect to key indistinguishability. Afterwards, we propose a general construction yielding a hierarchical key assignment scheme offering security against strong key recovery, given any hierarchical key assignment scheme which guarantees security against key recovery.
papers.abstract_zh: 分层密钥分配方案是一种将一些私有信息和加密密钥分配给部分有序层次结构中的一组类的方法，以这种方式，较高类的私有信息可以用于导出层次结构中较低的所有类的密钥。本文从不同的角度分析了分层密钥分配方案的安全性:关于密钥不可区分性和抗密钥恢复的安全性，以及最近提出的关于强密钥不可区分性和抗强密钥恢复的两个安全性概念。我们首先探讨了所有安全概念之间的关系，特别地，我们证明了关于强密钥不可区分性的安全性并不比关于密钥不可区分性的安全性更强。然后，我们提出了一个一般的构造，给出了一个分层密钥分配方案，它提供了抵抗强密钥恢复的安全性，给定了任何保证抵抗密钥恢复的安全性的分层密钥分配方案。
papers.title_zh: 关键的不可区分性与强钥匙无法区分的关键关键分配方案的不可区分性

papers.title: Password Extraction via Reconstructed Wireless Mouse Trajectory
papers.authors: Xian Pan, Zhen Ling, Aniket Pingley, Wei Yu, Nan Zhang, Kui Ren, Xinwen Fu
papers.abstract: Logitech made the following statement in 2009: “Since the displacements of a mouse would not give any useful information to a hacker, the mouse reports are not encrypted.” In this paper, we prove the exact opposite is true-i.e., it is indeed possible to leak sensitive information such as passwords through the displacements of a Bluetooth mouse. Our results can be easily extended to other wireless mice using different radio links. We begin by presenting multiple ways to sniff unencrypted Bluetooth packets containing raw mouse movement data. We then show that such data may reveal text-based passwords entered by clicking on software keyboards. We propose two attacks, the prediction attack and replay attack, which can reconstruct the on-screen cursor trajectories from sniffed mouse movement data. Two inference strategies are used to discover passwords from cursor trajectories. We conducted a holistic study over all popular operating systems and analyzed how mouse acceleration algorithms and packet losses may affect the reconstruction results. Our real-world experiments demonstrate the severity of privacy leakage from unencrypted Bluetooth mice. We also discuss countermeasures to prevent privacy leakage from wireless mice. To the best of our knowledge, our work is the first to demonstrate privacy leakage from raw mouse data.
papers.abstract_zh: 罗技在2009年发表了如下声明:“由于鼠标的位移不会给黑客提供任何有用的信息，所以鼠标报告没有加密。”在本文中，我们证明了完全相反的情况是正确的，即，确实有可能通过蓝牙鼠标的位移来泄露密码等敏感信息。我们的结果可以很容易地扩展到其他使用不同无线电链路的无线鼠标。我们首先介绍多种方法来嗅探包含原始鼠标移动数据的未加密蓝牙数据包。然后，我们证明这些数据可能会泄露通过点击软键盘输入的基于文本的密码。我们提出了两种攻击，预测攻击和重放攻击，这两种攻击可以从嗅探到的鼠标移动数据中重建屏幕上的光标轨迹。两种推理策略用于从光标轨迹中发现密码。我们对所有流行的操作系统进行了整体研究，并分析了鼠标加速算法和数据包丢失如何影响重建结果。我们的真实实验证明了未加密蓝牙鼠标隐私泄露的严重性。我们还讨论了防止无线鼠标泄露隐私的对策。据我们所知，我们的工作首次证明了原始鼠标数据的隐私泄露。
papers.title_zh: 通过重建的无线鼠标轨迹提取密码

papers.title: Security Optimization of Dynamic Networks with Probabilistic Graph Modeling and Linear Programming
papers.authors: Hussain M. J. Almohri, Layne T. Watson, Danfeng Yao, Xinming Ou
papers.abstract: Securing the networks of large organizations is technically challenging due to the complex configurations and constraints. Managing these networks requires rigorous and comprehensive analysis tools. A network administrator needs to identify vulnerable configurations, as well as tools for hardening the networks. Such networks usually have dynamic and fluidic structures, thus one may have incomplete information about the connectivity and availability of hosts. In this paper, we address the problem of statically performing a rigorous assessment of a set of network security defense strategies with the goal of reducing the probability of a successful large-scale attack in a dynamically changing and complex network architecture. We describe a probabilistic graph model and algorithms for analyzing the security of complex networks with the ultimate goal of reducing the probability of successful attacks. Our model naturally utilizes a scalable state-of-the-art optimization technique called sequential linear programming that is extensively applied and studied in various engineering problems. In comparison to related solutions on attack graphs, our probabilistic model provides mechanisms for expressing uncertainties in network configurations, which is not reported elsewhere. We have performed comprehensive experimental validation with real-world network configuration data of a sizable organization.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于复杂的配置和限制，保护大型组织的网络在技术上极具挑战性。管理这些网络需要严格而全面的分析工具。网络管理员需要识别易受攻击的配置，以及强化网络的工具。这种网络通常具有动态和流体结构，因此人们可能不完全了解主机的连通性和可用性。在本文中，我们解决了静态执行一组网络安全防御策略的严格评估的问题，目标是在动态变化的复杂网络体系结构中降低成功的大规模攻击的概率。我们描述了一个概率图模型和算法，用于分析复杂网络的安全性，最终目标是降低成功攻击的概率。我们的模型自然利用了一种可扩展的最新优化技术，称为序列线性规划，在各种工程问题中被广泛应用和研究。与攻击图上的相关解决方案相比，我们的概率模型提供了在网络配置中表达不确定性的机制，这在别处没有报道。我们已经使用一个大型组织的真实网络配置数据进行了全面的实验验证。
papers.title_zh: 具有概率图建模和线性编程的动态网络的安全优化

papers.title: VoteTrust: Leveraging Friend Invitation Graph to Defend against Social Network Sybils
papers.authors: Zhi Yang, Jilong Xue, Xiaoyong Yang, Xiao Wang, Yafei Dai
papers.abstract: Online social networks (OSNs) suffer from the creation of fake accounts that introduce fake product reviews, malware and spam. Existing defenses focus on using the social graph structure to isolate fakes. However, our work shows that Sybils could befriend a large number of real users, invalidating the assumption behind social-graph-based detection. In this paper, we present VoteTrust, a scalable defense system that further leverages user-level activities. VoteTrust models the friend invitation interactions among users as a directed, signed graph, and uses two key mechanisms to detect Sybils over the graph: a voting-based Sybil detection to find Sybils that users vote to reject, and a Sybil community detection to find other colluding Sybils around identified Sybils. Through evaluating on Renren social network, we show that VoteTrust is able to prevent Sybils from generating many unsolicited friend requests. We also deploy VoteTrust in Renen, and our real experience demonstrates that VoteTrust can detect large-scale collusion among Sybils.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线社交网络(osn)遭受虚假账户的创建，这些账户引入了虚假的产品评论、恶意软件和垃圾邮件。现有的防御措施侧重于使用社交图结构来隔离假货。然而，我们的工作表明，Sybils可以与大量的真实用户交朋友，从而使基于社交图的检测背后的假设无效。在本文中，我们介绍了VoteTrust，这是一个可扩展的防御系统，它进一步利用了用户级活动。VoteTrust将用户之间的朋友邀请交互建模为一个有向的、有符号的图，并使用两种关键机制来检测该图中的女巫:基于投票的女巫检测，用于查找用户投票拒绝的女巫，以及女巫社区检测，用于查找已识别女巫周围的其他串通女巫。通过在人人网上的评估，我们表明VoteTrust能够防止Sybils产生许多未经请求的好友请求。我们还在Renen中部署了VoteTrust，我们的实际经验表明，VoteTrust可以检测Sybils之间的大规模共谋。
papers.title_zh: 投票：利用朋友邀请图来防御社交网络Sybils

papers.title: A Hardware-Software Approach for On-Line Soft Error Mitigation in Interrupt-Driven Applications
papers.authors: Antonio Martínez-Álvarez, Felipe Restrepo-Calle, Sergio Cuenca-Asensi, Leonardo M. Reyneri, Almudena Lindoso, Luis Entrena
papers.abstract: Integrity assurance of configuration data has a significant impact on microcontroller-based systems reliability. This is especially true when running applications driven by events which behavior is tightly coupled to this kind of data. This work proposes a new hybrid technique that combines hardware and software resources for detecting and recovering soft-errors in system configuration data. Our approach is based on the utilization of a common built-in microcontroller resource (timer) that works jointly with a software-based technique, which is responsible to periodically refresh the configuration data. The experiments demonstrate that non-destructive single event effects can be effectively mitigated with reduced overheads. Results show an important increase in fault coverage for SEUs and SETs, about one order of magnitude.
papers.abstract_zh: 配置数据的完整性保证对基于微控制器的系统的可靠性具有重大影响。当运行由事件驱动的应用程序时尤其如此，这些事件的行为与这类数据紧密相关。这项工作提出了一种新的混合技术，结合硬件和软件资源，用于检测和恢复系统配置数据中的软错误。我们的方法是基于利用一个通用的内置微控制器资源(定时器),它与一种基于软件的技术协同工作，负责定期刷新配置数据。实验证明，非破坏性的单粒子效应可以通过减少开销来有效地减轻。结果显示seu和set的故障覆盖率显著增加，大约一个数量级。
papers.title_zh: 一种用于在线软件中断应用程序中的软件软件方法

papers.title: A Large-Scale Active Measurement Study on the Effectiveness of Piece-Attack on BitTorrent Networks
papers.authors: Ali Fattaholmanan, Hamid R. Rabiee
papers.abstract: The peer to peer (P2P) file sharing applications have allocated a significant amount of today's Internet traffic. Among various P2P file sharing protocols, BitTorrent is the most common and popular one that attracts monthly a quarter of a billion users from all over the world. Similar to other P2P file sharing protocols, BitTorrent is mostly used for illegal sharing of copyright protected files such as movies, music and TV series. To impede this huge amount of illegal file distributions, anti-P2P companies have arisen to stand against these applications (specially the BitTorrent). To this end, they have begun to fire large-scale Internet attacks against BitTorrent networks. In this paper, we are going to actively measure the impact of the piece-attack against BitTorrent networks. Our measurement is divided into five scenarios in order to figure out the constraint factors that influence the success of the attack. To be able to evaluate the attack in different experiments, we defined attack effectiveness to quantitatively verify the success of the attack. Based on the measurement results, we discovered how it is possible to achieve significant outcome with modest amount of resources used by the attackers in hampering the illegal distribution of files in BitTorrent networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 对等(P2P)文件共享应用程序已经分配了当今互联网的大量流量。在各种P2P文件共享协议中，BitTorrent是最常见和最受欢迎的协议，每月吸引来自世界各地的2.5亿用户。与其他P2P文件共享协议类似，BitTorrent主要用于非法共享电影、音乐和电视剧等受版权保护的文件。为了阻止这种大量的非法文件分发，反P2P公司开始反对这些应用程序(特别是BitTorrent)。为此，他们已经开始对BitTorrent网络发动大规模的互联网攻击。在这篇论文中，我们将积极地衡量片段攻击对BitTorrent网络的影响。为了找出影响攻击成功的约束因素，我们的测量分为五个场景。为了能够在不同的实验中评估攻击，我们定义了攻击有效性来定量验证攻击的成功。根据测量结果，我们发现了攻击者如何能够使用适量的资源来阻止BitTorrent网络中文件的非法分发，从而获得显著的结果。
papers.title_zh: 一项大规模的主动测量研究，涉及攻击在Bittorrent网络上的有效性

papers.title: Distributed Attack Graph Generation
papers.authors: Kerem Kaynar, Fikret Sivrikaya
papers.abstract: Attack graphs show possible paths that an attacker can use to intrude into a target network and gain privileges through series of vulnerability exploits. The computation of attack graphs suffers from the state explosion problem occurring most notably when the number of vulnerabilities in the target network grows large. Parallel computation of attack graphs can be utilized to attenuate this problem. When employed in online network security evaluation, the computation of attack graphs can be triggered with the correlated intrusion alerts received from sensors scattered throughout the target network. In such cases, distributed computation of attack graphs becomes valuable. This article introduces a parallel and distributed memory-based algorithm that builds vulnerability-based attack graphs on a distributed multi-agent platform. A virtual shared memory abstraction is proposed to be used over such a platform, whose memory pages are initialized by partitioning the network reachability information. We demonstrate the feasibility of parallel distributed computation of attack graphs and show that even a small degree of parallelism can effectively speed up the generation process as the problem size grows. We also introduce a rich attack template and network model in order to form chains of vulnerability exploits in attack graphs more precisely.
papers.abstract_zh: 攻击图显示了攻击者可以用来入侵目标网络并通过一系列漏洞利用获得权限的可能路径。攻击图的计算受到状态爆炸问题的影响，当目标网络中的弱点数量变大时，这种问题最明显。攻击图的并行计算可以用来减轻这个问题。当用于在线网络安全评估时，攻击图的计算可以通过从分散在目标网络中的传感器接收到的相关入侵警报来触发。在这种情况下，攻击图的分布式计算变得很有价值。本文介绍了一种基于并行和分布式内存的算法，该算法在分布式多代理平台上构建基于漏洞的攻击图。提出了在这样的平台上使用虚拟共享存储器抽象，其存储器页面通过划分网络可达性信息来初始化。我们证明了攻击图的并行分布式计算的可行性，并表明随着问题规模的增长，即使很小程度的并行也能有效地加速生成过程。我们还引入了丰富的攻击模板和网络模型，以便更精确地在攻击图中形成漏洞利用链。
papers.title_zh: 分布式攻击图生成

papers.title: Generic and Efficient Constructions of Attribute-Based Encryption with Verifiable Outsourced Decryption
papers.authors: Xianping Mao, Junzuo Lai, Qixiang Mei, Kefei Chen, Jian Weng
papers.abstract: Attribute-based encryption (ABE) provides a mechanism for complex access control over encrypted data. However in most ABE systems, the ciphertext size and the decryption overhead, which grow with the complexity of the access policy, are becoming critical barriers in applications running on resource-limited devices. Outsourcing decryption of ABE ciphertexts to a powerful third party is a reasonable manner to solve this problem. Since the third party is usually believed to be untrusted, the security requirements of ABE with outsourced decryption should include privacy and verifiability. Namely, any adversary including the third party should learn nothing about the encrypted message, and the correctness of the outsourced decryption is supposed to be verified efficiently. We propose generic constructions of CPA-secure and RCCA-secure ABE systems with verifiable outsourced decryption from CPA-secure ABE with outsourced decryption, respectively. We also instantiate our CPA-secure construction in the standard model and then show an implementation of this instantiation. The experimental results show that, compared with the existing scheme, our CPA-secure construction has more compact ciphertext and less computational costs. Moreover, the techniques involved in the RCCA-secure construction can be applied in generally constructing CCA-secure ABE, which we believe to be of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的加密(ABE)提供了一种对加密数据进行复杂访问控制的机制。然而，在大多数ABE系统中，密文长度和解密开销随着访问策略的复杂性而增长，成为在资源有限的设备上运行的应用的关键障碍。将ABE密文的解密外包给一个强大的第三方是解决这个问题的合理方式。由于第三方通常被认为是不可信的，外包解密的ABE的安全需求应该包括隐私和可验证性。也就是说，包括第三方在内的任何对手都不应该知道关于加密消息的任何事情，并且外包解密的正确性应该被有效地验证。我们分别从带外包解密的CPA安全的ABE出发，提出了带可验证外包解密的CPA安全的和RCCA安全的ABE系统的一般构造。我们还在标准模型中实例化了我们的CPA-secure构造，然后展示了该实例化的实现。实验结果表明，与现有方案相比，我们的CPA-secure构造具有更紧凑的密文和更少的计算开销。此外，RCCA安全构造中涉及的技术可以应用于一般的CCA安全ABE的构造，我们相信这是独立的兴趣所在。
papers.title_zh: 基于属性的加密的通用和高效结构，并具有可验证的外包解密

papers.title: Identifying High-Cardinality Hosts from Network-Wide Traffic Measurements
papers.authors: Yang Liu, Wenji Chen, Yong Guan
papers.abstract: Host cardinality is defined as the number of distinct peers that a host communicates with in the network. There have been several algorithms proposed to monitor network traffic and identify high-cardinality hosts at a centralized network operation center (NOC). Due to massive amounts of data and limitations on transforming and processing them at the NOC, it is desirable to design mergeable and reversible data structures summarizing traffic measurements in a distributed network monitoring system. A mergeable data structure summarizes traffic measurements at each local monitor, and these summaries from different monitors can be merged at the NOC, while preserving the error guarantee without increasing space. A reversible data structure can report interested (high-cardinality) hosts efficiently using compressed information without querying every single host in the network. In this paper, we propose a new data streaming algorithm to identify high-cardinality hosts over the network-wide traffic measurements. Our algorithm introduces a new mergeable and reversible data structure for the distributed network monitoring system, which is designed by Noisy Group Testing. We have theoretically analyzed our algorithm and evaluated it against both synthetic and real-world data sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 主机基数被定义为主机在网络中与之通信的不同对等体的数量。已经提出了几种算法来监控网络流量并在集中式网络操作中心(NOC)识别高基数主机。由于大量的数据和在NOC上转换和处理它们的限制，期望设计可合并的和可逆的数据结构来概括分布式网络监控系统中的流量测量。一个可合并的数据结构总结了每个本地监视器的流量测量，并且这些来自不同监视器的总结可以在NOC上合并，同时保持误差保证而不增加空间。可逆数据结构可以使用压缩信息有效地报告感兴趣的(高基数)主机，而无需查询网络中的每一台主机。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的数据流算法来识别网络流量测量中的高基数主机。我们的算法为分布式网络监控系统引入了一种新的可合并、可逆的数据结构，这种数据结构是通过有噪分组测试设计的。我们从理论上分析了我们的算法，并对合成和真实数据集进行了评估。
papers.title_zh: 从网络范围的流量测量中识别高心电图宿主

papers.title: Low-Rate DoS Attacks Detection Based on Network Multifractal
papers.authors: Zhijun Wu, Liyuan Zhang, Meng Yue
papers.abstract: Low-rate denial of service (LDoS) attacks send periodic pulse sequences with relative low rate to form aggregation flows at the victim end. LDoS attack flows have the characteristics of low average rate and great concealment. It is hard to detect LDoS attack flows from normal traffic due to low rate property. Network traffic measurement shows that aggregate network traffic is multifractal. In order to characterize and analyze network traffic, researchers have developed concise mathematical models to explore complex multifractal structure. Although the LDoS attack flows are very small, it will inevitably lead to the change of multifractal characteristics of network traffic. This paper targets at exploiting and estimating the changes in multifractal characteristics of network traffic for detecting LDoS attack flows. The algorithm of multifractal detrended fluctuation analysis (MF-DFA) is used to explore the change in terms of multifractal characteristics over a small scale of network traffic due to LDoS attacks. Through wavelet analysis, the singularity and bursty of network traffic under LDoS attacks are estimated by using Hölder exponent. The difference values (D-value) of Hölder exponent of network traffic between normal and under LDoS attack situations are calculated. The D-value is used as the basis to determine LDoS attacks. A detection threshold is set based on the statistical results. The presence of LDoS attacks can be confirmed through comparing D-value with detection threshold. Experiments on detection performance have been performed in the test-bed network and simulation platform. The extensive experimental results are congruent with the theoretical analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 低速率拒绝服务(LDoS)攻击以相对较低的速率发送周期性脉冲序列，在受害端形成聚合流。LDoS攻击流具有平均速率低、隐蔽性强的特点。由于低速率特性，很难从正常流量中检测出LDoS攻击流。网络流量测量表明，聚合网络流量是多重分形的。为了表征和分析网络流量，研究人员开发了简洁的数学模型来探索复杂的多重分形结构。虽然LDoS攻击流量很小，但它不可避免地会导致网络流量多重分形特征的改变。本文旨在利用和估计网络流量多重分形特征的变化来检测LDoS攻击流。多重分形去趋势波动分析(MF-DFA)算法被用来研究LDoS攻击引起的小规模网络流量多重分形特征的变化。通过小波分析，利用Hölder指数估计LDoS攻击下网络流量的奇异性和突发性。计算正常和LDoS攻击情况下网络流量的Hölder指数的差值(d值)。D值被用作确定LDoS攻击的基础。基于统计结果设置检测阈值。通过比较D值和检测阈值，可以确认LDoS攻击的存在。在测试床网络和仿真平台上进行了检测性能实验。大量的实验结果与理论分析一致。
papers.title_zh: 基于网络多重分数的低速DOS攻击检测

papers.title: ProbeBuilder: Uncovering Opaque Kernel Data Structures for Automatic Probe Construction
papers.authors: Chi-Wei Wang, Chia-Wei Wang, Shiuhpyng Shieh
papers.abstract: VM-based inspection tools generally implement probes in the hypervisor to monitor events and the state of kernel of the guest system. The most important function of a probe is to carve information of interest out of the memory of the guest when it is triggered. Implementing probes for a closed-source OS demands manually reverse-engineering the undocumented code/data structures in the kernel binary image. Furthermore, the reverse-engineering result is often non-reusable between OS versions or even kernel updates due to the rapid change of these structures. In this paper, we propose ProbeBuilder, a system automating the process to inference kernel data structures. Based on dynamic execution, ProbeBuilder searches for data structures matching the “pointer-offset-pointer” pattern in guest memory. The sequences of these offsets, which are referred to as dereferences, are then verified by ProbeBuilder with instruction evidence that traverse them. The experiment on Windows kernel shows that ProbeBuilder efficiently narrows thousands of choices for kernel-level probes down to dozens. The finding allows analysts to quickly implement probes, facilitating rapid development/update of inspection tools for different OSes. With these features, ProbeBuilder is the first system capable of automatically generating practical probes that extracts information through dereferences to opaque kernel data structures.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于VM的检查工具通常在管理程序中实现探测，以监控事件和客户系统的内核状态。探针最重要的功能是当它被触发时，从客人的记忆中挖掘出感兴趣的信息。为闭源操作系统实现探测需要手动对内核二进制映像中未记录的代码/数据结构进行逆向工程。此外，由于这些结构的快速变化，逆向工程的结果通常在操作系统版本甚至内核更新之间是不可重用的。在本文中，我们提出了ProbeBuilder，一个自动处理内核数据结构的系统。基于动态执行，ProbeBuilder在客户内存中搜索与“指针-偏移量-指针”模式匹配的数据结构。这些偏移量的序列被称为解引用，然后由ProbeBuilder用遍历它们的指令证据来验证。在Windows内核上的实验表明，ProbeBuilder有效地将内核级探针的数千种选择减少到几十种。这一发现允许分析师快速实现探测，促进不同操作系统检查工具的快速开发/更新。凭借这些特性，ProbeBuilder是第一个能够自动生成实用探针的系统，该探针通过解引用不透明的内核数据结构来提取信息。
papers.title_zh: 探针：发现自动探针构建的不透明内核数据结构

papers.title: Safety Decidability for Pre-Authorization Usage Control with Finite Attribute Domains
papers.authors: P. V. Rajkumar, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: This paper considers the safety problem for the pre-authorization sub-model of the well-known <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$UCON_{ABC}$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="pv-ieq1-2427834.gif"/> </alternatives></inline-formula> usage control model, that is, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$Pre\_UCON_A$ </tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="pv-ieq2-2427834.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. It is shown that <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$Pre\_UCON_A$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="pv-ieq3-2427834.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> with finite attribute domains has decidable safety even if arbitrary object creation is allowed. This result eliminates the previously known restrictions for obtaining safety decidability in this context, which only allow a finite bounded number of objects to be created. Our result specifically permits unbounded object creation, so the set of objects is potentially infinite. In the proof, we show that the set of reachable protection tuples in infinite state <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$Pre\_UCON_A$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="pv-ieq4-2427834.gif"/> </alternatives></inline-formula> models is finite and computable. We also provide a construction for decision procedure which answers the safety question by examining the reachable protection tuples.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文考虑了著名的< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ UCON _ { ABC } $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:type = " simple " xlink:href = " PV-ie Q1-2427834 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >使用控制模型的预授权子模型的安全问题，即< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ Pre \ _ UCON _ A证明了具有有限属性域的< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ Pre \ _ UCON _ A $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:type = " simple " xlink:href = " PV-ieq 3-2427834 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >具有可判定的安全性，即使允许任意的对象创建。该结果消除了先前已知的在这种情况下获得安全可判定性的限制，该限制仅允许创建有限数量的对象。我们的结果特别允许创建无限的对象，因此对象集可能是无限的。在证明中，我们表明无限状态< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ Pre \ _ UCON _ A $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:type = " simple " xlink:href = " PV-ieq 4-2427834 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >模型中的可达保护元组集是有限的和可计算的。我们还提供了一个决策过程的构造，它通过检查可达保护元组来回答安全性问题。
papers.title_zh: 具有有限属性域的预授权使用控制的安全性可确定性

papers.title: Secure Multiset Intersection Cardinality and its Application to Jaccard Coefficient
papers.authors: Bharath K. Samanthula, Wei Jiang
papers.abstract: The Jaccard Coefficient, as an information similarity measure, has wide variety of applications, such as cluster analysis and image segmentation. Due to the concerns of personal privacy, the Jaccard Coefficient cannot be computed directly between two independently owned datasets. The problem, secure computation of the Jaccard Coefficient for multisets (SJCM), considers the situation where two parties want to securely compute the random shares of the Jaccard Coefficient between their multisets. During the process, the content of each party's multiset is not disclosed to the other party and also the value of Jaccard Coefficient should be hidden from both parties. Secure computation of multiset intersection cardinality is an important sub-problem of SJCM. Existing methods when applied to solve such a problem can lead to either insecure or inefficient solutions. Our work addresses this gap. We first present a basic SJCM protocol constructed using the existing secure dot product method as a sub-routine. Then, as a major contribution, we propose an approximated version of our basic protocol to improve efficiency without compromising accuracy much. We provide various experimental results to show that the proposed protocols are significantly more efficient than the existing techniques when the domain size is small using both simulated and real datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: Jaccard系数作为一种信息相似性度量，有着广泛的应用，如聚类分析和图像分割。出于个人隐私的考虑，Jaccard系数不能在两个独立拥有的数据集之间直接计算。多重集Jaccard系数的安全计算(SJCM)问题考虑了两方想要安全地计算他们多重集之间Jaccard系数的随机份额的情况。在这个过程中，每一方的多重集的内容都不能透露给另一方，Jaccard系数的值也应该对双方隐藏。多重集交集基数的安全计算是SJCM的一个重要子问题。当应用现有方法来解决这样的问题时，可能导致不安全或低效的解决方案。我们的工作填补了这一空白。我们首先提出一个基本的SJCM协议，它是使用现有的安全点积方法作为一个子程序来构造的。然后，作为一个主要的贡献，我们提出了一个我们的基本协议的近似版本，以提高效率而不牺牲准确性。我们提供了各种实验结果来表明，当使用模拟和真实数据集时，所提出的协议比现有技术明显更有效。
papers.title_zh: 安全的多发相交基数及其应用于Jaccard系数

papers.title: A Proximity Authentication System for Smartphones
papers.authors: Lingjun Li, Xinxin Zhao, Guoliang Xue
papers.abstract: Authenticating whether two smartphones are in close proximity is important in smartphone security. For example, the authentication result can be used to pair two devices and construct a secure communication channel between them. Many existing proximity authentication systems rely on short range networks-the communication is usually restricted in short range networks. However, this approach is inadequate when we want to verify whether the communication distance is within a few centimeters, i.e. near field. To address this challenge, many other techniques construct systems based on the near field communication (NFC) system. Unfortunately, only a small portion of smart devices in the current market are equipped with NFC chips. The purpose of this paper is to provide a close proximity authentication system which does not depend on NFC chips. We devise a system to achieve close proximity authentication by using correlated finger movements on the two smartphones. Human input usually contains errors and is of low entropy, which affects the usability and security of our system. We solve these issues in an efficient way, considering the limited computational resources on smart devices. Our system does not need any prior secret information shared between the two devices, and generates the same high-entropy cryptographic key for both devices in a successful authentication. The efficiency of the system is validated by evaluations on Motorola Droid smartphones.
papers.abstract_zh: 在智能手机安全中，验证两部智能手机是否靠得很近非常重要。例如，认证结果可用于配对两个设备，并在它们之间构建安全通信通道。许多现有的邻近认证系统依赖于短程网络-通信通常被限制在短程网络中。然而，当我们想要验证通信距离是否在几厘米之内，即近场时，这种方法是不够的。为了应对这一挑战，许多其他技术构建了基于近场通信(NFC)系统的系统。遗憾的是，目前市场上的智能设备只有一小部分搭载了NFC芯片。本文的目的是提供一个不依赖于NFC芯片的近距离认证系统。我们设计了一个系统，通过在两部智能手机上使用相关的手指移动来实现近距离认证。人类的输入通常包含错误并且是低熵的，这影响了我们系统的可用性和安全性。考虑到智能设备上有限的计算资源，我们以高效的方式解决了这些问题。我们的系统不需要在两个设备之间共享任何先验秘密信息，并且在一次成功的认证中为两个设备生成相同的高熵密钥。在摩托罗拉Droid智能手机上的评测验证了该系统的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 智能手机的接近身份验证系统

papers.title: Deleting Secret Data with Public Verifiability
papers.authors: Feng Hao, Dylan Clarke, Avelino Francisco Zorzo
papers.abstract: Existing software-based data erasure programs can be summarized as following the same one-bit-return protocol: the deletion program performs data erasure and returns either success or failure. However, such a one-bit-return protocol turns the data deletion system into a black box – the user has to trust the outcome but cannot easily verify it. However, the return of the“Success” bit can be misleading. Although the link of the file has been removed, the content of the file remains on the disk. An attacker with a forensic tool can easily recover the deleted file by scanning the disk. This is especially problematic when the deletion program is encapsulated within a Trusted Platform Module (TPM), and the user has no access to the code inside.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的基于软件的数据擦除程序可以总结为遵循相同的一位返回协议:删除程序执行数据擦除并返回成功或失败。然而，这样一个一位返回协议将数据删除系统变成了一个黑盒——用户不得不相信结果，但无法轻易验证它。然而，“成功”一词的回归可能会产生误导。尽管文件的链接已被删除，但文件的内容仍保留在磁盘上。拥有取证工具的攻击者可以通过扫描磁盘轻松恢复被删除的文件。当删除程序被封装在可信平台模块(TPM)中，并且用户无法访问其中的代码时，这尤其成问题。
papers.title_zh: 删除具有公共可验证性的秘密数据

papers.title: Detection of Unspecified Emergencies for Controlled Information Sharing
papers.authors: Barbara Carminati, Elena Ferrari, Michele Guglielmi
papers.abstract: During emergency situations one of the key requirements to handle the crisis is information sharing among organizations involved in the emergency management. When emergency situations are well known, it is possible to specify a priori these situations and to plan the information sharing needs in advance. However, there are many situations where it is not possible to describe these emergencies and their information sharing requirements beforehand. Therefore, in this paper, we present a framework able to deal with both specified and unspecified emergencies. The idea is to detect unspecified emergencies and related information sharing needs through denied access request analysis, anomaly detection techniques, and analysis of the history of permitted access requests. Besides presenting the techniques, the paper also presents experiments to verify their effectiveness.
papers.abstract_zh: 在紧急情况下，处理危机的关键要求之一是参与应急管理的组织之间的信息共享。当紧急情况众所周知时，可以预先指定这些情况，并预先计划信息共享需求。然而，在许多情况下，无法事先描述这些紧急情况及其信息共享要求。因此，在本文中，我们提出了一个框架，能够处理指定和未指定的紧急情况。其思想是通过拒绝访问请求分析、异常检测技术和允许访问请求的历史分析来检测未指定的紧急情况和相关的信息共享需求。除了介绍这些技术外，本文还通过实验验证了它们的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 检测未指定的紧急情况以进行控制信息共享

papers.title: Optimization of Full versus Incremental Periodic Backup Policy
papers.authors: Gregory Levitin, Liudong Xing, Qingqing Zhai, Yuanshun Dai
papers.abstract: This paper models repairable computing systems performing a mission that is successful if the system can accomplish a specified amount of work within the allowed mission time or deadline. During the mission the system is subject to a sequence of full and incremental data backup procedures to facilitate an effective system recovery and avoid repeating the entire mission work from the very beginning when a system failure happens. The repair time is fixed while the system time-to-failure can follow any arbitrary type of distributions. This paper makes novel contributions by first developing a new numerical algorithm to evaluate mission success probability and expected completion time of the considered repairable real-time computing systems subject to mixed full and incremental backups. Correctness of the proposed evaluation algorithm is verified using Monte Carlo simulations. We make another new contribution by formulating and solving the backup schedule optimization problem that finds the full and incremental backup frequencies maximizing the mission success probability. Through illustrative examples, effects of different parameters (including the system time-to-failure distribution parameter, maximum allowed mission time, data backup and retrieval times, storage availability, repair time and efficiency) on the mission success probability and expected completion time as well as on the optimal backup schedule solution are investigated.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文对可修复计算系统进行建模，如果系统能够在允许的任务时间或期限内完成指定的工作量，那么该系统执行的任务是成功的。在飞行任务期间，该系统要经过一系列完整和增量数据备份程序，以便于有效的系统恢复，并避免在系统发生故障时从头开始重复整个飞行任务工作。修复时间是固定的，而系统无故障时间可以服从任意类型的分布。本文的创新之处在于首次提出了一种新的数值算法来评估可修复实时计算系统在混合完全备份和增量备份下的任务成功概率和期望完成时间。蒙特卡洛仿真验证了所提评估算法的正确性。我们通过公式化和解决备份调度优化问题做出了另一个新的贡献，该问题找到了最大化任务成功概率的完全和增量备份频率。通过示例，研究了不同参数(包括系统无故障时间分布参数、最大允许任务时间、数据备份和检索时间、存储可用性、修复时间和效率)对任务成功概率和期望完成时间以及最优备份调度解的影响。
papers.title_zh: 优化完整与增量周期性备份策略

papers.title: Private and Secure Tag Access for Large-Scale RFID Systems
papers.authors: Min-Te Sun, Kazuya Sakai, Wei-Shinn Ku, Ten-Hwang Lai, Athanasios V. Vasilakos
papers.abstract: The performance of key authentication and the degree of privacy in large-scale RFID systems are considered by many researchers as tradeoffs. Based on how keys are managed in the system, the privacy preserving tag authentications proposed in the past can be categorized into tree-based and group-based approaches. While a tree-based approach achieves high performance in key authentication, it suffers from the issue of low privacy should a fraction of tags be compromised. On the contrary, while group-based key authentication is relatively invulnerable to compromise attacks, it is not scalable to a large number of tags. In this paper, we propose a new private tag authentication protocol based on skip lists, named randomized skip lists-based authentication (RSLA). Without sacrificing the authentication performance, RSLA provides a high privacy preserving mechanism. While RSLA provides the same level of unpredictability-based-privacy and indistinguishability-based privacy compared with other structured key management approaches, our scheme achieves the highest system anonymity with good performance in key look up and update. In addition, the simulation results match our analyses closely.
papers.abstract_zh: 在大规模RFID系统中，密钥认证的性能和隐私程度被许多研究者认为是折衷的。根据密钥在系统中的管理方式，过去提出的隐私保护标签认证可以分为基于树和基于组的方法。虽然基于树的方法在密钥认证中实现了高性能，但是如果一小部分标签被泄露，它会遭受低私密性的问题。相反，虽然基于组的密钥认证相对来说不易受到折衷攻击，但是它不可扩展到大量标签。本文提出了一种新的基于跳表的私有标签认证协议，称为基于随机跳表的认证(RSLA)。在不牺牲认证性能的情况下，RSLA提供了高度隐私保护机制。与其他结构化密钥管理方法相比，RSLA提供了同等水平的基于不可预测性的隐私和基于不可区分性的隐私，同时我们的方案在密钥查找和更新方面具有良好的性能，实现了最高的系统匿名性。此外，模拟结果与我们的分析非常吻合。
papers.title_zh: 大规模RFID系统的私人和安全标签访问

papers.title: Reliability Evaluation of Network Systems with Dependent Propagated Failures Using Decision Diagrams
papers.authors: Yuchang Mo, Liudong Xing, Farong Zhong, Zhao Zhang
papers.abstract: In a network system, a propagated failure (PF) is a failure originating from a network component that can cause extensive damages to other network components or even the failure of the entire system. Existing works on PFs have mostly assumed the deterministic effect from a component PF, i.e., a fixed subset of system components is affected whenever the PF occurs. However, in many real-world systems, the components may have different levels of protection, and the effect of damage from a component PF can be dependent upon the status of other components within the same system or the occurrence order of component failures. This paper proposes a new analytical method based on multi-valued decision diagrams (MDDs) for the reliability analysis of network systems with dependent propagation effects. Particularly, new MDD modeling procedures are proposed for considering different types of dependent PF effects introduced by different protection levels. After the system MDD is generated using a new MDD combination algorithm to efficiently handle the dependent PF effects, methods for computing the network reliability and component importance measures are presented. The detailed analysis of an example network system subjected to dependent PFs is presented to illustrate the basics and application of the proposed method. It is shown that the proposed MDD-based method generates smaller model size and thus presents lower computational complexity in the model generation and evaluation than the existing Markov method and separable method.
papers.abstract_zh: 在网络系统中，传播性故障(PF)是源于网络组件的故障，它会对其他网络组件造成大范围的损害，甚至导致整个系统的故障。现有的PFs工作大多假设了部件PF的确定性效应，即每当PF发生时，系统部件的固定子集都会受到影响。然而，在许多实际系统中，组件可能具有不同的保护级别，并且组件PF的损坏影响可能取决于同一系统中其他组件的状态或组件故障的发生顺序。提出了一种新的基于多值决策图的分析方法，用于具有相关传播效应的网络系统的可靠性分析。特别地，提出了新的MDD建模方法，用于考虑由不同防护等级引入的不同类型的相关PF效应。在使用新的MDD组合算法生成系统MDD以有效处理相关PF效应之后，提出了计算网络可靠性和部件重要性度量的方法。通过对一个受依赖PFs影响的网络系统的详细分析，说明了该方法的基本原理和应用。结果表明，与现有的马尔可夫方法和可分方法相比，所提出的基于MDD的方法生成的模型规模更小，因此在模型生成和评估方面具有更低的计算复杂度。
papers.title_zh: 使用决策图的依赖传播失败的网络系统的可靠性评估

papers.title: Trust-Based Service Management for Social Internet of Things Systems
papers.authors: Ing-Ray Chen, Fenye Bao, Jia Guo
papers.abstract: A social internet of things (IoT) system can be viewed as a mix of traditional peer-to-peer networks and social networks, where “things” autonomously establish social relationships according to the owners' social networks, and seek trusted “things” that can provide services needed when they come into contact with each other opportunistically. We propose and analyze the design notion of adaptive trust management for social IoT systems in which social relationships evolve dynamically among the owners of IoT devices. We reveal the design tradeoff between trust convergence versus trust fluctuation in our adaptive trust management protocol design. With our adaptive trust management protocol, a social IoT application can adaptively choose the best trust parameter settings in response to changing IoT social conditions such that not only trust assessment is accurate but also the application performance is maximized. We propose a table-lookup method to apply the analysis results dynamically and demonstrate the feasibility of our proposed adaptive trust management scheme with two real-world social IoT service composition applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 社交物联网(IoT)系统可以被视为传统点对点网络和社交网络的混合，其中“物”根据所有者的社交网络自主建立社交关系，并在彼此机会性接触时寻求可提供所需服务的可信“物”。我们提出并分析了社交物联网系统中自适应信任管理的设计思想，在该系统中，社交关系在物联网设备的所有者之间动态演化。在我们的自适应信任管理协议设计中，我们揭示了信任收敛和信任波动之间的设计权衡。通过我们的自适应信任管理协议，社交物联网应用可以自适应地选择最佳信任参数设置，以响应不断变化的物联网社交条件，从而不仅信任评估准确，而且应用性能也得到最大化。我们提出了一种动态应用分析结果的查表方法，并通过两个真实的物联网服务组合应用验证了我们提出的自适应信任管理方案的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 基于信任的社交互联网系统的服务管理

papers.authors: Jaideep Vaidya
papers.abstract: Recently, the agricultural sector is facing concomitant challenges of rising the productivity to feed the growing global population and increasing the resources use efficiency, while reducing the environmental impact on the ecosystems and human health. In fact, fertilizers and pesticides play a crucial role in agriculture, representing a powerful tool for growers to increase yield and guarantee continuous productivity throughout the seasons under both optimal and suboptimal conditions. In the last three decades, several technological innovations have been proposed to enhance the sustainability of agricultural production systems, through a significant reduction of synthetic agrochemicals like pesticides and fertilizers. A promising and environmental-friendly innovation would be the use of natural plant biostimulants (PBs) that enhance flowering, plant growth, fruit set, crop productivity, and nutrient use efficiency (NUE), and are able also to improve the tolerance against a wide range of abiotic stressors (Colla and Rouphael, 2015).
