papers.abstract_zh: 最近，农业部门面临着提高生产力以养活不断增长的全球人口和提高资源利用效率的挑战，同时减少对生态系统和人类健康的环境影响。事实上，化肥和农药在农业中发挥着至关重要的作用，是种植者在最佳和次最佳条件下提高产量和保证全年连续生产的有力工具。在过去的三十年里，人们提出了一些技术创新，通过大量减少农药和化肥等合成农用化学品来提高农业生产系统的可持续性。一个有前途的环保创新是使用天然植物生物刺激素(PBs ),它可以促进开花、植物生长、坐果、作物产量和养分利用效率(NUE ),还能够提高对各种非生物胁迫的耐受性(Colla和Rouphael，2015年)。PBs最初的定义是排除一些功能，如肥料或植物保护产品。1997年，弗吉尼亚理工学院和州立大学作物与土壤环境科学系的张和施密特在《土壤维护》杂志上把PBs定义为“微量的促进植物生长的物质”。通过使用“微量”来描述PBs，作者含蓄地想要将生物刺激剂与营养物和土壤改良剂区分开来，后者也促进植物生长，但显然被大量使用。这篇网络文章中提到的PBs是两个重要的类别，如腐殖酸和海藻提取物，它们对植物的作用被认为基本上是激素。2012年，欧洲联盟委员会指定了一项关于植物生物刺激素的特别研究，以评估所涉及的物质和材料，该研究由du Jardin (2012年)出版，题为:"植物生物刺激素科学文献分析"。根据科学文献(250篇在其标题和/或摘要中使用“生物刺激剂”一词的科学文章)，提出了以下定义:“植物生物刺激剂是指除营养物和杀虫剂以外的物质和材料，当以特定配方应用于植物、种子或生长基质时，能够以一种对生长、发育和/或应激反应提供潜在益处的方式改变植物的生理过程”。du Jardin (2012年)得出结论认为，多溴联苯是一种非常异质的物质，并在他的研究中提出了八类作为生物刺激物的物质:腐殖物质、复杂的有机物质(从工农业和城市废物、污水污泥提取物、堆肥和粪肥中获得)、有益的化学元素(铝、钴、钠、硒和硅)、无机盐(包括亚磷酸盐)、海藻提取物(褐色、红色和绿色
papers.title_zh: 社论

papers.title: A Systems Theoretic Approach to the Security Threats in Cyber Physical Systems Applied to Stuxnet
papers.authors: Arash Nourian, Stuart E. Madnick
papers.abstract: Cyber physical systems (CPSs) are increasingly being adopted in a wide range of industries such as smart power grids. Even though the rapid proliferation of CPSs brings huge benefits to our society, it also provides potential attackers with many new opportunities to affect the physical world such as disrupting the services controlled by CPSs. Stuxnet is an example of such an attack that was designed to interrupt the Iranian nuclear program. In this paper, we show how the vulnerabilities exploited by Stuxnet could have been addressed at the design level. We utilize a system theoretic approach, based on prior research on system safety, that takes both physical and cyber components into account to analyze the threats exploited by Stuxnet. We conclude that such an approach is capable of identifying cyber threats towards CPSs at the design level and provide practical recommendations that CPS designers can utilize to design a more secure CPS.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息物理系统(CPSs)越来越多地被广泛应用于智能电网等行业。尽管CPS的快速扩散给我们的社会带来了巨大的好处，但它也为潜在的攻击者提供了许多影响物理世界的新机会，例如中断由CPS控制的服务。Stuxnet就是这种旨在中断伊朗核计划的攻击的一个例子。在本文中，我们展示了Stuxnet利用的漏洞如何在设计层面得到解决。我们利用系统理论方法，基于之前对系统安全的研究，将物理和网络组件都考虑在内，来分析Stuxnet所利用的威胁。我们的结论是，这种方法能够在设计层面识别CPS面临的网络威胁，并为CPS设计师提供实用的建议，以设计更安全的CPS。
papers.title_zh: 应用于STUXNET的网络物理系统中安全威胁的系统理论方法

papers.title: Anonymity Leakage in Private VoIP Networks
papers.authors: Saurabh Shintre, Virgil D. Gligor, João Barros
papers.abstract: Private communication detection (PCD) is a traffic-analysis technique whereby an ordinary user of a communication network exploits side channels in end-point devices to observe the busy/idle activity status of targeted users. Correlations of users’ activity status allows collection of communication records that reveal private relationships. PCD techniques have been demonstrated for a number of communication technologies, such as Wi-Fi and VoIP, and their effectiveness shown even when the communication network is private; i.e., it provides content confidentiality, flow anonymity, and user pseudonymity. In this paper, we present a mathematical model of PCD that captures the activity status of two targets in a private VoIP network, including the probing process of an attacker that aims to breach their communication anonymity. Using this model, we a) develop fundamental bounds on PCD accuracy; b) measure the anonymity leakage in terms of the amount of call record information obtained in an attack; and c) provide performance guarantees and compare the efficacy of different PCD countermeasures, such as resource randomization and use of firewalls.
papers.abstract_zh: 专用通信检测(PCD)是一种流量分析技术，通信网络的普通用户利用终端设备中的侧信道来观察目标用户的忙/闲活动状态。用户活动状态的相关性允许收集揭示私人关系的通信记录。PCD技术已经被证明用于多种通信技术，例如Wi-Fi和VoIP，并且即使当通信网络是私有的时，它们也显示出有效性；即，它提供内容机密性、流匿名性和用户假名性。在本文中，我们提出了一个PCD的数学模型，该模型捕获私有VoIP网络中两个目标的活动状态，包括攻击者旨在破坏他们的通信匿名性的探测过程。使用这个模型，我们a)开发PCD精度的基本界限；b)根据在攻击中获得的呼叫记录信息的数量来测量匿名泄漏；以及c)提供性能保证并比较不同PCD对策的功效，例如资源随机化和防火墙的使用。
papers.title_zh: 私人VoIP网络中的匿名性泄漏

papers.title: Efficient and Privacy-Preserving Outsourced Calculation of Rational Numbers
papers.authors: Ximeng Liu, Kim-Kwang Raymond Choo, Robert H. Deng, Rongxing Lu, Jian Weng
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose a framework for efficient and privacy-preserving outsourced calculation of rational numbers, which we refer to as POCR. Using POCR, a user can securely outsource the storing and processing of rational numbers to a cloud server without compromising the security of the (original) data and the computed results. We present the system architecture of POCR and the associated toolkits required in the privacy preserving calculation of integers and rational numbers to ensure that commonly used outsourced operations can be handled on-the-fly. We then prove that the proposed POCR achieves the goal of secure integer and rational number calculation without resulting in privacy leakage to unauthorized parties, and demonstrate the utility and the efficiency of POCR using simulations.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一个有效的和隐私保护的有理数外包计算的框架，我们称之为POCR。使用POCR，用户可以安全地将有理数的存储和处理外包给云服务器，而不会损害(原始)数据和计算结果的安全性。我们介绍了POCR的系统架构和在整数和有理数的隐私保护计算中所需的相关工具包，以确保常用的外包操作可以在运行中处理。然后，我们证明了所提出的POCR实现了安全整数和有理数计算的目标，而不会导致隐私泄露给未授权方，并通过仿真演示了POCR的实用性和效率。
papers.title_zh: 有效和隐私的外包计算有理数

papers.title: Faultprog: Testing the Accuracy of Binary-Level Software Fault Injection
papers.authors: Domenico Cotroneo, Anna Lanzaro, Roberto Natella
papers.abstract: Off-The-Shelf (OTS) software components are the cornerstone of modern systems, including safety-critical ones. However, the dependability of OTS components is uncertain due to the lack of source code, design artifacts and test cases, since only their binary code is supplied. Fault injection in components’ binary code is a solution to understand the risks posed by buggy OTS components. In this paper, we consider the problem of the accurate mutation of binary code for fault injection purposes. Fault injection emulates bugs in high-level programming constructs (assignments, expressions, function calls, ...) by mutating their translation in binary code. However, the semantic gap between the source code and its binary translation often leads to inaccurate mutations. We propose Faultprog, a systematic approach for testing the accuracy of binary mutation tools. Faultprog automatically generates synthetic programs using a stochastic grammar, and mutates both their binary code with the tool under test, and their source code as reference for comparisons. Moreover, we present a case study on a commercial binary mutation tool, where Faultprog was adopted to identify code patterns and compiler optimizations that affect its mutation accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 现成的(OTS)软件组件是现代系统的基石，包括安全关键型系统。然而，由于缺少源代码、设计工件和测试用例，OTS组件的可靠性是不确定的，因为只提供了它们的二进制代码。组件二进制代码中的故障注入是理解错误的OTS组件所带来的风险的解决方案。在本文中，我们考虑了用于故障注入的二进制代码的精确变异问题。故障注入模拟高级编程结构(赋值、表达式、函数调用，...)通过在二进制代码中改变它们的翻译。然而，源代码和其二进制翻译之间的语义差距经常导致不准确的突变。我们提出了Faultprog，一种测试二元变异工具准确性的系统方法。Faultprog使用随机语法自动生成合成程序，并用测试工具对它们的二进制代码和它们的源代码进行变异，作为比较的参考。此外，我们提供了一个商业二进制变异工具的案例研究，其中Faultprog被用来识别影响其变异准确性的代码模式和编译器优化。
papers.title_zh: FALSPROG：测试二进制软件故障注入的准确性

papers.title: GeTrust: A Guarantee-Based Trust Model in Chord-Based P2P Networks
papers.authors: Xianfu Meng, Dongxu Liu
papers.abstract: More and more users are attracted by P2P networks characterized by decentralization, autonomy and anonymity. However, users’ unconstrained behavior makes it necessary to use a trust model when establishing trust relationships between peers. Most existing trust models are based on recommendations, which, however, suffer from the shortcomings of slow convergence and high complexity of trust computations, as well as huge overhead of network traffic. Inspired by the establishment of trust relationships in human society, a guarantee-based trust model, GeTrust, is proposed for Chord-based P2P networks. A service peer needs to choose its guarantee peer(s) for the service it is going to provide, and they are both required to pledge reputation mortgages for the service. The request peer makes evaluations on all the candidates of service peer by referring their service reputations and their guarantee peers’ reputations, and selects the one with highest evaluation to be its service provider. In order to enhance GeTrust's availability and prevent malicious behavior, we also present incentive mechanism and anonymous reputation management strategy. Simulation results show that GeTrust is effective and efficient in terms of improving successful transaction rate, resisting complex attacks, reducing network overhead and lowering computational complexity.
papers.abstract_zh: P2P网络以其去中心化、自治性和匿名性的特点吸引了越来越多的用户。然而，用户的无约束行为使得在对等点之间建立信任关系时有必要使用信任模型。现有的大多数信任模型都是基于推荐的，但是存在收敛速度慢、信任计算复杂度高以及网络流量开销大的缺点。受人类社会建立信任关系的启发，提出了一种基于Chord的P2P网络信任模型GeTrust。一个服务对等体需要为它将要提供的服务选择它的担保对等体，并且它们都需要为该服务保证信誉抵押。请求节点通过参考服务节点的服务信誉和保证节点的信誉对所有候选服务节点进行评估，并选择评估最高的服务节点作为其服务提供者。为了提高GeTrust的可用性和防止恶意行为，我们还提出了激励机制和匿名信誉管理策略。仿真结果表明，GeTrust在提高成功交易率、抵抗复杂攻击、减少网络开销和降低计算复杂度方面是有效的。
papers.title_zh: GetRust：基于和弦的P2P网络中的基于保证的信任模型

papers.title: Immutable Authentication and Integrity Schemes for Outsourced Databases
papers.authors: Attila Altay Yavuz
papers.abstract: Database outsourcing enables organizations to offload their data management overhead to the external service providers. Immutable signatures are ideal tools to provide authentication and integrity for such applications with an important property called immutability. Signature immutability ensures that, no attacker can derive a valid signature for unposed queries from previous queries and their corresponding signatures. This prevents an attacker from creating his own de-facto services via such derived signatures. Unfortunately, existing immutable signatures are very computation/communication costly, which make them impractical for real-life applications. In this paper, we developed three new schemes called <italic>practical and immutable signature bouquets (<inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">${PISB}$</tex-math></inline-formula>)</italic>, which achieve efficient immutability for outsourced databases. <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${PISB}$</tex-math></inline-formula> schemes are simple, non-interactive, and computation/communication efficient. Our generic scheme can be constructed from any aggregate signature coupled with a standard signature. Our specific scheme is constructed from Condensed-RSA and Sequential Aggregate RSA. It has a low verifier computational overhead and compact signature. Our third scheme offers the lowest end-to-end delay among existing alternatives by enabling efficient signature pre-computability. We provide formal security analysis of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${PISB}$</tex-math></inline-formula>  schemes (in Random Oracle Model) and give a theoretical analysis on the relationship between signature immutability and signature extraction. We also showed that <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${PISB}$ </tex-math></inline-formula> schemes are more efficient than previous alternatives.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据库外包使组织能够将其数据管理开销转移给外部服务提供商。不可变签名是为这类应用程序提供身份验证和完整性的理想工具，它具有一个称为不变性的重要属性。签名不变性确保没有攻击者能够从先前的查询及其相应的签名中为未发布的查询导出有效的签名。这可以防止攻击者通过这种派生签名创建自己的实际服务。不幸的是，现有的不可变签名的计算/通信成本非常高，这使得它们对于现实生活中的应用不切实际。在本文中，我们开发了三个新的方案，称为< italic >实用且不可变的签名束(< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { PISB } $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >)</italic >，实现了外包数据库的高效不变性。< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { PISB } $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >方案简单、非交互式、计算/通信效率高。我们的一般方案可以由任何聚合签名和标准签名构成。我们的具体方案是由压缩RSA和顺序聚合RSA构成的。它具有低的验证者计算开销和紧凑的签名。我们的第三个方案通过实现高效的签名可预测性，提供了现有备选方案中最低的端到端延迟。我们提供了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { PISB } $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >方案(在随机预言模型中)的形式化安全性分析，并给出了签名不变性和签名提取之间关系的理论分析。我们还展示了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { PISB } $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >方案比以前的替代方案更有效。
papers.title_zh: 外包数据库的不变身份验证和完整性方案

papers.title: MADAM: Effective and Efficient Behavior-based Android Malware Detection and Prevention
papers.authors: Andrea Saracino, Daniele Sgandurra, Gianluca Dini, Fabio Martinelli
papers.abstract: Android users are constantly threatened by an increasing number of malicious applications (apps), generically called malware. Malware constitutes a serious threat to user privacy, money, device and file integrity. In this paper we note that, by studying their actions, we can classify malware into a small number of behavioral classes, each of which performs a limited set of misbehaviors that characterize them. These misbehaviors can be defined by monitoring features belonging to different Android levels. In this paper we present MADAM, a novel host-based malware detection system for Android devices which simultaneously analyzes and correlates features at four levels: kernel, application, user and package, to detect and stop malicious behaviors. MADAM has been specifically designed to take into account those behaviors that are characteristics of almost every real malware which can be found in the wild. MADAM detects and effectively blocks more than 96 percent of malicious apps, which come from three large datasets with about 2,800 apps, by exploiting the cooperation of two parallel classifiers and a behavioral signature-based detector. Extensive experiments, which also includes the analysis of a testbed of 9,804 genuine apps, have been conducted to show the low false alarm rate, the negligible performance overhead and limited battery consumption.
papers.abstract_zh: Android用户不断受到越来越多的恶意应用程序(应用程序)的威胁，这些应用程序统称为恶意软件。恶意软件对用户隐私、金钱、设备和文件完整性构成严重威胁。在本文中，我们注意到，通过研究他们的行为，我们可以将恶意软件分为少量的行为类别，每个类别都执行一组有限的不当行为。这些不当行为可以通过监控属于不同Android级别的功能来定义。在本文中，我们提出了MADAM，一种新的基于主机的Android设备恶意软件检测系统，它同时分析和关联四个级别的特征:内核、应用程序、用户和软件包，以检测和阻止恶意行为。MADAM经过专门设计，考虑到了几乎所有真正的恶意软件的行为特征。MADAM通过利用两个并行分类器和一个基于行为特征的检测器的合作，检测并有效阻止超过96%的恶意应用，这些恶意应用来自三个包含约2，800个应用的大型数据集。进行了广泛的实验，其中包括对9，804个正版应用的测试床的分析，以显示低误报率、可忽略的性能开销和有限的电池消耗。
papers.title_zh: 女士：有效，有效的基于行为的Android恶意软件检测和预防

papers.title: Magic Train: Design of Measurement Methods against Bandwidth Inflation Attacks
papers.authors: Peng Zhou, Rocky K. C. Chang, Xiaojing Gu, Minrui Fei, Jianying Zhou
papers.abstract: Bandwidth measurement is important for many network applications and services, such as peer-to-peer networks, video caching and anonymity services. To win a bandwidth-based competition for some malicious purpose, adversarial Internet hosts may falsely announce a larger network bandwidth. Some preliminary solutions have been proposed to this problem. They can either evade the bandwidth inflation by a consensus view (i.e., opportunistic bandwidth measurements) or detect bandwidth frauds via forgeable tricks (i.e., detection through bandwidth's CDF symmetry). However, smart adversaries can easily remove the forgeable tricks and report an equally larger bandwidth to avoid the consensus analyses. To defend against the smart bandwidth inflation frauds, we design magic train, a new measurement method which combines an unpredictable packet train with estimated round-trip time (RTT) for detection. The inflation behaviors can be detected through highly contradictory bandwidth results calculated using different magic trains or a train's different segments, or large deviation between the estimated RTT and the RTT reported by the train's first packet. Being an uncooperative measurement method, magic train can be easily deployed on the Internet. We have implemented the magic train using RAW socket and LibPcap, and evaluated the implementation in a controlled testbed and the Internet. The results have successfully confirmed the effectiveness of magic train in detecting and preventing smart bandwidth inflation attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 带宽测量对于许多网络应用和服务是重要的，例如对等网络、视频缓存和匿名服务。为了赢得基于带宽的竞争，敌对的互联网主机可能会虚假地宣布更大的网络带宽。对于这个问题已经提出了一些初步的解决方案。他们可以通过一致的观点(即，机会性带宽测量)来逃避带宽膨胀，或者通过伪造的伎俩来检测带宽欺诈(即，通过带宽的CDF对称性来检测)。然而，聪明的对手可以很容易地消除伪造的伎俩，并报告一个同样大的带宽，以避免共识分析。为了防范智能带宽膨胀欺诈，我们设计了magic train，这是一种新的测量方法，它结合了不可预测的包序列和估计的往返时间(RTT)来进行检测。通过使用不同的魔术序列或序列的不同段计算的高度矛盾的带宽结果，或者序列的第一个数据包报告的估计RTT和RTT之间的大偏差，可以检测到膨胀行为。作为一种不合作的测量方法，魔术列车可以很容易地部署在互联网上。我们使用RAW socket和LibPcap实现了magic train，并在一个受控的测试床和互联网上评估了该实现。结果成功地证实了magic train在检测和防止智能带宽膨胀攻击方面的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 魔术火车：针对带宽通货膨胀攻击的测量方法的设计

papers.title: Negative Iris Recognition
papers.authors: Dongdong Zhao, Wenjian Luo, Ran Liu, Lihua Yue
papers.abstract: Elements of a person's biometrics are typically stable over the duration of a lifetime, and thus, it is highly important to protect biometric data while supporting recognition (it is also called secure biometric recognition). However, the biometric data that are derived from a person usually vary slightly due to a variety of reasons, such as distortion during picture capture, and it is difficult to use traditional techniques, such as classical encryption algorithms, in secure biometric recognition. The negative database (NDB) is a new technique for privacy preservation. Reversing the NDB has been demonstrated to be an NP-hard problem, and several algorithms for generating hard-to-reverse NDBs have been proposed. In this paper, first, we propose negative iris recognition, which is a novel secure iris recognition scheme that is based on the NDB. We show that negative iris recognition supports several important strategies in iris recognition, e.g., shifting and masking. Next, we analyze the security and efficiency of negative iris recognition. Experimental results show that negative iris recognition is an effective and secure iris recognition scheme. Specifically, negative iris recognition can achieve a highly promising recognition performance (i.e., GAR = 98.94% at FAR = 0.01%, EER = 0.60%) on the typical database CASIA-IrisV3-Interval.
papers.abstract_zh: 一个人的生物特征的元素通常在一生中是稳定的，因此，在支持识别的同时保护生物特征数据是非常重要的(也称为安全生物特征识别)。然而，由于各种原因，例如图片捕捉期间的失真，从人导出的生物统计数据通常略有不同，并且难以在安全生物统计识别中使用传统技术，例如经典加密算法。负面数据库(NDB)是一种新的隐私保护技术。反转NDB已经被证明是一个NP难问题，并且已经提出了几种产生难以反转的ndb的算法。本文首先提出了负虹膜识别，这是一种新的基于NDB的安全虹膜识别方案。我们表明，否定虹膜识别支持虹膜识别中的几个重要策略，例如，移动和掩蔽。接下来，我们分析了消极虹膜识别的安全性和效率。实验结果表明，消极虹膜识别是一种有效、安全的虹膜识别方案。具体来说，在典型的数据库CASIA-IrisV3-Interval上，否定虹膜识别可以实现非常有前途的识别性能(即在FAR = 0.01%时GAR = 98.94%，EER = 0.60%)。
papers.title_zh: 负虹膜识别

papers.title: Performability Analysis of k-to-l-Out-of-n Computing Systems Using Binary Decision Diagrams
papers.authors: Yuchang Mo, Liudong Xing, Joanne Bechta Dugan
papers.abstract: Modern computing systems typically utilize a large number of computing nodes to perform coordinated computations in parallel or simultaneously. They can exhibit multiple performance states or levels due to statuses or failures of their consistent nodes. Performability analysis is concerned with assessing the probability that the computing system performs at a particular performance level. In the context of performability analysis, these computing systems can be modeled using k-to-l-out-of-n structures. This paper proposes new analytical methods based on binary decision diagrams (BDD) for the performability analysis of large computing systems with unrepairable computing nodes. A new and efficient BDD algorithm that makes full uses of the special k -to-l-out-of-n structure is first proposed for systems with computing node having identical computing powers. New simplification rules are further proposed to generate compact and canonical BDD models for systems with heterogeneous computing nodes characterized by different computing powers. Ordering heuristic is also explored to further reduce the size of BDD models. Examples are provided to illustrate the proposed BDD-based performability analysis methodology as well as its efficiency in analyzing large-scale computing systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代计算系统通常利用大量计算节点并行或同时执行协同计算。由于一致性节点的状态或故障，它们可以表现出多种性能状态或级别。可执行性分析涉及评估计算系统在特定性能水平上执行的概率。在可执行性分析的上下文中，这些计算系统可以使用k-to-l-out-of-n结构来建模。提出了一种新的基于二元决策图的分析方法，用于具有不可修复计算节点的大型计算系统的可执行性分析。针对计算节点具有相同计算能力的系统，提出了一种新的有效的BDD算法，该算法充分利用了特殊的k -to-l-out-of-n结构。进一步提出了新的简化规则来为具有以不同计算能力为特征的异构计算节点的系统生成紧凑和规范的BDD模型。排序启发式也被探索，以进一步减少BDD模型的规模。举例说明了所提出的基于BDD的可执行性分析方法及其在分析大规模计算系统中的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 使用二进制决策图对N计算系统的K-TO-L-OF-OF-OF-OF-OF-OF-OF-OF

papers.title: Performability Modeling for RAID Storage Systems by Markov Regenerative Process
papers.authors: Fumio Machida, Ruofan Xia, Kishor S. Trivedi
papers.abstract: This paper presents a performability model for RAID storage systems using Markov regenerative process to compare different RAID architectures. While homogeneous Markov models are extensively used for reliability analysis of RAID storage systems, the memory-less property of the sojourn time assumed in such models is not satisfied in reality, especially in disk rebuild process whose progress is not interrupted even at an event of another disk failure. In this paper, we use Markov regenerative process which allows us to model the generally distributed rebuild times providing a needed extension of the traditional Markov models. The Markov regenerative process is then used to assess the performability of the storage system by assigning reward rates to each state based on the real storage benchmark results. Our numerical study characterizes the performability advantage of RAID6 architecture over RAID10 architecture in terms of sequential read access. Our findings include that the effect of exponential assumption for the rebuild times has practically negligible effect when we focus on data availability. However, the effect this approximation on performability prediction may not be negligible especially when the performance level drastically changes in degraded states. Our MRGP model provides more accurate prediction of performability in such cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一个RAID存储系统的可执行性模型，使用马尔可夫再生过程来比较不同的RAID体系结构。虽然齐次马尔可夫模型被广泛用于RAID存储系统的可靠性分析，但是这种模型中假设的逗留时间的无记忆特性在现实中并不满足，特别是在磁盘重建过程中，即使发生另一个磁盘故障，重建过程也不会中断。在本文中，我们使用马尔可夫再生过程，它允许我们对一般分布的重建时间进行建模，提供了传统马尔可夫模型的必要扩展。然后，通过基于实际存储基准测试结果向每个状态分配报酬率，使用马尔可夫再生过程来评估存储系统的可执行性。我们的数值研究描述了RAID6架构在顺序读取访问方面优于RAID10架构的可执行性优势。我们的发现包括，当我们关注数据可用性时，重建时间的指数假设的影响实际上可以忽略不计。然而，这种近似对可执行性预测的影响可能是不可忽略的，尤其是当性能水平在降级状态下剧烈变化时。我们的MRGP模型在这种情况下提供了更精确的可执行性预测。
papers.title_zh: 马尔可夫再生过程的RAID存储系统的可执行性建模

papers.title: PROVEST: Provenance-Based Trust Model for Delay Tolerant Networks
papers.authors: Jin-Hee Cho, Ing-Ray Chen
papers.abstract: Delay tolerant networks (DTNs) are often encountered in military network environments where end-to-end connectivity is not guaranteed due to frequent disconnection or delay. This work proposes a provenance-based trust framework, namely PROVEST (PROVEnance-baSed Trust model) that aims to achieve accurate peer-to-peer trust assessment and maximize the delivery of correct messages received by destination nodes while minimizing message delay and communication cost under resource-constrained network environments. Provenance refers to the history of ownership of a valued object or information. We leverage the interdependency between trustworthiness of information source and information itself in PROVEST. PROVEST takes a data-driven approach to reduce resource consumption in the presence of selfish or malicious nodes while estimating a node's trust dynamically in response to changes in the environmental and node conditions. This work adopts a model-based method to evaluate the performance of PROVEST (i.e., trust accuracy and routing performance) using Stochastic Petri Nets. We conduct a comparative performance analysis of PROVEST against existing trust-based and non-trust-based DTN routing protocols to analyze the benefits of PROVEST. We validate PROVEST using a real dataset of DTN mobility traces.
papers.abstract_zh: 延迟容忍网络(DTN)经常出现在军事网络环境中，由于频繁的断开连接或延迟，端到端的连通性得不到保证。该工作提出了一个基于起源的信任框架，即PROVEST(基于起源的信任模型),其目的是在资源受限的网络环境下，实现精确的对等信任评估，最大限度地传递正确的消息给目的节点，同时最小化消息延迟和通信成本。出处是指有价值的对象或信息的所有权历史。在PROVEST中，我们利用了信息源的可信度和信息本身之间的相互依赖性。PROVEST采用数据驱动的方法来减少自私或恶意节点的资源消耗，同时根据环境和节点条件的变化动态估计节点的信任度。本文采用基于模型的方法，使用随机Petri网来评估PROVEST的性能(即信任精度和路由性能)。我们对PROVEST与现有的基于信任和不基于信任的DTN路由协议进行了性能对比分析，以分析PROVEST的优势。我们使用DTN移动轨迹的真实数据集来验证PROVEST。
papers.title_zh: 宣传：延迟耐受网络的基于出处的信任模型

papers.title: Rumor Source Identification in Social Networks with Time-Varying Topology
papers.authors: Jiao Jiao Jiang, Sheng Wen, Shui Yu, Yang Xiang, Wanlei Zhou
papers.abstract: Identifying rumor sources in social networks plays a critical role in limiting the damage caused by them through the timely quarantine of the sources. However, the temporal variation in the topology of social networks and the ongoing dynamic processes challenge our traditional source identification techniques that are considered in static networks. In this paper, we borrow an idea from criminology and propose a novel method to overcome the challenges. First, we reduce the time-varying networks to a series of static networks by introducing a time-integrating window. Second, instead of inspecting every individual in traditional techniques, we adopt a reverse dissemination strategy to specify a set of suspects of the real rumor source. This process addresses the scalability issue of source identification problems, and therefore dramatically promotes the efficiency of rumor source identification. Third, to determine the real source from the suspects, we employ a novel microscopic rumor spreading model to calculate the maximum likelihood (ML) for each suspect. The one who can provide the largest ML estimate is considered as the real source. The evaluations are carried out on real social networks with time-varying topology. The experiment results show that our method can reduce $60 - 90$ percent of the source seeking area in various time-varying social networks. The results further indicate that our method can accurately identify the real source, or an individual who is very close to the real source. To the best of our knowledge, the proposed method is the first that can be used to identify rumor sources in time-varying social networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 识别社交网络中的谣言来源对于通过及时隔离来源来限制谣言造成的损害至关重要。然而，社会网络拓扑中的时间变化和正在进行的动态过程挑战了我们在静态网络中考虑的传统来源识别技术。本文借鉴犯罪学的思想，提出了一种新的方法来克服这些挑战。首先，我们通过引入时间积分窗口将时变网络简化为一系列静态网络。第二，我们采用反向传播策略来指定一组真实谣言来源的嫌疑人，而不是像传统技术那样检查每个人。这一过程解决了来源识别问题的可扩展性问题，因此极大地提高了谣言来源识别的效率。第三，为了确定嫌疑人的真实来源，我们采用了一种新的微观谣言传播模型来计算每个嫌疑人的最大似然(ML)。能够提供最大最大似然估计的那个被认为是真正的源。评估是在具有时变拓扑的真实社交网络上进行的。实验结果表明，在各种时变社会网络中，我们的方法可以减少60-90%的资源搜索面积。结果进一步表明，我们的方法可以准确地识别真实源，或者非常接近真实源的个体。据我们所知，所提出的方法是第一个可用于识别时变社交网络中谣言来源的方法。
papers.title_zh: 与时变拓扑的社交网络中的谣言来源识别

papers.title: A Shoulder Surfing Resistant Graphical Authentication System
papers.authors: Hung-Min Sun, Shiuan-Tung Chen, Jyh-Haw Yeh, Chia-Yun Cheng
papers.abstract: Authentication based on passwords is used largely in applications for computer security and privacy. However, human actions such as choosing bad passwords and inputting passwords in an insecure way are regarded as “the weakest link” in the authentication chain. Rather than arbitrary alphanumeric strings, users tend to choose passwords either short or meaningful for easy memorization. With web applications and mobile apps piling up, people can access these applications anytime and anywhere with various devices. This evolution brings great convenience but also increases the probability of exposing passwords to shoulder surfing attacks. Attackers can observe directly or use external recording devices to collect users’ credentials. To overcome this problem, we proposed a novel authentication system PassMatrix, based on graphical passwords to resist shoulder surfing attacks. With a one-time valid login indicator and circulative horizontal and vertical bars covering the entire scope of pass-images, PassMatrix offers no hint for attackers to figure out or narrow down the password even they conduct multiple camera-based attacks. We also implemented a PassMatrix prototype on Android and carried out real user experiments to evaluate its memorability and usability. From the experimental result, the proposed system achieves better resistance to shoulder surfing attacks while maintaining usability.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于密码的认证主要用于计算机安全和隐私的应用中。然而，诸如选择不良密码和以不安全的方式输入密码等人为行为被视为认证链中的“最薄弱环节”。为了便于记忆，用户倾向于选择短的或有意义的密码，而不是任意的字母数字串。随着web应用程序和移动应用程序的堆积，人们可以随时随地通过各种设备访问这些应用程序。这种发展带来了极大的便利，但也增加了暴露密码的可能性。攻击者可以直接观察或使用外部记录设备来收集用户的凭据。为了克服这个问题，我们提出了一种新的认证系统PassMatrix，基于图形密码来抵抗肩窥攻击。PassMatrix具有一次性有效登录指示器和覆盖整个pass-image范围的可循环水平和垂直条，即使攻击者进行多次基于摄像头的攻击，也不会提示他们找出或缩小密码范围。我们还在Android上实现了一个PassMatrix原型，并进行了真实用户实验来评估它的可记忆性和可用性。实验结果表明，该系统在保持可用性的同时，具有更好的抗肩窥攻击能力。
papers.title_zh: 抗肩膀冲浪的图形身份验证系统

papers.title: Attribute-based Access Control for ICN Naming Scheme
papers.authors: Bing Li, Dijiang Huang, Zhijie Wang, Yan Zhu
papers.abstract: Information Centric Networking (ICN) is a new network architecture that aims to overcome the weakness of existing IP-based networking architecture. Instead of establishing a connection between the communicating hosts, ICN focuses on the content, i.e., data, transmitted in network. Content copies in ICN can be cached at different locations. The content is out of its owner's control once it is published. Thus, enforcing access control policies on distributed content copies is crucial in ICN. Attribute-Based Encryption (ABE) is a feasible approach to enforce such control mechanisms in this environment. However, applying ABE in ICN faces two challenges: from management perspective, it is complicated to manage attributes in distributed manners; from privacy protection perspective, unlike in traditional networks, the enforced content access policies are public to all the ICN users. Thus, it is desirable that unauthorized content viewers are not able to retrieve the access policy. To this end, a privacy-preserving access control scheme for ICN and its corresponding attribute management solution are presented in this paper. The proposed approach is compatible with existing flat name based ICN architectures.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息中心网络(ICN)是一种新的网络体系结构，旨在克服现有的基于IP的网络体系结构的弱点。ICN不是在通信主机之间建立连接，而是关注网络中传输的内容，即数据。ICN的内容副本可以缓存在不同的位置。内容一旦发布，就脱离了其所有者的控制。因此，在ICN，对分布式内容拷贝实施访问控制策略至关重要。基于属性的加密(ABE)是在这种环境中实施这种控制机制的可行方法。然而，在ICN应用ABE面临两个挑战:从管理角度来看，以分布式方式管理属性是复杂的；从隐私保护的角度来看，与传统网络不同，强制内容访问策略对所有ICN用户是公开的。因此，希望未授权的内容查看者不能检索访问策略。为此，本文提出了一种保护隐私的ICN访问控制方案及其相应的属性管理解决方案。所提出的方法与现有的基于平面名称的ICN体系结构兼容。
papers.title_zh: ICN命名方案的基于属性的访问控制

papers.title: Conditional Diagnosability of (n, k)-Star Graphs Under the PMC Model
papers.authors: Nai-Wen Chang, Sun-Yuan Hsieh
papers.abstract: Fault diagnosis has played a major role in measuring the reliability of multiprocessor systems. The diagnosability of many well-known multiprocessor systems has been widely investigated. Conditional diagnosability is a novel property of measuring diagnosability by adding a further condition that any fault set cannot contain all the neighbors of every node in the system. Several known structural properties of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(n,k)$ </tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="hsieh-ieq2-2562620.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-star graphs are exhibited. Based on these properties, we investigate the conditional diagnosability of <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$(n,k)$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="hsieh-ieq3-2562620.gif"/> </alternatives></inline-formula>-star graphs under the PMC model, and show that it is 1) <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\left\lceil \frac{n}{2}\right\rceil -1$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="hsieh-ieq4-2562620.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> for <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n\geq 4$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="hsieh-ieq5-2562620.gif"/> </alternatives></inline-formula> and <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k=1$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="hsieh-ieq6-2562620.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, and 2) <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n+3k-6$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="hsieh-ieq7-2562620.gif"/> </alternatives></inline-formula> for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$2\leq k\leq n-3$</tex-math> <alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="hsieh-ieq8-2562620.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>.
papers.abstract_zh: 故障诊断在衡量多处理器系统的可靠性方面发挥了重要作用。许多众所周知的多处理器系统的可诊断性已经得到了广泛的研究。条件可诊断性是衡量可诊断性的一个新特性，它增加了一个条件，即任何故障集都不能包含系统中每个节点的所有邻居。展示了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(n，k)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Hsieh-ieq 2-2562620 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-star图的几个已知结构性质。基于这些性质，我们研究了PMC模型下< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $(n，k)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Hsieh-ieq 3-2562620 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >-星型图的条件可诊断性，并证明了它是1)< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ left \ lceil \ frac { n } { n
papers.title_zh: PMC模型下（N，K） - 星形图的条件诊断性

papers.title: Efficient Anonymous Message Submission
papers.authors: Xinxin Zhao, Lingjun Li, Guoliang Xue, Gail-Joon Ahn
papers.abstract: In online surveys, many people are reluctant to provide true answers due to privacy concerns. Thus, anonymity is important for online message collection. Existing solutions let each member blindly shuffle the submitted messages by using an IND-CCA2 secure cryptosystem. In the end, the message sender's identities are protected since no one knows the message submission order. These approaches cannot efficiently handle groups of large size. In this paper, we propose an efficient anonymous message submission protocol aimed at a practical group size. Our protocol is based on a secret sharing scheme and a symmetric key cryptosystem. We propose a novel method to aggregate members’ messages into a message vector such that a group member knows only his own position in the submission sequence. The protocol is accountable for capturing malicious members breaking the protocol execution. We provide a theoretical proof showing that our protocol is anonymous under malicious attacks. We also discuss our simulation results to demonstrate the efficiency of our protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 在网上调查中，很多人出于隐私考虑，不愿意提供真实答案。因此，匿名对于在线消息收集是重要的。现有的解决方案让每个成员通过使用IND-CCA2安全密码系统来盲目地混洗提交的消息。最终，消息发送者的身份得到了保护，因为没有人知道消息提交的顺序。这些方法不能有效地处理大规模的组。在本文中，我们提出了一个有效的匿名消息提交协议。我们的协议基于秘密共享方案和对称密钥密码系统。我们提出了一种新的方法来将成员的消息聚合到一个消息向量中，使得一个组成员只知道自己在提交序列中的位置。该协议负责捕获破坏协议执行的恶意成员。我们提供了一个理论证明，表明我们的协议在恶意攻击下是匿名的。我们也讨论了我们的模拟结果来证明我们的协议的效率。
papers.title_zh: 有效的匿名消息提交

papers.title: Empirical Study of Face Authentication Systems Under OSNFD Attacks
papers.authors: Yan Li, Yingjiu Li, Ke Xu, Qiang Yan, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Face authentication has been widely available on smartphones, tablets, and laptops. As numerous personal images are published in online social networks (OSNs), OSN-based facial disclosure (OSNFD) creates significant threat against face authentication. We make the first attempt to quantitatively measure OSNFD threat to real-world face authentication systems on smartphones, tablets, and laptops. Our results show that the percentage of vulnerable users that are subject to spoofing attacks is high, which is about 64 percent for laptop users, and 93 percent smartphone/tablet users. We investigate liveness detection methods in the real-world face authentication systems against OSNFD threat. We discover that under protection of liveness detection, the percentage of vulnerable images is 18.8 percent, but the percentage of vulnerable users is as high as 73.3 percent. This evidence suggests that the current face authentication systems are not strong enough under OSNFD attacks. Finally, we develop a risk estimation tool based on logistic regression, and analyze the impacts of key attributes of facial images on the OSNFD risk. Our statistical analysis reveals that the most influential attributes of facial images are image resolution, facial makeup, occluded eyes, and illumination. This tool can be used to evaluate OSNFD risk for OSN images to increase users’ awareness of OSNFD.
papers.abstract_zh: 人脸认证已经在智能手机、平板电脑和笔记本电脑上广泛使用。随着在线社交网络(OSNs)上发布大量个人图像，基于OSN的面部披露(OSNFD)对面部认证造成了巨大威胁。我们首次尝试在智能手机、平板电脑和笔记本电脑上定量测量OSNFD对真实世界人脸认证系统的威胁。我们的结果显示，遭受欺骗攻击的易受攻击用户的比例很高，笔记本电脑用户约为64%，智能手机/平板电脑用户约为93%。我们研究了现实世界中针对OSNFD威胁的人脸认证系统的活性检测方法。我们发现，在活性检测的保护下，脆弱图像的比例为18.8%，而脆弱用户的比例高达73.3%。这一证据表明，当前的人脸认证系统在OSNFD攻击下不够强大。最后，我们开发了一个基于逻辑回归的风险评估工具，并分析了面部图像的关键属性对OSNFD风险的影响。我们的统计分析揭示了面部图像的最有影响力的属性是图像分辨率、面部化妆、被遮挡的眼睛和照明。该工具可用于评估OSN图像的OSNFD风险，以提高用户对OSNFD的认识。
papers.title_zh: OSNFD攻击下面部身份验证系统的经验研究

papers.title: Knowledge Connectivity Requirements for Solving Byzantine Consensus with Unknown Participants
papers.authors: Eduardo Adílio Pelinson Alchieri, Alysson Bessani, Fabíola Greve, Joni da Silva Fraga
papers.abstract: Consensus is a fundamental building block to solve many practical problems that appear on reliable distributed systems. In spite of the fact that consensus is being widely studied in the context of standard networks, few studies have been conducted in order to solve it in dynamic and self-organizing systems characterized by unknown networks. While in a standard network the set of participants is static and known, in an unknown network, such set and number of participants are previously unknown. This work studies the problem of Byzantine Fault-Tolerant Consensus with Unknown Participants, namely BFT-CUP. This new problem aims at solving consensus in unknown networks with the additional requirement that participants in the system may behave maliciously. It presents the necessary and sufficient knowledge connectivity conditions in order to solve BFT-CUP under minimal synchrony requirements. In this way, it proposes algorithms that are shown to be optimal in terms of synchrony and knowledge connectivity among participants in the system.
papers.abstract_zh: 共识是解决许多出现在可靠分布式系统中的实际问题的基本构件。尽管在标准网络的背景下共识被广泛地研究，但是为了在以未知网络为特征的动态和自组织系统中解决它，很少进行研究。在标准网络中，参与者的集合是静态的并且是已知的，而在未知网络中，参与者的集合和数量是未知的。本文研究参与者未知的拜占庭容错共识问题，即BFT杯。这个新问题旨在解决未知网络中的共识，并附加了系统参与者可能恶意行为的要求。给出了在最小同步要求下求解BFT杯的充要知识连通条件。通过这种方式，它提出了在系统参与者之间的同步性和知识连接性方面被证明是最优的算法。
papers.title_zh: 与未知参与者解决拜占庭共识的知识连通性要求

papers.title: PDA: Semantically Secure Time-Series Data Analytics with Dynamic User Groups
papers.authors: Taeho Jung, Junze Han, Xiang-Yang Li
papers.abstract: Third-party analysis on private records is becoming increasingly important due to the widespread data collection for various analysis purposes. However, the data in its original form often contains sensitive information about individuals, and its publication will severely breach their privacy. In this paper, we present a novel Privacy-preserving Data Analytics framework PDA, which allows a third-party aggregator to obliviously conduct many different types of polynomial-based analysis on private data records provided by a dynamic sub-group of users. Notably, every user needs to keep only <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$O(n)$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="jung-ieq1-2577034.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> keys to join data analysis among <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$O(2^n)$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="jung-ieq2-2577034.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> different groups of users, and any data analysis that is represented by polynomials is supported by our framework. Besides, a real implementation shows the performance of our framework is comparable to the peer works who present ad-hoc solutions for specific data analysis applications. Despite such nice properties of PDA, it is provably secure against a very powerful attacker (chosen-plaintext attack) even in the Dolev-Yao network model where all communication channels are insecure.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于出于各种分析目的广泛收集数据，第三方对私人记录的分析变得越来越重要。然而，原始形式的数据通常包含个人的敏感信息，其发布将严重侵犯他们的隐私。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的隐私保护数据分析框架PDA，它允许第三方聚合器对动态用户子群提供的隐私数据记录进行多种不同类型的基于多项式的分析。值得注意的是，每个用户只需要保持< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " > $ o(n)$ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " jung-ie Q1-2577034 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >键，就可以在< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$o(2^n)$</tex-math><alternatives> < inline-graphic xlink:href = " jung-ieq 2-2577034 . gif "/> </alternatives >之间加入数据分析此外，一个真实的实现表明，我们的框架的性能可以与为特定数据分析应用提供专门解决方案的同行作品相媲美。尽管PDA具有这些良好的性质，但它在所有通信信道都不安全的Dolev-Yao网络模型中也能抵抗强大的攻击者(选择明文攻击)。
papers.title_zh: PDA：具有动态用户组的语义安全时间序列数据分析

papers.title: Physical Attestation in the Smart Grid for Distributed State Verification
papers.authors: Thomas Roth, Bruce M. McMillin
papers.abstract: A malicious process in a distributed system can fabricate its internal state in its communications with its peers. These state fabrications can cause other processes in the distributed system to make incorrect control decisions. Smart grid systems have a unique advantage in the detection of falsified state attacks because process control decisions have an observable effect on a shared physical infrastructure. The physical infrastructure acts as a high-integrity message channel that broadcasts changes in individual process states. This work proposes a new distributed security mechanism called physical attestation that combines physical feedback with methods from computer security to detect state fabrications in the smart grid. The theory of physical attestation is proven using an information flow security property called nondeducibility, and supported with experimental results from a simulation test bed.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式系统中的恶意进程可以在与其对等方的通信中伪造其内部状态。这些状态伪造会导致分布式系统中的其他进程做出不正确的控制决策。智能电网系统在检测伪造状态攻击方面具有独特的优势，因为过程控制决策对共享的物理基础设施具有明显的影响。物理基础设施充当高完整性的消息通道，广播各个流程状态的变化。这项工作提出了一种新的分布式安全机制，称为物理证明，它将物理反馈与计算机安全方法相结合，以检测智能电网中的状态伪造。物理证明的理论是使用称为不可还原性的信息流安全属性来证明的，并且得到了来自模拟测试床的实验结果的支持。
papers.title_zh: 用于分布式状态验证的智能电网中的物理证明

papers.title: Randomness Tests in Hostile Environments
papers.authors: Martin Goll, Shay Gueron
papers.abstract: An acceptable way to assess the quality of an RNG (PRNG) is to apply a standard battery of statistical randomness tests to a sampled output. Such tests compare some observed properties of the sample to properties of a uniform distribution, with the hope to detect deviations from the expected behavior. Consider a (P)RNG that outputs <italic>M </italic>-bit values which, due to a failure or an attack, are coerced to a subset of <italic>{0, 1}<sup>M</sup> </italic> of only <italic>2<sup>n</sup></italic> elements, for some <italic>n < M</italic>. Such outputs are predictable with a probability of at least <italic>2<sup>−n</sup> > 2<sup>−M</sup></italic>, but the standard randomness tests do not necessarily detect this behavior. We show here deterministic <italic>M</italic>-bit sequences (<italic>M = 128</italic>) that belong to a subset of size <italic>2<sup>n</sup></italic>, but pass the DIEHARD Battery of Tests of Randomness [1] and the NIST Statistical Test Suite [2], even with a relatively small value of <italic>n = 29</italic>. To address the difficulty, we propose a detection method that is feasible even for large values of <italic>n</italic> (e.g., <italic>n = 64</italic>). As a practical example, we apply our method to rule out the existence of the speculative stealthy hardware Trojan that is discussed in [3].
papers.abstract_zh: 评估RNG (PRNG)质量的一种可接受的方法是对采样输出应用一组标准的统计随机性测试。这种测试将样品的一些观察到的性质与均匀分布的性质进行比较，希望检测出与预期行为的偏差。考虑一个输出< italic>M </italic >位值的(P)RNG，由于故障或攻击，这些值被强制为仅< italic > 2 < sup > n </italic >元素的< italic>{0，1 } < sup > M </italic >的子集，对于某些< italic>n < M</italic >。这种输出可预测的概率至少为< italic > 2 < sup >-n </sup > > 2 < sup >-M </sup > </italic >，但标准随机性测试不一定能检测到这种行为。我们在这里展示了确定性的M比特序列(< italic>M = 128</italic >)，它们属于大小为< italic>2<sup>n</sup></italic >的子集，但是通过了一系列严格的随机性测试[1]和NIST统计测试套件[2]，即使是相对较小的值< italic>n = 29</italic >。为了解决这个困难，我们提出了一种检测方法，即使对于大的< italic>n</italic >(例如< italic>n = 64</italic >)值也是可行的。作为一个实际的例子，我们应用我们的方法来排除[3]中讨论的投机性隐形硬件木马的存在。
papers.title_zh: 敌对环境中的随机测试

papers.title: Risk Assessment in Social Networks Based on User Anomalous Behaviors
papers.authors: Naeimeh Laleh, Barbara Carminati, Elena Ferrari
papers.abstract: Although the dramatic increase in Online Social Network (OSN) usage, there are still a lot of security and privacy concerns. In such a scenario, it would be very beneficial to have a mechanism able to assign a risk score to each OSN user. For this reason, in this paper, we propose a risk assessment based on the idea that the more a user behavior diverges from what it can be considered as a ‘normal behavior’, the more it should be considered risky. In doing this, we have taken into account that OSN population is really heterogeneous in observed behaviors. As such, it is not possible to define a unique standard behavioral model that fits all OSN users’ behaviors. However, we expect that similar people tend to follow similar rules with the results of similar behavioral models. For this reason, we propose a risk assessment approach organized into two phases: similar users are first grouped together, then, for each identified group, we build one or more models for normal behavior. The carried out experiments on a real Facebook dataset show that the proposed model outperforms a simplified behavioral-based risk assessment where behavioral models are built over the whole OSN population, without a group identification phase.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管在线社交网络(OSN)的使用急剧增加，但仍然存在很多安全和隐私问题。在这种情况下，拥有一种能够为每个OSN用户分配风险分值的机制将非常有益。出于这个原因，在本文中，我们提出了一种风险评估方法，该方法基于这样一种思想，即用户行为越偏离“正常行为”，就越应该被认为是有风险的。在这样做的时候，我们已经考虑到OSN人口在观察到的行为上确实是异质的。因此，不可能定义适合所有OSN用户行为的唯一标准行为模型。然而，我们期望相似的人倾向于遵循相似的规则，具有相似的行为模型的结果。出于这个原因，我们提出了一种分为两个阶段的风险评估方法:首先将相似的用户分组，然后，对于每个确定的组，我们为正常行为建立一个或多个模型。在真实的脸书数据集上进行的实验表明，所提出的模型优于简化的基于行为的风险评估，其中行为模型是在整个OSN人口上建立的，没有群体识别阶段。
papers.title_zh: 基于用户异常行为的社交网络中的风险评估

papers.title: Shadow Attacks Based on Password Reuses: A Quantitative Empirical Analysis
papers.authors: Weili Han, Zhigong Li, Minyue Ni, Guofei Gu, Wenyuan Xu
papers.abstract: With the proliferation of websites, the security level of password-protected accounts is no longer purely determined by individual ones. Users may register multiple accounts on the same site or across multiple sites, and these passwords from the same users are likely to be the same or similar. As a result, an adversary can compromise the account of a user on a web forum, then guess the accounts of the same user in sensitive accounts, <italic/>e.g. <italic/>, online banking services, whose accounts could have the same or even stronger passwords. We name this attack as the shadow attack on passwords. To understand the situation, we examined the state-of-the-art Intra-Site Password Reuses (ISPR) and Cross-Site Password Reuses (CSPR) based on the leaked passwords from the biggest Internet user group (<italic/>i.e.<italic/>, 668 million members in China). With a collection of about <italic>70 million real-world </italic> web passwords across four large websites in China, we obtained around 4.6 million distinct users who have multiple accounts on the same site or across different sites. We found that for the users with multiple accounts in a single website, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$59.72$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="han-ieq1-2568187.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> percent reused their passwords and for the users with multiple accounts on multiple websites, <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$33.16 \pm 8.91$ </tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="han-ieq2-2568187.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> percent reused their passwords across websites. For the users that have multiple accounts but different passwords, the set of passwords of the same user exhibits patterns that can help password guessing: a leaked weak password reveals partial information of a strong one, which degrades the strength of the strong one. Given the aforementioned findings, we conducted an experiment and achieved a 39.38 percent improvement of guessing success rate with John the Ripper guessing tool. To the best of our knowledge, we are the first to provide a large-scale, empirical, and quantitative measurement of web password reuses, especially ISPR, and shed light on the severity of such threat in the real world.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着网站的激增，密码保护账户的安全级别不再纯粹由个人决定。用户可能在同一个网站或跨多个网站注册多个帐户，来自相同用户的这些密码很可能相同或相似。因此，对手可以在网络论坛上侵入用户的帐户，然后猜测同一用户在敏感帐户中的帐户，例如< italic/>网上银行服务，其帐户可能具有相同或甚至更强的密码。我们将这种攻击称为密码影子攻击。为了了解这种情况，我们根据最大的互联网用户群(< italic/>即< italic/>，中国有6.68亿用户)泄露的密码，研究了最先进的站点内密码重用(ISPR)和跨站点密码重用(CSPR)。我们在中国的四个大型网站上收集了大约< italic > 7000万个真实世界</italic >的网络密码，获得了大约460万个不同的用户，他们在同一网站或不同网站上拥有多个帐户。我们发现，对于在一个网站上拥有多个帐户的用户，< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 59.72 $</tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Han-ie Q1-2568187 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >的用户重复使用其密码的比例为,< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ 33.16 \ pm 8.91对于拥有多个帐户但密码不同的用户，同一用户的密码集呈现出有助于密码猜测的模式:泄漏的弱密码揭示了强密码的部分信息，从而降低了强密码的强度。鉴于上述发现，我们进行了一项实验，使用开膛手约翰猜测工具，猜测成功率提高了39.38%。据我们所知，我们是第一个提供大规模、实证和量化的网络密码重用测量的，尤其是ISPR，并揭示了这种威胁在现实世界中的严重性。
papers.title_zh: 基于密码重复使用的影子攻击：定量经验分析

papers.title: Towards Transparent Debugging
papers.authors: Fengwei Zhang, Kevin Leach, Angelos Stavrou, Haining Wang
papers.abstract: Traditional malware analysis relies on virtualization or emulation technology to run samples in a confined environment, and to analyze malicious activities by instrumenting code execution. However, virtual machines and emulators inevitably create artifacts in the execution environment, making these approaches vulnerable to detection or subversion. In this paper, we present MalT, a debugging framework that employs System Management Mode, a CPU mode in the x86 architecture, to transparently study armored malware. MalT does not depend on virtualization or emulation and thus is immune to threats targeting such environments. Our approach reduces the attack surface at the software level, and advances state-of-the-art debugging transparency. MalT embodies various debugging functions, including register/memory accesses, breakpoints, and seven stepping modes. Additionally, MalT restores the system to a clean state after a debugging session. We implemented a prototype of MalT on two physical machines, and we conducted experiments by testing an array of existing anti-virtualization, anti-emulation, and packing techniques against MalT. The experimental results show that our prototype remains transparent and undetected against the samples. Furthermore, debugging and restoration introduce moderate but manageable overheads on both Windows and Linux platforms.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的恶意软件分析依赖虚拟化或仿真技术在受限环境中运行样本，并通过检测代码执行来分析恶意活动。然而，虚拟机和模拟器不可避免地会在执行环境中产生工件，使得这些方法容易被检测到或被颠覆。在本文中，我们提出了MalT，一个调试框架，它采用系统管理模式，x86架构中的CPU模式，来透明地研究装甲恶意软件。MalT不依赖于虚拟化或仿真，因此不会受到针对此类环境的威胁。我们的方法减少了软件级别的攻击面，并提高了最先进的调试透明度。MalT包含各种调试功能，包括寄存器/内存访问、断点和七种步进模式。此外，MalT会在调试会话后将系统恢复到干净的状态。我们在两台物理机器上实现了MalT的原型，并通过测试一系列现有的反虚拟化、反仿真和打包技术来进行实验。实验结果表明，我们的原型保持透明，不被样本检测到。此外，调试和恢复在Windows和Linux平台上都引入了适度但可管理的开销。
papers.title_zh: 走向透明调试

papers.title: Understanding Practical Tradeoffs in HPC Checkpoint-Scheduling Policies
papers.authors: Nosayba El-Sayed, Bianca Schroeder
papers.abstract: As the scale of High-Performance Computing (HPC) clusters continues to grow, their increasing failure rates and energy consumption levels are emerging as serious design concerns. Efficiently running systems at such large scales critically relies on deploying effective, practical methods for fault tolerance while having a good understanding of their respective performance and energy overheads. The most commonly used fault tolerance method is checkpoint/restart. Checkpoint scheduling policies, however, have been traditionally optimized and analysed from one angle: application performance. In this work, we provide an extensive analysis of the performance, energy and I/O costs associated with a wide array of checkpointing policies. We consider practical deployment issues and show that simple formulas can be used to accurately estimate wasted work in a system. We propose methods to optimize checkpoint scheduling for energy savings and evaluate the runtime-optimized and energy-optimized policies using simulations based on failure logs from 10 production HPC clusters. Our results show ample room for achieving high quality energy/performance tradeoffs when using methods that exploit characteristics of real world failures. We also analyze the impact of energy-optimized checkpointing on the storage subsystem and identify policies that are optimal for I/O savings.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着高性能计算(HPC)集群规模的持续增长，其不断增加的故障率和能耗水平正在成为严重的设计问题。在如此大的规模上高效运行系统，关键在于部署有效、实用的容错方法，同时充分了解它们各自的性能和能量开销。最常用的容错方法是检查点/重启。然而，检查点调度策略传统上是从一个角度进行优化和分析的:应用程序性能。在这项工作中，我们提供了与各种检查点策略相关的性能、能量和I/O成本的广泛分析。我们考虑实际的部署问题，并表明简单的公式可以用来准确地估计系统中浪费的工作。我们提出了优化检查点调度以节省能源的方法，并使用基于10个生产HPC集群的故障日志的模拟来评估运行时优化和能源优化策略。我们的结果表明，当使用利用真实世界故障特征的方法时，有足够的空间来实现高质量的能量/性能折衷。我们还分析了能源优化的检查点对存储子系统的影响，并确定了最有利于I/O节省的策略。

papers.title: On the Efficiency of FHE-Based Private Queries
papers.authors: Myungsun Kim, Hyung Tae Lee, San Ling, Huaxiong Wang
papers.abstract: Private query processing is a very attractive problem in the fields of both cryptography and databases. In this work, we restrict our attention to the efficiency aspect of the problem, particularly for basic queries with conditions on various combinations of <italic>equality</italic>. Without loss of generality, these conditions can be regarded as a Boolean function, and this Boolean function can then be evaluated at ciphertexts produced by a fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) scheme <italic>without decryption</italic>. From the efficiency perspective, the remaining concern is to efficiently test the equality function without severely downgrading the performance of FHE-based querying solutions. To this end, we first analyze the multiplicative depth required for an equality test algorithm with respect to the plaintext space inhabited by general FHE schemes. The primary reason for this approach is that given an equality test algorithm, its efficiency is measured in terms of the multiplicative depth required to construct its arithmetic circuit expression. Indeed, the implemented equality test algorithm dominates the entire performance of FHE-based query solutions, apart from the performance of the underlying FHE scheme. Then, we measure the multiplicative depth considering an FHE scheme that takes an extension field as its plaintext space and that supports the depth-free evaluation of Frobenius maps. According to our analysis, when the plaintext space of an FHE scheme is a field of characteristic <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$2$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq1-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>, the equality test algorithm for <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\ell$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq2-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>-bit messages requires the lowest multiplicative depth <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\lceil \log {\ell}\rceil$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq3-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>. Furthermore, we design a set of private query protocols for conjunctive, disjunctive, and threshold queries based on the equality test algorithm. Similarly, applying the equality test algorithm over <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathbb {F}_{2^{\ell}}$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq4-2568182.gif"/></alternatives> </inline-formula>, our querying protocols require the minimum depths. More specifically, a multiplicative depth of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\lceil \log {\ell}\rceil +\lceil \log {(1+\rho)}\rceil$</tex-math> <alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq5-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is required for conjunctive and disjunctive queries, and a depth of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\lceil \log {\ell}\rceil +2\lceil \log {(1+\rho)}\rceil$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq6-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> is required for threshold conjunctive queries, when their query conditions have <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\rho$</tex-math> <alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq7-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> attributes to be compared. Finally, we provide a communication-efficient version of our solutions, though with additional computational costs, when an upper bound <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\delta$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq8-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> (<inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$0\leq \delta \leq 1$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq9-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula>) on the selectivity of a database is given. Consequently, we reduce the communication cost from <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math> <alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq10-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> to approximately <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\lfloor \delta n\rfloor$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq11-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> ciphertexts with <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\lceil \log {n}\rceil$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq12-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> additional depth when the database consists of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$n$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="lee-ieq13-2568182.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> tuples.

papers.title: CSC-Detector: A System to Infer Large-Scale Probing Campaigns
papers.authors: Elias Bou-Harb, Chadi Assi, Mourad Debbabi
papers.abstract: This paper uniquely leverages unsolicited real darknet data to propose a novel system, CSC-Detector, that aims at identifying Cyber Scanning Campaigns. The latter define a new phenomenon of probing events that are distinguished by their orchestration (i.e., coordination) patterns. To achieve its aim, CSC-Detector adopts three engines. Its fingerprinting engine exploits a unique observation to extract probing activities from darknet traffic. The system's inference engine employs a set of behavioral analytics to generate numerous significant insights related to the machinery of the probing sources while its analysis engine exploits the previously obtained inferences to automatically infer the campaigns. CSC-Detector is empirically evaluated and validated using 240 GB of real darknet data. The outcome discloses 3 recent, previously unreported large-scale probing campaigns targeting diverse Internet services. Further, one of those inferred campaigns revealed that the sipscan campaign that was initially analyzed by CAIDA is arguably still active, yet operating in a stealthy, very low rate mode. We envision that the proposed system that is tailored towards darknet data, which is frequently, abundantly and effectively used to generate cyber threat intelligence, could be used by network security analysts, emergency response teams and/or observers of cyber events to infer large-scale orchestrated probing campaigns. This would be utilized for early cyber attack warning and notification as well as for simplified analysis and tracking of such events.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文独特地利用主动提供的真实暗网数据来提出一种新颖的系统，CSC-Detector，旨在识别网络扫描活动。后者定义了一种探测事件的新现象，这些事件通过它们的编排(即协调)模式来区分。为了实现这一目标，CSC-Detector采用了三个引擎。其指纹识别引擎利用独特的观察从暗网流量中提取探测活动。该系统的推理引擎采用一组行为分析来生成与探测源的机制相关的大量重要见解，而其分析引擎利用先前获得的推理来自动推断活动。CSC-Detector使用240 GB的真实暗网数据进行了经验评估和验证。结果披露了3个最近的，以前没有报道的针对不同互联网服务的大规模探测活动。此外，其中一个推断的战役显示，CAIDA最初分析的sipscan战役可以说仍然活跃，但以一种隐秘的、非常低的速率模式运行。我们设想，针对暗网数据定制的拟议系统可以被网络安全分析师、应急响应团队和/或网络事件的观察者用来推断大规模协调的探测活动，暗网数据被频繁、丰富和有效地用于生成网络威胁情报。这将用于早期网络攻击预警和通知，以及简化此类事件的分析和跟踪。
papers.title_zh: CSC-Detector：推断大型探测活动的系统

papers.title: D2FL: Design and Implementation of Distributed Dynamic Fault Localization
papers.authors: Fanfu Zhou, Zhengwei Qi, Jianguo Yao, Ruhui Ma, Bin Wang, Athanasios V. Vasilakos, Haibing Guan
papers.abstract:
Compromised or misconfigured routers have been a major concern in large-scale networks. Such routers sabotage packet delivery, and thus hurt network performance. Data-plane fault localization (FL) promises to solve this problem. Regrettably, the path-based FL fails to support dynamic routing, and the neighbor-based FL requires a centralized trusted administrative controller (AC) or global clock synchronization in each router and introduces storage overhead for caching packets. To address these problems, we introduce a dynamic distributed and low-cost model, D
 2
FL. Using random two-hop neighborhood authentication, D
 2
FL supports volatile path without the AC or global clock synchronization. Besides, D
 2
FL requires only constant tens of KB for caching which is independent of the packet transmission rate. This is much less than the cache size of DynaFL or DFL which consumes several MB. The simulations show that D
 2
FL achieves low false positive and false negative rate with no more than 3 percent bandwidth overhead. We also implement an open source prototype and evaluate its effect. The result shows that the performance burden in user space is less than 10 percent with the dynamic sampling algorithm.

papers.title: Design, Analysis, and Implementation of ARPKI: An Attack-Resilient Public-Key Infrastructure
papers.authors: David A. Basin, Cas Cremers, Tiffany Hyun-Jin Kim, Adrian Perrig, Ralf Sasse, Pawel Szalachowski
papers.abstract: The current Transport Layer Security (TLS) Public-Key Infrastructure (PKI) is based on a weakest-link security model that depends on over a thousand trust roots. The recent history of malicious and compromised Certification Authorities has fueled the desire for alternatives. Creating a new, secure infrastructure is, however, a surprisingly challenging task due to the large number of parties involved and the many ways that they can interact. A principled approach to its design is therefore mandatory, as humans cannot feasibly consider all the cases that can occur due to the multitude of interleavings of actions by legitimate parties and attackers, such as private key compromises (e.g., domain, Certification Authority, log server, other trusted entities), key revocations, key updates, etc. We present ARPKI, a PKI architecture that ensures that certificate-related operations, such as certificate issuance, update, revocation, and validation, are transparent and accountable. ARPKI efficiently supports these operations, and gracefully handles catastrophic events such as domain key loss or compromise. Moreover ARPKI is the first PKI architecture that is co-designed with a formal model, and we verify its core security property using the Tamarin  prover. We prove that ARPKI offers extremely strong security guarantees, where compromising even  $n-1$  trusted signing and verifying entities is insufficient to launch a man-in-the-middle attack. Moreover, ARPKI's use deters misbehavior as all operations are publicly visible. Finally, we present a proof-of-concept implementation that provides all the features required for deployment. Our experiments indicate that ARPKI efficiently handles the certification process with low overhead. It does not incur additional latency to TLS, since no additional round trips are required.
papers.abstract_zh: 当前的传输层安全性(TLS)公钥基础设施(PKI)基于依赖于一千多个信任根的最薄弱环节安全模型。恶意和妥协的证书颁发机构的近期历史激发了对替代方案的渴望。然而，创建一个新的、安全的基础设施是一项非常具有挑战性的任务，因为涉及到大量的参与方，并且他们可以通过多种方式进行交互。因此，对其设计的原则性方法是强制性的，因为人类无法可行地考虑由于合法方与攻击者的大量交错行为而可能发生的所有情况，例如私钥泄露(例如，域、认证机构、日志服务器、其他可信实体)、密钥撤销、密钥更新等。我们提出了ARPKI，这是一个PKI体系结构，它确保与证书相关的操作，如证书颁发、更新、撤销和验证，是透明的和负责任的。ARPKI有效地支持这些操作，并优雅地处理灾难性事件，如域密钥丢失或泄露。此外，ARPKI是第一个与正式模型共同设计的PKI体系结构，我们使用Tamarin证明者验证了它的核心安全属性。我们证明ARPKI提供了非常强的安全保证，即使危及$n-1$可信签名和验证实体也不足以发起中间人攻击。此外，ARPKI的使用阻止了不当行为，因为所有操作都是公开可见的。最后，我们展示了一个概念验证实现，它提供了部署所需的所有功能。我们的实验表明，ARPKI以较低的开销有效地处理了认证过程。它不会给TLS带来额外的延迟，因为不需要额外的往返。
papers.title_zh: ARPKI的设计，分析和实施：攻击性公钥基础架构

papers.title: Efficient and Expressive Keyword Search Over Encrypted Data in Cloud
papers.authors: Hui Cui, Zhiguo Wan, Robert H. Deng, Guilin Wang, Yingjiu Li
papers.abstract: Searchable encryption allows a cloud server to conduct keyword search over encrypted data on behalf of the data users without learning the underlying plaintexts. However, most existing searchable encryption schemes only support single or conjunctive keyword search, while a few other schemes that are able to perform expressive keyword search are computationally inefficient since they are built from bilinear pairings over the composite-order groups. In this paper, we propose an expressive public-key searchable encryption scheme in the prime-order groups, which allows keyword search policies (i.e., predicates, access structures) to be expressed in conjunctive, disjunctive or any monotonic Boolean formulas and achieves significant performance improvement over existing schemes. We formally define its security, and prove that it is selectively secure in the standard model. Also, we implement the proposed scheme using a rapid prototyping tool called Charm [37] , and conduct several experiments to evaluate it performance. The results demonstrate that our scheme is much more efficient than the ones built over the composite-order groups.
papers.abstract_zh: 可搜索加密允许云服务器代表数据用户对加密数据进行关键字搜索，而无需了解底层明文。然而，大多数现有的可搜索加密方案仅支持单个或连接的关键字搜索，而其他一些能够执行表达性关键字搜索的方案计算效率低，因为它们是在复合序组上从双线性对构建的。在本文中，我们提出了一个素数阶群中的可表达公钥可搜索加密方案，该方案允许关键字搜索策略(即谓词、访问结构)用合取、析取或任何单调布尔公式来表达，并在现有方案的基础上实现了显著的性能改进。我们形式化地定义了它的安全性，并证明了它在标准模型下是选择性安全的。此外，我们使用名为Charm [37]的快速原型工具实现了所提出的方案，并进行几个实验来评估其性能。结果表明，我们的方案比基于复合序群的方案更有效。
papers.title_zh: 对云中加密数据的高效和表现力的关键字搜索

papers.title: End-to-End Detection of Caller ID Spoofing Attacks
papers.authors: Hossen A. Mustafa, Wenyuan Xu, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi, Steffen Schulz
papers.abstract: Caller ID (caller identification) is a service provided by telephone operators where the phone number and/or the name of the caller is transmitted to inform the callee who is calling. Today, most people trust the caller ID information and some banks even use Caller ID to authenticate customers. However, with the proliferation of smartphones and VoIP, it is easy to spoof caller ID information by installing a particular application on the smartphone or by using service providers that offer Caller ID spoofing. As the phone network is fragmented between countries and companies and upgrades of old hardware is costly, no mechanism is available today to let end-users easily detect Caller ID spoofing attacks. In this article, we propose a new approach of using end-to-end caller ID verification schemes that leverage features of the existing phone network infrastructure (CallerDec ). We design an SMS-based and a timing-based version of CallerDec that works with existing combinations of landlines, cellular and VoIP networks and can be deployed at the liberty of the users. We implemented both CallerDec schemes as an App for Android-based phones and validated their effectiveness in detecting spoofing attacks in various scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 呼叫者ID(呼叫者标识)是由电话运营商提供的服务，其中发送呼叫者的电话号码和/或姓名来通知正在呼叫的被呼叫者。今天，大多数人相信来电显示信息，一些银行甚至使用来电显示来验证客户。然而，随着智能手机和VoIP的普及，通过在智能手机上安装特定的应用程序或使用提供来电显示欺骗的服务提供商，很容易欺骗来电显示信息。由于电话网络在国家和公司之间是分散的，并且旧硬件的升级是昂贵的，所以今天没有机制可以让最终用户容易地检测呼叫者ID欺骗攻击。在本文中，我们提出了一种利用现有电话网络基础设施(CallerDec)功能的端到端呼叫者ID验证方案的新方法。我们设计了基于SMS和基于时间的CallerDec版本，可与现有的座机、蜂窝和VoIP网络结合使用，并可由用户自由部署。我们将这两种CallerDec方案实现为基于Android的手机应用程序，并验证了它们在各种场景中检测欺骗攻击的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 端到端检测呼叫者ID欺骗攻击

papers.title: Flexible Hardware-Managed Isolated Execution: Architecture, Software Support and Applications
papers.authors: Dmitry Evtyushkin, Jesse Elwell, Meltem Ozsoy, Dmitry Ponomarev, Nael B. Abu-Ghazaleh, Ryan Riley
papers.abstract: We consider the problem of how to provide an execution environment where the application's secrets are safe even in the presence of malicious system software layers. We propose Iso-X—a flexible, fine-grained hardware-supported framework that provides isolation for security-critical pieces of an application such that they can execute securely even in the presence of untrusted system software. Isolation in Iso-X is achieved by creating and dynamically managing compartments (isolated software modules) to host critical fragments of code and associated data. Iso-X provides fine-grained isolation at the memory-page level, flexible allocation of memory, and a low-complexity, hardware-only trusted computing base. Iso-X requires minimal additional hardware, a small number of new ISA instructions to manage compartments, and minimal changes to the operating system which need not be in the trusted computing base. The run-time performance overhead of Iso-X is negligible and even the overhead of creating and destroying compartments is modest. An FPGA implementation of Iso-X runtime mechanisms shows a negligible impact on the processor cycle time.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑如何提供一个执行环境的问题，在这个环境中，即使存在恶意的系统软件层，应用程序的秘密也是安全的。我们提出了Iso-X——一个灵活的、细粒度的硬件支持框架，它为应用程序的安全关键部分提供隔离，这样它们甚至可以在不可信的系统软件存在的情况下安全地执行。Iso-X中的隔离是通过创建和动态管理隔离舱(隔离的软件模块)来托管关键的代码片段和相关数据来实现的。Iso-X提供了内存页面级的细粒度隔离、灵活的内存分配以及低复杂性、纯硬件的可信计算基础。Iso-X需要最少的附加硬件、少量新的ISA指令来管理区间，以及对不需要在可信计算基础中的操作系统的最小改变。Iso-X的运行时性能开销可以忽略不计，甚至创建和销毁隔离专区的开销也不多。Iso-X运行时机制的FPGA实现对处理器周期时间的影响可以忽略不计。
papers.title_zh: 灵活的硬件管理的孤立执行：体系结构，软件支持和应用程序

papers.title: Locating Faults in MANET-Hosted Software Systems
papers.authors: Petr Novotný, Bong Jun Ko, Alexander L. Wolf
papers.abstract: We present a method to locate faults in service-based software systems hosted on mobile ad hoc networks (MANETs). In such systems, computations are structured as interdependent services distributed across the network, collaborating to satisfy client requests. Faults, which may occur at either or both the service and network layers, propagate by cascading through some subset of the services, from their root causes back to the clients that initiate requests. Fault localization in this environment is especially challenging because the systems are typically subject to a wider variety and higher incidence of faults than those deployed in fixed networks, the resources available to collect and store analysis data are severely limited, and many of the sources of faults are by their nature transient. Our method makes use of service-dependence and fault data that are harvested in the network through decentralized, run-time observations of service interactions and fault symptoms. We have designed timing- and Bayesian-based reasoning techniques to analyze the data in the context of a specific fault propagation model. The analysis provides a ranked list of candidate fault locations. Through extensive simulations, we evaluate the performance of our method in terms of its accuracy in correctly ranking root causes under a wide range of operational conditions.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种定位移动自组网中基于服务的软件系统故障的方法。在这样的系统中，计算被结构化为分布在网络上的相互依赖的服务，协作以满足客户端请求。故障可能发生在服务层和网络层中的任一层或两层，通过服务的某个子集级联传播，从其根源返回到发起请求的客户端。这种环境中的故障定位尤其具有挑战性，因为与部署在固定网络中的系统相比，系统通常会遭受更广泛的故障种类和更高的故障发生率，可用于收集和存储分析数据的资源非常有限，并且许多故障源本质上是瞬时的。我们的方法利用了服务相关性和故障数据，这些数据是通过对服务交互和故障症状的分散的运行时观察在网络中获得的。我们设计了基于时间和贝叶斯的推理技术来分析特定故障传播模型环境中的数据。该分析提供了候选故障位置的排序列表。通过大量的模拟，我们评估了我们的方法在各种操作条件下正确排列根本原因的准确性方面的性能。
papers.title_zh: 在Manet托管软件系统中找到故障

papers.title: On the Interplay Between Cyber and Physical Spaces for Adaptive Security
papers.authors: Christos Tsigkanos, Liliana Pasquale, Carlo Ghezzi, Bashar Nuseibeh
papers.abstract: Ubiquitous computing is resulting in a proliferation of cyber-physical systems that host or manage valuable physical and digital assets. These assets can be harmed by malicious agents through both cyber-enabled or physically-enabled attacks, particularly ones that exploit the often ignored interplay between the cyber and physical world. The explicit representation of spatial topology is key to supporting adaptive security policies. In this paper we explore the use of Bigraphical Reactive Systems to model the topology of cyber and physical spaces and their dynamics. We utilise such models to perform speculative threat analysis through model checking to reason about the consequences of the evolution of topological configurations on the satisfaction of security requirements. We further propose an automatic planning technique to identify an adaptation strategy enacting security policies at runtime to prevent, circumvent, or mitigate possible security requirements violations. We evaluate our approach using a case study concerned with countering insider threats in a building automation system.
papers.abstract_zh: 无处不在的计算正在导致托管或管理有价值的物理和数字资产的网络物理系统激增。这些资产可能会被恶意代理通过网络或物理攻击来损害，特别是那些利用了网络和物理世界之间经常被忽略的相互作用的攻击。空间拓扑的显式表示是支持自适应安全策略的关键。在本文中，我们探索了使用双图反应系统来模拟网络和物理空间的拓扑结构及其动力学。我们利用这样的模型通过模型检查来执行推测性的威胁分析，以推断拓扑结构的演变对满足安全要求的后果。我们还提出了一种自动规划技术来识别在运行时制定安全策略的适应策略，以防止、规避或减轻可能的安全需求违反。我们使用一个关于在楼宇自动化系统中应对内部威胁的案例研究来评估我们的方法。
papers.title_zh: 在网络和物理空间之间的相互作用上，以进行自适应安全

papers.title: Rmind: A Tool for Cryptographically Secure Statistical Analysis
papers.authors: Dan Bogdanov, Liina Kamm, Sven Laur, Ville Sokk
papers.abstract: Secure multi-party computation is a practical cryptographic method for processing confidential data. Research progress has led to its use in privacy-preserving statistical analysis. Implementations of simple statistical analysis functions have been published, but no comprehensive tool has been built. We describe and implement a suite of most used statistical analysis functions in the privacy-preserving setting including simple statistics, t-test, chi-squared test, Wilcoxon tests and linear regression. We give descriptions of the privacy-preserving algorithms and benchmark results that show an order of magnitude improvement over previous work.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全多方计算是一种处理机密数据的实用加密方法。研究进展已导致其在隐私保护统计分析中的使用。简单的统计分析功能的实现已经发布，但是还没有构建全面的工具。我们描述并实现了一套在隐私保护设置中最常用的统计分析功能，包括简单统计、t检验、卡方检验、Wilcoxon检验和线性回归。我们给出了隐私保护算法的描述和基准测试结果，这些结果显示出比以前的工作有一个数量级的改进。
papers.title_zh: rmind：一种用于密码安全统计分析的工具

papers.title: Searchable Encryption over Feature-Rich Data
papers.authors: Qian Wang, Meiqi He, Minxin Du, Sherman S. M. Chow, Russell W. F. Lai, Qin Zou
papers.abstract: Storage services allow data owners to store their huge amount of potentially sensitive data, such as audios, images, and videos, on remote cloud servers in encrypted form. To enable retrieval of encrypted files of interest, searchable symmetric encryption (SSE) schemes have been proposed. However, many schemes construct indexes based on keyword-file pairs and focus on boolean expressions of exact keyword matches. Moreover, most dynamic SSE schemes cannot achieve forward privacy and reveal unnecessary information when updating the encrypted databases. We tackle the challenge of supporting large-scale similarity search over encrypted feature-rich multimedia data, by considering the search criteria as a high-dimensional feature vector instead of a keyword. Our solutions are built on carefully-designed fuzzy Bloom filters which utilize locality sensitive hashing (LSH) to encode an index associating the file identifiers and feature vectors. Our schemes are proven to be secure against adaptively chosen query attack and forward private in the standard model. We have evaluated the performance of our scheme on real-world high-dimensional datasets, and achieved a search quality of 99 percent recall with only a few number of hash tables for LSH. This shows that our index is compact and searching is not only efficient but also accurate.
papers.abstract_zh: 存储服务允许数据所有者以加密形式在远程云服务器上存储大量潜在敏感数据，如音频、图像和视频。为了能够检索感兴趣的加密文件，已经提出了可搜索对称加密(SSE)方案。然而，许多方案基于关键字-文件对构建索引，并关注精确关键字匹配的布尔表达式。此外，大多数动态SSE方案不能实现前向隐私，并且在更新加密数据库时会泄露不必要的信息。通过将搜索标准视为高维特征向量而不是关键字，我们解决了在加密的特征丰富的多媒体数据上支持大规模相似性搜索的挑战。我们的解决方案建立在精心设计的模糊布隆过滤器上，该过滤器利用位置敏感散列(LSH)来编码关联文件标识符和特征向量的索引。我们的方案在标准模型下被证明是安全的，可以抵抗适应性选择查询攻击和前向保密。我们已经在真实世界的高维数据集上评估了我们的方案的性能，并且在只有少量散列表的情况下实现了99%召回率的搜索质量。这表明我们的索引是紧凑的，搜索不仅高效而且准确。
papers.title_zh: 可以通过功能丰富的数据进行搜索加密

papers.title: SieveQ: A Layered BFT Protection System for Critical Services
papers.authors: Miguel Garcia, Nuno Neves, Alysson Bessani
papers.abstract: Firewalls play a crucial role in assuring the security of today's critical infrastructures, forming a first line of defense by being placed strategically at the front-end of the networks. Sometimes, however, they have exploitable weaknesses, allowing an adversary to bypass them in different ways. Therefore, their design should include improved resilience capabilities to allow them to operate correctly in highly adverse environments. This paper proposes SieveQ, a message queue service that protects and regulates the access to critical systems, in a way similar to an application-level firewall. SieveQ achieves fault and intrusion tolerance by employing an architecture based on two filtering layers, enabling efficient removal of invalid messages at early stages and decreasing the costs associated with Byzantine Fault-Tolerant (BFT) replication of previous solutions. Our experimental evaluation shows that SieveQ improves existing replicated-firewalls resilience in the presence of corrupted messages by faulty nodes. Furthermore, it accommodates high loads, as it is able to handle sixteen times more security events per second than what was processed by the Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) infrastructure employed in the 2012 Summer Olympic Games.
papers.abstract_zh: 防火墙在确保当今关键基础设施的安全方面发挥着至关重要的作用，它战略性地位于网络的前端，形成了第一道防线。然而，有时它们有可利用的弱点，允许对手以不同的方式绕过它们。因此，它们的设计应该包括改进的弹性能力，以允许它们在非常不利的环境中正确操作。本文提出了SieveQ，这是一种消息队列服务，以类似于应用程序级防火墙的方式保护和管理对关键系统的访问。SieveQ通过采用基于两个过滤层的架构来实现容错和入侵容忍，能够在早期阶段有效删除无效消息，并降低与以前解决方案的拜占庭容错(BFT)复制相关的成本。我们的实验评估表明，SieveQ提高了现有复制防火墙在故障节点破坏消息的情况下的弹性。此外，它还支持高负载，每秒钟能够处理的安全事件是2012年夏季奥运会采用的安全信息和事件管理(SIEM)基础设施的16倍。
papers.title_zh: SieveQ：用于关键服务的分层BFT保护系统

papers.title: Symbolic Synthesis of Timed Models with Strict 2-Phase Fault Recovery
papers.authors: Fathiyeh Faghih, Borzoo Bonakdarpour
papers.abstract: In this article, we focus on efficient synthesis of fault-tolerant timed models from their fault-intolerant version. Although the complexity of the synthesis problem is known to be polynomial time in the size of the time-abstract bisimulation of the input model, the state of the art currently lacks synthesis algorithms that can be efficiently implemented. This is in part due to the fact that synthesis is in general a challenging problem and its complexity is significantly magnified in the context of timed systems. We propose an algorithm that takes as input a timed automaton, a set of fault actions, and a set of safety and bounded-time response properties, and utilizes a space-efficient symbolic representation of the timed automaton (called zone graph) to synthesize a fault-tolerant timed automaton as output. The output automaton satisfies strict phased recovery, where it is guaranteed that the output model behaves similarly to the input model in the absence of faults and in the presence of faults, fault recovery is achieved in two phases, each satisfying certain safety and timing constraints.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们关注的是从容错模型到容错时间模型的有效综合。尽管已知合成问题的复杂度是输入模型的时间抽象互模拟的大小的多项式时间，但是当前技术水平缺乏可以有效实现的合成算法。这部分是由于综合通常是一个具有挑战性的问题，并且其复杂性在定时系统的环境中被显著放大。我们提出了一种算法，该算法将一个时间自动机、一组故障动作以及一组安全和有限时间响应属性作为输入，并利用时间自动机的空间有效符号表示(称为区域图)来合成一个容错时间自动机作为输出。输出自动机满足严格的分阶段恢复，其中保证输出模型在无故障和有故障时的行为类似于输入模型，故障恢复分两个阶段实现，每个阶段满足一定的安全性和时序约束。
papers.title_zh: 具有严格2相断层恢复的定时模型的符号合成

papers.title: The g-Good-Neighbor Conditional Diagnosability of Arrangement Graphs
papers.authors: Limei Lin, Li Xu, Dajin Wang, Shuming Zhou
papers.abstract:
A network's diagnosability is the maximum number of faulty vertices the network can discriminate solely by performing mutual tests among the vertices.
