In order to enable the multicast approach, we introduce an asymmetric broadcast encryption primitive, which we have optimized towards constrained nodes to reduce the communication/computation overhead as compared to existing approaches. With an extensive experimental study on a public testbed in several practical settings, we show SEDA's efficient performance compared to state-of-the-art approaches. Finally, our theoretical security analysis shows SEDA's security against identified adversary models.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线安全(重新)编程嵌入式设备的能力是新兴物联网(IoT)的一项基本功能。当前的方法通过利用传感设备内的同质性有效地工作，其中所有节点都需要更新并参与该过程。由于物联网部署的异构性，设备类型和程序映像各不相同，现有解决方案的性能会严重下降。我们用我们的系统SEDA解决了这个缺点，它利用了一种安全的多播方法。SEDA优于现有系统，因为程序映像仅在目标节点上安全地传送和处理，因此减少了不涉及的节点的开销。为了实现多播方法，我们引入了非对称广播加密原语，与现有方法相比，我们针对受限节点对其进行了优化，以减少通信/计算开销。通过在几个实际设置中的公共测试床上的广泛实验研究，我们展示了与最先进的方法相比，SEDA的高效性能。最后，我们的理论安全分析显示了SEDA对已识别的对手模型的安全性。
papers.title_zh: SEDA：物联网安全的空中代码传播协议

papers.title: Separable Reversible Data Hiding in Encrypted JPEG Bitstreams
papers.authors: Zhenxing Qian, Hang Zhou, Xinpeng Zhang, Weiming Zhang
papers.abstract: While most techniques of reversible data hiding in encrypted images (RDH-EI) are developed for uncompressed images, this paper provides a separable reversible data hiding protocol for encrypted JPEG bitstreams. We first propose a JPEG encryption algorithm, which enciphers an image to a smaller size and keeps the format compliant to JPEG decoder. After a content owner uploads the encrypted JPEG bitstream to a remote server, a data hider embeds an additional message into the encrypted copy without changing the bitstream size. On the recipient side, the original bitstream can be reconstructed losslessly using an iterative recovery algorithm based on the blocking artifact. Since message extraction and image recovery are separable, anyone who has the embedding key can extract the message from the marked encrypted copy. Experimental results show that the proposed method outperforms a previous work in terms of separation capability, embedding capacity and security.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然大多数加密图像中的可逆数据隐藏技术(RDH-EI)是针对未压缩图像开发的，但本文提供了一种针对加密JPEG比特流的可分离可逆数据隐藏协议。我们首先提出了一种JPEG加密算法，它将图像加密到较小的尺寸，并保持格式符合JPEG解码器。在内容所有者将加密的JPEG比特流上传到远程服务器之后，数据隐藏器在不改变比特流大小的情况下将附加消息嵌入到加密副本中。在接收方，可以使用基于块效应的迭代恢复算法无损地重构原始比特流。由于消息提取和图像恢复是可分离的，任何拥有嵌入密钥的人都可以从标记的加密副本中提取消息。实验结果表明，该方法在分离能力、嵌入容量和安全性方面都优于前人的工作。
papers.title_zh: 可分离的可逆数据隐藏在加密的jpeg bitstreams中

papers.title: The Rise of Social Botnets: Attacks and Countermeasures
papers.authors: Jinxue Zhang, Rui Zhang, Yanchao Zhang, Guanhua Yan
papers.abstract: Online social networks (OSNs) are increasingly threatened by social bots which are software-controlled OSN accounts that mimic human users with malicious intentions. A social botnet refers to a group of social bots under the control of a single botmaster, which collaborate to conduct malicious behavior while mimicking the interactions among normal OSN users to reduce their individual risk of being detected. We demonstrate the effectiveness and advantages of exploiting a social botnet for spam distribution and digital-influence manipulation through real experiments on Twitter and also trace-driven simulations. We also propose the corresponding countermeasures and evaluate their effectiveness. Our results can help understand the potentially detrimental effects of social botnets and help OSNs improve their bot(net) detection systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线社交网络(OSN)日益受到社交机器人的威胁，社交机器人是由软件控制的OSN账户，模仿人类用户，怀有恶意。社交僵尸网络是指在单个僵尸主机控制下的一组社交机器人，它们协作进行恶意行为，同时模仿正常OSN用户之间的交互，以降低他们被检测到的个体风险。我们通过Twitter上的真实实验和跟踪驱动的模拟，展示了利用社交僵尸网络进行垃圾邮件分发和数字影响操纵的有效性和优势。我们还提出了相应的对策，并对其有效性进行了评估。我们的结果可以帮助理解社交僵尸网络的潜在有害影响，并帮助osn改进他们的僵尸(网络)检测系统。
papers.title_zh: 社会僵尸网络的兴起：攻击和对策

papers.title: VPSearch: Achieving Verifiability for Privacy-Preserving Multi-Keyword Search over Encrypted Cloud Data
papers.authors: Zhiguo Wan, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Although cloud computing offers elastic computation and storage resources, it poses challenges on verifiability of computations and data privacy. In this work we investigate verifiability for privacy-preserving multi-keyword search over outsourced documents. As the cloud server may return incorrect results due to system faults or incentive to reduce computation cost, it is critical to offer verifiability of search results and privacy protection for outsourced data at the same time. To fulfill these requirements, we design a <underline>V</underline>erifiable <underline>P </underline>rivacy-preserving keyword <underline>S</underline>earch scheme, called VPSearch, by integrating an adapted homomorphic MAC technique with a privacy-preserving multi-keyword search scheme. The proposed scheme enables the client to verify search results efficiently without storing a local copy of the outsourced data. We also propose a random challenge technique with ordering for verifying top-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math> <alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="wan-ieq1-2635128.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> search results, which can detect incorrect top-<inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">$k$</tex-math><alternatives> <inline-graphic xlink:href="wan-ieq2-2635128.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> results with probability close to 1. We provide detailed analysis on security, verifiability, privacy, and efficiency of the proposed scheme. Finally, we implement VPSearch using Matlab and evaluate its performance over three UCI bag-of-words data sets. Experiment results show that authentication tag generation incurs about 3 percent overhead only and a search query over 300,000 documents takes about 0.98 seconds on a laptop. To verify 300,000 similarity scores for one query, VPSearch costs only 0.29 seconds.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然云计算提供了弹性的计算和存储资源，但它对计算的可验证性和数据隐私提出了挑战。在这项工作中，我们调查的可验证性隐私保护多关键字搜索外包文件。由于云服务器可能由于系统故障或降低计算成本的动机而返回不正确的结果，因此同时提供搜索结果的可验证性和外包数据的隐私保护至关重要。为了满足这些要求，我们设计了一个可验证的保持隐私的关键字搜索方案，称为VPSearch，它集成了一个自适应同态MAC技术和一个保护隐私的多关键字搜索方案。所提出的方案使客户能够有效地验证搜索结果，而无需存储外包数据的本地副本。我们还提出了一种带有排序的随机挑战技术，用于验证top-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ k $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " wan-ie Q1-2635128 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >搜索结果，它可以检测不正确的top-< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ k $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " 1我们对该方案的安全性、可验证性、隐私性和效率进行了详细的分析。最后，我们使用Matlab实现了VPSearch，并在三个UCI词袋数据集上评估了它的性能。实验结果表明，认证标签生成仅产生大约3%的开销，并且在笔记本电脑上搜索超过300，000个文档需要大约0.98秒。验证一个查询的300，000个相似性得分，VPSearch只需要0.29秒。
papers.title_zh: VPSEarch：在加密云数据上实现隐私的多关键单词搜索的可验证性

2015.journals_title: IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing, Volume 12

papers.title: A Computational Dynamic Trust Model for User Authorization
papers.authors: Yuhui Zhong, Bharat K. Bhargava, Yi Lu, Pelin Angin
papers.abstract: Development of authorization mechanisms for secure information access by a large community of users in an open environment is an important problem in the ever-growing Internet world. In this paper we propose a computational dynamic trust model for user authorization, rooted in findings from social science. Unlike most existing computational trust models, this model distinguishes trusting belief in integrity from that in competence in different contexts and accounts for subjectivity in the evaluation of a particular trustee by different trusters. Simulation studies were conducted to compare the performance of the proposed integrity belief model with other trust models from the literature for different user behavior patterns. Experiments show that the proposed model achieves higher performance than other models especially in predicting the behavior of unstable users.
papers.abstract_zh: 在不断发展的互联网世界中，为开放环境中的大型用户群体的安全信息访问开发授权机制是一个重要问题。本文基于社会科学的研究成果，提出了一种用于用户授权的计算动态信任模型。与大多数现有的计算信任模型不同，该模型区分了不同情境下对诚信和能力的信任信念，并考虑了不同信任者对特定受托人评价的主观性。针对不同的用户行为模式，进行了仿真研究以比较所提出的完整性信念模型与来自文献的其他信任模型的性能。实验表明，该模型在预测不稳定用户行为方面取得了比其他模型更高的性能。
papers.title_zh: 用户授权的计算动态信任模型

papers.title: Behavior Rule Specification-Based Intrusion Detection for Safety Critical Medical Cyber Physical Systems
papers.authors: Robert Mitchell, Ing-Ray Chen
papers.abstract: We propose and analyze a behavior-rule specification-based technique for intrusion detection of medical devices embedded in a medical cyber physical system (MCPS) in which the patient's safety is of the utmost importance. We propose a methodology to transform behavior rules to a state machine, so that a device that is being monitored for its behavior can easily be checked against the transformed state machine for deviation from its behavior specification. Using vital sign monitor medical devices as an example, we demonstrate that our intrusion detection technique can effectively trade false positives off for a high detection probability to cope with more sophisticated and hidden attackers to support ultra safe and secure MCPS applications. Moreover, through a comparative analysis, we demonstrate that our behavior-rule specification-based IDS technique outperforms two existing anomaly-based techniques for detecting abnormal patient behaviors in pervasive healthcare applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出并分析了一种基于行为规则规范的医疗设备入侵检测技术，该技术嵌入在医疗网络物理系统(MCPS)中，在该系统中，患者的安全是最重要的。我们提出了一种将行为规则转换为状态机的方法，以便可以根据转换后的状态机轻松检查被监控行为的设备是否偏离其行为规范。以生命体征监测仪医疗设备为例，我们证明了我们的入侵检测技术可以有效地以高检测概率换取误报，以应对更复杂和隐蔽的攻击者，从而支持超安全的MCPS应用。此外，通过比较分析，我们证明了我们的基于行为规则规范的入侵检测技术优于两种现有的基于异常的技术，用于检测普遍医疗保健应用中的异常患者行为。
papers.title_zh: 行为规范规范基于安全性关键医疗网络物理系统的入侵检测

papers.title: Camouflage Traffic: Minimizing Message Delay for Smart Grid Applications under Jamming
papers.authors: Zhuo Lu, Wenye Wang, Cliff Wang
papers.abstract: Smart grid is a cyber-physical system that integrates power infrastructures with information technologies. To facilitate efficient information exchange, wireless networks have been proposed to be widely used in the smart grid. However, the jamming attack that constantly broadcasts radio interference is a primary security threat to prevent the deployment of wireless networks in the smart grid. Hence, spread spectrum systems, which provide jamming resilience via multiple frequency and code channels, must be adapted to the smart grid for secure wireless communications, while at the same time providing latency guarantee for control messages. An open question is how to minimize message delay for timely smart grid communication under any potential jamming attack. To address this issue, we provide a paradigm shift from the case-by-case methodology, which is widely used in existing works to investigate well-adopted attack models, to the worst-case methodology, which offers delay performance guarantee for smart grid applications under any attack. We first define a generic jamming process that characterizes a wide range of existing attack models. Then, we show that in all strategies under the generic process, the worst-case message delay is a U-shaped function of network traffic load. This indicates that, interestingly, increasing a fair amount of traffic can in fact improve the worst-case delay performance. As a result, we demonstrate a lightweight yet promising system, transmitting adaptive camouflage traffic (TACT), to combat jamming attacks. TACT minimizes the message delay by generating extra traffic called camouflage to balance the network load at the optimum. Experiments show that TACT can decrease the probability that a message is not delivered on time in order of magnitude.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能电网是将电力基础设施与信息技术相结合的信息物理系统。为了促进高效的信息交换，无线网络已被提议广泛用于智能电网。然而，不断广播无线电干扰的干扰攻击是阻止在智能电网中部署无线网络的主要安全威胁。因此，通过多个频率和代码信道提供抗干扰能力的扩频系统必须适应智能电网，以实现安全的无线通信，同时为控制消息提供延迟保证。一个悬而未决的问题是，在任何潜在的干扰攻击下，如何最小化及时智能电网通信的消息延迟。为了解决这一问题，我们提供了一种从逐案方法到最坏情况方法的范式转变，逐案方法在现有工作中广泛用于调查广泛采用的攻击模型，最坏情况方法在任何攻击下为智能电网应用提供延迟性能保证。我们首先定义一个通用的干扰过程，它描述了一系列现有攻击模型的特征。然后，我们证明了在通用过程下的所有策略中，最坏情况下的消息延迟是网络流量负载的U形函数。有趣的是，这表明增加一定量的流量实际上可以改善最坏情况下的延迟性能。因此，我们展示了一个轻量级但有前景的系统，传输自适应伪装流量(TACT)，以对抗干扰攻击。TACT通过生成称为伪装的额外流量来最大程度地平衡网络负载，从而最大限度地减少消息延迟。实验表明，TACT可以将消息不能按时送达的概率降低数量级。
papers.title_zh: 伪装流量：最小化智能电网应用程序的消息延迟

papers.title: Collusion-Tolerable Privacy-Preserving Sum and Product Calculation without Secure Channel
papers.authors: Taeho Jung, Xiang-Yang Li, Meng Wan
papers.abstract: Much research has been conducted to securely outsource multiple parties' data aggregation to an untrusted aggregator without disclosing each individual's privately owned data, or to enable multiple parties to jointly aggregate their data while preserving privacy. However, those works either require secure pair-wise communication channels or suffer from high complexity. In this paper, we consider how an external aggregator or multiple parties can learn some algebraic statistics (e.g., sum, product) over participants' privately owned data while preserving the data privacy. We assume all channels are subject to eavesdropping attacks, and all the communications throughout the aggregation are open to others. We first propose several protocols that successfully guarantee data privacy under semi-honest model, and then present advanced protocols which tolerate up to k passive adversaries who do not try to tamper the computation. Under this weak assumption, we limit both the communication and computation complexity of each participant to a small constant. At the end, we present applications which solve several interesting problems via our protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经进行了许多研究来安全地将多方的数据聚合外包给不可信的聚合器，而不公开每个人的私有数据，或者使多方能够联合聚合他们的数据，同时保护隐私。然而，这些工作要么需要安全的成对通信信道，要么具有很高的复杂性。在本文中，我们考虑外部聚合器或多方如何在保持数据隐私的同时学习参与者私有数据的一些代数统计(例如，和、积)。我们假设所有通道都受到窃听攻击，并且聚合中的所有通信对其他人都是开放的。我们首先提出了几个在半诚实模型下成功保证数据隐私的协议，然后提出了一些先进的协议，这些协议可以容忍k个不试图篡改计算的被动对手。在这个弱假设下，我们将每个参与者的通信和计算复杂度限制为一个小常数。最后，我们展示了通过我们的协议解决几个有趣问题的应用。
papers.title_zh: 没有安全渠道的串谋倾斜的隐私权和产品计算

papers.title: hBFT: Speculative Byzantine Fault Tolerance with Minimum Cost
papers.authors: Sisi Duan, Sean Peisert, Karl N. Levitt
papers.abstract: We present hBFT, a hybrid, Byzantine fault-tolerant, replicated state machine protocol with optimal resilience. Under normal circumstances, hBFT uses speculation, i.e., replicas directly adopt the order from the primary and send replies to the clients. As in prior work such as Zyzzyva, when replicas are out of order, clients can detect the inconsistency and help replicas converge on the total ordering. However, we take a different approach than previous work that has four distinct benefits: it requires many fewer cryptographic operations, it moves critical jobs to the clients with no additional costs, faulty clients can be detected and identified, and performance in the presence of client participation will not degrade as long as the primary is correct. The correctness is guaranteed by a three-phase checkpoint subprotocol similar to PBFT, which is tailored to our needs. The protocol is triggered by the primary when a certain number of requests are executed or by clients when they detect an inconsistency.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了hBFT，一个混合的，拜占庭容错的，具有最佳弹性的复制状态机协议。在正常情况下，hBFT使用推测，即副本直接采用来自主服务器的命令，并向客户端发送回复。正如在Zyzzyva等以前的工作中，当副本无序时，客户端可以检测到不一致，并帮助副本收敛到总排序。然而，我们采用了一种不同于以前工作的方法，这种方法有四个明显的好处:它需要更少的加密操作，它将关键作业转移到客户端，而没有额外的成本，可以检测和识别有故障的客户端，并且只要主服务器是正确的，在客户端参与的情况下性能不会下降。正确性由一个类似于PBFT的三阶段检查点子协议来保证，它是根据我们的需要定制的。当执行了一定数量的请求时，由主服务器触发该协议，或者当客户端检测到不一致时，由客户端触发该协议。
papers.title_zh: HBFT：投机性拜占庭式容错，最低成本

papers.title: Meeting Cardinality Constraints in Role Mining
papers.authors: Pullamsetty Harika, Marreddy Nagajyothi, John C. John, Shamik Sural, Jaideep Vaidya, Vijayalakshmi Atluri
papers.abstract: Role mining is a critical step for organizations that migrate from traditional access control mechanisms to role based access control (RBAC). Additional constraints may be imposed while generating roles from a given user-permission assignment relation. In this paper we consider two such constraints which are the dual of each other. A role-usage cardinality constraint limits the maximum number of roles any user can have. Its dual, the permission-distribution cardinality constraint, limits the maximum number of roles to which a permission can belong. These two constraints impose mutually contradictory requirements on user to role and role to permission assignments. An attempt to satisfy one of the constraints may result in a violation of the other. We show that the constrained role mining problem is NP-Complete and present heuristic solutions. Two distinct frameworks are presented in this paper. In the first approach, roles are initially mined without taking the constraints into account. The user-role and role-permission assignments are then checked for constraint violation in a post-processing step, and appropriately re-assigned, if necessary. In the second approach, constraints are enforced during the process of role mining. The methods are first applied on problems that consider the two constraints individually, and then with both considered together. Both methods are evaluated over a number of real-world data sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于从传统访问控制机制迁移到基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)的组织来说，角色挖掘是关键的一步。在从给定的用户权限分配关系中生成角色时，可能会施加额外的约束。在本文中，我们考虑两个这样的相互对偶的约束。角色使用基数约束限制了任何用户可以拥有的最大角色数量。它的对偶，权限分布基数约束，限制了一个权限可以属于的角色的最大数量。这两个约束对用户到角色和角色到权限的分配提出了相互矛盾的要求。试图满足其中一个约束可能会导致违反另一个约束。我们证明了约束角色挖掘问题是NP完全的，并给出了启发式解。本文提出了两个不同的框架。在第一种方法中，最初挖掘角色时没有考虑约束。然后在后处理步骤中检查用户角色和角色权限分配是否违反约束，并在必要时适当地重新分配。在第二种方法中，约束是在角色挖掘过程中实施的。这些方法首先应用于单独考虑这两个约束的问题，然后一起考虑这两个约束。这两种方法都在大量真实数据集上进行了评估。
papers.title_zh: 在角色挖掘中达到基数限制

papers.title: PRGA: Privacy-Preserving Recording & Gateway-Assisted Authentication of Power Usage Information for Smart Grid
papers.authors: Tat Wing Chim, Siu-Ming Yiu, Victor O. K. Li, Lucas Chi Kwong Hui, Jin Zhong
papers.abstract: Smart grid network facilitates reliable and efficient power generation and transmission. The power system can adjust the amount of electricity generated based on power usage information submitted by end users. Sender authentication and user privacy preservation are two important security issues on this information flow. In this paper, we propose a scheme such that even the control center (power operator) does not know which user makes the requests of using more power or agreements of using less power until the power is actually used. At the end of each billing period (i.e., after electricity usage), the end user can prove to the power operator that it has really requested to use more power or agreed to use less power earlier. To reduce the total traffic volume in the communications network, our scheme allows gateway smart meters to help aggregate power usage information, and the power generators to determine the total amount of power that needs to be generated at different times. To reduce the impact of attacking traffic, our scheme allows gateway smart meters to help filter messages before they reach the control center. Through analysis and experiments, we show that our scheme is both effective and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能电网网络促进可靠和高效的发电和输电。电力系统可以基于终端用户提交的用电信息来调整发电量。发送方认证和用户隐私保护是信息流中的两个重要安全问题。在本文中，我们提出了一种方案，使得即使控制中心(电力运营商)也不知道哪个用户提出了使用更多电力的请求或使用更少电力的协议，直到电力被实际使用。在每个计费周期结束时(即，在用电之后)，终端用户可以向电力运营商证明其确实已经请求使用更多电力或者同意更早地使用更少电力。为了减少通信网络中的总流量，我们的方案允许网关智能电表帮助汇总用电信息，并允许发电机确定不同时间需要产生的总电量。为了减少攻击流量的影响，我们的方案允许网关智能电表在消息到达控制中心之前帮助过滤消息。通过分析和实验，我们表明我们的方案是有效的。
papers.title_zh: PRGA：智能网格的电力使用信息的保密录音和网关辅助身份验证

papers.title: Secure Data Aggregation Technique for Wireless Sensor Networks in the Presence of Collusion Attacks
papers.authors: Mohsen Rezvani, Aleksandar Ignjatovic, Elisa Bertino, Sanjay K. Jha
papers.abstract: Due to limited computational power and energy resources, aggregation of data from multiple sensor nodes done at the aggregating node is usually accomplished by simple methods such as averaging. However such aggregation is known to be highly vulnerable to node compromising attacks. Since WSN are usually unattended and without tamper resistant hardware, they are highly susceptible to such attacks. Thus, ascertaining trustworthiness of data and reputation of sensor nodes is crucial for WSN. As the performance of very low power processors dramatically improves, future aggregator nodes will be capable of performing more sophisticated data aggregation algorithms, thus making WSN less vulnerable. Iterative filtering algorithms hold great promise for such a purpose. Such algorithms simultaneously aggregate data from multiple sources and provide trust assessment of these sources, usually in a form of corresponding weight factors assigned to data provided by each source. In this paper we demonstrate that several existing iterative filtering algorithms, while significantly more robust against collusion attacks than the simple averaging methods, are nevertheless susceptive to a novel sophisticated collusion attack we introduce. To address this security issue, we propose an improvement for iterative filtering techniques by providing an initial approximation for such algorithms which makes them not only collusion robust, but also more accurate and faster converging.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于有限的计算能力和能量资源，在聚集节点处完成的来自多个传感器节点的数据的聚集通常通过诸如平均的简单方法来完成。然而，众所周知，这种聚合极易受到节点泄露攻击。由于WSN通常无人值守，且没有防篡改硬件，因此非常容易受到此类攻击。因此，确定数据的可信度和传感器节点的信誉对WSN至关重要。随着超低功耗处理器性能的大幅提升，未来的聚合器节点将能够执行更复杂的数据聚合算法，从而降低WSN的脆弱性。迭代滤波算法在这方面大有可为。这种算法同时聚集来自多个来源的数据，并提供对这些来源的信任评估，通常以分配给每个来源提供的数据的相应权重因子的形式。在本文中，我们证明了几个现有的迭代滤波算法，虽然比简单的平均方法对共谋攻击更加鲁棒，但是对我们引入的新的复杂共谋攻击是敏感的。为了解决这个安全问题，我们提出了一种对迭代滤波技术的改进，通过提供这种算法的初始近似，使它们不仅抗共谋，而且更准确和更快地收敛。
papers.title_zh: 在存在串谋攻击的情况下，无线传感器网络的安全数据聚合技术

papers.title: Secure Spatial Top-k Query Processing via Untrusted Location-Based Service Providers
papers.authors: Rui Zhang, Jingchao Sun, Yanchao Zhang, Chi Zhang
papers.abstract: This paper considers a novel distributed system for collaborative location-based information generation and sharing which become increasingly popular due to the explosive growth of Internet-capable and location-aware mobile devices. The system consists of a data collector, data contributors, location-based service providers (LBSPs), and system users. The data collector gathers reviews about points-of-interest (POIs) from data contributors, while LBSPs purchase POI data sets from the data collector and allow users to perform spatial top-k queries which ask for the POIs in a certain region and with the highest k ratings for an interested POI attribute. In practice, LBSPs are untrusted and may return fake query results for various bad motives, e.g., in favor of POIs willing to pay. This paper presents three novel schemes for users to detect fake spatial snapshot and moving top-k query results as an effort to foster the practical deployment and use of the proposed system. The efficacy and efficiency of our schemes are thoroughly analyzed and evaluated.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文考虑了一种新颖的分布式系统，用于协作的基于位置的信息生成和共享，由于具有互联网能力和位置感知的移动设备的爆炸式增长，该系统变得越来越流行。该系统由数据收集器、数据贡献者、基于位置的服务提供者(LBSPs)和系统用户组成。数据收集器从数据贡献者收集关于兴趣点(POI)的评论，而LBSPs从数据收集器购买POI数据集，并允许用户执行空间top-k查询，该查询要求特定区域中的POI，并且对于感兴趣的POI属性具有最高k评级。在实践中，LBSPs是不可信的，并且可能出于各种不良动机返回假的查询结果，例如，有利于愿意付费的poi。本文提出了三种新的用户检测伪空间快照和移动top-k查询结果的方案，以促进该系统的实际部署和使用。我们的方案的功效和效率被彻底地分析和评估。
papers.title_zh: 通过不信任的基于位置的服务提供商来保护空间TOP-K查询处理

papers.title: The State of the Journal Editorial
papers.authors: Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: Presents an editorial discussing the state of the IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing, focusing of its past achievements, scope of coverage, and topics to be addressed in the coming year.
papers.abstract_zh: 提交一篇社论，讨论IEEE可靠和安全计算汇刊的状态，重点关注其过去的成就、覆盖范围和来年要解决的主题。
papers.title_zh: 期刊社论状态

papers.title: A Reliability Improvement Method for SOA-Based Applications
papers.authors: Goran Delac, Marin Silic, Sinisa Srbljic
papers.abstract: As SOA gains more traction through various implementations, building reliable service compositions remains one of the principal research concerns. Widely researched reliability assurance methods, often rely on applying redundancy or complex optimization strategies that can make them less applicable when it comes to designing service compositions on a larger scale. To address this issue, we propose a design time reliability improvement method that enables selective service composition improvements by focusing on the most reliability-critical workflow components, named weak points. With the aim of detecting most significant weak points, we introduce a method based on a suite of recommendation algorithms that leverage a belief network reliability model. The method is made scalable by using heuristic algorithms that achieve better computational performance at the cost of recommendation accuracy. Although less accurate heuristic algorithms on average require more improvement steps, they can achieve better overall performance in cases when the additional step-wise overhead of applying improvements is low. We confirm the soundness of the proposed solution by performing experiments on data sets of randomly generated service compositions.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着SOA通过各种实现获得更多的关注，构建可靠的服务组合仍然是主要的研究关注点之一。广泛研究的可靠性保证方法通常依赖于应用冗余或复杂的优化策略，这使得它们在设计更大规模的服务组合时不太适用。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种设计时可靠性改进方法，该方法通过关注对可靠性最关键的工作流组件(称为弱点)来实现选择性的服务组合改进。为了检测最重要的弱点，我们介绍了一种基于一套推荐算法的方法，该算法利用了信任网络可靠性模型。该方法通过使用启发式算法而变得可扩展，启发式算法以推荐准确度为代价实现了更好的计算性能。虽然不太精确的启发式算法平均起来需要更多的改进步骤，但是当应用改进的额外的逐步开销较低时，它们可以实现更好的整体性能。通过在随机生成的服务组合数据集上进行实验，我们证实了所提出的解决方案的可靠性。
papers.title_zh: 基于SOA的应用程序的可靠性改进方法

papers.title: Context-Based Access Control Systems for Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Bilal Shebaro, Oyindamola Oluwatimi, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: Mobile Android applications often have access to sensitive data and resources on the user device. Misuse of this data by malicious applications may result in privacy breaches and sensitive data leakage. An example would be a malicious application surreptitiously recording a confidential business conversation. The problem arises from the fact that Android users do not have control over the application capabilities once the applications have been granted the requested privileges upon installation. In many cases, however, whether an application may get a privilege depends on the specific user context and thus we need a context-based access control mechanism by which privileges can be dynamically granted or revoked to applications based on the specific context of the user. In this paper we propose such an access control mechanism. Our implementation of context differentiates between closely located sub-areas within the same location. We have modified the Android operating system so that context-based access control restrictions can be specified and enforced. We have performed several experiments to assess the efficiency of our access control mechanism and the accuracy of context detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动Android应用程序通常可以访问用户设备上的敏感数据和资源。恶意应用程序滥用这些数据可能会导致隐私泄露和敏感数据泄漏。一个例子是一个恶意的应用程序偷偷记录一个机密的商业对话。这个问题源于这样一个事实，即一旦应用程序在安装时被授予所请求的特权，Android用户就不能控制应用程序的能力。然而，在许多情况下，应用程序是否可以获得特权取决于特定的用户上下文，因此我们需要一种基于上下文的访问控制机制，通过这种机制，可以根据用户的特定上下文动态地授予或撤销应用程序特权。本文提出了这样一种访问控制机制。我们的上下文实现在同一位置内的紧密定位的子区域之间进行区分。我们修改了Android操作系统，以便可以指定和执行基于上下文的访问控制限制。我们进行了几个实验来评估我们的访问控制机制的效率和上下文检测的准确性。
papers.title_zh: 基于上下文的移动设备访问控制系统

papers.title: DDSGA: A Data-Driven Semi-Global Alignment Approach for Detecting Masquerade Attacks
papers.authors: Hisham A. Kholidy, Fabrizio Baiardi, Salim Hariri
papers.abstract: A masquerade attacker impersonates a legal user to utilize the user services and privileges. The semi-global alignment algorithm (SGA) is one of the most effective and efficient techniques to detect these attacks but it has not reached yet the accuracy and performance required by large scale, multiuser systems. To improve both the effectiveness and the performances of this algorithm, we propose the Data-Driven Semi-Global Alignment, DDSGA approach. From the security effectiveness view point, DDSGA improves the scoring systems by adopting distinct alignment parameters for each user. Furthermore, it tolerates small mutations in user command sequences by allowing small changes in the low-level representation of the commands functionality. It also adapts to changes in the user behaviour by updating the signature of a user according to its current behaviour. To optimize the runtime overhead, DDSGA minimizes the alignment overhead and parallelizes the detection and the update. After describing the DDSGA phases, we present the experimental results that show that DDSGA achieves a high hit ratio of 88.4 percent with a low false positive rate of 1.7 percent. It improves the hit ratio of the enhanced SGA by about 21.9 percent and reduces Maxion-Townsend cost by 22.5 percent. Hence, DDSGA results in improving both the hit ratio and false positive rates with an acceptable computational overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 伪装攻击者冒充合法用户来利用用户服务和特权。半全局对齐算法(SGA)是检测这些攻击的最有效和高效的技术之一，但是它还没有达到大规模多用户系统所需的准确性和性能。为了提高算法的效率和性能，我们提出了数据驱动的半全局比对方法。从安全有效性的角度来看，DDSGA通过为每个用户采用不同的校准参数来改进评分系统。此外，通过允许命令功能的低级表示中的小变化，它容忍用户命令序列中的小变化。它还通过根据用户的当前行为更新用户的签名来适应用户行为的变化。为了优化运行时开销，DDSGA最大限度地减少了对齐开销，并将检测和更新并行化。在描述了DDSGA阶段之后，我们给出了实验结果，表明DDSGA实现了88.4%的高命中率和1.7%的低误报率。它将增强型SGA的命中率提高了约21.9%，并将Maxion-Townsend成本降低了22.5%。因此，DDSGA以可接受的计算开销改善了命中率和假阳性率。
papers.title_zh: DDSGA：一种数据驱动的半全球对准方法，用于检测化装攻击

papers.title: Improved Privacy-Preserving P2P Multimedia Distribution Based on Recombined Fingerprints
papers.authors: David Megías
papers.abstract: Anonymous fingerprint has been suggested as a convenient solution for the legal distribution of multimedia contents with copyright protection whilst preserving the privacy of buyers, whose identities are only revealed in case of illegal re-distribution. However, most of the existing anonymous fingerprinting protocols are impractical for two main reasons: 1) the use of complex time-consuming protocols and/or homomorphic encryption of the content, and 2) a unicast approach for distribution that does not scale for a large number of buyers. This paper stems from a previous proposal of recombined fingerprints which overcomes some of these drawbacks. However, the recombined fingerprint approach requires a complex graph search for traitor tracing, which needs the participation of other buyers, and honest proxies in its P2P distribution scenario. This paper focuses on removing these disadvantages resulting in an efficient, scalable, privacy-preserving and P2P-based fingerprinting system.
papers.abstract_zh: 匿名指纹已经被建议作为一种方便的解决方案，用于具有版权保护的多媒体内容的合法分发，同时保护购买者的隐私，购买者的身份仅在非法再分发的情况下才被暴露。然而，大多数现有的匿名指纹协议由于两个主要原因是不切实际的:1)使用复杂耗时的协议和/或内容的同态加密，以及2)用于分发的单播方法不适合大量购买者。这篇论文源于先前提出的重组指纹，它克服了这些缺点中的一些。然而，重组指纹方法需要复杂的图搜索来追踪叛逆者，这需要其他购买者的参与，并且在其P2P分发场景中需要诚实的代理。本文致力于消除这些缺点，实现一个高效的、可扩展的、隐私保护的、基于P2P的指纹系统。
papers.title_zh: 改进了基于重组指纹的P2P P2P多媒体分布的改进

papers.title: Modeling Dependability Features for Real-Time Embedded Systems
papers.authors: Siru Ni, Yi Zhuang, Zining Cao, Xiangying Kong
papers.abstract: Ensuring dependability is significant in the development process of Real-Time Embedded Systems (RTESs). The dependability of a system model is usually presented by temporal and data constraints, which are ambiguous and incomplete when using semi-formal methods. Formal methods have precise semantics and strong verifiability, but few can capture the dependability features for RTESs. This paper presents Z-MARTE, an extensible modeling method combining MARTE profile and Z notation, to provide rigorous specifications towards the dependability features of RTESs. To extend the descriptive ability of Z, we design the time model, structure model and behavior model in Z-MARTE, specifying temporal and data constraints in the form of predicates. Z-MARTE can be edited and verified by the existing tools for Z. The converting from MARTE to Z-MARTE is supported by ZMT, a model transformation tool we design. A case study of a communication system is given to illustrate the modeling and verification procedure of Z-MARTE.
papers.abstract_zh: 在实时嵌入式系统的开发过程中，确保可靠性至关重要。系统模型的可靠性通常由时间和数据约束来表示，这在使用半形式化方法时是不明确和不完整的。形式化方法具有精确的语义和很强的可验证性，但很少能捕捉到RTESs的可信性特征。本文提出了Z-MARTE，一种结合MARTE剖面和Z符号的可扩展建模方法，为RTESs的可信性特征提供了严格的规范。为了扩展Z的描述能力，我们在Z-MARTE中设计了时间模型、结构模型和行为模型，以谓词的形式指定了时间和数据约束。Z-MARTE可以通过现有的Z工具进行编辑和验证。我们设计的模型转换工具ZMT支持从MARTE到Z-MARTE的转换。以一个通信系统为例说明了Z-MARTE的建模和验证过程。
papers.title_zh: 实时嵌入式系统的建模可靠性功能

papers.title: Performability Evaluation of Grid Environments Using Stochastic Reward Nets
papers.authors: Reza Entezari-Maleki, Kishor S. Trivedi, Ali Movaghar
papers.abstract: In this paper, performance of grid computing environment is studied in the presence of failure-repair of the resources. To achieve this, in the first step, each of the grid resource is individually modeled using Stochastic Reward Nets (SRNs), and mean response time of the resource for grid tasks is computed as a performance measure. In individual models, three different scheduling schemes called random selection, non-preemptive priority, and preemptive priority are considered to simultaneously schedule local and grid tasks to the processors of a single resource. In the next step, single resource models are combined to shape an entire grid environment. Since the number of the resources in a large-scale grid environment is more than can be handled using such a monolithic SRN, two approximate SRN models using folding and fixed-point techniques are proposed to evaluate the performance of the whole grid environment. Brouwer's fixed-point theorem is used to theoretically prove the existence of a solution to the fixed-point approximate model. Numerical results indicate an improvement of several orders of magnitude in the model state space reduction without a significant loss of accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究了网格计算环境在资源故障修复情况下的性能。为了实现这一点，在第一步中，使用随机回报网(SRNs)对每个网格资源进行单独建模，并计算资源对网格任务的平均响应时间作为性能度量。在单个模型中，考虑了三种不同的调度方案，称为随机选择、非抢占式优先级和抢占式优先级，以同时将本地和网格任务调度给单个资源的处理器。在下一步中，将单个资源模型组合起来，形成一个完整的网格环境。由于大规模网格环境中的资源数量超过了使用这种单片SRN可以处理的数量，因此提出了两种使用折叠和定点技术的近似SRN模型来评估整个网格环境的性能。Brouwer不动点定理用于从理论上证明不动点近似模型解的存在性。数值结果表明，模型状态空间减少了几个数量级，而精度没有显著损失。
papers.title_zh: 使用随机奖励网对网格环境的性能评估

papers.title: Risk Aware Query Replacement Approach for Secure Databases Performance Management
papers.authors: Ousmane Amadou Dia, Csilla Farkas
papers.abstract: Large amount of data and increased demand to extract, analyze and derive knowledge from data are impairing nowadays performance of enterprise mission-critical systems such as databases. For databases, the challenging problem is to manage complex and sometimes non-optimized queries executed on enormous data sets stored across several tables. This generally results in increased query response time and loss of employees productivity. In this paper, we investigate the problem of enterprise computing resources availability. Our goal is to minimize performance degradation arising from resource intensive queries. We propose a risk aware approach that decouples the process of analyzing resource requirements of sql queries from their execution. We leverage XACML to control users' requests and to monitor database loads. This allows us to adjust available resources in a database system to computing resource needs of queries. A query can therefore run in a database if it does not severely impact the performance of the database. Otherwise, we propose to the requester a replacement query denoted what-if-query. Such query proposes results that are similar to the results of the requester's query, is secure and provides acceptable answers when it executes without compromising the performance of the database.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，大量的数据以及从数据中提取、分析和获取知识的日益增长的需求正在削弱企业关键任务系统(如数据库)的性能。对于数据库来说，具有挑战性的问题是管理复杂的、有时未经优化的查询，这些查询是对存储在多个表中的巨大数据集执行的。这通常会导致查询响应时间的增加和员工生产力的损失。本文研究企业计算资源可用性问题。我们的目标是最小化由资源密集型查询引起的性能下降。我们提出了一种风险感知方法，将sql查询的资源需求分析过程与其执行过程相分离。我们利用XACML来控制用户请求和监控数据库负载。这允许我们调整数据库系统中的可用资源，以满足查询的计算资源需求。因此，如果不会严重影响数据库的性能，查询可以在数据库中运行。否则，我们向请求者提出一个替换查询，称为what-if-query。这种查询提出的结果与请求者的查询结果相似，是安全的，并且在执行时提供可接受的答案，而不会损害数据库的性能。
papers.title_zh: 风险意识的查询替换方法用于安全数据库绩效管理

papers.title: Secure Tag Search in RFID Systems Using Mobile Readers
papers.authors: Saravanan Sundaresan, Robin Doss, Selwyn Piramuthu, Wanlei Zhou
papers.abstract: One of the important features of an RFID system is its ability to search for a particular tag among a group of tags. In order to ensure privacy and security of the tags, the search has to be conducted in a secure fashion. To our knowledge not much work has been done in this secure search area of RFID. The minimal work that has been done do not comply with the EPC C1G2 (Class-1 Gen-2) standard since most of them use expensive hash operations or sophisticated encryption schemes that cannot be implemented in the low-cost passive tags that are highly resource constrained. Our work aims to fill this gap by proposing a protocol that is based on simple XOR encryption and 128 bit pseudo random number generators (PRNG), operations that can be easily implemented on low-cost passive tags. Thus, our protocol enables large scale implementations and achieves EPC C1G2 compliance while meeting the security requirements. The protocol provides additional protection by hiding the pseudo-random number during all transmissions using a blind-factor.
papers.abstract_zh: RFID系统的一个重要特征是其在一组标签中搜索特定标签的能力。为了确保标签的私密性和安全性，搜索必须以安全的方式进行。据我们所知，在RFID的安全搜索领域还没有做很多工作。已经完成的最少工作不符合EPC C1G2 (Class-1 Gen-2)标准，因为它们中的大多数使用昂贵的哈希运算或复杂的加密方案，这些方案不能在资源高度受限的低成本无源标签中实现。我们的工作旨在通过提出一个基于简单XOR加密和128位伪随机数发生器(PRNG)的协议来填补这一空白，这些操作可以在低成本的无源标签上轻松实现。因此，我们的协议支持大规模实施，并在满足安全要求的同时实现了EPC C1G2合规性。该协议通过使用盲因子在所有传输期间隐藏伪随机数来提供额外的保护。
papers.title_zh: 使用移动阅读器在RFID系统中安全标记搜索

papers.title: VM-μCheckpoint: Design, Modeling, and Assessment of Lightweight In-Memory VM Checkpointing
papers.authors: Long Wang, Zbigniew Kalbarczyk, Ravishankar K. Iyer, Arun Iyengar
papers.abstract: Checkpointing and rollback techniques enhance reliability and availability of virtual machines and their hosted IT services. This paper proposes VM-μCheckpoint, a light-weight pure-software mechanism for high-frequency checkpointing and rapid recovery for VMs. Compared with existing techniques of VM checkpointing, VM-μCheckpoint tries to minimize checkpoint overhead and speed up recovery by means of copy-on-write, dirty-page prediction and in-place recovery, as well as saving incremental checkpoints in volatile memory. Moreover, VM-μCheckpoint deals with the issue that latency in error detection potentially results in corrupted checkpoints, particularly when checkpointing frequency is high. We also constructed Markov models to study the availability improvements provided by VM-μCheckpoint (from 99 to 99.98 percent on reasonably reliable hypervisors). We designed and implemented VM-μCheckpoint in the Xen VMM. The evaluation results demonstrate that VM-μCheckpoint incurs an average of 6.3 percent overhead (in terms of program execution time) for 50 ms checkpoint intervals when executing the SPEC CINT 2006 benchmark. Error injection experiments demonstrate that VM-μCheckpoint, combined with error detection techniques in RMK, provides high coverage of recovery.
papers.abstract_zh: 检查点和回滚技术增强了虚拟机及其托管IT服务的可靠性和可用性。本文提出VM-μCheckpoint，一种轻量级的纯软件机制，用于虚拟机的高频检查点和快速恢复。与现有的VM检查点技术相比，VM-μCheckpoint通过写入时复制、脏页预测和就地恢复，以及在易失性存储器中保存增量检查点，来尽量减少检查点开销并加快恢复速度。此外，VM-μCheckpoint处理错误检测中的延迟可能导致损坏的检查点的问题，特别是当检查点频率很高时。我们还构建了马尔可夫模型来研究VM-μ检查点提供的可用性改进(在相当可靠的虚拟机管理程序上从99%提高到99.98%)。我们在Xen VMM上设计并实现了VM-μ检查点。评估结果表明，在执行SPEC CINT 2006基准测试时，对于50毫秒的检查点间隔，VM-μ检查点平均产生6.3%的开销(就程序执行时间而言)。错误注入实验表明，VM-μ检查点结合RMK中的错误检测技术，提供了较高的恢复覆盖率。
papers.title_zh: VM-μCheckpoint：设计，建模和评估轻便内存中VM检查点

papers.title: A Lightweight Secure Scheme for Detecting Provenance Forgery and Packet DropAttacks in Wireless Sensor Networks
papers.authors: Salmin Sultana, Gabriel Ghinita, Elisa Bertino, Mohamed Shehab
papers.abstract: Large-scale sensor networks are deployed in numerous application domains, and the data they collect are used in decision-making for critical infrastructures. Data are streamed from multiple sources through intermediate processing nodes that aggregate information. A malicious adversary may introduce additional nodes in the network or compromise existing ones. Therefore, assuring high data trustworthiness is crucial for correct decision-making. Data provenance represents a key factor in evaluating the trustworthiness of sensor data. Provenance management for sensor networks introduces several challenging requirements, such as low energy and bandwidth consumption, efficient storage and secure transmission. In this paper, we propose a novel lightweight scheme to securely transmit provenance for sensor data. The proposed technique relies on in-packet Bloom filters to encode provenance. We introduce efficient mechanisms for provenance verification and reconstruction at the base station. In addition, we extend the secure provenance scheme with functionality to detect packet drop attacks staged by malicious data forwarding nodes. We evaluate the proposed technique both analytically and empirically, and the results prove the effectiveness and efficiency of the lightweight secure provenance scheme in detecting packet forgery and loss attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 大规模传感器网络部署在许多应用领域，它们收集的数据用于关键基础设施的决策。数据通过聚合信息的中间处理节点从多个源流出。恶意对手可能会在网络中引入额外的节点或危害现有的节点。因此，确保高数据可信度对于正确决策至关重要。数据来源是评估传感器数据可信度的一个关键因素。传感器网络的起源管理引入了几个具有挑战性的需求，例如低能量和带宽消耗、高效存储和安全传输。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的轻量级方案来安全地传输传感器数据的出处。所提出的技术依赖于包内布隆过滤器来编码起源。我们在基站引入了有效的起源验证和重建机制。此外，我们扩展了安全起源方案，增加了检测恶意数据转发节点发起的丢包攻击的功能。我们对所提出的技术进行了分析性和经验性的评估，结果证明了轻量级安全起源方案在检测分组伪造和丢失攻击方面的有效性和效率。
papers.title_zh: 轻巧的安全方案，用于检测无线传感器网络中的出处伪造和数据包dropattacks

papers.title: Continuous and Transparent User Identity Verification for Secure Internet Services
papers.authors: Andrea Ceccarelli, Leonardo Montecchi, Francesco Brancati, Paolo Lollini, Angelo Marguglio, Andrea Bondavalli
papers.abstract: Session management in distributed Internet services is traditionally based on username and password, explicit logouts and mechanisms of user session expiration using classic timeouts. Emerging biometric solutions allow substituting username and password with biometric data during session establishment, but in such an approach still a single verification is deemed sufficient, and the identity of a user is considered immutable during the entire session. Additionally, the length of the session timeout may impact on the usability of the service and consequent client satisfaction. This paper explores promising alternatives offered by applying biometrics in the management of sessions. A secure protocol is defined for perpetual authentication through continuous user verification. The protocol determines adaptive timeouts based on the quality, frequency and type of biometric data transparently acquired from the user. The functional behavior of the protocol is illustrated through Matlab simulations, while model-based quantitative analysis is carried out to assess the ability of the protocol to contrast security attacks exercised by different kinds of attackers. Finally, the current prototype for PCs and Android smartphones is discussed.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统上，分布式互联网服务中的会话管理基于用户名和密码、显式注销以及使用传统超时的用户会话到期机制。新兴的生物测定解决方案允许在会话建立期间用生物测定数据替换用户名和密码，但是在这种方法中，单次验证仍然被认为是足够的，并且用户的身份被认为在整个会话期间是不可改变的。此外，会话超时的长度可能会影响服务的可用性以及随之而来的客户端满意度。本文探讨了生物识别技术在会话管理中的应用前景。安全协议被定义为通过连续的用户验证进行永久认证。该协议基于从用户透明获取的生物特征数据的质量、频率和类型来确定自适应超时。通过Matlab仿真说明了该协议的功能行为，同时进行了基于模型的定量分析，以评估该协议对抗不同类型攻击者实施的安全攻击的能力。最后，讨论了当前用于PC和Android智能手机的原型。
papers.title_zh: 安全互联网服务的连续且透明的用户身份验证

papers.title: Fault Injection in Virtualized Systems - Challenges and Applications
papers.authors: Michael Le, Yuval Tamir
papers.abstract: We analyze the interaction between system virtualization and fault injection: (i) use of virtualization to facilitate fault injection into non-virtualized systems, and (ii) use of fault injection to evaluate the dependability of virtualized systems. We explore the benefits of using virtualization for fault injection and discuss the challenges of implementing fault injection in virtualized systems along with resolutions to those challenges. For experimental evaluation, we use a test platform that consists of the Gigan fault injector, that we have developed, with the Xen virtual machine monitor. We evaluate the degree to which fault injection results obtained from running the target system in a virtual machine are comparable to running the target system on bare hardware. We compare results when injection is done from within the target system versus from the hosting hypervisor. We evaluate the performance benefits of leveraging system virtualization for fault injection. Finally, we demonstrate the capabilities of our injector and highlight the benefits of leveraging system virtualization for fault injection by describing deployments of Gigan to evaluate both non-virtualized and virtualized systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们分析了系统虚拟化和故障注入之间的相互作用:(I)使用虚拟化来促进故障注入到非虚拟化系统中，以及(ii)使用故障注入来评估虚拟化系统的可靠性。我们探讨了使用虚拟化进行故障注入的好处，并讨论了在虚拟化系统中实现故障注入的挑战以及这些挑战的解决方案。为了进行实验评估，我们使用了一个测试平台，该平台由我们开发的盖刚故障注入器和Xen虚拟机监视器组成。我们评估在虚拟机中运行目标系统所获得的故障注入结果与在裸硬件上运行目标系统所获得的结果的相似程度。我们比较了从目标系统内部注入和从托管虚拟机管理程序注入的结果。我们评估了利用系统虚拟化进行故障注入的性能优势。最后，我们展示了我们的注入器的功能，并通过描述盖刚的部署来评估非虚拟化和虚拟化系统，强调了利用系统虚拟化进行故障注入的好处。
papers.title_zh: 虚拟化系统中的故障注入 - 挑战和应用

papers.title: Invalidating Idealized BGP Security Proposals and Countermeasures
papers.authors: Qi Li, Xinwen Zhang, Xin Zhang, Purui Su
papers.abstract: Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) is vulnerable to routing attacks because of the lack of inherent verification mechanism. Several secure BGP schemes have been proposed to prevent routing attacks by leveraging cryptographic verification of BGP routing updates. In this paper, we present a new type of attacks, called TIGER, which aims to invalidate the “proven” security of these secure BGP schemes and allow ASes to announce forged routes even under full deployment of any existing secure BGP proposal. By launching TIGER attacks, malicious ASes can easily generate and announce forged routes which can be successfully verified by the existing secure BGP schemes. Furthermore, TIGER attacks can evade existing routing anomaly detection schemes by guaranteeing routing data-plane availability and consistency of control- and data-plane. Toward a new securing BGP scheme, we propose Anti-TIGER to detect and defend against TIGER attacks. Anti-TIGER enables robust TIGER detection by collaborations between ASes. In particular, we leverage Spread Spectrum Communication technique to watermark certain special probing packets, which manifest the existence of TIGER attacks. Anti-TIGER does not require any modifications in routing data-plane, therefore it is easy to deploy and incrementally deployable. We evaluate the effectiveness of TIGER and Anti-TIGER by experiments with real AS topologies of the Internet. Our experiment results show that TIGER attacks can successfully hijack a considerable number of prefixes. In the meanwhile, Anti-TIGER can achieve 100 percent detection ratio of TIGER attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于缺乏内在的验证机制，边界网关协议(BGP)容易受到路由攻击。已经提出了几种安全的BGP方案，通过利用BGP路由更新的密码验证来防止路由攻击。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的攻击类型，称为TIGER，旨在使这些安全BGP方案的“已证明”安全性无效，并允许as即使在任何现有安全BGP提案的完全部署下也能宣布伪造的路由。通过发起TIGER攻击，恶意as可以很容易地生成并公布伪造的路由，这些路由可以被现有的安全BGP方案成功验证。此外，TIGER攻击可以通过保证路由数据平面的可用性以及控制平面和数据平面的一致性来规避现有的路由异常检测方案。针对一种新的安全BGP方案，我们提出了反TIGER来检测和防御TIGER攻击。Anti-TIGER通过as之间的协作实现了健壮的老虎检测。特别地，我们利用扩频通信技术对某些特殊的探测包进行水印处理，这些探测包表明存在TIGER攻击。Anti-TIGER不需要对路由数据平面进行任何修改，因此易于部署和增量部署。我们通过在真实的互联网拓扑上的实验来评估TIGER和Anti-TIGER的有效性。我们的实验结果表明，老虎攻击可以成功劫持相当数量的前缀。同时，防虎可以达到100%的老虎攻击检测率。
papers.title_zh: 理想化的BGP安全建议和对策无效

papers.title: Key-Recovery Attacks on KIDS, a Keyed Anomaly Detection System
papers.authors: Juan E. Tapiador, Agustín Orfila, Arturo Ribagorda, Benjamín Ramos
papers.abstract: Most anomaly detection systems rely on machine learning algorithms to derive a model of normality that is later used to detect suspicious events. Some works conducted over the last years have pointed out that such algorithms are generally susceptible to deception, notably in the form of attacks carefully constructed to evade detection. Various learning schemes have been proposed to overcome this weakness. One such system is Keyed IDS (KIDS), introduced at DIMVA “10. KIDS” core idea is akin to the functioning of some cryptographic primitives, namely to introduce a secret element (the key) into the scheme so that some operations are infeasible without knowing it. In KIDS the learned model and the computation of the anomaly score are both key-dependent, a fact which presumably prevents an attacker from creating evasion attacks. In this work we show that recovering the key is extremely simple provided that the attacker can interact with KIDS and get feedback about probing requests. We present realistic attacks for two different adversarial settings and show that recovering the key requires only a small amount of queries, which indicates that KIDS does not meet the claimed security properties. We finally revisit KIDS' central idea and provide heuristic arguments about its suitability and limitations.
papers.abstract_zh: 大多数异常检测系统依赖于机器学习算法来导出常态模型，该模型随后用于检测可疑事件。过去几年进行的一些工作指出，这种算法通常容易受到欺骗，特别是以精心构造的攻击形式来逃避检测。已经提出了各种学习方案来克服这一弱点。一个这样的系统是在DIMVA“10。KIDS的核心思想类似于一些密码原语的功能，即在方案中引入一个秘密元素(密钥),这样一些操作在不知道它的情况下是不可行的。在KIDS中，学习模型和异常分数的计算都是依赖于密钥的，这一事实可能会阻止攻击者创建规避攻击。在这项工作中，我们展示了恢复密钥是非常简单的，只要攻击者能够与孩子互动并获得关于探测请求的反馈。我们提出了两种不同的对抗性设置的现实攻击，并表明恢复密钥只需要少量的查询，这表明KIDS不符合所声称的安全属性。我们最后重温了孩子们的中心思想，并提供了关于其适用性和局限性的启发性论点。
papers.title_zh: 钥匙恢复对孩子的攻击，一个钥匙异常检测系统

papers.title: Marlin: Mitigating Code Reuse Attacks Using Code Randomization
papers.authors: Aditi Gupta, Javid Habibi, Michael S. Kirkpatrick, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: Code-reuse attacks, such as return-oriented programming (ROP), are a class of buffer overflow attacks that repurpose existing executable code towards malicious purposes. These attacks bypass defenses against code injection attacks by chaining together sequence of instructions, commonly known as gadgets, to execute the desired attack logic. A common feature of these attacks is the reliance on the knowledge of memory layout of the executable code. We propose a fine grained randomization based approach that breaks these assumptions by modifying the layout of the executable code and hinders code-reuse attack. Our solution, Marlin, randomizes the internal structure of the executable code by randomly shuffling the function blocks in the target binary. This denies the attacker the necessary a priori knowledge of instruction addresses for constructing the desired exploit payload. Our approach can be applied to any ELF binary and every execution of this binary uses a different randomization. We have integrated Marlin into the bash shell that randomizes the target executable before launching it. Our work shows that such an approach incurs low overhead and significantly increases the level of security against code-reuse based attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 代码重用攻击(如面向返回的编程(ROP ))是一种缓冲区溢出攻击，它将现有的可执行代码重新用于恶意目的。这些攻击通过将指令序列(通常称为小工具)链接在一起来执行所需的攻击逻辑，从而绕过对代码注入攻击的防御。这些攻击的一个共同特征是依赖于可执行代码的内存布局知识。我们提出了一种基于细粒度随机化的方法，通过修改可执行代码的布局来打破这些假设，并阻止代码重用攻击。我们的解决方案Marlin通过随机打乱目标二进制文件中的功能块，使可执行代码的内部结构随机化。这使得攻击者无法获得构建所需利用有效载荷所需的指令地址的先验知识。我们的方法可以应用于任何ELF二进制文件，并且该二进制文件的每次执行都使用不同的随机化。我们已经将Marlin集成到bash shell中，它在启动目标可执行文件之前对其进行随机化。我们的工作表明，这种方法导致低开销，并显著提高了对基于代码重用的攻击的安全性。
papers.title_zh: MARLIN：使用代码随机化缓解代码重复使用攻击

papers.title: On the Hardness of Adding Nonmasking Fault Tolerance
papers.authors: Alex P. Klinkhamer, Ali Ebnenasir
papers.abstract: This paper investigates the complexity of adding nonmasking fault tolerance, where a nonmasking fault-tolerant program guarantees recovery from states reached due to the occurrence of faults to states from where its specifications are satisfied. We first demonstrate that adding nonmasking fault tolerance to low atomicity programs-where processes have read/write restrictions with respect to the variables of other processes--is NP-complete (in the size of the state space) on an unfair or weakly fair scheduler. Then, we establish a surprising result that even under strong fairness, addition of nonmasking fault tolerance remains NP-hard! The NP-hardness of adding nonmasking fault tolerance is based on a polynomial-time reduction from the 3-SAT problem to the problem of designing self-stabilizing programs from their non-stabilizing versions, which is a special case of adding nonmasking fault tolerance. While it is known that designing self-stabilization under the assumption of strong fairness is polynomial, we demonstrate that adding self-stabilization to non-stabilizing programs is NP-hard under weak fairness.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究了增加非屏蔽容错的复杂性，其中非屏蔽容错程序保证从由于故障发生而达到的状态恢复到满足其规范的状态。我们首先证明，在不公平或弱公平调度器上，向低原子性程序(其中进程相对于其他进程的变量具有读/写限制)添加非屏蔽容错是NP完全的(在状态空间的大小上)。然后，我们建立了一个令人惊讶的结果，即使在强公平性下，增加非屏蔽容错仍然是NP难的！添加非屏蔽容错的NP难度是基于从3-SAT问题到从它们的非稳定版本设计自稳定程序的问题的多项式时间缩减，这是添加非屏蔽容错的特例。虽然已知在强公平性假设下设计自稳定是多项式的，但是我们证明了在弱公平性下将自稳定添加到非稳定程序是NP-hard的。
papers.title_zh: 关于添加非卸载容错的硬度

papers.title: Time-Delayed Broadcasting for Defeating Inside Jammers
papers.authors: Sisi Liu, Loukas Lazos, Marwan Krunz
papers.abstract: We address the problem of jamming-resistant broadcast communications under an internal threat model. We propose a time-delayed broadcast scheme (TDBS), which implements the broadcast operation as a series of unicast transmissions distributed in frequency and time. TDBS does not rely on commonly shared secrets, or the existence of jamming-immune control channels for coordinating broadcasts. Instead, each node follows a unique pseudo-noise (PN) frequency hopping sequence. Contrary to conventional PN sequences designed for multi-access systems, the PN sequences in TDBS exhibit correlation to enable broadcast. Moreover, they are designed to limit the information leakage due to the exposure of a subset of sequences by compromised nodes. We map the problem of constructing such PN sequences to the 1-factorization problem for complete graphs. We further accommodate dynamic broadcast groups by mapping the problem of updating the assigned PN sequences to the problem of constructing rainbow paths in proper edge-colored graphs.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们在内部威胁模型下解决抗干扰广播通信的问题。我们提出了一种时延广播方案(TDBS)，它将广播操作实现为一系列在频率和时间上分布的单播传输。TDBS不依赖于共享的秘密，也不依赖于抗干扰控制信道来协调广播。相反，每个节点遵循唯一的伪噪声(PN)跳频序列。与为多址系统设计的传统PN序列相反，TDBS的PN序列表现出相关性，能够进行广播。此外，它们被设计成限制由于受危害节点暴露序列子集而导致的信息泄漏。我们将构造这种PN序列的问题映射到完全图的1-因子分解问题。通过将更新分配的PN序列的问题映射到在适当的边着色图中构造彩虹路径的问题，我们进一步适应动态广播组。
papers.title_zh: 耗时广播，以击败干扰者

papers.title: An OS-level Framework for Anomaly Detection in Complex Software Systems
papers.authors: Antonio Bovenzi, Francesco Brancati, Stefano Russo, Andrea Bondavalli
papers.abstract: Revealing anomalies at the operating system (OS) level to support online diagnosis activities of complex software systems is a promising approach when traditional detection mechanisms (e.g., based on event logs, probes and heartbeats) are inadequate or cannot be applied. In this paper we propose a configurable detection framework to reveal anomalies in the OS behavior, related to system misbehaviors. The detector is based on online statistical analyses techniques, and it is designed for systems that operate under variable and non-stationary conditions. The framework is evaluated to detect the activation of software faults in a complex distributed system for Air Traffic Management (ATM). Results of experiments with two different OSs, namely Linux Red Hat EL5 and Windows Server 2008, show that the detector is effective for mission-critical systems. The framework can be configured to select the monitored indicators so as to tune the level of intrusivity. A sensitivity analysis of the detector parameters is carried out to show their impact on the performance and to give to practitioners guidelines for its field tuning.
papers.abstract_zh: 当传统的检测机制(例如，基于事件日志、探测和心跳)不足或不能应用时，揭示操作系统(OS)级别的异常以支持复杂软件系统的在线诊断活动是一种有前途的方法。在本文中，我们提出了一个可配置的检测框架，以揭示与系统不当行为相关的操作系统行为异常。该检测器基于在线统计分析技术，专为在可变和不稳定条件下运行的系统而设计。对该框架进行评估，以检测复杂分布式空中交通管理系统(ATM)中软件故障的激活。对Linux Red Hat EL5和Windows Server 2008两种不同操作系统的实验结果表明，该检测器对关键任务系统是有效的。该框架可以被配置为选择被监控的指示器，以便调整入侵的级别。对检测器参数进行了灵敏度分析，以显示它们对性能的影响，并为从业人员提供现场调谐指南。
papers.title_zh: 复杂软件系统中异常检测的OS级级框架

papers.title: On the Security of A Privacy-Preserving Product Calculation Scheme
papers.authors: Youwen Zhu, Zhiqiu Huang, Liusheng Huang, Tsuyoshi Takagi
papers.abstract: Recently, Jung and Li [1] propose a highly efficient privacy-preserving product calculation scheme without requiring secure communication channels. Then, they present secure approaches to solve several application problems using the product calculation protocol. In this work, we observe several security flawsin their privacy-preserving product calculation scheme and some application protocols. We show the security vulnerabilities will result in the disclosure of private data. In two application protocols, almost all the private numbers will be revealed. We further suggest solutions to fix the security problems.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，Jung和Li [1]提出了一个不需要安全通信信道的高效隐私保护乘积计算方案。然后，他们提出了使用乘积计算协议解决几个应用问题的安全方法。在这项工作中，我们观察到一些安全漏洞在他们的隐私保护产品计算方案和一些应用协议。我们表明安全漏洞会导致隐私数据的泄露。在两个应用协议中，几乎所有的私有号码都会被泄露。我们进一步建议解决安全问题的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 关于隐私保护产品计算方案的安全性

papers.title: A Hotness Filter of Files for Reliable Non-Volatile Memory Systems
papers.authors: Chin-Hsien Wu, Po-Han Wu, Kuo-Long Chen, Wen-Yen Chang, Kun-Cheng Lai
papers.abstract: Flash memory has been widely utilized in embedded systems and consumer electronics, because of its low-power consumption, high-performance access, non-volatility, and shock resistance. A flash-memory device is different from a typical hard-disk device and requires a sophisticated management method to improve the reliable endurance and provide the efficient storage management. To improve the reliable endurance and provide the efficient storage management, the previous works have demonstrated that the identification of the frequently used data and the least recently used data is a key point. In this paper, we will propose a hotness filter of files to calculate how the files are accessed (i.e., reads and writes) intensively. The proposed filter is designed specifically to distinguish between hot and cold files by considering the characteristics of non-volatile memory systems and Android systems. In the experiments, we have implemented the hotness filter in a real Android system (e.g., Asus Nexus 7) and demonstrated that the proposed filter can correctly identify hot and cold files without significant overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 闪存因其低功耗、高性能访问、非易失性和抗冲击等优点，已广泛应用于嵌入式系统和消费电子产品中。闪存设备不同于典型的硬盘设备，需要复杂的管理方法来提高可靠性和提供有效的存储管理。为了提高可靠的耐久性和提供有效的存储管理，先前的工作已经证明识别频繁使用的数据和最近最少使用的数据是一个关键点。在本文中，我们将提出一个文件热度过滤器来计算文件的访问(即读写)强度。所提出的过滤器是专门设计来通过考虑非易失性存储器系统和Android系统的特征来区分热和冷文件的。在实验中，我们在真实的Android系统(例如，华硕Nexus 7)中实现了热度过滤器，并证明了所提出的过滤器可以正确地识别热和冷文件，而没有显著的开销。
papers.title_zh: 可靠的非易失性存储系统的文件热过滤器

papers.title: A Memory-Access Validation Scheme against Payload Injection Attacks
papers.authors: Dongkyun Ahn, Gyungho Lee
papers.abstract: The authenticity of a piece of data or an instruction is crucial in mitigating threats from various forms of software attack. In spite of the various forms of protection against malicious attacks exploiting spurious data, adversaries have been successful in circumventing such protection. This paper proposes a memory-access validation scheme that manages information on spurious data at the granularity of the cache line size. A validation unit based on the proposed scheme answers queries from other components in the processor so that spurious data can be blocked before control flow diversion. We describe the design of this validation unit as well as its integration into the memory hierarchy of a modern processor and assess its memory requirement and performance impact with two simulators. The experimental results show that our scheme is able to detect synthesized payload injection attacks and to manage taint information with a moderate memory overhead under an acceptable performance impact.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据或指令的真实性对于减轻各种形式的软件攻击威胁至关重要。尽管针对利用虚假数据的恶意攻击有各种形式的保护，但是对手已经成功地规避了这种保护。本文提出了一种内存访问验证方案，在缓存行大小的粒度上管理虚假数据的信息。基于所提出的方案的验证单元回答来自处理器中的其他组件的查询，从而可以在控制流转向之前阻止虚假数据。我们描述了该验证单元的设计，以及它与现代处理器的存储器层次结构的集成，并使用两个仿真器评估了它的存储器要求和性能影响。实验结果表明，我们的方案能够检测合成有效载荷注入攻击，并在可接受的性能影响下，以适中的内存开销管理污点信息。
papers.title_zh: 针对有效载荷注射攻击的内存访问验证方案

papers.title: A Probabilistic Discriminative Model for Android Malware Detection with Decompiled Source Code
papers.authors: Lei Cen, Christopher S. Gates, Luo Si, Ninghui Li
papers.abstract: Mobile devices are an important part of our everyday lives, and the Android platform has become a market leader. In recent years a number of approaches for Android malware detection have been proposed, using permissions, source code analysis, or dynamic analysis. In this paper, we propose to use a probabilistic discriminative model based on regularized logistic regression for Android malware detection. Through extensive experimental evaluation, we demonstrate that it can generate probabilistic outputs with highly accurate classification results. In particular, we propose to use Android API calls as features extracted from decompiled source code, and analyze and explore issues in feature granularity, feature representation, feature selection, and regularization. We show that the probabilistic discriminative model also works well with permissions, and substantially outperforms the state-of-the-art methods for Android malware detection with application permissions. Furthermore, the discriminative learning model achieves the best detection results by combining both decompiled source code and application permissions. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first research that proposes probabilistic discriminative model for Android malware detection with a thorough study of desired representation of decompiled source code and is the first research work for Android malware detection task that combines both analysis of decompiled source code and application permissions.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动设备是我们日常生活的重要组成部分，Android平台已经成为市场领导者。近年来，已经提出了许多用于Android恶意软件检测的方法，使用权限、源代码分析或动态分析。在本文中，我们提出使用基于正则化逻辑回归的概率判别模型来检测Android恶意软件。通过大量的实验评估，我们证明了它可以生成具有高精度分类结果的概率输出。特别地，我们建议使用Android API调用作为从反编译源代码中提取的特征，并分析和探索特征粒度、特征表示、特征选择和正则化方面的问题。我们表明，概率判别模型也可以很好地与权限一起工作，并大大优于应用程序权限的Android恶意软件检测的最新方法。此外，判别学习模型通过结合反编译的源代码和应用程序权限来实现最佳检测结果。据我们所知，这是第一个通过彻底研究反编译源代码的期望表示来提出Android恶意软件检测的概率判别模型的研究，也是第一个结合反编译源代码和应用程序权限分析的Android恶意软件检测任务的研究工作。
papers.title_zh: 源代码，用于Android恶意软件检测的概率歧视模型

papers.title: A Trust-Based Privacy-Preserving Friend Recommendation Scheme for Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Linke Guo, Chi Zhang, Yuguang Fang
papers.abstract: Online social networks (OSNs), which attract thousands of million people to use everyday, greatly extend OSN users' social circles by friend recommendations. OSN users' existing social relationship can be characterized as 1-hop trust relationship, and further establish a multi-hop trust chain during the recommendation process. As the same as what people usually experience in the daily life, the social relationship in cyberspaces are potentially formed by OSN users' shared attributes, e.g., colleagues, family members, or classmates, which indicates the attribute-based recommendation process would lead to more fine-grained social relationships between strangers. Unfortunately, privacy concerns raised in the recommendation process impede the expansion of OSN users' friend circle. Some OSN users refuse to disclose their identities and their friends' information to the public domain. In this paper, we propose a trust-based privacy-preserving friend recommendation scheme for OSNs, where OSN users apply their attributes to find matched friends, and establish social relationships with strangers via a multi-hop trust chain. Based on trace-driven experimental results and security analysis, we have shown the feasibility and privacy preservation of our proposed scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 吸引数十亿人每天使用的在线社交网络(OSNs)通过朋友推荐极大地扩展了OSN用户的社交圈。OSN用户现有的社交关系可以表征为1跳信任关系，并在推荐过程中进一步建立多跳信任链。与人们在日常生活中通常经历的一样，网络空间中的社会关系潜在地由OSN用户的共享属性形成，例如同事、家庭成员或同学，这表明基于属性的推荐过程将导致陌生人之间更细粒度的社会关系。不幸的是，推荐过程中提出的隐私问题阻碍了OSN用户朋友圈的扩大。一些OSN用户拒绝公开他们的身份和朋友的信息。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于信任的隐私保护的OSNs好友推荐方案，其中OSN用户应用他们的属性来寻找匹配的好友，并通过多跳信任链与陌生人建立社交关系。基于跟踪驱动的实验结果和安全性分析，我们证明了所提方案的可行性和隐私保护性。
papers.title_zh: 一个基于信任的保险的朋友推荐计划，用于在线社交网络

papers.title: Anonymous Two-Factor Authentication in Distributed Systems: Certain Goals Are Beyond Attainment
papers.authors: Ding Wang, Debiao He, Ping Wang, Chao-Hsien Chu
papers.abstract: Despite two decades of intensive research, it remains a challenge to design a practical anonymous two-factor authentication scheme, for the designers are confronted with an impressive list of security requirements (e.g., resistance to smart card loss attack) and desirable attributes (e.g., local password update). Numerous solutions have been proposed, yet most of them are shortly found either unable to satisfy some critical security requirements or short of a few important features. To overcome this unsatisfactory situation, researchers often work around it in hopes of a new proposal (but no one has succeeded so far), while paying little attention to the fundamental question: whether or not there are inherent limitations that prevent us from designing an “ideal” scheme that satisfies all the desirable goals? In this work, we aim to provide a definite answer to this question. We first revisit two foremost proposals, i.e. Tsai et al.'s scheme and Li's scheme, revealing some subtleties and challenges in designing such schemes. Then, we systematically explore the inherent conflicts and unavoidable trade-offs among the design criteria. Our results indicate that, under the current widely accepted adversarial model, certain goals are beyond attainment. This also suggests a negative answer to the open problem left by Huang et al. in 2014. To the best of knowledge, the present study makes the first step towards understanding the underlying evaluation metric for anonymous two-factor authentication, which we believe will facilitate better design of anonymous two-factor protocols that offer acceptable trade-offs among usability, security and privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管进行了二十年的深入研究，设计实用的匿名双因素认证方案仍然是一个挑战，因为设计者面临着一系列令人印象深刻的安全要求(例如，抵抗智能卡丢失攻击)和期望的属性(例如，本地密码更新)。已经提出了许多解决方案，但是很快发现它们中的大多数要么不能满足一些关键的安全要求，要么缺少一些重要的特征。为了克服这一不尽人意的局面，研究人员常常希望找到一个新方案(但迄今为止还没有人成功)，同时很少关注根本问题:是否存在固有的限制，阻止我们设计出满足所有理想目标的“理想”方案？在这项工作中，我们的目标是为这个问题提供一个明确的答案。我们首先回顾了两个最重要的方案，即蔡等人的方案和李的方案，揭示了设计这样的方案的一些微妙之处和挑战。然后，我们系统地探讨了设计标准之间的内在冲突和不可避免的权衡。我们的结果表明，在当前广泛接受的对抗模式下，某些目标是无法实现的。这也暗示了对黄等人2014年遗留的公开问题的否定回答。据所知，本研究为理解匿名双因素认证的潜在评估指标迈出了第一步，我们相信这将有助于更好地设计匿名双因素协议，在可用性、安全性和隐私性之间提供可接受的折衷。
papers.title_zh: 分布式系统中的匿名两因素身份验证：某些目标是无法实现的

papers.title: Between Worlds: Securing Mixed JavaScript/ActionScript Multi-Party Web Content
papers.authors: Phu H. Phung, Maliheh Monshizadeh, Meera Sridhar, Kevin W. Hamlen, V. N. Venkatakrishnan
papers.abstract: Mixed Flash and JavaScript content has become increasingly prevalent; its purveyance of dynamic features unique to each platform has popularized it for myriad Web development projects. Although Flash and JavaScript security has been examined extensively, the security of untrusted content that combines both has received considerably less attention. This article considers this fusion in detail, outlining several practical scenarios that threaten the security of Web applications. The severity of these attacks warrants the development of new techniques that address the security of Flash-JavaScript content considered as a whole, in contrast to prior solutions that have examined Flash or JavaScript security individually. Toward this end, the article presents FlashJaX, a cross-platform solution that enforces fine-grained, history-based policies that span both Flash and JavaScript. Using in-lined reference monitoring, FlashJaX safely embeds untrusted JavaScript and Flash content in Web pages without modifying browser clients or using special plug-ins. The architecture of FlashJaX, its design and implementation, and a detailed security analysis are exposited. Experiments with advertisements from popular ad networks demonstrate that FlashJaX is transparent to policy-compliant advertisement content, yet blocks many common attack vectors that exploit the fusion of these Web platforms.
papers.abstract_zh: 混合的Flash和JavaScript内容变得越来越普遍；它提供了每个平台独有的动态特性，这使它在无数的Web开发项目中得到了普及。尽管Flash和JavaScript的安全性已经得到了广泛的研究，但是结合了两者的不可信内容的安全性却很少受到关注。本文详细讨论了这种融合，概述了几种威胁Web应用程序安全性的实际场景。这些攻击的严重性保证了新技术的发展，这些新技术将Flash-JavaScript内容的安全性作为一个整体来考虑，这与以前单独检查Flash或JavaScript安全性的解决方案形成对比。为此，本文介绍了FlashJaX，这是一个跨平台的解决方案，它执行细粒度的、基于历史的策略，跨越Flash和JavaScript。使用内嵌引用监控，FlashJaX可以在网页中安全地嵌入不受信任的JavaScript和Flash内容，而无需修改浏览器客户端或使用特殊的插件。阐述了FlashJaX的体系结构、设计和实现，并对其进行了详细的安全性分析。对来自流行广告网络的广告进行的实验表明，FlashJaX对于符合策略的广告内容是透明的，但是阻止了许多利用这些Web平台的融合的常见攻击媒介。
papers.title_zh: 世界之间：确保混合的JavaScript/Actionscript多方Web内容

papers.title: REAL: A Reciprocal Protocol for Location Privacy in Wireless Sensor Networks
papers.authors: Jia-Dong Zhang, Chi-Yin Chow
papers.abstract: K-anonymity has been used to protect location privacy for location monitoring services in wireless sensor networks (WSNs), where sensor nodes work together to report k-anonymized aggregate locations to a server. Each k-anonymized aggregate location is a cloaked area that contains at least k persons. However, we identify an attack model to show that overlapping aggregate locations still pose privacy risks because an adversary can infer some overlapping areas with less than k persons that violates the k-anonymity privacy requirement. In this paper, we propose a reciprocal protocol for location privacy (REAL) in WSNs. In REAL, sensor nodes are required to autonomously organize their sensing areas into a set of non-overlapping and highly accurate k-anonymized aggregate locations. To confront the three key challenges in REAL, namely, self-organization, reciprocity property and high accuracy, we design a state transition process, a locking mechanism and a time delay mechanism, respectively. We compare the performance of REAL with current protocols through simulated experiments. The results show that REAL protects location privacy, provides more accurate query answers, and reduces communication and computational costs.
papers.abstract_zh: k-匿名已被用于保护无线传感器网络(WSNs)中位置监测服务的位置隐私，其中传感器节点一起工作以向服务器报告k-匿名化的聚集位置。每个k匿名化的聚集位置是包含至少k个人的隐藏区域。然而，我们确定了一个攻击模型，以表明重叠的聚集位置仍然带来隐私风险，因为对手可以推断出一些具有少于k个人的重叠区域，这违反了k-匿名隐私要求。在本文中，我们提出了一个对等的无线传感器网络位置隐私协议。实际上，传感器节点需要自主地将它们的感测区域组织成一组不重叠且高度精确的k-匿名化聚集位置。针对REAL中的三个关键挑战，即自组织性、互易性和高准确性，我们分别设计了状态转换过程、锁定机制和延时机制。我们通过模拟实验比较了真实协议和当前协议的性能。结果表明，REAL保护了位置隐私，提供了更准确的查询答案，降低了通信和计算成本。
papers.title_zh: 真实：无线传感器网络中位置隐私的相互协议

papers.title: Vive La Différence: Paxos vs. Viewstamped Replication vs. Zab
papers.authors: Robbert van Renesse, Nicolas Schiper, Fred B. Schneider
papers.abstract: Paxos, Viewstamped Replication, and Zab are replication protocols for high-availability in asynchronous environments with crash failures. Claims have been made about their similarities and differences. But how does one determine whether two protocols are the same, and if not, how significant are the differences? We address these questions using refinement mappings. Protocols are expressed as succinct specifications that are progressively refined to executable implementations. Doing so enables a principled understanding of the correctness of design decisions for implementing the protocols. Additionally, differences that have a significant impact on performance are surfaced by this exercise.
papers.abstract_zh: Paxos、Viewstamped Replication和Zab是在发生崩溃故障的异步环境中实现高可用性的复制协议。已经对它们的相似性和差异提出了主张。但是如何确定两个协议是否相同，如果不相同，差异有多大呢？我们使用精化映射来解决这些问题。协议被表达为简洁的规范，这些规范被逐步细化为可执行的实现。这样做可以从原则上理解实现协议的设计决策的正确性。此外，对性能有重大影响的差异也在此练习中显露出来。
papers.title_zh: 差异：Paxos vs。 ViewStamp的复制VS。 ZAB

papers.title: On the Equivalence of Two Security Notions for Hierarchical Key Assignment Schemes in the Unconditional Setting
papers.authors: Massimo Cafaro, Roberto Civino, Barbara Masucci
papers.abstract: The access control problem in a hierarchy can be solved by using a hierarchical key assignment scheme, where each class is assigned an encryption key and some private information. A formal security analysis for hierarchical key assignment schemes has been traditionally considered in two different settings, i.e., the unconditionally secure and the computationally secure setting, and with respect to two different notions: security against key recovery (KR-security) and security with respect to key indistinguishability (KI-security), with the latter notion being cryptographically stronger. Recently, Freire, Paterson and Poettering proposed strong key indistinguishability (SKI-security) as a new security notion in the computationally secure setting, arguing that SKI-security is strictly stronger than KI-security in such a setting. In this paper we consider tthehe unconditionally secure setting for hierarchical key assignment schemes. In such a setting the security of the schemes is not based on specific unproven computational assumptions, i.e., it relies on the theoretical impossibility of breaking them, despite the computational power of an adversary coalition. We prove that, in this setting, SKI-security is not stronger than KI-security, i.e., the two notions are fully equivalent from an information-theoretic point of view.
papers.abstract_zh: 层次结构中的访问控制问题可以通过使用分层密钥分配方案来解决，其中每个类被分配一个加密密钥和一些私有信息。传统上，在两种不同的设置中，即无条件安全和计算安全设置中，并且相对于两种不同的概念，考虑了针对分层密钥分配方案的形式安全性分析:针对密钥恢复的安全性(KR-security)和针对密钥不可区分性的安全性(KI-security)，后一概念在密码学上更强。最近，Freire、Paterson和Poettering提出了强密钥不可区分性(SKI-security)作为计算安全环境中的一种新的安全概念，认为在这种环境下SKI-security严格强于KI-security。在本文中，我们考虑了分层密钥分配方案的无条件安全设置。在这样的设置中，方案的安全性不是基于特定的未证实的计算假设，即，它依赖于理论上不可能破解它们，尽管对手联盟具有计算能力。我们证明，在这种情况下，SKI-security并不比KI-security强，也就是说，从信息论的观点来看，这两个概念是完全等价的。
papers.title_zh: 关于在无条件设置中的两个安全概念等于两个安全概念

papers.title: A Systematic Assessment of the Security of Full Disk Encryption
papers.authors: Tilo Müller, Felix C. Freiling
papers.abstract: Organizations as well as private users frequently report the loss and theft of mobile devices such as laptops and smartphones. The threat of data exposure in such scenarios can be mitigated by protection mechanisms based on encryption. Full disk encryption (FDE) is an effective method to protect data against unauthorized access. FDE can generally be classified into software- and hardware-based solutions. We assess the practical security that users can expect from these FDE solutions regarding physical access threats. We assume that strong cryptography like AES cannot be broken but focus on vulnerabilities arising from practical FDE implementations. We present the results of a comprehensive and systematic comparison of the security of software- and hardware-based FDE. Thereby, we exhibit attacks on widespread FDE standards in many common scenarios and different system configurations. As a result, we show that neither software- nor hardware-based FDE provides perfect security, nor is one clearly superior to the other.
papers.abstract_zh: 组织和私人用户经常报告笔记本电脑和智能手机等移动设备丢失或被盗。在这种情况下，数据泄露的威胁可以通过基于加密的保护机制来减轻。全磁盘加密(FDE)是保护数据免受未授权访问的有效方法。FDE通常可以分为基于软件和基于硬件的解决方案。我们评估了用户可以从这些FDE解决方案中获得的有关物理访问威胁的实际安全性。我们假设像AES这样的强密码术是无法破解的，但是关注实际FDE实现中出现的漏洞。我们展示了基于软件和基于硬件的FDE的安全性的全面和系统的比较结果。因此，我们展示了在许多常见场景和不同系统配置中对广泛的FDE标准的攻击。因此，我们表明，无论是基于软件还是基于硬件的FDE都不能提供完美的安全性，也没有哪一个明显优于另一个。
papers.title_zh: 对完整磁盘加密安全性的系统评估

papers.title: Collaborative Search Log Sanitization: Toward Differential Privacy and Boosted Utility
papers.authors: Yuan Hong, Jaideep Vaidya, Haibing Lu, Panagiotis Karras, Sanjay Goel
papers.abstract: Severe privacy leakage in the AOL search log incident has attracted considerable worldwide attention. However, all the web users' daily search intents and behavior are collected in such data, which can be invaluable for researchers, data analysts and law enforcement personnel to conduct social behavior study [14], criminal investigation [5] and epidemics detection [10]. Thus, an important and challenging research problem is how to sanitize search logs with strong privacy guarantee and sufficiently retained utility. Existing approaches in search log sanitization are capable of only protecting the privacy under a rigorous standard [24] or maintaining good output utility [25] . To the best of our knowledge, there is little work that has perfectly resolved such tradeoff in the context of search logs, meeting a high standard of both requirements. In this paper, we propose a sanitization framework to tackle the above issue in a distributed manner. More specifically, our framework enables different parties to collaboratively generate search logs with boosted utility while satisfying Differential Privacy. In this scenario, two privacy-preserving objectives arise: first, the collaborative sanitization should satisfy differential privacy; second, the collaborative parties cannot learn any private information from each other. We present an efficient protocol -Collaborative sEarch Log Sanitization (CELS) to meet both privacy requirements. Besides security/privacy and cost analysis, we demonstrate the utility and efficiency of our approach with real data sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 美国在线搜索日志事件中的严重隐私泄露引起了全世界的广泛关注。然而，所有网络用户的日常搜索意图和行为都被收集在这些数据中，这对于研究人员、数据分析人员和执法人员进行社会行为研究[14]、刑事调查[5]和流行病检测[10]来说是非常宝贵的。因此，一个重要的和具有挑战性的研究问题是如何净化搜索日志，具有强隐私保证和足够的保留效用。现有的搜索日志净化方法只能在严格的标准下保护隐私[24]或保持良好的输出效用[25]。据我们所知，在搜索日志的上下文中，很少有工作完美地解决了这种折衷，满足了这两个需求的高标准。在本文中，我们提出了一个净化框架，以分布式方式解决上述问题。更具体地说，我们的框架使不同方能够在满足不同隐私的同时，以增强的效用协作生成搜索日志。在这种情况下，出现了两个隐私保护目标:首先，协作净化应该满足差别隐私；第二，合作各方不能从彼此那里获知任何私人信息。我们提出了一种有效的协议——协同搜索日志净化(CELS)来满足这两种隐私要求。除了安全性/隐私性和成本分析，我们用真实数据集展示了我们方法的效用和效率。
papers.title_zh: 协作搜索日志清理：朝着差异隐私和增强实用程序

papers.title: GTID: A Technique for Physical Device and Device Type Fingerprinting
papers.authors: Sakthi Vignesh Radhakrishnan, A. Selcuk Uluagac, Raheem A. Beyah
papers.abstract: In this paper, we introduce GTID, a technique that can actively and passively fingerprint wireless devices and their types using wire-side observations in a local network. GTID exploits information that is leaked as a result of heterogeneity in devices, which is a function of different device hardware compositions and variations in devices' clock skew. We apply statistical techniques on network traffic to create unique, reproducible device and device type signatures, and use artificial neural networks (ANNs) for classification. We demonstrate the efficacy of our technique on both an isolated testbed and a live campus network (during peak hours) using a corpus of 37 devices representing a wide range of device classes (e.g., iPads, iPhones, Google Phones, etc.) and traffic types (e.g., Skype, SCP, ICMP, etc.). Our experiments provided more than 300 GB of traffic captures which we used for ANN training and performance evaluation. In order for any fingerprinting technique to be practical, it must be able to detect previously unseen devices (i.e., devices for which no stored signature is available) and must be able to withstand various attacks. GTID is a fingerprinting technique to detect previously unseen devices and to illustrate its resilience under various attacker models. We measure the performance of GTID by considering accuracy, recall, and processing time and also illustrate how it can be used to complement existing security mechanisms (e.g., authentication systems) and to detect counterfeit devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们介绍了GTID，这是一种可以在本地网络中使用有线端观察来主动和被动地对无线设备及其类型进行指纹识别的技术。GTID利用由于设备的异构性而泄露的信息，这是不同设备硬件组成和设备时钟偏差变化的函数。我们对网络流量应用统计技术来创建独特的、可重复的设备和设备类型签名，并使用人工神经网络(ann)进行分类。我们使用代表各种设备类别(例如，iPads、iPhones、Google Phones等)的37个设备的语料库，在隔离测试床和实时校园网络(高峰时段)上展示了我们的技术的有效性。)和流量类型(例如Skype、SCP、ICMP等)。).我们的实验提供了超过300 GB的流量捕获，用于ANN训练和性能评估。为了使任何指纹识别技术实用，它必须能够检测以前未见过的设备(即，没有存储的签名可用的设备)，并且必须能够抵抗各种攻击。GTID是一种指纹识别技术，用于检测以前未见过的设备，并展示其在各种攻击者模型下的弹性。我们通过考虑准确性、召回率和处理时间来衡量GTID的性能，并说明了它如何用于补充现有的安全机制(如认证系统)和检测假冒设备。
papers.title_zh: GTID：物理设备和设备类型指纹的技术

papers.title: Mining Attribute-Based Access Control Policies
papers.authors: Zhongyuan Xu, Scott D. Stoller
