Hence, an adversary could thwart a victim node’s communication by simply jamming its slot(s). Such attack turns out to be effective, energy efficient, and extremely difficult to detect. In this paper, we present JAMMY, a distributed and dynamic solution to selective jamming in TDMA-based WSNs. Unlike traditional approaches, JAMMY changes the slot utilization pattern at every superframe, thus making it unpredictable to the adversary. JAMMY is decentralized, as sensor nodes determine the next slot utilization pattern in a distributed and autonomous way. Results from performance analysis of the proposed solution show that JAMMY introduces negligible overhead yet allows multiple nodes to join the network, in a limited number of superframes.
papers.abstract_zh: 时分多址(TDMA)通常用于无线传感器网络(WSNs ),尤其是在关键应用中，因为它提供了高能效、有保证的带宽、有限且可预测的延迟以及无冲突。然而，TDMA容易受到选择性干扰攻击。在TDMA传输中，时隙通常被预先分配给传感器节点，并且每个时隙被相同的节点用于多个连续的超帧。因此，对手可以通过简单地干扰其时隙来阻挠受害者节点的通信。这种攻击证明是有效的、节能的，并且极难检测。在本文中，我们提出了JAMMY，一种分布式的动态解决方案，以选择性干扰TDMA为基础的无线传感器网络。与传统方法不同，JAMMY在每个超帧改变时隙利用模式，从而使对手无法预测。JAMMY是分散的，因为传感器节点以分布式和自治的方式确定下一个时隙利用模式。对所提出的解决方案的性能分析的结果表明，JAMMY引入的开销可以忽略，但允许多个节点在有限数量的超帧中加入网络。
papers.title_zh: Jammy：一种分布式和动态的解决方案，用于TDMA WSN中选择性干扰攻击

papers.title: Location Based Handshake and Private Proximity Test with Location Tags
papers.authors: Yao Zheng, Ming Li, Wenjing Lou, Y. Thomas Hou
papers.abstract: A location proximity test service allows mobile users to determine whether they are in close proximity to each other, and has found numerous applications in mobile social networks. Unfortunately, existing solutions usually reveal much of users’ private location information during a proximity test. They are also vulnerable to location cheating where an attacker reports false locations to gain an advantage. Moreover, the initial trust establishment among unfamiliar users in large scale mobile social networks has been a challenging task. In this paper, we propose a novel scheme that enables a user to perform (1) a location based handshake that establishes secure communications among strangers, who do not have a pre-shared secret, and (2) a privacy-preserving proximity test without revealing the user’s actual location to the server or other users not within the proximity. The proposed scheme is based on a novel concept, i.e., spatial-temporal location tags, and we put forward a location tag construction method using environmental signals that provides an unforgeable location proof. We use Bloom filters to efficiently represent users’ location tags and vicinity regions. We exploit fuzzy extractor, a lightweight cryptographic primitive, to extract shared secrets between matching location tags. We conduct extensive analysis, simulation, and real experiments to demonstrate the feasibility, security, and efficiency of our scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 位置接近度测试服务允许移动用户确定他们是否彼此非常接近，并且已经在移动社交网络中找到了许多应用。不幸的是，现有的解决方案通常会在接近度测试期间泄露用户的许多私人位置信息。它们也容易受到位置欺骗，攻击者报告虚假位置以获得优势。此外，在大规模移动社交网络中，陌生用户之间的初始信任建立一直是一项具有挑战性的任务。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的方案，使用户能够执行(1)基于位置的握手，在没有预共享秘密的陌生人之间建立安全通信，以及(2)隐私保护邻近测试，而不会向服务器或不在邻近范围内的其他用户暴露用户的实际位置。该方案基于一个新的概念，即时空位置标签，我们提出了一种使用环境信号的位置标签构造方法，提供了一个不可伪造的位置证明。我们使用布隆过滤器来有效地表示用户的位置标签和邻近区域。我们利用模糊提取器，一种轻量级的密码原语，来提取匹配位置标签之间的共享秘密。我们进行了大量的分析、模拟和真实实验来证明我们的方案的可行性、安全性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于位置的握手和带有位置标签的私人接近测试

papers.title: Scalable Certificate Revocation Schemes for Smart Grid AMI Networks Using Bloom Filters
papers.authors: Khaled Rabieh, Mohamed M. E. A. Mahmoud, Kemal Akkaya, Samet Tonyali
papers.abstract: Given the scalability of the advanced metering infrastructure (AMI) networks, maintenance and access of certificate revocation lists (CRLs) pose new challenges. It is inefficient to create one large CRL for all the smart meters (SMs) or create a customized CRL for each SM since too many CRLs will be required. In order to tackle the scalability of the AMI network, we divide the network into clusters of SMs, but there is a tradeoff between the overhead at the certificate authority (CA) and the overhead at the clusters. We use Bloom filters to reduce the size of the CRLs in order to alleviate this tradeoff by increasing the clusters’ size with acceptable overhead. However, since Bloom filters suffer from false positives, there is a need to handle this problem so that SMs will not discard important messages due to falsely identifying the certificate of a sender as invalid. To this end, we propose two certificate revocation schemes that can identify and nullify the false positives. While the first scheme requires contacting the gateway to resolve them, the second scheme requires the CA additionally distribute the list of certificates that trigger false positives. Using mathematical models, we have demonstrated that the probability of contacting the gateway in the first scheme and the overhead of the second scheme can be very low by properly designing the Bloom filters. In order to assess the scalability and validate the mathematical formulas, we have implemented the proposed schemes using Visual C. The results indicate that our schemes are much more scalable than the conventional CRL and the mathematical and simulation results are almost identical. Moreover, we simulated the distribution of the CRLs in a wireless mesh-based AMI network using ns-3 network simulator and assessed its distribution overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 鉴于高级计量基础设施(AMI)网络的可扩展性，证书撤销列表(CRL)的维护和访问提出了新的挑战。为所有智能电表(SM)创建一个大的CRL或为每个SM创建一个定制的CRL是低效的，因为需要太多的CRL。为了解决AMI网络的可扩展性问题，我们将网络划分为SMs集群，但是在认证机构(CA)的开销和集群的开销之间存在权衡。我们使用布隆过滤器来减少CRL的大小，以便通过在可接受的开销下增加簇的大小来缓解这种折衷。然而，由于布隆过滤器遭受假阳性，所以需要处理这个问题，使得SMs不会由于错误地将发送者的证书识别为无效而丢弃重要的消息。为此，我们提出了两个证书撤销方案，可以识别和消除误报。第一种方案要求联系网关来解决它们，而第二种方案要求CA另外分发触发误报的证书列表。使用数学模型，我们已经证明，通过适当地设计布隆过滤器，第一方案中联系网关的概率和第二方案的开销可以非常低。为了评估可扩展性和验证数学公式，我们使用Visual C实现了所提出的方案。结果表明，我们的方案比传统的CRL具有更好的可扩展性，并且数学和模拟结果几乎相同。此外，我们使用ns-3网络模拟器模拟了CRL在无线网状AMI网络中的分布，并评估了其分布开销。
papers.title_zh: 使用Bloom过滤器的智能网格AMI网络的可扩展证书吊销方案

papers.title: SPE: Security and Privacy Enhancement Framework for Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Brian Krupp, Nigamanth Sridhar, Wenbing Zhao
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present a security and privacy enhancement (SPE) framework for unmodified mobile operating systems. SPE introduces a new layer between the application and the operating system and does not require a device be jailbroken or utilize a custom operating system. We utilize an existing ontology designed for enforcing security and privacy policies on mobile devices to build a policy that is customizable. Based on this policy, SPE provides enhancements to native controls that currently exist on the platform for privacy and security sensitive components. SPE allows access to these components in a way that allows the framework to ensure the application is truthful in its declared intent and ensure that the user’s policy is enforced. In our evaluation we verify the correctness of the framework and the computing impact on the device. Additionally, we discovered security and privacy issues in several open source applications by utilizing the SPE Framework. From our findings, if SPE is adopted by mobile operating systems producers, it would provide consumers and businesses the additional privacy and security controls they demand and allow users to be more aware of security and privacy issues with applications on their devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一个针对未修改的移动操作系统的安全和隐私增强(SPE)框架。SPE在应用程序和操作系统之间引入了一个新的层，并且不需要设备越狱或者使用定制的操作系统。我们利用为在移动设备上实施安全和隐私策略而设计的现有本体来构建可定制的策略。基于这一政策，SPE针对隐私和安全敏感组件对平台上现有的本机控制进行了增强。SPE允许以某种方式访问这些组件，这种方式允许框架确保应用程序在其声明的意图中是真实的，并确保用户的策略得到执行。在我们的评估中，我们验证了框架的正确性以及对设备的计算影响。此外，通过利用SPE框架，我们在几个开源应用程序中发现了安全和隐私问题。根据我们的发现，如果移动操作系统生产商采用SPE，它将为消费者和企业提供他们需要的额外的隐私和安全控制，并允许用户更多地意识到他们设备上的应用程序的安全和隐私问题。
papers.title_zh: SPE：移动设备的安全性和隐私增强框架

papers.title: Towards Detecting Compromised Accounts on Social Networks
papers.authors: Manuel Egele, Gianluca Stringhini, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Compromising social network accounts has become a profitable course of action for cybercriminals. By hijacking control of a popular media or business account, attackers can distribute their malicious messages or disseminate fake information to a large user base. The impacts of these incidents range from a tarnished reputation to multi-billion dollar monetary losses on financial markets. In our previous work, we demonstrated how we can detect large-scale compromises (i.e., so-called campaigns) of regular online social network users. In this work, we show how we can use similar techniques to identify compromises of individual high-profile accounts. High-profile accounts frequently have one characteristic that makes this detection reliable—they show consistent behavior over time. We show that our system, were it deployed, would have been able to detect and prevent three real-world attacks against popular companies and news agencies. Furthermore, our system, in contrast to popular media, would not have fallen for a staged compromise instigated by a US restaurant chain for publicity reasons.
papers.abstract_zh: 泄露社交网络帐户已成为网络罪犯有利可图的行动路线。通过劫持对流行媒体或商业帐户的控制，攻击者可以向大量用户分发他们的恶意消息或散布虚假信息。这些事件的影响从名誉受损到金融市场上数十亿美元的金钱损失不等。在我们之前的工作中，我们展示了如何检测常规在线社交网络用户的大规模妥协(即所谓的活动)。在这项工作中，我们展示了如何使用类似的技术来识别个人高知名度帐户的妥协。高知名度的客户通常有一个使这种检测可靠的特征——他们随着时间的推移表现出一致的行为。我们证明，如果我们的系统得到部署，它将能够检测并阻止三起针对知名公司和新闻机构的真实攻击。此外，与大众媒体相比，我们的系统不会因为一家美国连锁餐厅出于宣传原因而煽动的阶段性妥协而倒下。
papers.title_zh: 要检测社交网络上的折衷帐户

papers.title: Comments on "Verifiable and Exculpable Outsourced Attribute-Based Encryption for Access Control in Cloud Computing"
papers.authors: Hu Xiong, Jianfei Sun
papers.abstract: Recently in IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing (TDSC) (doi: 10.1109/TDSC.2015.2499755), Ma et al. proposed a new construction of attribute-based encryption (ABE) which can outsource the complicated encryption task to Encryption Service Provider (ESP) in a verifiable manner. Despite the authors claimed that the results of the outsourced encryption can be checked by the user, we show that Ma et al.’s proposal fails to provide the verifiability property for outsourced encryption, the most essential security goal that a verifiable computation scheme should achieve. Specifically, by giving concrete attacks, we demonstrate that the ESP can return forged intermediate ciphertext to the user without being detected.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近在IEEE可信与安全计算汇刊(doi: 10.1109/TDSC.2015.2499755)上，马等人提出了一种新的基于属性的加密(ABE)结构，该结构可以将复杂的加密任务以可验证的方式外包给加密服务提供商(ESP)。尽管作者声称外包加密的结果可以被用户检查，但我们表明，马等人的方案未能提供外包加密的可验证性，这是可验证计算方案应达到的最基本的安全目标。具体地说，通过给出具体的攻击，我们证明了ESP可以在不被检测到的情况下向用户返回伪造的中间密文。
papers.title_zh: 评论“基于云计算中访问控制的基于可验证和剥离的外包属性加密”的评论

papers.title: A Comprehensive Comparison of Multiparty Secure Additions with Differential Privacy
papers.authors: Slawomir Goryczka, Li Xiong
papers.abstract: This paper considers the problem of secure data aggregation (mainly summation) in a distributed setting, while ensuring differential privacy of the result. We study secure multiparty addition protocols using well known security schemes: Shamir’s secret sharing, perturbation-based, and various encryptions. We supplement our study with our new enhanced encryption scheme EFT, which is efficient and fault tolerant.Differential privacy of  the final result is achieved by either distributed Laplace or Geometric mechanism (respectively DLPA or DGPA), while approximated differential privacy is achieved by diluted mechanisms.  Distributed random noise is generated collectively by all participants, which draw random variables from one of several distributions: Gamma, Gauss, Geometric, or their diluted versions.  We introduce a new distributed privacy mechanism with noise drawn from the Laplace distribution, which achieves smaller redundant noise with efficiency.  We compare complexity and security characteristics of the protocols with different differential privacy mechanisms and security schemes.  More importantly, we implemented all protocols and present an experimental comparison on their performance and scalability in a real distributed environment.  Based on the evaluations, we identify our security scheme and Laplace DLPA as the most efficient for secure distributed data aggregation with differential privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文考虑了分布式环境下的安全数据聚合(主要是求和)问题，同时确保结果的差分隐私。我们研究了使用众所周知的安全方案的安全多方添加协议:Shamir的秘密共享，基于扰动，和各种加密。我们补充了我们的研究与我们的新的增强加密方案EFT，这是有效的和容错的。最终结果的差分隐私是通过分布式拉普拉斯或几何机制(分别是DLPA或DGPA)实现的，而近似差分隐私是通过稀释机制实现的。分布式随机噪声由所有参与者集体产生，这些参与者从几种分布中抽取随机变量:伽马分布、高斯分布、几何分布或它们的稀释版本。我们引入了一种新的分布式隐私机制，该机制利用拉普拉斯分布中的噪声，有效地减少了冗余噪声。我们比较了不同的差分隐私机制和安全方案的协议的复杂性和安全特性。更重要的是，我们实现了所有的协议，并在真实的分布式环境中对它们的性能和可扩展性进行了实验比较。基于评估，我们确定我们的安全方案和拉普拉斯DLPA对于具有不同隐私的安全分布式数据聚集是最有效的。
papers.title_zh: 与差异隐私的多方安全添加的全面比较

papers.title: Composability Verification of Multi-Service Workflows in a Policy-Driven Cloud Computing Environment
papers.authors: Basit Shafiq, Sameera Ghayyur, Ammar Masood, Zahid Pervaiz, Abdulrahman Almutairi, M. Farrukh Khan, Arif Ghafoor
papers.abstract: The emergence of cloud computing infrastructure and Semantic Web technologies has created unprecedented opportunities for composing large-scale business processes and workflow-based applications that span multiple organizational domains. A key challenge related to composition of such multi-organizational business processes and workflows is posed by the security and access control policies of the underlying organizational domains. In this paper, we propose a framework for verifying secure composability of distributed workflows in an autonomous multi-domain environment. The objective of workflow composability verification is to ensure that all the users or processes executing the designated workflow tasks conform to the time-dependent security policy specifications of all collaborating domains. A key aspect of such verification is to determine the time-dependent schedulability of distributed workflows, assumed to be invoked on a recurrent basis. We use a two-step approach for verifying secure workflow composability. In the first step, a distributed workflow is decomposed into domain-specific projected workflows and is verified for conformance with the respective domain's security and access control policy. In the second step, the cross-domain dependencies amongst the workflow tasks performed by different collaborating domains are verified.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算基础设施和语义Web技术的出现，为组合跨越多个组织领域的大规模业务流程和基于工作流的应用程序创造了前所未有的机会。与这种多组织业务流程和工作流的组合相关的一个关键挑战是由基础组织域的安全和访问控制策略提出的。在本文中，我们提出了一个在自治多域环境中验证分布式工作流安全可组合性的框架。工作流可组合性验证的目标是确保执行指定工作流任务的所有用户或进程符合所有协作域的时间相关安全策略规范。这种验证的一个关键方面是确定分布式工作流的依赖于时间的可调度性，假设在循环的基础上被调用。我们使用两步方法来验证安全工作流的可组合性。在第一步中，将分布式工作流分解为特定于域的计划工作流，并验证其是否符合相应域的安全和访问控制策略。在第二步中，验证由不同协作域执行的工作流任务之间的跨域依赖性。
papers.title_zh: 在政策驱动的云计算环境中多服务工作流的合成性验证

papers.title: Mandatory Content Access Control for Privacy Protection in Information Centric Networks
papers.authors: Qi Li, Ravi S. Sandhu, Xinwen Zhang, Mingwei Xu
papers.abstract: Several Information Centric Network (ICN) architectures have been proposed as candidates for the future Internet, aiming to solve several salient problems in the current IP-based Internet architecture such as mobility, content dissemination and multi-path forwarding. In general, security and privacy are considered as essential requirements in ICN. However, existing ICN designs lack built-in privacy protection for content providers (CPs), e.g., any router in an Internet Service Provider in ICN can cache any content, which may result in information leakage. In this paper, we propose Mandatory Content Access Control (MCAC), a distributed information flow control mechanism to enable a content provider to control which network nodes can cache its contents. In MCAC, a CP defines different security labels for different contents, and content routers check these labels to decide if a content object should be cached. To ensure correct enforcement of MCAC, we also propose a design of a trusted architecture by extending existing mainstream router architectures. We evaluate the performance of MCAC in the NS-3 simulator. The simulation results show that enforcing MCAC in routers does not introduce significant overhead in content forwarding.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经提出了若干信息中心网络(ICN)架构作为未来互联网的候选，旨在解决当前基于IP的互联网架构中的若干突出问题，例如移动性、内容分发和多路径转发。一般来说，安全和隐私在ICN被认为是基本要求。然而，现有的ICN设计缺乏对内容提供商(CP)的内置隐私保护，例如，ICN的互联网服务提供商的任何路由器都可以缓存任何内容，这可能导致信息泄漏。在本文中，我们提出了强制内容访问控制(MCAC)，一种分布式信息流控制机制，使内容提供商能够控制哪些网络节点可以缓存其内容。在MCAC，CP为不同的内容定义不同的安全标签，内容路由器检查这些标签以决定是否应该缓存内容对象。为了确保MCAC的正确实施，我们还通过扩展现有的主流路由器架构，提出了一种可信架构的设计。我们在NS-3模拟器上评估了MCAC的性能。仿真结果表明，在路由器中实施MCAC并没有在内容转发中引入显著的开销。
papers.title_zh: 以信息为中心网络中的强制性内容访问控制以保护隐私保护

papers.title: On Efficient and Robust Anonymization for Privacy Protection on Massive Streaming Categorical Information
papers.authors: Ji Zhang, Hongzhou Li, Xuemei Liu, Yonglong Luo, Fulong Chen, Hua Wang, Liang Chang
papers.abstract: Protecting users’ privacy when transmitting a large amount of data over the Internet is becoming increasingly important nowadays. In this paper, we focus on the streaming categorical information and propose a novel anonymization technique for providing a strong privacy protection to safeguard against privacy disclosure and information tampering. Our technique utilizes an innovative two-phase anonymization approach which is very easy to implement, highly efficient in terms of speed and communication and is robust against possible tampering from adversaries. Extensive experimental evaluation that is conducted demonstrates that our technique is very efficient and more robust than the existing method.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，在互联网上传输大量数据时保护用户隐私变得越来越重要。在本文中，我们关注于流式分类信息，并提出了一种新的匿名化技术来提供强大的隐私保护，以防止隐私泄露和信息篡改。我们的技术利用了一种创新的两阶段匿名化方法，这种方法非常容易实现，在速度和通信方面非常高效，并且对来自对手的可能篡改具有鲁棒性。进行的大量实验评估表明，我们的技术是非常有效的，并且比现有方法更健壮。
papers.title_zh: 关于在大规模流媒体上保护隐私保护的高效且可靠的匿名化

papers.title: On Network Footprint of Traffic Inspection and Filtering at Global Scrubbing Centers
papers.authors: Polina Zilberman, Rami Puzis, Yuval Elovici
papers.abstract: Traffic diversion through powerful cloud-based scrubbing centers provides a solution for protecting against various DDoS attacks. In one respect, such a solution enables sanitizing attack traffic close to its source and saves precious resources for the network service provider. Contrarily, the diversion of the inspected traffic toward the scrubbing centers may increase its footprint in the network. The location of the scrubbing centers greatly affects the network resource utilization and, therefore, should be carefully considered in the design of the security service. In this paper, we investigate four deployment strategies and compare their performance on a network of Points-of-Presence and on several router level topologies obtained from the RocketFuel project. The deployment quality was measured using the following criteria: the footprint of the inspected traffic, the redistribution of load on the links, and the increase in communication latency. Our results show that the deployment strategy that is considered to perform well for locating network monitors by maximizing flow coverage results in the worst footprint when traffic diversion is employed. Overall, we show that the deployment strategy that is tailored for traffic filtering is also suitable for traffic monitoring, but not the other way around.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过强大的基于云的清理中心进行流量分流，为防范各种DDoS攻击提供了解决方案。在一个方面，这种解决方案能够在攻击流量的源头附近对其进行净化，并为网络服务提供商节省了宝贵的资源。相反，将被检查的流量转移到清理中心可能会增加其在网络中的足迹。清理中心的位置会极大地影响网络资源的利用率，因此在设计安全服务时应该仔细考虑。在本文中，我们研究了四种部署策略，并比较了它们在一个接入点网络和从RocketFuel项目获得的几个路由器级拓扑上的性能。使用以下标准来衡量部署质量:被检查流量的足迹、链路上负载的重新分布以及通信延迟的增加。我们的结果表明，被认为通过最大化流覆盖来定位网络监视器表现良好的部署策略在采用流量分流时会导致最差的足迹。总的来说，我们展示了为流量过滤定制的部署策略也适用于流量监控，而不是相反。
papers.title_zh: 全球擦洗中心的交通检查和过滤网络足迹

papers.title: Still Beheading Hydras: Botnet Takedowns Then and Now
papers.authors: Yacin Nadji, Roberto Perdisci, Manos Antonakakis
papers.abstract: Devices infected with malicious software typically form botnet armies under the influence of one or more command and control (C&C) servers. The botnet problem reached such levels where federal law enforcement agencies have to step in and take actions against botnets by disrupting (or “taking down”) their C&Cs, and thus their illicit operations. Lately, more and more private companies have started to independently take action against botnet armies, primarily focusing on their DNS-based C&Cs. While well-intentioned, their C&C takedown methodology is in most cases ad-hoc, and limited by the breadth of knowledge available around the malware that facilitates the botnet. With this paper, we aim to bring order, measure, and reason to the botnet takedown problem. We improve an existing takedown analysis system called rza. Specifically, we examine additional botnet takedowns, enhance the risk calculation to use botnet population counts, and include a detailed discussion of policy improvements that can be made to improve takedowns. As part of our system evaluation, we perform a postmortem analysis of the recent 3322.org, Citadel, and No-IP takedowns.
papers.abstract_zh: 受恶意软件感染的设备通常会在一个或多个命令和控制(C&C)服务器的影响下形成僵尸网络大军。僵尸网络问题达到了这样的程度，联邦执法机构不得不介入并采取行动，通过破坏(或“拿下”)它们的C & Cs，从而破坏它们的非法操作来对付僵尸网络。最近，越来越多的私人公司开始独立采取行动对抗僵尸网络军队，主要集中在他们基于DNS的C & Cs。虽然他们的初衷是好的，但他们的C&C攻击方法在大多数情况下都是临时的，并且受到促进僵尸网络的恶意软件知识广度的限制。通过这篇文章，我们旨在为僵尸网络的关闭问题带来秩序、措施和理由。我们改进了一个名为rza的现有拆卸分析系统。具体来说，我们检查了其他僵尸网络攻击，增强了使用僵尸网络数量的风险计算，并详细讨论了可用于改进攻击的政策改进。作为系统评估的一部分，我们对最近的3322.org、城堡和无IP攻击进行了事后分析。
papers.title_zh: 仍在斩首hydras：那时僵尸网络撤下

papers.title: Zero-Sum Password Cracking Game: A Large-Scale Empirical Study on the Crackability, Correlation, and Security of Passwords
papers.authors: Shouling Ji, Shukun Yang, Xin Hu, Weili Han, Zhigong Li, Raheem A. Beyah
papers.abstract: In this paper, we conduct a large-scale study on the crackability, correlation, and security of <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sim}145$</tex-math><alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="ji-ieq1-2481884.gif"/> </alternatives></inline-formula> million real world passwords, which were leaked from several popular Internet services and applications. To the best of our knowledge, this is the largest empirical study that has been conducted. Specifically, we first evaluate the crackability of <inline-formula><tex-math notation="LaTeX">${\sim}145$</tex-math> <alternatives><inline-graphic xlink:href="ji-ieq2-2481884.gif"/></alternatives></inline-formula> million real world passwords against 6+ state-of-the-art password cracking algorithms in multiple scenarios. Second, we examine the effectiveness and soundness of popular commercial password strength meters (e.g., Google, QQ) and the security impacts of username/email leakage on passwords. Finally, we discuss the implications of our results, analysis, and findings, which are expected to help both password users and system administrators to gain a deeper understanding of the vulnerability of real passwords against state-of-the-art password cracking algorithms, as well as to shed light on future password security research topics.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们对< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ sim } 145 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Ji-ie Q1-2481884 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >百万个真实世界密码的可破解性、相关性和安全性进行了大规模研究，这些密码是从一些流行的互联网服务和应用程序中泄露的。据我们所知，这是迄今为止规模最大的实证研究。具体来说，我们首先评估了< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ { \ sim } 145 $ </tex-math > < alternatives > < inline-graphic xlink:href = " Ji-ieq 2-2481884 . gif "/> </alternatives > </inline-formula >百万真实世界密码在多种情况下对6+最先进密码破解算法的破解能力。其次，我们研究了流行的商业密码强度计(如Google、QQ)的有效性和可靠性，以及用户名/电子邮件泄露对密码的安全影响。最后，我们讨论了我们的结果、分析和发现的含义，这些结果有望帮助密码用户和系统管理员更深入地了解真实密码对最先进的密码破解算法的脆弱性，并为未来的密码安全研究课题提供启示。
papers.title_zh: 零和密码破解游戏：一项关于密码的破解性，相关性和安全性的大规模实证研究

papers.title: Enabling Anonymous Authorization and Rewarding in the Smart Grid
papers.authors: Tassos Dimitriou, Ghassan O. Karame
papers.abstract: The smart grid leverages infrastructural support to achieve fine-grained power consumption monitoring in an attempt to offer higher efficiency, reliability, and security. Such functionality, however, requires the collection of fine-grained usage data which may raise serious concerns with respect to consumer privacy. Thus far, existing work has solely focused on the problem of privately aggregating energy measurements. However, these solutions do not allow the provider to acquire detailed energy measurements which are essential for maintaining the network, debugging configuration problems, etc. In this work, we address this problem and we propose an authentication scheme that allows a smart meter to anonymously interact with the utility provider when submitting detailed consumption data. We then move one step further, enabling the incorporation of anonymous rewarding mechanisms in the smart grid in exchange for detailed measurements that users report. We argue that such rewarding mechanisms provide solid incentives for users to accept the release of their detailed energy consumption; we show that our proposal does notleak any information about the identity of users—even when redeeming the rewards. Finally, we implement a prototype based on our proposal and we evaluate its performance in realistic deployment settings.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能电网利用基础设施支持来实现细粒度的功耗监控，以提供更高的效率、可靠性和安全性。然而，这种功能需要收集细粒度的使用数据，这可能会引起对消费者隐私的严重关注。到目前为止，现有的工作只是集中在私人聚集能源测量的问题。然而，这些解决方案不允许提供商获取对维护网络、调试配置问题等至关重要的详细能量测量。在这项工作中，我们解决了这个问题，并提出了一个认证方案，允许智能电表在提交详细的消费数据时匿名与公用事业提供商进行交互。然后，我们更进一步，在智能电网中加入匿名奖励机制，以换取用户报告的详细测量结果。我们认为，这种奖励机制为用户提供了坚实的激励，以接受他们的详细能源消耗的发布；我们证明了我们的提议不会泄露任何关于用户身份的信息——即使是在兑换奖励的时候。最后，我们基于我们的建议实现了一个原型，并评估了它在实际部署环境中的性能。
papers.title_zh: 在智能网格中实现匿名授权和奖励

papers.title: Security Analysis of Password-Authenticated Key Retrieval
papers.authors: SeongHan Shin, Kazukuni Kobara
papers.abstract: A PAKR (Password-Authenticated Key Retrieval) protocol and its multi-server system allow one party (say, client), who has a memorable password, to retrieve a long-term static key in an exchange of messages with at least one other party (say, server) that has a private key associated with the password. In this paper, we analyze the only PAKR (named as PKRS-1) standardized in IEEE 1363.2 <xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref9">[9]</xref> and its multi-server system (also, <xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref12">[12]</xref> ) by showing that any passive/active attacker can find out the client’s password and the static key with off-line dictionary attacks. This result contradicts the security claims made for PKRS-1 (see Clause 10.2 of IEEE 1363.2 <xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref9">[9]</xref> ).
papers.abstract_zh: PAKR(口令认证的密钥检索)协议及其多服务器系统允许具有可记忆口令的一方(例如，客户机)在与至少另一方(例如，服务器)的消息交换中检索长期静态密钥，该另一方具有与该口令相关联的私钥。在本文中，我们分析了IEEE 1363.2中唯一标准化的PAKR(命名为PKRS-1)及其多服务器系统(也是,< xref ref ref-type = " bibr " rid = " re F12 " >[12]</xref > ),表明任何被动/主动攻击者都可以通过离线字典攻击找到客户端的密码和静态密钥。这一结果与PKRS-1的安全声明相矛盾(参见IEEE 1363.2第10.2条< xref ref ref-type = " bibr " rid = " re F9 " >[9]</xref >)。
papers.title_zh: 密码认可的密钥检索的安全分析

papers.title: Editor's Note
papers.authors: Elisa Bertino
papers.title_zh: 编者注

papers.title: Achieving Content-Oriented Anonymity with CRISP
papers.authors: Peng Zhang, Qi Li, Patrick P. C. Lee
papers.abstract: As a popular realization of Information-Centric Network (ICN), Named Data Networking (NDN) greatly improves the efficiency of Internet content-distribution. A feature of NDN is that it improves privacy, as no addresses are needed for either the content consumer or publisher. However, NDN packets contain content names, and hence a well-motivated adversary can still deduce what content the user is requesting once it can link the packets and users. How to provide privacy in NDN, given its unique data retrieval mode, is an open problem. In this paper, we explore a specific content-oriented anonymity model called content-user unlinkability, which breaks the relationship between the content and the requesting user. We argue that achieving content-user unlinkability efficiently is a non-trivial task, since existing tunnel-based approaches will largely dismiss content caching of NDN, resulting in large content retrieval delay. To this end, we propose CRISP, namely Cooperative Random IntereSt P ropagation. In CRISP, routers cooperate to form full-meshed groups, within which content requests are randomly propagated before they are forwarded to content producers. We show CRISP can achieve probable content-user unlinkability with probabilistic models. Extensive simulations demonstrate that CRISP outperforms existing solutions including ANDANA and Crowds, in terms of both content retrieval latency and data throughput.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为以信息为中心的网络(ICN)的一种流行实现，命名数据网络(NDN)极大地提高了互联网内容分发的效率。NDN的一个特点是它提高了保密性，因为内容消费者和发布者都不需要地址。然而，NDN数据包包含内容名称，因此，一旦能够将数据包和用户联系起来，动机良好的对手仍然可以推断出用户正在请求什么内容。鉴于其独特的数据检索模式，如何在NDN提供隐私是一个公开的问题。在本文中，我们探索了一种特定的面向内容的匿名模型，称为内容-用户不可链接性，它打破了内容和请求用户之间的关系。我们认为，有效地实现内容-用户不可链接性是一项重要的任务，因为现有的基于隧道的方法将在很大程度上消除NDN的内容缓存，从而导致大的内容检索延迟。为此，我们提出了CRISP，即合作随机兴趣传播。在CRISP中，路由器合作形成全网状组，内容请求在转发给内容制作者之前在组内随机传播。我们证明CRISP可以通过概率模型实现可能的内容-用户不可链接性。大量模拟表明，在内容检索延迟和数据吞吐量方面，CRISP优于现有的解决方案，包括ANDANA和Crowds。
papers.title_zh: 实现面向内容的匿名

papers.title: Enhancing MongoDB with Purpose-Based Access Control
papers.authors: Pietro Colombo, Elena Ferrari
papers.abstract: Privacy has become a key requirement for data management systems. Nevertheless, NoSQL datastores, namely highly scalable non relational database management systems, which often support data management of Internet scale applications,still do not provide support for privacy policies enforcement. With this work, we begin to address this issue, by proposing an approach for the integration of purpose based policy enforcement capabilities into MongoDB, a popular NoSQL datastore. Our contribution consists of the enhancement of the MongoDB role based access control model with privacy concepts and related enforcement monitor. The proposed monitor is easily integrable into any MongoDB deployment through simple configurations. Experimental results show that our monitor enforces purpose-based access control with low overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私已经成为数据管理系统的一个关键要求。然而，NoSQL数据存储，即通常支持互联网规模应用的数据管理的高度可扩展的非关系数据库管理系统，仍然不提供对隐私策略实施的支持。通过这项工作，我们开始解决这个问题，提出了一种将基于目的的策略执行功能集成到MongoDB(一个流行的NoSQL数据库)中的方法。我们的贡献包括MongoDB基于角色的访问控制模型的增强，带有隐私概念和相关的执行监视器。通过简单的配置，提议的监视器可以很容易地集成到任何MongoDB部署中。实验结果表明，该监控器以较低的开销实现了基于目的的访问控制。
papers.title_zh: 通过基于目的的访问控制增强MongoDB

papers.title: Fast Software Implementations of Bilinear Pairings
papers.authors: Reza Azarderakhsh, Dieter Fishbein, Gurleen Grewal, Shi Hu, David Jao, Patrick Longa, Rajeev Verma
papers.abstract: Advancement in pairing-based protocols has had a major impact on the applicability of cryptography to the solution of more complex real-world problems. However, the computation of pairings in software still needs to be optimized for different platforms including emerging embedded systems and high-performance PCs. Few works in the literature have considered implementations of pairings on the former applications despite their growing importance in a post-PC world. In this paper, we investigate the efficient computation of the Optimal-Ate pairing over special class of pairing friendly Barreto-Naehrig curves in software at different security levels. We target both applications and perform our implementations on ARM-powered processors (with and without NEON instructions) and PC processors. We exploit state-of-the-art techniques and propose new optimizations to speed up the computation in the different levels including tower field and curve arithmetic. In particular, we extend the concept of lazy reduction to inversion in extension fields, analyze an efficient alternative for the sparse multiplication used inside the Miller’s algorithm and reduce further the cost of point/line evaluation formulas in affine and projective homogeneous coordinates. In addition, we study the efficiency of using M-type and D-type sextic twists in the pairing computation and carry out a detailed comparison between affine, Jacobian, and homogeneous coordinate systems. Our implementations on various mass-market emerging embedded devices significantly improve the state-of-the-art of pairing computation on ARM-powered devices and x86-64 PC platforms. For ARM implementations we achieved considerably faster computations in comparison to the counterparts.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于配对的协议的进步对密码学应用于解决更复杂的现实世界问题产生了重大影响。然而，软件中的配对计算仍然需要针对不同的平台进行优化，包括新兴的嵌入式系统和高性能PC。尽管配对在后PC时代变得越来越重要，但文献中很少有作品考虑到配对在前一种应用程序上的实现。本文研究了在不同安全级别的软件中，对一类特殊的配对友好Barreto-Naehrig曲线进行最优ate配对的有效计算。我们针对这两种应用，在ARM处理器(有和没有NEON指令)和PC处理器上执行我们的实现。我们采用了最先进的技术，并提出了新的优化方法来加速不同层次的计算，包括塔场和曲线运算。特别地，我们将懒惰归约的概念扩展到扩展域中的求逆，分析了米勒算法中使用的稀疏乘法的有效替代方案，并且进一步降低了仿射和投影齐次坐标中点/线评估公式的成本。此外，我们研究了在配对计算中使用M型和D型六次扭转的效率，并在仿射、雅可比和齐次坐标系之间进行了详细的比较。我们在各种大众市场新兴嵌入式设备上的实现显著提高了ARM驱动设备和x86-64 PC平台上的配对计算的最新水平。对于ARM实施，我们实现了比同类产品更快的计算速度。
papers.title_zh: 双线性配对的快速软件实现

papers.title: Forensic Identification of Anonymous Sources in OneSwarm
papers.authors: George Bissias, Brian Neil Levine, Marc Liberatore, Swagatika Prusty
papers.abstract: OneSwarm is a p2p system for anonymous file sharing. We quantify the system’s vulnerability to three attacks that identify the sources of files. First, we detail and prove that a timing attack allows a single attacker to investigate all its neighbors for possession of specific files. We prove the attack is possible due to OneSwarm’s design and is unthwarted by changes made to OneSwarm since we released our attack. Second, we show that OneSwarm is much more vulnerable to a collusion attack than previously reported, and we quantify the attack’s success given a file’s popularity, a factor not evaluated earlier. Third, we present a novel application of a known TCP-based attack. It allows a single attacker to identify whether a neighbor is the source of data or a proxy for it. Each of these attacks can be repeated as attackers quit and rejoin the network. We present these attacks in the context of forensics and the investigation of child pornography. We show that our attacks meet the higher standards required of law enforcement for criminal investigations.
papers.abstract_zh: OneSwarm是一个用于匿名文件共享的p2p系统。我们量化了系统对识别文件来源的三种攻击的脆弱性。首先，我们详细说明并证明了定时攻击允许单个攻击者调查其所有邻居是否拥有特定文件。我们证明这种攻击是可能的，是由于one sword的设计，而不是由于我们发布攻击后对one sword所做的更改。第二，我们表明OneSwarm比之前报道的更容易受到共谋攻击，我们量化了给定文件流行度时攻击的成功，这是之前没有评估的因素。第三，我们提出了一个已知的基于TCP的攻击的新应用。它允许单个攻击者识别邻居是数据源还是数据源的代理。当攻击者退出并重新加入网络时，这些攻击中的每一个都可以重复。我们在法医和儿童色情调查的背景下呈现这些攻击。我们证明，我们的攻击符合执法部门在刑事调查中要求的更高标准。
papers.title_zh: 法医识别Oneswarm中的匿名资源

papers.title: Incentivized Outsourced Computation Resistant to Malicious Contractors
papers.authors: Alptekin Küpçü
papers.abstract: With the rise of Internet computing, outsourcing difficult computational tasks became an important need. Yet, once the computation is outsourced, the job owner loses control, and hence it is crucial to provide guarantees against malicious actions of the contractors involved. One may want to ensure that both the job itself and any inputs to it are hidden from the contractors, while still enabling them to perform the necessary computation. Furthermore, one would check that the computation was carried out correctly. In this paper, we are not concerned with hiding the job or the data, but our main task is to ensure that the job is computed correctly. We also observe that not all contractors are malicious; rather, majority are rational. Thus, our approach brings together elements from cryptography, as well as game theory and mechanism design. We achieve the following results: (1) We incentivize all the rational contractors to perform the outsourced job correctly, (2) we guarantee high fraction (e.g., 99.9 percent) of correct results even in the existence of a relatively large fraction (e.g., 33 percent) of malicious irrational contractors in the system, (3) and we show that our system achieves these while being almost as efficient as running the job locally (e.g., with only 3 percent overhead). Such a high correctness guarantee was not known to be achieved with such efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着互联网计算的兴起，外包困难的计算任务成为一种重要的需求。然而，一旦计算被外包，作业所有者就失去了控制，因此提供针对所涉及的承包商的恶意行为的保证是至关重要的。人们可能希望确保对承包商隐藏作业本身及其任何输入，同时仍然使他们能够执行必要的计算。此外，可以检查计算是否正确。在本文中，我们不关心隐藏作业或数据，但我们的主要任务是确保正确计算作业。我们还观察到，并不是所有的承包商都是恶意的；相反，大多数人是理性的。因此，我们的方法结合了密码学、博弈论和机制设计的元素。我们实现了以下结果:(1)我们激励所有理性订约人正确地执行外包工作，(2)即使在系统中存在相对大部分(例如，33%)的恶意非理性订约人的情况下，我们也保证高部分(例如，99.9%)的正确结果，(3)并且我们表明我们的系统在实现这些的同时几乎与本地运行工作一样高效(例如，只有3%的开销)。这样高的正确性保证在这样的效率下是无法实现的。
papers.title_zh: 激励对恶意承包商抵抗恶意承包商的外包计算

papers.title: Learning-Based Jamming Attack against Low-Duty-Cycle Networks
papers.authors: Zequ Yang, Peng Cheng, Jiming Chen
papers.abstract: Jamming is a typical attack by exploiting the nature of wireless communication. Lots of researchers are working on improving energy-efficiency of jamming attack from the attacker’s view. Whereas, in the low-duty-cycle wireless sensor networks where nodes stay asleep most of time, the design of jamming attack becomes even more challenging especially when considering the stochastic transmission pattern arising from both the clock drift and other uncertainties. In this paper, we propose LearJam, a novel learning-based jamming attack strategy against low-duty-cycle networks, which features the two-phase design consisting of the learning phase and attacking phase. Then in order to degrade the network throughput to the maximal degree, LearJam jointly optimizes these two phases subject to the energy constraint. Moreover, such process of optimization is operated iteratively to accommodate the requirement of practical implementation. Conversely, we also discuss how the state-of-the-art mechanisms can defend against LearJam, which will aid the researchers to improve the security of low-duty-cycle networks. Extensive simulations show that our design achieves significantly higher number of successful attacks and reduces the network’s throughput considerably, especially in a sparse low-duty-cycle network, compared with some typical jamming strategies.
papers.abstract_zh: 干扰是一种典型的利用无线通信本质的攻击。许多研究者从攻击者的角度出发，致力于提高干扰攻击的能量效率。然而，在节点大部分时间处于休眠状态的低占空比无线传感器网络中，干扰攻击的设计变得更加具有挑战性，尤其是在考虑由时钟漂移和其他不确定性引起的随机传输模式时。针对低占空比网络，提出了一种新的基于学习的干扰攻击策略LearJam，其特点是由学习阶段和攻击阶段组成的两阶段设计。然后为了最大程度地降低网络吞吐量，LearJam在满足能量约束的情况下对这两个阶段进行联合优化。此外，这种优化过程是迭代操作的，以适应实际实施的要求。反过来，我们也讨论了最新的机制如何防御LearJam，这将有助于研究人员提高低占空比网络的安全性。大量仿真表明，与一些典型的干扰策略相比，我们的设计实现了显著更高的成功攻击次数，并显著降低了网络的吞吐量，尤其是在稀疏低占空比网络中。
papers.title_zh: 基于学习的干扰攻击针对低矮的周期网络

papers.title: StreaMon: A Data-Plane Programming Abstraction for Software-Defined Stream Monitoring
papers.authors: Marco Bonola, Giuseppe Bianchi, Giulio Picierro, Salvatore Pontarelli, Marco Monaci
papers.abstract: The fast evolving nature of modern cyber threats and network monitoring needs calls for new, “software-defined”, approaches to simplify and quicken programming and deployment of online (stream-based) traffic analysis functions. StreaMon is a carefully designed data-plane abstraction devised to scalably decouple the “programming logic” of a traffic analysis application (tracked states, features, anomaly conditions, etc.) from elementary primitives (counting and metering, matching, events generation, etc), efficiently pre-implemented in the probes, and used as common instruction set for supporting the desired logic. Multi-stage multi-step real-time tracking and detection algorithms are supported via the ability to deploy custom states, relevant state transitions, and associated monitoring actions and triggering conditions. Such a separation entails platform-independent, portable, online traffic analysis tasks written in a high level language, without requiring developers to access the monitoring device internals and program their custom monitoring logic via low level compiled languages (e.g., C, assembly, VHDL). We validate our design by developing a prototype and a set of simple (but functionally demanding) use-case applications and by testing them over real traffic traces.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代网络威胁和网络监控需求的快速发展需要新的“软件定义”方法来简化和加快在线(基于流的)流量分析功能的编程和部署。StreaMon是一个精心设计的数据平面抽象，旨在可扩展地分离流量分析应用程序的“编程逻辑”(跟踪的状态、特征、异常情况等)。)来自基本原语(计数和计量、匹配、事件生成等)，在探针中有效地预先实现，并用作支持所需逻辑的公共指令集。通过部署定制状态、相关状态转换以及相关监控动作和触发条件的能力，支持多阶段多步骤实时跟踪和检测算法。这种分离需要独立于平台的、可移植的、以高级语言编写的在线流量分析任务，而不需要开发者访问监控设备内部并通过低级编译语言(例如，C、汇编、VHDL)对他们的定制监控逻辑进行编程。我们通过开发一个原型和一组简单(但功能要求苛刻)的用例应用程序，并在真实的交通轨迹上测试它们，来验证我们的设计。
papers.title_zh: Streamon：用于软件定义的流监视的数据平面编程抽象

papers.title: Verifiable and Exculpable Outsourced Attribute-Based Encryption for Access Control in Cloud Computing
papers.authors: Hui Ma, Rui Zhang, Zhiguo Wan, Yao Lu, Suqing Lin
papers.abstract: We propose two ciphertext-policy attribute-based key encapsulation mechanism (CP-AB-KEM) schemes that for the first time achieve both outsourced encryption and outsourced decryption in two system storage models and give corresponding security analysis. In our schemes, heavy computations are outsourced to Encryption Service Providers (ESPs) or Decryption Service Providers (DSPs), leaving only one modular exponentiation computation for the sender or the receiver. Moreover, we propose a general verification mechanism for a wide class of ciphertext-policy (cf. key-policy) AB-KEM schemes, which can check the correctness of the outsourced encryption and decryption efficiently. Concretely, we introduce a stronger version of verifiability (cf. [1] ) and a new security notion for outsourced decryption called exculpability, which guarantees that a user cannot accuse DSP of returning incorrect results while it is not the case. With all these mechanisms, any dispute between a user and an outsource computation service provider can be easily resolved, furthermore, a service provider will be less motivated to give out wrong results. Finally, we implement our schemes in Charm  [2] , and the results indicate that the proposed schemes/mechanisms are efficient and practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了两个密文策略的基于属性的密钥封装机制(CP-AB-KEM)方案，首次在两种系统存储模型下实现了外包加密和外包解密，并给出了相应的安全性分析。在我们的方案中，繁重的计算被外包给加密服务提供商(esp)或解密服务提供商(DSP)，只给发送者或接收者留下一次模幂运算。此外，我们还提出了一种针对多种密文策略(参见密钥策略)AB-KEM方案的通用验证机制，该机制可以有效地验证外包加密和解密的正确性。具体来说，我们引入了一个更强版本的可验证性(参见[1])和一个新的外包解密安全概念，称为可原谅性，它保证用户不能指责DSP返回不正确的结果，而事实并非如此。有了所有这些机制，用户和外包计算服务提供商之间的任何争议都可以很容易地解决，此外，服务提供商也不会给出错误的结果。最后，我们在Charm [2]中实现了我们的方案，结果表明我们提出的方案/机制是有效和实用的。
papers.title_zh: 可验证且可扣除的基于外包属性的加密，用于云计算中的访问控制

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of a Privacy-Preserving Aggregation Protocol
papers.authors: Marc Joye
papers.abstract: Privacy-preserving aggregation protocols allow an untrusted aggregator to evaluate certain statistics over a population of individuals without learning each individual’s privately owned data. In this note, we show that a recent protocol for computing an aggregate sum due to Jung, Li, and Wan (IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing, 2015) is universally breakable, that is, anyone is able to recover each individual’s private data from the corresponding ciphertext. We also describe an alternate collusion attack against their companion product protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 保护隐私的聚集协议允许不可信的聚集器在不了解每个个体的私有数据的情况下评估个体群体的某些统计数据。在本文中，我们证明了Jung、Li和Wan(2015年IEEE可靠和安全计算汇刊)最近提出的一个计算总和的协议是普遍可破的，即任何人都可以从相应的密文中恢复每个人的私人数据。我们还描述了另一种针对其伙伴产品协议的共谋攻击。
papers.title_zh: 隐私汇总协议的密码分析
